jp_dialogue: The deserted shrine on a summer day.<fix123>　　The sun had come back from its vacation,<fix123>　　and the shrine was enjoying long absent sunny days.<fix123><fix123>　　With no humans in sight, one could hear only the cicadas...<fix123>
<c$Reimu:$12345678> "Ah, this is how summer should be.<fix123><c$$12345678"> You wouldn't even be able to get any sunflower oil if it stayed that gloomy."<fix123>
<c$Reimu:$12345678> "Now, it'd be even better if people would actually visit the shrine..."<fix123>
<c$???:$12345678> "Quite.<fix123><c$$12345678"> Not much of a business without any customers, is it now?"<fix123>
<c$Reimu:$12345678> "You don't fall under 'people.'<fix123><c$$12345678"> It might be a bit better without your kind around."<fix123>
<c$Remilia:$12345678> "Oh my, how rude.<fix123><c$$12345678"> Even without me around, no human would<fix123><fix123><c$$12345678"> bother visiting a place as remote as this."<fix123>
<c$Reimu:$12345678> "Anyhow, aren't you supposed to be weak against sunlight?<fix123><c$$12345678"> Just turn to ash already."<fix123>
<c$Remilia:$12345678> "I brought my parasol."<fix123>
<c$Reimu:$12345678> "That's all you need?<fix123><c$$12345678"> ...What was the point of all that mist, then? (^^;"<fix123>
<c$Remilia:$12345678> "Hey, cut it out!<fix123><c$$12345678"> The sun will shine on me!"<fix123>
<c$Reimu:$12345678> "You could use a little time in the sun, don't you think?<fix123><c$$12345678"> You look sickly pale."<fix123>
<c$Remilia:$12345678> "It'll vaporize me before it tans me."<fix123>
<c$Remilia:$12345678> "Inhaling some of that vapor would<fix123><c$$12345678"> turn you immortal, by the way."<fix123>
<c$Reimu:$12345678> "...I think I'll pass."<fix123>
<c$Remilia:$12345678> "Won't you?"<fix123>
<c$Reimu:$12345678> "I'll settle for just 20 years' worth or so."<fix123>
It seemed as if this peaceful summertime would never pass.<fix123>　　This eternal shrine, too, seemingly stayed unchanged.<fix123>
Ending No. 3<fix123>

The deserted shrine on a summer day.<fix123>　　The sun had come back from its vacation,<fix123>　　and the shrine was enjoying long absent sunny days.<fix123><fix123>　　With no humans in sight, one could hear only the cicadas...<fix123>
<c$Reimu:$12345678> "Ahh, it sure is much hotter today...<fix123><c$$12345678"> I won't be able to get any work done!"<fix123>
<c$Reimu:$12345678> "...Then again, it's not like there's<fix123><c$$12345678"> any work to do with nobody around."<fix123>
<c$???:$12345678> "If you're feeling hot and bored,<fix123><c$$12345678"> let's tell each other ghost stories!"<fix123>
<c$Reimu:$12345678> "Ehh, that's pointless if I'm alone.<fix123>
<c$Reimu:$12345678> "Clearly not!!"<fix123>
<c$Remilia:$12345678> "That aside, this sure is one shoddy shrine."<fix123>
<c$Reimu:$12345678> "Shut it. This is how shrines are supposed to look."<fix123>
<c$Remilia:$12345678> "It's well-suited for ghost stories, no?<fix123><c$$12345678"> It'll cool you off."<fix123>
<c$Reimu:$12345678> "Why would I want to do something as dumb as<fix123><c$$12345678"> listen to ghost stories told by a monster in broad daylight?"<fix123>
<c$Remilia:$12345678> "We can wait until night, if it's of any help."<fix123>
<c$Reimu:$12345678> "Let's not."<fix123>
<c$Reimu:$12345678> "What's the story about?"<fix123>
<c$Remilia:$12345678> "Well... Once upon a time, there was<fix123><c$$12345678"> a girl who lived for over 500 years..."<fix123>
<c$Reimu:$12345678> "And? Who was she?"<fix123>
<c$Reimu:$12345678> "...Don't drink my blood, alright?"<fix123>
Peace was working to envelop the illusory summer.<fix123>　　Slowly but steadily, like moss covering the rocks by the riverside...<fix123>
Ending No. 4<fix123>
The deserted shrine on a summer day.<fix123>　　A shrine still lacking the sun's brilliance.<fix123>
<c$Reimu:$12345678> "I've had enough...<fix123><c$$12345678"> Will the mist not go away if I don't beat the culprit?"<fix123>
<c$Reimu:$12345678> "Why's it so cold, anyway?"<fix123>
Will the mist really disappear once she's taken down?<fix123>　　The scarlet summer of the ill-trained continued on.<fix123>
Bad Ending No. 1<fix123>　　Aim for a No Continue Clear on Normal or higher!<fix123>

Gensokyo in the summer.<fix123>　　The sun had come back from its vacation,<fix123>　　wiping away all of the mist in the air. <fix123><fix123>　　Thus, it shamelessly brought the Scarlet Devil Mansion and its few windows to light...<fix123>
<c$Sakuya:$12345678> "Ah, sheesh. It's so hot, and there's so much work...<fix123><c$$12345678"> This is why having the mist around was nice."<fix123>
<c$Sakuya:$12345678> "Ah, it's almost snack time...<fix123><c$$12345678"> Well, I can prepare it immediately if I stop time."<fix123>
<c$Sakuya:$12345678> "Yes, mistress, I'll be right there."<fix123>
<c$Sakuya:$12345678> "Sorry to keep you waiting."<fix123>
<c$Marisa:$12345678> "Thanks."<fix123>
<c$Sakuya:$12345678> "Today, we've got a rare tea from the Kandy region."(キャンディー is most likely "Kandy" rather than "candy" in this context.)<fix123>
<c$Marisa:$12345678> "Way too red for my tastes."(Black tea is called "red tea" in Japanese (紅茶), as well as Chinese.)<fix123>
<c$Sakuya:$12345678> "Not only that, the cake has some rare ingredients, too."<fix123>
<c$Marisa:$12345678> "...What'd ya put in there? (^^;"<fix123>
<c$Sakuya:$12345678> "Bamboo flowers, and such."<fix123>
<c$Sakuya:$12345678> "They normally bloom once every 60 years,<fix123><c$$12345678"> but I can manipulate time to make them bloom immediately."<fix123>
<c$Marisa:$12345678> "Does that make it any tastier?"<fix123>
<c$Sakuya:$12345678> "It makes it a rarity."<fix123>
<c$Remilia:$12345678> "Hey, what's with you acting as if you own the place?<fix123><c$$12345678"> And why are you eating my snack?!"<fix123>
<c$Marisa:$12345678> "'Cause it's yours."<fix123>
<c$Sakuya:$12345678> "Ah, I prepared some for you too, mistress."<fix123>
<c$Remilia:$12345678> "What's on the menu today?"<fix123>
<c$Sakuya:$12345678> "A rarity."<fix123>
<c$Remilia:$12345678> "Yay, it's my favorite!"<fix123>
<c$Marisa:$12345678> "Well, ain't you a picky eater. (sweat)"<fix123>
<c$Marisa:$12345678> "...Anyway, it sure is hot out today, huh?"<fix123>
<c$Remilia:$12345678> "Oh, look who's talking. The mist made it cooler,<fix123><c$$12345678"> but you made me get rid of it!"<fix123>
<c$Marisa:$12345678> "...Felt like a good idea back then."<fix123>
Today, too, the summer-colored fantasy brought time to a peaceful halt.<fix123>　　One can only wonder if its flow will ever resume.<fix123>
Ending No. 5<fix123>

Gensokyo in the summer.<fix123>　　The sun had come back from its vacation,<fix123>　　wiping away all of the mist in the air. <fix123><fix123>　　Thus, it shamelessly brought the Scarlet Devil Mansion and its few windows to light...<fix123>
<c$Marisa:$12345678> "...Well, this might be pretty interestin'.<fix123><c$$12345678"> I don't get a lot of it, though, 'cause it's in Esperanto."<fix123>
<c$???:$12345678> "What, you're here again?"<fix123>
<c$Marisa:$12345678> "I ain't."<fix123>
<c$Sakuya:$12345678> "Don't come in here to read without permission.<fix123><c$$12345678"> That counts as trespassing."<fix123>
<c$Marisa:$12345678> "I come here all the time, so why don't you just<fix123><c$$12345678"> go ahead and serve me some gross tea?"<fix123>
<c$Sakuya:$12345678> "We only have good tea, I'm afraid."<fix123>
<c$Marisa:$12345678> "And besides, books are meant to be read, right?"<fix123>
<c$Sakuya:$12345678> "Can you even read that one?"<fix123>
<c$???:$12345678> "Heeey, Sakuya? Where are you?"<fix123>
<c$Sakuya:$12345678> "Ah, the mistress is calling.<fix123><c$$12345678"> Hide for a moment."<fix123>
<c$Sakuya:$12345678> "I'm right here, mistress!"<fix123>
<c$Remilia:$12345678> "Oh, there you are. Are you cleaning?"<fix123>
<c$Sakuya:$12345678> "Yes, of course."<fix123>
<c$Remilia:$12345678> "I'm going out for a bit. Please take care of the mansion while I'm gone."<fix123>
<c$Sakuya:$12345678> "Make sure to take your parasol with you.<fix123><c$$12345678"> It's really sunny today."<fix123>
<c$Remilia:$12345678> "Of course. I'd be risking my life otherwise."<fix123>
<c$Remilia:$12345678> "That aside, the library really smells of rats."<fix123>
<c$Sakuya:$12345678> "Ah, don't worry about that.<fix123><c$$12345678"> Certainly, it might smell like dead rats,<fix123><fix123><c$$12345678"> but I assure you there are no dead rats here."<fix123>
<c$Remilia:$12345678> "Well, clean it up either way. Bye."<fix123>
<c$Sakuya:$12345678> "Take care, mistress."<fix123>
<c$Sakuya:$12345678> "Now then, there's a live rat to take care of."<fix123>
<c$Marisa:$12345678> "You talkin' about me?"<fix123>
The fantastic mansion showed no changes.<fix123>　　And yet, the summer breeze seemed like it wanted to make some.<fix123>
Ending No. 6<fix123>
Inside the gloomy forest.<fix123>　　A forest to which the sun had not yet returned.<fix123>
<c$Marisa:$12345678> "Dammit, talk about frustratin'...<fix123><c$$12345678"> It's really not like me to lose to such a small fry..."<fix123>
<c$Marisa:$12345678> "Man, I really wanted to try saying something like that."<fix123>
A dark summer. It seems like these sunless days will continue on for a while.<fix123>
Bad Ending No. 2<fix123>　　Aim for a No Continue Clear on Normal or higher!<fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Unlike you,<fix123>I'm not night-blind.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だから～、私は鳥目じゃない<fix123>って<fix123>って、そうじゃなくて、<fix123>あなたが、ここのご主人？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm telling youuuu,<fix123>I'm not night-blind.<fix123>...Right, so what I meant to say was,<fix123>are you the owner of this house?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お嬢様になんの用？<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>邪魔させないわ<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Then a not-so-dark person like you will do.<fix123>You're the ones spreading this mist<fix123>all over the place, right?<fix123>It's a nuisance.<fix123>What are you trying to do?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さて、早速仕事に取りかかって<fix123>貰おうかしら<fix123>言い忘れたけど私は、ここの<fix123>メイド長の咲夜。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well then, I'll have you<fix123>start working immediately.<fix123>I forgot to introduce myself.<fix123>I am Sakuya, the chief maid.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ってことは、私があなたを倒せば<fix123>メイド長ってことね<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おまたせ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sorry to keep you waiting.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>誰？前来た時は居なかったような<fix123>気がするけど・・・<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who are you? I don't think you were here when I came<fix123>last time...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>居たけど、見えなかったの<fix123>で、あなたはもしかして人間？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I was, but you couldn't see me.<fix123>So, are you a human?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、そうよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, that's right.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だましたりしてない？<fix123>人間って飲み物の形でしか見たこと<fix123>無いの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're not trying to trick me, are you?<fix123>I've only ever seen humans<fix123>in the form of a drink.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、人間だよ<fix123>人間は、紅茶よりは複雑なもの<fix123>なのよ。殆どの人はね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, I'm actually human.<fix123>Humans are a bit more complicated than black tea.<fix123>Most of them are, anyway.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほら、鶏って<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But, chickens...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あー？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>...even if you don't know how to cook them,<fix123>they're still tasty.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あんたんところは、人間を誰が<fix123>捌くの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>And who makes food out of humans<fix123>in your household?<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>I dunno? I don't think<fix123>my sister does...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お姉様？<fix123>レプリカとかいう、悪魔のこと？<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>レミリア！<fix123>レミリアお姉様よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Remilia!<fix123>My sister Remilia.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あいつは絶対に、調理は出来ない<fix123>と思うよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I doubt that your sister<fix123>can cook at all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>しないわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>She doesn't.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>妹君に言いたいけど<fix123>お姉様はいつも家の神社に入り<fix123>浸って迷惑なの<fix123>何とか言ってやってよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There's something I want to tell you.<fix123>Your older sister keeps intruding on my shrine<fix123>and being a nuisance.<fix123>Could you do something about it?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>知ってるわよ。<fix123>私も行こうとしたら・・・<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I know.<fix123>I wanted to go too...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>するな<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>止められた<fix123>お外は豪雨で歩けない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I couldn't.<fix123>It was raining too hard.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>要注意人物なんだね<fix123>過去になんかやらかしたの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You've got special needs, it seems.<fix123>Did you do something bad in the past?<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>I couldn't have done anything.<fix123>I haven't gone out even once<fix123>in the past 495 years.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほんとに、問題児なのね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A real problem child.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、パターン作りごっこね<fix123>それは私の得意分野だわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, the pattern-making game.<fix123>I'm pretty good at that.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Flandre Scarlet DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>見た？<fix123>これが神に仕えるものの力なのよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>See?<fix123>This is the power of those who serve gods!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そんなんで勝ったと思っちゃうんだ<fix123>まだまだこれからよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Don't go thinking you won with that.<fix123>There's still more to come!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>！？<fix123>って、もうそんな余裕も無いくせに<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>!?<fix123>Er, you're in really bad shape though.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はい、もう、煙も出ません<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, I can't even shoot smoke anymore...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いつでも遊びに来てあげるから<fix123>頼むから、神社に遊びに来ないで<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'll come play whenever you want.<fix123>So please, don't come to the shrine.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら、お礼にケーキと紅茶を<fix123>持って行こうと思ってたのに。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, and I was thinking of visiting you<fix123>with cake and tea, as thanks.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あんたの所の食べ物は人間の所に<fix123>もってきちゃだめだって<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Try not to bring your kind<fix123>of food to a human's place.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>甘さ控えめよ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's not too sweet, is it?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ノンシュガーでも！<fix123>良い子はおとなしく帰って<fix123>寝てなさい<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Not even if it's sugar-free!<fix123>Be a good girl. Go back home<fix123>and go to sleep.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>・・・ここは私の家よ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...But this is my house.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>じゃぁ帰らなくてもいいわ<fix123>悪い子は<fix123>私はそろそろ帰るけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So you don't need to go home.<fix123>Fitting for a bad girl.<fix123>I'm going home now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>悪い子は、帰らなくてもいいのよ[3]<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Bad girls don't need to go home.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>・・・神社にもう一人悪い子<fix123>置いてきたから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...I left another bad girl<fix123>at the shrine, after all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>悪い子って、誰のこと？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who do you mean, bad girl?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あんたと姉さんだ！！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You and your sister!!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>東方紅魔狂　～ Sister of Scarlet<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Eastern Scarlet Devil Lunatic ~ Sister of Scarlet[1]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 魔法少女達の百年祭<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Centennial Festival for Magical Girls<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Patchouli Knowledge ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>なによ<fix123>また来たの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What?<fix123>You are here again?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あんたかい？<fix123>これらの仕業は？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You?<fix123>Are you the one responsible for this?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今それどころじゃないのよー<fix123>あんたといい、妹様といい<fix123>今日は厄日だわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I don't have time for this...<fix123>First, the little sister, and now you.<fix123>This is the worst day ever!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Patchouli Knowledge DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>どうしちゃったんだ？<fix123>この館<fix123>今はレミリアは神社に居るはずだぜ<fix123>なんで、こんなに館の攻撃が<fix123>激しいんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What's going on<fix123>around here?<fix123>Remilia should be at the shrine right now.<fix123>So why's everyone attacking me<fix123>this intensely?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんかお呼びかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Did someone call me?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>呼んでないぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Nope.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Flandre Scarlet ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>おまたせ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sorry to keep you waiting.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あんた誰？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who're you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人に名前を聞くときは・・・<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Before you ask for a person's name...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、私？<fix123>そうだな、博麗霊夢、巫女だぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, me?<fix123>Right, I'm Reimu Hakurei, a shrine maiden.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>悪魔の妹<fix123>フランドール・スカーレット<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Devil's Little Sister<fix123>Flandre Scarlet<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>フランドールよ<fix123>魔理沙さん（巫女は無理があるわ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I am Flandre,<fix123>Miss Marisa. (You could never be a shrine maiden.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あんた、なにもん？<fix123>（看護婦の方が良かったか？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>And what are you?<fix123>(Maybe I shoulda said nurse?[2])<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私はずっと家に居たわ<fix123>あなたがこの家に入り浸ってる<fix123>ときもね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've been in this house the whole time.<fix123>Even the last time you<fix123>barged in here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>居たっけ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You were?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ずっと地下で休んでいたわ<fix123>４９５年くらいね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've been sleeping in the basement.<fix123>For about 495 years.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いいねぇ、私は週休２日だぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Cool, I only get weekends off.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いつもお姉様とやり取りして<fix123>いるの、聞いていたわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I heard that you often quarreled<fix123>with my elder sister.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お姉様？<fix123>妹君かえ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Elder sister?<fix123>So you're her younger sister.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私も人間と言うものが見たく<fix123>なって、外に出ようとしたの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I wanted to see one of these<fix123>"humans", so I tried to go outside.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>良かったじゃないか<fix123>ほれほれ、思う存分見るが良い<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, ain't you in luck.<fix123>Here, look as much as you like.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: U.N.オーエンは彼女なのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: U.N. Owen was Her?[3]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>一緒に遊んでくれるのかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Will you play with me?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いくら出す？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What's it worth to ya?[4]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>コインいっこ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>One coin.[5]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>一個じゃ、<fix123>人命も買えないぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>One coin?<fix123>You can't even buy a life with that.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あなたが、コンティニュー<fix123>出来ないのさ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I meant you can't<fix123>use a continue!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Flandre Scarlet DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>さー、満足した？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Satisfied now?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>嘘みたい<fix123>私が負けるなんて・・・<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This can't be true.<fix123>I can't believe I actually lost...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、割と嘘かもな<fix123>今日は、私はもう帰るけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yeah, it might be less true than you think.<fix123>I'm gonna go home for the day.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、満足したわ<fix123>でも、結局また一人になるのか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, I'm satsified.<fix123>But in the end I'll be all alone again.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>♪！<fix123>一人になったら首を吊るんだろ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>♪!<fix123>If you're alone, does that mean you'll hang yourself?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何でよ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Why should I?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>She went and hanged herself<fix123>and then there were none.<fix123>（一人が首を吊って<fix123>そして誰もいなくなった）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>She went and hanged herself<fix123><fix123>and then there were none.<fix123>(One hanged herself<fix123>and then there were none.)<fix123><fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>誰からそれを聞いたのよー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Where did you hear that...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>有名な童謡だぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's a famous nursery rhyme.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私の予定では最後の一人は<fix123>あなただったのよ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I had planned for you to be<fix123>the last one.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さっきの攻撃で、おまえが<fix123>消えたときだな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Right, when you went invisible<fix123>during that attack before.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>She died by the bullet<fix123>and then there were none.<fix123>（一人が弾幕を避けきれず<fix123>そして誰もいなくなった）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>She died by the bullet<fix123><fix123>and then there were none.<fix123>(One couldn't dodge the bullets<fix123>and then there were none.)<fix123><fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>当てが外れて悪かったな。<fix123>あいにく、弾避けは得意なんでねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sorry to disappoint you.<fix123>Unfortunately, I'm pretty good at dodging.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ま、いいけどね<fix123>首吊ったって死ねないから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, it doesn't matter.<fix123>I can't die, even if I hang myself.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>首吊り死体は醜いぜ<fix123>大人しく本当の歌どおりにしとけよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A hanged corpse is pretty ugly.<fix123>Why don't you do as the real song says?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>本当の歌って？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The real song?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おいおい、知らんのか？<fix123>She got married<fix123>and then there were none...<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wait, you don't know?<fix123>She got married<fix123>and then there were none...[6]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>誰とよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Marry who?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>神社の娘でも紹介するぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'll introduce ya to a girl at a shrine.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>白銀の春<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Spring of Silvery Snow<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Cherry petals must have fallen like snowflakes...<fix123>However, it was still silvery snow.<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Cherry petals should have fallen like snowflakes...<fix123>Yet it was still silver with snow.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 無何有の郷　～ Deep Mountain<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Paradise ~ Deep Mountain[1]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さむ～<fix123>いい加減にして欲しいわ<fix123>いつもならもう眠る季節だって言うのに<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's so cold...<fix123>When will this be over?<fix123>This is supposed to be the season for sleeping.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Letty Whiterock ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>春眠暁を覚えず、<fix123>かい？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>"In spring one sleeps a sleep that knows no dawn,"<fix123>was it?[2]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>冬の忘れ物<fix123>レティ・ホワイトロック<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What Winter Left Behind <fix123>Letty Whiterock<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どっちかつーと、あんたらの永眠かな？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If I had to guess, I'd say it is time for your kind's eternal sleep.[3]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ところで、人間は冬眠しないの？<fix123>哺乳類のくせに<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Don't humans sleep during winter? <fix123>I mean, you're mammals, after all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>する人もいるけど、私はしないの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Some people do, but I don't.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私が眠らせてあげるわ。<fix123>安らかな春眠<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Then I'll help you go to sleep. <fix123>A deep and peaceful sleep.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ～ぁ、春眠ももっと暖かく<fix123>ならないとねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, but for a nice deep sleep, <fix123>it needs to be much warmer.[4]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>暖かくなると眠るんなら、私達と同じだね<fix123>あと、馬酔木の花とかも<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If you sleep when it's warm, then you're just like us, aren't you? <fix123>Like the asebi flowers, too.[5]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: クリスタライズシルバー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Crystallized Silver<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うるさい、あんたみたいのが眠ればちったぁ暖かくなるのよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Shut up! If your kind would just go to sleep, it would warm up already!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Letty Whiterock DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あんま、暖かくならないわね<fix123>もう少し、激しい攻撃でもよかったのに<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That didn't warm me up very much.<fix123>She could have at least attacked a bit more fiercly.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>マヨヒガの黒猫<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Black Cat of Mayohiga<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>It wavered in the village in which people are not.<fix123>"MAYOIGA"(apparitional village) refused human always.<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>''It wavered in the village where people are not.<fix123>The ghostly village of Mayohiga always refused humans.''<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 遠野幻想物語<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Fantastic Tales from Tono<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はて<fix123>こんなところに家があったっけ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hold on,<fix123>did there use to be houses here?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Chen ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ここに迷い込んだら最後！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Straying into here means the end!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>凶兆の黒猫 <fix123>橙（チェン）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Black Cat of Bad Omens <fix123>Chen<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>最後？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The end?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それはさておき、迷い家にようこそ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Anyway, welcome to Mayohiga!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>で、何が最後？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The end of what?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>迷い込んだら最後、２度と戻れないわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Once you wander in, you can never return.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうですか<fix123>で、たしか、迷い家って<fix123>ここにあるもの<fix123>持ち帰れば幸運になれるって．．．<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see.<fix123>Well, I'm certain I've heard that items from Mayohiga<fix123>will bring you luck if you take them home...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なれるわよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>They will.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>じゃぁ、略奪開始ー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well then, the plundering starts nー<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんだって？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ティアオイエツォン(withered leaf)<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Diao Ye Zong (withered leaf)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ここは、私達の里よ<fix123>人間は出てってくれる？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This is our home. <fix123>Would you mind leaving, human?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>迷い込んだら、２度と戻れないわ<fix123>．．． は、どうなったのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Whatever happened to <fix123>"Once you wander in, you can never return"?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Chen DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>とりあえず<fix123>軽くて身近な日常品を探さないと<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>First of all,<fix123>I'll look around for some easy-to-carry everday necessities.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人形租界の夜<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>One Night in the Settlement of the Dolls<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Is that it is snowing only this paradise?<fix123>The paradise was already Alice's playground.<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Is it snowing even in this paradise?<fix123>The paradise that is already Alice's playground.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ブクレシュティの人形師<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Dollmaker of București<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Alice Margatroid ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Alice Margatroid LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>夜は冷えるわね<fix123>視界も最悪だし<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's really cold out tonight...<fix123>And I can't see a thing.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Alice Margatroid ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>冷えるのは、あなたの春度が足りないから<fix123>じゃなくて？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Is your level of spring insufficient even to push away this cold?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>七色の人形使い<fix123>アリス・マーガトロイド<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Seven-Colored Puppeteer <fix123>Alice Margatroid<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いや、足りないかも知れないけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, that might be true.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>しばらくぶりね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Long time no see.[6]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さっき遭ったばかりだってば<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We've only just met.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いや、そういう意味じゃなくて<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, that's not what I meant.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>しばらく巨人？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Long time no visibility?[7]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私のこと覚えてないの？<fix123>まぁ、どうでもいいけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Don't you remember me?<fix123>Well, either way is fine though.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それはともかく、春度って何？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Setting that aside, what did you mean by "level of spring"?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どれだけ、あなたの頭が春なのかの度合いよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I was referring to the springtime in your head.[8]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あんまり、高くても嫌だなぁ<fix123>でも、どうしてこんなに冬が長くなったのよ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I hope mine's not too high.<fix123>Still, why has this winter been so long?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>春度を集めてる奴が居るからよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There's someone who's gathering the spring.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あんたは関係無いわけ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>And you have nothing to do with it?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あるわけ無いわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Of course not.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>じゃ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Bye.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ちょっと！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 人形裁判　～ 人の形弄びし少女<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Doll Judgement ~ The Girl who Played with People's Shapes<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>折角、旧友と出あったと言うのに<fix123>手土産はあんたの命だけかい？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>And we've only just met after so long, old friend.<fix123>Have you only brought me your life as a gift?[9]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>誰があんたみたいな七色魔法莫迦と旧友なのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>And why am I being called "old friend" by this seven-colored magical moron?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>所詮、巫女は二色<fix123>その力は私の二割八分六厘にも満たない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>In the end, shrine maidens are two colors.<fix123>Your power is only twenty-eight-point-five-seven-one-four percent as powerful as mine.[10]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Alice Margatroid DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>春度っていうのは<fix123>この桜の花びらのことかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>By "spring",<fix123>were you referring to these cherry petals?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>判ってて集めてたんじゃないの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You were gathering them without knowing it?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いや、まぁ、うん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, I mean, uh... yes.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>雲の上の桜花結界<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Cherry Blossom Barrier from Above the Clouds<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Cherry petal has been coming down from over the cloud.<fix123>Does "Reisyouden"(Legendary place) exist really?<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Cherry petals have been falling from above the clouds.<fix123>Does "Reishouden", the legendary place, really exist?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 天空の花の都<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Capital City of Flowers in the Sky<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それにしても<fix123>雲の上まで桜が舞ってるのは何故？<fix123>・・・<fix123>・・・<fix123>いつもだったらここで、誰かが答えて<fix123>くれるんですけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So anyhow...<fix123>Why are cherry blossoms fluttering up above the clouds?<fix123>...<fix123>...<fix123>Doesn't someone usually pop out with a response <fix123>at a time like this?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Lunasa Prismriver ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ああ、分ったよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yeah, ok.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>騒霊ヴァイオリスト<fix123>ルナサ・プリズムリバー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Poltergeist Violinist <fix123>Lunasa Prismriver<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほら、それはアレだ<fix123>この辺はこの季節になると気圧が・・・<fix123>下がる<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>See, it's that.<fix123>Around here when the season changes the atmospheric pressure...<fix123>lowers.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんかテンションも下がりそうね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It looks like our excitement is about to lower as well.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おっと、用が無いわけじゃないので帰らないわよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, I have business here. I'm not going home yet.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>誰もそんなこと言おうとしていない<fix123>上昇気流と言いたかっただけ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Nobody's telling you to.<fix123>I just meant that there are ascending air currents, you see.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ともかく、どう見てもこの門の先が目的地っぽいんだけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I mean, it just seems that my destination lies behind this gate.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>姉さんってば早いって<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're hurrying too much, sister.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Merlin Prismriver ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Lyrica Prismriver ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>騒霊トランペッター<fix123>メルラン・プリズムリバー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Poltergeist Trumpeter <fix123>Merlin Prismriver<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それ、誰？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>And who is that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>上昇気流<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>An ascending air current.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>騒霊キーボーディスト<fix123>リリカ・プリズムリバー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Poltergeist Keyboardist <fix123>Lyrica Prismriver<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私達の天敵ねー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Our natural enemyー<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おそらく、それは違う<fix123>で、あんたら何者？<fix123>ここはどこなのよ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Perhaps not.<fix123>So, what the hell are you people? <fix123>And what is this place anyway?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 幽霊楽団　～ Phantom Ensemble<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Phantom Band ~ Phantom Ensemble<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私達は騒霊演奏隊～<fix123>お呼ばれで来たの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We are the Poltergeist Musical Performance Ensemble~ <fix123>We were called here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>これからお屋敷でお花見よ<fix123>私達は音楽で盛り上げるの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There will be a cherry blossom viewing at the mansion. <fix123>We will enliven it with music.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>でも、あなたは演奏できない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You, however, can't perform.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私もお花見したいわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But I wanna go flower-viewing, too.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あなたはお呼びでない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You have not been invited.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>幽霊にお呼ばれ、ねぇ<fix123>あんまりされたくないなぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Invited by phantoms? <fix123>I wouldn't like that anyway.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>雑音は、始末するまで<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Unwanted noise should be drowned out.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>がんばってね～<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Good luck~<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>手助け歓迎中よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Any assistance will be welcome.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Prismriver Sisters DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>やった、お花見権確保！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Alright!  I can attend the flower-view event!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>で、目的はお花見ジャック？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So, is your purpose "Hijacking the flower-view event"?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何か違った気もする・・・<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I feel like something is wrong...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>白玉楼階段の幻闘<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Spirit Battle on the Staircase of Hakugyokurou<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>The girl lived in the world after death.<fix123>They were a half of a phantom and human...<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The girl lived in the world after death.<fix123>She was half-phantom and half-human...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>願わくは<fix123><fix123>花の下にて<fix123><fix123>春死なむ<fix123><fix123><fix123>その如月の望月のころ<fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Let me die in spring <fix123><fix123>beneath the blossoms <fix123><fix123><fix123>at Kisaragi's full moon[11]<fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 東方妖々夢　～ Ancient Temple<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Eastern Ghostly Dream ~ Ancient Temple<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Youmu Konpaku ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あなた、人間ね<fix123>ちょうどいい<fix123>あなたの持ってるなけなしの春を<fix123>すべて頂くわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're a human, I see.<fix123>Just what I needed.<fix123>I shall drain every drop<fix123>of the spring from you!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Youmu Konpaku LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>この不吉な感じ<fix123>あんまり喜ばしくないわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This ominous feeling...<fix123>doesn't make me happy at all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Youmu Konpaku ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>みんなが騒がしいと思ったら<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So this is why everyone here is noisy...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>半分幻の庭師<fix123>魂魄　妖夢（こんぱくようむ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Half-fantasy Gardener<fix123>Youmu Konpaku<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>生きた人間だったのね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...it must be because of a living human.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>・・・まさかと思ったけど<fix123>ここって・・・<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...Don't tell me <fix123>this place...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>昔は生きていた者が住む処よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This is the place where the used-to-be-living reside.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あの世？<fix123>やっぱりお呼ばれしてたのかぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The world of the dead? <fix123>I see I've been invited somehow.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あなたは、まだお呼びではない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You have not yet been invited.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それにしても<fix123>こんな普通に、普通の人間があの世に入れたら、危ないじゃないの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>In any case...<fix123>How can a normal person enter the world of the dead so easily? <fix123>That's just too dangerous.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あんたが、結界を破って入ってきたんでしょ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You broke the barrier on the way here, didn't you!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あんな結界、普通に破れたわよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That one opened right up.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>入ってくるな、の意思表示に結界が張ってあったわけでしょ<fix123>「のぼるな危険」の鉄塔にのぼる子供じゃないんだから<fix123>勝手に結界を破って、勝手に危険とか言ってるんじゃないよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That barrier was a "Do not enter" sign...<fix123>You're like a kid climbing a pole that says "Don't climb".<fix123>Selfishly tearing it, then saying "That's just too dangerous"?<fix123>Nonsense.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>良く喋る幽霊だ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're quite a talkative phantom.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は半分は幽霊ではない！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm half non-phantom!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そっちを訂正するの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's what needed correction?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ともかく、あとほんの僅かの春が集まれば<fix123>この西行妖（さいぎょうあやかし）が満開になる<fix123>あなたが持ってきたなけなしの春が<fix123>満開まであと一押しするってものよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>At any rate, with just a little more spring,<fix123>the Saigyou Ayakashi will soon reach full bloom.<fix123>The small trace of spring that you've brought here...<fix123>will give us the last step needed.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>良く喋る半分は幽霊<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're quite a talkative half-phantom.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>話を聞いてた？<fix123>あなたはここで斬られておしまいなのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Were you listening to me?<fix123>I'm going to cut you down here, and you'll meet your end.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あの世で死んでも、あの世に逝くのかしら<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If I die in the world of the dead, would I still be sent to the world of the dead?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あんたは地獄逝き<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You will be sent to hell.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ、ここは地獄じゃないの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, so this place is not hell is it?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 広有射怪鳥事　～ Till when?<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Hiroari Shoots a Strange Bird ~ Till When?[12]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>・・・妖怪が鍛えたこの楼観剣に<fix123>斬れぬものなど、あんまり無い！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The things that cannot be cut by my Roukanken, forged by youkai...<fix123>are next to none!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Youmu Konpaku DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ここはもう十分に春じゃない<fix123>これ以上に何をしようっていうの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There's enough spring in this place already.<fix123>What else are you trying to do?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お嬢様が今年こそは桜を満開にするって・・・<fix123>西行妖が満開になるにはこの程度の春では・・・<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The young mistress would like to see perfect cherry blossoms this year.<fix123>This level of spring is not enough for the Saigyou Ayakashi to bloom fully...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>満開になると良い事あるのかしら<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>And is a full bloom a... good thing?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>厭離穢士<fix123>欣求浄土<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Loathing this unclean world<fix123>Seeking rebirth in the Pure Land<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>彼の世に嬢の亡骸<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A Maiden's Remains in the Other World<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほとけには桜の花をたてまつれ<fix123>我が後の世を人とぶらはば<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Please offer cherry blossoms to the Buddha<fix123>Should you wish to mourn for me in the other world[13]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: アルティメットトゥルース<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Ultimate Truth<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Youmu Konpaku ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>これ以上踏み込んで<fix123>お嬢様に殺されても知らないわよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Don't step any further!<fix123>Believe me, the young mistress will not hesitate to kill!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>殺されるのはあんたじゃなくて？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Kill who, exactly? You?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Youmu Konpaku DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ああもう！<fix123>死霊ばっかでうんざりよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Geez!<fix123>I'm so fed up with all these phantoms.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>勝手に人の庭に乗り込んできて<fix123>文句ばっか言ってるなんて<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Selfishly stepping into someone's garden only to speak complaints.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yuyuko Saigyouji ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>どうかしてるわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's not normal.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>幽冥楼閣の亡霊少女<fix123>西行寺 幽々子（さいぎょうじゆゆこ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ghost Girl in the Netherworld Tower<fix123>Yuyuko Saigyouji<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まぁ、うちは死霊ばっかですけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sure, my home is full of phantoms, yes.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さて、用件はなんだっけ？<fix123>見事な桜に見とれてたわよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now, what was my business here again? <fix123>The lovely cherry blossoms distracted me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お花見かしら？<fix123>割と場所は空いてるわよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Did you come for cherry blossom viewing?<fix123>We do have a few empty places.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ、そう？<fix123>じゃ、お花見でもしていこうかしら<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, really?<fix123>Well then, let's go have a look.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>でも、あなたはお呼びではない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You still are not invited, dear.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうそう、思い出した<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, yes, yes, I remember.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何かしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Remember what?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私はうちの神社の桜で花見をするのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'd rather have a flower-viewing event at my shrine.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そんなわけで、見事な桜だけど<fix123>集めた春を返してくれる？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>While it's true the flowers here are beautiful,<fix123>would you kindly return the spring you stole?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もう少しなのよ<fix123>もう少しで、西行妖（さいぎょうあやかし）<fix123>が満開になるの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Just a little longer.<fix123>A little longer and the Saigyou Ayakashi will be in full bloom...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんなのよ、西行妖って<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Just what is this Saigyou Ayakashi?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うちの妖怪桜<fix123>この程度の春じゃ、この桜の封印が解けないのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Our youkai cherry tree.<fix123>We still don't have enough spring to break the seal on its blossom.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>わざわざ封印してあるんだから<fix123>それは、解かない方がいいんじゃないの？<fix123>なんの封印だか判らんし<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's been intentionally sealed up,<fix123>so it's probably better not to mess with it, right?<fix123>Besides, we don't know what's sealed in it.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>結界乗り越えてきたあんたが言う事かしら<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How can you say that after breaching through our barrier?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まぁいいや、封印解くとどうなるっていうの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yeah, whatever.  So, what happens if you break this seal?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>すごく満開になる<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A perfect bloom will occur.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>と同時に、何者かが復活するらしいの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>And at that time, a certain someone will be revived.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>興味本位で復活させちゃダメでしょ<fix123>何者かわからんし<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Reviving people just for curiosity isn't good.<fix123>And again, we don't know who will be revived at all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら、私は興味本位で人も妖怪も死に誘えるわよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, I can invite humans and youkai to their deaths just for curiosity.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>反魂と死を同じに考えちゃダメでしょ<fix123>面倒なものが復活したらどうするのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Being able to bring death doesn't mean you know anything about bringing life.<fix123>What if you revive something really nasty?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>試して見ないと判らないわ<fix123>なんにしても、お呼ばれしてないあなたが<fix123>ここにいる時点で死んだも同然<fix123>というか、ここに居る事自体が死んだと言うことよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We can't know before we try.<fix123>And in any case, uninvited girl,<fix123>being here at this point in time is same as being dead.<fix123>Or more precisely, being here means you have died.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は死んでもお花見が出来るのね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Even if I'm dead, I can go flower-viewing.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あなたが持っているなけなしの春があれば<fix123>本当の桜が見れるわ<fix123>・・・何者かのオマケつきでね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If I could just have that bit of spring that you carry within you...<fix123>I could see real cherry blossoms...<fix123>...with that "certain someone".<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さて、冗談はそこまでにして<fix123>幻想郷の春を返して貰おうかしら<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Alright, enough joking around.<fix123>I will now take back Gensokyo's spring.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 幽雅に咲かせ、墨染の桜　～ Border of Life<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Bloom Nobly, Ink-black Cherry Blossom ~ Border of Life[14]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>最初からそう言えばいいのに<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You should have said so from the start.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>最初から２番目位に言った<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It was the second thing I said from the beginning.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>最後の詰めが肝心なのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The conclusion is the most important part.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>花の下に還るがいいわ、春の亡霊！<fix123>花の下で眠るがいいわ、紅白の蝶！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Return beneath the flowers, ghost of spring!<fix123><fix123>Sleep beneath the flowers, red-white butterfly!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yuyuko Saigyouji DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>身のうさを思ひしらでややみなまし<fix123>そむくならひのなき世なりせば<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My life might have ended knowing nothing of my misery<fix123>were this a world without the custom of priestly retreat [15]<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>BGM: ボーダーオブライフ<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yuyuko Saigyouji DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>Ending　No. 05<fix123><fix123>
The Youkai Mountain.<fix123>
The tallest mountain in Gensokyo.<fix123>
Dominated by the youkai, headed by the tengu.<fix123>
"That's good--!<fix123>
That's a ridiculous idea!"<fix123>
"Ri- ridiculous!?"<fix123>
"The market can only be opened under extraordinary conditions.<fix123>
It is under these conditions that it's possible to completely disown an item."<fix123>
"I get it. Hence, the festival."<fix123>
"That's right. You've got a great understanding of the market.<fix123>
Just as you'd expect from such an ancient person."<fix123>
"Don't call me an ancient person. I'm a god."<fix123>
"Oh, pardon my little joke.<fix123>
Well then, the matter of the next festival is decided.<fix123>
How exciting--"<fix123>
"Um, what were you talking about with Miss Kanako?"<fix123>
"Oh, weren't you listening?<fix123>
The next market will be held at your own shrine.<fix123>
Won't you look forward to it?"<fix123>
"Ah, I see?"<fix123>
"The god at your place.<fix123>
To say the least, she's a truly wild one."<fix123>
"Cutting down a tree on the edge of a cliff,<fix123>
Then bartering while running away.<fix123>
Just the thought of it can form a market!"<fix123>
"Aha... I see...?"<fix123>
"By the way, about those ability cards..."<fix123>
"Ability cards are just one of many products.<fix123>
A rather amusing and collectible one."<fix123>
"Amusing... is it?"<fix123>
"Something both fun to collect and sell.<fix123>
Together with Iizunamaru, we made such a product.<fix123>
I'm sure it'll be a hit in the upcoming market.<fix123>
Didn't you enjoy them too?"<fix123>
Though Sanae was a god in title,<fix123>
she didn't really understand their discussions.<fix123>
Apparently, the Moriya Shrine was to host a<fix123>market in the youkai mountain.<fix123>
And it was supposedly going to be quite festive.<fix123>
Are we using the market god, or being used by her?<fix123>
Are we using the great tengu, or being used by her?<fix123>
Is the Moriya Shrine being used, or is it the the other way around...<fix123>
As a business matter, it doesn't really make much sense.<fix123>
<c$Ending　No.07 — Mountain Alliance$><fix123>
<c$Congratulations!$><fix123><c$No Continue Clear!$><fix123>
The Youkai Mountain.<fix123>
The tallest mountain in Gensokyo.<fix123>
Dominated by the youkai, headed by the tengu.<fix123>
"...Well, of course."<fix123>
"...Really? But this is..."<fix123>
"...But, in terms of compliance..."<fix123>
"...If you think about it from a macro perspective..."<fix123>
"...Then the benefit to us will be..."<fix123>
"Agreed."<fix123>
"Then, it's settled."<fix123>
"Heh, heh, heh."<fix123>
"Hahaha."<fix123>
"What are those two talking about?"<fix123>
"Well, it's a business matter, isn't it?"<fix123>
"I have no idea what they're saying."<fix123>
"Eh, that's surprising.<fix123>
Even though you're the maiden of that shrine."<fix123>
"What do you mean by..."<fix123>
"It's a well-known fact that the god here loves<fix123>to jump on the bandwagon when others are profiting."<fix123>
"Oh, I see. I can imagine that."<fix123>
"And if you share a little of the riches with her,<fix123>she'll just sit back and overlook what you're doing.<fix123>
That's what Miss Iizunamaru said.<fix123>
Oops, that's a secret, okay?"<fix123>
"Hmmm."<fix123>
"Well, frankly speaking...<fix123>
It does help keep things peaceful around this youkai mountain.<fix123>
Hahaha."<fix123>
"This talk is over.<fix123>
Well then, let's go home."<fix123>
"Ah, yes."<fix123>
In the end, the ability cards were deemed harmless,<fix123>and in fact, beneficial to the mountain's economy.<fix123>
The Moriya Shrine began to endorse them as good luck charms.<fix123>
Sanae couldn't get Tsukasa's words out of her head.<fix123>
She started to distrust her own shrine, just the tiniest bit.<fix123>
Well, that's Tsukasa up to her usual tricks.<fix123>
<c$Ending No. 08 — Moriya Shrine's Master Salesman$><fix123>
<c$Congratulations!$><fix123><c$No Continue Clear!$><fix123>
The Youkai Mountain.<fix123>
The tallest mountain in Gensokyo.<fix123>
Dominated by the youkai, headed by the tengu.<fix123>
"Extra--! Extra--!<fix123>
A human was stranded on the Youkai Mountain!"<fix123>
It was Sanae Kochiya from the Moriya Shrine--!<fix123>
She was stranded due to sustaining too many wounds from danmaku--!<fix123>
Was this the work of some youkai who aren't satisfied with how the Moriya Shrine does things?"<fix123>
Sanae was carried to the Moriya Shrine by the tengu, while they laughed at her.<fix123>
There's nothing more embarrassing than this.<fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>The cherry trees were already in full bloom.<fix123>Yet the Japanese hearts were not yet satisfied.<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>ここで遭ったが百年目<fix123>今日は憑きたての<fix123>ほやほやだよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Finally, we meet again.<fix123>Today, I have now become... <fix123>freshly and newly possessed!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いつぞやの猫。死んだのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, I've seen this kitty before. Did you die to get here?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Chen DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>改めて見てみると<fix123>本当に広い庭だわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>When I look again,<fix123>it's really a large garden.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間の匂いがする～<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I smell a human~<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Ran Yakumo ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>すきま妖怪の式<fix123>八雲　藍（やくも　らん）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Shikigami of the Sukima Youkai <fix123>Ran Yakumo<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>違った<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, I'm mistaken.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>違わない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, you aren't.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>見た感じ、生きているようだが<fix123>あなたは死んでいるのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Apparently you're alive...<fix123>Well, I'm not really sure. Are you dead?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>見た感じで結構だけど<fix123>あなたは見た感じ、狐に見える<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Appearance is enough to judge.<fix123>And apparently you're a fox.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あなたは見た感じ、犬に見える<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>And apparently you're a dog.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>見た感じで物を言うな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Don't judge something by looks alone.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私も畜生どもと一緒にされたくはない<fix123>私はとある方の式神<fix123>式神とはいえ、そんじょそこらの妖怪より<fix123><fix123>力はある<fix123>ましては、人間や犬なんて<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Don't mistake me for a simple beast either.<fix123>I am the shikigami of a powerful master.<fix123>As such, my powers far exceed those of any youkai you've ever seen...<fix123>Not to mention those of humans. Or dogs.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>式神も狐も猫も大差ないわよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There's not much difference between shikigami, cats, and foxes.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どこから猫が出てきたんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>And where'd you see a cat?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ちょっと前に階段の脇から<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Just back there, near the stairs.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>飛躍しすぎ、何の話よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's a great change of subject.<fix123><fix123>What do you mean?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今度は、また階段の脇から狐よ<fix123>ここは大自然がいっぱいね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This time, I see a fox.<fix123>It's full of animals around here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>・・・橙に遭った？<fix123>丁度、探しているところだったのよ<fix123>あいつは、落ち着きが無いから<fix123><fix123>すぐ居なくなるのよねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...So you met Chen?<fix123>I've been searching for her.<fix123>She is always restless like a cat, and now she's disappeared.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>大変残念ですが<fix123>猫は山へ洗濯にいきました<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Too bad for you,<fix123>That cat went to the mountain to do laundry.[2]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>へぇ、そうなの<fix123>私も丘に帰ろうかしら<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Is that so?<fix123>Maybe I should return to the hills too then.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 少女幻葬　～ Necro-Fantasy<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: A Maiden's Illusionary Funeral ~ Necro-Fantasy<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>狐死してきゅう（丘）にしゅ（首）す<fix123>ここは「あの世」<fix123><fix123>丁度良かったわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A fox goes into the hills to die.[3]<fix123>As this is the Netherworld, it will be a fitting grave for you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふん<fix123><fix123>橙を苛めたのお前だろ？<fix123>橙は私の式神だ<fix123><fix123>その仇は取らないとな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ha.<fix123><fix123>I bet you are the one who tormented Chen, aren't you?<fix123>Chen is my shikigami.<fix123><fix123>I must take revenge for her.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>猫は妖怪の式神の式神か・・・<fix123><fix123>そんな程度じゃないかと思ったよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>She's a youkai's shikigami's shikigami?<fix123><fix123>I thought it was something like that.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Ran Yakumo DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>さぁ、丘でも何処へでも帰りなさい<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well then, go back to the hills or wherever.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>強い・・・<fix123>今ごろ、橙も式が落ちてへこたれてるん<fix123><fix123>だろうなぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ouch...<fix123>Chen's probably depressed too since she's no longer shikigami possessed.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>とりあえずは、迷惑かける奴は<fix123><fix123>退治したけど<fix123>迷惑の主が居るみたいなんだけどなぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So I've defeated these annoyances.<fix123>However, I sense there's a mastermind of this whole mess.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>紫（ゆかり）様～<fix123>そろそろ、私だけでは限界ですぅ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Help me Master Yukari~<fix123>This is more than I can handle...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>迷惑の限界？<fix123>あなたのご主人様は<fix123>自分の式神を放っておいて、何をしてるの<fix123><fix123>かしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>More annoyance than you can cause?<fix123>What exactly is your master doing,<fix123>leaving her shikigami running around like this?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>寝てる<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sleeping.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>起こせ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Then wake her up.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>起こすには丘へ帰らないと<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I have to go back to the hills in order to wake her up.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ここには居ないの・・・<fix123>迷惑な式神を使う迷惑な式神の主は<fix123>さぞかし迷惑な奴なんでしょうな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So she's not around then...<fix123>Master of such an annoying shikigami, eh.<fix123>I bet she must be even more annoying than this one.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>・・・否定はしまい<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...I don't deny that.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>とりあえず、起きたらまた来てあげますわ<fix123>それまでに、ちゃんと起こしておくこと<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Anyway, I'll be back when your master is awake.<fix123>In the meantime, wake her up properly.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>言ってることがおかしくないか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You aren't quite making sense.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いいから、起こせ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Just do it.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>しくしく<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>*sob*<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>The Border Between Youkai and Humans<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>三國に渡り妖異をなすが<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>また来たの？<fix123>今日はもう疲れたし<fix123>そろそろ寝ようと思っていたのに<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You again?<fix123>I'm tired today.<fix123>I was just about to go to sleep...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今度こそ眠らせてあげるわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'll let you really rest in peace this time.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Ran Yakumo DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>この辺りの治安は<fix123>昔からこうなのかしら<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So, is law enforcement around here<fix123>always like this?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あの世に法など無いの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There's no law in the world of the dead.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yukari Yakumo ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>死刑は出来ないですから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>As we can't have a death penalty here, of course.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら夜摩天（閻魔様の事）は？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, what about the Yama?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>夜摩天より力があれば<fix123><fix123>どうとでもなる<fix123>ここは、いや、ここもそういう世界なの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Should you be stronger than the Yama,<fix123>you could do as you please.<fix123>That's the way of this place... no, of all places.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>力とは経済力？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Stronger how exactly? Financially?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>智恵よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>In wisdom.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>で、智恵のあるあなたは誰？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, to which person of wisdom am I speaking?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>神隠しの主犯<fix123>八雲　紫（やくも　ゆかり）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Mastermind Behind the Spiriting Away[4]<fix123>Yukari Yakumo<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あなたの事は、藍から聞いたわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I heard about you from Ran.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら、私も有名になったものだわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, I've become famous now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>有名人であるあなたに、ちょっと会って<fix123><fix123>見たくてね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, I've always wanted to meet someone as famous as yourself.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それで起きてきたというわけ？<fix123>でも、サインも出来ないけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So much that it woke you right up, I see.<fix123>Sorry I can't give you my autograph.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いやぁ、直筆の二枚舌で結構です～<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's alright, your handwritten duplicity would be sufficient～<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>直筆？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...Handwritten?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ネクロファンタジア<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Necrofantasia<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あなたは気がついていない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You have not yet noticed.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あなたの智恵が無いことにですか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That you have no wisdom at all?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>極楽と地獄の境界が曖昧に<fix123><fix123>なっている事に<fix123>ここは鬼達の無法地帯に<fix123><fix123>なっている事に<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...That the borders between the pure land and hell are fading.<fix123>This place has become a lawless land of oni.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地獄だなんて、魔界より怖くない<fix123>鬼だなんて、悪魔に比べたらなんて<fix123><fix123>事も無いわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hell is not as scary as Makai.<fix123>Oni, compared to the devil, are nothing at all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あなたは此処から抜け出せない<fix123>それが無間地獄<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You cannot scurry away;<fix123>Beyond here only lies the worst of Hell.[5]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>大丈夫、一本の蜘蛛の糸さえあれば<fix123><fix123>極楽の境界を見つけられる<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's all right, as long as I have one thread of spider's silk,<fix123>I can find a way to Heaven.[6]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふふふ<fix123>その道が、蜘蛛の糸より細く<fix123>蜘蛛の糸より複雑な弾幕の道でも？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hahaha...<fix123>Even when the way through my danmaku is thinner,<fix123>And more intricate than any spider's web?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yukari Yakumo DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あ～、極楽極楽<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ahh, feels like I'm in heaven.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あんな道を通るなんて聞いてないです～<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I never expected anyone could make their way through～<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>蜘蛛の糸ったって、蜘蛛より大きな<fix123><fix123>昆虫でも捕まえられる<fix123>蝶でもね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A spider's silk can capture things far larger than the spider itself.<fix123>Like, say, a butterfly.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>やっぱりあれか<fix123>夜の蜘蛛は泥棒に入られる<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, so that's it. If you see a spider at night,<fix123>someone's going to raid your house.[7]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>泥棒とは人聞きの悪いわ<fix123>メイドの格好していれば、何処に忍び<fix123><fix123>込んでも、割と平気だけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Don't call me a thief.<fix123>Though I suppose with this maid uniform, it's quite unusual to get into trouble.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私の家に来ても何も無いですわ<fix123>同じ境にある神社よりはましですけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, at least there's nothing worthwhile in my house.<fix123>Still worth a lot more than the shrine on the same border though.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうで無くても<fix123>寝ているだけの家に何かあるとは<fix123><fix123>思えない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That goes without saying.<fix123>You wouldn't have anything in your house if all you ever do is sleep.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>失礼ね<fix123><fix123>色々あるわよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's rude.<fix123><fix123>My house is full of nice things.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さっきは何も無いと言った<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's not what you just said.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お布団とか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My futon, for example.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そんなもの誰も取りませんて<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Nobody's going to steal that...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>枕とか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>And my pillow.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>本当に何も無さそう・・・<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Okay, so there's nothing really...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>でも漂流物がよく届くわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But sometimes things wash up on the shore.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>海なんてあったっけ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...is there a sea around here?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>子供とか大人とか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Like human children. Or adults.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ちゃんと返してあげなさいね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You'd better return them to where they were.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: The Lunar Rainbow Market.<fix123>
A sky that belongs to no one.<fix123>
Tonight too a rainbow shines unusually across the moon.<fix123>
You want me to open the market?"<fix123>
"Indeed."<fix123>
"Hahaha, well, of course.<fix123>
I'd open it even if you didn't tell me to. When the time comes, that is.<fix123>
But why now?"<fix123>
"Our resident witch has finished her analysis of the ability cards,<fix123>
and reached the conclusion that they aren't dangerous.<fix123>
Therefore, you won't hear anything from us again."<fix123>
"Is that so? And you're sure that analysis is correct?"<fix123>
"Well, I'd rather trust one of our own researches rather than an outsider's words,<fix123>
but this and that are... separate issues.<fix123>
Something else has happened."<fix123>
"I see, I see... and what would that be?"<fix123>
"My lady became interested in the research results...<fix123>
And she would like to take a look at this so called market of yours."<fix123>
"Well if that's the case, she's always welcome!<fix123>
But?"<fix123>
"And that's where the main issue arises,<fix123>
my lady is extremely weak to both rain and sunlight...<fix123>
So going to somewhere with a rainbow is rather difficult on her."<fix123>
"Weak to rain AND sunlight, you say?<fix123>Well, that must be a tough life."<fix123>
"And so, I would like to request that<fix123>you hold the market at the Scarlet Devil Mansion.<fix123>
Indoors that is."<fix123>
Okay, okay, that's no problem.<fix123>
We can't have a rainbow indoors,<fix123>but I can open the market under conditions other than rainbows as well."<fix123>
"...such as?"<fix123>
"As long as some other special event occurs, the market can take place.<fix123>
Like a meteor impact, or a volcanic eruption...<fix123>
Well, just look for rare and special things at your home."<fix123>
A few days later, the market was held at the Scarlet Devil Mansion,<fix123>which had had its walls and ceilings painted rainbow.<fix123>
Seeing the eccentric and brilliantly colored building,<fix123>many guests visited the market.<fix123>
Being able to see the market, Remilia was satisfied.<fix123>
In addition, Patchouli was satisfied as well.<fix123>
After all, she was able to determine the conditions<fix123>under which the marketplace god can hold her markets.<fix123>
<c$Ending No. 05 — Rainbow Devil Mansion$><fix123>
<c$Congratulations!$><fix123><c$No Continue Clear!$><fix123>
The Scarlet Devil Mansion.<fix123>
A western mansion standing at the lakeside, where vampires live.<fix123>
An unhealthy looking building with very few windows.<fix123>
"...and the god disappeared at the same time the lunar rainbow did."<fix123>
"Hmm...<fix123>
And she claimed to be a god of marketplaces?"<fix123>
"Indeed..."<fix123>
"Allowing trade when a rainbow appears...<fix123>
What a peculiar condition.<fix123>
You can do business anytime you please, after all..."<fix123>
"It is rather strange."<fix123>
"And yet it is not all that uncommon in the world of magic.<fix123>
There must be a meaning to that condition."<fix123>
"Perhaps it makes it possible to sell things you ordinarily couldn't.<fix123>
Ability cards imbued with copies of certain abilities, for example.<fix123>
However..."<fix123>
"This card,<fix123>
it certainly seemed to be a magic item, but now it's just a piece of scrap paper."<fix123>
No matter how I stimulate it, no ability activates."<fix123>
"Is that so?<fix123>
How strange, I am certain that they worked when<fix123>I was fighting with them..."<fix123>
"And the magic imbued in the cards are all the same.<fix123>
I can't imagine how the cards would contain different abilities.<fix123>
Which would mean that..."<fix123>
"It was all your imagination..."<fix123>
"I haven't lied."<fix123>
I know."<fix123>
"You're not the only one talking about the cards' abilities after all.<fix123>
If that's the case, then there's only one possibility.<fix123>
It's that marketplace god's power.<fix123>
The secret is in trading them with predetermined rules."<fix123>
Patchouli soon separated the ingredients of the cards,<fix123>
and found out that one of the components are dragon gems.<fix123>
Upon hearing that, Sakuya remembered...<fix123>
That fight that she endured in the suffocating Rainbow Dragon Cave, up on the mountain.<fix123>
<c$Ending No. 06 — Conditional Magic Items$><fix123>
<c$Congratulations!$><fix123><c$No Continue Clear!$><fix123>
The Youkai Mountain.<fix123>
The tallest mountain in Gensokyo.<fix123>
Dominated by the youkai, headed by the tengu.<fix123>
"Extra--! Extra--!<fix123>
A human was stranded on the Youkai Mountain!"<fix123>
It was the maid of the Scarlet Devil Mansion, Sakuya Izayoi--!<fix123>
She wouldn't disclose why she became stranded,<fix123>
perhaps she was spirited away?"<fix123>
Sakuya was carried to the Scarlet Devil Mansion by the tengu, while they laughed at her.<fix123>
There's nothing more embarrassing than this.<fix123>
Bad Ending No. 11 Aim for a No Continue Clear!<fix123>
<fix123>妖怪の式の式<fix123><fix123>
