<fix123>ここで遭ったが百年目<fix123>今日は憑きたての<fix123>ほやほやだよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Finally, we meet again.<fix123>Today, I have now become... <fix123>freshly and newly possessed!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まだ、十日位だ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, it's only been ten days.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Chen DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あー<fix123>本当に騒がしいな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ahh,<fix123>What's all this commotion?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今夜も、楽しい宴の準備～<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>In this evening, let's do fun banquet preparation again~<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Ran Yakumo ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>すきま妖怪の式<fix123>八雲　藍（やくも　らん）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Shikigami of the Sukima Youkai <fix123>Ran Yakumo<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おおう、人間発見<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ooh, I see a human.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>宴の準備が楽しいのか？<fix123>変った奴だな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Preparations are fun?<fix123>You're a weirdo.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何言ってるの<fix123>「楽しい宴」の準備さ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What are you saying?<fix123>I mean preparation for "fun banquet".<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>物事は準備が一番楽しい<fix123>いや、そういう奴も居るんでね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I mean, some people DO.<fix123>Y'know, think that preparing is the most enjoyable part.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ところで、この辺で猫を見かけ<fix123>なかったか？<fix123>準備はあいつの仕事なんだが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Anyway, have you seen a cat around these parts, by any chance?<fix123>The preparations are actually her job.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>橙の事なら見かけなかったぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If you're talking about Chen, then no, I haven't seen her.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>やっぱりお前だな？<fix123>橙を酷い目にあわせた奴は<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Aha!  It was you, then!<fix123>You're the jerk who caused Chen trouble.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>失礼な、酷い目に合わせたのではない<fix123>目も当てられない状態にしただけだぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How rude.  I don't cause anyone trouble.<fix123>I only made her something too terrible to look at.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>橙は私の式神<fix123>式神ったって、安くは無い<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Chen is my shikigami.<fix123>Though she's shikigami, she's not so cheap.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>式神が式神を使うのか<fix123>共喰いか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Shikigamis use shikigamis?<fix123>Isn't that vaguely cannibalistic?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>誰が食べるなんて言ったのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I don't mean I eat her.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>とりあえず、お前を使ってる奴が<fix123>居るはずなんだよな<fix123>それが橙とか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Anyway, so what you're saying is that you, a shikigami, must have a master.<fix123>I bet it might be Chen?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そんな訳無い<fix123>ご主人様は、ぐっすりお休みですわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No way.<fix123>My mistress is fast asleep.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>「式神を使える式神」を使う奴にも<fix123>興味があるが<fix123>呼び出して貰えないか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Someone who can use a "shikigami that can use a shikigami" is surely interesting.<fix123>Mind if I speak to this mistress of yours?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は護衛でもあるわ<fix123>私の式神を目も当てられない状態にする<fix123>人を、ご主人様に会わせる訳が無い<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I am also her guardian.<fix123>And as such I have no intention of letting those who make my shikigami too terrible to look at meet her.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 少女幻葬　～ Necro-Fantasy<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: A Maiden's Illusionary Funeral ~ Necro-Fantasy<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>わかったぜ<fix123>お前も目も当てられない状態にすれば<fix123>良いんだな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, I get it.<fix123>Now I just have to make you too terrible to look at too.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何を分ったのか分らんが<fix123>目どころか、色々当てられない状態に<fix123>してやるよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I don't get what you think you "get".<fix123>Very soon, I will make you too terrible not to just look at but to do anything.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Ran Yakumo DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>さぁ、出て来い妖怪変化<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Okay, show yourself you youkai.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>げー、強い<fix123>これじゃ、橙が敵わないのも無理はないか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Gee, she's strong.<fix123>No wonder Chen had no chance against her.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前の主は何処に居る？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Where's your mistress?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>紫（ゆかり）様は、まだおやすみ中だ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My mistress, Yukari, is still sleeping.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あー？<fix123>自分の式神が目も当てられない状態<fix123>になっても、起きてこないのか？<fix123>起こせ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ahh?<fix123>She doesn't wake up even when her shikigami is in a mess?<fix123>Wake her up.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>といっても、紫様はここにはいないし～<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You say that, but she is not somewhere nearby~<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>遠隔操作型か？<fix123>それにしてはパワーが高い気がするが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So you're a long-distance type?<fix123>You have quite a bit of power for that type though.[2]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何の話よ<fix123>私は殆どの時間を式神の姿で暮らしている<fix123>そんじょそこらの妖怪よりは強いはず<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What are you talking about?<fix123>I've been in shikigami possession for quite a long time.<fix123>My power surely exceeds that of average youkai.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>とりあえず、お前には意味が無いことが<fix123>分った<fix123>どうすれば、そいつは起きる？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Okay, I understand that you're plainly worthless.<fix123>What should I do to wake her up?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>夜になれば目が覚める<fix123>私も殆ど寝てる姿しかみてないし<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>She will at night.<fix123>I only see her when she is sleeping, anyway.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>夜まで待つか・・・<fix123>とりあえず、楽しい宴の準備は<fix123>続けてくれて構わないぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So I have to wait till nighttime...<fix123>Well, you may go back to your preparation of the fun banquet.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>しくしく<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...sob sob...<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>The Border Between Youkai and Humans<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>また来たの？<fix123>今日はもう疲れたし<fix123>そろそろ寝ようと思っていたのに<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You again?<fix123>I'm tired today.<fix123>I was just about to go to sleep...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それは良い心がけだ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You really have dedication.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Strange.<fix123>Wicked strange.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何がでしょうか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What is strange?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yukari Yakumo ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>今宵の月の色の事かしら？<fix123>それとも<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The color of the moon this evening?<fix123>Or...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>月の明度だ<fix123>明るすぎないか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The moon's brightness.<fix123>It's too bright, isn't it?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>月の光は、太陽の光の反射<fix123>夜と昼の境界を繋ぐ、唯一の鍵です<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The moon is caused by a reflection from the sun's light.<fix123>That is the only key to the border between day and night.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>明るいのは、今が昼とも夜ともつかない<fix123>状態だというのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>By which you mean, it's bright<fix123>because it's neither day nor night now?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ただ、ここが雲の上だからじゃないかしら<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, isn't it just because we are above the clouds?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>で、誰だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>By the way, who are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>神隠しの主犯<fix123>八雲　紫（やくも　ゆかり）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Mastermind Behind the Spiriting Away[3]<fix123>Yukari Yakumo<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, I hear Ran caused some annoyance to you.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>To people in the Netherworld, rather than me.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, in that case,<fix123>I shall continue the rage.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>迷惑の親分か<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Another annoyance.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ネクロファンタジア<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Necrofantasia<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あなたは気がついていない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You have not yet noticed.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>This is the night of the new moon.<fix123>I hold the border between day and night in the palm of my hand.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>夕方の妖怪か？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are you a youkai of the twilight then?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そんなもん手の内にあっても・・・<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How would it help me if I could control that...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>明け方？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>or of the dawn?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あなたは、すでに私の結界の内にいる<fix123>ここに居る内は夜も明ける事はない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I already have you within my barriers.<fix123>As long as you're here, the dawn will never break.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんだ、夜桜の妖怪か<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What, are you the youkai of the night-cherry blossoms then?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私の結界を見つける手段は無い！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The edges of my barriers cannot be found!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yukari Yakumo DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>お、夜も明けそうな時間だが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, the time is almost sunrise.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>流石にもう疲れました～<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>And I'm really tired~<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>大したことも無い<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That wasn't that hard.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まだ、冬眠明けで体力不足なのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm still in bad shape as I've just awakened from my hibernation.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>冬眠前に蜂蜜でも大量に蓄えるのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Do you store a lot of honey before hibernation or something?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Humans.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>睡眠中は藍任せなんだけど<fix123>なんだか今年は目覚めが悪い<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Supposedly Ran takes care of work.<fix123>I feel like I had an unpleasant awakening this year.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>冬が長すぎたんじゃない？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Maybe because the winter was too long?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、そうか、それで人不足なのね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, yes, that's why there's a shortage of humans.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人不足って、用途合ってるような<fix123>・・・合ってないんだろうな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Shortage of humans, hmm... is it a correct usage of the word?<fix123>...or maybe not.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私なら、春と冬の境界を操る事くらい<fix123>容易いのに<fix123>あなたなんかに任せたから遅れたのね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's easy for me to manipulate the border between winter and spring...<fix123>It's your responsibility that it was taking so long to solve.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>誰も任されてなど居ない<fix123>それに境界を弄られたら、春一番が<fix123>北風になるぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I wasn't given responsibility to begin with.<fix123>Also, if you manipulate the border, the first spring storm will turn into north wind.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ご名答<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's right.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あと、お前が寝ながら（冬眠しながら）<fix123>起きる<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Or else, you could be awake while you're asleep (hibernating).<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>夢遊病？<fix123>あれも私の得意技なの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You mean noctambulism?<fix123>That's my hobby too.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>得意技って・・・<fix123>病ってついてるじゃないか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hobby, eh...<fix123>It's a kind of syndrome.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私がじゃなくて<fix123>人間を夢遊病にする<fix123>睡眠と覚醒の境界を弄るだけよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, not myself.<fix123>It's humans who get noctambulism.<fix123>With me manipulating the border between asleep and awake.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>便利な奴だぜ<fix123>それはそうと、そろそろ夜が明けて<fix123>も良いんじゃないか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's really convenient.<fix123>So, by the way, isn't it supposed to be morning by now?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>時間はもうとっくに日の入りね<fix123>夜なのはこの辺りだけ・・・<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's even closer to another sunset.<fix123>Only this place is in night...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>くそ、徹夜で目の下にクマが<fix123>謀ったな！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Crap, I've got bags under my eyes with this vigil!<fix123>You tricked me!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>謀ってない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I didn't.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>蓬莱人形<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Doll of Hourai<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>満月の下の、草木も眠る丑三つ時。<fix123><fix123>人間と妖怪の肝試しは、いったい何を恐れる？<fix123><fix123>最大の大罪の犠牲者は、いったいどこに居る？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Under the full moon, even the plants are asleep in the dead of the night.<fix123>Just what is there to be afraid of in this human and youkai's trial of guts? [1]<fix123>Just where is the victim of the greatest sin?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: エクステンドアッシュ　～ 蓬莱人<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Extend Ash ~ Person of Hourai<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Keine Kamishirasawa ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>待っていたぞ。<fix123>満月の夜にやってくるとはいい度胸だ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've been waiting.<fix123>You've got some guts, challenging me on the night of the full moon.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……肝試しでも、お前は怖くない！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...this may be a trial of guts, but I'm not scared of you!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あの人間には指一本触れさせない！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I won't let you lay one finger on that human!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Keine Kamishirasawa DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>急に……、攻撃が止んだ。<fix123><fix123>こういうときが一番怖いです。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The attacks just... stopped, all of a sudden.<fix123><fix123>This is when things are at their scariest.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>一際異彩を放つ、幽霊の姿。<fix123>こんな満月の下の草木も眠る丑三つ時。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A phantom, dressed loudly and conspicuously.<fix123>And in the dead of night, when even the plants are asleep under the full moon.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Fujiwara no Mokou ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>幽霊は珍しくは無いけど、その確かな姿、<fix123><fix123>目立つわね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Seeing phantoms isn't rare, but your appearance<fix123><fix123>definitely stands out.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うわ、出た！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wah, someone's there!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>妖夢、出たわよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Youmu, there she is.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>蓬莱の人の形<fix123>藤原 妹紅<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Figure of the Person of Hourai<fix123>Fujiwara no Mokou<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>幽霊に、出た、言われてもねぇ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Funny for a phantom to be saying that.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんだ、人間か。<fix123><fix123>間違って斬るところでしたよ。<fix123>って、こんな時間に人間？<fix123><fix123>やっぱり不自然よ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What, a human?<fix123><fix123>I was about to slash her by mistake.<fix123>...but, wait, a human at this hour?<fix123><fix123>That's definitely weird!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は最初からここに住んでいるの。<fix123><fix123>時間はともかく、貴方達よりは自然だわ。<fix123>で、貴方達は何の用かしら。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I live around here to begin with.<fix123><fix123>Time aside, you two are far more unusual.<fix123>So, what business do you have here?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私達は肝試しに――って、幽々子さま？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We're here for a trial of... uh, Lady Yuyuko?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>妖夢、そいつに近づいてはいけない。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Youmu, don't get close to her.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>幽々子さま……。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Lady Yuyuko...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そいつは、他の人間とは違う。<fix123>触れてはいけない。<fix123><fix123>その呪いで穢れてしまう。<fix123>食してはいけない。<fix123><fix123>その毒で呪われてしまう。<fix123>何より……。<fix123><fix123>私の術が効かない。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That girl is different from other humans.<fix123>Don't touch her.<fix123><fix123>Her curse will be passed on to you.<fix123>Don't eat her.<fix123><fix123>Her poison will curse you, too.<fix123>Above all else...<fix123><fix123>My powers can't affect her.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんか、酷く嫌われてるようね。<fix123><fix123>初対面なのに。<fix123>それに、いきなり術って、何をかけようと<fix123><fix123>したのかしら。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's a pretty sour way to talk about someone<fix123><fix123>you've only just met.<fix123>And what are these "powers", huh?<fix123><fix123>What were you trying to do?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>幽々子さまは、人間を死なす事が出来る。<fix123><fix123>それが効かないというのは――<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Lady Yuyuko can invoke death in humans.<fix123><fix123>But if it doesn't work on you--<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いきなり取り殺そうとしたの？<fix123><fix123>物騒な幽霊ね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So you tried to take my life right off the bat?<fix123><fix123>You're pretty dangerous phantoms.[2]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前は人間ではないな？<fix123>って、それじゃ幽々子さまが怯えている<fix123><fix123>理由が判らないけど。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Aren't you human?<fix123>Well, then, I don't understand why<fix123><fix123>Lady Yuyuko would be afraid of you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あいにくだけど、人間よ。<fix123><fix123>ただちょっと死なないだけ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Unfortunately, yes, I am human.<fix123><fix123>I just sort of can't die, is all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>蓬莱人……。<fix123><fix123>怖いわ、妖夢。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A person of Hourai...<fix123><fix123>This is scary, Youmu.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>肝試しに来るまではあれほど平気だった<fix123><fix123>のに……、何か変な物でも食べました？<fix123>まぁ、この場は私が何とかします。<fix123>怖いもん無しの幽々子さまが、こんなに<fix123><fix123>怯えるものがあるなんて思わなかった。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You were fine with this trial of guts up<fix123><fix123>until now... did you eat something funny?<fix123>Well, I'll just do something about this myself.<fix123>I would never have thought something could frighten<fix123><fix123>the unshakable Lady Yuyuko.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>幽霊と私では、相性が良くないのかな？<fix123>なんだか腹が立ってきたよ。<fix123><fix123>もう攻撃開始しようかな～。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Shouldn't I get along well with phantoms?<fix123>This is somehow irritating.<fix123><fix123>Maybe I should just start attacking now~?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>でも、何をそんなに怯えているんですか？<fix123><fix123>幽々子さま。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But what is so frightening about her,<fix123><fix123>Lady Yuyuko?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>蓬莱の薬を飲んだ人間は不老不死になる。<fix123>その不老不死の人間の生き肝を食すと、<fix123>その人も不老不死になる。<fix123>その生き肝を亡霊が食すと……？<fix123>死ねない亡霊が生まれるわ。<fix123>そして、蓬莱の輪廻は終る。<fix123><fix123>成仏も転生も出来ないし、薬も続かない。<fix123>まぁ食べなければいいんだけどね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A human who has drunk the Hourai Elixir will become unable to age or die.<fix123>If another human eats that immortal human's guts,<fix123>that person too will never age and never die.<fix123>And if a ghost eats them...?<fix123>An undying ghost will be born.<fix123>Thus, the cycle of Hourai ends. They'll never achieve nirvana<fix123><fix123>or reincarnate, and the elixir will stop along with them.<fix123>Well, I guess it'd be fine if you didn't eat them.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>じゃあ食べるなー！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Then don't eat them!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>全く、ふざけた幽霊達ね。<fix123>もしかしたら、幽霊になるとこんなに<fix123><fix123>おかしくなるのかしら？<fix123>死ねない私には確かめ様がないわね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My god, you're such noisy phantoms.<fix123>If I turned into a phantom myself,<fix123><fix123>would I be as crazy as you two?<fix123>I guess I'll never know, since I won't die.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>心配した私が馬鹿でした。<fix123><fix123>幽々子さまはやっぱり幽々子さまですね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I was a fool for worrying.<fix123><fix123>Lady Yuyuko is Lady Yuyuko, after all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>食べるかもしれないよ～。<fix123><fix123>目の前の不老不死の生き肝、美味しそうね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I might still eat them~.<fix123><fix123>Those eternally fresh, raw guts look pretty tasty to me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>幽々子さまの手の届かない処で始末します。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'll take care of what your powers can't reach, Lady Yuyuko.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>果たして、死人が私を斬る事が出来るかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Can the dead really strike the living, in the end?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>仲間を増やす事は出来ないかもしれないけど、<fix123><fix123>本当に死なないのか試させてもらうよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We may not be able to make you one of us,<fix123><fix123>but let's give this a try and see if you really are immortal.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>成仏を忘れた亡霊は新たな生を生まない。<fix123><fix123>死ねない人間は色鮮やかな冥界を知らない。<fix123>生まれ生まれ生まれ生まれて生の始めに暗く<fix123><fix123>死に死に死に、死んで死の終わりに冥し<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ghosts who have forgotten nirvana cannot be reborn.<fix123><fix123>A human who cannot die will not know the vivid Netherworld.[3]<fix123>As one really lives, lives, lives, she doesn't know the start of life.<fix123><fix123>As one really dies, dies, dies, she doesn't know the end or death.[4]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 月まで届け、不死の煙<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Reach for the Moon, Immortal Smoke<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>死を知らない私は闇を超越する。<fix123><fix123>暗い輪廻から解き放たれた美しい弾幕を見よ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>As I do not know death, I have surpassed that darkness.<fix123><fix123>See this beautiful danmaku, unchained from the dark samsara!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Fujiwara no Mokou DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>なんてこと！<fix123><fix123>もう体力の限界が……。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What the?!<fix123><fix123>I'm reaching my limit, here...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>不老不死でも体力には限りがあるのですね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Even if you're immortal, your body still has its limits.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さぁ、相手の動きが鈍くなってきたわ。<fix123><fix123>今よ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Okay, our opponent can barely move.<fix123><fix123>Now!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何の今ですか！<fix123><fix123>食べないんでしょ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What do you mean, "now"?<fix123><fix123>We're not eating her, right!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>死ねなくても、闘い続ける事は出来ないわ。<fix123><fix123>体のあちこちが痛い。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I can't die, but I can't keep fighting like this.<fix123><fix123>My body hurts all over.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>亡霊はいいわよ。<fix123><fix123>体は痛まないし。貴方もどう？　亡霊は。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Being a ghost is nice.<fix123><fix123>Your body never hurts. What do you say to being one?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人の話聞いてました？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are you even listening to me?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>死なない人間は面白いですね。<fix123><fix123>力一杯闘ってもいいという安心感があって。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A human that can't die sure is interesting.<fix123><fix123>I can use my full power without any hesitation.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら、貴方いつも手を抜いているのかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My, were you holding back the whole time?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いえ、滅相も無いです。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Good heavens, no.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それにしても、強い。<fix123><fix123>何でそんなに強いのよ。<fix123>みんな私より年下でしょう？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That aside, you're very strong.<fix123><fix123>Why is that?<fix123>I guess everyone's just younger than I am?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間には強さの限界があるからに<fix123><fix123>決まってるじゃない。<fix123>貴方は、いくら頑張っても幽霊に勝てない。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A human would obviously have limits<fix123><fix123>to their strength, wouldn't they?<fix123>You can try all you like, but you can't beat a phantom.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>幽霊はあんまり関係無いと思いますが、<fix123><fix123>むしろこっちは二人で闘ってい……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I don't think being phantoms had much to do with it,<fix123><fix123>but it was rather that there were two of us...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら、目の前に不老不死の生き肝が。<fix123><fix123>珍しいわね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, my. There's some eternally fresh, raw guts<fix123><fix123>before us. How rare.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>幽々子さま～。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Lady Yuyuko...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>しょうがない。<fix123>もう痛くて動けないし、<fix123><fix123>煮るなり焼くなり好きにしな！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, fine.<fix123>It hurts too much to move,<fix123><fix123>so boil me, roast me, whatever!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>煮ても焼いても駄目よ！<fix123>肝は、生で食すのよ。<fix123><fix123>煮ても焼いても蓬莱の効力は無くなるわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Boiling or roasting would be no good!<fix123>You have to eat the guts raw.<fix123><fix123>Boiling or roasting would neutralize the elixir's effect.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>じゃあ、焼きましょう。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, then, let's roast her.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>焼かれても死なないけどね。<fix123><fix123>ちょっと熱いだけ……、しくしく。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Even if you roast me, I won't die.<fix123><fix123>It'll just be kind of hot... *sob*<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ところで、何でこんなことになったん<fix123><fix123>だったっけ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>By the way, how did we wind up<fix123><fix123>in this situation, again?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方が肝試しに行く嵌めになったって<fix123><fix123>誘ったんじゃないの。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Didn't you say you wanted to take on<fix123><fix123>the trial of guts, and asked me to come along?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、それでですか。<fix123>だからさっきから生き肝、生き肝、<fix123><fix123>言ってたんですか。<fix123>肝試しは途中で中止です。<fix123><fix123>輝夜に騙されたのが判ったから。<fix123>輝夜は明らかに、この人間と戦わせたがって<fix123><fix123>いたんですよ。肝試しなんて嘘もいいところ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, right, that.<fix123>So why have you been saying "raw guts" this,<fix123><fix123>"raw guts" that for a while now?<fix123>I gave up on the trial already.<fix123><fix123>I realized it was just Kaguya tricking us.<fix123>She obviously just wanted us to fight this human.<fix123><fix123>The trial of guts was all a lie.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>中止？中断でしょ？<fix123><fix123>肝試しはこれから再開するわよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Gave up? You just paused, right?<fix123><fix123>The trial of guts starts again from here on.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>えー……<fix123><fix123>実は私、怖い物苦手なんですよぉ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Uhh...<fix123><fix123>Honestly, I'm bad with scary things...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほらあそこの竹の下に幽霊が……。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, look, there's a phantom under that tree...!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ひえぇぇぇ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Eeeeek!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>愉快な日本の神様<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A Merry Japanese God<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>守矢の神社（本殿）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Moriya Shrine (Inner Sanctum)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 明日ハレの日、ケの昨日<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Tomorrow Will Be Special, Yesterday Was Not<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kanako Yasaka ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あら、もしかしてこの先に進むつもり？<fix123>駄目よ永遠に眠り続ける私の友人が居るんだから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, do you mean to go further ahead?<fix123>You may not — there rests my ever-sleeping friend.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kanako Yasaka DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>途中、神奈子が言っていたな<fix123>やはり<fix123>この神社には何か別の神様が居るんだ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Kanako said it on the way in...<fix123>I knew it!<fix123>There really is another god in this shrine.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Suwako Moriya ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>＊おおっと＊<fix123>これは珍しい<fix123>神奈子が本殿まで人間を通すなんて<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, look at this!<fix123>What a surprise.<fix123>It's been a while since Kanako let a human into the inner sanctum.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いやまあ勝手に通ってきただけだけど……<fix123>お前は誰だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Uh, well, it's more like I let myself in...<fix123>Who are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>土着神の頂点<fix123>洩矢　諏訪子<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Highest of Native Gods<fix123>Suwako Moriya<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この神社の本当の神様よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm the real god of this shrine.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>本当の、だ？<fix123>またなんかドロドロしてそうだな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The real one?<fix123>It looks like things are getting all muddled again...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>表向きは神奈子の神社<fix123>でも、実質は私の神社<fix123>表向きには私の名前は殆ど出てこないけど<fix123>実際に神社で働いているのはこの私<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Outwardly it's Kanako's shrine,<fix123>but in truth it's mine.<fix123>My name isn't really mentioned publicly,<fix123>but I'm the one that does the work at the shrine.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それって……<fix123>言い換えれば、働いた分、全部神奈子に<fix123>持って行かれているって事じゃないのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But, that's...<fix123>In other words, Kanako's making off with<fix123>all the fruits of your labor?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>う<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Geh.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>神社与えられて喜んでいたら<fix123>美味しいところ持って行かれたとか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If you're giving up the shrine so freely,<fix123>you must have gotten something really nice in return.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうじゃないの<fix123>この神社は元々私の神社<fix123>ただ昔、神奈子に侵略戦争を仕掛けられて<fix123>神社を乗っ取られただけよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's not it.<fix123>This was originally my shrine.<fix123>But it's just that a long time ago, Kanako started up a vicious war<fix123>against me and took over it.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>乗っ取られただけって<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>She took over it?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今では、私への信仰心も増えたし<fix123>結果として感謝しているけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, faith in me has risen since then, so<fix123>I guess I'm grateful for that, but...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>神様の世界も大変そうだな<fix123>じゃ、この神社の秘密が少し判ったから<fix123>わたしゃこの辺で<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The world of the gods sure seems tough.<fix123>Welp, now that I know more about the secrets of the shrine,<fix123>I guess I'll just be...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ネイティブフェイス<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Native Faith<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何言ってるのよ<fix123>わざわざ本殿まで訪れた参拝客<fix123><fix123>只で帰す訳にもいかないでしょう？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What are you saying?<fix123>I can't just let a visitor leave just like that<fix123>after coming all the way to the inner sanctum, can I?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お、何か手みやげでもあるのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, do you have a present for me?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方は神社に踏み込んだのだから<fix123>早苗と神奈子にもしたように<fix123>私とも弾幕祭りを行う必要があるわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Since you made it into the shrine, you'll have to do<fix123>like you did with Sanae and Kanako...<fix123>You'll have to have a danmaku festival with me!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Suwako Moriya DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あはははは。天晴れだわ一王国を築いたこの私が、人間に負けるとは<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ahahahaha. Simply admirable for a human to defeat a god who's built up a country by herself.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>弾幕においては私が先輩だからな勝たない訳にいくまい<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm your senior when it comes to danmaku, so there's no way I could lose.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間でも神様と同等の強さを発揮できる弾幕ごっこ……<fix123>幻想郷には賢い事を考えた人がいるのね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>For a human to be on the same level as a god in danmaku play...<fix123>Gensokyo sure has some pretty sharp people.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>基本的にみんな頭が良いからな<fix123>一部を除いて<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's basically because everyone's really smart.<fix123>Well, almost everyone.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>よし決めた！私もこのまま幻想郷に住もうっと<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Alright, It's settled! I'll take up residence in Gensokyo, too.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そのつもりで幻想郷に来たんじゃないのかよまた帰るつもりだったのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Isn't that why you came here in the first place, or were you still thinking about going back?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>神奈子が勝手に神社ごとこっちに持ってきただけよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, Kanako moved the shrine here on her own, that's all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああそうかい<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, really?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>でも、神奈子には見えていたのかもね<fix123>幻想郷に、神様のセカンドライフが眠っている事を<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But, Kanako must have been able to see it...<fix123>That a second life awaits us gods here in Gensokyo.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おおっと、外の世界の現役の神様がみんなこっちに来られたらたまらんぜ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey now, it wouldn't be any good if all the gods from the outside came here, you know?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そんなに広くないし、外の世界で現役の神様は来ないと思うけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Gensokyo isn't that big, so I don't think that'd happen.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まあいいや。幻想郷に住むのなら宴会の一つでも開宴するんだな<fix123>そうでもしないと、妖怪達が納得しないぜ後、私とか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, whatever. If you're going to live here, try preparing for a feast once in a while.<fix123>The youkai won't stand for it if you don't. And I won't, either.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まあ怖い<fix123>それでは早速大宴会を企画しましょう４４本の筒粥を準備しますわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, scary.<fix123>If that's the case, we'd better start planning a big feast right away. I'll get 44 reeds for rice gruel right away.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お粥で宴会とは……外の世界の酒事情はカオスだな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A party with rice gruel... the outside world's drinking traditions are pure chaos.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: The Forest of Magic.<fix123>
A tough place for humans to live in, but perfect for beings of magic to dwell.<fix123>
Within this forest is a messy house that belonged to Marisa.<fix123>
You went to Miss Chimata after discarding all your cards?"<fix123>
"It was an accident! I picked that card by mistake!"<fix123>
"The marketplace god wanted to gain faith<fix123>
through monetary exchange...<fix123>
You essentially denied that even without thinking about it."<fix123>
"And now Miss Chimata is bedridden..."<fix123>
"What? Bedridden!?"<fix123>
"Yep, she seems to be having nightmares<fix123>of a robber who can't even engage in basic commerce."<fix123>
"A robber is a bit of an overstatement I think.<fix123>
Oh yeah, you're that great tengu's servant right?<fix123>What business do you have with me?"<fix123>
"Although it was just how things happened to end up, Master Iizunamaru is still<fix123>worried about sending you to the berserk god, Miss Chimata that is...<fix123>
Think of it as aftercare!"<fix123>
"How fishy..."<fix123>
"Even if you are indeed a brilliant card user<fix123>that enjoyed card games...<fix123>
Oh, to think Miss Chimata would attack you so relentlessly!"<fix123>
"Card games...?"<fix123>
"But I'm so glad you seem to be unharmed."<fix123>
"Actually, aren't you that great tengu's pet?<fix123>
Why'd ya go tattle on yer boss to the marketplace god?"<fix123>
"You can't be too suspicious with folks whose intentions you can't guess.<fix123>
What IS your goal, anyways?"<fix123>
"I don't know if you'd believe me...<fix123>
But it was all for the sake of profits.<fix123>
I always act with the best of Master Iizunamru's financial benefit in mind.<fix123>
And that includes coming to check up on you, Miss Marisa!"<fix123>
Welp, that's good enough for me.<fix123>
Thanks for caring."<fix123>
"Heheheh, you're welcome."<fix123>
Marisa had determined that the ability cards were not dangerous.<fix123>
Their abilities are limited and there's a condition to using them too,<fix123>so it's unlikely that they'd pose any threat to Gensokyo even if they continued distribution.<fix123>
Actually, considering that people just started to sell them on their own,<fix123>the goal might have been to make it so that it can't be stopped in the first place.<fix123>
If that's the case, then there's no other choice then to join in the fun.<fix123>
<c$Ending No. 03 — The Tube Fox Wins Marisa Over$><fix123>
<c$Congratulations!$><fix123><c$No Continue Clear!$><fix123>
The Youkai Mountain.<fix123>
The tallest mountain in Gensokyo.<fix123>
Dominated by the youkai, headed by the tengu.<fix123>
"Oh, so you're fine.<fix123>
I was worried about you."<fix123>
"Whew, that marketplace god<fix123>
was no joke!"<fix123>
"I'd imagine so..."<fix123>
"But I managed to defeat her one way or another.<fix123>
I hope that means the cards will stop being distributed for now..."<fix123>
"Heheheh, well thanks for that."<fix123>
"Sorry for keeping quiet about this,<fix123>
but it's not like defeating the marketplace god would stop it either.<fix123>
No one can control it now."<fix123>
"...I thought that might be the case."<fix123>
"Well whatever, it's not like the cards themselves are all that dangerous anyways.<fix123>
Once their magic runs out, they're just paper scraps."<fix123>
"Well, those cards are just toys after all."<fix123>
"You say toys, but they're still magic items.<fix123>
To think that you guys can make so many magic items<fix123>that even toys are made of them...<fix123>
How amazing... I mean, terrifying."<fix123>
"Heh heh heh, the mountain is plentiful with resources, after all.<fix123>
I bet you're jealous, but I've no mind to share with humans."<fix123>
"Oh yeah, I saw that Rainbow Dragon Cave mine thing."<fix123>
"...so you saw. Not a word to anyone else, please."<fix123>
"I heard from this strange woman with magatamas called Misumaru,<fix123>
that you were excavating magic items from the mine."<fix123>
"Misumaru...? Who's that?"<fix123>
"Huh? She's not the one mining there?"<fix123>
"She's not who I entrusted the mining to, no.<fix123>
Perhaps she's a looter? Can't overlook that."<fix123>
Megumu summoned her white fox servant, Tsukasa, and whispered something into her ear.<fix123>
And Tsukasa left with a happy look on her face.<fix123>
She likely went to investigate the Rainbow Dragon Cave.<fix123>
So Marisa decided to go investigate once again.<fix123>
And definitely not just because she was interested in the magic item mine.<fix123>
...right?<fix123>
<c$Ending No. 04 — The God Unbeknownst to the Great Tengu$><fix123>
<c$Congratulations!$><fix123><c$No Continue Clear!$><fix123>
The Youkai Mountain.<fix123>
The tallest mountain in Gensokyo.<fix123>
Dominated by the youkai, headed by the tengu.<fix123>
"Extra--! Extra--!<fix123>
A human was stranded on the Youkai Mountain!"<fix123>
"It was the magician Marisa Kirisame--!<fix123>
It seems she got lost on the mountain--!<fix123>
Climbing the mountain at night, is she sane--!?"<fix123>
Marisa was carried near the Human Village by the tengu, while they laughed at her<fix123>
There's nothing more embarrassing than this.<fix123>

<fix123>地獄のラブリービジター<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Lovely Visitor from Hell<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>守矢神社<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Moriya Shrine<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ラストリモート<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Last Remote<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Sanae Kochiya ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あら、この寒い中参拝に来たのですか？<fix123>うふふ私もここでの挨拶の仕方を学びました<fix123>この幻想郷では常識に囚われてはいけないのですね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, did you come to visit the shrine in this cold weather?<fix123>Hehe, I've learned how to do the greetings here.<fix123>You can't let yourself be held back by common sense in Gensokyo, right!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Sanae Kochiya DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>やっぱ冬山は寒いぜ<fix123>冬はこうでないとな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It sure is cold on the mountain.<fix123>I guess it's winter, after all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（冬は河が凍って生活しやすいんだ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(The rivers freeze over in the winter. It makes life easy for us.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>凍って生活しやすい？何でだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The rivers freezing makes it easy on you? Why's that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（凍った水面の下って実は暖かいんだよ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(It's actually warm underneath the ice.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>というか突っ込んでいいか？<fix123>何で私は山でもお前と交信続けてるんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Anyhow can I interrupt?<fix123>Why are you talking to me like this when I'm on the mountain?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（癖になっちゃった<fix123>　それに氷の河から出たくない）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(I guess it's become a habit.<fix123>Besides, I don't wanna leave the water.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ま、良いけどさ別に<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh well, whatever.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（核融合のエネルギーを分けて<fix123>　欲しければ文句を言わない事）<fix123>（制御鴉は手懐けたから後は山の神様に<fix123>　報告して使わせて貰うだけさ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(If you want a share of our nuclear energy,<fix123>stop complaining.)<fix123>(We tamed the crow in charge of it, so now we just<fix123>have to go tell the god of the mountain.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Koishi Komeiji ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あのーちょっと良いですか？<fix123>この神社の人を誰か見ませんでしたか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Um, excuse me?<fix123>Have you seen anyone from this shrine?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>見てないぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Nope.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（嘘吐け、さっきいたじゃんか）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(You liar, we just saw someone.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、さっき見たぜ<fix123>倒しちゃったが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, yeah, just a minute ago.<fix123>We beat her, though.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>倒しちゃった？何で？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You beat her? Why?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>挨拶だってさま、そんなもんだよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It was her way of greeting us, or something like that.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（うーん神様達、今日は居ないみたいだ<fix123>　また今度にしよう）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Hmm. It looks like the gods aren't here today.<fix123>Let's come back later.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？居ないんですか？　神様<fix123>困りましたね地下深くからわざわざ山の上まで来たというのに<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What? The gods aren't here?<fix123>Oh, no. And I came all the way up here from deep underground...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何だと？地下深くだと？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What? Did you say from deep underground?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>山の神様が留守なんじゃ、骨折り損ね骨折り損で……何が儲かるんだっけ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What a waste of time to come while the gods are out... What could I possibly gain from this?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、くたびれが儲かるんだな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, you gained tiredness.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>えー、まだくたびれてないわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh? I'm not tired yet.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（魔理沙、こいつも核融合の力を<fix123>　欲しがってるのかも知れない）<fix123>（要注意だ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Marisa, she might want to get her hands on<fix123>fusion energy, too.)<fix123>(Be careful.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>核融合？貴方、何で核融合の事知ってるの？<fix123>でもまぁ、山の神様ってこの神社で良かったのね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Fusion energy? How do you know about fusion energy?<fix123>But man, those mountain gods have a pretty nice shrine, don't they?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前……お前も核融合の力が目当てなのか！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You... are you after fusion energy, too!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（渡さん、渡さんぞー！<fix123>　やっちまいな！　魔理沙）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(We're not gonna hand it over!<fix123>Take her down, Marisa!)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まあ落ち着け<fix123>ただの参拝客かも知れぬ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, calm down.<fix123>Maybe she's just a normal shrine visitor.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふーん、貴方この間地底に降りてきた人間でしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmm, you're the human that came to the underground, aren't you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>閉じた故意の瞳<fix123>古明地 こいし<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Closed Eyes of Love<fix123>Koishi Komeiji<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お姉ちゃんが言ってたもん変な珠を持った人間が家を荒らしていったって<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sis mentioned a weird human with orbs that disturbed our home.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お姉ちゃんだと？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Your sister?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お姉ちゃんやおくうを倒したように私も倒したいならどうぞ<fix123>折角地底から出てきたんだからくたびれ以外の何かを儲けたいもの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If you wanted to beat me like you did Sis and Okuu, by all means.<fix123>Since I went to the trouble of coming up from the underground, I'd like to get something out of it.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（おい魔理沙<fix123>　何をしている？　さっさと追い返しな）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Hey, Marisa<fix123>What are you doing? Hurry up and get her out of here)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そ、そうだな<fix123>核融合の力は誰にも渡さんここから去って貰おうか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Y...yeah<fix123>I won't hand over the power of fusion to you. Get out of here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ハルトマンの妖怪少女<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Hartmann's Youkai Girl<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>良いわ、追い返したいなら私を倒してみる事ね<fix123>でもね、お姉ちゃんを倒したからっていい気になってちゃいけないよ<fix123>貴方の死体は地霊殿のエントランスに飾ってあげる！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm, if you want to turn me away, just try to beat me.<fix123>Don't get confident just because you beat my sister, though.<fix123>We'll decorate the entrance of the Palace of the Earth Spirits with your corpse!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お姉ちゃんって誰だろうな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who's your sister, anyway?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Koishi Komeiji DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>うへぇ強いわーこりゃお姉ちゃんが負ける訳だ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wow, you're really strong! I can see how my sister lost to you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お姉ちゃんってもしかして<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, is your sister...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うん？　判らないの？貴方、地霊殿に来た人じゃなくて？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh? Didn't you know? Aren't you the one who visited the Palace?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>やっぱり、あのさとりの妹かー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I knew it, you're that Satori girl's sister...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うん神様も居なくて骨折り損だけど<fix123>くたびれ以外の何かは見つけたわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yeah, I thought this would be a waste since the gods aren't in,<fix123>but it looks like I found something worthwhile after all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（お前は何しにここに来たんだ？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(So what did you come here for?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほら、おくうに核融合の力を授けた神様が山に居るって聞いて<fix123>私のペットにも何か力を与えて貰えないかなーと<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I heard that the god who gave Okuu nuclear fusion power lived on a mountain.<fix123>I was wondering if I could get some powers for my pets, too.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（残念だったね。多分、神様は山の為に<fix123>　ならない事はしないよ）<fix123>（核融合は山の発展に役立つと思って<fix123>　お前の所のペットを利用したに過ぎん）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(That's too bad. These gods probably won't do anything<fix123>that won't benefit them.)<fix123>(The only reason your house's pet got nuclear fusion power<fix123>is because it helped their plans.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>えーそうなの？つまんないのー<fix123>でもまあいいや面白い人間に会えたし<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What, really? That's boring...<fix123>Oh well, I got to meet someone interesting.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>面白いぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm pretty interesting.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今度、家に遊びに来てよ<fix123>面白い怨霊とか用意しておくから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Come play at my house next time.<fix123>We'll find some interesting spirits for you, or something.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふむ、行ってやっても良いんだがな<fix123>行く途中に障碍が多い気もする<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmm. I don't mind going...<fix123>But it could be pretty hard getting there.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>大丈夫だよ地霊殿の人と知り合いだって言えば<fix123>大抵の妖怪は避けるから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, don't worry. If you just tell people you're friends with the people at the Palace,<fix123>I'm sure most of the youkai will avoid you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（……相当嫌われてるんだね）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(... wow, everybody hates them.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お姉ちゃんは戦いは弱いけど、どんな妖怪にも恐れられているの<fix123>お姉ちゃんの名前を出せば、地底は自由に動けるわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My sister is bad at fighting, but everybody is afraid of her.<fix123>Just say her name, and you'll have free run of the underground.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だってさこれで自由に地底に行けるな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm, so does that mean I can go anywhere I want down there?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（いや、私はちょっと……）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Well, I, uh...)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おおそうか<fix123>お前は他にも苦手な奴がいたな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, yeah.<fix123>There's someone else who doesn't like you too much.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>誰のことー？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who's that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（何にしても私はいいや。また地底に<fix123>　行きたければ一人で行って）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Whatever, I'll be fine. If you want to go<fix123>back underground, you can go by yourself.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>一人でって、あれ？　貴方一人じゃ……もしかして多重人格者なの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>By yourself, what? Aren't you... Do you have multiple personalities?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今を以て、別人格は廃業だぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Nope, from now on I'm just the one personality.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>未確認飛行幻想物体<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Unidentified Flying Fantastic Object<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>夜の空<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Night Sky<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 夜空のユーフォーロマンス<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: UFO Romance in the Night Sky<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kogasa Tatara ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>うらめしやー！<fix123>この間は失敗したわ<fix123>人間を驚かすには、やっぱり夜じゃないとね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Booo!<fix123>I messed up last time.<fix123>You have to wait until night to surprise humans!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kogasa Tatara DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>うーん、さっきまで鳥の形をしていたのに<fix123>今は空飛ぶ獣……<fix123>なんなのかしら？<fix123>あの生き物は<fix123>ＵＦＯに乗っていたんだから、まず間違い無く<fix123>エイリアンだと思うけど<fix123>……<fix123>何か聞こえる……<fix123>理解できない声……<fix123>もしかして、エイリアンの声かしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmmm, it looked like a bird before,<fix123>but now it's a monster flying through the sky...<fix123>What the heck<fix123>is this thing?<fix123>Since it's riding in a UFO,<fix123>I think it's got to be an alien, but...<fix123>......<fix123>I can hear something......<fix123>A voice, but I can't understand it......<fix123>Maybe it's an alien's voice?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>??? ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>聖救出、おめでとう！<fix123>まさか、飛倉が妖怪退治を専門とする<fix123>人間の手によって集まるなんてね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Congratulations on rescuing Hijiri!<fix123>I never thought the fragments of the Flying Storehouse would be<fix123>found by a human specializing in youkai hunting.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ、謎の発光物体発見！<fix123>これは本当に宇宙人と遭遇したかー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, I found the mysterious shining thing!<fix123>Is this really an alien encounter?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nue Houjuu TRANSFORMS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>エイリアンって何だっけ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What's an alien?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あれ、日本語でした<fix123>最近のエイリアンはバイリンガルなのね<fix123>エイリアンってのは余り見た事のない<fix123>余所の国の人の事です<fix123>でも、一般的には宇宙人の事を指しますね<fix123>今じゃ、異質な人間なんて居ませんから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, wow, that was Japanese.<fix123>I guess all aliens are bilingual these days.<fix123>Well, alien really just means someone<fix123>from an unknown, far-off land.<fix123>But, usually it refers to space creatures.<fix123>Other humans just aren't that unusual anymore.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふーん、正体不明って事ね？<fix123>エイリアンも<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmm, so aliens<fix123>are something unidentified, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いやいや、意外とエイリアンも正体が割れて<fix123>いるらしいですよ？<fix123>リトルグレイとかオレンジとか、金星人とか<fix123>ちゃんと分類されて<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, not really, I mean, they've already classified<fix123>a bunch of different kinds of aliens.<fix123>Like the Little Greys, the Oranges, Venusians...<fix123>They're pretty well known.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>じゃあ、エイリアンも人間は怖がらないと<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Then, I suppose humans aren't afraid of aliens, either.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええ、会いたいと思っていますよ<fix123>セチの成功を願っていますから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's right, we'd like to meet them.<fix123>That's why I hope SETI is a success!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>セチ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>SETI?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>で、貴方は誰？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So, who are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>未確認幻想飛行少女<fix123>封獣　ぬえ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Unidentified Fantastic Flying Girl<fix123>Nue Houjuu<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は鵺、正体不明がウリの妖怪よ<fix123>正体不明は人間を怖がらせる事が出来る<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm a nue, the youkai best known as being mysterious.<fix123>I can scare people because they don't know my true form.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ぬえ……って、何かどっかで聞いた事<fix123>あるような<fix123>あ、もしかして、ゲームとかでも<fix123>良く出てくる化け物だ<fix123>確か……頭が虎、手足が蛇……だっけ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Nue...hm, I think I've heard of that before.<fix123>Maybe.<fix123>Oh, yeah, I think they show up a lot<fix123>as monsters in games, or something.<fix123>Let's see...head of a tiger, legs of a snake......?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>蛇に手足は無いでしょ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Snakes don't have any legs.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>鵺の正体みたりエイリアン<fix123>って事でいいかしら<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I wonder if I should just think of you<fix123>as an alien?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふむ、エイリアンの方が通りが良いのなら<fix123>それでいいわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm, well, if it's easier that way<fix123>I suppose it's not a problem.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>やった！<fix123>エイリアンに会ったって自慢が出来る<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes!<fix123>Now I can tell people I met an alien.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>怖がらないの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're not afraid?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さあ、天狗を連れてきますので<fix123>一緒に記念撮影しましょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now, I'll go bring the tengu, so shall we take<fix123>a picture together to commemorate the occasion?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 平安のエイリアン<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Heian Alien<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう、どのみち怖がってくれないのね<fix123>でも、怖がってくれないと私の心は餓える<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, it looks like you're not going to be afraid.<fix123>But if you're not afraid, my heart will go dry.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さあさあ、おめかしして<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Come on, let's get all dressed up.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>不思議に憧れる人間よ！<fix123>正体不明の飛行物体に怯えて死ね！！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now, you human who adores the strange!<fix123>Die from the terror of this unidentified flying object!!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nue Houjuu DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ま、まさか、幾ら長い間眠っていたからといって<fix123>こんな小娘にやられるとは……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I-I can't believe I've been beaten by such a young girl,<fix123>even if I've been asleep for so long......<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>やっぱり、あのＵＦＯに乗って<fix123>この幻想郷に来たんですか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I knew it, you came to Gensokyo<fix123>riding on that UFO, didn't you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>い、いや流石にそれは<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>W-well, indeed, I-<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何処の星から来たのでしょう？<fix123>やっぱり、高度な文明を持っているのかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What planet did you come from?<fix123>You must have a really advanced civilization, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いやまあ、それほどでも<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Er, well, I suppose.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>憧れます<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're so amazing.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>宇宙人に？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>An alien is?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええ、だって人間は月に行ってから４０年も経つ<fix123>というのに、火星にすら辿り着けないのですから<fix123>ええ、二十一世紀は宇宙の世紀だなんて言われて<fix123>いたんですけどね<fix123>今じゃ、外の世界は環境を守れだとか<fix123>景気対策がどうだとか<fix123>ばっかみたい<fix123>何の為に生まれてきたのか考えられない人ばかり<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, well, it's been 40 years since humans landed on the moon,<fix123>and we haven't even made it to Mars yet.<fix123>Everyone said the 21st century would be<fix123>the age of space flight, but...<fix123>All they're worrying about outside is saving the environment<fix123>and figuring out how to keep the economy afloat.<fix123>It's just crazy.<fix123>The world's full of people who don't even think about why they're here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>へー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それに比べて、幻想郷は夢が一杯だわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Compared to that, Gensokyo is a dream land.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私みたいな妖怪が人間を喰らい尽すつもりでも？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Even if youkai like me want to eat humans?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そ・こ・よ、そこ<fix123>そんなエキセントリックな出来事は<fix123>ここにしかない<fix123>エイリアンに出会えるのも幻想郷<fix123>ならではねー、さ、記念撮影しましょ？<fix123>さあ、付いて来てくださいな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>See, that's exactly it!<fix123>Something eccentric like that could<fix123>only happen here.<fix123>You could only meet an alien here in Gensokyo,<fix123>so, why don't we take that picture now?<fix123>Please come with me!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（まだ私をエイリアンだと思っているんだ）<fix123>ま、まあ良いけどね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(She still thinks I'm an alien...)<fix123>W-well, okay.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>付いてこないと置いていきますよー？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hurry up, or I'll leave you behindー!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>反逆ののろしを上げろ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Raise the Flag of Rebellion!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>命蓮寺<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Myouren Temple<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>神子の復活で聖なる者の力が強くなりすぎた！<fix123>今こそ妖怪は反逆を仕掛けなければならない！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>After Miko's revival, the power of the saint has grown too strong!<fix123>Now is the time to commence the youkai rebellion!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 妖怪裏参道<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Rear Temple Path of Youkai<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nue Houjuu ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>古の妖怪その１<fix123>封獣 ぬえ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Old Youkai #1<fix123>Nue Houjuu<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あーあ、あんな奴ら復活させちゃってさ<fix123>今、妖怪界隈は大騒ぎだよ<fix123>だから妖怪の切り札を呼び寄せた<fix123>お前はここで終わりだがな！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ahhh, those bums all resurrected.<fix123>The youkai world is in an uproar now.<fix123>So, I called in the youkai's trump card.<fix123>It's over for you right now, though!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nue Houjuu DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>妖怪の切り札だって？<fix123><fix123>そもそも神子さん達は<fix123><fix123>妖怪じゃなかったのね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The youkai's trump card?<fix123>So I guess Miss Miko's group<fix123>weren't youkai after all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほいほい<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hello, there!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mamizou Futatsuiwa ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>なんじゃおぬしは<fix123>妖怪か？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What might you be?<fix123>Are you a youkai?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>えーっと、半分妖怪みたいな……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ummm, well, I'm kind of like a half youkai......<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふむ煮え切らぬな<fix123>何でも聖人の復活で妖怪達が<fix123>怯えてしまっているそうじゃないか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm, how indecisive.<fix123>I've been told the youkai are in fear of<fix123>the resurrection of that saint.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>化け狸 十変化<fix123>二ッ岩 マミゾウ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Bake-danuki with Ten Transformations<fix123>Mamizou Futatsuiwa<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>儂が活を入れに来たぞい<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've come to give 'em a pep talk.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は大丈夫です<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, I'm okay.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>しかし、おぬしからは<fix123>妖怪のオーラが感じられぬ<fix123>本当に妖怪なのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>By the by, I don't sense the aura of a youkai<fix123>around you at all.<fix123>Are you truly a youkai?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>半分幽霊で半分人間です<fix123>妖怪って言っていいのかよく判らないですが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm half-human, half-phantom.<fix123>I don't know if you could call me a youkai or not...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>訳判らんな<fix123>まあいい、どのみち一流の妖怪として<fix123>儂が育て上げてやろう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm, I believe I don't understand.<fix123>In any case, why not allow me to train you,<fix123>as a first class youkai?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>遠慮します<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, thank you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 佐渡のニッ岩<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Futatsuiwa From Sado<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>聖人が復活して困っていると言ったのは<fix123>幻想郷の妖怪じゃないか<fix123>そんな煮え切らん姿勢では<fix123>危機は乗り越えられん！<fix123>儂の弾幕変化十番勝負で<fix123>みっちりと稽古を付けてやるぞ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Come, now, was it not the youkai of Gensokyo<fix123>that claimed to be in danger from that saint's return?<fix123><fix123>Don't expect to make it through these times alive<fix123>with such a half-baked response!<fix123>Allow me to do some strict training with my<fix123>ten-game match of danmaku transformations!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mamizou Futatsuiwa DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>おほん、ぅおっほん<fix123>う、うむ、もう十分じゃろ<fix123>もう十分強くなったな<fix123>免許皆伝じゃ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>*cough*, *cough*<fix123><fix123>Er, hmm, I suppose that will do.<fix123>You've gotten strong enough now.<fix123>Yes, you may now consider yourself an initiate!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>やれやれ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, honestly.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>しかし、そんなに強いのに<fix123>聖人を怖れるなんて何故じゃ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Still, if you have that much strength,<fix123>why would you fear that saint so?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は怖れていないですよ<fix123>もう戦って勝ちましたし<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I wasn't afraid of her.<fix123>I already fought her and won.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何じゃと？<fix123>それでは儂はなんの為にわざわざ<fix123>佐渡からやってきたというのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What was that?<fix123>Then, why on earth did I come all this way<fix123>from far-off Sado?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さあ？　ここのお寺の人に<fix123>聞いてみたらどうです？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who knows? Why not try asking<fix123>the folks here at the temple?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お寺？<fix123>しかし儂は化け狸じゃが……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A temple?<fix123>However, I'm a youkai tanuki...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ここの命蓮寺は妖怪寺なんです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, the Myouren Temple is a youkai temple.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんと、面白い話じゃ<fix123>妖怪退治をする神社と、妖怪のお寺か<fix123>ここは面白い場所じゃな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Is that so? How interesting.<fix123>A youkai exterminating shrine and a youkai temple...<fix123>What an interesting place this is.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ところで、さっき佐渡から来たって<fix123>言ってましたね<fix123>佐渡って何処ですか？<fix123>どんな場所ですか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>By the way, you said<fix123>you came from Sado, right?<fix123>Where is Sado?<fix123>What kind of place is it?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふぉっふぉっふぉ<fix123>儂の話が聞きたいかえ？<fix123>少し長くなるが良いか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ho! Ho! Ho!<fix123>Would you like to hear more about me?<fix123>Telling all might take a while.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>じゃあいいです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, nevermind, then.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いやいやそう言わずに<fix123>取り敢えずお寺に入って<fix123>休憩してから話して進ぜよう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Surely you needn't have said as much...<fix123>In any case, why don't we wait until<fix123>we've rested a bit in the temple to talk?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おめでとう！<fix123>これでエキストラステージはクリアです！<fix123>ちなみに既にノーコンクリアしたキャラでボムを３個以上残してクリアすると<fix123>いつもと違ったエンディングが見られます<fix123>（ノーコンティニュー＆ノーマル以上限定）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Congratulations!<fix123>You have cleared the Extra Stage!<fix123>By the way, if you clear the game again with 3 or more bombs in stock for a character that has already cleared the game without continuing<fix123>You will be able to see a different ending from usual.<fix123>(Only limited to 1cc's and for difficulties above normal)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: The Hakurei Shrine.<fix123>
A shrine on the outskirts of Gensokyo.<fix123>
This is the so-called "Youkai Shrine"<fix123>where youkai come more often than humans.<fix123>
"...the yin-yang orb."<fix123>
"So, you're the one who made my yin-yang orb...<fix123>
Is that true?"<fix123>
"But of course. Impressive, no?"<fix123>
"Well, I dunno about whether it's impressive or not..."<fix123>
"I am a god who makes her living off making jewelry.<fix123>
Not just yin-yang orbs. In fact, I mainly make magatama beads."<fix123>
"Huh, sounds like a boring job."<fix123>
"So, does that mean the yin-yang orb is made out of the same stuff<fix123>the ability cards are made of?"<fix123>
"In a broad sense, yes.<fix123>
They are both made out of Izanagi Objects."<fix123>
"And Izanagi Objects are...?"<fix123>
"Objects that held meaning back during the age of gods.<fix123>
Objects from an age when objects were free of ownership."<fix123>
"These objects themselves hold power equal to the gods themselves.<fix123>
Although it's fine to just call them magic items nowadays."<fix123>
"Oh, I've heard of those."<fix123>
"Many of these objects have been given names<fix123>
and new meanings, making them ordinary objects...<fix123>
But even more of them still slumber within the mountain."<fix123>
"Oh, in the mountain!<fix123>
Is it really fine to dig them up?"<fix123>
"I cannot say that it's truly fine,<fix123>
we have no idea what would get dug up after all."<fix123>
"Well stop doing it then!"<fix123>
"There seems to be a misunderstanding.<fix123>
I am not the one excavating the Rainbow Dragon Cave."<fix123>
"Huh?"<fix123>
"I was simply looking into whether the cave was dangerous or not.<fix123>
You could say that I was there for the same reasons you were.<fix123>
We were lucky that it was only dragon gems though."<fix123>
"Well that's a relief.<fix123>
The ability cards are limited in power and don't seem that dangerous anyways."<fix123>
It seems that only a small amount of dragon gems are included in the ability cards,<fix123>
so they can't continue providing abilities unless magic is resupplied somehow."<fix123>
That "somehow" was the equal exchange governed by the marketplace god's powers.<fix123>
In other words, their trade with money involved.<fix123>
The ability cards were, in the end, simple objects of entertainment<fix123>
made to secure funds for the great tengu<fix123>
and to gather faith for the marketplace god herself.<fix123>
<c$Ending No.01 — The Gods' Games$><fix123>
<c$Congratulations!$><fix123><c$No Continue Clear!$><fix123>
The Lunar Rainbow Market.<fix123>
A sky that belongs to no one.<fix123>
The rainbow created by the moon's strange glow was about to dissapear.<fix123>
"The rainbow will soon vanish. The market is over."<fix123>
"Market this, market that, what market is there!?<fix123>It was just a fight!"<fix123>
"Was "just a fight" unsatisfactory for you?<fix123>
It did not seem that way to me."<fix123>
"Ugh... well...<fix123>
That's not the point! There was no market!"<fix123>
"A so-called "market" is a special place where all ownership is lost temporarily.<fix123>A special place of revelry.<fix123>
In such places of revelry, we carry out events different from those of everyday events."<fix123>
"Well, I know that much at least."<fix123>
"Even regular acts of violence<fix123>
are a type of ritual in these places of revelry.<fix123>
In other words, they are no different from festivals held for a god."<fix123>
"Enough about the market!<fix123>
More importantly, the ability cards!<fix123>
What *are* they?"<fix123>
"The ability cards are a masterpiece I created along with the tengu.<fix123>
They mined for the dragon gems and I unlocked their powers, duplicated and distributed<fix123>them.<fix123>
They're great for trading, but are simply objects of entertainment after all."<fix123>
"Entertainment?"<fix123>
"Indeed, just for entertainment.<fix123>
What you do with them after you obtain them is up to the individual though..."<fix123>
"Everyone really likes the various characters of Gensokyo.<fix123>
I simply created cards that had similar magic within them,<fix123>they're quite topical right now."<fix123>
"Everyone's happily collecting them.<fix123>
By the way, the cards' abilities are limited<fix123>
and not nearly as dangerous as you think."<fix123>
"Hmm, well it does seem that they're just toys...<fix123>
But hasn't this gone too far?"<fix123>
"Heheheh."<fix123>
Chimata claimed that the ability cards were simply created for entertainment.<fix123>
It's not like Reimu believed her just like that,<fix123>
but it's true that she did feel that they weren't that dangerous through fighting with them.<fix123>
Chimata is the god of the marketplace.<fix123>
She earns faith through a prospering market.<fix123>
In other words, she should have gained power through the card trade.<fix123>
If distributing the objects was the goal itself,<fix123>then making appealing objects of entertainment isn't unfathomable.<fix123>
...but Reimu wondered,<fix123>
what would happen if she did something that was blasphemous to the market in front of Chimata?<fix123>
How would she feel if she threw away all the cards<fix123>
right before the market opened?<fix123>
Reimu's curiosity would never be satisfied.<fix123>
<c$Ending No. 02 — God of the Marketplace$><fix123>
<c$Congratulations!$><fix123><c$No Continue Clear!$><fix123>
The Youkai Mountain.<fix123>
The tallest mountain in Gensokyo.<fix123>
Dominated by the youkai, headed by the tengu.<fix123>
"Extra--! Extra--!<fix123>
A human was stranded on the Youkai Mountain!"<fix123>
"What's this!?<fix123>
It was the Hakurei shrine maiden, Reimu Hakurei!<fix123>
It seems that she was stranded due to oxygen deprivation--!"<fix123>
Reimu was carried to the Hakurei Shrine by the tengu, while they laughed at her.<fix123>
There's nothing more embarrassing than this.<fix123>
Bad Ending No. 09 Aim for a No Continue Clear!<fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Sorry, but we're going to have to stop you right here.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Let the soul repose performance begin!<fix123><fix123>
