<fix123>この嵐は自然の物ではないわ<fix123>強大な魔力が大気に<fix123>干渉した魔力嵐 (マジックストーム) ……！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The storm is clearly not natural.<fix123>Powerful magic is interfering with<fix123>the atmosphere and causing a magical storm...!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ようやく来たわね<fix123>人間のメイドよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You've finally come,<fix123>human maid.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Raiko Horikawa ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>打ち出の小槌の件は<fix123>私の耳にも届いているわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Even I have heard about<fix123>the Miracle Mallet incident.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あらそうでしたか<fix123>この異常な魔力嵐の中<fix123>貴方も苦しいでしょう<fix123>小槌の魔力を回収して<fix123>ただの道具に戻してあげます<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, is that so?<fix123>You must be having a hard time<fix123>in the middle of this storm.<fix123>I shall take the Mallet's magic back<fix123>and return you to being a tool.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>夢幻のパーカッショニスト<fix123>堀川雷鼓<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Phantasmal Percussionist<fix123>Raiko Horikawa<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ざーんねんね<fix123>ただの道具に戻る気なんて毛頭無い<fix123>それにもう手遅れよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Too bad.<fix123>Not a single part of me wants to return to being a mere tool.<fix123>And besides, you're too late anyway.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>手遅れ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Too late?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は呪われた小槌の魔力を抜いて<fix123>魔力を取り替えたのよ<fix123>もう打ち出の小槌の魔力<fix123>なんて必要ないの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I have replaced the cursed Mallet's power<fix123>with a different magic.<fix123>I no longer require<fix123>the Miracle Mallet.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>取り替えた……ですって？<fix123>そんなことが出来るの？　付喪神に……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You... replaced it?<fix123>Tsukumogami can do that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 始原のビート　～ Pristine Beat<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Primordial Beat ~ Pristine Beat<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あらあら<fix123>付喪神だから簡単に出来るのよ？<fix123>何故なら道具は使用者を変えれば<fix123>魔力が変わるんだからね<fix123>さあ試すとするか<fix123>私の新しい魔力を<fix123>さあ外の世界の使役者 (ドラマー) よ！<fix123>幻想郷に夢幻のビートを響かせよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My, my.<fix123>It's simple because I'm a tsukumogami.<fix123>Because when a tool's user changes,<fix123>their magic power changes, too.<fix123>Now, shall we test out<fix123>my new magical power?<fix123>Come, my drummer from the outside world!<fix123>Let your visionary beat resound throughout Gensokyo!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Raiko Horikawa DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あらららら<fix123>降参よー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How surprising!<fix123>I surrender...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふう<fix123>強かったわ<fix123>ちょっと気軽に退治するレベルじゃ<fix123>無かったわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wow,<fix123>you were pretty tough.<fix123>Not the<fix123>easily-exterminated type, I see.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まだ新しい魔力が使いこなせてない<fix123>のかな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I guess I still haven't mastered<fix123>this new magic yet.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ところで新しい魔力って……<fix123>もしかして<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This new magic...<fix123>I have a feeling I know, but what is it?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>外の世界の魔力 (ドラマー) よ<fix123>未知の力が次々と流れ込んでくるわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's a drummer from the outside world.<fix123>Strange power continues to flow through me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら危険思想ね<fix123>外の世界に干渉するなんて……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, that is a perilous idea.<fix123>Interfering in the outside world could lead to problems...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうかな？<fix123>でも私達道具には結界なんて関係無いもん<fix123>自然に行き来出来るのよ<fix123>ほら勝手に流れ着いたりしているでしょ？<fix123>外の道具が<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Is that right?<fix123>But things like borders don't mean anything to us tools.<fix123>We can come and go as we please.<fix123>Tools from the outside float here<fix123>on their own all the time, don't they?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふーん　って付喪神になったから<fix123>もうそういう訳にはいかないんじゃない？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmmm... Wait, since you are a tsukumogami now,<fix123>that does not apply to you anymore, correct?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ<fix123>そうかも……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh.<fix123>Maybe...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どうする？<fix123>元の道具に戻るなら協力するけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What will you do?<fix123>If you wish to return to being a tool, I shall help.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……いやー<fix123>それだけは勘弁して下さい<fix123>ただ叩かれ踏まれるだけの<fix123>生活に戻りたくないわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...No thanks!<fix123>I'd very much not like to do that.<fix123>I don't want to go back to a life of<fix123>being hit and stepped on.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>叩かれたくない……って<fix123>貴方　太鼓でしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You are a drum, yes?<fix123>How could you not want to be hit?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>切り札はいつだって悪手<fix123>Evel Trinity<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Trump Card is Always a Bad Move<fix123>Evil Trinity<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>夢の世界<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Dream World<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 見た事も無い悪夢の世界<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: A World of Nightmares Never Seen Before<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Doremy Sweet ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>また来てしまったのですね……<fix123>もう後戻りは出来ないわ<fix123>月の民としての狂気は<fix123>貴方にはもはや毒でしかないのです！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So you've come here again, hm...<fix123>There's no turning back now.<fix123>The lunacy of the moon's people<fix123>is nothing but poison to you by now!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Doremy Sweet DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Junko ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>この答えに辿り着くまで<fix123>思ったより時間が掛ったわね<fix123>月の兎を地上に堕とすという<fix123>奇策を打ったのだから<fix123>すぐに気付くと思ったのですが……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It took longer than I anticipated<fix123>for them arrive at this answer.<fix123>Since they came up with the scheme<fix123>to drop a moon rabbit to Earth,<fix123>I thought they'd realize it right away...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>聞きましたよ！<fix123>貴方が月の民を憎む理由を<fix123>貴方の境遇には同情しますが……<fix123>それでも大半の月の民は<fix123>関係無いはず！<fix123>前回ので決着が付いたんじゃ<fix123>なかったの？<fix123>なんでまだ月の民は<fix123>ここに居るのよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I heard about why you hate<fix123>the people of the moon.<fix123>Look, I can sympathize with your situation...<fix123>But the majority of the moon's people<fix123>have nothing to do with all that!<fix123>Didn't we settle this<fix123>in our last battle?<fix123>Why are the moon's people<fix123>still in here!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……月の民は夢の世界に逃げ込んだ<fix123>月の都に居られなくなった月の民は<fix123>そうするだろうと私は読んでいた<fix123>勿論、私は先手を打った<fix123>夢の世界に刺客を<fix123>送り込んでいたのです<fix123>さあ出ておいで！<fix123>地獄の女神、へカーティアよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...The people of the moon escaped into the dream world.<fix123>I foresaw that they would do so, as they were<fix123>unable to stay in the Lunar Capital.<fix123>Of course, I took the initiative.<fix123>I sent an assassin<fix123>into the dream world first.<fix123>Now, show yourself!<fix123>Hecatia, goddess of hell!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Hecatia Lapislazuli ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>地獄の女神<fix123>ヘカーティア・ラピスラズリ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Goddess of Hell<fix123>Hecatia Lapislazuli<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>んもう<fix123>待ちくたびれたわよん<fix123>ようやく、嫦娥の奴に復讐出来るのね？<fix123>腕が鳴るわー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Aw, geeze.<fix123>You totally kept me waiting, y'know.<fix123>So we're finally gonna get revenge on Chang'e, huh?<fix123>My fingers are so itchingー<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いや、敵は嫦娥ではなくて<fix123>目の前の兎です<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, no. Your enemy is the rabbit<fix123>before you, not the moon's people.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>兎？<fix123>もしかして月の兎？　嫦娥の部下の<fix123>それなら見逃せないね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Rabbit?<fix123>You mean a moon rabbit? One of Chang'e's minions?<fix123>Sure can't let her escape, in that case.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だ、誰よ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>W-who are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は月と地球と異界の<fix123>三つの身体を持つ地獄の女神<fix123>純狐の策で夢の世界に罠を<fix123>張っていたのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm the goddess of hell, wielding three bodies<fix123>for the moon, the Earth, and the Otherworld.<fix123>I set a trap in the dream world<fix123>as part of Junko's plan.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうか、月で見た妖精のご主人様って<fix123>貴方の事ね<fix123>変な格好してるからすぐに判ったわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see. You're the 'Master' who<fix123>that fairy on the moon mentioned.<fix123>That weird outfit of yours says it all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>でも純狐？<fix123>月の兎一匹の為に何でわざわざ私が？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But hey, Junko?<fix123>Why'd you bring me out for one little moon rabbit?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ただの兎じゃない<fix123>この兎こそが、月の民の切り札だった<fix123>この兎のおかげで<fix123>我々の敗北が半分だけ決定した<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>She's no ordinary rabbit.<fix123>She was the trump card of the moon's people.<fix123>It's thanks to this rabbit that we<fix123>were defeated, albeit only halfway.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええええ？<fix123>何でそんな事が……<fix123>まさかこんな兎一匹で<fix123>我々の作戦が失敗するなんて<fix123>しょうがない<fix123>消すしか無いか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Whaaaat?<fix123>How'd she do that...?<fix123>I can't believe a single rabbit<fix123>could ruin our whole plan.<fix123>Welp, nothing else to do.<fix123>Gotta get rid of her.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>やっぱりそうなるのね<fix123>もう私は月の兎じゃ無いのに……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So it's come to this after all.<fix123>I'm not even a moon rabbit any more, though...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: パンデモニックプラネット<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Pandemonic Planet<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>月の兎は宿敵、嫦娥の部下<fix123>この兎を生かして帰す訳にいかないね<fix123>お前に楽しい選択肢をやろう！<fix123>月、地球、異界……<fix123>殺されたい身体を自分で選べ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Moon rabbits are minions of Chang'e, my long-standing rival.<fix123>There's no way I can let this rabbit return alive.<fix123>I'll give you a real fun choice!<fix123>The moon, the Earth, or the Otherworld...?<fix123>Pick whichever body you want to be killed by!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Hecatia Lapislazuli and Junko DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>二人がかりとは恥も外見もないね [sic]<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Two at once? Aren't you shamed to hold bare-knuckles?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いやねぇ、ちょっとした冗談よ<fix123>勝負は私の負けね<fix123>……お前<fix123>途中から気が付いていたけど<fix123>月の兎じゃないね？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Nah, see, it was just a little joke.<fix123>I lost the battle.<fix123>...now, you.<fix123>I caught on partway through, but...<fix123>You're not a moon rabbit, are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうよ<fix123>幻想郷の兎になったの<fix123>もう月の兎に戻る事は出来ないわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, I'm not.<fix123>I became a rabbit of Gensokyo!<fix123>I can't return to being a moon rabbit now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>面白い奴ね<fix123>なる程ー<fix123>これが地上にいる月の賢者の秘策……<fix123>ねえ、その賢者に会わせてほしいなー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're pretty interesting.<fix123>I see, I see~.<fix123>So this was a strategy from the lunar sage on Earth...<fix123>Hey, I'd kind of like to meet that sage~.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……私も貴方達に会いたいという旨を<fix123>伝える為にやってきました<fix123>ですがその条件として<fix123>夢の世界にいる月の民を解放して<fix123>二度と月の都を襲わないという<fix123>約束が必要です<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...I also came here to extend<fix123>an invitation to you two.<fix123>However, as a condition,<fix123>you'll have to release the citizens in the dream world...<fix123>And promise never to attack<fix123>the Lunar Capital again.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ねえ、純狐？<fix123>良いかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, Junko.<fix123>Is this okay?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……良いわ<fix123>月の民を都へ戻しても<fix123>但し、飲む条件は半分だけです<fix123>二度と月の都を襲わないのではなく<fix123>しばらく月の都を襲わない、なら飲みます<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...it's fine.<fix123>Even if they return to the capital.<fix123>However, I can only accede to one of those conditions.<fix123>If, instead of "never attack again,"<fix123>you make it "don't attack for a while," I'll accept.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……判ったわ<fix123>それでいいわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...I understand.<fix123>That'll be fine.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>オーケーオーケー<fix123>じゃあ、月の民は解放しよう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Okay, okay.<fix123>Releasing the moon's people now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>永琳様の言ったとおりね<fix123>必ず会いたがるから、条件を与えろ<fix123>でも条件を一つ変えてくるから<fix123>それを受け入れろ……と<fix123>もしかしたらこいつ等と永琳様達は<fix123>ツーカーなんじゃ無いかしら<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(There, just like Lady Eirin said.<fix123>They'll want to meet us anyway, so give them some conditions.)<fix123>(But they'll want to change one of the conditions,<fix123>so just accept those new terms.)<fix123>These two might be such a good match with Lady Eirin<fix123>and company that they can read each others' minds.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ん？<fix123>何か言った？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm?<fix123>Did you say something?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>しまった、声に出てたわ<fix123>何でもないわよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Whoops, said that out loud.<fix123>Nothing, it was nothing.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>心配することなんてないわ<fix123>今はもう復讐心は無い<fix123>そもそも幻想郷にいる月の民は<fix123>はなから敵では無いのよ<fix123>勿論、貴方もね<fix123>それに……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You needn't worry.<fix123>For now, I have no desire for revenge.<fix123>In the first place, the people of the moon<fix123>living in Gensokyo are by no means my enemy.<fix123>That extends to you too.<fix123>Also...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>良かったねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, that's great.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何が？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What is?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どうやら純狐は貴方の事が<fix123>気に入ったみたいよ<fix123>暫く復讐を止めるってのは<fix123>貴方のお陰さ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It sounds like Junko's taken<fix123>a bit of an interest in you.<fix123>It's thanks to you that she'll put a hold<fix123>on her revenge for a while.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そ、そうっすか<fix123>これは光栄です……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>O-oh, is that so.<fix123>I'm quite honored...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>月の兎じゃなければ、もう憎む<fix123>相手では無いからね<fix123>私も幻想郷で面白そうな奴を<fix123>探してみようかなぁ<fix123>何か心当たりがあったら紹介してね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I mean, if you're not a moon rabbit,<fix123>she's got no reason to hate you.<fix123>Maybe I'll search for some interesting<fix123>people in Gensokyo, too...?<fix123>If you've got anyone in mind, feel free to introduce me!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>秘神の真の姿<fix123>Hidden Star in Fifth Season<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>True Form of the Secret God<fix123>Hidden Star in Fifth Season<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>後戸の国<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Land of the Back Door<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: もうドアには入れない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: No More Going Through Doors<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Satono Nishida and Mai Teireida ENTER<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>おお、君はこの前の<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, it's you again.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お師匠様は気に入っていたみたいよ<fix123><fix123>意外だわー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It seemed like the master really enjoyed you.<fix123><fix123>What a surprise!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だが、君の快進撃はここまでだ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But your forward march ends here!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Satono Nishida and Mai Teireida DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>とびらとびらとびら……<fix123>この景色<fix123><fix123>なんか前に見た事がある気がするなぁ<fix123>デジャブってやつ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Door door door...<fix123>This place...<fix123><fix123>I feel like I saw it before.<fix123>Is this that deja vu thing?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おお、お前はこの間の<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, you're the one from before.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Okina Matara ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>究極の絶対秘神<fix123>摩多羅　隠岐奈<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Ultimate, Absolute Secret God<fix123>Okina Matara<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おもしろ妖精じゃないか<fix123><fix123>よく来たね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Aren't you an interesting fairy?<fix123><fix123>I'm glad you made it.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前は誰だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who're you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おっとっと<fix123><fix123>あれ？　忘れているの？<fix123>お前に集めさせていた<fix123><fix123>魔力を頂いた時に<fix123>一緒に記憶も失ったのかな？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Whoa there.<fix123><fix123>Huh? Did you forget?<fix123>Perhaps when I helped myself<fix123><fix123>to the energy I had you gather,<fix123>you lost your memories with them?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うーん……<fix123><fix123>そうだ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Mmmm...<fix123><fix123>Oh yeah!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>思い出したかな<fix123><fix123>改めてようこそ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Do you remember now?<fix123><fix123>Once again, welcome.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>記憶を取り戻しにこの世界に<fix123><fix123>来たのを忘れてた<fix123>ところでお前は誰だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I just remembered that I came to this world<fix123><fix123>to get my memories back!<fix123>So, uh, who're you again?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>こりゃ話にならんな<fix123><fix123>所詮、 妖精 (バカ) は妖精 (バカ) か<fix123>惜しいな、前の時は覇気が感じられて<fix123><fix123>妖精の新時代を見た気がしたんだが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This isn't getting us anywhere.<fix123><fix123>Oh well, I suppose fairies (fools)  will be fairies (fools) .<fix123>It is a shame though. When I saw such ambition in a fairy last time,<fix123><fix123>I felt I had witnessed the beginning of a new era of fairies.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お、馬鹿にされている気がするぞ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, I'm gettin' the feeling you're making fun of me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>気のせいではないぞ<fix123><fix123>目の前のコイツはただの残念な奴だ<fix123>さっさと背中の扉の魔力を頂いて<fix123><fix123>元の世界に強制帰還させるか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's not just your imagination.<fix123><fix123>The fool before me is nothing but a disappointment.<fix123>I'll just take the magic from the door on your back<fix123><fix123>and forcibly send you back to where you came from.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>やるきだな！<fix123><fix123>いつでもかかってこい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yeah, you wanna fight?<fix123><fix123>Come at me whenever you want!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ん？　……なんだと<fix123><fix123>お前の背中の季節は……<fix123>どの四季にも属していないだと？<fix123>もっとも妖精の生命力が失われる<fix123><fix123>季節の境目、土用……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm? ...What is this?<fix123><fix123>The season in your back is...<fix123>It doesn't belong to any of the four seasons?<fix123>To think it would be doyou, the border between seasons<fix123><fix123>where the lifeforce of fairies is lost.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 秘神マターラ　～ Hidden Star in All Seasons.<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Secret God Matara ~ Hidden Star in All Seasons.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふっふっふ<fix123><fix123>お前の愚劣な演技に騙されるところだった<fix123>やはりおもしろい妖精だな<fix123><fix123>一戦交えていくか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh heh heh.<fix123><fix123>I was nearly fooled by your idiot act.<fix123>You really are an interesting fairy.<fix123><fix123>Shall we battle once more?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あー、思い出したぞー！<fix123><fix123>あたいが再戦したいのは<fix123>椅子に坐っていた奴だ！<fix123><fix123>お前は関係無い、邪魔だよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah! I remember now!<fix123><fix123>The person I wanted to fight again<fix123>was someone sitting in a chair!<fix123><fix123>Nothing to do with YOU! Outta the way!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>その時椅子に坐っていたのは私だ！<fix123><fix123>見てわからんか<fix123>私と再戦したがっていたのなら<fix123><fix123>やってやろう<fix123>真なる秘神の力<fix123><fix123>全て味わい尽くすが良い<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm the one who was in the chair!<fix123><fix123>Can't you tell by looking?<fix123>But if you wanted a rematch with me,<fix123><fix123>then let's do this.<fix123>For the true power of a hidden god,<fix123><fix123>you had better savor every last drop!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Okina Matara DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>勝った！<fix123><fix123>長かった最強の旅も終わりだ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I win!<fix123><fix123>My long road to becoming the strongest is finally over!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>見事だ！<fix123><fix123>素晴らしすぎる！<fix123>ここまで背中の扉を<fix123><fix123>使いこなせた妖精は初めてだ<fix123>しかしお前の戦い方には<fix123><fix123>疑問も残る<fix123>私の裏をかいて季節の隙間の魔力を<fix123><fix123>集めたというのに<fix123>それを余り意識していない<fix123><fix123>ようにも見受けられる<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Splendid!<fix123><fix123>Simply magnificent!<fix123>You're the first fairy to have<fix123><fix123>achieved such mastery over the door on your back.<fix123>But I do have a question<fix123><fix123>as to the way you fought.<fix123>You managed to outwit me by<fix123><fix123>drawing power from the gap between seasons,<fix123>But it seems to be that<fix123><fix123>you were not particularly aware of this.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>背中の扉？<fix123><fix123>季節の隙間？　何言ってんのお前<fix123>あたいが勝った<fix123><fix123>お前は負けた、ただそれだけだ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Door on my back?<fix123><fix123>Gap between seasons? What are you even talking about?<fix123>I won, you lost!<fix123><fix123>That's it!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふっ、演技には見えないな<fix123>本当にお前はただの妖精 (バカ) だ<fix123>お前が季節の隙間を使ってやってきたのは<fix123><fix123>ただの偶然か、それとも……？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm, she doesn't seem to be acting.<fix123>So you really are just a fairy (fool)  then.<fix123>So was your use of the gap between seasons just a coincidence?<fix123><fix123>Or perhaps...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だから季節の隙間って何だよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Like I said, what's with all this season gap stuff?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それぞれの季節と季節の間には、春夏秋冬の<fix123><fix123>どの季節にも属さない瞬間というのがある<fix123>その瞬間は自然の力が衰え<fix123><fix123>精神が生命を凌駕するのだ<fix123>何故かお前は、妖精の苦手な瞬間を選んで<fix123><fix123>私に挑んできたのだ<fix123>偶然か必然か、それが原因で<fix123><fix123>その力を奪って強制退出出来なくなった<fix123>その事に私は驚いたんだよ<fix123><fix123>そして気に入った<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>When one season transitions into another, there exists a moment<fix123><fix123>that belongs to neither spring, summer, fall, or winter.<fix123>In that moment, the power of nature weakens,<fix123><fix123>and mental energy wins out over life energy.<fix123>And for whatever reason, you chose to challenge me with<fix123><fix123>that moment--the worst possible moment for a fairy.<fix123>Whether it was a coincidence or fate, that fact prevented me<fix123><fix123>from stealing your power and forcibly ejecting you.<fix123>That's what at first surprised me,<fix123><fix123>and then intrigued me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>選んでって……<fix123><fix123>あたいは何もしていないけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Chose...?<fix123>But I didn't choose anything.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ちなみに、どの扉から入ってきたの？<fix123><fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Incidentally, which door did you enter from?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ラルバんところの背中の扉からだ<fix123>アゲハチョウの妖精だよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>From one on Larva's back.<fix123>She's a swallowtail butterfly fairy.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>アゲハチョウの妖精<fix123><fix123>なるほど……<fix123>そこは本来なら夏の扉の筈だが<fix123>そいつはアゲハチョウの妖精では無く<fix123><fix123>常夜神なのかもしれんな<fix123>私に敵対する神の一つだ<fix123>こうなると偶然とは思えないな<fix123>まあいい、とにかく面白い妖精を<fix123><fix123>見つけた事には変わらん<fix123>どうだ？<fix123><fix123>私の元で働いてみないか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A swallowtail butterfly fairy, was it?<fix123><fix123>I see...<fix123>Normally that should have been a summer door.<fix123>It's possible that she wasn't a butterfly fairy at all,<fix123><fix123>but  Tokoyo no Kami (God of the Everlasting Night)  instead.<fix123>A god who is one of my enemies.<fix123>In which case, I can't imagine this was a coincidence.<fix123>But no matter. It doesn't change the fact that<fix123><fix123>I discovered an interesting fairy.<fix123>So how about it?<fix123><fix123>Would you like to try working for me?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>働く？<fix123><fix123>なんで？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Work?<fix123><fix123>Why?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は二童子の後継者を<fix123><fix123>探していたんだよ<fix123>踊って馬鹿騒ぎするだけの仕事だよ<fix123><fix123>前例は無いが妖精だって出来るかもしれん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've been looking for a successor for<fix123><fix123>my two servants.<fix123>All the job requires is that you dance and make a wild racket.<fix123><fix123>There's no precedent, so perhaps even a fairy would do.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>仕事かぁ<fix123><fix123>余り興味が無いなぁ<fix123>妖精の仕事って、奴隷の様に<fix123><fix123>こき使わされてるのしか見た事無いしねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A job, huh?<fix123>I don't really wanna...<fix123>The only fairy jobs I've ever seen are ones<fix123><fix123>where someone pushes them around like a slave.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まあ、考えて置いてくれ<fix123><fix123>時間は無限にある<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, think it over.<fix123>We have all the time in the world.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>血戯えの業風<fix123>Beastly Storm<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Karmic Winds of a Bloody Frenzy<fix123>Beastly Storm<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地獄（畜生界隣接暴風区域）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hell (Stormy Area Nearby the Beast Realm)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 輝かしき弱肉強食の掟<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Shining Law of the Strong Eating the Weak<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kutaka Niwatari ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>この先、最強の動物霊が占拠しています<fix123><fix123><fix123>現在、地上に攻めてこないように<fix123><fix123>水際作戦決行中です！<fix123><fix123><fix123>今すぐ引き返してください！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The area up ahead is occupied by the strongest animal spirit.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Right now, we're carrying out coastal operations<fix123><fix123>in order to prevent her from attacking the surface.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Please turn back now!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kutaka Niwatari DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>地獄の水際作戦<fix123><fix123>初めて見たわ<fix123><fix123><fix123>相当ヤバイ奴が出てくるんじゃ……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Coastal operations in Hell.<fix123><fix123>This is the first time I've seen it.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Someone real bad must've appeared......<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（この隠す気のないオーラは<fix123><fix123>あいつしかない）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Not even attempting to hide that aura?<fix123>Who else could it be?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Saki Kurokoma ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あっはっは！<fix123><fix123>笑いが止まらないな！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah ha ha!<fix123><fix123>I can't stop laughing!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>吉弔の奴が袿姫を倒したお陰で<fix123><fix123>我らが自由に動ける様になった<fix123><fix123><fix123>見事だ！　人間よ！<fix123><fix123>早速顔を見せよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Thanks to that bastard Kicchou defeating Keiki,<fix123><fix123>we can finally act freely!<fix123><fix123><fix123>Excellent work! Human!<fix123><fix123>Show your face at once!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（やっぱり、驪駒(くろこま)だ！<fix123><fix123>こいつ偉そうで腹が立つんだよな）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(It's definitely Kurokoma!<fix123><fix123>Her arrogance is infuriating!)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方が最強の動物霊……！<fix123><fix123>一体何者なの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You are the strongest animal spirit......!<fix123><fix123>Just who are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……なる程、動物霊に私のことを<fix123><fix123>教えられていないんだね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>......I see.<fix123><fix123>So the animal spirit didn't tell you about me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>勁牙組　組長<fix123>驪駒(くろこま)　早鬼(さき)<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Matriarch of the Keiga Family<fix123>Saki Kurokoma<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>失礼した、私は勁牙組(けいがぐみ)組長<fix123><fix123>驪駒 早鬼(くろこま　さき)である<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How rude of me. I am Saki Kurokoma,<fix123><fix123>boss of the Keiga Family.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>勁牙組……？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Keiga Family......?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>こいつは、剛欲同盟の宿敵だ<fix123><fix123><fix123>生き方に誇りも何も持っていない<fix123><fix123>暴力集団の長だよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>She's the sworn enemy of the Gouyoku Alliance.<fix123><fix123><fix123>She's the leader of a gang of thugs<fix123><fix123>who have nothing worth boasting about.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふえー、畜生界には色んな<fix123><fix123>組織があるんですねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wow, there sure are a lot of organizations<fix123><fix123>in the Animal Realm.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前に憑いているのは<fix123><fix123>饕餮(とうてつ)のところのオオワシ霊だな<fix123><fix123><fix123>まさかプライドの高い剛欲同盟が<fix123><fix123>鬼傑組の作戦に協力するとは思わなかったが<fix123><fix123><fix123>お前があの袿姫を倒してくれたお陰で<fix123><fix123>畜生界は再び競争社会へと戻ったのだよ<fix123><fix123><fix123>となれば、我ら最強最速軍団<fix123><fix123>勁牙組の天下だ<fix123><fix123><fix123>程なくして畜生界は<fix123><fix123>我ら勁牙組の物になるだろう<fix123><fix123><fix123>いや畜生界どころか地獄界も人間界も……？<fix123><fix123>夢は広がるわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The one possessing you<fix123><fix123>is an eagle spirit from Toutetsu's gang, right?<fix123><fix123><fix123>To think the prideful Gouyoku Alliance would<fix123><fix123>cooperate with Kiketsu Family! How unexpected.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Thanks to you defeating Keiki,<fix123><fix123>the Animal Realm has returned to being a competitive society.<fix123><fix123><fix123>And thus, the strongest, fastest army,<fix123><fix123>the Keiga Family, will rule all.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Soon the Animal Realm shall<fix123><fix123>come under our possession.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Perhaps not just the Animal Realm, but Hell and the Human Realm too......?<fix123><fix123>My dreams are broadening.[1]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>馬鹿な<fix123><fix123>そんなこと出来る訳無い！<fix123><fix123><fix123>いや、勁牙組の暴力組長なら<fix123><fix123>やりかねない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Don't be ridiculous.<fix123><fix123>You'll never manage that!<fix123><fix123><fix123>No, wait, she's the head of the Keiga Family.<fix123>If anyone can do it, it's those violent brutes.<fix123><fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>オオワシ霊、慌てる必要は無いわ<fix123><fix123><fix123>元々私は動物霊の侵略を止めに<fix123><fix123>来ていたのを思いだしたわ<fix123><fix123><fix123>つまり、本来の敵が目の前に<fix123><fix123>現れただけ<fix123><fix123><fix123>これを倒すために私は<fix123><fix123>動いていたんだわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No need to panic, eagle spirit.<fix123><fix123><fix123>I came here to stop the invasion in the first place.<fix123><fix123><fix123>In other words, all this means is that<fix123><fix123>I've found my target.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Everything I've done has been<fix123><fix123>to defeat her!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 聖徳太子のペガサス　～ Dark Pegasus<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Prince Shoutoku's Pegasus ~ Dark Pegasus<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふっふっふ、心地良いな<fix123><fix123><fix123>吉弔みたいな裏がある奴と違って<fix123><fix123>覚悟があって美しい<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh heh, just what I like to hear.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Unlike that two-faced Kicchou,<fix123><fix123>you are determined and elegant.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間……力を貸すぞ！<fix123><fix123>共に暴力組長の暴走を止めよう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Human...... I'll lend you my power!<fix123><fix123>Together, we can stop the boss of the thugs!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>剛欲同盟のオオワシ霊よ！！<fix123><fix123>良い人間を見つけたな！<fix123><fix123><fix123>しかし私は強いぞ<fix123><fix123>遠慮無く全力を出し切れよ！<fix123><fix123><fix123>さあ、邪神を打ち破る人間の力<fix123><fix123>この漆黒の天馬(ペガサス)に見せよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Eagle spirit of the Gouyoku Alliance!<fix123><fix123>I see you've found a good human!<fix123><fix123><fix123>But I'll have you know that I'm strong.<fix123><fix123>Hold nothing back and come at me!<fix123><fix123><fix123>Now, show this jet-black pegasus<fix123><fix123>the power of the human who defeated the wicked god!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Saki Kurokoma DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>……ハアハア<fix123><fix123><fix123>力強さと身軽さ、弾幕に対する勇気と知恵<fix123><fix123>全てバランスが良い！<fix123><fix123><fix123>か、感動した！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>......*pant pant*<fix123><fix123><fix123>Your power, swiftness, bravery and knowledge<fix123><fix123>in facing down danmaku... All in perfect balance!<fix123><fix123><fix123>I-I'm moved!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まだまだ戦えるよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I can still fight!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いや、やめようじゃないか<fix123><fix123>これ以上続けたらどちらかが倒れる<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, let's stop here.<fix123><fix123>If we keep going at it, one of us will fall.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……ハアハア、助かった<fix123><fix123>もう駄目かと思った<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>......*pant pant*, thank god.<fix123><fix123>I couldn't hold on anymore.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>正直な奴だ<fix123><fix123>気に入ったよ<fix123><fix123><fix123>しかし、オオワシ霊よ<fix123><fix123>お前に関して判らない事が一つある<fix123>何故、剛欲同盟が吉弔に協力して<fix123><fix123>袿姫討伐作戦に乗ったんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, aren't you honest?<fix123>You've caught my eye.<fix123><fix123><fix123>However, eagle spirit.<fix123><fix123>There is something I don't understand regarding you.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Why did the Gouyoku Alliance agree on<fix123><fix123>cooperating with Kicchou to defeat Keiki?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……<fix123><fix123><fix123>そんなこと、お前に言う必要は無い<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>......<fix123><fix123><fix123>I have no need to tell you about this.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>当ててやろうか<fix123><fix123><fix123>影の薄い剛欲同盟が鬼傑組と結びついて<fix123><fix123>勁牙組(うち)を凌駕しようとした、とか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Then let me guess.<fix123><fix123><fix123>You two were plotting to secretly<fix123><fix123>gang up on the Keiga Family or something?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>違うな、我らが主の饕餮(とうてつ)様は<fix123><fix123>鬼傑組も勁牙組も興味ない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's not it. Lady Toutetsu has no interest<fix123><fix123>in either the Kiketsu or the Keiga Families.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>と言うことは……<fix123><fix123>霊長園の独占か<fix123><fix123><fix123>それとも存在不確定の闇組織、か<fix123><fix123>どちらにしても無謀な強欲、だな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Meaning......<fix123><fix123>You want to monopolize the Primate Spirit Garden?<fix123><fix123><fix123>That or the unidentified dark organization, huh?<fix123><fix123>Either way, she's being way too greedy.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>想像にお任せするよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'll leave it up to your imagination.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おおーい<fix123><fix123><fix123>なんかおいてけぼりなんですけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heeey.<fix123><fix123><fix123>You guys are kinda leaving me behind...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おお、失礼<fix123><fix123>お詫びにもう一戦、どうです？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, I'm sorry. How about we<fix123><fix123>have another fight, as an apology?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それでもいいから<fix123><fix123>無視しないでください<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I don't want that either!<fix123><fix123>Just don't ignore me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>終末への採掘<fix123>Apocalyptic Mining<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Mining that Leads to the End Times<fix123>Apocalyptic Mining<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>虹龍洞<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Rainbow Dragon Cave<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 幻想の地下大線路網<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Great Fantastic Underground Railway Network<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Tsukasa Kudamaki ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>何かと都合が良いと思って<fix123>甘やかしてきたが……<fix123>坑道を荒らしに来るようなら<fix123>もう用なしだ<fix123>人間らしく死ね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I let you off easy before,<fix123>since you seemed useful......<fix123>But if you're going to cause trouble in the<fix123>tunnels, I've got no more use for you!<fix123>Die like the pitiful human you are!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Tsukasa Kudamaki DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>神奈子様はアビリティカードを<fix123>受け入れる様だけど<fix123>ここの鉱坑の事を<fix123>無視して良いのかしら<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Lady Kanako seems to have<fix123>accepted the Ability Cards,<fix123>but it is really alright to<fix123>ignore the mining here?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Momoyo Himemushi ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>典(つかさ)……じゃないな<fix123>誰だおめーは<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're... not Tsukasa.<fix123>Who are ya!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は東風谷早苗<fix123>守矢神社の巫女です<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I am Sanae Kochiya,<fix123>the Moriya Shrine maiden.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>守矢神社、か<fix123>ああ、その憎らしい面は<fix123>確かにそうだ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Moriya Shrine, huh?<fix123>Ahh, yep. That's your<fix123>despicable face, all right.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>黒きドラゴンイーター<fix123>姫虫 百々世<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Onyx Dragon Eater<fix123>Momoyo Himemushi<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>くっくっく、失礼<fix123>俺は百々世(ももよ)<fix123>虹龍洞 (ここ) の監督だ<fix123>守矢神社がここに用はないはずだが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh-heh-heh. Beg your pardon.<fix123>The name's Momoyo.<fix123>I'm the Rainbow Dragon Cave's foreman.<fix123>And I'm pretty sure the Moriya Shrine has no business here, yeah?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私が個人的に知りたいのです<fix123>ここで掘っている鉱物について<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There's something I personally want to know<fix123>about the mineral being mined here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>個人的に、だ？<fix123>じゃあなんでさっき<fix123>守矢神社の巫女だって名乗ったんだよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Personally?<fix123>Then why'd you introduce yourself<fix123>as the Moriya shrine maiden?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ、それは癖で……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, that was just out of habit...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Misumaru Tamatsukuri ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>危ない！<fix123>東風谷早苗くん<fix123>その大ムカデは危険です<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Be careful!<fix123>That oomukade is extremely dangerous,<fix123>young Sanae Kochiya!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今度は誰だ！？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Another one of ya!? Who are you!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は玉造 魅須丸<fix123>龍珠の正当な所有者です<fix123>お前達の行為はとても<fix123>許されるものではありません<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I am Misumaru Tamatsukuri,<fix123>the rightful owner of the dragon gems.<fix123>Your actions have been wholly unacceptable.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なん、だと？<fix123>所有者だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Whazzat?<fix123>Rightful owner?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Tsukasa Kudamaki ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>また誰か来た！<fix123>盗掘者どもめ、大勢で来やがったな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Another one!<fix123>You thieves are just pilin' on in here, aren'tcha?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>百々世どの<fix123>賊ではありません、典でございます<fix123>そこのカラフルな魅須丸って奴が<fix123>私が言っていた盗掘者です<fix123>目の前の人間と結託して、<fix123>ここの龍珠を根こそぎ奪おうとしています<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Miss Momoyo, I'm not a thief.<fix123>I'm Tsukasa.<fix123>This colorful "Misumaru" character<fix123>is the thief that I mentioned.<fix123>She's colluding with the human before you<fix123>to steal all the dragon gems from the mountain.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はあ？<fix123>ちょっと、何言ってるのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123>Wait a minute, what are you talking about?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>このままでは虹龍洞は<fix123>もう封鎖するしかないでしょう<fix123>しかしこの事はまだ<fix123>飯綱丸様は知りません<fix123>いったん飯綱丸様に報告して<fix123>判断を仰ぎましょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>At this rate, we'll have no choice but to<fix123>close down the Rainbow Dragon Cave.<fix123>But Master Iizunamaru doesn't<fix123>know about this yet.<fix123>I shall return and report to her,<fix123>so that she may pass her judgement.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふっふっふ、待て<fix123>こいつらがここにいることは<fix123>飯綱丸はまだ知らないんだな？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>*Chuckle*. Hang on.<fix123>You just said that Iizunamaru doesn't<fix123>know about these two being here, yeah?<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>......That is correct.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>大暴れ出来るチャンスじゃないか<fix123>盗掘者相手に天狗の判断など要らぬ<fix123>現場判断で十分だ<fix123>この場で徹底的に叩きのめしてやろう！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, ain't this a chance to go all out?<fix123>We don't need the tengu's judgement just for<fix123>some petty thieves. I can make the call myself.<fix123>I'll pummel 'em into the dirt here and now!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>不味いですね<fix123>あの狐に唆されて要らぬ戦いが始まりそう<fix123>こいつは大ムカデ<fix123>龍をも喰らう醜悪な妖怪です<fix123>貴方は勝たなければいけません<fix123>力を授けましょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How unfortunate. We're about to get into a<fix123>pointless fight, thanks to that fox's prodding.<fix123>Your opponent is an oomukade,<fix123>a disgusting youkai that eats even dragons.<fix123>You must win against her.<fix123>Let me lend you a bit of strength.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Card Select Phase<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>良いカードを選んだ？<fix123>では東風谷早苗よ、覚悟して挑め！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Have you chosen a good card?<fix123>Well then, Sanae Kochiya, brace yourself and fight!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Misumaru Tamatsukuri and Tsukasa Kudamaki LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>……<fix123>次々と登場人物が出てきて<fix123>割り込む隙が無い！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...<fix123>So many characters keep showing up<fix123>that I can barely get a word in!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 龍王殺しのプリンセス<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Princess Who Slays Dragon Kings<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>準備は出来たか？<fix123>卑怯な盗掘者！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are you finished getting ready?<fix123>You cowardly thief!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私はただ、ここで掘り出している<fix123>鉱物について知りたかっただけなんだけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I just wanted to know about<fix123>the minerals being dug out here...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だったら教えてやろう！<fix123>俺に勝ったらな<fix123>喜び震えよ！<fix123>お前の神社の下で眠れることに！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Then I shall tell you!<fix123>If you win, that is.<fix123>Tremble in joy!<fix123>Your resting place shall be beneath your own shrine!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Momoyo Himemushi DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>……き<fix123>気持ちいい！<fix123>思う存分弾幕を撃たせてくれて<fix123>ありがとう！<fix123>守矢神社も悪くないじゃないか<fix123>飯綱丸はいつも悪く言ってるけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...That...<fix123>felt AWESOME!<fix123>Thanks for letting me shoot all<fix123>the danmaku I could ever want!<fix123>Dang, I guess the Moriya Shrine ain't so bad either.<fix123>Even though Iizunamaru's always badmouthin' the place.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？<fix123>なんか言った？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Eh?<fix123>Did you say something?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何でも無いぜ<fix123>そうだ、約束だったな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It was nothin'.<fix123>Ah yeah, our promise.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？　約束？<fix123>何でしたっけ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm? Promise?<fix123>What promise?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おいおい、弾のカスりすぎで<fix123>記憶が飛んだか？<fix123>ここで掘っている物について<fix123>よく知りたいって言ってたじゃないか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oi, oi. Did you lose your memory<fix123>from grazin' too many bullets?<fix123>You said you wanted to know more about<fix123>the stuff we're diggin' up here, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ahh.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ここは龍珠鉱山だ<fix123>龍珠というレアアースが取れる<fix123>龍珠は魔力に反応して違う<fix123>輝きを見せるんだ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This is a dragon gem mine. It's a prime spot for<fix123>getting dragon gems, which are a rare earth element.<fix123>They react to different types of magic<fix123>an' give off different glows in response.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はー、それは綺麗そうですねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh, that sounds beautiful.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そりゃ綺麗さ<fix123>でも綺麗なだけじゃない<fix123>何故輝きが異なるかというと、<fix123>魔力をコピーしているからだ<fix123>龍珠を使えば、能力のコピーが<fix123>可能なんだよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well they are!<fix123>But that's not all.<fix123>They glow in different colors<fix123>'cause they're copying the magic.<fix123>Using dragon gems lets you<fix123>copy others' abilities.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なるほど、それがアビリティカード……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see, and that's how the Ability Cards work...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ま、実際にはコピーできるけど<fix123>それだけでは発動しないらしい<fix123>どうやってアビリティカードを<fix123>完成させたのかは、俺は知らん<fix123>飯綱丸は確か……市場の神の力を<fix123>利用するとか言ってたが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, they can copy the magic, but apparently<fix123>you can't activate 'em on their own.<fix123>I dunno how they completed<fix123>the Ability Cards, myself.<fix123>I think Iizunamaru said that...<fix123>they made use of the market god's power.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……よく判りました<fix123>有難うございます<fix123>えー、っとお名前何でしたっけ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...I understand.<fix123>Thank you so much.<fix123>Umm, what was your name again?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>俺か？<fix123>俺は姫虫 百々世だ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Me?<fix123>I'm Momoyo Himemushi.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>百々世さん、見かけによらず<fix123>優しいんですね<fix123>そんな見た目で約束守って<fix123>くれるなんて思いませんでした<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're much more kind than your<fix123>appearance lets on, Miss Momoyo.<fix123>I didn't think you'd honor your promise,<fix123>judging from how you look.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>喧嘩売ってるのか？<fix123>最高だ。その喧嘩、買おう！<fix123>今すぐ再戦だ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You pickin' a fight with me?<fix123>Perfect! I'll take you up on that offer!<fix123>Time for a rematch, right now!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ、ごめんなさい<fix123>やっぱり見た目通りでした<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, I'm sorry.<fix123>Your looks weren't deceiving, after all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: Higan.<fix123>
One of the afterlife realms. The flow of time cannot be felt here.<fix123>
All there is is a vast eternity.<fix123>
"I see. So the repercussions of a conflict in the Animal Realm reached even the surface."<fix123>
"What do we do? We'll need some sort of plan, right?"<fix123>
"No one in the Yama Group had noticed what was going on in the Animal Realm."<fix123>
"After all, strife is business as usual there.<fix123>
And, there is a vast distance between the Animal Realm and the Human Realm. Except for<fix123>extreme circumstances, there's no way they could influence each other."<fix123>
"Then how...?"<fix123>
"It... must be because of the chaos going on in Hell.<fix123>
The management systems of Hell are collapsing, and power is becoming decentralized."<fix123>
"Right now, Hell is a lawless land.<fix123>
Even if the Animal Realm is far from the Human Realm, Hell is its next-door neighbor.<fix123>
They must have taken advantage of the disorder in Hell and went for the Human Realm."<fix123>
"It seems there's someone cunning in the Animal Realm, too."<fix123>
"Oh, it's probably her...<fix123>
That tortoise-looking girl who calls herself Kicchou."<fix123>
"Could you tell me everything you know about her?"<fix123>
"Yes."<fix123>
Having the Yama interested in her story<fix123>filled Youmu with an indescribable joy.<fix123>
Perhaps because of that, she added a little color to it.<fix123>
The mysterious god Keiki Haniyasushin<fix123>had become a fiend that needed to be stopped.<fix123>
Or so she bragged.<fix123>
<c$Ending No. 07 — Losing Trust Through Boasting$><fix123>
<c$Congratulations!$><fix123><c$No Continue Clear!$><fix123>
The Primate Spirit Garden in the Animal Realm.<fix123>
A keyhole-shaped forest.<fix123>
The interior is filled with strange technology.<fix123>
Youmu had returned to look into what had happened,<fix123>but she arrived just as Yachie and Keiki were squaring off.<fix123>
"So, how was it?<fix123>Human swords are sharp, aren't they?"<fix123>
"Tee hee, I was shocked. I thought there was nothing here but spirits."<fix123>
"Well, as long as you're happy.<fix123>
It was worth finding a human to work with."<fix123>
"But maybe the sword could've been sharpened a little more.<fix123>
She couldn't even scratch my ceramics."<fix123>
"Um... Do you two get along well then?"<fix123>
"There's no such thing as 'getting along' in the Animal Realm."<fix123>
"What? Really?<fix123>
But I was looking forward to working with the beasts in the future."<fix123>
"We compete, and make progress. In that sense she's a worthy opponent.<fix123>
But in terms of struggling for resources, she's an old enemy I need to get rid of."<fix123>
"Struggling for resources, huh...?"<fix123>
"Is something the matter?"<fix123>
"By 'resources' she means... human spirits."<fix123>
"I-Is that so? How awful..."<fix123>
"See? Don't you agree?"<fix123>
"And that's why you don't belong here, Keiki.<fix123>
It's not just the humans. The beast spirits, too. We're all resources."<fix123>
The Animal Realm is a place where everyone indulges in their selfishness.<fix123>One could say that cowards who forget that cannot exist.<fix123>
The powerful figure of Yachie Kicchou is necessary there.<fix123>
However, Keiki Haniyasushin, the god summoned<fix123>by the human spirits, thought a little differently.<fix123>
Youmu understood that, if only slightly.<fix123>
<c$Ending No. 08 — Fear of a Critical Situation$><fix123>
<c$Congratulations!$><fix123><c$No Continue Clear!$><fix123>
Hakugyokurou.<fix123>
A picturesque mansion in the Netherworld.<fix123>
Here there are no gods.<fix123>
"Blah blah blah, and so on."<fix123>
"Oh, sorry.<fix123>I wasn't listening."<fix123>
"Then I'll start over with my report.<fix123>
Regarding the invasion of beast spirits..."<fix123>
"Wow, an evil god in the Animal Realm...?"<fix123>
"They came to the surface in order to find people<fix123>who could defeat her."<fix123>
"Is that so?<fix123>
But isn't it possible that it was also a trick?"<fix123>
"They're famous, you know.<fix123>
Everyone knows the Kiketsu Family is a Yakuza group that casually swindles people.<fix123>
Weren't you actually tricked into defeating that evil god for them?"<fix123>
"Sh-She's famous? That tortoise?"<fix123>
"And you were talking about an evil god,<fix123>but how do you know she's actually evil?"<fix123>
"Now get going."<fix123>
"Huh?"<fix123>
"Your new job is to investigate the evil god."<fix123>
The evil god Keiki Haniyasushin showed up on the surface before too long.<fix123>
She was never a god of the Animal Realm in the first place, so this wasn't too odd.<fix123>
Though for some reason, it seemed eerily likely that she would bring<fix123>the Animal Realm's survival-of-the-fittest conflict with her out into the surface world.<fix123>
<c$Ending No. 09 — Doing Her Job For Once$><fix123>
<c$Congratulations!$><fix123><c$No Continue Clear!$><fix123>
"I'm Kicchou, the chief of the Kiketsu Family.<fix123>
We were wrong to have placed our hopes in you.<fix123>
It seemed the evil god's power just barely managed to beat you."<fix123>
"It's inconvenient for us to let you live any longer.<fix123>
It's unfortunate, but..."<fix123>
"Wawawaaa!"<fix123>
"N-No, I'm fine!<fix123>
Just let me fight one more time!<fix123>
I've already analyzed all my enemy's attacks!"<fix123>
"...Understood.<fix123>
However, there are plenty of humans that can take your place.<fix123>
We won't allow any more failures."<fix123>
You were just barely forced to run away from the evil god.<fix123>
You absolutely can't lose next time!<fix123>
<c$Bad Ending No. 03 — Aim for a No Continue Clear!$><fix123>
<fix123>終末への採掘<fix123>Apocalyptic Mining<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>I am Sakuya Izayoi, employed at the<fix123>Scarlet Devil Mansion as a maid.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……ほう、知らん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...Huh. Never heard of ya.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>I would imagine so.<fix123>And you are?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>黒きドラゴンイーター<fix123>姫虫 百々世<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Onyx Dragon Eater<fix123>Momoyo Himemushi<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おっと、失礼<fix123>俺は百々世(ももよ)<fix123>虹龍洞 (ここ) の監督だ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, beg your pardon.<fix123>The name's Momoyo.<fix123>I'm the Rainbow Dragon Cave's foreman.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>The foreman?<fix123>I see...<fix123>So that Misumaru person wasn't in charge.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>"Misumaru"?<fix123>Who's that?<fix123>*Gasp*, are they that thief<fix123>Tsukasa mentioned?<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>盗掘とは皮肉ね<fix123>妖怪の山を掘りまくって<fix123>伊弉諾物質(イザナギオブジェクト)を盗み出しているのは<fix123>お前達、大ムカデ率いる<fix123>妖怪集団じゃないか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ironic that you would call me a thief.<fix123>Isn't your band of youkai,<fix123>led by an oomukade...<fix123>The ones who are digging up the Youkai Mountain<fix123>and stealing the Izanagi Objects?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今度は誰だ！？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Another one of ya!? Who are you!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は玉造 魅須丸<fix123>龍珠の正当な所有者です<fix123>お前達の行為はとても<fix123>許されるものではありません<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I am Misumaru Tamatsukuri,<fix123>the rightful owner of the dragon gems.<fix123>Your actions have been wholly unacceptable.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なん、だと？<fix123>所有者だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Whazzat?<fix123>Rightful owner?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Tsukasa Kudamaki ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>また誰か来た！<fix123>盗掘者どもめ、大勢で来やがったな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Another one!<fix123>You thieves are just pilin' on in here, aren'tcha?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>百々世どの<fix123>賊ではありません、典でございます<fix123>そこのカラフルな魅須丸って奴が<fix123>私が言っていた盗掘者です<fix123>目の前の人間と結託して、<fix123>ここの龍珠を根こそぎ奪おうとしています<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Miss Momoyo, I'm not a thief.<fix123>I'm Tsukasa.<fix123>This colorful "Misumaru" character<fix123>is the thief that I mentioned.<fix123>She's colluding with the human before you<fix123>to steal all the dragon gems from the mountain.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>しかしこの事はまだ<fix123>飯綱丸様は知りません<fix123>いったん飯綱丸様に報告して<fix123>判断を仰ぎましょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But Master Iizunamaru doesn't<fix123>know about this yet.<fix123>I shall return and report to her,<fix123>so that she may pass her judgement.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふっふっふ、待て<fix123>こいつらがここにいることは<fix123>飯綱丸はまだ知らないんだな？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>*Chuckle*. Hang on.<fix123>You just said that Iizunamaru doesn't<fix123>know about these two being here, yeah?<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>......That is correct.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>大暴れ出来るチャンスじゃないか<fix123>盗掘者相手に天狗の判断など要らぬ<fix123>現場判断で十分だ<fix123>この場で徹底的に叩きのめしてやろう！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, ain't this a chance to go all out?<fix123>We don't need the tengu's judgement just for<fix123>some petty thieves. I can make the call myself.<fix123>I'll pummel 'em into the dirt here and now!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なるほど、みんなその嘘吐き狐に<fix123>翻弄されているみたいね<fix123>私は盗掘者でもないし<fix123>恐らく魅須丸も違う<fix123>飯綱丸という大天狗も<fix123>戦闘を望んでいない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, I see. Everyone seems to be being played<fix123>against each other by that lying fox.<fix123>I am not a thief, and it's likely<fix123>that Misumaru isn't one either.<fix123>The Great Tengu you call Iizunamaru<fix123>also doesn't wish for any battle, either.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あっはっは<fix123>そんな筈はないぞ<fix123>飯綱丸は戦闘大好きだ<fix123>それにお前達が盗掘者かどうかなんて<fix123>本当はどうでも良いのだ<fix123>ただ単に戦いたいだけだから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ahahah!<fix123>No way!<fix123>Iizunamaru loves to fight!<fix123>And I don't really care if<fix123>you guys are thieves or not.<fix123>I just want a good fight, myself!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>戦闘は避けられないようね<fix123>貴方は勝たなければいけません<fix123>力を授けましょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It seems that a battle is unavoidable.<fix123>You must win against her.<fix123>Let me lend you a bit of strength.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Have you chosen a good card?<fix123>Well then, Sakuya Izayoi, brace yourself and fight!<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Princess Who Slays Dragon Kings<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Are you done preparing?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>やれば良いんでしょ？<fix123>やれば<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Fine.<fix123>We just have to fight, yes?<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>I've been looking for someone who I'm allowed<fix123>to fight without holding anything back!<fix123>Tremble in joy!<fix123>The mountain shall be your grave!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Momoyo Himemushi DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>……き<fix123>気持ちいい！<fix123>思う存分弾幕を<fix123>撃てたし楽しかったぜ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...That...<fix123>felt AWESOME!<fix123>That was a blast! I got to shoot<fix123>all the danmaku I could ever want!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>メイドを舐めないでね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Don't underestimate maids!<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>A "maid", huh?<fix123>So maids were a race of ferocious butchers.[1]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>種族じゃなくて<fix123>職業だけどね<fix123>さて、魅須丸に用事が<fix123>あったんだけど……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's not a race,<fix123>it's an occupation.<fix123>Now then, I had some business<fix123>with Misumaru, but...<fix123><fix123>
