en_dialogue: <fix123>Misumaru's that lady who made<fix123>a break for it just now, right?<fix123>Who was she?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さあ……<fix123>私にもさっぱり<fix123>うちの魔女様に調べて来て欲しいって<fix123>言われたんですけどねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who knows...<fix123>I have no idea either.<fix123>Our resident witch told me to<fix123>come here and look into it, but...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Misumaru Tamatsukuri APPEARS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>……呼んだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...You called?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>わあ！<fix123>何処から出てきた！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Woah!<fix123>Where did you come from!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方達の暴力行為を<fix123>こっそり見てました<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I was quietly watching your violent<fix123>behaviour from over there.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>良かった<fix123>聞きたいことが山ほどありまして<fix123>まずは、龍珠とアビリティカードの<fix123>関係を知りたいです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wonderful.<fix123>I have quite a lot to ask you.<fix123>First, do you know about the relationship<fix123>between the dragon gems and the Ability Cards?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>カードは大天狗が作った<fix123>マジックアイテムです<fix123>魂を封じ込める龍珠を<fix123>利用している様ですが<fix123>細かいメカニズムは謎です<fix123>龍珠だけではカードの魔力が<fix123>維持できない筈なのに<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The cards are a type of magic item<fix123>that the great tengu created.<fix123>They seem to be utilizing dragon gems,<fix123>which can seal souls within them,<fix123>but the detailed mechanism behind them is a mystery to me.<fix123>After all, the dragon gems alone shouldn't be sufficient<fix123>for maintaining the cards' supply of magic.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なるほど……有難うございます<fix123>次に伊弉諾物質(イザナギオブジェクト)についてですが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see... Thank you so much.<fix123>Next is about the Izanagi Objects.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>伊弉諾物質は……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>An Izanagi Object is...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おいおい、下らない話をしたいんなら<fix123>外に出てからやれ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oi, oi. If you're gonna drone on about<fix123>boring stuff, feel free to do it outside.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あらごめんなさい<fix123>魅須丸さん<fix123>紅魔館に来て頂けませんか？<fix123>うちの魔女様に質問攻めに<fix123>あうかも知れませんが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, excuse us.<fix123>Miss Misumaru, do you mind coming<fix123>to the Scarlet Devil Mansion?<fix123>Our resident witch may barrage<fix123>you with questions, mind.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>良いでしょう<fix123>ちなみにさっきの質問だけど<fix123>伊弉諾物質は危険ですよ<fix123>掘り起こさないに越したことはない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Very well.<fix123>Ah yes, about your prior question.<fix123>Izanagi Objects are dangerous,<fix123>so it's best to not dig them up.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？<fix123>今なんて……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Eh?<fix123>What did you just...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>終末への採掘<fix123>Apocalyptic Mining<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Mining that Leads to the End Times<fix123>Apocalyptic Mining<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>虹龍洞<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Rainbow Dragon Cave<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 幻想の地下大線路網<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Great Fantastic Underground Railway Network<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Tsukasa Kudamaki ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>何かと都合が良いと思って<fix123>甘やかしてきたが……<fix123>坑道を荒らしに来るようなら<fix123>もう用なしだ<fix123>人間らしく死ね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I let you off easy before,<fix123>since you seemed useful......<fix123>But if you're going to cause trouble in the<fix123>tunnels, I've got no more use for you!<fix123>Die like the pitiful human you are!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Tsukasa Kudamaki DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>いやー<fix123>天狗の執念を甘く見てたかもな<fix123>こんなに深く掘れるもんなのか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Maan.<fix123>I might've underestimated the tengu's persistence, huh.<fix123>Are they seriously diggin' this deep?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Momoyo Himemushi ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>典(つかさ)……じゃないな<fix123>誰だおめーは<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're... not Tsukasa.<fix123>Who are ya!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>我こそは黙る子も泣く魔法使い<fix123>霧雨魔理沙だ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Behold! I am the magician who makes<fix123>even silent children cry, Marisa Kirisame![1]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……ほう、知らん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...Huh. Never heard of ya.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前は何者だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>黒きドラゴンイーター<fix123>姫虫 百々世<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Onyx Dragon Eater<fix123>Momoyo Himemushi<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おっと、失礼<fix123>俺は百々世(ももよ)<fix123>虹龍洞 (ここ) の監督だ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, beg your pardon.<fix123>The name's Momoyo.<fix123>I'm the Rainbow Dragon Cave's foreman.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>監督？<fix123>なるほど……そりゃあ都合が良い<fix123>ここで採掘している<fix123>龍珠の事について聞きたい<fix123>あわよくば分けて欲しい<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Foreman?<fix123>I see... well that's convenient.<fix123>I wanna ask about those dragon<fix123>gems you've been mining here.<fix123>And I'm hopin' you might be able to share some.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>龍珠について、だと？<fix123>お前が、典が言っていた盗掘者って奴か？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Dragon gems, y'say?<fix123>Are you that thief that Tsukasa mentioned?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Misumaru Tamatsukuri ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>危ない！<fix123>霧雨魔理沙くん<fix123>その大ムカデは危険です<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Be careful!<fix123>That oomukade is extremely dangerous,<fix123>young Marisa Kirisame!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今度は誰だ！？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Another one of ya!? Who are you!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は玉造 魅須丸<fix123>龍珠の正当な所有者です<fix123>お前達の行為はとても<fix123>許されるものではありません<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I am Misumaru Tamatsukuri,<fix123>the rightful owner of the dragon gems.<fix123>Your actions have been wholly unacceptable.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なん、だと？<fix123>所有者だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Whazzat?<fix123>Rightful owner?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Tsukasa Kudamaki ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>また誰か来た！<fix123>盗掘者どもめ、大勢で来やがったな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Another one!<fix123>You thieves are just pilin' on in here, aren'tcha?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>百々世どの<fix123>賊ではありません、典でございます<fix123>そこのカラフルな魅須丸って奴が<fix123>私が言っていた盗掘者です<fix123>目の前の人間と結託して、<fix123>ここの龍珠を根こそぎ奪おうとしています<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Miss Momoyo, I'm not a thief.<fix123>I'm Tsukasa.<fix123>This colorful "Misumaru" character<fix123>is the thief that I mentioned.<fix123>She's colluding with the human before you<fix123>to steal all the dragon gems from the mountain.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？<fix123>何を言っているんだ<fix123>ちょっとだけ貰えれば良いと<fix123>思っていただけ……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Eh?<fix123>What are you talking about?<fix123>I was just thinking about<fix123>taking a tiny bit...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>このままでは虹龍洞は<fix123>もう封鎖するしかないでしょう<fix123>しかしこの事はまだ<fix123>飯綱丸様は知りません<fix123>いったん飯綱丸様に報告して<fix123>判断を仰ぎましょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>At this rate, we'll have no choice but to<fix123>close down the Rainbow Dragon Cave.<fix123>But Master Iizunamaru doesn't<fix123>know about this yet.<fix123>I shall return and report to her,<fix123>so that she may pass her judgement.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふっふっふ、待て<fix123>こいつらがここにいることは<fix123>飯綱丸はまだ知らないんだな？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>*Chuckle*. Hang on.<fix123>You just said that Iizunamaru doesn't<fix123>know about these two being here, yeah?<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>......That is correct.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>大暴れ出来るチャンスじゃないか<fix123>盗掘者相手に天狗の判断など要らぬ<fix123>現場判断で十分だ<fix123>この場で徹底的に叩きのめしてやろう！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, ain't this a chance to go all out?<fix123>We don't need the tengu's judgement just for<fix123>some petty thieves. I can make the call myself.<fix123>I'll pummel 'em into the dirt here and now!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>狐の所為で変な流れに<fix123>なってしまった……<fix123>こいつは大ムカデ<fix123>龍をも喰らう醜悪な妖怪です<fix123>貴方は勝たなければいけません<fix123>力を授けましょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That fox has led the conversation<fix123>in a strange direction...<fix123>Your opponent is an oomukade,<fix123>a disgusting youkai that eats even dragons.<fix123>You must win against her.<fix123>Let me lend you a bit of strength.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Card Select Phase<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>良いカードを選んだ？<fix123>では霧雨魔理沙よ、覚悟して挑め！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Have you chosen a good card?<fix123>Well then, Marisa Kirisame, brace yourself and fight!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Misumaru Tamatsukuri and Tsukasa Kudamaki LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ちょっ待てよ！<fix123>こいつに勝ったら龍珠を<fix123>分けてくれるんだろうな？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wait a minute!<fix123>You're gonna share some of those<fix123>dragon gems with me if I win, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 龍王殺しのプリンセス<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Princess Who Slays Dragon Kings<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>良いだろう<fix123>お前が勝ったら分けてやる<fix123>正々堂々とした盗掘者は大歓迎だ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Very well!<fix123>If you win, I'll give you some.<fix123>I'll always give a warm welcome to<fix123>thieves who play fair and square!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はあどうも<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Haah, thanks...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だが無意味だ<fix123>俺が負ける筈が無い<fix123>喜び震えよ！<fix123>山がお前の墓標だ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But it doesn't matter!<fix123>There's no way I would lose.<fix123>Tremble in joy!<fix123>The mountain shall be your grave!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Momoyo Himemushi DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>……き<fix123>気持ちいい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...That...<fix123>felt AWESOME!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>やった！<fix123>勝ったぜ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes!<fix123>I won!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>思う存分弾幕を<fix123>撃てたし楽しかったぜ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That was a blast! I got to shoot<fix123>all the danmaku I could ever want!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>忘れてないよな？<fix123>約束<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You didn't forget, right?<fix123>Our promise?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>約束？<fix123>はて……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Promise?<fix123>What was it, again...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>龍珠を分けてくれる約束！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That you'd share the dragon gems with me!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ、ああ、まあ<fix123>ちょっとくらいなら良いかな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, ahh, well...<fix123>I guess a bit won't hurt.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>やったぜ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yeah!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>飯綱丸には内緒だぞ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Keep it a secret from Iizunamaru, okay?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Tsukasa Kudamaki APPEARS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>わあ！<fix123>何処から出てきた！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Woah!<fix123>Where did you come from!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>百々世どの<fix123>見事な戦いぶりでしたね<fix123>先ほどの戦いぶりで勝てないのでしたら<fix123>もう仕方がありません<fix123>しかし、龍珠を譲るとなると<fix123>飯綱丸様が黙っていないでしょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Miss Momoyo, you fought<fix123>a splendid battle.<fix123>If even your might wasn't enough to<fix123>defeat her, I suppose we have no choice.<fix123>But I doubt Master Iizunamaru would stay silent<fix123>about it if you let her have the dragon gems.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>俺はこいつの強さが気に入った<fix123>だから望む通りにしてやる<fix123>何か問題あるか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I like how strong this one is.<fix123>So I'm gonna do what she wants.<fix123>You got a problem with that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>典、おめぇが黙っていれば<fix123>問題ないってことだよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>As long as you stay silent about it,<fix123>I'm guessin' we don't have a problem. Right, Tsukasa?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>やれやれ、百々世どのに脅されたら<fix123>しかたがありませんね<fix123>私に勝ち目なんて無いのだから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My, my. If Miss Momoyo is threatening me,<fix123>I suppose I'll have to oblige.<fix123>I can't possibly win, after all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふ、流石<fix123>頭が良い奴は違うな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh, not bad.<fix123>You smart folks really are different.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんか面倒な話になってる？<fix123>私はただ、ちょっとだけ<fix123>貰えれば良かったんだが<fix123>ただの興味本位で……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Is it just me, or is this conversation getting kind of murky?<fix123>I was really just hopin' to<fix123>get the teensiest bit of it.<fix123>Just out of, uh, academic curiosity...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>龍珠が欲しければ<fix123>いつでも来い<fix123>また勝負しようじゃないか！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If you want more dragon gems,<fix123>come on back any time!<fix123>Let's have a rematch!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>また戦わなきゃいけないのかよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I have to fight you again!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>終末への採掘<fix123>Apocalyptic Mining<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Mining that Leads to the End Times<fix123>Apocalyptic Mining<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>虹龍洞<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Rainbow Dragon Cave<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 幻想の地下大線路網<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Great Fantastic Underground Railway Network<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Tsukasa Kudamaki ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>何かと都合が良いと思って<fix123>甘やかしてきたが……<fix123>坑道を荒らしに来るようなら<fix123>もう用なしだ<fix123>人間らしく死ね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I let you off easy before,<fix123>since you seemed useful......<fix123>But if you're going to cause trouble in the<fix123>tunnels, I've got no more use for you!<fix123>Die like the pitiful human you are!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Tsukasa Kudamaki DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>進んでも進んでも<fix123>終わりが見えない<fix123>山を穴だらけにする気なの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I can't see the end<fix123>no  matter how much I go on...<fix123>Are they trying to fill the mountain with holes?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Momoyo Himemushi ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>典(つかさ)……じゃないな<fix123>誰だおめーは<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're... not Tsukasa.<fix123>Who are ya!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は博麗神社の巫女<fix123>博麗霊夢！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I am the Hakurei shrine maiden,<fix123>Reimu Hakurei!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>博麗神社の巫女、だと！？<fix123>ああ、その間抜け面は確かにそうだ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Hakurei shrine maiden!?<fix123>Ahh, yep. That's her dumb face, all right.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>黒きドラゴンイーター<fix123>姫虫(ひめむし) 百々世(ももよ)<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Onyx Dragon Eater<fix123>Momoyo Himemushi<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>くっくっく、失礼<fix123>俺は百々世(ももよ)<fix123>虹龍洞(ここ)の監督だ<fix123>博麗神社の巫女が何か用かね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh-heh-heh. Beg your pardon.<fix123>The name's Momoyo.<fix123>I'm the Rainbow Dragon Cave's foreman.<fix123>So, what brings the Hakurei shrine maiden to see me?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あんたが監督？<fix123>てっきり魅須丸(みすまる)って奴が監督だと思ってた<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're the foreman?<fix123>I totally thought that Misumaru person was in charge.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>みすまる、だと？<fix123>誰だそいつ<fix123>はっ、典が言っていた<fix123>盗掘者って奴か？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>"Misumaru"?<fix123>Who's that?<fix123>*Gasp*, are they that thief<fix123>Tsukasa mentioned?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Misumaru Tamatsukuri ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>盗掘とは皮肉ね<fix123>妖怪の山を掘りまくって<fix123>伊弉諾物質(イザナギオブジェクト)を盗み出しているのは<fix123>お前達、大ムカデ率いる<fix123>妖怪集団じゃないか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ironic that you would call me a thief.<fix123>Isn't your band of youkai,<fix123>led by an oomukade...<fix123>The ones who are digging up the Youkai Mountain<fix123>and stealing the Izanagi Objects?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今度は誰だ！？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Another one of ya!? Who are you!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は玉造 魅須丸<fix123>龍珠の正当な所有者です<fix123>お前達の行為はとても<fix123>許されるものではありません<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I am Misumaru Tamatsukuri,<fix123>the rightful owner of the dragon gems.<fix123>Your actions have been wholly unacceptable.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なん、だと？<fix123>所有者だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Whazzat?<fix123>Rightful owner?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Tsukasa Kudamaki ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>また誰か来た！<fix123>盗掘者どもめ、大勢で来やがったな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Another one!<fix123>You thieves are just pilin' on in here, aren'tcha?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>百々世どの<fix123>賊ではありません、典でございます<fix123>そこのカラフルな魅須丸って奴が<fix123>私が言っていた盗掘者です<fix123>目の前の人間と結託して、<fix123>ここの龍珠を根こそぎ奪おうとしています<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Miss Momoyo, I'm not a thief.<fix123>I'm Tsukasa.<fix123>This colorful "Misumaru" character<fix123>is the thief that I mentioned.<fix123>She's colluding with the human before you<fix123>to steal all the dragon gems from the mountain.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？<fix123>ちょっ、何言ってんのよ<fix123>私はただカードの調査に来ただけ……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Eh?<fix123>Hang on, what are you saying?<fix123>I just came to investigate the cards...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>このままでは虹龍洞は<fix123>もう封鎖するしかないでしょう<fix123>しかしこの事はまだ<fix123>飯綱丸様は知りません<fix123>いったん飯綱丸様に報告して<fix123>判断を仰ぎましょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>At this rate, we'll have no choice but to<fix123>close down the Rainbow Dragon Cave.<fix123>But Master Iizunamaru doesn't<fix123>know about this yet.<fix123>I shall return and report to her,<fix123>so that she may pass her judgement.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふっふっふ、待て<fix123>こいつらがここにいることは<fix123>飯綱丸はまだ知らないんだな？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>*Chuckle*. Hang on.<fix123>You just said that Iizunamaru doesn't<fix123>know about these two being here, yeah?<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>......That is correct.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>大暴れ出来るチャンスじゃないか<fix123>盗掘者相手に天狗の判断など要らぬ<fix123>現場判断で十分だ<fix123>この場で徹底的に叩きのめしてやろう！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, ain't this a chance to go all out?<fix123>We don't need the tengu's judgement just for<fix123>some petty thieves. I can make the call myself.<fix123>I'll pummel 'em into the dirt here and now!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>不味いですね<fix123>あの狐に唆されて要らぬ戦いが始まりそう<fix123>こいつは大ムカデ<fix123>龍をも喰らう醜悪な妖怪です<fix123>貴方は勝たなければいけません<fix123>力を授けましょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How unfortunate. We're about to get into a<fix123>pointless fight, thanks to that fox's prodding.<fix123>Your opponent is an oomukade,<fix123>a disgusting youkai that eats even dragons.<fix123>You must win against her.<fix123>Let me lend you a bit of strength.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Card Select Phase<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>良いカードを選んだ？<fix123>では博麗霊夢よ、覚悟して挑め！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Have you chosen a good card?<fix123>Well then, Reimu Hakurei, brace yourself and fight!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Misumaru Tamatsukuri and Tsukasa Kudamaki LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ちょっ<fix123>なんか巻き込まれてるー！？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wai--<fix123>Why am I getting roped into this!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 龍王殺しのプリンセス<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Princess Who Slays Dragon Kings<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もう準備は出来てるか？<fix123>卑怯な盗掘者！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are you finished getting ready?<fix123>You cowardly thief!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>盗掘者じゃないけど<fix123>こうなったらやるしか無さそうね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm not a thief, but I guess I just<fix123>have to roll with it at this point.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何をしても許される敵を<fix123>探していたんだ<fix123>喜び震えよ！<fix123>山がお前の墓標だ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've been looking for someone who I'm allowed<fix123>to fight without holding anything back!<fix123>Tremble in joy!<fix123>The mountain shall be your grave!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Momoyo Himemushi DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>……き<fix123>気持ちいい！<fix123>思う存分弾幕を撃たせてくれて<fix123>ありがとう！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...That...<fix123>felt AWESOME!<fix123>Thanks for letting me shoot all<fix123>the danmaku I could ever want!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あーえらい目にあったわ<fix123>何で私が戦うハメになってるのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ugh, I really got put through the wringer...<fix123>Why did I end up having to fight you, anyway?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>冗談も休み休み言え<fix123>さっきの戦いっぷり<fix123>戦いが嫌いな奴の動きじゃない<fix123>盗掘者とはいえ<fix123>強い奴は大歓迎だぞ<fix123>いつでも盗掘しに来い！<fix123>虹龍洞に！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Give the jokes a rest!<fix123>Someone who hates fighting wouldn't have been<fix123>moving nearly as fiercely as you were just now.<fix123>You might be a thief, but I'll always<fix123>give a warm welcome to tough customers!<fix123>Come and steal your fill whenever you please,<fix123>at the Rainbow Dragon Cave!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だから、盗掘者じゃないってば<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Like I said, I'm not a thief!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>盗掘者じゃない？<fix123>……<fix123>じゃあ、何しにこんな場所に？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're not a thief?<fix123>......<fix123>Then why'd you come all the way down here?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……うーん<fix123>この鉱坑の調査よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...Mmmm.<fix123>I'm here to investigate these mines.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>またまたご冗談を<fix123>調査に来ただけなら<fix123>俺が攻撃始めた段階で<fix123>さっさと逃げれば良かったものを<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Again with those jokes!<fix123>If you just came to investigate,<fix123>then you could've just run away<fix123>when I began attacking!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……はっ<fix123>その発想はなかった<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>......Ah!<fix123>I hadn't thought of that.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>くっくっく<fix123>最高に気に入ったぞ！<fix123>飯綱丸にも紹介しよう<fix123>あいつもお前みたいな<fix123>好戦家が大好きだからな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hahaha!<fix123>You're definitely one of my favorites!<fix123>Let me introduce you to Iizunamaru!<fix123>She's a total combat-lover,<fix123>just like you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ところで、魅須丸って<fix123>結局何だったの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>By the way, who was that<fix123>Misumaru lady, after all?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なるほど、本当にお前の<fix123>知り合いじゃないのか……<fix123>まあ良い、見つけたら<fix123>今みたいに戦うだけだ<fix123>その時は<fix123>一緒に戦おうぜ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, I see. So she really wasn't<fix123>some friend of yours...?<fix123>Well, whatever. If I ever find her,<fix123>we'll just have another fight like today!<fix123>When that time comes,<fix123>we can fight her together!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>遠慮します<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No thank you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私雨、その後に<fix123> Chase rainbows<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>After an Isolated Shower ~ Chase rainbows<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>妖怪の山麓<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Youkai Mountain Foothills<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 妖異達の通り雨<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: A Shower of Strange Occurrences<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>Mike Goutokuji LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>わー、虹だー<fix123>突然の雨で最悪ーって思ってたけど<fix123>心まで晴れたわー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wow, a rainbow!<fix123>The way it started raining all of a sudden was just<fix123>the worst, but now my heart's as clear as the sky!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おーい！<fix123>そこのお姉さん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, Sis!<fix123>Yeah, you over there!<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>商売繁盛の縁起物<fix123>豪徳寺 ミケ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Lucky Charm for Prosperous Commerce<fix123>Mike Goutokuji<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いいカードあるよー<fix123>買って行かないかい？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've got some nice cards!<fix123>Wanna buy any?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……早速見つけた<fix123>貴方はカードの売人ね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...Looks like I found you nice and fast.<fix123>You're one of those card merchants.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 大吉キトゥン<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Kitten of Great Fortune<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>You've already heard? That makes things easy.<fix123>I've got some rare cards lined up here! Better act fast.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私はカードの売人を<fix123>捕まえに来たのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm actually here to arrest<fix123>the card merchants.<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Wha?!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>覚悟しなさい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Prepare thyself!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mike Goutokuji DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>何故だ！<fix123>カードの取引なんて<fix123>みんなやってるわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Why?!<fix123>Practically everyone's<fix123>getting in on the card trade!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>みんな！？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Everyone?!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>知らないの？<fix123>そういえば貴方、山の神社の巫女ね<fix123>貴方のアビリティカードも<fix123>出回っていたのをみたわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You haven't heard?<fix123>Oh, you're that shrine maiden from the mountain, aren'tcha.<fix123>I saw your Ability Card makin' the<fix123>rounds too, as a matter of fact.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私のアビリティカード！？<fix123>え？　そ、そんな……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My own Ability Card?!<fix123>Huh? T-that's...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私を倒したって何にも変わらない<fix123>売人なんてそこら中にいる<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Defeatin' me won't do you any good.<fix123> There are merchants all over the darn place.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>確かにそうよね、誰がカードを<fix123>作っているのか突き止めないと……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's a good point, actually. I've got to<fix123>figure out who's making the cards...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それはそうと<fix123>私のカード買っていかない？<fix123>何かのヒントになるかもよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That said, though.<fix123>Wanna buy a card off of me?<fix123>It could give you some kinda hint!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>商売上手な猫ねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You've got good salesmanship for a cat...<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>People of the Far Depths ~ Secret Green Cliff<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>秘天崖<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Secret Heaven Cliff<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Cliff Hidden in Deep Green<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>Takane Yamashiro LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>山の妖怪にこの辺には近づくなって<fix123>言われてるのよねぇ……<fix123>でも、こんなに神秘的な崖が<fix123>あったなんて知らなかったわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The mountain youkai have been<fix123>telling us not to go near here...<fix123>I never knew that there was a cliff with such<fix123>a mystical atmosphere back here, though!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Takane Yamashiro ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>おー、やっぱり守矢んちの<fix123>早苗ちゃんだった<fix123>さっきは見間違いかと思ったよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh! You're little Sanae from<fix123>the Moriyas' place, after all.<fix123>I thought I'd mistaken who you were, back there.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>失礼、どちら様でしょうか……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Excuse me, but who are you...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>山奥のビジネス妖怪<fix123>山城 たかね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Business Youkai of the Mountain's Recess<fix123>Takane Yamashiro<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>山童(やまわろ)の山城たかねだよ<fix123>空中索道(ロープウェイ)の工事を手伝っていたんだ<fix123>で、今日は何の用？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm Takane Yamashiro, the yamawaro!<fix123>I helped you guys out with building your cable car.<fix123>So, what brings you here today?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>アビリティカードの件で<fix123>調べたいことがあって……<fix123>って、貴方もカードを<fix123>持っているみたいね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'd like to investigate a few things<fix123>regarding those Ability Cards...<fix123>Oh, it looks like you've<fix123>got some cards yourself.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: バンデットリィテクノロジー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Banditry Technology<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>カード、か……<fix123>守矢神社が動き出すのは<fix123>時間の問題だと思っていたが……<fix123>まだまだ稼げるネタなんでね<fix123>これを奪われるわけにはいかないよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Cards, eh...?<fix123>I did think it was only a matter of time<fix123>before the Moriya Shrine made their move...<fix123>But there's still a lotta money to be made off<fix123>of these things. I can't let you take them!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Takane Yamashiro DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>強すぎる……<fix123>でも私を倒したって<fix123>カードの流通は止められないよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Good grief, you're strong...<fix123>But defeating me won't stop<fix123>the cards from circulating!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>でも、こうやって一人ずつ<fix123>潰していくしか方法が無い……<fix123>しかし、山を中心にカードが<fix123>広まっていることは判っています<fix123>このままほうって置くわけには<fix123>いかないのです<fix123>今は売人を見つけては<fix123>情報を集めるしかないの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There's no way to deal with them besides<fix123>stamping you out one by one, though...<fix123>But I do know that the cards are<fix123>spreading out from near the mountain.<fix123>I can't just leave things<fix123>alone like this.<fix123>Right now, my only choice is to find merchants<fix123>and gather information from them.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なるほどね<fix123>じゃあ情報を売ってあげようか？<fix123>とっておきの情報をね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see.<fix123>How about I sell you some info, then?<fix123>Some really, really special info.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>わーい、ちょうだいちょうだい<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ooh! Gimme, gimme!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おっと、タダな訳ないでしょう？<fix123>貴重な情報(カード)なんだから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Not so fast! I'm not giving it out for free.<fix123>It's a very valuable tidbit(card), after all.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>A Cave Boring Into the High, Noble Plains ~ Mine of High Land<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>False Heaven Shelf<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Perpetual Snow of Komakusa Blossoms<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>The hell's all this racket...?<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>うせな！<fix123>煙草の味が濁る<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Get lost!<fix123>You'll ruin the taste of my tobacco.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Sannyo Komakusa EXITS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Sannyo Komakusa ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ここまで付いてくるなんて<fix123>どうやらただの暴徒じゃあ<fix123>ないみたいだねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You followed me all this way, huh?<fix123>Guess you're not just<fix123>some ordinary rioter...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方は……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>高地に棲む山女郎<fix123>駒草太夫<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Highland-Dwelling Yamajorou<fix123>Komakusa-dayuu<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は山如(さんにょ)と言う者だ<fix123>みんなは駒草太夫(こまくさだゆう)と呼んでいるがね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My name's Sannyo.<fix123>Folks like to call me Komakusa-dayuu, though.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうそう、駒草太夫さんね<fix123>天狗相手に博打の商売をしているとか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Right, you're Miss Komakusa-dayuu!<fix123>You run a gambling parlor for the tengu, and such.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おや？<fix123>よく見たら、守矢神社の巫女か<fix123>こんな所に来ちゃ駄目じゃないか<fix123>約束が違うぞ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh?<fix123>Well, if it isn't the Moriya shrine maiden.<fix123>You're not supposed to come up here, right?<fix123>You're breaking your promise right now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええ、しかし緊急事態なんです<fix123>山に奇妙なカードが流通していて<fix123>それが風紀を乱しているというか……<fix123>とにかくその流通の中心が<fix123>この辺っぽいのです<fix123>カードを全て回収して<fix123>事態を収束させないと！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, but this is an emergency situation.<fix123>There are bizarre cards circulating on the mountain,<fix123>and it's disturbing the peace, or some such...<fix123>At any rate, it seems that the card<fix123>market is centered around here.<fix123>I have to collect all the cards<fix123>and contain the situation!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>風紀を乱す？<fix123>事態を収束？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Disturbing the peace?<fix123>Contain the situation?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: スモーキングドラゴン<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Smoking Dragon<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふん、山のお巡りさんに<fix123>でもなったつもりか？<fix123>カードの流通は山の未来にとって<fix123>必要不可欠だ<fix123>山の風紀を乱しているのは<fix123>お前達、守矢神社の方なんだよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmph. Who do you think you are?<fix123>A mountain cop?<fix123>I'll have you know that the card market's<fix123>a crucial part of the mountain's future.<fix123>You're the ones disturbing the mountain's peace!<fix123>You Moriya Shrine folks!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Sannyo Komakusa DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ぐ、強すぎる<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Grh. You're way too strong...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>調査に協力して貰うわよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'll be having you cooperate with my investigation.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>流石だ<fix123>天狗の旦那が認めるだけあるな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Not bad.<fix123>It's no wonder that tengu has a high opinion of you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ところで貴方の後ろにある<fix123>その入(・)口(・)は何？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>By the way, what's that entrance<fix123>I happen to see behind you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>虹龍洞を知らないのか？<fix123>虹龍洞は山の未来を作る夢の鉱坑だよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You haven't heard of the Rainbow Dragon Cave?<fix123>It's a cave with a mine full of dreams in it. A mine that'll build the mountain's future.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？　虹龍洞？<fix123>初めて聞いたんですけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh? The Rainbow Dragon Cave?<fix123>This is the first I've heard of it.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうなのか？<fix123>守矢神社の神さんたちも<fix123>一枚噛んでいると聞いてたんだが……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Really?<fix123>I could've sworn I heard that the Moriya Shrine<fix123>gods had their finger in that pie, too...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ど、どど、どういう事？<fix123>そんなの聞いてない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>W-w-w-what?<fix123>I haven't heard anything about that!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おいおい、中に入っては駄目だ<fix123>この上なく危険だぞ<fix123>いくら、お前が強いと言っても<fix123>人間には酷な環境だ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, hey, you can't go in there.<fix123>It's more dangerous than you'd ever believe!<fix123>I don't care how strong you are.<fix123>It's an awful environment for humans to be in.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いや、これは調査しざるを得ない<fix123>だから、何か良いカード持っていたら頂戴<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, I simply have to investigate this.<fix123>So if you have any good cards, I'd like to buy one!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふっ、まあ良いだろう<fix123>精々気を付けるんだな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh. Well, alright.<fix123>You'd better be real careful in there.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>伊弉諾物質 (イザナギ　オブジェクト) <fix123>Mine of Izanagi Object<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Izanagi Objects ~ Mine of Izanagi Object<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>虹龍洞<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Rainbow Dragon Cave<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 廃れゆく産業遺構<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Obsolescent Industrial Ruins<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Large Wheel Ghost ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Large Wheel Ghost LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>何ここ……<fix123>石炭でも掘っているのかな<fix123>遅れてるなぁ<fix123>もう核融合の時代なのに<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What is this place...?<fix123>I wonder if they're digging up something like coal?<fix123>They sure are lagging behind here...<fix123>Even though we're already in the age of nuclear fusion.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Misumaru Tamatsukuri ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>そこの人間！<fix123>止まりなさーい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You there, human!<fix123>Stop at once!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>勾玉創造職人<fix123>玉造 魅須丸<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Master Artisan of Magatama<fix123>Misumaru Tamatsukuri<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>これ以上潜ると死ぬよ<fix123>悪い事は言わない<fix123>今すぐ引き返しなさい<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You'll die if you proceed any further.<fix123>I'm telling you this for your own good.<fix123>Turn around and leave, right now!<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Who are you!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は玉造(たまつくり)ですよ<fix123>東風谷早苗くん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My name is Tamatsukuri,<fix123>Young Sanae Kochiya.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私のことを知っているんですね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So already you seem to know who I am.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええ、勿論……<fix123>そこでもう一度警告します<fix123>この先は無酸素エリアです<fix123>つまり人間の貴方は<fix123>呼吸が出来なくなります<fix123>それでも貴方は進みますか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, of course I do...<fix123>So let me repeat my warning once again.<fix123>Beyond this point is an anoxic zone.<fix123>That means a human like you will cease<fix123>to be able to breathe down there.<fix123>Will you still proceed, knowing that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>無酸素！？<fix123>鉱坑って言うから嫌な予感がしてたけど<fix123>もしかして有毒ガスも出る？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Anoxic!?<fix123>I had a bad feeling about this mine shaft<fix123>from the start, but are there toxic gases too?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>無酸素状態では人間はすぐに窒息します<fix123>だから有毒ガスが<fix123>あっても無くても一緒ですが<fix123>勿論、有毒ガスで満たされてますよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Humans will quickly suffocate in any anoxic environment.<fix123>Whether there are toxic gases or not<fix123>won't change the end result...<fix123>But yes, the shaft is indeed filled with toxic gas.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほんとー？<fix123>一酸化炭素か何かかしら<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Really?<fix123>Is it carbon monoxide or something, I wonder?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 神代鉱石<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Ore from the Age of the Gods<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>怖くないのですか？<fix123>死を忘れてしまったのです？<fix123>長くここに留まると<fix123>死んでしまうと言うのに<fix123>窒息死は非常に苦しい終わり方です<fix123>もっと楽な方法をおすすめします！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are you not scared?<fix123>Have you forgotten that you might die?<fix123>Even though I warned you that<fix123>lingering here would cause your demise?<fix123>Death by asphyxiation is a highly unpleasant way to go.<fix123>Might I recommend a more palatable method!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Misumaru Tamatsukuri DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>やるじゃない<fix123>まさかそこまで強いお方だとは<fix123>思いませんでした<fix123>東風谷早苗くん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm, not bad.<fix123>I certainly didn't expect you<fix123>to be this strong.<fix123>Young Sanae Kochiya.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……な、なに、これ……<fix123>いきが、できない……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...W-what is this...?<fix123>I can't... breathe...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だから、ここにいると<fix123>窒息するって言ったでしょう？<fix123>既に酸素濃度は地上の半分程度です<fix123>なまじ腕は立つ所為で<fix123>危機感を失ったようね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I told you, didn't I?<fix123>That you'd suffocate if you stayed here?<fix123>The oxygen levels are already about half of that on the surface.<fix123>It seems that your brash show of skill<fix123>has led you to forget your sense of danger.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……これだけはしりたいわ<fix123>ここでほっているのはなに？<fix123>金？　銀？　石炭？　鉄鉱石？<fix123>ボーキサイト？　それともウラン？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...Just let me know one thing.<fix123>What exactly are you mining here?<fix123>Gold? Silver? Coal? Iron?<fix123>Bauxite?[1] Or even Uranium?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふふふ<fix123>ここは、龍珠の採掘場です<fix123>龍珠とは、いにしえの時代から伝わる<fix123>いわばイザナギオブジェクト<fix123>人類が生まれるずっと前から存在する<fix123>人知の及ばない鉱物です<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>*Chuckle*.<fix123>This is a mining site for dragon gems.<fix123>Dragon gems are so-called Izanagi Objects<fix123>that have been handed down since ancient times.<fix123>They are ores that have existed since long before<fix123>the birth of mankind, and are beyond human understanding.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……な、なんだってー<fix123>なにをいっているのか<fix123>わからない！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...W-what the heeeck?<fix123>I have no idea what in the world<fix123>you're talking about!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ところで貴方はアビリティカードを<fix123>調査しに来たのでしょう？<fix123>ならば、目指すは虹龍洞(このおく)では無い<fix123>外に出て山の頂上を<fix123>目指すと良いでしょう<fix123>そこに龍珠から出来た勾玉を利用して<fix123>利益を得ている奴がいます！<fix123>そこでの深呼吸は格別ですよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>By the way, you've come to investigate<fix123>the Ability Cards, haven't you?<fix123>Then this cave isn't where you should be headed.<fix123>You ought to head back outside<fix123>and seek the top of the mountain.<fix123>There's someone there who's been making<fix123>profits off of magatama made from dragon gems!<fix123>I really do recommend taking some deep breaths up there.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>大空は誰の物なのか<fix123>Spectral Hierarchy<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>To Whom Does the Vast Sky Belong? ~ Spectral Hierarchy<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>妖怪の山 山頂<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Youkai Mountain Peak<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 待ちわびた逢魔が時<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Long-Awaited Oumagatoki<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Tsukasa Kudamaki ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>人間が来たわ！<fix123>私の思った通りじゃん<fix123>こんなこと<fix123>長くは続かないと……！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A human's here!<fix123>See, it's just as I thought.<fix123>I knew we couldn't keep something<fix123>like this up for long...!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Tsukasa Kudamaki LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ハアハア<fix123>さっきの鉱坑程じゃあないけど<fix123>ここまで来ると空気が薄くて辛いわ<fix123>高山病になっちゃう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huff... huff...<fix123>It's not as bad as that mine shaft from before,<fix123>but it's still tough with the thin air up here.<fix123>I'm going to get altitude sickness.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Megumu Iizunamaru ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>おやおや<fix123>面白いお方がいらっしゃる<fix123>神社のお嬢ちゃんじゃないか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Why, what's this?<fix123>A curious little thing just showed up.<fix123>You're the young miss from that shrine, aren't you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>鴉天狗の大将<fix123>飯綱丸 龍<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Chief of the Crow Tengu<fix123>Megumu Iizunamaru<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>知っての通り、ここは人間が易々と<fix123>立ち入っていい場所じゃ無いよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>As you already know, this isn't a place that humans<fix123>ought to set foot in so easily.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>天狗、いや大天狗様ですね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're a tengu-- no, a Great Tengu, aren't you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いかにも、私は飯綱丸(いいずなまる)[2]<fix123>鴉天狗の大将です<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Indeed, I am Iizunamaru,<fix123>general of the crow tengu.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>天狗の領域に無断で侵入して<fix123>失礼致します<fix123>しかし、どうもカードの源流が<fix123>私達の山にあるようでして<fix123>これの調査に天狗の領域に<fix123>立ち入る事が不可避なのです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm sorry for trespassing in the domain<fix123>of the tengu without permission.<fix123>However, as the origin of these cards<fix123>seems to be somewhere on our mountain,<fix123>I have no choice but to enter tengu<fix123>territory in order to investigate them.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>アビリティカードの話をしてます？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are you talking about the Ability Cards?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうですそうです<fix123>何か心当たりはありませんか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, exactly!<fix123>Do you happen to know anything?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>心当たりも何も<fix123>それは私が作った物よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I don't just "happen to know" about them.<fix123>I created them, as a matter of fact!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？　なんですって！？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh? What did you say!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Tsukasa Kudamaki ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>いたいた<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There you are!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>耳元で囁く邪悪な白狐<fix123>管牧 典<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wicked White Fox Who Whispers in Ears<fix123>Tsukasa Kudamaki<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほら私の言っていたとおりになったわ<fix123>いつか人間が乗り込んでくるよって<fix123>こうなっては仕方が無いです<fix123>この人間は私が相手しますので<fix123>その間に飯綱丸様は……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>See, things turned out just like I said they would.<fix123>A human would be sure to come snooping up here eventually!<fix123>I suppose we have no choice by now.<fix123>I shall deal with this human myself.<fix123>So in the meantime, Master Iizunamaru, you can...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 星降る天魔の山<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Starry Mountain of Tenma<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あっはっは<fix123>出しゃばるんじゃない<fix123>お前は弱いくせに<fix123>自分の力を過信しすぎる<fix123>怪我でもしたら<fix123>困るのは私なんだ<fix123>こいつは私が相手する<fix123>お前は引っ込んでな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah-hah-hah!<fix123>Don't get ahead of yourself.<fix123>You're too confident in your own strength,<fix123>despite being a weakling.<fix123>If you got injured, I'd be<fix123>the one troubled by it.<fix123>I'll deal with her.<fix123>You get back!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Tsukasa Kudamaki LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Megumu Iizunamaru DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ふっふっふ<fix123>お見事<fix123>私は降参します<fix123>ですからこれ以上の戦いは無益です<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh heh.<fix123>Splendid.<fix123>I hereby surrender.<fix123>As such, any further conflict is futile.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>やけに素直ですね……<fix123>本当にアビリティカードを<fix123>作ったのって貴方なの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're awfully direct...<fix123>Are you really the one<fix123>who made the Ability Cards?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええ、そのとおりです<fix123>虹龍洞で採掘した龍珠を使って<fix123>一儲けしようとね<fix123>もう十分儲かったし<fix123>そろそろ潮時かなーと<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, that's right.<fix123>I figured I could make a good profit using the dragon<fix123>gems dug up from the Rainbow Dragon Cave, you know?<fix123>I've made enough money off of them by now,<fix123>so I was guessing it'd be about time to pack up shop anyway.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いやはや、犯人が見つかって<fix123>ひとまずは良かったです<fix123>これ以上混乱する前にカードの<fix123>流通を止めて頂きたいのですが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, now! I've found the culprit, so that should be a relief for the time being.<fix123>Could I ask you to please stop circulating these<fix123>cards before any further confusion breaks out?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>しかしねぇ、このカードの流通は<fix123>私では止められないよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's the thing, I'm afraid. I can't stop<fix123>the cards from circulating by myself.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何でです？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Why is that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何故なら、カードの売買は<fix123>それぞれ個人が勝手に始めた物だからね<fix123>もし本気でカードの流通を<fix123>止めたければ<fix123>更に上空にいる、黒幕を探すと良い<fix123>カードの流通は全て<fix123>そいつが担っている<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Because everyone who's taking part in the card trade<fix123>just started doing so of their own accord.<fix123>If you do seriously want to<fix123>stop the cards' circulation...<fix123>I suggest you search for the mastermind, who's even higher up in the sky.<fix123>She's fully in charge of<fix123>circulating the cards.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうですか、まだ何か<fix123>いるんですね……<fix123>判りました<fix123>それでは失礼して……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Is that right? There's<fix123>still someone left...<fix123>I see. In that case,<fix123>please excuse me...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Sanae Kochiya LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>……行かせて良かったんです？<fix123>あの神の元に<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...Are you alright with this?<fix123>Letting her leave, and reach that god?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>良いのよ<fix123>私がその能力を有効的に<fix123>利用してやらなければ<fix123>落ちぶれた神様のまま<fix123>だったというのに<fix123>いつの間にか力を付けて<fix123>カードの利権を我が物にし始めて<fix123>そろそろ邪魔になって来たところよ<fix123>守矢神社のお嬢ちゃんなら<fix123>どっちが負けても我々の得になる<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's fine.<fix123>If I hadn't made effective use of<fix123>her ability in the first place,<fix123>she'd still have been a<fix123>washed-up shell of a god...<fix123>And yet she regained her power while my back was turned,<fix123>and started trying to take over the rights to the cards!<fix123>She's made herself into just enough of a nuisance by now.<fix123>If the Moriya Shrine girl fights her,<fix123>we'll benefit no matter which one loses.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……あははは<fix123>なるほどね<fix123>裏切り行為には<fix123>直接自分の手を下さない<fix123>素晴らしい考えだと思います<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>....Hahaha.<fix123>I see.<fix123>When you betray someone, you don't<fix123>do it with your own hands.<fix123>A wonderful idea, in my opinion.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>月虹市場<fix123>Lunar Rainbow Market<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Lunar Rainbow Market ~ Lunar Rainbow Market<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>誰の物でもない夜空<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Night Sky that Belongs to No One<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ルナレインボー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Lunar Rainbow<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Tsukasa Kudamaki ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>飯綱丸様が裏切った！<fix123>面白くなってきたわー！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Master Iizunamaru betrayed her!<fix123>Things are really getting interesting!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Tsukasa Kudamaki LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>不自然な月だわ<fix123>こんなに明るい夜も珍しい<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What an unnatural moon.<fix123>Even the night being this bright is unusual.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Chimata Tenkyuu ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ようこそ<fix123>月虹市場へ<fix123>今宵の一番乗りは貴方よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Welcome to the Lunar Rainbow Market.<fix123>You're the first marketeer to arrive this evening.<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>...And you are?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>無主物の神<fix123>天弓 千亦<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>God of Unowned Property<fix123>Chimata Tenkyuu<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>天弓千亦(てんきゅうちまた)<fix123>市場のプレゼンターです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Chimata Tenkyuu.<fix123>I'm the market's main presenter.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>市場のプレゼンター？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The market's presenter?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>虹が出たとき等、特別なときに<fix123>商売を可能にする神です<fix123>貴方達が商売出来るのは<fix123>私がいるからなのよ<fix123>貴方も私のお陰で<fix123>生きているようなものです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm a god who makes commerce possible on special<fix123>occasions, such as when a rainbow appears.<fix123>It's thanks to my presence that you're<fix123>all able to buy and sell goods.<fix123>Put another way, you're essentially<fix123>alive right now because of me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なるほど……？<fix123>つまりそれはどういう……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see...?<fix123>So what does that all...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Tsukasa Kudamaki ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>千亦どの<fix123>報告があります<fix123>……<fix123>……であります<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Miss Chimata.<fix123>I have a report for you.<fix123>....<fix123>....so she said.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何？<fix123>飯綱丸が裏切ったって？<fix123>あっはっは<fix123>今頃気が付いたか、天狗風情が<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What?<fix123>Iizunamaru betrayed me?<fix123>Ah-hah-hah!<fix123>It took you that long to realize, you lousy tengu?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>といいますと？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>By which you mean?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私を利用して儲かろうとしていた<fix123>事なんて最初から判っていたわ<fix123>でも、逆に自分が利用されていた事に<fix123>気付くのは遅すぎたわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I always knew that she was taking<fix123>advantage of me to make a profit.<fix123>But it looks like she was too slow to realize<fix123>that I was taking advantage of her right back!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほうほう<fix123>興味深いお話です<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oho.<fix123>How very interesting.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方は飯綱丸のペットでしょう？<fix123>帰って伝えなさい<fix123>もう、市場は開かれた<fix123>何人たりとも<fix123>神の手から逃れられる物か<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're Iizunamaru's pet, aren't you?<fix123>Trot on back and tell her.<fix123>The market is already open.<fix123>None can escape from the hands of God!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あのー<fix123>私のこと忘れてません？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Umm.<fix123>Did you forget about me?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あらごめんなさい<fix123>忘れてました<fix123>では始めましょうか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, I'm so sorry.<fix123>I forgot.<fix123>Now then, shall we begin?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>えっ？　何を？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh? Begin what?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何をって……取引ですよ<fix123>貴方、今まで仕入れた<fix123>アビリティカードを売りに来たんでしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What do you mean, "what"...? Our transaction, of course.<fix123>You're here to sell the Ability Cards you've<fix123>spent all this time stocking up, aren't you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>売りに来た？<fix123>ああ、なるほど<fix123>貴方はそういう神様ですか<fix123>集めたカードを換金してくれるってわけね……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sell them?<fix123>Oh, I see.<fix123>You're that kind of god?<fix123>So you exchange collected cards into money...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まあ、そんな所ね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, more or less.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うーんどうしようかなー<fix123>ちなみにいくらぐらいで？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmm, what to do...<fix123>About how much are you offering, by the way?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>東風谷早苗どの<fix123>このお方は市場の、商売の神であります<fix123>ですが市場が開いている時間は限定的です<fix123>例えば虹が出ているときとか<fix123>異界と交錯しているときとかです<fix123>今のうちにカードを売って<fix123>利益確定した方が良いと思います<fix123>その方がお(・)得(・)ですよ<fix123>貴方の目的はそれでしょう？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Miss Sanae Kochiya.<fix123>Miss Chimata is a god of the marketplace, and of commerce.<fix123>However, this marketplace is only open at certain times.<fix123>For instance, when a rainbow comes out,<fix123>or when there's an intersection with an Otherworld.<fix123>I think it would be best if you sold a card,<fix123>and received a set profit for it while you still can.<fix123>That would be more beneficial for you.<fix123>That's what you're here for, isn't it?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はっ、違う違う！<fix123>カードの流通を止める為に<fix123>来たんだった！<fix123>市場の神なんでしょ！<fix123>本当にそうなら<fix123>今すぐカードの流通を止めなさい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>*Gasp!* No, that's wrong!<fix123>I came here in order to halt<fix123>the circulation of these cards!<fix123>You're the god of markets, aren't you?<fix123>If that's true, then stop<fix123>these cards from circulating right now!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あーあ、言っちゃいけないこと<fix123>言っちゃった<fix123>ふふふ、しーらないっと<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Whoops, you went and said<fix123>something you shouldn't have.<fix123>*Giggle*. Don't say I didn't warn yooou.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Tsukasa Kudamaki LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>BGM: あの賑やかな市場は今どこに　～ Immemorial Marketeers<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Where is that Bustling Marketplace Now ~ Immemorial Marketeers<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>If Sanae doesn't hold the Blank Card<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>流通を止めることは出来ない<fix123>何故ならすでに月に<fix123>虹が架かっているからです<fix123>商売に介入することは<fix123>市場を侮辱する行為<fix123>貴方は市場から<fix123>排除されなければならない<fix123>すべて無(かみ)に返そう！<fix123>神の見えざる手で！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I cannot halt their circulation.<fix123>Why, you ask? Because the rainbow<fix123>is already encircling the moon.<fix123>To intervene in transactions now<fix123>would be blasphemy against the market.<fix123>I'm afraid I must have you<fix123>disbarred from this marketplace.<fix123>Let us return all things to nothing (God) !<fix123>By God's invisible hand!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>If Sanae holds the Blank Card<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>……お前<fix123>お前が持っているカードは……<fix123>私の……！？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...You.<fix123>That card you're holding...<fix123>It's mine...?!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>間違えて買っちゃったのよ……<fix123>もう泣きそう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I bought it by complete mistake...<fix123>I feel like crying.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>泣きそう、って何よ<fix123>所有権を操作する唯一のカードなのに<fix123>でも、面白い事をしてくれるわね！<fix123>ここで死んでしまうのが残念だわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>"Feel like crying?" Excuse you!<fix123>It's the one and only card that can control ownership.<fix123>But you've shown me something quite interesting!<fix123>It's a shame that you're going to die here!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Before Final Spell Card<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>素晴らしくも神を恐れぬ人間よ<fix123>虹はまもなく閉じる<fix123>最後にお前の命も無 (かみ) に返そう<fix123>これで終わりだ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>O wonderous human, who fears not even God.<fix123>The rainbow will close in just a few moments' time!<fix123>Finally, return even your life to nothing (God) !<fix123>This marks the end!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Chimata Tenkyuu DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
The Primate Spirit Garden in the Animal Realm.<fix123>
A keyhole-shaped forest.<fix123>
The interior is filled with strange technology.<fix123>
"Amazing!<fix123>
There's a ton of stuff I've never seen before here!<fix123>
Let me do some investigatin', all right?"<fix123>
"Yes, Lady Keiki has given her permission.<fix123>
Since she now understands that you're unrelated to the dispute<fix123>between the human spirits and the beast spirits."<fix123>
"She decided that, if you aren't possessed by a beast spirit,<fix123>then as a human, you'd probably be on our side."<fix123>
"Your boss is pretty understanding, huh."<fix123>
"All these antique items have such a mysterious shine to them.<fix123>
I wonder how you even make tools like these..."<fix123>
"Lady Keiki has dexterous hands, you see."<fix123>
"No matter what she makes, a spirit will come to reside in them.<fix123>
Even I am but a clay figure that was created by Lady Keiki."<fix123>
"Wha, what did you say? She really is dexterous, huh."<fix123>
Earthenware, bronzeware, mirrors, and swords. Though all of them looked worn,<fix123>they each housed a tremendous magical power.<fix123>
It seemed like even a single item would be able to gather faith as a goshintai.<fix123>
Marisa thought, "Isn't this the same as being able to create gods?"<fix123>and shuddered just a tiny bit.<fix123>
<c$Ending No. 04 — The Master that Molds Gods$><fix123>
<c$Congratulations!$><fix123><c$Good job on your No Continue Clear!$><fix123>
Marisa's house.<fix123>
A snug house found in the Forest of Magic.<fix123>
"I'm Kicchou, the boss of the Kiketsu Family.<fix123>
You have my extreme gratitude for<fix123>cooperating with our Otter this time around."<fix123>
"Waah! You scared me. What is it? Don't just pop out like that."<fix123>
"Thanks to your cooperation, we've<fix123>managed to deal a blow to that evil god."<fix123>
"That's right, in the end I still don't really know<fix123>what I was fighting with, and what I got caught up in..."<fix123>
"We, the beast spirits, were being harassed by<fix123>that group of idols led by that Keiki.<fix123>
The group of idols was trying to put the entirety of the Animal Realm under their control."<fix123>
"Only a human from the surface, who possessed both a physical form and<fix123>a different faith, could destroy those idols.<fix123>
That is why your cooperation was necessary."<fix123>
"It would've been fine if you'd just told me from the start."<fix123>
"You have my sincerest apologies.<fix123>
But I couldn't afford even the slightest chance of failure."<fix123>
According to her, if she revealed the plan to the humans, then there was a chance<fix123>that Keiki would hear about it, so that's why she needed to deceive them.<fix123>
Marisa wasn't able to read Yachie's true intentions from her words.<fix123>
Or rather, perhaps she just couldn't see Keiki as an evil god.<fix123>
<c$Ending No. 05 — Might Makes Right$><fix123>
<c$Congratulations!$><fix123><c$Good job on your No Continue Clear!$><fix123>
The Primate Spirit Garden in the Animal Realm.<fix123>
A keyhole-shaped forest.<fix123>
The interior is filled with strange technology.<fix123>
"You want to take a look around the Primate Spirit Garden?<fix123>
Go ahead. You're always welcome here."<fix123>
"Ah, thanks."<fix123>
"As long as you're not possessed by a beast spirit, you're one of our allies, after all."<fix123>
"I dunno about being an ally, and in the first place<fix123>I have no clue what you're even fighting over."<fix123>
"I can't see you as an ally of the beast spirits, though.<fix123>
What do you think about cooperating with the human spirits in changing the Animal Realm?<fix123>
If you do, you'll be free to use anything in the Primate Spirit Garden to your heart's content."<fix123>
"Wha, what did you say? That's an attractive proposal..."<fix123>
"As a bonus, I'll make a 1/8 figure of you.<fix123>
I can even make it cooler than the real thing."<fix123>
"Um, I'll have to decline."<fix123>
"Hohoho, the 1/8 was a joke.<fix123>
If I'm going to make one, it'll have to be life-size, right?"<fix123>
To Marisa, Keiki just seemed simple-minded, and didn't seem<fix123>to have any ambitions.<fix123>
It was hard to imagine why the beast spirits<fix123>resented her so strongly.<fix123>
<c$Ending No. 06 — The Animal Realm Wasn't Straightforward$><fix123>
<c$Congratulations!$><fix123><c$Good job on your No Continue Clear!$><fix123>
"I'm Kicchou, the boss of the Kiketsu Family.<fix123>
We were wrong to have placed our hopes in you.<fix123>
It seemed the evil god's power just barely managed to beat you."<fix123>
"It's inconvenient for us to let you live any longer.<fix123>
It's unfortunate, but..."<fix123>
"W-Wait, what are you gonna do!?"<fix123>
"This time, the beast spirits got in my way.<fix123>
Next time, I'll show you all my true power, so gimme another chance!"<fix123>
"...Understood.<fix123>
However, there are plenty of humans that can take your place.<fix123>
We won't allow any more failures."<fix123>
You were just barely forced to run away from the evil god.<fix123>
You absolutely can't lose next time!<fix123>
<c$Bad Ending No. 02 — Aim for a No Continue Clear!$><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>That makes things nice an' easy.<fix123>I've got some rare cards lined up here! Better act fast.<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>Huh?!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前達ぼんくらが持っていても<fix123>しょうがない代物よ<fix123>怪我したくなければ<fix123>さっさと出しな！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There's no point in letting blockheads<fix123>like you have something so valuable.<fix123>If you don't want to get hurt,<fix123>fork them over right now!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mike Goutokuji DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>っく……！<fix123>攻撃しても無駄よ！<fix123>でも、アビリティカードは<fix123>暴力では決して渡さない<fix123>それなりの対価ってもんが必要でしょ？<fix123>それが自由経済の大前提でしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ggh...!<fix123>There's no point in attacking me!<fix123>But you won't be getting any Ability Cards<fix123>through violence, that's for sure.<fix123>I need somethin' of value in return, right?<fix123>That's the basis of the entire free market.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふふふそうね<fix123>じゃあお金出すから全部頂戴<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>*Chuckle*. I suppose so.<fix123>I'll pay full price, so give me everything you have.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>毎度ありー<fix123>って言いたいけれど<fix123>一回につき一枚しか購入できないのよ<fix123>知らなかったの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Pleasure doin' business with you!<fix123>...Is what I'd like to say.<fix123>But you can only buy one card per transaction.<fix123>Didn'tcha know that?<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>It's been a while since I climbed up the mountain by myself.<fix123>I hardly expected the Youkai Mountain to have<fix123>such a perfect sheer cliff for rock-climbing.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm a yamawaro, not a kappa! A yamawaro.<fix123>We're pretty similar, though.<fix123>This is no place for humans to be skulking around.<fix123>So get outta here, quick!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうもいかない<fix123>貴方もカードを持っているのが<fix123>見えるからね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm afraid that won't be happening.<fix123>After all, I can see that<fix123>you've got cards of your own.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Cards, eh...?<fix123>I guess you've been sniffing around for them after all.<fix123>These are too much for you puny little humans to handle!<fix123>Begone from our mountain!<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Good grief, you're strong...<fix123>But it's too bad for you!<fix123>Cards can't be taken through violence.<fix123>Those are the rules.<fix123><fix123>
