jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は山如(さんにょ)と言う者だ<fix123>みんなは駒草太夫(こまくさだゆう)と呼んでいるがね<fix123>お前は、誰だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My name's Sannyo.<fix123>Folks like to call me Komakusa-dayuu, though.<fix123>And who are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私はカードの売人を探しているのです<fix123>貴方もカード、売ってくれるんでしょう？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm searching for card merchants at the moment.<fix123>I imagine you're selling cards as well?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふふっ<fix123>まずは名を名乗れ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heheh.<fix123>Your name first, if you don't mind.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>失礼致しました<fix123>私は十六夜咲夜<fix123>紅魔館でメイドをしています<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I do apologize.<fix123>I'm Sakuya Izayoi.<fix123>I work as a maid at the Scarlet Devil Mansion<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あっはっは<fix123>ただ者ならぬ風格を感じていたが<fix123>ただの人間のメイドか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Bahaha!<fix123>I got the feeling you weren't someone to sneeze at.<fix123>But you're just some human maid?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: スモーキングドラゴン<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Smoking Dragon<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それなら麓の売人から手に入れな！<fix123>さっさと去れ<fix123>私から買おうとするなんざ８０年早い<fix123>去らないというのなら<fix123>力ずくで追い返してやろう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If you want some, go buy 'em from a merchant in the foothills!<fix123>Get lost right now.<fix123>You're 80[1] years too early to even think of buyin' from me!<fix123>And if you won't leave,<fix123>I'll chase you off with brute force.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Sannyo Komakusa DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ぐ、強すぎる<fix123>判った判った<fix123>お前は強い、カードは売ってやろう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Grh. You're way too strong...<fix123>I get it, I get it.<fix123>You're strong. I'll sell ya some cards.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あらどうも<fix123>ところで貴方の後ろにある<fix123>その入(・)口(・)は何処に繋がっているの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Why, thank you.<fix123>By the way, where might that entrance<fix123>behind you happen to lead?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>これか？<fix123>これは虹龍洞の洞口だ<fix123>虹龍洞は山の未来を作る夢の鉱坑だよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This?<fix123>It's the entrance to the Rainbow Dragon Cave.<fix123>It's a cave with a mine full of dreams in it. A mine that'll build the mountain's future.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>虹龍洞……<fix123>鉱坑……<fix123>そんなの初耳ね<fix123>石炭でも掘ってるのかしら<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Rainbow Dragon Cave...<fix123>A mine...<fix123>This is the first I've heard of it.<fix123>Are you digging for coal, perhaps?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おいおい、中に入っては駄目だ<fix123>この上なく危険だぞ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, hey, you can't go in there.<fix123>It's more dangerous than you'd ever believe!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>忠告ありがとう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Thank you for the heads-up.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どうしても入りたいというのなら……<fix123>どうだ？<fix123>良いカード持ってるよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, if you insist on goin' in...<fix123>What do you say?<fix123>I've got some pretty good cards.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>伊弉諾物質 (イザナギ　オブジェクト) <fix123>Mine of Izanagi Object<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Izanagi Objects ~ Mine of Izanagi Object<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>虹龍洞<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Rainbow Dragon Cave<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 廃れゆく産業遺構<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Obsolescent Industrial Ruins<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Large Wheel Ghost ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Large Wheel Ghost LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>この坑道<fix123>長すぎる……<fix123>何処まで行っても<fix123>見た目が変わらないし……<fix123>はっ<fix123>もしかしてループしている！？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This mine shaft is<fix123>far too long...<fix123>No matter how far I go,<fix123>it all looks the same, too...<fix123>*Gasp!*<fix123>Could I be looping in place?!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Misumaru Tamatsukuri ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>そこの人間！<fix123>止まりなさーい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You there, human!<fix123>Stop at once!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>勾玉創造職人<fix123>玉造 魅須丸<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Master Artisan of Magatama<fix123>Misumaru Tamatsukuri<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>これ以上潜ると死ぬよ<fix123>悪い事は言わない<fix123>今すぐ引き返しなさい<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You'll die if you proceed any further.<fix123>I'm telling you this for your own good.<fix123>Turn around and leave, right now!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いや、ループはしていないのか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I suppose I'm not looping, then.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ループ……確かに無限に感じられる<fix123>くらい長い坑道ですが<fix123>それは飽くなき欲望が形になった<fix123>だけです<fix123>もう一度警告します<fix123>この先は無酸素エリアです<fix123>つまり人間の貴方は<fix123>呼吸が出来なくなります<fix123>それでも貴方は進みますか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Looping... True, this shaft certainly<fix123>is long enough to feel endless.<fix123>But that's nothing more than someone's<fix123>insatiable desire, taken form.<fix123>I'll warn you one more time.<fix123>Beyond this point is an anoxic zone.<fix123>That means a human like you will cease<fix123>to be able to breathe down there.<fix123>Will you still proceed, knowing that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>無酸素、ですって？<fix123>……酸素って何でしたっけ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Anoxic, you say?<fix123>...Remind me what "oxygen" is?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 神代鉱石<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Ore from the Age of the Gods<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>酸素とは、”失うと瞬時に死ぬ”<fix123>という動物に掛けられた呪いです<fix123>無酸素エリアとは動物の侵入から<fix123>守られた神域なのです<fix123>貴方もどうせ窒息で死ぬんでしょうけど<fix123>もっと楽に死んでも良いんですよ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oxygen is a curse placed on animals, which<fix123>causes them to instantly die in its absence.<fix123>An anoxic zone is a sanctuary that's<fix123>protected from animals' intrusion.<fix123>You're bound to die of suffocation there too,<fix123>but I really suggest dying in a more pleasant way, you know?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Misumaru Tamatsukuri DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>やるじゃない<fix123>まさかそこまで強いお方だとは<fix123>思いませんでした<fix123>十六夜咲夜くん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm, not bad.<fix123>I certainly didn't expect you<fix123>to be this strong.<fix123>Young Sakuya Izayoi.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>！？<fix123>なぜ、わたしのことを……<fix123>しかし、はめられた<fix123>くるしい……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>?!<fix123>How do you know... who I am...?<fix123>But I've walked right into a trap.<fix123>I can't breathe...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>窒息するって言ったでしょう？<fix123>既に酸素濃度は地上の半分程度です<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I told you you'd suffocate, yes?<fix123>The oxygen levels here are already just about half of that on the surface.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>これが、ここののろいなのね……<fix123>最後にききたいわ<fix123>……ここでなにをほっているの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So this is the curse on this place...<fix123>Let me ask one last thing.<fix123>...What are you digging up here?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ここは、龍珠の採掘場です<fix123>龍珠とは、いにしえの時代から伝わる<fix123>いわばイザナギオブジェクト<fix123>人類が生まれるずっと前から存在する<fix123>人知の及ばない鉱物です<fix123>私はこの龍珠から本物の勾玉を<fix123>造っているのです<fix123>勾玉のた(・)ま(・)とは人間の魂のことであり<fix123>故に人間の能力を封じ込め……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This is a mining site for dragon gems.<fix123>Dragon gems are so-called Izanagi Objects<fix123>that have been handed down since ancient times.<fix123>They are ores that have existed since long before<fix123>the birth of mankind, and are beyond human understanding.<fix123>I happen to craft genuine magatamas<fix123>from these dragon gems.<fix123>The "tama" in "magatama" refers to a human's soul.<fix123>As such, they can seal humans' abilities within them...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……は、はなしがながい<fix123>もう、なにをいっているのかわからない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...Y-you're really droning on.<fix123>I can't even tell what you're saying any more...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら、ごめんあそばせ<fix123>ところで貴方はアビリティカードを<fix123>調査しに来たのでしょう？<fix123>ならば、目指すは虹龍洞(このおく)では無い<fix123>外に出て山の頂上を<fix123>目指すと良いでしょう<fix123>そこに龍珠から出来た勾玉を利用して<fix123>利益を得ている奴がいます！<fix123>そこでの深呼吸は格別ですよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, my sincerest apologies.<fix123>By the way, you've come to investigate<fix123>the Ability Cards, haven't you?<fix123>Then this cave isn't where you should be headed.<fix123>You ought to head back outside<fix123>and seek the top of the mountain.<fix123>There's someone there who's been making<fix123>profits off of magatama made from dragon gems!<fix123>I really do recommend taking some deep breaths up there.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>大空は誰の物なのか<fix123>Spectral Hierarchy<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>To Whom Does the Vast Sky Belong? ~ Spectral Hierarchy<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>妖怪の山 山頂<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Youkai Mountain Peak<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 待ちわびた逢魔が時<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Long-Awaited Oumagatoki<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Tsukasa Kudamaki ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>人間が来たわ！<fix123>私の思った通りじゃん<fix123>こんなこと<fix123>長くは続かないと……！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A human's here!<fix123>See, it's just as I thought.<fix123>I knew we couldn't keep something<fix123>like this up for long...!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Tsukasa Kudamaki LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>もうこんな時間……<fix123>ハズレの洞窟で時間を<fix123>使いすぎたわ<fix123>暗くなってしまっては<fix123>下山も危ないわよね<fix123>この辺で夜営しましょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's this late already...<fix123>I wasted too much time<fix123>in that dud of a cave.<fix123>Now that it's dark, descending the<fix123>mountain will also be dangerous.<fix123>Time to set up camp here for the night.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Megumu Iizunamaru ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>おやおや<fix123>夜のハイキングかな<fix123>それとも、遭難かな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Why, what's this?<fix123>Out on a nighttime hike?<fix123>Or perhaps you're stranded?<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>And you are?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>鴉天狗の大将<fix123>飯綱丸 龍<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Chief of the Crow Tengu<fix123>Megumu Iizunamaru<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は大天狗の飯綱丸(いいづなまる)<fix123>人間の素性なんて<fix123>どうでも良いが<fix123>ここは、人間が易々と<fix123>立ち入っていい場所じゃ無いよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I am the Great Tengu, Iizunamaru.<fix123>I have no interest in<fix123>who you might be, human,<fix123>but this isn't a place that humans<fix123>ought to set foot in so easily.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はいそうですか<fix123>さっきの奴が言っていた<fix123>勾玉を使って利益を得ている奴って<fix123>天狗なんでしょう？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, is that so.<fix123>So the one making a profit off of magatama,<fix123>who that woman from before mentioned...<fix123>They're a tengu, aren't they?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>アビリティカードの話をしてます？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are you talking about the Ability Cards?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>えーっと多分<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ummm. Probably.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>カードなら、それは私が作った物よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I actually happened to create those cards.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？　なんですって！？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh? Excuse me?!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Tsukasa Kudamaki ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>いたいた<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There you are!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>耳元で囁く邪悪な白狐<fix123>管牧 典<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wicked White Fox Who Whispers in Ears<fix123>Tsukasa Kudamaki<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほら私の言っていたとおりになったわ<fix123>いつか人間が乗り込んでくるよって<fix123>こうなっては仕方が無いです<fix123>この人間は私が相手しますので<fix123>その間に飯綱丸様は……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>See, things turned out just like I said they would.<fix123>A human would be sure to come snooping up here eventually!<fix123>I suppose we have no choice by now.<fix123>I shall deal with this human myself.<fix123>So in the meantime, Master Iizunamaru, you can...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 星降る天魔の山<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Starry Mountain of Tenma<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あっはっは<fix123>出しゃばるんじゃない<fix123>お前は弱いくせに<fix123>自分の力を過信しすぎる<fix123>怪我でもしたら<fix123>困るのは私なんだ<fix123>こいつは私が相手する<fix123>お前は引っ込んでな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah-hah-hah!<fix123>Don't get ahead of yourself.<fix123>You're too confident in your own strength,<fix123>despite being a weakling.<fix123>If you got injured, I'd be<fix123>the one troubled by it.<fix123>I'll deal with her.<fix123>You get back!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Tsukasa Kudamaki LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Megumu Iizunamaru DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ふっふっふ<fix123>お見事<fix123>強くて勇気のある者は好きです<fix123>お前の話を聞きましょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh heh.<fix123>Splendid.<fix123>I'm fond of brave, powerful people.<fix123>I'll hear you out.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>本当にアビリティカードを<fix123>作ったのって貴方なの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are you really the one who<fix123>made the Ability Cards?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええ、そのとおりです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, I am.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>一体何が目的でこんな物を作ったの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Just what kind of motive would you have for making these things?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何の目的でって……<fix123>そりゃあビジネスに<fix123>決まってるでしょう<fix123>お陰様で好評のようで<fix123>こちらも潤っています<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My motive...?<fix123>Why, they're my latest<fix123>business venture, obviously.<fix123>It seems that people are quite enjoying them,<fix123>so I'm in a rather cushy spot right now myself.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふん、所詮天狗、か<fix123>非道の極みだわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmph, typical tengu.<fix123>Simply the height of immorality.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>非道ですか？<fix123>魂の一部をコピーしただけです<fix123>誰にも被害は出てない筈ですが……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Immoral?<fix123>I just copied a small part of people's souls.<fix123>They shouldn't be posing any harm to anyone...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>被害ねぇ……<fix123>埒が明かないわ<fix123>不快だからさっさと回収してくれる？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Harm, hm...?<fix123>This isn't getting me anywhere.<fix123>They're unpleasant, so would you mind recalling all of them?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それは出来ません<fix123>カードの流通は私では止められない<fix123>何故なら、カードの売買は<fix123>それぞれ個人が勝手に始めた物です<fix123>それに、流通を牛耳っているのは<fix123>私では無いからです<fix123>本気で流通を止めたいのなら<fix123>更に上空にいる、黒幕を探すと良い<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I can't do that.<fix123>The cards' circulation can't be stopped; not by me, at least.<fix123>Because everyone who's taking part in the card trade<fix123>just started doing so of their own accord.<fix123>And I'm not the one controlling<fix123>their circulation, either.<fix123>If you do seriously want to stop that circulation, I suggest<fix123>you search for the mastermind, who's even higher up in the sky.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……判ったわ、嘘じゃ無さそうね<fix123>情報をありがとう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...Alright. You don't seem to be lying.<fix123>Thanks for the information.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Sakuya Izayoi LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>……行かせて良かったんです？<fix123>あの神の元に<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...Are you alright with this?<fix123>Letting her leave, and reach that god?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>良いのよ<fix123>私がその能力を有効的に<fix123>利用してやらなければ<fix123>落ちぶれた神様のまま<fix123>だったというのに<fix123>いつの間にか力を付けて<fix123>カードの利権を我が物にし始めて<fix123>そろそろ邪魔になって来たところよ<fix123>さっきの奴なら良い働きを<fix123>してくれるでしょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's fine.<fix123>If I hadn't made effective use of<fix123>her ability in the first place,<fix123>she'd still have been a<fix123>washed-up shell of a god...<fix123>And yet she regained her power while my back was turned,<fix123>and started trying to take over the rights to the cards!<fix123>She's made herself into just enough of a nuisance by now.<fix123>I'm sure that girl just now will do a good job for us.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……あははは<fix123>なるほどね<fix123>裏切り行為には<fix123>直接自分の手を下さない<fix123>素晴らしい考えだと思います<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>....Hahaha.<fix123>I see.<fix123>When you betray someone, you don't<fix123>do it with your own hands.<fix123>A wonderful idea, in my opinion.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>月虹市場<fix123>Lunar Rainbow Market<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Lunar Rainbow Market ~ Lunar Rainbow Market<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>誰の物でもない夜空<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Night Sky that Belongs to No One<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ルナレインボー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Lunar Rainbow<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Tsukasa Kudamaki ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>飯綱丸様が裏切った！<fix123>面白くなってきたわー！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Master Iizunamaru betrayed her!<fix123>Things are really getting interesting!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Tsukasa Kudamaki LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>綺麗な月ですこと<fix123>更に上空って言ってたけど<fix123>まさか月の事じゃ無いわよね<fix123>あり得るから怖いわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My, what a beautiful moon.<fix123>She said "even higher in the sky,"<fix123>but I certainly hope she didn't mean the moon.<fix123>The scary part is that that's actually plausible.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Chimata Tenkyuu ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ようこそ<fix123>月虹市場へ<fix123>今宵の一番乗りは貴方よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Welcome to the Lunar Rainbow Market.<fix123>You're the first marketeer to arrive this evening.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>無主物の神<fix123>天弓 千亦<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>God of the Unowned<fix123>Chimata Tenkyuu<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>天弓千亦(てんきゅうちまた)<fix123>市場のプレゼンターです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Chimata Tenkyuu.<fix123>I'm the market's main presenter.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>市場のプレゼンター……<fix123>良かった、見つけたわ<fix123>カードの流通を<fix123>仕切っているのは貴方ね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The market's presenter...<fix123>Good, I've finally found you.<fix123>You're the one in charge of<fix123>the cards' circulation, then?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうですよ<fix123>私は虹が出たとき等、特別なときに<fix123>商売を可能にする神です<fix123>貴方達が商売出来るのは<fix123>私がいるからです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Quite so!<fix123>I'm a god who makes commerce possible on special<fix123>occasions, such as when a rainbow appears.<fix123>It's thanks to my presence that you're<fix123>all able to buy and sell goods.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ならば、このカードの流通を<fix123>止めて欲しいの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>In that case, I'd like you to halt<fix123>circulation of these cards.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……え？<fix123>何だって？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...Huh?<fix123>Come again?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Tsukasa Kudamaki ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>千亦どの<fix123>報告があります<fix123>……<fix123>……であります<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Miss Chimata.<fix123>I have a report for you.<fix123>....<fix123>....so she said.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何？<fix123>飯綱丸が裏切ったって？<fix123>あっはっは<fix123>今頃気が付いたか、天狗風情が<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What?<fix123>Iizunamaru betrayed me?<fix123>Ah-hah-hah!<fix123>It took you that long to realize, you lousy tengu?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>といいますと？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>By which you mean?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私を利用して儲かろうとしていた<fix123>事なんて最初から判っていたわ<fix123>でも、逆に自分が利用されていた事に<fix123>気付くのは遅すぎたわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I always knew that she was taking<fix123>advantage of me to make a profit.<fix123>But it looks like she was too slow to realize<fix123>that I was taking advantage of her right back!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほうほう<fix123>興味深いお話です<fix123>ところでそこの人間<fix123>発言には気を付けた方がいい<fix123>このお方は市場の、商売の神です<fix123>怒らせても得することは<fix123>何一つありませんよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oho.<fix123>How very interesting.<fix123>By the way, miss human.<fix123>I would suggest you pay careful attention to your remarks.<fix123>Miss Chimata is a god of the marketplace, and of commerce.<fix123>You have nothing whatsoever<fix123>to gain from angering her.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふふふ<fix123>では始めましょうか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>*Giggle*.<fix123>So, shall we begin?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>始めるって？　何を？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Begin what, exactly?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何をって……取引ですよ<fix123>貴方、今まで仕入れた<fix123>アビリティカードを売りに来たんでしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What do you mean, "what"...? Our transaction, of course.<fix123>You're here to sell the Ability Cards you've<fix123>spent all this time stocking up, aren't you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>売りに来た？<fix123>いやそうじゃ無いわ<fix123>カードの売買を終わらせたいの<fix123>気持ち悪いったらありゃしないわ<fix123>今すぐカードを全て回収して<fix123>売買を禁止させて！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sell them?<fix123>No, that's not it.<fix123>I want to stop everyone from selling them.<fix123>They're as unsettling as something could possibly be.<fix123>Recall all the cards this instant,<fix123>and ban any further sale of them!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう……<fix123>市場破壊が目的の賊でしたか<fix123>それは看過出来ないですねぇ<fix123>こういう賊がいるから<fix123>いつまで経っても平和が訪れない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see...<fix123>So, you were a robber seeking to destroy the marketplace?<fix123>I certainly can't let that slide.<fix123>The fact that robbers like you exist<fix123>is the reason why peace can never arrive.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あーあ、だから発言に気を付けてって<fix123>言ったのに<fix123>ふふふ、しーらないっと<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Whoops. And even when I told<fix123>you to watch what you say.<fix123>*Giggle*. Don't say I didn't warn yooou.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Tsukasa Kudamaki LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>BGM: あの賑やかな市場は今どこに　～ Immemorial Marketeers<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Where is that Bustling Marketplace Now ~ Immemorial Marketeers<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>If Sakuya doesn't hold the Blank Card<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>残念ね……<fix123>市場は開くことは出来るけど<fix123>介入することは<fix123>市場を侮辱する行為です<fix123>お前達みたいな市場破壊者を<fix123>許すわけに行かない<fix123>私は自由な商売を保証する！<fix123>それが市場の神だ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How unfortunate...<fix123>I can open a marketplace, sure,<fix123>but intervening in one is blasphemy<fix123>against the market itself.<fix123>I can never forgive market-destroyers<fix123>such as yourselves.<fix123>I absolutely guarantee free trade!<fix123>That's what a market god is!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>If Sakuya holds the Blank Card<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>……お前<fix123>お前が持っているカードは……<fix123>私の……！？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...You.<fix123>That card you're holding...<fix123>It's mine...?!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>このカード、使えなさすぎるから<fix123>捨てようと思ってたのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's such an utterly useless card that<fix123>I was just thinking about throwing it out.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>使えないって何よ<fix123>所有権を操作する唯一のカードなのに<fix123>最っ高に面白い賊ね！<fix123>ここで死んでしまうのが残念だわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>"Useless?" Excuse you!<fix123>It's the one and only card that can control ownership.<fix123>What an utterly interesting robber!<fix123>It's a shame that you're going to die here!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Before Final Spell Card<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>素晴らしくも神を恐れぬ人間よ<fix123>虹はまもなく閉じる<fix123>最後にお前の命も無 (かみ) に返そう<fix123>これで終わりだ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>O wonderous human, who fears not even God.<fix123>The rainbow will close in just a few moments' time!<fix123>Finally, return even your life to nothing (God) !<fix123>This marks the end!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Chimata Tenkyuu DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>私雨、その後に<fix123> Chase rainbows<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>After an Isolated Shower ~ Chase rainbows<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>妖怪の山麓<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Youkai Mountain Foothills<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 妖異達の通り雨<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: A Shower of Strange Occurrences<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mike Goutokuji ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Mike Goutokuji LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ひでー<fix123>雨だったなぁ<fix123>ほんと<fix123>山の天気は変わりやすい<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Man, that was some awful rain.<fix123>Weather near the mountain really does change fast.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おーい！<fix123>そこのお姉さん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, Sis!<fix123>Yeah, you over there!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mike Goutokuji ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>商売繁盛の縁起物<fix123>豪徳寺 ミケ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Lucky Charm for Prosperous Commerce<fix123>Mike Goutokuji<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いいカードあるよー<fix123>買って行かないかい？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've got some nice cards!<fix123>Wanna buy any?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>カードって<fix123>この不思議なアビリティカードの事か？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Cards?<fix123>You mean these mysterious little Ability Cards?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お、喰い付いてきたね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ooh, looks like I've got a bite.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それは危険なアイテムだ<fix123>猫がオモチャにする代物じゃ無い<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Those cards are dangerous items.<fix123>They sure ain't cat toys, I can tell you that much.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 大吉キトゥン<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Kitten of Great Fortune<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふ、そんなこと言って……<fix123>お姉さんも欲しいんでしょ？<fix123>それに危険な訳ないじゃん<fix123>だってみんな集めているもん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmph! You might say that...<fix123>but you want 'em too, don'tcha?<fix123>And they're not dangerous or anything.<fix123>I mean, everyone's collecting 'em!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>みんな集めている、だと？<fix123>大変な事になってるな<fix123>ひとまず、お前の持っている<fix123>カードから調査しよう！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>"Everyone's collecting 'em"?<fix123>Looks like things have gotten pretty serious.<fix123>Looks like I'll start<fix123>by investigating your cards!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mike Goutokuji DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>っく……！<fix123>攻撃しても無駄よ！<fix123>でも、アビリティカードは<fix123>暴力では決して渡さない<fix123>それなりの対価ってもんが必要でしょ？<fix123>それが自由経済の大前提でしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ggh...!<fix123>There's no point in attacking me!<fix123>But you won't be getting any Ability Cards<fix123>through violence, that's for sure.<fix123>I need somethin' of value in return, right?<fix123>That's the basis of the entire free market.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>自由経済？　もしかしてこのカードって<fix123>みんな売買しているのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The free market? Are you saying that everyone's buyin' and sellin' those cards?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>当たり前じゃない<fix123>で、買うの？　買わないの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Duh, of course!<fix123>So, are you gonna buy? Or aren't ya?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>しょ、しょうがない<fix123>買うよ、買う！　いくらなんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>O-okay, fine.<fix123>I'll buy 'em. I'll buy 'em! How much are they?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……ふっふっふ<fix123>そう来なくっちゃ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...Heh heh heh.<fix123>Now we're talking.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>深奥の民<fix123> Secret Green Cliff<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>People of the Far Depths ~ Secret Green Cliff<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>秘天崖<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Secret Heaven Cliff<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 深緑に隠された断崖<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Cliff Hidden in Deep Green<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Takane Yamashiro ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Takane Yamashiro LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>さっきの猫の話だとカードは<fix123>妖怪の山発祥のようだが……<fix123>こんな断崖絶壁の秘境に<fix123>入るのは初めてだぜ……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>According to that cat, the cards<fix123>originated from the Youkai Mountain...<fix123>But this is my first time visitin' this area.<fix123>It's sheer cliffs all around...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Takane Yamashiro ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>おー、やっぱり人間じゃないか<fix123>さっきは見間違いかと思ったよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh! You're a human after all.<fix123>I thought I'd mistaken what you were, back there.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>出てきたな<fix123>猫は嘘を吐いていなかった<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Bingo.<fix123>Looks like the cat wasn't lyin'.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>山奥のビジネス妖怪<fix123>山城 たかね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Business Youkai of the Mountain's Recess<fix123>Takane Yamashiro<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この崖は我々、山童(やまわろ)のアジトだ<fix123>人間が来て良い場所じゃ無い<fix123>さっさと帰った帰った<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This cliff is a secret hideout for we, the yamawaro.<fix123>It's no place for humans to be skulking around.<fix123>So get outta here, quick!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>カードを持っている奴が<fix123>すぐ見つかるとはラッキーだぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Pretty lucky for me to have found<fix123>someone with cards on 'em this quick.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: バンデットリィテクノロジー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Banditry Technology<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>カード、か……<fix123>やはり、それを嗅ぎつけてきたか<fix123>これは矮小な人間の手に余る物だ！<fix123>山から消え失せろ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Cards, eh...?<fix123>I guess you've been sniffing around for them after all.<fix123>These are too much for you puny little humans to handle!<fix123>Begone from our mountain!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Takane Yamashiro DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>強すぎる……<fix123>だが、残念だったな<fix123>暴力ではカードは奪えない<fix123>そう決められているんだ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Good grief, you're strong...<fix123>But it's too bad for you!<fix123>Cards can't be taken through violence.<fix123>Those are the rules.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>暴力ではカードは奪えない……<fix123>さっきの猫もそう言ってたな<fix123>そう言われると罪悪感が出て<fix123>強奪する気が失せるぜ<fix123>まあいいよ、買うから<fix123>買って調査するよ<fix123>いくらなんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ya can't take cards through violence...<fix123>That cat said the same thing.<fix123>Hearin' that makes me feel too<fix123>guilty to steal the things.<fix123>Welp, alright. I'll buy one.<fix123>First I'll buy, then I'll investigate.<fix123>How much you want?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら、お客さんだというのなら<fix123>話は別だわ！<fix123>さあどうぞ！<fix123>どれもお買い得ですよー！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ooh! If you're a customer,<fix123>then that's quite a different story!<fix123>Now, go right ahead!<fix123>They're all great deals!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>尊き高原に穿つ洞<fix123> Mine of High Land<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A Cave Boring Into the High, Noble Plains ~ Mine of High Land<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>偽天棚<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>False Heaven Shelf<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 駒草咲くパーペチュアルスノー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Perpetual Snow of Komakusa Blossoms<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>騒がしい……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The hell's all this racket...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Sannyo Komakusa ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>うせな！<fix123>煙草の味が濁る<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Get lost!<fix123>You'll ruin the taste of my tobacco.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Sannyo Komakusa EXITS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Sannyo Komakusa ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ここまで付いてくるなんて<fix123>どうやらただの暴徒じゃあ<fix123>ないみたいだねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You followed me all this way, huh?<fix123>Guess you're not just<fix123>some ordinary rioter...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>誰だお前<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who're you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>高地に棲む山女郎<fix123>駒草太夫<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Highland-Dwelling Yamajorou<fix123>Komakusa-dayuu<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は山如(さんにょ)と言う者だ<fix123>みんなは駒草太夫(こまくさだゆう)と呼んでいるがね<fix123>お前は、誰だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My name's Sannyo.<fix123>Folks like to call me Komakusa-dayuu, though.<fix123>And who are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は霧雨魔理沙と言う者だ<fix123>みんなは天才魔法使いって呼んでるがね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My name's Marisa Kirisame.<fix123>Folks like to call me Genius Magician, though.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふふっ<fix123>その天才くんが<fix123>こんな山の上に何の用だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heheh.<fix123>So, what brings Miss Genius<fix123>up to this mountaintop?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>カードの売人を追ってきたんだ<fix123>お前もカードを持っているようだな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm huntin' down card merchants.<fix123>Looks like you've got some cards too, don'tcha?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>やっぱりカードが欲しいんだな<fix123>そうだと思ったよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So it's cards you want, after all.<fix123>I thought as much.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: スモーキングドラゴン<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Smoking Dragon<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それなら麓の売人から手に入れな！<fix123>さっさと去れ<fix123>私から買おうとするなんざ８０年早い<fix123>去らないというのなら<fix123>力ずくで追い返してやろう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If you want some, go buy 'em from a merchant in the foothills!<fix123>Get lost right now.<fix123>You're 80[1] years too early to even think of buyin' from me!<fix123>And if you won't leave,<fix123>I'll chase you off with brute force.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Sannyo Komakusa DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ぐ、強すぎる<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Grh. You're way too strong...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>カードが欲しいと言うよりは<fix123>カードの秘密が知りたいんだ<fix123>このカードは一体何なんだ？<fix123>誰が作っているんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's not that I want the cards<fix123>so much as I wanna know their secrets.<fix123>What are these cards?<fix123>Who's making 'em?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……そんなこと<fix123>知る必要もない<fix123>というか私も知らない<fix123>商売には必要の無い事だしねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...You don't need<fix123>to know about that.<fix123>Uh, actually, I don't know either.<fix123>It's not somethin' I need to do business, after all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そ、そうなのか？<fix123>まあ、調査は続行だな<fix123>ところでお前の後ろに<fix123>ぽっかり空いてるそ(・)れ(・)は何だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>R-really?<fix123>Well, I guess the investigation continues.<fix123>By the way, what's that big,<fix123>gaping thing behind you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>これは……虹龍洞の洞口<fix123>虹龍洞は山の未来を作る夢の鉱坑だ<fix123>中は危ないから<fix123>私が見張っている<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This is... the entrance to the Rainbow Dragon Cave.<fix123>In that cave is a mine full of dreams. A mine that'll build the mountain's future.<fix123>It's dangerous inside, so<fix123>I'm watchin' over the place.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほう……興味深い<fix123>こっちも調べないとな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oho... intriguing.<fix123>I'd better check this place out too.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>伊弉諾物質 (イザナギ　オブジェクト) <fix123>Mine of Izanagi Object<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Izanagi Objects ~ Mine of Izanagi Object<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>虹龍洞<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Rainbow Dragon Cave<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 廃れゆく産業遺構<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Obsolescent Industrial Ruins<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Large Wheel Ghost ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Large Wheel Ghost LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>とんでもなく深い洞窟だな<fix123>この虹色に光輝く魔力……<fix123>とんでもない掘り出し物が見つかりそうだぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Man, this cave is ridiculously deep.<fix123>Seein' this magic shining with rainbow light...<fix123>I feel like I'm gonna dig up somethin' ridiculously good.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Misumaru Tamatsukuri ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>そこの人間！<fix123>止まりなさーい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You there, human!<fix123>Stop at once!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>勾玉創造職人<fix123>玉造 魅須丸<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Master Artisan of Magatama<fix123>Misumaru Tamatsukuri<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>これ以上潜ると死ぬよ<fix123>悪い事は言わない<fix123>今すぐ引き返しなさい<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You'll die if you proceed any further.<fix123>I'm telling you this for your own good.<fix123>Turn around and leave, right now!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ようやく敵のお出ましか<fix123>待ちくたびれたぜ！<fix123>このまま地獄まで行くかと思ったよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Finally time for the bad guy to show up, eh?<fix123>You really kept me waiting!<fix123>I thought I was gonna follow this tunnel all the way to Hell.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>聞いてますか？<fix123>もう一度警告します<fix123>この先は無酸素エリアです<fix123>つまり人間の貴方は<fix123>呼吸が出来なくなります<fix123>それでも貴方は進みますか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are you even listening?<fix123>I'll warn you one more time.<fix123>Beyond this point is an anoxic zone.<fix123>That means a human like you will cease<fix123>to be able to breathe down there.<fix123>Will you still proceed, knowing that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>呼吸が出来なくなる、だと？<fix123>そんな脅しは効かないぜ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I won't be able to breathe, huh?<fix123>Threats like that won't work on me!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 神代鉱石<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Ore from the Age of the Gods<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>やれやれ<fix123>これは脅しでは無いと言うのに……<fix123>この地が無知な人間の死体で<fix123>汚れるのはごめんだわ<fix123>自ら去るか、運ばれて去るか<fix123>今すぐ選びなさい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Honestly, now.<fix123>I'm not even telling you this as a threat...<fix123>I'd rather not see this place be sullied<fix123>with an ignorant human's corpse.<fix123>Will you leave on your own, or be carried out?<fix123>Choose at once!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Misumaru Tamatsukuri DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>やるじゃない<fix123>まさかそこまで強いお方だとは<fix123>思いませんでした<fix123>霧雨魔理沙くん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm, not bad.<fix123>I certainly didn't expect you<fix123>to be this strong.<fix123>Young Marisa Kirisame.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>わたしのことをしっているのか……<fix123>ぐ、いきが……くるしい<fix123>これはなんのまねだ……？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Y'know who I am...?<fix123>Gh, I can't... breathe...<fix123>Wh' th'hell are you doin'...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>言ったでしょう？<fix123>ここら辺でも<fix123>既に酸素濃度は地上の半分程度です<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I told you, didn't I?<fix123>Even at this depth, the oxygen levels are<fix123>already about half of that on the surface.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>こ、こうさんだ<fix123>いきができないんじゃ、もうなにもできん<fix123>しかし、これだけはおしえてくれ<fix123>ここでいったいなにをほっているんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I-I give up...<fix123>There's nothin' I can do if I can't breathe.<fix123>But tell me this one thing.<fix123>What th' heck are ya diggin' for down here?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ここは、龍珠の採掘場です<fix123>龍珠とは、いにしえの時代から伝わる<fix123>いわばイザナギオブジェクト<fix123>人類が生まれるずっと前から存在する<fix123>人知の及ばない鉱物です<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This is a mining site for dragon gems.<fix123>Dragon gems are so-called Izanagi Objects<fix123>that have been handed down since ancient times.<fix123>They are ores that have existed since long before<fix123>the birth of mankind, and are beyond human understanding.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……イザナギオブジェクト！<fix123>神代のマジックアイテムだったか<fix123>そんなものほりだして<fix123>う、うらやましい<fix123>くそっ……もう、いきが……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...Izanagi Objects!<fix123>You're gettin' magic items from the gods' era, then.<fix123>Dang, diggin' up stuff like that.<fix123>I-I'm jealous.<fix123>Damn... I can't take another breath...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ところで貴方はアビリティカードを<fix123>調査しに来たのでしょう？<fix123>ならば、目指すは虹龍洞(このおく)では無い<fix123>外に出て山の頂上を<fix123>目指すと良いでしょう<fix123>そこに龍珠から出来た勾玉を利用して<fix123>利益を得ている奴がいます！<fix123>そこでの深呼吸は格別ですよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>By the way, you've come to investigate<fix123>the Ability Cards, haven't you?<fix123>Then this cave isn't where you should be headed.<fix123>You ought to head back outside<fix123>and seek the top of the mountain.<fix123>There's someone there who's been making<fix123>profits off of magatama made from dragon gems!<fix123>I really do recommend taking some deep breaths up there.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>大空は誰の物なのか<fix123>Spectral Hierarchy<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>To Whom Does the Vast Sky Belong? ~ Spectral Hierarchy<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>妖怪の山 山頂<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Youkai Mountain Peak<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 待ちわびた逢魔が時<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Long-Awaited Oumagatoki<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Tsukasa Kudamaki ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>人間が来たわ！<fix123>私の思った通りじゃん<fix123>こんなこと<fix123>長くは続かないと……！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A human's here!<fix123>See, it's just as I thought.<fix123>I knew we couldn't keep something<fix123>like this up for long...!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Tsukasa Kudamaki LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>すーーーー<fix123>はーーーー<fix123>たしかに<fix123>山での深呼吸は最高だぜ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>*Inhaaaale*...<fix123>Hwaaaaah...<fix123>Dang, yeah!<fix123>Takin' deep breaths on a mountain is the best!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Megumu Iizunamaru ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>おやおや<fix123>夜のハイキングかな<fix123>それとも、遭難かな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Why, what's this?<fix123>Out on a nighttime hike?<fix123>Or perhaps you're stranded?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>誰だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who're you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>鴉天狗の大将<fix123>飯綱丸 龍<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Chief of the Crow Tengu<fix123>Megumu Iizunamaru<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は大天狗の飯綱丸(いいづなまる)<fix123>人間の素性なんて<fix123>どうでも良いが<fix123>ここは、人間が易々と<fix123>立ち入っていい場所じゃ無いよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I am the Great Tengu, Iizunamaru.<fix123>I have no interest in<fix123>who you might be, human,<fix123>but this isn't a place that humans<fix123>ought to set foot in so easily.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>大天狗……<fix123>随分と山奥まで来ちまったなぁ<fix123>調べたいことがあってね<fix123>ちょっとだけ時間あるか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A Great Tengu...<fix123>Man, I must've hiked pretty deep by now.<fix123>Well, I've got somethin' I wanna investigate.<fix123>You got time to spare?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何でしょう？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What might that be?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>アビリティカードって知ってるか？<fix123>それが麓で流通しているんだ<fix123>何か知ってる事は無いか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You know 'bout those Ability Card things?<fix123>They're making the rounds down in the foothills.<fix123>You happen t' know anything about them?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>アビリティカード？<fix123>知ってるも何も<fix123>それは私が作った物よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Ability Cards?<fix123>I don't just "know" about them.<fix123>I created them, as a matter of fact!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？　なんだと！？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh? What?!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Tsukasa Kudamaki ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>いたいた<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There you are!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>耳元で囁く邪悪な白狐<fix123>管牧 典<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wicked White Fox Who Whispers in Ears<fix123>Tsukasa Kudamaki<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほら私の言っていたとおりになったわ<fix123>いつか人間が乗り込んでくるよって<fix123>こうなっては仕方が無いです<fix123>この人間は私が相手しますので<fix123>その間に飯綱丸様は……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>See, things turned out just like I said they would.<fix123>A human would be sure to come snooping up here eventually!<fix123>I suppose we have no choice by now.<fix123>I shall deal with this human myself.<fix123>So in the meantime, Master Iizunamaru, you can...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 星降る天魔の山<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Starry Mountain of Tenma<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あっはっは<fix123>出しゃばるんじゃない<fix123>お前は弱いくせに<fix123>自分の力を過信しすぎる<fix123>怪我でもしたら<fix123>困るのは私なんだ<fix123>こいつは私が相手する<fix123>お前は引っ込んでな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah-hah-hah!<fix123>Don't get ahead of yourself.<fix123>You're too confident in your own strength,<fix123>despite being a weakling.<fix123>If you got injured, I'd be<fix123>the one troubled by it.<fix123>I'll deal with her.<fix123>You get back!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Tsukasa Kudamaki LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Megumu Iizunamaru DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ふっふっふ<fix123>お見事<fix123>強くて勇気のある者は好きです<fix123>お前の話を聞きましょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh heh.<fix123>Splendid.<fix123>I'm fond of brave, powerful people.<fix123>I'll hear you out.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さっきアビリティカードを<fix123>作ったとか言ってなかったか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You said that you made the<fix123>Ability Cards a minute ago, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええ、そのとおりです<fix123>虹龍洞で採掘した龍珠を使って<fix123>一儲けしようとね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, that's right.<fix123>I figured I could make a good profit using the dragon<fix123>gems dug up from the Rainbow Dragon Cave, you know?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なるほど、見えて来たぞ<fix123>さっきからあちこちで<fix123>虹色に光っているなと思ったが<fix123>あれは全て龍珠が放つ虹彩なんだろ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Gotcha. I think I'm puttin' it together.<fix123>I've been noticing those rainbow lights<fix123>here an' there for a little while now...<fix123>Those are all rainbows bein' projected<fix123>by the dragon gems, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>その通りです<fix123>中々知識のある……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Indeed.<fix123>You're quite the knowledgeable...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>カード全てがマジックアイテムで<fix123>ある事が不思議だったんだ<fix123>魔法鉱山を<fix123>掘り当てたのなら納得がいく<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I thought it was weird that every<fix123>single card was its own magic item.<fix123>If you dug 'em up from a magic mine,<fix123>then it makes total sense.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それで、どうするつもりですか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So, what are you going to do now?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>純粋な知的好奇心で調べている<fix123>それとちょっぴりの蒐集欲だ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm investigating 'em out of pure curiosity!<fix123>That, plus the tiniest hint of wanting to hoard 'em.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>残念だったね<fix123>カードを設計したのは私だけど<fix123>もう私の手を離れている<fix123>もし本気でカードの行方を調べたり<fix123>集めたりしたければ<fix123>更に上空にいる、黒幕を探すと良い<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I'm afraid I'll have to disappoint you.<fix123>I may have designed the cards,<fix123>but they're out of my hands by now.<fix123>If you do seriously want to investigate their<fix123>whereabouts, collect them, and so on...<fix123>I suggest you search for the mastermind, who's even higher up in the sky.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なるほど……<fix123>判った！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see...<fix123>Got it!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Marisa Kirisame LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>……行かせて良かったんです？<fix123>あの神の元に<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...Are you alright with this?<fix123>Letting her leave, and reach that god?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>良いのよ<fix123>私がその能力を有効的に<fix123>利用してやらなければ<fix123>落ちぶれた神様のまま<fix123>だったというのに<fix123>いつの間にか力を付けて<fix123>カードの利権を我が物にし始めて<fix123>そろそろ邪魔になって来たところよ<fix123>さっきの奴なら良い働きを<fix123>してくれるでしょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's fine.<fix123>If I hadn't made effective use of<fix123>her ability in the first place,<fix123>she'd still have been a<fix123>washed-up shell of a god...<fix123>And yet she regained her power while my back was turned,<fix123>and started trying to take over the rights to the cards!<fix123>She's made herself into just enough of a nuisance by now.<fix123>I'm sure that girl just now will do a good job for us.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……あははは<fix123>なるほどね<fix123>裏切り行為には<fix123>直接自分の手を下さない<fix123>素晴らしい考えだと思います<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>....Hahaha.<fix123>I see.<fix123>When you betray someone, you don't<fix123>do it with your own hands.<fix123>A wonderful idea, in my opinion.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>月虹市場<fix123>Lunar Rainbow Market<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Lunar Rainbow Market ~ Lunar Rainbow Market<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>誰の物でもない夜空<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Night Sky that Belongs to No One<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ルナレインボー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Lunar Rainbow<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Tsukasa Kudamaki ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>飯綱丸様が裏切った！<fix123>面白くなってきたわー！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Master Iizunamaru betrayed her!<fix123>Things are really getting interesting!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Tsukasa Kudamaki LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>不気味な月だぜ<fix123>これも何かの力が<fix123>働いているのかもしれん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What a creepy moon.<fix123>There might be some kinda<fix123>power at work here, too.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Chimata Tenkyuu ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ようこそ<fix123>月虹市場へ<fix123>今宵の一番乗りは貴方よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Welcome to the Lunar Rainbow Market.<fix123>You're the first marketeer to arrive this evening.<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>...And you are?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>無主物の神<fix123>天弓(てんきゅう) 千亦(ちまた)<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123><fix123>God of The Unowned<fix123>Chimata Tenkyuu<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>天弓千亦(てんきゅうちまた)<fix123>市場のプレゼンターです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Chimata Tenkyuu.<fix123>I'm the market's main presenter.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>市場のプレゼンター……<fix123>カードの売人の元締めか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The market's presenter...<fix123>So you're the card merchants' manager?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まあ、あながち間違いでは無いですが<fix123>私は虹が出たとき等、特別なときに<fix123>商売を可能にする神です<fix123>貴方達が商売出来るのは<fix123>私がいるからなのよ<fix123>貴方も私のお陰で<fix123>生きているようなものです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I suppose that's not exactly wrong...<fix123>I'm a god who makes commerce possible on special<fix123>occasions, such as when a rainbow appears.<fix123>It's thanks to my presence that you're<fix123>all able to buy and sell goods.<fix123>Put another way, you're essentially<fix123>alive right now because of me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なるほど……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Tsukasa Kudamaki ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>千亦どの<fix123>報告があります<fix123>……<fix123>……であります<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Miss Chimata.<fix123>I have a report for you.<fix123>....<fix123>....so she said.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何？<fix123>飯綱丸が裏切ったって？<fix123>あっはっは<fix123>今頃気が付いたか、天狗風情が<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What?<fix123>Iizunamaru betrayed me?<fix123>Ah-hah-hah!<fix123>It took you that long to realize, you lousy tengu?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>といいますと？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>By which you mean?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私を利用して儲かろうとしていた<fix123>事なんて最初から判っていたわ<fix123>でも、逆に自分が利用されていた事に<fix123>気付くのは遅すぎたわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I always knew that she was taking<fix123>advantage of me to make a profit.<fix123>But it looks like she was too slow to realize<fix123>that I was taking advantage of her right back!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほうほう<fix123>興味深いお話です<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oho.<fix123>How very interesting.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ちょっといいか？<fix123>お前はさっきの天狗と一緒にいた狐じゃないか<fix123>お前、天狗の部下じゃ無かったのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, mind if I butt in?<fix123>You're the fox that was with that tengu down there, yeah?<fix123>Weren't you her minion or somethin'?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>勿論です<fix123>飯綱丸様は唯一にして最高の主です<fix123>千亦どのはご主人様の大切な友人ゆえ<fix123>不利益の無い様、情報を共有しようと<fix123>貴方もこの方を怒らせないように<fix123>した方が良いですよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, of course.<fix123>Master Iizunamaru is the highest and only master I serve.<fix123>As Miss Chimata is my master's precious friend,<fix123>I thought it best that we share information to ensure that none are at a disadvantage.<fix123>I believe it would be best for you, too,<fix123>to avoid angering Miss Chimata.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何とも狐らしい胡散臭い奴だな<fix123>まあいい、カードを<fix123>流通させている奴を見つけた<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wow, you sound shady as hell. Makes sense for a fox.<fix123>Whatever, though. I finally found the one<fix123>who's putting the cards on the market.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふふふ<fix123>では始めましょうか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>*Giggle*.<fix123>So, shall we begin?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>始めるって？　何を？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Begin? Begin what?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何をって……取引ですよ<fix123>貴方、今まで仕入れた<fix123>アビリティカードを売りに来たんでしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What do you mean, "what"...? Our transaction, of course.<fix123>You're here to sell the Ability Cards you've<fix123>spent all this time stocking up, aren't you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>売りに来た？<fix123>いやそうじゃ無い<fix123>カードの売買を終わらせに来たんだ<fix123>みんな勝手に自分のカードを<fix123>作られて困惑しているからな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sell 'em?<fix123>Nah, that ain't it.<fix123>I'm here to stop you all from sellin' em.<fix123>Everyone's getting weirded out, having<fix123>cards of 'em made without them knowing!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう……<fix123>市場破壊が目的の賊でしたか<fix123>それは看過出来ないですねぇ<fix123>こういう賊がいるから<fix123>いつまで経っても平和が訪れない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see...<fix123>So, you were a robber seeking to destroy the marketplace?<fix123>I certainly can't let that slide.<fix123>The fact that robbers like you exist<fix123>is the reason why peace can never arrive.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あーあ、怒らせちゃったみたいね<fix123>ふふふ、しーらないっと<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Whoops, looks like you made her mad.<fix123>*Giggle*. Don't say I didn't warn yooou.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Tsukasa Kudamaki LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>BGM: あの賑やかな市場は今どこに　～ Immemorial Marketeers<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Where is that Bustling Marketplace Now ~ Immemorial Marketeers<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>If Marisa doesn't hold the Blank Card<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>未開人め……<fix123>いつまで暴力で物を支配できると<fix123>思い込んでいるのだ？<fix123>物の所有権は市場の神にしか操作出来ない<fix123>物を所有する限り何人たりとも<fix123>神の手から逃れられないのよ<fix123>市場は開かれた！<fix123>すべて無(かみ)に返そう！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You foul barbarian...<fix123>How long are you going to believe that you can<fix123>use violence to hold dominion over objects?<fix123>Possession of an object can only be<fix123>controlled by the god of the markets.<fix123>As long as they possess something,<fix123>none can escape from the hands of God!<fix123>The market has been opened!<fix123>Let us return all things to nothing (God) !<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>If Marisa holds the Blank Card<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>……お前<fix123>お前が持っているカードは……<fix123>私の……！？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...You.<fix123>That card you're holding...<fix123>It's mine...?!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああハズレを掴まされたぜ<fix123>最っ高に使えないアビリティカードだ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, yeah. I got a dud foisted on me.<fix123>It's the most utterly useless Ability Card around!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>使えないって何よ<fix123>所有権を操作する唯一のカードなのに<fix123>最っ高に面白い賊ね！<fix123>ここで死んでしまうのが残念だわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>"Useless?" Excuse you!<fix123>It's the one and only card that can control ownership.<fix123>What an utterly interesting robber!<fix123>It's a shame that you're going to die here!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Before Final Spell Card<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>素晴らしくも神を恐れぬ人間よ<fix123>虹はまもなく閉じる<fix123>最後にお前の命も無 (かみ) に返そう<fix123>これで終わりだ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>O wonderous human, who fears not even God.<fix123>The rainbow will close in just a few moments' time!<fix123>Finally, return even your life to nothing (God) !<fix123>This marks the end!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Chimata Tenkyuu DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>私雨、その後に<fix123>Chase rainbows<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>After an Isolated Shower ~ Chase rainbows<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: A Shower of Strange Occurrences<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>Mike Goutokuji LEAVES<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Good, the rain's stopped.<fix123>Now my investigation can really get underway.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, Sis!<fix123>Yeah, you over there!<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Lucky Charm for Prosperous Commerce<fix123>Mike Goutokuji<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>I've got some nice cards!<fix123>Wanna buy any?<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Cards?!<fix123>Looks like I've found my first clue already.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お、喰い付いてきたね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ooh, looks like I've got a bite.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それを持っていては危険よ<fix123>今すぐよこしなさい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's dangerous to have those.<fix123>Hand them over right now!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 大吉キトゥン<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Kitten of Great Fortune<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああん？<fix123>力ずくで奪おうって言うのかい？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Whaa?<fix123>Are you sayin' you're gonna steal 'em by force?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうよ！<fix123>アビリティカードは異変調査対象になった<fix123>つべこべ言わず渡しなさい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Exactly!<fix123>Those Ability Cards are the subject of my incident investigation.<fix123>Quit making excuses and hand them over!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mike Goutokuji DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>っく……！<fix123>攻撃しても無駄よ！<fix123>でも、アビリティカードは<fix123>暴力では決して渡さない<fix123>それなりの対価ってもんが必要でしょ？<fix123>それが自由経済の大前提でしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ggh...!<fix123>There's no point in attacking me!<fix123>But you won't be getting any Ability Cards<fix123>through violence, that's for sure.<fix123>I need somethin' of value in return, right?<fix123>That's the basis of the entire free market.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>わかったわかった、ちゃんと買うから<fix123>で、いくらなの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Alright, alright, I'll buy them like I'm supposed to.<fix123>So, how much do they run for?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……ふっふっふ<fix123>そう来なくっちゃ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...Heh heh heh.<fix123>Now we're talking.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Secret Heaven Cliff<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>こんな山奥、何が潜んでいるのか<fix123>判ったもんじゃ無いわ<fix123>本当にこんな所に<fix123>売人がいるのかなぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There's no telling what could be<fix123>lurking this deep in the mountains...<fix123>Are there really any merchants<fix123>hanging out in a place like this?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Takane Yamashiro ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>おー、よく見たら<fix123>博麗の巫女だー<fix123>こんな僻地に珍しいね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh! Now that I get a good look at you,<fix123>you're the Hakurei shrine maiden!<fix123>It's rare to see you this far off the beaten path.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あんたは、河童……じゃないわ<fix123>山童(やまわろ)ね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're... not a kappa.<fix123>You're a yamawaro, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>山奥のビジネス妖怪<fix123>山城 たかね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Business Youkai of the Mountain's Recess<fix123>Takane Yamashiro<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうさ、知っての通りこの崖は<fix123>我々、山童のアジトだ<fix123>人間が来て良い場所じゃ無い<fix123>さっさと帰った帰った<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Indeed! And as you may be aware, this<fix123>cliff's a secret hideout for us yamawaro.<fix123>It's no place for humans to be skulking around.<fix123>So get outta here, quick!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>待って、貴方の手に持っているのは<fix123>アビリティカードでしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hang on! Those are Ability<fix123>Cards you're holding, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: バンデットリィテクノロジー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Banditry Technology<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>カード、か……<fix123>やはり、それを嗅ぎつけてきたか<fix123>騒ぎが大きくなる前に<fix123>始末しないとなぁ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Cards, eh...?<fix123>I guess you've been sniffing around for them after all.<fix123>Better dispose of you before<fix123>you raise too much of a ruckus!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Takane Yamashiro DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>強すぎる……<fix123>だが、残念だったな<fix123>暴力ではカードは奪えない<fix123>そう決められているんだ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Good grief, you're strong...<fix123>But it's too bad for you!<fix123>Cards can't be taken through violence.<fix123>Those are the rules.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>判った判った<fix123>なんでそんなルールがあるのか<fix123>判らないけど、買うから<fix123>その代わり知っている情報を<fix123>教えて貰うわよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Alright, alright.<fix123>I don't know why there's some rule<fix123>like that, but I'll buy them.<fix123>In exchange, you'll tell me<fix123>all the information you know!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら、お客さんだというのなら<fix123>話は別だわ！<fix123>情報と言えば、カードの売買には<fix123>もう一つルールがあるの<fix123>一回につき購入は一枚だけなの<fix123>破ると恐ろしいことになるらしいよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ooh! If you're a customer,<fix123>then that's quite a different story!<fix123>Speaking of information, there's actually one more<fix123>rule when it comes to buying and selling cards.<fix123>You can only buy one card with each transaction.<fix123>Apparently, you get in BIG trouble if you break this rule.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……貴重な情報をありがとう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...Thanks for the valuable info.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さあどうぞ！<fix123>どれも全て貴重な品よー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now, go right ahead!<fix123>They're all very valuable products.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>You followed me all this way, huh?<fix123>Guess you're not just<fix123>some ordinary rioter...<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Who are you...?<fix123>And where is this?<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Highland-Dwelling Yamajorou<fix123>Komakusa-dayuu<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は山如(さんにょ)と言う者だ<fix123>みんなは駒草太夫(こまくさだゆう)と呼んでいるがね<fix123>お前は、下界の神社の巫女だな<fix123>よくここまで来たねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My name's Sannyo.<fix123>Folks like to call me Komakusa-dayuu, though.<fix123>You're that shrine maiden from down below, right?<fix123>Nice job making it this far.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>カードの売人を追ってたら<fix123>いつの間に辿り着いただけよ<fix123>で、後ろの入(・)口(・)みたいなのは何なのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I was chasing after card merchants,<fix123>and eventually I just wound up here.<fix123>So, what's that thing behind you? Looks like some sort of entrance.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふっふっふ、知りたいか？<fix123>勿論教える気など無い<fix123>ここから先は立ち入り禁止だ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh heh heh. Wanna know?<fix123>'Course, I've got no intention of telling you.<fix123>Entry's prohibited past this point.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>こんな山の高地に謎の入口……<fix123>怪しい、怪しすぎるわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A mysterious entrance up on such a high mountain plateau...<fix123>It's suspicious! Too suspicious!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: スモーキングドラゴン<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Smoking Dragon<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そんな訳で怪我したくなければ<fix123>さっさと去れ<fix123>ここでは何も見なかった<fix123>判っているよな<fix123>それが出来ないのなら<fix123>もう何も見られない様にしてやる<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So with that, I'd suggest beating a retreat<fix123>if you don't want to get hurt.<fix123>You didn't see anything here.<fix123>We clear on that?<fix123>And if you can't keep your mouth shut,<fix123>I'll make sure you can't see anything.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Sannyo Komakusa DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ぐ、強すぎる<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Grh. You're way too strong...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふん、私に隠し事が出来ると<fix123>思わないでよ<fix123>で、その入口は何？<fix123>喋って貰うわよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmph. Don't go thinking that<fix123>you can hide anything from me.<fix123>So, what's that entrance?<fix123>You're going to tell me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>仕方が無い……<fix123>降参だ<fix123>ここは虹龍洞の洞口<fix123>虹龍洞は山の未来を作る夢の鉱坑だ<fix123>私は関係者以外が近寄らない様に<fix123>見張っていたんだよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Alright, fine...<fix123>I've gotta surrender.<fix123>This is the entrance to the Rainbow Dragon Cave.<fix123>In that cave is a mine full of dreams. A mine that'll build the mountain's future.<fix123>I've been watchin' over the place so<fix123>that no outsiders wander too close.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふん、見張りが付いているって事は<fix123>よからぬ事を企んでそうね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmph. If they've posted a guard here,<fix123>then they're probably up to no good!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いやいや<fix123>私が見張っていたのは<fix123>中は大変危険だから……だよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Nah, that ain't it.<fix123>I'm guarding the place...<fix123>because it's really dangerous inside.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……むむむ<fix123>ちょっと気合いを入れないとね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...Mmmm.<fix123>Guess I'd better keep my wits about me.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Izanagi Objects ~ Mine of Izanagi Object<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Rainbow Dragon Cave<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Obsolescent Industrial Ruins<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>Large Wheel Ghost LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>一体、何処まで続いてるの？<fix123>この洞窟<fix123>まさかこんなに深いだなんて<fix123>入口からは想像も付かなかったわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Just how long does<fix123>this cave go on for?<fix123>I never would've imagined<fix123>it would be this deep from the entrance.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Misumaru Tamatsukuri ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>そこの人間！<fix123>止まりなさーい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You there, human!<fix123>Stop at once!<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Master Artisan of Magatama<fix123>Misumaru Tamatsukuri<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>これ以上潜ると死ぬよ<fix123>悪い事は言わない<fix123>今すぐ引き返しなさい<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You'll die if you proceed any further.<fix123>I'm telling you this for your own good.<fix123>Turn around and leave, right now!<fix123><fix123>
