en_dialogue: <fix123>I'll die...?<fix123>You're kidding, right?<fix123>You're obviously trying to hide something from me!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふー<fix123>この先は無酸素エリアです<fix123>つまり人間の貴方は<fix123>呼吸が出来なくなります<fix123>それでも貴方は進みますか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sigh...<fix123>Beyond this point is an anoxic zone.<fix123>That means a human like you will cease<fix123>to be able to breathe down there.<fix123>Will you still proceed, knowing that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>呼吸が出来なくなる……<fix123>じゃあその前に調べきってやるわ！<fix123>この洞窟の秘密をね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I won't be able to breathe...?<fix123>Then I'll just search the place top to bottom before that happens!<fix123><fix123>I'll find all of this cavern's secrets!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 神代鉱石<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Ore from the Age of the Gods<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>やれやれ<fix123>これは脅しでは無いと言うのに……<fix123>窒息死なんかで陰陽玉の継承者を<fix123>失うわけにはいかない<fix123>どうせ失うのなら<fix123>やはり私の手で！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Honestly, now.<fix123>I'm not even telling you this as a threat...<fix123>I can't afford to lose the inheritor<fix123>of the Yin-Yang Orb to suffocation.<fix123>If we'll lose you either way,<fix123>at least let it be by my hands!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Misumaru Tamatsukuri DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>お見事！<fix123>私が造った陰陽玉を<fix123>そこまで使いこなせているとは<fix123>玉造部(たまつくりべ)冥利に尽きます<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Splendid!<fix123>To think that the Yin-Yang Orb that<fix123>I crafted has been mastered to such a degree.<fix123>It is an honor to the Tamatsukuri-be. [1]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>な、なにをいっている……<fix123>いきがくるしくなってきた<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>W-what are you saying...?<fix123>I'm starting to feel faint.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>言ったでしょう？<fix123>既に酸素濃度は<fix123>地上の半分程度でしょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I told you, didn't I?<fix123>The oxygen levels here are already<fix123>just about half of that on the surface.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>こ、ここでいったいなにを……！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>W-what are you doing down here...?!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ここは、龍珠の採掘場です<fix123>龍珠とは、いにしえの時代から伝わる<fix123>いわばイザナギオブジェクト<fix123>人類が生まれるずっと前から存在する<fix123>人知の及ばない鉱物です<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This is a mining site for dragon gems.<fix123>Dragon gems are so-called Izanagi Objects<fix123>that have been handed down since ancient times.<fix123>They are ores that have existed since long before<fix123>the birth of mankind, and are beyond human understanding.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……もっとききたいけど<fix123>も、もうだめ<fix123>くそー、ここはとんだハズレだわ<fix123>にんげんむきのばしょではない！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...I want to hear more,<fix123>b-but I can't take it any longer...<fix123>Dammit, this place was a total bust!<fix123>This is no place for humans to be!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええ、ここに限らず採掘場とは<fix123>人間には過酷な環境です<fix123>神の資源を奪う行為には<fix123>代償が必要なのでしょうね<fix123>ところで貴方はアビリティカードを<fix123>調査しに来たのでしょう？<fix123>ならば、目指すは虹龍洞(このおく)では無い<fix123>外に出て山の頂上を<fix123>目指すと良いでしょう<fix123>そこに龍珠から出来た勾玉を利用して<fix123>利益を得ている奴がいます！<fix123>さあ戻られよ！<fix123>陰陽玉の後継者、博麗霊夢よ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Indeed. Mining sites in general are<fix123> a harsh environment for humans, not just here.<fix123>I suppose a price must be paid for<fix123>stealing the resources of the gods.<fix123>By the way, you've come to investigate<fix123>the Ability Cards, haven't you?<fix123>Then this cave isn't where you should be headed.<fix123>You ought to head back outside<fix123>and seek the top of the mountain.<fix123>There's someone there who's been making<fix123>profits off of magatama made from dragon gems!<fix123>Now go on back!<fix123>O successor of the Yin-Yang Orb, Reimu Hakurei!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>大空は誰の物なのか<fix123>Spectral Hierarchy<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>To Whom Does the Vast Sky Belong? ~ Spectral Hierarchy<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>妖怪の山 山頂<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Youkai Mountain Peak<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 待ちわびた逢魔が時<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Long-Awaited Oumagatoki<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Tsukasa Kudamaki ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>人間が来たわ！<fix123>私の思った通りじゃん<fix123>こんなこと<fix123>長くは続かないと……！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A human's here!<fix123>See, it's just as I thought.<fix123>I knew we couldn't keep something<fix123>like this up for long...!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Tsukasa Kudamaki LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>すっかり日が沈んじゃった<fix123>これじゃあ、カードを持っている奴を<fix123>見つけるのは困難ね<fix123>出直すしかなさそう……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The sun's plunged right on down by now.<fix123>It'll be hard to find anyone<fix123>carrying cards at this rate.<fix123>Looks like my only choice is to try again some other time...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Megumu Iizunamaru ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>おやおや<fix123>面白いお方がいらっしゃる<fix123>何かあったのかい？<fix123>博麗神社の巫女さんよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Why, what's this?<fix123>We seem to have an interesting guest.<fix123>Is something the matter,<fix123>Miss Hakurei Shrine Maiden?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何か、って<fix123>まあ、その<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>"Something?"<fix123>Well, um, that is to say.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>鴉天狗の大将<fix123>飯綱丸 龍<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Chief of the Crow Tengu<fix123>Megumu Iizunamaru<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ここら一帯は我々天狗の領域だよ<fix123>巫女とはいえ、人間が易々と<fix123>立ち入っていい場所じゃ無い<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This stretch of mountain is the territory of we tengu.<fix123>It isn't a place that humans ought to<fix123>set foot in so easily, shrine maiden or no.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方は見たところ天狗ね<fix123>聞きたいことがあるの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're a tengu, from the looks of it.<fix123>There's something I'd like to ask you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何？<fix123>聞きたいことって<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh?<fix123>And what would that be?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>アビリティカードの件に<fix123>ついてなんだけど<fix123>さっきの洞窟では<fix123>何か知っている奴が山の頂上にいるって<fix123>私はそのアビリティカードの正体を<fix123>調べにやってきたの<fix123>何か知ってる？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, it's about this whole<fix123>Ability Card business...<fix123>Back in that cave just now, I was told that there's<fix123>someone who knows about them up on the mountaintop.<fix123>I came up here to investigate what<fix123>those Ability Cards really are.<fix123>Anything you can tell me?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>アビリティカード？<fix123>知ってるも何も<fix123>それは私が作った物よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Ability Cards?<fix123>I don't just "know" about them.<fix123>I created them, as a matter of fact!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？　なんだって！？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh? What?!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Tsukasa Kudamaki ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>いたいた<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There you are!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>耳元で囁く邪悪な白狐<fix123>管牧 典<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wicked White Fox Who Whispers in Ears<fix123>Tsukasa Kudamaki<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほら私の言っていたとおりになったわ<fix123>いつか人間が乗り込んでくるよって<fix123>こうなっては仕方が無いです<fix123>この人間は私が相手しますので<fix123>その間に飯綱丸様は……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>See, things turned out just like I said they would.<fix123>A human would be sure to come snooping up here eventually!<fix123>I suppose we have no choice by now.<fix123>I shall deal with this human myself.<fix123>So in the meantime, Master Iizunamaru, you can...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 星降る天魔の山<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Starry Mountain of Tenma<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あっはっは<fix123>出しゃばるんじゃない<fix123>お前にこいつの相手を<fix123>任せられるもんか<fix123>相手は数々の罪のない妖怪を葬ってきた<fix123>あ(・)の(・)博麗神社の巫女様だぞ<fix123>こいつは私が相手する<fix123>お前は引っ込んでな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah-hah-hah!<fix123>Don't get ahead of yourself.<fix123>As if I could let you deal<fix123>with her, of all people!<fix123>Our opponent is the eminent Hakurei Shrine Maiden,<fix123>who has buried countless innocent youkai until this day.<fix123>I'll deal with her.<fix123>You get back!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Tsukasa Kudamaki LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Megumu Iizunamaru DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ふっふっふ<fix123>お見事<fix123>私は降参します<fix123>ですからこれ以上の戦いは無益です<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh heh.<fix123>Splendid.<fix123>I hereby surrender.<fix123>As such, any further conflict is futile.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>やけに素直ね<fix123>さあ、カードの事について教えて！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How very straightforward of you.<fix123>Now, tell me about those cards!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さっきも言ったけど<fix123>カードを作ったのは私よ<fix123>虹龍洞で採掘した龍珠を使って<fix123>一儲けしようとね<fix123>もう十分儲かったし<fix123>そろそろ潮時かなーと<fix123>でもね、このカードの流通は<fix123>私では止められない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>As I said before, I'm the<fix123>one who made the cards.<fix123>I figured I could make a good profit using the dragon<fix123>gems dug up from the Rainbow Dragon Cave, you know?<fix123>I've made enough money off of them by now,<fix123>so I was guessing it'd be about time to pack up shop anyway.<fix123>But just so you know, I can't stop<fix123>the cards from circulating by myself.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はあ？<fix123>何で？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What?<fix123>Why?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何故なら、カードの売買は<fix123>それぞれ個人が勝手に始めた物です<fix123>それに、流通を牛耳っているのは<fix123>私では無いからです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Because everyone who's taking part in the card trade<fix123>just started doing so of their own accord.<fix123>And I'm not the one controlling<fix123>their circulation, either.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もう！<fix123>さっきからどういうことなのよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Augh!<fix123>It's just been one thing after another today, hasn't it!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>商売の世界は複雑なんですよ<fix123>もし本気でカードの流通を<fix123>止めたければ<fix123>更に上空にいる、黒幕を探すと良い<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The world of commerce is a complex one.<fix123>If you do seriously want to<fix123>stop the cards' circulation...<fix123>I suggest you search for the mastermind, who's even higher up in the sky.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>判ったわよ！<fix123>行きゃ良いんでしょ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Fine, got it!<fix123>I just have to go up there, right?!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Reimu Hakurei LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>……行かせて良かったんです？<fix123>あの神の元に<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...Are you alright with this?<fix123>Letting her leave, and reach that god?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>良いのよ<fix123>私がその能力を有効的に<fix123>利用してやらなければ<fix123>落ちぶれた神様のまま<fix123>だったというのに<fix123>いつの間にか力を付けて<fix123>カードの利権を我が物にし始めて<fix123>そろそろ邪魔になって来たところよ<fix123>巫女相手に痛い目に遭えば良いんだわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's fine.<fix123>If I hadn't made effective use of<fix123>her ability in the first place,<fix123>she'd still have been a<fix123>washed-up shell of a god...<fix123>And yet she regained her power while my back was turned,<fix123>and started trying to take over the rights to the cards!<fix123>She's made herself into just enough of a nuisance by now.<fix123>Getting sorely beaten by the shrine maiden will serve her right.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……あははは<fix123>なるほどね<fix123>あの単純な巫女なら<fix123>きっと首尾良くやってくれるでしょうね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>....Hahaha.<fix123>I see.<fix123>That simpleton of a shrine maiden<fix123>ought to do a proper job for us.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>月虹市場<fix123>Lunar Rainbow Market<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Lunar Rainbow Market ~ Lunar Rainbow Market<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>誰の物でもない夜空<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Night Sky that Belongs to No One<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ルナレインボー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Lunar Rainbow<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Tsukasa Kudamaki ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>飯綱丸様が裏切った！<fix123>面白くなってきたわー！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Master Iizunamaru betrayed her!<fix123>Things are really getting interesting!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Tsukasa Kudamaki LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>すっごい月！<fix123>何か出そうな雰囲気はあるけど……<fix123>まさかさっきの狐が<fix123>黒幕では無いよね？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What a huge moon!<fix123>It feels like something's about to pop out, but...<fix123>Don't tell me that fox just now is<fix123>the mastermind or something, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Chimata Tenkyuu ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ようこそ<fix123>月虹市場へ<fix123>今宵の一番乗りは貴方よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Welcome to the Lunar Rainbow Market.<fix123>You're the first marketeer to arrive this evening.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>無主物の神<fix123>天弓 千亦<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>God of the Unowned<fix123>Chimata Tenkyuu<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>天弓千亦(てんきゅうちまた)<fix123>市場のプレゼンターです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Chimata Tenkyuu.<fix123>I'm the market's main presenter.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>市場のプレゼンター、とは……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The market's presenter? So you're...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>虹が出たとき等、特別なときに<fix123>商売を可能にする神です<fix123>貴方達が商売出来るのは<fix123>私がいるからなのよ<fix123>貴方も私のお陰で<fix123>生きているようなものです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm a god who makes commerce possible on special<fix123>occasions, such as when a rainbow appears.<fix123>It's thanks to my presence that you're<fix123>all able to buy and sell goods.<fix123>Put another way, you're essentially<fix123>alive right now because of me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なるほど……？<fix123>よく判らない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Okay...?<fix123>I don't totally follow.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Tsukasa Kudamaki ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>千亦どの<fix123>報告があります<fix123>……<fix123>……であります<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Miss Chimata.<fix123>I have a report for you.<fix123>....<fix123>....so she said.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何？<fix123>飯綱丸が裏切ったって？<fix123>あっはっは<fix123>今頃気が付いたか、天狗風情が<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What?<fix123>Iizunamaru betrayed me?<fix123>Ah-hah-hah!<fix123>It took you that long to realize, you lousy tengu?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>といいますと？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>By which you mean?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私を利用して儲かろうとしていた<fix123>事なんて最初から判っていたわ<fix123>でも、逆に自分が利用されていた事に<fix123>気付くのは遅すぎたわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I always knew that she was taking<fix123>advantage of me to make a profit.<fix123>But it looks like she was too slow to realize<fix123>that I was taking advantage of her right back!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほうほう<fix123>興味深いお話です<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oho.<fix123>How very interesting.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方は飯綱丸のペットでしょう？<fix123>帰って伝えなさい<fix123>もう、市場は開かれた<fix123>何人たりとも<fix123>神の手から逃れられる物か<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're Iizunamaru's pet, aren't you?<fix123>Trot on back and tell her.<fix123>The market is already open.<fix123>None can escape from the hands of God!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もしもーし<fix123>話が長いよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Helloooo?<fix123>You've been talking for way too long!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あらごめんなさい<fix123>忘れてました<fix123>では始めましょうか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, I'm so sorry.<fix123>I forgot.<fix123>Well then, shall we begin?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>えっ？　何を？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh? Begin what?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何をって……取引ですよ<fix123>貴方、今まで仕入れた<fix123>アビリティカードを売りに来たんでしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What do you mean, "what"...? Our transaction, of course.<fix123>You're here to sell the Ability Cards you've<fix123>spent all this time stocking up, aren't you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>売りに来た？<fix123>違うわよ！<fix123>私はカードの調査に来たのよ<fix123>カードの正体を掴んだら<fix123>回収しようと思ってるの<fix123>こんなカードがあると<fix123>安心して眠れないわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sell them?<fix123>No way!<fix123>I'm here to investigate the cards.<fix123>I'm thinking that once I figure out what<fix123>they really are, I'll confiscate them all.<fix123>I'll never get a good night's sleep<fix123>with these cards making the rounds!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう……<fix123>金銭の交換無しでカードを独占しようと<fix123>市場破壊が目的の賊でしたか<fix123>それは看過出来ないですねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see...<fix123>You're trying to monopolize the cards with no exchange of currency.<fix123>So, you were a robber seeking to destroy the marketplace?<fix123>I certainly can't let that slide.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>博麗霊夢どの<fix123>このお方は市場の、商売の神であります<fix123>怒らせる事は、貴方にとって<fix123>不利益にしかならない<fix123>大人しくカードを売って<fix123>利益確定した方が良いと思います<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Miss Reimu Hakurei.<fix123>Miss Chimata is a god of the marketplace, and of commerce.<fix123>Angering her would be nothing<fix123>but disadvantageous for you.<fix123>I think it would be best if you simply sold a card,<fix123>and received a set profit for it.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あーもうゴチャゴチャうるさい！<fix123>こっちは変なカードを勝手に作られて<fix123>最初から頭にきているのよ！<fix123>市場の神だか何だか知らないけど<fix123>本当にそうなら<fix123>今すぐカードの流通を止めなさい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Argh, will everyone quit blathering on?!<fix123>I've been steaming mad from the very start,<fix123>having these weird cards get made from me!<fix123>I don't know about you being a marketplace god or whatever,<fix123>but if that's what you really are,<fix123>take those cards out of circulation, right now!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふふふ、しーらないっと<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>*Giggle*. Don't say I didn't warn yooou.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Tsukasa Kudamaki LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>BGM: あの賑やかな市場は今どこに　～ Immemorial Marketeers<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Where is that Bustling Marketplace Now ~ Immemorial Marketeers<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>If Reimu doesn't hold the Blank Card<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>残念ね……<fix123>物々交換が理解できない賊は<fix123>市場に立ち入ることは許されない<fix123>お前の所有物は全て解放してやろう<fix123>裸一貫になって痛感するがいい<fix123>人間は何も所有できない<fix123>哀れな生き物だったのだと！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How unfortunate...<fix123>A robber who refuses to understand bartering<fix123>has no right to enter the marketplace.<fix123>Allow me to liberate all of your possessions!<fix123>Let your pockets be stripped bare, and painfully realize this fact:<fix123>Humans were always poor creatures<fix123>who can own nothing at all!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>If Reimu holds the Blank Card<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>……お前<fix123>お前が持っているカードは……<fix123>私の……！？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey...<fix123>That card you're holding...<fix123>It's mine...?!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さっき手に入ったのよ<fix123>最っ高に使えないアビリティカードね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I got ahold of it just a minute ago.<fix123>It's the most utterly useless Ability Card of all!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>使えないって何よ<fix123>所有権を操作する唯一のカードなのに<fix123>最っ高に面白い賊ね！<fix123>ここで死んでしまうのが残念だわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>"Useless?" Excuse you!<fix123>It's the one and only card that can control ownership.<fix123>What an utterly interesting robber!<fix123>It's a shame that you're going to die here!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Before Final Spell Card<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>素晴らしくも神を恐れぬ人間よ<fix123>虹はまもなく閉じる<fix123>最後にお前の命も無 (かみ) に返そう<fix123>これで終わりだ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>O wonderous human, who fears not even God.<fix123>The rainbow will close in just a few moments' time!<fix123>Finally, return even your life to nothing (God) !<fix123>This marks the end!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Chimata Tenkyuu DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>血戯えの業風<fix123>Beastly Storm<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Karmic Winds of a Bloody Frenzy<fix123>Beastly Storm<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地獄（畜生界隣接暴風区域）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hell (Stormy Area Nearby the Beast Realm)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 輝かしき弱肉強食の掟<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Shining Law of the Strong Eating the Weak<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kutaka Niwatari ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>この先、最強の動物霊が占拠しています<fix123><fix123><fix123>現在、地上に攻めてこないように<fix123><fix123>水際作戦決行中です！<fix123><fix123><fix123>今すぐ引き返してください！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The area up ahead is occupied by the strongest animal spirit.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Right now, we're carrying out coastal operations<fix123><fix123>in order to prevent her from attacking the surface.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Please turn back now!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kutaka Niwatari DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>地獄の水際作戦<fix123><fix123>初めて見たわ<fix123><fix123><fix123>相当ヤバイ奴が出てくるんじゃ……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Coastal operations in Hell.<fix123><fix123>This is the first time I've seen it.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Someone real bad must've appeared......<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（……誰かと思ったけど<fix123><fix123>やっぱりそうか）<fix123><fix123><fix123>（この馬鹿みたいなオーラは<fix123><fix123>あのお方だ！）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(......I wondered who it was.<fix123><fix123>Seems my suspicion was right.)<fix123>(This aura of tremendous might belongs<fix123><fix123>to that person!)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Saki Kurokoma ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あっはっは！<fix123><fix123>笑いが止まらないな！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah ha ha!<fix123><fix123>I can't stop laughing!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>吉弔の奴が袿姫を倒したお陰で<fix123><fix123>我らが自由に動ける様になった<fix123><fix123><fix123>見事だ！　人間よ！<fix123><fix123>早速顔を見せよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Thanks to that bastard Kicchou defeating Keiki,<fix123><fix123>we can finally act freely!<fix123><fix123><fix123>Excellent work! Human!<fix123><fix123>Show your face at once!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>やっぱり、驪駒(くろこま)様！<fix123><fix123>何でこんなことを！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's really you, Lady Kurokoma!<fix123><fix123>Why are you doing this!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方が最強の動物霊……！<fix123><fix123>一体何者なの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You are the strongest animal spirit......!<fix123><fix123>Just who are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……なる程、動物霊に私のことを<fix123><fix123>教えられていないんだね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>......I see.<fix123><fix123>So the animal spirit didn't tell you about me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>勁牙組　組長<fix123>驪駒(くろこま)　早鬼(さき)<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Matriarch of the Keiga Family<fix123>Saki Kurokoma<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>失礼した、私は勁牙組(けいがぐみ)組長<fix123><fix123>驪駒 早鬼(くろこま　さき)である<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How rude of me. I am Saki Kurokoma,<fix123><fix123>boss of the Keiga Family.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>勁牙組……？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Keiga Family......?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（この方は、我々の敵の親玉だ）<fix123><fix123><fix123>（勁牙組は獣らしい獣の集団で<fix123><fix123>力しか取り柄のない筋肉馬鹿組織だぞ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(This person here is the boss of our enemy.)<fix123><fix123><fix123>(The Keiga Family is a beastly organization<fix123><fix123>full of muscleheads whose only redeeming quality is their strength.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>獣らしい獣……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A beastly beast......<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前に憑いているのは<fix123>吉弔のところのカワウソ霊だな<fix123><fix123><fix123>袿姫を倒すための<fix123><fix123>吉弔との苟且(かりそめ)の協力はもう終わった<fix123><fix123><fix123>お前があの袿姫を倒してくれたお陰で<fix123><fix123>畜生界は再び競争社会へと戻ったのだよ<fix123><fix123><fix123>となれば、我ら最強最速軍団<fix123><fix123>勁牙組の天下だ<fix123><fix123><fix123>程なくして畜生界は<fix123><fix123>我ら勁牙組の物になるだろう<fix123><fix123><fix123>いや畜生界どころか地獄界も人間界も……？<fix123><fix123>夢は広がるわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The one possessing you<fix123><fix123>is an otter spirit from Kicchou's gang, right?<fix123><fix123><fix123>Our brief deal with Kicchou in order to<fix123>defeat Keiki is now over.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Thanks to you defeating Keiki,<fix123><fix123>the Animal Realm has returned to being a competitive society.<fix123><fix123><fix123>And thus, the strongest, fastest army,<fix123><fix123>the Keiga Family, will rule all.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Soon the Animal Realm shall<fix123><fix123>come under our possession.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Perhaps not just the Animal Realm, but Hell and the Human Realm too......?<fix123><fix123>My dreams are broadening.[1]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ど、どうしよう<fix123><fix123>驪駒(くろこま)様がそんな暴挙に……<fix123><fix123><fix123>今すぐ吉弔様に報告に行かないと！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wh-What to do?<fix123><fix123>Lady Kurokoma's being so aggressive......<fix123><fix123><fix123>We have to go and report to Lady Kicchou now!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>逃げるんじゃない<fix123><fix123>カワウソ霊！<fix123><fix123><fix123>地獄の水際作戦中の今こそ<fix123><fix123>こいつを倒すには最良の時<fix123><fix123><fix123>このチャンスを逃す手はないよ！<fix123><fix123>お前の野望を斬り崩してやる！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Otter spirit,<fix123><fix123>don't run away!<fix123><fix123><fix123>This is the opportune moment to take her down,<fix123><fix123>while Hell is still undergoing coastal operations.<fix123><fix123><fix123>I won't let this chance slip by!<fix123><fix123>I'll cut your ambitions into pieces!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 聖徳太子のペガサス　～ Dark Pegasus<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Prince Shoutoku's Pegasus ~ Dark Pegasus<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふっふっふ、心地良いな<fix123><fix123><fix123>吉弔みたいな裏がある奴と違って<fix123><fix123>覚悟があって美しい<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh heh, just what I like to hear.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Unlike that two-faced Kicchou,<fix123><fix123>you are determined and elegant.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>冥界の剣士、……いや魂魄妖夢<fix123><fix123>その通りだ、今回は退く作戦ではない！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Swordswoman of the Netherworld...... No, Youmu Konpaku.<fix123><fix123>Indeed, we will not retreat this time!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>鬼傑組のカワウソ霊よ！<fix123><fix123>良い人間を見つけたな！<fix123><fix123><fix123>しかし私は強いぞ<fix123><fix123>遠慮無く全力を出し切れよ！<fix123><fix123><fix123>さあ、邪神を打ち破る人間の力<fix123><fix123>この漆黒の天馬(ペガサス)に見せよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Otter spirit of the Kiketsu Family!<fix123><fix123>I see you've found a good human!<fix123><fix123><fix123>But I'll have you know that I'm strong.<fix123><fix123>Hold nothing back and come at me!<fix123><fix123><fix123>Now, show this jet-black pegasus<fix123><fix123>the power of the human who defeated the wicked god!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Saki Kurokoma DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>……ハアハア<fix123><fix123><fix123>力強さと身軽さ、弾幕に対する勇気と知恵<fix123><fix123>全てバランスが良い！<fix123><fix123><fix123>か、感動した！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>......*pant pant*<fix123><fix123><fix123>Your power, swiftness, bravery and knowledge<fix123><fix123>in facing down danmaku... All in perfect balance!<fix123><fix123><fix123>I-I'm moved!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まだまだ戦えるよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I can still go on!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いや、やめようじゃないか<fix123><fix123>これ以上続けたらどちらかが倒れる<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, let's stop here.<fix123><fix123>If we keep going at it, one of us will fall.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……ハアハア、助かった<fix123><fix123>もう駄目かと思った<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>......*pant pant*, thank god.<fix123><fix123>I couldn't hold on anymore.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>正直な奴だ<fix123><fix123>気に入ったよ<fix123><fix123><fix123>しかし、お前に袿姫を倒せた<fix123><fix123>理由は判らなかった<fix123><fix123><fix123>我々には手も足も<fix123><fix123>出せなかったというのに<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're an upstanding fellow.<fix123><fix123>I'm interested in ya.<fix123><fix123><fix123>However, I cannot understand<fix123><fix123>how you were able to defeat Keiki.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Even though none of us<fix123><fix123>were able to even touch her.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふっふっふ<fix123><fix123><fix123>吉弔様は倒す方法を発見して<fix123><fix123>それを実行できましたけどね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh heh heh.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Lady Kicchou discovered a way,<fix123><fix123>and I just carried it out.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ぐぬぬ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ugh.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>力ばかり強くても、それは<fix123><fix123>本当の強さではないって事です<fix123><fix123><fix123>な？　相棒<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The lesson is, even if you have power,<fix123><fix123>that doesn't mean that you're truly strong.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Am I right, partner?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いつから相棒になったのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>When did I become your partner?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>く、悔しくなんかない<fix123><fix123><fix123>どんな策を弄しようとも<fix123><fix123>最後に勝つのは力だけだ<fix123><fix123><fix123>肌で感じろよ、畜生の理を！<fix123><fix123>最後は暴力が勝つ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I-I'm not frustrated or anythin'!<fix123><fix123><fix123>No matter what schemes you pull,<fix123><fix123>power is the only thing that guarantees victory.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Experience will make ya learn the law of beasts!<fix123><fix123>Violence is what wins in the end!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>嫌な世界だなぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What an unpleasant world this is.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……はっ！　驪駒(くろこま)様<fix123><fix123>もったいなきお言葉で<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>......Yes!<fix123><fix123>You overpraise me, Lady Kurokoma.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>......This human doesn't know of me, huh.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Matriarch of the Keiga Family<fix123>Saki Kurokoma<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>How rude of me. I am Saki Kurokoma,<fix123><fix123>boss of the Keiga Family.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>勁牙組……？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Keiga Family......?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この方は、私の親分だ<fix123><fix123><fix123>勁牙組は強大な腕力、俊敏な脚力、<fix123><fix123>無限の勇気を自慢とする動物霊の集団である<fix123><fix123><fix123>畜生界最強の組織だぞ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This person here's my boss.<fix123><fix123><fix123>The Keiga Family is an organization of animal spirits<fix123><fix123>who pride themselves over their strong arms, swift legs and infinite courage.<fix123><fix123><fix123>They're the strongest group in the Animal Realm, y'know.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>畜生界最強……！？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The strongest in the Animal Realm!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>袿姫を倒すための<fix123><fix123>吉弔との苟且(かりそめ)の協力はもう終わった<fix123><fix123><fix123>お前があの袿姫を倒してくれたお陰で<fix123><fix123>畜生界は再び競争社会へと戻ったのだよ<fix123><fix123><fix123>となれば、我ら最強最速軍団<fix123><fix123>勁牙組の天下だ<fix123><fix123><fix123>程なくして畜生界は<fix123><fix123>我ら勁牙組の物になるだろう<fix123><fix123><fix123>いや畜生界どころか地獄界も人間界も……？<fix123><fix123>夢は広がるわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Our brief deal with Kicchou in order to<fix123>defeat Keiki is now over.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Thanks to you defeating Keiki,<fix123><fix123>the Animal Realm has returned to being a competitive society.<fix123><fix123><fix123>And thus, the strongest, fastest army,<fix123><fix123>the Keiga Family, will rule all.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Soon the Animal Realm shall<fix123><fix123>come under our possession.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Perhaps not just the Animal Realm, but Hell and the Human Realm too......?<fix123><fix123>My dreams are broadening.[1]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>つまりは、私があの神様を倒したから<fix123><fix123>貴方みたいなのが出てきた、と<fix123><fix123><fix123>責任を取らないと<fix123><fix123>いけないわね！<fix123><fix123><fix123>私には貴方を止める責任がある<fix123><fix123>命を賭してでも！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>In other words, since I defeated that god,<fix123><fix123>someone like you appeared in her place.<fix123><fix123><fix123>I have to take responsibility!<fix123><fix123><fix123>It's my duty to stop you,<fix123><fix123>even if it risks my life!<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Prince Shoutoku's Pegasus ~ Dark Pegasus<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>正直な奴だ<fix123><fix123>気に入ったよ<fix123><fix123><fix123>ところで、お前<fix123><fix123>地上の人間じゃないな？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, aren't you honest?<fix123>You've caught my eye.<fix123><fix123><fix123>By the way, you...<fix123><fix123>You're not a human from the surface, are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええ、冥界の住人ですが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, I'm a resident of the Netherworld.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なる程、冥界ね<fix123><fix123><fix123>どうりで幽霊の扱いに<fix123><fix123>長けていると思ったよ<fix123><fix123><fix123>よし決めた！<fix123><fix123>今度、冥界に行ってみよう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see, the Netherworld.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Indeed, that would explain why<fix123><fix123>you were so good at manipulating the souls.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Yup, I've decided!<fix123><fix123>I'll try heading to the Netherworld next time.<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Huh?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>冥界で味方を増やせば<fix123><fix123>勁牙組は更に強くなれる！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If I can gain supporters in the Netherworld,<fix123><fix123>the Keiga Family would get even stronger!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そ、そんなことは<fix123><fix123><fix123>そんな事言うなら<fix123><fix123>また痛い目に遭わせるよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Bu-But...<fix123><fix123><fix123>But if you do that,<fix123><fix123>I'll have to beat you up again!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あはは、願ってもない！<fix123><fix123><fix123>じゃあ、少し休憩して<fix123><fix123>再戦しようじゃないか！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ahaha, just what I wanted, right!?<fix123><fix123><fix123>Well then, get some rest,<fix123><fix123>and we shall fight again!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふ、ふえー<fix123><fix123>何か口車に載せられた気がする<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ha... Wha...<fix123><fix123>I feel like I completely lost control of the conversation.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: The Hakurei Shrine.<fix123>
A shrine on the outskirts of Gensokyo.<fix123>
This is the so-called "Youkai Shrine"<fix123>where youkai come more often than <fix123><fix123>humans.<fix123>
The beast spirit invasion had stopped, but Reimu,<fix123>who couldn't see the full picture, was a little unsatisfied.<fix123>
"The air in the Human Realm really is delicious, isn't it."<fix123>
"You again?<fix123>
You keep coming back to visit, huh."<fix123>
"I was thinking about where I should set up my base<fix123>if I came to the Human Realm."<fix123>
"What, are you planning on coming to the Human Realm? Stop it."<fix123>
"Don't say that.<fix123>Maybe you'll change your mind when I tell you about the poor human spirits."<fix123>
"I don't want to hear it."<fix123>
"The human spirits might be happier on the surface rather than<fix123>in the Animal Realm. Don't you think?"<fix123>
"They're ghosts, aren't they? Then they should just go to the Netherworld."<fix123>
"The Netherworld turned us down, you see. They said they already have too many ghosts.<fix123>
And since the human spirits from the Animal Realm aren't the type to laze around,<fix123>they might not be suited for the Netherworld."<fix123>
"So they're troublemakers? The surface doesn't want them, either."<fix123>
"They aren't troublemakers.<fix123>
They just can't relax easily. You could say they're hard workers."<fix123>
"By the way, changing the subject, what's the goshintai for this shrine?"<fix123>
"If you want, should I carve out an excellent idol for you?"<fix123>
"Oh, really?<fix123>
If you're saying you'll make something cool, then..."<fix123>
It seemed Keiki had gained an interest in the Human Realm.<fix123>
Reimu learned afterwards that she had thrown the Animal Realm into chaos<fix123>by spreading her idolatry.<fix123>
She had the feeling that, not humans vs. beasts, not physical vs. spiritual,<fix123>but a religious confrontation was approaching.<fix123>
<c$Ending No. 01 — The Haniwa Idol$><fix123>
<c$Congratulations!$><fix123><c$Good job on your No Continue Clear!$><fix123>
The Hakurei Shrine.<fix123>
A shrine on the outskirts of Gensokyo.<fix123>
This is the so-called "Youkai Shrine"<fix123>where youkai come more often than humans.<fix123>
"Ahh. That was rough.<fix123>
Rather than the empty Hell, it felt like<fix123>the Animal Realm was even more suffocating."<fix123>
"I never once expected the problem to be in the Animal Realm and not Hell."<fix123>
"I'm very sorry for having hidden it from you.<fix123>
But thanks to you, we've managed to deal a blow to our archenemy."<fix123>
"That group of haniwa is the longtime enemy for you beast spirits?<fix123>
I'm kind of curious about your relationship with the human spirits."<fix123>
"Well, you see..."<fix123>
"Allow me to explain."<fix123>
"Um, who were you again?"<fix123>
"I'm Kicchou, the boss of the Kiketsu Family.<fix123>
"Thank you for cooperating with our otter this time around."<fix123>
"Ah, the tortoise I met in Hell..."<fix123>
"We employed the human spirits as our slaves.<fix123>
However, that's something that's rather common in the Animal Realm."<fix123>
"The Animal Realm is a world without gods, and almost all spirits,<fix123>including me, are treated as slaves. That's the natural way of things.<fix123>
Even so, the human spirits made a frightening choice."<fix123>
"That was to call on an evil god that could manufacture gods.<fix123>
Keiki is an evil god that was summoned by the human spirits."<fix123>
"An evil god that could manufacture gods..."<fix123>
"She created those idols, and the human spirits put their faith into them.<fix123>
Although they did it without knowing that they were<fix123>just putting themselves under her control..."<fix123>
Yachie taught Reimu about the inner workings of the Animal Realm.<fix123>
The spirits without physical forms couldn't destroy<fix123>the idols that Keiki created, so they had been at a loss.<fix123>
Yachie came up with the plan to have a living human come to destroy the idols.<fix123>
Her polite front only made Reimu a little more wary of her.<fix123>
<c$Ending No. 02 — The Yakuza Known As the Kiketsu Family$><fix123>
<c$Congratulations!$><fix123><c$Good job on your No Continue Clear!$><fix123>
The Hakurei Shrine.<fix123>
A shrine on the outskirts of Gensokyo.<fix123>
Today, a lot of animal spirits are gathered there.<fix123>
"I get it, I get it.<fix123>
This wasn't such a big deal.<fix123>
So you don't need to thank me."<fix123>
"We preserved our honor thanks to you.<fix123>
So if there's any way we can repay you...<fix123>
There's nothing we can't help with."<fix123>
"Even if you say so...<fix123>
I just can't think of anything...<fix123>
Oh, I know! How about this?"<fix123>
"What's going on here?<fix123>
The shrine's full of animal spirits."<fix123>
"Yeah, about that..."<fix123>
"Some stuff happened, and I kinda<fix123>ended up working with an eagle spirit.<fix123>
And they were telling me they just HAD to thank me."<fix123>
"So this is them returning the favor?"<fix123>
"They're sight-seeing.<fix123>
And paying. It's pretty profitable."<fix123>
The high-handed eagle spirits were surprisingly dutiful.<fix123>
Because of their pride, they must hate owing people favors.<fix123>
The Human Realm became a popular tourist destination<fix123>for animal spirits, and purses swelled.<fix123>
So even though she still didn't understand a lot of what happened,<fix123>Reimu was glad she went to the Animal Realm.<fix123>
<c$Ending No. 03 — All's Well That Ends Well$><fix123>
<c$Congratulations!$><fix123><c$No Continue Clear!$><fix123>
"I'm Kicchou, the boss of the Kiketsu Family.<fix123>
We were wrong to have placed our hopes in you.<fix123>
It seemed the evil god's power just barely managed to beat you."<fix123>
"It's inconvenient for us to let you live any longer.<fix123>
It's unfortunate, but..."<fix123>
"W-Wait a minute!"<fix123>
"This time I was just little under the weather. That's all.<fix123>Let me go one more time!"<fix123>
"...Understood.<fix123>
However, there are plenty of humans that can take your place.<fix123>
We won't allow any more failures."<fix123>
You were just barely forced to run away from the evil god.<fix123>
You absolutely can't lose next time!<fix123>
<c$Bad Ending No. 01 — Aim for a No Continue Clear!$><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Karmic Winds of a Bloody Frenzy<fix123>Beastly Storm<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地獄（畜生界隣接暴風区域）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hell (Stormy Area Nearby the Beast Realm)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 輝かしき弱肉強食の掟<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Shining Law of the Strong Eating the Weak<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kutaka Niwatari ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>この先、最強の動物霊が占拠しています<fix123><fix123><fix123>現在、地上に攻めてこないように<fix123><fix123>水際作戦決行中です！<fix123><fix123><fix123>今すぐ引き返してください！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The area up ahead is occupied by the strongest animal spirit.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Right now, we're carrying out coastal operations<fix123><fix123>in order to prevent her from attacking the surface.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Please turn back now!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kutaka Niwatari DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>こんな大荒れの地獄で<fix123><fix123>一体誰が暴れているんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who on earth is rampaging<fix123><fix123>in this turbulent area of Hell?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（……誰かと思ったけど<fix123><fix123>やっぱりそうか）<fix123><fix123><fix123>（この隠す気のないオーラは<fix123><fix123>あいつしかない）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(......I wondered who it was.<fix123><fix123>Seems my suspicion was right.)<fix123><fix123><fix123>Not even attempting to hide that aura?<fix123><fix123>Who else could it be?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Saki Kurokoma ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あっはっは！<fix123><fix123>笑いが止まらないな！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah ha ha!<fix123><fix123>I can't stop laughing!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>吉弔の奴が袿姫を倒したお陰で<fix123><fix123>我らが自由に動ける様になった<fix123><fix123><fix123>見事だ！　人間よ！<fix123><fix123>早速顔を見せよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Thanks to that bastard Kicchou defeating Keiki,<fix123><fix123>we can finally act freely!<fix123><fix123><fix123>Excellent work! Human!<fix123><fix123>Show your face at once!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（やっぱり、驪駒(くろこま)だ！<fix123><fix123>こいつ偉そうで腹が立つんだよな）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(It's definitely Kurokoma!<fix123><fix123>Her arrogance is infuriating!)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ちょ、ちょっと待て<fix123><fix123>私はお前なんて知らないぞ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wha-Wait a second!<fix123><fix123>I don't even know who you are!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……なる程、動物霊に私のことを<fix123><fix123>教えられていないんだね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>......I see.<fix123><fix123>So the animal spirit didn't tell you about me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>勁牙組　組長<fix123>驪駒(くろこま)　早鬼(さき)<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Matriarch of the Keiga Family<fix123>Saki Kurokoma<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>失礼した、私は勁牙組(けいがぐみ)組長<fix123><fix123>驪駒 早鬼(くろこま　さき)である<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How rude of me. I am Saki Kurokoma,<fix123><fix123>boss of the Keiga Family.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>勁牙組……？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Keiga Family......?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>こいつは、剛欲同盟の宿敵だ<fix123><fix123><fix123>生き方に誇りも何も持っていない<fix123><fix123>暴力集団の長だよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>She's the sworn enemy of the Gouyoku Alliance.<fix123><fix123><fix123>She's the leader of a gang of thugs<fix123><fix123>who have nothing worth boasting about.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（暴力……団、か<fix123><fix123>なる程きな臭い）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Thugs, huh?<fix123><fix123>Makes sense. She smells like trouble.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前に憑いているのは<fix123><fix123>饕餮(とうてつ)のところのオオワシ霊だな<fix123><fix123><fix123>まさかプライドの高い剛欲同盟が<fix123><fix123>鬼傑組の作戦に協力するとは思わなかったが<fix123><fix123><fix123>お前があの袿姫を倒してくれたお陰で<fix123><fix123>畜生界は再び競争社会へと戻ったのだよ<fix123><fix123><fix123>となれば、我ら最強最速軍団<fix123><fix123>勁牙組の天下だ<fix123><fix123><fix123>程なくして畜生界は<fix123><fix123>我ら勁牙組の物になるだろう<fix123><fix123><fix123>いや畜生界どころか地獄界も人間界も……？<fix123><fix123>夢は広がるわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The one possessing you<fix123><fix123>is an eagle spirit from Toutetsu's gang, right?<fix123><fix123><fix123>To think the prideful Gouyoku Alliance would<fix123><fix123>cooperate with Kiketsu Family, how unexpected.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Thanks to you defeating Keiki,<fix123><fix123>the Animal Realm has returned to being a competitive society.<fix123><fix123><fix123>And thus, the strongest, fastest army,<fix123><fix123>the Keiga Family, will rule all.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Soon the Animal Realm shall<fix123><fix123>come under our possession.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Perhaps not just the Animal Realm, but Hell and the Human Realm too......?<fix123><fix123>My dreams are broadening.[1]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>馬鹿な<fix123><fix123>そんなこと出来る訳無い！<fix123><fix123><fix123>いや、勁牙組の暴力組長なら<fix123><fix123>やりかねない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Don't be ridiculous.<fix123><fix123>You'll never manage that!<fix123><fix123><fix123>No, wait, she's the head of the Keiga Family.<fix123><fix123>If anyone can do it, it's those violent brutes!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なる程、オオワシ霊の言うとおり<fix123><fix123>ヤバそうな奴だな<fix123><fix123><fix123>しょうがない<fix123><fix123>こんな奴を見逃す訳にはいかないな<fix123><fix123><fix123>今ここで叩きのめしてやる！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see, it's just as you've said.<fix123><fix123>She's bad news.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Oh well. It's not like you can<fix123>just run from these types.<fix123><fix123><fix123>We'll just have to beat her here!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 聖徳太子のペガサス　～ Dark Pegasus<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Prince Shoutoku's Pegasus ~ Dark Pegasus<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふっふっふ、心地良いな<fix123><fix123><fix123>吉弔みたいないけ好かない奴と違って<fix123><fix123>好戦的で気持ちいいぞ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh heh heh, that sounds nice.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Unlike that foul Kicchou,<fix123><fix123>I happen to like fighting!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間……力を貸すぞ！<fix123><fix123>共に暴力組長の暴走を止めよう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Human...... I'll lend you my power!<fix123><fix123>Let's stop this violent leader's rampage together!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>剛欲同盟のオオワシ霊よ！！<fix123><fix123>良い人間を見つけたな！<fix123><fix123><fix123>しかし私は強いぞ<fix123><fix123>遠慮無く全力を出し切れよ！<fix123><fix123><fix123>さあ、邪神を打ち破る人間の力<fix123><fix123>この漆黒の天馬(ペガサス)に見せよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Eagle spirit of the Gouyoku Alliance!<fix123><fix123>I see you've found a good human!<fix123><fix123><fix123>But I'll have you know that I'm strong.<fix123><fix123>Hold nothing back and come at me!<fix123><fix123><fix123>Now, show this jet-black pegasus<fix123><fix123>the power of the human who defeated the wicked god!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Saki Kurokoma DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>……ハアハア<fix123><fix123><fix123>力強さと身軽さ、弾幕に対する勇気と知恵<fix123><fix123>全てバランスが良い！<fix123><fix123><fix123>か、感動した！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>......*pant pant*<fix123><fix123><fix123>Your power, swiftness, bravery and knowledge<fix123><fix123>in facing down danmaku... All in perfect balance!<fix123><fix123><fix123>I-I'm moved!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まだまだ余裕そうだな……<fix123><fix123>こいつはヤバいぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>She's still taking it easy...<fix123><fix123>She's really bad news.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いや、今日はもう精一杯だよ<fix123><fix123><fix123>お前の強さと勇気に免じて<fix123><fix123>一旦侵略はやめよう<fix123><fix123><fix123>こっちも消耗戦は避けたいんでね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Whew, I've had enough today.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Out of respect for your strength,<fix123><fix123>I'll stop the invasion for now.<fix123><fix123><fix123>I'd like to avoid wasting energy too.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そりゃあ良かった<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's a relief.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ただ個人的に地上に行くことにするよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But I will visit the surface.<fix123>Just on my own.<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Hm?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>畜生界の人間霊は最弱すぎて<fix123><fix123>絶滅危惧で保護対象だというのに<fix123><fix123><fix123>生身の人間は我々が<fix123><fix123>手も足も出なかった邪神を打ちのめした<fix123><fix123><fix123>その強さとは何なのかを知りたい<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The human spirits in the Animal Realm are so weak<fix123><fix123>that they're being preserved as endangered species.<fix123><fix123><fix123>But a flesh and blood human managed to<fix123><fix123>beat that wicked god I couldn't even touch.<fix123><fix123><fix123>I want to know the reason behind that power.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>でも、それは私がちょいと<fix123><fix123>特別強いだけかもよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I might just be a teensy bit<fix123><fix123>special though, you know.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ならば、地上に行った時は<fix123><fix123>また手合わせをお願いしたいな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>In that case, I hope we<fix123><fix123>can spar when I visit.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ぐ、ま、まあ良いぜ<fix123><fix123>地上に来たら私のところに来なよ<fix123><fix123><fix123>神社じゃなくて、な<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ugh... F-Fine.<fix123><fix123>Come to my place when you do.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Just stay away from the shrine, okay?<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>(It's really you, Lady Kurokoma!<fix123><fix123>Why are you doing this!?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ちょ、ちょっと待て<fix123><fix123>私はお前なんて知らないぞ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wha-Wait a second!<fix123><fix123>I don't even know who you are!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……なる程、動物霊に私のことを<fix123><fix123>教えられていないんだね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>......I see.<fix123><fix123>So the animal spirit didn't tell you about me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>勁牙組　組長<fix123>驪駒(くろこま)　早鬼(さき)<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Matriarch of the Keiga Family<fix123>Saki Kurokoma<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>失礼した、私は勁牙組(けいがぐみ)組長<fix123><fix123>驪駒 早鬼(くろこま　さき)である<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How rude of me. I am Saki Kurokoma,<fix123><fix123>boss of the Keiga Family.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>勁牙組……？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Keiga Family......?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（この方は、我々の敵の親玉だ）<fix123><fix123><fix123>（勁牙組は獣らしい獣の集団で<fix123><fix123>力しか取り柄のない筋肉馬鹿組織だぞ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(This person here is the boss of our enemy.)<fix123><fix123><fix123>(The Keiga Family is a beastly organization<fix123><fix123>full of muscleheads whose only redeeming quality is their strength.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（筋肉馬鹿組織か）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(A musclehead organization, huh?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前に憑いているのは<fix123>吉弔のところのカワウソ霊だな<fix123><fix123><fix123>袿姫を倒すための<fix123><fix123>吉弔との苟且(かりそめ)の協力はもう終わった<fix123><fix123><fix123>お前があの袿姫を倒してくれたお陰で<fix123><fix123>畜生界は再び競争社会へと戻ったのだよ<fix123><fix123><fix123>となれば、我ら最強最速軍団<fix123><fix123>勁牙組の天下だ<fix123><fix123><fix123>程なくして畜生界は<fix123><fix123>我ら勁牙組の物になるだろう<fix123><fix123><fix123>いや畜生界どころか地獄界も人間界も……？<fix123><fix123>夢は広がるわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The one possessing you<fix123><fix123>is an otter spirit from Kicchou's gang right?<fix123><fix123><fix123>Our brief deal with Kicchou in order to<fix123>defeat Keiki is now over.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Thanks to you defeating Keiki,<fix123><fix123>the Animal Realm has returned to being a competitive society.<fix123><fix123><fix123>And thus, the strongest, fastest army,<fix123><fix123>the Keiga Family, will rule all.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Soon the Animal Realm shall<fix123><fix123>come under our possession.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Perhaps not just the Animal Realm, but Hell and the Human Realm too......?<fix123><fix123>My dreams are broadening.[1]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ど、どうしよう<fix123><fix123>驪駒(くろこま)様がそんな暴挙に……<fix123><fix123><fix123>今すぐ吉弔様に報告に行かないと！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wh-What to do?<fix123><fix123>Lady Kurokoma's being so aggressive......<fix123><fix123><fix123>We have to go and report to Lady Kicchou now!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>慌てるな、カワウソ霊<fix123><fix123>今回は退却する作戦じゃないよな<fix123><fix123><fix123>こいつはこのまま放って<fix123><fix123>置くわけには行かない<fix123><fix123><fix123>こいつは危険な奴だ！<fix123><fix123>今すぐ叩きのめさないとな！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Don't panic, otter spirit.<fix123><fix123>Now's not time to retreat, right?<fix123><fix123><fix123>It's not like we can't leave<fix123><fix123>this person to do whatever she pleases.<fix123><fix123><fix123>This one's a dangerous bastard!<fix123><fix123>We have to defeat her now!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 聖徳太子のペガサス　～ Dark Pegasus<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Prince Shoutoku's Pegasus ~ Dark Pegasus<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふっふっふ、心地良いな<fix123><fix123><fix123>吉弔みたいないけ好かない奴と違って<fix123><fix123>好戦的で気持ちいいぞ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh heh heh, that sounds nice.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Unlike that foul Kicchou,<fix123><fix123>I happen to like fighting!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間、……いや霧雨魔理沙<fix123><fix123>勇気あるな！　協力するぞ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Human...... No, Marisa Kirisame.<fix123><fix123>You're courageous! I'll cooperate with you!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>鬼傑組のカワウソ霊よ！<fix123><fix123>良い人間を見つけたな！<fix123><fix123><fix123>しかし私は強いぞ<fix123><fix123>遠慮無く全力を出し切れよ！<fix123><fix123><fix123>さあ、邪神を打ち破る人間の力<fix123><fix123>この漆黒の天馬(ペガサス)に見せよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Otter spirit of the Kiketsu Family!<fix123><fix123>I see you've found a good human!<fix123><fix123><fix123>But I'll have you know that I'm strong.<fix123><fix123>Hold nothing back and come at me!<fix123><fix123><fix123>Now, show this jet-black pegasus<fix123><fix123>the power of the human who defeated the wicked god!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Saki Kurokoma DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>……ハアハア<fix123><fix123><fix123>力強さと身軽さ、弾幕に対する勇気と知恵<fix123><fix123>全てバランスが良い！<fix123><fix123><fix123>か、感動した！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>......*pant pant*<fix123><fix123><fix123>Your power, swiftness, bravery and knowledge<fix123><fix123>in facing down danmaku... All in perfect balance!<fix123><fix123><fix123>I-I'm moved!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>参ったな、こいつは強い……<fix123><fix123>こんな奴を地上に行かすわけには<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oof, she's strong......<fix123><fix123>I can't let someone like this go up to the surface—<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前の強さに免じて暫くは<fix123><fix123>侵略を控えるよ<fix123><fix123><fix123>うちも消耗戦には<fix123><fix123>持ち込みたくないからね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>In consideration of your strength,<fix123><fix123>I'll pull back the invasion for now.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Even I don't want to turn it<fix123><fix123>into a war of attrition, after all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それは助かる……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Thank god......<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それに人間界の前に<fix123><fix123>まずは畜生界の征服からだしね<fix123><fix123><fix123>吉弔率いる鬼傑組<fix123><fix123>饕餮(とうてつ)率いる剛欲同盟<fix123><fix123><fix123>さらに袿姫が操る霊長園<fix123><fix123>それと存在不確定の隠密卑劣集団……<fix123><fix123><fix123>どれも征服し甲斐があって<fix123><fix123>ふふふ、楽しくなってきたな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Guess I'll have to conquer the Animal Realm<fix123><fix123>before I move on to the Human Realm, then.<fix123><fix123><fix123>The Kiketsu Family lead by Kicchou,<fix123><fix123>and the Gouyoku Alliance lead by Toutetsu...<fix123><fix123><fix123>There's also the Primate Spirit Garden controlled by Keiki,<fix123><fix123>and then there's that unidentified and despicable hidden organization......<fix123><fix123><fix123>It'll be worthwhile defeating any one of them.<fix123><fix123>Hahaha, this is getting fun.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なー、カワウソ霊よー<fix123><fix123>こいつヤバイ奴なんじゃ……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, otter spirit~<fix123><fix123>Ain't she bad news......<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ、やっぱ判ります？<fix123><fix123><fix123>勁牙組なんてただの暴力が好きなだけの<fix123><fix123>そのまんま暴力団ですからね<fix123><fix123><fix123>だから組長もろくなもんじゃないです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, so you felt it too?<fix123><fix123><fix123>The Keiga Family simply loves violence.<fix123><fix123>They're just a gang of thugs.<fix123><fix123><fix123>That's why their leader has nothing good to offer.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まあ尤も、獣らしいと言えば<fix123><fix123>獣らしいのかも知れんな<fix123><fix123><fix123>畜生界ってこんな奴ばかりなんだろ？<fix123><fix123>ぞっとしないぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I guess it only makes sense<fix123><fix123>that a beast would be beastly.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Is the Animal Realm full of people like this?<fix123><fix123>Can't say I care for that.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>血戯えの業風<fix123>Beastly Storm<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Karmic Winds of a Bloody Frenzy<fix123>Beastly Storm<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地獄（畜生界隣接暴風区域）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hell (Stormy Area Nearby the Beast Realm)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 輝かしき弱肉強食の掟<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Shining Law of the Strong Eating the Weak<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kutaka Niwatari ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>この先、最強の動物霊が占拠しています<fix123><fix123><fix123>現在、地上に攻めてこないように<fix123><fix123>水際作戦決行中です！<fix123><fix123><fix123>今すぐ引き返してください！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The area up ahead is occupied by the strongest animal spirit.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Right now, we're carrying out coastal operations<fix123><fix123>in order to prevent her from attacking the surface.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Please turn back now!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kutaka Niwatari DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>こんな大荒れの地獄で<fix123><fix123>一体誰が暴れているんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who on earth is rampaging<fix123><fix123>in this turbulent area of Hell?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Saki Kurokoma ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あっはっは！<fix123><fix123>笑いが止まらないな！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah ha ha!<fix123><fix123>I can't stop laughing!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>吉弔の奴が袿姫を倒したお陰で<fix123><fix123>我らが自由に動ける様になった<fix123><fix123><fix123>見事だ！　吉弔に使われたフリをした<fix123><fix123>甲斐が有ったな。オオカミ霊よ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Thanks to that bastard Kicchou defeating Keiki,<fix123><fix123>we can finally act freely!<fix123><fix123><fix123>Excellent work! I see pretending to be used by Kicchou paid off.<fix123><fix123>Wolf spirit!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……はっ！　驪駒(くろこま)様<fix123><fix123>もったいなきお言葉で<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>......Yes!<fix123><fix123>You overpraise me, Lady Kurokoma.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ちょ、ちょっと待て<fix123><fix123>私はお前なんて知らないぞ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wha-Wait a second!<fix123><fix123>I don't even know who you are!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……人間には私の事を伝えてないんだね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>......You didn't tell the human about me, huh.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>勁牙組　組長<fix123>驪駒(くろこま)　早鬼(さき)<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Matriarch of the Keiga Family<fix123>Saki Kurokoma<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>失礼した、私は勁牙組(けいがぐみ)組長<fix123><fix123>驪駒 早鬼(くろこま　さき)である<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How rude of me. I am Saki Kurokoma,<fix123><fix123>boss of the Keiga Family.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>勁牙組……？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Keiga Family......?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（この方は、私の親分だ）<fix123><fix123><fix123>（勁牙組は強大な腕力、俊敏な脚力、<fix123><fix123>無限の勇気を自慢とする動物霊の集団である）<fix123><fix123><fix123>（畜生界最強の組織だぞ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(This person here's my boss.)<fix123><fix123><fix123>(The Keiga Family is an organization of animal spirits<fix123><fix123>who pride ourselves on our strong arms, swift legs and infinite courage.)<fix123><fix123><fix123>(We're the strongest group in the Animal Realm, y'know.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>オオカミ霊の親分、か<fix123><fix123>なる程<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>She's your boss? Huh.<fix123><fix123>I see.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>袿姫を倒すための<fix123><fix123>吉弔との苟且(かりそめ)の協力はもう終わった<fix123><fix123><fix123>お前があの袿姫を倒してくれたお陰で<fix123><fix123>畜生界は再び競争社会へと戻ったのだよ<fix123><fix123><fix123>となれば、我ら最強最速軍団<fix123><fix123>勁牙組の天下だ<fix123><fix123><fix123>程なくして畜生界は<fix123><fix123>我ら勁牙組の物になるだろう<fix123><fix123><fix123>いや畜生界どころか地獄界も人間界も……？<fix123><fix123>夢は広がるわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Our brief deal with Kicchou in order to<fix123>defeat Keiki is now over.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Thanks to you defeating Keiki,<fix123><fix123>the Animal Realm has returned to being a competitive society.<fix123><fix123><fix123>And thus, the strongest, fastest army,<fix123><fix123>the Keiga Family, will rule all.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Soon the Animal Realm shall<fix123><fix123>come under our possession.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Perhaps not just the Animal Realm, but Hell and the Human Realm too......?<fix123><fix123>My dreams are broadening.[1]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なる程判った<fix123><fix123>嬉しいぜ<fix123><fix123><fix123>ここまで判りやすい侵略者なら<fix123><fix123>戦うのに躊躇しない<fix123><fix123><fix123>元々、地上に侵略しようとしていたのは<fix123><fix123>お前だったのか！<fix123><fix123><fix123>今すぐ叩きのめしてやる！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I kinda get it.<fix123><fix123>I'm glad.<fix123><fix123><fix123>I won't need to hesitate<fix123><fix123>if the invader is so obvious!<fix123><fix123><fix123>You were the one who was trying<fix123><fix123>to invade the surface!<fix123><fix123><fix123>I'll beat you up right now!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 聖徳太子のペガサス　～ Dark Pegasus<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Prince Shoutoku's Pegasus ~ Dark Pegasus<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふっふっふ、心地良いな<fix123><fix123><fix123>吉弔みたいないけ好かない奴と違って<fix123><fix123>好戦的で気持ちいいぞ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh heh heh, that sounds nice.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Unlike that foul Kicchou,<fix123><fix123>I happen to like fighting!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>判っているな？　オオカミ霊よ<fix123><fix123>お前は人間に全力で協力してかかってこい<fix123>あの袿姫を倒した時と<fix123><fix123>同じ力じゃないと面白くない<fix123><fix123><fix123>さあ、邪神を打ち破る人間の力<fix123><fix123>この漆黒の天馬(ペガサス)に見せよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Do you hear me? Wolf spirit,<fix123><fix123>you will do all you can to help this human and come at me!<fix123><fix123><fix123>It won't be fun if she's<fix123><fix123>not as strong as when she defeated Keiki.<fix123>Now, show this jet-black pegasus<fix123><fix123>the power of the human who defeated the wicked god!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Saki Kurokoma DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>……ハアハア<fix123><fix123><fix123>力強さと身軽さ、弾幕に対する勇気と知恵<fix123><fix123>全てバランスが良い！<fix123><fix123><fix123>か、感動した！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>......*pant pant*<fix123><fix123><fix123>Your power, swiftness, bravery and knowledge<fix123><fix123>in facing down danmaku... All in perfect balance!<fix123><fix123><fix123>I-I'm moved!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私の強さが判ったなら<fix123><fix123>侵略なんてやめることだな！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If you understand how strong I am,<fix123><fix123>then you'll stop the invasion!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>判った、取り敢えずはそうしよう<fix123><fix123><fix123>まあ、どのみち人間界を支配するのは<fix123><fix123>畜生界を征服してからだしな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Got it, I'll back off for now.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Welp, in any case ruling over the Human Realm<fix123><fix123>will have to wait till after we conquer the Animal Realm.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>畜生界の征服は……<fix123><fix123>私が止めなくても良いんだよな？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Conquering the Animal Realm......<fix123><fix123>I don't have to stop that, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>元々、我々勁牙組は<fix123><fix123>畜生界ナンバーワンでしたし<fix123><fix123><fix123>袿姫を倒したからもう<fix123><fix123>邪魔をする奴はいないね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We of the Keiga Family<fix123><fix123>were the strongest in the Animal Realm to begin with.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Since you defeated Keiki,<fix123><fix123>there's no longer anyone in our way.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いやぁ、でも……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmm, but......<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どうした？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What is it?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あの袿姫って奴を<fix123><fix123>やっつけた感じが全然しないんだけど<fix123><fix123><fix123>まだまだ余力がありそうな……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It doesn't feel like<fix123><fix123>I defeated that Keiki person at all.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Maybe she has more up her sleeve......<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>大丈夫、大丈夫<fix123><fix123>特に根拠は無いが、あいつは怖くなくなった<fix123><fix123><fix123>きっと吉弔が何とかして<fix123><fix123>くれてるに違いない<fix123><fix123><fix123>それに一度攻撃を始めたら<fix123><fix123>もう止められないのが我らの売りさ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It'll be fine, it'll be fine.<fix123><fix123>I don't really know why, but I'm not scared of her anymore.<fix123><fix123><fix123>I'm sure Kicchou's<fix123><fix123>gonna do something.<fix123><fix123><fix123>But being unstoppable once we start attacking<fix123><fix123>is one of our special features.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なあ、オオカミ霊さー<fix123><fix123>お前の上司、ちょっと浅慮なんじゃ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, wolf spirit...<fix123><fix123>Ain't your boss kinda empty-headed?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええ、すみません<fix123><fix123><fix123>お察しの通り、物理は強いんですけど<fix123><fix123>頭の方はちょっと<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yeah, I'm sorry about that.<fix123><fix123><fix123>It is as you've seen. We are physically strong,<fix123><fix123>but our intellect is a bit...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>畜生界の勢力は私には判らんが……<fix123><fix123><fix123>お前の組が支配する想像が付かないぜ<fix123><fix123>確かに力は強いんだけど……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I got no idea what the politics of the Animal Realm are like......<fix123><fix123><fix123>But I can hardly imagine this family o'yours ruling it.<fix123><fix123>There's no denyin' you guys are strong, but......<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何だと？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What is it?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>袿姫って奴が一番くせ者だし<fix123><fix123>何となくまた全て持って行かれる気がするぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Keiki strikes me as the most dangerous person.<fix123><fix123>Somehow it seems like she can come at us with all her power again.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうか、そうなったらその時は<fix123><fix123>また倒しに行ってくれよな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You think so? Well if that happens, <fix123>you'll go defeat her again for me, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほら、そういうところだよ<fix123><fix123>何も考えてないだろ、お前？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>See, that's what I mean.<fix123><fix123>You aren't thinkin' at all, are ya?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>血戯えの業風<fix123>Beastly Storm<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Karmic Winds of a Bloody Frenzy<fix123>Beastly Storm<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地獄（畜生界隣接暴風区域）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hell (Stormy Area Nearby the Beast Realm)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 輝かしき弱肉強食の掟<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Shining Law of the Strong Eating the Weak<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kutaka Niwatari ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>この先、最強の動物霊が占拠しています<fix123><fix123><fix123>現在、地上に攻めてこないように<fix123><fix123>水際作戦決行中です！<fix123><fix123><fix123>今すぐ引き返してください！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The area up ahead is occupied by the strongest animal spirit.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Right now, we're carrying out coastal operations,<fix123><fix123>in order to prevent her from attacking the surface.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Please turn back now!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kutaka Niwatari DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>畜生界から本当の侵略者が<fix123><fix123>出てきたって！<fix123><fix123><fix123>私が地上に出てくるきっかけを<fix123><fix123>与えてしまったのなら倒さないと<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So true invaders from<fix123><fix123>the Animal Realm showed up!<fix123><fix123><fix123>Since I gave them the opportunity by returning to the surface,<fix123><fix123>guess I'll have to take them down too!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（……誰かと思ったけど<fix123><fix123>やっぱりそうか）<fix123><fix123><fix123>（この隠す気のないオーラは<fix123><fix123>あいつしかない）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(......I wondered who it was.<fix123><fix123>Seems my suspicion was right.)<fix123><fix123><fix123>(Not even attempting to hide that aura?<fix123><fix123>Who else could it be?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Saki Kurokoma ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あっはっは！<fix123><fix123>笑いが止まらないな！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah ha ha!<fix123><fix123>I can't stop laughing!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>吉弔の奴が袿姫を倒したお陰で<fix123><fix123>我らが自由に動ける様になった<fix123><fix123><fix123>見事だ！　人間よ！<fix123><fix123>早速顔を見せよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Thanks to that bastard Kicchou defeating Keiki,<fix123><fix123>we can finally act freely!<fix123><fix123><fix123>Excellent work! Human!<fix123><fix123>Show your face at once!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（やっぱり、驪駒(くろこま)だ！<fix123><fix123>こいつ偉そうで腹が立つんだよな）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(It's definitely Kurokoma!<fix123><fix123>Her arrogance is infuriating!)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ！？<fix123><fix123>誰だ、お前？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh!?<fix123><fix123>Who on earth are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……なる程、動物霊に私のことを<fix123><fix123>教えられていないんだね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>......I see.<fix123><fix123>So the animal spirit didn't tell you about me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>勁牙組　組長<fix123>驪駒(くろこま)　早鬼(さき)<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Matriarch of the Keiga Family<fix123>Saki Kurokoma<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>失礼した、私は勁牙組(けいがぐみ)組長<fix123><fix123>驪駒 早鬼(くろこま　さき)である<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How rude of me. I am Saki Kurokoma,<fix123><fix123>boss of the Keiga Family.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>勁牙組……？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Keiga Family......?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>こいつは、剛欲同盟の宿敵だ<fix123><fix123><fix123>生き方に誇りも何も持っていない<fix123><fix123>暴力集団の長だよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This person is the sworn enemy of the Gouyoku Alliance.<fix123><fix123><fix123>She's the leader of a gang of thugs<fix123><fix123>who have nothing worth boasting about.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>暴力集団……？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A gang of thugs...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前に憑いているのは<fix123><fix123>饕餮(とうてつ)のところのオオワシ霊だな<fix123><fix123><fix123>まさかプライドの高い剛欲同盟が<fix123><fix123>鬼傑組の作戦に協力するとは思わなかったが<fix123><fix123><fix123>お前があの袿姫を倒してくれたお陰で<fix123><fix123>畜生界は再び競争社会へと戻ったのだよ<fix123><fix123><fix123>となれば、我ら最強最速軍団<fix123><fix123>勁牙組の天下だ<fix123><fix123><fix123>程なくして畜生界は<fix123><fix123>我ら勁牙組の物になるだろう<fix123><fix123><fix123>いや畜生界どころか地獄界も人間界も……？<fix123><fix123>夢は広がるわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The one possessing you<fix123><fix123>is an eagle spirit from Toutetsu's gang, right?<fix123><fix123><fix123>To think the prideful Gouyoku Alliance would<fix123><fix123>cooperate with Kiketsu Family! How unexpected.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Thanks to you defeating Keiki,<fix123><fix123>the Animal Realm has returned to being a competitive society.<fix123><fix123><fix123>And thus, the strongest, fastest army,<fix123><fix123>the Keiga Family, will rule all.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Soon the Animal Realm shall<fix123><fix123>come under our possession.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Perhaps not just the Animal Realm, but Hell and the Human Realm too......?<fix123><fix123>My dreams are broadening.[1]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>馬鹿な<fix123><fix123>そんなこと出来る訳無い！<fix123><fix123><fix123>いや、勁牙組の暴力組長なら<fix123><fix123>やりかねない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Don't be ridiculous.<fix123><fix123>You'll never manage that!<fix123><fix123><fix123>No, wait, she's the head of the Keiga Family.<fix123><fix123>If anyone can do it, it's those violent brutes!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>大丈夫よ、オオワシ霊<fix123><fix123>そんな侵略行為は許されない<fix123><fix123><fix123>私を畜生界の争乱に<fix123><fix123>巻き込んだのは失敗だったわね<fix123><fix123><fix123>今ここであんたを倒して<fix123>獣の野望をたたき切ってやるから！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It'll be fine, eagle spirit.<fix123><fix123>I won't allow the invasion to happen.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Roping me into the Animal Realm's conflict<fix123><fix123>was a mistake!<fix123><fix123><fix123>I'll beat you right here,<fix123><fix123>and put an end to your beastly ambitions!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 聖徳太子のペガサス　～ Dark Pegasus<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Prince Shoutoku's Pegasus ~ Dark Pegasus<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふっふっふ、心地良いな<fix123><fix123><fix123>吉弔みたいないけ好かない奴と違って<fix123><fix123>好戦的で気持ちいいぞ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh heh heh, that sounds nice.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Unlike that foul Kicchou,<fix123><fix123>I happen to like fighting!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間……力を貸すぞ！<fix123><fix123>共に暴力組長の暴走を止めよう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Human...... I'll lend you my power!<fix123><fix123>Let's stop this violent leader's rampage together!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>剛欲同盟のオオワシ霊よ！<fix123><fix123>良い人間を見つけたな！<fix123><fix123><fix123>しかし私は強いぞ<fix123><fix123>遠慮無く全力を出し切れよ！<fix123><fix123><fix123>さあ、邪神を打ち破る人間の力<fix123><fix123>この漆黒の天馬(ペガサス)に見せよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Eagle spirit of the Gouyoku Alliance!<fix123><fix123>I see you've found a good human!<fix123><fix123><fix123>But I'll have you know that I'm strong.<fix123><fix123>Hold nothing back and come at me!<fix123><fix123><fix123>Now, show this jet-black pegasus<fix123><fix123>the power of the human who defeated the wicked god!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Saki Kurokoma DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>……ハアハア<fix123><fix123><fix123>力強さと身軽さ、弾幕に対する勇気と知恵<fix123><fix123>全てバランスが良い！<fix123><fix123><fix123>か、感動した！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>......*pant pant*<fix123><fix123><fix123>Your power, swiftness, bravery and knowledge<fix123><fix123>in facing down danmaku... All in perfect balance!<fix123><fix123><fix123>I-I'm moved!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうですか……<fix123><fix123>こっちはもうヘトヘト<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Is that so......<fix123><fix123>I'm completely worn out.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どうだ、オオワシ霊を捨てて<fix123><fix123>勁牙組に入って貰えないだろうか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How about it? Won't you consider<fix123><fix123>abandoning the eagle spirit and joining the Keiga Family?<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Hm?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間は知らないかも知れないが<fix123><fix123>剛欲同盟長の饕餮(とうてつ)は最悪な奴だぞ<fix123><fix123><fix123>組織はトップが私欲に走る奴だと<fix123><fix123>部下は不幸にしかならない<fix123><fix123><fix123>その点、 勁牙組(うち)は良いぞー<fix123><fix123>強ければすぐにでも幹部だ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A human may not know this,<fix123><fix123>but the leader of the Gouyoku Alliance, Toutetsu, is the worst.<fix123><fix123><fix123>If a greedy bastard is at the top of the organization,<fix123><fix123>the underlings would never be happy.<fix123><fix123><fix123>When it comes to that, we of the Keiga Family are better.<fix123><fix123>You can climb up the ladder quick, as long as you're strong.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>動物霊の組織になんて<fix123><fix123>何処も入るつもりは無いわよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I have no intention of<fix123><fix123>joining any animal spirit organizations. Got it?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（ええー、もうてっきり<fix123><fix123>うちの仲間かと思ってたのにー）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Ehh? I thought you<fix123><fix123>were already a part of us~.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まあ良い<fix123><fix123><fix123>今日は人間の強さを<fix123><fix123>見られただけで十分満足だ<fix123><fix123><fix123>決めた<fix123><fix123>今度は人間界に行くぞ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, whatever.<fix123>What I've just seen of the<fix123><fix123>strength of humans is very satisfying.<fix123>I've decided!<fix123><fix123>I'll go to the Human Realm next!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何しに来るの<fix123><fix123>迷惑だわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What are you coming over for?<fix123><fix123>It'll be a bother.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そりゃあ、私にとって<fix123><fix123>畜生界は狭すぎるからね<fix123><fix123><fix123>その時はまた宜しくな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, y'see...<fix123><fix123>The Animal Realm's just too small for me.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Well, I'll be thanking you in advance.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>嫌な予感しかしない……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I have a bad feeling about this......<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: Somewhere in the sky above Gensokyo.<fix123>
As a fairy, she's fine even in the summer heat.<fix123>
"All right! At last, I'm now the strongest!"<fix123>
"Wow! Amazing!<fix123> Well, you did beat ME, after all!"<fix123>
"So what kinds of people did you beat?"<fix123>
"This lady with a big hatchet...<fix123>
and a dog at the shrine, I think... and this girl with a wide hat...<fix123>
and, uh... what was after that again?"<fix123>
"All my memories after that are fuzzy.<fix123> I think there were a lot of doors...?"<fix123>
"Wow! You're duuuuuumb!"<fix123>
"Maybe it's the heat making me dumb...<fix123>
...Huh? Hey! Look at your back!"<fix123>
"What's with this door thing on your back!?"<fix123>
"Ew! Creepy!"<fix123>
"But this door... I feel like I've... Ugh, my head..."<fix123>
"Oh, I remember now!<fix123>
I met some weird people in a world full of doors."<fix123>
"Weird people?"<fix123>
"Like these weird dancers, and this lady who was so lazy she fought in a chair.<fix123>
I feel like I fought them, but...<fix123>
It's so weird, that's where my memories get all fuzzy."<fix123>
"Hmph, so you lost then?"<fix123>
"H-How could I lose!?<fix123> I'm the strongest!"<fix123>
After the rampage induced by the two children, the fairies' memories were vague.<fix123>
The seasons had gone wild because of the fairies, who control nature,<fix123>going beyond their limits while berserk.<fix123>
The doors that had appeared on their backs were proof that the fairies had been influenced.<fix123>
Realizing this, Cirno told Larva that:<fix123>"Whatever you do, don't look at or touch your own back."<fix123>
Of course, she planned to enter the door and take back her memories<fix123>as soon as she was ready.<fix123>
<c$Ending No. 03 — The Reappearing Back Door$><fix123>
<c$Congratulations!$><fix123><c$No Continue Clear!$><fix123>
Somewhere in the sky above Gensokyo.<fix123>
Not really sure where this is.<fix123>
"Another great, sunny day!<fix123>
The summer sunlight is marking my skin, huh?"<fix123>
"Wait, huh? Summer sunlight...?<fix123>
Didn't I used to hate it when it was hot?<fix123>
Since when was I okay with heat?"<fix123>
"Well, whatever. It just means I conquered my weakness!<fix123>
Meaning it's pushed me to be the strongest!<fix123>
I'm all fired up now! Now I kinda wanna go test my strongestness!"<fix123>
"Oh perfect timing, there's a fairy over there!<fix123>
I'm gonna try fighting her!"<fix123>
Just then, the butterfly fairy Larva appeared in front of her.<fix123>
And so, Cirno began her battle (for the Nth time).<fix123>
It seems she was losing her sense of self due to going berserk.<fix123>
<c$Ending No. 04 — The Start of the Idiot Loop World$><fix123>
<c$Congratulations on your clear!$><fix123>
<c$Next time, try to use no continues!$><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>How rude of me. I am Saki Kurokoma,<fix123><fix123>Boss of the Keiga Family.<fix123><fix123>
