en_dialogue: <fix123>This person here is the boss of our enemy.<fix123>The Keiga Family is a beastly organization<fix123><fix123>full of muscleheads whose only redeeming quality is their strength.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（筋肉馬鹿組織……？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(......Musclehead organization?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前に憑いているのは<fix123><fix123>吉弔のところのカワウソ霊だな<fix123>袿姫を倒すための<fix123><fix123>吉弔との苟且(かりそめ)の協力はもう終わった<fix123>お前があの袿姫を倒してくれたお陰で<fix123><fix123>畜生界は再び競争社会へと戻ったのだよ<fix123>となれば、我ら最強最速軍団<fix123><fix123>勁牙組の天下だ<fix123>程なくして畜生界は<fix123><fix123>我ら勁牙組の物になるだろう<fix123>いや畜生界どころか地獄界も人間界も……？<fix123><fix123>夢は広がるわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The one possessing you<fix123><fix123>is an otter spirit from Kicchou's gang right?<fix123>Our brief deal with Kicchou in order to<fix123>defeat Keiki is now over.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Thanks to you defeating Keiki,<fix123><fix123>the Animal Realm has returned to being a competitive society.<fix123><fix123><fix123>And thus, the strongest, fastest army,<fix123><fix123>the Keiga Family, will rule all.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Soon the Animal Realm shall<fix123><fix123>come under our possession.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Perhaps not just the Animal Realm, but Hell and the Human Realm too......?<fix123><fix123>My dreams are broadening.[1]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ど、どうしよう<fix123><fix123>驪駒(くろこま)様がそんな暴挙に……<fix123>今すぐ吉弔様に報告に行かないと！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wh-What to do?<fix123><fix123>Master Kurokoma's being so aggressive......<fix123>We have to report to Lady Kicchou now!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>大丈夫よ、カワウソ霊<fix123><fix123>報告は後でも良いわ<fix123>私を畜生界の争乱に<fix123><fix123>巻き込んだのは失敗だったわね<fix123>今ここであんたを倒して<fix123><fix123>獣の野望をたたき切ってやるから！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It'll be fine, otter spirit.<fix123><fix123>The report can wait.<fix123>Roping me into the Animal Realm's conflict,<fix123><fix123>was a mistake!<fix123><fix123><fix123>I'll beat you right here,<fix123><fix123>and put an end to your beastly ambitions!<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Prince Shoutoku's Pegasus ~ Dark Pegasus<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふっふっふ、心地良いな<fix123><fix123><fix123>吉弔みたいないけ好かない奴と違って<fix123><fix123>好戦的で気持ちいいぞ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh heh heh, that sounds nice.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Unlike that foul Kicchou,<fix123><fix123>I happen to like fighting!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間、……いや博麗霊夢よ<fix123><fix123>感謝するぞ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Human...... No, Reimu Hakurei.<fix123><fix123>You have my thanks.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>鬼傑組のカワウソ霊よ！<fix123><fix123>良い人間を見つけたな！<fix123>しかし私は強いぞ<fix123><fix123>遠慮無く全力を出し切れよ！<fix123>さあ、邪神を打ち破る人間の力<fix123><fix123>この漆黒の天馬(ペガサス)に見せよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Otter spirit of the Kiketsu Family!<fix123><fix123>I see you've found a good human!<fix123>But I'll have you know that I'm strong.<fix123><fix123>Hold nothing back and come at me!<fix123>Now, show this jet-black pegasus<fix123><fix123>the power of the human who defeated the wicked god!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Saki Kurokoma DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>……ハアハア<fix123><fix123><fix123>力強さと身軽さ、弾幕に対する勇気と知恵<fix123><fix123>全てバランスが良い！<fix123><fix123><fix123>か、感動した！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>......*pant pant*<fix123><fix123><fix123>Your power, swiftness, bravery and knowledge<fix123><fix123>in facing down danmaku... All in perfect balance!<fix123><fix123><fix123>I-I'm moved!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうですか……<fix123><fix123>こっちはもうヘトヘト<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Is that so......<fix123><fix123>I'm completely worn out.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どうだ、カワウソ霊を捨てて<fix123><fix123>勁牙組に入って貰えないだろうか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How about it? Won't you consider<fix123><fix123>ditching that otter spirit and joining the Keiga Family?<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Hm?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>鬼傑組は根性ひん曲がった奴ばかりだぞ<fix123>勁牙組は竹を割ったような<fix123><fix123>性格の奴ばかりだし<fix123>組織は超絶ホワイトさ<fix123><fix123>上司は漆黒の天馬(ブラックホース)だけどな、はっはっは<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There are only deceptive fellows in the Kiketsu Family, y'know.<fix123>The whole Keiga Family, on the other hand,<fix123><fix123>is as straightforward as bamboo.<fix123>Our group is absolutely clean and white-hearted,<fix123><fix123>despite having a dark horse for a boss. Hahaha!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この話、驪駒(くろこま)様の鉄板らしいんです<fix123>ちなみに、畜生界の組織は<fix123><fix123>全て超絶ブラックですけどね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This seems to be Lady Kurokoma's favorite punch-line.<fix123>By the way, all organizations in the Animal Realm<fix123><fix123>are black-hearted, just so you know.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……動物霊達も大変そうねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see...... You animal spirits have it rough too, huh.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今日は人間の強さを<fix123><fix123>見られただけで十分満足だ<fix123>決めた<fix123><fix123>今度は人間界に行くぞ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What I've just seen of the<fix123><fix123>strength of humans is very satisfying.<fix123>I've decided!<fix123><fix123>I'll go to the Human Realm next!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何しに来るのよ<fix123><fix123>迷惑だわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What are you coming over for?<fix123><fix123>It'll be a bother.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そりゃあ、私にとって<fix123><fix123>畜生界は狭すぎるからね<fix123>その時はまた宜しくな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, y'see...<fix123><fix123>The Animal Realm's just too small for me.<fix123>Well, I'll be thanking you in advance.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>嫌な予感しかしない……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I have a bad feeling about this......<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>血戯えの業風<fix123>Beastly Storm<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Karmic Winds of a Bloody Frenzy<fix123>Beastly Storm<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地獄（畜生界隣接暴風区域）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hell (Stormy Area Nearby the Beast Realm)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 輝かしき弱肉強食の掟<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Shining Law of the Strong Eating the Weak<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kutaka Niwatari ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>この先、最強の動物霊が占拠しています<fix123><fix123><fix123>現在、地上に攻めてこないように<fix123><fix123>水際作戦決行中です！<fix123><fix123><fix123>今すぐ引き返してください！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The area up ahead is occupied by the strongest animal spirit.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Right now, we're carrying out coastal operations<fix123><fix123>in order to prevent her from attacking the surface.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Please turn back now!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kutaka Niwatari DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>畜生界から本当の侵略者が<fix123><fix123>出てきたって！<fix123><fix123><fix123>私が地上に出てくるきっかけを<fix123><fix123>与えてしまったのなら倒さないと<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So true invaders from<fix123><fix123>the Animal Realm showed up!<fix123><fix123><fix123>Since I gave them the opportunity by returning to the surface,<fix123><fix123>I guess I'll have to take them down, too!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Saki Kurokoma ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あっはっは！<fix123><fix123>笑いが止まらないな！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah ha ha!<fix123><fix123>I can't stop laughing!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>吉弔の奴が袿姫を倒したお陰で<fix123><fix123>我らが自由に動ける様になった<fix123><fix123>見事だ！　吉弔に使われたフリをした<fix123><fix123>甲斐が有ったな。オオカミ霊よ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Thanks to that bastard Kicchou defeating Keiki,<fix123><fix123>we can finally act freely!<fix123><fix123>Excellent work! I see pretending to be used by Kicchou paid off,<fix123><fix123>wolf spirit!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……はっ！　驪駒(くろこま)様<fix123><fix123>もったいなきお言葉で<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>......Yes!<fix123><fix123>You overpraise me, Lady Kurokoma.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ！？<fix123><fix123>誰だ、お前？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh!?<fix123><fix123>Who on earth are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……その人間は私を知らないんだね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>......This human doesn't know of me, huh.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>勁牙組　組長<fix123>驪駒(くろこま)　早鬼(さき)<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Matriarch of the Keiga Family<fix123>Saki Kurokoma<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>失礼した、私は勁牙組(けいがぐみ)組長<fix123><fix123>驪駒 早鬼(くろこま　さき)である<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How rude of me. I am Saki Kurokoma,<fix123><fix123>boss of the Keiga Family.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>勁牙組……？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Keiga Family......?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（この方は、私の親分だ）<fix123><fix123><fix123>（勁牙組は強大な腕力、俊敏な脚力、<fix123><fix123>無限の勇気を自慢とする動物霊の集団である）<fix123><fix123><fix123>（畜生界最強の組織だぞ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(This person here's my boss.)<fix123><fix123><fix123>(The Keiga Family is an organization of animal spirits<fix123><fix123>who pride ourselves on our arms, swift legs and infinite courage.)<fix123><fix123><fix123>(We're the strongest group in the Animal Realm, y'know.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>オオカミ霊の親分だって？<fix123><fix123>そんな……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>She's your boss?<fix123><fix123>But then......<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>袿姫を倒すための<fix123><fix123>吉弔との苟且(かりそめ)の協力はもう終わった<fix123><fix123><fix123>お前があの袿姫を倒してくれたお陰で<fix123><fix123>畜生界は再び競争社会へと戻ったのだよ<fix123><fix123><fix123>となれば、我ら最強最速軍団<fix123><fix123>勁牙組の天下だ<fix123><fix123><fix123>程なくして畜生界は<fix123><fix123>我ら勁牙組の物になるだろう<fix123><fix123><fix123>いや畜生界どころか地獄界も人間界も……？<fix123><fix123>夢は広がるわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Our brief deal with Kicchou in order to<fix123>defeat Keiki is now over.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Thanks to you defeating Keiki,<fix123><fix123>the Animal Realm has returned to being a competitive society.<fix123><fix123><fix123>And thus, the strongest, fastest army,<fix123><fix123>the Keiga Family, will rule all.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Soon the Animal Realm shall<fix123><fix123>come under our possession.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Perhaps not just the Animal Realm, but Hell and the Human Realm too......?<fix123><fix123>My dreams are broadening.[1]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう簡単にいくかしら？<fix123><fix123><fix123>私を畜生界の争乱に<fix123><fix123>巻き込んだのは失敗だったわね<fix123><fix123><fix123>今ここであんたを倒して<fix123><fix123>畜生界に叩き戻してやる！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You think it'll be that easy?<fix123><fix123><fix123>Roping me into the Animal Realm's conflict<fix123><fix123>was a mistake!<fix123><fix123><fix123>I'll beat you right here,<fix123><fix123>and smack you straight back into the Animal Realm!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 聖徳太子のペガサス　～ Dark Pegasus<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Prince Shoutoku's Pegasus ~ Dark Pegasus<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふっふっふ、心地良いな<fix123><fix123><fix123>吉弔みたいないけ好かない奴と違って<fix123><fix123>好戦的で気持ちいいぞ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh heh heh, that sounds nice.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Unlike that foul Kicchou,<fix123><fix123>I happen to like fighting!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>判っているな？　オオカミ霊よ<fix123><fix123>お前は人間に全力で協力してかかってこい<fix123>あの袿姫を倒した時と<fix123><fix123>同じ力じゃないと面白くない<fix123>さあ、邪神を打ち破る人間の力<fix123><fix123>この漆黒の天馬(ペガサス)に見せよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You got that, wolf spirit?<fix123><fix123>Do all you can to help this human and come at me!<fix123>It won't be fun if she's<fix123><fix123>not as strong as when she defeated Keiki.<fix123>Now, show this jet-black pegasus<fix123><fix123>the power of the human who defeated the wicked god!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Saki Kurokoma DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>……ハアハア<fix123><fix123><fix123>力強さと身軽さ、弾幕に対する勇気と知恵<fix123><fix123>全てバランスが良い！<fix123><fix123><fix123>か、感動した！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>......*pant pant*<fix123><fix123><fix123>Your power, swiftness, bravery and knowledge<fix123><fix123>in facing down danmaku... All in perfect balance!<fix123><fix123><fix123>I-I'm moved!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうですか……<fix123><fix123>こっちはもうヘトヘト<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Is that so......<fix123><fix123>I'm completely worn out.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どうだ、勁牙組に入って<fix123><fix123>貰えないだろうか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I wonder,<fix123><fix123>would you consider joining the Keiga Family?<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Hm?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は畜生界を支配するのに<fix123><fix123>忙しいからな<fix123><fix123><fix123>勁牙組の人間界支部として<fix123><fix123>人間界の支配を任せよう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm busy with ruling the Animal Realm,<fix123><fix123>you see.<fix123><fix123><fix123>So I'll leave the Human Realm to you,<fix123><fix123>as the Human Realm division of the Keiga Family.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いやいやそんな馬鹿げた話……<fix123><fix123>あるわけ無いでしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What? That's ridiculous......<fix123><fix123>You think I'd agree to that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？　断るなんて酷い……<fix123><fix123>そんなに強いのに人間界を支配しないなんて<fix123><fix123><fix123>何の為に力を見せつけたのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Eh? How cruel of you to refuse......<fix123><fix123>To not rule over the Human Realm, even though you're so strong.<fix123><fix123><fix123>So then, why did you show me your strength?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もしかして、勁牙組って<fix123><fix123>馬鹿ばっかりなの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wait, is everyone in the<fix123><fix123>Keiga Family an idiot?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええ、すみません<fix123><fix123><fix123>お察しの通り、物理は強いんですけど<fix123><fix123>頭の方はちょっと<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yeah, I'm sorry about that.<fix123><fix123><fix123>It is as you've seen. We are physically strong,<fix123><fix123>but our intellect is a bit...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>じゃあいいや<fix123><fix123>やっぱり自分で切り開かないとね<fix123>人間界を訪れたときはまた頼むよ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Whatever, then.<fix123><fix123>Guess I'll have to cut open a path myself.<fix123>I'll be calling on you when I visit the Human Realm next, okay?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>へ？　何を？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh? What for?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>勿論、手合わせだよ<fix123><fix123>今度はオオカミ霊抜きの力を見せて欲しい<fix123><fix123><fix123>今度私が勝ったら、さっきの話も考えてくれ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A duel, of course.<fix123><fix123>I want to see your power without the wolf spirit.<fix123><fix123><fix123>If I win, I'll have you reconsider my proposition.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うへえ、もううんざり……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ugh, I've had enough of this......<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: The Youkai Mountain.<fix123>
Gensokyo's tallest mountain. Home to many youkai, including the tengu.<fix123>
"So you're sure she said she was a god of impairments?"<fix123>
"Right. I thought it was a serious matter."<fix123>
"Hmm... well that IS a disturbing story."<fix123>
"If whoever this is gathered faith and showed herself,<fix123> she might have been trying to get rid of the tengu,<fix123>
and if she shows up personally, that itself might be for the purpose of causing the tengu's downfall..."<fix123>
"No, she didn't seem THAT hostile.<fix123>
Although it is true that she acted like meeting me was an inconvenience."<fix123>
"But still, it's not every day you consult with me about anything."<fix123>
"At first I was merely investigating the season incident,<fix123> but if the threat to the tengu is real, then I can't put this in an article."<fix123>
"And there it is, concealing the truth for your own convenience."<fix123>
"But aren't I being the very model of a reporter?<fix123>
If I'm not writing an article, then I'm free to consult with whoever I wish."<fix123>
"Don't beat around the bush, you just want my thoughtography power."<fix123>
"Well of course I do.<fix123>
Actually, I fought the mastermind, but unfortunately I lost.<fix123>
I'd been caught in her trap from the beginning, allowing her to take away all my weapons."<fix123>
"And at the very end when I was at my wit's end,<fix123> she got away before I realized what was happening."<fix123>
"This is rare. So she made even a battle-type like you cry uncle?"<fix123>
"I'm the social awareness type, thank you very much."<fix123>
"But now I have no idea where she is or what she's doing.<fix123>
Which is where you come in. With your thoughtography, I could get a lead on her."<fix123>
"Sure, but... you don't know where she is, right?"<fix123>
"Don't worry, there's a way.<fix123>
There was a hint in the season I equipped."<fix123>
"Th-There's a door on your back!?"<fix123>
Aya began to use the supposedly trapped season once again.<fix123>
It was supposed to have been an enemy trap, but it was the one<fix123>thing still connecting her to her opponent.<fix123>
Aya intended to jump into the door as soon as she prepared a countermeasure.<fix123>
This wasn't because she was frustrated.<fix123>
Nor was it because she wanted to save the tengu.<fix123>
So why, then, was Aya taking action?<fix123>
Because she wanted to write an article.<fix123>
She was sure she could make an article out of the tengu narrowly avoiding crisis.<fix123>
<c$Ending No. 05 — The Very Model of a Reporter$><fix123>
<c$Congratulations!$><fix123><c$No Continue Clear!$><fix123>
The Youkai Mountain.<fix123>
Gensokyo's tallest mountain. Home to many youkai, including the tengu.<fix123>
"Looks like she got away.<fix123>
Those back doors are a real pain. She can run to anywhere she wants."<fix123>
"Maybe I should have beat her faster?<fix123>
Next I need the perfect countermeasure before I try again."<fix123>
The mastermind appeared to be an enemy of the tengu.<fix123>
However, she seemed to have gotten away right before the finishing blow.<fix123>
Aya thought she should beat her before she gets away next time.<fix123>
<c$Ending No. 06 — Door to Anywhere$><fix123>
<c$Congratulations on your clear!$><fix123>
<c$Next time, try to use no continues!$><fix123>
<fix123>千万無量の無念<fix123> Infinity Make-work<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Innumerable Regrets ~ Infinity Make-work<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Sai no Kawara<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>Eika Ebisu LEAVES<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>It's just like I heard.<fix123>There are countless beast spirits<fix123><fix123>crossing the Sanzu River...!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そこのお前！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, you there!<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>河原のアイドル水子<fix123>戎 瓔花<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Stillborn Idol of the Riverbed<fix123>Eika Ebisu<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>こんなところで暴れるから<fix123><fix123>積み石がみんな崩れちゃったよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>All the stones we were stacking fell over<fix123><fix123>because you were thrashing around!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>水子の霊……<fix123>こんなところで石を積んでいても<fix123><fix123>しょうがない<fix123>冥界に来られるように口利きして<fix123><fix123>あげようか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The spirit of a stillborn...<fix123>There's no point to stacking stones in<fix123><fix123>some dreary place like this, you know.<fix123>Shall I put in a good word for you,<fix123><fix123>so you can go to the Netherworld?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>謝るのが先じゃないの？<fix123>それに私達水子は<fix123><fix123>この河原が良いの！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Shouldn't you apologize first?<fix123>And for your information, we stillborns<fix123><fix123>like this dry riverbed!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ジェリーストーン<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Jelly Stone<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>河原こそが私達の王国なんだから！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This riverbed is our own little kingdom!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eika Ebisu DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ぐぐぐ……強い<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Gugugu... So strong...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうなのねぇ<fix123><fix123>水子の王国ねぇ<fix123>弱者が集まっても<fix123><fix123>弱いままだと思うけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see, I see.<fix123><fix123>A kingdom of stillborns...<fix123>No matter how many weaklings you gather<fix123><fix123>together, though, you'll all still be weak.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>強さなんて興味ない<fix123>石を積むという単純作業が<fix123><fix123>楽しいからここにいるのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Strength doesn't matter to us.<fix123>We're here because we enjoy the<fix123><fix123>simple work of stacking stones!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>御影石の赤子<fix123> Cross the Styx<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A Baby Carved from Granite ~ Cross the Styx<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>三途の河<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sanzu River<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ロストリバー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Lost River<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Urumi Ushizaki ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Urumi Ushizaki LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>死神の舟を使わなかったのは<fix123><fix123>失敗だったかもしれないなぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ignoring the shinigami's ferry<fix123><fix123>might've been a mistake on my part...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はぐれた幽霊かと<fix123><fix123>思ったら……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I thought you were a lost phantom...<fix123><fix123><fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Urumi Ushizaki ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>古代魚の子連れ番人<fix123>牛崎 潤美<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Parental Guardian of Ancient Fish<fix123>Urumi Ushizaki<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>生きているじゃないか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But it looks like you're still alive, huh?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方は……もしや牛鬼？<fix123>人間を襲うのを禁止されてから<fix123>三途の河で漁業を営んでいるそうねぇ<fix123>血の代わりに呑む<fix123><fix123>三途の河の水は美味しいかい？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are you... that ushi-oni?<fix123>I heard that ever since you got banned from attacking humans,<fix123>you started a fish farming business at the Sanzu River.<fix123>Drinking river water instead of blood now,<fix123><fix123>are you? How does it taste?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんだお前は<fix123><fix123>挑発しているつもりか？<fix123>私を牛鬼と知って<fix123><fix123>挑発しているのなら<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are you tryin' to pick a fight<fix123><fix123>with me or somethin'?<fix123>If you wanna fight me, knowing full<fix123><fix123>well that I'm an ushi-oni...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 石の赤子と水中の牛<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Stone Baby and the Submerged Bovine<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私も遠慮せずにお前を<fix123><fix123>川に沈めてやるぞ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Then I won't hesitate to drown<fix123><fix123>you in the river either!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Urumi Ushizaki DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ぐぐぐ……思い出した<fix123>お前さん<fix123><fix123>冥界のいつも暢気な庭師じゃ……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Grgh... Now I remember.<fix123>You're that carefree<fix123><fix123>gardener from the Netherworld...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうよ、今頃思い出したの？<fix123><fix123>牛はトロいなぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Exactly. You only just remembered?<fix123><fix123>Cows are pretty dumb.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いやなんか、そんな嫌な<fix123><fix123>性格だったかなぁと……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, uh, I was just wonderin' if your<fix123><fix123>personality was always this nasty...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ところで、お願いがあるんだけど……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>By the way, I have a favor to ask...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What's that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>彼岸の方向ってどっちだっけ？<fix123>い、いや、迷子になったわけじゃないぞ？<fix123><fix123>念のため、念のため……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Which direction was Higan?<fix123>I-I'm not lost, of course.<fix123><fix123>I'm just making sure! Really!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>思い過ごしか……<fix123><fix123>いつもの暢気な庭師じゃな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Pfft, you're the same carefree gardener as ever.<fix123><fix123>Musta been my imagination...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>鬼渡の関所<fix123> Lonely Amaryllis<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Checkpoint of Oniwatari ~ Lonely Amaryllis<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>彼岸<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Higan<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 不朽の曼珠沙華<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Everlasting Red Spider Lily<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kutaka Niwatari ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>閻魔(えんま)様から話は聞いています<fix123>容赦無く、貴方を試しなさいってね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've heard about you from the Yama.<fix123>She told me to test you with no mercy!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kutaka Niwatari EXITS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Kutaka Niwatari ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>地獄へ行こうとしている<fix123><fix123>だけありますね<fix123>中々の腕前でございます<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Just as I'd expect from someone<fix123><fix123>trying to get to Hell.<fix123>You're quite skilled indeed.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ、ニワタリ様ですね<fix123>私は冥界の使いであります<fix123>今すぐ扉を開けることは出来ますよね？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, you're Lady Niwatari.<fix123>I am a servant of the Netherworld!<fix123>You'll open the gate for me right now, yes?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地獄関所の番頭神<fix123>庭渡 久侘歌<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Clerical God of Hell's Checkpoint<fix123>Kutaka Niwatari<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私を知っているのですね<fix123><fix123>地獄に耐えられるのかどうかの<fix123><fix123>試験はこれからです<fix123>地獄に行きたければ<fix123><fix123>私を倒してみせなさい<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So you're already familiar with me.<fix123>I shall hereby test whether you are<fix123><fix123>capable of surviving Hell. <fix123>If you wish to enter, you'll<fix123><fix123>have to defeat me first.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>良いでしょう<fix123><fix123>思う存分かかってきなさい<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Very well.<fix123><fix123>Come at me with all thy might!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: セラフィックチキン<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Seraphic Chicken<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私が地獄で通用するのか<fix123><fix123>試してみるが良い！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Test my ability to survive<fix123><fix123>the fires of Hell!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kutaka Niwatari DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>このぐらいやれば十分でしょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That ought to be enough.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え、あ、まあそうですねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Er, um, well, I suppose so...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そろそろ、地獄の門を<fix123><fix123>開いても良いですよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Feel free to open the gate<fix123><fix123>to Hell any time now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>えーっと、どっちが試験をしていたのか<fix123><fix123>判らなくなりますね……<fix123>でもこれだけは忘れないで下さい<fix123>地獄の霊達は、心の隙間を<fix123><fix123>狙ってきます<fix123>慢心するとそこに付け込む<fix123><fix123>霊が現れるかも知れません<fix123>冥府の使いである貴方に言う事では<fix123><fix123>無いかも知れませんが……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Umm. I'm not exactly sure who<fix123><fix123>was testing who just now...<fix123>Remember this one warning, however:<fix123>The spirits of Hell will try to crawl into<fix123><fix123>your heart wherever there's an opening.<fix123>If you're conceited, there's sure to be a spirit<fix123><fix123>that'll take advantage of that weakness.<fix123>As a servant of the Netherworld, I'm sure<fix123><fix123>you know this already, but just in case...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>万苦の業風<fix123> Darkside of Paradise<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Karmic Wind of Myriad Sufferings ~ Darkside of Paradise<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地獄 (詳細位置の特定不能)<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hell (Specific Location Unknown)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: アンロケイテッドヘル<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Unlocated Hell<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yachie Kicchou ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>生身の人間ですね<fix123>地獄は絶望的に広いですよ<fix123>私が案内しましょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, a human of flesh and blood.<fix123>Hell is hopelessly large, you know?<fix123>Allow me to guide you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yachie Kicchou EXITS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Yachie Kicchou ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>よく付いて来られたね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You've done well to follow me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はあはあ<fix123>やっぱり本物の業風は息が詰まるわ<fix123>まさに地獄<fix123>ところで貴方は誰？<fix123>地獄の鬼では無さそうねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huff, huff...<fix123>Real karmic winds really feel suffocating huh.<fix123>That's Hell for you.<fix123>By the way, who are you?<fix123>You don't seem to be one of Hell's oni.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: トータスドラゴン　～　幸運と不運<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Tortoise Dragon ~ Good Fortune and Bad Fortune<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>鬼傑組 組長<fix123>吉弔 八千慧<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Matriarch of the Kiketsu Family<fix123>Yachie Kicchou<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は鬼傑組(きけつぐみ)の組長<fix123><fix123>吉弔(きっちょう)八千慧(やちえ)である<fix123>お前こそ名を名乗れ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I am the leader of the Kiketsu family,<fix123>Yachie Kicchou.<fix123>Right back at you: identify yourself.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ？　それは失礼<fix123><fix123>私は魂魄妖夢<fix123>地上侵略している動物霊を退治しに<fix123><fix123>来たんですけど<fix123>どう見ても貴方は怪しい<fix123><fix123>何か企んでいるのなら、白状しなさい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh? Pardon my manners.<fix123><fix123>I am Youmu Konpaku.<fix123>I came here to subjugate<fix123><fix123>the animal spirits invading the surface.<fix123>You're suspicious no matter how I look at it.<fix123><fix123>Come clean now if you have anything planned!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は貴方の探している敵ではない<fix123>それに敵は地獄(ここ)にはいないよ<fix123><fix123>残念ね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm not the enemy you're searching for.<fix123>And your enemy's not here in Hell either.<fix123><fix123>What a shame.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そんな話、信じられるもんですか<fix123>倒してから、細かい話を聞きだしてやる！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You think I'm gonna believe something like that?<fix123>I'll hear out your little story after I beat you!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yachie Kicchou DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>素晴らしい腕前です<fix123><fix123>貴方のような人間なら勝てるかも知れません<fix123>では、倒すべき敵の下へ<fix123><fix123>貴方を案内します<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What wonderful skill.<fix123><fix123>With a human like you, everything should go just fine.<fix123>Now then, allow me to guide<fix123><fix123>you to the enemy.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あれ？<fix123>本当に貴方は敵ではないの？<fix123>言われてみればそんなに<fix123><fix123>ヤバそうな奴じゃ無い気もしてきたわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh?<fix123>Are you really not my enemy?<fix123>Now that you mention it,<fix123>I'm starting to<fix123>feel like you're not all that dangerous.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>やっと判って頂けましたか<fix123>私が敵がいる場所を教えます<fix123>貴方の役目はその敵を倒す事だけ<fix123><fix123>ですからね……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So you finally realized.<fix123>I'm going to tell you where the enemy is.<fix123>Your role is simply to defeat said enemy.<fix123><fix123>Nothing more...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>早く敵の場所を教えて<fix123><fix123>急いで敵を倒しに行きたいから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Tell me where they are then,<fix123><fix123>I wanna defeat them quickly.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>動物霊は地獄のお隣にある<fix123><fix123>畜生(ちくしょう)界にいます<fix123>その畜生界の中心に<fix123><fix123>一際目立つ建造物があって<fix123>そこが敵の本拠地なのです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The animal spirits are in the Animal Realm,<fix123><fix123>located next door to Hell.<fix123>There's a particularly prominent structure<fix123><fix123>located in the center of the Animal Realm...<fix123>That's the enemy's main base.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>畜生界の中心！<fix123>教えてくれて感謝するわ<fix123><fix123>よーし、極悪な畜生どもを壊滅させてやる！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Center of the Animal Realm!<fix123>I thank you for telling me.<fix123><fix123>Alright, let's go and destroy those wicked beasts!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>口先だけでないと信じているぞ<fix123><fix123>オオワシに選ばれし剛欲(ごうよく)の騎士よ！<fix123>さあ行け！<fix123><fix123>呪い極めた鬼形(きぎょう)の敵を滅せよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Warrior of Gouyoku, chosen by the eagles!<fix123><fix123>I trust that you're not just talk!<fix123>Go forth!<fix123><fix123>Destroy that demon-shaped enemy, cursed in extremity!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>畜生メトロポリス<fix123> Beastly Dystopia<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Tiragyoni Metropolis ~ Beastly Dystopia<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>畜生界<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Animal Realm<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ビーストメトロポリス<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Beast Metropolis<fix123><fix123><fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mayumi Joutougu ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Mayumi Joutougu EXITS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>畜生界は都会だって<fix123><fix123>聞いてたけど<fix123>想像以上だったわ<fix123>目の前に見える鍵穴みたいなのが<fix123><fix123>目的地なのかなぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've heard that the<fix123><fix123>Animal Realm is a city,<fix123>but this is way more than what I had in mind.<fix123>I wonder if that keyhole-shaped thing<fix123><fix123>in front of me is my destination.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mayumi Joutougu ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>人間？<fix123>さっさと霊長園に戻らないと<fix123><fix123>飢えた畜生達に捕らわれるよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A human?<fix123>You'd better get back to the Primate Spirit Garden post-haste,<fix123><fix123>or else you'll be captured by starving beasts.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>霊長園？<fix123>そこの池に囲まれた森かしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Primate Spirit Garden?<fix123>Is that the forest surrounded by the lake there?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>霊長園を知らないだって？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You don't know about the Primate Spirit Garden?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>埴輪兵長<fix123>杖刀偶　磨弓<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Haniwa Lance Corporal<fix123>Mayumi Joutougu<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>と言うかお前……<fix123>畜生界の人間霊じゃないな！<fix123><fix123>何者だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Actually, speaking of which...<fix123>You're not a human spirit from the Animal Realm!<fix123><fix123>Who are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は冥界の住人よ<fix123>動物霊達を退治しに<fix123><fix123>地上からやってきたの……<fix123>……<fix123>（えっ、身体が動かないわ！？<fix123><fix123>……まさかオオワシ霊の仕業！？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm a resident of the Netherworld,<fix123>I came here from the surface to exterminate<fix123>the animal spirits, and......<fix123>......<fix123>(Huh? My body isn't moving!?<fix123><fix123>......Is this the eagle spirit's doing!?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: セラミックスの杖刀人<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Joutounin of Ceramics<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふっふっふ<fix123>私は、お前達を破壊する為だけに<fix123><fix123>生身の人間を連れてきた！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh heh heh!<fix123>I brought a live human down here<fix123>just to destroy the lot of you!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴様から感じる霊気……<fix123><fix123>まさか、オオワシ霊なのか？<fix123>生身の人間に頼るなんて<fix123><fix123>オオワシにそんな謙虚さがあるとは……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That aura I feel from you...<fix123><fix123>Could you be an eagle spirit?<fix123>To think that an eagle would be so humble<fix123><fix123>as to rely on a living human...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この為だけにあのにっくき鬼傑組の<fix123><fix123>奴らと同盟を結んだのだ！<fix123>お前達、呪われし偶像どもから<fix123><fix123>人間霊(どれい)を解放する！<fix123>覚悟しろ！<fix123><fix123>弱肉強食こそ、畜生界の理(ことわり)だ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>For this sole reason, we formed an alliance<fix123><fix123>with that loathsome Kiketsu Family!<fix123>I shall liberate the human spirits(slaves)<fix123><fix123>from you accursed idols!<fix123>Prepare yourself!<fix123>It's the law of the Animal Realm that the strong eat the weak!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mayumi Joutougu DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>つ、強い！<fix123><fix123>畜生界の人間霊とは訳が違う……！<fix123>なんと恐ろしい策……！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So, so strong! Completely different from<fix123><fix123>a human spirit of the Animal Realm...!<fix123>What a fearsome strategy...!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（よし！<fix123><fix123>これならば勝てる！）<fix123>（ありがとう！<fix123><fix123>冥界の剣士よ！）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Yes!<fix123>I'll be sure to win at this rate!)<fix123>(You have my thanks,<fix123>swordswoman of the Netherworld!)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……<fix123>不覚、まさかこの私が<fix123><fix123>オオワシ霊に乗っ取られるとは……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...<fix123>How careless of me. To think that I would be<fix123><fix123>taken over by the eagle spirit......<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（私だ、オオワシ霊だ）<fix123>（貴方と私の二人ならば<fix123><fix123>畜生界を取り戻す事が出来る）<fix123>（そうすれば、地上への<fix123><fix123>動物霊の侵攻も止まるだろう）<fix123>（貴方にも悪くない話の筈だ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(It's me. The eagle spirit.)<fix123>(With the two of us combined,<fix123><fix123>we can take back the Animal Realm!)<fix123>(If we do that, the beast spirits' invasion of<fix123><fix123>the surface will be sure to cease as well.)<fix123>(That should sound pretty good to you too, no?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>これは埴輪兵士が作られてから<fix123><fix123>初めての緊急事態だわ！<fix123>早くみんなに知らせないと！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This is the first emergency situation we've had<fix123><fix123>since the Haniwa Soldiers were created!<fix123>I have to go alert everyone quick!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>話は判ったわ<fix123>私を連れて来ないと<fix123><fix123>倒せない敵がいるのね？<fix123>ここまで来たら全て斬ってやるわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Got it.<fix123>So there's an enemy you can't<fix123><fix123>defeat without bringing me here?<fix123>Well, I came all the way here, so let's cut them all up!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>イドラデウス<fix123> Idola-Deus<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Deus ex Idola ~ Idola-Deus<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Primate Spirit Garden - Tumulus Base Interior<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: エレクトリックヘリテージ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Electric Heritage<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mayumi Joutougu ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>生身の人間がこんなに<fix123><fix123>強い生き物だなんて！<fix123>夢のような現実だわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>To think that living humans<fix123>were such strong creatures!<fix123>Everything feels like a dream!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mayumi Joutougu DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>見たことも無い世界だわ<fix123>あの外見からは想像も付かない内部ね<fix123>ここの何処かに敵がいるのよね？<fix123><fix123>オオワシ霊さん？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's a world I've never seen before.<fix123>You wouldn't think it'd look like this from the outside.<fix123>So our enemy's somewhere in here,<fix123><fix123>right, eagle spirit?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（……）<fix123>（これがあの霊長園の内部か……）<fix123>（人工物ばかりになって……<fix123><fix123>美しい自然は何処に！）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(...)<fix123>(This is the interior of the Garden...?)<fix123>(It's filled with man-made material now...!<fix123>What happened to the beautiful nature?!)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Keiki Haniyasushin ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>来客とは珍しい<fix123>もう私達に敵う者などいないと<fix123><fix123>悲しんでいたのに……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A guest? How rare.<fix123>And here, I had almost shed a tear at the fact<fix123><fix123>that nobody was left to fight against us...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>出てきたか<fix123>畜生の理を破りし破壊神！<fix123><fix123>埴安神 袿姫(はにやすしん　けいき)！<fix123>お前の天下はもう終わりだ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So there you are, eh?<fix123>The god of destruction who defies the law of beasts!<fix123><fix123>Keiki Haniyasushin!<fix123>Your reign ends here!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>孤立無援が誂えた造形神<fix123>埴安神　袿姫<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Sculptor God Crafted by Utter Isolation<fix123>Keiki Haniyasushin<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>破壊神だって？<fix123><fix123>酷いわねぇ<fix123>この食うか食われるかの畜生界で<fix123><fix123>私ほど物を生み出している者もいないわよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>God of destruction?<fix123><fix123>Talk about rude.<fix123>In this eat-or-be-eaten Animal Realm,<fix123><fix123>there's nobody else who's created as much as I have.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あのー、えっと<fix123><fix123>貴方は誰なんでしょう？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Uh, well,<fix123><fix123>who are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>へっ？<fix123><fix123>さっきは私を知っているような素振りを……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123><fix123>You were acting like you knew me a second ago...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>えーっと、それは私に憑いている<fix123><fix123>オオワシ霊が喋ってまして<fix123>私は冥界から動物霊の調査に<fix123><fix123>来ました魂魄妖夢です<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, uh... that was the eagle spirit<fix123><fix123>possessing me who was talking.<fix123>I am Youmu Konpaku.<fix123><fix123>I came from the Netherworld to investigate the animal spirits.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方は黙ってて！<fix123>今は目の前の邪神を倒す<fix123><fix123>チャンスなんだぞ<fix123>今だけは、このオオワシ様が<fix123><fix123>魂魄妖夢になる！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Silence, you!<fix123>This is my chance to defeat the<fix123><fix123>wicked god standing before us.<fix123>For just this moment, I, the mighty eagle,<fix123><fix123>shall be Youmu Konpaku!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（ええー<fix123>そんなー）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Wha⁠—<fix123>b-but...)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なる程……取り憑いて<fix123><fix123>人間をここまで連れてきたのか<fix123>でも、何も知らない愚かな<fix123><fix123>人間を騙して連れてきて<fix123>一体、何になると思っているの？<fix123><fix123>オオワシ霊さん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see... you possessed a human<fix123><fix123>and brought them all the way here.<fix123>But what exactly do you<fix123><fix123>hope to accomplish...<fix123>By tricking and dragging along some foolish human who<fix123><fix123>doesn't know anything? Care to answer, eagle spirit?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前は、剛欲(ごうよく)同盟だっけ？<fix123>プライドだけ高くて<fix123><fix123>実力は他に劣る事で有名な……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're from the Gouyoku Alliance, right?<fix123>Famous for being ridiculously prideful, but<fix123><fix123>lacking in capabilities in every other area...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふん、しかしお前を倒せば<fix123><fix123>畜生界一の座を奪えるさ<fix123>生身の人間が苦手だって聞いたぞ！<fix123><fix123>さあ、勝負しろ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmph. But if I defeat you,<fix123><fix123>I can steal the Animal Realm's top seat!<fix123>I heard that you're weak against living humans, too!<fix123><fix123>Now, have at thee!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふっふっふ<fix123>冥界の住人よ<fix123><fix123>動物霊に騙されるな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh heh heh.<fix123>Resident of the Netherworld.<fix123>Don't let this beast spirit deceive you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>えっ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は畜生どもから<fix123><fix123>人間霊を守る造形神(イドラデウス)よ<fix123>動物霊達は霊長園を奪う為に<fix123><fix123>お前を騙している<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I am the sculptor god(Idola Deus) who protects the<fix123>human spirits from those foul beasts.<fix123>The animal spirits tricked you in order to<fix123>take away the Primate Spirit Garden!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？<fix123><fix123>何だって？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123><fix123>What?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>騙されるでないぞ、冥界の剣士よ<fix123>こいつは人間の味方なんかじゃない<fix123>自分を喚び出した人間霊を<fix123><fix123>破滅に追い込んだ邪神だぞ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Don't be fooled, swordsman of the Netherworld.<fix123>She's no ally of humans at all.<fix123>She's a wicked god who drove the human spirits<fix123>who summoned her to their destruction!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>や、やっぱりそうよねぇ<fix123>ここまで来たら動物霊を<fix123><fix123>信じないとおかしくなっちゃう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Y-Yeah, I thought so.<fix123>I'd be crazy if I start doubting<fix123><fix123>the animal spirit after having come this far.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>やれやれ、そのオオワシの<fix123><fix123>言う事なんて信じられるのかい？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My my, I wonder if the eagle's words<fix123><fix123>can really be trusted?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>た、たしかに……<fix123><fix123>オオワシ霊！　もう騙されないぞ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>W-Well, I dunno...<fix123><fix123>Eagle spirit! Tell me the truth! I won't be fooled any longer!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふざけるな！<fix123><fix123>私が嘘を吐いていると抜かすか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Don't mess with me!<fix123><fix123>How dare you say I'm lying?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>色々と騙されてここまで<fix123><fix123>来た気がするけど……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I feel like I came here 'cause<fix123><fix123>you lied to me about all kinds of stuff though......<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふふふ、優柔不断なのは損よねぇ<fix123><fix123>一生後悔するわ……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hehehe, being indecisive will be your downfall.<fix123><fix123>You'll regret this for the rest of your life...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（し、しまった！<fix123><fix123>これは時間稼ぎだ、人間！）<fix123>（こいつの造形術が来る！<fix123><fix123>動物霊達(われわれ)は、皆これにやられたんだ！）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(O-Oh no!<fix123><fix123>We let her stall for too long, human!)<fix123>(She's about to unleash her sculpting arts!<fix123><fix123>Every last one of us beast spirits was defeated by them!)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 偶像に世界を委ねて　～ Idoratrize World<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Entrusting this World to Idols ~ Idolatrize World<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>一旦退却だ！<fix123><fix123>逃げろ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We must retreat for now!<fix123><fix123>RUN!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>冥界から人間を連れてきておいて<fix123><fix123>敵前逃亡とは……！<fix123>失望したぞ<fix123><fix123>畜生は所詮、畜生だな<fix123>肉のお前を滅して<fix123><fix123>土と水で美しく造り直してやる！<fix123>半分幽霊、半分埴輪なんて<fix123><fix123>孤高の偶像(アイドル)になるぞ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...You brought a human all the way from the Netherworld<fix123><fix123>to flee right before your foe!<fix123>I'm disappointed, you know.<fix123><fix123>I guess beasts will be beasts after all.<fix123>I'll destroy your flesh,<fix123><fix123>and build it anew from soil and water!<fix123>Half-phantom, half-haniwa,<fix123><fix123>you'll be an idol that truly stands apart!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Keiki Haniyasushin PAUSES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>人間よ、よく耐えた！<fix123><fix123>まもなく応援が来るぞ！<fix123>もうこっちが強者だ！<fix123><fix123>孤独な邪神にトドメを刺せ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You've done well to survive this long, human!<fix123><fix123>Our reinforcements will arrive in seconds!<fix123>We are the strong ones now!<fix123><fix123>Land the finishing blow on this lonesome, wicked god!<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>ぐぐぐ……強い<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Gugugu... So strong...<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>I really don't have time to be<fix123><fix123>messing around here...<fix123>Well, I'll be going now. Bye.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>She knocked over all the children's artwork, too...<fix123>...Guess I'll just have to say a storm passed by.<fix123>Well, these things happen.<fix123><fix123>We'll just have a speed-stacking contest today instead.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>But it looks like you're still alive, huh?<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Are you... that ushi-oni?<fix123>Perfect timing.<fix123><fix123>I'm a servant of the Netherworld.<fix123>But I've gotten kind of lost...<fix123><fix123>Can you remind me which way Higan is?<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, right. You're the Netherworld's carefree gardener...<fix123>...not. You're an imposter, ain'tcha?<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>A servant of the Netherworld would<fix123><fix123>never get lost in the Sanzu River!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Urumi Ushizaki DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ぐぐぐ……強い<fix123><fix123>偽者のくせに<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Grgh... for a lousy impostor,<fix123><fix123>you sure are strong.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いやその、本物なんですけど<fix123><fix123>道に迷っちゃって……<fix123>いつもは死神に先導して貰うから<fix123><fix123>良いんですけど<fix123>今日は急ぎで……<fix123><fix123>ちょっと先走っちゃって<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, uh, I'm real.<fix123><fix123>I really did just get lost...<fix123>I usually have the shinigami<fix123><fix123>lead the way, but...<fix123>I'm in a hurry today,<fix123><fix123>so I kinda jumped the gun.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、そうだった<fix123><fix123>思い出したよ<fix123>冥界の庭師は、暢気で抜(・)け(・)て(・)いるって<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh. Right. Now I remember.<fix123>The Netherworld's gardener has a carefree<fix123><fix123>attitude... and a totally empty head.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Just as I'd expect from someone<fix123><fix123>trying to get to Hell.<fix123>You're quite skilled indeed.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, you're Lady Niwatari.<fix123>I'm a servant of the Netherworld.<fix123>And, see, I kind of<fix123><fix123>have to go to Hell...<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>So you're already familiar with me.<fix123><fix123>Let's get straight to the point, then.<fix123>I shall hereby test whether you are<fix123><fix123>capable of surviving Hell.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>やっぱり戦う事になるんですよね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh. Yeah, I... guess we have to fight, huh.<fix123><fix123>
