en_dialogue: <fix123>If your sights are set on Hell,<fix123><fix123>then give me everything you've got!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kutaka Niwatari DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>お、お見事です<fix123>貴方なら地獄に行っても<fix123><fix123>瞬殺されることはないでしょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>W-Well done.<fix123>I suppose you'll do fine in Hell.<fix123><fix123>You won't be killed instantly, at least.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>良かったです<fix123><fix123>でもこれから地獄かー……<fix123>出来れば行きたくなかったん<fix123><fix123>ですがね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's good.<fix123><fix123>...I guess Hell is up next, though...<fix123>Honestly, I'd rather not<fix123><fix123>have to go there at all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>随分と弱気ですね<fix123><fix123>でもそれは危険かも知れないです<fix123>地獄の霊達は、心の隙間を<fix123><fix123>狙ってきます<fix123>不安があるとそこに付け込む<fix123><fix123>霊が現れるかも知れません<fix123>すでに貴方にも取り込んでいる<fix123><fix123>霊がいる様ですが……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Your will is quite weak...<fix123><fix123>But that may prove dangerous.<fix123>The spirits of Hell will try to crawl into<fix123><fix123>your heart wherever there's an opening.<fix123>If you're anxious, there's sure to be a spirit<fix123><fix123>that'll take advantage of that weakness.<fix123>Although it seems that one such spirit<fix123><fix123>is already present inside you...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>万苦の業風<fix123> Darkside of Paradise<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Karmic Wind of Myriad Sufferings ~ Darkside of Paradise<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地獄 (詳細位置の特定不能)<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hell (Specific Location Unknown)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: アンロケイテッドヘル<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Unlocated Hell<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yachie Kicchou ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>生身の人間ですね<fix123>地獄は絶望的に広いですよ<fix123>私が案内しましょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, a human of flesh and blood.<fix123>Hell is hopelessly large, you know?<fix123>Allow me to guide you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yachie Kicchou EXITS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Yachie Kicchou ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>よく付いて来られたね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You've done well to follow me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はあはあ<fix123>やっぱり本物の業風は息が詰まるわ<fix123>まさに地獄<fix123>ところで貴方は誰？<fix123>地獄の鬼では無さそうねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huff, huff...<fix123>Real karmic winds really feel suffocating huh.<fix123><fix123>That's Hell for you.<fix123>By the way, who are you?<fix123>You don't seem to be one of Hell's oni.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: トータスドラゴン　～　幸運と不運<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Tortoise Dragon ~ Good Fortune and Bad Fortune<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>鬼傑組 組長<fix123>吉弔 八千慧<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Matriarch of the Kiketsu Family<fix123>Yachie Kicchou<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は鬼傑組(きけつぐみ)の組長<fix123><fix123>吉弔(きっちょう)八千慧(やちえ)である<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I am the leader of the Kiketsu family,<fix123>Yachie Kicchou.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>鬼傑組というのは……<fix123><fix123>あの精鋭部隊の揃った鬼傑組ですね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Kiketsu family......<fix123><fix123>Ah, the one that formed the elite unit!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（えっ？　鬼傑組なんて聞いたことが<fix123><fix123>無いけど、私、何を言っているの？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Huh? I've never heard of the Kiketsu family,<fix123><fix123>so what am I saying?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>やめなさい<fix123><fix123>それ以上お前が出しゃばるとボロが出る<fix123>まずは名を名乗りなさい<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Stop.<fix123><fix123>Run your mouth any more and we will be exposed.<fix123>So first, give me your name.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>失礼しました<fix123><fix123>私は魂魄妖夢です<fix123>地上侵略している動物霊の調査で<fix123><fix123>冥界の白玉楼から来ました<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Pardon my manners.<fix123><fix123>I am Youmu Konpaku.<fix123>I came from Hakugyokurou in the Netherworld<fix123><fix123>in order to investigate the animal spirits invading the surface.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方の敵となる動物霊は<fix123><fix123>地獄(ここ)にはいません<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The beast spirit you see as your enemy,<fix123>is not here in Hell.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？<fix123>そう、なんですか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123>Is... that the case?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私が本当の敵の居場所を教えましょう<fix123><fix123>付いて来なさい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Allow me to tell you where your true enemy is!<fix123><fix123>Follow me!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yachie Kicchou DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>素晴らしい腕前です<fix123><fix123>貴方のような人間なら大丈夫でしょう<fix123>では、倒すべき敵の下へ<fix123>貴方を案内します<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What wonderful skill.<fix123><fix123>With a human like you, everything should go just fine.<fix123>Now then, allow me to guide<fix123><fix123>you to the enemy.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>有難うございます<fix123><fix123>そのお言葉をお待ちしておりました<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Why, thank you.<fix123>I've been waiting so long to hear such kind words.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（えっ！？）<fix123>（何で私が初対面の相手に<fix123><fix123>こんなにへりくだっているのかしら）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Huh!?)<fix123>(I wonder why I'm being so humble<fix123><fix123>to a person I haven't met before?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私が敵がいる場所を教えます<fix123>貴方の役目はそれを倒す事だけ<fix123><fix123>ですからね……<fix123>動物霊は地獄のお隣にある<fix123><fix123>畜生(ちくしょう)界にいます<fix123>その畜生界の中心に<fix123><fix123>一際目立つ建造物があって<fix123>そこが敵の本拠地なのです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm going to tell you where the enemy is.<fix123>Your role is simply to defeat said enemy.<fix123>Nothing more...<fix123>The beast spirits are in the Animal Realm,<fix123><fix123>located next door to Hell.<fix123>There's a particularly prominent structure<fix123><fix123>located in the center of the Animal Realm...<fix123>That's the enemy's main base.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>りょ、了解しました<fix123>必ずや、倒して見せます<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>U-Understood.<fix123>By all means, I'll be sure to defeat them.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>カワウソに選ばれし伏兵よ！<fix123><fix123>鬼傑組の鉄の掟を思い出せ！<fix123>搦手(からめて)こそが最短最良だ！<fix123><fix123>呪い極めた鬼形(きぎょう)の敵を滅せよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh sneak attacker, chosen by the otters!<fix123><fix123>Remember the iron-clad law of the Kiketsu family!<fix123>There is no route swifter or more effective than the rear!<fix123><fix123>Destroy that demon-shaped enemy, cursed in extremity!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>畜生メトロポリス<fix123> Beastly Dystopia<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Tiragyoni Metropolis ~ Beastly Dystopia<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>畜生界<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Animal Realm<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ビーストメトロポリス<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Beast Metropolis<fix123><fix123><fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mayumi Joutougu ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Mayumi Joutougu EXITS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>畜生界は都会だって<fix123><fix123>聞いてたけど<fix123>想像以上だったわ<fix123>目の前に見える鍵穴みたいなのが<fix123><fix123>目的地なのかなぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've heard that the<fix123><fix123>Animal Realm is a city,<fix123>but this is way more than what I had in mind.<fix123>I wonder if that keyhole-shaped thing<fix123><fix123>in front of me is my destination.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mayumi Joutougu ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>人間？<fix123>さっさと霊長園に戻らないと<fix123><fix123>飢えた畜生達に捕らわれるよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A human?<fix123>You'd better get back to the Primate Spirit Garden post-haste,<fix123><fix123>or else you'll be captured by starving beasts.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>霊長園？<fix123>そこの池に囲まれた森かしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Primate Spirit Garden?<fix123>Is that the forest surrounded by the lake there?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>霊長園を知らないだって？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You don't know about the Primate Spirit Garden?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>埴輪兵長<fix123>杖刀偶　磨弓<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Haniwa Lance Corporal<fix123>Mayumi Joutougu<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>と言うかお前……<fix123>畜生界の人間霊じゃないな！<fix123><fix123>何者だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Actually, speaking of which...<fix123>You're not a human spirit from the Animal Realm!<fix123><fix123>Who are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は冥界の住人よ<fix123>動物霊達を退治しに<fix123><fix123>地上からやってきたの……<fix123>……<fix123>（えっ、身体が動かないわ！？<fix123><fix123>……まさかカワウソ霊の仕業！？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm a resident of the Netherworld,<fix123>I came here from the surface to exterminate<fix123><fix123>the animal spirits, and......<fix123>......<fix123>(Huh? My body isn't moving!?<fix123><fix123>......Is this the otter spirit's doing!?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: セラミックスの杖刀人<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Joutounin of Ceramics<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふっふっふ<fix123>私は、お前達を破壊する為だけに<fix123><fix123>生身の人間を連れてきた！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh heh heh!<fix123>I brought a live human down here<fix123>just to destroy the lot of you!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴様から感じる霊気……<fix123><fix123>まさか、カワウソ霊なのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This aura I'm sensing from you......<fix123><fix123>Could you be an otter spirit?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうだ、我ら鬼傑組の<fix123><fix123>必殺搦手の作戦を喰らえ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's right! Now, face the elite<fix123><fix123>underhanded tactics of the Kiketsu Family!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうか、鬼傑組の吉弔の手先なのね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, I see. You're an agent of Kicchou, from the Kiketsu Family.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前達、呪われし偶像どもから<fix123><fix123>人間霊(どうぐ)を解放する！<fix123>覚悟しろ！<fix123><fix123>弱肉強食こそ、畜生界の理(ことわり)だ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We shall liberate the human spirits(tools)<fix123><fix123>from you accursed idols!<fix123>Prepare yourself!<fix123>It is the law of the Animal Realm that the strong eat the weak!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mayumi Joutougu DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>つ、強い！<fix123><fix123>畜生界の人間霊とは訳が違う……！<fix123>なんと恐ろしい策……！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>S-So strong! Completely different from a<fix123>human spirit of the Animal Realm...! <fix123>What a fearsome strategy...!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（よし！<fix123><fix123>これならば勝てる！）<fix123>（ありがとう！<fix123><fix123>冥界の剣士よ！）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Yes!<fix123>I'll be sure to win at this rate!)<fix123>(You have my thanks,<fix123>swordswoman of the Netherworld!)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……<fix123>不覚、まさかこの私が<fix123><fix123>カワウソ霊に乗っ取られるとは……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...<fix123>How careless of me. To think that I would be<fix123><fix123>taken over by the otter spirit......<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（私だ、カワウソ霊だ<fix123><fix123>改めて礼を言う、ありがとう）<fix123>（貴方のお陰で偶像を<fix123><fix123>破壊できそうだ）<fix123>（でも、あと少しだけ<fix123><fix123>協力して欲しい）<fix123>（偶像を破壊すれば<fix123><fix123>畜生界は動物霊の支配に戻る）<fix123>（そうすれば、地上への<fix123><fix123>動物霊の侵攻も止まるだろう）<fix123>（貴方と目的は一致している筈だ<fix123><fix123>協力して打ち勝とう！）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(It's me, the otter spirit.<fix123>Once again, thank you.)<fix123>(With your help, we'll be able<fix123>to destroy those idols!)<fix123>(But I need your cooperation<fix123>for just a little longer.)<fix123>(Once the idols are destroyed, we beast spirits<fix123>will take back control of the Animal Realm.)<fix123>(If we do that, the beast spirits' invasion of<fix123>the surface will be sure to cease as well.)<fix123>(That means we have the same goal, right?<fix123>Let's join forces and take them down!)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>これは埴輪兵士が作られてから<fix123><fix123>初めての緊急事態だわ！<fix123>早くみんなに知らせないと！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This is the first emergency situation we've had<fix123><fix123>since the Haniwa Soldiers were created!<fix123>I have to go alert everyone quick!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>話は判ったわ<fix123>私もさっきの奴が悪いと思う<fix123><fix123>何でか判らないけど<fix123>さあ、悪を斬りに行くよ<fix123><fix123>霊長園とやらに！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Got it.<fix123>I also think the lady back there was the bad guy,<fix123><fix123>although I'm not sure why I think so.<fix123>Now, let's go cut up this evil!<fix123><fix123>To the Spirit Garden or whatever!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>イドラデウス<fix123> Idola-Deus<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Deus ex Idola ~ Idola-Deus<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>霊長園 墳墓内部<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Primate Spirit Garden - Tumulus Base Interior<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: エレクトリックヘリテージ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Electric Heritage<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mayumi Joutougu ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>生身の人間がこんなに<fix123><fix123>強い生き物だなんて！<fix123>夢のような現実だわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>To think that living humans<fix123>were such strong creatures!<fix123>Everything feels like a dream!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mayumi Joutougu DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>見たことも無い世界だわ<fix123>あの外見からは想像も付かない内部ね<fix123>ここの何処かに敵がいるのよね？<fix123><fix123>カワウソ霊さん？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's a world I've never seen before.<fix123>You wouldn't think it'd look like this from the outside.<fix123>So our enemy's somewhere in here,<fix123>right, otter spirit?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（……）<fix123>（霊長園と言えば<fix123><fix123>畜生界一美しい庭園だったのに……）<fix123>（噂には聞いていたが酷い有様だ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(...)<fix123>(This was always the most beautiful<fix123>garden in the entire Animal Realm...)<fix123>(I'd heard the rumors, sure,<fix123>but this really is atrocious.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Keiki Haniyasushin ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>来客とは珍しい<fix123>もう私達に敵う者などいないと<fix123><fix123>悲しんでいたのに……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A guest? How rare.<fix123>And here, I had almost shed a tear at the fact<fix123><fix123>that nobody was left to fight against us...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ついに見つけたぞ！<fix123>畜生の理を破りし破壊神！<fix123><fix123>埴安神 袿姫(はにやすしん　けいき)！<fix123>お前の野望も潰えるときがきたぞ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've finally found you!<fix123>God of destruction that defies the law of beasts!<fix123><fix123>Keiki Haniyasushin!<fix123>The time where your ambitions crumble has come!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>孤立無援が誂えた造形神<fix123>埴安神　袿姫<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Sculptor God Crafted by Utter Isolation<fix123>Keiki Haniyasushin<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>良いわねぇ<fix123><fix123>やっぱり動物は活きが良くないとね<fix123>お前から鬼傑組特有の<fix123><fix123>生臭い匂いがするわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, that's good to hear. Animals ought<fix123>to be nice and lively, after all!<fix123>I can smell that particular fishy scent<fix123>of the Kiketsu family coming off of you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>でも、見た目は人間みたいだけど……<fix123><fix123>一体、どういう卑怯な策を持ってきたのかしら<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But you look like a human, though...<fix123><fix123>Just what kind of cowardly scheme did you come up with?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>見た目は人間だけど<fix123><fix123>半分は幽霊です<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I might look like a human,<fix123><fix123>but half of me's a phantom.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なる程ね、人間に取り憑いて<fix123><fix123>騙して連れてきたのね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see. You possessed a human,<fix123><fix123>and tricked them into coming here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いやその、私は冥界の住人で<fix123><fix123>元々半分幽霊なのですが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Umm, I'm a resident of the Netherworld,<fix123><fix123>so I've always been half-phantom.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>鬼傑組の……お前はカワウソ霊かな？<fix123><fix123>人間を連れてきたからといって、それが何？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Kiketsu family's... otter spirit, I believe?<fix123><fix123>You say you brought a human here. What about it?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（……生身の人間を恐れない！？）<fix123>（吉弔様ー！<fix123><fix123>話が違うじゃないのー！）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(...She's not afraid of a live human?!)<fix123>(Lady Kichoooou!<fix123>This isn't what you said would happen!)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふっふっふ<fix123>冥界の住人よ<fix123><fix123>動物霊に騙されるな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh heh heh.<fix123>Resident of the Netherworld.<fix123>Don't let this beast spirit deceive you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>えっ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は畜生どもから<fix123><fix123>人間霊を守る造形神(イドラデウス)よ<fix123>動物霊達は霊長園を奪う為に<fix123><fix123>お前を騙している<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I am the sculptor god(Idola Deus) who protects the<fix123>human spirits from those foul beasts.<fix123>The animal spirits tricked you in order to<fix123>take away the Primate Spirit Garden!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？<fix123><fix123>何だって？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123><fix123>What?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>騙されるな、冥界の剣士よ<fix123>こいつは人間霊から信仰を<fix123><fix123>吸い上げるだけの邪神だ！<fix123>こいつは動物の敵であり、人間の敵だ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Don't be fooled, swordswoman of the Netherworld!<fix123>She's a wicked god who only sucks up<fix123>faith from the human spirits!<fix123>She's an enemy of beasts and humans both!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>や、やっぱりそうよねぇ<fix123>ここまで来たら動物霊を<fix123><fix123>信じないとおかしくなっちゃう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Y-Yeah, I thought so.<fix123>I'd be crazy if I start doubting<fix123>the animal spirit after having come this far.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>カワウソが本当のことを<fix123><fix123>言っていると思う？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Do you truly think the<fix123><fix123>otter is telling the truth?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そ、そりゃそうね<fix123><fix123>カワウソ霊！　もう騙されないぞ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>W-Well, I dunno...<fix123><fix123>Otter spirit! Tell me the truth! I won't be fooled any longer!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんて優柔不断な奴だ……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What a wishy-washy fellow......<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほんと、優柔不断なのは損よねぇ<fix123><fix123>一生後悔するわ……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Truly, I hate indecisiveness.<fix123><fix123>You'll regret this for the rest of your life...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（し、しまった！<fix123><fix123>この会話は罠だ、人間！）<fix123>（こいつの造形術が来る！<fix123><fix123>動物霊達(われわれ)は、皆これにやられたんだ！）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(O-Oh no!<fix123>This conversation was a trap, human!)<fix123>(She's about to unleash her sculpting arts!<fix123><fix123>Every last one of us beast spirits was defeated by them!)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 偶像に世界を委ねて　～ Idoratrize World<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Entrusting this World to Idols ~ Idolatrize World<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>一旦退却だ！<fix123><fix123>逃げろ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We must retreat for now!<fix123>RUN!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>冥界から人間を連れてきておいて<fix123><fix123>敵前逃亡とは……！<fix123>失望したぞ<fix123><fix123>畜生は所詮、畜生だな<fix123>肉のお前を滅して<fix123><fix123>土と水で美しく造り直してやる！<fix123>半分幽霊、半分埴輪なんて<fix123><fix123>孤高の偶像(アイドル)になるぞ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...You brought a human all the way from the Netherworld<fix123><fix123>to flee right before your foe!<fix123>I'm disappointed, you know.<fix123><fix123>I guess beasts will be beasts after all.<fix123>I'll destroy your flesh,<fix123><fix123>and build it anew from soil and water!<fix123>Half-phantom, half-haniwa,<fix123><fix123>you'll be an idol that truly stands apart!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Keiki Haniyasushin PAUSES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>人間よ、よく耐えた！<fix123><fix123>まもなく応援が来るぞ！<fix123>もうこっちが強者だ！<fix123><fix123>孤独な邪神にトドメを刺せ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You've done well to survive this long, human!<fix123>Our reinforcements will arrive in seconds!<fix123>We are the strong ones now!<fix123>Land the finishing blow on this lonesome, wicked god!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Keiki Haniyasushin DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>千万無量の無念<fix123> Infinity Make-work<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Innumerable Regrets ~ Infinity Make-work<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>賽の河原<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sai no Kawara<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM:地蔵だけが知る哀嘆<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Lamentations Known Only by Jizo<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eika Ebisu ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Eika Ebisu LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>報告通りだわ<fix123>次々と動物霊達が三途の河を<fix123><fix123>渡ってきている……！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's just like I heard.<fix123>There are countless beast spirits<fix123><fix123>crossing the Sanzu River...!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そこのお前！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, you there!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eika Ebisu ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>河原のアイドル水子<fix123>戎 瓔花<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Stillborn Idol of the Riverbed<fix123>Eika Ebisu<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>こんなところで暴れるから<fix123><fix123>積み石がみんな崩れちゃったよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>All the stones we were stacking fell over<fix123><fix123>because you were thrashing around!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>積み石？　全部崩したわ<fix123><fix123>何か貰えるの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The stones? Yeah, I knocked them all down.<fix123><fix123>Do I get a prize?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>酷い、酷いわー<fix123><fix123>積み石は子供達の大切な作品なのにー！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>H-How awful! Every pile here was a priceless<fix123><fix123>masterpiece made by the children!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ジェリーストーン<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Jelly Stone<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私が仇を取ってやる！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'll avenge them!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eika Ebisu DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ぐぐぐ……強い<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Gugugu... So strong...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おっと、お前の座っている積み石を<fix123><fix123>残していたわ<fix123>それを崩したらパーフェクト！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, whoops. I forgot about the pile<fix123><fix123>that you're sitting on top of.<fix123>Once I knock it over, I'll have a perfect score!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>鬼すぎる<fix123>お前なんて地獄に落ちてしまえー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're worse than an oni...<fix123>Go fall into Hell, why don't you!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>御影石の赤子<fix123> Cross the Styx<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A Baby Carved from Granite ~ Cross the Styx<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>三途の河<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sanzu River<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ロストリバー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Lost River<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Urumi Ushizaki ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Urumi Ushizaki LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>死神の舟を使わなかったのは<fix123><fix123>失敗だったかもしれないなぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ignoring the shinigami's ferry<fix123><fix123>might've been a mistake on my part...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はぐれた幽霊かと<fix123><fix123>思ったら……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I thought you were a lost phantom...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Urumi Ushizaki ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>古代魚の子連れ番人<fix123>牛崎 潤美<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Parental Guardian of Ancient Fish<fix123>Urumi Ushizaki<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>生きているじゃないか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But it looks like you're still alive, huh?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方は……もしや牛鬼？<fix123>人間を襲うのを禁止されてから<fix123>三途の河で漁業を<fix123><fix123>営んでいると聞いたけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are you... that ushi-oni?<fix123>I heard that ever since you got banned from attacking humans,<fix123>You started a fish farming<fix123><fix123>business at the Sanzu River.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうさ、河は静かなもんさ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yep. The river's a peaceful place.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 石の赤子と水中の牛<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Stone Baby and the Submerged Bovine<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前みたいな襲撃しても怒られない<fix123><fix123>人間が来ない限りはね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But now that you've come along, it's a different story!<fix123><fix123>Nobody would blame me for attackin' a human like you!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Urumi Ushizaki DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ぐぐぐ……思い出した<fix123>お前さん<fix123><fix123>冥界のいつも暢気な庭師じゃ……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Grgh... Now I remember.<fix123>You're that carefree<fix123><fix123>gardener from the Netherworld...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今はちょっと気が立っていてねぇ<fix123>地獄に行く前の良い<fix123><fix123>準備運動になったわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Right now, though, I happen to be feeling a little testy.<fix123>Well, this was a pretty good warm-up<fix123><fix123>before heading for Hell.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほう、地獄に行くのか……<fix123>何が起こっているのか<fix123><fix123>教えてくれないかねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, so you're going to Hell...?<fix123>Would you mind telling me what's<fix123><fix123>goin' on down there, by any chance?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>鬼渡の関所<fix123> Lonely Amaryllis<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Checkpoint of Oniwatari ~ Lonely Amaryllis<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>彼岸<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Higan<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 不朽の曼珠沙華<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Everlasting Red Spider Lily<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kutaka Niwatari ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>閻魔(えんま)様から話は聞いています<fix123>容赦無く、貴方を試しなさいってね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've heard about you from the Yama.<fix123>She told me to test you with no mercy!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kutaka Niwatari EXITS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Kutaka Niwatari ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>地獄へ行こうとしている<fix123><fix123>だけありますね<fix123>中々の腕前でございます<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Just as I'd expect from someone<fix123><fix123>trying to get to Hell.<fix123>You're quite skilled indeed.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ、ニワタリ様ですね<fix123>私は冥界の使いです<fix123>地獄へ行くつもりなので<fix123><fix123>門を開けて下さい<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, you're Lady Niwatari.<fix123>I work in the Netherworld.<fix123>I need access to Hell,<fix123><fix123>so please open the gate.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地獄関所の番頭神<fix123>庭渡 久侘歌<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Clerical God of Hell's Checkpoint<fix123>Kutaka Niwatari<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私を知っているのですね<fix123><fix123>ならば話は早いです<fix123>地獄に耐えられるのかどうかの<fix123><fix123>試験はこれからです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So you're already familiar with me.<fix123><fix123>Let's get straight to the point, then.<fix123>I shall hereby test whether you are<fix123><fix123>capable of surviving Hell.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>望むところです<fix123><fix123>刀の錆びにしてやりましょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Very well.<fix123><fix123>My sword shall taste your blood!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: セラフィックチキン<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Seraphic Chicken<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>口先だけの輩なら<fix123><fix123>地獄では通用しませんよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Mere talk won't get you<fix123><fix123>anywhere in Hell!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kutaka Niwatari DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>お、お見事です<fix123>貴方なら地獄に行っても<fix123><fix123>瞬殺されることはないでしょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>W-Well done.<fix123>I suppose you'll do fine in Hell.<fix123><fix123>You won't be killed instantly, at least.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>大丈夫に決まってます<fix123><fix123>瞬殺される前に斬殺してみせるわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Of course I'll be fine. I'll slice them to<fix123><fix123>pieces before they even get the chance!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>随分な自信ですね<fix123>でもこれだけは忘れないで下さい<fix123>地獄の霊達は、心の隙間を<fix123><fix123>狙ってきます<fix123>力を過信するとそこに付け込む<fix123><fix123>霊が現れるかも知れません<fix123>冥府の使いである貴方に言う事では<fix123><fix123>無いかも知れませんが……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How very confident.<fix123>Remember this one warning, however:<fix123>The spirits of Hell will try to crawl into<fix123><fix123>your heart wherever there's an opening.<fix123>If you overestimate your power, there's sure to be<fix123><fix123>a spirit that'll take advantage of that weakness.<fix123>As a servant of the Netherworld, I'm sure<fix123><fix123>you know this already, but just in case...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>万苦の業風<fix123> Darkside of Paradise<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Karmic Wind of Myriad Sufferings ~ Darkside of Paradise<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地獄 (詳細位置の特定不能)<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hell (Specific Location Unknown)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: アンロケイテッドヘル<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Unlocated Hell<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yachie Kicchou ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>生身の人間ですね<fix123>地獄は絶望的に広いですよ<fix123>私が案内しましょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, a human of flesh and blood.<fix123>Hell is hopelessly large, you know?<fix123>Allow me to guide you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yachie Kicchou EXITS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Yachie Kicchou ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>よく付いて来られたね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You've done well to follow me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はあはあ<fix123>やっぱり本物の業風は息が詰まるわ<fix123>まさに地獄<fix123>ところで貴方は誰？<fix123>地獄の鬼では無さそうねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huff, huff...<fix123>Real karmic winds really feel suffocating huh.<fix123><fix123>That's Hell for you.<fix123>By the way, who are you?<fix123>You don't seem to be one of Hell's oni.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: トータスドラゴン　～　幸運と不運<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Tortoise Dragon ~ Good Fortune and Bad Fortune<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>鬼傑組 組長<fix123>吉弔 八千慧<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Matriarch of the Kiketsu Family<fix123>Yachie Kicchou<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は鬼傑組(きけつぐみ)の組長<fix123>吉弔(きっちょう) 八千慧(やちえ)である<fix123>お前こそ、名を名乗れ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I am the leader of the Kiketsu family, <fix123>Yachie Kicchou.<fix123>Right back at you: identify yourself.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>失礼しました<fix123><fix123>私は魂魄妖夢です<fix123>地上侵略している動物霊の調査で<fix123><fix123>冥界の白玉楼から来ました<fix123>鬼傑組というのは……<fix123>失礼ですが聞いたことが無いのですが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Pardon my manners.<fix123>I am Youmu Konpaku.<fix123>I came from Hakugyokurou in the Netherworld<fix123><fix123>in order to investigate the animal spirits invading the surface.<fix123>The Kiketsu family......<fix123>I'm sorry, but I don't seem to have heard of it.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いえそんな筈がありません<fix123>貴方は知っている筈です<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, that can't be right.<fix123>You must know of us.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え、あれ？<fix123>そういえば聞いたことある気がしてきた……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmm, oh?<fix123>Now that you mention it I think I have......<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それに、貴方が探している動物霊が<fix123><fix123>地獄(ここ)にはいないことも知っている筈です<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>In addition, you must also know that the animal spirit you are<fix123><fix123>looking for is not here in Hell.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう、だったかも？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yeah, maybe?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私が本当の敵の居場所を教えましょう<fix123>付いて来なさい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Allow me to tell you where your true enemy is!<fix123>Follow me!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yachie Kicchou DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>素晴らしい腕前です<fix123>貴方のような人間なら大丈夫でしょう<fix123>では、倒すべき敵の下へ<fix123>貴方を案内します<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What wonderful skill.<fix123>With a human like you, everything should go just fine.<fix123>Now then, allow me to guide<fix123><fix123>you to the enemy.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ、有難うございます……<fix123>しかし、貴方は初めて会ったはずなのに<fix123>何故かそんな気がしないのですが……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>T-Thank you...<fix123>I wonder why... This should be our first meeting,<fix123>and yet I feel like that's not the case.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>きっとそうでしょうね<fix123>しかし、貴(・)方(・)は動物霊の侵略を止めに<fix123>来ただけの人間です<fix123>私が敵がいる場所を教えます<fix123>貴方の役目はその敵を倒す事だけ<fix123>ですからね……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm positive that that's the case.<fix123>However, you are just the human who came<fix123>to stop the animal spirits' invasion.<fix123>I'm going to tell you where the enemy is.<fix123>Your role is simply to defeat said enemy.<fix123>Nothing more...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私の、役目……<fix123>そうだった、敵を倒すことだったわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My... role...<fix123>Yes, that is to defeat the enemy!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>動物霊は地獄のお隣にある<fix123>畜生(ちくしょう)界にいます<fix123>その畜生界の中心に<fix123>一際目立つ建造物があって<fix123>そこが敵の本拠地なのです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The animal spirits are in the Animal Realm,<fix123>located next door to Hell.<fix123>There's a particularly prominent structure<fix123>located in the center of the Animal Realm...<fix123>That's the enemy's main base.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>敵は畜生界……<fix123>畜生界に行くのは初めてだけど<fix123>何だかワクワクしてきたわ<fix123>何でも叩き斬ってやる！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The enemy's in the Animal Realm......<fix123>It's my first time going there,<fix123>but I'm kinda excited!<fix123>I'll cut apart everything that stands in my way!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さすが心強いぞ！<fix123>オオカミに選ばれし勁牙(けいが)の戦士よ！<fix123>さあ行け！<fix123>呪い極めた鬼形(きぎょう)の敵を滅せよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Truly reassuring!<fix123>Oh warrior of Keiga, chosen by the wolves!<fix123>Go forth!<fix123>Destroy that demon-shaped enemy, cursed in extremity!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>畜生メトロポリス<fix123> Beastly Dystopia<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Tiragyoni Metropolis ~ Beastly Dystopia<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>畜生界<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Animal Realm<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ビーストメトロポリス<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Beast Metropolis<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mayumi Joutougu ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Mayumi Joutougu EXITS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>畜生界は都会だって<fix123>聞いてたけど<fix123>想像以上だったわ<fix123>目の前に見える鍵穴みたいなのが<fix123>目的地なのかなぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've heard that the<fix123><fix123>Animal Realm is a city,<fix123>but this is way more than what I had in mind.<fix123>I wonder if that keyhole-shaped thing<fix123><fix123>in front of me is my destination.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mayumi Joutougu ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>人間？<fix123>さっさと霊長園に戻らないと<fix123>飢えた畜生達に捕らわれるよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A human?<fix123>You'd better get back to the Primate Spirit Garden post-haste,<fix123><fix123>or else you'll be captured by starving beasts.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>霊長園？<fix123>そこの池に囲まれた森かしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Primate Spirit Garden?<fix123>Is that the forest surrounded by the lake there?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>霊長園を知らないだって？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You don't know about the Primate Spirit Garden?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>埴輪兵長<fix123>杖刀偶　磨弓<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Haniwa Lance Corporal<fix123>Mayumi Joutougu<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>と言うかお前……<fix123>畜生界の人間霊じゃないな！<fix123><fix123>何者だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Actually, speaking of which...<fix123>You're not a human spirit from the Animal Realm!<fix123>Who are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は冥界の住人よ<fix123>動物霊達を退治しに<fix123><fix123>やってきたの……<fix123>……<fix123>（えっ、身体が動かないわ！？<fix123>……まさかオオカミ霊の仕業！？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm a resident of the Netherworld,<fix123>I came here to exterminate<fix123>the animal spirits, and......<fix123>......<fix123>(Huh? My body isn't moving!?<fix123>Is this the wolf spirit's doing!?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: セラミックスの杖刀人<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Joutounin of Ceramics<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふっふっふ<fix123>私は、お前達を破壊する為だけに<fix123><fix123>生身の人間を連れてきた！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh heh heh!<fix123>I brought a live human down here<fix123>just to destroy the lot of you!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴様から感じる霊気……<fix123>まさか、オオカミ霊なのか？<fix123>冥界の人間を操るなんて<fix123>オオカミにそんな頭脳があるとは……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That aura I feel from you...<fix123>Could you be a wolf spirit?<fix123>To think that a wolf would be smart enough<fix123>to rely on a living human...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この為だけにあのにっくき鬼傑組の<fix123>奴らと同盟を結んだのだ！<fix123>お前達、呪われし偶像どもから<fix123>人間霊(えさ)を解放する！<fix123>覚悟しろ！<fix123>弱肉強食こそ、畜生界の理(ことわり)だ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>For this sole reason, we formed an alliance<fix123>with that loathsome Kiketsu family!<fix123>I shall liberate the human spirits(our prey)<fix123>from you accursed idols!<fix123>Prepare yourself!<fix123>It is the law of the Animal Realm that the strong eat the weak!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mayumi Joutougu DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>つ、強い！<fix123><fix123>畜生界の人間霊とは訳が違う……！<fix123>なんと恐ろしい策……！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>S-So strong! Completely different from a<fix123>human spirit of the Animal Realm...! <fix123>What a fearsome strategy...!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（よし！<fix123>これならば勝てる！）<fix123>（ありがとう！<fix123>冥界の剣士よ！）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Yes!<fix123>I'll be sure to win at this rate!)<fix123>(You have my thanks,<fix123>swordswoman of the Netherworld!)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……<fix123>不覚、まさかこの私が<fix123>オオカミ霊に乗っ取られるとは……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>......<fix123>How careless of me. To think that I would be<fix123>taken over by the wolf spirit......<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（すまなかった<fix123>私だ、オオカミ霊だ）<fix123>（しかし貴方のお陰で<fix123>霊長園に入る事が出来る）<fix123>（あと少しだ……！）<fix123>（あと少しで畜生界は<fix123>動物霊の支配に戻る）<fix123>（そうすれば、地上への<fix123>動物霊の侵攻も止まるだろう）<fix123>（安心するがよい<fix123>貴方と目的は一致している）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Sorry about that.<fix123>It's me, the wolf spirit.)<fix123>(But thanks to you, we can gain entry<fix123>to the Primate Spirit Garden.)<fix123>(Just a little further...!)<fix123>(Just a little further, and we animal spirits<fix123>can take back control of the Animal Realm.)<fix123>(If we do that, the animal spirits' invasion of<fix123>the surface will be sure to cease as well.)<fix123>(Worry not.<fix123>Our objectives are the same.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>これは埴輪兵士が作られてから<fix123><fix123>初めての緊急事態だわ！<fix123>はやくみんなに知らせないと！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This is the first emergency situation we've had<fix123><fix123>since the Haniwa Soldiers were created!<fix123>I have to go alert everyone quick!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>話は判ったわ<fix123>さっきの奴のボスを倒せば<fix123>良いんだよね<fix123>刀が錆びる前に行こう<fix123>霊長園とやらに！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Got it.<fix123>All we have to do is<fix123>defeat the boss of the person back there, yeah?<fix123>Let's go before my blade rusts.<fix123>To the Spirit Garden or whatever!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>イドラデウス<fix123> Idola-Deus<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Deus ex Idola ~ Idola-Deus<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>霊長園 墳墓内部<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Primate Spirit Garden - Tumulus Base Interior<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: エレクトリックヘリテージ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Electric Heritage<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mayumi Joutougu ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>生身の人間がこんなに<fix123><fix123>強い生き物だなんて！<fix123>夢のような現実だわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>To think that living humans<fix123>were such strong creatures!<fix123>Everything feels like a dream!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mayumi Joutougu DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>見たことも無い世界だわ<fix123>あの外見からは想像も付かない内部ね<fix123>ここの何処かに敵がいるのよね？<fix123>オオカミ霊さん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's a world I've never seen before.<fix123>You wouldn't think it'd look like this from the outside.<fix123>So our enemy's somewhere in here,<fix123>right, wolf spirit?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（……）<fix123>（な、何だこれは！？）<fix123>（自然豊かだった霊長園が……<fix123>あいつ等、許さないぞ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(......)<fix123>(W-what is all this?!)<fix123>(The Garden was so full of nature, but now...<fix123>I'll never forgive those curs!)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Keiki Haniyasushin ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>来客とは珍しい<fix123>もう私達に敵う者などいないと<fix123><fix123>悲しんでいたのに……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A guest? How rare.<fix123>And here, I had almost shed a tear at the fact<fix123><fix123>that nobody was left to fight against us...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ついに見つけたぞ！<fix123>畜生の理を破りし破壊神！<fix123><fix123>埴安神 袿姫(はにやすしん　けいき)！<fix123>お前の偶像を破壊する為に<fix123>生身の人間を連れてきたぞ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've finally found you!<fix123>The god of destruction who defies the law of beasts!<fix123>Keiki Haniyasushin!<fix123>I brought a live human along<fix123>to destroy your idols!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>孤立無援が誂えた造形神<fix123>埴安神　袿姫<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Sculptor God Crafted by Utter Isolation<fix123>Keiki Haniyasushin<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>生身の人間だって！？<fix123>そんな馬鹿な話……<fix123>誰が信じるもんですか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A live human?!<fix123>That's ridiculous...<fix123>Who would believe that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>すみません<fix123>生身の人間です……<fix123>でも半分は幽霊なのですが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Excuse me,<fix123>but I'm the living human......<fix123>Well, half of me's a ghost though.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>冥界から、だって？<fix123>これはまた遠いところからわざわざ<fix123>何か秘策でもあるのかしら？<fix123>オオカミ霊さん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>From the Netherworld, you mean?<fix123>My, thank you so much for coming all the way.<fix123>So do you have some sort of trick up your sleeve?<fix123>Care to answer, wolf spirit?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方、噛みつくしか能の無い<fix123>勁牙組(けいがぐみ)のオオカミでしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're a wolf from the Keiga Family, right?<fix123>Useless for anything except biting?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……なぜ判った<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...How'd you know?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふっふっふ<fix123>冥界の住人よ<fix123><fix123>動物霊に騙されるな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh heh heh.<fix123>Resident of the Netherworld.<fix123>Don't let this beast spirit deceive you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>えっ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は畜生どもから<fix123><fix123>人間霊を守る造形神(イドラデウス)よ<fix123>動物霊達は霊長園を奪う為に<fix123><fix123>お前を騙している<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I am the sculptor god(Idola Deus) who protects the<fix123>human spirits from those foul beasts.<fix123>The animal spirits tricked you in order to<fix123>take away the Primate Spirit Garden!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？<fix123>何だって？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123><fix123>What?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>騙されるな、剣士よ<fix123>こいつは自然の摂理を<fix123><fix123>破壊する邪神だ！<fix123>こいつは動物の敵であり、人間の敵だ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Don't be fooled, swordswoman.<fix123>She's a wicked god who destroyed<fix123>the divine blessing of Nature!<fix123>She's an enemy of beasts and humans both!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>や、やっぱりそうよねぇ<fix123>ここまで来たら動物霊を<fix123><fix123>信じないとおかしくなっちゃう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Y-Yeah, I thought so.<fix123>I'd be crazy if I start doubting<fix123>the animal spirit after having come this far.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>オオカミが本当のことを<fix123><fix123>言っていると思う？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Do you truly think the wolf is telling the truth?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そ、そりゃそうね<fix123>オオカミ霊！　もう騙されないぞ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>W-Well, I dunno...<fix123>Wolf spirit! Tell me the truth! I won't be fooled any longer!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この優柔不断ヤロー！<fix123>あいつが敵だー！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You wishy-washy fool!<fix123>She's  the enemy!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほんと、優柔不断なのは嫌よねぇ<fix123><fix123>一生後悔するわ……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Truly, I hate indecisiveness.<fix123>You'll regret this for the rest of your life...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（し、しまった！<fix123><fix123>時間稼ぎされてたぞ、人間！）<fix123>（こいつの造形術が来る！<fix123>動物霊達(われわれ)は、皆これにやられたんだ！）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(O-Oh no!<fix123>We let her stall for too long, human!)<fix123>(She's about to unleash her sculpting arts!<fix123>Every last one of us beast spirits was defeated by them!)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 偶像に世界を委ねて　～ Idoratrize World<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Entrusting this World to Idols ~ Idolatrize World<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>一旦退却だ！<fix123>逃げろ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We must retreat for now!<fix123>RUN!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>冥界から人間を連れてきておいて<fix123>敵前逃亡とは……！<fix123>失望したぞ<fix123>畜生は所詮、畜生だな<fix123>肉のお前を滅して<fix123>土と水で美しく造り直してやる！<fix123>半分幽霊、半分埴輪なんて<fix123>孤高の偶像(アイドル)になるぞ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...You brought a human all the way from the Netherworld<fix123>to flee right before your foe!<fix123>I'm disappointed, you know.<fix123>I guess beasts will be beasts after all.<fix123>I'll destroy your flesh,<fix123>and build it anew from soil and water!<fix123>Half-phantom, half-haniwa,<fix123><fix123>you'll be an idol that truly stands apart!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Keiki Haniyasushin PAUSES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>人間よ、よく耐えた！<fix123><fix123>まもなく応援が来るぞ！<fix123>もうこっちが強者だ！<fix123><fix123>孤独な邪神にトドメを刺せ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You've done well to survive this long, human!<fix123>Our reinforcements will arrive in seconds!<fix123>We are the strong ones now!<fix123>Land the finishing blow on this lonesome, wicked god!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Keiki Haniyasushin DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
The Forest of Magic.<fix123>
The forest in Gensokyo filled with the mysterious and the eerie.<fix123>
Marisa's home is there.<fix123>
"Whoa... I can't believe it was that spacious through the door in my back."<fix123>
"It was real bad in there.<fix123>
It was crawlin' with all these creepy people."<fix123>
"It seemed like they could move 'round by creatin' magic doors on people's backs.<fix123>
By the way, the person makin' the doors had a crazy amount of magic power."<fix123>
"What's with that? What a weird way to attack."<fix123>
"So why was it snowing in the Forest of Magic then?"<fix123>
"I hear it was 'cause the fairies with doors on 'em were goin' berserk.<fix123>
And I guess the fairies in the Forest of Magic are attuned with winter?"<fix123>
"So do you think the fairies will settle down now?"<fix123>
"To be honest, no clue.<fix123>
Reason for that being that she got away."<fix123>
"Seriously? You let her get away? Laaame."<fix123>
"Shut up.<fix123>
That back door turned out to be a trap."<fix123>
"Looks like I had one on my back, too.<fix123>
I knew I was usin' some different magic from my back,<fix123> but it seems that was her power."<fix123>
"And there I was,<fix123> diligently gatherin' power for her like an idiot."<fix123>
"That's a pretty clever way of gathering magic."<fix123>
"So anyways, she took all that magic power,<fix123>
and got away in the confusion."<fix123>
"But what could she've been after...?"<fix123>
Marisa went silent.<fix123>
For some reason, she found it difficult to believe that she was just being scouted.<fix123>
The lady had said that her job was to keep the balance of Gensokyo.<fix123>
And she appeared to have interest in Marisa.<fix123>
But to tell the truth, she didn't know the pros and cons of the job.<fix123>
And before she knew it, she was back in the Forest of Magic. Did that mean she was rejected?<fix123>
She wasn't entirely against the idea.<fix123>
However, she also lacked the courage to give up on her current lifestyle.<fix123>
Still conflicted, she decided to go out and look for a back door.<fix123>
In order to meet the mastermind again.<fix123>
<c$Ending No. 07 — The Creepy Job Interview$><fix123>
<c$Congratulations!$><fix123><c$No Continue Clear!$><fix123>
The Forest of Magic.<fix123>
The forest in Gensokyo filled with the mysterious and the eerie.<fix123>
Marisa's home is there.<fix123>
"Hmm, no matter what I did, I was no match for her.<fix123>
In order to win, I need more information."<fix123>
"Back doors, back doors...<fix123>
Guess all I can do is find one and jump in."<fix123>
She thought her weapon had been sealed,<fix123>but before she knew it, the enemy got away.<fix123>
Marisa decided to set out for battle once again.<fix123>
<c$Ending No. 08 — Was That a Rejection?$><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>迷い込んだのかい？<fix123><fix123>ここは生きた人間が来るところじゃないぞ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are you lost?<fix123><fix123>This isn't a place for the living.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>丁度良いところに<fix123><fix123>話の出来る奴が現れたな！<fix123>今すぐに彼岸の方角を教えよ！<fix123><fix123>さもなくば失せろ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>'Ey, finally someone I can talk to!<fix123><fix123>Perfect timing.<fix123>Tell me which way Higan is, now!<fix123><fix123>If you can't, then get lost!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ん？<fix123><fix123>あんた、彼岸に行きたいのか<fix123>彼岸の方角はそうだなぁ……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm?<fix123><fix123>You wanna go to Higan, of all places?<fix123>Well, from where you're standing...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 石の赤子と水中の牛<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Stone Baby and the Submerged Bovine<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そのまま真っ直ぐ丑寅の方角だ<fix123><fix123>私の方にもっと寄れ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's straight to the northeast-- the "demon's gate".<fix123><fix123>Come closer to me, now.[1]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Urumi Ushizaki DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>むぐぐ、強いな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Mrgh. You're strong.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>無駄な戦闘だったな<fix123><fix123>さあ、彼岸はどっちだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What a pointless battle.<fix123><fix123>Now, which way is Higan?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>このまま真っ直ぐで間違いないわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Just keep going straight ahead.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>最初からそう言っていれば<fix123><fix123>良かったのに<fix123>地獄の為に魔力を温存したいんだがね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sheesh, you coulda just said<fix123><fix123>so in the first place.<fix123>I'm tryin' to conserve my magic for Hell, ya know.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前、彼岸どころか<fix123><fix123>地獄に行くつもりなのか<fix123>そりゃあ……<fix123><fix123>ご愁傷様だな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're not just heading<fix123><fix123>for Higan, but for Hell?<fix123>You, uh...<fix123><fix123>You've got my condolences.[2]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>鬼渡の関所<fix123> Lonely Amaryllis<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Checkpoint of Oniwatari ~ Lonely Amaryllis<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>彼岸<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Higan<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 不朽の曼珠沙華<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Everlasting Red Spider Lily<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kutaka Niwatari ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>閻魔(えんま)様から話は聞いています<fix123>容赦無く、貴方を試しなさいってね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've heard about you from the Yama.<fix123>She told me to test you with no mercy!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kutaka Niwatari EXITS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Kutaka Niwatari ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>地獄へ行こうとしている<fix123><fix123>だけありますね<fix123>中々の腕前でございます<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Just as I'd expect from someone<fix123><fix123>trying to get to Hell.<fix123>You're quite skilled indeed.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前は何者だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>And who're you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地獄関所の番頭神<fix123>庭渡 久侘歌<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Clerical God of Hell's Checkpoint<fix123>Kutaka Niwatari<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は、久(く)侘(た)歌(か)<fix123><fix123>地獄の関所を見張っています<fix123>貴方が地獄で耐えられるのか<fix123><fix123>試していました<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I am Kutaka. I watch over<fix123><fix123>the border checkpoint of Hell.<fix123>I've been testing you,<fix123><fix123>to see if you're capable of withstanding Hell.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私を試していたというのか？<fix123>鶏風情が偉くなったもんだなぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You've been testing me, huh?<fix123>Pretty cocky, for a chicken.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>鶏は鶏でも、私はニワタリの神です<fix123>人間に取(・)り(・)憑(・)い(・)た(・)だ(・)け(・)の大鷲<fix123><fix123>なんかより、ずっと偉いと思いますが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Chickens may be chickens, but I am a god of chickens[3].<fix123>I would say that I'm far more distinguished than<fix123><fix123>some eagle who's merely possessing a human.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何だと？<fix123>私が何者か判って言ってるのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Excuse me?<fix123>Do you have any idea who I am?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: セラフィックチキン<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Seraphic Chicken<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>謝ったって許さんからな<fix123><fix123>お前を焼き鳥にしてやる！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's way too late for you to apologize!<fix123><fix123>I'm having fried chicken!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kutaka Niwatari DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ま、参りました<fix123>私は敵対するつもりはありません<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I-I give in!<fix123>I bear no hostile intent towards you, truly.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>判れば宜しい<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If you understand, then alright.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ただ、貴方が地獄に行って不幸なことに<fix123><fix123>ならないか確認していただけです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I just wanted to confirm that you wouldn't<fix123><fix123>find yourself in danger in Hell.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私にそんな試練は必要ないぜ<fix123>そういうわけで、地獄の門を開けて貰おうか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I don't need any of your little tests.<fix123>Now, are you gonna open<fix123><fix123>the gate to Hell or not?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうそう、思い出しました<fix123><fix123>貴方に一つ大切な忠告がありました<fix123>閻魔様曰く、貴方に憑依している<fix123><fix123>動物霊を信用しない方が良いそうです<fix123>それでは地獄をお楽しみ下さい<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh right, that reminds me.<fix123><fix123>I have one more important warning for you.<fix123>According to the Yama, it'd be unwise to<fix123><fix123>trust that beast spirit possessing you.<fix123>And with that, please enjoy your time in Hell.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>万苦の業風<fix123> Darkside of Paradise<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Karmic Wind of Myriad Sufferings ~ Darkside of Paradise<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地獄 (詳細位置の特定不能)<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hell (Specific Location Unknown)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: アンロケイテッドヘル<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Unlocated Hell<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yachie Kicchou ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>生身の人間ですね<fix123>地獄は絶望的に広いですよ<fix123>私が案内しましょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, a human of flesh and blood.<fix123>Hell is hopelessly large, you know?<fix123>Allow me to guide you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yachie Kicchou EXITS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Yachie Kicchou ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>よく付いて来られたね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You've done well to follow me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はあはあ<fix123>地獄の風はこたえるなぁ<fix123>でもやっと追い詰めたぜ！<fix123>地上を支配しようとする動物霊は<fix123>お前だな！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huff, huff...<fix123>Hell's winds sure take a toll on ya.<fix123>But I finally caught up to you!<fix123>You're the beast spirit<fix123>who's trying to take over the surface!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>鬼傑組 組長<fix123>吉弔 八千慧<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Matriarch of the Kiketsu Family<fix123>Yachie Kicchou<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方は動物霊を征伐に来たのですね<fix123>でも貴方が倒すべき動物霊は<fix123><fix123>私ではないですし<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, you came here to subjugate the beast spirits?<fix123>Alas, I'm afraid that the beast<fix123>spirit you are looking for is not me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: トータスドラゴン　～　幸運と不運<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Tortoise Dragon ~ Good Fortune and Bad Fortune<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方の敵となる動物霊は<fix123>地獄(ここ)にはいません<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The beast spirits you see as your enemy,<fix123>are  not here in Hell.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？<fix123>騙そうとしているな？<fix123><fix123>浅はかな動物霊だなぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123>Are you trying to trick me?<fix123><fix123>What a thoughtless beast spirit.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>騙しているように思ったのなら<fix123><fix123>それでも良いです<fix123>私を信じなければ<fix123><fix123>無限に広いこの地獄で<fix123>貴方の敵を見つける事は<fix123><fix123>絶対に出来ないでしょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's fine even if<fix123><fix123>you think I'm lying.<fix123>Choose not to believe me,<fix123><fix123>and you shall never<fix123>find your enemy<fix123><fix123>in this hopelessly large Hell.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふ、ふん。騙しているかどうか<fix123><fix123>まずは倒してみてから調べるぜ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>W-Well. I'll look into whether<fix123><fix123>you're lying after I defeat you!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>最初からそれでいいのです、<fix123>私に勝てたら<fix123><fix123>本当の敵の居場所を教えましょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You should've done this from the start.<fix123><fix123>If you can beat me,<fix123>I'll tell you where your real enemy is.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yachie Kicchou DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>す、素晴らしい<fix123><fix123>貴方のような人間なら大丈夫でしょう<fix123>では、倒すべき敵の下へ<fix123><fix123>貴方を案内します<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>W-wonderful!<fix123><fix123>With a human like you, everything should go just fine.<fix123>I will now guide you to the<fix123>enemy you must defeat.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前は一体何者だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who exactly are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は鬼傑組(きけつぐみ)の組長です<fix123><fix123>それ以上に説明が必要でしょうか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I am the leader of the Kiketsu family.<fix123><fix123>Do you really need any further explanation?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>鬼傑組、組長……！？<fix123>何でだろう、初めて聞いた筈なのに<fix123><fix123>何故か知っているような……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Leader of the Kiketsu family......?!<fix123>What the... I've only heard of them just now,<fix123>but I already know her somehow...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方は動物霊の侵略を止めに<fix123><fix123>来ただけの人間です<fix123>私が敵がいる場所を教えます<fix123>貴方の役目はその敵を倒す事だけ<fix123><fix123>ですからね……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're just the human who came<fix123>to stop the beast spirits' invasion.<fix123>I'm going to tell you where the enemy is.<fix123>Your role is simply to defeat said enemy.<fix123>Nothing more...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>役目……そう言われると何か<fix123><fix123>重要な使命があったような気がするな<fix123>仕方が無い、敵の本拠地を教えてくれ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Role... When you phrase it like that<fix123><fix123>it feels like I had an important mission.<fix123>Nothin' to do about it. Tell me where the enemy base's is.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>動物霊は地獄のお隣にある<fix123><fix123>畜生(ちくしょう)界にいます<fix123>その畜生界の中心に<fix123><fix123>一際目立つ建造物があって<fix123>そこが敵の本拠地なのです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The beast spirits are in the Animal Realm,<fix123><fix123>located next door to Hell.<fix123>There's a particularly prominent structure<fix123><fix123>located in the center of the Animal Realm...<fix123>That's the enemy's main base.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>敵は畜生界の中心か<fix123>関係の無いお前と戦って損したぜ<fix123><fix123>じゃあな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So the enemy's in the center of the Animal Realm, huh?<fix123>I wasted effort fighting you then.<fix123><fix123>Bye.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>口先だけでないと信じているぞ<fix123><fix123>オオワシに選ばれし剛欲(ごうよく)の騎士よ！<fix123>さあ行け！<fix123><fix123>呪い極めた鬼形(きぎょう)の敵を滅せよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Warrior of Gouyoku[4], chosen by the eagles!<fix123><fix123>I trust that you're not just talk!<fix123>Now, go!<fix123>Destroy that demon-shaped enemy, cursed in extremity!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>畜生メトロポリス<fix123> Beastly Dystopia<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Tiragyoni Metropolis ~ Beastly Dystopia<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>畜生界<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Animal Realm<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ビーストメトロポリス<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Beast Metropolis<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mayumi Joutougu ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Mayumi Joutougu EXITS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>何だここは<fix123>さっきまでの地獄とは<fix123><fix123>大違いだな<fix123>さっきの奴が言っていた<fix123><fix123>畜生界の中心の建造物って<fix123><fix123><fix123>アレのことなのか……？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Whoa,<fix123>this place is very different<fix123>from Hell back there.<fix123>Is that the "structure in the<fix123>center of the Animal Realm"<fix123>that the person back there mentioned......?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mayumi Joutougu ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>人間？<fix123>さっさと霊長園に戻らないと<fix123><fix123>飢えた畜生達に捕らわれるよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A human?<fix123>You'd better get back to the Primate Spirit Garden post-haste,<fix123><fix123>or else you'll be captured by starving beasts.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>霊長園って何だ？<fix123>あそこに見える、古墳の事か？<fix123><fix123>確かに霊(・)園(・)だもんな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What's the Primate Spirit Garden?<fix123>Do you mean that burial mound thing over there?<fix123><fix123>It's certainly a garden for spirits.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>霊長園を知らないだって？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You don't know about the Primate Spirit Garden?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>埴輪兵長<fix123>杖刀偶　磨弓<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Haniwa Lance Corporal<fix123>Mayumi Joutougu<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>と言うかお前……<fix123>畜生界の人間霊じゃないな！<fix123><fix123>生身の人間だ！<fix123>どうやって、この究極の弱肉強食の<fix123><fix123>畜生界で生き延びてきた？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Actually, speaking of which...<fix123>You're not a human spirit from the Animal Realm!<fix123><fix123>You're a flesh-and-blood human!<fix123>How did you manage to survive in<fix123><fix123>such a dog-eat-dog place as this?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私はここの住人じゃない<fix123>動物霊達を退治しに<fix123><fix123>地上からやってきたんだ……<fix123>……<fix123>（くっ、身体が動かない！？<fix123><fix123>……まさかオオワシ霊の仕業か！）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm not a resident of this place.<fix123>I came here from the surface to<fix123><fix123>exterminate the beast spirits, and......<fix123>......<fix123>(Ugh, why can't I move!?<fix123>...Is the eagle spirit doing this?!)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: セラミックスの杖刀人<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Joutounin of Ceramics<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふっふっふ<fix123>私は、お前達を破壊する為だけに<fix123><fix123>生身の人間を連れてきた！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh heh heh!<fix123>I brought a live human down here<fix123><fix123>just to destroy the lot of you!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴様から感じる霊気……<fix123><fix123>まさか、オオワシ霊なのか？<fix123>生身の人間に頼るなんて<fix123><fix123>オオワシにそんな謙虚さがあるとは……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That aura I feel from you...<fix123><fix123>Could you be an eagle spirit?<fix123>To think that an eagle would be so humble<fix123><fix123>as to rely on a living human...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この為だけにあのにっくき鬼傑組の<fix123><fix123>奴らと同盟を結んだのだ！<fix123>お前達、呪われし偶像どもから<fix123><fix123>人間霊(どれい)を解放する！<fix123>覚悟しろ！<fix123><fix123>弱肉強食こそ、畜生界の理(ことわり)だ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>For this sole reason, we formed an alliance<fix123><fix123>with that loathsome Kiketsu family!<fix123>I shall liberate the human spirits(slaves)<fix123>from you accursed idols!<fix123>Prepare yourself!<fix123>It's the law of the Animal Realm that the strong eat the weak!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mayumi Joutougu DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>つ、強い！　生身の人間とは<fix123><fix123>この様な物だったのか……！<fix123>なんと恐ろしい策……！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>S-so strong! So this is what<fix123><fix123>living humans are like...!<fix123>What a fearsome strategy...!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（よし！<fix123><fix123>これならば勝てる！）<fix123>（ありがとう！<fix123><fix123>人間の魔法使いよ！）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Yes!<fix123><fix123>I'll be sure to win at this rate!)<fix123>(You have my thanks,<fix123><fix123>human magician!)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……<fix123>まさかオオワシ霊に<fix123><fix123>身体を乗っ取られるとはな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>......<fix123>Can't believe I let an eagle<fix123><fix123>spirit hijack my body.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（私だ、オオワシ霊だ）<fix123>（貴方と私の二人ならば<fix123><fix123>畜生界を取り戻す事が出来る）<fix123>（そうすれば、地上への<fix123><fix123>動物霊の侵攻も止まるだろう）<fix123>（貴方にも悪くない話の筈だ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(It's me. The eagle spirit.)<fix123>(With the two of us combined,<fix123><fix123>we can take back the Animal Realm!)<fix123>(If we do that, the beast spirits' invasion of<fix123><fix123>the surface will be sure to cease as well.)<fix123>(That should sound pretty good to you too, no?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>これは埴輪兵士が作られてから<fix123><fix123>初めての緊急事態だわ！<fix123>早くみんなに知らせないと！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This is the first emergency situation we've had<fix123><fix123>since the Haniwa Soldiers were created!<fix123>I have to go alert everyone quick!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>変な話になってきたな<fix123>でも、まあ良いだろう<fix123><fix123>確かにさっきの奴はムカつくしな<fix123>ボスに会いたくなってきたぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, this has gotten pretty weird.<fix123>But that's fine.<fix123><fix123>The person back there did irritate me.<fix123>I'm looking forwards to meeting the boss now!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>イドラデウス<fix123> Idola-Deus<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Deus ex Idola ~ Idola-Deus<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Primate Spirit Garden - Tumulus Base Interior<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Electric Heritage<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mayumi Joutougu ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>生身の人間がこんなに<fix123><fix123>強い生き物だなんて！<fix123>夢のような現実だわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>To think that living humans<fix123>were such strong creatures!<fix123>Everything feels like a dream!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mayumi Joutougu DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ここが、古墳内部か……<fix123>異質さに異質さを重ねて来たな<fix123>オオワシ霊、敵は何処だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So this is the inside of the burial mound......<fix123>This place is just weird on top of weird.<fix123>Eagle spirit, where's our enemy?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（……）<fix123>（これがあの霊長園の内部か……）<fix123>（人工物ばかりになって……<fix123><fix123>美しい自然は何処に！）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(...)<fix123>(This is the interior of the Garden...?)<fix123>(It's filled with man-made material now...!<fix123><fix123>What happened to the beautiful nature?!)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Keiki Haniyasushin ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>来客とは珍しい<fix123>もう私達に敵う者などいないと<fix123><fix123>悲しんでいたのに……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A guest? How rare.<fix123>And here, I had almost shed a tear at the fact<fix123><fix123>that nobody was left to fight against us...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>出てきたか<fix123>畜生の理を破りし破壊神！<fix123><fix123>埴安神 袿姫(はにやすしん　けいき)！<fix123>お前の天下はもう終わりだ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So there you are, eh?<fix123>The god of destruction who defies the law of beasts!<fix123><fix123>Keiki Haniyasushin!<fix123>Your reign ends here!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>孤立無援が誂えた造形神<fix123>埴安神　袿姫<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Sculptor God Crafted by Utter Isolation<fix123>Keiki Haniyasushin<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>破壊神だって？<fix123><fix123>酷いわねぇ<fix123>この食うか食われるかの畜生界で<fix123><fix123>私ほど物を生み出している者もいないわよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>God of destruction?<fix123><fix123>Talk about rude.<fix123>In this eat-or-be-eaten Animal Realm,<fix123><fix123>there's nobody else who's created as much as I have.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前は何者だ？<fix123><fix123>お前が敵なのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who are you?<fix123><fix123>Are you my enemy?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>へっ？<fix123><fix123>さっきは私を知っているような素振りを……<fix123>……って、もしかしてお前<fix123><fix123>人間！？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123>You were acting like you knew me a second ago...<fix123>...Wait, are you a human?!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうだ、人間だ<fix123>お前が敵なのかと聞いているんだが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yep, I'm a human alright.<fix123>I hear that you're apparently my enemy.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方は黙ってて！<fix123>今は目の前の邪神を倒す<fix123><fix123>チャンスなんだぞ<fix123>今だけは、このオオワシ様が<fix123><fix123>霧雨魔理沙になる！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Silence, you!<fix123>This is my chance to defeat the<fix123><fix123>wicked god standing before us.<fix123>For just this moment, I, the mighty eagle,<fix123>shall be Marisa Kirisame!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なる程……取り憑いて<fix123><fix123>人間をここまで連れてきたのか<fix123>でも、何も知らない愚かな<fix123><fix123>人間を騙して連れてきて<fix123>一体、何になると思っているの？<fix123><fix123>オオワシ霊さん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see... you possessed a human<fix123><fix123>and brought them all the way here.<fix123>But what exactly do you<fix123>hope to accomplish,<fix123>by tricking and dragging along some foolish human who<fix123><fix123>doesn't know anything? Care to answer, eagle spirit?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前は、剛欲(ごうよく)同盟だっけ？<fix123>プライドだけ高くて<fix123>実力は他に劣る事で有名な……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're from the Gouyoku Alliance, right?<fix123>Famous for being ridiculously prideful, but<fix123>lacking in capabilities in every other area...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふん、しかしお前を倒せば<fix123><fix123>畜生界一の座を奪えるさ<fix123>生身の人間が苦手だって聞いたぞ！<fix123><fix123>さあ、勝負しろ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmph. But if I defeat you,<fix123>I can steal the Animal Realm's top seat!<fix123>I heard that you're weak against living humans, too!<fix123>Now, have at thee!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふっふっふ<fix123>人間よ<fix123><fix123>動物霊に騙されるな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh heh heh.<fix123>You there, human.<fix123>Don't let this beast spirit deceive you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>えっ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は畜生どもから<fix123>人間霊を守る造形神(イドラデウス)よ<fix123>人間同士戦う必要なんてない<fix123>そう思わないかい？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I am the sculptor god(Idola Deus) who protects the<fix123>human spirits from those foul beasts.<fix123>There's no need for fellow humans to fight each other.<fix123>Don't you agree?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？<fix123><fix123>お前は人間なのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123><fix123>Are you human?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>騙されるでないぞ、魔法使いよ<fix123>こいつは人間の味方なんかじゃない<fix123>自分を喚び出した人間霊を<fix123><fix123>破滅に追い込んだ邪神だぞ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Don't be fooled, magician.<fix123>She's no ally of humans at all.<fix123>She's a wicked god who drove the human spirits<fix123>who summoned her to their destruction!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何だ何だ？<fix123><fix123>訳がわからないぞ<fix123>どっちが嘘を吐いているんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wh-what?<fix123><fix123>I don't really get it.<fix123>Who's spitting lies here?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>動物と私のどっちを信じるか<fix123><fix123>悩む方がどうかしているわ<fix123>私は迫害されていた人間霊を<fix123><fix123>救った神なのよ<fix123>今、お前に憑いている<fix123><fix123>動物霊こそが、人間の敵よ！<fix123>どうだ……<fix123><fix123>私の味方にならないか……？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>To trust in me or the beast spirit?<fix123><fix123>I wonder why you hesitate?<fix123>I am a god that saved<fix123><fix123>the humans who were being persecuted!<fix123>The beast spirit possessing you right now<fix123><fix123>is the enemy of mankind!<fix123>Well?<fix123><fix123>Won't you join my side...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（ま、まずい！<fix123><fix123>時間稼ぎされてたぞ、人間！）<fix123>（こいつの造形術が来る！<fix123><fix123>動物霊達(われわれ)は、皆これにやられたんだ！）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Human, this is bad!<fix123>We let her stall for too long!)<fix123>(She's about to unleash her sculpting arts!<fix123>Every last one of us beast spirits was defeated by them!)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 偶像に世界を委ねて　～ Idoratrize World<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Entrusting this World to Idols ~ Idolatrize World<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>一旦退却だ！<fix123><fix123>逃げろ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We must retreat for now!<fix123><fix123>RUN!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何か策がありそうだったのに<fix123><fix123>敵前逃亡とは……！<fix123>失望したぞ<fix123><fix123>畜生は所詮、畜生だな<fix123>そうだ、人間の肉を滅して<fix123><fix123>土と水で美しく造り直してやる！<fix123>折角の地上の人間だ！<fix123><fix123>畜生界一の偶像(アイドル)にしてやろう！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Even though you seemed like you had a plan...<fix123><fix123>To flee right before your foe...!<fix123>I'm disappointed, you know.<fix123>I guess beasts will be beasts after all.<fix123>That's it. I'll destroy this human's body of flesh,<fix123><fix123>and build it anew from soil and water!<fix123>Humans from the surface are rare!<fix123>I'll make you the best idol in the Animal Realm!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Keiki Haniyasushin PAUSES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>人間よ、よく耐えた！<fix123><fix123>まもなく応援が来るぞ！<fix123>もうこっちが強者だ！<fix123><fix123>孤独な邪神にトドメを刺せ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You've done well to survive this long, human!<fix123>Our reinforcements will arrive in seconds!<fix123>We are the strong ones now!<fix123>Land the finishing blow on this lonesome, wicked god!<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Innumerable Regrets ~ Infinity Make-work<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>ぐぐぐ……強い<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Uh, sorry about that.<fix123><fix123>I'm kinda in a hurry...<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>*sob sob*<fix123>The children were looking forward<fix123><fix123>to this contest so much...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ、後味悪い……<fix123><fix123>平和になったらまた来るぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Talk about a bad aftertaste...<fix123><fix123>I-I'll come back when things calm down, okay?<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Parental Guardian of Ancient Fish<fix123>Urumi Ushizaki<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Are you lost?<fix123><fix123>This isn't a place for the living.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>すみません……<fix123><fix123>方角がわからなくなっちゃって<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sorry...<fix123><fix123>I kinda lost track of where I was goin'.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>幻想郷に帰りたいか……<fix123>ふっふっふ<fix123><fix123>丁度良いねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Do you want to return to Gensokyo...?<fix123>Heh heh heh.<fix123><fix123>What perfect timing.<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Hm?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>丁度古代魚達の餌をあげないと<fix123><fix123>いけない時間なんだ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Feeding time for my ancient fish<fix123><fix123>just rolled around.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 石の赤子と水中の牛<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Stone Baby and the Submerged Bovine<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふっふっふ、私の代わりにこの子を<fix123><fix123>見といてくれないか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh heh heh... Excuse me, but could<fix123><fix123>you watch my baby for a moment?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Urumi Ushizaki DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>むぐぐ、強いな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Mrgh. You're strong.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何だその石の赤子は<fix123>重すぎて河に落ちるかと思ったぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What's up with that stone baby?<fix123>It was so heavy, I thought I might<fix123><fix123>end up fallin' in the river.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>超重量のこの子を抱けるとは<fix123>見た目とは裏腹に<fix123><fix123>中々の豪腕だな<fix123>良いだろう<fix123><fix123>お前を河に沈めるのはやめてやる<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You can hold it, even though it's so heavy...?!<fix123>Dang, you must be a lot<fix123><fix123>stronger than you look.<fix123>Alright.<fix123><fix123>I'll stop trying to drown you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、沈められるところだったんだな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, you were trying to drown me. Yikes.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Higan<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>I've heard about you from the Yama.<fix123>She told me to test you with no mercy!<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>Kutaka Niwatari ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
