en_dialogue: <fix123>Just as I'd expect from someone<fix123><fix123>trying to get to Hell.<fix123>You're quite skilled indeed.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前は何者だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>And who're you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地獄関所の番頭神<fix123>庭渡 久侘歌<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Clerical God of Hell's Checkpoint<fix123>Kutaka Niwatari<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は、久(く)侘(た)歌(か)<fix123><fix123>地獄の関所を見張っています<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I am Kutaka. I watch over<fix123><fix123>the border checkpoint of Hell.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なるほど、地獄の門番って訳ね<fix123>だったら、地獄で何が起きているのか<fix123><fix123>知っているんじゃないのか？<fix123>動物霊が地上を支配しようと<fix123><fix123>しているだとか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, so you're Hell's gatekeeper.<fix123>Then would ya happen t' know<fix123><fix123>what's goin' on in Hell?<fix123>Like, are the beast spirits tryin'<fix123><fix123>to conquer the surface or somethin'?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地獄では毎日のように<fix123><fix123>騒動が起きています<fix123>権力闘争だって<fix123><fix123>日常茶飯事ですので……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There's always some turmoil or<fix123><fix123>another occuring in Hell.<fix123>Even violent power struggles<fix123><fix123>are an everyday occurence...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>で、でも今度のは地上がヤバそうなんだ<fix123>何とか地獄に行かせて貰えないか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>B-but this time it looks like the surface's in trouble.<fix123>Is there any way you could let me into Hell?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方が行きたがっているのは知っています<fix123><fix123>だから、貴方の力を試させて貰います<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm well aware of your intent to go there.<fix123><fix123>Therefore, I shall test your strength.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: セラフィックチキン<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Seraphic Chicken<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私の攻撃をいなせないくらいでは<fix123><fix123>地獄に行く意味が無いですからね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>After all, if you cannot even dodge my attacks,<fix123><fix123>then visiting Hell would be futile.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kutaka Niwatari DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>そ、そこまでです<fix123><fix123>もう十分判りました<fix123>貴方なら地獄でも<fix123><fix123>立ち回れるかも知れません<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Th-That's enough.<fix123><fix123>I've seen all I need to.<fix123>With strength like yours, you may very well<fix123><fix123>be able to handle yourself in Hell.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうか、地獄に行くのは<fix123><fix123>若干心配だったが……<fix123>それは杞憂(きゆう)なのかもな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That so? Phew. I was honestly kinda<fix123><fix123>worried about goin' to Hell...<fix123>But I s'pose there wasn't any need to worry.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうそう、思い出しました<fix123><fix123>貴方に一つ大切な忠告がありました<fix123>閻魔様曰く、貴方に憑依している<fix123><fix123>動物霊を信用しない方が良いそうです<fix123>特に貴方はすでに心を<fix123><fix123>乗っ取られはじめているようです<fix123>どうか地獄の計略に<fix123><fix123>引っかかりませんように<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh right, that reminds me.<fix123><fix123>I have one more important warning for you.<fix123>According to the Yama, it'd be unwise to<fix123><fix123>trust that beast spirit possessing you.<fix123>Your heart, in particular, already seems<fix123><fix123>to be falling under its control.<fix123>Take care not to get caught<fix123><fix123>in one of Hell's schemes...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>万苦の業風<fix123> Darkside of Paradise<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Karmic Wind of Myriad Sufferings ~ Darkside of Paradise<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地獄 (詳細位置の特定不能)<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hell (Specific Location Unknown)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: アンロケイテッドヘル<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Unlocated Hell<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yachie Kicchou ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>生身の人間ですね<fix123>地獄は絶望的に広いですよ<fix123>私が案内しましょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, a human of flesh and blood.<fix123>Hell is hopelessly large, you know?<fix123>Allow me to guide you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yachie Kicchou EXITS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Yachie Kicchou ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>よく付いて来られたね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You've done well to follow me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はあはあ<fix123>地獄の風はこたえるなぁ<fix123>でも、あっさり怪しい奴が<fix123><fix123>見つかって良かったぜ<fix123>地上を支配しようとする動物霊は<fix123><fix123>お前だな！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huff, huff...<fix123>Hell's winds sure take a toll on ya.<fix123>Anyways, what a suspicious person.<fix123><fix123>I'm glad I found you.<fix123>You're the beast spirit<fix123>who's trying to take over the surface!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>鬼傑組 組長<fix123>吉弔 八千慧<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Matriarch of the Kiketsu Family<fix123>Yachie Kicchou<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方は動物霊を征伐に来たのですね<fix123>でも貴方が倒すべき動物霊は<fix123><fix123>私ではないですし<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, you came here to subjugate the beast spirits?<fix123>Alas, I'm afraid that the beast<fix123>spirit you are looking for is not me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: トータスドラゴン　～　幸運と不運<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Tortoise Dragon ~ Good Fortune and Bad Fortune<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方の敵となる動物霊は<fix123>地獄(ここ)にはいません<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The beast spirits you see as your enemy,<fix123>are  not here in Hell.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？<fix123>だ、だって実際に地獄から<fix123><fix123>動物霊が現れて……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123>B-But the beast spirits are<fix123><fix123>coming up from Hell......<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>動物霊が人間界に行くのに<fix123><fix123>地獄を経由するしかなかったのでしょう<fix123>敵のところまで案内してやりましょうか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This is because they had to pass through Hell to reach<fix123><fix123>the Human Realm from the Animal Realm.<fix123>How about I guide you to your enemy?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう言われると確かに<fix123><fix123>お前は敵ではない気がしてきた……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now that you say that<fix123><fix123>I do feel like you aren't my enemy......<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>敵である訳がありませんよ<fix123>私に勝てたら<fix123><fix123>本当の敵の居場所を教えましょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I am no foe of yours.<fix123>If you can beat me,<fix123>I'll tell you where your real enemy is.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yachie Kicchou DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>す、素晴らしい<fix123><fix123>貴方のような人間なら大丈夫でしょう<fix123>では、倒すべき敵の下へ<fix123><fix123>貴方を案内します<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>W-wonderful!<fix123><fix123>With a human like you, everything should go just fine.<fix123>I will now guide you to the<fix123>enemy you must defeat.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前は一体何者だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who exactly are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は鬼傑組(きけつぐみ)の組長です<fix123><fix123>貴方にはそれが判らないはずがない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I am the leader of the Kiketsu family.<fix123><fix123>There's no way you don't know what that means.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>も、申し訳ございません<fix123><fix123>吉弔(きっちょう)様！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>M-My sincerest apologies,<fix123>Lady Kicchou!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（ん？　あれ？<fix123><fix123>何で私が謝ってるんだ？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Huh? What?<fix123><fix123>Why am I apologizing?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>謝る必要なんてないですよ<fix123>貴方は動物霊の侵略を止めに<fix123><fix123>来ただけの人間ですから<fix123>私がその敵がいる場所を教えます<fix123>貴方の役目はそれを倒す事だけ<fix123><fix123>ですからね……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There's no need to apologize.<fix123>You're just the human who came<fix123><fix123>to stop the beast spirits' invasion.<fix123>I'm going to tell you where the enemy is.<fix123>Your role is simply to defeat said enemy.<fix123>Nothing more...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そ、そうだな<fix123><fix123>確かに倒しに行くのが目的だったしな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>T-That's true.<fix123><fix123>I did come here to defeat them.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>動物霊は地獄のお隣にある<fix123><fix123>畜生(ちくしょう)界にいます<fix123>その畜生界の中心に<fix123><fix123>一際目立つ建造物があって<fix123>そこが敵の本拠地なのです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The beast spirits are in the Animal Realm,<fix123><fix123>located next door to Hell.<fix123>There's a particularly prominent structure<fix123><fix123>located in the center of the Animal Realm...<fix123>That's the enemy's main base.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>畜生界の中心か<fix123><fix123>よし、いっちょうやったるか！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Center of the Animal Realm, got it!<fix123><fix123>Welp, let's just give it a go!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>カワウソに選ばれし伏兵よ！<fix123><fix123>鬼傑組の鉄の掟を思い出せ！<fix123>搦手(からめて)こそが最短最良だ！<fix123><fix123>呪い極めた鬼形(きぎょう)の敵を滅せよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh sneak attacker, chosen by the otters!<fix123><fix123>Remember the iron-clad law of the Kiketsu Family!<fix123>There is no route swifter or more effective than the rear!<fix123><fix123>Destroy that demon-shaped enemy, cursed in extremity!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>畜生メトロポリス<fix123> Beastly Dystopia<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Tiragyoni Metropolis ~ Beastly Dystopia<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>畜生界<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Animal Realm<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ビーストメトロポリス<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Beast Metropolis<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mayumi Joutougu ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Mayumi Joutougu EXITS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>何だここは<fix123>さっきまでの地獄とは<fix123><fix123>大違いだな<fix123>さっきの奴が言っていた<fix123><fix123>畜生界の中心の建造物って<fix123><fix123>アレのことなのか……？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Whoa,<fix123>this place is very different<fix123>from Hell back there.<fix123>Is that the "structure in the<fix123>center of the Animal Realm"<fix123>that the person back there mentioned......?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mayumi Joutougu ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>人間？<fix123><fix123><fix123>さっさと霊長園に戻らないと<fix123><fix123>飢えた畜生達に捕らわれるよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A human?<fix123>You'd better get back to the Primate Spirit Garden post-haste,<fix123><fix123>or else you'll be captured by starving beasts.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>霊長園って何だ？<fix123>あそこに見える、古墳の事か？<fix123><fix123>確かに霊(・)園(・)だもんな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What's the Primate Spirit Garden?<fix123>Do you mean that burial mound thing over there?<fix123><fix123>It's certainly a garden for spirits.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>霊長園を知らないだって？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You don't know about the Primate Spirit Garden?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>埴輪兵長<fix123>杖刀偶　磨弓<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Haniwa Lance Corporal<fix123>Mayumi Joutougu<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>と言うかお前……<fix123>畜生界の人間霊じゃないな！<fix123><fix123>生身の人間だ！<fix123>どうやって、この究極の弱肉強食の<fix123><fix123>畜生界で生き延びてきた？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Actually, speaking of which...<fix123>You're not a human spirit from the Animal Realm!<fix123><fix123>You're a flesh-and-blood human!<fix123>How did you manage to survive in<fix123><fix123>such a dog-eat-dog place as this?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私はここの住人じゃない<fix123>動物霊達を退治しに<fix123><fix123>地上からやってきたんだ……<fix123>……<fix123>くっ、身体が動かない！？<fix123><fix123>……まさかカワウソ霊の仕業か！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm not a resident of this place.<fix123>I came here from the surface to<fix123><fix123>exterminate the beast spirits, and......<fix123>......<fix123>(Ugh, why can't I move!?<fix123>...Is the otter spirit doing this?!)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: セラミックスの杖刀人<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Joutounin of Ceramics<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふっふっふ<fix123>私は、お前達を破壊する為だけに<fix123><fix123>生身の人間を連れてきた！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh heh heh!<fix123>I brought a live human down here<fix123><fix123>just to destroy the lot of you!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴様から感じる霊気……<fix123><fix123>まさか、カワウソ霊なのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That aura I feel from you...<fix123><fix123>Could you be an otter spirit?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうだ、我ら鬼傑組の<fix123><fix123>必殺搦手の作戦を喰らえ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's right! Now, face the elite<fix123><fix123>underhanded tactics of the Kiketsu family!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうか、鬼傑組の吉弔の手先なのね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, I see. You're an agent of Kicchou, from the Kiketsu family.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前達、呪われし偶像どもから<fix123><fix123>人間霊(どうぐ)を解放する！<fix123>覚悟しろ！<fix123><fix123>弱肉強食こそ、畜生界の理(ことわり)だ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I shall liberate the human spirits(our tools)<fix123>from you accursed idols!<fix123>Prepare yourself!<fix123>It's the law of the Animal Realm that the strong eat the weak!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mayumi Joutougu DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>つ、強い！　生身の人間とは<fix123><fix123>この様な物だったのか……！<fix123>なんと恐ろしい策……！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>S-so strong! So this is what<fix123><fix123>living humans are like...!<fix123>What a fearsome strategy...!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（よし！<fix123><fix123>これならば勝てる！）<fix123>（ありがとう！<fix123><fix123>人間の魔法使いよ！）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Yes!<fix123><fix123>I'll be sure to win at this rate!)<fix123>(You have my thanks,<fix123><fix123>human magician!)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……<fix123>まさかカワウソ霊に<fix123><fix123>身体を乗っ取られるとはな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>......<fix123>Can't believe I let an otter<fix123><fix123>spirit hijack my body.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（私だ、カワウソ霊だ<fix123><fix123>改めて礼を言う、ありがとう）<fix123>（貴方のお陰で偶像を<fix123><fix123>破壊できそうだ）<fix123>（でも、あと少しだけ<fix123><fix123>協力して欲しい）<fix123>（偶像を破壊すれば<fix123><fix123>畜生界は動物霊の支配に戻る）<fix123>（そうすれば、地上への<fix123><fix123>動物霊の侵攻も止まるだろう）<fix123>（貴方と目的は一致している筈だ<fix123><fix123>協力して打ち勝とう！）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(It's me, the otter spirit.<fix123>Once again, thank you.)<fix123>(With your help, we'll be able<fix123>to destroy those idols!)<fix123>(But I need your cooperation<fix123>for just a little longer.)<fix123>(Once the idols are destroyed, we beast spirits<fix123>will take back control of the Animal Realm.)<fix123>(If we do that, the beast spirits' invasion of<fix123>the surface will be sure to cease as well.)<fix123>(That means we have the same goal, right?<fix123>Let's join forces and take them down!)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>これは埴輪兵士が作られてから<fix123><fix123>初めての緊急事態だわ！<fix123>早くみんなに知らせないと！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This is the first emergency situation we've had<fix123><fix123>since the Haniwa Soldiers were created!<fix123>I have to go alert everyone quick!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>変な話になって来たな<fix123>でもまあ、カワウソ霊を信じてやるか<fix123>いざ、霊長園に行くぞ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, this has gotten pretty weird.<fix123>But whatever, I might as well<fix123><fix123>believe you, otter spirit.<fix123>Alright, let's head to the Primate Garden!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>イドラデウス<fix123> Idola-Deus<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Deus ex Idola ~ Idola-Deus<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>霊長園 墳墓内部<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Primate Spirit Garden - Tumulus Base Interior<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: エレクトリックヘリテージ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Electric Heritage<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mayumi Joutougu ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>生身の人間がこんなに<fix123><fix123>強い生き物だなんて！<fix123>夢のような現実だわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>To think that living humans<fix123>were such strong creatures!<fix123>Everything feels like a dream!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mayumi Joutougu DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ここが、古墳内部か……<fix123>異質さに異質さを重ねて来たな<fix123>カワウソ霊、敵は何処だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So this is what's inside the burial mound, huh...<fix123>This place is just weird on top of weird.<fix123>Otter spirit, where's our enemy?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（……）<fix123>（霊長園と言えば<fix123><fix123>畜生界一美しい庭園だったのに……）<fix123>（噂には聞いていたが酷い有様だ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(...)<fix123>(This was always the most beautiful<fix123>garden in the entire Animal Realm...)<fix123>(I'd heard the rumors, sure,<fix123>but this really is atrocious.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Keiki Haniyasushin ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>来客とは珍しい<fix123>もう私達に敵う者などいないと<fix123><fix123>悲しんでいたのに……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A guest? How rare.<fix123>And here, I had almost shed a tear at the fact<fix123><fix123>that nobody was left to fight against us...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>見つけたぞ！<fix123>畜生の理を破りし破壊神！<fix123><fix123>埴安神 袿姫(はにやすしん　けいき)！<fix123>お前の野望も潰えるときがきたぞ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There you are!<fix123>The god of destruction who defies the law of beasts!<fix123>Keiki Haniyasushin!<fix123>The time has come for your ambitions to be crushed!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>孤立無援が誂えた造形神<fix123>埴安神　袿姫<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Sculptor God Crafted by Utter Isolation<fix123>Keiki Haniyasushin<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>良いわねぇ<fix123><fix123>やっぱり動物は活きが良くないとね<fix123>お前から鬼傑組特有の<fix123><fix123>生臭い匂いがするわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, that's good to hear. Animals ought<fix123>to be nice and lively, after all!<fix123>I can smell that particular fishy scent<fix123>of the Kiketsu family coming off of you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>でも、見た目は人間みたいだけど……<fix123><fix123>一体、どういう卑怯な策を持ってきたのかしら<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But you look like a human, though...<fix123><fix123>Just what kind of cowardly scheme did you come up with?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おいおい<fix123><fix123>見た目も何も、私は人間だぜ<fix123>ちょいと動物霊を利用して<fix123><fix123>ここまで来たんだが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, wait. I don't just look<fix123><fix123>like a human, I am one.<fix123>I'm just using an animal spirit<fix123><fix123>for a bit to get here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……！？<fix123>なる程……生身の人間に憑依してきたと<fix123>でも、何も知らない愚かな<fix123><fix123>人間を騙して連れてきて<fix123>一体、何になると思っているの？<fix123><fix123>鬼傑組の……お前はカワウソ霊かしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...!?<fix123>I see... you possessed a human.<fix123>But what exactly do you<fix123>hope to accomplish,<fix123>by tricking and dragging along some foolish human who doesn't<fix123><fix123>know anything? Kiketsu family's... otter spirit, I believe?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（……生身の人間を恐れない！？）<fix123>（吉弔様ー！<fix123><fix123>話が違うじゃないのー！）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(...She's not afraid of a live human?!)<fix123>(Lady Kichoooou!<fix123>This isn't what you said would happen!)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふっふっふ<fix123>人間よ<fix123><fix123>動物霊に騙されるな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh heh heh.<fix123>You there, human.<fix123>Don't let this beast spirit deceive you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>えっ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は畜生どもから<fix123>人間霊を守る造形神(イドラデウス)よ<fix123>人間同士戦う必要なんてない<fix123>そう思わないかい？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I am the sculptor god(Idola Deus) who protects the<fix123>human spirits from those foul beasts.<fix123>There's no need for fellow humans to fight each other.<fix123>Don't you agree?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？<fix123><fix123>お前は人間なのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123><fix123>Are you human?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>騙されるな、魔法使いよ）<fix123>こいつは人間霊から信仰を<fix123><fix123>吸い上げるだけの邪神だ！<fix123>こいつは動物の敵であり、人間の敵だ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Don't be fooled, magician!<fix123>She's a wicked god who only sucks up<fix123>faith from the human spirits!<fix123>She's an enemy of beasts and humans both!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何だ何だ？<fix123><fix123>訳がわからないぞ<fix123>どっちが嘘を吐いているんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wh-what?<fix123><fix123>I don't really get it.<fix123>Who's spitting lies here?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>動物と私のどっちを信じるか<fix123><fix123>悩む方がどうかしているわ<fix123>私は迫害されていた人間霊を<fix123><fix123>救った神なのよ<fix123>今、お前に憑いている<fix123><fix123>動物霊こそが、人間の敵よ！<fix123>どうだ……<fix123><fix123>私の味方にならないか……？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>To trust in me or the beast spirit?<fix123><fix123>I wonder why you hesitate?<fix123>I am a god that saved<fix123><fix123>the humans who were being persecuted!<fix123>The beast spirit possessing you right now<fix123><fix123>is the enemy of mankind!<fix123>Well?<fix123><fix123>Won't you join my side...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（ま、まずい！<fix123><fix123>のんびり話をしすぎてたぞ、人間！）<fix123>（こいつの造形術が来る！<fix123><fix123>動物霊達(われわれ)は、皆これにやられたんだ！）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Oh, oh no!<fix123><fix123>We've been chatting for too long, human!)<fix123>(She's about to unleash her sculpting arts!<fix123>Every last one of us beast spirits was defeated by them!)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 偶像に世界を委ねて　～ Idoratrize World<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Entrusting this World to Idols ~ Idolatrize World<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>一旦退却だ！<fix123><fix123>逃げろ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We must retreat for now!<fix123><fix123>RUN!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何か策がありそうだったのに<fix123><fix123>敵前逃亡とは……！<fix123>失望したぞ<fix123><fix123>畜生は所詮、畜生だな<fix123>そうだ、人間の肉を滅して<fix123><fix123>土と水で美しく造り直してやる！<fix123>折角の地上の人間だ！<fix123><fix123>畜生界一の偶像(アイドル)にしてやろう！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Even though you seemed like you had a plan...<fix123>To flee right before your foe...!<fix123>I'm disappointed, you know.<fix123>I guess beasts will be beasts after all.<fix123>That's it. I'll destroy this human's body of flesh,<fix123>and build it anew from soil and water!<fix123>Humans from the surface are rare!<fix123>I'll make you the best idol in the Animal Realm!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Keiki Haniyasushin PAUSES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>人間よ、よく耐えた！<fix123><fix123>まもなく応援が来るぞ！<fix123>もうこっちが強者だ！<fix123><fix123>孤独な邪神にトドメを刺せ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You've done well to survive this long, human!<fix123>Our reinforcements will arrive in seconds!<fix123>We are the strong ones now!<fix123>Land the finishing blow on this lonesome, wicked god!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Keiki Haniyasushin DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>千万無量の無念<fix123> Infinity Make-work<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Innumerable Regrets ~ Infinity Make-work<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Sai no Kawara<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Lamentations Known Only by Jizo<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>Eika Ebisu LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>動物霊が多いな<fix123>河の向こうからやって来たって事は<fix123><fix123>間違いなさそうだな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Lotta beast spirits here, huh?<fix123>Looks like they're coming from across the river,<fix123><fix123>no doubt about it.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そこのお前！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, you there!<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>河原のアイドル水子<fix123>戎 瓔花<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Stillborn Idol of the Riverbed<fix123>Eika Ebisu<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>こんなところで暴れるから<fix123><fix123>積み石がみんな崩れちゃったよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>All the stones we were stacking fell over<fix123><fix123>because you were thrashing around!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>積み石？<fix123><fix123>そんなもん崩れる為にあるもんだ<fix123>小鬼が崩す手間が省けて<fix123><fix123>良かったじゃないか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The stones?<fix123>Those things basically exist to get knocked over.<fix123>I saved ya the trouble of havin' those little oni<fix123><fix123>knock 'em over for ya. You should be thankin' me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>小鬼だって一つずつ崩さないのに……<fix123><fix123>鬼よりも酷い！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Even the little oni don't knock them over one by one...<fix123><fix123>You're worse than an oni!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ジェリーストーン<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Jelly Stone<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この鬼が！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You oni!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eika Ebisu DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ぐぐぐ……強い<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Gugugu... So strong...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もうおしまいか？<fix123><fix123>骨のない奴だな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You done already?<fix123><fix123>Talk about boneless.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>骨……<fix123><fix123>骨の事を言ったー！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Boneless...?<fix123><fix123>You're talking to ME about BONES?!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>な、なんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>W-What's wrong?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>骨なんて……無くたって問題ないもん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who... who cares if I don't have any bones!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>三途の河(こんなところ)に<fix123><fix123>生身の人間とは<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I never thought I'd see a flesh and blood human<fix123><fix123>in the Sanzu River(a place like this).<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Urumi Ushizaki ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>古代魚の子連れ番人<fix123>牛崎 潤美<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Parental Guardian of Ancient Fish<fix123>Urumi Ushizaki<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>迷い込んだのかい？<fix123><fix123>ここは生きた人間が来るところじゃないぞ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are you lost?<fix123><fix123>This isn't a place for the living.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>丁度良いところに<fix123><fix123>面白そうな奴がいるじゃないか<fix123>目的地の方角がわからなくて<fix123><fix123>イライラしてたんだ<fix123>お前を倒して<fix123><fix123>気持ちを入れ替えてやる！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Perfect timing.<fix123><fix123>You seem like the fun type.<fix123>I've lost the way to my destination, see,<fix123><fix123>an' I'm a little ticked off.<fix123>I bet I'll feel way better<fix123><fix123>once I beat you up!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんと、自暴自棄な……<fix123>私も久しく人を<fix123><fix123>襲っていないんでねぇ……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wow, talk about desperate...<fix123>I have to say, it's been a while<fix123><fix123>since I last attacked a human...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 石の赤子と水中の牛<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Stone Baby and the Submerged Bovine<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>望むところだ！<fix123><fix123>お前を古代魚の餌にしてやろう！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>As you wish, then!<fix123><fix123>I'll turn you into food for my ancient fish!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Urumi Ushizaki DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>むぐぐ、強いな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Mrgh. You're strong.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さあ教えな<fix123>彼岸の方向はどっちだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A'ight, spit it out.<fix123>Which way to Higan?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>心配するな<fix123><fix123>ここは彼岸の近くだ<fix123>でも彼岸に行きたいなら<fix123>死神に連れて行ってもらえば<fix123><fix123>良かったんじゃないか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Don't worry,<fix123><fix123>we're pretty close to Higan already.<fix123>But if that's where you're headed...<fix123>Wouldn't it have been better<fix123><fix123>to have the shinigami take you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>緊急事態なんだ<fix123><fix123>あんな暢気な船旅は御免だね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This is an emergency.<fix123><fix123>I don't have time for a pleasure cruise!<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Checkpoint of Oniwatari ~ Lonely Amaryllis<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Higan<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Everlasting Red Spider Lily<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kutaka Niwatari ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>閻魔(えんま)様から話は聞いています<fix123>容赦無く、貴方を試しなさいってね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've heard about you from the Yama.<fix123>She told me to test you with no mercy!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kutaka Niwatari EXITS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Kutaka Niwatari ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>地獄へ行こうとしている<fix123><fix123>だけありますね<fix123>中々の腕前でございます<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Just as I'd expect from someone<fix123><fix123>trying to get to Hell.<fix123>You're quite skilled indeed.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前は何者だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>And who're you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地獄関所の番頭神<fix123>庭渡 久侘歌<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Clerical God of Hell's Checkpoint<fix123>Kutaka Niwatari<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は、久(く)侘(た)歌(か)<fix123><fix123>地獄の関所を見張っています<fix123>貴方が地獄で耐えられるのか<fix123><fix123>試していました<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I am Kutaka. I watch over<fix123><fix123>the border checkpoint of Hell.<fix123>I've been testing you,<fix123><fix123>to see if you're capable of withstanding Hell.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほう、じゃあもう十分だろ<fix123><fix123>地獄に行かせてくれ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh? I'm sure you've seen enough, then.<fix123><fix123>Lemme through.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うーん、まだまだ<fix123><fix123>とてもとても……<fix123>その程度では地獄の一丁目にも<fix123><fix123>辿り着けないと思いますよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmm... not quite.<fix123><fix123>At your level...<fix123>I doubt you'd even make it<fix123><fix123>to the first ward of Hell.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>じゃあさっきまでみたいな奴じゃなくて<fix123><fix123>地獄レベルの攻撃をしてきなよ<fix123>全部いなしてやるからさ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Then stop it with the kiddy stuff,<fix123><fix123>and hit me with some Hell-level attacks!<fix123>I'll dodge 'em all!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: セラフィックチキン<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Seraphic Chicken<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>勿論そのつもりです<fix123><fix123>地獄に行く前に地獄を見せましょう！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Of course. That was the plan.<fix123><fix123>I'll show you Hell before you even set foot inside![1]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kutaka Niwatari DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>お、お見事です<fix123>何故、閻魔様が貴方に許可を出す様に<fix123><fix123>仰ってたのか判りました<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>W-Well done.<fix123>Now I understand why the Yama<fix123><fix123>said to give you permission.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>その昔、閻(そ)魔(い)様(つ)もやっつけたことが<fix123><fix123>あるからな<fix123>さーて、次はいよいよ地獄か……<fix123>どんな強い奴がいるんだろうな！<fix123>全部蹴散らせてやるぜ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I mean, I DID beat up the Yama(her) that one time.<fix123>So, next up is finally Hell, huh...?<fix123>I don't care how strong they are down there!<fix123><fix123>I'll kick all their butts!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうそう、思い出しました<fix123><fix123>貴方に一つ大切な忠告がありました<fix123>閻魔様曰く、貴方に憑依している<fix123><fix123>動物霊を信用しない方が良いそうです<fix123>それでは地獄をお楽しみ下さい<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh right, that reminds me.<fix123><fix123>I have one more important warning for you.<fix123>According to the Yama, it'd be unwise to<fix123><fix123>trust that beast spirit possessing you.<fix123>And with that, please enjoy your time in Hell.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>万苦の業風<fix123> Darkside of Paradise<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Karmic Wind of Myriad Sufferings ~ Darkside of Paradise<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地獄 (詳細位置の特定不能)<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hell (Specific Location Unknown)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: アンロケイテッドヘル<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Unlocated Hell<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yachie Kicchou ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>生身の人間ですね<fix123>地獄は絶望的に広いですよ<fix123>私が案内しましょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, a human of flesh and blood.<fix123>Hell is hopelessly large, you know?<fix123>Allow me to guide you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yachie Kicchou EXITS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Yachie Kicchou ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>よく付いて来られたね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You've done well to follow me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はあはあ<fix123>地獄の風はこたえるなぁ<fix123>でもやっと追い詰めたぜ！<fix123>地上を支配しようとする動物霊は<fix123>お前だな！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huff, huff...<fix123>Hell's winds sure take a toll on ya.<fix123>But I finally caught up to you!<fix123>You're the beast spirit<fix123>who's trying to take over the surface!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>鬼傑組 組長<fix123>吉弔 八千慧<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Matriarch of the Kiketsu Family<fix123>Yachie Kicchou<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方は動物霊を征伐に来たのですね<fix123>でも貴方が倒すべき動物霊は<fix123>私ではないですし<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, you came here to subjugate the beast spirits?<fix123>Alas, I'm afraid that the beast<fix123>spirit you are looking for is not me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: トータスドラゴン　～　幸運と不運<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Tortoise Dragon ~ Good Fortune and Bad Fortune<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方の敵となる動物霊は<fix123>地獄(ここ)にはいません<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The beast spirits you see as your enemy,<fix123>are  not here in Hell.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？<fix123>だ、だって実際に地獄から<fix123>動物霊が現れて……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123>B-But the beast spirits are<fix123>coming up from Hell......<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>動物霊が人間界に行くのに<fix123>地獄を経由するしかなかったのでしょう<fix123>敵のところまで案内して<fix123>やりましょうか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This is because they had to pass through Hell to reach<fix123>the Human Realm from the Animal Realm.<fix123>How about I<fix123>guide you to your enemy?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そ、その話をもっと詳しく<fix123>聞きたいぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>T-Tell me more<fix123>about that.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>決まりですね<fix123>私に勝てたら<fix123>本当の敵の居場所を教えましょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Then it's decided.<fix123>If you can beat me,<fix123>I'll tell you where your real enemy is.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yachie Kicchou DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>す、すばらしい<fix123>貴方のような人間なら大丈夫でしょう<fix123>では、倒すべき敵の下へ<fix123>貴方を案内します<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>W-wonderful!<fix123><fix123>With a human like you, everything should go just fine.<fix123>I will now guide you to the<fix123>enemy you must defeat.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前は一体何者だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who exactly are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は鬼傑組(きけつぐみ)の組長です<fix123>それ以上に説明が必要でしょうか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I am the leader of the Kiketsu family.<fix123>Do you really need any further explanation?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>鬼傑組、組長……！？<fix123>何でだろう、初めて聞いた筈なのに<fix123>何故か知っているような……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Leader of the Kiketsu family......?!<fix123>What the... I've only heard of them just now,<fix123>but I already know her somehow...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方は動物霊の侵略を止めに<fix123>来ただけの人間です<fix123>私が敵がいる場所を教えます<fix123>貴方の役目はその敵を倒す事だけ<fix123>ですからね……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're the human who came<fix123>to stop the beast spirits' invasion.<fix123>I'm going to tell you where the enemy is.<fix123>Your role is simply to defeat said enemy.<fix123>Nothing more...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何か釈然としないが……<fix123>まあ敵と戦えるなら何でもいいや<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm not really satisfied with that answer, but......<fix123>I guess it's fine as long as I can fight the enemy.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>動物霊は地獄のお隣にある<fix123><fix123>畜生(ちくしょう)界にいます<fix123>その畜生界の中心に<fix123><fix123>一際目立つ建造物があって<fix123>そこが敵の本拠地なのです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The beast spirits are in the Animal Realm,<fix123><fix123>located next door to Hell.<fix123>There's a particularly prominent structure<fix123><fix123>located in the center of the Animal Realm...<fix123>That's the enemy's main base.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>敵は畜生界の中心だな！？<fix123>何だかワクワクしてきたぜ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The enemy's in the center of the Animal Realm, right!?<fix123>I'm kinda getting excited now!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さすが心強いぞ！<fix123>オオカミに選ばれし勁牙(けいが)の戦士よ！<fix123>さあ行け！<fix123><fix123>呪い極めた鬼形(きぎょう)の敵を滅せよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Truly reassuring as I'd expect!<fix123>Oh warrior of Keiga, chosen by the wolves!<fix123>Now, go!<fix123>Destroy that demon-shaped enemy, cursed in extremity!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>畜生メトロポリス<fix123> Beastly Dystopia<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Tiragyoni Metropolis ~ Beastly Dystopia<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>畜生界<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Animal Realm<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ビーストメトロポリス<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Beast Metropolis<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mayumi Joutougu ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Mayumi Joutougu EXITS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>何だここは<fix123>さっきまでの地獄とは<fix123>大違いだな<fix123>さっきの奴が言っていた<fix123>畜生界の中心の建造物って<fix123>アレのことなのか……？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Whoa,<fix123>this place is very different<fix123>from Hell back there.<fix123>Is that the "structure in the<fix123>center of the Animal Realm"<fix123>that the person back there mentioned......?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mayumi Joutouguu ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>人間？<fix123>さっさと霊長園に戻らないと<fix123><fix123>飢えた畜生達に捕らわれるよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A human?<fix123>You'd better get back to the Primate Spirit Garden post-haste,<fix123><fix123>or else you'll be captured by starving beasts.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>霊長園って何だ？<fix123>あそこに見える、古墳の事か？<fix123><fix123>確かに霊(・)園(・)だもんな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What's the Primate Spirit Garden?<fix123>Do you mean that burial mound thing over there?<fix123><fix123>It's certainly a garden for spirits.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>霊長園を知らないだって？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You don't know about the Primate Spirit Garden?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>埴輪兵長<fix123>杖刀偶　磨弓<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Haniwa Lance Corporal<fix123>Mayumi Joutougu<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>と言うかお前……<fix123>畜生界の人間霊じゃないな！<fix123>生身の人間だ！<fix123>どうやって、この究極の弱肉強食の<fix123>畜生界で生き延びてきた？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Actually, speaking of which...<fix123>You're not a human spirit from the Animal Realm!<fix123><fix123>You're a flesh-and-blood human!<fix123>How did you manage to survive in<fix123><fix123>such a dog-eat-dog place as this?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私はここの住人じゃない<fix123>動物霊達を退治しに<fix123>地上からやってきたんだ……<fix123>……<fix123>（くっ、身体が動かない！？<fix123>……まさかオオカミ霊の仕業か！）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm not a resident of this place.<fix123>I came here from the surface to<fix123><fix123>exterminate the beast spirits, and......<fix123>......<fix123>(Ugh, why can't I move!?<fix123>...Is the wolf spirit doing this?!)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: セラミックスの杖刀人<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Joutounin of Ceramics<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふっふっふ<fix123>私は、お前達を破壊する為だけに<fix123><fix123>生身の人間を連れてきた！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh heh heh!<fix123>I brought a live human down here<fix123><fix123>just to destroy the lot of you!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴様から感じる霊気……<fix123><fix123>まさか、オオカミ霊なのか？<fix123>生身の人間を操るなんて<fix123>オオカミにそんな頭脳があるとは……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That aura I feel from you...<fix123>Could you be a wolf spirit?<fix123>To think that a wolf would be smart enough<fix123>to rely on a living human...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この為だけにあのにっくき鬼傑組の<fix123>奴らと同盟を結んだのだ！<fix123>お前達、呪われし偶像どもから<fix123>人間霊(えさ)を解放する！<fix123>覚悟しろ！<fix123>弱肉強食こそ、畜生界の理(ことわり)だ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>For this sole reason, we formed an alliance<fix123>with that loathsome Kiketsu family!<fix123>I shall liberate the human spirits(our prey)<fix123>from you accursed idols!<fix123>Prepare yourself!<fix123>It's the law of the Animal Realm that the strong eat the weak!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mayumi Joutougu DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>つ、強い！　生身の人間とは<fix123><fix123>この様な物だったのか……！<fix123>なんと恐ろしい策……！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>S-so strong! So this is what<fix123><fix123>living humans are like...!<fix123>What a fearsome strategy...!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（よし！<fix123><fix123>これならば勝てる！）<fix123>（ありがとう！<fix123><fix123>人間の魔法使いよ！）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Yes!<fix123><fix123>I'll be sure to win at this rate!)<fix123>(You have my thanks,<fix123><fix123>human magician!)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……<fix123>まさかオオカミ霊に<fix123><fix123>身体を乗っ取られるとはな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>......<fix123>Can't believe I let a wolf<fix123><fix123>spirit hijack my body.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（すまなかった<fix123>私だ、オオカミ霊だ）<fix123>（しかし貴方のお陰で<fix123>霊長園に入る事が出来る）<fix123>（あと少しだ……！）<fix123>（あと少しで畜生界は<fix123>動物霊の支配に戻る）<fix123>（そうすれば、地上への<fix123>動物霊の侵攻も止まるだろう）<fix123>（安心するがよい<fix123>貴方と目的は一致している）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Sorry about that.<fix123>It's me, the wolf spirit.)<fix123>(But thanks to you, we can gain entry<fix123>to the Primate Spirit Garden.)<fix123>(Just a little further...!)<fix123>(Just a little further, and we beast spirits<fix123>can take back control of the Animal Realm.)<fix123>(If we do that, the beast spirits' invasion of<fix123>the surface will be sure to cease as well.)<fix123>(Worry not.<fix123>Our objectives are the same.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>これは埴輪兵士が作られてから<fix123><fix123>初めての緊急事態だわ！<fix123>早くみんなに知らせないと！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This is the first emergency situation we've had<fix123><fix123>since the Haniwa Soldiers were created!<fix123>I have to go alert everyone quick!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>変な話になってきたな<fix123>でも、ここまで来たら<fix123>後には退けなくなってきたぜ！<fix123>この畜生界で何が起こっているのか<fix123>この手で確かめてやる！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, this has gotten pretty weird.<fix123>But I've gone this far,<fix123>so no reason to back off now!<fix123>I'll find out what's happening in the<fix123>Animal Realm with my own two hands!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>イドラデウス<fix123> Idola-Deus<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Deus ex Idola ~ Idola-Deus<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>霊長園 墳墓内部<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Primate Spirit Garden - Tumulus Base Interior<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: エレクトリックヘリテージ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Electric Heritage<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mayumi Joutougu ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>生身の人間がこんなに<fix123><fix123>強い生き物だなんて！<fix123>夢のような現実だわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>To think that living humans<fix123>were such strong creatures!<fix123>Everything feels like a dream!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mayumi Joutougu DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ここが、古墳内部か……<fix123>異質さに異質さを重ねて来たな<fix123>オオカミ霊、敵は何処だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So this is what's inside the burial mound, huh...<fix123>This place is just weird on top of weird.<fix123>Wolf spirit, where's our enemy?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（……）<fix123>（な、何だこれは！？）<fix123>（自然豊かだった霊長園が……<fix123>あいつ等、許さないぞ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(....)<fix123>(W-what is all this?!)<fix123>(The Garden was so full of nature, but now...<fix123>I'll never forgive those curs!)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Keiki Haniyasushin ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>来客とは珍しい<fix123>もう私達に敵う者などいないと<fix123><fix123>悲しんでいたのに……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A guest? How rare.<fix123>And here, I had almost shed a tear at the fact<fix123><fix123>that nobody was left to fight against us...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ついに見つけたぞ！<fix123>畜生の理を破りし破壊神！<fix123>埴安神(はにやすしん) 袿姫(けいき)！<fix123>お前の偶像を破壊する為に<fix123>生身の人間を連れてきたぞ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've finally found you!<fix123>The god of destruction who defies the law of beasts!<fix123>Keiki Haniyasushin!<fix123>I brought a live human along<fix123>to destroy your idols!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>孤立無援が誂えた造形神<fix123>埴安神　袿姫<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Sculptor God Crafted by Utter Isolation<fix123>Keiki Haniyasushin<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>生身の人間だって！？<fix123>そんな馬鹿な話……<fix123>誰が信じるもんですか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A live human?!<fix123>That's ridiculous...<fix123>Who would believe that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>馬鹿な話ですまんな<fix123>私は人間だぜ<fix123>お前は何者なんだ？<fix123>私は動物霊に導かれてここまで<fix123>やってきたんだが……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm sorry that I'm ridiculous.<fix123>I'm the human.<fix123>Who are you?<fix123>I came here led by<fix123>all the beast spirits, but......<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あっはっは<fix123>なる程、確かに人間のようね<fix123>でも、何も知らない愚かな<fix123>人間を騙して連れてきて<fix123>一体、何になると思っているの？<fix123>オオカミ霊さん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ahahah!<fix123>I see. You certainly do seem to be a human.<fix123>But what exactly do you<fix123>hope to accomplish,<fix123>by tricking and dragging along some foolish human who<fix123><fix123>doesn't know anything? Care to answer, wolf spirit?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方、噛みつくしか能の無い<fix123>勁牙組(けいがぐみ)のオオカミでしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're a wolf from the Keiga Family, right?<fix123>Useless for anything except biting?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……なぜ判った<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...How'd you know?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふっふっふ<fix123>人間よ<fix123><fix123>動物霊に騙されるな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh heh heh.<fix123>You there, human.<fix123>Don't let this beast spirit deceive you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>えっ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は畜生どもから<fix123>人間霊を守る造形神(イドラデウス)よ<fix123>人間同士戦う必要なんてない<fix123>そう思わないかい？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I am the sculptor god(Idola Deus) who protects the<fix123>human spirits from those foul beasts.<fix123>There's no need for fellow humans to fight each other.<fix123>Don't you agree?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？<fix123><fix123>お前は人間なのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123><fix123>Are you human?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>騙されるな、魔法使いよ<fix123>こいつは自然の摂理を<fix123>破壊する邪神だ！<fix123>こいつは動物の敵であり、人間の敵だ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Don't be fooled, magician.<fix123>She's a wicked god who destroyed<fix123>the divine blessing of Nature!<fix123>She's an enemy of beasts and humans both!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何だ何だ？<fix123><fix123>訳がわからないぞ<fix123>どっちが嘘を吐いているんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wh-what?<fix123><fix123>I don't really get it.<fix123>Who's spitting lies here?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>動物と私のどっちを信じるか<fix123><fix123>悩む方がどうかしているわ<fix123>私は迫害されていた人間霊を<fix123><fix123>救った神なのよ<fix123>今、お前に憑いている<fix123><fix123>動物霊こそが、人間の敵よ！<fix123>どうだ……<fix123><fix123>私の味方にならないか……？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>To trust in me or the beast spirit?<fix123><fix123>I wonder why you hesitate?<fix123>I am a god that saved<fix123><fix123>the humans who were being persecuted!<fix123>The beast spirit possessing you right now<fix123><fix123>is the enemy of mankind!<fix123>Well?<fix123><fix123>Won't you join my side...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（ま、まずい！<fix123><fix123>耳を傾けている場合じゃないぞ、人間！）<fix123>（こいつの造形術が来る！<fix123><fix123>動物霊達(われわれ)は、皆これにやられたんだ！）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(T-this is bad!<fix123>There's no time to lend her an ear, human!)<fix123>(She's about to unleash her sculpting arts!<fix123>Every last one of us beast spirits was defeated by them!)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 偶像に世界を委ねて　～ Idoratrize World<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Entrusting this World to Idols ~ Idolatrize World<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>一旦退却だ！<fix123><fix123>逃げろ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We must retreat for now!<fix123><fix123>RUN!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何か策がありそうだったのに<fix123>敵前逃亡とは……！<fix123>失望したぞ<fix123>畜生は所詮、畜生だな<fix123>そうだ、人間の肉を滅して<fix123>土と水で美しく造り直してやる！<fix123>折角の地上の人間だ！<fix123>畜生界一の偶像(アイドル)にしてやろう！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Even though you seemed like you had a plan...<fix123>To flee right before your foe...!<fix123>I'm disappointed, you know.<fix123>I guess beasts will be beasts after all.<fix123>That's it. I'll destroy this human's body of flesh,<fix123>and build it anew from soil and water!<fix123>Humans from the surface are rare!<fix123>I'll make you the best idol in the Animal Realm!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Keiki Haniyasushin PAUSES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>人間よ、よく耐えた！<fix123><fix123>まもなく応援が来るぞ！<fix123>もうこっちが強者だ！<fix123><fix123>孤独な邪神にトドメを刺せ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You've done well to survive this long, human!<fix123>Our reinforcements will arrive in seconds!<fix123>We are the strong ones now!<fix123>Land the finishing blow on this lonesome, wicked god!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Keiki Haniyasushin DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>千万無量の無念<fix123> Infinity Make-work<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Innumerable Regrets ~ Infinity Make-work<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>賽の河原<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sai no Kawara<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM:地蔵だけが知る哀嘆<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Lamentations Known Only by Jizo<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eika Ebisu ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Eika Ebisu LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>動物霊だらけね<fix123>でもこんなところで手こずっている<fix123><fix123>場合じゃないわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yep, there's beast spirits all over the place.<fix123>But I've got no time to waste floundering<fix123><fix123>around in some place like this.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そこのお前！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, you there!<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>河原のアイドル水子<fix123>戎 瓔花<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Stillborn Idol of the Riverbed<fix123>Eika Ebisu<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>こんなところで暴れるから<fix123><fix123>積み石がみんな崩れちゃったよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>All the stones we were stacking fell over<fix123><fix123>because you were thrashing around!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんだって？<fix123>こんな河原で石を積んでいる<fix123><fix123>お前が悪いんだよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What's that? You dare blame me?<fix123>It's YOUR fault for stacking pebbles<fix123><fix123>on the riverside, of all places!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>こ、こいつ……！<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>BGM: ジェリーストーン<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Jelly Stone<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>石を積むことを馬鹿にしたなー！<fix123><fix123>許さん、死ねい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How dare you mock the art of stone-stacking!<fix123><fix123>Unforgivable! Dieee!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eika Ebisu DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ぐぐぐ……強い<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Gugugu... So strong...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>喜びなさいよ<fix123>私が動物霊達を集めたから<fix123><fix123>思う存分に石が積めるのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You should feel honored.<fix123>Thanks to me gathering all the beast spirits,<fix123> <fix123>you can stack stones to your heart's content.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前が来てなければ<fix123><fix123>最初から石は積めてたんだ<fix123>今日の積み石コンテストは<fix123><fix123>台無しだわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We would've been stacking them from the<fix123><fix123>very beginning if you hadn't come along...<fix123>Today's stone-stacking contest<fix123><fix123>is completely ruined!<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>A Baby Carved from Granite ~ Cross the Styx<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Sanzu River<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>Urumi Ushizaki LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>いつになったら向こう岸に着くのかな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's taking me forever to reach the other side...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>三途の河(こんなところ)に<fix123><fix123>生身の人間とは<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I never thought I'd see a flesh and blood human<fix123><fix123>in the Sanzu River(a place like this).<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Urumi Ushizaki ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>凶暴な魚に引きずり込まれたいのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are you looking to get dragged down by some savage fish?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おお、丁度良いところに現れた<fix123>この河、無駄に広いんで<fix123><fix123>方角がわからなくなっちゃって<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, you showed up at the perfect time.<fix123>This river is so unnecessarily vast<fix123><fix123>that I lost track of where I'm going.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>古代魚の子連れ番人<fix123>牛崎 潤美<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Parental Guardian of Ancient Fish<fix123>Urumi Ushizaki<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私に道案内をさせようと<fix123><fix123>言うのか<fix123>……ふっふっふ、良いだろう<fix123><fix123>行き先は私が決めてやろう<fix123>幻想郷か？<fix123><fix123>それとも……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are you saying you want<fix123>me to guide you?<fix123>...Heh heh heh. All right, fine.<fix123><fix123>But I'll choose the destination for you.<fix123>Would you rather return to Gensokyo?<fix123><fix123>Or perhaps...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 石の赤子と水中の牛<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Stone Baby and the Submerged Bovine<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>やはりあの世に<fix123><fix123>送ってやろうか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Would you like me to send you<fix123><fix123>to the world beyond, after all?!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Urumi Ushizaki DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>おお、何という強さ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Whoa, that's some power all right.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何があの世送りだって？<fix123>私が行きたいのは<fix123><fix123>あの世の先の地獄よ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sending me to the world beyond? Pah.<fix123>I'm going even further beyond that,<fix123><fix123>for your information! To Hell!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地獄だって？<fix123>何と恐ろしいことを言う……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You wanna go to Hell?<fix123>What a frightenin' thing to say...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地獄まで行く勇気の無い奴は<fix123><fix123>お呼びでないわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I have no business with those who lack<fix123><fix123>the courage to go there. Begone.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>鬼渡の関所<fix123> Lonely Amaryllis<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Checkpoint of Oniwatari ~ Lonely Amaryllis<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>彼岸<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Higan<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 不朽の曼珠沙華<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Everlasting Red Spider Lily<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kutaka Niwatari ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>閻魔(えんま)様から話は聞いています<fix123>容赦無く、貴方を試しなさいってね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've heard about you from the Yama.<fix123>She told me to test you with no mercy!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kutaka Niwatari EXITS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Kutaka Niwatari ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>地獄へ行こうとしている<fix123><fix123>だけありますね<fix123>中々の腕前でございます<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Just as I'd expect from someone<fix123><fix123>trying to get to Hell.<fix123>You're quite skilled indeed.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もしかして私を試しているの？<fix123><fix123>あんたは一体誰よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are you perhaps trying to test me?<fix123><fix123>Who are you, anyway?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地獄関所の番頭神<fix123>庭渡 久侘歌<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Clerical God of Hell's Checkpoint<fix123>Kutaka Niwatari<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は、久(く)侘(た)歌(か)<fix123><fix123>地獄の関所を見張っています<fix123>閻魔様は地獄に通しても良いと<fix123><fix123>言っていましたが<fix123>私は貴方が地獄に耐えられると<fix123><fix123>思っていないので……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I am Kutaka. I watch over<fix123><fix123>the border checkpoint of Hell.<fix123>The Yama did say that it's<fix123><fix123>okay to let you through...<fix123>But I don't believe you're ready<fix123> <fix123>to go through Hell just yet.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふふふ、ふざけた真似を<fix123>この私が地獄に耐えられるかどうか<fix123><fix123>思う存分に試してみてから言って！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hah hah. Ridiculous!<fix123>Who do you think I am? I can't deal with Hell?<fix123> <fix123>Say that after you take a good stab at me!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>威勢は良いですね<fix123><fix123>さすが、地獄に行くと言うだけある<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How very assertive.<fix123><fix123>I should expect as much from a potential Hell visitor.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: セラフィックチキン<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Seraphic Chicken<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>では、お望み通り<fix123><fix123>存分に試してみましょう！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Very well. I'll test you to your<fix123><fix123>limits, just as you wish!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kutaka Niwatari DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>お、お見事です<fix123>それだけの腕前があれば<fix123><fix123>地獄の鬼にも渡り合えるかも知れません<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>W-Well done.<fix123>With such skill, you may even be able<fix123><fix123>to compete with the oni in Hell.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら、ありがとう<fix123><fix123>最初から判っていた事を教えてくれて<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My, how kind of you to tell me<fix123><fix123>something that I already knew.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうそう、思い出しました<fix123><fix123>貴方に一つ大切な忠告がありました<fix123>閻魔様曰く、貴方に憑依している<fix123><fix123>動物霊を信用しない方が良いそうです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh right, that reminds me.<fix123><fix123>I have one more important warning for you.<fix123>According to the Yama, it'd be unwise to<fix123><fix123>trust that beast spirit possessing you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？<fix123><fix123>それはどういう事？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123><fix123>What's that supposed to mean?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さあ、どういう意味でしょうねぇ<fix123><fix123>私が聞いてもすぐに忘れてしまうので<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I find myself wondering the same thing.<fix123><fix123>I forget things almost right away, you see...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ、あんた、その見た目……<fix123><fix123>もしや鳥頭だね？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Y-you know, now that I take a good look at you...<fix123><fix123>Are you literally a birdbrain?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ニワトリの神様ですからね<fix123><fix123>鳥頭は貴重な能力です<fix123>それでは地獄をお楽しみ下さい<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Of course I am. I'm a chicken deity, after all.<fix123><fix123>Being birdbrained is a valuable trait of mine!<fix123>And with that, please enjoy your time in Hell.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>万苦の業風<fix123> Darkside of Paradise<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Karmic Wind of Myriad Sufferings ~ Darkside of Paradise<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地獄 (詳細位置の特定不能)<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hell (Specific Location Unknown)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: アンロケイテッドヘル<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Unlocated Hell<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yachie Kicchou ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>生身の人間ですね<fix123>地獄は絶望的に広いですよ<fix123>私が案内しましょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, a human of flesh and blood.<fix123>Hell is hopelessly large, you know?<fix123>Allow me to guide you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yachie Kicchou EXITS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Yachie Kicchou ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>よく付いて来られたね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You've done well to follow me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はあはあ<fix123>風が強すぎる……<fix123>でも、ようやく見つけた動物霊なんだから<fix123>逃すわけに行かないでしょ<fix123>私は地上を支配しようとする<fix123><fix123>動物霊を探して地獄(ここ)まできたの<fix123>その動物霊ってあんたなの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huff, huff...<fix123>This wind is way too strong...<fix123>But now that I've finally found you, beast spirit,<fix123>there's no way I'd let you escape.<fix123>I came down here to Hell in search of a beast spirit<fix123>who's plotting to take over the surface world.<fix123>Would that happen to be you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>鬼傑組 組長<fix123>吉弔 八千慧<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Matriarch of the Kiketsu Family<fix123>Yachie Kicchou<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方は動物霊を征伐に来たのですね<fix123>でもあなたが倒すべき<fix123>動物霊がいる場所は……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, you came here to subjugate the beast spirits?<fix123>Alas, I'm afraid that the beast<fix123>spirits you need to defeat...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: トータスドラゴン　～　幸運と不運<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Tortoise Dragon ~ Good Fortune and Bad Fortune<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地獄(ここ)ではないのです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are not here in Hell.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？<fix123>そんなわけないでしょ<fix123>人を騙そうとしているね？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123>No way.<fix123>You're just trying to trick me, aren't you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>信じないというのなら良いですよ<fix123>この無限に広い地獄で永遠に<fix123>彷徨い続ければいい<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If you don't believe me, then fine.<fix123>Feel free to wander forever in<fix123>Hell's infinitely vast space.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ、う<fix123>ちょっとだけ話を聞いてやろうかな？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Uh, er.<fix123>I guess I could hear you out just a little?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふふふ、では決まりですね<fix123>私に勝てたら<fix123>本当の敵の居場所を教えましょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh heh. That settles it, then.<fix123>If you can beat me,<fix123>I'll tell you where your real enemy is.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yachie Kicchou DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>す、素晴らしい<fix123>貴方のような人間なら大丈夫でしょう<fix123>では、倒すべき敵の下へ<fix123>貴方を案内します<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>W-wonderful!<fix123>With a human like you, everything should go just fine.<fix123>I will now guide you to the<fix123>enemy you must defeat.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方は一体何者なの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who exactly are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は鬼傑組(きけつぐみ)の組長です<fix123><fix123>それ以上に説明が必要でしょうか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I am the leader of the Kiketsu family.<fix123>Do you really need any further explanation?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ん？　あれ？<fix123>そういえば疑問なんて<fix123>無かったような……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh? What the...?<fix123>Now that I think about it, I feel like<fix123>I never had any questions...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そのはずです<fix123>貴方は動物霊の侵略を止めに<fix123>来ただけの人間です<fix123>私がその敵がいる場所を教えます<fix123>貴方の役目はそれを倒す事だけ<fix123>ですからね……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Precisely.<fix123>You're just the human who came<fix123>to stop the beast spirits' invasion.<fix123>I'm going to tell you where the enemy is.<fix123>Your role is simply to defeat said enemy.<fix123>Nothing more...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>早く敵の場所を教えてよ<fix123>何か急いで敵の下に行きたいからさ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Alright, then spit it out already.<fix123>I'm not quite sure why, but I want to get there in a hurry...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>動物霊は地獄のお隣にある<fix123>畜生(ちくしょう)界にいます<fix123>その畜生界の中心に<fix123>一際目立つ建造物があって<fix123>そこが敵の本拠地なのです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The beast spirits are in the Animal Realm,<fix123>located next door to Hell.<fix123>There's a particularly prominent structure<fix123>located in the center of the Animal Realm...<fix123>That's the enemy's main base.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>敵は畜生界の中心にいるのね！<fix123>最初からそれだけ<fix123>教えてくれれば良かったのに<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So the enemy's in the center of the Animal Realm!<fix123>Yeesh, you could've just told<fix123>me that from the get-go.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>口先だけでないと信じているぞ<fix123>オオワシに選ばれし剛欲(ごうよく)の騎士よ！<fix123>さあ行け！<fix123><fix123>呪い極めた鬼形(きぎょう)の敵を滅せよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Warrior of Gouyoku[1], chosen by the eagles!<fix123>I trust that you're not just talk!<fix123>Now, go!<fix123>Destroy that demon-shaped enemy, cursed in extremity!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>畜生メトロポリス<fix123> Beastly Dystopia<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Tiryagyoni Metropolis ~ Beastly Dystopia<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>畜生界<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Animal Realm<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ビーストメトロポリス<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Beast Metropolis<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mayumi Joutougu ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Mayumi Joutougu EXITS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ここが畜生界……<fix123>地獄とはまた異質の<fix123>息苦しさがあるわね<fix123>それで<fix123>畜生界の中心の建造物って<fix123>アレのことかしら……？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So this is the Animal Realm...<fix123>It feels just as suffocating as Hell,<fix123>but in a different sort of way.<fix123>So.<fix123>Is that the "structure in the<fix123>center of the Animal Realm"...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A human?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mayumi Joutougu ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>さっさと霊長園に戻らないと<fix123>飢えた畜生達に捕らわれるよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You'd better get back to the Primate Spirit Garden post-haste,<fix123><fix123>or else you'll be captured by starving beasts.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>霊長園？<fix123>後ろの鍵穴みたいな奴かしら<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Primate Spirit Garden?<fix123>Would that be the big keyhole thing behind you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>霊長園を知らないだって？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You don't know about the Primate Spirit Garden?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>埴輪兵長<fix123>杖刀偶　磨弓<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Haniwa Lance Corporal<fix123>Mayumi Joutougu<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>と言うかお前……<fix123>畜生界の人間霊じゃないな！<fix123>生身の人間だ！<fix123>どうやって、この究極の弱肉強食の<fix123>畜生界で生き延びてきた？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Actually, speaking of which...<fix123>You're not a human spirit from the Animal Realm!<fix123>You're a flesh-and-blood human!<fix123>How did you manage to survive in<fix123>such a dog-eat-dog place as this?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私はここの住人じゃなくて<fix123>動物霊達を退治しに<fix123>地上からやって……<fix123>……<fix123>（くっ、意識が乗っ取られる！<fix123>……もしやオオワシ霊の仕業か！？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>For your information, I'm not from here.<fix123>I came from the surface world to<fix123>exterminate the beast spirits, and...<fix123>......<fix123>(Gah, something's taking over my mind!<fix123>...Is this the eagle spirit's doing?!)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: セラミックスの杖刀人<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Joutoujin of Ceramics<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふっふっふ<fix123>私は、お前達を破壊する為だけに<fix123>生身の人間を連れてきた！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh heh heh!<fix123>I brought a live human down here<fix123>just to destroy the lot of you!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴様から感じる霊気……<fix123>まさか、オオワシ霊なのか？<fix123>生身の人間に頼るなんて<fix123>オオワシにそんな謙虚さがあるとは……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That aura I feel from you...<fix123>Could you be an eagle spirit?<fix123>To think that an eagle would be so humble<fix123>as to rely on a living human...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この為だけにあのにっくき鬼傑組の<fix123>奴らと同盟を結んだのだ！<fix123>お前達、呪われし偶像どもから<fix123>人間霊(どれい)を解放する！<fix123>覚悟しろ！<fix123>弱肉強食こそ、畜生界の理(ことわり)だ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>For this sole reason, we formed an alliance<fix123>with that loathsome Kiketsu family!<fix123>I shall liberate the human spirits(slaves)<fix123>from you accursed idols!<fix123>Prepare yourself!<fix123>It's the law of the Animal Realm that the strong eat the weak!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mayumi Joutougu DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>つ、強い！生身の人間とは<fix123>この様な物だったのか……！<fix123>なんと恐ろしい策……！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>S-so strong! So this is what<fix123>living humans are like...!<fix123>What a fearsome strategy...!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（よし！<fix123>これならば勝てる！）<fix123>（ありがとう！<fix123>人間の巫女よ！）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Yes!<fix123>I'll be sure to win at this rate!)<fix123>(You have my thanks,<fix123>human shrine maiden!)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……<fix123>意識が動物霊に乗っ取られている！？<fix123>一体何が起こって……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>.....<fix123>The beast spirit's taking over my mind?!<fix123>What on earth is going on...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（私だ、オオワシ霊だ）<fix123>（貴方と私の二人ならば<fix123>畜生界を取り戻す事が出来る）<fix123>（そうすれば、地上への<fix123>動物霊の侵攻も止まるだろう）<fix123>（貴方にも悪くない話の筈だ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(It's me. The eagle spirit.)<fix123>(With the two of us combined,<fix123>we can take back the Animal Realm!)<fix123>(If we do that, the beast spirits' invasion of<fix123>the surface will be sure to cease as well.)<fix123>(That should sound pretty good to you too, no?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>これは埴輪兵士が作られてから<fix123>初めての緊急事態だわ！<fix123>早くみんなに知らせないと！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This is the first emergency situation we've had<fix123>since the Haniwa Soldiers were created!<fix123>I have to go alert everyone quick!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は一体何と戦っているのかしら<fix123>でも、この先から感じたことのない<fix123>不気味な宗教オーラを感じるわ！<fix123>行こう！<fix123>霊長園とやらに！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...What am I even fighting against right now?<fix123>Still, I can feel a creepy cult aura up ahead,<fix123>like nothing I've ever felt before!<fix123>Let's go!<fix123>We're off to that "Primate Spirit Garden" place!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>イドラデウス<fix123> Idola-Deus<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Deus ex Idola ~ Idola-Deus<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>霊長園 墳墓内部<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Primate Spirit Garden - Tumulus Base Interior<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: エレクトリックヘリテージ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Electric Heritage<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mayumi Joutougu ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>生身の人間がこんなに<fix123>強い生き物だなんて！<fix123>夢のような現実だわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>To think that living humans<fix123>were such strong creatures!<fix123>Everything feels like a dream!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mayumi Joutougu DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>気持ち悪いところねぇ<fix123>お目当ての敵は何処に居るの？<fix123>私に取り憑いているオオワシ霊さん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Man, it's gross in here.<fix123>So, oh eagle spirit possessing me,<fix123>where's the enemy we're searching for?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（……）<fix123>（これがあの霊長園の内部か……）<fix123>（人工物ばかりになって……<fix123>美しい自然は何処に！）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(....)<fix123>(This is the interior of the Garden...?)<fix123>(It's filled with man-made material now...!<fix123>What happened to the beautiful nature?!)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Keiki Haniyasushin ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>来客とは珍しい<fix123>もう私達に敵う者などいないと<fix123>悲しんでいたのに……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A guest? How rare.<fix123>And here, I had almost shed a tear at the fact<fix123>that nobody was left to fight against us...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>出てきたか<fix123>畜生の理を破りし破壊神！<fix123>埴安神 袿姫(はにやすしん　けいき)！<fix123>お前の天下はもう終わりだ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So there you are, eh?<fix123>The god of destruction who defies the law of beasts!<fix123>Keiki Haniyasushin!<fix123>Your reign ends here!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>孤立無援が誂えた造形神<fix123>埴安神　袿姫<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Sculptor God Crafted by Utter Isolation<fix123>Keiki Haniyasushin<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>破壊神だって？<fix123>酷いわねぇ<fix123>この食うか食われるかの畜生界で<fix123>私ほど物を生み出している者もいないわよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>God of destruction?<fix123>Talk about rude.<fix123>In this eat-or-be-eaten Animal Realm,<fix123>there's nobody else who's created as much as I have.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あのー、えっと<fix123>貴方は何者なの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, uh.<fix123>Who are you, exactly?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>へっ？<fix123>さっきは私を知っているような素振りを……<fix123>……って、もしかしてお前<fix123>人間！？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123>You were acting like you knew me a second ago...<fix123>...Wait, are you a human?!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうよ、人間よ<fix123>動物霊達を退治しようと思っていたら<fix123>こんなところまで来ちゃった<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yep, I'm human!<fix123>I thought I'd go exterminate the beast spirits,<fix123>but somehow I wound up here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方は黙ってて！<fix123>今は目の前の邪神を倒す<fix123>チャンスなんだぞ<fix123>今だけは、このオオワシ様が<fix123>博麗霊夢になる！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Silence, you!<fix123>This is my chance to defeat the<fix123>wicked god standing before us.<fix123>For just this moment, I, the mighty eagle,<fix123>shall be Reimu Hakurei!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なる程……取り憑いて<fix123>人間をここまで連れてきたのか<fix123>でも、何も知らない愚かな<fix123>人間を騙して連れてきて<fix123>一体、何になると思っているの？<fix123>オオワシ霊さん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see... you possessed a human<fix123>and brought them all the way here.<fix123>But what exactly do you<fix123>hope to accomplish...<fix123>By tricking and dragging along some foolish human who<fix123><fix123>doesn't know anything? Care to answer, eagle spirit?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前は、剛欲(ごうよく)同盟だっけ？<fix123>プライドだけ高くて<fix123>実力は他に劣る事で有名な……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're from the Gouyoku Alliance, right?<fix123>Famous for being ridiculously prideful, but<fix123>lacking in capabilities in every other area...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふん、しかしお前を倒せば<fix123>畜生界一の座を奪えるさ<fix123>生身の人間が苦手だって聞いたぞ！<fix123>さあ、勝負しろ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmph. But if I defeat you,<fix123>I can steal the Animal Realm's top seat!<fix123>I heard that you're weak against living humans, too!<fix123>Now, have at thee!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふっふっふ<fix123>人間よ<fix123>動物霊に騙されるな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh heh heh.<fix123>You there, human.<fix123>Don't let this beast spirit deceive you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>えっ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は畜生どもから<fix123>人間霊を守る造形神(イドラデウス)よ<fix123>人間同士戦う必要なんてない<fix123>そう思わないかい？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I am the sculptor god(Idola Deus) who protects the<fix123>human spirits from those foul beasts.<fix123>There's no need for fellow humans to fight each other.<fix123>Don't you agree?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>に、人間同士……！？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>F-fellow humans...?!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>騙されるでないぞ、巫女よ<fix123>こいつは人間の味方なんかじゃない<fix123>自分を喚び出した人間霊を<fix123>破滅に追い込んだ邪神だぞ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Don't be fooled, shrine maiden!<fix123>She's no ally of humans at all.<fix123>She's a wicked god who drove the human spirits<fix123>who summoned her to their destruction!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>う、うう……<fix123>何か面倒なことに巻き込まれているような<fix123>しかし、お前からは邪悪なオーラが見える！<fix123>取り敢えず倒してから考える！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>U-urgh...<fix123>I feel like I've gotten dragged into something really obnoxious.<fix123>But I can see an evil aura around you!<fix123>I'll beat you for starters, and then think things over!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう、勘が鈍いのねぇ<fix123>今なら見逃してあげると<fix123>言っているのに気が付かないなんて<fix123>しかたがない<fix123>しかたがないねぇ……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah. Your intuition certainly isn't very sharp.<fix123>I'm saying that I'll let you off the hook if you<fix123>back off now, but you didn't notice at all...<fix123>What a shame.<fix123>What a crying shame...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（まずい事になったぞ、人間！<fix123>時間をかけすぎた！）<fix123>（こいつの造形術が来る！<fix123>動物霊達(われわれ)は、皆これにやられたんだ！）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Human, this is bad!<fix123>We let her stall for too long!)<fix123>(She's about to unleash her sculpting arts!<fix123>Every last one of us beast spirits was defeated by them!)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 偶像に世界を委ねて　～ Idoratrize World<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Entrusting this World to Idols ~ Idolatrize World<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>一旦退却だ！<fix123>逃げろ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We must retreat for now!<fix123>RUN!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>策を練ってきて敵前逃亡とは……！<fix123>愚の骨頂だな<fix123>神域を冒して乗り込んできておいて<fix123>逃げられると思うなよ？<fix123>肉のお前を滅して<fix123>土と水で美しく造り直してやる！<fix123>お前は一点の瑕もなき偶像(アイドル)として<fix123>未来永劫語り継がれるだろう！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You built up this whole plan, and now you flee<fix123>in the face of the enemy...! Truly the height of idiocy.<fix123>Don't think for a second that I'll let you escape<fix123>after you violated my sacred territory to this extent.<fix123>I'll destroy your body of flesh, and<fix123>build you anew from soil and water!<fix123>You shall be an idol without a single flaw,<fix123>told of for ages and ages to come!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Keiki Haniyasushin PAUSES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>人間よ、よく耐えた！<fix123>まもなく応援が来るぞ！<fix123>もうこっちが強者だ！<fix123>孤独な邪神にトドメを刺せ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You've done well to survive this long, human!<fix123>Our reinforcements will arrive in seconds!<fix123>We are the strong ones now!<fix123>Land the finishing blow on this lonesome, wicked god!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Keiki Haniyasushin DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
The Hakurei Shrine.<fix123>
A shrine on the eastern end of Gensokyo. Commonly known as the "Youkai Shrine."<fix123>
"Now that you're back, Reimu,<fix123> the spring at the shrine is going to end soon, huh?"<fix123>
"I sure hope so."<fix123>
"You sound awfully unsure. You did manage to meet the mastermind, right?"<fix123>
"Of course I did.<fix123> I made sure she wouldn't spread her activities to the fairies."<fix123>
"Spread to the fairies?"<fix123>
"She was making the fairies go berserk,<fix123> which was apparently making the seasons go out of control."<fix123>
"So now that I made her stop,<fix123> it should gradually return to normal. Pretty sure anyway."<fix123>
"Hmm... Sounds like you're not telling me something."<fix123>
"Actually... I never got a promise from her or anything.<fix123> I just kinda shouted at her to stop it mid-fight."<fix123>
"It seems I got caught in her trap,<fix123> so she got away."<fix123>
"Oh my, that's rare for you, Reimu."<fix123>
"It looked like she could open doors to go anywhere in an instant,<fix123> so she had vanished before I realized what was going on."<fix123>
"But, I know it'll all work out."<fix123>
"I mean, you always win in the end, right Reimu?"<fix123>
"I sure hope so, but..."<fix123>
"If I don't do something about those mysterious back doors,<fix123> she could be hiding anywhere. What a pain."<fix123>
"Back doors... oh!"<fix123>
"I did manage to find her by jumping into the door of a Jizo I met in the forest though."<fix123>
"In that case, shouldn't finding her again be a piece of cake?<fix123> I mean, right on your back you have..."<fix123>
Aunn pointed to Reimu's back.<fix123>
Attached to it was a mysterious door.<fix123>
However, Reimu wasn't surprised.<fix123>
They were a group who didn't mind throwing Gensokyo's entire climate into chaos.<fix123>
They weren't bothered by being discovered, but surely they'd at least keep an eye on her.<fix123>
But this was her chance.<fix123>
Reimu vowed to reenter a back door and have a rematch with the mysterious hidden god.<fix123>
But this time, instead of equipping a sub-season...<fix123>
<c$Ending No. 01 — Resolved to a Rematch$><fix123>
<c$Congratulations!$><fix123><c$No Continue Clear!$><fix123>
The Hakurei Shrine.<fix123>
A shrine located on the eastern outskirts.<fix123>
"Huh? What?<fix123>
When did I get to the shrine?"<fix123>
"Oh I see, she used one of those back doors to get away.<fix123>
Darn it! Next time I'll have to end it quick so she can't get away!"<fix123>
She thought her weapon had been sealed,<fix123>but before she knew it, the enemy got away.<fix123>
Reimu took on the battle once again.<fix123>
<c$Ending No. 02 — Abrupt Defeat$><fix123>
<c$Congratulations on your clear!$><fix123>
<c$Next time, try to use no continues!$><fix123>
<fix123>千万無量の無念<fix123> Infinity Make-work<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Innumerable Regrets ~ Infinity Make-work<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Sai no Kawara<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>Eika Ebisu LEAVES<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Yep, there's beast spirits all over the place.<fix123>But I've got no time to waste floundering<fix123><fix123>around in some place like this.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そこのお前！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, you there!<fix123><fix123>
