en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Beast Metropolis<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mayumi Joutougu ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Mayumi Joutougu EXITS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ここが畜生界……<fix123>地獄とはまた異質の<fix123>息苦しさがあるわね<fix123>それで<fix123>畜生界の中心の建造物って<fix123>アレのことかしら……？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So this is the Animal Realm...<fix123>It feels just as suffocating as Hell,<fix123>but in a different sort of way.<fix123>So.<fix123>Is that the "structure in the<fix123>center of the Animal Realm"...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A human?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mayumi Joutougu ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>さっさと霊長園に戻らないと<fix123>飢えた畜生達に捕らわれるよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You'd better get back to the Primate Spirit Garden post-haste,<fix123><fix123>or else you'll be captured by starving beasts.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>霊長園？<fix123>後ろの鍵穴みたいな奴かしら<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Primate Spirit Garden?<fix123>Would that be the big keyhole thing behind you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>霊長園を知らないだって？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You don't know about the Primate Spirit Garden?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>埴輪兵長<fix123>杖刀偶　磨弓<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Haniwa Lance Corporal<fix123>Mayumi Joutougu<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>と言うかお前……<fix123>畜生界の人間霊じゃないな！<fix123>生身の人間だ！<fix123>どうやって、この究極の弱肉強食の<fix123>畜生界で生き延びてきた？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Actually, speaking of which...<fix123>You're not a human spirit from the Animal Realm!<fix123>You're a flesh-and-blood human!<fix123>How did you manage to survive in<fix123>such a dog-eat-dog place as this?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私はここの住人じゃなくて<fix123>動物霊達を退治しに<fix123>地上からやって……<fix123>……<fix123>（くっ、意識が乗っ取られる！<fix123>……もしやオオカミ霊の仕業か！？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>For your information, I'm not from here.<fix123>I came from the surface world to<fix123>exterminate the beast spirits, and...<fix123>......<fix123>(Gah, something's taking over my mind!<fix123>...Is this the wolf spirit's doing?!)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: セラミックスの杖刀人<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Joutoujin of Ceramics<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふっふっふ<fix123>私は、お前達を破壊する為だけに<fix123>生身の人間を連れてきた！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh heh heh!<fix123>I brought a live human down here<fix123>just to destroy the lot of you!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴様から感じる霊気……<fix123>まさか、オオカミ霊なのか？<fix123>生身の人間に頼るなんて<fix123>オオカミにそんな頭脳があるとは……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That aura I feel from you...<fix123>Could you be a wolf spirit?<fix123>To think that a wolf would be smart enough<fix123>to rely on a living human...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この為だけにあのにっくき鬼傑組の<fix123>奴らと同盟を結んだのだ！<fix123>お前達、呪われし偶像どもから<fix123>人間霊(えさ)を解放する！<fix123>覚悟しろ！<fix123>弱肉強食こそ、畜生界の理(ことわり)だ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>For this sole reason, we formed an alliance<fix123>with that loathsome Kiketsu family!<fix123>I shall liberate the human spirits(our prey)<fix123>from you accursed idols!<fix123>Prepare yourself!<fix123>It's the law of the Animal Realm that the strong eat the weak!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mayumi Joutougu DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>つ、強い！生身の人間とは<fix123>この様な物だったのか……！<fix123>なんと恐ろしい策……！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>S-so strong! So this is what<fix123>living humans are like...!<fix123>What a fearsome strategy...!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（よし！<fix123>これならば勝てる！）<fix123>（ありがとう！<fix123>人間の巫女よ！）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Yes!<fix123>I'll be sure to win at this rate!)<fix123>(You have my thanks,<fix123>human shrine maiden!)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……<fix123>意識が動物霊に乗っ取られている！？<fix123>一体何が起こって……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>.....<fix123>The beast spirit's taking over my mind?!<fix123>What on earth is going on...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（すまなかった<fix123>私だ、オオカミ霊だ）<fix123>（しかし貴方のお陰で<fix123>霊長園に入る事が出来る）<fix123>（あと少しだ……！）<fix123>（あと少しで畜生界は<fix123>動物霊の支配に戻る）<fix123>（そうすれば、地上への<fix123>動物霊の侵攻も止まるだろう）<fix123>（安心するがよい<fix123>貴方と目的は一致している）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Sorry about that.<fix123>It's me, the wolf spirit.)<fix123>(But thanks to you, we can gain entry<fix123>to the Primate Spirit Garden.)<fix123>(Just a little further...!)<fix123>(Just a little further, and we beast spirits<fix123>can take back control of the Animal Realm.)<fix123>(If we do that, the beast spirits' invasion of<fix123>the surface will be sure to cease as well.)<fix123>(Worry not.<fix123>Our objectives are the same.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>これは埴輪兵士が作られてから<fix123>初めての緊急事態だわ！<fix123>早くみんなに知らせないと！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This is the first emergency situation we've had<fix123>since the Haniwa Soldiers were created!<fix123>I have to go alert everyone quick!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は一体何と戦っているのかしら<fix123>まあいいや<fix123>行こう！<fix123>恐らく敵の本陣へ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...What am I even fighting against right now?<fix123>Whatever, though.<fix123>Let's go!<fix123>To what is (probably) the enemy's main base!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>イドラデウス<fix123> Idola-Deus<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Deus ex Idola ~ Idola-Deus<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>霊長園 墳墓内部<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Primate Spirit Garden - Tumulus Base Interior<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: エレクトリックヘリテージ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Electric Heritage<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mayumi Joutougu ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>生身の人間がこんなに<fix123>強い生き物だなんて！<fix123>夢のような現実だわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>To think that living humans<fix123>were such strong creatures!<fix123>Everything feels like a dream!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mayumi Joutougu DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>気持ち悪いところねぇ<fix123>お目当ての敵は何処に居るの？<fix123>私に取り憑いているオオカミ霊さん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Something feels wrong here.<fix123>Oh wolf spirit possessing me,<fix123>where's the enemy we're searching for?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（……）<fix123>（な、何だこれは！？）<fix123>（自然豊かだった霊長園が……<fix123>あいつ等、許さないぞ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(....)<fix123>(W-what is all this?!)<fix123>(The Garden was so full of nature, but now...<fix123>I'll never forgive those curs!)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Keiki Haniyasushin ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>来客とは珍しい<fix123>もう私達に敵う者などいないと<fix123>悲しんでいたのに……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A guest? How rare.<fix123>And here, I had almost shed a tear at the fact<fix123>that nobody was left to fight against us...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ついに見つけたぞ！<fix123>畜生の理を破りし破壊神！<fix123>埴安神 袿姫(はにやすしん　けいき)！<fix123>お前の偶像を破壊する為に<fix123>生身の人間を連れてきたぞ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've finally found you!<fix123>The god of destruction who defies the law of beasts!<fix123>Keiki Haniyasushin!<fix123>I brought a live human along<fix123>to destroy your idols!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>孤立無援が誂えた造形神<fix123>埴安神　袿姫<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Sculptor God Crafted by Utter Isolation<fix123>Keiki Haniyasushin<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>生身の人間だって！？<fix123>そんな馬鹿な話……<fix123>誰が信じるもんですか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A live human?!<fix123>That's ridiculous...<fix123>Who would believe that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>う、嘘じゃないわ！<fix123>私は地上の人間よ！<fix123>お前は何者なの？<fix123>ここは一体？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>T-they're not lying!<fix123>I'm a human from the surface!<fix123>Who are you?<fix123>What is this place?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あっはっは<fix123>なる程、確かに人間のようね<fix123>でも、何も知らない愚かな<fix123>人間を騙して連れてきて<fix123>一体、何になると思っているの？<fix123>オオカミ霊さん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ahahah!<fix123>I see. You certainly do seem to be a human.<fix123>But what exactly do you<fix123>hope to accomplish,<fix123>by tricking and dragging along some foolish human who<fix123><fix123>doesn't know anything? Care to answer, wolf spirit?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前、噛みつくしか能の無い<fix123>勁牙組(けいがぐみ)のオオカミでしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're a wolf from the Keiga Family, right?<fix123>Useless for everything except biting?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……なぜ判った<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...How'd you know?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふっふっふ<fix123>人間よ<fix123>動物霊に騙されるな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh heh heh.<fix123>You there, human.<fix123>Don't let this beast spirit deceive you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>えっ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は畜生どもから<fix123>人間霊を守る造形神(イドラデウス)よ<fix123>人間同士戦う必要なんてない<fix123>そう思わないかい？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I am the sculptor god(Idola Deus) who protects the<fix123>human spirits from those foul beasts.<fix123>There's no need for fellow humans to fight each other.<fix123>Don't you agree?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>に、人間同士……！？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>F-fellow humans...?!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>騙されるな、巫女よ<fix123>こいつは自然の摂理を<fix123>破壊する邪神だ！<fix123>こいつは動物の敵であり、人間の敵だ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Don't be fooled, shrine maiden!<fix123>She's a wicked god who destroyed<fix123>the divine blessing of Nature!<fix123>She's an enemy of beasts and humans both!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>う、うう……<fix123>何か面倒なことに巻き込まれているような<fix123>しかし、お前からは邪悪なオーラが見える！<fix123>取り敢えず倒してから考える！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>U-urgh...<fix123>I feel like I've gotten dragged into something really obnoxious.<fix123>But I can see an evil aura around you!<fix123>I'll beat you for starters, and then think things over!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう、勘が鈍いのねぇ<fix123>今なら見逃してあげると<fix123>言っているのに気が付かないなんて<fix123>しかたがない<fix123>しかたがないねぇ……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah. Your intuition certainly isn't very sharp.<fix123>I'm saying that I'll let you off the hook if you<fix123>back off now, but you didn't notice at all...<fix123>What a shame.<fix123>What a crying shame...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（ま、まずい！<fix123>時間をかけすぎた、人間！）<fix123>（こいつの造形術が来る！<fix123>動物霊達(われわれ)は、皆これにやられたんだ！）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Human, this is bad!<fix123>We let her stall for too long!)<fix123>(She's about to unleash her sculpting arts!<fix123>Every last one of us beast spirits was defeated by them!)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 偶像に世界を委ねて　～ Idoratrize World<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Entrusting this World to Idols ~ Idolatrize World<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>一旦退却だ！<fix123>逃げろ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We must retreat for now!<fix123>RUN!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>策を練ってきて敵前逃亡とは……！<fix123>愚の骨頂だな<fix123>神域を冒して乗り込んできておいて<fix123>逃げられると思うなよ？<fix123>肉のお前を滅して<fix123>土と水で美しく造り直してやる！<fix123>お前は一点の瑕もなき偶像(アイドル)として<fix123>未来永劫語り継がれるだろう！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You built up this whole plan, and now you flee<fix123>in the face of the enemy...! Truly the height of idiocy.<fix123>Don't think for a second that I'll let you escape<fix123>after you violated my sacred territory to this extent.<fix123>I'll destroy your body of flesh, and<fix123>build you anew from soil and water!<fix123>You shall be an idol without a single flaw,<fix123>told of for ages and ages to come!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Keiki Haniyasushin PAUSES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>人間よ、よく耐えた！<fix123>まもなく応援が来るぞ！<fix123>もうこっちが強者だ！<fix123>孤独な邪神にトドメを刺せ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You've done well to survive this long, human!<fix123>Our reinforcements will arrive in seconds!<fix123>We are the strong ones now!<fix123>Land the finishing blow on this lonesome, wicked god!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Keiki Haniyasushin DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>秘神の真の姿<fix123>Hidden Star in Fifth Season<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>True Form of the Secret God<fix123>Hidden Star in Fifth Season<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>後戸の国<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Land of the Back Door<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: もうドアには入れない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: No More Going Through Doors<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Satono Nishida and Mai Teireida ENTER<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>何だ、また来たのか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What, you're back?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方のせいで私達が怒られたわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We got the scolding of our lives 'cause of you!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>即刻立ち去れい！<fix123><fix123>薄汚い天狗めが！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Begone this instant!<fix123><fix123>You filthy tengu wretch!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Satono Nishida and Mai Teireida DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>やあやあ<fix123><fix123>我こそは疾風の鴉天狗、射命丸文なり！<fix123>この度は天狗の未来を賭けて<fix123><fix123>再び勝負を挑みにきたものである！<fix123>障碍の神、 隠岐奈 (おきな) よ！<fix123><fix123>出てくるがいい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hear me!<fix123><fix123>I am known as the crow tengu of the gale, Aya Shameimaru!<fix123>I have come to challenge you to another battle<fix123><fix123>with the future of the tengu at stake!<fix123>God of impairments, Okina!<fix123><fix123>Show yourself!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この間の天狗か<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The tengu from before?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Okina Matara ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>究極の絶対秘神<fix123>摩多羅　隠岐奈<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Ultimate, Absolute Secret God<fix123>Okina Matara<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>再び姿を現すとは<fix123><fix123>良い度胸だな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You must certainly be a bold one<fix123><fix123>to appear before me again.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この間は卑怯な罠で逃げられたけど<fix123><fix123>今度は逃がさない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Last time you escaped thanks to your cowardly trap,<fix123><fix123>but this time you won't get away.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>逃がさない？<fix123><fix123>何をいう、逃げ帰ったのはお前だぞ？<fix123>背中の魔力を返して貰ったら<fix123><fix123>お前は手も足も出せない状態で<fix123>お前は季節の扉に入って<fix123><fix123>元の世界に帰ったんだ<fix123>逃げたのはお前だよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I won't get away?<fix123><fix123>What are you saying? Aren't YOU the one who fled?<fix123>After I had you return the power on your back,<fix123><fix123>you were rendered completely helpless.<fix123>That's when you entered the door on your back<fix123><fix123>and returned to your own world.<fix123>You're the one who ran.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……少しだけそんな気もしてました<fix123>貴方と戦っていたはずが、いつの間にか<fix123><fix123>幻想郷に居たんでね<fix123>私が集めた季節の魔力は<fix123><fix123>貴方に全て奪われて強制解放された<fix123>それ自体が強制退出の罠だと<fix123><fix123>気付かずにね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...I had a slight suspicion that might be the case.<fix123>I should have been fighting you, but before I knew it<fix123><fix123>I was back in Gensokyo.<fix123>All the seasonal magic I'd gathered<fix123><fix123>was taken by you and forcibly released.<fix123>And that itself was a trap to forcibly eject me.<fix123><fix123>I should've known!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうだ、だからお前に勝ち目は無い！<fix123><fix123>何度やっても同じだよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Indeed, and that's why you'll never win!<fix123><fix123>No matter how many times you try, you'll meet the same end.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふっ、そこまで判っていて<fix123><fix123>私が無策でここに来る訳が無いでしょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmph. Did you really think that, having figured all<fix123><fix123>that out, I'd charge back in here without a plan?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほう？<fix123><fix123>策、とな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh?<fix123><fix123>A plan, you say?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私の背中の季節を見よ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Take a look at my back!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほう……なるほど！<fix123><fix123>お前は季節の隙間の魔力を集めてきたのか！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oho... I see!<fix123><fix123>You came here with the power of the gap between seasons?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうです<fix123><fix123>季節の変わり目の魔力だけを集めました<fix123>四季の生命力がもっとも失われ、<fix123><fix123>この世の魔が顕 (あらわ) れる季節の隙間よ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Exactly.<fix123><fix123>I only collected power from the turning point of the seasons.<fix123>The gap between seasons, where the vitality of the four seasons is lost,<fix123><fix123>and where all the evil in the world rears its head!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふふふ、それを私が吸収して<fix123><fix123>解放すれば天狗の魔によって自滅すると<fix123>黙っていれば判らなかったかも<fix123><fix123>知れないのに、何故教える？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh heh. So if I absorb and release that,<fix123><fix123>I'll destroy myself with the tengu's evil power.<fix123>But if you had stayed quiet, I might not have realized.<fix123><fix123>Why tell me?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>神ともあろう方が気付かないわけがない<fix123><fix123>と思ったからです<fix123>それに貴方を滅しにきた訳では<fix123><fix123>ございません<fix123>卑劣な罠に掛けたいのではなく<fix123><fix123>貴方の罠を封じたいだけですから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I figured that a god such as yourself<fix123><fix123>would be sure to figure it out anyway.<fix123>And I'm not here to destroy you, either.<fix123>I don't want to ensnare you in some cowardly trap.<fix123><fix123>I just wanted to nullify the one you used.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 秘神マターラ　～ Hidden Star in All Seasons.<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Secret God Matara ~ Hidden Star in All Seasons.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふっふっふ<fix123><fix123>正々堂々と勝負したいという訳か<fix123>良いだろう、その勇気に敬意を払って<fix123><fix123>季節の魔力は使わないでやる<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh heh heh.<fix123><fix123>So you wish to fight fair and square, is it?<fix123>Very well then. To honor your courage,<fix123><fix123>I won't use any seasonal energy.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>正々堂々と戦いたいというか<fix123><fix123>取材をしたいだけなんです<fix123>天狗と祖先を等しくする障碍の神に<fix123>世間から疎外されてきた<fix123><fix123>河原者の歴史と、これからを<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's less that I want a fair match,<fix123><fix123>and more that I just want to interview you.<fix123>You're a god of impairments who shares<fix123><fix123>an ancestor with us tengu, after all.<fix123>I'd like to know more about the history of outcasts from society<fix123><fix123>such as yourself and what you're going to do in the future.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>良いだろう、お前が勝ったら<fix123><fix123>取材でも何でも受けてやろう<fix123>幻想郷の縁起は我々、障碍の者を<fix123><fix123>抜きにしては語れぬ<fix123>見よ！　聞け！　語れ！<fix123><fix123>これが障碍の秘神の姿だ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Very well. If you win, I'll give you<fix123><fix123>an interview and whatever else.<fix123>After all, Gensokyo's origins cannot be told of<fix123><fix123>without including us impaired people as well.<fix123>See it! Hear it! Speak of it!<fix123><fix123>Behold the true form of the impaired, hidden god!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Okina Matara DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>はあはあ<fix123><fix123>まだやるか！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>*Pant* *Pant*<fix123><fix123>Had enough yet?!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>見事だ！<fix123><fix123>もう十分、お前の強さは判った<fix123>勝負は私の負けだ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Splendid!<fix123><fix123>That's more than enough, I understand your strength now.<fix123>This is my loss.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……いいえ、私の負けです<fix123>背中の魔力無しでは<fix123><fix123>到底勝つことは出来ませんでした<fix123>そしてこの力は貴方の力です<fix123>背中の魔力を使う事<fix123><fix123>前提の戦闘を見て<fix123>最初から貴方の掌で踊らされている<fix123><fix123>かのようでした<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...No, it's my loss.<fix123>Without this magic at my back,<fix123><fix123>I wouldn't have stood a chance against you.<fix123>And that power is ultimately yours.<fix123><fix123>This fight was built on the basic assumption that<fix123><fix123>I would be using that power. Now that I've seen that...<fix123>I can tell that I've been dancing on your palm<fix123><fix123>from the very beginning.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>確かにいつだって背中の扉を封じたり<fix123><fix123>別の魔力を呼び出す事も出来た<fix123>だが、私がそれをしなかったのは<fix123><fix123>お前の勇気に敬意を払ってのことだ<fix123>私の掌の上だろうと<fix123><fix123>お前の勝ちは変わらない<fix123>堂々とするが良い<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's right. I could have closed your door at any time<fix123><fix123>and drawn from another source of power.<fix123>But I decided not to. And it's your courage<fix123><fix123>that I chose to honor by doing so.<fix123>Whether or not you were on my palm,<fix123><fix123>that doesn't change the fact that you won.<fix123>Stand proud.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ですよねー<fix123><fix123>私の勝ちでいいんですよねー<fix123>じゃあ約束通り私の取材を<fix123><fix123>受けてもらいます！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yeah, you're right...<fix123><fix123>Yeah! Why SHOULDN'T I claim victory?<fix123>So, as promised, I'll be conducting<fix123><fix123>my interview with you now!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>う、うむ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, uh, yes.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この度は<fix123><fix123>何故こんな事をしたのですか？<fix123>あ、こんな事ってのは四季異変の事ね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So, for starters,<fix123><fix123>why did you do all this?<fix123>Oh and by "this" I mean the four seasons incident.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うちの二童子もそろそろ<fix123><fix123>解放してやりたくてね<fix123>その後継者を探していたんだ<fix123>可能性ありそうな奴らを広域で<fix123><fix123>引っかけるために<fix123>ありとあらゆる奴の<fix123><fix123>潜在能力を引き出させたのさ<fix123>妖精や精霊たちの潜在能力によって<fix123><fix123>季節が少しおかしく見えただけ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've been feeling like it's about time<fix123><fix123>for me to release my two servants.<fix123>So I was looking for their successor.<fix123>In order to draw in candidates with<fix123><fix123>potential from a wide area...<fix123>I had the two of them draw out the latent<fix123><fix123>abilities of absolutely everybody.<fix123>The seasons simply appeared a bit strange because<fix123><fix123>of the fairies' and divine spirits' latent power.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なるほど、それで後継者は<fix123><fix123>見つかったのですか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see. So, did you find a successor then?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まだだね<fix123><fix123>いくつか候補はいるけど<fix123>でも、幻想郷全域に背中の扉を<fix123><fix123>使うのはこれっきりにしておくよ<fix123>もう、十分伝わったと思うから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Nope, not yet.<fix123><fix123>I do have plenty of candidates, though.<fix123>I suppose this can be the last time<fix123><fix123>I use the back doors all over Gensokyo.<fix123>I'm sure my message has already been received.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>？？<fix123><fix123>では次の質問です<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>??<fix123><fix123>All right, next question.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ちょっと待って、質問ってどの位あるの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hold on, how many questions are there?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いくらでも出てくるわよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>As many as I need.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今は闘いの直後で疲れている<fix123><fix123>また今度にしてくれないか？<fix123>そうだ、今度は天狗の元に<fix123><fix123>行ってやる<fix123>お前を見ていたら<fix123><fix123>今の天狗に興味が湧いてきたよ<fix123>天狗さえ良ければ<fix123><fix123>平和協定を結ぼうじゃないか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm tired after that battle.<fix123><fix123>Can we do this another time?<fix123>Oh, I know! How about I go visit<fix123><fix123>the home of all you tengu?<fix123>Now that I've seen you, I've become quite<fix123><fix123>interested in the tengu of today.<fix123>And if the tengu will accept,<fix123><fix123>why not forge a peace agreement?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はあ、良いですが<fix123>ただし約束してください<fix123>私以外の取材を受けないでください<fix123>こんな大きなネタ<fix123><fix123>他の人には渡しませんから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Fine, fine, that's all fine.<fix123>But you'd better promise me this:<fix123>Don't accept interviews from anyone but me!<fix123>I can't let anyone else get their<fix123><fix123>hands on a scoop this big.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>う、うむ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Uh, sure...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>秘神の真の姿<fix123>Hidden Star in Fifth Season<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>True Form of the Secret God<fix123>Hidden Star in Fifth Season<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>後戸の国<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Land of the Back Door<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: もうドアには入れない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: No More Going Through Doors<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Satono Nishida and Mai Teireida ENTER<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>おお、君はこの前の<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, it's you again?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お師匠様を怒らせたらしいわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I heard you annoyed our Master.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もうテストは終わりだよ<fix123>さっさと帰れ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The test is over!<fix123>Get outta here! Scram!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Satono Nishida and Mai Teireida DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>おーい、居ないのかー？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey! Anyone here?!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>また戻って来たのか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So you've returned?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Okina Matara ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>究極の絶対秘神<fix123>摩多羅　隠岐奈<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Ultimate, Absolute Secret God<fix123>Okina Matara<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>最終テスト途中で逃げたお前は<fix123>残念ながら不採用だ<fix123>さっさと帰れ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You ran away in the middle of the final test.<fix123>I'm sad to say you've been rejected.<fix123>Now leave, immediately.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>テスト途中で逃げた……か<fix123>やはりそうなのか<fix123>最初はお前が逃げたと思っていたが<fix123>よく考えてみると、自分が逃げた<fix123>可能性の方が高い気がしてな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I ran away during the test...?<fix123>So that's really what happened, then?<fix123>At first I thought YOU had run away...<fix123>But when I thought it over,<fix123>it did seem pretty likely that I had run myself.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そんな臆病なお前が何の用事だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So what business does a coward like you have with me?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今日は再戦しにやってきた<fix123>別に採用されたいと思っている<fix123>訳では無いが<fix123>心情的に負けたままにして<fix123>おけなくてな！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I came here for a rematch.<fix123>Not that I really care about the job or anything.<fix123>I just can't stand the thought of<fix123>keeping this loss on my record!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前は人間だが<fix123>魔法を使うんだよな<fix123>なら判る筈だ<fix123>何故お前が手も足も出なくなって<fix123>逃げ出したのかを<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're a human,<fix123>but you do use magic, yes?<fix123>Then you should already understand.<fix123>You should know why you were rendered helpless<fix123>and ultimately fled.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>全ての背中の装備は<fix123>お前の移動装置兼、魔力回収装置だな<fix123>背中の装備を通じて、お前は動かずして<fix123>全てを手に入れている<fix123>そいつを使えばどんな人間からでも<fix123>魔力を吸収できる<fix123>そして要らない奴は扉から<fix123>どっかへ飛ばすことも出来る<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It was because all of that back equipment.<fix123>It was used by you for both movement, and absorbing magic.<fix123>With those, you can get everything you want<fix123>without lifting a finger.<fix123>So no matter what kind of human was using it,<fix123>you could just drain all their energy.<fix123>And if you didn't need them,<fix123>you could just send them flying to wherever.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうだ<fix123>つまりお前に勝ち目は無い<fix123>そこまで判っていてよく来たな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Exactly.<fix123>In other words, you never stood a chance.<fix123>But even knowing all that,<fix123>you still came for a rematch?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうはいっても負けたままで<fix123>居るわけには行かない<fix123>だから今度はお前の罠を<fix123>逆に利用してやるぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What, you think that's gonna stop me<fix123>from reclaiming my victory?<fix123>This time I'm taking your trap and turning it around.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>利用……？<fix123>ほう、それは何だ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh...?<fix123>And what could you mean by that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私の背中を見よ！<fix123>これが答えだ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Take a look at my back!<fix123>There's your answer!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほう……今のお前の背中の扉は<fix123>もっとも生命力が失われる<fix123>季節の境目、土用か……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oho... I see that the door on your back right now...<fix123>corresponds to doyou, the border between seasons<fix123>where the world loses its vitality entirely.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どうだ！<fix123>これならお前が強制解放しても<fix123>退出先が存在しない！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How's THAT?<fix123>With this, even if you tried to kick me out,<fix123>there's nowhere for me to go!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 秘神マターラ　～ Hidden Star in All Seasons.<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Secret God Matara ~ Hidden Star in All Seasons.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふっふっふ<fix123>そう上手くいくとは思わないが<fix123>悪くない策だ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh heh heh.<fix123>I don't think it'll work out very well in the end,<fix123>but it's not a bad plan.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今度は心置きなく戦わせて貰うぜ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This time, I can get a fair fight outta ya with no worries at all!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>気に入った！<fix123>一度は不採用にしたが<fix123>やはり思い直そう<fix123>その聡明さと大胆さに惚れた<fix123>不採用取り消しだ<fix123>それでは再度、最終テストを行う<fix123>今度は季節の魔力は使わない！<fix123>真なる秘神の秘術をしかと見よ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How interesting!<fix123>I'd already rejected you,<fix123>but you've made me reconsider.<fix123>I must admit I'm quite taken by your wisdom and boldness.<fix123>You can consider your rejection nullified.<fix123>Now let us begin the final test, once again!<fix123>This time I won't be using the energy of the seasons!<fix123>Behold the the true secret arts of a hidden god!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Okina Matara DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>もう私の勝ちだろ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>C'mon! I've won by now, haven't I?!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お見事！<fix123>テストは合格よ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Splendid!<fix123>You've passed the test!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふう、手強かったが<fix123>何とかなった<fix123>これで心置きなく安眠できる<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Whew, that was tough.<fix123>But I made it through, somehow.<fix123>Now I can get a good night's sleep with no worries at all...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>と言うわけで、採用です！<fix123>うちで働いてくれるんだよね<fix123>どっちが良い？<fix123>生命担当の丁礼田と精神担当の爾子田<fix123>今ならどっちでも良いわよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So with that, you have the job!<fix123>I'll allow you to work for me.<fix123>So which one would you prefer to be?<fix123>Teireida in charge of life energy, or Nishida in charge of mental energy?<fix123>Right now, you can have your pick of either.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>働くつもりは無いって<fix123>言ってるだろ<fix123>って、もし私が働いたら<fix123>さっきの二人はどうなるんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm not gonna work for you.<fix123>Didn't I say that already?<fix123>But, uh, if I DID,<fix123>what would happen to those two?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>引き継ぎをしたら解放して<fix123>人間に戻してあげるつもりよ<fix123>貴方が仕事を引き受けてくれないと<fix123>ずっとあのままだけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If you take over, I intend to release them<fix123>and make them human again.<fix123>Although if you don't take the job,<fix123>they'll remain as they are forever.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あの二人もお前の魔力で動く<fix123>傀儡なのか……<fix123>まあ、私が代わりになる気は<fix123>毛頭無いな<fix123>それはともかく、四季異変は<fix123>辞めてくれないか？<fix123>森が冬のままだと<fix123>暖房代も馬鹿にならないからな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So they're both puppets being moved by your magic, huh...?<fix123>Well, I still don't wanna take their place.<fix123>Nooo siree.<fix123>All that aside, do you think you could<fix123>stop the 'four seasons' incident now?<fix123>If the forest stays winter any longer,<fix123>I don't even wanna think about my heating bill.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>四季異変は背中の扉の副作用よ<fix123>でも、幻想郷全域に背中の扉を<fix123>使うのはこれっきりにしておくわ<fix123>もう、十分伝わったと思うし<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The four seasons incident is a side effect of the back doors.<fix123>But I suppose this can be the last time<fix123>I use the doors all over Gensokyo.<fix123>I'm sure my message has already been received.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ん？　誰にだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh? Message to who?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今の幻想郷のみんなと、別の賢者にね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Everyone living in Gensokyo, especially the other sages.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>つまり自分の力凄いぞアピールか<fix123>さもしい奴だなー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So, basically, you were showing off how strong you are?<fix123>Yeesh, talk about self-centered.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>神様にはそれが必要なのよ<fix123>判ってくれる？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You do realize that gods are required to do that, don't you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あー<fix123>確かにそういう奴一杯居るな<fix123>まあいいや、四季異変は<fix123>収まっていくんだろ？<fix123>大した被害も出てないし<fix123>今回は大目に見てやるよ<fix123>その代わり、四季異変を解決したのは<fix123>私だと言いふらそう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, right.<fix123>We do have more than a few folks like that.<fix123>Well, whatever. The incident is gonna settle down now, right?<fix123>There wasn't any major damage,<fix123>so I'll let you off with that.<fix123>In exchange, just tell everyone that I'm the one who resolved it, okay?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あー、自分の力凄いぞアピールだー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wuh-oh. Showing off how strong you are, eh?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうだ<fix123>何か悪いか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's right.<fix123>Got a problem with that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>悪くは無い<fix123>悪くは無いが<fix123>何だかなぁ<fix123>ともかく、私は気長に待ってるよ<fix123>貴方の心変わりを<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Nope, none.<fix123>None at all, but...<fix123>It's just, ehh... never mind.<fix123>In any case, I'll be be patiently awaiting your change of heart.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そのつもりは無いって言っている<fix123>それに勝負に負けたら<fix123>突然口調が変わって気持ち悪いな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I told you, I'm not taking the job.<fix123>Plus, it's kinda creepy how quickly you changed your tone when you lost.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: Eientei.<fix123>
The headquarters of former Lunarians located in the Bamboo Forest of the Lost.<fix123>
"I had no intention of deceiving you.<fix123>
The reason I didn't say it was for the sake of the Lunar Capital,<fix123>
was because I wanted to get the humans to resolve it."<fix123>
"And many Lunarians were not informed of it, either."<fix123>
"Indeed.<fix123>
I heard about it from Lady Sagume."<fix123>
"It's a good thing you were able to reach her safely.<fix123>
We are lucky that she is so clever."<fix123>
"Well, she actually attacked me. With quite fierce danmaku."<fix123>
"Also, there is something I would like to ask about..."<fix123>
"Yes, I know what you want to ask.<fix123>
About Junko, isn't it?"<fix123>
"There is a certain person in the Lunar Capital that Junko detests.<fix123>
The reason for this is quite complicated, but...<fix123>
That person is the wife of Junko's husband.<fix123>
"Hm? The wife of her husband? Isn't that just herself?"<fix123>
"In the past, her husband was responsible for killing her son,<fix123>
So she got her revenge by killing him."<fix123>
"The husband killed her son? Why?"<fix123>
"This man's wife had an evil gift.....<fix123>
And the wife is none other than Chang'e."<fix123>
"Huh? Lady Chang'e? The one who governs all the moon rabbits..."<fix123>
"Junko hates Chang'e.<fix123>
Consequently, she also hates the Lunarians, to whom Chang'e belongs."<fix123>
"And when she attacked the Lunar Capital, we tricked her in a contest of wits.<fix123>
And her attacks were repeated over time.<fix123>
Of course, only a small fraction of Lunarians know this."<fix123>
"Wow, it's amazing.<fix123>
I still could not understand what the people's role was<fix123>
and at the time, the Lunar Capital was under attack."<fix123>
"Just don't tell the other moon rabbits about this."<fix123>
"Yes, if Lady Chang'e learns about this, we'll be in big trouble."<fix123>
"Rabbits, in fact, can be used to overthrow Chang'e."<fix123>
This time, she did not hide anything from Reisen.<fix123>
After this conversation, despite being a regular moon rabbit,<fix123>she felt a little closer to her teacher.<fix123>
And along with this, she realized she would no longer be able to<fix123>communicate with the Lunarians as before.<fix123>
<c$Ending No.07 — The real enemy of the Lunar Capital$><fix123>
<c$You have completed the game! Congratulations!$><fix123>
<c$Pointdevice Mode or No Miss Clear Ending$><fix123>
Eientei.<fix123>
The shelter of former Lunarians, located in the Bamboo Forest of the Lost.<fix123>
"Oh no, I'm getting scolded for sure, yikes!<fix123>
I better avoid Eientei for a while.<fix123>
It can't be helped, seems like I'll have to sleep outdoors......"<fix123>
"I wonder what I was thinking, not using the ‘Ultramarine Orb Elixir?’<fix123>
That evil spirit was strong."<fix123>
"By the way, she said something about Lady Chang'e before the fight...<fix123>
Maybe she was her true target...?"<fix123>
——Chang'e.<fix123>
Goddess of the Moon, who has been imprisoned in the Lunar Capital.<fix123>
She commands all the moon rabbits.<fix123>
"Oh, Reisen?<fix123>
Come back home."<fix123>
"Oh, Lady Kaguya...."<fix123>
"Eirin is quite pleased that you are bringing us some information<fix123>about the incident. She's also angry that you didn't use the elixir."<fix123>
"I already knew she would be angry. Still, thank you."<fix123>
"Moreover, there is something else not even Eirin knows about, am I right?<fix123>
Tell me about it in detail."<fix123>
"...about what, exactly?"<fix123>
"The fairy mentioned that Junko is her<fix123>‘master's friend.’ "<fix123>
"Yeah, that's right."<fix123>
"We didn't know that Junko has a friend.<fix123>
Perhaps, this might become Junko's trump card."<fix123>
"I wonder if you have more to tell me regarding this subject?<fix123>
What kind of fairy she was, details about the incident......"<fix123>
Reisen returned to Eientei thanks to Kaguya's favors.<fix123>
Eirin didn't seem angry anymore.<fix123>
Reisen reported as many details about the fairy as possible.<fix123>
However, no one was able to grasp her true identity.<fix123>
With the opponent's silhouette revealed,<fix123>the atmosphere had grown more eerie.<fix123>
It was a story of a dream. (To be continued in the extra stage.)<fix123>
<c$Ending No.08 — The beginning of real nightmares$><fix123>
<c$You have completed the game! Congratulations!$><fix123>
<c$Self Clear Ending$><fix123>
<fix123>秘神の真の姿<fix123>Hidden Star in Fifth Season<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>True Form of the Secret God<fix123>Hidden Star in Fifth Season<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>後戸の国<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Land of the Back Door<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: もうドアには入れない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: No More Going Through Doors<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Satono Nishida and Mai Teireida ENTER<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>おお、君はこの前の<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, it's you again?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>不合格だったらしいわね<fix123>意外だわー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We heard that you didn't make the cut.<fix123>Can't say I saw that one coming!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だから君はここに居る資格は無い！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Which means you're not qualified to be here!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Satono Nishida and Mai Teireida DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>そろそろ出てきなさいよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Come on out already!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まさかまた<fix123>やってくるとはね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Why, to think that you'd<fix123>come back here...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Okina Matara ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>究極の絶対秘神<fix123>摩多羅　隠岐奈<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Ultimate, Absolute Secret God<fix123>Okina Matara<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>大した勇気だ<fix123>褒めて使わす<fix123>だが、お前も判った筈だ<fix123>私に勝つことは不可能だと<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How very brave of you.<fix123>You have my respect.<fix123>However, you should understand by now<fix123>that victory against me is impossible.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そりゃあんたが勝負の途中で<fix123>逃げたからでしょ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, yeah, 'cause you got up and ran off<fix123>in the middle of our battle.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何だと？<fix123>記憶違いをしているな<fix123>逃げたのはお前だよ<fix123>お前に集めさせていた<fix123>魔力を頂いたら<fix123>最後は手も足も出なくなって<fix123>逃げていったじゃないか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What?<fix123>It seems that you're misremembering things.<fix123>You're the one who ran.<fix123>I helped myself to the magic power<fix123>that I had led you to collect...<fix123>Which rendered you helpless in the<fix123>end, so you fled. Didn't you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私が逃げた？<fix123>そんな馬鹿なことあるわけ無いでしょ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I fled?<fix123>That's ridiculous. There's no way.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>覚えてないんだねぇ<fix123>私は鮮明に覚えているよ<fix123>全ての武器を封印されたお前が<fix123>自分の扉から逃げ帰っていったんだよ<fix123>自分の持ってきた季節の扉からね<fix123>また同じ目に遭いたいのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You really don't remember...<fix123>Well, I happen to remember it just fine.<fix123>With all your weapons sealed off,<fix123>you escaped through your own door and returned home.<fix123>Through the very same season door you have right now.<fix123>Do you want to meet the same fate again?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>季節の扉……<fix123>やっぱりそうか<fix123>私は逃げた記憶が無いけど<fix123>でも、もしかしたら……という思いもあった<fix123>気が付いたら、集めた季節の場所に<fix123>戻らされてたからね<fix123>つまり、背中の扉は魔力回収と強制排出を<fix123>兼ねている罠だった！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The season door...<fix123>So that was it, after all.<fix123>I don't remember fleeing, but there was a moment<fix123>when I thought "wait, hang on a second...?"<fix123>Because before I even knew it, I'd been returned<fix123>to the location of the season I'd collected.<fix123>In other words, the door on my back was a trap<fix123>that both absorbs magic power and forcibly ejects people!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうだ、よく判ったな<fix123>だからお前に勝ち目は無い<fix123>最後はここからお追い出されるのだから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Indeed. You did well to figure it out.<fix123>That's why you have no chance of victory.<fix123>No matter what, you'll be chased out of here in the end.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふっふっふ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh heh heh.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ん？どうした？<fix123>気でも触れたか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm? What's the matter?<fix123>Do you have a screw loose?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>予想が当たったわ！<fix123>これで勝った！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My theory was correct!<fix123>Victory is mine!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何だと？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What's this, now?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私の背中を見て<fix123>今回集めてきたのは<fix123>季節の境目よ！<fix123>これなら強制的に戻される場所は<fix123>存在しないはず！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Take a look at my back.<fix123>This time, I've been gathering<fix123>the boundary between seasons!<fix123>That means there's no location in<fix123>existence for me to get ejected to!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほう……今のお前の背中の扉は<fix123>もっとも生命力が失われる<fix123>季節の境目、土用か……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oho... I see that the door on your back right now...<fix123>Corresponds to doyou, the border between seasons<fix123>where the world loses its vitality entirely.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 秘神マターラ　～ Hidden Star in All Seasons.<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Secret God Matara ~ Hidden Star in All Seasons.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふっふっふ<fix123>悪くない策だ<fix123>しかしそれは、自らの退路を<fix123>断ったと言う事だ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm hm hm.<fix123>Not a bad strategy.<fix123>However, this also means that you've<fix123>cut off your own escape route.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今度はあんたを倒すまで<fix123>この場を去らないって事よ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That just means I won't budge an inch<fix123>until I beat you for good, this time!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>気に入った！<fix123>お前は博麗の巫女だから<fix123>部下にすることは出来ないが<fix123>その聡明さに敬意を払って<fix123>集めた季節の魔力を<fix123>使わずに戦ってやる<fix123>見よ！　聞け！　語れ！<fix123>秘神の真なる魔力がお前の障碍となろう！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hah hah! I like you!<fix123>You're the Hakurei shrine maiden,<fix123>so I can't make you my subordinate,<fix123>but as a show of respect for your intelligence...<fix123>I'll fight you without using the<fix123>seasonal magic that I've gathered.<fix123>See it! Hear it! Speak of it!<fix123>The secret god's true magic power shall be your greatest impairment!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Okina Matara DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>やったか！？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Did I beat her?!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>やられたー！<fix123>さすが博麗の巫女ね<fix123>この私の攻撃を避けきるなんて<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've been beatennn!<fix123>Only natural for the Hakurei maiden, of course.<fix123>To think that you'd evade all of my attacks...!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>よし、今度こそ勝った<fix123>今すぐ、悪巧みは辞める事ね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Okay, now I've won for real.<fix123>So give up on all your evil schemes right now!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うーん、どうしようかなー<fix123>まだ二童子の後継者が<fix123>見つかってないんだけどなー<fix123>見つからないとあの二人も<fix123>ずっと解放出来ないし、可哀想よねー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Mmm~mm, what am I gonna do now~?<fix123>I still haven't found successors<fix123>for my servants or anythi~ing...<fix123>And without their successors, I can't release<fix123>those two girls any time soon. Poor thi~ings...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>派手に季節が狂わない方法で<fix123>探してください<fix123>チラシ貼るとか面接とか……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Try hiring people in a way that doesn't<fix123>make a huge mess of the seasons.<fix123>Like flyers. Or interviews, or something...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>秘神がそんな事するの？<fix123>嫌だなー<fix123>ま、いっか<fix123>暫くはあの二人に頑張って貰おうかな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Me, a secret god? Do that?<fix123>I don't wann~a.<fix123>But eh, it's fine.<fix123>Guess I'll just have those two keep working at it for a while.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どうして妖怪達はいちいち<fix123>派手な行動を取るのかしら<fix123>それに負けると急に<fix123>馴れ馴れしくなるし<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Why do youkai insist on making such<fix123>a big show of everything, anyway?<fix123>You always get way too chummy<fix123>with me as soon as you lose, too.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>妖怪じゃなくて神様ですよー<fix123>ところで……<fix123>背中の扉に季節の境目を使用する<fix123>というテクニックだけど<fix123>本当は貴方が考えたんじゃ無いでしょ<fix123>その境界線を使う手法、よく知っている<fix123>彼奴のやり方に似ているのよね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm not a youkai, I'm a god!<fix123>By the way...<fix123>About that whole "use the border between<fix123>seasons as your backdoor" technique...<fix123>You didn't come up with that by yourself, did you?<fix123>A method that uses borders like that... it reminds me a lot<fix123>of a certain someone I'm rather familar with.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……まあね<fix123>正直言うと、理屈はよく判ってないしー<fix123>何なのよ、背中の扉って<fix123>季節装備って、生命力の暴力って……<fix123>そんな訳のわからない妖怪理論なんて<fix123>理解しようって方が無理があるわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...Well, who knows.<fix123>Honestly, I don't really understand the logic behind it either?<fix123>Like, what's with all of this? Doors on people's backs,<fix123>seasonal weaponry, berserk life force, blah blah blah...<fix123>Trying to understand all this ridiculous<fix123>youkai theory is just impossible, if you ask me!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>妖怪じゃなくて神様ね<fix123>人智を超えてしまうのは<fix123>仕方が無い<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Not youkai, though! A god!<fix123>Really, it's only natural that all of this<fix123>would exceed human understanding.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はいそうですか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, okay. Sure.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>でも、貴方もこちら側としか<fix123>見えないけどね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>From where I'm standing, though,<fix123>I'd say you seem more like one of "our side" too.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どうでもいいや<fix123>そろそろ帰る<fix123>……帰りはどの扉から出れば良いの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yeah, whatever.<fix123>I'm gonna head back soon.<fix123>...Uh, which door should I go through to get back home?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>博麗神社なら下から２番目<fix123>右から４０番目が良いね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If you want the Hakurei Shrine, I'd recommend the<fix123>door 2nd from the bottom and 40th from the right.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ありがとう<fix123>じゃあ、季節の件は戻しておくようにね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Thanks.<fix123>Now, you'd better return the seasons to normal, okay?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Reimu leaves<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>……そうか<fix123>気付いているアピールしてくるか<fix123>二童子の後継探しなんていう<fix123>嘘の口実で派手に動いた甲斐があった<fix123>私達が創った幻想郷は<fix123>無事に機能しているようだな<fix123>機能しすぎて、もはや誰にも<fix123>制御出来ないようだが<fix123>それも賢者達が望んだこと<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...I see.<fix123>She's hinting to me that she knows what I'm up to...?<fix123>Pretending that I was searching for successor servants<fix123>and making a big show of things seems to have paid off, in the end.<fix123>It seems that the Gensokyo we all created<fix123>is still functioning just fine.<fix123>Honestly, it seems to be functioning too well,<fix123>to the point where nobody can fully control it...<fix123>But that, too, is what the sages wanted for it.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Reimu pops back in<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あのー<fix123>右から４０番目の扉って<fix123>何処から見て右なのよ？<fix123>そもそも上下すら怪しいし<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Um...<fix123>You said 40th from the right,<fix123>but did you mean my right, or yours?<fix123>Even up and down are kind of sketchy in here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おお、すまんすまん<fix123>今は、私から見て左に<fix123>１６番目の扉が良い……<fix123>何なら付いていってやるよ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, sorry about that.<fix123>By now, the 16th door from my left<fix123>would be your best bet...<fix123>How about I come with you, just to be safe?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お願いします……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, please...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ついでに博麗神社で花見酒でも<fix123>していこうかな<fix123>これからが楽しみだねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>While we're at it, why don't I join you for some<fix123>drinks and a flower-viewing at the shrine?<fix123>Ah, we've got so much fun to look forward to...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>朝靄の先の真夏日<fix123>Miracle Blue Sky<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A Midsummer Day Beyond the Morning Mist<fix123>Miracle Blue Sky<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>真夏の上空<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Midsummer Skies<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 希望の星は青霄に昇る<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: A Star of Hope Rises in the Blue Sky<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>Eternity Larva LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>わーい！<fix123>夏はサイコーだぜー！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wahooo!<fix123>Summer is the BEST!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>わーい<fix123><fix123>サイコーだー！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wahooo!<fix123><fix123>It sure is!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eternity Larva ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>神に近づく蝶の妖精<fix123>エタニティラルバ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Butterfly Fairy who Approaches God<fix123>Eternity Larva<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お、日焼けしたねぇ<fix123><fix123>夏をエンジョイしているかい？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh my, you've got a tan!<fix123><fix123>Are you enjoying this fine summer day?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あたぼーよ！<fix123><fix123>氷の妖精様は夏に本領発揮されるのさ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heck yeah I am!<fix123><fix123>Summer is when I, the great ice fairy, can show my true power!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>アゲハ蝶の妖精だって負けてないよ！<fix123><fix123>力が無限に湧いてくるわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We butterfly fairies are hardly going to lose either!<fix123><fix123>I'm surging with endless strength!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 真夏の妖精の夢<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: A Midsummer Fairy's Dream<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>夏はどっちの物か、勝負だよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>LET'S FIGHT TO SEE WHO SUMMER BELONGS TO!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eternity Larva DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>勝った！<fix123><fix123>夏はもらったぜ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I win!<fix123><fix123>Summer is officially mine!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>負けたー<fix123><fix123>あんた、なかなかやるね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I lost~.<fix123><fix123>You sure are something!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>こんなに力が出てくるのは<fix123><fix123>初めてだぜー<fix123>このまま幻想郷を支配してやんよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Man, I've NEVER been this<fix123><fix123>powerful before!<fix123>I'm gonna charge onward and conquer Gensokyo!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私の分も頑張ってきてね！<fix123><fix123>期待してるわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Fight on for my share, too!<fix123><fix123>We're all counting on you!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>任せとけ！<fix123><fix123>妖精 (われら) の未来はあたいが創る！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Leave it to me!<fix123><fix123>I shall create the future of us fairies with my own two hands!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>紅い山の孤独<fix123>Red Mountain Loneliness<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Solitude on the Scarlet Mountain<fix123>Red Mountain Loneliness<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>紅葉した山<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Mountain in Autumn Colors<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 色無き風は妖怪の山に<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Colorless Wind on Youkai Mountain<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nemuno Sakata ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Nemuno Sakata PAUSES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>なんだ？<fix123>ここはうちのなわばりだべ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What?<fix123>This here's s'posedta' be my territory.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>知るもんか！<fix123><fix123>あたいは幻想郷の支配者になる妖精だぞー！<fix123>どこに行って何をしようが<fix123><fix123>あたいの自由だー！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Like I care!<fix123><fix123>I'm the fairy who shall soon lord over Gensokyo!<fix123>I can go anywhere and do<fix123><fix123>anything I want!<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>An overlord, eh? Well, sure, have<fix123><fix123>fun with your lordin' or whatever.<fix123>More importantly, you oughta<fix123><fix123>git on outta here.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>I dunno! I'm just feeling really strong.<fix123>I bet it's because of<fix123><fix123>the midsummer sun.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そんなんで大丈夫なんかな<fix123><fix123>幻想郷の支配者って……<fix123>ま、取り敢えず出ていってくんろ<fix123><fix123>小さい支配者さん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are y'sure you're really<fix123><fix123>"Gensokyo overlord" material...?<fix123>Welp, you just head along now,<fix123><fix123>lil' miss overlord.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ま、いいか<fix123><fix123>涼しい今こそあたいの本領発揮よー！<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Cherry petals?<fix123><fix123>Don't be stupid! It's fall, those would never...<fix123>Whaaa?!<fix123><fix123>They ARE cherry petals!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>こんな馬鹿だけど<fix123><fix123>妖力だけは一人前ねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What an idiot.<fix123><fix123>You sure have an impressive aura, though...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんだこりゃあ<fix123><fix123>すげー、一日だなぁ<fix123>たった一日で<fix123><fix123>真夏に真秋に真春になった<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What the heck is all this?<fix123><fix123>This's awesome! It's only been one day...!<fix123>In just one day, it's turned from<fix123><fix123>midsummer to midfall to mid'sprin! [2]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まあき、まはるって<fix123><fix123>そんな言い方しないわよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Um. "Midfall" and<fix123><fix123>"mid'sprin" aren't words.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh? Really?<fix123>Whatever, though! Once I rule the land,<fix123><fix123>I'll make them into official words!<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>You seem to be stronger than usual. I mean, so<fix123><fix123>are all the other fairies around here, but still.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Sorry, miss fairy, but I'm gonna<fix123><fix123>have to chase you outta here.<fix123>As this shrine's guardian beast!<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>つ、強いー<fix123>妖精達が力を持っていることには<fix123><fix123>気が付いていたけど、ここまでとは<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>S-So strong...!<fix123>I knew that the fairies were stronger, but<fix123><fix123>I hardly imagined they were this strong...<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes! I'm one step closer to<fix123><fix123>becoming supreme overlord!<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>I mean, I bet I could've won if<fix123><fix123>I'd really gotten serious...<fix123>It's just that if I use any more of my<fix123><fix123>power, I fear I might lose control of it.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>負け惜しみって奴ー？<fix123><fix123>かっこわるーい<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What, you a sore loser or somethin'?<fix123><fix123>Sooo laaaame!<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Grhrhgh.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さーて、次は何処に<fix123><fix123>向かおうかなー<fix123>今なら誰にも負ける気がしないぜー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A'ight, where am I<fix123><fix123>gonna head next?<fix123>I feel like I can't lose to ANYONE right now!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まあ、 神 (こ) 社 (こ) から出て行ってくれるのなら<fix123><fix123>なんにも文句は言わないけどね<fix123>でも、気を付けた方が良いわ<fix123><fix123>苟 (・) 且 (・) の (・) 力 (・) には絶対何か裏があるんだから<fix123>私はその力に悪意を感じて……<fix123><fix123>って、もう居ない！<fix123>ありゃあ、痛い目に遭うだろうな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, if you're leaving the shrine,<fix123><fix123>I'll hardly be one to complain.<fix123>You should be careful, though. "Temporary" power<fix123><fix123>always has something else lurking behind it.<fix123>I've sensed an evil intent behind that power, and...<fix123><fix123>oh, she's already gone!<fix123>My goodness. She's in for a rough time.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>My, what's going on?<fix123><fix123>I'm practically overflowing with magic power...<fix123>I feel like taking this out for a spin on some fairies!<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmph. I dunno what the heck<fix123><fix123>that lady was on about...<fix123>But hey! A stronger enemy showed up,<fix123><fix123>so I'll just roll with that.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>This out-of-season blizzard<fix123>might make it hard to tell, but...<fix123>This is the Forest of Magic, you know?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だから？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>And?<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>It doesn't matter who it is. There's nobody<fix123><fix123>who can stand up to a magic specialist like me!<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>You moron!<fix123><fix123>You big ol' hat-headed moron!<fix123>Victory is decided by whoever's the strongest!<fix123>So victory is mine!<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, aren't you confident.<fix123>As a symbol of Jizo, I exist in this world to provide<fix123><fix123>salvation to all creatures in this era without Buddhas...<fix123>But fairies sure don't count.<fix123><fix123>'Tis a bitter shame! I'll see you in your next life![3]<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>こ、この妖精<fix123><fix123>出来る！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>W-What's with this fairy?!<fix123><fix123>She actually packs a punch!<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>I see... I did get the feeling that there was<fix123><fix123>more power dwelling in me than usual,<fix123>but it looks like you had that same<fix123><fix123>power within you too!<fix123>If we were both using performance enhancers for that fight,<fix123><fix123>then it figures that a fairy would be so powerful.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, to tell you the truth,<fix123><fix123>my magic allows me to control life.<fix123>Fairies are pure life energy, so if I really got serious,<fix123><fix123>I should've been able to completely nullify you...<fix123>But for some reason, it didn't work on you.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>What are you trying to say?<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>In short, you're running on some power<fix123><fix123>other than that of mere fairies right now...<fix123>Wha?!<fix123><fix123>Uh, there's a door stuck to your back?!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あたいの背中がどうしたって？<fix123><fix123>……あっ！？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There's a what-now on my back?<fix123><fix123>...Waagh?!<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>妖精が消えた……！？<fix123><fix123>背中を触ったら吸い込まれるように……<fix123>……<fix123>……ま、妖精は救済対象じゃ無いしね<fix123><fix123>見て見ぬ振り、見て見ぬ振り<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123><fix123>The fairy vanished...!? It's like she got sucked<fix123>away somewhere when she touched her own back...<fix123>....<fix123>...Well, fairies aren't salvation targets anyway.<fix123><fix123>Nothin' to see here, nothin' to see here.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Aw, c'mon. An unforeseen fairy got chosen!<fix123><fix123>Isn't that okay too?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それには実力が無いとねぇー<fix123>だからテストするよ！<fix123><fix123>貴方の実力を！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If she's got the power to back it up, of course...<fix123>Which means it's time for a test!<fix123><fix123>Show us what you're really made of!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どっちの奴が先に勝負するのか<fix123><fix123>さっさと決めい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Okay, who's gonna fight me first?<fix123><fix123>Decide quick!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>予想外は人生の最高のスパイスさ<fix123><fix123>君もそう思うだろ？<fix123>喜べ戦闘民族よ！<fix123><fix123>君の相手は二人同時だ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Unexpected stuff is the best spice of life.<fix123><fix123>Don't you think so too?<fix123>Be overjoyed, O little warrior tribesman!<fix123><fix123>Your opponent shall be both of us at once!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Satono Nishida and Mai Teireida DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ま、まだやるか！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Y-You still wanna go?!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>このぐらいで良いか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yeah, that oughta be fine.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>へー、まあまあね<fix123><fix123>妖精にしては……だけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My, that was actually all right.<fix123><fix123>By fairy standards... However...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>残念だけど不合格<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sorry, but you don't pass.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああん？<fix123><fix123>何か馬鹿にされてる？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Whaaat?!<fix123><fix123>Are you makin' fun of me?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>所詮、僕たちが与えた力の上で<fix123><fix123>戦っているだけで<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>In the end, you were only fighting<fix123><fix123>with the power that we gave you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方本来の力は<fix123><fix123>大した物では無い<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Your original power is hardly<fix123><fix123>anything worth noting.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何をゴチャゴチャ言っているんだ？<fix123>現に今、あたいが勝ったじゃ無いか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What are you two babbling about now?<fix123>I won, didn't I? Plain as day!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>これはテストだからね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That was a test, is the thing.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今、貴方は私達の力によって<fix123><fix123>強くなっているだけ<fix123>戦う振りをして<fix123><fix123>本来の力を見ていたのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're only being strengthened by<fix123><fix123>our powers, right now.<fix123>We were just pretending to put up a fight<fix123><fix123>so that we could gauge your original strength.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふざけんな！<fix123><fix123>お前らがあたいに何かしたって！？<fix123>なる程判った！<fix123><fix123>本来の力はもっと凄いってことだな！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Quit MESSING with me!<fix123><fix123>Are you two sayin' you did somethin' to my power?!<fix123>Aha! Now I see!<fix123><fix123>The truth is that I'm even more powerful than this!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ごめんちょっと待って<fix123>……え？<fix123><fix123>……判りました<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sorry, hang on a second.<fix123>...Huh?<fix123><fix123>...Understood.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何？<fix123><fix123>お師匠様から連絡？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What was that?<fix123><fix123>Did Master give us a call?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お師匠様が私達を呼んでるわ<fix123>多分怒られると思う<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, she's summoned us.<fix123>We're probably in for a scolding.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>げー！<fix123><fix123>嫌だなぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Blech!<fix123><fix123>This is the worst.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Satono and Mai leave<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>ちょっと待って、と言われたまま<fix123><fix123>誰も居なくなった<fix123>……んー、えーっと？<fix123><fix123>この場合はどうすれば<fix123>それに、何だあいつ等<fix123><fix123>あたいの事なんて眼中にないって感じで<fix123>……<fix123>丁度いいや<fix123><fix123>勝手に暴れても良いって事だな！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>She said to hang on for one second,<fix123><fix123>but they just up and left.<fix123>...Err. Uhhh?<fix123><fix123>What am I supposed to do now?<fix123>Plus, those two kind of seemed like<fix123><fix123>they weren't even paying attention to me...<fix123>.....<fix123>Perfect!<fix123><fix123>This means I've got a free pass to smash this place up!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>開けるなかれ、見るなかれ<fix123>後ろの扉に秘天あり<fix123>Hidden Star in Four Seasons<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Open It Not, Gaze Not Upon It;<fix123>Heaven Lies Hidden Behind the Door to Your Rear<fix123>Hidden Star in Four Seasons<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>後戸の国<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Land of the Back Door<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: イントゥ・バックドア<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Into Backdoor<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さっきの奴ら<fix123><fix123>どこに行っちまったんだ？<fix123>それにしても<fix123><fix123>こんな暗い場所つまんない<fix123>帰ろ帰ろ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Where did those two weirdos<fix123><fix123>run off to, anyway?<fix123>Aside from that, though,<fix123><fix123>this place is so dark and boring.<fix123>I'm gonna leave.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Okina Matara ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>何だお前は<fix123>二童子の奴何をしてるんだ？<fix123><fix123>変な妖精が紛れ込んでおるぞ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What are you doing here?<fix123>What on Earth are those two layabouts doing?<fix123><fix123>There's some weird fairy wandering around in here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何だお前は！<fix123><fix123>何か強そうだな！<fix123>あたいと戦えー！<fix123><fix123>最強の称号を賭けて！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who the heck are you?!<fix123><fix123>You seem real strong!<fix123>Come, do battle with me!<fix123><fix123>We'll fight for the title of the strongest!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前、気が付いていないのか？<fix123>それ以上暴走したら<fix123><fix123>妖精とはいえ持たないかもしれんぞ<fix123>証拠に肌が黒くなって<fix123><fix123>きているじゃないか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Have you not noticed yet?<fix123>Even if you're a fairy, if you run rampant any more<fix123><fix123>than this, you won't be able to hold yourself together.<fix123>Look, your skin is browning as we speak.<fix123><fix123>Isn't that proof enough?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああん？　これは日焼けだぜ！<fix123><fix123>夏の勲章だ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Whaat?! This is just a tan!<fix123><fix123>It's a summer medal of honor!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>究極の絶対秘神<fix123>摩多羅　隠岐奈<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Ultimate, Absolute Secret God<fix123>Okina Matara<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それは違うな<fix123>暴走の影響が見た目に<fix123><fix123>現れているだけだ<fix123>完全に自我を失う前に<fix123><fix123>ここから去るがよい<fix123>お前に与えられた背 (・) 中 (・) の (・) 力 (・) は<fix123><fix123>解いてやるように言っておくぞ<fix123>無事に弱くなるし<fix123><fix123>肌も元通りに戻るだろう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're mistaken.<fix123>The effects of your supercharged rampage<fix123><fix123>are merely spreading to your appearance.<fix123>You should get out of here before your<fix123><fix123>sense of self completely breaks down.<fix123>I'll tell those two to deactivate the<fix123><fix123>power at your back that they granted.<fix123>Your strength will safely weaken,<fix123><fix123>and your skin should soon return to normal.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>背中の力って何だよう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What d'you mean, "power at my back?"<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前の後ろについて来ている<fix123><fix123>季節武器 (それ) の事だよ<fix123>その影響力無しでは<fix123><fix123>お前の力など見る影も無いぞ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That season weaponry that's been<fix123><fix123>following you around. See?<fix123>Without its influence, your power would be<fix123><fix123>a mere shadow of what it is right now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああん？<fix123><fix123>これはあたいの力だ！<fix123>最強が怖くてしょうがないんだろ？<fix123><fix123>いっちょ揉んでやるぜ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What?!<fix123><fix123>This is my power!<fix123>You're just scared of the strongest fighter around, aren'tcha?<fix123><fix123>C'mon, let's just have a little fight!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 秘匿されたフォーシーズンズ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Concealed Four Seasons<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前の力を制御している私と<fix123><fix123>お前が勝負するなんて愚の骨頂だ<fix123>だが……良いだろう<fix123><fix123>妖精の力も気になっていたからな<fix123>たまには部下に妖精を選ぶのも<fix123><fix123>面白いのかもしれん<fix123>それもお前の力が見るに足る<fix123><fix123>物だったらの話だがな<fix123>思う存分力を発揮せよ<fix123>そして私に見せてみよ！<fix123><fix123>妖精が跳ね踊る暗黒能楽を！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm the one keeping your power in check right now.<fix123><fix123>A fight between the two of us would be the very height of foolishness.<fix123>But... all right.<fix123><fix123>I'm interested in the power of fairies, too.<fix123>It might not be so bad to choose a fairy<fix123><fix123>for my subordinate once in a while.<fix123>Of course, that's only if you<fix123><fix123>prove your power to be worthy.<fix123>Unleash your power to its fullest strength!<fix123>And then show me!<fix123><fix123>Show me the noh of darkness that a fairy dances!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>When Okina Matara declares her final Spell Card:<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>季節装備を敵に奪われた！<fix123>さあ、最後は己のサブ季節と戦え！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The enemy stole your season options!<fix123>Now, for the finale, fight against thine own sub-season!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Okina Matara DEFEATED (...?)<fix123><fix123>
The Moriya Shrine<fix123>
A relatively new shrine on the Youkai Mountain.<fix123>
"—And then it became clear that my mission was to destroy a great evil,<fix123>
and to save the entire Lunar Capital.<fix123>
Thus, I became revered as the savior of the Moon."<fix123>
"That's all, roughly.<fix123>
It's explained easier when illustrated."<fix123>
"...So this is your report on the incident?"<fix123>
"Yes, it's the legend of my heroism."<fix123>
"Hmm. The content is impressive, but how much of it is true?"<fix123>
"You won't believe it: About eighty percent."<fix123>
"Next time you write a report, make it 100% true."<fix123>
"...Hmm-hmm.<fix123>
So they were going to move the Lunar Capital to Gensokyo...<fix123>
because the Lunar Capital itself was invaded. Is that true?"<fix123>
"Yes, absolutely true."<fix123>
"Even so,<fix123>
why did the Lunarians ask for your help?"<fix123>
"It's probably because I'm strong."<fix123>
"It's because they had an enemy they couldn't approach themselves."<fix123>
"This Sagume... could she be...?"<fix123>
"Someone you know? She was quite odd."<fix123>
"Well, if she is the Sagume, then the Lunarians are the heavenly gods'..."<fix123>
Having said this, Kanako plunged into thinking.<fix123>
This would mean that some of the Lunarians had divine lineages.<fix123>
And they, though reluctant, were going to come down to the Earth.<fix123>
It would have been like the second Tenson Kourin.<fix123>
While Sanae may have been oblivious to this,<fix123>preventing such an event was praiseworthy for a native god.<fix123>
"This girl really does have it in her," thought Kanako.<fix123>
<c$Ending No.05 — Qualified as a God of the Earth$><fix123>

The Moriya Shrine<fix123>
A relatively new shrine on the Youkai Mountain.<fix123>
"You can't even dodge that?!<fix123>
Run a lap around the lake!"<fix123>
"Yes! I'm going!"<fix123>
.........After some time...<fix123>
"Too slow!<fix123>
Get ready for the next danmaku set!"<fix123>
"Huff huff~ Please let me rest for a bit."<fix123>
"That attitude is why you're no match for the Lunarians!<fix123>
You wanna come back all beat up like last time?!"<fix123>
"No, I don't, but..."<fix123>
"We don't live in an era where sports teams and the like can win with willpower alone..."<fix123>
"You don't get it!<fix123>
The fact that it's not that era is what makes it so valuable!"<fix123>
"Danmaku is all about guts!<fix123>
If you can't dodge it, then you don't have enough guts! Understand?!"<fix123>
"Yeah..."<fix123>
"We have the result of the analysis."<fix123>
"How was it?"<fix123>
"Huff huff huff~ Analysis?"<fix123>
"The analysis of the ‘Ultramarine Orb Elixir,’ of course.<fix123>
While Sanae was on the Moon, we were looking into it."<fix123>
"Oh, so that's why I had to go to the Moon without it."<fix123>
"Looks like that was the right decision though.<fix123>
It's likely that this potion had a strong side effect."<fix123>
"Ho-ho, what side effect?"<fix123>
"While you're experiencing the future, an effect that purifies the past can also be observed.<fix123>
If you were to use it on the ancient, native gods..."<fix123>
"It'd be an instant kill."<fix123>
"Yes, this potion has a strong influence on the living Earth creatures."<fix123>
"Eh? So if I used it, I'd be dangerous?"<fix123>
"Well, nothing deadly would've happened."<fix123>
"Well... it wouldn't have been deadly, probably, but all your<fix123>impurities might be washed away, leaving you as a clean human."<fix123>
"? Isn't that a good thing?"<fix123>
The difference between surface dwellers and Lunarians is whether or not they have impurity.<fix123>
Those who left the impure Earth to live on the Moon have become the Lunarians.<fix123>
Impurity, the Lunarians say, is the concept of life and death.<fix123>
To lose one's impurity is to lose both life and death.<fix123>
So the Lunarians cannot live on the lively Earth.<fix123>
The Ultramarine Orb Elixir weakens the influence of life and death. That's for certain.<fix123>
Without the concept of "extra lives," misses don't feel as heavy.<fix123>
Continuing to use the Ultramarine Orb Elixir might be dangerous.<fix123>
<c$Ending No.06 — Danmaku Victory Through Guts$><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>The Butterfly Fairy who Approaches God<fix123>Eternity Larva<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, you! Yes, you in the black over there.<fix123><fix123>Are you enjoying this summer day?<fix123>If you've got nothing else to do, come cool<fix123><fix123>me off with that stupid-big fan of yours!<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: A Midsummer Fairy's Dream<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>You don't seem related to the incident, so without<fix123><fix123>further ado, allow me to blow you into next week.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>わーい、戦いだ戦いだ！<fix123><fix123>真夏の戦争だ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Woohoo! Let's fight, let's fight!<fix123><fix123>It's time for a midsummer war!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eternity Larva DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>こうさーん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I surrenderrrr.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>事件と関係無いところで<fix123><fix123>エネルギーを使ってしまった<fix123>しかし……<fix123><fix123>貴方妖精にしては強いのね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Mm. I've gone and wasted my energy on something<fix123><fix123>that had nothing to do with the incident.<fix123>That said, though...<fix123><fix123>You're quite strong for a fairy.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>力が有り余って仕方が無いの<fix123><fix123>今なら新世界の神にでもなれそうだわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've got way more power than I know what to do with.<fix123><fix123>I feel like I could even become the god of the new world right now!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>昆虫型妖精の暴走……<fix123><fix123>まあ夏の暑さにやられた感じかな<fix123>記事になるような事件じゃなさそうね<fix123><fix123>異常気象の取材を続けましょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>An insect fairy going berserk...<fix123><fix123>Well, I suppose the summer heat just got to her.<fix123>This doesn't seem big enough to write an article about.<fix123><fix123>Let's continue gathering material on the abnormal weather.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>What?<fix123><fix123>What's a tengu like you doin' here?<fix123>You're not s'posed t' be here. We made an agreement.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Whoops, please excuse me.<fix123>This was your territory, yes?<fix123><fix123>
