en_dialogue: <fix123>The Yamanba who Surpasses This Floating World's Barriers<fix123>Nemuno Sakata<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>判ってて入ってきたと<fix123><fix123>言うのなら問題だなぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If you're sayin' you came in here already<fix123><fix123>knowing that, we're gonna have a problem.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ちょっと取材に来たのです<fix123>この辺が秋(・)の(・)中(・)心(・)地(・)みたいですので<fix123><fix123>是非お話をお聞かせ頂きたいと思いまして<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I came here to do a bit of journalism.<fix123>This spot appears to be the exact center of the autumn area,<fix123><fix123>so I would greatly appreciate it if I could ask you a few questions?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この山はあんたらのだけの<fix123><fix123>もんじゃない<fix123>不可侵条約を一方的に破棄するのが<fix123><fix123>天狗達(あんたら)のやり方だって言うんだな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This mountain doesn't just belong to<fix123><fix123>you tengu, you know.<fix123>So that's your way of doin' things, huh? Decidin'<fix123><fix123>all by yourselves to scrap our non-aggression treaty?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 山奥のエンカウンター<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Deep-Mountain Encounter<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>じゃあ、うちはうちの<fix123><fix123>やり方でお前を迎えてやるぞ<fix123>山姥(やまんば)のやり方でな！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>In that case, I'll give ya a warm welcome<fix123><fix123>with my way of doin' things.<fix123>A yamanba's way, that is!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nemuno Sakata DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ちょっと止めましょう<fix123>私は貴方に対し<fix123><fix123>何の敵意もありません<fix123>山姥(あなたたち)の脱依存主義も自然主義も<fix123><fix123>尊重しておりおります [sic]<fix123>私が来た理由は<fix123><fix123>お話を伺いたいだけなんですが……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Let's pause for a moment.<fix123>I bear no ill will of<fix123><fix123>any kind towards you.<fix123>We respect the independent and naturalistic<fix123><fix123>way of life that yamanba follow.<fix123>I simply came here because I wish<fix123><fix123>to ask you a few questions...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あっはっは<fix123><fix123>天狗という奴はやはり喰えない奴だな<fix123>人を武力で脅しておいて<fix123><fix123>何がお話を伺いたい、だ<fix123>気に入った<fix123><fix123>取材でも何でも受けてやる<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah hah hah!<fix123><fix123>You tengu sure are a crafty lot, after all!<fix123>You come in an' threaten someone with force, an' then<fix123><fix123>have the gall to say "I just want to ask some questions?"<fix123>I like you!<fix123><fix123>I'll accept any interview or whatever you've got.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>有難うございます<fix123>私は知っていましたよ<fix123><fix123>貴方達が本当は友好的な種族であることも<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Thank you ever so much.<fix123>I knew all along that your species<fix123><fix123>is actually quite friendly.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それで、取材ってなんだべ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So, what's this interview about?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今年の秋に関して<fix123><fix123>何か気付いたことはありませんか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Have you noticed anything in particular<fix123><fix123>about this year's autumn?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>んー、何かあったのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ehh... is there somethin' goin' on?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>神獣泳ぐ桜色の海<fix123>Sea of Spring Pink<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Sakura-Colored Sea the Divine Beast Swims Through<fix123>Sea of Spring Pink<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>博麗神社の夜桜<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Evening Cherries at the Hakurei Shrine<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 桜色の海を泳いで<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Swim Through a Sakura-Colored Sea<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Lily White ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Lily White DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>見事な桜ねぇ<fix123>神社は暴走した妖精や妖怪に<fix123><fix123>乗っ取られているようだけど<fix123>霊夢は留守かな<fix123><fix123>のんきなもんね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What beautiful cherry blossoms...<fix123>It seems that the shrine's been taken over<fix123><fix123>by berserk fairies and youkai, though.<fix123>Is Reimu out, I wonder?<fix123><fix123>She sure is laid-back.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>天狗のブン屋ー？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A tengu reporter?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Aunn Komano ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>暴力取材ならお断りだよ<fix123><fix123>今すぐ出て行ってー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If you're here for one of your violent interviews,<fix123><fix123>I'll have to decline. Just leave right now, okay?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あれ？<fix123><fix123>貴方はいったい……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123><fix123>Just who are you...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>神仏に心酔する守護神獣<fix123>高麗野 あうん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Guardian Beast Devoted to Shintoism and Buddhism<fix123>Aunn Komano<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は神社の守護神<fix123><fix123>コマ犬の高(こ)麗(ま)野(の)だよ<fix123>巫女が留守の間は<fix123><fix123>私が侵入者を追っ払っているの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm Komano the komainu,<fix123><fix123>this shrine's guardian god!<fix123>I chase away intruders while<fix123><fix123>the shrine maiden is out.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>コマ犬、ですか<fix123><fix123>そんなの居ましたっけ<fix123>まあ良いです<fix123><fix123>お話をお聞かせ頂きたいのですが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A komainu, hm?<fix123><fix123>Was there really one of these around?<fix123>Well, that's fine.<fix123><fix123>I'd like to ask you a few questions?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 一対の神獣<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: A Pair of Divine Beasts<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おーい、侵入者を追っ払っている<fix123><fix123>って言ってるでしょ<fix123>それ以上神社に居るつもりなら<fix123><fix123>容赦しないよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hello? I just said I'm<fix123><fix123>chasing away intruders.<fix123>If you intend to stay in this shrine<fix123><fix123>any longer, I'll give you no mercy!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Aunn Komano DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>では、この異常な桜について<fix123><fix123>お話をお聞かせ下さい<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So, I'd like to ask you about<fix123><fix123>these abnormal cherry blossoms.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>暴力はんたーい<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I don't agree with violeeence...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>暴力で追い返そうとした奴が<fix123><fix123>何を言っているんですか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Excuse me? You were trying to<fix123><fix123>violently chase me out just now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>しょうがないなぁ<fix123>で、桜の話だっけ？<fix123><fix123>それとも暴走している妖精の話？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Aw, fine.<fix123>So, the cherry blossoms, was it? Or was it<fix123><fix123>the berserk fairies you wanted to know about?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええ、何か諸々の異常に関して<fix123><fix123>気付いたことが無いかと<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'd like to know about anything out of the<fix123><fix123>ordinary that you've noticed, yes.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>残念ながら私が知っていることは<fix123><fix123>何も無いの<fix123>本当に無いわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm sorry, but I don't know anything<fix123><fix123>about what's going on.<fix123>Really, I've got nothing.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうですか……<fix123><fix123>確かにそんな顔してますね<fix123>先の山姥も何にも情報を<fix123><fix123>持っていなかった<fix123>こんな幻想郷を覆うくらいの異変なのに<fix123><fix123>全く首謀者の手掛かりが無いなんて<fix123>思ったより陰湿で用意周到な<fix123><fix123>奴の仕業かも知れないわね！<fix123>千年に一度の大スクープの予感だわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Is that so...?<fix123><fix123>Your expression does seem to say as much.<fix123>That yamanba from before didn't<fix123><fix123>have any information, either.<fix123>We've got an incident big enough to cover all of Gensokyo,<fix123><fix123>but absolutely no clues as to the ringleader...<fix123>This may be the work of someone far more insidious<fix123><fix123>and strategically-minded than I thought!<fix123>I can feel a once-in-a-thousand-years scoop coming on!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>視界ゼロの邂逅<fix123>White Blizzard Out of Season<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A Curious Encounter at Zero Visibility<fix123>White Blizzard Out of Season<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>魔法の森上空　（推測）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sky Over the Forest of Magic (assumed)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 幻想のホワイトトラベラー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Illusionary White Traveler<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mai Teireida ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Mai Teireida LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Mai Teireida ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ほー、天狗……？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Woah, a tengu...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はいそうです<fix123>お話をお聞きしたいのですが<fix123><fix123>お時間宜しいでしょうか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, that's right.<fix123>I'd like to ask you a few questions.<fix123><fix123>Could you perhaps spare a moment?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だめだめだめ<fix123><fix123>アンタは同類だが天敵じゃないか<fix123>天狗が出てくることも<fix123><fix123>想定していたが、驚いたわー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Nuh-uh-uh. Nah. Nope.<fix123><fix123>We might have the same classification, but you're our mortal enemy!<fix123>I did imagine that a tengu might show<fix123><fix123>up, but geeze, what a surprise...!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>力がみなぎるわー！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm brimming with power!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Narumi Yatadera ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>森で垂迹した魔法地蔵<fix123>矢田寺　成美<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Magic Jizo who Manifested in the Forest<fix123>Narumi Yatadera<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何故だろう、こんなに魔力が<fix123><fix123>溢れ出てくるなんて……<fix123>誰でも良いから<fix123><fix123>この力を試したい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My, what's going on?<fix123><fix123>I'm practically overflowing with magic power...<fix123>I don't care who!<fix123><fix123>I want to try this power out on someone!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あはは、間に合った<fix123><fix123>お前の相手はこいつよ<fix123>それじゃあ僕は帰るねー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ahaha, just in time.<fix123><fix123>This gal here is your opponent.<fix123>Welp, time for me to head on back!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ……<fix123><fix123>逃げやがった<fix123>でも、目の前の貴方も気になります<fix123><fix123>ついでにお時間宜しいでしょうか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah...<fix123><fix123>Dang it, she ran off.<fix123>I'm interested in this new face too, though.<fix123><fix123>Could you lend me a moment of your time?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>良いよ！<fix123><fix123>相手してくれるんだー！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sure!<fix123><fix123>Thanks for facing off with me!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>相手？<fix123><fix123>インタビューですよね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Facing off?<fix123><fix123>You do mean for an interview, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 魔法の笠地蔵<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Magic Straw-Hat Jizo<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうじゃないわ<fix123><fix123>吹雪が私に力を与えてくれているみたいで<fix123>その力をぶつける相手よ！<fix123><fix123>くたばれ天狗野郎！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Nope, not at all.<fix123><fix123>It seems like this blizzard is giving me strength...<fix123>So I'm gonna hurl all that strength at you!<fix123><fix123>Eat this, you damn dirty tengu!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この理由なく好戦的な感じ……<fix123>嫌いじゃない！<fix123><fix123>むしろフェイバリット！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What a pointlessly belligerent attitude...<fix123>Not bad, if you ask me!<fix123><fix123>In fact, it's my favorite!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Narumi Yatadera DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>さて、インタビューに入ります<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>All right, then. Let's proceed with the interview.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……しくしく<fix123><fix123>はい<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...*sob sob*<fix123><fix123>'Kay.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さっき貴方は、吹雪に力を得たと<fix123><fix123>言ってましたが、どういう意味でしょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You said a moment ago that the blizzard was giving<fix123><fix123>you power. What exactly did you mean by that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>悪いけど私も判らないわ<fix123><fix123>妙に力が湧いてくるというか<fix123>普段はこんな好戦的じゃあないのよ<fix123><fix123>ひっそり暮らしたい派なのよ<fix123>それに……なんだか背中が熱いわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sorry, but I'm not sure either.<fix123><fix123>I can feel a strange power flowing forth, or something...?<fix123>I'm not usually this eager to fight, either.<fix123><fix123>I want to live a nice, quiet life, if anything!<fix123>Also... my back feels kind of hot, I think.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……さっきいた竹を持っていた奴は誰？<fix123><fix123>知っている人？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...Who was that girl carrying the bamboo<fix123><fix123>a moment ago? Do you know her?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？　竹を持っていた奴？<fix123><fix123>誰の事？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wha? A girl with bamboo?<fix123><fix123>Who are you talking about?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>戦う前に貴方の後ろで<fix123><fix123>踊っていた奴です<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The strange girl who was dancing<fix123><fix123>behind you before we fought.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>嘘だぁ、いくら吹雪が酷くても<fix123><fix123>踊っていたら判りますよー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're kidding! Sure, this is a pretty harsh blizzard,<fix123><fix123>but I could definitely tell if someone was dancing right behind me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……お地蔵さんは<fix123><fix123>注意力が無い、と<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>..."Jizo statues have zero ability to<fix123><fix123>pay attention." Noted.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さっきから背中が熱くて<fix123><fix123>後ろを何度も見たけど誰も居なかったし<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My back's felt hot for a while now, so I've turned around to see<fix123><fix123>what's the matter many times, but there hasn't been anyone there.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>背中が熱いなら……医者に診せなさい<fix123><fix123>それとも石工の方が良いのかな<fix123>ん？<fix123><fix123>貴方、背中に扉があるわよ！？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If your back feels hot... you should go see a doctor.<fix123><fix123>Or maybe a mason would be better, in your case.<fix123>Hm?<fix123><fix123>Um, miss? There's a door stuck to your back?!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？<fix123><fix123>何それ怖い<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123><fix123>Wow, talk about scary.[1]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さっきの奴が、背中に取り憑いて<fix123><fix123>力を与えていると見た！<fix123>もしかしたら、今まで戦った奴の<fix123><fix123>背中にも潜んでいたのかな<fix123>虎穴に入らずんば虎児を得ず！<fix123><fix123>中は……広そうね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see! That girl from before was possessing you<fix123><fix123>via your back and giving you power!<fix123>Perhaps she was hiding in the backs of<fix123><fix123>all the others I fought, too...<fix123>If you don't enter a tiger's lair, you can't catch its cubs![2]<fix123><fix123>Let's see... wow, there's a lot of room in here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>童子は狂気を跳ね踊る<fix123>Into Crazy Back Door<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Douji Hop and Dance in Madness<fix123>Into Crazy Back Door<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>後戸の国<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Land of the Back Door<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 禁断の扉の向こうは、この世かあの世か<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Does the Forbidden Door Lead to This World, or the World Beyond?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Satono Nishida ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Satono Nishida LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Mai Teireida ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>やっと重要参考人を見つけました！<fix123><fix123>それではインタビューをします<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've finally found a material witness!<fix123><fix123>With that, I'd like to begin our interview.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あれ！？<fix123><fix123>さっきの天狗！？　何故ここに……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What?!<fix123><fix123>The tengu from before?! How'd you get in here...?!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地蔵の背中からやってきました<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I went through the Jizo's back.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あちゃー、扉開きっぱなしだったかー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ack. Guess I left the door open...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Satono Nishida ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>もー、舞ったら<fix123><fix123>おっちょこちょいなんだから<fix123>天狗なんて引き入れてどうするのよ<fix123><fix123>絶対に怒られるわよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, Mai.<fix123><fix123>You're such a scatterbrain.<fix123>What were you even thinking, bringing a tengu in here?<fix123><fix123>We're never going to hear the end of this.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いやー失敗したわー<fix123><fix123>でも僕は怒られるとは思わないよ<fix123>僕らの仕事は天狗を退く事だからね<fix123><fix123>ここでやっつけちゃえば良い<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ehh, yeah, I did mess up...<fix123><fix123>But I don't think Master will get mad at us.<fix123>Our job is to drive tengu away, after all.<fix123><fix123>All we gotta do is shoot her down here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>天狗を退く仕事……？<fix123><fix123>貴方達は一体何者なの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Your job is to drive tengu away...?<fix123><fix123>What in the world are you two?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>危険すぎるバックダンサーズ<fix123>爾子田　里乃　＆　丁礼田　舞<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>All-Too-Dangerous Backup Dancers<fix123>Satono Nishida & Mai Teireida<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>僕は丁礼田　舞 (ていれいだ　まい) <fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm Mai Teireida.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は爾子田　里乃 (にしだ　さとの) <fix123><fix123>障碍 (しょうがい) 神の二童子よ<fix123>本質的には貴方と同類ね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>And I'm Satono Nishida.<fix123><fix123>We're twin douji who serve a god of impairments.<fix123>We're fundamentally the same type of being as you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>障碍神……<fix123><fix123>何か聞いた事があったような<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A god of impairments...<fix123><fix123>I feel like I've heard that phrase before somewhere.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: クレイジーバックダンサーズ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Crazy Backup Dancers<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>障碍神……<fix123><fix123>それは物事を妨げる神である<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, a god of impairments...<fix123><fix123>A god who works to impair things.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>僕らは天狗と同じような<fix123><fix123>行動を取って、天狗を退くのさ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Our job is to behave the same way as tengu,<fix123><fix123>in order to drive tengu away!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私はただ、四季異変のインタビュー<fix123><fix123>したかっただけですが<fix123>戦うしかなさそうね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I only wanted to interview the two of you<fix123><fix123>about the four seasons incident, but...<fix123>It looks like I've got no choice but to fight.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>その場がここになるとは<fix123><fix123>予想外だったが……<fix123>とくとみよ！<fix123><fix123>僕らが二童子の秘儀「天狗怖 (おど) し」だ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I didn't expect to have to do this<fix123><fix123>right here, of all places, but...<fix123>Behold! Feast your eyes on us two servants'<fix123><fix123>secret ceremony, the  "Tengu-Odoshi"! (Tengu Frightening) <fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Satono Nishida and Mai Teireida DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ふん、口ほどにも無い<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmph! You're all bark and no bite.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>これは手強い<fix123><fix123>予想外だな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wow, she's strong.<fix123><fix123>Sure didn't expect that.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>舐めてかかってたわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It seems that we underestimated her.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は貴方達と敵対する<fix123><fix123>必要がありません<fix123>四季異変の情報さえ<fix123><fix123>手に入れば良いのですが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There's no need for me to show<fix123><fix123>such hostility towards you.<fix123>All I want is information on the four<fix123><fix123>seasons incident. That's all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>四季異変？<fix123><fix123>あれは僕達がやったわけじゃ無いよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The season incident?<fix123><fix123>Nah, that's not our fault.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？<fix123><fix123>そうなんですか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123><fix123>Really?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私達は背後で踊ることで<fix123><fix123>対象の潜在能力を無限に引き出せるの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>See, we can draw out a target's latent abilities to<fix123><fix123>an infinite extent by dancing behind their backs.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>僕達は普段隠れていた奴らの<fix123><fix123>可能性を見つけだすと共に<fix123>天狗の様な障碍の妖怪を退くという<fix123><fix123>使命を受けてやったのさ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We received orders to seek out potential<fix123><fix123>in people who are normally hidden...<fix123>And to drive away any youkai who serve as<fix123><fix123>impairments, such as tengu and the like.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>四季異変は私達の踊りの結果<fix123><fix123>暴走した妖精や精霊、神霊達の仕業よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The season incident was caused by the fairies, sprites<fix123><fix123>and divine spirits who went berserk because of our dancing.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>メモメモ……<fix123><fix123>つまり、まとめると<fix123>貴方達は使命を受けて<fix123><fix123>あちこちの妖怪に力を与えていた<fix123>その副作用で妖精達が暴走して<fix123><fix123>自然がおかしくなった……と<fix123>つまり四季異変の犯人は<fix123><fix123>貴方達じゃないですか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Jotting all this down...<fix123><fix123>So, to sum it all up:<fix123><fix123>Your superior ordered the two of you to grant<fix123><fix123>power to youkai in various places.<fix123>The fairies went berserk as a side effect of that,<fix123><fix123>which made nature become strange...<fix123>So you two are the culprit behind<fix123><fix123>the season incident, aren't you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ごめんちょっと待って<fix123>……え？<fix123><fix123>……判りました<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sorry, hang on a second.<fix123>...Huh?<fix123><fix123>...Understood.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何？<fix123><fix123>お師匠様から連絡？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What was that?<fix123><fix123>Did Master give us a call?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お師匠様が私達を呼んでるわ<fix123>多分怒られると思う<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, she's summoned us.<fix123>We're probably in for a scolding.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>げー！<fix123><fix123>嫌だなぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Blech!<fix123><fix123>This is the worst.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Satono and Mai leave<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>居なくなってしまった<fix123>四季異変を起こしている犯人は<fix123><fix123>見つけることが出来たけど……<fix123>障碍 (しょうがい) 神ねぇ……何か天狗の歴史で<fix123><fix123>聞いた事がある気がするなぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...They don't seem to be coming back.<fix123>Well, I've managed to find the culprit<fix123><fix123>responsible for the season incident, but...<fix123>A god of impairments, hm... I really do feel like<fix123><fix123>I've heard about one in tengu history before...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>開けるなかれ、見るなかれ<fix123>後ろの扉に秘天あり<fix123>Hidden Star in Four Seasons<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Open It Not, Gaze Not Upon It;<fix123>Heaven Lies Hidden Behind the Door to Your Rear<fix123>Hidden Star in Four Seasons<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>後戸の国<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Land of the Back Door<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: イントゥ・バックドア<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Into Backdoor<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さっきの二人にもっと話を<fix123><fix123>伺いたかったのですが<fix123>何とも不思議な世界ですねぇ<fix123>地蔵の背中からこんなに<fix123><fix123>世界が広がっているなんて……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I would have liked to ask those two<fix123><fix123>some more questions, but that aside...<fix123>This is quite the mysterious world we have here.<fix123>To think that a jizo's back would have<fix123><fix123>such a vast world inside of it...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Okina Matara ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あっはっは<fix123><fix123>これは面白い！<fix123>後戸の国に天狗とはな！<fix123><fix123>世も末か<fix123>本来、私達は天狗と同じ障碍 (しょうがい) を司る者だが<fix123><fix123>住むべき場所は違う<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah hah hah!<fix123><fix123>How very interesting!<fix123>A tengu, in the Land of the Back Door!<fix123><fix123>Just what is this world coming to?<fix123>I'm a being meant to govern impairments,<fix123><fix123>just like tengu, but we belong in different places.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>天狗と同じ……？<fix123><fix123>貴方は一体何者ですか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Just like tengu...?<fix123><fix123>What in the world are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>究極の絶対秘神<fix123>摩多羅　隠岐奈<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Ultimate, Absolute Secret God<fix123>Okina Matara<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は摩多羅 (またら) 　隠岐奈 (おきな) <fix123>後戸 (うしろど) の神であり<fix123><fix123>障碍 (しょうがい) の神であり<fix123>能楽の神であり<fix123><fix123>宿神 (しゅくしん) であり、星神である<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My name is Okina Matara.<fix123>I am the god of the back door,<fix123><fix123>a god of impairments,<fix123>a god of noh performance,<fix123><fix123>a god of outcasts, a god of stars...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>色んな二つ名があるんですねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's a lot of titles.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふっふっふ<fix123><fix123>まあ天狗のお前なら判るだろう<fix123>こんなに多くの神格を持っている<fix123><fix123>筈なんて無いと……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh heh heh.<fix123><fix123>Well, a tengu such as yourself should already understand.<fix123>Understand the fact, of course, that no god could<fix123><fix123>possibly have so many divine natures at once...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>と言いますと？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...Meaning?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>嘘を吐いているはずだと<fix123><fix123>思っているだろう？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You think I'm lying,<fix123>don't you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええ、まあ<fix123>あるいは、嘘は吐いていないけど<fix123><fix123>本質は隠されている匂いがします<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, yes.<fix123>Or perhaps you're not lying, but I get the feeling<fix123><fix123>that you're concealing your true nature.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まあ絶対の秘神、これが<fix123><fix123>本質かも知れないね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I'm an absolute secret god.<fix123><fix123>This may very well be my true nature after all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>障碍の神……秘神……<fix123><fix123>あ、思い出しました！<fix123>障碍の民の祖は二つに分かれ<fix123><fix123>一つは山に棲み、天狗となった<fix123>もう一つは仏の後ろに潜み人里に棲んだ<fix123><fix123>それが障碍の秘神……<fix123>もしかして貴方は……！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Impairments... a secret god...<fix123><fix123>Oh, I remember now!<fix123>Our ancestors, the people of impairments, split into two groups.<fix123><fix123>One settled in the mountains and became tengu.<fix123>The other hid behind buddhas, living in human settlements.<fix123><fix123>That is to say, a secret god of impairments...<fix123>Could you be...?!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 秘匿されたフォーシーズンズ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Concealed Four Seasons<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何度も言っている<fix123><fix123>私がその障碍の神そのものである<fix123>色々な二つ名が存在するが<fix123><fix123>一番本質を突いているのは何だと思う？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How many times must I say it?<fix123><fix123>I am that very god.<fix123>I have a wide variety of titles, but which one<fix123><fix123>do you think most accurately represents my true form?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さっき、秘神が本質だと<fix123><fix123>仰ってませんでした？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Didn't you say just a moment ago<fix123><fix123>that your true form was that of a "secret god?"<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>障碍の神とは天狗除けの神<fix123><fix123>という意味でもある<fix123>つまり私は<fix123><fix123>天狗をこの世から消す神だ<fix123>だから最初に笑ったんだよ<fix123><fix123>天狗が、天狗除け (うしろど) の国に入ってきたんだから<fix123>まさに烏滸 (おこ) の沙汰！<fix123><fix123>愚直に退け！　天狗改め天愚 (てんぐ) の記者よ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>"A god of impairments" also means<fix123><fix123>"a god of tengu-warding."<fix123>That is to say, I am a god who<fix123><fix123>eliminates tengu from this world.<fix123>That's why I laughed at first.<fix123><fix123>A tengu, of all things, has entered the land of tengu-warding.<fix123>Such utter cheek that you crow of!<fix123><fix123>Be vanquished in earnest, you foolish tengu reporter! [3]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>When Okina Matara declares her final Spell Card:<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>季節装備を敵に奪われた！<fix123>さあ、最後は己のサブ季節と戦え！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The enemy stole your season options!<fix123>Now, for the finale, fight against thine own sub-season!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Okina Matara DEFEATED (...?)<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>朝靄の先の真夏日<fix123>Miracle Blue Sky<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A Midsummer Day Beyond the Morning Mist<fix123>Miracle Blue Sky<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>真夏の上空<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Midsummer Skies<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 希望の星は青霄に昇る<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: A Star of Hope Rises in the Blue Sky<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eternity Larva ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Eternity Larva LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>なんだよ暑いじゃねーか<fix123>このヤロー！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What's the big idea here?!<fix123>It's freakin' HOT!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんだなんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What've we got here?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eternity Larva ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>神に近づく蝶の妖精<fix123>エタニティラルバ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Butterfly Fairy who Approaches God<fix123>Eternity Larva<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>夏が暑いのは当たり前じゃない<fix123><fix123>妖精だって知ってるわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Of course summer is hot.<fix123><fix123>Even fairies know that.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>こんなに暑いと思わなかったから<fix123><fix123>厚着して来ちゃったじゃねーか<fix123>あー、暑くて死ぬぜー！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I thought it wasn't gonna be this hot!<fix123><fix123>That's why I'm all bundled up like this.<fix123>Ugh, it's so hot I could just die!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>よくみたら貴方<fix123><fix123>馬鹿みたいな季節外れの格好ね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now that I look at you, you're totally dressed<fix123><fix123>for the wrong season. You look so dumb!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 真夏の妖精の夢<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: A Midsummer Fairy's Dream<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もっと身体を動かして<fix123><fix123>夏の暑さを全身で味わいましょ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Come on! Get some exercise, and taste<fix123><fix123>this summer heat with your whole body!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eternity Larva DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あつーい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So hoooot!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>暑いぜー！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hot indeed!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>暑いならなんで<fix123><fix123>そんな格好しているの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If it's so hot then why<fix123><fix123>are you dressed like that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うちの周りは雪が降るくらいの<fix123><fix123>真冬だったんだよ！<fix123>本当にどうなってるんだー？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's so cold over where I live that it's snowing!<fix123><fix123>It's practically winter!<fix123>Seriously, what is going on?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>またまたそんな冗談をー<fix123><fix123>今は最高の真夏じゃないの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That sure is a good joke.<fix123><fix123>It's the height of summer right now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>見れば判る<fix123><fix123>ここが夏である事は間違いない<fix123>久しぶりにつかみ所の無い異変だな<fix123><fix123>次は何処を調査すれば良いのか判らん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yeah, I can see that.<fix123><fix123>It's definitely summer 'round here.<fix123>Haven't had an incident this hard to get a hold of in a while.<fix123><fix123>I'm not even sure where to go investigate next.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>紅い山の孤独<fix123>Red Mountain Loneliness<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Solitude on the Scarlet Mountain<fix123>Red Mountain Loneliness<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>紅葉した山<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Mountain in Autumn Colors<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 色無き風は妖怪の山に<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Colorless Wind on Youkai Mountain<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nemuno Sakata ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Nemuno Sakata PAUSES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>なんだ？<fix123>ここはうちのなわばりだべ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What?<fix123>This here's s'posedta' be my territory.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>見た事のない奴だな<fix123>何者だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh, haven't seen you before.<fix123>Who are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>浮世の関を超える山姥<fix123>坂田 ネムノ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Yamanba who Surpasses This Floating World's Barriers<fix123>Nemuno Sakata<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それはこっちの台詞だなぁ<fix123>うちはここにずっと住んでいる<fix123><fix123>動いたことはない<fix123>そしたらお前がやってきたんだべ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That oughta be my line.<fix123>I've always been livin' here.<fix123><fix123>Never moved an inch!<fix123>And all of a sudden, you came flyin' up.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おお、すまん<fix123><fix123>私は魔法使いの魔理沙だ<fix123>どうやらこの辺一帯だけ<fix123><fix123>季節が秋 (・) になっているんだが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, sorry about that.<fix123><fix123>I'm Marisa the magician.<fix123>I'm not sure why, but it seems like the season around<fix123><fix123>this one area has turned into autumn?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 山奥のエンカウンター<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Deep-Mountain Encounter<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そんな話はしらん<fix123><fix123>それよりもここから出て行け<fix123>これ以上ここに留まるというなら<fix123><fix123>お前を開きにして天日に干すぞ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I don't know nothin' 'bout that.<fix123><fix123>More importantly, you should git outta here.<fix123>If you stick around here any longer,<fix123><fix123>I'll slice you open an' sun-dry you!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nemuno Sakata DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あんた強いな<fix123><fix123>魔法使い、だっけ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Whew, you're strong.<fix123><fix123>Y'said you were a magician?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>魔法使いと言っても<fix123><fix123>人間だがな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes. Although a human one,<fix123><fix123>admittedly.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほう、人間、ねぇ<fix123>まるで伝説の金時みたいな<fix123><fix123>人間じゃな<fix123>気に入った！<fix123><fix123>何でも話を聞くぞ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oho. A human, eh?<fix123>As humans go, you remind me a' that<fix123><fix123>legendary Kintoki[1] kid.<fix123>I like you!<fix123><fix123>I'll hear any questions y'got.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうか、じゃあ訊くぞ<fix123>この辺だけを秋にした奴について<fix123><fix123>何か知っているか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Really? Okay, then.<fix123>Do you know anything about the one who made it into<fix123><fix123>autumn just around this one area?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この辺だけ秋？<fix123><fix123>何の話だべ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>"Just this one area?"<fix123><fix123>The heck y'mean by that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>幻想郷のあちこちで異常気象が<fix123><fix123>起きているのは知っているか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are you aware that there's abnormal weather<fix123><fix123>occurring in various places in Gensokyo?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>知らん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Nah.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>他におかしな気候になっている<fix123><fix123>場所を教えてくれ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Could you please tell me any other places<fix123><fix123>where there's been strange weather.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うちはここから<fix123><fix123>出ないから何にも知らんぞ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I ain't never left here,<fix123><fix123>so I dunno nothin'.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……邪魔したな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...Sorry to have bothered you.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>The Sakura-Colored Sea the Divine Beast Swims Through<fix123>Sea of Spring Pink<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Evening Cherries at the Hakurei Shrine<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Swim Through a Sakura-Colored Sea<fix123><fix123>
