<fix123>Lily White DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>神社もおかしいんだよな<fix123><fix123>ここだけ異常に桜が咲いている<fix123>神社に異変を起こした奴がいる<fix123><fix123>というのは考えにくいんだがな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The shrine's pretty weird, too. This is the<fix123><fix123>only place with so many cherry trees blooming.<fix123>Although, I can't imagine the culprit of an incident<fix123><fix123>would be hanging around at the shrine...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら魔理沙さん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, miss Marisa! Hello!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Aunn Komano ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>神仏に心酔する守護神獣<fix123>高麗野 あうん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Guardian Beast Devoted to Shintoism and Buddhism<fix123>Aunn Komano<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いま霊夢さんは留守ですよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Miss Reimu is out at the moment.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>誰だお前<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who the heck are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>嫌だなぁ<fix123><fix123>コマ犬の高 (こ) 麗 (ま) 野 (の) ですよ<fix123>初めましてですけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, don't be like that!<fix123><fix123>I'm Komano the komainu!<fix123>Although this is our first time talking.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>初めましてかい<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Is it, now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>これでもこっそり神社やお寺の<fix123><fix123>守護をしてきたんですよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I may not look it, but I've been quietly protecting<fix123><fix123>shrines and temples for quite some time now!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>コマ犬っつーのはアレか<fix123><fix123>よく待ち合わせに使われる石像の<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Komainu are... those things, right?<fix123><fix123>Those statues people always use as meet-up locations.[2]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まーそれですね<fix123><fix123>こう見えても神社の守護神です<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, yes, I suppose. Despite appearances,<fix123><fix123>I'm the guardian god of this shrine.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あっはっは<fix123><fix123>味方のフリをしたって騙されないぞ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah hah hah!<fix123><fix123>Pretendin' to be an ally won't trick me!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 一対の神獣<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: A Pair of Divine Beasts<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何が守護神だ<fix123><fix123>現に、今の神社は異変まみれじゃ無いか！<fix123>お前を倒して神社を<fix123><fix123>季節を戻してやろう！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Some guardian god you are!<fix123><fix123>The shrine's smack-dab in the middle of an incident right now!<fix123>I'm gonna beat you down and turn<fix123><fix123>the shrine's season back to normal!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Aunn Komano DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>負けたー<fix123>神社に尽くしてきたのに<fix123><fix123>ボコボコにされたー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I lost~!<fix123>I came here to do everything I could<fix123><fix123>for the shrine, but I got beaten up...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前から異変に繋がる<fix123><fix123>妖気は感じなかったな<fix123>まあ、何だ<fix123><fix123>すまん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I didn't feel any aura comin' from you<fix123><fix123>that was related to the incident after all.<fix123>Well, uh, y'know.<fix123><fix123>Sorry.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>最初から私は神社の味方だって<fix123><fix123>言ってるでしょ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I told you I was on the shrine's side<fix123><fix123>in the first place, didn't I?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>じゃあこの異変調査の<fix123><fix123>協力してくれるか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So, will you help me out with<fix123><fix123>my incident investigation?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>勿論ですとも！<fix123>神社やお寺だけ見ているけど<fix123><fix123>変わった事があるとすれば<fix123>妖精が暴走していること<fix123><fix123>くらいかなぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, certainly!<fix123>I've only been around the shrines and temples,<fix123><fix123>but the only things that were out of the ordinary...<fix123>Were the fairies going berserk?<fix123><fix123>Besides that, not much.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あいつ等、異変になると<fix123><fix123>いつも暴走するけどな<fix123>後は……<fix123>いつも隠れて活動していた<fix123><fix123>コマ犬 (おまえ) が出しゃばっているのも<fix123>変わった事と言えばそう見えるな<fix123>一応、あと一つの季節の場所も<fix123><fix123>調べてから結論付けるか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Those little squirts always freak<fix123><fix123>out during incidents, though.<fix123>Aside from that...<fix123>There's the fact that a komainu like you, who usually<fix123><fix123>does stuff in hiding, is out and about...<fix123>Now that I think about it, that does seem weird.<fix123>I guess I'll check out the last season's location<fix123><fix123>just to be safe, then draw my conclusion?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>頑張ってー<fix123><fix123>影ながら応援してるわよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Good luck!<fix123><fix123>I'll be cheering you on from the shadows!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>調子狂うから応援はいいや<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Let's table the cheering. It'll just throw me off.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>視界ゼロの邂逅<fix123>White Blizzard Out of Season<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A Curious Encounter at Zero Visibility<fix123>White Blizzard Out of Season<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>魔法の森上空　（推測）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sky Over the Forest of Magic (assumed)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 幻想のホワイトトラベラー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Illusionary White Traveler<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mai Teireida ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Mai Teireida LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Mai Teireida ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>もしかして君が<fix123><fix123>選ばれた者なのかな？<fix123>派手にやったつもりだったんだけど<fix123><fix123>出てくるの、思ったより遅かったねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Could you be one of the<fix123><fix123>chosen ones?<fix123>I was trying to be real flashy about all this,<fix123><fix123>but you still took way longer than I thought to show up.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前が森をこんなにした奴か！？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are you the one who did this to the forest?!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>力がみなぎるわー！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm brimming with power!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Narumi Yatadera ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>森で垂迹した魔法地蔵<fix123>矢田寺　成美<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Magic Jizo who Manifested in the Forest<fix123>Narumi Yatadera<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何故だろう、こんなに魔力が<fix123><fix123>溢れ出てくるなんて……<fix123>これは目の前の人間に<fix123><fix123>試さざるを得ない！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My, what's going on?<fix123><fix123>I'm practically overflowing with magic power...<fix123>I've just got to try this out<fix123><fix123>on the human in front of me!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あはははは<fix123><fix123>今度の相手はこいつよ<fix123>それじゃあ僕は帰るねー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ahahahaha!<fix123><fix123>This gal here is your next opponent.<fix123>Welp, time for me to head on back!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おい逃げるな！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey! Get back here!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんだか判らないけど<fix123><fix123>吹雪が私に力を与えているみたい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm not quite sure why,<fix123><fix123>but it seems like this blizzard is giving me strength!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前は……何処かで見た事があるな<fix123>思い出した、魔法地蔵の成子 (なるこ) じゃないか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey... Haven't I seen you somewhere before?<fix123>Oh, I remember now. You're Naruko the magic jizo, aren'tcha?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>その声は、魔法人間の魔理沙？<fix123>魔法吹雪が酷くてよく見えなかったわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I recognize that voice... Marisa, the magic human?<fix123>This magic blizzard is so bad that I could barely tell it was you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さっきの奴を追うから<fix123><fix123>そこを退いてくれ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm chasing that girl who was just here,<fix123><fix123>so could you get outta my way?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 魔法の笠地蔵<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Magic Straw-Hat Jizo<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>嫌だね<fix123><fix123>今日は魔法試ししたい気分なの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I don't want to.<fix123><fix123>I'm in the mood to test out my magic today!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>引っ込み思案なお前が珍しいことを言うなぁ<fix123><fix123>私に勝てると思ってるのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Never thought I'd hear that from a shut-in introvert like you...<fix123><fix123>You really think you can beat me?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今日は吹雪が後押ししている気分なの<fix123><fix123>だから負ける気がしない<fix123>理由は特にない！<fix123><fix123>行くぞー！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>With today's blizzard at my back,<fix123><fix123>I feel like I can take on anything!<fix123>That's my only reason, really!<fix123><fix123>Let's go!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Narumi Yatadera DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>まだまだ力が有り余っているわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've still got plenty of power!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ちょっとたんま<fix123>お前の魔法、ちょっとおかしいぜ？<fix123>何というか、普通じゃ無い魔力の<fix123><fix123>溢れ方をしている<fix123>後ろから魔力が溢れている感じだ<fix123><fix123>自分では気が付いていないのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hold on, time out.<fix123>Isn't there something a bit off about your magic today?<fix123>How do I put this... like, the magic energy<fix123><fix123>is flowin' out in a really abnormal way.<fix123>It's comin' out from behind you.<fix123><fix123>You have to have noticed by now, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうなのよねー<fix123><fix123>背中が熱いというか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, you're right...<fix123><fix123>It feels kind of like my back is on fire.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうか、それも気になるが……<fix123><fix123>ちなみにさっきの奴、あれは誰だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Gotcha. That bothers me too, but...<fix123><fix123>who was that person here earlier anyway?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さっきの奴？<fix123><fix123>何の話よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What person?<fix123><fix123>What are you talking about?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前の後ろで踊っていた奴だよ<fix123><fix123>気が付いていなかったのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The girl who was dancing behind you.<fix123><fix123>What, you didn't notice her?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私はずっと一人だったと思うけど？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I thought I've always been alone, though?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そういえばお前は独りが<fix123><fix123>好きなタイプだったな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, right. You're the type who<fix123><fix123>likes your solitude an' all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あーそれにしても<fix123><fix123>背中が熱いわー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, but still,<fix123><fix123>my back is just so hot...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>吹雪に当たって凍傷してるかもな<fix123><fix123>ちょっと見せてみろよ<fix123>え？<fix123><fix123>ちょっとお前！？<fix123>背中に扉がある！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You ARE in a blizzard. Maybe it's frostbite?<fix123><fix123>Let me a have look.<fix123>Huh?<fix123><fix123>What the heck?!<fix123>You've got a door on your back!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？<fix123><fix123>何それ怖い<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123><fix123>Wow, talk about scary.[3]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>間違いない、背中の扉から<fix123><fix123>魔力が溢れているんだ……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No doubt about it. All that energy<fix123><fix123>is coming from this door...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何がどうなってるの？<fix123><fix123>魔理沙、何とかしてよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What on Earth is happening to me?<fix123><fix123>Do something, Marisa!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ぐぐ、これはどう見ても罠だと思うんだが……<fix123>これを逃すともう手掛かりも無い<fix123><fix123>叩けよ、さらば開かれん！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ugh... this is really obviously a trap, but...<fix123>Well, it's not like I can just ignore my only clue.<fix123><fix123>"Knock, and it shall be opened unto you!"<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>童子は狂気を跳ね踊る<fix123>Into Crazy Back Door<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Douji Hop and Dance in Madness<fix123>Into Crazy Back Door<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>後戸の国<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Land of the Back Door<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 禁断の扉の向こうは、この世かあの世か<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Does the Forbidden Door Lead to This World, or the World Beyond?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Satono Nishida ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Satono Nishida LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Mai Teireida ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>なんだここは……<fix123>成子の背中の奥にこんな世界が<fix123><fix123>広がっているとはな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What's with this place...?<fix123>I can't believe there's such a big world<fix123><fix123>inside of Naruko's back.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あれ！？<fix123><fix123>さっきの人間、どうやってここに……？<fix123>あー、もしかして、さっきの地蔵の<fix123><fix123>背中扉を開きっぱなしにしてたかな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What the?!<fix123><fix123>How'd that human get in here...?<fix123>Ohhh. Guess I forgot to close that<fix123><fix123>jizo's back-door on my way out...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Satono Nishida ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>もー、舞ったら<fix123><fix123>おっちょこちょいなんだから<fix123>まだ指令も出てないのに<fix123><fix123>人間を引き入れちゃってー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, Mai.<fix123><fix123>You're such a scatterbrain.<fix123>You went and pulled a human in<fix123><fix123>before the order even arrived...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まー、でも潮時だよ<fix123><fix123>随分派手にやったしさ<fix123>『よくやった、丁度良いんじゃない？』<fix123><fix123>ってお師匠様も言うと思うよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Eh, well! The tide should turn in our favor now, anyway.<fix123><fix123>I did a real spectacular job out there, after all.<fix123>If you ask me, Master's gonna say<fix123><fix123>"well done! This is perfect."<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前達は一体？<fix123><fix123>それにここは何処なんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who are you people?<fix123><fix123>And where is this place?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>危険すぎるバックダンサーズ<fix123>爾子田　里乃　＆　丁礼田　舞<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>All-Too-Dangerous Backup Dancers<fix123>Satono Nishida & Mai Teireida<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふっ、僕は丁礼田　舞 (ていれいだ　まい) <fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh! Why, I'm Mai Teireida.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は爾子田　里乃 (にしだ　さとの) <fix123>改めて<fix123><fix123>ようこそ後戸 (うしろど) の国へ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>And I'm Satono Nishida.<fix123>Hello once again,<fix123>and welcome to the Land of the Back Door (Ushirodo-no-Kuni) .<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>後戸の国？<fix123><fix123>聞いた事が無いな<fix123>罠だと思ったが<fix123><fix123>もう後には退けん！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Land of the Back Door?<fix123><fix123>Never heard of it.<fix123>I figured that this was a trap,<fix123><fix123>but I can't back down now!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: クレイジーバックダンサーズ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Crazy Backup Dancers<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>安心しな<fix123><fix123>罠では無いよ<fix123>でも、君が選ばれた者なのか<fix123><fix123>これからテストする<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Don't worry,<fix123><fix123>this isn't a trap.<fix123>But we will be giving you a test now,<fix123><fix123>to see if you're one of the chosen ones.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方が弱すぎると<fix123><fix123>お師匠様に怒られちゃうからねー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now, if you're too weak, our<fix123><fix123>Master will get real mad at us...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>本気で行くよ！<fix123><fix123>死んだらそれまでだ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So you'd better give us all you've got!<fix123><fix123>If you die, welp, that's the end of that!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>手加減はしないけど<fix123><fix123>死んだら殺すからねー！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We're not gonna hold anything back,<fix123><fix123>but if you go and die on us, you're totally dead meat!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Satono Nishida and Mai Teireida DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>中々手強いな！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're not half-bad!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>よーしそこまでで良いわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Okaay! That's good enough.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まあまあ、及第点かなぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You did all right. Passing marks, I guess?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>よーし、おめでとう！<fix123><fix123>ごーかーく！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Alright, congrats!<fix123><fix123>You paaaaassed!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ご、合格？<fix123><fix123>何の話だ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>P-pass? Pass what?<fix123><fix123>What's this all about?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私達は背後で踊ることで<fix123><fix123>対象の潜在能力を無限に引き出せるの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>See, we can draw out a target's latent abilities to<fix123><fix123>an unlimited extent by dancing behind their backs.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>僕達は普段隠れていた奴らの<fix123><fix123>可能性を見つけだすと共に<fix123>君のようなアグレッシブな人材を<fix123><fix123>探していたんだ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We received orders to seek out potential<fix123><fix123>in people who are normally hidden...<fix123>And we're looking for especially<fix123><fix123>aggressive talent like you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>潜在能力を引き出す……ははあ<fix123><fix123>成子の背中の扉はそれの影響か<fix123>もしかして四季が狂っていたのは<fix123><fix123>妖精達の潜在能力を引き出したからか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Drawing out latent abilities... Ah-hah.<fix123><fix123>So that's what the door on Naruko's back was doing?<fix123>Wait, so are the four seasons going crazy<fix123><fix123>because you're drawing out the latent potential of the fairies?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まあ、それは副作用だね<fix123><fix123>妖精達が勝手に暴走しただけさ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, it's more like a side effect.<fix123><fix123>The fairies are just going crazy on their own.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>妖精を暴走させて幻想郷を<fix123><fix123>混乱させてまで探したい人材……<fix123>そうか、それが私か<fix123><fix123>そうかそうか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You want someone talented so badly that you're willing<fix123><fix123>to let the fairies throw Gensokyo into chaos...<fix123>An' that someone is me, eh?<fix123><fix123>I see, I see.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さてと、テストも合格したし<fix123>君を招待しよう！<fix123><fix123>背後の最高秘神の前に！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, you passed the test, sooo...<fix123>We hereby invite you<fix123><fix123>to meet the ultimate god hidden behind your back!<fix123><fix123><fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>開けるなかれ、見るなかれ<fix123>後ろの扉に秘天あり<fix123>Hidden Star in Four Seasons<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Open It Not, Gaze Not Upon It;<fix123>Heaven Lies Hidden Behind the Door to Your Rear<fix123>Hidden Star in Four Seasons<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>後戸の国<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Land of the Back Door<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: イントゥ・バックドア<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Into Backdoor<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>一体何処に居ると言うんだ？<fix123><fix123>その秘神とやらは<fix123>それにこの世界は一体何なんだ？<fix123>何処に行っても扉ばかりで……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So where exactly is she?<fix123><fix123>This hidden god of theirs?<fix123>And what is this world anyway?<fix123>It's just doors as far as the eye can see...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Okina Matara ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>おお、よくぞ来られた<fix123>お前が二童子の言っていた人間だな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, I see you've arrived.<fix123>You're the human who my two servants mentioned, I see.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうだ、多分な<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yup, probably.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふーむ<fix123>その格好は何だ<fix123><fix123>不思議な服だな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmm.<fix123>Why are you dressed like that?<fix123><fix123>Rather strange fashion sense you have.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>魔法使いの正装だぞ<fix123><fix123>不思議なのも魔法使いならではだ<fix123>お前も大概だぞ？<fix123><fix123>一体何者なんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This here's a magician's uniform!<fix123><fix123>It's strange, sure, but for a magician it's a pretty good look.<fix123>And how about you, anyway?<fix123><fix123>Who exactly are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>究極の絶対秘神<fix123>摩多羅　隠岐奈<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Ultimate, Absolute Secret God<fix123>Okina Matara<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は摩多羅 (またら) 　隠岐奈 (おきな) <fix123>後戸 (うしろど) の神であり<fix123><fix123>障碍 (しょうがい) の神であり<fix123>能楽の神であり<fix123><fix123>宿神 (しゅくしん) であり、星神であり<fix123>この幻想郷を創った<fix123><fix123>賢者の一人でもある<fix123>そろそろ、二童子 (あいつら) の後任を<fix123><fix123>見つけないといけない時期でな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My name is Okina Matara.<fix123>I am the god of the back door,<fix123><fix123>a god of impairments,<fix123>a god of noh performance,<fix123><fix123>a god of outcasts, a god of stars...<fix123>And I am one of the sages<fix123><fix123>who created our Gensokyo.<fix123>Sooner or later, I need to find some successors<fix123><fix123>to take over from those two servants of mine.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>後任？<fix123><fix123>二童子って、さっきの奴らのことだな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Successors?<fix123><fix123>By 'two servants,' you mean those dancers from before, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうだ、私の大切な両腕だからこそ<fix123><fix123>定期的に新しい人間に変えている<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes. They're my precious arms and legs, which is why<fix123><fix123>I periodically swap them out for new humans.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>普段は何をやる仕事なんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So, what does the job normally entail?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>裏から幻想郷のバランスを取る仕事だ<fix123><fix123>フィクサーとでも言おうかな<fix123>まあ簡単なお仕事だよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I suppose you could say you'd be a fixer,<fix123><fix123>keeping the balance in Gensokyo from behind the scenes.<fix123>Well, it's an easy job.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>簡単かどうか判らんが<fix123><fix123>面白そうな仕事だな<fix123>だが断る！<fix123>私は私の好きなように<fix123><fix123>生きていく<fix123>さっきの二人みたいになるなんて<fix123><fix123>まっぴら御免だ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I dunno if that's really that easy,<fix123><fix123>although it does sound interesting.<fix123>But I refuse![4]<fix123>I live my life doing<fix123><fix123>whatever I want.<fix123>If I had to live like those two just now?<fix123><fix123>Thanks, but no thanks.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 秘匿されたフォーシーズンズ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Concealed Four Seasons<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あっはっは<fix123><fix123>何を勘違いしている？<fix123>最初からお前に選択肢など<fix123><fix123>与えていないぞ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah ha ha!<fix123><fix123>Aren't you misunderstanding something?<fix123>I never gave you a choice<fix123><fix123>from the outset.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何だと？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>誰を部下にするかは私が選ぶ<fix123><fix123>お前に是非など聞いておらん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I am the one who chooses my servants.<fix123><fix123>Certainly no one ever asked you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふん、力ずくで来るか<fix123><fix123>望むところだぜ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmph, so you're coming after me with brute force?<fix123><fix123>That suits me just fine!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前の背 (・) 中 (・) に (・) 四 (・) 季 (・) の (・) 扉 (・) がある限り<fix123><fix123>私の制御下から逃れる術は無い<fix123>それでは最終暗黒テストを行うぞ<fix123><fix123>失望させたら殺すからな！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>As long as you have that door of the seasons on your back,<fix123><fix123>any battle between us will be nothing more than a farce.<fix123>Now, let us begin the final test of darkness.<fix123><fix123>If you disappoint me, I'll kill you!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>When Okina Matara declares her final Spell Card:<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>季節装備を敵に奪われた！<fix123>さあ、最後は己のサブ季節と戦え！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The enemy stole your season options!<fix123>Now, for the finale, fight against thine own sub-season!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Okina Matara DEFEATED (...?)<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>朝靄の先の真夏日<fix123>Miracle Blue Sky<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A Midsummer Day Beyond the Morning Mist<fix123>Miracle Blue Sky<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>真夏の上空<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Midsummer Skies<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 希望の星は青霄に昇る<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: A Star of Hope Rises in the Blue Sky<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eternity Larva ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Eternity Larva LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>暑いわねぇ<fix123>ここだけ見ると何も異常は<fix123><fix123>起きてないようにみえるけど……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It sure is hot...<fix123>Just glancing around here, there doesn't seem<fix123><fix123>to be anything abnormal happening...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どしたの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What's up?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eternity Larva ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>神に近づく蝶の妖精<fix123>エタニティラルバ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Butterfly Fairy who Approaches God<fix123>Eternity Larva<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>巫女が出てくるなんて<fix123><fix123>なんか異変でも起こったのかなー？<fix123>力が有り余ってるんで<fix123><fix123>手伝ってあげようか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If the shrine maiden's out and about,<fix123><fix123>then did an incident happen, by any chance?<fix123>I've got more power than I know what to do with,<fix123><fix123>so how about I help you out?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>やれやれ、この四 (・) 季 (・) 異 (・) 変 (・) で<fix123><fix123>得しているのは能天気な妖精(バカ)たちだけね<fix123>妖精なんかに手伝ってもらうほど<fix123><fix123>落ちぶれてはいないわよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Good grief. Looks like the only ones benefiting from<fix123><fix123>this season incident are you dumb fairies.<fix123>I haven't sunk so low as to need help<fix123><fix123>from some fairy, you know.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 真夏の妖精の夢<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: A Midsummer Fairy's Dream<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう？<fix123><fix123>じゃあ、思う存分あばれようっと<fix123>血がたぎっているからね！<fix123><fix123>真夏の熱気で！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh?<fix123><fix123>Then, how about I kick up a storm?!<fix123>My blood's totally boiling<fix123><fix123>with midsummer heat!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eternity Larva DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>こうさーん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I surrenderrrr.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふう、思ったよりも手強かったわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Whew. You were tougher than I thought.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私だってここまで力が出せるとは<fix123><fix123>思ってなかったわ<fix123>夏の青空が私をそうさせたの<fix123>今なら新世界の神にでも<fix123><fix123>なれそうな気分よ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I didn't think I had that much strength<fix123><fix123>in me either!<fix123>This blue summer sky got me pumped up.<fix123>Right now, I feel like I could even<fix123><fix123>become the god of the new world!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう……<fix123>異常気象と共に妖精がおかしくなるのは<fix123><fix123>偶然ではないよねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see...<fix123>It doesn't seem like a coincidence that the fairies<fix123><fix123>are going nuts at the same time as the weather.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>紅い山の孤独<fix123>Red Mountain Loneliness<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Solitude on the Scarlet Mountain<fix123>Red Mountain Loneliness<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>紅葉した山<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Mountain in Autumn Colors<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 色無き風は妖怪の山に<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Colorless Wind on Youkai Mountain<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nemuno Sakata ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Nemuno Sakata PAUSES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>なんだ？<fix123>ここはうちのなわばりだべ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What?<fix123>This here's s'posedta' be my territory.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あー？<fix123><fix123>なわばり？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wha?<fix123><fix123>Territory?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>浮世の関を超える山姥<fix123>坂田 ネムノ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Yamanba who Surpasses This Floating World's Barriers<fix123>Nemuno Sakata<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうだ、よそ者が<fix123><fix123>勝手に入ってくるな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yeah. Outsiders like yourself<fix123><fix123>shouldn't be bargin' on in here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なわばり、ってこの辺は天狗の<fix123><fix123>支配下だと思っていたけど……<fix123>あんた天狗じゃなさそうね<fix123><fix123>何者なの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>"Territory"... I thought this area was<fix123><fix123>under tengu administration, but...<fix123>You sure don't look like a tengu.<fix123><fix123>Who are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 山奥のエンカウンター<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Deep-Mountain Encounter<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>誰でもいいべ<fix123>これ以上ここに留まるというなら<fix123><fix123>お前が越冬用の保存食になるだけだ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who am I? Ain't nobody's problem.<fix123>If you stick around here any longer, you're<fix123><fix123>just gonna wind up as my winter food supply.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nemuno Sakata DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あんた強いな<fix123><fix123>何者なんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Y'sure are strong!<fix123><fix123>Who are ya, anyway?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え、えーっと、博麗神社で<fix123><fix123>巫女をやっています<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Er, well, ahem. I work as the shrine maiden<fix123><fix123>of the Hakurei Shrine.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>巫女？<fix123><fix123>ふーん、知らんな<fix123>でも強いやつは嫌いではない<fix123><fix123>うちに寄っていくか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Shrine maiden?<fix123><fix123>Feh. First I've heard of ya.<fix123>I can't help but like strong folks, though!<fix123><fix123>Wanna come by my place?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうか、聞いたことがあるわ<fix123>人知れず山の中に住んでいて<fix123>社会を持たず、他所とも関係を持たない<fix123><fix123>超閉鎖的で生態不明の妖怪<fix123>もしかして、あなたは山姥(やまんば)でしょ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Aha, I've heard of you before.<fix123>Living alone in the mountains...<fix123>There's these super-isolated youkai whose lifestyle is unknown,<fix123><fix123>and who forgo forming societies or any connections with others.<fix123>You're a yamanba, aren't you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう呼ばれることもあるな<fix123>で、秋の日は釣瓶落としだ<fix123>山の秋はすぐに寒くなるぞ<fix123><fix123>ささ、お茶でも飲んでいくべ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yeah, I've been called that a couple a' times.<fix123>The autumn sun sets as quick as a well-bucket droppin' now.<fix123>It's gonna get freezin' cold up here on the mountain.<fix123><fix123>You should drop by an' have some tea! C'mon, don't be shy.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>遠慮しておくわ<fix123><fix123>まだ長生きする予定なので……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm afraid I'll have to pass.<fix123><fix123>I'm still planning to have a long life, after all...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>神獣泳ぐ桜色の海<fix123>Sea of Spring Pink<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Sakura-Colored Sea the Divine Beast Swims Through<fix123>Sea of Spring Pink<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>博麗神社の夜桜<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Evening Cherries at the Hakurei Shrine<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 桜色の海を泳いで<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Swim Through a Sakura-Colored Sea<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Lily White ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Lily White DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>こうしてみると<fix123>神社(うち)の上空も大概だったわね<fix123>少し春っぽいかなーとは思っていたけど<fix123><fix123>これは……異常よねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now that I take a good look at it...<fix123>The sky above my shrine is in quite the state, too.<fix123>I did think it was a little spring-y around here,<fix123><fix123>but this... is definitely abnormal.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Aunn Komano ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あれ？<fix123><fix123>神社で戦闘ですかー？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh?<fix123><fix123>Is there a fight going on down at the shrine?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>神仏に心酔する守護神獣<fix123>高麗野 あうん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Guardian Beast Devoted to Shintoism and Buddhism<fix123>Aunn Komano<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私が神社を見張っていましたが<fix123>ちょっと妖精が興奮状態なくらいで<fix123>これといって危険な侵入者は<fix123><fix123>なかったですよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've been keeping watch over this place,<fix123>but the excited fairies are all that's come by.<fix123>There haven't been any dangerous<fix123><fix123>intruders in particular.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>えーっと<fix123><fix123>あんた誰だっけ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Uhhhh.<fix123><fix123>Who are you again...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>嫌だなぁ<fix123><fix123>コマ犬の高(コ)麗(マ)野(ノ)ですよぉ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Aw, come on!<fix123><fix123>I'm Komano the komainu, of course!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……コマ犬なんて居たっけ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...Did we have any komainu here?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええ、ひっそりと神社とか<fix123><fix123>お寺とかを見守っていました<fix123>というわけで<fix123><fix123>神社(ここ)は私が見張ってますんで<fix123>侵入者の心配はありませんから<fix123><fix123>安心して出かけてきてくださいな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Why, yes! I quietly keep watch over<fix123><fix123>shrines, temples, and the like.<fix123>As such,<fix123><fix123>I've been watching over this shrine too.<fix123>There's been no sign of any intruders,<fix123><fix123>so you can rest easy if you feel like heading back out.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 一対の神獣<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: A Pair of Divine Beasts<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>っていうか、どう考えても<fix123><fix123>アンタが侵入者じゃない！<fix123>アンタが何者なのか<fix123><fix123>じっくり調べてやるわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yeah, uh, hello?! YOU'RE obviously<fix123><fix123>the one intruding here!<fix123>I'm gonna find out who you are,<fix123><fix123>and I'm gonna be real thorough about it!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Aunn Komano DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ひどーい<fix123>私はただ、神社を<fix123><fix123>守っていただけなのに<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How mean!<fix123>All I've been doing is protecting<fix123><fix123>the shrine for you...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どうやら、嘘は吐いていないようね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm. You don't seem to be lying after all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今までも簡単な敵から<fix123><fix123>神社やお寺を守ってきたんですよ<fix123>ボランティアって奴？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes! I've been protecting shrines and temples<fix123><fix123>from simple enemies all the time until now.<fix123>It's, like, volunteer work?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう、全然気が付かなかったわ<fix123><fix123>ごめんね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh, I see. I hadn't noticed at all.<fix123><fix123>I'm sorry.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いーえ、気付かれないように<fix123><fix123>貢献するのが楽しいのよ<fix123>でも、今回は何故か居ても立っても<fix123><fix123>居られなくて表に出てきちゃった……<fix123>桜に浮かれてたのかなぁ？<fix123><fix123>自分でも判らないや<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, that's all right! Contributing my help in such<fix123><fix123>a way that I go unnoticed is fun, really.<fix123>But this time, for some reason, no matter how long I tried<fix123><fix123>to stand around, I couldn't help but go back outside...<fix123>Maybe I was entranced by the cherry blossoms?<fix123><fix123>Even I'm not quite sure.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……しかしコマ犬かぁ<fix123><fix123>アンタも四季異変とは関係なさそうねぇ<fix123>後、残った季節は一つしか無いんだけど<fix123><fix123>そこも期待できない気がする……<fix123>勘が鈍ったのかなぁ<fix123><fix123>ここまで全く異変の手掛かりがないなんて<fix123>それとも、今まで戦った奴らの<fix123><fix123>何処かに何か重大な見落としが……？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...That aside, though, a komainu?<fix123><fix123>You don't seem related to the season incident either.<fix123>There's only one season left to check out now,<fix123><fix123>but I don't feel like there'll be much there either...<fix123>Is my intuition starting to fail me?<fix123><fix123>I've never had such a total lack of leads during an incident.<fix123>Or maybe... I overlooked something big<fix123><fix123>hidden among my previous opponents...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>これからまた出かけるんですね<fix123>神社の留守はお任せ下さいなー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It seems you're headed out again then!<fix123>You can leave the shrine in my capable hands!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>妖精に山姥、コマ犬……<fix123>うーむ……まさかねぇ<fix123><fix123>いや、しかし……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A fairy, a yamanba, a komainu...<fix123>Hrrmm... Wait. Nah, no way.<fix123><fix123>Well, no, on the other hand...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>視界ゼロの邂逅<fix123>White Blizzard Out of Season<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A Curious Encounter at Zero Visibility<fix123>White Blizzard Out of Season<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>魔法の森上空　（推測）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sky Over the Forest of Magic (assumed)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 幻想のホワイトトラベラー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Illusionary White Traveler<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mai Teireida ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Mai Teireida LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Mai Teireida ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>もしかして君が<fix123>選ばれた者なのかな？<fix123>派手にやったつもりだったんだけど<fix123>出てくるの、思ったより遅かったねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Could you be one of the<fix123>chosen ones?<fix123>I was trying to be real flashy about all this,<fix123>but you still took way longer than I thought to show up.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あんた、一体何者よ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Just who are you?!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>力がみなぎるわー！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm brimming with power!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Narumi Yatadera ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>森で垂迹した魔法地蔵<fix123>矢田寺　成美<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Magic Jizo who Manifested in the Forest<fix123>Narumi Yatadera<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何故だろう、こんなに魔力が<fix123>溢れ出てくるなんて……<fix123>これは目の前の人間に<fix123>試さざるを得ない！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My, what's going on?<fix123>I'm practically overflowing with magic power...<fix123>I've just got to try this out<fix123>on the human in front of me!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あはははは<fix123>今度の相手はこいつよ<fix123>それじゃあ僕は帰るねー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ahahahaha!<fix123>This gal here is your next opponent.<fix123>Welp, time for me to head on back!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ちょっ、まっ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wait-- HEY!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんだか判らないけど<fix123>吹雪が私に力を与えているみたい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm not quite sure why,<fix123>but it seems like this blizzard is giving me strength!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あんた、邪魔よ！<fix123>やっと尻尾を掴みかけたんだから<fix123>そこを退いて！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, you! You're in the way!<fix123>I've finally got ahold of the culprit,<fix123>so move it already!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 魔法の笠地蔵<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Magic Straw-Hat Jizo<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>誰かと思ったら<fix123>博麗神社の巫女じゃないの<fix123>単身で魔法の森に入ってくるなんて<fix123>随分と無謀ね<fix123>巫女と闘えるこんな機会<fix123>逃す手は無いわー！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Why, who's this?<fix123>It's the Hakurei shrine maiden!<fix123>You're pretty reckless, coming into the<fix123>Forest of Magic all by yourself.<fix123>There's no way I'm throwing away a chance<fix123>to fight the shrine maiden, of all people!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Narumi Yatadera DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あらら<fix123>負けちゃった<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh my, my, my.<fix123>I lost!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>邪魔しないでよ<fix123>さっきの奴、見失っちゃうじゃない<fix123>唯でさえ視界が悪いと言うのに<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Quit getting in my way.<fix123>At this rate, I'll lose sight of that weirdo who was just here.<fix123>The visibility here is already awful to begin with.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さっきの奴……？<fix123>何の話をしているの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Someone was just here...?<fix123>What are you talking about?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さっき貴方の後ろにいた奴よ<fix123>気が付かなかったの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The girl who was floating behind you a minute ago.<fix123>Didn't you notice her?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私はずっと一人だけど……<fix123>森にずっと一人……<fix123>う……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I'm always alone...<fix123>Aaall alone in the forest...<fix123>*sniff*...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ、いやその<fix123>ごめん<fix123>しかし、どういうことかしら<fix123>さっきの奴は一体？<fix123>……春夏秋冬全ての場所に<fix123>普段は隠れている奴らが<fix123>有り得ない力を持って現れた<fix123>これが偶然の訳が無い！<fix123>糸を引いている奴は近くにいる！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, well. Uh.<fix123>Sorry about that.<fix123>Really, though, what's going on here?<fix123>Who was that just now?<fix123>...In all four seasons' locations...<fix123>There's been people who normally stay hidden,<fix123>suddenly showing up with unbelivable power.<fix123>No way this is just some coincidence!<fix123>There's someone pulling the strings very close by!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あー、なんだか背中が熱いわー<fix123>こんなに吹雪いているのに<fix123>不思議ねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ahh, my back feels hot for some reason~.<fix123>Even though we're in the middle of a blizzard...<fix123>How strange...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>背中……<fix123>あっ！<fix123>あんたの背中に<fix123>何か扉があるわよ！？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Your back...?<fix123>AH!<fix123>Uh, there's some kind of<fix123>door stuck to your back?!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？<fix123>何それ怖い<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123>Wow, talk about scary.[1]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>尻尾を捕まえたわ！<fix123>飛び込むよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've got them in my sights now!<fix123>Time to hop on through this thing!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>童子は狂気を跳ね踊る<fix123>Into Crazy Back Door<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Douji Hop and Dance in Madness<fix123>Into Crazy Back Door<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>後戸の国<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Land of the Back Door<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 禁断の扉の向こうは、この世かあの世か<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Does the Forbidden Door Lead to This World, or the World Beyond?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Satono Nishida ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Satono Nishida LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Mai Teireida ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>見つけたわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There you are!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あれ！？<fix123>さっきの人間、どうやってここに……？<fix123>あー、もしかして、さっきの地蔵の<fix123>背中扉を開きっぱなしにしてたかな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What the?!<fix123>How'd that human get in here...?<fix123>Ohhh. Guess I forgot to close that<fix123>jizo's back-door on my way out...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Satono Nishida ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>もー、舞ったら<fix123>おっちょこちょいなんだから<fix123>まだ指令も出てないのに<fix123>人間を引き入れちゃってー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, Mai.<fix123>You're such a scatterbrain.<fix123>You went and pulled a human in<fix123>before the order even arrived...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まー、でも潮時だよ<fix123>随分派手にやったしさ<fix123>『よくやった、丁度良いんじゃない？』<fix123>ってお師匠様も言うと思うよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Eh, well! The tide should turn in our favor now, anyway.<fix123>I did a real spectacular job out there, after all.<fix123>If you ask me, Master's gonna say<fix123>"well done! This is perfect."<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ちょっと！<fix123>あんたら何者なのよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, hello!<fix123>Who ARE you two?!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふっ、僕は丁礼田　舞 (ていれいだ　まい) <fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh! Why, I'm Mai Teireida.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は爾子田　里乃 (にしだ　さとの) <fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>And I'm Satono Nishida.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>危険すぎるバックダンサーズ<fix123>爾子田　里乃　＆　丁礼田　舞<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>All-Too-Dangerous Backup Dancers<fix123>Satono Nishida & Mai Teireida<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>改めて<fix123>ようこそ後戸 (うしろど) の国へ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hello once again,<fix123>and welcome to the Land of the Back Door (Ushirodo-no-Kuni) .<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: クレイジーバックダンサーズ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Crazy Backup Dancers<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>早速だけどテストを<fix123>開始するよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now, this might be a bit sudden,<fix123>but let's start your test!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>テスト？<fix123>一体何を言っているの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Test?<fix123>What are you even talking about?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方が弱すぎると<fix123>お師匠様に怒られちゃうからねー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now, if you're too weak, our<fix123>Master will get real mad at us...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>本気で行くよ！<fix123>死んだらそれまでだ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So you'd better give us all you've got!<fix123>If you die, welp, that's the end of that!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>手加減はしないけど<fix123>死んだら殺すからねー！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We're not gonna hold anything back,<fix123>but if you go and die on us, you're totally dead meat!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Satono Nishida and Mai Teireida DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>よし勝った！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There! I won!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まあまあね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That was alright.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうねぇ<fix123>及第点、かなぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yeahhh.<fix123>Passing marks, I guess?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>よーし、おめでとう！<fix123>ごーかーく！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Alright, congrats!<fix123>You paaaaassed!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何なのよ、いちいちイライラするなぁ<fix123>ボロボロのくせに<fix123>あんたらが異変を起こしたんでしょ？<fix123>私はそれを止めに来たのよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Geeze, what's with you two? What a couple of pests.<fix123>You're all beat up, and still...<fix123>You two caused the incident, right?<fix123>I'm here to put a stop to it!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>異変って四季異変のこと？<fix123>あれは僕達がやったわけじゃ無いよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You mean the 'four seasons' incident?<fix123>Nah, that wasn't us.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え、マジ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wait, for real?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>マジマジ<fix123>やってないよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>For really real!<fix123>It's not our fault.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そ、そんな馬鹿な話が<fix123>あるわけないわ！<fix123>やっと尻尾を掴んだと<fix123>思ったのに<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>C-Come on! That's<fix123>totally ridiculous!<fix123>Ugh, I was so sure I'd<fix123>caught the culprit...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私達は背後で踊ることで<fix123>対象の潜在能力を無限に引き出せるの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>See, we can draw out a target's latent abilities to<fix123>an infinite extent by dancing behind their backs.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>僕達は普段隠れていた奴らの<fix123>可能性を見つけだすと共に<fix123>君のようなアグレッシブな人材を<fix123>捕まえるという使命を受けてやったのさ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We received orders to seek out potential<fix123>in people who are normally hidden...<fix123>And to capture any aggressive<fix123>talented folks such as yourself.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>四季異変は私達の踊りの結果<fix123>暴走した妖精や精霊、神霊達の仕業よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The season incident was caused by the fairies, sprites and<fix123>divine spirits who went berserk because of our dancing.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……んー、えーっと？<fix123>それってやっぱり四季異変は<fix123>間接的にあんたらの仕業なんじゃ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...hmm, uh...?<fix123>Well, so, then the season incident was<fix123>indirectly your fault anyway, wasn't it.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうなのかなー？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are you sure about that~?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さてと、テストも合格したし<fix123>君を招待しよう！<fix123>背後の最高秘神の前に！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, you passed the test, sooo...<fix123>We hereby invite you<fix123>to meet the ultimate god hidden behind your back!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>開けるなかれ、見るなかれ<fix123>後ろの扉に秘天あり<fix123>Hidden Star in Four Seasons<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Open It Not, Gaze Not Upon It;<fix123>Heaven Lies Hidden Behind the Door to Your Rear<fix123>Hidden Star in Four Seasons<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>後戸の国<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Land of the Back Door<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: イントゥ・バックドア<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Into Backdoor<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はあはあ……<fix123>背中の扉の先がこんなに広いなんて<fix123>世の中不思議な事だらけねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>*pant, pant*...<fix123>I hardly expected there to be such a big place behind a door in someone's back...<fix123>The world really is full of wonders.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おお、よくぞ来られた<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, I see you've arrived.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Okina Matara ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>お前が二童子の言っていた人間だな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're the human who my two servants mentioned, I see.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>出てきたわ！<fix123>お前が異変の首謀者ねー！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There you are!<fix123>You're the ringleader of the incident!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>異変？<fix123>四季が狂っていた事なら<fix123>それは暴走した妖精の所為であり<fix123>則ち自然現象である<fix123>誰の責任でもない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Incident?<fix123>If you mean the out-of-order seasons,<fix123>the berserk fairies are to blame for that.<fix123>A natural phenomenon, essentially.<fix123>It's nobody's responsibility.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そんな言い訳なんて聞くつもりは無い！<fix123>行くよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm not here to listen to any of your excuses!<fix123>Here I go!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まあ待て<fix123>どうせこの後お別れなんだ<fix123>もっと話をしても良いじゃないか<fix123>私は摩多羅　隠岐奈 (またら　おきな) <fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, wait a moment.<fix123>We'll be parting ways after this anyway,<fix123>so why not talk for a while longer?<fix123>My name is Okina Matara.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>究極の絶対秘神<fix123>摩多羅　隠岐奈<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Ultimate, Absolute Secret God<fix123>Okina Matara<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>後戸 (うしろど) の神であり<fix123>障碍 (しょうがい) の神であり<fix123>能楽の神であり<fix123>宿神 (しゅくしん) であり、星神であり<fix123>この幻想郷を創った<fix123>賢者の一人でもある<fix123>そろそろ、二童子 (あいつら) の後任を<fix123>見つけないといけない時期でな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I am the god of the back door,<fix123>a god of impairments,<fix123>a god of noh performance,<fix123>a god of outcasts, a god of stars...<fix123>And I am one of the sages<fix123>who created our Gensokyo.<fix123>Sooner or later, I need to find some successors<fix123>to take over from those two servants of mine.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>後任？<fix123>私をどうするつもり？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Successors?<fix123>What are you planning to do with me?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>しかし……あのポンコツ二人組は<fix123>随分と強力な人間を連れてきたわねぇ<fix123>博麗神社の巫女とはな<fix123>まあ勿論、不合格だ<fix123>表の世界に帰って宜しい<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>However... that lousy pair certainly brought<fix123>me a strong human, that's for sure.<fix123>The Hakurei shrine maiden, of all people!<fix123>Well, it should go without saying that you don't meet the qualifications.<fix123>You can feel free to return to the front-facing world.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああん？<fix123>ふざけけるんじゃないよ！<fix123>アンタが用はなくても<fix123>私にはある！<fix123>異変の解決が私の仕事なのよ！<fix123>アンタを倒して幻想郷を元に戻す！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What?<fix123>Quit playing around already!<fix123>You might not have any business with me,<fix123>but I sure have some with you!<fix123>Resolving this incident is my job!<fix123>I'm gonna defeat you and return Gensokyo to normal!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 秘匿されたフォーシーズンズ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Concealed Four Seasons<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>馬鹿だねぇ<fix123>断言しよう！<fix123>今のお前が私に勝つことは不可能だ<fix123>お前の背中に四季の扉 (・　・　・　・　・　・) がある限り<fix123>勝負など茶番でしか無い<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How very foolish.<fix123>Let me declare this!<fix123>Victory against me is impossible in your current state.<fix123>As long as you have that door of the seasons on your back,<fix123>any battle between us will be nothing more than a farce.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふん、つべこべ言わずに行くよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmph! Stop quibbling already, let's just go!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まあ良いだろう<fix123>そこまで言うなら私に見せてみろ！<fix123>狂乱狂気の弾幕に踊る<fix123>暗黒能楽の舞をな！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Fine, very well.<fix123>If you so insist, then show me!<fix123>Show me the noh of darkness that you dance<fix123>in this maddening frenzy of danmaku!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>When Okina Matara declares her final Spell Card:<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>季節装備を敵に奪われた！<fix123>さあ、最後は己のサブ季節と戦え！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The enemy stole your season options!<fix123>Now, for the finale, fight against thine own sub-season!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Okina Matara DEFEATED (...?)<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>切り札はいつだって悪手<fix123>Evel Trinity<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Trump Card is Always a Bad Move<fix123>Evil Trinity<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>夢の世界<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Dream World<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 見た事も無い悪夢の世界<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: A World of Nightmares Never Seen Before<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Doremy Sweet ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>また来てしまったのですね……<fix123>だから言ったでしょう？<fix123>あの時、夢という事にしておけば<fix123><fix123>こんな狂夢を見る事は無かったのに……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So you've come here again, hm...<fix123>I told you, didn't I?<fix123>If you had made it all just a dream back then,<fix123><fix123>you wouldn't be seeing such a lunatic dream now...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Doremy Sweet DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Junko ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>この答えに辿り着くまで<fix123>思ったより時間が掛ったわね<fix123>人間を使うという奇策を打ったのだから<fix123>すぐに気付くと思ったのですが……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It took longer than I anticipated<fix123>for them arrive at this answer.<fix123>Since they came up with the scheme to use a human,<fix123>I thought they'd realize it right away...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>また会ったわねー！<fix123>今度こそ決着を付けるとき！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So we meet again!<fix123>This time, I shall certainly defeat you!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……月の民は夢の世界に逃げ込んだ<fix123>月の都に居られなくなった月の民は<fix123>そうするだろうと私は読んでいた<fix123>勿論、私は先手を打った<fix123>夢の世界に刺客を<fix123>送り込んでいたのです<fix123>さあ出ておいで！<fix123>地獄の女神、へカーティアよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...The people of the moon escaped into the dream world.<fix123>I foresaw that they would do so, as they were<fix123>unable to stay in the Lunar Capital.<fix123>Of course, I took the initiative.<fix123>I sent an assassin<fix123>into the dream world first.<fix123>Now, show yourself!<fix123>Hecatia, goddess of hell!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Hecatia Lapislazuli ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>地獄の女神<fix123>ヘカーティア・ラピスラズリ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Goddess of Hell<fix123>Hecatia Lapislazuli<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>んもう<fix123>待ちくたびれたわよん<fix123>ようやく、嫦娥の奴に復讐出来るのね？<fix123>腕が鳴るわー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Aw, geeze.<fix123>You totally kept me waiting, y'know.<fix123>So we're finally gonna get revenge on Chang'e, huh?<fix123>My fingers are so itchingー<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いや、敵は月の民ではなくて<fix123>目の前の人間です<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, no. Your enemy is the human<fix123>before you, not the moon's people.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間？<fix123>ええ人間なの？　生身の？<fix123>ふーん……<fix123>どれどれ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Human?<fix123>For real? Like, they're physically here?<fix123>Hmm...<fix123>Let's have a look-see.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>むむ、敵が二人？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Mmm. Two enemies, huh?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>二人に見えるかしら？<fix123>ふふふ<fix123>まあ良いでしょう<fix123>この人間が純狐を手こずらせてるの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, does it look like two?<fix123>Heh heh heh.<fix123>Well, all right.<fix123>So this human's been giving you a hard time, Junko?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>手こずるなんてもんじゃ無い<fix123>この人間のおかげで<fix123>我々の敗北が半分だけ決定した<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It wasn't merely a 'hard time'.<fix123>It's thanks to this human that we<fix123>were defeated, albeit only halfway.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええええ？<fix123>それほどまで……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Whaaaat?<fix123>She's that strong...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>月の民は狡猾だわ<fix123>こんな人間を送り込んでくるなんて<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The moon's people were quite cunning,<fix123>sending this human to fight me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふーん、面白い<fix123>純狐がそこまで言うんなら本物ね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmm, interesting.<fix123>If you're saying that much, they must be the real thing.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何かヤバイ雰囲気……<fix123>ひとまず退散して味方を<fix123>呼んでこようかしら<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This sure is a dangerous atmosphere...<fix123>Maybe I ought to retreat for now<fix123>and call in some allies.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そーんなに怖がらなくてもいいわよ？<fix123>何も本気で戦ったりはしないわよぉ<fix123>どうやら純狐も敗北を覚悟している<fix123>みたいだし……<fix123>もう勝ち負けは重要じゃ無いみたい<fix123>だから私達も正々堂々一人ずつ戦うわ<fix123>これは余興みたいなもんよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Aw, c'mooon. You don't have to be that scared of me, you know?<fix123>I'm not going to fight you seriously.<fix123>It kinda seems like Junko's<fix123>prepared for defeat, anyway...<fix123>It doesn't really matter who wins or loses any more.<fix123>So we're gonna fight you one at a time, nice and fair!<fix123>This is just a bit of entertainment.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうですか<fix123>安心しました<fix123>では改めて……<fix123>さっさと勝負しろ！　この変なＴシャツヤロー！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, really?<fix123>That's a relief.<fix123>In that case...<fix123>Do battle with me at once! You freaky T-shirt weirdo!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: パンデモニックプラネット<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Pandemonic Planet<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>よーし、可愛いねぇ<fix123>ちょっと遊んでやるわ<fix123>本来なら、人間など相手に<fix123>しないんだけど<fix123>『貴方は私に暴言を吐いた』<fix123>それだけの理由で貴方を地獄へ堕とす<fix123>ただそれだけの理由だ！<fix123>死んでも悔しがれ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>All right. You're a cute little thing,<fix123>so I'll play with you a bit.<fix123>Usually, I'd rather not fight<fix123>the likes of a human, but...<fix123>"You totally insulted me just now."<fix123>For that reason alone, I'll drop you into hell.<fix123>For that reason, and no more!<fix123>Now, suffer even in death!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Hecatia Lapislazuli and Junko DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>約束破ったわねー！<fix123>二人がかりで来るなんて！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, you broke your promise!<fix123>You both attacked at the end!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あらあらごめんなさいね<fix123>もう勝負あったわ、私の負けよ<fix123>純狐が言うだけあって<fix123>素晴らしい人間だわ<fix123>こんな素晴らしい人間がいる<fix123>幻想郷に攻め入るなんて<fix123>月の民達は許しがたいわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, hey, sorry about that.<fix123>The battle's over already. I lost.<fix123>You're as amazing a human<fix123>as Junko said.<fix123>Honestly, attacking Gensokyo?<fix123>When there's such amazing humans there?<fix123>I'm finding it kinda hard to forgive the moon's people.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今はその許しがたい月の民を<fix123>解放して欲しいの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Just the same, I'd like you to release<fix123>those hard-to-forgive people now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ねえ、純狐？<fix123>良いかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, Junko?<fix123>Is this okay?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……良いわ<fix123>月の民を都へ戻しても<fix123>この人間に出会えたおかげで<fix123>戦意喪失したから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...it's fine.<fix123>Even if they return to the capital...<fix123>Thanks to my encounter with this human,<fix123>I've lost my will to fight.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>オーケーオーケー<fix123>じゃあ、月の民は解放しよう<fix123>これであいつ等は幻想郷からも<fix123>手を引くでしょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sure thing, sure thing.<fix123>Releasing the moon's people now.<fix123>They ought to pull out<fix123>of Gensokyo now, too.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほんとに？<fix123>一回、そっちの奴に騙されたから<fix123>信用できないんだけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Really?<fix123>You already tricked me once before,<fix123>so I don't know if I can trust you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>騙してなんかないわ<fix123>まさか月の民が幻想郷全体を人質に<fix123>とるなんて思って無かったから<fix123>結果として間接的に幻想郷への<fix123>攻撃になってしまっただけで<fix123>我々の敵は月の民だけなんです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We have no intent to deceive.<fix123>I never thought that the moon's people<fix123>would take all of Gensokyo hostage.<fix123>My plan only indirectly resulted<fix123>in Gensokyo being attacked.<fix123>The people of the moon are our only enemies.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なら……良いけど<fix123>あ、そういえば幻想郷に月の民が<fix123>住んでいますよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well... okay.<fix123>Oh, now that you mention it.<fix123>There's some moon people living in Gensokyo.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>知ってるわ<fix123>それがどうかしたの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yeah, them.<fix123>What about them?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>その人に抗議してみたら<fix123>如何でしょう？<fix123>月の民代表として<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How about you go and<fix123>protest to them a little?<fix123>As delegates of the moon's people.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それもアリかもね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, that could work.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>勿論、対話で、ですよ？<fix123>暴力はいけませんよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But just by speaking, of course?<fix123>Violence isn't a good thing!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うーん、相手が暴力を使って来たら<fix123>どうするの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Mmm, but what if they use violence<fix123>against us first?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>その時は戦ってください<fix123>さっきみたいに！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Then fight them as you please!<fix123>Just like us a minute ago!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あははは<fix123>おもしろーい<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ahahaha~.<fix123>You're funnyー<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふふふ、今はもう復讐心は無いわ<fix123>次の復讐劇まで<fix123>長い時間が掛りそうね<fix123>貴方のお陰でね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh heh heh. For now, I have no desire for revenge.<fix123>It seems it'll be a long time<fix123>until my next revenge drama.<fix123>Thanks to you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほんじゃまあ<fix123>我々も戻りましょうか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We~ell,<fix123>seems like it's about time for us to head back, huh?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>戻るって、何処に？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Head back? Where to?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地球にです<fix123>我々は月の民ではないですから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Back to Earth.<fix123>We're not people of the moon, after all.<fix123><fix123><fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: Marisa's house.<fix123>
It is in the middle of Gensokyo, in the brimming with impurity Forest of Magic.<fix123>
"Well, it's amazin' that I'm alive.<fix123>
It turns out that there were some strong enemies in the Lunar Capital.<fix123>
Although, it looks like thanks to me, the capital was saved."<fix123>
"It turns out I was just the moon peoples' pawn.<fix123>Even thinkin' about this is annoyin'."<fix123>
"But I learned somethin' very important from Sagume.<fix123>
The reason urban legends came alive,<fix123>
is because of this thing's power."<fix123>
"This power stone from the Lunar Capital.<fix123>
It's a good thing I took the one that was mixed with the occult balls.<fix123>
I had no idea it held such power it could make Gensokyo fall into chaos."<fix123>
"Hello! I hope I'm not bothering you."<fix123>
"Waah, ya surprised me! Stop appearin' so suddenly."<fix123>
"So, you've been to the Lunar Capital?"<fix123>
"Uh, yeah. I went and saved the Lunar Capital."<fix123>
"Aha, great job, superhero."<fix123>
"Superheroine. What business do you have here?"<fix123>
"This power stone. Show it to me a little."<fix123>
"Ah, I guess ya want to retrieve 'n break it?"<fix123>
"Nooo, not at all. Such a precious thing... why do you think I would do that?"<fix123>
"Well, this's a dangerous item which has the power to materialize urban legends.<fix123>
It could actually make Gensokyo fall into chaos."<fix123>
"What are you saying? I already knew all that."<fix123>
"Aren't we lucky to have gained such information and such magical power?<fix123>
Gensokyo can change even more with this."<fix123>
"What? Sayin' this isn't like you."<fix123>
"I was certain you were the type who'd protect the barrier 'n reject change, but..."<fix123>
"Ufufufu, was that so?<fix123>
At any rate, did you meet the one who created this power stone?"<fix123>
"Y-yeah..."<fix123>
"Splendid, make sure to cherish your relationship with that one.<fix123>
Dear me! It's a delight to be so busy."<fix123>
No matter how much she pushed herself, Marisa couldn't read Yukari's thoughts.<fix123>
In the end, she disappeared without laying her hand on the power stone.<fix123>
Yukari talked about Gensokyo changing, but for what reason did she show herself there?<fix123>
Marisa thought.<fix123>
The goal of Yukari is to protect Gensokyo.<fix123>
But does it mean that for that purpose,<fix123>she'd consider even things like invading the Outside World or the Lunar Capital?<fix123>
Even though she thought to herself that it was impossible, the thought sent a chill down her spine.<fix123>
<c$Ending No.03 — Lunar Legacy$><fix123>
<c$You have completed the game! Congratulations!$><fix123>
<c$Pointdevice Mode or No Miss Clear Ending$><fix123>
Marisa's house.<fix123>
It is in the middle of Gensokyo, in the brimming with impurity Forest of Magic.<fix123>
"What? The mission failed?"<fix123>
"Well, whether it failed or not<fix123>
...I didn't even really understand what plan it was to begin with."<fix123>
"The plan to chase the moon rabbits back.<fix123>
You at least understood that, right?<fix123>
It was a mistake to rely on you."<fix123>
"Why didja entrust me with that ‘Ultramarine Orb Elixir’ in the first place?"<fix123>
"It wasn't only you.<fix123>
We also gave it to other humans."<fix123>
"However, these other humans said they didn't want to use that elixir.<fix123>
Well, there could actually be some secondary effects..."<fix123>
"What? Are there?!"<fix123>
"Because of that, the only one who merrily took it was you,<fix123>
but it is a disappointment that you failed."<fix123>
"Wait a sec."<fix123>
"As you said, I took the elixir, but I didn't use it."<fix123>
"Huh?"<fix123>
"Then, you didn't use it, attacked the Lunar Capital,<fix123>lost, and fled back?"<fix123>
"I didn't flee! I kept goin' till the end."<fix123>
"Weren't you happy to receive the elixir?<fix123>
What was that about, then!?"<fix123>
"See, that was because I obtained a rare item.<fix123>
It entered my collection as a treasure.<fix123>
It'd've been a waste to use it."<fix123>
"Haaah, Master, humans are doomed.<fix123>
This isn't even worth talking about.<fix123>
Now, it looks like I have no choice but to go myself..."<fix123>
"What's this? If you can go yourself,<fix123>then ya should've gone yourself from the start."<fix123>
"But I don't want to use that elixir!"<fix123>
Marisa didn't tell everything about what happened in the Lunar Capital.<fix123>
There were things she couldn't understand anyway,<fix123>and overall she was deceived by Reisen, she thought.<fix123>
However, she noticed that it wasn't the case after meeting her.<fix123>
It seemed Reisen didn't know the truth either.<fix123>
It was the right decision not to use the elixir, Marisa thought.<fix123>
The only person who knew the truth was the one who crafted the elixir, Eirin, after all.<fix123>
Marisa didn't want to take part in such a shady plan.<fix123>
<c$Ending No.04 — The moon rabbit's resolution$><fix123>
