en_dialogue: <fix123>Human?<fix123>For real? Like, they're physically here?<fix123>Hmm...<fix123>Let's have a look-see.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>な、何だよ<fix123>ジロジロ見るなよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>W-what's with you?<fix123>Quit starin' at me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まあ良いでしょう<fix123>この人間が純狐を手こずらせてるの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, all right.<fix123>So this human's been giving you a hard time, Junko?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>手こずるなんてもんじゃ無い<fix123>この人間のおかげで<fix123>我々の敗北が半分だけ決定した<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It wasn't merely a 'hard time'.<fix123>It's thanks to this human that we<fix123>were defeated, albeit only halfway.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええええ？<fix123>それほどまで……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Whaaaat?<fix123>She's that strong...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>月の民は狡猾だわ<fix123>こんな人間を送り込んでくるなんて<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The moon's people were quite cunning,<fix123>sending this human to fight me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふーん、面白い<fix123>純狐がそこまで言うんなら本物ね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmm, interesting.<fix123>If you're saying that much, they must be the real thing.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まあ、良く判らんが<fix123>本物だ！<fix123>このまま月の民が夢の世界に<fix123>閉じ込められていると幻想郷が危ないんだ<fix123>お前達の仕業に間違い無い！<fix123>倒してやる！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I dunno what's happenin',<fix123>but I'm definitely real!<fix123>If you keep the moon people trapped in the<fix123>dream world, it'll be real bad for Gensokyo!<fix123>That's definitely your doing!<fix123>So I'm gonna take you down!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>夢の世界にいる月の民を<fix123>縛り付けているのは勿論私よ<fix123>あいつ等、夢の中だと無防備<fix123>なんですもの、簡単だったわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, I'm the one keeping the moon's people<fix123>tied down in the dream world.<fix123>They're totally defenseless while<fix123>they're in here. It was easy.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: パンデモニックプラネット<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Pandemonic Planet<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>よし決めた！<fix123>本来なら、人間など相手に<fix123>しないんだけど<fix123>『貴方は私の友人に楯突いた』<fix123>それだけの理由で貴方を地獄へ堕とす<fix123>ただそれだけの理由だ！<fix123>死んでも悔しがれ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Okay, my mind's made up!<fix123>Usually, I'd rather not fight<fix123>the likes of a human, but...<fix123>"You fought back against my friend."<fix123>For that reason alone, I'll drop you into hell.<fix123>For that reason, and no more!<fix123>Now, suffer even in death!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Hecatia Lapislazuli and Junko DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>二人がかりだなんて卑怯だ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, you both attacked! That's playin' dirty!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あはは、少し遊んでみただけよ<fix123>勝負は私の負けね<fix123>純狐が言うだけあって<fix123>素晴らしい人間だわ<fix123>こんな素晴らしい人間がいる<fix123>幻想郷に攻め入るなんて<fix123>月の民達は許しがたいわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hahaha, I was just playing around a bit.<fix123>I lost the battle.<fix123>You're as amazing a human<fix123>as Junko said.<fix123>Honestly, attacking Gensokyo?<fix123>When there's such amazing humans there?<fix123>I'm finding it kinda hard to forgive the moon's people.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まあ同感だが……<fix123>今は月の民を解放して欲しいんだ<fix123>そうしないと幻想郷が危ない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I hafta agree...<fix123>But for now, I'd like ya to let them go.<fix123>If you don't, it'll be dangerous fer' Gensokyo.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ねえ、純狐？<fix123>良いかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, Junko?<fix123>Is this okay?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……良いわ<fix123>月の民を都へ戻しても<fix123>この人間に出会えたおかげで<fix123>戦意喪失したから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...it's fine.<fix123>Even if they return to the capital...<fix123>Thanks to my encounter with this human,<fix123>I've lost my will to fight.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>オーケーオーケー<fix123>じゃあ、月の民は解放しよう<fix123>これであいつ等は幻想郷からも<fix123>手を引くでしょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sure thing, sure thing.<fix123>Releasing the moon's people now.<fix123>They ought to pull out<fix123>of Gensokyo now, too.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それにしてもお前達は何者なんだ？<fix123>月の民を敵視しているって事は<fix123>今の我々と利害が一致しているんだが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That aside, what are you guys anyway?<fix123>If you're enemies of the moon's people,<fix123>we might have a common interest, here...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私達の敵は嫦娥<fix123>月の兎のリーダーよ<fix123>彼奴は私の息子の命を<fix123>奪った奴の妻である<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Our enemy is Chang'e,<fix123>the leader of the moon rabbits.<fix123>She is the wife of the man<fix123>who stole my son's life away.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私の星を殺した奴の妻でもあるわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>And the wife of the guy who killed one of my stars.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほう……ガチの復讐って話だったのか<fix123>星を殺したってのは良く判らないけど<fix123>触れないでおくか<fix123>まあ、なんだ<fix123>悪かったな<fix123>私達の為に復讐を諦めさせて<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh. So it's dictionary-definition revenge, then?<fix123>(Don't quite get that 'killed a star' thing,)<fix123>(but maybe I shouldn't pry.)<fix123>But, eh,<fix123>sorry 'bout all this.<fix123>Now you gotta give up on your revenge for our sake, an' all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>良いのよ、私達にチャンスは<fix123>無限に存在するもの<fix123>そう、この復讐劇も永遠に<fix123>繰り返されるのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's all right.<fix123>We have endless opportunities.<fix123>Yes, this revenge drama will<fix123>repeat itself for all eternity.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ならいいや<fix123>月が絡むと何でも永遠になるもんな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A'ight then.<fix123>You get the moon involved, an' just about everything takes forever.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ねえ今度貴方の所に<fix123>遊び行ってもいいかしら？<fix123>これだけの力を身に付けた人間<fix123>興味が尽きないわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, is it okay if I come over to<fix123>your place to play next time?<fix123>With even a human this powerful,<fix123>I'd practically never get bored.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あんた、地獄の女神じゃなかったっけ？<fix123>地獄がやってくる、だなんてぞっとしないな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Uh, aren't you a hell goddess?<fix123>Really don't like idea of you raisin' hell over there.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>大丈夫よ、地上では<fix123>地上の女神だから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Nah, it's fine. As long as I'm on<fix123>Earth, I'm an Earth goddess.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうなのか……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That so...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>切り札はいつだって悪手<fix123>Evel Trinity<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Trump Card is Always a Bad Move<fix123>Evil Trinity<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>夢の世界<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Dream World<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 見た事も無い悪夢の世界<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: A World of Nightmares Never Seen Before<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Doremy Sweet ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>また来てしまったのですね……<fix123>覚悟は出来てますか？<fix123>もう貴方の狂夢は終わらない<fix123>永遠に付きまとう現実と知れ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So you've come here again, hm...<fix123>Have you prepared yourself?<fix123>Your lunatic dream isn't over yet.<fix123>Know a reality that will follow you forever!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Doremy Sweet DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Junko ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>この答えに辿り着くまで<fix123>思ったより時間が掛ったわね<fix123>人間を使うという奇策を打ったのだから<fix123>すぐに気付くと思ったのですが……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It took longer than I anticipated<fix123>for them arrive at this answer.<fix123>Since they came up with the scheme to use a human,<fix123>I thought they'd realize it right away...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>む、また出てきた！<fix123>やっぱりこれもあんたの仕業なのね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Bah, it's you again!<fix123>I knew this had to be your doing!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>月の民は夢の世界に逃げ込んだ<fix123>月の都に居られなくなった月の民は<fix123>そうするだろうと私は読んでいた<fix123>勿論、私は先手を打った<fix123>夢の世界に刺客を<fix123>送り込んでいたのです<fix123>さあ出ておいで！<fix123>地獄の女神、へカーティアよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The people of the moon escaped into the dream world.<fix123>I foresaw that they would do so, as they were<fix123>unable to stay in the Lunar Capital.<fix123>Of course, I took the initiative.<fix123>I sent an assassin<fix123>into the dream world first.<fix123>Now, show yourself!<fix123>Hecatia, goddess of hell!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Hecatia Lapislazuli ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>地獄の女神<fix123>ヘカーティア・ラピスラズリ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Goddess of Hell<fix123>Hecatia Lapislazuli<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>んもう<fix123>待ちくたびれたわよん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Aw, geeze.<fix123>You totally kept me waiting, y'know.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>め、女神？<fix123>あんたが？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>G-goddess?<fix123>You?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ようやく、嫦娥の奴に復讐出来るのね？<fix123>腕が鳴るわー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So we're finally gonna get revenge on Chang'e, huh?<fix123>My fingers are so itchingー<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いや、敵は月の民ではなくて<fix123>目の前の人間です<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, no. Your enemy is the human<fix123>before you, not the moon's people.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間？<fix123>ええ人間なの？　生身の？<fix123>ふーん……<fix123>どれどれ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Human?<fix123>For real? Like, they're physically here?<fix123>Hmm...<fix123>Let's have a look-see.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何か、良く判らないけど<fix123>月の民が都に戻れないのは<fix123>あんたが原因なんでしょ？<fix123>あいつ等が夢の世界に居座ると<fix123>私達人間も困るの！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I don't quite get it,<fix123>but the moon's people can't return to the capital...<fix123>...because of you, right?<fix123>If they sit around in the dream world,<fix123>it's a big problem for us humans too!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ごーかぁーく<fix123>オーケーオーケー、相手にしてあげる <fix123>良い素材を見つけたわね<fix123>純狐<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>'Kay, all confirmed.<fix123>Sure thing, sure thing! I'll take you on.<fix123>You sure found some good material,<fix123>Junko.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>見つけたのは月の民だけど……<fix123>まあお陰で陰鬱だった地上生活も<fix123>楽しくなりそうだわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, it was the moon's people who found her...<fix123>But thanks to them, my once-dismal life on Earth<fix123>may get a lot more fun.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どうする？　二人でやるの？<fix123>それとも私の三体全てを使って四人で？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So what are we going with? Two on one?<fix123>Or should I call in my other two selves and make it four on one?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いや……流石にそれは勿体ない<fix123>正々堂々、一人ずつ勝負しよう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No... that would be quite a waste indeed.<fix123>Let's do this fairly and battle in turns.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>勿体ないって同感、どうかーん<fix123>気が合うわね、私達<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Totally with you on the 'waste' part. To~tally.<fix123>See, we're a totally good match.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いつまで待たせるつもりよ！<fix123>私はいつだって臨戦態勢よ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How long are you gonna keep me waiting!?<fix123>I'm always prepared for battle!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ごめんごめん<fix123>お待たせしたね<fix123>さっきの質問に答えるわ<fix123>夢の世界にいる月の民を<fix123>縛り付けているのは勿論私よ<fix123>あいつ等、夢の中だと無防備<fix123>なんですもの、簡単だったわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Whoops, sorry.<fix123>I did keep you waiting, yeah.<fix123>I'll answer your question from before.<fix123>Yes, I'm the one keeping the moon's people<fix123>tied down in the dream world.<fix123>They're totally defenseless while<fix123>they're in here. It was easy.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今すぐ、月の民を解放しなさい！<fix123>さもないとこの場で<fix123>滅ぼしてみせる！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Let the people of the moon go this instant!<fix123>If you don't, I'll grind you<fix123>into the dust right here!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: パンデモニックプラネット<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Pandemonic Planet<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>よーし、可愛いから<fix123>ちょっと遊んでやろう<fix123>本来なら、人間など相手に<fix123>しないんだけど<fix123>『貴方は私に汚い言葉を使った』<fix123>それだけの理由で貴方を地獄へ堕とす<fix123>ただそれだけの理由だ！<fix123>死んでも悔しがれ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>All right. You're a cute little thing,<fix123>so I'll play with you a bit.<fix123>Usually, I'd rather not fight<fix123>the likes of a human, but...<fix123>"You used some rude language towards me."<fix123>For that reason alone, I'll drop you into hell.<fix123>For that reason, and no more!<fix123>Now, suffer even in death!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Hecatia Lapislazuli and Junko DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>二人がかりで来たでしょ！<fix123>狡いわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, you both attacked at the end!<fix123>That's no fair!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ごめんごめん、ちょっと遊んでみただけよ<fix123>勝負は私の負けね<fix123>こんな素晴らしい人間が居る<fix123>幻想郷に攻め入るなんて<fix123>月の民達は何を考えているのやら<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sorry, sorry. I was just playing around a bit.<fix123>I lost the battle.<fix123>Honestly, attacking Gensokyo?<fix123>When there's such amazing humans there?<fix123>I've got no idea what the moon's people were thinking.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さっさと月の民を解放しなさい<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Let the people of the moon go. Now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ねえ、純狐<fix123>良いかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, Junko.<fix123>Is this okay?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……良いわ<fix123>月の民を都へ戻しても<fix123>この人間に出会えたおかげで<fix123>戦意喪失したから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...it's fine.<fix123>Even if they return to the capital...<fix123>Thanks to my encounter with this human,<fix123>I've lost my will to fight.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>オーケーオーケー<fix123>じゃあ、月の民は解放しよう<fix123>これであいつ等は幻想郷からも<fix123>手を引くでしょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sure thing, sure thing.<fix123>Releasing the moon's people now.<fix123>They ought to pull out<fix123>of Gensokyo now, too.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……結果月の民を救う羽目になって<fix123>なんか釈然としないんだけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...y'know, I'm still not satisfied with<fix123>ending up saving the moon's people...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そりゃあねぇ……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, about that...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>月の民は狡猾で無慈悲なのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The people of the moon truly are cunning and cruel.<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Hm?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>幻想郷は人質に取られていた<fix123>って考えられるでしょ？<fix123>幻想郷を救いたかったら<fix123>月の都から手を引け、って非人道的な策よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You can think of it<fix123>as them taking Gensokyo hostage, no?<fix123>"If you want Gensokyo to be spared,<fix123>leave the moon." A terribly inhumane strategy.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ、そういう事<fix123>そう考えると<fix123>何か腹が立ってきたわ <fix123>永琳達に会ったら一発殴らないと<fix123>気が済まないわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh, guess so.<fix123>When I think about it like that,<fix123>I get somehow annoyed.<fix123>Next time I meet Eirin's lot,<fix123>I'm gonna have to punch them.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>永琳？<fix123>それが地上にいる月の賢者の名前？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Eirin?<fix123>Is that the name of the lunar sage living on Earth?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え、あ、ああ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Er, um, uhhhhh,<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今度、案内して貰えるかしら？<fix123>その家まで<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Could you perhaps guide me<fix123>to her place of residence?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ、う<fix123>良いのかな？　会わせて<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Uh, um.<fix123>Is that okay? Having you meet her?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>別に争うつもりは無いから<fix123>今はね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I don't particularly intend to fight her.<fix123>For now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いいね、私も連れて行ってよ<fix123>貴方みたいな人間と会えたのも<fix123>その賢者のお陰ですもんね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sounds good! Take me along, too!<fix123>It's thanks to this sage that I<fix123>met a human like you, after all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まあ、判ったわ<fix123>でもこれだけは肝に銘じておいてね<fix123>幻想郷で問題を起こすような事があったら<fix123>即刻私が退治するからね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, all right.<fix123>But you'd better remember this, okay?<fix123>If you cause any sort of problem in Gensokyo,<fix123>I'll exterminate you at once!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はーい<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, yes.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>浄土の探査機<fix123>Eagle Rabbit<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Probe from the Pure Land<fix123>Eagle Rabbit<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>妖怪の山麓<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Foot of Youkai Mountain<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Unforgettable, the Nostalgic Greenery<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>Seiran LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Seiran ENTERS AGAIN<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Seiran LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ついにこの時が来たのね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So the time has finally come.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あらあら<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, my.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Seiran ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>浅葱色のイーグルラヴィ<fix123>清蘭<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Pale Blue Eagle Ravi<fix123>Seiran<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お久しぶりー！<fix123>元気してたー？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's been a while!<fix123>Have you been doing well?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>随分と派手に攻撃されたけどね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Aside from you attacking me pretty flashily, yes.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まあこれも仕事なの<fix123>判るでしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, it's for work.<fix123>You know how it is, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 兎は舞い降りた<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Rabbit Has Landed<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だからここで大人しく<fix123>やられて、ね？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So just behave yourself<fix123>and get beaten here, okay?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Seiran DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>え？<fix123>何で私がやられてるの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123>Why did you beat me?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>残念ながら私は<fix123>地上の兎になったのよ<fix123>つまり貴方は私の敵……<fix123>いや、貴方じゃ無くてその上に居る<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sorry, but I've<fix123>become an earth rabbit.<fix123>Basically, you're my enemy...<fix123>No, not you. The ones above you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>『メーデーメーデー！<fix123>緊急事態発生！』<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Mayday, mayday!<fix123>This is a state of emergency!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうそう、テレパシーでみんなに<fix123>報告すると良いわ<fix123>自分勝手な月の兎にね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's right, spread the word to everyone<fix123> with telepathy.<fix123>To all those selfish moon rabbits.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>湖上の前線基地<fix123>Lunatic Front Line<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Forward Base on the Lake<fix123>Lunatic Front Line<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>妖怪の山の湖<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Youkai Mountain Lake<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 湖は浄めの月光を映して<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Lake Reflects the Pure Moonlight<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Ringo ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Ringo LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>うーん、上の方から<fix123>懐かしい風を感じるわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Mmm, the wind up here<fix123>brings back memories.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>裏切ったって<fix123>マジですか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So is it true<fix123>that you betrayed us?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Ringo ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>橘色のイーグルラヴィ<fix123>鈴瑚<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Orange Eagle Ravi<fix123>Ringo<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>月の兎同士で争うだなんて<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Fighting your fellow moon rabbits, honestly.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まあね<fix123>これも命令だけどねー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I suppose.<fix123>I'm acting under orders too, though.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方も大変ねぇ<fix123>地上に行ったって仕事仕事<fix123>私達、兎の労働条件は<fix123>一向に向上しないしねー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You've got it tough, too, huh?<fix123>Even on Earth, it's work, work, work.<fix123>And us rabbits' working conditions<fix123>haven't improved at all, either...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>でね、私のミッションは<fix123>都に潜入する必要があるの<fix123>まあそんな訳で、ちょっと<fix123>通路使わせてよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Anyway, my mission<fix123>requires me to infiltrate the capital.<fix123>So would you mind<fix123>letting me use the passage?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 九月のパンプキン<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Pumpkin of September<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はいどうぞ、ってそんな訳に<fix123>いかないでしょ？<fix123>裏切り者は排除しろと<fix123>就業規則に書いてあるしね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Do you think I'm just going to say<fix123>'Yes, go right ahead'?<fix123>'Eliminate traitors' is written<fix123>in our work regulations, too.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Ringo DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>地上の環境は過酷だけど<fix123>変化があってまあまあ楽しめるわよ<fix123>まあ、住めば都ってね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Earth's environment is harsh, but<fix123>there's never a dull moment, so it's pretty fun.<fix123>Well, your home capital is what you make it, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう、私も地上に住みたいなー<fix123>仕事も何もかもかなぐり捨てて<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yeah, I want to live on Earth too...<fix123>And just forget about work and everything else.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さてさて久々に月の都に<fix123>潜入するとしますか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now, then, it's been a while, but<fix123>it's time for me to infiltrate the Lunar Capital.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうそう、一つだけ忠告しておくわ<fix123>今、月の都は一人の狂人によって<fix123>おかしくなり始めている<fix123>昔の極楽浄土はもう<fix123>見る影も無いと思ってね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, right, let me give you one warning.<fix123>Right now, the Lunar Capital has started going crazy<fix123>thanks to a single lunatic.<fix123>Understand that there's nothing left<fix123>of the pure land of old.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほほう……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oho...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>アポロ経絡<fix123>Dreamful Path<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Apollo Meridian<fix123>Dreamful Path<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>秘密の連絡通路<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Secret Passageway<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 宇宙を飛ぶ不思議な巫女<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Mysterious Shrine Maiden Flying Through Space<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Doremy Sweet ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Doremy Sweet LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ここは第四槐安(かいあん)通路かな<fix123>……久しぶりだから忘れかけてるけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This is Kaian[1] Passageway #4, I believe?<fix123>...It's been a while, so I've started to forget.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おっとそこまでよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, that's far enough.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Doremy Sweet ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>夢の支配者<fix123>ドレミー・スイート<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ruler of Dreams<fix123>Doremy Sweet<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方はここを通すな<fix123>って言われててねぇ<fix123>貴方に何の怨みも無いけど<fix123>私も仕事だからね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've been told<fix123>to not let you through here.<fix123>I have no grudge against you,<fix123>but I've got a job to do too.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ば、獏(ばく)だって？<fix123>そんな馬鹿な……<fix123>なんだって夢の中(ここ)で<fix123>一番危険な妖怪が私の前に<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A... a baku?<fix123>This is ridiculous...<fix123>What's the most dangerous youkai in the Dream World(this place)<fix123>doing here in front of me?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今回の件は私も少しかんでいるんでね<fix123>この程度の仕事は義理で引き受けた形さ<fix123>さあ、良い子だからぐっすり眠って<fix123>全てを忘れちゃいましょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm a little caught up in these events, too.<fix123>This much work is more of a matter of duty.<fix123>Now be a good girl, have a nice, long sleep,<fix123>and forget about everything.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>兎しか使わないはずの連絡通路に<fix123>わざわざ敵を配置するだなんて<fix123>私か誰かを誘い込んでいるのが<fix123>見え見えじゃないか……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Putting an enemy in a passageway<fix123>that only rabbits use...<fix123>It's obvious they're trying to<fix123>lure me, or somebody, in...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 永遠の春夢<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Eternal Spring Dream<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>知っての通り、地上と月の都の<fix123>連絡通路は精神世界である<fix123>ここは夢の世界(ドリームワールド)<fix123>夢を喰い、夢を創る私に敵うと思うなよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>As you know, the passageway<fix123>between Earth and the Lunar Capital is the mental world.<fix123>This is the Dream World!<fix123>Don't think you can stand against me, an eater and creator of dreams!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Doremy Sweet DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>この先待ち受けているのが悪夢だとしても<fix123>それでも私は行くしかない<fix123>それが仕事だからねぇ<fix123>守らなきゃいけないのですよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Even if there's a nightmare waiting for me ahead,<fix123>I have no choice but to go on.<fix123>It's my job, after all.<fix123>I've got to do it.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうですか……<fix123>私の方は一応形だけでも<fix123>仕事したのでもう十分です<fix123>それにしても<fix123>兎にしては珍しいですねぇ<fix123>ちゃんと仕事をするなんて……<fix123>なんか使命感があるというか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see...<fix123>I may just be here for form's sake, but<fix123>I've done my job, so that's enough.<fix123>That aside,<fix123>you're rather unusual for a rabbit.<fix123>Actually doing your job properly...<fix123>Perhaps you've got a sense of duty?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まあ……私にもまだ狂いが<fix123>残っているのかもね<fix123>穢土(えど)は月の狂気を穏やかに<fix123>させてくれる筈なのにねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well... maybe I'm still<fix123>a little crazy.<fix123>Even though this impure world ought to have<fix123>calmed the moon's madness down...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いやそういう月の狂気ではないわ<fix123>貴方から感じたのは<fix123>どちらかというと<fix123>地上くさいというか……<fix123>誰かが用意した夢を抱いて<fix123>個性をひねり出す人間のような<fix123>要は染まったのね<fix123>穢れた大地に<fix123>穢れた貴方には今の月の都は<fix123>狂気の沙汰(ルナティック)にしか見えないでしょう<fix123>必要以上に気を付けてね<fix123>それでは貴方に吉夢が訪れん事を<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, this isn't the moon's madness.<fix123>What I feel from you is...<fix123>...if I had to say, I'd call it<fix123>earthliness...<fix123>Like those humans, who manage to come up with their own individuality<fix123>by embracing the dreams that others prepared for them.<fix123>In short, you've been tainted.<fix123>By this impure land.<fix123>Your impure self will see nothing but lunacy<fix123>in the Lunar Capital now.<fix123>Be even more careful than you need to.<fix123>Now, then, I wish you pleasant dreams.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>寂びの来ない街<fix123>Lunatic Kingdom<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A City Free of Sabi[2]<fix123>Lunatic Kingdom<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>月の都<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Lunar Capital<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 凍り付いた永遠の都<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Frozen Capital of Eternity<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Sagume Kishin ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Sagume Kishin LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>これは一体！？<fix123>何故こんなに冷え切っているのかしら<fix123>それに誰もいないだなんて……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What is this!?<fix123>Why's everything frozen over like this?<fix123>And nobody's here...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Sagume Kishin ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>舌禍をもたらす女神<fix123>稀神サグメ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Goddess who Invites Unfortunate Slips of the Tongue<fix123>Sagume Kishin<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ、サグメ様……<fix123>この現状は一体<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, Lady Sagume...<fix123>What's going on here?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……兎？<fix123>今、月の民は全員仮の月の都に<fix123>退避している筈なのに<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...a rabbit?<fix123>But the people of the moon should have all<fix123>been evacuated to the fake Lunar Capital by now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>仮の……月の都？<fix123>もしかしてみんな<fix123>夢の世界にいるとか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Fake... Lunar Capital?<fix123>Does that mean everyone's<fix123>in the dream world or something?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>察しが良いわね<fix123>月の民はみな夢の世界を<fix123>本物の都と勘違いしている<fix123>それこそ月の都の狂夢<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Good guess.<fix123>The people of the moon have all mistaken<fix123>the dream world for the real capital.<fix123>That is the Lunar Capital's lunatic dream.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いつも喋らないサグメ様が<fix123>饒舌になっているなんて<fix123>何か本当におかしな事が<fix123>起きているんだわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>For you to be so unusually<fix123>talkative, Lady Sagume,<fix123>something really strange must<fix123>be happening after all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方は地上に堕ちた兎ね<fix123>八意様のところの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're the rabbit that fell to Earth, aren't you?<fix123>The one from Lady Yagokoro's place.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 逆転するホイールオブフォーチュン<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Reversed Wheel of Fortune<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まさか獏がこちらへ通すとは<fix123>思わなかったけど……<fix123>もしかして可(・)能(・)性(・)が<fix123>あるというのか……<fix123>試してみるわ<fix123>地上に堕ちた貴方の力を！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I never thought the baku would let you<fix123> pass through to this place, but...<fix123>...perhaps that possibility<fix123>does exist...?<fix123>I'll now test the power<fix123>of you who fell to Earth!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Sagume Kishin DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>判った判った<fix123>もう十分よ<fix123>八意様が貴方を遣った<fix123>理由が判ったわ<fix123>貴方なら月の都を<fix123>救えるかも知れない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see, I see.<fix123>That's enough.<fix123>I understand the reason that<fix123>Lady Yagokoro dispatched you for this.<fix123>You might be able<fix123>to save the Lunar Capital.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>えええ？<fix123>月の都をー？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Whaaaat?<fix123>Save the Lunar Capitalー?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今、月の都はある敵によって<fix123>侵略されようとしている<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Right now, an enemy of the Lunar Capital<fix123>is trying to invade.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>侵略だって？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Invade?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それも我々月の民には<fix123>手が出せない生命の力でね<fix123>慌てて月の都を凍結停止させて<fix123>全員を退避したけど<fix123>このままでは狂夢によって<fix123>月の民の精神も持たない<fix123>だから早いうちに<fix123>幻想郷へ遷都しようと考えていたの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>And she's using the power of life,<fix123>which we people of the moon can't act against.<fix123>We panicked, put the Lunar Capital in stasis,<fix123>and evacuated everyone,<fix123>but that lunatic dream can't sustain<fix123>the citizens' minds forever like this.<fix123>So we thought we would<fix123>relocate to Gensokyo soon.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うひょっ！？<fix123>遷都！？<fix123>いやー、驚きすぎました<fix123>その事は地上に来ている月の兎は……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hwa!?<fix123>Relocate!?<fix123>Ahh, that's just too big a shock.<fix123>So the moon rabbits that came to Earth...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>勿論知らないわ<fix123>地上に月の都の別荘を作ろう<fix123>程度にしか教えていない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>They have no idea, of course.<fix123>All we told them was that the Lunar Capital<fix123>was building a summer home on Earth.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……月の民の上司はいつもそう<fix123>隠蔽に隠蔽でもう嫌になっちゃう<fix123>でもなんでそれを私に？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...I really can't stand the way the lunar authorities<fix123>always hide things just for the sake of hiding them.<fix123>But why are you telling me this?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方に教えたのは<fix123>貴方が敵を討つ条件を満たしていたからよ<fix123>敵は生命の源を牛耳る力を<fix123>持っています<fix123>生死を拒絶する月の民(われわれ)を<fix123>逆手にとった狡い敵なのですが……<fix123>貴方はもう生死を拒絶しないのね<fix123>身も心も地上に堕ちていた<fix123>貴方はもう穢れている<fix123>だから貴方なら敵のところに行ける<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm telling you because you fulfill the conditions<fix123>necessary to strike back at our enemy.<fix123>Our enemy has the power to<fix123>control the source of life.<fix123>She's crafty, turning our own rejection<fix123>of life and death against us...<fix123>...but you no longer reject it.<fix123>Your body and soul have both fallen to Earth.<fix123>Because of your impurity,<fix123>you can travel to where she is.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふー恐ろしい話<fix123>有難うございました<fix123>永琳様も輝夜様も、最初から判って<fix123>私や人間に行かせようとしたんだわ<fix123>人の危険なんて<fix123>どうでも良いのよね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Phew, that's quite a story.<fix123>Thank you.<fix123>Lady Eirin and Lady Kaguya knew all this from the beginning,<fix123>so they sent me and those humans.<fix123>They really don't mind<fix123>putting people in danger.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私が計画を話してしまったので<fix123>もう幻想郷に遷都は出来ないでしょう<fix123>だからもう貴方しか頼りが無いの<fix123>判るでしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Because I told you about the plan,<fix123>we won't be able to relocate to Gensokyo anymore.<fix123>So we have nothing left but to rely on you.<fix123>Do you understand?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はあ、サグメ様がそう仰るのなら<fix123>そういう事になっちゃうんでしょうね<fix123>強制的に<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Aah, if that's what you say, Lady Sagume,<fix123>that's just how it'll be.<fix123>By hook or by crook.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>判っているのなら行きなさい！<fix123>いざ敵の本拠地、静かの海に向かえ！<fix123>これはいわば勅命よ<fix123>私の天津神部分からの……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If you get it, then go already!<fix123>Now, on to the enemy's home base, the Sea of Tranquility!<fix123>Consider that an imperial order.<fix123>From the part of me that's a heavenly god...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>星条旗のピエロ<fix123>Clownish Moon<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Pierrot of the Star-Spangled Banner<fix123>Clownish Moon<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>静かの海<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sea of Tranquility<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 遥か38万キロのボヤージュ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Faraway Voyage of 380,000 Kilometers<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Clownpiece ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>きゃはははは！<fix123>面白い事が起こっているわー！<fix123>妖精達よ、もっとスピード<fix123>あげていこうよ！<fix123>イッツ、ルナティックターイム！<fix123>狂気の世界へようこそ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Kyahahahaha!<fix123>Something real interesting is going on~!<fix123>Hey, fairies!<fix123>Let's crank up the speed!<fix123>It's lunatic time!<fix123>Welcome to a world of madness!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Clownpiece EXITS WITHOUT FIGHTING<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>都の外に妖精の大群……？<fix123>これがサグメ様の言っていた<fix123>侵略者？<fix123>いや、確かに妖精は穢れの象徴だけど<fix123>あいつ等に侵略する知能は無いと思う<fix123>それに月の民だって妖精程度の<fix123>穢れは怖くないし……<fix123>って疑問はそこじゃないわ<fix123>そもそもなんで月面に<fix123>妖精がいるのか、ってとこよね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A swarm of fairies outside the capital...?<fix123>Are these the invaders Lady Sagume<fix123>mentioned?<fix123>Well, it's true that fairies are a symbol of impurity,<fix123>but I don't think they have the intelligence to invade.<fix123>And the people of the moon shouldn't fear<fix123>the level of impurity from mere fairies...<fix123>...Wait, that's not the problem here.<fix123>What are fairies doing on the moon<fix123>in the first place? That's the real question.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それはねぇ<fix123>地上から連れて来られた<fix123>のもいるけど<fix123>月面にも元々いたのよ、妖精は<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, you see...<fix123>There's a few here who were<fix123>brought from Earth,<fix123>but there were originally fairies<fix123>living on the moon, too!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>妖精の親玉ね<fix123>確かに他の妖精とはひと味違う<fix123>ようだけど……<fix123>こんな奴に月の民が<fix123>手を焼くなんて……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So you're the fairies' boss.<fix123>You do seem a bit different<fix123>from the other fairies, but...<fix123>I can hardly believe that the moon's people<fix123>would have their hands full with you...!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あたいを誰だと思っているの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who do you think I am?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地獄の妖精<fix123>クラウンピース<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Fairy of Hell<fix123>Clownpiece<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あたいは地獄の妖精<fix123>クラウンピース<fix123>月の民は友人様の敵<fix123>友人様の敵はご主人様の敵<fix123>ご主人様の敵はあたいの敵だ！<fix123>容赦しないぞ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm a fairy from hell,<fix123>Clownpiece.<fix123>The moon's people are enemies of honorable friend.<fix123>Enemies of honorable friend are enemies of Master's.<fix123>And any enemy of Master's is an enemy of mine!<fix123>I'll show no mercy.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>腑に落ちない処も在るけど……<fix123>私も容赦しないよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm not really sure I get the whole picture here...<fix123>but you won't get any mercy from me, either!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 星条旗のピエロ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Pierrot of the Star-Spangled Banner<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>純(・)化(・)した妖精のエネルギーは<fix123>鬼神を越えるって言われたもん<fix123>月の民の嫌う生死の穢れを<fix123>たっぷり喰らって<fix123>初めての死で<fix123>地獄に堕ちるがいい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>They say that a refined fairy's energy<fix123>exceeds even that of a kishin.<fix123>Taste the impurity of life and death<fix123>that the moon's people hate so much,<fix123>and let your first death<fix123>send you falling into hell!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Clownpiece DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>はあはあはあ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hah, hah, hah...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この圧倒的な力……<fix123>普通の妖精ではない！？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This overwhelming power...<fix123>You aren't an ordinary fairy, are you!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>な、なんで……？<fix123>生命の象徴である我々妖精族が<fix123>ここを支配している限り<fix123>月の民は手も足も出せないって<fix123>聞いたのに<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>W-why...?<fix123>But I heard that as long as we fairies,<fix123>symbols of life, controlled this place,<fix123>the people of the moon wouldn't<fix123>be able to do a thing.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ねえねえ、その話<fix123>誰に聞いたの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, who exactly<fix123>did you hear that from?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ご主人様の友人様よ<fix123>妖精達の力を純(・)化(・)してくれたのも<fix123>そのお方<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My honorable friend.<fix123>The one who refined us fairies' power<fix123>was her, too.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>純化？<fix123>それって一体……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Refined?<fix123>What does that mean...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あたいにも良く判らないけど<fix123>凄いことらしいよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I don't really get it either, but apparently<fix123>it's something really amazing.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふーん、そいつが妖精達を<fix123>騙して何かをしているのか<fix123>確かにここの妖精達は<fix123>穢れまくっている<fix123>いや、穢れその物といってもいい<fix123>レベルだわ<fix123>確かにこのレベルで攻められると<fix123>都は榛穢(しんわい)化するかもしれないわね……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmm. So she tricked the fairies<fix123>and did something to them?<fix123>The fairies around here are<fix123>really impure, after all.<fix123>No, at this level you could say they basically<fix123>are impurity.<fix123>Being attacked with something at this level<fix123>might really send the capital into ruin after all...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あのー、あんた、いや貴方様には何で<fix123>私の穢れが平気だったのでしょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, lady... er, madam... why are you<fix123>okay with all of my impurity?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私はもう……、地上の兎だからね<fix123>一度穢れてしまえば、もう戻る事は<fix123>不可能でしょう<fix123>でもこれで間違い無いわ<fix123>お師匠様は月の都を救うために<fix123>私を遣ったんだわ<fix123>ただ、敵は月の民のクリティカルな弱点を<fix123>熟知し、それを活かす能力を持っている<fix123>何者なのかしら……<fix123>お師匠様もサグメ様も知っている筈なのに<fix123>教えてくれないからなぁ<fix123>何にしてもここまで来たら<fix123>最後までお師匠様の期待に添うのみよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Because I'm... an earth rabbit, now.<fix123>Once you've become impure once,<fix123>it's impossible to return.<fix123>But this confirms it.<fix123>My master sent me to save<fix123>the Lunar Capital.<fix123>But the enemy understood the lunar citizens' weak point,<fix123>and had the ability to make use of that knowledge.<fix123>What sort of person could they be...?<fix123>Master and Lady Sagume probably both know,<fix123>but they won't tell me...<fix123>Either way, since I've come this far,<fix123>I'll just have to live up to Master's expectations!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>倶に天を戴かずとも<fix123>Pure Furies<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Though Unable to Dwell Together Under Heaven[3]<fix123>Pure Furies<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>静かの海（裏）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sea of Tranquility (Underside)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 故郷の星が映る海<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Sea Where One's Home Planet Reflects<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>If playing on Pointdevice Mode (or on Legacy with no misses)<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Junko ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>万策尽きて暴挙に出たとでも<fix123>言うのだろうか<fix123>月の民のその様な姿を<fix123>見たくは無かったですね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Have they exhausted all other possibilities<fix123>and carried out this reckless attempt?<fix123>I never hoped to see the<fix123>moon's people come to this.<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>...Who are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>純狐<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Junko<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私の名は純狐<fix123>月の民に仇なす仙霊である<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My name is Junko.<fix123>A sagacious spirit bearing ill will to the citizens of the moon.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>月の民にこんな敵がいたなんて<fix123>聞いてないわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've never heard of the people of the moon<fix123>having an enemy like you!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まさか月の兎(せんし)を送り込んでくるなんて<fix123>狂気の民が正気に堕ちたのかな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>To think they sent a moon rabbit(soldier) after me.<fix123>Perhaps the citizens of lunacy have descended into sanity.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さあね、私も命令(しごと)で来ただけだから<fix123>何が狂気で何が正気か良く判らない<fix123>ただこれだけは言える！<fix123>月の民は狂気のままだ！<fix123>まごう事なき狂気、絶対の狂気！<fix123>そうじゃなきゃ、こんな仕事<fix123>振るわけが無いもん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who knows. I'm just here to do my job,<fix123>so I wouldn't really know about lunacy or sanity.<fix123>But there's one thing I can say for sure!<fix123>The people of the moon are still in lunacy!<fix123>Unwavering lunacy, absolute lunacy!<fix123>If they didn't, there's no way<fix123>they'd pass this job onto me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほう……そこまで言うのなら<fix123>お前には秘密があるというのです？<fix123>私に気付いていない月の秘策が<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hoh... if you'll go that far,<fix123>then perhaps you have a secret of your own?<fix123>A secret plan of the moon that I've had yet to recognize.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さあね<fix123>でも気を付けた方が良いのは<fix123>貴方よ<fix123>私はサグメ様の命でここに居る<fix123>運命は逆転し始めているのよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who knows.<fix123>But the one who needs to watch out<fix123>is you.<fix123>I've come here on Lady Sagume's orders. <fix123>This fate has already begun to be reversed!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ピュアヒューリーズ　～　心の在処<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Pure Furies ~ Whereabouts of the Heart<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>面白い……月の民が私を厭わない<fix123>と言うのならかかって来なさい<fix123>月の兎に何が出来るのか<fix123>月の民は何を考えているのか<fix123>見せよ！<fix123>穢れた月の民の成れの果てを！<fix123>そして見よ！<fix123>純粋なる瑕穢(かあい)の向こう側を！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Interesting... so the people of the moon do not abhor me.<fix123>In that case, come at me.<fix123>What can a moon rabbit do?<fix123>What are the people of the moon thinking?<fix123>Now, show me!<fix123>The ruined remains of the impure people of the moon!<fix123>And behold!<fix123>Just what lies beyond this pristine impurity!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Junko DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>If playing on Legacy Mode (with misses)<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>万策尽きて暴挙に出たとでも<fix123>言うのだろうか<fix123>月の民のその様な姿を<fix123>見たくは無かったですね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Have they exhausted all other possibilities<fix123>and carried out this reckless attempt?<fix123>I never hoped to see the<fix123>moon's people come to this.<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>...Who are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>純狐<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Junko<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私の名は純狐<fix123>月の民に仇なす仙霊である<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My name is Junko.<fix123>A sagacious spirit bearing ill will to the citizens of the moon.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>月の民にこんな敵がいたなんて<fix123>聞いてないわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've never heard of the people of the moon<fix123>having an enemy like you!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まさか月の兎(せんし)を送り込んでくるなんて……<fix123>ん？<fix123>どういうこと？<fix123>何故お前はそこまで穢れている？<fix123>何故お前はそこまでミスを<fix123>受け入れているのです？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>To think they sent a moon rabbit(soldier) after me...<fix123>Hmm?<fix123>What is this?<fix123>Why have you become so impure?<fix123>And why have you accepted<fix123>all these mistakes?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、ミスを受け入れている<fix123>訳じゃ無いけど……<fix123>私はもう月の兎を止めたんだ<fix123>今はもう地上の兎なのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Um, it's not like I really<fix123>accepted them, but...<fix123>I've stopped being a moon rabbit.<fix123>I'm an earth rabbit now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>な、何だって？<fix123>そんな月の民に奇策が……<fix123>月の兎を地上に堕として<fix123>私にぶつけるだなんて<fix123>素直に感心したわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>W-what?<fix123>Such a scheme from the people of the moon...<fix123>Dropping a moon rabbit to Earth<fix123>in order to strike at me...<fix123>I'm genuinely impressed!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え、あ、そうなの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wha? Ah, really?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ピュアヒューリーズ　～　心の在処<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Pure Furies ~ Whereabouts of the Heart<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>でも奇策は奇策<fix123>月の民も愚かなミスをしている<fix123>この地上の兎は必要以上に<fix123>穢れを負っているわ<fix123>これでは私の力の前では無力！<fix123>絶対的無力！<fix123>だが、不倶戴天の敵、嫦娥(じょうが)よ<fix123>見ているか？<fix123>お前が出てくるまで<fix123>こいつをいたぶり続けよう！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But schemes are just schemes.<fix123>The people of the moon have made a foolish mistake, as well.<fix123>This earth rabbit bears impurity<fix123>beyond what is necessary.<fix123>Like this, she is powerless against my strength!<fix123>Absolutely powerless!<fix123>Now, my mortal enemy, Chang'e.<fix123>Are you watching?<fix123>I'm going to torment this girl<fix123>until you come out!<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Commencing immediate attack!<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>This is Seiran.<fix123>I've made contact with a belligerent earthling.<fix123>Now proceeding with purification.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm-m?<fix123>Those ears... Are you a rabbit?<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Hindrances are to be eliminated!<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>やだー<fix123>何で援軍が誰も来ないのよー<fix123>これだから今の兎は命令を守らない屑だ<fix123>って言われるのよー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Man,<fix123>why aren't any reinforcements coming?<fix123>That's why they say that rabbits nowadays<fix123>are disobedient garbageー[1]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そういえばこの辺で探査……<fix123>機械の蜘蛛っぽいの見ませんでした？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>By the way, did you see a probe...<fix123>um, a mechanical spider-looking thing around here?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地上探査機の事ですかね<fix123>それなら今は基地に帰っていますよー<fix123>ってそんな事私が言ったなんて<fix123>みんなには内緒だよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I guess you're talking about the Earth probes.<fix123>They're returning to the base for nowー<fix123>Wait, I'm not supposed to tell you this!<fix123>It's a secret to everyone!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はあはあ、じゃあ内緒ついでに<fix123>基地の場所も教えて頂けないかと……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see, I see. So, if you're already at it,<fix123>could you please tell me where that base is?<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>I'll have you know that this lake is under our control.<fix123>Please don't behave as you please around here, okay?<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>We are Eagle Ravi, the investigation corps of the Moon rabbits.<fix123>We will not receive any orders<fix123>from impure earthlings.<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>へーやるじゃん<fix123>強いわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, not bad at all.<fix123>You're pretty strong.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>月の兎……<fix123>永遠亭のお仲間ね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Moon rabbits...<fix123>Are you friends of the people at Eientei?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私達は現役の兎兵士であり<fix123>残念ながら彼女らは敵なのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We are military rabbits on duty.<fix123>Unfortunately, they are our enemies.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うーん……<fix123>するってぇと<fix123>私にとって貴方達は<fix123>敵なのね？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Mmm...<fix123>So, that means...<fix123>that you're my<fix123>enemies too?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>敵では無い<fix123>味方ですら無い<fix123>地上人は浄化の過程において<fix123>非常に良い働きをしてくれた<fix123>……らしいよ<fix123>うちら下っ端(うさぎ)にはよく判らないけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're not an enemy.<fix123>But not even an ally, either.<fix123>The earthlings have done a surprisingly good job<fix123>helping in the process of purification.<fix123>...well, apparently.<fix123>Although it's hard to understand for us underling rabbits.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>よく判らない……ね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hard to understand, you say...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さあどうする？<fix123>貴方が望むなら<fix123>この先に進んでも良いわよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So, what are you going to do?<fix123>If you want to,<fix123>you can go forward from here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は地上(ここ)が気に入ったので<fix123>残るけどね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I like the Earth(this place), though,<fix123>so I'll stay here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>アポロ経絡<fix123>Dreamful Path<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Apollo Meridian<fix123>Dreamful Path<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>秘密の連絡通路<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Secret Passageway<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 宇宙を飛ぶ不思議な巫女<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Mysterious Shrine Maiden Flying Through Space<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Doremy Sweet ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Doremy Sweet LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ああ、宙(そら)を飛んでいるわ<fix123>今まさに飛んでいるわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, I'm flying through space!<fix123>I'm really flying right now!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あらあら<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, my.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Doremy Sweet ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>夢の支配者<fix123>ドレミー・スイート<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ruler of Dreams<fix123>Doremy Sweet<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>随分と悪夢にうなされているみたいね<fix123>私が食べてあげよう……って<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It seems you're having quite the nightmare.<fix123>I'll just help myself to it... wait.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>生身じゃないの！？<fix123>肉体付き悪夢！？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Is that your physical body!?<fix123>You're having a nightmare in the flesh!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は念願の宙を飛んでいるんです<fix123>これが悪夢なら何が吉夢になるんです？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm flying through space like I've always wanted.<fix123>If this is a nightmare, what would even count as a good dream?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>生身で悪夢の欠片(スペースデブリ)に被弾すると<fix123>大変な事になるわ<fix123>今すぐ肉体だけでも<fix123>現(うつつ)に戻さないと<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If your body is hit by nightmare fragments(space debris),<fix123>it won't be pleasant.<fix123>I ought to send you back to reality right away.<fix123>Even just your body, at least.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>えーっと、よく判らないんですが<fix123>兎に月の都に行けるって言われたんで<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Uh, so, I don't really understand what's going on,<fix123>but a rabbit told me that this is the way to the Lunar Capital.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>月の都……<fix123>ははぁんそういう事ね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Lunar Capital...<fix123>Oh-ho, I see now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 永遠の春夢<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Eternal Spring Dream<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>良いでしょう<fix123>その狂夢、私が処理しましょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Very well.<fix123>I will dispose of this lunatic dream.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今は眠りなさい<fix123>貴方の槐安(かいあん)は今作られる<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now, sleep.<fix123>I will craft your Kaian[2] now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Doremy Sweet DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>貴方の悪夢は私が<fix123>美味しく頂きました<fix123>ですがこのまま月の都に<fix123>向かうというのなら<fix123>今までの何倍もの悪夢となって<fix123>貴方の精神を蝕むでしょう<fix123>月の狂夢（ルナティックドリーム）<fix123>と呼ばれる悪夢です<fix123>今ならまだ『目が覚めたら夢だった』<fix123>って事にできますが……<fix123>それでも進みますか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I have helped myself to<fix123>your delicious nightmares.<fix123>However, if you still intend<fix123>on going to the Lunar Capital,<fix123>your mind will surely be eroded by a nightmare<fix123>many times greater than before.<fix123>It is worthy of being called<fix123>a 'lunatic dream'.<fix123>Right now, you can still "wake up and<fix123>find out that it was only a dream"...<fix123>Will you still proceed, despite that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私はその問いかけを知っている<fix123>その答えを知っている<fix123>イイエを選んでも永遠に<fix123>質問を繰り返す奴でしょう？<fix123>答えはイエス！<fix123>このまま月の都に突入よ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I know this question.<fix123>And I know the answer to it.<fix123>You'll just keep saying 'but thou must!'<fix123>no matter how many times I say no, right?<fix123>So the answer is "yes"!<fix123>I am going to the Lunar Capital!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうですか……<fix123>それでは貴方に吉夢が訪れん事を<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see...<fix123>In that case, I wish you good dreams.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>アポロ１７号が降り立ってから<fix123>４０年以上成し得ていない有人探査<fix123>そのチャンスが目の前にあるというのに<fix123>ここで夢オチにさせられてたまるもんですか！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ever since Apollo 17 landed on the Moon, there hasn't been<fix123>a manned expedition for over 40 years.<fix123>With a chance like this right in front of me,<fix123>there's no way I'll let it end with "it was all just a dream"!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>寂びの来ない街<fix123>Lunatic Kingdom<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A City Free of Sabi[3]<fix123>Lunatic Kingdom<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>月の都<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Lunar Capital<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 凍り付いた永遠の都<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Frozen Capital of Eternity<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Sagume Kishin ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Sagume Kishin LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>月には高度な文明が存在した<fix123>ＮＡＳＡは知っていたが隠蔽している<fix123>なーんてそんな都市伝説あったわよね<fix123>これを見ると、あながち都市伝説と<fix123>言えなくも無いかもなぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So there's an advanced civilization on the moon;<fix123>NASA knows about it, but is concealing it.<fix123>I remember hearing an urban legend<fix123>like that once.<fix123>Seeing this, I guess I can't say it was<fix123>entirely an urban legend in the end, huh...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Sagume Kishin ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>舌禍をもたらす女神<fix123>稀神 サグメ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Goddess Who Invites Unfortunate Slips of the Tongue<fix123>Sagume Kishin<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もしかして月の民ですか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are you one of the moon's people?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>すみませーん<fix123>もしもーし<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Excuuuse me...<fix123>Helloooo...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もしかして耳が悪いのかな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Maybe her hearing's bad.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……そうでは無い<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...That's not it.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>わあビックリした<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Aah, that gave me a fright.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何故人間がここに居るのか<fix123>考えていただけよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I was just trying to think of a reason<fix123>why a human would be on the moon.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方は月の民ですよねぇ<fix123>色々お聞きしたいことが<fix123>あるのですが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So you are a lunar citizen...<fix123>I've actually got a lot of questions<fix123>for you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もしかして無視されている？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Could it be you're ignoring me?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 逆転するホイールオブフォーチュン<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Reversed Wheel of Fortune<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……そうでは無い<fix123>まだ確定してないから<fix123>何も話す訳にはいかないのよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...That's not it.<fix123>Nothing is settled yet,<fix123>so there's no way I'll say anything!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Sagume Kishin DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>いきなり襲いかかってくるなんて<fix123>随分ですね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Just attacking someone out of the blue like that<fix123>is really rude, you know!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>試すような形になってしまって<fix123>申し訳ない<fix123>もう私は決めたわ<fix123>全てお話ししましょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm sorry that I had to<fix123>test you like that.<fix123>I've decided now.<fix123>Let's talk about everything.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はあ、では幻想郷に<fix123>何をしようとしているのですか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Haah... So, what are you trying<fix123>to do in Gensokyo?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>見ての通り、月の都は現在<fix123>凍結されています<fix123>これはある敵の侵略からの<fix123>防御策なのですが……<fix123>生命の源を牛耳る敵の策に<fix123>手も足も出ない状況なのです<fix123>我々月の民は、生死を<fix123>拒絶しますので……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>As you can see, the Lunar Capital<fix123>is frozen right now.<fix123>This is a defense against a certain<fix123>enemy's invasion,<fix123>but as she controls the source of life,<fix123>we're unable to act against her plans.<fix123>Because we people of the moon<fix123>reject life and death, you see...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はあはあ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Mm-hmm, mm-hmm.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>このまま凍結させ続ける訳にも<fix123>いかないので<fix123>あくまでも保険としてですが<fix123>幻想郷遷都計画が持ち上がりました<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We can't just leave things<fix123>frozen like this either,<fix123>so just as insurance, I created<fix123>the Gensokyo Capital Relocation Plan.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>せんと？<fix123>って何でしたっけ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Relocation?<fix123>Er, what's that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お引っ越しの事よ<fix123>しないに越した事は無いんですが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Moving.<fix123>Although we're better off not doing it.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はあ、なる程<fix123>月の都も大変なんですね<fix123>まあ幻想郷は良いところですので<fix123>引っ越しちゃっても良いかも<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ahh, I see.<fix123>The Lunar Capital has it tough, too.<fix123>Well, Gensokyo's a nice place,<fix123>so maybe it'd be okay if you moved there.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうでしたか……<fix123>ちょっと見込み違いだったのかな<fix123>てっきり八意様の差し金かと<fix123>思ったのですが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Is that so...?<fix123>Perhaps I miscalculated a little.<fix123>I would have thought that you were acting<fix123>at Lady Yagokoro's suggestion.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いやまあその<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, well, uh...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>しかしもう遅い<fix123>私はサグメ。言葉で世界の行く末を<fix123>変える存在です<fix123>私が喋ってしまったから<fix123>運命はまた変わる<fix123>遷都は実現しないでしょう<fix123>月の都の命運は貴方に賭けるしかない<fix123>もう逃れられないわよ<fix123>ついに運命は逆さに動き始めた<fix123>いざ敵の本拠地、静かの海に向かえ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But it's too late for that.<fix123>I am Sagume, a being who can change<fix123>the world's course with my words.<fix123>Now that I've gone and talked about it,<fix123>fate will begin to change again.<fix123>The relocation will surely not come to be.<fix123>I have no choice but to bet the fate of the Lunar Capital on you.<fix123>There's no escape any more.<fix123>Fate has at last begun to reverse.<fix123>Now, on to the enemy's home base, the Sea of Tranquility!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>星条旗のピエロ<fix123>Clownish Moon<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Pierrot of the Star-Spangled Banner<fix123>Clownish Moon<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>静かの海<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sea of Tranquility<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 遥か38万キロのボヤージュ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Faraway Voyage of 380,000 Kilometers<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Clownpiece ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>きゃはははは！<fix123>面白い事が起こっているわー！<fix123>妖精達よ、もっとスピード<fix123>あげていこうよ！<fix123>イッツ、ルナティックターイム！<fix123>狂気の世界へようこそ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Kyahahahaha!<fix123>Something real interesting is going on~!<fix123>Hey, fairies!<fix123>Let's crank up the speed!<fix123>It's lunatic tiiiime!<fix123>Welcome to a world of madness!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Clownpiece EXITS WITHOUT FIGHTING<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>流されるがままにとんでもない<fix123>ところにいる気がするー！<fix123>それは置いておいて<fix123>さっきの話はつまり……<fix123>月の都を救えるのは<fix123>貴方しかいない！<fix123>って事で良いのかな<fix123>もしかして頼りに<fix123>されちゃってる？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I think just going with the flow<fix123>has left me in an unbelievable situation...!<fix123>Well, putting that aside,<fix123>to summarize that conversation just now...<fix123>"You're the only one who can<fix123>save the Lunar Capital!"<fix123>That's about right, isn't it?<fix123>I guess this means everyone's<fix123>relying on me, huh?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Clownpiece ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>松明を浴びた妖精達を<fix123>抜けてくるなんて<fix123>中々やるじゃ無い<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You got past all the fairies<fix123>bathed in my torchlight.<fix123>You must really be something!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は負けません！<fix123>月の都を救う運命なんです！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I won't lose!<fix123>Saving the Lunar Capital is my destiny!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほほう、言ってくれるねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oho, is that right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地獄の妖精<fix123>クラウンピース<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Fairy of Hell<fix123>Clownpiece<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あたいは地獄の妖精<fix123>クラウンピース<fix123>月の民は友人様の敵<fix123>友人様の敵はご主人様の敵<fix123>ご主人様の敵はあたいの敵だ！<fix123>容赦しないぞ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm a fairy from hell,<fix123>Clownpiece.<fix123>The moon's people are enemies of honorable friend.<fix123>Enemies of honorable friend are enemies of Master's.<fix123>And any enemy of Master's is an enemy of mine!<fix123>I'll show no mercy.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ、いえ<fix123>私は月の民では……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Uh, no,<fix123>I'm not from the...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もう遅ーい<fix123>月の都から出てくる奴がいたら<fix123>何をしても良いって言われてるもーん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Tooooo late.<fix123>I was told I could do whatever I want<fix123>to anyone who came from the Lunar Capital.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 星条旗のピエロ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Pierrot of the Star-Spangled Banner<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あたいの松明はねぇ<fix123>光を浴びた者が狂うんだ<fix123>狂うというのは<fix123>本来の力を出し切ると言う事<fix123>とてつもないパワーで<fix123>お前をやっつけちゃうぞー！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Y'see, the light from my torch<fix123>drives anyone it touches crazy.<fix123>And going crazy<fix123>means bringing out your true strength.<fix123>I'm gonna beat you down<fix123>with this tremendous power!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Clownpiece DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>はあはあはあ<fix123>な、なんで……？<fix123>生命の象徴である我々妖精族が<fix123>ここを支配している限り<fix123>月の民は手も足も出せないって<fix123>聞いたのに<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hah, hah, hah...<fix123>W-why...?<fix123>But I heard that as long as we fairies,<fix123>symbols of life, controlled this place,<fix123>the people of the moon wouldn't<fix123>be able to do a thing.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ですから私は月の民では……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I told you, I'm not from the...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あんた……いや、貴方様は<fix123>もしかして地上人！？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wait, lady... er, madam...?<fix123>Could you be an earthling!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうよ<fix123>地球人よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes!<fix123>I am a citizen of Earth.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何で地上人がこんな所に……？<fix123>話が違うわよー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What's an earthling doing here...?<fix123>Nobody told me this would happenー<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうねぇ<fix123>私としても不思議に思っているんです<fix123>ここは月面のように<fix123>見えるんですが……<fix123>空気とかどうなってるんでしょう<fix123>何で声が通るんでしょう？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yeah...<fix123>It's all a bit strange for me, too.<fix123>This looks like the surface<fix123>of the moon, but...<fix123>what about the atmosphere and all?<fix123>How are our voices being carried?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>んー<fix123>何の話か良く判らないや<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Mmm...<fix123>I don't really know what you're talking about.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>本当の月面はこういう所なのか<fix123>それともまだ夢の中なのか<fix123>それとも、妖精がいる事が<fix123>何かしら影響しているのか……<fix123>は、そうか<fix123>妖精は自然の権化だから……<fix123>妖精のお陰で空気が存在する？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Is this really what the moon is like,<fix123>or am I still in a dream?<fix123>Or, maybe the fairies being here<fix123>has some kind of effect...?<fix123>Ah, that's right.<fix123>Fairies are incarnations of nature, so...<fix123>...the atmosphere exists because of the fairies?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ところで何をしに来たんだっけ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So what were you here for, again?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私はさっきのサグメって方に言われて<fix123>月の都を救いに来ました！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm here to save the Lunar Capital<fix123>on orders from that ‘Sagume’ person!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>月の民は敵って言ってたんだけど<fix123>地上人は敵なのかなぁ<fix123>よくわかんなくなっちゃったけど<fix123>もう疲れちゃった<fix123>眠いよう<fix123>もう帰っていい？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I was told that the people of the moon are my enemy,<fix123>but I dunno about earthlings...<fix123>I don't really know what's going on anymore,<fix123>but I've had enough of all this.<fix123>I'm tired.<fix123>Can I leave yet?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>妖精が空気を生んでいるとすると<fix123>私が生きていられるのは妖精のお陰……<fix123>寝たら駄目だ！<fix123>寝たら（私が）死ぬぞ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(If the fairies are creating the atmosphere,)<fix123>(then I'm alive because of the fairies...)<fix123>You can't sleep!<fix123>If you sleep, someone's gonna die! (Me.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もう友人様の所に連れていって<fix123>あげるから許してよー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'll take you to where our honorable friend is,<fix123>so just spare me alreadyー<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>倶に天を戴かずとも<fix123>Pure Furies<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Though Unable to Dwell Together Under Heaven[4]<fix123>Pure Furies<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>静かの海（裏）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sea of Tranquility (Underside)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 故郷の星が映る海<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Sea Where One's Home Planet Reflects<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>If playing on Pointdevice Mode (or on Legacy with no deaths)<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Junko ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>いかに策を練ろうとも<fix123>相手はそれを乗り越えて来る<fix123>口惜しや<fix123>もう少しで宿敵に手が届くというのに<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No matter how many countermeasures<fix123>I work out, you overcome them.<fix123>'Tis a shame.<fix123>My nemesis was nearly within reach.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方が月の都を侵略している奴ねー！<fix123>いざ尋常に勝負せーい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So you're the one invading the Lunar Capital!<fix123>Come, let us do battle fair and square!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……貴方には一片の瑕疵も無い<fix123>私の負けね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...You have not a single blemish.<fix123>I admit defeat.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お、おにょい？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hwha-wha-whaaa?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まさか月面に地上人を送り込むなんて<fix123>頭の片隅にも無かったわ<fix123>私の読みが甘かった<fix123>既に勝負は決したのです……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>For not one moment did I ever expect<fix123>that they would send an earthling to the moon.<fix123>I underestimated them.<fix123>It seems the battle has already been decided...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なっ、にっ、のっ……<fix123>もうっ！　何なのよそれ！<fix123>そもそも貴方は何者なのよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wuh... buh... huh...<fix123>Hey! What's that supposed to mean!<fix123>Who even are you, anyway!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>純狐<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Junko<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私の名は純狐<fix123>月の民に仇なす仙霊である<fix123>さあ、掃討戦を始めましょう？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My name is Junko.<fix123>A sagacious spirit bearing ill will to the citizens of the moon. <fix123>Now, shall we begin our clean-up battle?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何かしら、このやり場の無い憤り<fix123>既に私が勝ちって<fix123>どういう事なの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Just what is this pent-up frustration I'm feeling?<fix123>What do you mean,<fix123>I've already won?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ここに無傷の人間がやってきた時点で<fix123>今 (・) 回 (・) の作戦は失敗したのです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>For an uninjured human to arrive at this point,<fix123>my current plan must already have failed.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何か納得いかないなぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Somehow, I can't agree with that...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間を甘く見てました<fix123>アポロ１１号の船員だって<fix123>傷だらけだったと言うのに<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I have underestimated humans.<fix123>After all, even the crew of Apollo 11<fix123>was covered with wounds.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？　その話詳しく<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh? Details, please.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それはともかく貴方は私に勝つでしょう<fix123>誰かの手によってそういう<fix123>シナリオが用意されているはずです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Putting that aside, you will triumph over me.<fix123>That is the scenario that has<fix123>been constructed by another's hand.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ピュアヒューリーズ　～　心の在処<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Pure Furies ~ Whereabouts of the Heart<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ですが、その勝利には悪夢が<fix123>付きまとうでしょう<fix123>彼女とは倶 (とも) に天を戴かずとも<fix123>憎しみだけが純化する<fix123>その憎しみを彼女に当てられないのが<fix123>悔しくて仕方が無い！<fix123>かわりにお前にぶつけてやろう<fix123>熾烈な運命の結果であるお前の勝利の為に！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>However, that victory will surely<fix123>be accompanied by a nightmare.<fix123>Even if we are unable to dwell together under Heaven,<fix123>my hatred alone will be refined. <fix123>That this hatred will never touch her<fix123>leaves nothing for me but vexation!<fix123>In exchange, I'll vent myself against you, such that your<fix123>victory, the outcome of this cruel fate, may be realized!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>If playing on Legacy Mode (with deaths)<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Junko ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>いかに策を練ろうとも<fix123>相手はそれを乗り越えて来る<fix123>しかし、その愚策は失敗に<fix123>終わったようね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No matter how many countermeasures<fix123>I work out, you overcome them.<fix123>However, it seems your foolish<fix123>scheme has ended in failure.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方が月の都を侵略している奴ねー！<fix123>いざ尋常に勝負せーい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So you're the one invading the Lunar Capital!<fix123>Come, let us do battle!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう、私と勝負になると<fix123>思っているとは片腹痛い<fix123>月の民を夢の中に避難させ<fix123>地上人を送り込む<fix123>大胆不敵な策だったけど<fix123>詰めが甘かった様ね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, to think that you could do battle<fix123>with me was absurd.<fix123>The people of the moon escape into a dream,<fix123>and send an earthling to deal with me.<fix123>I thought it to be a daring plan,<fix123>but I suppose I overestimated them.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どいうこと？ [sic]<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What's that supposed to mean?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そんなに死穢の匂いを身に<fix123>纏った人間では私を倒せない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A human so completely surrounded by the<fix123>stench of death can never hope to defeat me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>純狐<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Junko<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私の名は純狐<fix123>私の純化の力で無条件に貴方を<fix123>殺す事が出来てしまう<fix123>貴方はここまで何回ミスを冒して<fix123>来たのです？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My name is Junko.<fix123>With my power of purification,<fix123>I am able to kill you unconditionally.<fix123>Just how many mistakes have you<fix123>suffered on the way here?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ミスってのは被弾の事ですか？<fix123>それならえーっと……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>By 'mistakes', you mean getting shot?<fix123>Well, about, uh...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>数え切れないのですね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>An uncountable number, I'm sure.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そりゃそうよ、た (・) ま (・) に当たったって[5]<fix123>良いじゃない。人間だもの[6]<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, yeah. A couple shots here and there are<fix123>fine, aren't they? I'm only human, after all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ピュアヒューリーズ　～　心の在処<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Pure Furies ~ Whereabouts of the Heart<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>月の民も随分と愚かなミスをした<fix123>この地上人はお前らが考えるよりも<fix123>遥かに弱かった様ですね<fix123>ただ月の民との交戦は硬直状態が続いて<fix123>飽き飽きしていたところです<fix123>不倶戴天の敵、嫦娥 (じょうが) よ。見てるか！？<fix123>月の民が弄した愚策を！　穢れた人間を！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The moon's people, too, have committed a foolish mistake. <fix123>It seems this earthling is far<fix123>more weak than you all thought.<fix123>My stagnated engagement with the people of the moon<fix123>was just beginning to exhaust my interest. <fix123>My mortal enemy, Chang'e. Are you watching!?<fix123>Gaze upon the lunar citizens' foolish plan, and upon this impure human!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Junko DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
Eientei.<fix123>
An estate located in the Bamboo Forest of the Lost.<fix123>
Also known as the "Dark Hospital," here live former inhabitants of the Lunar Capital.<fix123>
"I was not going to deceive you."<fix123>
"Then, why did I have to save the Lunar Capital?"<fix123>
"Because if you rescue the Lunar Capital, you rescue Gensokyo, right?"<fix123>
"They should've settled the problem themselves, honestly!"<fix123>
"This time we faced someone whom the Lunarians couldn't deal with themselves,<fix123>and youkai, being completely impure, cannot even see."<fix123>
"In other words, only humans could solve it."<fix123>
"...But you couldn't say so from the start?"<fix123>
"I'm sorry, I just thought that if I said it's all<fix123>for the sake of the Lunar Capital, you'd refuse."<fix123>
"Urgh..."<fix123>
"Although, even if you refused, I'm sure we could have met in the middle<fix123>one way or another. You're way too kindhearted not to."<fix123>
Reimu, being unsatisfied with this outcome, left Eientei.<fix123>
On the way home, she was stopped by an earth rabbit.<fix123>
"...Listen, listen, what were the guys who<fix123>attacked the Lunar Capital like?"<fix123>
"You're too familiar."<fix123>
"What were they?"<fix123>
"...Hm, she was a brazen person named Junko."<fix123>
"...I see. Is she a Lunarian, or is she a youkai?"<fix123>
"What are you asking this for?"<fix123>
"Just for reference. See, I want to know what the weak points of the Lunarians are."<fix123>
"Is that so? Don't know what you're planning, but..."<fix123>
"...She's neither Lunarian nor a youkai.<fix123>
Rather, she's a more pure soul. In short, a divine spirit."<fix123>
"I knew it. So she was something like that."<fix123>
" ‘I knew it’? What do you mean?"<fix123>
"That means that we, the Inaba family, also have a chance."<fix123>
"You're going to go against the Lunarians? You'd better not."<fix123>
"Isn't it obvious that they'll just make you dance in their palm?"<fix123>
"Who said we're going against them?<fix123>
We just want to do business. With the Lunar Capital guys."<fix123>
Reimu didn't understand what the white rabbit was scheming,<fix123>but somewhere inside she smiled.<fix123>
Even if rabbits were going to get beaten by the Lunarians,<fix123>
or they'd take over by lucrative words,<fix123>
in any case, this whole affair seemed interesting to her.<fix123>
However, she had decided firmly<fix123>
that she didn't want any more business with the Lunarians.<fix123>
<c$Ending No.01 — Savior of the Lunar Capital$><fix123>
<c$All clear! Congratulations!$><fix123><c$Pointdevice Mode or No Miss Clear Ending$><fix123>
The Hakurei Shrine.<fix123>
A shrine located on the outskirts of the east.<fix123>
"Listen, moon rabbits are still appearing on the mountain..."<fix123>
"I know that.<fix123>
but something unexpected has happened."<fix123>
"Unexpected?"<fix123>
"The truth is that we weren't meant to defend against the Lunar Capital.<fix123>
A far more fearsome enemy appeared..."<fix123>
"She attacked the Lunar Capital.<fix123>
And I was involved to actually save it.<fix123>
Apparently, if you're not human, you can't get close to her or something."<fix123>
"I see, I see. And besides,<fix123>
she gave us this ‘Ultramarine Orb Elixir’, right?<fix123>
Now I also understand why."<fix123>
"So wait, does that mean that moon rabbits will withdraw soon?"<fix123>
"Well, not really.<fix123>
I didn't use that ‘Ultramarine Orb Elixir’, and... it seems that I lost."<fix123>
"Eh?<fix123>
You didn't use it?"<fix123>
"Well, you see, who knows what in the world it's made of."<fix123>
The moon rabbits haven't ceased their investigation of Gensokyo.<fix123>
Apparently, the youkai were not able to see or feel them.<fix123>
But it was relaxed enough to wonder whether or not the attack was serious.<fix123>
However, a few days later<fix123>
the rabbits finally came to the shrine.<fix123>
"Sheesh, so you've made it all the way to the shrine already?"<fix123>
"Ho-ho, so this is the Earth shrine.<fix123>
You're keeping it pretty tidy."<fix123>
"What's with the suspicious praise?"<fix123>
"This shrine is famous among us moon rabbits."<fix123>
"Ho-ho, I wonder why?"<fix123>
"According to the rabbits who've been here in the past,<fix123>
this supposedly sacred shrine coexists with youkai. Such a rare place."<fix123>
"I've always wanted to visit it at least once. I wanna see all sorts of youkai."<fix123>
"Why would a citizen of the Moon say such a thing...?<fix123>
Don't you guys hate all the impurities on the surface though?"<fix123>
"Youkai are nothing but impurities."<fix123>
"Impurity is only really a problem for the Lunarian nobility.<fix123>
Us underlings don't really care either way."<fix123>
Afterward, youkai came to the shrine like usual,<fix123>but somehow they can see the moon rabbits with their own eyes.<fix123>
Apparently this was an effect of the probe from the Lunar Capital,<fix123>to prevent impure beings from approaching.<fix123>
In other words, they didn't want to provoke Gensokyo's youkai.<fix123>
Perhaps you could think of the entire invasion plan drafted by Sagume<fix123>as showing that the Lunarians didn't really want to have to fight the youkai.<fix123>
<c$Ending No.02 — Coexistence with the Moon Rabbits$><fix123>
<c$You have completed the game! Congratulations!$><fix123>
<c$Self Clear Ending$><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>I heard about you from Seiran.<fix123>She said she'd engaged an interesting person...<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, whatever.<fix123>I should finish my job and take a breather.<fix123>Earthlings, who are allowed to get hit,<fix123>cannot possibly understand our hard workー<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Woah, that was intense all of a sudden.<fix123>I'm not lookin' forward to what's up next.<fix123><fix123>
