jp_dialogue: <fix123>だって地上はもうすぐ<fix123>浄化される筈だし……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, the Earth is going<fix123>to be purified soon...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は月の都の侵略を阻止しよう<fix123>と思うだけだが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm thinkin' I'll just go stop the<fix123>Lunar Capital's aggression.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それだけ強いのなら<fix123>行ってみるといいわ<fix123>狂った極楽浄土<fix123>　月　の　都　(ルナティックキングダム)へ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If you're that strong,<fix123>you might as well go there.<fix123>To the crazed Pure Land,<fix123>the Lunar Capital(Lunatic Kingdom).<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>アポロ経絡<fix123>Dreamful Path<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Apollo Meridian<fix123>Dreamful Path<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>秘密の連絡通路<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Secret Passageway<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 宇宙を飛ぶ不思議な巫女<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Mysterious Shrine Maiden Flying Through Space<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Doremy Sweet ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Doremy Sweet LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>さっきまで湖に居た筈だが……<fix123>何だここは<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I was at the lake just a while ago...<fix123>What is this place?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あらあら<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, my.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Doremy Sweet ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>夢の支配者<fix123>ドレミー・スイート<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ruler of Dreams<fix123>Doremy Sweet<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>幻想郷の魔法使いね<fix123>今日はどんな夢を……<fix123>って生身！？<fix123>もしかして生身！？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The magician from Gensokyo, hm?<fix123>What dream will you be having toda...<fix123>Wait, your physical body!?<fix123>Is that your physical body!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まだ生身だが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I think it still is.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>生身でこんな夢の世界へ<fix123>飛び込んでくるなんて<fix123>何かの罠に嵌められたのかな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>For your physical body to break into<fix123>the Dream World like this...<fix123>...have you been caught in some kind of trap?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>罠だって？<fix123>やっぱり罠だったのか<fix123>すぐ目の前にあんな大きな月が<fix123>見えているというのに<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Trap?<fix123>Aw, so that really was a trap.<fix123>Even though there's a giant moon<fix123>right in front of me, too!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>月が見えている？<fix123>ははぁんそういう事ね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are you seeing the Moon?<fix123>Oh-ho, I see now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 永遠の春夢<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Eternal Spring Dream<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>良いでしょう<fix123>その狂夢、私が処理しましょう<fix123>今は眠りなさい<fix123>貴方の槐安(かいあん)は今作られる<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Very well.<fix123>I will dispose of this lunatic dream.<fix123>Now, sleep.<fix123>I will craft your Kaian[1] now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Doremy Sweet DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あらあら、眠らないのです？<fix123>それではいつまで経っても<fix123>夢の中ですよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My, my, aren't you going to sleep?<fix123>In that case, you'll stay in a dream<fix123>no matter how much time passes.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>んー、夢の中なのか<fix123>ここは<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm-m, so I'm inside of a dream right now?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうですよ<fix123>貴方は今、夢の中に生身で居るのです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's right.<fix123>Your physical body is inside of a dream.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>月の都に行くって話は<fix123>一体どうなっちまったんだ……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What the heck happened to the whole<fix123>'going to the Lunar Capital' thing...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>確かに貴方の夢は月の都に<fix123>向かってるようです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It seems that your dream is indeed<fix123>headed to the Lunar Capital.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そのままなら<fix123>もうすぐ到着するでしょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>And, you are<fix123>soon about to arrive.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうか<fix123>それなら良いんだ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh.<fix123>That's alright then.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ですがその悪夢を覚まさないというのは<fix123>お薦めできませんが……<fix123>夢は現実以上に精神を侵します<fix123>不自然に用意された夢は危険です<fix123>前みたいに学校の怪談の夢とか見ていた方が<fix123>精神的には良いんですけどねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>However, I cannot recommend that you<fix123>remain within that nightmare.<fix123>Dreams invade your mind more than reality itself.<fix123>Dreams used unnaturally are extremely dangerous.<fix123>It would be better for your mind if you kept<fix123>seeing dreams about school legends, as you did before.[2]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なっ<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>夢は具現化するんですよ<fix123>貴方も体感したんじゃ無いですか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The dreams are becoming real.<fix123>You must have sensed it, surely?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>都市伝説(オカルトボール)で、ね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>With the urban legends(Occult Balls), that is.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>寂びの来ない街<fix123>Lunatic Kingdom<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A City Free of Sabi[3]<fix123>Lunatic Kingdom<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>月の都<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Lunar Capital<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 凍り付いた永遠の都<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Frozen Capital of Eternity<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Sagume Kishin ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Sagume Kishin LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>月の都……なのか？<fix123>何だか生きている物の姿が<fix123>殆ど無い<fix123>さっき出会った奴くらいだな<fix123>もしかしたらまだ<fix123>夢の中なのかも知れんが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Is this... the Lunar Capital?<fix123>Weird. There's barely anythin'<fix123>alive around here.<fix123>Besides the lady from a minute ago.<fix123>Maybe I'm still in a<fix123>dream or something...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Sagume Kishin ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>舌禍をもたらす女神<fix123>稀神 サグメ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Goddess Who Invites Unfortunate Slips of the Tongue<fix123>Sagume Kishin<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>噂をすれば<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Speak of the devil.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんだ、愛想の無い奴だな<fix123>地上から来た人間なんだ<fix123>もっと驚いても良いんだぜ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Not very friendly, are ya?<fix123>I'm a human who came here from Earth!<fix123>Can't ya be a little more surprised?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>幻想郷に何をしようと<fix123>しているんだ？<fix123>何で月の都にお前くらいしか<fix123>見当たらないんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What exactly are ya tryin'<fix123>to do in Gensokyo?<fix123>Why isn't there anyone here<fix123>in the Capital except you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……まだ喋るには早い<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...it's still too early to speak.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 逆転するホイールオブフォーチュン<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Reversed Wheel of Fortune<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうか、喋らないなら<fix123>こっちから行くぜ<fix123>色々知ってそうな<fix123>顔をしてるもんな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A'ight. If you won't talk,<fix123>I'll be the first to move.<fix123>That look on your face<fix123>seems like you know what's up.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Sagume Kishin DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>貴方が送り込まれた理由が<fix123>判ったわ<fix123>きっと八意様の差し金ね<fix123>そんなに強いんですもの<fix123>貴方ならきっと……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I now understand why<fix123>you were sent here.<fix123>I'm sure it was on Lady Yagokoro's suggestion.<fix123>You're terribly strong.<fix123>Perhaps with you...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんだ、喋れるんじゃ無いか<fix123>幻想郷に攻め込んできたのは<fix123>お前の仕業なのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So you can talk after all, huh?<fix123>Are you the one who's orderin'<fix123>the attack on Gensokyo?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうですね<fix123>幻想郷遷都計画に関しては<fix123>あくまでも保険としてですが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, I am.<fix123>The Gensokyo Capital Relocation Plan<fix123>was meant only as insurance, though.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>遷都、だと？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wait, relocation?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>しないに越した事は<fix123>無いんですけどねぇ<fix123>月の都をこのまま凍結させ<fix123>続けるわけにも行かないし<fix123>ま、仕方が無いのよね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We're better off not<fix123>doing it, mind you.<fix123>Though it's not as if we can keep the<fix123>Lunar Capital frozen like this forever...<fix123>Well, it can't really be helped.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>話がまるで読めないな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I really don't get what yer talkin' about.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>本当に侵略を受けているのは<fix123>月の都なの<fix123>それも我々月の民には<fix123>手が出せない方法で<fix123>全滅を回避する為に<fix123>幻想郷への移住を検討していいた [sic]<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Lunar Capital is what's<fix123>really under attack.<fix123>Via a method that renders us People of<fix123>the Moon unable to act, to boot.<fix123>I was considering migrating to Gensokyo<fix123>to prevent us from being wiped out.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>月の都が侵略されているだと？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Lunar Capital's under attack?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええそうです<fix123>もっとも、月の民達はそんなこと<fix123>知らないのですが<fix123>私は言葉で世界の行く末を<fix123>変える存在です<fix123>あ(・)の(・)都市伝説が広まったとき<fix123>遷都は現実化し、危機は回避できる<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, that is the case.<fix123>The People of the Moon aren't aware<fix123>of any of this, though.<fix123>I am a being who can change the<fix123>world's course with my words.<fix123>When that rumor began to spread, the Lunar Capital<fix123>would materialize there, and the danger would be avoided.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>判ったような判らんような<fix123>だが、幻想郷を巻き込まないでくれ<fix123>迷惑だ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I kinda get it, but kinda don't.<fix123>But just keep Gensokyo outta this, okay?<fix123>'S a pain.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もう心配は要らないわ<fix123>私が喋ってしまったから<fix123>運命はまた変わる<fix123>遷都は実現しないでしょう<fix123>だから私は貴方に賭けるわ<fix123>もう逃れられないわよ<fix123>ついに運命は逆さに動き始めた<fix123>いざ敵の本拠地、静かの海に向かえ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You need not concern yourself.<fix123>Now that I've gone and talked about it,<fix123>fate will begin to change again.<fix123>The relocation will surely not come to be.<fix123>Thus, I'll place my bet on you.<fix123>There's no escape any more.<fix123>Fate has at last begun to reverse.<fix123>Now, on to the enemy's home base, the Sea of Tranquility!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>星条旗のピエロ<fix123>Clownish Moon<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Pierrot of the Star-Spangled Banner<fix123>Clownish Moon<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>静かの海<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sea of Tranquility<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 遥か38万キロのボヤージュ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Faraway Voyage of 380 000 Kilometers<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Clownpiece ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>きゃはははは！<fix123>面白い事が起こっているわー！<fix123>妖精達よ、もっとスピード<fix123>あげていこうよ！<fix123>イッツ、ルナティックターイム！<fix123>狂気の世界へようこそ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Kyahahahaha!<fix123>Something real interesting is going on~!<fix123>Hey, fairies!<fix123>Let's crank up the speed!<fix123>It's lunatic tiiiime!<fix123>Welcome to a world of madness!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Clownpiece EXITS WITHOUT FIGHTING<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>ちょっと情報を整理しよう<fix123>月の都は凍結状態だったが<fix123>それはさっきの奴か誰かが<fix123>防御のためにやったとして<fix123>それとは別に月の都を侵略している<fix123>奴がいるって言ってたな<fix123>それも、月の民には手が出せない<fix123>方法で侵略されている、って……<fix123>つまり私を使って月の都を<fix123>救おう、って事なのか？<fix123>総合すると、どうやら最初から永琳 (あいつ) に<fix123>担がれていたみたいだな……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Let's review what we have so far.<fix123>The Lunar Capital's been put in stasis.<fix123>Either the lady from before or someone else<fix123>did that for defense purposes...<fix123>Also, she said that there's someone else<fix123>invading the Lunar Capital too.<fix123>An' they're using "a method that prevents<fix123>the moon's people from acting"...<fix123>So they're using me to save<fix123>the Lunar Capital, I guess?<fix123>In summary, it looks like Eirin's (she's)  been<fix123>takin' me for a ride since the start...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Clownpiece ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>松明を浴びた妖精達を<fix123>抜けてくるなんて<fix123>中々やるじゃ無い<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You got past all the fairies<fix123>bathed in my torchlight.<fix123>You must really be something.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>誰だお前<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who're you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地獄の妖精<fix123>クラウンピース<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Fairy of Hell<fix123>Clownpiece<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あたいは地獄の妖精<fix123>クラウンピース！<fix123>この大地を友人様に戴いてから<fix123>貴方が初めての来客だわー！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm a fairy from hell,<fix123>Clownpiece!<fix123>You're the first visitor we've had<fix123>since honorable friend gave us this land!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>妖精か……月の民はこんな奴に<fix123>手を焼いているとはな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A fairy...? Hah, can't believe those moon people<fix123>would have their hands full with these guys.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おや、あたいを怖がらない？<fix123>あ、そうだ<fix123>友人様に言いつかってるんだった<fix123>月の都から出てくる奴があったら<fix123>何をしても良いって<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm, you're not afraid of me?<fix123>Oh, right.<fix123>Honorable friend told me something.<fix123>"If anyone comes from the Lunar<fix123>Capital, do anything you want to them!"<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>月の民が言う敵とは<fix123>お前だと言う事は判った<fix123>さくっと倒して報告するか<fix123>月の都を救えば<fix123>幻想郷も救われる筈だ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I get that you're the "enemy"<fix123>the moon people were talkin' about.<fix123>Better beat you quickly and report this, huh?<fix123>Saving the Lunar Capital oughta<fix123>save Gensokyo too, after all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 星条旗のピエロ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Pierrot of the Star-Spangled Banner<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あれー<fix123>あたいが怖くないのかな？<fix123>いや、月の民なら<fix123>あたいの存在が怖いはずだ<fix123>もうどうなっても良いよね<fix123>穢れて地獄に堕ちてしまえ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmmm~.<fix123>Am I really not that scary?<fix123>Nah, no way. The moon's people<fix123>should all be scared of my presence.<fix123>Well, it's fine by me either way.<fix123>Be sullied with impurity and fall to hell!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Clownpiece DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>はあはあはあ<fix123>な、なんで……？<fix123>生命の象徴である我々妖精族が<fix123>ここを支配している限り<fix123>月の民は手も足も出せないって<fix123>聞いたのに<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hah, hah, hah...<fix123>W-why...?<fix123>But I heard that as long as we fairies,<fix123>symbols of life, controlled this place,<fix123>the people of the moon wouldn't<fix123>be able to do a thing!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それはだなぁ<fix123>私が月の民じゃ無いからだろうな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, y'see.<fix123>That's probably because I'm not from the moon.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あんた……いや、貴方様は<fix123>もしかして地上人！？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wait, lady...<fix123>uh, I mean, madam? You're an earthling!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうだ<fix123>地面に這い蹲って生きているぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yup.<fix123>Been squatting on the earth as long as I lived.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何で地上人がこんな所に……？<fix123>話が違うわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What's an earthling doing here...?<fix123>Nobody told me this would happen.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ところで、何でお前ら妖精の所為で<fix123>月の民が手出せないんだか判らん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>By the way, I don't get why the moon's people<fix123>can't do anythin' against of you fairies.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>月の民は生死を拒絶するからね<fix123>生まれる事、死ぬ事<fix123>それは穢れるという事<fix123>我々は生命エネルギーの塊だから<fix123>月の民は触れたくないのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's because the moon's people reject life and death.<fix123>Being born and dying<fix123>both mean becoming impure.<fix123>As lumps of life energy, the moon's people<fix123>wouldn't even think of touching us.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間だって死ぬぞ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But don't all humans die?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>勿論、普段は完全に拒絶するような<fix123>ことは無いんだけれど<fix123>今は純 (・) 化 (・) して貰ってるからね<fix123>友人様の力で<fix123>ちょっと触れただけで穢れて<fix123>嫌なんじゃない？　月の民的に<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Of course, they usually don't<fix123>reject it completely,<fix123>but now our life energy has been refined<fix123>thanks to the power of our honorable friend.<fix123>Wouldn't it be awful to get totally impure just<fix123>by touching us? For the moon's people, I mean.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……幾つか判らんが<fix123>お前が月の都を侵略している<fix123>真犯人って訳では無さそうだ<fix123>裏でお前を利用している奴が<fix123>いるって事は明白だな<fix123>……私みたいにな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...I still don't totally get it,<fix123>but you at least don't seem like the true<fix123>culprits behind the Lunar Capital invasion.<fix123>It's clear that someone's<fix123>using you behind the scenes.<fix123>...much like m'self, really.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>倶に天を戴かずとも<fix123>Pure Furies<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Though Unable to Dwell Together Under Heaven[4]<fix123>Pure Furies<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>静かの海（裏）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sea of Tranquility (Underside)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 故郷の星が映る海<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Sea Where One's Home Planet Reflects<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>If playing on Pointdevice Mode (or on Legacy with no misses)<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Junko enters<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>いかに策を練ろうとも<fix123>相手はそれを乗り越えて来る<fix123>口惜しや <fix123>もう少しで宿敵に手が届くというのに<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No matter how many countermeasures<fix123>I work out, you overcome them.<fix123>'Tis a shame.<fix123>My nemesis was nearly within reach.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何だお前……<fix123>魔力では無い<fix123>感じた事の無い力を持っている<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What are you...?<fix123>That's some power you've got. It's not magic;<fix123>it's some force I've never sensed before.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まさか月面に地上人を送り込むなんて<fix123>頭の片隅にも無かったわ<fix123>それに貴方は一度たりとも<fix123>ミスせずにここまで来たようね<fix123>ひとまず私の負けを認めよう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>For not one moment did I ever expect<fix123>that they would send an earthling to the moon.<fix123>And you've even reached here without even a single mistake.<fix123>For now, I shall admit defeat.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どういう事？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What do you mean?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>僅かな瑕疵でも厭う月の民が<fix123>こんな綱渡りの手段を使うなんてね<fix123>私の読みが甘かった<fix123>既に勝負は決したのです……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm surprised that the people of the moon, hating even the<fix123>slightest impurity, would use such a haphazard method.<fix123>I underestimated them.<fix123>It seems the battle has already been decided...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何か良く判らんが私が勝った<fix123>って事で良いんだな<fix123>本当に良いんだな<fix123>って何かムカつくな<fix123>お前は何なんだよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Don't really get what you mean,<fix123>but it's great that I've won!<fix123>Yep. Real great.<fix123>--okay, you're pissin' me off somehow!<fix123>What exactly are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>純狐<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Junko<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私の名は純狐<fix123>月の民に仇なす仙霊である<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My name is Junko.<fix123>A sagacious spirit bearing ill will to the citizens of the moon.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>理由は判らんが私がここに来た時点で<fix123>お前の負けというルールだったんだな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Not sure why, but I guess the rule<fix123>was that you lose once I get here, huh?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうですね<fix123>だけど……<fix123>ここまでやってきた<fix123>貴方を称えて、勝負してやろう<fix123>それが礼儀ってものでしょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's true.<fix123>However...<fix123>Since you've managed to come here,<fix123>I humbly challenge you to a duel.<fix123>It is only polite, is it not?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あーくそう！<fix123>私は最初から永琳の駒の一つでしか<fix123>無かったって言うのか、こんちくしょう！<fix123>こんなやり場の無い怒り、全て<fix123>お前にぶつけてやる！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Augh, dammit!<fix123>You sayin' I was nothin' but Eirin's pawn<fix123>since the start!? Fer' god's sakes!<fix123>I've got nowhere to vent this anger.<fix123>I'll just hafta take it all out on you!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ピュアヒューリーズ　～　心の在処<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Pure Furies ~ Whereabouts of the Heart<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう、私も怒りだけが原動力なのです<fix123>彼女とは倶 (とも) に天を戴かずとも<fix123>憎しみだけが純化する<fix123>見せよ！<fix123>命を賭した地上人の可能性を！<fix123>そして見よ！<fix123>生死を拒絶した純粋なる霊力を！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, anger is the only force driving me as well.<fix123>Even if we are unable to dwell together under Heaven,<fix123>my hatred alone will be refined.<fix123>Now, show me!<fix123>Just what an earthling risking her life is capable of!<fix123>And behold!<fix123>This pristine spiritual force that rejects life and death!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>If playing on Legacy Mode (with misses)<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Junko ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>いかに策を練ろうとも<fix123>相手はそれを乗り越えて来る<fix123>しかし、その愚策は失敗に<fix123>終わったようね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No matter how many countermeasures<fix123>I work out, you overcome them.<fix123>However, it seems your foolish<fix123>scheme has ended in failure.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何だお前……<fix123>魔力では無い<fix123>感じた事の無い力を持っている<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What are you...?<fix123>That's some power you've got. It's not magic;<fix123>it's some force I've never sensed before.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いかにも<fix123>貴方達人間が持ち得ない純粋な力なり<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Indeed.<fix123>It is a pristine force, one that the likes of you humans would never have.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほほう、面白そうだ<fix123>その力、見せてもらおう！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Aha, sounds real interesting.<fix123>I'll have you show me that power!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>月の民を夢の中に避難させ<fix123>地上人を送り込む<fix123>大胆不敵な策だったけど<fix123>詰めが甘かった様ね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The people of the moon escape into a dream,<fix123>and send an earthling to deal with me.<fix123>I thought it to be a daring plan,<fix123>but I suppose I overestimated them.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんだと？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What'd you say?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そんなに死穢の匂いを身に<fix123>纏った人間では私を倒せない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A human so completely surrounded by the stench of death<fix123>can never hope to defeat me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>純狐<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Junko<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私の名は純狐<fix123>私の純化の力で無条件に貴方を<fix123>殺す事が出来てしまう<fix123>貴方はここまで何回ミスを冒して<fix123>来たのです？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My name is Junko.<fix123>With my power of purification,<fix123>I am able to kill you unconditionally.<fix123>Just how many mistakes have you made<fix123>before reaching here?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ミスなどしていないぜ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I didn't make no mistakes!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>下らぬ嘘の言葉も、一つのミスとして<fix123>数えましょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Allow me to count that petty lie<fix123>as one mistake as well.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>判った、嘘だ<fix123>大体強すぎなんだよ、今回の敵は！<fix123>ミスだってするだろうよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yeah, okay, that was a lie.<fix123>The enemies this time are way too strong, anyway!<fix123>Of course I'd make a couple mistakes here an' there!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ピュアヒューリーズ　～　心の在処<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Pure Furies ~ Whereabouts of the Heart<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>月の民も随分と愚かなミスをした<fix123>この地上人はお前らが考えるよりも<fix123>遥かに弱かった様ですね<fix123>ただ月の民との交戦は硬直状態が続いて<fix123>飽き飽きしていたところです<fix123>不倶戴天の敵、嫦娥 (じょうが) よ。見てるか！？<fix123>この者が運ぶ数多の生死を！ 榛穢 (しんわい) を！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The moon's people, too, have committed a foolish mistake.<fix123>It seems this earthling is far<fix123>more weak than you all thought.<fix123>My stagnated engagement with the people of the moon<fix123>was just beginning to exhaust my interest.<fix123>My mortal enemy, Chang'e. Are you watching!?<fix123>Look at the numerous lives and deaths, the impurities, this poor soul brings!<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>This is Seiran.<fix123>I've made contact with a belligerent earthling.<fix123>Now proceeding with purification.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Too bad for you,<fix123>filthy earthling.<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>ぐうう<fix123>だから現地部隊は嫌だったのにー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ghhh...<fix123>This is why I didn't want to be in the ground troopsー<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あんた、もしかして<fix123>月の兎じゃないの？<fix123>地上を浄化するって……<fix123>もの凄く嫌な予感がする<fix123>あんたらの拠点を教えなさい！<fix123>さもないと……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wait, are you<fix123>a moon rabbit?<fix123>Purifying the Earth...<fix123>I've got a really bad feeling about this.<fix123>Tell me where your base is!<fix123>Or else...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>勘弁してください－<fix123>教えたら殺されるわー！<fix123>山の湖に前線基地があるなんて<fix123>教えたら殺されるわー！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Please, spare me!<fix123>If I tell, they'll kill me!<fix123>If I tell you about our forward base on the mountain lake,<fix123>they'll kill me!<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>So this is the moon rabbit from before's<fix123>base, huh...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お待ちしておりましたー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've been waiting for youー<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>清蘭から話を聞いたわ<fix123>面白い奴と交戦したって……<fix123>あれ？<fix123>あんた見た事がある気が<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I heard about you from Seiran.<fix123>She said she'd engaged an interesting person...<fix123>Huh?<fix123>I feel like I've seen you before.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私はあんたなんか知らないわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I sure don't know you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……昔、月の都に来た事あるでしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...Did you come to the Lunar Capital a while ago?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ま、まあね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I s-suppose.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 九月のパンプキン<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Pumpkin of September<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そりゃ面白いや<fix123>手加減無しで遊べそうね！<fix123>一回の被弾(ミス)でも許されない<fix123>月の流儀(ルナティック)に度肝を抜くが良い！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This is interesting!<fix123>Looks like I can play with you without holding back!<fix123>Stand in awe of the moon's style of fighting(Lunatic),<fix123>where not even taking a single hit(making a single mistake) is allowed!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Ringo DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>まだ始まったばかりなのに<fix123>ちょっとは手加減して欲しいもんだわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm just getting started here!<fix123>You could have held back a little.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、地上にもずいぶんと<fix123>強い奴がいたもんね<fix123>食べ物も色々あるし<fix123>私も地上に生まれたかったわぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ahh, there are some pretty strong<fix123>people on Earth, huh?<fix123>You've got all sorts of food, too.<fix123>I wish I had been born on Earth...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>えーっと<fix123>今ってどういう状況なのかしら<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Um...<fix123>What in the world is going on now?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>我々は幻想郷を浄化しに<fix123>来たんだけど<fix123>我々、月の兎(したっぱ)にとっては<fix123>どうでもいい話<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We've come to purify<fix123>Gensokyo, but...<fix123>...us moon rabbits(underlings) don't really care about that.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はあ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>行ってみて自分で<fix123>判断するといいわ<fix123>いざ　月　の　都　(ルナティックキングダム)へ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You'll have to go and<fix123>work things out on your own.<fix123>Now, to the Lunar Capital(Lunatic Kingdom)!<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>The moon is so close...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>誰かと思いきや<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, look who it is.<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>夢の支配者<fix123>ドレミー・スイート<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ruler of Dreams<fix123>Doremy Sweet<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>幻想郷の巫女じゃないの<fix123>強い悪夢を見ているのねぇ<fix123>……って<fix123>生身！？<fix123>もしかして生身！？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If it isn't Gensokyo's shrine maiden.<fix123>This is quite a powerful nightmare, isn't it?<fix123>...Wait.<fix123>Your physical body!?<fix123>Is that your physical body?!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>えーっと<fix123>生身かな？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Uh...<fix123>I suppose it is?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>生身でこんな夢の世界へ<fix123>飛び込んでくるなんて<fix123>何かの罠に嵌められたのかな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>For your physical body to break into<fix123>the Dream World like this...<fix123>...have you been caught in some kind of trap?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>わ、罠だって？<fix123>私は月の都に向かって……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>T-trap?<fix123>I was heading towards the Lunar Capital...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>月の都……<fix123>ははぁんそういう事ね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Lunar Capital...<fix123>Oh-ho, I see now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 永遠の春夢<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Eternal Spring Dream<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>良いでしょう<fix123>その狂夢、私が処理しましょう<fix123>今は眠りなさい<fix123>貴方の槐安(かいあん)は今作られる<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Very well.<fix123>I will dispose of this lunatic dream.<fix123>Now, sleep.<fix123>I will craft your Kaian[1] now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Doremy Sweet DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ここまでの悪夢<fix123>全て処理させて頂きました<fix123>肉体を乗っ取りかねない<fix123>強い精神を持っているのですね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've disposed of<fix123>all the nightmares up to this point.<fix123>You must have a strong will<fix123>to maintain control over your body through this.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あんたは何者なの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は獏(バク)<fix123>夢の世界の住人です<fix123>貴方は月の都に向かうと<fix123>言ってましたね、しかも生身で<fix123>そこでは今までのとは比べものにならない<fix123>悪夢が待ち受けている事でしょう<fix123>それは狂夢（ルナティックドリーム）と<fix123>呼ぶべきものです<fix123>十分覚悟せよ<fix123>現し世(うつしよ)から夢を見ている人間よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I am a baku.<fix123>A resident of this Dream World.<fix123>You said you were heading towards the Lunar Capital?<fix123>And with your physical body, too.<fix123>There, a nightmare unlike any you have<fix123>encountered before now awaits you.<fix123>It is worthy of being called<fix123>a 'lunatic dream'.<fix123>Prepare yourself well,<fix123>dreaming human of the physical world.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……よく判らないけど<fix123>夢の世界を介して月の都と幻想郷が<fix123>繋がっていたって事なのかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...I don't really get it, but...<fix123>...I guess the Lunar Capital and Gensokyo are connected<fix123>through the dream world?<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>A City Free of Sabi[2]<fix123>Lunatic Kingdom<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>The Lunar Capital<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>Sagume Kishin LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>これが月の都……？<fix123>昔に来た時と随分様子が違うわね<fix123>何というか都ごと<fix123>凍り付いたかのようだわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Is this the Lunar Capital...?<fix123>It seems really different than the last time I came here.<fix123>Almost like the whole city<fix123>has been frozen or something.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Sagume Kishin ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>舌禍をもたらす女神<fix123>稀神 サグメ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Goddess Who Invites Unfortunate Slips of the Tongue<fix123>Sagume Kishin<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>えーっと<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Uhhh.<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>...ah, a human?<fix123>...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>しゃべらんのかい！<fix123>月の都が何でこうなっているのか<fix123>判らないけど<fix123>どうせあんたが幻想郷への侵略を<fix123>指揮してるんでしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Can you not talk!?<fix123>Look, I'm not sure what's going on<fix123>here in the Capital,<fix123>but you're the one conducting the<fix123>invasion of Gensokyo, aren't you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふむ、それはそうだけど……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Mm. Well, that's true...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>自白した<fix123>簡単に自白した<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You confessed.<fix123>You confessed so easily.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……貴方の役目は一体？<fix123>……おっと<fix123>余り喋っては作戦が失敗する<fix123>……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...just what is your role here?<fix123>...whoops.<fix123>If I talk too much, it'll ruin the plan.<fix123>......<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 逆転するホイールオブフォーチュン<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Reversed Wheel of Fortune<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>また黙るのね<fix123>まあいいわ、私のとる行動は一つしか無い<fix123>異変を解決する為に<fix123>あんたを倒す！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Clamming up again, huh?<fix123>Fine. There's only one thing for me to do.<fix123>Time to beat you up<fix123>and resolve this incident!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Sagume Kishin DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>貴方が送り込まれた理由が<fix123>判ったわ<fix123>きっと八意様の差し金ね<fix123>そんなに強いんですもの<fix123>貴方ならきっと……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I now understand why<fix123>you were sent here.<fix123>I'm sure it was on Lady Yagokoro's suggestion.<fix123>You're terribly strong.<fix123>Perhaps with you...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>攻撃したら急に喋るように<fix123>なったわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Looks like attacking you<fix123>got you to talk real fast.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私はサグメ<fix123>言葉で世界を方向変換させる<fix123>力を持っているの<fix123>だから上手くいってるときには<fix123>余り喋ってはいけないのよ<fix123>口は禍の元ってね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My name is Sagume.<fix123>I have the power to change the direction<fix123>of the world with my words.<fix123>So when things are going well,<fix123>I can't talk too much.<fix123>"Least said, soonest mended," after all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>へー、でも急に喋り出したって事は<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh. Okay, but if you're talking all of a sudden...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>これから破滅的な手段にて<fix123>新しい展開が始まるでしょう<fix123>私は貴方に乗るわ<fix123>破壊者は貴方になる<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A new development will surely occur soon,<fix123>through terribly destructive means.<fix123>I'm throwing my lot in with you.<fix123>You'll be the destroyer.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はい？<fix123>幻想郷に攻めてきたのは<fix123>貴方達でしょ？　破壊者は貴方達じゃ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Excuse me?<fix123>You're the ones who were attacking Gensokyo, right?<fix123>I'd say you're the destroyers.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>本当に侵略を受けているのは<fix123>月の都なの<fix123>それも我々月の民には<fix123>手が出せない方法で<fix123>全滅を回避する為に<fix123>幻想郷への移住を検討していたの<fix123>もっとも、月の民達はそんなこと<fix123>知らないのですが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Lunar Capital is what's<fix123>really under attack.<fix123>Via a method that renders us people of the moon<fix123>unable to act, to boot.<fix123>I was considering migrating to Gensokyo<fix123>to prevent us from being wiped out.<fix123>The people of the moon aren't aware<fix123>of any of this, though.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>月の都が侵略されて<fix123>それで幻想郷を侵略？<fix123>とんだご都合主義ね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Lunar Capital gets invaded,<fix123>so you invade Gensokyo in turn?<fix123>Real opportunistic attitude you've got there.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ですが、その運命もたった今<fix123>逆転し始めた<fix123>幻想郷への移住は<fix123>成功しないでしょう<fix123>その代わり、地上人である貴方が<fix123>月の都を救うのです！<fix123>さあ、私が口(・)に(・)す(・)る(・)わ(・)<fix123>もう貴方は運命から逃れられないわよ<fix123>運命は逆転し始めた<fix123>いざ敵の本拠地、静かの海に向かえ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>However, that fate has begun<fix123>to be overturned right now.<fix123>Our migration to Gensokyo<fix123>will surely go unrealized.<fix123>In exchange, you, an earthling,<fix123>shall save the Lunar Capital!<fix123>I shall now put it into words.<fix123>You can no longer escape from fate.<fix123>Fate has begun to turn over.<fix123>Now, on to the enemy's home base, the Sea of Tranquility!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>星条旗のピエロ<fix123>Clownish Moon<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Pierrot of the Star-Spangled Banner<fix123>Clownish Moon<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>静かの海<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sea of Tranquility<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 遥か38万キロのボヤージュ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Faraway Voyage of 380,000 Kilometers<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Clownpiece ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>きゃはははは！<fix123>面白い事が起こっているわー！<fix123>妖精達よ、もっとスピード<fix123>あげていこうよ！<fix123>イッツ、ルナティックターイム！<fix123>狂気の世界へようこそ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Kyahahahaha!<fix123>Something real interesting is going on~!<fix123>Hey, fairies!<fix123>Let's crank up the speed!<fix123>It's lunatic tiiiime!<fix123>Welcome to a world of madness!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Clownpiece EXITS WITHOUT FIGHTING<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>随分と荒涼としているところに<fix123>来てしまったわ<fix123>ところで、私が月の都を救う？<fix123>何だか変な話になってきたなぁ<fix123>それに何だか普段見かけない<fix123>妖精達がハッスルしてたけど……<fix123>あいつ等は何処にでもいるのね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Looks like I wound up<fix123>somewhere really desolate.<fix123>That aside, I'm supposed to save the Lunar Capital?<fix123>The story's gotten kind of weird somehow.<fix123>The fairies around here are hustling<fix123>way more than usual, too.<fix123>I guess you can find the squirts just about anywhere.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Clownpiece ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>それは違うなぁ<fix123>本来、表の月 (サーフェスムーン) は無生命の世界<fix123>妖精だって生まれ得ないのさ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Not quiiite.<fix123>Usually, the moon's near side (Surface Moon)  is a lifeless world.<fix123>It can't even produce fairies.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ、さっきの奴<fix123>見たところあんたも妖精っぽいけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, you again.<fix123>Although you look sort of fairy-like, too.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地獄の妖精<fix123>クラウンピース<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Fairy of Hell<fix123>Clownpiece<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう、あたいが地獄の妖精<fix123>クラウンピース！<fix123>この大地を友人様に戴いてから<fix123>貴方が初めての来客だわー！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes! I'm a fairy from hell,<fix123>Clownpiece!<fix123>You're the first visitor we've had<fix123>since honorable friend gave us this land!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>大地を頂いた？<fix123>ここは一体何処なの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Gave you the land?<fix123>Where exactly is this?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>表の月さ、月の都の外側だね<fix123>地獄よりは居心地が良いわよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The surface moon is the outer side of the Lunar Capital.<fix123>It's way more comfortable than hell!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そりゃまあ地獄に比べれば<fix123>何処も極楽でしょうね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, yeah. Compared to hell,<fix123>just about anywhere would be paradise.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ、そうだ<fix123>友人様に言いつかってるんだった<fix123>月の都から出てくる奴があったら<fix123>容赦するなって<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, right.<fix123>Honorable friend told me something.<fix123>"If anyone comes from the Lunar<fix123>Capital, show them no mercy!"<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>妖精風情の癖に<fix123>私を誰だと思ってるの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What, you? A fairy?<fix123>Do you have any idea who I am?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>知ーらない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Noooo idea.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>泣く子も黙る<fix123>博麗神社の巫女よ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm the Hakurei shrine maiden<fix123>who silences crying children!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 星条旗のピエロ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Pierrot of the Star-Spangled Banner<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あたいが泣くわけないじゃん<fix123>地獄の妖精だよ？<fix123>どちらかって言うと<fix123>泣かせる側だよー？<fix123>良いこと思いついたわ<fix123>あんたを泣かせて黙らせよっと<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I'm not gonna cry.<fix123>I'm a hell fairy, right?<fix123>If I had to say, I think I'd be the<fix123>one making people cry, y'know~?<fix123>Ooh, I got a good idea just now.<fix123>How about I make you cry and silence you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Clownpiece DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>はあはあはあ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hah, hah, hah...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もう、勝負あった！<fix123>あんたの負けよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Game set, already!<fix123>You lost!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>な、なんで……？<fix123>生命の象徴である我々妖精族が<fix123>ここを支配している限り<fix123>月の民は手も足も出せないって<fix123>聞いたのに<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>W-why...?<fix123>But I heard that as long as we fairies,<fix123>symbols of life, controlled this place,<fix123>the people of the moon wouldn't<fix123>be able to do a thing.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう言えばさっきの奴も<fix123>「月の民には手が出せない方法で」<fix123>って言ってたわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That reminds me. The lady from before...<fix123>...mentioned "a method that<fix123>renders us unable to act," too.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あんた……<fix123>いや、貴方様は一体？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, lady...<fix123>uh, I mean, madam? Who exactly are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さっきの話聞いてなかったの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Didn't you hear me before?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>黙る子も泣く地上人！<fix123>博麗神社の巫女！　二回目よ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>An Earthling who makes silent children cry!<fix123>The Hakurei shrine maiden! That's twice, now!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うん覚えた<fix123>で、その巫女が何をしに来たの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Mm. Got it.<fix123>So, what's a shrine maiden doing here?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>う、それが<fix123>幻想郷に侵略に来ていた輩を<fix123>探しに来ていたんだけど<fix123>いつの間にか月の都を救う事に<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Uh, well.<fix123>I came here looking for whoever's<fix123>invading Gensokyo, but...<fix123>At some point I wound up having to save the Lunar Capital.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>やっぱり月の民の仲間なのね！<fix123>って事は友人様の敵だ<fix123>友人様の敵はご主人様の敵<fix123>ご主人様の敵はあたいの敵だ！<fix123>……でも、どうすれば良いのかなぁ<fix123>もう力が残ってないや<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So you are in league with the moon's people!<fix123>Which means you're an enemy of our honorable friend.<fix123>An enemy of honorable friend is an enemy of Master's.<fix123>And any enemy of Master's is an enemy of mine!<fix123>...but, I'm not really sure what to do.<fix123>I've got no fight left in me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>取り敢えず、その友人？の<fix123>いるところまで案内してくれるかな<fix123>私には目的が良く判らなく<fix123>なって来ちゃった<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>For starters, how about you guide<fix123>me to this... friend?<fix123>I've sort of lost track<fix123>of my actual goal, here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>倶に天を載かずとも<fix123>Pure Furies<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Though Unable to Dwell Together Under Heaven[3]<fix123>Pure Furies<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>静かの海（裏）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sea of Tranquility (Underside)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 故郷の星が映る海<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Sea Where One's Home Planet Reflects<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>If playing on Pointdevice Mode (or on Legacy with no misses)<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Junko enters<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>いかに策を練ろうとも<fix123>相手はそれを乗り越えて来る<fix123>口惜しや<fix123>もう少しで宿敵に手が届くというのに<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No matter how many countermeasures<fix123>I work out, you overcome them.<fix123>'Tis a shame.<fix123>My nemesis was nearly within reach.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方が月の都を侵略している<fix123>張本人ね？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're the ringleader of the invasion<fix123>of the Lunar Capital, huh?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ひとまず私の負けを認めよう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>For now, I shall admit defeat.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああん？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wha?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まさか月面に地上人を送り込むなんて<fix123>頭の片隅にも無かったわ<fix123>僅かな瑕疵でも厭う月の民が<fix123>こんな姑息な手段を使うなんてね<fix123>私の読みが甘かった<fix123>既に勝負は決したって事よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>For not one moment did I ever expect<fix123>that they would send an earthling to the moon.<fix123>I'm surprised that the people of the moon, hating even the<fix123>slightest impurity, would use such a haphazard method.<fix123>I underestimated them.<fix123>The battle has already been decided.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>随分と余裕ね<fix123>闘いはこれからなのに<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You seem real relaxed, even though<fix123>the fight is still to come.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>純狐<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Junko<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私の名は純狐<fix123>月の民に仇なす仙霊である<fix123>正直、今 (・) 回 (・) の戦意は喪失したが……<fix123>ここまでやってきた<fix123>貴方を持て成してやろう<fix123>それが礼儀ってものでしょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My name is Junko.<fix123>A sagacious spirit bearing ill will to the citizens of the moon.<fix123>If I may be frank, my current will to fight has vanished...<fix123>However, I shall at least show you<fix123>some hospitality for arriving here.<fix123>It is only polite, is it not?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>正直、月の都がどうなろうが<fix123>知ったこっちゃないけど……<fix123>私にここまで手こずらせた鬱憤を<fix123>晴らさないと気が済まないわ！<fix123>それにあんた、何かムカつくし<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>To be honest, I don't really care<fix123>one bit about the Lunar Capital...<fix123>But I've got to at least vent a little<fix123>about having been given so much trouble!<fix123>Plus, you're sort of annoying somehow.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ピュアヒューリーズ　～　心の在処<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Pure Furies ~ Whereabouts of the Heart<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>彼 (・) 女 (・) とはもう別の星に住み<fix123>会うことは出来ないが<fix123>倶 (とも) に天を戴かずとも<fix123>憎しみだけが純化する<fix123>見せよ！<fix123>命を賭した地上人の可能性を！<fix123>そして見よ！<fix123>生死を拒絶した純粋なる霊力を！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Though she now lives on another heavenly body,<fix123>and I am unable to meet with her...<fix123>Even if we are unable to dwell together under Heaven,<fix123>my hatred alone will be refined.<fix123>Now, show me!<fix123>Just what an earthling risking her life is capable of!<fix123>And behold!<fix123>This pristine spiritual force that rejects life and death!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>If playing on Legacy Mode (with misses)<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Junko ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>いかに策を練ろうとも<fix123>相手はそれを乗り越えて来る<fix123>しかし、その愚策は失敗に<fix123>終わったようね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No matter how many countermeasures<fix123>I work out, you overcome them.<fix123>However, it seems your foolish<fix123>scheme has ended in failure.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方が月の都を侵略している<fix123>張本人ね？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're the ringleader of the invasion<fix123>of the Lunar Capital, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いかにも<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Verily.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>よーし、何か知らんけど<fix123>貴方を倒して月の都を救うわよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>All right! I dunno what's going on, but I'm<fix123>gonna beat you and save the Lunar Capital!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>月の民を夢の中に避難させ<fix123>地上人を送り込む<fix123>大胆不敵な策だったけど<fix123>詰めが甘かった様ね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The people of the moon escape into a dream,<fix123>and send an earthling to deal with me.<fix123>I thought it to be a daring plan,<fix123>but I suppose I overestimated them.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あー？<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>そんなに死穢の匂いを身に<fix123>纏った人間では私を倒せない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A human so completely surrounded by the<fix123>stench of death can never hope to defeat me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>純狐<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Junko<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私の名は純狐<fix123>私の純化の力で無条件に貴方を<fix123>殺す事が出来てしまう<fix123>貴方はここまで何回ミスを冒して<fix123>来たのです？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My name is Junko.<fix123>With my power of purification,<fix123>I am able to kill you unconditionally.<fix123>Just how many mistakes have you<fix123>suffered on the way here?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ぐっ<fix123>でも、そんなに多くない筈……<fix123>そう言えば永琳は薬を使わないと<fix123>今回の敵に敵わないと言っていたけど……<fix123>副作用が怖いから使わないで<fix123>来ちゃったのよねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Guh.<fix123>It shouldn't have been that many...<fix123>(That reminds me. Eirin did say that I couldn't<fix123>defeat these enemies without her drug...<fix123>The side effects sounded kinda scary,<fix123>though, so I wound up not using it.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ピュアヒューリーズ　～　心の在処<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Pure Furies ~ Whereabouts of the Heart<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>月の民も随分と愚かなミスをした<fix123>この地上人はお前らが考えるよりも<fix123>遥かに弱かった様ですね<fix123>ただ月の民との交戦は硬直状態が続いて<fix123>飽き飽きしていたところです<fix123>不倶戴天の敵、嫦娥 (じょうが) よ。見てるか！？<fix123>この者が生死の狭間でもがく姿を！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The moon's people, too, have committed a foolish mistake.<fix123>It seems this earthling is far<fix123>more weak than you all thought.<fix123>My stagnated engagement with the people of the moon<fix123>was just beginning to exhaust my interest.<fix123>My mortal enemy, Chang'e. Are you watching!?<fix123>Gaze upon this poor soul as she struggles between life and death!<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Sorry, but we're going to have to stop you right here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>鎮魂ライブの始まり始まりー！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Let the soul repose performance beginー!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Benben Tsukumo and Yatsuhashi Tsukumo DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>もうこの妖剣は使わないと<fix123>決めたんだけど……<fix123>小槌の魔力を受けた妖怪を退ける<fix123>目的なら仕方が無いわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I decided not to use this bewitched blade<fix123>anymore, but...<fix123>Since I there are still youkai being affected by the Mallet's magic,<fix123>I suppose I had no other choice.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ようやく来たわね<fix123>人間のメイドよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You've finally come,<fix123>human maid.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Raiko Horikawa ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>打ち出の小槌の件は<fix123>私の耳にも届いているわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Even I have heard about<fix123>the Miracle Mallet incident.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あらそうでしたか<fix123>なら何をしに来たのか<fix123>判りますね？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, I see.<fix123>Then you understand why I am here,<fix123>yes?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>夢幻のパーカッショニスト<fix123>堀川雷鼓<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Phantasmal Percussionist<fix123>Raiko Horikawa<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>小槌の魔力の後片付けに来た<fix123>って事でしょう？<fix123>でももう手遅れよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You've come here to clean up the mess from the<fix123>Mallet's magic power, right?<fix123>It's too late for that.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>手遅れ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Too late?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もう私に打ち出の小槌の魔力なんて<fix123>必要ないの<fix123>呪われた小槌の魔力を抜いて<fix123>魔力を取り替えたのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I no longer require<fix123>the Miracle Mallet.<fix123>For I have replaced the cursed Mallet's power<fix123>with a different magic.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>取り替えた……ですって？<fix123>そんなことが出来るの？　付喪神に……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You replaced it?<fix123>Tsukumogami can do that...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 始原のビート　～ Pristine Beat<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Primordial Beat ~ Pristine Beat<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あらあら<fix123>付喪神だから簡単に出来るのよ？<fix123>何故なら道具は使用者を変えれば<fix123>魔力が変わるんだからね<fix123>さあ試すとするか<fix123>私の新しい魔力を<fix123>さあ外の世界の使役者 (ドラマー) よ！<fix123>魂のビートで始原の感情を呼び覚ませ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My, my.<fix123>It's simple because I'm a tsukumogami.<fix123>Because when a tool's user changes,<fix123>their magic power changes, too.<fix123>Now, shall we test out<fix123>my new magical power?<fix123>Come, my drummer from the outside world!<fix123>Awaken primal emotions with your soul's beat!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Raiko Horikawa DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あらららら<fix123>降参よー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How surprising!<fix123>I surrenderー<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふう<fix123>強かったわ<fix123>ちょっと気軽に退治するレベルじゃ<fix123>無かったわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wow,<fix123>you were pretty tough.<fix123>Not the<fix123>easily-exterminated type, I see.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まだ新しい魔力が使いこなせてない<fix123>のかな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I guess I still haven't mastered<fix123>this new magic yet.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ところでさっき<fix123>魔力を取り替えたって言ってましたね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>By the way,<fix123>you mentioned before that you replaced the magic power.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうよ道具の使用者を変えたって事だけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's right, but it just means I've changed users.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>例えばですけど<fix123>小槌の魔力に冒されて<fix123>勝手に暴れる剣があったりして<fix123>その剣の使用者が変わった場合<fix123>魔力は入れ替わる……って事かしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Just hypothetically,<fix123>If there was a blade that was desecrated by<fix123>the Mallet's power and started causing problems...<fix123>If that blade changed hands,<fix123>would that mean the magic power would be changed?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うーんとねぇ……<fix123>強靱な精神を持っていればそうなるわね<fix123>ただし　入れ替わるんだから<fix123>小槌の魔力は使用者(あなた)に降りかかるわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmm, let's see...<fix123>If the user had a strong spirit, then probably.<fix123>But since the Mallet's magic is still intact,<fix123>its magic could affect you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だ　誰も私の事だなんて言ってないわよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I-I was just speaking hypothetically.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>隠したって判るわよ<fix123>その手の剣……苦しんでいるもの<fix123>……魔力の解放のしかた<fix123>もっと詳しく聞く？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I know you're hiding it.<fix123>The blade in your hand... It's suffering.<fix123>...Would you like to hear more<fix123>about how to release the magic power in it?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うーん<fix123>どうしようかなぁ<fix123>やっぱ遠慮しておくわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmmm...<fix123>Maybe I should?<fix123>No, I shall have to decline.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あらなんで？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, why?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私の魔力で付喪神化したら<fix123>強くなり過ぎるもの……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If it were to become a tsukumogami using my magic,<fix123>it would become far too powerful...<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Let the soul repose performance beginー!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Benben Tsukumo and Yatsuhashi Tsukumo DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>随分と禍々しい嵐だな<fix123>この間より格段に強い魔力を<fix123>感じるぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This is a pretty ominous storm.<fix123>This magic is on a whole different<fix123>level from the stuff before.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ようやく来たわね<fix123>魔法使いの人間よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You've finally come,<fix123>human magician.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Raiko Horikawa ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>私を封じに来たというのなら<fix123>もう手遅れよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If you've come to seal me away,<fix123>you're already too late.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>手遅れだと？<fix123>もう打ち出の小槌の魔力は<fix123>尽きているんだぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Too late?<fix123>But the Magic Mallet's power<fix123>has already run out.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>夢幻のパーカッショニスト<fix123>堀川 雷鼓<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Phantasmal Percussionist<fix123>Raiko Horikawa<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふふふ　私は自立した魔力を<fix123>手に入れたのよ<fix123>もう打ち出の小槌の魔力など<fix123>必要ない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hehehe. I have obtained the magic<fix123>to become independent.<fix123>I no longer require the powers<fix123>of the Miracle Mallet.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんだと？<fix123>別の魔力で動いている　だと？<fix123>そうか　それなら<fix123>放っておけないな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What?<fix123>So yer movin' usin' a different magic?<fix123>I see. In that case,<fix123>there's no way I can just leave ya be.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうなの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Is that so?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今回私のミニ八卦炉のお陰で<fix123>大切なことが判った<fix123>道具が勝手に動くと困る！<fix123>つまりお前らが勝手に<fix123>動いているだけで迷惑という事だ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I learned somethin' important from my<fix123>Mini-Hakkero before.<fix123>When tools move on their own, it's a huge pain!<fix123>So the simple fact that yer moving<fix123>on yer own makes ya a nuisance!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 始原のビート　～ Pristine Beat<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Primordial Beat ~ Pristine Beat<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>つまりそれは何？<fix123>さっき言ったでしょ？<fix123>私を封じたいのなら手遅れだと<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So what?<fix123>I already told you.<fix123>If you want to seal me, it's too late.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どんな魔力で動いているのか知らんが<fix123>妖怪退治に手遅れはないぜ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I dunno what kinda magic yer using to move around,<fix123>but I'm definitely not too late for some good ol' youkai extermination!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私のビートを聴いても<fix123>そう言えるかな？<fix123>さあ外の世界の使役者 (ドラマー) よ！<fix123>今夜は未知の鼓動で敵を退けるのだ (ビートイット) ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I wonder if you'll be able to say that<fix123>once you hear my beat.<fix123>Come, my drummer from the outside world!<fix123>Use your unknown pulse tonight to make my enemy "beat it"!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Raiko Horikawa DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あらららら<fix123>降参よー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How surprising!<fix123>I surrenderー<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>手強い相手だった<fix123>道具からこんなのが生まれるなんて<fix123>考えてみると恐ろしいな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You were pretty strong.<fix123>It's kinda scary to think somethin' this<fix123>powerful could be born from a tool.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まだまだ使いこなせてないかなぁ<fix123>外の世界の魔力<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I still haven't mastered<fix123>the outside world's magic...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……外の世界の魔力　か<fix123>私でも使いこなせなかったが<fix123>何にしてもお前は<fix123>退治しないでおいてやる<fix123>……外の世界の魔力が<fix123>目的じゃないぞ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The outside world's magic, huh.<fix123>I couldn't master it either.<fix123>But anyway,<fix123>I'll let you go without exterminatin' you.<fix123>...And not because I'm after<fix123>the outside world's magic!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あらそう？<fix123>なら自由にさせて貰うわ<fix123>そもそも私達付喪神は<fix123>暴れるためにいる訳じゃないの<fix123>怨みのある使用者に対しては<fix123>暴れる事もあるけど……<fix123>貴方に使われた記憶はないしー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, really?<fix123>Then I'll just be on my way.<fix123>In the first place, we tsukumogami<fix123>aren't here to cause trouble.<fix123>Though if our user is wicked,<fix123>then we might end up making trouble...<fix123>And I don't have any memory of you using me, so...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>怨みのある使用者に対しては<fix123>暴れる……か<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So if your user is wicked,<fix123>then you will make trouble...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どうしたの？<fix123>何か思い当たる節でも？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What's wrong?<fix123>Did you remember something?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ　いやその<fix123>まさか……<fix123>ミニ八卦炉は大事に使わんとな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, no.<fix123>Nothin' like that...<fix123>Man, I really need be careful with that Mini-Hakkero.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: The Scarlet Devil Mansion.<fix123>
A mansion on the Misty Lake where a vampire resides.<fix123>
"...So this bewitched sword was the Inchling's."<fix123>
The sword glowed eerily.<fix123>
"No, I mustn't... Something wrong is filling my heart."<fix123>
Is there anything around for it to cut?<fix123>
A fairy would be just perfect."<fix123>
"Oh? What are you doing?"<fix123>
"This bewitched sword seems to want blood,<fix123>so I wanted to cut something with it..."<fix123>
"Oh yes, what happened with the rioting on the lake?"<fix123>
"I exterminated them quite a while ago.<fix123>
As well as all the foes to follow."<fix123>
"Hmm. Is that right."<fix123>
"How about it?<fix123>
Do you wish to test the feel of cutting with this sword?"<fix123>
"Is it fun?"<fix123>
"It may be, yes. The sword delights at it."<fix123>
"My, Sakuya, you've gotten so bold... I'm glad."<fix123>
The rampaging bewitched sword once belonged to the Inchling.<fix123>
Sakuya did not return it to her, but rather took it back home.<fix123>
She knew it radiated a bewitching magic power,<fix123>but still, she could not let it go.<fix123>
The sword will go on cutting up youkai for a while longer.<fix123>
But the mistress of the mansion was quite pleased with the sight.<fix123>
<c$Ending No. 05 — Polite, refined madness.$><fix123>
<c$All clear! Congratulations! You're cool!$><fix123>
The Hakurei Shrine.<fix123>
A shrine on the east edge of Gensokyo.<fix123>
"...And that's all."<fix123>
"Tools getting power, and conspiring social upheaval..."<fix123>
"H-Huh. So that's what happened."<fix123>
"Oh? Did something come to mind?"<fix123>
"N-Nothing at all!"<fix123>
"N-Nothin' at all!"<fix123>
"You should perhaps be cautious not to get caught up in matters.<fix123>
Since the foe did wield the Miracle Mallet."<fix123>
"Miracle Mallet..."<fix123>
"Did you say Miracle Mallet?"<fix123>
"I only caught a glimpse, but I could tell<fix123>it was an ominous magic item."<fix123>
"The Miracle Mallet is one of the tools of the oni.<fix123>
Who knows what'd happen if you used it."<fix123>
"All the more reason to exercise caution."<fix123>
"Hold on, why are you telling that to us?"<fix123>
"Because...<fix123>
I don't want you going to the side of the resistance.<fix123>
Nor being affected by the tool's magic power."<fix123>
"T-That would never happen."<fix123>
"U-Uh, yeah."<fix123>
When Sakuya heard of a resistance,<fix123>Reimu and Marisa were the first things on her mind.<fix123>
Were they to betray her, her own standing would be in danger.<fix123>
So she went to keep an eye on them.<fix123>
Gensokyo's order is guaranteed by a rule of the strong.<fix123>
Weaklings are oppressed. But humans are not included in this.<fix123>
Depending on where humans stand, who can say what will happen...<fix123>
<c$Ending No. 06 — But the magic of the Miracle Mallet will run out first.$><fix123>
<c$All clear! Congratulations! You're cool!$><fix123>
The Scarlet Devil Mansion.<fix123>
Sakuya's spirit was shaken.<fix123>
"Ahh... I wanted to cut some more.<fix123>
Could the Miracle Mallet grant that wish...?"<fix123>
She was drastically influenced by the bewitched sword.<fix123>
Will she one day change jobs from her mistress to the Inchling!?<fix123>
<c$Ending No. 11 — Wake up, Chief Maid!$><fix123>
<c$Aim for a no-continue clear!$><fix123>
The Scarlet Devil Mansion.<fix123>
Sakuya's spirit had been crushed.<fix123>
"The Miracle Mallet's power is beyond expectation.<fix123>
Should I tell the mistress now... or...?"<fix123>
Sakuya considered something unthinkable, and gave up on telling her.<fix123>
In any case, the Miracle Mallet can grant any wish, so...<fix123>
<c$Ending No. 12 — Maybe watch others play sometime...$><fix123>
<c$Aim for a no-continue clear!$><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>What?<fix123>I see...<fix123>The magic vibe I get from you is definitely<fix123>different from my Mini-Hakkero's.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>魔力を取り替えたのよ<fix123>呪われた小槌の魔力を抜いてね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I replaced the magic.<fix123>So I don't have the power of the cursed Mallet now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>取り替えた……だと？<fix123>付喪神風情にそんな高度な術が……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You replaced it?<fix123>How could a tsukumogami like you use such high-level magic...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 始原のビート　～ Pristine Beat<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Primordial Beat ~ Pristine Beat<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あらあら<fix123>付喪神だから簡単に出来るのよ？<fix123>何故なら道具は使用者を変えれば<fix123>魔力が変わるんだからね<fix123>さあ試すとするか<fix123>私の新しい魔力を<fix123>さあ外の世界の使役者 (ドラマー) よ！<fix123>空前絶後のビートを響かせよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My, my.<fix123>It's simple because I'm a tsukumogami.<fix123>Because when a tool's user changes,<fix123>their magic power changes, too.<fix123>Now, shall we test out<fix123>my new magical power?<fix123>Come, my drummer from the outside world!<fix123>Let your once-in-a-lifetime beat resound!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Raiko Horikawa DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あらららら<fix123>降参よー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How surprising!<fix123>I surrenderー<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふっ　やるじゃないか<fix123>恐ろしい魔力だったぜ<fix123>しかし何だ<fix123>その魔力は……外の世界の魔力か<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh, you ain't bad at all.<fix123>Ya got some scary magic there.<fix123>But, uh,<fix123>is this magic from the outside world?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>外の世界には優れた太鼓叩きが<fix123>多いのよ<fix123>そういう道具使いを太鼓の達人<fix123>って呼ぶくらい<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There are lots of skilled drummers<fix123>in the outside world.<fix123>They even call them<fix123>"taiko drum masters".<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほう　外の世界には色んな魔法が<fix123>あるんだろうなぁ<fix123>何にしても気に入ったぜ<fix123>お前のビート<fix123>人間に危害を与えないと約束すれば<fix123>ここで退治するのは止めてやる<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So the outside world has lots of<fix123>different kinds of magic, too, huh? Cool.<fix123>Anyway, I really<fix123>dug your groove.<fix123>If ya promise not to harm to humans,<fix123>I won't exterminate ya now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほんと？<fix123>するする　約束しますー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Really?<fix123>I won't, I promiseー<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……軽いな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...That was easy.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だって……ただの道具には<fix123>戻りたくないしー<fix123>それに自分で動ければ良いだけで<fix123>暴れるのは本来の目的では無いしね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I mean... I don't want to go back<fix123>to being a tool!<fix123>I was never trying to cause trouble,<fix123>I just wanted to move on my own.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>自分で動ければ良い……か<fix123>私のミニ八卦炉ももしかして<fix123>そう思っているのか？<fix123>危ない危ない<fix123>さっさと魔力を抜いちまおう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Move on yer own...<fix123>I wonder if my Mini-Hakkero<fix123>wants to do that, too.<fix123>Whoops, that was a close one.<fix123>Better ditch the rest of that power now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>世界内存在に響く鼓動<fix123><fix123>Drum up resistance<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A Beat That Resounds Through One's Being in the World<fix123><fix123>Drum up resistance[1]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>幻想郷上空（嵐）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Skies of Gensokyo (Stormy)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 魔力の雷雲<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Thunderclouds of Magical Power<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Benben Tsukumo and Yatsuhashi Tsukumo ENTER<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>悪いけどここで足止めさせてもらうよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sorry, but we're going to have to stop you right here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>鎮魂ライブの始まり始まりー！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Let the soul repose performance beginー!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Benben Tsukumo and Yatsuhashi Tsukumo DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>この不思議な嵐も<fix123>打ち出の小槌の影響かな？<fix123>何て禍々しい魔力なのかしら<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Did the Miracle Mallet cause<fix123>this storm, too?<fix123>What ominous power...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ようやく来たわね<fix123>博麗神社の巫女よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You've finally come,<fix123>shrine maiden of Hakurei.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Raiko Horikawa ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>今頃来ても<fix123>もう遅いけどね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But you're<fix123>too late now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>遅いって……何が？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Too late for what?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>夢幻のパーカッショニスト<fix123>堀川 雷鼓<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Phantasmal Percussionist<fix123>Raiko Horikawa<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は自立した魔力を<fix123>手に入れたのよ<fix123>もう打ち出の小槌の魔力など<fix123>必要ない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I have obtained the magic<fix123>to become independent.<fix123>I no longer require the powers<fix123>of the Miracle Mallet.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんだって？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だから誰にも縛られないわ<fix123>私達は自由よ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now we won't be bound to anyone.<fix123>We are free!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>その力とやらも気になるけど<fix123>何でもいいや<fix123>あんたも暴れるというのなら<fix123>ここで成敗してくれる！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm a little concerned about that power,<fix123>but whatever.<fix123>If you're going to get violent, too,<fix123>then I'll punish you right here!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>噂は本当だったのね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The rumors were true.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 始原のビート　～ Pristine Beat<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Primordial Beat ~ Pristine Beat<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>巫女は妖怪なら問答無用で<fix123>襲いかかってくるって<fix123>それはつまり道具(わたし)が妖怪として<fix123>認められた証拠でもある<fix123>さあ外の世界の使役者(ドラマ－)よ！<fix123>今こそ闘いのビートを刻むのだ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The shrine maiden will just attack<fix123>youkai out of the blue.<fix123>In other words, that's proof that I, a tool,<fix123>have been acknowledged as a youkai.<fix123>Come, my drummer from the outside world!<fix123>Engrave your beat into this very battle!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Raiko Horikawa DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あらららら<fix123>降参よー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How surprising!<fix123>I surrenderー<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>道具の割には中々やるじゃない<fix123>それにしてもお祓い棒といい<fix123>道具が暴れる世界って困るわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>For a tool, that was quite a fight. <fix123>Man, whether it's the purification rod or whatever,<fix123>a world where tools run around causing havoc is a big pain.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>困る……だって？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It is?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そりゃ困るわよ<fix123>お祓い棒抜きでは大変だったんだから<fix123>道具はただ使われていればいいの<fix123>それが出来なきゃただのゴミよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, of course!<fix123>I had enough trouble just going out without it.<fix123>Tools should just settle for being used.<fix123>If they can't even do that, then they're just garbage.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……そう<fix123>道具って切ないわー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...I see.<fix123>It must be painful being a tool.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あんたも道具でしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Aren't you a tool, too?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうでした<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I was!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>付喪神化した道具は供養するのが<fix123>習わしだけど……<fix123>お祓い棒の件もあるしー<fix123>今回は原因が特殊だしー<fix123>……まあ大人しくしていれば<fix123>見逃してあげなくもないわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've learned that you should hold memorial services<fix123>for tools that have become tsukumogami...<fix123>But with the purification rod thing,<fix123>and since this is a special case...<fix123>If you behave yourselves,<fix123>I might overlook it.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら嬉しいわ<fix123>絶対に巫女(あなた)の前では暴れません<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Why, thank you.<fix123>I swear to never raise a ruckus around the shrine maiden.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……他の人間の前でもね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...And other humans, too. All right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ　でも<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, wait.<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>What?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>コンサートの時だけは<fix123>暴れさせて下さいね<fix123>外の世界の魔力(ドラマー)が<fix123>こう囁くんです<fix123>太鼓を叩くに頭脳は要らぬ<fix123>猿人時代の魂を呼び覚ませ！　と<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Please just let me raise<fix123>a ruckus during concerts, okay?<fix123>The drummers in the outside world<fix123>have a saying.<fix123>"Awaken your caveman spirit,<fix123>for it doesn't need brains to beat a drum!"<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>へー<fix123>……外の世界は野蛮ねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh.<fix123>...The outside world seems barbaric.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>世界内存在に響く鼓動<fix123><fix123>Drum up resistance<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A Beat That Resounds Through One's Being in the World<fix123><fix123>Drum up resistance[1]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>幻想郷上空（嵐）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Skies of Gensokyo (Stormy)<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Thunderclouds of Magical Power<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>悪いけどここで足止めさせてもらうよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sorry, but we're going to have to stop you right here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>鎮魂ライブの始まり始まりー！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Let the soul repose performance beginー!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Benben Tsukumo and Yatsuhashi Tsukumo DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>さっきの楽器の付喪神が<fix123>絡んでいるとすると<fix123>やっぱり付喪神なのかな？<fix123>楽器なのかな？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If those instrument tsukumogami<fix123>from earlier are involved...<fix123>Surely this is the work of<fix123>another instrument tsukumogami.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ようやく来たわね<fix123>博麗神社の巫女よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You've finally come,<fix123>shrine maiden of Hakurei.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Raiko Horikawa ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>今頃来ても<fix123>もう遅いけどね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But you're<fix123>too late now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>やっぱり楽器の付喪神ねー<fix123>ようやく勘を取り戻せてきたわ<fix123>でも残念ね<fix123>打ち出の小槌は回収期に入ったから<fix123>あんたもすぐに普通の道具に戻るわよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I was right, an instrument tsukumogami.<fix123>My intuition has finally returned.<fix123>Unfortunately for you, though,<fix123>now that the Miracle Mallet is recovering its power,<fix123>you'll go back to normal soon.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>夢幻のパーカッショニスト<fix123>堀川 雷鼓<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Phantasmal Percussionist<fix123>Raiko Horikawa<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら巫女ともあろう者が<fix123>なんて勘の鈍い事を……<fix123>もう小槌の魔力を失っても<fix123>ただの道具には戻らないわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Really? And you thought your<fix123>intuition had returned?<fix123>I can stay like this<fix123>even without the Miracle Mallet.<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Huh?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>打ち出の小槌の魔力が力の源だと<fix123>私はすぐに気が付いたの<fix123>そのまま享受していては<fix123>真の自立とは言えない<fix123>だから考えた<fix123>打ち出の小槌の魔力を捨て<fix123>別の魔力を取り込む呪法……<fix123>それを教えたのよ<fix123>付喪神のみんなに<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I noticed right away that the Miracle Mallet<fix123>was the source of my power.<fix123>If I had just accepted that,<fix123>I wouldn't be truly independent.<fix123>So I had a thought. <fix123>What if I discarded the Miracle Mallet's power<fix123>and replaced it with a different magic...?<fix123>Then I told all the<fix123>other tsukumogami about it.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>別の魔力を取り込む呪法だって？<fix123>たかが道具にそんな知恵が……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You replaced it with a different magic?<fix123>How did a mere tool figure that out...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 始原のビート　～ Pristine Beat<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Primordial Beat ~ Pristine Beat<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あらあら<fix123>道具の方がよく知っててよ<fix123>何故なら道具は全て使用者の魔力で<fix123>動いているんだからね<fix123>さあ試すとするか<fix123>私の新しい魔力を<fix123>さあ外の世界の使役者(ドラマ－)よ！<fix123>幻想郷に始原のビートを響かせよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My, my.<fix123>Tools would know better than anyone.<fix123>Because tools operate entirely<fix123>through the magic of their users.<fix123>So, shall I test my<fix123>new power on you?<fix123>Come, my drummer from the outside world!<fix123>Let your primal beat echo throughout Gensokyo!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Raiko Horikawa DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あらららら<fix123>降参よー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How surprising!<fix123>I surrenderー<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>道具の割には中々やるじゃない<fix123>でも一人前の妖怪までは<fix123>まだまだね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>For a tool, that was quite a fight.<fix123>But you're not quite up to the level<fix123>of a full-fledged youkai yet.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>外の世界の魔力だけでは<fix123>敵わないのか……<fix123>でもまあいいや<fix123>十分戦えることが判ったし<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So I can't stand up to you using just<fix123>magic from the outside world...<fix123>But that doesn't matter,<fix123>since I learned I can fight quite a bit.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それにしても別の魔力を<fix123>取り込む呪法……かぁ<fix123>付喪神がそんな悪知恵を<fix123>働かせるなんて思わなかったわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But a spell to replace<fix123>your source of magic power...<fix123>I had no idea tsukumogami<fix123>had that kind of cunning.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>誰だって自分が生き残るのには<fix123>努力を惜しまないでしょ？<fix123>それは悪知恵でも何でもないわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Everyone works hard to<fix123>survive, right?<fix123>You can't call that "cunning".<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ところでどういう物なの？<fix123>その呪法<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>By the way, what exactly is<fix123>the magic you're using now?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>小槌の魔力の様に勝手に<fix123>入り込むのは例外だけど……<fix123>本来　道具の魔力は使用者の魔力なの<fix123>使ってくれる人で魔力が変わる<fix123>だから私は外の世界から流れてきた<fix123>太鼓を取り込んだのよ<fix123>外の世界にいる魔法使い(ドラマー)の魔力が<fix123>私の心を満たす　それが呪法よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Magic Mallet was an exception,<fix123>since it empowered objects on its own, but...<fix123>Originally, a tool's magic power is that of its user.<fix123>Depending on the person using it, the magic changes.<fix123>So, I possessed a drum that had<fix123>floated in from the outside world.<fix123>The mystical power of a drummer from the outside world<fix123>is what fills my soul. That's what the spell is.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふーん<fix123>よく判らないけど何か便利そうね<fix123>何にしても大人しくしていれば<fix123>私は……道具には攻撃しない事にしたわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh.<fix123>I don't really get it, but it sounds convenient.<fix123>In any case, if they behave themselves, I...<fix123>won't attack tools.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら有難うございます<fix123>私も巫女(あなた)には逆らいません<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, thank you very much.<fix123>I won't defy you either, then.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>他の妖怪がどう動くかまでは<fix123>約束できないけどね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Though I can't make any promises,<fix123>since it depends on how the other youkai act.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>淡水真珠の涙<fix123>Water Nymph<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Tears of Freshwater Pearls<fix123>Water Nymph<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>霧の湖<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Misty Lake<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Mist Lake<fix123><fix123>
