<fix123>Cirno DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>こんなものですかね<fix123>湖掃除<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So is this what lake cleaning<fix123>is like?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あなたは！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, you!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Wakasagihime ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>淡水に棲む人魚<fix123>わかさぎ姫<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Mermaid Living in Fresh Water<fix123>Wakasagihime<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>畔のお屋敷にいる……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're the one from that mansion on the bank...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>半漁人！？<fix123>この死の湖に妖精以外の<fix123>生き物が居たなんて……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A half-fish person!?<fix123>I had no idea there was anything else<fix123>besides fairies living around this dead lake.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほらほらそんな感じ<fix123>なんだもん<fix123>私達 (ようかい) の存在を忘れて<fix123>久しいんだわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>See?<fix123>That's how it is.<fix123>You've long forgotten about<fix123>the existence of us youkai!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 秘境のマーメイド<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Mermaid from the Uncharted Land<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Wakasagihime DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>身近にも色んな<fix123>生き物が居たんですね<fix123>これからは注意して<fix123>観察するとしましょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So there were creatures like her<fix123>in the neighborhood.<fix123>I should take care<fix123>when observing from now on.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>柳の下の生首<fix123>Flying Head<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Severed Head Under the Willows<fix123>Flying Head<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>柳の運河<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Canal of Willows<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 運河を行き交う人妖<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Humans and Youkai Traversing the Canal<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Sekibanki ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Sekibanki LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>こんな人里の近くにも<fix123>暴れる妖怪が……<fix123>幻想郷の平和なんて<fix123>砂上のバベルみたいなもんね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There are even youkai running amok<fix123>this close to the Human Village...<fix123>It seems peace in Gensokyo<fix123>is like the Tower of Babel upon sand.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>早速現れたわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You showed up fast.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Sekibanki ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ろくろ首の怪奇<fix123>赤蛮奇<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Rokurokubi Horror<fix123>Sekibanki<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私を退治しに来たというの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Have you come to exterminate me?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええ　まあ<fix123>暴れる妖怪を大人しくしろ<fix123>との命を受けましたので<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, yes.<fix123>Since I received an order<fix123>to pacify all the rampaging youkai.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>無駄よ無駄<fix123>いまさら来たって<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's useless.<fix123>You've come too late.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 柳の下のデュラハン<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Dullahan Under the Willows<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もう私達 (ようかい) の逆襲は<fix123>始まっているのよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The youkai have already begun<fix123>to strike back!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Sekibanki DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>な　なによあんた<fix123>強いじゃないのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wh-What's with you?<fix123>You're actually strong.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>弱いだなんて一度でも<fix123>言いました？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Did I even once say that<fix123>I was weak?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>く　くやしいけど<fix123>ここは大人しく退くか……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I really don't want to,<fix123>but I guess I'll retreat for now...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう……大人しくしていれば<fix123>誰も危害を与えないはず<fix123>……巫女以外は<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, if you behave yourself,<fix123>no one will hurt you.<fix123>...Except for the shrine maiden.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>十五夜の妖獣<fix123>Metamorphose<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Beast Youkai of the 15th Night<fix123>Metamorphose<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>迷いの竹林<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Bamboo Forest of the Lost<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 満月の竹林<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Bamboo Forest of the Full Moon<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kagerou Imaizumi ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Kagerou Imaizumi LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>私を退治しに来たのね？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You've come to exterminate me, haven't you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kagerou Imaizumi ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>……何か<fix123>みんな退治されたがっている<fix123>のかしら<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...how strange.<fix123>Do all of you want to be<fix123>exterminated, perhaps?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>竹林のルーガルー<fix123>今泉影狼<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Bamboo Forest's Loup-Garou<fix123>Kagerou Imaizumi<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方に私が倒せるかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Do you think you can defeat me?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう命じられましたので……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I was ordered to do so...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ようやく私達のような妖怪も<fix123>脚光を浴びる時が来たわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The youkai's day in the sun,<fix123>so to speak, has come at last.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>脚光？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Really?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 孤独なウェアウルフ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Lonesome Werewolf<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>大人しくしてろと言われて<fix123>はや幾年か<fix123>もう我慢できないわ<fix123>これからは私達の時代よ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How many years has it been<fix123>since we were told to remain docile?<fix123>Enough is enough.<fix123>Our time is now!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kagerou Imaizumi DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>なんと狼男でしたか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who should it be but a wolfman.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>狼女です！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm a wolf-woman!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ失礼しました<fix123>よく屋敷でオオカミ男ごっこを<fix123>するので<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, my apologies.<fix123>I often play pretend-wolfman<fix123>at the mansion.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら注目を浴びてるのかしら<fix123>貴方って……吸血鬼のメイドよね？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, so it seems my kind has some notoriety.<fix123>And you're... the vampire's maid?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>よくモノマネをしますよ<fix123>『あっしは満月を見ると<fix123>変身するでガンス』<fix123>…………<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I often get to perform this impression:<fix123>"When a' see a full moon,<fix123>a' transform!" [1]<fix123>......<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>…………<fix123>負けちゃったから<fix123>無条件で降伏するしかないのかー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>......<fix123>So, since I've lost,<fix123>I guess I have to surrender unconditionally.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>その前に……<fix123>他に暴れている妖怪が居ないか<fix123>知りません？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Before you do that...<fix123>Do you know if there are other youkai<fix123>running amok?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>他にって……<fix123>私は単独で行動してるけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Others?<fix123>Well, I'm acting on my own.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？<fix123>人魚とかろくろ首とかと<fix123>共謀していないの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123>Were you not conspiring with<fix123>that mermaid, that rokurokubi and others?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>共謀だなんて……<fix123>そんな事しないわよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A conspiracy..?<fix123>I took no part in any such thing.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うーん？<fix123>偶然同時多発的に暴れてた？<fix123>そんな事有り得ないと<fix123>思うんだけど……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmm... So it is just by coincidence<fix123> that you all became violent at once?<fix123>That seems<fix123>rather hard to believe...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>嵐の中の不協和音<fix123>Stormy Discord<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Dissonance Within the Storm<fix123>Stormy Discord<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>幻想郷上空（嵐）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Skies Above Gensokyo (Storm)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: マジカルストーム<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Magical Storm<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Benben Tsukumo ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Benben Tsukumo LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>急に不気味な雲が<fix123>現れたと思ったら<fix123>やっぱり自然に出来た雲じゃ<fix123>ないようね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>All these eerie clouds suddenly<fix123>turned up.<fix123>It certainly doesn't seem like<fix123>a natural phenomenon.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ちょっとまって<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wait a sec.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yatsuhashi Tsukumo ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>古びた琴の付喪神<fix123>九十九 八橋<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Tsukumogami of an Aged Koto<fix123>Yatsuhashi Tsukumo<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私の相手をしてくれない？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Why don't you fight with me?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>こんな上空に付喪神……？<fix123>良いわ<fix123>何か怪しいので相手をしてあげる<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There are tsukumogami all the way up here?<fix123>All right.<fix123>I detect something suspicious, so I accept.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Benben Tsukumo ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>こらこらそいつは私の獲物だぞ？<fix123>横取りとは感心しないねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now, now. That's my prey, you know.<fix123>Swiping her away is not very admirable behavior.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふーんだ<fix123>逃す方が悪いんだから<fix123>それにさっきの戦いをみてたけど<fix123>こいつは姉さんの直線的な<fix123>音楽じゃあ駄目よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmmph!<fix123>It's your fault for running away.<fix123>I saw you fighting her before, anyway.<fix123>Your plain, linear music<fix123>won't work on her, big sis.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ねえねえ<fix123>内輪もめはやめてくださる？<fix123>私は二人相手でも構わないから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Excuse me,<fix123>could you save the sibling rivalry for later?<fix123>I can fight you both at once.<fix123>It does not matter to me at all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うーん<fix123>姉さんは黙ってて<fix123>私は一人で人間と闘って<fix123>倒すのが夢だったんだから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey...<fix123>Could you stay out of this, Benben?<fix123>It's always been my dream to<fix123>fight against a human and win, you know.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あっそう　まあいいや<fix123>私は他の相手を探そうっと<fix123>じゃあ後はよろしく<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, whatever.<fix123>I'll just look for another opponent.<fix123>I'll leave the rest to you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Benben Tsukumo LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あっさりしてるのね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That seemed too easy.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私達の最終目的は<fix123>貴方を倒す事じゃないからね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, our ultimate goal isn't<fix123>to defeat you, after all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 幻想浄瑠璃<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Illusionary Joururi<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>大人しき者が力を得る<fix123>この下克上の世界<fix123>道具だって世界を支配できる！<fix123>貴方はその礎となるのよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The meek have gained power<fix123>in this world of social upheaval.<fix123>Even mere tools can rule the world!<fix123>I'll make you the foundation we'll stand on!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yatsuhashi Tsukumo DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>わっほーい<fix123>この人<fix123>強かったー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Whoa-hoー<fix123>This person<fix123>was strong...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>最終目的は<fix123>世界を支配する事……？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Your "ultimate goal"<fix123>is to rule the world, then?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうよ<fix123>そのお膳立ては整っているんだから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's right!<fix123>The preparations are already complete.<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Really?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何でか知らないけど<fix123>今まで大人しかった妖怪達ほど<fix123>強い力が貰える<fix123>そういう世界が出来つつあるの<fix123>それなら大人しい道具が<fix123>最強じゃない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I dunno why, but...<fix123>Even the youkai who've been docile up until now<fix123>have received a strong power too.<fix123>That's the kind of world it's turning into.<fix123>If that's so, then docile tools would<fix123>be the strongest of all, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>道具……？<fix123>　一体何が行われているの？<fix123>その話<fix123>もっと聞かせて？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Tools?<fix123>What in the world is happening?<fix123>Can you<fix123>tell me more?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>空中に浮かぶ逆さ城……<fix123>私達の力の源流はそこにあるわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The inverted castle floating in the sky...<fix123>That's where the source of our power is.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何もかも逆さまな世界<fix123>Reverse Ideology<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A Completely Inverted World<fix123>Reverse Ideology<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>空中逆さ城内部<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Floating Inverted Castle - Interior<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 空中に沈む輝針城<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Shining Needle Castle Sinking in the Air<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Seija Kijin ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Seija Kijin LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Seija Kijin ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>何だ？<fix123>お前は<fix123>ここはお前達のような人間が<fix123>来る場所ではない<fix123>即刻立ち去れい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What?<fix123>What do you want?<fix123>This isn't a place<fix123>for humans like you.<fix123>Leave at once!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ここに来たら道具が力を<fix123>持てると聞きました<fix123>その話を詳しく<fix123>聞きたいのですが……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I heard that tools who come here<fix123>could be granted power.<fix123>I would like to hear<fix123>the details...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>逆襲のあまのじゃく<fix123>鬼人 正邪<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Counterattacking Amanojaku<fix123>Seija Kijin<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>誰だ？<fix123>そんな適当な噂を流している奴は<fix123>まあ当たらずとも遠からず……<fix123>だが<fix123>それはあくまでも代償(・・)の所為だ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who is the one spreading all<fix123>those silly rumors?<fix123>Well, it's not correct, but not wrong either.<fix123>But...<fix123>That's all because of the "price".<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今まで大人しかった妖怪に<fix123>力を与えたり<fix123>道具にまで力を与えたり<fix123>しているって聞いたけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I heard that the youkai that<fix123>were docile until now,<fix123>and even tools,<fix123>have all been receiving power.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうか……地上でもそんな<fix123>変化が起きているのか<fix123>もっと調査が必要だな<fix123>代償の<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see... Even on the surface,<fix123>changes are happening.<fix123>I need to investigate this<fix123>"payment" some more...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええい　じれったい！<fix123>何を企んでいるのか言いなさい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Argh, I do not have the time for this!<fix123>Just tell me what you are plotting!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まあ人間になら話しても<fix123>良いだろう<fix123>我々はひっくり返す者(レジスタンス)だ<fix123>幻想郷の勢力図を塗り替えてやる<fix123>どのみち人間は被支配者だがな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, it should be okay to<fix123>explain to a human.<fix123>We are a force of resistance.<fix123>We will overturn society and re-draw the political borders of Gensokyo!<fix123>It doesn't have much to do with you, since<fix123>you humans will end up under our heels.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>レジスタンス！？<fix123>さっきのお琴が言っていた<fix123>世界を支配するってのは本当だったのね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A resistance force!?<fix123>So what the koto said before<fix123>about taking over the world was true.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どうだ？<fix123>理解したならここを去るが良い<fix123>人間にとっては今より<fix123>居心地の良い世界にしてやるよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What do you say?<fix123>If you understand, you should leave us be.<fix123>The new world will be more comfortable<fix123>for humans, after all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>残念ね<fix123>私は支配者側にいる人間なの<fix123>レジスタンスという事は<fix123>私達に対しての反逆という事よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Unfortunately,<fix123>I am a human on the ruling side.<fix123>To me, a resistance force<fix123>means a revolt against us.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Music stops<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>そうか……<fix123>それは驚きだ<fix123>我ら力弱き者達が如何(いか)に<fix123>虐げられていたか<fix123>お前達には判るまい<fix123>……ならば<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see...<fix123>That's a surprise.<fix123>None of you understand<fix123>how much we, the weak,<fix123>have been oppressed.<fix123>So...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: リバースイデオロギー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Reverse Ideology<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何もかもひっくり返る逆さ城で<fix123>弱者の屈辱を味わうがいい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>In this inverted castle where everything is turned upside-down,<fix123>I'll give you a taste of the humiliation the weak have suffered!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Seija Kijin DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>くう<fix123>なんてこった<fix123>時期尚早だったか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ugh.<fix123>How'd this happen?<fix123>Maybe my attempt was premature.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>幻想郷を混乱に陥れると<fix123>いうなら容赦しないわ<fix123>まあ　その程度の腕では<fix123>何も出来ないでしょうけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I will show no mercy to those<fix123>who want to plunge Gensokyo into chaos.<fix123>But I doubt you could do much anyway,<fix123>considering your level of strength.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まだだ<fix123>まだ始まったばかりだ<fix123>我らの手に秘宝(・・)がある限り<fix123>いくらでも強くなれるだろう<fix123>……多少の代償に目を瞑れば<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Not yet.<fix123>It's only just begun.<fix123>As long as we have that treasure,<fix123>we can become as strong as we want.<fix123>...As long as we can turn a blind eye to the price.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Seija Kijin LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あっ……<fix123>ここでは一息置いて<fix123>逃がすのが得策ね<fix123>我らって言ってたし　一人の仕業<fix123>じゃない事は明白なんだから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah...<fix123>Taking a rest and then fleeing<fix123>was a wise choice on her part.<fix123>She also said "we", so this clearly<fix123>is not the work of just one person.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>小さき者の大きな野望<fix123>Little Princess<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Small One's Great Ambition<fix123>Little Princess<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>輝針城 天守閣<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Shining Needle Castle - Castle Keep<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 針小棒大の天守閣<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Exaggerated Castle Keep<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Seija Kijin ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Seija Kijin DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>いつの間にか夜が明けてるわ<fix123>嵐も去ったみたい<fix123>ここからなら幻想郷が<fix123>見下ろせるわね……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It seems dawn broke at some point<fix123>and the storm also receded.<fix123>You could look down and see<fix123>all of Gensokyo from here...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だーれ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who's theeere?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Shinmyoumaru Sukuna ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あら人間？<fix123>何か用？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A human?<fix123>Do you need something?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この辺にひっくり返す者(レジスタンス)が居ると<fix123>聞きまして……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I heard that there was<fix123>a resistance force meeting here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら……賛同者って訳？<fix123>人間の貴方が？<fix123>嬉しいわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My... So you're a supporter?<fix123>A human supporter?<fix123>I'm so happy!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>小人の末裔<fix123>少名 針妙丸<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Descendant of the Inchlings<fix123>Shinmyoumaru Sukuna<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>我々小人の一族はその身体的特徴から<fix123>どうしても力は弱かった<fix123>味方する者も殆どいない<fix123>利用するだけして後はポイッだ<fix123>例え人間にも味方が居るって<fix123>こんなに嬉しい事なんだ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Thanks to the physical traits of the inchlings,<fix123>no matter what we do, we're powerless.<fix123>There's almost nobody who wants to ally with us.<fix123>We're just used, then thrown away.<fix123>Even a human or a youkai joining<fix123>our cause is great news.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いやえーと<fix123>あの<fix123>私はその企みを止めようと……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Umm,<fix123>actually...<fix123>I am trying to stop that plot...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>取り敢えず貴方にも力を与えないとね<fix123>自分が良い？<fix123>そのナイフが良い？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If you're joining, I have to give you some power as well.<fix123>Should I give it to you?<fix123>Or your knife?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？<fix123>もしかして力って……<fix123>道具を付喪神にするような力ですか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm?<fix123>By "power"...<fix123>You mean the power to change a tool into a tsukumogami?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうよ<fix123>それが欲しくて来たんでしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's right!<fix123>That's what you came for, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふーむ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmm.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どのみち人間では居られなくなる<fix123>でしょうけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Either way, you'll probably<fix123>no longer be a human, though.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ハッキリと言った方が良いわね<fix123>私は支配者側の人間であり<fix123>レジスタンス行為は自分にとって反逆行為<fix123>私は貴方達と与する事は出来ません<fix123>むしろここで征伐します！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see I should just say it outright.<fix123>I am a human on the ruling side,<fix123>so to me, resistance movements are treacherous.<fix123>I cannot support you in your endeavor.<fix123>Rather, I am here to subjugate you!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 輝く針の小人族　～ Little Princess<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Inchling of the Shining Needle ~ Little Princess<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あはははは<fix123>そうか支配者側……か　残念だ<fix123>だが私の手には夢幻の力がある<fix123>それが秘宝『打ち出の小槌(こづち)』！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ahahaha!<fix123>I see, you're on the ruling side... How unfortunate.<fix123>However, I have the power of dreams here in my hand.<fix123>This is our treasure, the "Miracle Mallet"!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>打ち出の小槌ですか……<fix123>……えっ！？　何ですって？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Miracle Mallet...<fix123>...Wait, what!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私には見える<fix123>支配関係が逆転する未来が！<fix123>さあ、秘宝(こづち)よ！<fix123>社会的弱者に夢幻の力を与え給え！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I can see it.<fix123>A future where the rulers and the ruled are reversed!<fix123>Now, my treasured mallet!<fix123>Grant the power of dreams to those who are socially weak!<fix123><fix123>

From now on, humans are gonna rule.<fix123>
I'll fear nothin' when I have this mini-hakkero!"<fix123>

I just thought it was strange."<fix123>

(Mmm, mmph...)<fix123>

"This girl was the culprit.<fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>And why's that?<fix123>You saw her first,<fix123>but your shoddy music won't be enough...<fix123>...to defeat this tsukumogami user.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>付喪神使い……？<fix123>そうね……この妖剣<fix123>付喪神みたいなもんね<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>What are you saying?<fix123>It doesn't just "seem" like one,<fix123>it IS one, no matter how you look at it.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふーん　まあいいや<fix123>こいつは姉さんに任せるわ<fix123>じゃあねー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmm. Well, whatever.<fix123>I'll leave her to you, Benben.<fix123>See you laterー<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yatsuhashi Tsukumo LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>逃がすもんですか！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Escaping now, are we!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>待ちな！<fix123>あんたの相手はこの私だよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hold it!<fix123>You will be facing me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 幻想浄瑠璃<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Illusionary Joururi<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何もかも逆さまな<fix123>下克上のこの世界<fix123>最強の道具が誰なのか<fix123>今ここで決めるわよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>In this world of social upheaval<fix123>where everything is turned on its head...<fix123>Who is the strongest tool?<fix123>We'll decide that here and now!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Benben Tsukumo DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>うーん<fix123>まいったまいった<fix123>降参よー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Nngh.<fix123>Okay, I lost.<fix123>I surrenderー<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>切れ味鈍らないわねー<fix123>斬っても斬っても<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No matter how much it cuts,<fix123>this blade does not grow dull.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そりゃそうよ<fix123>今や道具の天下だもの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, of course.<fix123>The whole world is ruled by tools right now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>道具の天下？<fix123>どういうことかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ruled by tools?<fix123>What are you talking about?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今や普段大人しい妖怪ほど<fix123>力が持てる世界なのよ？<fix123>そんなんなら<fix123>道具が最強に決まっているじゃない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Even youkai who are normally docile<fix123>can possess power in this world now, right?<fix123>It would follow that tools<fix123>would gain the strongest power of all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何その世界<fix123>初めて聞いたわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What kind of world is that?<fix123>This is the first I have heard of it.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方もその恩恵を与りたいんでしょ？<fix123>だったら先に行くといいわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You want to receive the same blessing too, right?<fix123>You should go on ahead, then.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>行くって何処に？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>To where, exactly?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>逆さ城に決まっているじゃない<fix123>私達の力の源流はそこなんだから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The inverted castle, of course!<fix123>That's where our power is coming from.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何もかも逆さまな世界<fix123>Reverse Ideology<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A Completely Inverted World<fix123>Reverse Ideology<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>空中逆さ城内部<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Floating Inverted Castle - Interior<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 空中に沈む輝針城<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Shining Needle Castle Sinking in the Air<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Seija Kijin ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Seija Kijin LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Seija Kijin ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>何だ？<fix123>お前は<fix123>ここはお前達のような人間が<fix123>来る場所ではない<fix123>即刻立ち去れい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What?<fix123>What do you want?<fix123>This isn't a place<fix123>for humans like you.<fix123>Leave at once!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ここに来たら道具が力を<fix123>持てると聞きました<fix123>その話を詳しく<fix123>聞きたいのですが……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I heard that tools who come here<fix123>could be granted power.<fix123>I would like to hear<fix123>the details...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>逆襲のあまのじゃく<fix123>鬼人 正邪<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Counterattacking Amanojaku<fix123>Seija Kijin<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……ほう<fix123>その手持ちの剣は<fix123>自我を持っている様だな<fix123>アレの代償が大きすぎたか……<fix123>こんな物まで影響を及ぼすのか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...Ah.<fix123>That blade in your hand...<fix123>It seems to have gained a sense of self.<fix123>Maybe the price for that was too great<fix123>if even those kinds of items were affected.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はい？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I beg your pardon?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まあいい<fix123>もっと強くありたいのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Never mind.<fix123>Do you want to become stronger?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まあ……そうですわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well... I suppose so.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なら私の仲間になるがいい<fix123>我々はひっくり返す者(レジスタンス)だ<fix123>幻想郷の勢力図を塗り替えてやる<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Then become my ally.<fix123>We are a force of resistance.<fix123>We will re-draw the political borders of Gensokyo!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>レジスタンス！？<fix123>これはこれは……<fix123>大変な話を聞いちゃった<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A resistance force!?<fix123>Well, well...<fix123>I think I just overheard something important.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どうだ？<fix123>賛同するか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So?<fix123>Will you join our cause?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>残念ながら私は既に<fix123>別勢力に付いていますので<fix123>レジスタンスという事は<fix123>私達に対しての反逆という事<fix123>仲間になる選択肢は元より無い<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Unfortunately, I am already<fix123>attached to another political power.<fix123>To me, a resistance force<fix123>means a revolt against us.<fix123>I never had the choice of becoming your ally from the start.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Music stops<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>そうか……<fix123>残念だな<fix123>我ら力弱き者達が如何(いか)に<fix123>虐げられていたか<fix123>お前達には想像できないか<fix123>……ならば<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see...<fix123>That is unfortunate.<fix123>If none of you can imagine<fix123>how much we, the weak,<fix123>have been oppressed...<fix123>Then...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: リバースイデオロギー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Reverse Ideology<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何もかもひっくり返る逆さ城で<fix123>弱者の屈辱を味わうがいい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>In this inverted castle where everything is turned upside-down,<fix123>I'll give you a taste of the humiliation the weak have suffered!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Seija Kijin DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>くう<fix123>なんてこった<fix123>時期尚早だったか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ugh.<fix123>How'd this happen?<fix123>Maybe my attempt was premature.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>口ほどではなかったですね<fix123>この剣だけで倒せそう……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It seems you were all talk.<fix123>This blade could probably beat you by itself...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>くっ<fix123>その剣の力も代償の影響だ<fix123>自分で首を絞めることに<fix123>なろうとはな<fix123>まあいい<fix123>我らの手に秘宝(・・)がある限り<fix123>いくらでも強くなれるだろう<fix123>さらばだ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ugh...<fix123>That sword's power is an effect of the "payment".<fix123>I can't believe it would become<fix123>something that could slit necks on its own.<fix123>But it doesn't matter.<fix123>As long as we have that treasure,<fix123>we can become as strong as we want.<fix123>Good bye.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Seija Kijin LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あっ……<fix123>これでハッキリしたわ<fix123>道具が動き出したり<fix123>大人しい妖怪が暴れたりしたのは<fix123>天邪鬼(レジスタンス)の仕業ね<fix123>どういう手段を使ったのか<fix123>までは判らないけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah...<fix123>Everything is clear now.<fix123>The reason why tools are moving on their own,<fix123>and docile youkai are running wild...<fix123>is because of that amanojaku's resistance force.<fix123>I don't know how she did<fix123>it yet, though.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>小さき者の大きな野望<fix123>Little Princess<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Small One's Great Ambition<fix123>Little Princess<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>輝針城 天守閣<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Shining Needle Castle - Castle Keep<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 針小棒大の天守閣<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Exaggerated Castle Keep<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Seija Kijin ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Seija Kijin DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>天邪鬼を倒したけど……<fix123>何でしょう<fix123>この胸騒ぎ……<fix123>何か居るわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I beat the amanojaku, but...<fix123>What could<fix123>this strange feeling be?<fix123>There must be someone here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だーれ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who's theeere?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Shinmyoumaru Sukuna ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あら人間？<fix123>何か用？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A human?<fix123>Do you need something?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>えーっと<fix123>ちょっと訊ねたい事がありまして<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Umm,<fix123>there was something I wanted to ask you about.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あれ？<fix123>その剣は……<fix123>間違い無いわ<fix123>私が実験的に付喪神にした物だー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm?<fix123>That blade...<fix123>There's no doubt about it.<fix123>That's something I made into a tsukumogami as an experimentー<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？<fix123>何ですって？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123>Wait, what?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それをわざわざ持ってきてくれたの？<fix123>人間も捨てたもんじゃ無いわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You brought it all the way here?<fix123>Even humans are good for something.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いやまあその<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, well, I, er...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>小人の末裔<fix123>少名 針妙丸<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Descendant of the Inchlings<fix123>Shinmyoumaru Sukuna<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>我々小人の一族はその身体的特徴から<fix123>どうしても力は弱かった<fix123>味方する者も殆どいない<fix123>利用するだけして後はポイッだ<fix123>そんな私にわざわざ会いに<fix123>来るなんて……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Thanks to the physical traits of the inchlings,<fix123>no matter what we do, we're powerless.<fix123>There's almost nobody who wants to ally with us.<fix123>We're just used, then thrown away.<fix123>I'm so glad you came all this way<fix123>just to meet me...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>えーっと盛り上がっているところ<fix123>申し訳ございません<fix123>私がここに来たのは成り行きです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Excuse me, I am sorry to<fix123>kill the mood,<fix123>but things just kind of led me here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうよね<fix123>道具に導かれて来たのよね<fix123>さあ私と一緒に<fix123>世界をひっくり返しましょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, I see.<fix123>You've been led by your tool.<fix123>Now, won't you join me<fix123>and turn the world upside-down?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……やはり天邪鬼(レジスタンス)の仲間なのね<fix123>貴方も<fix123>私は勢力者の下にいる<fix123>残念ながら私は反逆者に与する<fix123>つもりはない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So you are complicit with the amanojaku(resistance)<fix123>as well.<fix123>I am already aligned with another influential power.<fix123>Unfortunately for you, I have no intention to<fix123>support rebels of any kind.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 輝く針の小人族　～ Little Princess<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Inchling of the Shining Needle ~ Little Princess<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>では何故その剣に導かれるままに<fix123>ここにやってきたの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Then why have you come all this way<fix123>to where the knife led you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そ……それは<fix123>何となく妖怪を斬ってみたかっただけで<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, because...<fix123>For some reason, I just wanted to cut some youkai.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>道具が望むままに使用者を動かす<fix123>そんな事が可能になるのも<fix123>この秘宝『打ち出の小槌(こづち)』の力！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A tool controlling its user to do its bidding.<fix123>The only thing that could make that possible<fix123>is the power of our treasure, the "Miracle Mallet"!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>打ち出の小槌ですか……<fix123>……えっ！？　何ですって？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Miracle Mallet...<fix123>...Wait, what!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうだ！　物言わぬ道具に<fix123>夢幻の力を与える秘宝だ！<fix123>さあ、秘宝(こづち)よ！<fix123>迷える子羊を我ら反逆者(レジスタンス)の下に導き給え！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's right! It's the treasure that<fix123>imparts the power of dreams to speechless tools!<fix123>Now, my treasured mallet!<fix123>Lead this lost lamb to our resistance!<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>ちょっと肌寒いな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's a bit chilly.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あなたは！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, you!<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>淡水に棲む人魚<fix123>わかさぎ姫<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Mermaid Living in Fresh Water<fix123>Wakasagihime<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私を退治しに来たのですね？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Have you come to exterminate me?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ん？<fix123>ああ　まあそうかな<fix123>それにしても人魚か<fix123>湖にいたんだな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm?<fix123>Oh, yeah, I guess.<fix123>Anyway, a mermaid, huh?<fix123>I didn't know there was one in the lake.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いつも無視するんだもん<fix123>そろそろ私達 (ようかい) の出番が<fix123>あってもいいでしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You always ignore me.<fix123>Isn't it about time us youkai<fix123>had our day in the sun?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 秘境のマーメイド<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Mermaid from the Uncharted Land<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Wakasagihime DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ああ所詮は半分魚だ<fix123>大したことは無かったな<fix123>全部魚にした方が<fix123>強かったんじゃないか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>She was just a half-fish after all.<fix123>No big deal.<fix123>Wouldn't she be stronger<fix123>if she were all fish?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>柳の下の生首<fix123>Flying Head<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Severed Head Under the Willows<fix123>Flying Head<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Canal of Willows<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Humans and Youkai Traversing the Canal<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Sekibanki ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Sekibanki LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>こんなところにも<fix123>妖怪が出たか<fix123>柳の下なんて幽霊の旦那の<fix123>指定席だと思ってたが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So, youkai are showin' up<fix123>even in a place like this.<fix123>And here I thought the seats under the willows<fix123>were reserved for phantoms.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>意外と沢山居るのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You'd be surprised how many are here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Sekibanki ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ろくろ首の怪奇 <fix123>赤蛮奇<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Rokurokubi Horror<fix123>Sekibanki<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人里近くに住む妖怪も<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>As well as how many dwell near the Human Village.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おっと<fix123>さっきも会ったな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey,<fix123>I ran into ya a little while ago.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私も見て怖がらない<fix123>なんて許さない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I won't let you let away<fix123>with not being afraid of me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いやビックリしたぜ<fix123>さっき生首を見たしな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Actually, ya did surprise me there<fix123>when your head took off.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>その生首<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Do you want to...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 柳の下のデュラハン<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Dullahan Under the Willows<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もう一度見てみる？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>See me do that again?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Sekibanki DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>怖がってくれたかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Were you scared?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いやまあ<fix123>そうでも無いな<fix123>気持ち悪いけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, uh...<fix123>Not really.<fix123>But ya grossed me out.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>がっくし<fix123>最近の人間は肝が据わってるわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Urrgh...<fix123>Humans these days are so fearless.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まあ私は特別だからな<fix123>里で暴れるなよ？<fix123>子供が泣くぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I'm just special.<fix123>Don't cause a racket in the village, okay?<fix123>You'll make the kids cry.<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>私を退治しに来たのね？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You've come to exterminate me, haven't you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kagerou Imaizumi ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あー<fix123>退治されたいようだな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ahhhh,<fix123>ya sound like ya wanna be exterminated.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>竹林のルーガルー<fix123>今泉影狼<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Bamboo Forest's Loup-Garou<fix123>Kagerou Imaizumi<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方に私が倒せるかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Do you think you can defeat me?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>自信ありげだな<fix123>何か罠でも張っているのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ya look pretty confident.<fix123>Didja set a trap or somethin'?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふふふ<fix123>今日は満月だから……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hehehe.<fix123>It's because the moon is full tonight...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何の話だ？<fix123>はっ<fix123>迷いの竹林で満月だと？<fix123>何か嫌な予感がするな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So what?<fix123>Uh...<fix123>A full moon in the Bamboo Forest of the Lost?<fix123>I got a bad feelin' about this.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 孤独なウェアウルフ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Lonesome Werewolf<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう　いまや竹林は<fix123>月に祝福された地<fix123>ここで私と闘うなんて<fix123>気の毒だわ……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes. Now is the time when<fix123>the bamboo forest is a moon-blessed territory.<fix123>I feel sorry for you,<fix123>having to fight me here...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kagerou Imaizumi DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>狼女か……<fix123>湖の人魚といい今日は<fix123>半分人間の奴に会うな<fix123>ろくろ首はどうか判らんが……<fix123>あれも首から下は人間なのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A werewolf, huh?<fix123>I've been meetin' a lot of half-humans today.<fix123>First was that mermaid in the lake...<fix123>Not sure about rokurokubi, though...<fix123>Are they human from the neck down?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>湖の人魚って……<fix123>わかさぎ姫の事？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A mermaid in the lake?...<fix123>Do you mean Wakasagihime?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうだ<fix123>知り合いか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yeah.<fix123>Do ya know each other?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それなりにね<fix123>草の根妖怪ネットワークで<fix123>間違って食べようとした<fix123>事はあるけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Somewhat,<fix123>thanks to the grassroots youkai network.<fix123>Though I also tried to eat her once<fix123>by mistake.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふーんそうか<fix123>やっぱり何か企んでるだろ？<fix123>普段大人しい妖怪同士で<fix123>コソコソと……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmm, I see.<fix123>So you are plottin' something, right?<fix123>A bunch of normally quiet youkai,<fix123>gatherin' in secret...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あの子が暴れるとは<fix123>何かの間違いじゃない？<fix123>気弱で虫も殺せない<fix123>ような性格よ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That girl, attacking people?<fix123>Are you sure you're not mistaken?<fix123>That girl is so timid that<fix123>she wouldn't even kill a fly!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あー？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それに最低でも私は自分の<fix123>意思で暴れてみただけよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Besides, the most I did was<fix123>try and attack someone of my own accord.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うーん<fix123>嘘じゃ無さそうだな<fix123>そうか……<fix123>みんな気が立ってるんだな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmm...<fix123>Doesn't seem like yer lying.<fix123>I see...<fix123>Everyone's on edge.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>嵐の中の不協和音<fix123>Stormy Discord<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Dissonance Within the Storm<fix123>Stormy Discord<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>幻想郷上空（嵐）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Skies Above Gensokyo (Storm)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: マジカルストーム<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Magical Storm<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Benben Tsukumo ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Benben Tsukumo LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>急に雲が現れたと思ったら<fix123>こりゃあすげえな<fix123>確実にこの中に悪い奴がいる<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I thought these clouds appeared suddenly,<fix123>but this's really somethin' else.<fix123>There's gotta be a bad guy in here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yatsuhashi Tsukumo ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ちょっとまって<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wait a sec.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>古びた琴の付喪神<fix123>九十九 八橋<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Tsukumogami of an Aged Koto<fix123>Yatsuhashi Tsukumo<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私の相手をしてくれない？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Why don't you fight with me?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>付喪神だな？<fix123>丁度良い<fix123>きっとこういう奴を辿っていけば<fix123>ミニ八卦炉があ (・) あ (・) なった理由が判る筈<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A tsukumogami, huh?<fix123>Perfect.<fix123>If I follow someone like you,<fix123>I oughta figger out why my Mini-Hakkero started actin' up.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Benben Tsukumo ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>こらこらそいつは私の獲物だぞ？<fix123>横取りとは感心しないねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now, now. That's my prey, you know.<fix123>Swiping her away is not very admirable behavior.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふーんだ<fix123>逃す方が悪いんだから<fix123>それにさっきの戦いをみてたけど<fix123>こいつは姉さんの直線的な<fix123>音楽じゃあ駄目よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmmph!<fix123>It's your fault for running away.<fix123>I saw you fighting her before, anyway.<fix123>Your plain, linear music<fix123>won't work on her, big sis.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お　おう<fix123>二人相手でも構わないぞ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, um...<fix123>I don't mind fighting both of you at once...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うーん<fix123>私は一人で人間と闘って<fix123>倒すのが夢だったんだから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well...<fix123>It's always been my dream to<fix123>fight against a human and win, you know.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あっそう　まあいいや<fix123>私は他の相手を探そうっと<fix123>じゃあ後はよろしく<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, whatever.<fix123>I'll just look for another opponent.<fix123>I'll leave the rest to you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Benben Tsukumo LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>なんだ<fix123>結局お前一人か<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh,<fix123>so it's just you, then.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 幻想浄瑠璃<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Illusionary Joururi<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>道具だからって<fix123>甘く見ないでよね<fix123>大人しき者が力を得る<fix123>この下克上の世界<fix123>道具だって世界を支配できる！<fix123>貴方はその礎となるのよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Don't underestimate me just<fix123>because I'm a tool.<fix123>The meek have gained power<fix123>in this world of social upheaval.<fix123>Even mere tools can rule the world!<fix123>I'll make you the foundation we'll stand on!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yatsuhashi Tsukumo DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>わーお<fix123>こりゃ無理だー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wowー<fix123>I can't stand up to that.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さっき変な事を<fix123>言ってなかったか？<fix123>下克上の世界……とか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You said something<fix123>weird before, didn'tcha?<fix123>A "world of social upheaval," or something?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だって……<fix123>私みたいな道具でも力が持てる<fix123>最高じゃない<fix123>大人しくしている場合じゃないわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I mean...<fix123>Even tools like myself can possess power.<fix123>Isn't that awesome?<fix123>This is no time to be sitting around.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それで人間に逆襲した<fix123>とでも？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So does that mean you're taking<fix123>revenge on humans, or what?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間だけじゃないわ<fix123>いずれは世界を支配するつもりで<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Not just humans.<fix123>We plan to rule the entire world someday.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はん！<fix123>道具風情が世界をだと……？<fix123>いやまて……<fix123>そうか……<fix123>ミニ八卦炉が勝手に<fix123>動き出したのも……？<fix123>その話<fix123>詳しく教えてくれないか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hah!<fix123>Mere tools, ruling a world?<fix123>Wait, hold on...<fix123>I see...<fix123>Is this why the Mini-Hakkero<fix123>started moving on its own?<fix123>Could ya tell me more<fix123>about this?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今まで大人しかった妖怪達ほど<fix123>強い力が貰える<fix123>そういう世界が出来つつあるの<fix123>空中に浮かぶ逆さ城……<fix123>全てはあそこから出る力によって<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Even the youkai who've been docile up until now <fix123>have gotten more powerful, too.<fix123>That's the kind of world it's turning into.<fix123>All of our power comes from there,<fix123>that inverted castle floating in the sky...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何もかも逆さまな世界<fix123>Reverse Ideology<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A Completely Inverted World<fix123>Reverse Ideology<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>空中逆さ城内部<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Floating Inverted Castle - Interior<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 空中に沈む輝針城<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Shining Needle Castle Sinking in the Air<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Seija Kijin ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Seija Kijin LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Seija Kijin ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>何だ？<fix123>お前は<fix123>ここはお前達のような人間が<fix123>来る場所ではない<fix123>即刻立ち去れい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What?<fix123>What do you want?<fix123>This isn't a place<fix123>for humans like you.<fix123>Leave at once!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いやだ<fix123>ミニ八卦炉がおかしくなった原因が<fix123>ここにある筈なんでね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Not happenin'.<fix123>The reason my Mini-Hakkero's been goin' crazy<fix123>has gotta be here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>逆襲のあまのじゃく<fix123>鬼人 正邪<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Counterattacking Amanojaku<fix123>Seija Kijin<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何の話だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What are you talking about?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前は付喪神を操って<fix123>何かを企んでいるんだろ？<fix123>さっきそう聞いたぜ<fix123>琴だった付喪神にな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You've been controllin' the tsukumogami.<fix123>You're plottin' something, right?<fix123>I heard it from<fix123>a koto tsukumogami.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>付喪神……？<fix123>ははん<fix123>そうか代 (・) 償 (・) の影響か<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>From a tsukumogami?<fix123>Haha.<fix123>I see. It must be part of the "payment".<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Huh?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>付喪神などおまけでしかない<fix123>私が望むのはただ一つ<fix123>下克上だ！<fix123>強者が力を失い<fix123>弱者が統べる世界を望むのだ！<fix123>どのみち被支配者の人間には<fix123>関係無い話だがな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The tsukumogami are nothing but a bonus.<fix123>What I wish for is one thing only:<fix123>Social upheaval!<fix123>The strong shall lose their power<fix123>and the weak will rule the world!<fix123>It doesn't have much to do with you,<fix123>since you humans will end up under our heels.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>下克上だと？<fix123>それは困るな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Social upheaval?<fix123>Can't have that now, can we?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なあに　人間にとっては<fix123>今より住みよい世になるだろう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Why? For humans, it would be a world<fix123>of more ease than the one now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>違う違う<fix123>私は強者側だからな<fix123>下克上は私にとっての反逆だ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, no.<fix123>Because I'm one of the strong ones.<fix123>For me, "social upheaval" means a revolt.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほう……<fix123>お前にも判らぬか<fix123>我ら力弱き者達が如何 (いか) に<fix123>虐げられていたか<fix123>気にも留めたことがないと<fix123>言うのなら<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah...<fix123>You don't understand either.<fix123>If the thought of how much we, the weak,<fix123>have been oppressed so much<fix123>has never crossed your mind,<fix123>then...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: リバースイデオロギー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Reverse Ideology<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何もかもひっくり返る逆さ城で<fix123>初めての挫折を味わうがいい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>In this inverted castle where everything is turned upside-down,<fix123>I'll give you a taste your first failure!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Seija Kijin DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>くう<fix123>なんてこった<fix123>時期尚早だったか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ugh.<fix123>How'd this happen?<fix123>Maybe my attempt was premature.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほら強者だろ？<fix123>その程度の力で世の中をひっくり<fix123>返せると思っている事に驚きだ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I told ya I was one of the strong.<fix123>I'm surprised you could even think of flippin' the world<fix123>on its head when you're so weak.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まだだ<fix123>まだ諦めないぞ！<fix123>我らの手に秘宝がある限り<fix123>いくらでも強くなれるのだ<fix123>……多少の代償に目を瞑れば<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Not yet.<fix123>I haven't given up!<fix123>As long as we have that treasure,<fix123>we can become as strong as we want.<fix123>...As long as we can turn a blind eye to the price.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あっ　待て！<fix123>いくらでも強くなれる……<fix123>だと？<fix123>面白いじゃないか<fix123>ちょいと後を付けるか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, wait!<fix123>You can become as strong...<fix123>as ya want?<fix123>Now, don't that seem interestin'.<fix123>I'll just go ahead and follow her.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>小さき者の大きな野望<fix123>Little Princess<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Small One's Great Ambition<fix123>Little Princess<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>輝針城 天守閣<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Shining Needle Castle - Castle Keep<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 針小棒大の天守閣<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Exaggerated Castle Keep<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Seija Kijin ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Seija Kijin DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>外はすっかり晴れたようだな<fix123>清々しいぜ<fix123>こんな所に居る奴が<fix123>下克上とか考えるもんかな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, it's totally cleared up outside.<fix123>That's rejuvenatin'.<fix123>In a place like this, how could anyone think<fix123>about overthrowin' society?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だーれ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who's theeere?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Shinmyoumaru Sukuna ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あら巷で有名な魔法使いさん<fix123>来るべき時が来たのね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, it's that famous magician I've heard so much about.<fix123>You came at just the right time.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前が下克上を企んでいるのか<fix123>そんなこと許さないぞ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are you plottin' to overturn society?<fix123>I won't stand for that!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>最初の障碍 (しょうがい) が百戦錬磨の貴方とはね<fix123>だが諦めないよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The first obstacle is you, who has fought a hundred battles...<fix123>But I won't give up!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>小人の末裔<fix123>少名 針妙丸<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Descendant of the Inchlings<fix123>Shinmyoumaru Sukuna<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>小人の一族がどのような<fix123>屈辱を味わって来たのか<fix123>貴方達に判らせるまで！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I won't rest until you all know<fix123>the kind of humiliation that<fix123>the inchling race has endured!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前は小人だったのか……<fix123>小さくは見えないが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So you're an inchling...?<fix123>Ya don't look too small.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>大きくなる力を得た今こそ<fix123>世界をひっくり返す好機 (チャンス) なのよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now that we've gained a greater power,<fix123>this is our chance to turn the world upside-down!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふん　小人になんて負ける筈が無い<fix123>大体　自分が弱いって判ってるから<fix123>下克上って言ってるんだよな<fix123>かかってこい！<fix123>私は決して弱い者になんか負けないぜ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh. There's no way I'd lose to an inchling.<fix123>Ain't the whole reason you want to overthrow society<fix123>because you're weak in the first place?<fix123>Bring it on!<fix123>I'll never lose to a weakling!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 輝く針の小人族　～ Little Princess<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Inchling of the Shining Needle ~ Little Princess<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あはははは<fix123>やはり強者と弱者は相容れない……か<fix123>だが私の手には夢幻の力がある<fix123>それが秘宝『打ち出の小槌 (こづち) 』！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ahahaha.<fix123>I suppose the strong and weak really are incompatible...<fix123>However, I have the power of dreams here in my hand.<fix123>This is our treasure, the "Miracle Mallet"!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>打ち出の……小槌だと！？<fix123>あの何でも願いを叶えるという……！？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Miracle... Mallet!?<fix123>The one that can grant any wish!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あわてふためくがいい<fix123>私には逃げ惑う強者の姿が見える<fix123>さあ、秘宝 (こづち) よ！<fix123>哀れな弱者に夢幻の力を与え給え！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're right to be scared.<fix123>I can see a strong person trying to flee from me.<fix123>Now, my treasured mallet!<fix123>Impart your power of dreams to all the pitiful weaklings!<fix123><fix123>

A shrine on the east edge of Gensokyo.<fix123>
"Looks like my purification rod's finally calming down."<fix123>
"Actually, my mini-hakkero was goin' nuts too.<fix123>
Didn't know you were having the same kind of problem.<fix123>
And who knew it was the power of the Miracle Mallet..."<fix123>
"Apparently the plan was only to make herself strong<fix123>and upset the social order.<fix123>
The consequence of which was giving off magical power<fix123>which made creatures vicious."<fix123>
"So the Mallet's effect caused peaceful youkai to rampage<fix123>and tools to move on their own... Well, no wonder."<fix123>
"No wonder what?"<fix123>
"When I held my mini-hakkero, I felt kinda gloomy.<fix123>
I felt like torchin' stuff, didn't matter what.<fix123>
That must have been an effect of the magic."<fix123>
"Hmm, well, I didn't have any thoughts like that with my rod."<fix123>
"Really? Well... huh."<fix123>
"So, what happened to those youkai?<fix123>
What was it, Issun-boushi and an Amanojaku?"<fix123>
"Well, about that.<fix123>
I don't know where the Amanojaku went, but..."<fix123>
"Whoaaa, it's shaking! Is it an earthquake?"<fix123>
"Did I wake you?"<fix123>
"Eh?! You're tellin' me she's the one behind the incident?"<fix123>
"She used too much of the mallet's power,<fix123>so she won't be able to get big for a while."<fix123>
"Yeah, that's right.<fix123>
The blowback was worse than I thought..."<fix123>
"Oh, huh...<fix123>
Still, kinda cruel treating her like a bug, you think?"<fix123>
"Not at all.<fix123>
She has a cage to protect her from other bugs and animals."<fix123>
"Thaaanks! You're so considerate!"<fix123>
All the power stored in the Inchling was released,<fix123>making her small again. She'll be that way for a while.<fix123>
The Miracle Mallet will have to recollect its power later.<fix123>
It's thought the tools and weak youkai will gradually lose their power.<fix123>
Until then, Shinmyoumaru will be tiny as Inchlings are known to be.<fix123>
Did Reimu care for her because she felt guilty toward weaklings?<fix123>
Then again, looking at such a little youkai,<fix123>it's hard to see her as the mastermind of a social upheaval.<fix123>
<c$Ending No. 01 — Issun-Boushi in an insect cage.$><fix123>
<c$All clear! Congratulations! You're cool!$><fix123>
The Hakurei Shrine.<fix123>
A shrine on the east edge of Gensokyo.<fix123>
"Grooow big!"<fix123>
"Nope, it didn't do anything..."<fix123>
"Sure it's not a fake?"<fix123>
"No, I definitely got bigger earlier."<fix123>
"And how did that go?"<fix123>
"It got really hard to dodge bullets.<fix123>It's best not to get too huge, I'd say."<fix123>
"...Eh, sure."<fix123>
"Swing it all you want, it won't work for humans."<fix123>
"Oh? Did somebody say something?"<fix123>
"Only we Inchlings can use the Miracle Mallet.<fix123>
Though our bodies are small as a consequence..."<fix123>
"Hmph, really? That's boring.<fix123>
But say, is it true it can grant any wish?"<fix123>
"Maaaybe. I've heard as much."<fix123>
"What, and you never tried it?"<fix123>
"Well, there's no way to prove it can grant any wish.<fix123>
That's what the Amanojaku told me."<fix123>
"The amanojaku told you that... and you believed it?"<fix123>
"Maybe it doesn't really grant wishes at all."<fix123>
"Hey, um, my hands are getting numb..."<fix123>
All the power stored in the Inchling was released,<fix123>making her small again. She'll be that way for a while.<fix123>
This was the first time the Miracle Mallet<fix123>had been used for a wish besides growing big.<fix123>
Besides the desired wish, power unexpectedly leaked,<fix123>enraging peaceful youkai and making tools come alive.<fix123>
One might wonder, did the Amanojaku know about this?<fix123>
<c$Ending No. 02 — (Hitbox,) grooow smaller!$><fix123>
<c$All clear! Congratulations! You're cool!$><fix123>
The Hakurei Shrine.<fix123>
Reimu's spirit was shaken.<fix123>
"Agh, so relentless...<fix123>Should I join the side of the resistance...?"<fix123>
Reimu was crushed under the mighty Miracle Mallet.<fix123>
But to want to side with the resistance...<fix123>
Do you want to make an enemy of all humans and youkai, Reimu?<fix123>
<c$Ending No. 07 — You can't give up yet!$><fix123>
<c$Aim for a no-continue clear!$><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>What?<fix123>What do you want?<fix123>This isn't a place<fix123>for humans like you.<fix123>Leave at once!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いやだ<fix123>こんな面白そうなもん見つけて<fix123>手ぶらで帰れるもんか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Not happenin'.<fix123>This place is too interestin'<fix123>for me to leave empty-handed.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>逆襲のあまのじゃく<fix123>鬼人 正邪<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Counterattacking Amanojaku<fix123>Seija Kijin<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……ほう<fix123>その手持ちの道具<fix123>自我を持っている様だな<fix123>お前も我々の仲間になるか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...Ah.<fix123>That tool in your hand...<fix123>It seems to have gained a sense of self.<fix123>Will you become our ally as well?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>仲間……だと？<fix123>何を企んでいる？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Whaddya mean "ally"?<fix123>What are ya planning?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>我々はひっくり返す者(レジスタンス)だ<fix123>姫の秘宝(・・)を使い<fix123>幻想郷をひっくり返すのだ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We are a force of resistance.<fix123>We'll use the princess's treasure<fix123>to turn Gensokyo on its head.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お　おおう<fix123>そうか　それは大変だな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>O-oh.<fix123>I see. That's a big deal.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前もまだ生まれて間もない<fix123>力無き妖怪だろう？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You, too, must be a weak youkai,<fix123>only recently come to life, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>よ　妖怪だってぇ？<fix123>馬鹿にするな<fix123>私は人間だ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Y-Youkai?<fix123>Are ya makin' fun of me?<fix123>I'm a human.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Music stops<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>まあよい<fix123>味方になるなら人間でも構わぬ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, fine.<fix123>Even humans will be welcome allies.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>幻想郷をひっくり返すなんて<fix123>賛同するわけがない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There's no way I'd agree with somethin' like<fix123>turnin' Gensokyo upside-down.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうか残念だな……<fix123>その八卦炉(つくもがみ)が泣いているぞ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, that's unfortunate...<fix123>You're going to make that Hakkero(tsukumogami) cry, you know?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: リバースイデオロギー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Reverse Ideology<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>持ち主が天に落ちていく姿が<fix123>最後に見るものだなんてな！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The last thing it sees will be<fix123>its owner, falling out of the sky!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Seija Kijin DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>くう<fix123>なんてこった<fix123>時期尚早だったか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ugh.<fix123>How'd this happen?<fix123>Maybe my attempt was premature.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何だよ<fix123>拍子抜けだぜ<fix123>もっと熱い闘いが繰り<fix123>広げられると思ったのに<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Man,<fix123>that was such a let-down.<fix123>I thought you were going to<fix123>give me a better fight.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ますます仲間に欲しくなった<fix123>お前の力<fix123>我らの手に秘宝がある限り<fix123>お前もいくらでも強くなれるだろう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This just makes me want your power<fix123>on our side even more.<fix123>As long as we have that treasure,<fix123>you can become as strong as you want, too.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>秘宝……だと？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Treasure, ya say?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>次の一振り(おねだり)はお前の心変わりに<fix123>するかな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Maybe our next approach<fix123>will change your mind.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Seija Kijin LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あっ　待て！<fix123>秘宝……か<fix123>そういえば私の目的は<fix123>秘宝の発見だった<fix123>そうだ<fix123>そういう事にして追いかけるぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, wait!<fix123>Treasure, huh...?<fix123>That reminds me. My goal was to<fix123>find myself some treasure.<fix123>Yeah!<fix123>I'll chase her down and do just that!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>小さき者の大きな野望<fix123>Little Princess<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Small One's Great Ambition<fix123>Little Princess<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>輝針城 天守閣<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Shining Needle Castle - Castle Keep<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 針小棒大の天守閣<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Exaggerated Castle Keep<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Seija Kijin ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Seija Kijin DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>外はすっかり晴れたようだな<fix123>清々しいぜ<fix123>……何だか気が大きくなるな<fix123>今なら幻想郷も支配できる気がする<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, it totally cleared up outside.<fix123>That's rejuvenatin'.<fix123>...Kinda feels like I could do anythin' I wanted.<fix123>I feel like I could even rule over Gensokyo right now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だーれ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who's theeere?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Shinmyoumaru Sukuna ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あら巷で有名な魔法使いさん<fix123>もしかして私と一緒に<fix123>世界をひっくり返しに来たの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, it's that famous magician I've heard so much about.<fix123>Could you perhaps be here to<fix123>turn the world upside-down with me?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いや　あー<fix123>そうだ思い出した<fix123>ひ　秘宝を頂きに来たんだぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, uh...<fix123>Right, I remember.<fix123>I-I'm here to take some treasure.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あはははは<fix123>やっぱりね！<fix123>貴方の心が力を渇望しているのが<fix123>見えるもの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ahahaha!<fix123>I knew it!<fix123>I can see that your heart<fix123>longs for power.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なん……だと？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What? How...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間の味方がいるって<fix123>なんて心強いのかしら<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Having a human ally would be<fix123>greatly reassuring to us.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>小人の末裔<fix123>少名 針妙丸<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Descendant of the Inchlings<fix123>Shinmyoumaru Sukuna<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>我々小人の一族はその身体的特徴から<fix123>どうしても力は弱かった<fix123>味方する者も殆どいない<fix123>利用するだけして後はポイッだ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Thanks to the physical traits of the inchlings,<fix123>no matter what we do, we're powerless.<fix123>There's almost nobody who wants to ally with us.<fix123>We're just used, then thrown away.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前は小人だったのか……<fix123>小さくは見えないが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're an Inchling...?<fix123>Ya don't look too small.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>大きくなる力を得た今こそ<fix123>世界をひっくり返す好機(チャンス)なのよ！<fix123>もちろん貴方も賛同してくれるよね？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now that we've gained a greater power,<fix123>this is our chance to turn the world upside-down!<fix123>You surely agree, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うーん　ひっくり返す……か<fix123>面白そうだが<fix123>家の中が散らかるから<fix123>協力したくないな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Umm. Turn it upside-down...?<fix123>That seems interesting, but...<fix123>It'd make a total mess of my house,<fix123>so I don't really wanna help ya.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 輝く針の小人族　～ Little Princess<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Inchling of the Shining Needle ~ Little Princess<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>では何故秘宝の力を望む？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Then why do you desire my treasure's power?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そもそも秘宝が何なのか<fix123>実は知らなかったり……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I don't know what your<fix123>treasure is in the first place, so...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>面白い事を言うね<fix123>その道具に更なる力が欲しいんでしょ？<fix123>それが出来るのが<fix123>この秘宝『打ち出の小槌(こづち)』！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How amusing.<fix123>Don't you want more power for your tool?<fix123>That power can be easily granted<fix123>with this treasure, the "Miracle Mallet"!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>打ち出の……小槌だと！？<fix123>あの何でも願いを叶えるという……！？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Miracle... Mallet!?<fix123>The one that can grant any wish!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうだ！　全ての力弱き者に<fix123>夢幻の力を与える秘宝だ！<fix123>さあ、秘宝(こづち)よ！<fix123>人間、霧雨魔理沙の心を動かし給え！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes! A treasure that can grant the power<fix123>of dreams to all those who are weak!<fix123>Now, my treasured mallet!<fix123>Shake the heart of this human named Marisa Kirisame!<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Were there really any youkai<fix123>who would run amok in this lake?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あなたは！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, you!<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>淡水に棲む人魚<fix123>わかさぎ姫<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Mermaid Living in Fresh Water<fix123>Wakasagihime<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>かの高名な巫女じゃ<fix123>ありませんか<fix123>あれ？<fix123>武器を持っていないって事は<fix123>私を退治しに来た<fix123>訳ではないの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're that famous shrine maiden,<fix123>aren't you?<fix123>Huh?<fix123>You don't have a weapon.<fix123>Does that mean you haven't<fix123>come to exterminate me?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>退治に来たんだけど<fix123>お祓い棒は……ちょっとね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I came to exterminate you,<fix123>but that purification rod, well...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>舐めきってるわね！<fix123>私達 (ようかい) の恐ろしさを<fix123>再確認すると良いわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're underestimating me!<fix123>You ought to reaffirm the terror<fix123>that we youkai hold!<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Mermaid from the Uncharted Land<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>人魚は大人しい妖怪だと<fix123>思ってたんだけどねぇ<fix123>やっぱり何か<fix123>起きてるのかな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>And here I thought that mermaids<fix123>were a quiet sort of youkai.<fix123>Something's definitely<fix123>going on.<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>Sekibanki LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>こんな人里近くで<fix123>妖怪騒ぎだって！？<fix123>これは本格的に異変が<fix123>起こっているんだわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Youkai are rampaging<fix123>this close to the Human Village!?<fix123>We've got a bona fide<fix123>incident on our hands.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>早速現れたわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You showed up fast.<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>ろくろ首の怪奇 <fix123>　赤蛮奇<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Rokurokubi Horror<fix123>Sekibanki<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私を退治しに来たというの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Have you come to exterminate me?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>探す手間が省けたわ<fix123>そっちから出て来てくれるなんて<fix123>さっさと片付けるわよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Thanks for coming out on your own.<fix123>You saved me a lot of searching.<fix123>I'll make this quick!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……本当ね<fix123>大人しくしてたら<fix123>人間が増長したって<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...So, it's true.<fix123>Humans really have gotten swollen heads<fix123>now that we've been calm for a while.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ってあんた……<fix123>ろくろ首ね？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, wait...<fix123>Aren't you a rokurokubi?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 柳の下のデュラハン<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Dullahan Under the Willows<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうよ<fix123>人間は誰だって私を怖がるわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's right.<fix123>There isn't a human alive who isn't afraid of me!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Sekibanki DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>な　なによあんた<fix123>強いじゃないのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wh-What's with you?<fix123>You're actually strong.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>妖怪退治は専門だもん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, youkai extermination IS my speciality.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もしかして<fix123>あなたは……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Could you<fix123>perhaps be...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今頃気付いたの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You just realized it now?<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>My, my...<fix123>If it isn't that shrine's maiden.<fix123>The one infamous for<fix123>being overrun with youkai.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>十五夜の妖獣<fix123>Metamorphose<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Beast Youkai of the 15th Night<fix123>Metamorphose<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Bamboo Forest of the Lost<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 満月の竹林<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Bamboo Forest of the Full Moon<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kagerou Imaizumi ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Kagerou Imaizumi LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>私を退治しに来たのね？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You've come to exterminate me, haven't you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kagerou Imaizumi ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>何か……<fix123>今日倒して来た妖怪って<fix123>みんな退治されたがって<fix123>いたような<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh...<fix123>It's like all the youkai I beat today...<fix123>Actually wanted<fix123>to be exterminated.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>竹林のルーガルー<fix123>今泉影狼<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Bamboo Forest's Loup-Garou<fix123>Kagerou Imaizumi<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう見えるのかしら？<fix123>ただ単にみんなちょっと<fix123>嬉しいだけだと思うけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Does it look like that to you?<fix123>I think everyone is<fix123>just a little happy.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>嬉しいだって！？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Happy!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>妖怪退治の専門家だって<fix123>謳っていてもさ<fix123>私達みたいな単独行動の妖怪は<fix123>いつも相手にされてなかったから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Even if you declare yourself to be<fix123>some youkai-exterminating professional,<fix123>You haven't always fought<fix123>independently-acting youkai like us.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私だって暇じゃ無いのよ<fix123>かまって貰いたい為だけで<fix123>暴れないで欲しいなぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's not like I have the time for it.<fix123>I wish you wouldn't cause a ruckus<fix123>just to get my attention.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 孤独なウェアウルフ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Lonesome Werewolf<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>調子に乗ると痛い目に<fix123>遭うわよ？<fix123>よりにもよって<fix123>こんな満月の夜にね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If you get too presumptuous,<fix123>you're going to regret it.<fix123>And of all times,<fix123>on this night of a full moon.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kagerou Imaizumi DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>何の妖怪かと思ったら<fix123>狼女だったのね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I wondered what youkai you were.<fix123>So you were a werewolf.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あーあ<fix123>満月なのに負けちゃった<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Geez...<fix123>I lost, even with the full moon.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>最近普段大人しい筈の妖怪が<fix123>暴れているみたいだけど<fix123>何故なの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>All these normally docile youkai<fix123>are going crazy lately.<fix123>Why is that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さあ<fix123>偶然じゃ無いかしら？<fix123>最低でも私は自分の意思よ？<fix123>……たぶん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I don't know.<fix123>Maybe it's just coincidental?<fix123>At the very least, I'm acting on my own will.<fix123>...Probably.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>むむむ<fix123>そんな妙な事あるかなぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hum.<fix123>That seems odd.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>本当は満月の日に出たく<fix123>なかったんだけどなぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I don't even want to come out<fix123>on nights of the full moon, either.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんで？<fix123>さっきまで嬉々としてたじゃない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Why's that?<fix123>You were all upbeat just a little while ago.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほら……<fix123>抜け毛の処理が面倒だから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, look...<fix123>It's a pain to clean up the hair that falls out.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あー　うん<fix123><fix123>
