en_dialogue: <fix123>Now, now. That's my prey, you know.<fix123>Swiping her away is not very admirable behavior.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふーんだ<fix123>逃す方が悪いんだから<fix123>それにさっきの戦いをみてたけど<fix123>こいつは姉さんの直線的な<fix123>音楽じゃあ駄目よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmmph!<fix123>It's your fault for running away.<fix123>I saw you fighting her earlier, anyway.<fix123>Your plain, linear music<fix123>won't work on her, big sis.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>えーっと<fix123>何でも良いから始めてくれない？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Err...<fix123>I don't really care, so can we start now?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうね<fix123>やるわよー？<fix123>私は人間と闘って倒すのが<fix123>夢だったんだから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>All right.<fix123>Let's do this, then?<fix123>It's always been my dream to<fix123>fight against a human and win, you know.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まあいいや<fix123>私は他の相手を探そうっと<fix123>じゃあ後はよろしく<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, whatever.<fix123>I'll just look for another opponent.<fix123>I'll leave the rest to you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Benben Tsukumo LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あ　ちょっ……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, wait...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どっちをみてるのよ<fix123>貴方の相手は私よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who are you looking at?<fix123>You're messing with ME!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 幻想浄瑠璃<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Illusionary Joururi<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>大人しき者が力を得る<fix123>この下克上の世界<fix123>道具だって世界を支配できる！<fix123>貴方はその礎となるのよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The meek have gained power<fix123>in this world of social upheaval.<fix123>Even mere tools can rule the world!<fix123>I'll make you the foundation we'll stand on!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yatsuhashi Tsukumo DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ありゃりゃ<fix123>強いのねー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, geez.<fix123>You're strong-<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ちょっとちょっと<fix123>下克上の世界って<fix123>どういうこと？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wait, wait.<fix123>What did you mean by<fix123>"world of social upheaval"?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？<fix123>だって……<fix123>私みたいな道具でも力が持てる<fix123>最高じゃない<fix123>大人しくしている場合じゃないわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123>I mean...<fix123>Even tools like myself can possess power.<fix123>Isn't that awesome?<fix123>This is no time to be sitting around.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>道具が力を……だって？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The tools have power?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それに今まで大人しかった妖怪達ほど<fix123>強い力が貰えるのよ？<fix123>これは下克上の流れだわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Even the youkai who've been docile up until now<fix123>have gotten more powerful, too.<fix123>That's how social upheaval works!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？　力が貰える？<fix123>何を言って……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh? They've gotten powerful?<fix123>What are you--<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>空中に浮かぶ逆さ城……<fix123>あそこから力が溢れ出てるのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That inverted castle floating in the sky...<fix123>Power is overflowing from it.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何もかも逆さまな世界<fix123>Reverse Ideology<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A Completely Inverted World<fix123>Reverse Ideology<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>空中逆さ城内部<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Floating Inverted Castle - Interior<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 空中に沈む輝針城<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Shining Needle Castle Sinking in the Air<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Seija Kijin ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Seija Kijin LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Seija Kijin ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>何だ？<fix123>お前は<fix123>ここはお前達のような人間が<fix123>来る場所ではない<fix123>即刻立ち去れい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What?<fix123>What do you want?<fix123>This isn't a place<fix123>for humans like you.<fix123>Leave at once!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はいそうですか……<fix123>って立ち去る訳がないでしょ？<fix123>空中にこんなお城を建てて<fix123>何考えているのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You can't possibly think I'd just say<fix123>"okay" and be on my way.<fix123>What are you thinking,<fix123>building this huge castle in the air?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>逆襲のあまのじゃく<fix123>鬼人 正邪<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Counterattacking Amanojaku<fix123>Seija Kijin<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>聞きたいか？<fix123>聞きたいよな？<fix123>何を隠そう我らは<fix123>下克上を企んでいるのだ！<fix123>まあ関係無い話だがな<fix123>どのみち被支配者の人間には<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You want to hear?<fix123>I bet you do, huh?<fix123>To tell you the truth,<fix123>we're plotting to overthrow society!<fix123>It doesn't have much to do with you,<fix123>since you humans will end up under our heels.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>本気で下克上を考えている奴が<fix123>いたのね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So there are people<fix123>who would seriously consider social upheaval.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんだ？<fix123>驚かないな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What?<fix123>Aren't you surprised?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だってさっきお琴の付喪神が<fix123>そんな話してたもん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, the koto tsukumogami I met earlier<fix123>was saying things like that.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何だと？<fix123>お琴の付喪神だと……？<fix123>そうか<fix123>それも代償の一つだな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What?<fix123>A koto tsukumogami...?<fix123>I see.<fix123>That must be part of the payment.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まあいい<fix123>それも味方に付くだろう！<fix123>これからは強者が力を失い<fix123>弱者がこの世を統べるのだ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, whatever.<fix123>That just means we have more allies!<fix123>From here on, the strong shall lose their power<fix123>and the weak will control the world!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>呆れたわ<fix123>そんな誰も得をしない事を<fix123>する妖怪がいるなんて<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm shocked.<fix123>I can't believe there are youkai who would<fix123>do something no one would benefit from like that.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Music stops<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>誰も得をしない<fix123>……だとぉ？<fix123>我ら力弱き者達が如何(いか)に<fix123>虐げられていたか<fix123>お前達には判るまい<fix123>……ならば[1]<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Nobody would benefit...<fix123>you say?<fix123>None of you understand<fix123>how much we, the weak,<fix123>have been oppressed.<fix123>So...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: リバースイデオロギー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Reverse Ideology<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何もかもひっくり返る逆さ城で<fix123>念願の挫折を味わうがいい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>In this inverted castle where everything is turned upside-down,<fix123>I'll give you a taste of this earnest frustration!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Seija Kijin DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>くう<fix123>なんてこった<fix123>時期尚早だったか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ugh.<fix123>How'd this happen?<fix123>Maybe my attempt was premature.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>下克上だなんて……<fix123>幻想郷を混乱に貶める<fix123>行動は許さないわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Overthrowing society...<fix123>I won't allow you to cast<fix123>Gensokyo into chaos!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>混乱だと？<fix123>だから人間に何が判る<fix123>ただ力が無いだけで悪の汚名を<fix123>着せられ虐げられてきた私の歴史<fix123>今こそ復讐の時だ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Chaos?<fix123>Just like a human. You don't understand.<fix123>My history is filled with disgrace and oppression,<fix123>just for not having any power. <fix123>Now is the time for revenge!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あっ　ちょっ！<fix123>まあ追えば良いんでしょ？<fix123>追えば<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, wait--!<fix123>Well, I suppose I should chase her?<fix123>Yeah, let's do that.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>The Small One's Great Ambition<fix123>Little Princess<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Looks like the daybreak just arrived.<fix123>The stage for our battle is nice and set.<fix123>Now, show yourself!<fix123>The one disturbing Gensokyo's peace!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だーれ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who's theeere?<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>あら博麗神社の巫女じゃない<fix123>来るべき時が来たのね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, if it isn't the Hakurei shrine maiden.<fix123>You came at just the right time.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あんたが誰なのか知らないけど<fix123>下克上を企んでるんだって？<fix123>悪いけど<fix123>その企みはここでお仕舞いよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I have no idea who you are,<fix123>but you're planning to overthrow society, right?<fix123>Sorry,<fix123>but this plot of yours ends here!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ついに巫女に気付かれ<fix123>ちゃったのかー<fix123>でも私は諦めない！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Uh-oh, it seems the shrine maiden<fix123>finally caught on...<fix123>But I won't give up!<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Descendant of the Inchlings<fix123>Shinmyoumaru Sukuna<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>小人の一族がどのような<fix123>屈辱を味わって来たのか<fix123>貴方達に判らせるまで！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I won't rest until you all know<fix123>the kind of humiliation that<fix123>the inchling race has endured!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>小人だって！？<fix123>そんなの居たんだ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Inchling!?<fix123>They really exist?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほらそれよ！<fix123>小人はいつも無視されてきたんだわ<fix123>貴方達には弱者の気持ちが<fix123>わからない<fix123>だから下克上するの！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, of course!<fix123>You've always ignored the inchlings.<fix123>None of you understand the feelings<fix123>of the weak.<fix123>That's why I'm going to overthrow society!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>弱いって判ってるんなら<fix123>大人しくしてないとね<fix123>それが幻想郷の理(ことわり)よ！<fix123>大体　弱者がどうやって<fix123>私に勝つつもりなのかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If you know you're weak, then<fix123>you should behave yourself.<fix123>That's the law(truth) of Gensokyo!<fix123>And besides, how does someone weak like you<fix123>expect to win against me?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あはははは<fix123>やはり強者と弱者は相容れない……か<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ahahaha.<fix123>I suppose the strong and weak really are incompatible...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 輝く針の小人族　～ Little Princess<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Inchling of the Shining Needle ~ Little Princess<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>However, I have the power of dreams here in my hand.<fix123>This is our treasure, the "Miracle Mallet"!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>打ち出の……小槌だって！？<fix123>もしかしてその手にあるのは……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Miracle... Mallet!?<fix123>If you have that, then does that mean...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あわてふためくがいい<fix123>私には逃げ惑う強者の姿が見える<fix123>さあ、秘宝(こづち)よ！<fix123>身体小さき者に夢幻の力を与え給え！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're right to be scared.<fix123>I can see a strong person trying to flee from me.<fix123>Now, my treasured mallet!<fix123>Impart your power of dreams to all those of small stature!<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>Ending　No. 02 (Good Ending)<fix123><fix123>
The Netherworld mansion, Hakugyokurou.<fix123>
Youmu was reporting the recent happenings to Yuyuko Saigyouji.<fix123>
Youmu did not understand why the divine spirits had been decreasing in number.<fix123>
In any case, Youmu wanted to tell the story of her bravery.<fix123>
"Oh? What's that?<fix123>
You resurrected a human from 1,400 years ago?<fix123>
I'm sooo jealous!"<fix123>
"Huh? That's your response?"<fix123>
"Yes, it is.<fix123>
Because they were revived, see? Isn't that wonderful?"<fix123>
"Uh, I suppose so."<fix123>
"So, what kind of magic did they use?"<fix123>

"It seemed to be something involving dying once and then<fix123>being revived as an immortal ‘Shikaisen’ (corpse-free immortal)..."(Specifically, this refers to Taoists that achieved their immortality through practice of Shijie.)<fix123>
"Shikaisen! I think I'll try that myself!"<fix123>
"Are you familiar with this method, Lady Yuyuko?"<fix123>
"I'm not, but I'm sure I can do it anyway!"<fix123>
A good while later...<fix123>
"Lady Yuyuko, how did the Shikaisen resurrection go?"<fix123>
"Got tired of it."<fix123>
"Youmu."<fix123>
"Yes?"<fix123>
"Clean this up."<fix123>
"I'll get right on it."<fix123>
"Resurrecting yourself sure is hard..."<fix123>
"...Well, should I check up on Shikaisen? For next time?"<fix123>
"Like I said, I'm just tired of it. Good night."<fix123>
Yuyuko was a ghost princess.<fix123>
Yet it seemed she could enjoy food and relax like<fix123>a human without feeling the slightest discomfort.<fix123>
Why she desired to be resurrected, Youmu had not the slightest idea.<fix123>
Speaking of which, Youmu didn't understand the enemies she had faced either.<fix123>
All of them were seeking immortality.<fix123>
Was immortality really such a charming prospect?<fix123>
What separates those that seek immortality and those that don't?<fix123>
Was it perhaps a sense of honor that made the difference?<fix123>
What did those girls see in it? Youmu gazed at Yuyuko as she slept.<fix123>
<c$Ending No.07 — Having a lazy master is a pain.$><fix123>
<c$Congratulations, all clear! Just as I'd expected!$><fix123>
The Netherworld.<fix123>
One of the worlds to which spirits go after death.<fix123>
Outrageously spacious. Nothing if not spacious.<fix123>
"What's the deal here?"<fix123>
"Lady Yuyuko, I've realized something."<fix123>
"Oh, that you haven't been tending to the garden? Just now, really?"<fix123>
"...Well, uh, um. No, not that."<fix123>
"Then what?"<fix123>
"The fact that, in truth, I'm a hermit."<fix123>
"This battle helped me understand. I was a hermit all along."<fix123>
"Oh my, what to do... The spring weather must be affecting Youmu."<fix123>
"I'm not lying.<fix123>
As proof, I shall fly into the sky."<fix123>
"Oh yes, you've surprised even I."<fix123>
Thanks to brainwashing herself through repetition (?),<fix123>Youmu had convinced herself that she was a hermit.<fix123>
Of course, she wasn't a hermit, nor was it the weather;<fix123>it appeared to be a temporary fever.<fix123>
Yuyuko found this amusing, and so she went<fix123>all across Gensokyo letting people know.<fix123>
She'd go there and say "Look, my Youmu's a hermit!"<fix123>She'd go here and say "Come, see the power of the supernatural!"<fix123>
After Youmu returned to normal,<fix123>thinking back on the event made her more embarrassed than she could bear.<fix123>
Once again, she supposed, Yuyuko had the upper hand.<fix123>
<c$Ending No.08 — You're terrible, Lady Yuyuko.$><fix123>
<c$This is a Parallel Ending! Congratulations!$><fix123>
The mausoleum where Miko had been slumbering.<fix123>
Victory was somehow won, but not without severe damages.<fix123>
"It didn't help that my enemy had nothing to do with spirits.<fix123>
Not exactly my kind of opponent.<fix123>
Maybe I should just stick to the garden..."<fix123>
Youmu sulked over her poor performance.<fix123>
But however much she tended to the garden, it wouldn't satisfy her.<fix123>
<c$Ending No.12 — Well then, how about a rematch? $><fix123>
<c$Try to beat the game without continuing!$><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, a mermaid?<fix123>Is that all?<fix123>You're just a small fry.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうやって相手にされなく<fix123>なってから幾星霜<fix123>そろそろ私達 (ようかい) が<fix123>活躍する番よ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's been ages since anyone<fix123>took us seriously.<fix123>It's about time for us youkai<fix123>to flourish!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 秘境のマーメイド<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Mermaid from the Uncharted Land<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Wakasagihime DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>人魚は大人しい妖怪だと<fix123>思ってたんだけどねぇ<fix123>やっぱり何か<fix123>起きてるのかな<fix123>このお祓い棒の事も<fix123>気になるしな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>And here I thought that mermaids<fix123>were a quiet sort of youkai.<fix123>Something is definitely<fix123>going on.<fix123>This purification rod is<fix123>worrying me a bit, too.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>柳の下の生首<fix123>Flying Head<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Severed Head Under the Willows<fix123>Flying Head<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Canal of Willows<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Humans and Youkai Traversing the Canal<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>Sekibanki LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>こんな人里近くで<fix123>妖怪騒ぎだって！？<fix123>これは本格的に異変が<fix123>起こっているんだわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Youkai are rampaging<fix123>this close to the Human Village!?<fix123>We've got a bona fide<fix123>incident on our hands.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>早速現れたわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You showed up fast.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Sekibanki ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ろくろ首の怪奇<fix123>赤蛮奇<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Rokurokubi Horror<fix123>Sekibanki<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私を退治しに来たというの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Have you come to exterminate me?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>探す手間が省けたわ<fix123>そっちから出て来てくれるなんて<fix123>さっさと片付けるわよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Thanks for coming out on your own.<fix123>You saved me a lot of searching.<fix123>I'll make this quick!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……本当ね<fix123>大人しくしてたら<fix123>人間が増長したって<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...So, it's true.<fix123>Humans really have gotten swollen heads<fix123>now that we've been calm for a while.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>雑魚が粋がってるんじゃ<fix123>ないわよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A small fry like you shouldn't be<fix123>acting so huffy!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……非力な人間の癖に<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...Says the powerless human.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 柳の下のデュラハン<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Dullahan Under the Willows<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>頭を見る度うなされよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'll give you a nightmare every time you see a head!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Sekibanki DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>な　なによあんた<fix123>強いじゃないのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wh-What's with you?<fix123>You're actually strong.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>妖怪退治は専門だもん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, youkai extermination IS my speciality.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もしかして<fix123>あなたは……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Could you<fix123>perhaps be...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうよ！<fix123>このお祓い棒が目に入らぬか！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's right!<fix123>Do you not see this purification rod!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ははー<fix123>こりゃ失礼しましたー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hahah...<fix123>I must be leaving then...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>十五夜の妖獣<fix123>Metamorphose<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Beast Youkai of the 15th Night<fix123>Metamorphose<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Bamboo Forest of the Lost<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 満月の竹林<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Bamboo Forest of the Full Moon<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kagerou Imaizumi ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Kagerou Imaizumi LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>私を退治しに来たのね？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You've come to exterminate me, haven't you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kagerou Imaizumi ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>何か……<fix123>今日倒して来た妖怪って<fix123>みんな退治されたがって<fix123>いたような<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh...<fix123>It's like all the youkai I beat today...<fix123>Actually wanted to be<fix123>exterminated.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>竹林のルーガルー<fix123>今泉影狼<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Bamboo Forest's Loup-Garou<fix123>Kagerou Imaizumi<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう見えるのかしら？<fix123>ただ単にみんなちょっと<fix123>嬉しいだけだと思うけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Does it look like that to you?<fix123>I think everyone is<fix123>just a little happy.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>嬉しいだって！？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Happy!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>妖怪退治の専門家だって<fix123>謳っていてもさ<fix123>私達みたいな単独行動の妖怪は<fix123>いつも相手にされてなかったから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Even if you declare yourself to be<fix123>some youkai-exterminating professional,<fix123>You haven't always fought<fix123>independently-acting youkai like us.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だって……<fix123>キリが無いじゃん<fix123>暴れてない奴まで<fix123>相手にしてられないわ<fix123>本当は問答無用に<fix123>攻撃したいんだけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well...<fix123>There'd be no end to it.<fix123>I can't go around fighting<fix123>the ones not making a mess.<fix123>But I really do want to attack them,<fix123>with no questions asked.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふふふ<fix123>じゃあ相手にして貰うには<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hahaha.<fix123>All right, I'll take you on...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 孤独なウェアウルフ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Lonesome Werewolf<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>暴れるしか無いわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There's no other choice but to get wild.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>暴れる妖怪には容赦しないわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I won't have any mercy on wild youkai!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>気の毒ねぇ<fix123>こんな満月の夜に……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What a pity. And on a night<fix123>with such a beautiful full moon...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kagerou Imaizumi DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>何の妖怪かと思ったら<fix123>狼女だったのね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I wondered what youkai you were.<fix123>So you're a werewolf.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あーあ<fix123>満月なのに負けちゃった<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Geez...<fix123>I lost, even with the full moon.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>所詮は獣ね<fix123>弾幕はパワーだけじゃ<fix123>無くて頭も使わなきゃ<fix123>あーあ　お祓い棒が<fix123>獣くさくなっちゃった<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're just an animal, after all.<fix123>You have to use your head for danmaku,<fix123>not just raw power.<fix123>Great, now the purification rod<fix123>smells like animal.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ひどいわー<fix123>こんな出たくも無い日に出て<fix123>闘ったというのに<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're so cruel...<fix123>I didn't even want to come out today,<fix123>but I fought you anyway.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>出たくない日？<fix123>満月なのに？　狼女なのに？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You didn't want to come out today?<fix123>Even though it's a full moon? Even though you're a werewolf?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>毛深くなるから……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, because I get all hairy...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そ　そう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I-I see.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>嵐の中の不協和音<fix123>Stormy Discord<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Dissonance Within the Storm<fix123>Stormy Discord<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Skies Above Gensokyo (Storm)<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Magical Storm<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>Yatsuhashi Tsukumo LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>この不気味な嵐は一体……<fix123>こういう所に何らかの敵がいる！<fix123>私の経験上！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What the heck is this creepy storm?<fix123>There's got to be an enemy around here!<fix123>Based on my experience!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>みーつけた<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I spy...<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>古びた琵琶の付喪神<fix123>九十九 弁々<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Tsukumogami of an Aged Biwa<fix123>Benben Tsukumo<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私の相手になってくれそうな人<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Someone who looks like they could be my opponent...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほら妖怪がいた<fix123>こうなりゃ何でも相手になるわよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>See? I knew there'd be a youkai.<fix123>I'll take on you or anyone.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yatsuhashi Tsukumo ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ちょっと待ってよ<fix123>そいつは私が先に見つけたのよ<fix123>後から来て横取りだなんて狡いわ<fix123>姉さん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wait a sec.<fix123>I found her first.<fix123>First come first served,<fix123>big sis.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>良いじゃないの<fix123>それにさっきの戦いをみてたけど<fix123>あんたの手ぬるい音楽じゃあ無理よ<fix123>この付喪神使いを倒すのは<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>And why's that?<fix123>You saw her first,<fix123>but your shoddy music won't be enough...<fix123>...to defeat this tsukumogami user.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>付喪神使いだって！？<fix123>人を妖怪みたいに言わないの<fix123>私はあんたみたいな妖怪を退治する者よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Tsukumogami user!?<fix123>Don't speak of me as if I'm a youkai.<fix123>I'm here to exterminate youkai like you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふーん……<fix123>てっきり<fix123>お仲間だと思ったんだけどねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmmm......<fix123>I thought<fix123>you were one of us for sure, though...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まあいいや<fix123>こいつは姉さんに任せるわ<fix123>じゃあねー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, whatever.<fix123>I'll leave her to you, Benben.<fix123>See you laterー<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yatsuhashi Tsukumo LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あ　ちょっ……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, wai-<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さあボサッとしてないで<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well now, let's not stand around waiting.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 幻想浄瑠璃<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Illusionary Joururi<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何もかも逆さまな<fix123>下克上のこの世界<fix123>最強の道具が誰なのか<fix123>今ここで決めるわよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>In this world of social upheaval<fix123>where everything is turned on its head...<fix123>Who is the strongest tool?<fix123>We'll decide that here and now!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Benben Tsukumo DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>うーん<fix123>まいったまいった<fix123>降参よー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Nngh.<fix123>Okay, I lost.<fix123>I surrenderー<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ちょっとちょっと<fix123>下克上の世界って<fix123>どういうこと？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wait, wait.<fix123>What did you mean by<fix123>"world of social upheaval"?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？<fix123>だって……<fix123>私みたいな道具もこんな力を得たのよ<fix123>今まで大人しくしていたけど<fix123>これからは私達の時代だわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123>I mean...<fix123>All the other tools like me have gained power.<fix123>We've behaved ourselves so far,<fix123>but it'll be our era from now on.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>う　うーん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>H-huh.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この嵐の中<fix123>貴方もあそこを目指してるんでしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're also heading there<fix123>in this storm, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あそこ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>空中に浮かぶ逆さ城……<fix123>あそこから力が洩れているんだから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That inverted castle floating in the sky...<fix123>There's power leaking out from there, you see.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何もかも逆さまな世界<fix123>Reverse Ideology<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A Completely Inverted World<fix123>Reverse Ideology<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>空中逆さ城内部<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Floating Inverted Castle - Interior<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 空中に沈む輝針城<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Shining Needle Castle Sinking in the Air<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Seija Kijin ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Seija Kijin LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Seija Kijin ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>何だ？<fix123>お前は<fix123>ここはお前達のような人間が<fix123>来る場所ではない<fix123>即刻立ち去れい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What?<fix123>What do you want?<fix123>This isn't a place<fix123>for humans like you.<fix123>Leave at once!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はいそうですか……<fix123>って立ち去る訳がないでしょ？<fix123>空中にこんなお城を建てて<fix123>何考えているのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You can't possibly think I'd just say<fix123>"okay" and be on my way.<fix123>What are you thinking,<fix123>building this huge castle in the air?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>逆襲のあまのじゃく<fix123>鬼人 正邪<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Counterattacking Amanojaku<fix123>Seija Kijin<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……ほう<fix123>そうかそのお祓い棒<fix123>自我を持っている様だな<fix123>そ(・)い(・)つ(・)に導かれてやってきた<fix123>って訳か<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...Ah.<fix123>I see, that purification rod...<fix123>It seems to have gained a sense of self.<fix123>So that means that led you here,<fix123>doesn't it?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何だって？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>困ったもんだ<fix123>アレの代償が大きすぎたか<fix123>すんなり世の中を<fix123>ひっくり返せないもんだなぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This is a problem.<fix123>The price for that might be too big.<fix123>I might not be able to overturn<fix123>society so easily now...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あんた<fix123>もしかして……<fix123>本当に下克上を企んで……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey,<fix123>are you...<fix123>Are you seriously trying to overthrow society...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふっふっふ<fix123>如何にも<fix123>これからは強者が力を失い<fix123>弱者がこの世を統べるのだ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh heh heh.<fix123>Absolutely.<fix123>From here on, the strong shall lose their power<fix123>and the weak will unify the world!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>呆れたわ<fix123>そんな誰も得をしない事を<fix123>する妖怪がいるなんて<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm shocked.<fix123>I can't believe there are youkai who would<fix123>do something no one would benefit from like that.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Music stops<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>誰も得をしない<fix123>……だとぉ？<fix123>我ら力弱き者達が如何(いか)に<fix123>虐げられていたか<fix123>お前達には判るまい<fix123>……ならば<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Nobody would benefit,<fix123>you say...?<fix123>None of you understand<fix123>how much we, the weak,<fix123>have been oppressed.<fix123>So...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: リバースイデオロギー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Reverse Ideology<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何もかもひっくり返る[1]逆さ城で<fix123>念願の挫折を味わうがいい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>In this inverted castle where everything is overturned,<fix123>I'll give you a taste of this earnest frustration!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Seija Kijin DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>くう<fix123>なんてこった<fix123>時期尚早だったか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ugh.<fix123>How'd this happen?<fix123>Maybe my attempt was premature.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そんなんで下克上[1]する<fix123>つもりだったの？<fix123>もっと強い妖怪だって<fix123>沢山倒して来たわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's it? And you were<fix123>trying to overthrow society?<fix123>I've defeated tons of youkai<fix123>stronger than you, you know.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まだだ<fix123>まだ諦めないぞ！<fix123>我らの手に秘宝がある限り<fix123>いくらでも強くなれるのだ<fix123>……多少の代償に目を瞑れば<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Not yet.<fix123>I haven't given up!<fix123>As long as we have that treasure,<fix123>we can become as strong as we want.<fix123>...As long as we can turn a blind eye to the price.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あっ　ちょっ！<fix123>……逃げたつもりなのかぁ<fix123>口だけの妖怪の行動って<fix123>むしろ案内している<fix123>ようなものね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, wait!<fix123>Is she trying to get away?<fix123>That's something a youkai who's all talk would do.<fix123>Actually, it almost seems like<fix123>she's leading me instead.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>小さき者の大きな野望<fix123>Little Princess<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Small One's Great Ambition<fix123>Little Princess<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Shining Needle Castle - Castle Keep<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Seija Kijin ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Seija Kijin DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>すっかり夜が明けたみたいね<fix123>もう闘いのお膳立ては整ったわ<fix123>さあ出てきなさい！<fix123>幻想郷の平穏を破る者よ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Looks like the daybreak just arrived.<fix123>The stage for our battle is nice and set.<fix123>Now, show yourself!<fix123>The one disturbing Gensokyo's peace!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だーれ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who's theeere?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Shinmyoumaru Sukuna ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あら博麗神社の巫女じゃない<fix123>あれ……そのお祓い棒は<fix123>秘宝の力を得ているみたいね<fix123>という事は私の味方を<fix123>しに来たのかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, if it isn't the Hakurei shrine maiden.<fix123>Hm... it looks like your purification rod<fix123>has some of my treasure's power.<fix123>Does that mean you're here<fix123>as one of my allies?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああん？<fix123>誰が味方だって？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123>Who are you calling an ally?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>嬉しいわ−！<fix123>巫女が後ろ盾になってくれるなら<fix123>簡単に幻想郷をひっくり返せる[1]わ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This is wonderful−!<fix123>With the shrine maiden's support,<fix123>I'll be able to turn Gensokyo upside-down with no problem.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>やっぱり下克上[1]を企んでいるのね？<fix123>私がそんな話に乗るわけが<fix123>無いでしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So you really are plotting to overthrow society?<fix123>You know I'd never go along with<fix123>something like that, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>小人の末裔<fix123>少名 針妙丸<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Descendant of the Inchlings<fix123>Shinmyoumaru Sukuna<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もの言わぬ道具は朽ちるまで<fix123>こき使われる<fix123>動く事も考える事も許されず……<fix123>日頃から感謝だの<fix123>壊れたから供養だの<fix123>そんな事言って満足している<fix123>のは使用者(つよきもの)だけよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Tools can't speak, and they're worked<fix123>and worked until they fall apart.<fix123>They're not allowed to think of anything besides working...<fix123>You thank them for their daily work,<fix123>and you have memorial services when they break...<fix123>But the only ones who think that would be<fix123>satisfactory are the masters(powerful) who use them!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うーん？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ummm?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どう？　貴方の道具は今の方が<fix123>嬉しそうでしょ？<fix123>喜んで使っている貴方に訊くまでも<fix123>無かったわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So? That tool of yours seems<fix123>happier now, doesn't it?<fix123>You're using it so gladly that<fix123>I didn't even have to ask.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それはその……<fix123>えーっと<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, uh, that's...<fix123>ummm.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さあ私と一緒に道具(よわきもの)が笑って過ごせる<fix123>世界を創りましょ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now join me, and create a world where the tools(weak)<fix123>can spend their days in happiness!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だけど！<fix123>私は下克上の味方なんかする訳に<fix123>いかないわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But still!<fix123>There's no way I can ally myself<fix123>with someone trying to overthrow society!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 輝く針の小人族　～ Little Princess<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Inchling of the Shining Needle ~ Little Princess<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方の様な生まれつきの強者は<fix123>力を得る喜びを知らないのね<fix123>しかしそのお祓い棒を見れば<fix123>心に迷いを感じている事も窺える<fix123>私の手には夢幻の力がある<fix123>それが秘宝『打ち出の小槌(こづち)』！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Someone like you, who was born into power,<fix123>wouldn't know the joy of finally obtaining it.<fix123>However, if you look at your purification rod,<fix123>you can see that you feel hesitation.<fix123>I have the power of dreams here in my hand.<fix123>This is our treasure, the "Miracle Mallet"!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>打ち出の……小槌だって！？<fix123>もしかしてその手にあるのは……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Miracle... Mallet!?<fix123>If you have that, then does that mean...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私には貴方が弱者を理解し<fix123>私の味方になる未来が見える<fix123>さあ、秘宝(こづち)よ！<fix123>もの言わぬ道具に夢幻の力を与え給え！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I can see a future where you understand<fix123>your weakness and ally with me.<fix123>Now, my treasured mallet!<fix123>Impart the power of dreams to all the speechless tools!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Shinmyoumaru Sukuna DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>If player has continued<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Ending　No. 07 (Bad Ending)<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>If player has not continued<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Ending　No. 01 (Good Ending)<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>反逆ののろしを上げろ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Raise the Flag of Rebellion!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>命蓮寺<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Myouren Temple<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>神子の復活で聖なる者の力が強くなりすぎた！<fix123>今こそ妖怪は反逆を仕掛けなければならない！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>After Miko's revival, the power of the saint has grown too strong!<fix123>Now is the time to commence the youkai rebellion!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 妖怪裏参道<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Rear Temple Path of Youkai<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nue Houjuu ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>古の妖怪その１<fix123>封獣 ぬえ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Old Youkai #1<fix123>Nue Houjuu<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あーあ、あんな奴ら復活させちゃってさ<fix123>今、妖怪界隈は大騒ぎだよ<fix123>だから妖怪の切り札を呼び寄せた<fix123>お前はここで終わりだがな！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ahhh, those bums all resurrected.<fix123>The youkai world is in an uproar now.<fix123>So, I called in the youkai's trump card.<fix123>It's over for you right now, though!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nue Houjuu DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>妖怪の切り札ねぇ<fix123>ガシャドクロかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The youkai's trump card, huh?<fix123>I wonder if it's a gashadokuro?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そんな骨じゃないぞい<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, I'm not some pile of bones.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mamizou Futatsuiwa ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>おぬしは何じゃ？<fix123>博麗の巫女か？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who might you be?<fix123>The Hakurei shrine maiden?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>違います<fix123>一緒にしないで下さい<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, I'm not.<fix123>Please don't group us together like that.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おおすまんのう<fix123>巫女っぽい格好に見えたんで<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, my sincerest apologies.<fix123>You seemed to be a shrine maiden, so...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方がぬえさんが呼んだという<fix123>妖怪の切り札なの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are you the youkai trump card<fix123>Nue was talking about?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>化け狸 十変化<fix123>二ッ岩 マミゾウ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Bake-danuki with Ten Transformations<fix123>Mamizou Futatsuiwa<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いかにもそうじゃ<fix123>儂は佐渡の二ッ岩じゃ<fix123>儂が来たからには聖人の<fix123>好きにはさせんて<fix123>って、だからおぬしは何じゃ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Indeed I am.<fix123>I am Futatsuiwa from Sado.<fix123>I was called so that saint<fix123>wouldn't be allowed to have her way.<fix123>Now, who might you be?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>えーっと、私は幻想郷で巫女を<fix123>しています早苗と申します<fix123>信仰を集めようと思って<fix123>妖怪退治をしています<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, um, I'm Sanae.<fix123>I'm a shrine maiden in Gensokyo.<fix123>I'm doing some youkai extermination<fix123>to help raise my faith.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>変わった奴よのう<fix123>妖怪の前でそんな事言うなんて<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My, aren't you an odd one?<fix123>How unusual to say that before a youkai.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 佐渡のニッ岩<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Futatsuiwa From Sado<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ならばいっちょ揉んでやるか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Why don't I spar with you a bit, then?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私もそのつもりでした<fix123>化け狸さん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I was just thinking the same thing,<fix123>Miss Tanuki.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふぉっふぉっふぉ<fix123>その余裕、いつまで持つかな<fix123>さあ、弾幕変化十番勝負！<fix123>始めようじゃないか！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ho! Ho! Ho!<fix123>How long will you keep that confidence?<fix123>Now, shall we begin?<fix123>a ten-game match of danmaku transformations!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mamizou Futatsuiwa DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>おほん、ぅおっほん<fix123>ちょっと休憩させてくれんかのう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>*cough*, *cough*<fix123><fix123>Pray, might I be granted a brief respite?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私も休憩したいです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, I'd like to take a break, too.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それにしても、おぬし強いのう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I must say, you are quite strong.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうでしょそうでしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I am, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>儂は、この国の三分の一くらい（の狸）を<fix123>統べる力を持っていたんじゃ<fix123>それももう昔話か<fix123>こんな人間に負けてしまうなんてのう<fix123>ぬえの奴は買いかぶっていたが<fix123>本当はどんなもんだか……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I once had enough power to hold sway<fix123>over one third (of the tanuki) of Japan.<fix123>But perhaps that's a thing of the past, now.<fix123>To think I lost to a human like this...<fix123>Perhaps that nue overestimated my strength?<fix123>I wonder...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……<fix123>あのー<fix123>ちょっといいですか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...<fix123>Ummm...<fix123>May I say something?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんじゃ<fix123>捕まえて鍋にでもするのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, what is it?<fix123>Do you mean to catch me and make me into stew?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いやそんな野蛮な料理は<fix123>食べたくないですが<fix123>弱気になってどうするのですか！<fix123>そんな自分が年寄りだと<fix123>思い込んでいるから駄目なんですよ<fix123>ファイト！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, I don't think I'd want<fix123>to eat something so gamey.<fix123>Geting all depressed won't solve anything!<fix123>You'll only sell yourself short if you think<fix123>you're no good because you're so old.<fix123>Stay in the fight!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いや、まあその<fix123>しゃべり方は口癖であって<fix123>年寄りだとは思っていないんじゃが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Er, well, that is...<fix123>The way I speak is a habit of mine.<fix123>I don't believe I'm particularly old.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おめでとう！<fix123>これでエキストラステージはクリアです！<fix123>ちなみに既にノーコンクリアしたキャラでボムを３個以上残してクリアすると<fix123>いつもと違ったエンディングが見られます<fix123>（ノーコンティニュー＆ノーマル以上限定）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Congratulations!<fix123>You have cleared the Extra Stage!<fix123>By the way, if you clear the game again with 3 or more bombs in stock for a character that has already cleared the game without continuing<fix123>You will be able to see a different ending from usual.<fix123>(Only limited to 1cc's and for difficulties above normal)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>反逆ののろしを上げろ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Raise the Flag of Rebellion!<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Myouren Temple<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>After Miko's revival, the power of the saint has grown too strong!<fix123>Now is the time to commence the youkai rebellion!<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Rear Temple Path of Youkai<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>古の妖怪その１<fix123>封獣 ぬえ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Old Youkai #1<fix123>Nue Houjuu<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あーあ、あんな奴ら復活させちゃってさ<fix123>今、妖怪界隈は大騒ぎだよ<fix123>だから妖怪の切り札を呼び寄せた<fix123>お前はここで終わりだがな！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ahhh, those bums all resurrected.<fix123>The youkai world is in an uproar now.<fix123>So, I called in the youkai's trump card.<fix123>It's over for you right now, though!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nue Houjuu DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>何だと？<fix123>妖怪の助っ人を呼んだだと？<fix123>嫌な予感しかしないぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What's that?<fix123>They called in youkai reinforcements?<fix123>Can't help getting a bad feeling about this...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おやおや<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mamizou Futatsuiwa ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>おぬしは何者じゃ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who might you be?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前が妖怪の助っ人か？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are you the youkai reinforcements?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>化け狸 十変化<fix123>二ッ岩 マミゾウ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Bake-danuki with Ten Transformations<fix123>Mamizou Futatsuiwa<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いかにもそうじゃ<fix123>儂は佐渡の二ッ岩じゃ<fix123>何でも、とんでもない聖人が<fix123>復活したから<fix123>妖怪が震え上がってしまった<fix123>って聞いたぞい<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Why, indeed I am.<fix123>I am Futatsuiwa from Sado.<fix123>In any case, I received word an unruly saint<fix123>had been resurrected.<fix123>It seems she has reduced the youkai<fix123>to a trembling mass.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほう、彼奴そんなに凄かったのか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, was she really all that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何、おぬし知っておるのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm, so you know about her?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、私が復活させたからね（大嘘）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Of course, I'm the one that revived her (huge lie)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほほう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oho!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 佐渡のニッ岩<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Futatsuiwa From Sado<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それは面白い冗談じゃ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What an amusing joke.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>冗談じゃないと言ったら？<fix123>（冗談です）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What if I said I'm not joking?<fix123>(I'm joking)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おぬしは敵じゃな<fix123>そもそも人間 (カモ) じゃないか<fix123>丁度よい<fix123>うぉーみんぐあっぷじゃ<fix123>さあ、弾幕変化十番勝負！<fix123>何番目で根を上げるかな？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'd think you were enemies.<fix123>After all, are you not human?<fix123>Very well.<fix123>I shall take this as a warm-up.<fix123>And now for a ten-game match of danmaku transformations!<fix123>I wonder how many you can withstand?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mamizou Futatsuiwa DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>おほん、ぅおっほん<fix123>ちょっと休憩させてくれんかのう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>*cough*, *cough*<fix123>Pray, might I be granted a brief respite?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>させるか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You think I'll let you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いやん<fix123>動物虐待はんたーい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh my!<fix123>Prithee, I'm against animal abuse!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まあいいや<fix123>何だよ、妖怪の切り札って言うから<fix123>何かもっと凄い奴かと思ったら化け狸かい<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, whatever.<fix123>Aren't you supposed to be the youkai trump card?<fix123>I figured you'd be amazing, but you're just a tanuki youkai.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>む、化け狸を馬鹿にするのか？<fix123>化け狸は妖怪の中でも一大勢力を誇る<fix123>いわばエリートじゃ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, I hope you're not making light of tanuki.<fix123>We have quite a bit of influence in youkai society.<fix123>You might even call us elite.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>エリート？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Elite?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>その中でも儂は日本で三本指に入る位の<fix123>化け力を持っているんじゃ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>And in addition, my transformation power is<fix123>among the top three of Japan.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いやでも狸は狸だろ？<fix123>満月の夜に腹鼓を打つあの狸だろ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sure, but you're still just a tanuki, right?<fix123>The kind that drums on their bellies<fix123>on the night of the full moon, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>馬鹿にしているのかい？<fix123>おぬし、名を何という<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You are making light of us, are you not?<fix123>What do you call yourself?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>博麗霊夢だ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm Reimu Hakurei!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>霧雨魔理沙、と<fix123>判った覚えておこう<fix123>必ず復讐に行くからな<fix123>満月の夜に気を付けるんじゃな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Marisa Kirisame, is it?<fix123>I'll be sure to remember that.<fix123>I intend to take my revenge, so you'd best<fix123>watch your back on the night of the full moon.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私じゃなくて神子をやれよ……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, go after Miko, not me......<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おめでとう！<fix123>これでエキストラステージはクリアです！<fix123>ちなみに既にノーコンクリアしたキャラでボムを３個以上残してクリアすると<fix123>いつもと違ったエンディングが見られます<fix123>（ノーコンティニュー＆ノーマル以上限定）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Congratulations!<fix123>You have cleared the Extra Stage!<fix123>By the way, if you clear the game again with 3 or more bombs in stock for a character that has already cleared the game without continuing<fix123>You will be able to see a different ending from usual.<fix123>(Only limited to 1cc's and for difficulties above normal)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: (Yes, this is needed to overwrite the barely visible '+'.)<fix123>
The Moriya Shrine, up on the mountain.<fix123>
The cherry blossoms had already fallen at the base, but had yet to on the mountain.<fix123>
Sanae returned from the battle to her room and shut herself in.<fix123>

"Uh, let's see... In ancient Japan, there were two opposing clans:<fix123>The house of Mononobe – which followed Shinto – and the Soga –<fix123><fix123>who brought Buddhism from the continent and actively spread it."<fix123>
"Mononobe no Moriya desecrated the Buddha, which brought a divine curse upon the imperial family.<fix123>
For this reason Soga no Umako destroyed Moriya,<fix123>and the Mononobe clan collapsed."<fix123>
"And Prince Umayado was involved in the battle, too..."(Umayado is the birthname of Shōtoku.)<fix123>
Hm, there's certainly more to this. Especially the ‘curse’ part.<fix123>
Maybe I'll ask those girls more about it later..."<fix123>
"Sanaeee! You need to get cooking!"<fix123>
"Yes, I'll be right theeere!"<fix123>
"Huh? This is an old ¥10,000 bill..."<fix123>
"...What on earth?!<fix123>
This bearded face is Prince Shoutoku? H-Huh?"<fix123>
"Y-Yes, that's right. Of course he's bearded.<fix123>
Well then, surely they're different people.<fix123>
I wonder what on earth those girls were, then...?"<fix123>
"Gim-me food! Gim-me food!"<fix123>
"Right, right..."<fix123>
Sanae was never good at history. She was more of a science person.<fix123>
After the recent event, she took a little bit of interest in ancient history.<fix123>
But having moved into Gensokyo, Sanae had a disadvantage.<fix123>
She no longer had an easy way of knowing current rumors.<fix123>
Yes, at current, word was spreading that Prince Shoutoku did not actually exist.<fix123>
Who knows if there'll ever come a time when Sanae realizes<fix123>
that's what had brought about the events in Gensokyo?<fix123>
<c$Ending No.05 — But really, studying an elementary school textbook?$><fix123>
<c$Congratulations, all clear! Just as I'd expected!$><fix123>
A dojo constructed in a secret land.<fix123>
It was built in a sealed world solely for Miko and her followers.<fix123>
This was a place even Gensokyo didn't know of.<fix123>
"Hi-yah!"<fix123>
"Nice shout!"<fix123>
"Horyah!"<fix123>
"You've got it!"<fix123>
Sanae had converted.<fix123>
She was ultimately won over by their overwhelming charisma.<fix123>
"Rasseraaah!"(This is a chant associated with Aomori Nebuta Matsuri.)<fix123>
"Rasserah!"<fix123>
"Is this really what Tao training is like?"<fix123>
"That is right. It certainly is. Now keep at it!"<fix123>
"Right!"<fix123>
Sanae thought the gathering of divine spirits (= desires) was connected to faith.<fix123>
That was the entirety of her reason for converting and training.<fix123>
However, she came to notice she wasn't getting any faith herself.<fix123>
Where had Sanae mistaken her way?<fix123>
Actually, this wasn't a mistake at all.<fix123>
Japanese Shinto has close ties to the continent's Buddhism and Taoism.<fix123>
Sanae was enlightened to the fact that trying to gather faith<fix123>without realizing such was meaningless.<fix123>
<c$Ending No.06 — Of course, it seems she'll convert right back soon.$><fix123>
<c$This is a Parallel Ending! Congratulations!$><fix123>
The mausoleum where Miko had been slumbering.<fix123>
Victory was somehow won, but not without severe damages.<fix123>
"My, Prince Shoutoku?!<fix123>
That's a bit more of an opponent than I can manage!"<fix123>
Sanae feared her opponent and made a hasty retreat.<fix123>
But after having confirmed she had not been followed,<fix123>she felt the yearning for a rematch growing within her.<fix123>
<c$Ending No.11 — She'll be waiting for a rematch anytime.$><fix123>
<c$Try to beat the game without continuing!$><fix123>
<fix123>反逆ののろしを上げろ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Raise the Flag of Rebellion!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>命蓮寺<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Myouren Temple<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>神子の復活で聖なる者の力が強くなりすぎた！<fix123>今こそ妖怪は反逆を仕掛けなければならない！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>After Miko's revival, the power of the saint has grown too strong!<fix123>Now is the time to commence the youkai rebellion!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 妖怪裏参道<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Rear Temple Path of Youkai<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nue Houjuu ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>古の妖怪その１<fix123>封獣 ぬえ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Old Youkai #1<fix123>Nue Houjuu<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あーあ、あんな奴ら復活させちゃってさ<fix123>今、妖怪界隈は大騒ぎだよ<fix123>だから妖怪の切り札を呼び寄せた<fix123>お前はここで終わりだがな！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ahhh, those bums all resurrected.<fix123>The youkai world is in an uproar now.<fix123>So, I called in the youkai's trump card.<fix123>It's over for you right now, though!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nue Houjuu DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>何か嫌な空気……<fix123>妖怪臭いって言うか<fix123>獣臭いって言うか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've got a bad feeling about this......<fix123>It smells like youkai around here.<fix123>Or, like wild animals.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おやおや<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mamizou Futatsuiwa ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>博麗の巫女さんじゃないかい<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Aren't you the miko of Hakurei?<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Who're you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>化け狸 十変化<fix123>二ッ岩 マミゾウ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Bake-danuki with Ten Transformations<fix123>Mamizou Futatsuiwa<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おっと失礼<fix123>儂は佐渡の二ッ岩<fix123>皆はマミゾウって呼ぶよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, your pardon, please.<fix123>I am Futatsuiwa from Sado.<fix123>Everyone calls me Mamizou.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>マミゾウ？<fix123>変な名前<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Mamizou?<fix123>What an odd name.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ぬえの奴に呼ばれてやってきたんじゃ<fix123>何でも妖怪のピンチだから<fix123>助けて欲しいとか……？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Nue called me here, you see.<fix123>She said the youkai were in a pinch,<fix123>and she wanted me to lend my assistance.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そりゃまあ、私が退治しまくってるからね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I guess that's because I'm exterminating them all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はて、儂が聞いたのは封印された<fix123>聖人が復活したとか、だが？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Er, however, I'd heard something about<fix123> a sealed saint having been released?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そいつも私が倒したもん<fix123>楽勝よ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, but I beat her.<fix123>She was a piece of cake!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほっほっほ<fix123>威勢の良いことで<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, ho, ho.<fix123>My, but you sound confident.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 佐渡のニッ岩<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Futatsuiwa From Sado<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>でも儂が出てきたからには<fix123>もうでかい顔はさせんぞお<fix123>儂の化け力 (バケじから) はまだまだ健在じゃ<fix123>さあ、弾幕変化十番勝負！<fix123>始めようじゃないか！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now that I've arrived, though,<fix123>I'll have to put you back in your place.<fix123>My transformative powers are still at their prime.<fix123>Now, shall we begin a ten-game match <fix123>of danmaku transformations?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mamizou Futatsuiwa DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>おほん、ぅおっほん<fix123>ちょっと休憩させてくれんかのう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>*cough*, *cough*<fix123>Pray, might I be granted a brief respite?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もう十変化見せたでしょう？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Haven't you already done ten transformations?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ひー、ふー、みー……<fix123>ああ、そうじゃったかのう<fix123>まだ七か八くらいかと思っとった<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>One, two, three......<fix123>Oh, indeed I have.<fix123>I'd thought we were only at seven or eight.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それにこれ以上やったって<fix123>私には勝てないわよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Besides, doing any more<fix123>won't let you beat me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そ、そうか、そうかもな<fix123>ならば仕方が無い<fix123>わざわざ佐渡から海を越えて<fix123>やってきたというのに無念じゃ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmm, perhaps that is true.<fix123>Then it, cannot be helped.<fix123>Still, what a shame that my long journey<fix123>across the sea from Sado is for naught.<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>The sea?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうじゃ、何だ？<fix123>海を知らんのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh my, can it be<fix123>that you know not of the sea?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いや、一度見た事があるんだけどねぇ<fix123>月で<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, well, I saw it once.<fix123>On the moon.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほうほう、一度だけか<fix123>それは勿体ない事じゃ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, now! Just once?<fix123>What a shame that is.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんで？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Why?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>海は広い<fix123>この幻想郷の何倍、何百倍も広いんじゃ<fix123>その世界を知らずして<fix123>ここで強がっても意味ないて<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Vast is the sea.<fix123>Hundreds of times the size of Gensokyo.<fix123>There's no use in thinking yourself strong<fix123>if you know so little of the world.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>別に良いじゃない<fix123>ここで海の話を聞いているだけで<fix123>大体想像付くし！　どうせ楽勝だし！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, what's the difference? I can imagine the gist of it <fix123>by listening to stories about them right here!<fix123>Besides, you were still a pushover!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふぉっふぉっふぉ<fix123>井の中の蛙大海を知らず、じゃのう<fix123>真に己を強いと思っとるなら<fix123>大海原に飛び込むのを<fix123>怖れてはならんぞ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, ho, ho, ho!<fix123>The frog in the well knows not the sea, as they say.<fix123>If you truly believe yourself to be strong...<fix123>It won't do to be afraid<fix123>of plumbing into the depths of the open sea!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おめでとう！<fix123>これでエキストラステージはクリアです！<fix123>ちなみに既にノーコンクリアしたキャラでボムを３個以上残してクリアすると<fix123>いつもと違ったエンディングが見られます<fix123>（ノーコンティニュー＆ノーマル以上限定）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Congratulations!<fix123>You have cleared the Extra Stage!<fix123>By the way, if you clear the game again with 3 or more bombs in stock for a character that has already cleared the game without continuing<fix123>you will be able to see a different ending from usual.<fix123>(Only limited to 1cc's and for difficulties above normal)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>死してなお、愉しく<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Enjoyment, Even in Death<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Night Cherry Blossoms in the Netherworld<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>What are these divine spirits that are scattered and swept away by the cherry blossoms?<fix123>They only activate moments before death.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Night Sakura of Dead Spirits<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm...<fix123>It would seem the spirits are all<fix123>headed in the direction of the village.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら妖夢？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, Youmu?<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>彷徨わない亡霊<fix123>西行寺 幽々子<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Stationary Ghost<fix123>Yuyuko Saigyouji<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>こんな時間にどこに行くの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Where are you going at this time of night?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ、幽々子様<fix123>これからこの神霊の調査に行こうと思います<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, Lady Yuyuko!<fix123>I was thinking of going to investigate these divine spirits.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？<fix123>何を寝ぼけたことを言っているの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123>What half-asleep nonsense are you spouting?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？<fix123>だって大変な事になっているじゃないですか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123>Hasn't this become a serious matter?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何の話？<fix123>どっちにしても<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What do you mean?<fix123>Either way...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ゴーストリード<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Ghost Lead<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ここから出て行くと言うのなら<fix123>私を倒してから行きなさい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...if you say you're going to leave,<fix123>you'll have to defeat me first!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>理不尽なー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How irrational...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yuyuko Saigyouji DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あら、やるじゃない<fix123>行っても良いわよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm, not bad at all.<fix123>You can go ahead.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええ、暇だったのですね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You must have had a lot of time on your hands...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何か？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What is it?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>幽々子様はこの神霊を<fix123>どう考えていますか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What do you think of these<fix123>divine spirits, Lady Yuyuko?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何か、厄介な奴が復活しそうとか<fix123>お寺の裏の墓地に秘密があるとか<fix123>考えていないわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I doubt that some troublesome individual is about to make a return,<fix123>or that there's any secrets or anything in,<fix123>say, the cemetery behind the temple...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ん？<fix123>と、とにかく行ってきます<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm?<fix123>A-anyway, I'll be off.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お土産よろしくねー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Bring me back a souvenir!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>門前の妖怪、習わぬ経を読む<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Youkai Before the Gate, Reading a Sutra She Never Learned [1]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>命蓮寺参道<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Road to Myouren Temple<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>亡霊の不思議な導きで命蓮寺墓地を目指す<fix123>そこに持ち受けていた者は神霊と関係あるのだろうか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heading towards Myouren Temple Cemetery under the strange guidance of that ghost...<fix123>Might the ones there be related to the divine spirits?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 妖怪寺へようこそ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Welcome to the Youkai Temple<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kyouko Kasodani ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Kyouko Kasodani LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>このお寺は随分と妖怪が多いわね<fix123>この変な神霊も、お寺のお坊さんの<fix123>仕業なのかな？<fix123>なんか釈然としないけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This temple has quite a lot of youkai about.<fix123>Could these odd spirits, too,<fix123>be the work of the temple monk?<fix123>That isn't a very satisfying explanation, though.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>危ないわね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's dangerous!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kyouko Kasodani ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>参道で刃物を振り回すなんて<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What are you doing, swinging<fix123>sharp objects on the pilgrimage path?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>別に良いじゃないの<fix123>妖怪や妖精相手だし<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's fine, isn't it?<fix123>They're just youkai and fairies.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>読経するヤマビコ<fix123>幽谷 響子<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sutra-Reciting Yamabiko<fix123>Kyouko Kasodani<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お寺では殺生禁止なのー！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The temple has a strict ban on killing!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ、いや、まあ<fix123>殺すまで斬るつもりはー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Um, er, well,<fix123>not like I was gonna slice them until they were killed...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 門前の妖怪小娘<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Youkai Girl Before the Gate<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お寺で刃物を振り回して<fix123>無用な殺生を行うような奴は<fix123>ここで死んでしまえ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Anybody swinging around sharp swords<fix123>and committing unneccesary killing in the temple...<fix123>...is to die here!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kyouko Kasodani DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>貴方達、妖怪はいつも通り元気ねぇ<fix123>で、神霊について何か知っていること<fix123>ないかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You youkai are as energetic as ever...<fix123>So, would you happen to know anything<fix123>about the divine spirits?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>神霊って何？<fix123>食べやすいの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What's a divine spirit?<fix123>Does it taste good?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……そうよねぇ<fix123>神霊を集めて得をするのは神社くらいだし<fix123>妖怪の仕業って感じがしないわねぇ<fix123>しかし、本体無き神霊を具象化させても<fix123>そんなもの、すぐに消えてしまう<fix123>これじゃあ、ただ単に欲が<fix123>見えるようになっただけじゃない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...as expected.<fix123>Only a shrine would benefit from gathering divine spirits.<fix123>I can't help but feel this isn't the work of a youkai...<fix123>But even if these formless spirits materialize,<fix123>they'll just vanish right away.<fix123>They're nothing but essence of greed that's visible to the eyes<fix123>at this point...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>直線の楽園<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A Straight Line Paradise<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>命蓮寺墓地<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Myouren Temple Cemetery<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>墓地に住む者、それは人か幽鬼か妖怪か<fix123>皆が神霊を呼ぶこの霊は何故墓地に湧く？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are those living in the cemetery humans? Specters? Or are they youkai?<fix123>Why are the spirits everyone calls "divine spirits" gushing towards the cemetery?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 素敵な墓場で暮しましょ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Let's Live in a Lovely Cemetery<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kogasa Tatara ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>なにかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What do you want?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お困りの忘れ物<fix123>多々良 小傘<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Troubled Forgotten Item<fix123>Kogasa Tatara<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ、剣を振り回している人だ<fix123>もう誰でも良いわ！<fix123>この先に見た事のない奴が<fix123>番をしているのー<fix123>そいつにいくら撃ち込んでも<fix123>いつもタイムオーバーで負けるんだ<fix123>ねえ、何とかしてよ〜<fix123>お願い<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, someone swinging swords around...<fix123>Oh, anybody'll do!<fix123>I saw this girl I've never<fix123>seen before keeping watch back there.<fix123>But no matter how much I shoot her,<fix123>I always lose by time out...<fix123>So hey, do something about her〜<fix123>Pleeease.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>妖怪から助けを請われるなんて<fix123>面妖な<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Plead of help from a youkai?<fix123>How bizarre.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>へっへっへー<fix123>でも、私より強いのか試させて貰うよー！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh heh heh!<fix123>But we'll have to test if you're tougher than me!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kogasa Tatara DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>幽々子様は墓地に行けと<fix123>言ってましたが<fix123>言ってなかったかも知れないけど<fix123>何だか幽霊達が騒がしいわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, Lady Yuyuko told me to<fix123>go to the cemetery, but...<fix123>Although she may not have actually said it...<fix123>Anyway, the spirits are really making a racket.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ちーかよーるなー！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Dooon't come any closeeer!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yoshika Miyako ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>これから先はお前達が入って<fix123>良い場所ではない！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This is no place for<fix123>the likes of you to enter!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>来たわね<fix123>……既に事切れている？<fix123>もしやお前は腐……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, hello.<fix123>...Are you already dead?<fix123>Maybe you're decayi...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>忠実な死体<fix123>宮古 芳香<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Loyal Corpse<fix123>Yoshika Miyako<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>我々 (・・) は崇高な霊廟を守るために<fix123>生み出された戦士 (キョンシー) である<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We are fighters (jiang shi) , arisen to protect<fix123> this magnificent mausoleum.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？　キョ？<fix123>ああ、キョンシーね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Uh? Jia...?<fix123>Ah, jiang shi, I see.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうだ、判ったらここから去れ<fix123>もしくは仲間になれ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Right, so knowing that, you should leave.<fix123>Or otherwise become one of our companions.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>仲間ですか……<fix123>残念ながら、既に私も似たようなものです<fix123>しかし死してなおこの世に未練を残し<fix123>この世をさまようなんて<fix123>かわいそうね<fix123>あれれ？<fix123>何か違和感が<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Companions...? Sorry to say,<fix123>but I'm actually in a similar state already.<fix123>But to still be loitering around this world<fix123>because of a few lingering attachments...<fix123>I feel sorry for you.<fix123>Huh?<fix123>Something feels... off.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: リジッドパラダイス<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Rigid Paradise<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>我々は未練があってこの世に<fix123>留まっているのではない！<fix123>全てはあのお方をお寺の連中に<fix123>再び踏みにじられない為に！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We aren't stuck in this world<fix123>because we have attachments!<fix123>It is all so that she shall not be<fix123>trampled upon by the temple's inhabitants again!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yoshika Miyako DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>なんだぁとぅー！<fix123>しーぬー！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Whaaaaat!!?<fix123>I'm dyiiiiing!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はいはい、死んでます死んでます<fix123>お札を貼ったキョンシーって事は<fix123>貴方を操っている親玉が居るって事ね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, yes, we get it, you're already dead.<fix123>A jiang shi with a charm stuck on her head...<fix123>That must mean there's a master controlling you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうだっけ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Was there?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さっき自分でも親玉が居るって<fix123>匂わせてたじゃないの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Of course, you also reeked of<fix123>the possibility of such earlier...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？　臭うだと？<fix123>これでもお肌ケアしているんだぞうぅ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh? I stink?<fix123>But I take such good care of my skin.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ゾンビギャグ……<fix123>まあ、貴方の操り主を探してみましょう<fix123>何か手掛かりがあるはずだわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sigh, zombie jokes...<fix123>Well anyways, I'll go search around for who's controlling you.<fix123>I'm sure they'll have clues for me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私の主だと？？<fix123>なんだと……<fix123>まさか、あの悲しき宗教戦争が<fix123>再び起こるというのかぁ！<fix123>って誰だっけ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My... master??<fix123>What the...<fix123>Wait, does that mean<fix123>that dreadful religious war is upon us once again?!<fix123>...Er, who was that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>加速する嗜欲<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Accelerating Luxury<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>夢殿大祀廟の洞窟<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A Hole in the Hall of Dreams' Great Mausoleum<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>神霊はか細かき光の筋となり洞窟の奥を目指す<fix123>それはこの世の物とは思えない光景だった<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The divine spirits, pulled into fine strings of light toward the cavern's depth...<fix123>The scenery was unlike anything of this world.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: デザイアドライブ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Desire Drive<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>Seiga Kaku LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ここは……<fix123>私の霊感レーダーが感じるわ！<fix123>うん、ここはお墓ね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Here...<fix123>My spirit-detecting radar is getting a signal![2]<fix123>Yes, this place is a tomb.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Seiga Kaku ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>いらっしゃい<fix123>あら、貴方……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Welcome.<fix123>Ah, you're...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さっきも会いましたね<fix123>何者ですか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We just met back there, right?<fix123>Who are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>壁抜けの邪仙<fix123>青娥 娘々<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Wicked Hermit of Passing Through Walls<fix123>Lady Seiga<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は霍青娥<fix123>今は仙人をやっています<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm Seiga Kaku.<fix123>I'm currently living as a hermit.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>仙人……<fix123>んーと、それはつまり？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A hermit...<fix123>Ummm, that would mean...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>仙人は仙人ですよ<fix123>不老長寿、頭脳明晰、金剛不壊<fix123>貴方も同じような者みたいね<fix123>生死を超越してるでしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A hermit is a hermit.<fix123>Perpetual youth, a clear mind, a sturdy body.<fix123>It seems you're the same sort of being.<fix123>You've transcended life and death, haven't you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いやまあ死にますけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, uh, I can die.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yoshika Miyako ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>死ぬ、だとぉ！<fix123>死ぬのはいかん<fix123>あれだけはいかんのじゃ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Die, you say!?<fix123>Dying's no good.<fix123>Anything but that.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら、おはやいお還りで<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, my, you're back quick.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ありゃりゃ<fix123>復活が早いわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My oh my.<fix123>You resurrected quickly.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……なになに？<fix123>目の前のこいつに怨みがある？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...What's that?<fix123>You've got a grudge against this person in front of us?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 古きユアンシェン<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Old Yuanshen<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>じゃあ、もう一戦交えますか？<fix123>廟に集まる神霊を吸収したこの娘と<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So, will it be another round?<fix123>With this girl who has absorbed all the divine spirits that gathered in the tomb.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方が其奴の主だったのね！<fix123>探す手間が省けたわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So you're that thing's master!<fix123>That saves me some time!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>忠実なる我が僕よ<fix123>復活を拒もうとする者を根絶やしにせよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My faithful servant.<fix123>Go eradicate the one who would deny this resurrection!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Seiga Kaku & Yoshika Miyako DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あららら、お見事です<fix123>流石、幻想郷の人達は腕が立ちますねー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, my, my, my, how splendid.<fix123>The people of Gensokyo truly are talented.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まあ、私は強いですからね<fix123>で、貴方に聞きたい事があるの<fix123>ここに集まっている神霊の事だけど……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I am strong after all.<fix123>Now, I have something to ask you.<fix123>These divine spirits gathering here...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>大丈夫、大丈夫<fix123>そろそろ準備が終わった頃かしら<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's okay, it's okay.<fix123>The preparations should've ended right about now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>準備？　何の？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Preparation? For what?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この神霊に見える霊は<fix123>ただの小市民の欲なの<fix123>放って置いたらすぐに消えるし<fix123>何にも害はないわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>These spirits that look like divine spirits<fix123>are actually just common desires.<fix123>If you leave them be, they'll disappear soon.<fix123>They won't do any harm.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もうすぐあのお方が復活するの<fix123>それは異教の預言者が<fix123>処刑後三日目に復活した時より<fix123>盛大で神聖な物になるはずよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>She will be revived very soon.<fix123>Compared to that foreign prophet who resurrected<fix123>three days after his execution...<fix123>...this will be much more divine and magnificent.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何を企んでいるのか知らないけど<fix123>死者が復活するなんて<fix123>悪い事以外考えられない！<fix123>……ような気がします<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I don't know what you're scheming, but...<fix123>...the dead being resurrected can't be<fix123>anything but a bad thing!<fix123>...or so I think so.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>隠然たるモノの血<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Blood of Those with Hidden Power<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>夢殿大祀廟<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Hall of Dreams' Great Mausoleum<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>扉の向こうには巨大な遺構が隠されていた<fix123>ここに何が眠るのか神霊達は知っているのだろうか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A huge remnant was hidden behind the doors.<fix123>Are the divine spirits aware of what lies within?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 夢殿大祀廟<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Hall of Dreams' Great Mausoleum<fix123><fix123>
