<fix123>Soga no Tojiko DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>随分と大きなお墓ね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This is quite a big tomb.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、ついにこの日が来たのか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Aah, this fateful day hath finally come.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mononobe no Futo ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>我が復活を祝福する者よ、何者ぞ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Thou who hast blessed my resurrection: speak now, and name yourself.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おおっと<fix123>何かいた<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Whoops,<fix123>there's something in here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>古代日本の尸解仙<fix123>物部 布都<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Shikaisen from Ancient Japan<fix123> Mononobe no Futo<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おぬしは……人間では無いようだな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Thou art... inhuman, it wouldst seem.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>む、貴方の体から死の匂いが<fix123>ぷんぷんします<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Mmph, your body is covered<fix123>with the stench of death.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>死んでたからな<fix123>おぬしも似たようなもんだろう？<fix123>おぬしも尸解仙……だな？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Aye, for I art no longer among the living.<fix123>We are of a like kind, are we not?<fix123>Art thou not also a shikaisen?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え、違いますけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh? No, I'm not.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……え？<fix123>そ、そうか、ならば勘違いだ<fix123>すまん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...Come again?<fix123>I s-see. Then I have judged thee in error.<fix123>Thou hast mine apologies.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方は尸解仙ですか……<fix123>さっきの邪仙と同じ仲間ね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're a shikaisen...?<fix123>Then you're in league with that wicked hermit from just now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 大神神話伝<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Omiwa Legend<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だとしたら、何用か？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Aye, and? What wouldst thou do?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>自然の理に逆らう者を<fix123>倒して土に還すのだ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Defeat those who rebel against the natural order<fix123>and return them to the ground!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうか残念だ<fix123>おぬしも同類だと思ったのだがな<fix123>物部の秘術と道教の融合<fix123>還せるものなら還してみるが良い！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Alas.<fix123>And I had thought thee a kindred soul to me.<fix123>Thou who thinkest thou couldst return this fusion of the secret art of the Mononobe<fix123>and the way of the Tao into the ground, come now and attempt such a thing with all thy might!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mononobe no Futo DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>何だと？<fix123>おぬし、ただ者ではないな？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What is this?<fix123>It wouldst seem thou art truly no ordinary being.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はいはい、ただ者じゃないですよー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yep, I'm no ordinary beingー<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>その余裕、余程<fix123>高名な仙人だと心得る<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>For my defeat to have come to pass so readily...<fix123>Thou must truly be a hermit of great fame.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だから、仙人じゃないって<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm telling you, I'm not a hermit.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ご謙遜なさるな<fix123>おぬしも太子様の復活を<fix123>祝福しに来たのだろう？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Thou needest not play at humility.<fix123>Didst thou not come to bless<fix123>the Crown Prince's resurrection as well?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……<fix123>ここは合わせておいた方が<fix123>得しそうね<fix123>そ、そうね<fix123>祝福しに来たのです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...<fix123>(Maybe it's better if I<fix123>play along at this point.)<fix123>T-that's right.<fix123>I've come to deliver a blessing.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>判った判った<fix123>おぬしの様な強い者に祝福されれば<fix123>同慶の至りである<fix123>ではこちらに……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I understand, I understand.<fix123>For wouldst not a blessing from one so powerful as thee<fix123>be an event worthy of lauding?<fix123>Now, come this way...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>和を以て貴しと為す<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hold Harmony Sacred<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>神霊廟<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Divine Spirit Mausoleum<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>大量に集まった神霊はまるで星空のようだった<fix123>静かにその者の声が発せられるのを待っていた<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The massive quantity of gathered divine spirits resembled a starry sky.<fix123>They silently wait for the one to give her voice.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 小さな欲望の星空<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Starry Sky of Small Desires<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さっきの人に、「仙人だ」って騙して<fix123>入ってきちゃった<fix123>それにしても、こんなに生気に<fix123>満ちあふれたお墓は初めて見たわ<fix123>それにこの神霊、いやこれは<fix123>ただの欲が具現化したものらしいね<fix123>欲霊……生き霊の一種で低級な霊<fix123>こんなの集めて得する奴なんて……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I fooled that person back there to get in<fix123>by saying I was a hermit...<fix123>Still, this is the first tomb I've seen<fix123>that was so full of vitality.<fix123>And these divine spirits-- no, they're just<fix123>materialized incarnations of desires, apparently.<fix123>Vulgar spirits... the low grade spirits among the living spirits. [3]<fix123>Who could stand to gain something from gathering these things here...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>違う、勝手に集まってきただけよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No. They have gathered of their own volition.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Toyosatomimi no Miko ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>欲望が私の元に集まって来るのです<fix123>いつの時代も、いつの時代も<fix123>毎日毎日、十の要望を同時に<fix123>聞かされていたからでしょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Desires gather at my side.<fix123>In every single era.<fix123>Because I was made to listen to ten desires<fix123>at once every day, I'm sure.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……あれ？<fix123>君の欲望が二つ足りないわ<fix123>十あるはずの欲望のうち<fix123>生への執着と、死への羨望が<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...Hmm?<fix123>You lack two desires.<fix123>From among the ten that I expected,<fix123>your attachment to life and your envy of death are...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あいにく、私は既に<fix123>半分死んでいるのでして<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sorry, but I'm afraid that<fix123>I'm already half-dead.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>聖徳道士<fix123>豊聡耳　神子<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Shoutoku Taoist<fix123>Toyosatomimi no Miko<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうですか、君も同朋ですね？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Is that right? Then you and I are comrades, are we not?<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Huh?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>不老不死を最終目標とする道士でしょう？<fix123>いや、もう仙人、尸解仙なのかも<fix123>しれないけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Those who walk a path toward eternal life as its endpoint?<fix123>Well, although you may already be a hermit<fix123>or a shikaisen.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いやいやいや<fix123>仙人である事はさっき否定しました<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, no, no, no.<fix123>I just denied being a hermit a second ago.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>隠す必要は無いわ<fix123>私には全て判る<fix123>人間の欲を見れば判るもの<fix123>あいにく、君の欲が不足しているので<fix123>完全ではないんだけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There's no need to hide it.<fix123>I see and understand all.<fix123>All that can be understood from seeing human desire.<fix123>Regrettably, your desires are lacking,<fix123>and therefore incomplete.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いやだから、間違ってますよー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wait, no! I'm telling you, that's not itー<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 聖徳伝説　～　True Administrator<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Shoutoku Legend ~ True Administrator<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>同朋ならばこれから<fix123>何が起こるか判るわよね？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>As a comrade, you understand<fix123>what will happen next, don't you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>判りません！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, I don't!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>不老不死として蘇った者同士<fix123>相手と競い合い、道を学び合うのだ！<fix123>さあ私を倒して見せよ！<fix123>そして不老不死の為政者として<fix123>復活して見せよう！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Two beings revived to eternal life<fix123>must join together in combat, and join together in study of the Tao!<fix123>Now, try to defeat me!<fix123>And I will be resurrected<fix123>as a statesman of eternal life!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>During Spell Card 87, 88, 89 or 90<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Soga no Tojiko & Mononobe no Futo ENTER<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>やってやんよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Have at it!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>われにおまかせを！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Please let me handle this!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おろかものめが！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You damn fool!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はなしにもならぬわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Your pathetic power isn't worth talking about!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>やれやれ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Good grief!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まだまだぁ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You haven't won yet!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>またですか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Once again?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もういいでしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Haven't we done enough?<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>After Spell Card 87, 88, 89 or 90<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>たわむれはおわりじゃ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Enough playing around!<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>Ending　No. 12<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Night Cherry Blossoms in the Netherworld<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>桜に紛れて漂う幽かな神霊は一体何なのだろう<fix123>神霊は死ぬ寸前でのみ活性化する<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What are these divine spirits that are scattered and swept away by the cherry blossoms?<fix123>They only activate moments before death.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 死霊の夜桜<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Night Sakura of Dead Spirits<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Large Divine Spirit ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Large Divine Spirit DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>冥界って生きた人間が<fix123>ホイホイ入って良かったのかしら<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I wonder if it's really advisable for the Netherworld<fix123>to allow living humans in so readily...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あらあらお客様？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, do we have visitors?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yuyuko Saigyouji ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>彷徨わない亡霊<fix123>西行寺 幽々子<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Stationary Ghost<fix123>Yuyuko Saigyouji<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ちょっとまってね<fix123>お茶の用意をしてくるから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hold on a moment,<fix123> I'll prepare some tea.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いえいえお構いなく<fix123>で、用件ですが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, no, don't mind me..<fix123>Anyways, I have business with you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>夜分失礼します<fix123>くらいは言っても良いんじゃないの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You know, you could at least start off with<fix123>"sorry to bother you at this late hour" or something.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>突然、神霊が湧いて出るように<fix123>なったのですが<fix123>それについて何か知っている事は<fix123>ありませんか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>These divine spirits have suddenly<fix123>started gushing out everywhere.<fix123>So would you know anything<fix123>about the matter?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>んー<fix123>神霊ねぇ<fix123>神霊について何か知りたいの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm...<fix123>Divine spirits, you say...<fix123>You want to know about divine spirits, do you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>よろしくお願いします<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If you please.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ゴーストリード<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Ghost Lead<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だったら勝負よ！<fix123>私を倒してみせなさい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Then it's a duel!<fix123>Try and defeat me for it!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yuyuko Saigyouji DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>じゃあ、神霊の何について知りたいの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So, you wanted to know about the divine spirits?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>戦う必要があったのかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Did we really need to fight for that...?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何か？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Something on your mind?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いや、まあなんで急に現れたのか<fix123>霊に詳しい人なら判るかなと<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I just figured someone who knows about spirits<fix123>might know why they showed up so suddenly<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>神社で有効利用したいのね？<fix123>私にも判らないわ<fix123>霊は霊でもお寺の墓地に<fix123>集まっていく神霊の事なんて<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Do you plan to put them to use for your shrine?<fix123>I don't know what's going on, either.<fix123>Ghostly as they seem, I know nothing about these divine spirits<fix123>that are gathering toward the temple's cemetery.<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Huh?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>門前の妖怪、習わぬ経を読む<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Youkai Before the Gate, Reading a Sutra She Never Learned [1]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>命蓮寺参道<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Road to Myouren Temple<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>亡霊の不思議な導きで命蓮寺墓地を目指す<fix123>そこに持ち受けていた者は神霊と関係あるのだろうか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heading towards Myouren Temple Cemetery under the strange guidance of that ghost...<fix123>Might the ones there be related to the divine spirits?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 妖怪寺へようこそ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Welcome to the Youkai Temple<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kyouko Kasodani ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Kyouko Kasodani LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>さっき朝のおつとめをしている方を<fix123>倒して来ちゃいましたが……<fix123>まだみんな寝ているでしょうし<fix123>問題ない、か！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I just kinda beat down the girl who was<fix123>performing her morning duties...<fix123>But everyone should still be asleep,<fix123>so it shouldn't be a problem!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>問題あるよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It is a problem!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kyouko Kasodani ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>人間だと思って油断してたわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I got careless thinking that you're just a human.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ、大丈夫だったんですね<fix123>良かった良かった<fix123>それにしてもお寺の朝は<fix123>早いんですね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, so you're doing well.<fix123>Great, that's great.<fix123>Anyway, the temple starts its mornings<fix123>quite early, doesn't it?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>読経するヤマビコ<fix123>幽谷 響子<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sutra-Reciting Yamabiko<fix123> Kyouko Kasodani<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まあね<fix123>これも勤行 (ごんぎょう) なのよ<fix123>お陰でそら (・・) でお経を唱える<fix123>事が出来る様になったわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, yeah.<fix123>That's just part of the liturgy.<fix123>I've gotten quite good at being able<fix123>to recite sutras from memory.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それは良かったですね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's great.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ついでに<fix123>人間を襲うのも勤行のうち<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Incidentally,<fix123>attacking humans is also part of the liturgy.<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Huh?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 門前の妖怪小娘<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Youkai Girl Before the Gate<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間の悲鳴でお寺の朝を迎えるの！<fix123>素敵ね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A human scream to begin a morning at the temple!<fix123>How wonderful!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kyouko Kasodani DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>やーらーれーたー！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm done fooooor!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何という大声……！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What a shout...!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>不肖ヤマビコ<fix123>まだまだ修行が足りないわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, how this humble yamabiko<fix123>still lacks training!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あのー<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>What?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もしかして妖怪さんでした？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Could it be that you're a youkai?<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Huh?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>良かった−<fix123>僧侶と戦っているのかと思ってたから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, thank goodness...<fix123>I was worried I was fighting a monk.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>(本気でこれがお坊さんの勤行<fix123>だと思ってたのかしら？)<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Did she seriously think this was<fix123>part of a monk's liturgy?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さてと、お寺の墓地って言ってたわよね<fix123>行ってみましょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now then, she mentioned the temple's cemetery.<fix123>So that's where I'll be off to!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>直線の楽園<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A Straight Line Paradise<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>命蓮寺墓地<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Myouren Temple Cemetery<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>墓地に住む者、それは人か幽鬼か妖怪か<fix123>皆が神霊を呼ぶこの霊は何故墓地に湧く？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are those living in the cemetery humans? Specters? Or are they youkai?<fix123>Why are the spirits everyone calls "divine spirits" gushing towards the cemetery?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 素敵な墓場で暮しましょ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Let's Live in a Lovely Cemetery<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>あら、貴方は……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, you're...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お困りの忘れ物<fix123>多々良 小傘<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Troubled Forgotten Item<fix123> Kogasa Tatara<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ、良いところに来たわね<fix123>この先に見た事のない奴が<fix123>番をしているのー<fix123>そいつにいくら撃ち込んでも<fix123>いつもタイムオーバーで負けるんだ<fix123>ねえ、何とかしてよ〜<fix123>お願い<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, you came at a good time!<fix123>I saw this girl I've never<fix123>seen before keeping watch back there.<fix123>But no matter how much I shoot her,<fix123>I always lose by time out...<fix123>So hey, do something about her〜<fix123>Please.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら？<fix123>妖怪同士の喧嘩かしら<fix123>丁度良いわ！<fix123>まとめて倒してあげる！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123>A quarrel between fellow youkai, perhaps?<fix123>That's just perfect!<fix123>I'll take care of both of you at once!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kogasa Tatara DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>小傘さんが言っていた妖怪って<fix123>何処に居るのかしら？<fix123>そもそも妖怪なのかしら？<fix123>相手が人間だったら嫌ねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Just where is this youkai<fix123>Miss Kogasa was talking about?<fix123>Or was it even a youkai in the first place?<fix123>I'll be disappointed if it's a human...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ちーかよーるなー！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Dooon't come any closeeer!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yoshika Miyako ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>これから先はお前達が入って<fix123>良い場所ではない！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This is no place for<fix123>the likes of you to enter!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>来た！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There you are!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>忠実な死体<fix123>宮古 芳香<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Loyal Corpse<fix123> Yoshika Miyako<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>我々 (・・) は崇高な霊廟を守るために<fix123>生み出された戦士 (キョンシー) である<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We are fighters (jiang shi) , arisen to protect<fix123> this magnificent mausoleum.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>キョ、キョンシー？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>J-jiang shi?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうだ<fix123>やんごとなき霊魂に命を吹き込まれたのだ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's right.<fix123>We have had life breathed into us by noble spirits.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>知ってます見てました<fix123>テンテン可愛かったですよね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I know, I was watching.<fix123>Tiantian was rather cute, wasn't she?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何の話だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What are you talking about?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうかー、キョンシーって最近聞かないと<fix123>思っていたら幻想郷 (こんなところ) に居たのねー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, no wonder I hadn't heard about "jiang shi" in a while.<fix123>So you ended up here in Gensokyo (a place like this), huh...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: リジッドパラダイス<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Rigid Paradise<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何の話か判らないが<fix123>我々を知っているのなら判るだろう！<fix123>我々の弾幕でやられれば<fix123>お前もキョンシーになるのだ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I don't know what you're talking about,<fix123>but if you know of us, then you must understand!<fix123>If you're done in by our danmaku,<fix123>you'll become a jiang shi too!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yoshika Miyako DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ぐあぁぁあぁ！<fix123>やーらーれーたー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Gwaaaaargh!<fix123>I'm done fooooorー<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>(今日は断末魔を聞く事が多いわね)<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(I've heard so many agonized yells today.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>しかし、この世に生がある限り<fix123>ゾンビは滅せぬ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But as long as life remains on this world,<fix123>zombies will never perish.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あー<fix123>あーでもねー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah...<fix123>Ah, but you know...<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>What?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>キョンシーは既に幻想だけど<fix123>ゾンビは人気者ですよ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Jiang shi have faded to fantasy,<fix123>but zombies are really popular, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それは良かった<fix123>気分が良いぞ、何用だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's good to know.<fix123>I'm in a good mood. What is it you want?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ここを通してくださる？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Would you let me through?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>仕方が無い<fix123>ちょっとだけ眠りにつくぞ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, if I must.<fix123>I'll just take a little nap.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……さようなら<fix123>今度こそ永遠の眠りになると良いですね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...Farewell.<fix123>I hope the sleep's eternal this time...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>加速する嗜欲<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Accelerating Luxury<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>夢殿大祀廟の洞窟<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A Hole in the Hall of Dreams' Great Mausoleum<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>神霊はか細かき光の筋となり洞窟の奥を目指す<fix123>それはこの世の物とは思えない光景だった<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The divine spirits, pulled into fine strings of light toward the cavern's depth...<fix123>The scenery was unlike anything of this world.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: デザイアドライブ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Desire Drive<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>Seiga Kaku LEAVES<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>There was a heretical establishment like this<fix123>beneath the newly-made temple...?<fix123>That's kinda disturbing.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Seiga Kaku ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>いらっしゃい<fix123>あら、貴方は人間のようね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Welcome.<fix123>Oh, it seems you're a human.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方はさっき……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're that one from before...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>壁抜けの邪仙<fix123>青娥 娘々<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Wicked Hermit of Passing Through Walls<fix123>Lady Seiga<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この先は大道士の霊廟です<fix123>異教の人間が立ち入るような<fix123>場所じゃないわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Beyond this point is the mausoleum of a great Taoist.<fix123><fix123>Heretic humans are<fix123>forbidden to enter.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あらら、道士って事は、<fix123>さっきのキョンシーは貴方の？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, my, a Taoist.<fix123>So that jiang shi from before was yours?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>察しが良いですね<fix123>あの娘、いま何処にいるのかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well guessed.<fix123>Just where has that girl gotten to?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>(やっつけちゃった……<fix123>どう報告しよう)<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(I beat her up...<fix123>How should I tell her?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yoshika Miyako ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>おはよう！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Good morning!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら、すぐ隣に居たなんて<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, right at my side.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あれ？<fix123>生きてたの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123>It's still alive?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>死体は死なないのよ<fix123>素敵でしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Corpses can't die, you know.<fix123>Isn't it wonderful?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 古きユアンシェン<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Old Yuanshen<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さあさあ、もう一戦交えます？<fix123>廟に集まる神霊を吸収したこの娘と<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now, now, will it be another round?<fix123>With this girl who has absorbed all the divine spirits that gathered in the tomb.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ、え、出来れば<fix123>遠慮したいのですが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, um, if you don't mind,<fix123>I'd like to turn down the offer...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>残念でした<fix123>この娘も怨みがあるみたいですし<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, too bad.<fix123>It seems this girl has a grudge against you, too.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Seiga Kaku & Yoshika Miyako DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>見事だわ<fix123>貴方、普通の人間じゃ無いわね？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How splendid.<fix123>You're not an ordinary human, are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>判りますー？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Can you tell~?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>で、貴方みたいな人間が<fix123>大祀廟に何か用かしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So, what does a human like you<fix123>want with the grand mausoleum?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>んーと<fix123>何が起こっているんですか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ummm...<fix123>What exactly is going on?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？<fix123>そ、そうね<fix123>もうすぐ凄いお方が目を覚ますの<fix123>この霊達は、そのお方の威光に<fix123>惹かれて自ら集まってきてるのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123>Uh, right.<fix123><fix123>An amazing person is about to be awakened.<fix123>These spirits were attracted here by her power<fix123>and gathered of their own accord.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はあそうですか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh, is that right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そんな話を聞きたいんじゃなくて？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Is that not what you wanted to know?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>よく呑み込めていないのですが<fix123>取り敢えずこの扉の先に<fix123>行ってみましょうか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I don't think I really get it all that very well...<fix123>For now, why don't I just<fix123>go on ahead through that door?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう、改宗します？<fix123>貴方ならいい仙人になれますよ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see. Will you convert?<fix123>You would make an excellent hermit.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うーん、仙人には<fix123>なりたくないです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ummm, I don't want<fix123>to be a hermit.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>隠然たるモノの血<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Blood of Those with Hidden Power<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>夢殿大祀廟<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Hall of Dreams' Great Mausoleum<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>扉の向こうには巨大な遺構が隠されていた<fix123>ここに何が眠るのか神霊達は知っているのだろうか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A huge remnant was hidden behind the doors.<fix123>Are the divine spirits aware of what lies within?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 夢殿大祀廟<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Hall of Dreams' Great Mausoleum<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Soga no Tojiko ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Soga no Tojiko DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>幻想郷は不思議よね−<fix123>まだまだこんな建物が<fix123>埋もれているなんて<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Gensokyo sure is mysterious...<fix123>To think that buildings like these<fix123>are still lying buried beneath the earth...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、ついにこの日が来たのか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Aah... this fateful day hath finally come.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mononobe no Futo ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>我が復活を祝福する者よ、何者ぞ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Thou who hast blessed my resurrection: speak now, and name thyself.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ、人が居た<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, someone's here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>古代日本の尸解仙<fix123>物部 布都<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Shikaisen from Ancient Japan<fix123> Mononobe no Futo<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何者かと訊いておる<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who art thou that calleth upon me?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええ、幻想郷で神様をしております傍ら<fix123>巫女の真似事もしております<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I'm a god in Gensokyo,<fix123>while acting as a shrine maiden on the side.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>神様だと？<fix123>そうか、我を天界に迎え入れようと<fix123>いうのだな？<fix123>一度死んでみた甲斐があったと<fix123>いうものだ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A god, thou sayeth?<fix123>Dost thou come before me seeking to deliver me<fix123>unto Heaven?<fix123>Then mayhap there was value in having once<fix123>before tasted death.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いえ、そんなつもりはないですが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, I wasn't planning on that.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……では何用だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...Then what design hast driven thee before me?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それが私にもよく判らないのですが<fix123>何となく不穏な空気でしたので<fix123>ちょっと様子を見に……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm not really sure of that myself.<fix123><fix123>Somehow or another, I just felt something brewing in the air,<fix123>so I came to have a look...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 大神神話伝<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Omiwa Legend<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>迷い子という訳だな？<fix123>良いだろう<fix123>その迷い断ち切ってやろう<fix123>物部の秘術と道教の融合<fix123>おぬしで試してみるか！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Then thou art a lost child?<fix123><fix123>Very well,<fix123>I will cut through the haze of confusion that surrounds thee.<fix123>Wilt thou bear witness as I demonstrate the fusion of<fix123>the secret art of the Mononobe and the way of the Tao upon thee?!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mononobe no Futo DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>くっ！<fix123>おぬしは何者だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Kuh!<fix123>What manner of being art thou?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ですから、神様をしております傍ら……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Like I said, I'm a god while...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まあいい<fix123>我が復活した理由が判ったよ<fix123>凶悪な敵 (・) の存在が近衛兵たる<fix123>我を目覚めさせた<fix123>そういうことだろう？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It doth matter not.<fix123>I now apprehend the purpose of mine resurrection.<fix123>The coming of a enemy most wretched hath returned me,<fix123>one of the Imperial Guard, unto this waking world anew.<fix123>Is that not correct?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>凶悪な敵、って失礼ね<fix123>というかさー、この神霊達は何なの？<fix123>それを調べてるのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>"Enemy most wretched"? How rude.<fix123>And anyway, what are these divine spirits?<fix123>That's what I'm investigating.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>神霊だと……？<fix123>む、おぬしの周りを漂っているのは……<fix123>低俗霊か！？<fix123>これはもしや……<fix123>太子様が復活なされているのだな！<fix123>こうしてはおられまい<fix123>失礼するぞ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Divine spirits, sayeth thee...?<fix123>Mmm, these shades that doth linger about thee are...<fix123>Vulgar spirits!?<fix123>Mayhap...?<fix123>The Crown Prince hath been resurrected!<fix123>I cannot remain here like this.<fix123>Excuse me, if thou wouldst.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あのー<fix123>中に入っても良いんですかー？<fix123>入っちゃえ入っちゃえ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Umm...<fix123>Do you mind if I come in?<fix123>I'm comin' in, I'm comin' in!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>和を以て貴しと為す<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hold Harmony Sacred<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>神霊廟<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Divine Spirit Mausoleum<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>大量に集まった神霊はまるで星空のようだった<fix123>静かにその者の声が発せられるのを待っていた<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The massive quantity of gathered divine spirits resembled a starry sky.<fix123>They silently wait for the one to give her voice.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 小さな欲望の星空<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Starry Sky of Small Desires<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>凄い数の神霊が……<fix123>さっきの人は低俗霊って<fix123>言っていたわね<fix123><fix123>……うーん<fix123>さっきの人の名前が物部 (もののべ) 、ねぇ<fix123>どっかで聞いた事があるような……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>All these divine spirits...<fix123>That person just now<fix123>called them "vulgar spirits", didn't she?<fix123>...Hmmmm.<fix123>That person just now's name was Mononobe, huh?<fix123>It seems like I've heard that somewhere before...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>物部氏は滅んだわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Mononobe clan was destroyed.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Toyosatomimi no Miko ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>私はその場に立ち会ったことがあるもの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I witnessed it for myself.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>昔、物部氏と私は宗教的な理由により<fix123>対立していてね<fix123>それは神道と仏教の対立でした<fix123>表向きは……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Long ago, the Mononobe clan and I opposed one another<fix123>for religious reasons.<fix123>To the public, it appeared as a confrontation between<fix123>Shinto and Buddhism...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何の話？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What are you talking about?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は仏教派、と言われている筈ですが<fix123>それは私が用意した嘘の話<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I was said to be the Buddhist faction, <fix123>but that was a ruse that I had prepared.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あのー<fix123>どちら様でしょう？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Umm...<fix123>Who are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>聖徳道士<fix123>豊聡耳 神子<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Shoutoku Taoist<fix123>Toyosatomimi no Miko<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は豊聡耳神子 (とよさとみみのみこ) <fix123>人は私を聖徳王と呼ぶわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I am Toyosatomimi no Miko.<fix123>People call me Shoutoku Ou.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>聖徳、王！？<fix123>あの旧一万円札の？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Shoutoku, Ou?!<fix123>The one on the old 10,000-yen bill?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いつの時代の話かしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What era are you talking about?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……なる程、判ったわ！<fix123>この神霊は大きな信仰に<fix123>繋がると思ってましたが<fix123>貴方みたいな伝説の人が復活すれば<fix123>そりゃ、勝手に集まりますよねー<fix123>ってそれじゃあ、私の信仰に不利じゃん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...I see. I get it now!<fix123>I expected that these divine spirits would be somehow<fix123>connected to an immense source of faith, but...<fix123>Since a legendary person like you was resurrected,<fix123>it's no wonder they just decided to gather on their own.<fix123>...Wait, that's not very convenient for my faith.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>君から欲が溢れ出ているわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Desire overflows from within you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 聖徳伝説　～　True Administrator<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Shoutoku Legend ~ True Administrator<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は君と戦う理由は無い<fix123>『和を以て貴しと為す』です<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I have no reason to fight with you.<fix123>"Harmony is to be valued."<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>でもまあ折角ここまで来たのに<fix123>手ぶらで帰るのはちょっと……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But going back empty-handed after<fix123>coming all the way out here is kinda...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>判っています<fix123>君の心の欲を見れば言葉など無用<fix123>私と闘い、打ち勝って功績を<fix123>上げたいのでしょう？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I understand.<fix123>If I read your heart's desires, there is no need for words.<fix123><fix123>Wouldn't you like to fight me,<fix123>and achieve some merit should you defeat me?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええ、まあ、でも<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Uh, well, but--<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>気にしなくてよい<fix123>私の復活にもそれが有利になるのです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Pay me no mind.<fix123>It will be beneficial towards my resurrection, as well.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さあ私を倒して見せよ<fix123>それがこの世に和をもたらすのだ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now, attempt to defeat me.<fix123><fix123>That will bring harmony to this world!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>During Spell Card 87, 88, 89 or 90<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Soga no Tojiko & Mononobe no Futo ENTER<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>やってやんよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Have at it!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>われにおまかせを！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Please let me handle this!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おろかものめが！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You damn fool!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はなしにもならぬわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Your pathetic power isn't worth talking about!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>やれやれ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Good grief!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まだまだぁ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You haven't won yet!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>またですか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Once again?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もういいでしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Haven't we done enough?<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>Ending　No. 06<fix123><fix123>
The Great Mausoleum.<fix123>
The place where small divine spirits (= desires) had gathered<fix123>to have Miko grant their wishes.<fix123>
"So, whaddya want granted?<fix123>
Wha? ‘I want something tasty?’ Eat some shrooms.<fix123>
‘My hips ache?’ I know a good massage place."<fix123>
"Man, how do you understand all these guys like this?"<fix123>
"I told you, there's no point if you can't listen to ten desires at once."<fix123>
"Ten at once... eh?"<fix123>
"Thirsty... sleepy... with... dreams... power...<fix123>
Geez, stop talkin' over one another!"<fix123>
"People's thoughts change every moment.<fix123>
If you try to listen to them one by one, the result will differ.<fix123>
So you must listen to them all together, or you will not see the truth."<fix123>
"You're asking the impossible, lady!"<fix123>
"Well, I happen to think it's rather easy."<fix123>
"You ain't exactly normal, are you..."<fix123>
The divine spirits naturally gathered upon Miko's resurrection.<fix123>
The little desires of humans that reflected their true nature.<fix123>
That was what the small divine spirits really were.<fix123>
The little spirits gathered in the mausoleum were too many for Marisa to hold.<fix123>
So she lost interest in the mausoleum and returned to her ordinary life.<fix123>
So what happened to the small divine spirits then?<fix123>
They vanished into thin air once Miko appeared in the human village.<fix123>
Being able to listen to and understand ten people at once,<fix123>Miko was the talk of the town.<fix123>
Marisa didn't know where the little spirits had headed, but she didn't care anymore.<fix123>
Perhaps in a way, those little spirits had attracted Miko, the truly divine spirit.<fix123>
<c$Ending No.03 — A moment born from varying desires and faith.$><fix123>
<c$Congratulations, all clear! Just as I'd expected!$><fix123>
Marisa's house.<fix123>
Bad ventilation, gloomy, and packed with things piled high.<fix123>
Marisa was nowhere to be seen.<fix123>
However, one could hear strange noises outside.<fix123>
"Toh! Hah!"<fix123>
"Whew, nothin' beats morning training!"<fix123>
Explain this to me!<fix123>
Why has Marisa been doing some strange dance all morning?<fix123>
The truth is, Marisa had heard a secret of Taoism from Seiga.<fix123>
What secret was that?<fix123>
It was that of immortality.<fix123>
Immortality was the ultimate goal of Taoists.<fix123>

She'd heard this from Ibarakasen too, but seeing Miko and Futo,<fix123>firsthand examples of humans with immortality (breathed into them),<fix123><fix123>Marisa decided to become a Taoist!(Ibarakasen is Kasen's pseudonym.)<fix123>
"Hooyah!<fix123>
Um, I wonder if this is what Taoist training is supposed to be like?"<fix123>
"Well, I broke a good sweat.<fix123>
Can't be far from immortality now!"<fix123>
Yes, achieving immortality through such training was surely impossible.<fix123>
But who knows?<fix123>Maybe getting up early and doing some exercise helped extend Marisa's lifespan a bit.<fix123>
<c$Ending No.04 — Too bad she'll get tired of training soon.$><fix123>
<c$This is a Parallel Ending! Congratulations!$><fix123>
The mausoleum where Miko had been slumbering.<fix123>
Victory was somehow won, but not without severe damages.<fix123>
"That girl's just nuts.<fix123>
Got a whole different aura from anyone else I've ever met...<fix123>
Gonna hafta run for now!"<fix123>
Fearful of Miko's party though not willing to admit it, Marisa fled home.<fix123>
Telling herself it was just a first try, she prepared for a rematch.<fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Hold on a moment,<fix123> I'll prepare some tea.<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>さて、約束通り教えてもらうぜ<fix123>この纏わり付いている霊は何なんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Alright, now tell me like you promised.<fix123>What are all these spirits running around?<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>These are divine spirit children.<fix123>Bundles of human desire.<fix123>Ghostly as they may be, they're not related to the spirits here.<fix123><fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほほう、妖怪も手を焼く奴だと？<fix123>面白いじゃないか<fix123>お前もろとも消してやるぜ！<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>呼んだ？<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>An early riser!<fix123>Good girl, good girl.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Now, now, are you up to another round,<fix123>With this girl who has absorbed all the divine spirits that gathered in the tomb?<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>How splendid.<fix123>You're not an ordinary human, are you?<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Come, come, no need to be modest.<fix123>For a flesh-and-blood human to be able to fight me is truly amazing.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Okay, then, I'm an amazingly normal magician.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Ummm, what was it, again?<fix123>Ah, that's it! grave looting-- er, archaeological investigation!<fix123>It's a pretty academic goal.<fix123>I'm also interested in the divine spirits gathering here.<fix123>Academically.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Divine spirits, hmm?<fix123>They're actually vulgar spirits hoping for her powers<fix123>to turn them into real divine spirits.<fix123><fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あん？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm?<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>我が復活を祝福する者よ、何者ぞ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Thou who hast praised my resurrection: speak now, and name thyself.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おめでとう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Congratulations.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>古代日本の尸解仙<fix123>物部 布都<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Shikaisen from Ancient Japan<fix123> Mononobe no Futo<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>我が名は物部布都<fix123>我が復活したと言う事は<fix123>太子様の復活を拒む者が現れた<fix123>と言う事だな？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Thou mayest call me Mononobe no Futo.<fix123>Mine return doth indicate that one who wouldst deny<fix123>the Crown Prince's resurrection hath appeared.<fix123>Is it not so?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうなのか？<fix123>よく判らんが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Is that so?<fix123>I really have no idea.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうに決まっておる<fix123>我はこの霊廟を護る為に<fix123>眠っていたのだからな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It is most assuredly so.<fix123>I was laid to rest here that I might<fix123>defend this tomb, if need arose.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふーん<fix123>よく判らんがお宝が眠って<fix123>そうだな。この霊廟<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmmm.<fix123>I don't really get it, but it looks<fix123>like there might be some treasure waiting for me in that tomb.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 大神神話伝<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Omiwa Legend<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>馬脚を露したな<fix123>我が復活したのはお前のような<fix123>盗掘家から護る為だろう！<fix123>物部の秘術と道教の融合<fix123>その身に刻むがいい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>At last, thou hast revealed thy true nature.<fix123>The protection of mine house from such miscreant thieves as thee<fix123>is the purpose of mine resurrection!<fix123>Inscribe into thy very body this fusion of the secret art of the Mononobe<fix123>and the way of the Tao!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mononobe no Futo DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>くっ<fix123>おぬし、鍛えているな？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ugh!<fix123>Hast thou conditioned thy body for this encounter?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、健康の為にな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yeah, for my health.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうか、復活したてで<fix123>まだ力が上手く使えないな<fix123>これでは負けても<fix123>仕方が無い<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...Alas, mine power doth lack greatly its usual potency,<fix123>so soon after resurrection.<fix123>In such a state as this,<fix123>I was without recourse to prevent my defeat.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ベタな言い訳だ……<fix123>嫌いじゃないが<fix123>じゃそういう事で<fix123>この中、調べさせてもらうぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A lame excuse...<fix123>Not that I mind, though.<fix123>Well, then, with that,<fix123>I'll be investigating inside.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いや、ちょっと待って<fix123>む、おぬしの周りを<fix123>漂っているのは……<fix123>低俗霊か！？<fix123>これはもしや……<fix123>太子様が復活なされているのだな！<fix123>こうしてはおられまい<fix123>失礼するぞ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, stay a moment.<fix123>Hmm, these shades that doth<fix123>linger about thee are...<fix123>Vulgar spirits!?<fix123>Mayhap...<fix123>The Crown Prince hath been resurrected!<fix123>I cannot remain here like this.<fix123>Excuse me, if thou wouldst.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おいおい<fix123>置いてけぼりかよ<fix123>まあいいか、<fix123>中に入って良いって事だな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oi, oi,<fix123>you're just gonna leave me here?<fix123>Well, whatever.<fix123>I guess I can come in, then.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>和を以て貴しと為す<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hold Harmony Sacred<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>神霊廟<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Divine Spirit Mausoleum<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>大量に集まった神霊はまるで星空のようだった<fix123>静かにその者の声が発せられるのを待っていた<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The massive quantity of gathered divine spirits resembled a starry sky.<fix123>They silently wait for the one to give her voice.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 小さな欲望の星空<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Starry Sky of Small Desires<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>思ったより広いな<fix123>さてと、何かめぼしい物はあるか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This place is bigger than I thought.<fix123>Now, then, is there anything of value around here?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あるわよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There is.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Toyosatomimi no Miko ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ここにはかけがえのない<fix123>物が詰まっています<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This place is filled with<fix123>priceless valuables that are irreplaceable.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おおっと、出やがったな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Whoops, someone showed up.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>聖徳道士<fix123>豊聡耳 神子<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Shoutoku Taoist<fix123>Toyosatomimi no Miko<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>周りを見なさい<fix123>星空の様な儚い光<fix123>これら全てが人間の欲なのです<fix123>この欲を見ればその人間の全てが判るわ<fix123>過去も今も、未来も<fix123>この霊廟は言うなれば幻想郷の<fix123>アカシックレコード……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Have a look around.<fix123>These transient lights, like stars in the sky.<fix123>Each and every one of them is a human desire.<fix123>Observe a human's desires, and you can understand the entirety of that human.<fix123>Past, present, and future, as well.<fix123>One might say that this mausoleum is Gensokyo's Akashic Records....<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>欲で全てが判る？<fix123>ようやく理解したぜ<fix123>神霊はお前が集めていたんだな？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Understanding everything from desires?<fix123>I finally understand, now.<fix123>You gathered the divine spirits here, didn't you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうですわ<fix123>いや、正確に言うと少し違うけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's right.<fix123>Although, technically speaking, not entirely so.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あん？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私の復活を本能で感じて<fix123>欲の方が自ら集まって来たのです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>These desires gathered here themselves,<fix123>after instinctively sensing my resurrection.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そんな都合の良い事が……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How convenient...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 聖徳伝説　～　True Administrator<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Shoutoku Legend ~ True Administrator<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>君の十ある欲を全て見た私には<fix123>君の過去も未来も見えます<fix123>君は私を倒してこの霊廟を<fix123>調べる事になるでしょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>To one such as I, who has seen each of your ten desires,<fix123>your past and your future are visible.<fix123>You will defeat me, and then<fix123>search this mausoleum.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほう、倒しちゃって良いんだな？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ooh, so you don't mind if I beat you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この欲達はどうせ君には扱えません<fix123>十の欲を同時に聴き、理解できる<fix123>私の能力が必要なのです！<fix123>さあ私を倒して見せよ<fix123>そしてお前の欲望も全てさらけ出せ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You could never manage to govern over these desires either way.<fix123>My ability, to hear and understand ten desires<fix123>at once, is necessary for that!<fix123>Now, attempt to defeat me!<fix123>And lay bare your own desire!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>During Spell Card 87, 88, 89 or 90<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Soga no Tojiko & Mononobe no Futo ENTER<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>やってやんよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Have at it!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>われにおまかせを！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Please let me handle this!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おろかものめが！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You damn fool!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はなしにもならぬわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Your pathetic power isn't worth talking about!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>やれやれ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Good grief!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まだまだぁ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You haven't won yet!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>またですか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Once again?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もういいでしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Haven't we done enough?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Soga no Tojiko & Mononobe no Futo LEAVE<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>After Spell Card 87, 88, 89 or 90<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>たわむれはおわりじゃ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Enough playing around!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Toyosatomimi no Miko DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>If player has continued<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Ending　No. 10<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>If player has not continued<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Ending　No. 03<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>If player has not continued, has 3 bombs or above, played in Normal difficulty or above and cleared Ending No. 03<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Ending　No. 04<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>死してなお、愉しく<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Cheerful, Even in Death<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>夜桜の冥界<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Night Cherry Blossoms in the Netherworld<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>桜に紛れて漂う幽かな神霊は一体何なのだろう<fix123>神霊は死ぬ寸前でのみ活性化する<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What are these divine spirits that are scattered and swept away by the cherry blossoms?<fix123>They only activate moments before death.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 死霊の夜桜<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Night Sakura of Dead Spirits<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Large Divine Spirit ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Large Divine Spirit DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>さーて、幽霊の親玉を倒さないとね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now then, I'd better beat these phantoms' boss!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あらあらお客様？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, do we have visitors?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yuyuko Saigyouji ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>彷徨わない亡霊<fix123>西行寺 幽々子<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Stationary Ghost<fix123>Yuyuko Saigyouji<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ちょっとまってね<fix123>お茶の用意をしてくるから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hold on a moment,<fix123>I'll prepare some tea.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>行かなくて良いよ<fix123>こんなに霊を暴れさせて<fix123>どういうつもりか教えてくれる？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You don't have to bother.<fix123>Would you tell me what exactly you plan to do<fix123>by getting these spirits so riled up?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>んー？<fix123>どういうつもりだったのかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Mm?<fix123>What do I plan to do, indeed?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ちゃんと管理してよね！<fix123>不気味だから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You need to keep them in check!<fix123>I mean, they're just ghastly.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうね、よく判らないけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I don't know exactly what's going on...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ゴーストリード<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Ghost Lead<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>霊について調べたければ<fix123>私を倒してからにしなさい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...but if you want to know about the spirits,<fix123>you'll have to start with beating me!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yuyuko Saigyouji DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>で？<fix123>何の話だったかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So?<fix123>What exactly were you talking about?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まあ、このうようよしている霊？<fix123>なんなのさ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, you see all these spirits swarming around?<fix123>Yeah, what are those?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>これは神霊の子供よ<fix123>人間の祈りから生まれる儚い思念<fix123>霊は霊でも幽霊とは関係無いわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>These are divine spirit children.<fix123>Fleeting thoughts, born from the prayers of humans.<fix123>Ghostly as they may be, they're not related to the spirits here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうなの<fix123>冥界 (ここ) に来たのは見当違いって事？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see.<fix123>So coming to the Netherworld was a mistake?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ヒントをあげる<fix123>お寺の裏の墓地が怪しくないわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'll give you a hint.<fix123>The cemetery behind the temple isn't suspicious.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふーん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmm...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>門前の妖怪、習わぬ経を読む<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Youkai Before the Gate, Reading a Sutra She Never Learned [1]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>命蓮寺参道<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Road to Myouren Temple<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>亡霊の不思議な導きで命蓮寺墓地を目指す<fix123>そこに持ち受けていた者は神霊と関係あるのだろうか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heading towards Myouren Temple Cemetery under the strange guidance of that ghost...<fix123>Might the ones there be related to the divine spirits?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 妖怪寺へようこそ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Welcome to the Youkai Temple<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kyouko Kasodani ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Kyouko Kasodani LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>確かに冥界よりお寺の方が<fix123>霊が集まっているのね<fix123>それにしてもおかしいわねぇ<fix123>幽々子は神霊って言ってたけど……<fix123>神霊ってこんなワラワラと出る<fix123>雑多な霊だったっけ？<fix123>これじゃあ神霊というか<fix123>ただ心の声が形になっただけ……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There really are more spirits gathering<fix123>around the temple than in the Netherworld.<fix123>Still, it's strange...<fix123>Yuyuko said these were "divine spirits"...<fix123>But are divine spirits really<fix123>supposed to be this numerous and shoddy?<fix123>These aren't so much divine spirits as just<fix123>the voices of souls taken shape...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おはよーございます<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Good morning.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kyouko Kasodani ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>挨拶はきちんとしないとね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You always gotta give a proper greeting.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え、あ、おはよーございます<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Er, uh, good morning.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>読経するヤマビコ<fix123>幽谷 響子<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sutra-Reciting Yamabiko<fix123>Kyouko Kasodani<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>命蓮寺の戒律の一つ<fix123>「挨拶は心のオアシス」<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>One of Myouren Temple's precepts is<fix123>"greetings are a mental oasis."[2]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そういえばこのお寺は<fix123>妖怪寺だったわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, that's right,<fix123>this is a youkai temple.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうよ<fix123>妖怪に優しい妖怪のお寺<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sure is.<fix123>It's a temple for youkai that is kind to youkai.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>じゃあ即刻退治するしかないわね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, then I'll have to exterminate you right away!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 門前の妖怪小娘<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Youkai Girl Before the Gate<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>朝のおつとめ (・・・・) は、掃除に炊飯<fix123>そして迎え撃ち<fix123>幻想郷に人間の悲鳴が<fix123>こだまするよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My morning duties are sweeping, cooking,<fix123>and meeting challengers.<fix123>Let human screams<fix123>echo throughout Gensokyo!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kyouko Kasodani DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>私を倒しても何にもならないわよー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Beating me won't help anything, you know...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まあ妖怪だしね<fix123>取り敢えず退治しておかないと<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, you're a youkai.<fix123>It's necessary anyway.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何しに来たの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What are you here for?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ん？<fix123>ちょっと調査にね<fix123>本堂には神霊が集まって<fix123>いないようね……<fix123>臭いのは墓地、ね<fix123>墓地に神霊ねぇ……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm?<fix123>Just checking up on things.<fix123>The divine spirits don't appear to be<fix123>gathering within the temple itself...<fix123>It's the cemetery that stinks.<fix123>Divine spirits in the cemetery, huh...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>直線の楽園<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A Straight Line Paradise<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>命蓮寺墓地<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Myouren Temple Cemetery<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>墓地に住む者、それは人か幽鬼か妖怪か<fix123>皆が神霊を呼ぶこの霊は何故墓地に湧く？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are those living in the cemetery humans? Specters? Or are they youkai?<fix123>Why are the spirits everyone calls "divine spirits" gushing towards the cemetery?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 素敵な墓場で暮しましょ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Let's Live in a Lovely Cemetery<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kogasa Tatara ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>む、あんたは確か<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm, you're that—<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お困りの忘れ物<fix123>多々良 小傘<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Troubled Forgotten Item<fix123>Kogasa Tatara<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>やっと来てくれたんだ<fix123>この先に見た事のない奴が<fix123>番をしているのー<fix123>そいつにいくら撃ち込んでも<fix123>いつもタイムオーバーで負けるんだ<fix123>ねえ、何とかしてよ〜<fix123>お願い<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You finally came.<fix123>There's this girl I've never<fix123>seen before keeping watch back there.<fix123>But no matter how much I shoot her,<fix123>I always lose by time out...<fix123>So could you do something about her?<fix123>Please.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>妖怪に妖怪退治を依頼されるなんて<fix123>判ったわ<fix123>あんたもろとも倒してあげるわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A youkai requesting a youkai extermination...<fix123>Fine, then.<fix123>I'll beat you all at once.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kogasa Tatara DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>何処に居るのかしら？<fix123>その不思議な奴って<fix123>”番をしている”っ言ってたけど<fix123>何を守ってるのかなぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Where could this<fix123>mysterious girl be?<fix123>She said she was "keeping watch"...<fix123>but I wonder what she's guarding.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ちーかよーるなー！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Dooon't come any closeeer!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yoshika Miyako ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>これから先はお前達が入って<fix123>良い場所ではない！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This is no place for<fix123>the likes of any of you to enter!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああん？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>忠実な死体<fix123>宮古 芳香<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Loyal Corpse<fix123>Yoshika Miyako<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>我々 (・・) は崇高な霊廟を守るために<fix123>生み出された戦士 (キョンシー) である<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We are fighters (jiang shi) , arisen to protect<fix123>this magnificent mausoleum.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ゾンビでしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So you're a zombie?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうゾンビでーす<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's right, I'm a zombie.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>随分と血色の良いゾンビね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You've got really good complexion for a zombie.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前は墓参りに来た人間か？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Did you come to visit a grave?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は神霊の調査に来たのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I came to check up on these divine spirits.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>神霊？<fix123>何それ吸いやすいの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Divine spirits?<fix123>What're those? Are they easy to absorb?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら、あんたもハズレ？<fix123>おかしいなぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh? You're not the one, either?<fix123>How odd...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: リジッドパラダイス<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Rigid Paradise<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何にしても、この辺をお寺の連中から<fix123>護る為に私は蘇ったのだ！<fix123>我々の仲間になるが良い！<fix123>深き眠りから覚めた弾幕で！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Whatever the case, I was resurrected to<fix123>protect this area from the temple's inhabitants!<fix123>You shall become one of our companions!<fix123>By the danmaku awakened from a deep sleep!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yoshika Miyako DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>うおー！<fix123>やーらーれーたー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Whooorgh!<fix123>I'm done fooooorー<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さあ吐きなさい！<fix123>あんたは一体何を守っていたの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now, spit it out!<fix123>Just what were you protecting?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>う、う……<fix123>う、お<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>U-Uh...<fix123>ugh, oogh...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あれ？<fix123>土に還る時間かしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123>Time to sink back into the earth already?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ゾンビは永遠に不滅です！<fix123>お前は誰だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Zombies are eternal and undying!<fix123>Who are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>付き合いきれないわ<fix123>可哀想に、あたまも腐ってるのね<fix123>しょうがない<fix123>この先に進むしかないわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've had enough of this.<fix123>Pity that your head's rotted away, too.<fix123>Oh well.<fix123>I'll just have to press on ahead.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Reimu Hakurei LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ああ……ついに<fix123>大祀廟 (だいしびょう) の扉が開かれる……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ahhh... at last...<fix123>The door to the great mausoleum will finally open...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>加速する嗜欲<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Accelerating Luxury<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>夢殿大祀廟の洞窟<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A Hole in the Hall of Dreams' Great Mausoleum<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>神霊はか細かき光の筋となり洞窟の奥を目指す<fix123>それはこの世の物とは思えない光景だった<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The divine spirits, pulled into fine strings of light toward the cavern's depth...<fix123>The scenery was unlike anything of this world.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: デザイアドライブ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Desire Drive<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Seiga Kaku ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Seiga Kaku LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>間違い無いわ<fix123>神霊はここに集まっている！<fix123>しかも、もの凄く判りやすく<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There's no question.<fix123>This is where the divine spirits are gathering!<fix123>And it's clearly apparent, too.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Seiga Kaku ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あら、早かったわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, that was quick.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あんた誰？<fix123>もしかして<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who are you?<fix123>Could it be...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>壁抜けの邪仙<fix123>青娥 娘々<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Wicked Hermit of Passing Through Walls<fix123>Lady Seiga<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>先ほどは私の可愛い部下が<fix123>お世話になったみたいで……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It seems you took care of my<fix123>cute underling just now...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>可愛い部下？<fix123>腐った部下の事？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Cute underling?<fix123>You mean that rotten underling?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええ、腐ってて可愛いでしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes. She's so rotten and cute, isn't she?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なる程ね<fix123>あんたが死体を操っていたのね<fix123>悪趣味で無意味な番人なんか置いて<fix123>ここで何をやっているのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see.<fix123>So you were manipulating that corpse.<fix123>What are you doing, leaving that ill-bred<fix123>and pointless guard out here?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>悪趣味で……無意味？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ill-bred and... pointless?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>無意味よ無意味、頭も腐ってるし<fix123>全然門番になってなかったわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yeah, pointless. Her head's rotten.<fix123>She isn't any use as a guard at all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それが無意味じゃないのよねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, but there is a point, after all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yoshika Miyako ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ほいよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hup.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほら、私のキョンシーは<fix123>タフさが売りだもん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>See? My jiang shi's selling point<fix123>is her toughness.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……<fix123>やられたら一回休みって事が<fix123>理解できないのね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...<fix123>So you don't realize that you have to sit out<fix123>a round if you get beat, huh?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 古きユアンシェン<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Old Yuanxian<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さあさあ、もう一戦交えます？<fix123>廟に集まる神霊を吸収したこの娘と<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now, can you handle another round?<fix123>With this girl who has absorbed all the divine spirits that gathered in the tomb.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>言われないでも！<fix123>これではっきりしたわ！<fix123>この神霊騒ぎは人為的な物ってね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No need to ask!<fix123>Now you've made it clear!<fix123>The disturbance among the divine spirits is the work of someone with evil intentions!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Seiga Kaku & Yoshika Miyako DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>流石は幻想郷の巫女、ですね<fix123>錬丹で鍛えた私に傷を付けるなんて<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>As expected from one of Gensokyo's shrine maidens.<fix123>To think you could hurt someone who has been trained in creating elixirs of immortality.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さあ、異常な神霊を止めるのよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now, stop these abnormal divine spirits!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>神霊は私がやっている事じゃないわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I haven't done anything to the divine spirits.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>嘘おっしゃい！<fix123>集まる神霊が隠しきれてないわよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You lie!<fix123>You can't hide all these divine spirits gathering here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そりゃあ、あのお方が<fix123>復活するんですもの……<fix123>沢山の欲を抱擁できるお方ですもの<fix123>人間の欲だって集まって来るわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>They are here because she<fix123>is about to be resurrected...<fix123>She can embrace many desires, after all.<fix123>Even human desires would gather around her.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>悪の大王みたいなのが<fix123>復活するって言うのかしら<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So the evil overlord is about to be resurrected,<fix123>or something like that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>悪の大王？<fix123>いいや、違う<fix123>悪の大王は既に復活したわ<fix123>つい、こないだね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Evil overlord?<fix123>No, not at all.<fix123>The evil overlord has already been resurrected.<fix123>Just a little while ago.<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Hm?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あのお方の復活を阻むように<fix123>ここにお寺を建てた奴が――<fix123>――本当の悪の大王よ<fix123>妖怪を護る為にお寺を建てたんだわ<fix123>この中のお方は未来を背負う賢者です<fix123>必ずや、妖怪を滅してくれるでしょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The one who set up a temple here<fix123>as if to prevent her from resurrecting...<fix123>She's the true evil overlord.<fix123>She built a temple to protect the youkai.<fix123>The person within here is a sage upon whose shoulders rests the future.<fix123>She will surely destroy all youkai for us.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふーん<fix123>どっちでも良いけど<fix123>何にしても私は戦うわ<fix123>変な物を復活させたくないから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmmm.<fix123>Well, whatever.<fix123>Either way, I'm gonna fight.<fix123>I don't want to let anyone weird get resurrected.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>隠然たるモノの血<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Blood of Those with Hidden Power<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>夢殿大祀廟<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Hall of Dreams' Great Mausoleum<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>扉の向こうには巨大な遺構が隠されていた<fix123>ここに何が眠るのか神霊達は知っているのだろうか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A huge remnant was hidden behind the doors.<fix123>Are the divine spirits aware of what lies within?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 夢殿大祀廟<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Hall of Dreams' Great Mausoleum<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Soga no Tojiko ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Soga no Tojiko DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>これはまた変なお墓ねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This is another strange tomb, huh...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、ついにこの日が来たのか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ahh... the fateful day hath finally come.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mononobe no Futo ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>我が復活を祝福する者よ、何者ぞ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Thou who hast praised my resurrection: speak now, and name thyself.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>祝福してないよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I didn't praise anything.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>古代日本の尸解仙<fix123>物部 布都<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Shikaisen from Ancient Japan<fix123>Mononobe no Futo<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？<fix123>じゃあなんで我は復活したのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm?<fix123>Pray tell, what design hath led to my resurrection?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>知らないわよ<fix123>私はあんたみたいな得体の知れない奴の<fix123>復活を拒みに来たの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I dunno.<fix123>I'm just here to stop suspicious characters like you<fix123>from resurrecting.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほう<fix123>なる程<fix123>つまりお前は完全に復活する為の<fix123>試験相手だというのだな？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm.<fix123>I see.<fix123>Art thou the final trial I must conquer, that I may<fix123>be resurrected in full?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何でそうなるのよ<fix123>死者はみんな頭悪いわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How did it end up like this?<fix123>You dead people are all morons.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 大神神話伝<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Omiwa Legend<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>良いだろう！<fix123>お前を倒して完全に復活しようさ<fix123>すれば太子様も降臨出来よう<fix123>おぬしには怨みはないが<fix123>物部の秘術と道教の融合<fix123>お前で試させて貰おう！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Very well!<fix123>I shall vanquish thee, and so return to the world of the living in full.<fix123>Then, the Crown Prince shall rise anew.<fix123>Know that I harbor for thee no malice in mine heart.<fix123>Now, prepare thyself, for I shall demonstrate the fusion of the<fix123>secret art of the Mononobe and the way of the Tao upon thee!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mononobe no Futo DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>な、なんだと<fix123>おぬしの強さは一体……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wh-what madness is this...?<fix123>Truly, thine strength is...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>これで終わり？<fix123>大したことなかったわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Is it over?<fix123>That wasn't really that great.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>こんなにあっさり<fix123>負けてしまうとは<fix123>我はなんの為に千四百年も<fix123>眠っていたのだろうか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>To have suffered so sound a defeat...<fix123>To what ends hath I slept for these<fix123>fourteen-hundred years hence...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何で眠っていたのに<fix123>年数が判るのかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How did you keep track of time<fix123>while you were sleeping?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>む、周りを漂っているのは……<fix123>低俗霊か！？<fix123>これはもしや……<fix123>太子様が復活なされているのだな！<fix123>こうしてはおられまい<fix123>失礼するぞ<fix123>良い闘いだった<fix123>感謝するぞ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmm, these shades that doth linger about thee are...<fix123>Vulgar spirits?!<fix123>Mayhap...?<fix123>The Crown Prince hath been resurrected!<fix123>I cannot remain here like this.<fix123>Excuse me, if thou wouldst.<fix123>'Twas a rousing battle.<fix123>Thou hast mine gratitude!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mononobe no Futo LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あ<fix123>一人で盛り上がって<fix123>去って行っちゃった<fix123>それにしても何が良い闘い、よ<fix123>負けたくせに<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah.<fix123>She got all excited<fix123>and left on her own.<fix123>Anyway, what's with that "'twas a rousing battle" stuff?<fix123>She lost.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>和を以て貴しと為す<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hold Harmony Sacred<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>神霊廟<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Divine Spirit Mausoleum<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>大量に集まった神霊はまるで星空のようだった<fix123>静かにその者の声が発せられるのを待っていた<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The massive quantity of gathered divine spirits resembled a starry sky.<fix123>They silently wait for the one to give her voice.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 小さな欲望の星空<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Starry Sky of Small Desires<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>神霊が集まりすぎて<fix123>星空みたいだわ<fix123>何というか……<fix123>余り禍々しい様子じゃないわね<fix123>私が間違っていたのかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There's so many divine spirits gathering,<fix123>it's like a starry sky...<fix123>Somehow...<fix123>...this place doesn't feel very sinister at all.<fix123>Was I mistaken?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>君の行動は全て見させて頂いたわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I have observed all of your actions.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Toyosatomimi no Miko ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>素晴らしい人間ですね<fix123>君からも学ぶ物があります<fix123>いや、学ぶ物がない人間なんて<fix123>居なかったかしら……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You are truly a wonderful human.<fix123>I have much to learn from you.<fix123>Well, there's nobody who doesn't have something<fix123>they could learn, I suppose...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いつから見ていたの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How long have you been watching me?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>君が生まれる前から<fix123>遡って見させて頂きました<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I have looked back to before you were born<fix123>to watch you.<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Hm?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>君は妖怪退治を生業としていますが<fix123>妖怪に与 (くみ) するものにも見えます<fix123>私の復活を拒もうとした妖怪僧侶達の<fix123>仲間ではないのでしょうか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I have seen your occupation as a youkai exterminator,<fix123>but I have also seen your camaraderie with youkai.<fix123>You are friends with the youkai monks who aimed<fix123>to deny my resurrection, are you not?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>白蓮のこと？<fix123>あんなの商売敵よ（宗教的な意味で）<fix123>それより、過去から遡って見たって<fix123>どういうこと？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You mean Byakuren?<fix123>She's just a business rival. (In a religious sense.)<fix123>Anyway, what was that about looking<fix123>into the past?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>聖徳道士<fix123>豊聡耳 神子<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Shoutoku Taoist<fix123>Toyosatomimi no Miko<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は生前、十人の言葉を同時に<fix123>理解する事が出来ました<fix123>長き眠りで信仰の力を得た今では<fix123>人間の欲を聴く事も出来ます<fix123>欲は人間の本質を語ります<fix123>十の欲を理解すれば<fix123>人間の全てが判るというもの<fix123>それこそ過去も今も<fix123>そして未来も……<fix123>次に君はこう言うでしょう――<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>While I was alive, I had the ability to understand<fix123>ten people's words simultaneously.<fix123>During my long sleep, I acquired the power of faith, and now,<fix123>I can hear humans' desires.<fix123>Desire tells of a human's true character.<fix123>To understand the ten desires of a human<fix123>is to know them fully.<fix123>In the past, the present...<fix123>And the future...<fix123>Your next line is...[3]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いやいや、ちょっと待って！<fix123>私にも喋らせてよ！<fix123>折角ここまで来たんだから！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, hey, wait a minute!<fix123>Give me a chance to talk, too!<fix123>I've come all this way, you know!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 聖徳伝説　～　True Administrator<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Shoutoku Legend ~ True Administrator<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>――その必要は無い<fix123>何故なら、君の行動は<fix123>筒抜けだからね<fix123>そう、君は私に牙を剥くでしょう<fix123>特に理由も無く<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There is no need for that.<fix123>Because I have already seen through<fix123>all of your actions.<fix123>That's right, you will now bare your fangs at me.<fix123>Without any reason to do so.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>その通りよ<fix123>特に理由は無いけども！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's right.<fix123>Without any reason to do so!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間が私の存在を否定し、<fix123>伝説となる時を待っていたわ！<fix123>さあ私を倒して見せよ<fix123>そして私は生ける伝説となる！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This era, when humans deny my existence<fix123>and I have become legend, is what I was waiting for!<fix123>Now, attempt to defeat me!<fix123>And I shall become a living legend!<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>やってやんよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Have at it!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>われにおまかせを！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Please let me handle this!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おろかものめが！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You damn fool!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はなしにもならぬわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Your pathetic power isn't worth talking about!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>やれやれ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Good grief!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まだまだぁ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You haven't won yet!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>またですか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Once again?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もういいでしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Haven't we done enough?<fix123><fix123>
