jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kogasa Tatara ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>うらめしやー！<fix123>この間は失敗したわ<fix123>人間を驚かすには、やっぱり夜じゃないとね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Booo!<fix123>I messed up last time.<fix123>You have to wait until night to surprise humans!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kogasa Tatara DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>うーん、さっきまで鳥の形をしていたのに<fix123>今は空飛ぶ獣……<fix123>なんなのかしら？<fix123>あの生き物は<fix123>ＵＦＯに乗っていたんだから、まず間違い無く<fix123>エイリアンだと思うけど<fix123>……<fix123>何か聞こえる……<fix123>鳥の様な、獣の様な、赤ん坊の様な……<fix123>叫び声の様な、笑い声の様な<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmmm, it was a bird until just now,<fix123>but now it's a flying monster......<fix123>What on earth<fix123>is this creature, anyway?<fix123>It was riding in a UFO, so I think it's got to be<fix123>some kind of alien, but...<fix123>......<fix123>I can hear something......<fix123>It sounds like a bird, or a monster, or a baby......<fix123>Or a screaming voice, or laughter...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>??? ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>聖救出、おめでとう！<fix123>まさか、飛倉が妖怪退治を専門とする<fix123>人間の手によって集まるなんてね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Congratulations on rescuing Hijiri!<fix123>I never thought a human specializing in youkai hunting<fix123>would be the one to find the fragments of the Flying Storehouse.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ、謎の発光物体発見！<fix123>貴方が、ＵＦＯに乗っていたエイリアンね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, I found the mysterious shining thing!<fix123>You're the alien that was riding in the UFO, right!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>残念でした<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sorry, but...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nue Houjuu TRANSFORMS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>未確認幻想飛行少女<fix123>封獣　ぬえ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Unidentified Fantastic Flying Girl<fix123>Nue Houjuu<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は鵺、正体不明がウリの妖怪よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm a nue, the youkai best known as being mysterious.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あれ、そういえば日本語だわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh? Hm, you're speaking Japanese, too.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>エイリアンじゃ無いですから<fix123>それとも何かしら？<fix123>私より、エイリアンの方が怖いとでも？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, because I'm not an alien.<fix123>But, what are you saying?<fix123>Are aliens scarier than I am?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方、誰です？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だから鵺だって<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Look, I told you, I'm a nue.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ぬえ……？<fix123>どっかで聞いた事がある様な<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Nue......?<fix123>I think I've heard that word before...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら、有名じゃなかったのね、私<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What? I know I used to be famous.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まあ、宇宙人じゃなければ退治するだけです<fix123>って、ＵＦＯは何だったのかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, if you're not an alien, I guess I'll just have to beat you.<fix123>Wait, so what was the UFO, then?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ＵＦＯは、貴方の知識が生んだ想像の産物よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The UFO was an impression born from your own experience.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>へ？<fix123>でも、沢山見たわよ？<fix123>確かに円盤形ＵＦＯでした<fix123>古典的な<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123>But, I saw lots of them.<fix123>It was definitely a flying saucer.<fix123>The old-fashioned kind.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>古典的なのは貴方の心<fix123>しかし、古典的な人間なのに私を<fix123>知らないなんて……残念ね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Your heart is what's old-fashioned.<fix123>But why wouldn't an old-fashioned person<fix123>know about me? That's too bad...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まあ良いです<fix123>妖怪なら退治しないとね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, whatever.<fix123>If you're a youkai, I have to beat you!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 平安のエイリアン<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Heian Alien<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私の正体を知らないのは有難いわね<fix123>でも、怖がってくれないと私の心は餓える<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm glad you don't know my true nature.<fix123>But, if you're not afraid, my heart will dry up.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もう妖怪には驚きません！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I won't be surprised by any more youkai!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>妖怪の恐怖を忘れた人間よ！<fix123>正体不明の飛行物体に怯えて死ね！！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So, you human who's forgotten the fear of youkai!<fix123>Die from the terror of this unidentified flying object!!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nue Houjuu DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ま、まさか、幾ら長い間眠っていたからといって<fix123>こんな小娘にやられるとは……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I-I can't believe I've been beaten by such a young girl, even if I've been asleep for so long......<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だから、もう妖怪には負けませんよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I told you, I won't lose to any more youkai!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私も焼きが回ったかねぇ<fix123>地上の人間はもう夜を恐れないのかな<fix123>仕様が無い、煮るなり焼くなり好きにするがいい<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see I've lost my touch.<fix123>Are the humans above ground no longer afraid of the night?<fix123>Oh well, do whatever horrible thing you please.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>って、別に煮たり焼いたりする目的があって<fix123>戦った訳じゃないんですけどね<fix123>あのＵＦＯは何だったのか<fix123>何故、白蓮さん達にはＵＦＯに見えなかったのか<fix123>そういう事を調べようと思っていただけで<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, it's not like I fought you because I wanted<fix123>to do something horrible to you.<fix123>What was that UFO, anyway?<fix123>Why didn't it look like a UFO to Byakuren?<fix123>I just wanted to get the answer to those questions.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふん、私は正体不明の妖怪<fix123>正体不明のタネを飛倉に仕掛けたのよ<fix123>そのタネは、見る者の頭の中で理解できる物へ<fix123>変換して見せる力がある<fix123>貴方は、正体不明の浮遊物をＵＦＯと認識した<fix123>から、ＵＦＯに見えた<fix123>飛倉が飛ぶ事を知っている者達には、飛倉の<fix123>破片に見えるって訳<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I'm a youkai whose true form is unknown.<fix123>I put the Seed of Unknown Form on the fragments of the Flying Storehouse.<fix123>That seed has the power to change form into<fix123>whatever is in the head of the person looking at it.<fix123>Since you thought something unknown floating in the sky<fix123>had to be a UFO, you saw a UFO.<fix123>To people who knew of the Flying Storehouse,<fix123>they saw its fragments.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>じゃあ、ＵＦＯは頭の中の映像って事？<fix123>で、何でそんな事したのかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So, the UFO was really only in my head?<fix123>Why did you do that, then?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ムラサ達の邪魔にもなるし、人間も<fix123>怖がらせる事が出来る、予定だった<fix123>でも、貴方は怖がってくれなかった<fix123>それに、貴方の力で結局ムラサ達の手助けを<fix123>した形になってしまった<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I thought it would get in Murasa's way,<fix123>and it would make the humans scared.<fix123>But it looks like you weren't scared at all.<fix123>And on top of that, it looks like<fix123>it made you help out Murasa's group.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ＵＦＯは人類の憧れですよ？<fix123>怖い訳が無いじゃないですか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, humans love UFOs, you know?<fix123>There's no way we'd be scared of them.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今の人間は、正体不明な飛行物体を<fix123>恐れないのね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So humans aren't afraid of<fix123>unidentified flying objects these days?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええ、古い傘が飛んでいても驚かない<fix123>時代ですから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's right, this is an age where<fix123>an old flying umbrella won't scare people.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>仕様が無い、こうなったら正体を明かして<fix123>暴れた方が怖がるかも知れないな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh well, in that case maybe it would be scarier if<fix123>I just went on a rampage in my true form.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ、その時は本格的に退治しますよ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, but then I'll have to exterminate you for real.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>未確認飛行幻想物体<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Unidentified Flying Fantastic Object<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>The Night Sky<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: UFO Romance in the Night Sky<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kogasa Tatara ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>うらめしやー！<fix123>この間は失敗したわ<fix123>人間を驚かすには、やっぱり夜じゃないとね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Booo!<fix123>I messed up last time.<fix123>You have to wait until night to surprise humans!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kogasa Tatara DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>何処に消えた？<fix123>あんな小さな生き物を追うのは無理があったか<fix123>ま、この辺はＵＦＯ多発地帯だし<fix123>いざとなればまたこじ開ければ良いか<fix123>ん？<fix123>なんだ、この不気味な鳴き声は……<fix123>鳥……じゃないな、獣でもない<fix123>なんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Where did it disappear to?<fix123>Maybe it was hopeless trying to chase something that small.<fix123>Well, there's a lot of UFOs around here.<fix123>I guess I can always break open some more.<fix123>Huh?<fix123>What's that weird sound......<fix123>A bird... no, some kind of monster?<fix123>What is it?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>??? ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>聖救出、おめでとう！<fix123>まさか、飛倉が妖怪退治を専門とする<fix123>人間の手によって集まるなんてね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Congratulations on rescuing Hijiri!<fix123>I never thought a human specializing in youkai hunting would<fix123>be the one to find the fragments of the Flying Storehouse.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前は……船の中でも魔界でも現れたな<fix123>その正体が判らない飛行妖怪<fix123>そういう妖怪をなんていうか知ってるか？<fix123>鵺的妖怪って言うんだぜ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You... you showed up in the ship, and in Makai.<fix123>Hm, a flying youkai of unknown nature...<fix123>Do I know of any youkai like that?<fix123>I guess that'd make you something like a nue?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nue Houjuu TRANSFORMS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>未確認幻想飛行少女<fix123>封獣　ぬえ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Unidentified Fantastic Flying Girl<fix123>Nue Houjuu<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ご名答<fix123>いや、魔界まで行ってあの僧侶を助けた<fix123>かと思ったら<fix123>まさか、有りもしない幻のＵＦＯをこじ開けて<fix123>私を追ってくるなんて驚いたわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Correct.<fix123>Still, even if you went all the way to Makai<fix123>to save that monk,<fix123>I'm surprised you'd break open one of those<fix123>imaginary UFOs and come chasing after me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お、おお？<fix123>本当に鵺なのか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, ohhh?<fix123>You're really a nue?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方は面白い人間ね<fix123>正体不明な物が怖くないのかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're an interesting human.<fix123>You're not afraid of things you don't understand?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>怖く？<fix123>正体不明の物を見つけたらワクワク<fix123>するじゃないか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Afraid?<fix123>I'd be excited to find something<fix123>I didn't know anything about.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふーん<fix123>若いって良いわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmm.<fix123>It must be nice to be young.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>えへ、それほどでも<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hehe, I guess.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>これじゃあ、私が正体不明のタネをばらまいた<fix123>のも逆効果だったのか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This must be an unintended consequence of my<fix123>scattering the Seed of Unknown Form around.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>正体不明のタネ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Seed of Unknown Form?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>飛倉の破片を地上にばらまいて、ついでに<fix123>貴方達人間も怖がらせようと思ったのに<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I thought I'd scatter the fragments of the Flying Storehouse<fix123>around and use them to scare you humans, but...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ、ＵＦＯの事か？<fix123>正体不明のタネって<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, the UFO?<fix123>Is that what you meant by that seed?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>飛倉がＵＦＯに見えていたのは<fix123>貴方達、一部の人間だけよ<fix123>本当は姿の判らない正体不明の物体<fix123>だっただけ<fix123>それを何と認識するかは<fix123>その人の知識によるの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The only people who thought it looked like a UFO<fix123>was a few of you humans.<fix123>It was just something flying through the sky,<fix123>something you didn't recognize.<fix123>Each person sees it differently<fix123>depending on their experience and knowledge.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほー<fix123>よく判らんが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh.<fix123>I don't really get it, but...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さてさて、貴方は何をしに私を捜したの？<fix123>どうしてＵＦＯの後を追ったの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So, why did you come looking for me?<fix123>Why were you chasing after the UFO?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、ただの好奇心だ<fix123>正体不明に対する、な<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, just curiosity.<fix123>Curiosity about the unknown.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>これじゃあ、私の存在意義がない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Then what will happen to my reason to live?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 平安のエイリアン<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Heian Alien<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は正体不明の妖怪、鵺<fix123>正体不明こそが私の力の源<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm the nue, the youkai of indeterminate form.<fix123>Being unknown is the source of my power.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>む、やる気か？<fix123>何だか判らん鵺的な者に負けたくはないぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm, you wanna go?<fix123>I don't get what's going on, but I don't wanna lose to someone nue-like.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>好奇心で動く幼き者よ！<fix123>正体不明の飛行物体に踊らされて死ね！！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You youngster acting out of curiosity!<fix123>This unidentified flying object will make you dance to your death!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nue Houjuu DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ま、まさか、幾ら長い間眠っていたからといって<fix123>こんな小娘にやられるとは……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I-I can't believe I've been beaten by such a young girl,<fix123>even if I've been asleep for so long......<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おお、勝ってしまった<fix123>まだ私には話が読めんが、お前は何をしたんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, I won.<fix123>I still don't know what's going on, but what did you do?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は……ずっと長い間地底に<fix123>閉じ込められていたの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've... been locked away underground<fix123>for a long, long time.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>悪い事したんだな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You must've done something bad.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今年の初めになって何故か解放されたわ<fix123>地底世界自体が<fix123>そこで、私と一緒に閉じ込められていた<fix123>ムラサ達が何やら活気づいていたのよ<fix123>飛倉も地底から解放されれば、聖を<fix123>復活させることが出来るかも、ってね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We were all freed somehow at the beginning of this year.<fix123>The underground itself was, really.<fix123>When that happened, I noticed Murasa and the others<fix123>sealed away with me were up to something.<fix123>They said that if the Flying Storehouse were freed, too,<fix123>they might be able to bring back Hijiri.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もう復活したな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>She's already back now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は仲間はずれだったし、何より、ムラサ達が<fix123>楽しそうだったのが許せなかった<fix123>だから、先に飛倉の破片を地上にばらまいたの<fix123>姿のない正体不明の飛行物体としてね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I wasn't part of their group, so I felt like<fix123>I just couldn't let them have their fun.<fix123>So, I scattered the Flying Storehouse's fragments above ground.<fix123>I made them into unidentified flying objects.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それがＵＦＯに見えていたって訳だ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>And that's what looked like UFOs.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さあ、話はおしまい<fix123>貴方も私を封印するんでしょう？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, that's enough talk.<fix123>Are you going to seal me away, too?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>封印？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Seal you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>昔、人間に正体がばれたら<fix123>すぐに捕まって地底に閉じ込められたの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A long time ago, when a human discovered my true form,<fix123>they immediately captured me and sealed me away underground.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、私はそんな気はさらさら無いぜ<fix123>封印するのが大好きな人間もいるがね<fix123>しかし、お前があの白蓮達と<fix123>仲が悪い理由が判らん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, I don't wanna do anything like that.<fix123>I guess there's people who love sealing stuff up, though.<fix123>I don't know why you don't seem to get along with<fix123>any of Byakuren's crowd, though.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>仲が悪い？<fix123>いや、ムラサ達は良い奴だったよ<fix123>ただ、人間側に付くなんて言い始めなきゃね<fix123>それが気にくわなかったんだ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmm?<fix123>Oh, no, Murasa and them were good company.<fix123>I just wish they would admit they're siding with the humans.<fix123>That gets on my nerves.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間側ねぇ<fix123>あの白蓮側が、かぁ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Siding with humans?<fix123>You mean, because they're siding with Byakuren?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ムラサ達も長い間地底に閉じ込められて<fix123>いたから、日和ったのさ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I thought I'd give in, though, since Murasa and<fix123>the others were shut in underground for a long time, too.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>きっとお前は勘違いしている<fix123>いや、あの白蓮って僧侶、とんだ<fix123>喰わせもんだぜ<fix123>人間より妖怪の方が救うべき対象だ<fix123>って言って人間と戦っているぜ<fix123>挙げ句の果てに、妖怪御用達のお寺なんか<fix123>建てちゃってさ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm pretty sure you've got the wrong idea.<fix123>See, that Byakuren monk<fix123>is a total sham.<fix123>She fought humans, and even said that youkai need<fix123>saving more than humans do.<fix123>And on top of all that, they put up a temple<fix123>specifically for use by youkai.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？<fix123>僧侶が？　どういう事？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What?<fix123>That monk is? Are you sure?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前みたいな妖怪を救うんだってさ<fix123>たまったもんじゃないぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It wouldn't be a surprise for them to be<fix123>interested in helping a youkai like you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんだって……<fix123>私はそんな人間の邪魔をしてきたと<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What's that...?<fix123>I can't believe I caused trouble for a human like that.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、一度会ってみるのも良いと思うぜ<fix123>人間の里の近くに居るから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, I think it'll be fine if you just go meet her.<fix123>They're pretty close to the human village.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いや、私は会うことが出来ない<fix123>ムラサ達に合えば邪魔してきたのも<fix123>ばれるだろうし、それに<fix123>私の正体不明にキズが付く<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, I can't go see them.<fix123>If I meet Murasa, they'll find out I'm the one that was<fix123>causing them trouble. Besides,<fix123>My real body is hurt now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうかい、取り敢えず私がみんなに<fix123>言いふらすつもりだけどな<fix123>鵺の正体<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh. Well, anyway, I think I've got<fix123>some rumors to go spread now.<fix123>All about the true form of the nue.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Aahhn...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: The Hakurei Shrine.<fix123>
The shrine that stands on the eastern border of Gensokyo.<fix123>
The few cherry blossoms that remained are sure to be scattered by a pleasant wind before long.<fix123>
"Hmm, all that happened? (While I was asleep.)"<fix123>
"They were pretty strong opponents, but it really didn't amount to much.<fix123>
They were behind the times, too."<fix123>
("Behind the times" in Gensokyo, huh?)<fix123>
"So, what did they do after that?"<fix123>
"They said that being under the temple was improper<fix123>and relocated their base."<fix123>
"Oh, where to?<fix123>I kinda want to meet with those guys."<fix123>
"They wouldn't tell me where they relocated to.<fix123>
I heard that they built a dojo somewhere suitable for a hermit, though."<fix123>
"Somewhere suitable for a hermit? Where's that, a mountain?<fix123>(There's a hermit that lives on the mountain, after all.)"<fix123>
"I just told you, I don't know.<fix123>
Aah, maybe they'll come calling again..."<fix123>
A few days later at the Hakurei shrine.<fix123>
While Reimu was doing yard work as usual, Miko appeared there.<fix123>
"Heave-ho!"<fix123>
"Ohhh!"<fix123>
"Ah, thank you for the other day."<fix123>
"Ohhhh?!"<fix123>
"Ahh, my apologies for being late to greet you after moving.<fix123>
Please forgive my rude behavior with that fight before.<fix123>
I had only just woken up, and my judgment was clouded."<fix123>
"You have... uh, you've got infinite potential within you.<fix123>
As part of my apology for the other day, I was hoping to invite you to my house..."<fix123>
"How does that sound?"<fix123>
"Y-Your house? Where is it, anyway?"<fix123>
"It's right where I'm standing. See?"<fix123>
"...What are you, an ant larva?!"<fix123>
Of course, Miko is not an ant larva.<fix123>
Miko, Futo, and the rest, because they found living beneath a temple that was<fix123>a hangout for youkai to be improper, built a dojo in a new place and moved there.<fix123>
This was what was called a hermit world, a land that could<fix123>be expanded infinitely, no matter the size of the nook.<fix123>
Because of this, Miko's group was able<fix123>to move anywhere in an instant.<fix123>
Reimu looked into the dojo that she was invited to.<fix123>
She couldn't help but feel that she had seen the buildings, tools, and small items<fix123>that were there somewhere else before. Was it on the Moon, or in the heavens...?<fix123>
<c$Ending No.01 — Bugs aren't the only things that can live in cracks.$><fix123>
<c$Congratulations, all clear! Just as I'd expected!$><fix123>
The Hakurei Shrine.<fix123>
The shrine that stands on the eastern border of Gensokyo.<fix123>
Now, it is no longer the sole shrine in Gensokyo.<fix123>
"Aaah, nothing to do today...<fix123>
Why don't I eat something!? Yeah, that's what I'll do!"<fix123>
*scratch scratch*<fix123>
"Hm, a noise coming from the wall?"<fix123>
"Hey."<fix123>
"That fight back then was splendid."<fix123>
"D-D-Don't make holes in other people's walls!"<fix123>
"Don't worry. Something like that is easily restored."<fix123>
"The hole's gone... Wait, what? Was that sleight of hand?"<fix123>
"So, as to the reason that I have come here. I, Seiga Kaku,<fix123>would like to teach you the Tao."<fix123>
"Huh?"<fix123>
"Your power is truly splendid.<fix123>To think that you could even hold your own against Lady Toyosatomimi."<fix123>
"I don't know anything about the Tao."<fix123>
"What are you saying? The power you use is Taoism itself."<fix123>
"Huh?"<fix123>
"Your yin-yang orbs, your talismans, your spirit world trance<fix123>and all sorts of other things use the power of Taoism, don't they?"<fix123>
"Is that right?"<fix123>
"That's right. Although in Japan, it might be known as ‘onmyoudou’,<fix123>instead..."<fix123>
Danger! Reimu is pursued by Seiga.<fix123>
What could this wicked hermit be planning?!<fix123>
In truth, she is simply genuinely entranced by Reimu's power.<fix123>
This wicked hermit has a habit of being captivated by the power of strong humans.<fix123>
This is also the reason that she caught hold of Miko and told her about Taoism.<fix123>
<c$Ending No.02 — Reimu's techniques really aren't Shinto, after all.$><fix123>
<c$This is a Parallel Ending! Congratulations!$><fix123>
The mausoleum where Miko had been slumbering.<fix123>
Victory was somehow won, but not without severe damages.<fix123>
"What ARE those guys?! They're tough! Gensokyo's gonna be in serious trouble!<fix123>I have to get back quick and make sure they don't get too far..."<fix123>
Reimu hurried back to the shrine and devised a counter-measure.<fix123>
With this plan, she was certain she would not lose!<fix123>
<c$Ending No.09 — Still lacking in training.$><fix123>
<c$Try to beat the game without continuing!$><fix123>
<fix123>未確認飛行幻想物体<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Unidentified Flying Fantastic Object<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>夜の空<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Night Sky<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 夜空のユーフォーロマンス<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: UFO Romance in the Night Sky<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kogasa Tatara ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>うらめしやー！<fix123>この間は失敗したわ<fix123>人間を驚かすには、やっぱり夜じゃないとね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Booo!<fix123>I messed up last time.<fix123>You have to wait until night to surprise humans!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kogasa Tatara DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>何処に消えた？<fix123>鳥に姿を変えたり、獣になったり……<fix123>ＵＦＯに乗っていたアレはなんなんだ？<fix123>どうも、白蓮達とは関係のない妖怪の仕業<fix123>って感じがするぜ<fix123>ん？<fix123>なんだ、この不気味な鳴き声は……<fix123>獣とも鳥とも赤ん坊とも取れる様な<fix123>この鳴き声……まさか！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Where'd it disappear to?<fix123>It changed into a bird, and a monster......<fix123>What was that thing riding in that UFO?<fix123>It sure feels like some youkai that isn't related<fix123>to Byakuren at all is behind this.<fix123>Huh?<fix123>What's that weird animal cry?<fix123>Sounds kind a like a monster, or a bird, or a baby.<fix123>This sound... it's...!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>??? ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>聖救出、おめでとう！<fix123>まさか、飛倉が妖怪退治を専門とする<fix123>人間の手によって集まるなんてね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Congratulations on rescuing Hijiri!<fix123>I never thought a human specializing in youkai hunting<fix123>would be the one to find the fragments of the Flying Storehouse.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>初めて聞いたぜ、正体不明の妖怪の鳴き声<fix123>鵺！<fix123>光の玉の正体はお前だったのか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've never heard the voice of the youkai nobody's really seen before.<fix123>A nue!<fix123>Was that weird orb of light you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nue Houjuu TRANSFORMS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>未確認幻想飛行少女<fix123>封獣　ぬえ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Unidentified Fantastic Flying Girl<fix123>Nue Houjuu<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ご名答<fix123>いや、魔界まで行ってあの僧侶を助けた<fix123>かと思ったら<fix123>まさか、有りもしない幻のＵＦＯをこじ開けて<fix123>私を追ってくるなんて驚いたわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Correct.<fix123>Still, even if you went all the way to Makai<fix123>to save that monk.<fix123>I'm surprised you'd break open one of those<fix123>imaginary UFOs and come chasing after me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あれ？<fix123>鵺って、頭は猿で体は狸、手足は虎で尾は蛇<fix123>じゃ無かったのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123>I thought the nue had the head of a monkey, the body of a racoon dog,<fix123>the limbs of a tiger and the tail of a snake?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さっき、貴方も言っていたじゃない<fix123>正体不明の妖怪だって<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, you yourself said it, right?<fix123>Nobody knows what I really look like.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ言っていたな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh yeah, I did.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>正体不明ならなんで姿が判るのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So why would people know what I look like?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それは昔からの言い伝えで……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, there's an old legend...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は滅多に人間の前に姿を現したりしない<fix123>正体不明が、人間を怖がらせる事に一番有効<fix123>だと知っているからね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I hardly ever show my true form to humans.<fix123>Because I know the most effective way of scaring humans<fix123>is to make sure they don't know what you really are.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>正体知っちまったぜ<fix123>私<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Too bad someone does now.<fix123>Me!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>飛倉に仕込んだ正体不明のタネに付いて<fix123>貴方が嗅ぎ廻るから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's because you found me out by following<fix123>the Seed of Unknown Form hidden in the Flying Storehouse.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 平安のエイリアン<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Heian Alien<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私の正体不明にキズが付く前に何とかしないと<fix123>と思ってね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I was just thinking...<fix123>I'd better do something before you hurt my true form.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>む、やる気か？<fix123>ＵＦＯがなんだったのか<fix123>倒してからじっくり聞いてやるぜ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm, you wanna go?<fix123>I'll ask you all about what the UFOs really are<fix123>after I beat you!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>知識に頼り、想像する事をやめた人間よ！<fix123>正体不明の飛行物体に怯えて死ね！！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You human who's given up imagination for knowledge!<fix123>Die from the terror of this unidentified flying object!!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nue Houjuu DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ま、まさか、こんな正体不明の人間にぃ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I-I can't believe I lost to such an unidentifiable human!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おお、正体不明に怯えるのはお前の方だった<fix123>みたいだな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh, looks like you were the one<fix123>who's afraid of the unknown.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>で、貴方の目的は何？<fix123>また私を閉じ込めるつもり？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, what are you after?<fix123>Are you going to lock me away again?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>閉じ込める？<fix123>ああ、そんな趣味はないぜ<fix123>それより、このＵＦＯだよ、ＵＦＯ<fix123>どうやら白蓮達にはＵＦＯに見えないらしいが<fix123>なんなんだ？<fix123>一体<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Lock you away?<fix123>Nah, not my style.<fix123>I'm more interested in these UFOs.<fix123>Apparently Byakuren didn't see them as UFOs, though.<fix123>What the heck are they,<fix123>then?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それは、正体不明のタネを仕込んだ<fix123>飛倉の破片よ<fix123>正体不明のタネは、その物体の定義を否定して<fix123>見た者の知識の中から、それに似合った形と<fix123>して認識させる私の分身<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>They're fragments of the flying silo<fix123>that have the Seed of Unknown Form stuck in them.<fix123>The seed denies the object's true nature.<fix123>It's a part of me that makes the observer recognize it<fix123>as something else they've seen before instead.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どういう事だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What's that mean?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方は未定義の飛行物体を見て、それを<fix123>円盤ＵＦＯと認識したの<fix123>だから、ＵＦＯに見えただけ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>When you saw an unfamiliar flying object,<fix123>you thought it was a flying saucer.<fix123>So, you just thought it was a UFO.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほほう？<fix123>私はＵＦＯは地球に来ていると信じているがな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, really?<fix123>I really believed that UFOs were coming to Earth.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>その心が、ＵＦＯに見せたのよ<fix123>人によっては木片、人によっては鳥、獣<fix123>もしかしたら、弾幕に見えた者もいるかもね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Such a mind would naturally see a UFO.<fix123>Some people see pieces of wood, some see birds or monsters.<fix123>There may even be people who saw them as danmaku.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そんな事して、何が目的だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So why did you do that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ムラサ達の邪魔をしたかったのよ<fix123>混乱させて、何事も失敗するようにと<fix123>そしたら貴方の大活躍によって飛倉は<fix123>集められてしまった<fix123>私は逆に貴方に興味を持ったわ<fix123>だから手助けもした<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I wanted to mess with Murasa's efforts.<fix123>I thought I'd confuse them and make them fail.<fix123>But when you came into the picture,<fix123>all the pieces of the silo were assembled.<fix123>I ended up just getting you interested instead.<fix123>That's why I helped you out, too.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>手助け、だと？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You helped me out?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ま、結局その人間にこうやって倒されて<fix123>しまった訳だけど<fix123>さあ、人間よ<fix123>私を煮るなり焼くなり好きにしなさい！<fix123>あ、でも地底に閉じ込めるのは勘弁ね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, in the end, it just ended up with you<fix123>beating me like this.<fix123>Now, human!<fix123>Boil me! Bake me alive! Do anything you wish!<fix123>Oh, but please, just don't seal me underground again.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>煮ても焼いても食えそうにないな<fix123>こいつ<fix123>ま、楽しかったし、今日はこの辺にして<fix123>おいてやるよ<fix123>その代わり、その正体不明のタネとやらを<fix123>分けて貰おうか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Boil you? Bake you?<fix123>Bleh, I'm not gonna eat you.<fix123>Well, that was fun, but I guess<fix123>I should be going soon.<fix123>But, in return, will you let me have some of those<fix123>Seeds of Unknown Form or whatever?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええ？<fix123>まあ良いけどー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123>Well, I suppose...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>やったぜ、って蛇じゃ無いんだな<fix123>こんな光の玉なのか<fix123>タネって<fix123>てっきりＵＦＯの中に入っていた蛇かと<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes! Wait, it's not a snake?<fix123>It's a glowing orb, huh?<fix123>I was sure<fix123>this seed was a snake when it was inside the UFO.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>同じ物ですよ<fix123>貴方は、それを正体不明のタネと認識したから<fix123>姿が変わって見えたの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Don't worry, it's the same thing.<fix123>It's changed shapes for you now that<fix123>you know it's the Seed of Unknown Form.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふーん<fix123>面白いぜ<fix123>あと、霊夢にはまだＵＦＯの正体を内緒に<fix123>しておこう<fix123>この正体不明のタネ<fix123>暫くはこれで遊べるな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh.<fix123>That's really interesting.<fix123>Maybe I'll keep the reality behind the UFOs<fix123>a secret from Reimu for now.<fix123>I think I can have some fun playing with<fix123>this Seed of Unknown Form for a while.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>未確認飛行幻想物体<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Unidentified Flying Fantastic Object<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>夜の空<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Night Sky<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 夜空のユーフォーロマンス<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: UFO Romance in the Night Sky<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kogasa Tatara ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>うらめしやー！<fix123>この間は失敗したわ<fix123>人間を驚かすには、やっぱり夜じゃないとね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Booo!<fix123>I messed up last time.<fix123>You have to wait until night to surprise humans!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kogasa Tatara DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>雲が出てきたわね<fix123>見失ったわー<fix123>あんな小さな蛇<fix123>まあ、この辺異常にＵＦＯが多いし<fix123>いざとなれば、またこじ開けてみよう<fix123>ん？<fix123>何かの鳴き声がするわね<fix123>鳥？<fix123>いや、この鳴き声はまさか……！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wow, there's lots of clouds out now.<fix123>Where's that little snake?<fix123>Looks like I lost it.<fix123>It looks like there's lots of UFOs around here, though. I can just break open another one if I have to.<fix123>Hm?<fix123>I thought I heard something.<fix123>A bird?<fix123>No, this voice... it can't be...!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>??? ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>聖救出、おめでとう！<fix123>まさか、飛倉が妖怪退治を専門とする<fix123>人間の手によって集まるなんてね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Congratulations on rescuing Hijiri!<fix123>I never thought a human specializing in youkai hunting would be the one to find the fragments of the Flying Storehouse.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この不吉な鳴き声は！<fix123>古から正体不明と言われてきた謎の妖怪<fix123>鵺の鳴き声！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This voice of misfortune!<fix123>It's the mysterious youkai from ancient times...<fix123>It's the cry of the nue!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nue Houjuu TRANSFORMS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>未確認幻想飛行少女<fix123>封獣　ぬえ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Unidentified Fantastic Flying Girl<fix123>Nue Houjuu<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ご名答<fix123>いや、魔界まで行ってあの僧侶を助けた<fix123>かと思ったら<fix123>まさか、有りもしない幻のＵＦＯをこじ開けて<fix123>私を追ってくるなんて驚いたわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Correct.<fix123>Still, even if you went all the way to Makai<fix123>to save that monk,<fix123>I'm surprised you'd break open one of those<fix123>imaginary UFOs and come chasing after me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あの姿を変える蛇も、あの謎のＵＦＯも<fix123>鵺の仕業だったのね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So, that shape-shifting snake and those mysterious UFOs were all the work of the nue too, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いい余興になったでしょ？<fix123>でもね、あの飛倉の破片がＵＦＯに<fix123>見えたのは貴方達人間くらい<fix123>人によっては木片<fix123>人によっては鳥、または獣<fix123>弾幕に見えた人も居るかもね<fix123>いやあ、人間の想像力には驚かされるよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, wasn't it a nice show?<fix123>But, you humans were the only ones who thought<fix123>the fragments of the Flying Storehouse were UFOs.<fix123>Some people saw them as pieces of wood,<fix123>some as birds, others as beasts.<fix123>Maybe some people even saw them as danmaku.<fix123>Well, humans have amazing imaginations.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何が目的なの？<fix123>それにあんた、魔界まで付いて来てたでしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What were you after?<fix123>Wait, did you follow me all the way to Makai?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら、気付いてたのね？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, did you notice?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そりゃ、変な光の玉がずっと付いて来てたら<fix123>おかしく思うわよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, anyone would think a weird shiny orb<fix123>following them is strange.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ちょっと興味があったからね<fix123>貴方に<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I was just having so much fun<fix123>watching you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>で、目的は？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So, what were you after?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は人を怖がらせたいだけ<fix123>だから、正体の判らない恐怖で地上を覆ったの<fix123>久しぶりの地上だもの<fix123>私の正体がばれるまでは色々楽しめるじゃない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I just want to scare people. That's why I ravaged the old world with the fear of my unknown form.<fix123>I haven't been above ground in a long time.<fix123>I had a lot of fun before my true form was revealed.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>久しぶりの地上って事は<fix123>あんたも、地底の妖怪だったの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You haven't been above ground...?<fix123>Are you another one of those underground youkai?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>昔、正体がばれた時は大変だったわ<fix123>この姿じゃ怖がってくれないから<fix123>地底に閉じ込められちゃった<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It was terrible when my true form was revealed. Since this appearance was not dreadful at all,<fix123>I got locked in the underground after that.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地底を開放したのは拙かったわね……<fix123>次から次へとおぞましい妖怪が<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's too bad the underground got opened up......<fix123>It's been one disgusting youkai after another.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もう、あんな暗くて狭い場所に閉じ込められる<fix123>なんて勘弁よ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I don't want to ever be shut up in such a dark<fix123>and cramped place again, thank you!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 平安のエイリアン<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Heian Alien<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さあ、私の正体に気付いた貴方を<fix123>力ずくで黙らせてやるわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now that you've found out my true form,<fix123>I'll use all my powers to keep you quiet!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>む、来るのね！<fix123>封印されていた伝説の妖怪が<fix123>どれほどの物か見せて貰うわよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So you want to fight, huh?<fix123>Let's see what the legendary sealed youkai<fix123>is really made of!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>夜の恐怖を忘れた人間よ！<fix123>正体不明の飛行物体に怯えて死ね！！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You human who's forgotten the fear of night!<fix123>Die from the terror of this unidentified flying object!!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nue Houjuu DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ま、まさか、幾ら長い間眠っていたからといって<fix123>こんな小娘にやられるとは……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I-I can't believe I've been beaten by such a young girl, even if I've been asleep for so long......<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>弱い弱い<fix123>さあ、また封印しましょ<fix123>今度は何処が良いかな<fix123>白蓮の代わりに法界に行って貰おうかしら？<fix123>あそこなら簡単には戻っては来られまい<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wow, you're really weak.<fix123>Well, time to seal you away again.<fix123>Where would be good this time?<fix123>Maybe I should take you to Hokkai instead of Byakuren?<fix123>You won't be able to get back from there so easily.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もう、封印されるのは嫌よー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, I don't want to be sealed away againー<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……冗談よ冗談<fix123>今の地上では妖怪達が自由を得ているの<fix123>もちろん、妖怪を退治する自由と引き替えにね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...... I'm just kidding.<fix123>Youkai are free to wander the earth these days.<fix123>Of course, we're also free to hunt them.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうなの？<fix123>妖怪っていうだけで封印されたりしないの？<fix123>人間を大量虐殺しても追放されたりしないの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Really?<fix123>I won't get sealed away just for being a youkai?<fix123>I won't get banished for massacring humans?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>します<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, you will.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>えー意味ないじゃん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh? What's the point, then?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ま、実は妖怪の味方の僧侶が寺を建てたのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, that youkai-friendly monk built a temple.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>僧侶って、白蓮の事？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Monk? You mean Byakuren?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう、彼奴なら例え鵺でも力になってくれる<fix123>と思うよ<fix123>きっと、あんたが人間から疎まれてもね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, I think she'd be willing to help<fix123>even a nue.<fix123>Even if the humans shunned you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>白蓮ってそんな人だったんだ<fix123>しまったな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I didn't know Byakuren was like that...<fix123>Oops.<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Huh?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>つい、ムラサ達が助けだそうとしていたの<fix123>邪魔しちゃった<fix123>を地上にばらまいたのも私だし<fix123>怒られなきゃいいけど……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I got in Murasa's way, even though<fix123>she was trying to help Byakuren.<fix123>I'm the one who scattered the Flying Storehouse fragments.<fix123>I hope she doesn't get mad, but......<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>こってり絞られるんじゃない？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I bet she'll really put you through the wringer.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>白蓮に気付かれる前に、私の可愛い使い魔達を<fix123>回収しておこうっと<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'll have to go use my cute little familiars to<fix123>find all the pieces before she realizes it was me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>大丈夫、私が報告するわ<fix123>ある事ない事<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Don't worry, I'll tell her everything.<fix123>Some facts, and some lies...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この鬼め<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You fiend.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Booo!<fix123>I messed up last time.<fix123>You have to wait until night to surprise humans!<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Congratulations on rescuing Hijiri!<fix123>I never thought a human specializing in youkai hunting<fix123>would be the one to find the fragments of the Flying Granary.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この不吉な鳴き声は！<fix123>古から正体不明と言われてきた謎の妖怪<fix123>鵺の鳴き声！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This voice of misfortune!<fix123>It's the mysterious youkai from ancient times...<fix123>It's the voice of the nue!<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>未確認幻想飛行少女<fix123>封獣　ぬえ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Unidentified Fantastic Flying Girl<fix123>Nue Houjuu<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ご名答<fix123>いや、魔界まで行ってあの僧侶を助けた<fix123>かと思ったら<fix123>まさか、有りもしない幻のＵＦＯをこじ開けて<fix123>私を追ってくるなんて驚いたわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Correct.<fix123>Still, even if you went all the way to Makai<fix123>to save that monk,<fix123>I'm surprised you'd break open one of those<fix123>imaginary UFOs and come chasing after me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>出たな、謎の飛行妖怪<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So here it is, the mysterious flying youkai.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私が人間の前に姿を現すなんて滅多にない事よ？<fix123>貴方が余りにも嗅ぎ回るもんだからね<fix123>さすが、魔界まで行って何事もなかったかの<fix123>ように戻って来ちゃう人間は違うね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I hardly ever show myself before humans, you know?<fix123>You've just spent too much time sniffing around for me.<fix123>I suppose a human who could go all the way to Makai and back<fix123>like it was nothing is special.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あのＵＦＯは一体何なのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What are those UFOs?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は、飛倉に正体不明のタネを仕込んだの<fix123>そのタネは、見る者の頭の中で理解できる物へ<fix123>変換して見せる力がある<fix123>つまり、貴方が見たＵＦＯは<fix123>貴方の想像力の賜物、という事ね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I put the Seed of Unknown Form in the Flying Granary.<fix123>The seed has the power to change shape into something<fix123>its observer can understand.<fix123>In other words, the UFO you saw<fix123>was just a figment of your imagination..<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうなの？　人によって形が違って見えるって<fix123>にわかに信じがたいわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Really? It's not easy to believe<fix123>it would look different to different people.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あらそう？<fix123>でもさあ……<fix123>私の姿だって、みんないい加減な表現をして<fix123>言い伝えてきたでしょう？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, really?<fix123>But, you know......<fix123>That's what happened to people when they saw me-<fix123>they all had different descriptions, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>鵺と言えば、頭は猫、体は鶏、しっぽは蛇ね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, a nue has the head of a cat, the body of a chicken, and the tail of a snake, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうそう。それを言った人間に一度も<fix123>姿を見せてないのにね<fix123>みんなまちまちな表現をするから、私も姿が<fix123>曖昧な妖怪となってしまう<fix123>迷惑極まりない<fix123>いや、有難いんだけどね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sure. But, I've never looked like that<fix123>when people saw me.<fix123>People have different perspectives, so even the form I take<fix123>has gotten quite vague over the years.<fix123>It makes things very difficult.<fix123>Well, it's also convenient.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>有難い？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Convenient?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>正体不明がウリの妖怪として、人間に<fix123>恐怖を煽る事が出来る<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>As a youkai whose specialty is being mysterious,<fix123>it makes it easy to play on people's fears.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 平安のエイリアン<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Heian Alien<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さあ、私の正体に気付いた貴方を葬って<fix123>正体不明を取り戻さないとね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But now that you've seen me, I'll have to bury you<fix123>so I can go back to being an unknown.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>む、来るのね！<fix123>語り継がれてきた正体不明の妖怪が<fix123>どれほどの物か見せて貰うわよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmph, so that's how it is!<fix123>Let's see what the legendary mysterious youkai<fix123>is really made of!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>夜の恐怖を忘れた人間よ！<fix123>正体不明の飛行物体に怯えて死ね！！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You human who's forgotten the fear of night!<fix123>Die from the terror of this unidentified flying object!!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nue Houjuu DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ま、まさか、幾ら長い間眠っていたからといって<fix123>こんな小娘にやられるとは……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I-I can't believe I've been beaten by such a young girl,<fix123>even if I've been asleep for so long......<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>伝説の妖怪とはいえ、普段姿を表に出し<fix123>たがらない奴はやっぱり大した事無いわね<fix123>弱いからこっそり行動するんでしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I guess anyone who doesn't want to show their true form<fix123>isn't all that, even if they're a legendary youkai.<fix123>Were you hiding out because you're so weak?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今までなりを潜めていたのは、地底に<fix123>閉じ込められていたからよ<fix123>その昔、心ない人間にやられたの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The only reason I've been hiding for so long<fix123>is because I was shut away underground!<fix123>A long time ago, I was beaten by a cruel human.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何か悪い事したんでしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You did something bad, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私はただ怖がらせていただけ<fix123>それが妖怪の糧なんだから仕方が無いわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I just made them afraid.<fix123>That's what youkai do, there's no helping it.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>誰だって怖い物は嫌よ<fix123>そんな妖怪、退治されて当然だわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Nobody likes scary things.<fix123>It's natural a youkai like that would be hunted down.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だって、肝試しとかやるじゃん<fix123>怖い怖いも好きのうちなんじゃないの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But, you have bravery contests, right?<fix123>Aren't there people who like being afraid?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そ、それはそれ、これはこれよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>W-well, that's different.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あーあ、正体不明の巫女に正体が<fix123>ばれちゃったし<fix123>これからどうしようかなぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ahhh, my true form has been uncovered<fix123>by an unidentified shrine maiden.<fix123>What am I going to do now?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>取り敢えず、ばらまいた正体不明のタネを<fix123>元に戻しなさい<fix123>そうすれば、白蓮達も散らばった飛倉の破片を<fix123>集めやすくなるでしょう？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Anyway, you need to fix all those seeds of<fix123>unknown form you scattered around.<fix123>It'll be easier for Byakuren's group to find the other pieces<fix123>of the Flying Granary that way, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんで、僧侶の手伝いなんか……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Why do I have to help that monk......?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だって、あの僧侶<fix123>妖怪の味方よ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, she's<fix123>a friend of youkai, right?<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Huh?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>特に貴方みたいな人間に封印された妖怪の<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Especially youkai like you who were sealed away by humans.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>白蓮ってそんな人だったんだ<fix123>でも、私はムラサ達が助けだそうとしていたの<fix123>つい邪魔しちゃった<fix123>飛倉を地上にばらまいたのも私だし<fix123>今更そんなみんなの前に行けないわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I didn't know Byakuren was like that.<fix123>But, I got in Murasa's way, even though<fix123>she was trying to help Byakuren.<fix123>I'm the one that scattered the Flying Granary everywhere.<fix123>I can't show myself in front of them anymore.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>好きにする事ね<fix123>一応、封印したりはしないけど<fix123>ただ一応言っておくけど<fix123>私はあんたの味方じゃないから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, do whatever you want.<fix123>I won't seal you away for now, but...<fix123>At least, just for now, okay?<fix123>After all, I'm no friend of yours.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふん、人間を怖がらせて楽しむから<fix123>いいもん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm, I'll just have fun<fix123>scaring some humans.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: The Moriya Shrine, up on the mountain.<fix123>
Cherry blossoms were blooming at its foot, but the mountain tops were still cold and covered<fix123>
with traces of snow. Few humans ever came this far, even when there wasn't snow.<fix123>
"It looks like it was pretty rough.<fix123>
Youkai hunting is a tough job."<fix123>
"Yes, it really was.<fix123>
I started chasing a ship, but before I knew it I'd been<fix123>brought to a world I couldn't escape from."<fix123>
"So, I asked a human there for help and made it home somehow."<fix123>
"Hmmm.<fix123>
So, this is in return for that favor, then?"<fix123>
" ‘Help Wanted Building Myouren Temple,<fix123>Now Seeking Wood & Clay Workers’ "<fix123>
"Well, uh, she said she wanted to build a temple, so I thought<fix123>it would be nice to help her out.<fix123>
Look, they need people of your and Lady Suwako's talents."<fix123>
"It's just a lot to ask in return for a ride on a ship."<fix123>
"But, I didn't have any way to get home.<fix123>
"Well, anyway... Ah, what was her name again?"<fix123>
"Byakuren. Byakuren Hijiri."<fix123>
"How suspicious."<fix123>
"You said she was sealed underground for a long time, but<fix123>the first thing she wants to do is build a temple?"<fix123>
"Hm, that's a good point.<fix123>
I was worried about how to get home from Makai, so I forgot."<fix123>
"No matter, why don't we help her out, anyway?<fix123>
That will let us size up this Byakuren person."<fix123>
"Oh, thank you!"<fix123>
"You're gonna help out, too."<fix123>
"Well, uh, I'm not that good at manual labor..."<fix123>
And so the Myouren Temple was built by Kanako and Suwako.<fix123>
It was completed in a flash. Suwako made the earth flat,<fix123>brought down the ship, and it was finished.<fix123>
Kanako gazed intently at Byakuren and the youkai around her.<fix123>
Byakuren was revered by the youkai.<fix123>
Kanako thought it was odd that a monk that'd build a temple<fix123>like this would be so revered by youkai.<fix123>
Byakuren always dealt frankly and truthfully with youkai and humans.<fix123>
She turned to the doubt-filled Kanako and thanked her profusely.<fix123>
"You're the god of the mountain, right? I could tell just by looking at you."<fix123>
So saying, she began explaining her circumstances.<fix123>
Where she was born,<fix123>
the sort of life she'd lived,<fix123>
and why she'd been sealed away.<fix123>
Kanako didn't sense a shred of falsehood in her story.<fix123>
"This monk is certainly no ordinary person."<fix123>
Kanako was even more convinced they'd need to exercise caution.<fix123>
<c$Ending No.05 — Byakuren is really a nice person.$><fix123>
<c$Congratulations, all clear! Just as I'd expected!$><fix123>
The sacred palanquin ship, a ship that soars through the sky.<fix123>
It wasn't a treasure ship; just an otherwise ordinary ship that<fix123>could fly through the sky.<fix123>
It must be nice to fly through the sky once in a while.<fix123>
"Wow, this flying ship sure is nice."<fix123>
"You don't surprise easily, do you?"<fix123>
"Well, what's a UFO or two nowadays?"<fix123>
"UFO?"<fix123>
"Things like this are called UFOs.<fix123>
At least, where we come from."<fix123>
"I see."<fix123>
"It means ‘unidentified flying object.’ "<fix123>
"So, I know what this ship is, but what were the tiny UFOs?"<fix123>
"Tiny UFOs... Unidentified flying objects?<fix123>
Are you talking about the pieces of the Flying Storehouse?"<fix123>
"I've got one!"<fix123>
"Good job. See, one of these.<fix123>
It doesn't look like part of a storehouse to me at all."<fix123>
"Really?<fix123>
It's shabby now, but it was once part of a wooden storehouse."<fix123>
"Eh? Wooden? This thing?"<fix123>
"It does feel kind of woody, but..."<fix123>
"A circular storehouse? It must've been ahead of its time."<fix123>
"Eh? Circular?<fix123>
No, just a plain, simple storehouse. Is it already old-fashioned?"<fix123>
"Eh? Did I say something odd?"<fix123>
The three continued to talk past each other for a while.<fix123>
Suwako had thought there was one mystery left in the report<fix123>Sanae had given and decided to ride the flying ship for herself.<fix123>
That mystery was the matter of the circular UFOs.<fix123>
She couldn't imagine these being parts of a storehouse.<fix123>
Suwako had thought Byakuren's group was still hiding something.<fix123>
However, she was mistaken.<fix123>
The truth was that the flying wooden fragments didn't look like<fix123>flying saucers to Byakuren's group.<fix123>
The UFO Sanae had caught looked like a normal piece of wood.<fix123>
That's why their conversation wasn't getting anywhere.<fix123>
Sanae and Suwako never realized this,<fix123>and disembarked from the ship feeling unsatisfied.<fix123>
They decided to believe storehouses were round in Byakuren's time.<fix123>
<c$Ending No.06 — Who's the culprit behind the UFOs?$><fix123>
<c$Congratulations, all clear! Just as I'd expected!$><fix123>
Hokkai, a part of Makai.<fix123>
Sanae was caught by Byakuren, and was unable to return home.<fix123>
She had no choice but to listen to Byakuren's speech...<fix123>
"Hmm, I guess not all youkai are bad.<fix123>
I don't want to think of them as being the same as gods, though."<fix123>
Sanae quietly listened as Byakuren spoke.<fix123>
At first she just wanted Byakuren to send her home,<fix123>but over time she came to sympathize with the youkai.<fix123>
<c$Ending No.11 — So, when do I get to go home?$><fix123>
<c$Go for a one-credit clear! $><fix123>
Hokkai, a part of Makai.<fix123>
Sanae was caught by Byakuren, and was unable to return home.<fix123>
She had nothing to do but pour out her feelings to Byakuren.<fix123>
"You see, humans live in constant fear of youkai.<fix123>
So, we can't have someone like you just running amok.<fix123>
By the way, how can I get back to my world?"<fix123>
Sanae realized that she was surrounded by youkai.<fix123>
She only then realized that trying to defy them all could<fix123>very well cost her her life.<fix123>
<c$Ending No.12 — It's not good to be too stubborn.$><fix123>
<c$Go for a one-credit clear!$><fix123>

en_dialogue: *sniff sniff*<fix123>And I did my best to look youkai-like.<fix123>I guess I was thrown out because<fix123>the design was a little off ... ...<fix123>I thought I'd try to get back at the human who threw me away,<fix123>and I turned into a youkai ... ...<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: U-um, look, I didn't mean it like that ... ...<fix123>It's just, if I got an umbrella like that from a friend,<fix123>I just thought maybe I'd rather say no and go home wet ...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>聖輦と不吉な船長<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Unfortunate Captain of the Holy Palanquin<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: 聖輦船内部<fix123>
en_dialogue: Inside the Palanquin Ship<fix123>

jp_dialogue: BGM: 幽霊客船の時空を越えた旅<fix123>
en_dialogue: BGM: Interdimensional Voyage of a Ghostly Passenger Ship<fix123>

jp_dialogue: これは一体……？<fix123>空を飛ぶ船だからもっとメカメカしい内装を<fix123>想像していたのですが……<fix123>何か古くさい廃屋みたいね<fix123>もっと準備して本格的に調査を開始しないと<fix123>駄目そうだわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: What is this place ... ?<fix123>I thought the insides of a flying ship<fix123>would be more mechanical, but ...<fix123>It's all old-fashioned, like a deserted house.<fix123>I'd better get serious and do a full-blown investigation<fix123>or I won't get anywhere.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Minamitsu Murasa ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
BGM: キャプテン・ムラサ<fix123>
en_dialogue: BGM: Captain Murasa<fix123>

jp_dialogue: 誰か居るの？<fix123>
en_dialogue: Is someone there?<fix123>

jp_dialogue: わ！　びっくりした<fix123>
en_dialogue: Woah!  You scared me!<fix123>

jp_dialogue: あら、人間？<fix123>しかも飛宝を持ってきてくれたなんて<fix123>
en_dialogue: Oh, a human?<fix123>And to think she's brought the flying treasure ...<fix123>

jp_dialogue: 秘宝？<fix123>さっきの妖怪もそんな事言ってたわね<fix123>それって何なのですか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: Flying treasure?<fix123>The youkai before was talking about that, too.<fix123>What is it, anyway?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: 封印された聖を復活させる為の宝物です<fix123>ネズミに探させていたのですが……<fix123>一体何処で何をしているのやら<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: It's treasure that we need to resurrect Hijiri.<fix123>We had the mouse out searching for it, but ...<fix123>What's she off getting into, anyway?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: ネズミ……何処かで見たような……<fix123>あ、人間を食べようとしたあの妖怪？<fix123>あー、人間を馬鹿にして腹立つ奴だったわねー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: Mouse ... I think I've seen one recently ...<fix123>Oh, that youkai who was talking about eating people?<fix123>Hmm, it got on my nerves how she was making fun of humans.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: 水難事故の念縛霊<fix123>村紗 水蜜<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: The Ghost Left from the Shipwreck<fix123>Minamitsu Murasa<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: あ、申し遅れました<fix123>私は村紗、この聖輦船の船長です<fix123>貴方の持ってきた飛宝は歓迎しますが<fix123>この世界に未練ある人間の乗船は<fix123>お断りしています<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: Oh, where are my manners?<fix123>I'm Murasa, the captain of this holy palanquin.<fix123>I'm glad you brought us the flying treasures ...<fix123>But I'd rather not have a human that's still<fix123>attached to this world onboard.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: え？　私はただ調査に来ただけですが<fix123>
en_dialogue: Hm?  I just came to do some investigation.<fix123>

jp_dialogue: その飛宝を置いてさっさと下船するよう<fix123>お願いします<fix123>
en_dialogue: Please,<fix123>leave the treasures here and disembark immediately.<fix123>

jp_dialogue: もしかして、また人間が馬鹿にされている<fix123>というのかしら？<fix123>これはいけないわ！<fix123>霊夢さん達がチャランポランやってるから<fix123>舐められるんだわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: Hm, are you also<fix123>trying to make fun of humans?<fix123>I won't let you do that!<fix123>You all won't take me seriously because Reimu and her friends<fix123>are off somewhere goofing around!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: もしかして……<fix123>下船する気は無いとでも言うのでしょうか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: Does this mean ...<fix123>You have no intention of leaving?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: 貴方を倒して人間の尊厳を取り戻すわ！<fix123>
en_dialogue: I'll beat you and restore our human dignity!<fix123>

jp_dialogue: それは丁度良かったです<fix123>私も、その飛宝を奪う為に戦うつもりでしたから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: Well, then, that's fine.<fix123>I was going to fight you to take the treasures by force, anyway.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Minamitsu Murasa DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
強い……<fix123>貴方は一体何者？<fix123>
en_dialogue: You're strong ...<fix123>Who are you, anyway?<fix123>

jp_dialogue: 私は東風谷早苗<fix123>人であり神である現人神です！<fix123>妖怪には負けませんよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: I'm Sanae Kochiya,<fix123>a human who's also a living god!<fix123>I won't lose to any youkai!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: そう……神様でしたか<fix123>では強いのも理解できます<fix123>下船しろだなんて……<fix123>騙して申し訳ございませんでした<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: I see ... so you're a god.<fix123>I can see why you're so strong, then.<fix123>Well ... please excuse me<fix123>for deceiving you with my talk of disembarking.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: へ？<fix123>
en_dialogue: Huh?<fix123>

jp_dialogue: 本当は、飛宝を持って逃げられないように<fix123>挑発して時間稼ぎをしていただけなのです<fix123>
en_dialogue: I was really just trying to buy time by provoking you<fix123>into fighting so you wouldn't leave with the treasure.<fix123>

jp_dialogue: あ、そう？<fix123>
en_dialogue: Oh, really?<fix123>

jp_dialogue: もうすぐ、目的地に着きますよ<fix123>無事に飛宝を持ったままね<fix123>この船はもう戻れない<fix123>さあ、貴方も魔の地の住人よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: We'll arrive at our destination soon<fix123>safely carrying the treasure.<fix123>This ship won't be going back.<fix123>It looks like you're a citizen of the demons' land now, too.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>魔界の赤黒い封印<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Red and Black Seal of the Underworld<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: 魔界（法界上空）<fix123>
en_dialogue: Makai (above Hokkai)<fix123>

jp_dialogue: BGM: 魔界地方都市エソテリア<fix123>
en_dialogue: BGM: Provincial Makai City Esoteria<fix123>

jp_dialogue: おや？<fix123>君も魔界まで来たのかい？<fix123>
en_dialogue: Hmm?<fix123>So you came to Makai, too?<fix123>

jp_dialogue: あ、ネズミだわー！<fix123>船長が探していたわよ？<fix123>何処ほっつき歩いているのかって<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: Oh, it's the mouse!<fix123>The captain was looking for you, you know?<fix123>Saying, "where's she wandering off to now?" ...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: え？　そう？　実は船長達に内緒で<fix123>別の探し物を頼まれてたんだ<fix123>探し物は、君が偶然手に入れた飛宝と<fix123>もう一つは、この毘沙門天の宝塔<fix123>古道具屋で眠っていたのを、やっと見つけたよ<fix123>随分と吹っ掛けられたがね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: Oh?  Really?  Actually, I've had to look<fix123>for something else - it's a secret to the captain.<fix123>I was looking for the flying treasure you happened to find,<fix123>but also for this jeweled pagoda of Bishamonten.<fix123>I finally found it in a second-hand goods shop.<fix123>It cost me an arm and a leg, though.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: ふーん<fix123>あ、思い出した<fix123>貴方、人間を食べるとか言ってたわね<fix123>ここで成敗してくれるわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: Hmm ...<fix123>Oh, now I remember.<fix123>You were talking about eating people before.<fix123>It's payback time now!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: 面白い人間だ。この宝塔はご主人様の物だが<fix123>どの位の光が出るのか試してみよう！<fix123>
en_dialogue: You're pretty funny.  This pagoda is really my master's,<fix123>but let's see how much light it can shine!<fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nazrin DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
こんな世界があるのですね……<fix123>船が何処を通ってきたのか判らないけど<fix123>何か、不穏な感じがする場所ね<fix123>ここはもしかして、魔物の棲む世界……？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: It's hard to believe there's a world like this ...<fix123>I couldn't tell where we were going in the ship;<fix123>this place seems pretty unstable, though.<fix123>Is this the world where demons live ... ?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Shou Toramaru ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
そうです<fix123>ここは魔界です<fix123>
en_dialogue: Yes.<fix123>This is Makai.<fix123>

jp_dialogue: え？　魔界？<fix123>
en_dialogue: Huh?  Makai?<fix123>

jp_dialogue: 魔界は、その妖気の酷さから殆どの<fix123>生き物が住むのに適さない世界です<fix123>しかし、一部の妖怪はここで修行し、人間は<fix123>魔法を覚える事が出来るのです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: The horrible, unearthly nature of Makai makes it<fix123>an unsuitable place for most living creatures.<fix123>However, some of the youkai train here,<fix123>and humans could learn magic here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: 貴方は一体？<fix123>
en_dialogue: Just who are you?<fix123>

jp_dialogue: 毘沙門天の弟子<fix123>寅丸 星<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: The Disciple of Bishamonten<fix123>Shou Toramaru<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: 私は毘沙門天の代理<fix123>聖の信仰を一身に受けていた者です<fix123>ナズーリンが持ってきたこの宝塔と<fix123>貴方の持ってきた飛倉の破片が揃えば<fix123>ここの封印を解く事が出来ます<fix123>聖への恩を返す事が出来るのです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: I am the representative of Bishamonten,<fix123>and a devotee of Hijiri's creed.<fix123>Now that we have the jeweled pagoda Nazrin brought,<fix123>as well as the fragments of the Flying Granary you possess,<fix123>We can break the seal here.<fix123>We can repay our debt of gratitude to Hijiri.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: 聖ってのは誰なの？<fix123>
en_dialogue: Who is Hijiri?<fix123>

jp_dialogue: 聖は聖ですよ<fix123>私の知る限り、最も慈悲の心を持ち<fix123>最も秀でた人間でした<fix123>聖は魔界の力に手を出したが為に、愚かな<fix123>人間達によって封印されてしまったのです<fix123>さあ、私と一緒に封印を解きましょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: Hijiri is a holy person.<fix123>As far as I know, she is the most exemplary human<fix123>with the most compassionate heart.<fix123>Because Hijiri sought the power of Makai,<fix123>some foolish humans sealed her away.<fix123>Now, come, let us break the seal together.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: むむ、このままなし崩し的に封印を解く事に<fix123>なるのかしら？<fix123>……<fix123>ちょっと気になるわね〜<fix123>その聖って人がどんな人か<fix123>でも、その前に……<fix123>貴方が信用出来る妖怪とは限らないわ<fix123>封印を解くのは私がやるわ<fix123>その宝塔とやらも、私が奪ってやる！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: Mmm, it looks like this is just going to<fix123>turn into me breaking the seal?<fix123><fix123><fix123>... ...<fix123>I'm a little worried about that~<fix123>What kind of person is this Hijiri?<fix123>But, before that ...<fix123>I'm not sure you're such a devoted youkai.<fix123>I'll be the one to break that seal.<fix123>And I'll take that jeweled pagoda or whatever!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: BGM: 虎柄の毘沙門天<fix123>
en_dialogue: BGM: The Tiger-Patterned Bishamonten<fix123>

jp_dialogue: そうですか、封印が解ければそれでも<fix123>良いでしょう<fix123>ただ、もし貴方に邪心があるのであれば<fix123>魔界に有りてなお輝き続けるこの法の光――<fix123>この毘沙門天の宝塔の前に<fix123>ひれ伏す事になるでしょう！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: Will you?<fix123>It would be wonderful if you broke the seal.<fix123>However, if your heart is wicked ...<fix123>Then you'll have to bear witness to the light of dharma which is even brighter here in Makai --<fix123>And bow down<fix123>before this pagoda of Bishamonten!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Shou Toramaru DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
負けた……<fix123>貴方は間違っていない<fix123>
en_dialogue: I lost ...<fix123>What you're doing is not wrong.<fix123>

jp_dialogue: よし！<fix123>貴方の宝塔を貸して！<fix123>
en_dialogue: Great!<fix123>Now, lend me that pagoda!<fix123>

jp_dialogue: 一時的にですよ？<fix123>持っていったりしないでくださいよ？<fix123>
en_dialogue: Just for a while, okay?<fix123>Don't run off with it, okay?<fix123>

jp_dialogue: これとこれでこうやって……<fix123>……<fix123>って、どうやって封印解けばいいの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: Okay, there, and now I'll just ...<fix123>... ...<fix123>Um, how am I supposed to break the seal?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: そこはですね〜<fix123>ここをこう捻るのです<fix123>
en_dialogue: Look, like this~<fix123>You have to twist this like that.<fix123>

jp_dialogue: わ、封印が消えていく……<fix123>
en_dialogue: Wow, the seal's disappearing ... ...<fix123>

jp_dialogue: ああ、数百年ぶりに法界に風が吹くわ！<fix123>
en_dialogue: Ah, the wind is blowing into Hokkai for the first time in hundreds of years!<fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>八苦を滅した尼公<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Nun Who Overcame the Eight Sufferings<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: 法界<fix123>
en_dialogue: Hokkai<fix123>

jp_dialogue: BGM: 法界の火<fix123>
en_dialogue: BGM: The Fire of Hokkai<fix123>

jp_dialogue: 結局封印解いちゃった<fix123>まあ調査目的だから良いわよね<fix123>ここに封印されていた者をつぶさに調査して<fix123>帰れば諏訪子様も喜んでくれる筈<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: Well, the seal's broken now.<fix123>I guess it's okay, since it's all investigative.<fix123>If I investigate the person who was sealed here really carefully,<fix123>Lady Suwako should be happy when I get back.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Byakuren Hijiri ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
ああ、法の世界に光が満ちる<fix123>貴方がこの世界を解放してくれたの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: O, the world of dharma is filled with light.<fix123>Are you the one who liberated this world?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: あ、もしかして貴方がここに<fix123>封印されていたという？<fix123>
en_dialogue: Oh, are you the person<fix123>who was sealed away in here?<fix123>

jp_dialogue: ええそうです<fix123>
en_dialogue: Yes, I am.<fix123>

jp_dialogue: 貴方は一体何者なの？<fix123>
en_dialogue: Just who are you?<fix123>

jp_dialogue: 封印された大魔法使い<fix123>聖　白蓮<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: The Great Sealed Magician<fix123>Byakuren Hijiri<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: 私の名は白蓮<fix123>遠い昔の僧侶です<fix123>貴方は見たところ巫女の様ね？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: My name is Byakuren.<fix123>I was a Buddhist monk a long, long time ago.<fix123>You seem to be a shrine maiden, am I right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: ええ、そうです<fix123>実は巫女でもあり神様でもあります<fix123>
en_dialogue: Yes, I am.<fix123>Actually, I'm also a god, too.<fix123>

jp_dialogue: 神様……？<fix123>神様が何故、こんな魔界の奥に？<fix123>
en_dialogue: A god ... ?<fix123>What would a god be doing in the depths of Makai?<fix123>

jp_dialogue: 空を飛ぶ船を調べていたら、気が付いたら<fix123>こんな処にいたのです<fix123>
en_dialogue: I was investigating a ship flying through the sky,<fix123>and before I knew it, here I was.<fix123>

jp_dialogue: はあ、こんな処って<fix123>ここの封印をどうやって解いたのです？<fix123>ここの封印は特別な物でした<fix123>私の弟、命蓮が残した唯一の宝の力で<fix123>封印されたのです<fix123>その宝も地中に埋められ、もう手も足も<fix123>出せなかった<fix123>貴方はどうやって封印を解いたの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: Hmm, I see ...<fix123>How did you break the seal here?<fix123>This seal was a very special seal.<fix123>It was sealed with the only piece of treasure<fix123>left by my brother, Myouren.<fix123>With that treasure buried underground,<fix123>I've been completely trapped.<fix123>Just how did you break the seal?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: いやまあ、ちょっとした成り行きで<fix123>
en_dialogue: Well, you know, this and that happened, and ...<fix123>

jp_dialogue: ただ者じゃないわね、貴方<fix123>
en_dialogue: You must be someone remarkable.<fix123>

jp_dialogue: 勿論、神様ですから<fix123>それで妖怪達が貴方を復活させようと<fix123>していたのですが、それは何故ですか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: Of course, I'm a god.<fix123>I understand the youkai were all trying to revive you,<fix123>but why?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: 妖怪ですか……もしかして虎だったり<fix123>船幽霊だったり、入道だったりしました？<fix123>
en_dialogue: The youkai ... were there perhaps<fix123>a tiger, a Ship Phantom, and a Nyuudo?<fix123>

jp_dialogue: んー多分<fix123>
en_dialogue: Mmm, that's about right.<fix123>

jp_dialogue: そうですか……あの方達はまだ私を<fix123>慕ってくれていたのですね<fix123>もう、千年以上も力になってあげられ<fix123>なかったというのに<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: I see ... so they all<fix123>still miss me ...<fix123>Even though I haven't been able to do anything for them<fix123>for over a thousand years ...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: 妖怪の力に？<fix123>貴方は妖怪の味方なの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: Help them?<fix123>Are you a friend of the youkai?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: 味方……と言えば味方ですが<fix123>人間の味方でもあります<fix123>私が目指すのは人間と妖怪の平等な世界<fix123>神様の貴方には判らないかも知れないですが<fix123>虐げられてきた妖怪の復権を望んでいるのです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: A friend ... yes, I suppose I am,<fix123>but I'm also a friend to humans.<fix123>I want to create a world where humans and youkai live as equals.<fix123>I don't know if a god like you could understand,<fix123>but I want to see the oppressed youkai regain their status.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: 平等？　虐げられてきた？<fix123>どちらかというと、人間の方が<fix123>虐げられてきたわ！<fix123>私は人間の復権を望みます！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: Equals?  Oppressed?<fix123>Whichever way you look at it,<fix123>humans are the ones being oppressed!<fix123>I want to see humans regain their status!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: BGM: 感情の摩天楼　~ Cosmic Mind<fix123>
en_dialogue: BGM: Emotional Skyscraper ~ Cosmic Mind<fix123>

jp_dialogue: そうですか、現人神と意見が合わず残念です<fix123>ただ、私は妖怪と神の区別をしていない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: I see, it's too bad a living god couldn't see it my way.<fix123>However, I don't distinguish between youkai and gods.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: 健全な神様は妖怪を退治するのです！<fix123>
en_dialogue: The wholesome gods hunt the wicked youkai!<fix123>

jp_dialogue: 私が寺にいた頃と人間は変わっていないな<fix123>誠に独善で、土豪劣紳であるッ！<fix123>いざ、南無三――！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: Humans haven't changed since my days in the temple.<fix123>How self-righteous. You're just a petty tyrant!<fix123><fix123>Now, in the name of the Three Treasures-- !<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: The Hakurei Shrine.<fix123>
It's a shrine on the eastern edge of Gensokyo.<fix123>
There was little snow left on the shrine grounds, casting shade by the trees.<fix123>
The cherry blossoms would probably be out soon.<fix123>
"Maaakaiiii, la la laaaa~"<fix123>
"Well, you're in a good mood."<fix123>
"Yeah, something good happened."<fix123>
"Was it that treasure ship?<fix123>You were saying you were gonna sneak on board."<fix123>
"Ah, it wasn't a treasure ship."<fix123>
"I knew it."<fix123>
"That ship was headed for Makai.<fix123>
They were flying off to save their friend there."<fix123>
"In Makai?<fix123>
Why are you in such a good mood, then?"<fix123>
"I rode along with them all the way to Makai,<fix123>so I found a lot of neat stuff."<fix123>
"This is a magic stone, and this is a Makai mushroom.<fix123>I even got some Makai rice crackers at a souvenir stand."<fix123>
"Hm, Makai. I don't think I'd want to go there."<fix123>
"They let me ride back on that ship, and they even said<fix123>they'll take me to Makai again any time I want to go.<fix123>
I'll be able to get all kinds of rare stuff now!"<fix123>
"Hmmm.<fix123>
So it was a Makai cruise ship, not a treasure ship."<fix123>
"But, if that ship can go back and forth to Makai so easily,<fix123>
why would they let you ride with them?"<fix123>
" 'cuz we had a fight, and I won."<fix123>
"I knew it.<fix123>
I just knew you'd end up fighting someone on that ship."<fix123>
"She was the captain, actually."<fix123>
Marisa asked Byakuren to let her continue to go freely<fix123>between Gensokyo and Makai.<fix123>
Byakuren liked Marisa's direct personality, so she asked Murasa<fix123>to let her go wherever she pleased.<fix123>
As a fellow magician, Byakuren told Marisa to come see her if<fix123>she ever had any trouble.<fix123>
"Of course - I broke your seal, after all," Marisa said,<fix123>and resolved to make as much of Byakuren's offer as possible.<fix123>
But there was still the question of the UFOs she'd used to break the seal.<fix123>
Byakuren wasn't any help figuring out why they looked that way.<fix123>
Marisa thought there was still some mystery to be solved.<fix123>
<c$Ending No.03 — Makai tours: Reasonable prices!$><fix123>
<c$Congratulations, all clear! Just as I'd expected!$><fix123>
Marisa's house.<fix123>
A gloomy, musty place stacked high with various items.<fix123>
Many items of unknown origin and purpose lay sleeping here,<fix123>including many useless things even Marisa wouldn't touch.<fix123>
"What the heck?<fix123>
It was flying earlier, but now it won't move at all."<fix123>
"What'd they call it... the Flying Storehouse?<fix123>
A part of a storehouse that flew through the sky...<fix123>
I wonder if I can make it fly again somehow?"<fix123>
"Mm?<fix123>
The top of the UFO is opening?<fix123>
Is there something inside?"<fix123>
"Huh? Is this a li'l snake toy...?<fix123>
What's this doing in there?<fix123>
Hm, doesn't look alive..."<fix123>
"What a creepy piece of treasure.<fix123>
Whatever, it looks kind of valuable.<fix123>
Hopefully Reimu will exorcise it if it's cursed."<fix123>
Marisa took the snake toy out of the UFO and stared in shock.<fix123>
The flying, UFO-shaped treasure had turned into a simple piece<fix123>of wood in the blink of an eye.<fix123>
Marisa looked speechlessly at the magical object before her.<fix123>She was quite impressed.<fix123>
This was certainly some very powerful item.<fix123>
Putting the snake back inside restored its UFO-like appearance.<fix123>
Marisa was absolutely sure that this was some sort of treasure.<fix123>
However, one doubt remained with her.<fix123>
She didn't know whether the wood or the snake was the treasure.<fix123>
Marisa's intuition told her it was the wood fragment.<fix123>
Those youkai had called it part of the Flying Storehouse, after all.<fix123>
The wood fragment seemed more like a piece of a storehouse.<fix123>
She tried various ways to make the wood fragment change its shape,<fix123>but in the end it only reacted to the snake.<fix123>
As soon as she gave up trying to make it change, she noticed<fix123>something extremely surprising and disturbing.<fix123>
"Th-that little toy is moving!"<fix123>
The snake moved suddenly as if it had come back to life, and then<fix123>headed to the window as if to escape!<fix123>
Dumbfounded, Marisa thought that perhaps the snake was the<fix123>treasure and not the piece of wood and started chasing it.<fix123>
The snake was rather quick and made it to the window in the blink of an eye.<fix123>
Then it suddenly changed shape into a bird and disappeared into<fix123>the night sky. Marisa watched it, dumbstruck.<fix123>
"I-I'll have to thoroughly investigate this, whatever it is!"<fix123>
<c$Ending No.04 — Continued in the Extra Stage.$><fix123>
<c$Congratulations, all clear! Just as I'd expected!$><fix123>
Hokkai, a part of Makai.<fix123>
Marisa was caught by Byakuren, and was unable to return home.<fix123>
At first, she was happy about it, but...<fix123>
"This is so boring, I'm gonna die.<fix123>
I'm sick of being in a world with nothing in it.<fix123>
I just wanna go home soon..."<fix123>
Youkai quietly went on with their lives all around her.<fix123>
A world without any conflict was like Hell for Marisa.<fix123>
<c$Ending No.09 — She's too young to be able to enjoy boredom.$><fix123>
<c$Go for a one-credit clear!$><fix123>
Hokkai, a part of Makai.<fix123>
Marisa was caught by Byakuren, and was unable to return home.<fix123>
At first, she was happy about it, but...<fix123>
"There's no point in getting all this treasure<fix123>if I can't even get back home.<fix123>
There's no way for me to study it here."<fix123>
Marisa's mistake had been not realizing her escape route had<fix123>been cut off while she was distracted by treasure.<fix123>
She decided to focus on how to get back home for now.<fix123>

<c$Ending No.10 — Others will tire of your caution.$>(Literally "Strike a stone bridge and have somebody else cross it", a twist on the usual Japanese proverb 石橋をたたいて渡る (literally "Strike a stone bridge before crossing it") about being overly cautious.)<fix123>
<c$Go for a one-credit clear!$><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, the ship is headed for its destination<fix123>automatically now.<fix123>Actually, there's not much for me to do as captain these days.<fix123><fix123>
