en_dialogue: <fix123>And what?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>嫌ですねぇ、妖怪退治ですよ<fix123>貴方、妖怪ですよね？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, ummm, you know, exterminate youkai.<fix123>You're a youkai, aren't you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>妖怪でーす<fix123>でも、その煩わしい妖怪退治ももうすぐ終わる<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I am!<fix123>But, that troublesome youkai hunting of yours will be over soon.<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Huh?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>聖が望む未来<fix123>それは争いのない美しい妖怪世界<fix123>貴方が持ってきた宝で聖の封印を解く事が<fix123>出来るのですから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The future that Hijiri wants<fix123>is a peaceful, beautiful youkai world.<fix123>And, we'll be able to break Hijiri's seal<fix123>with the treasure you've brought.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええっ？　妖怪退治の無い世界？<fix123>それは困ります<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huuh? A world without youkai hunting?<fix123>That's not good.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方と貴方の持っている宝がこの船に<fix123>乗っていれば、私は魔界に連れて行くだけ<fix123>さあ、もうすぐ目的地ですよ<fix123>逃がしません！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If you stay on board with the treasure you have,<fix123>we can take you along to Makai.<fix123>We'll be there before long.<fix123>I won't let you get away!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Minamitsu Murasa DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>だてに妖怪退治をしている訳じゃないのね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I can see you're not just in this business for show.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私の持っている宝って何？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What's the treasure I've got?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>勝手に浮遊している物体です<fix123>元々は穀倉の一部でしたが……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>They're objects that can fly on their own.<fix123>They used to be part of a grain silo, though...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、これってＵＦＯ型のおもちゃじゃないの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, so it's not a UFO-shaped toy?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ＵＦＯ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>UFO?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>えーっと、何でしたっけ？<fix123>空飛ぶ謎の物体、ってあれ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ummm, let's see, what was it?<fix123>Unidentified flying object, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええ、そのものですね<fix123>それが飛宝、飛倉の破片なのです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, it's exactly that.<fix123>That's our flying treasure, the fragments of the Flying Granary.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ＵＦＯの正体は穀倉の一部だったのねー<fix123>昔見た雑誌に騙されてたわー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So the UFOs were actually parts of a grain silo.<fix123>Those magazines I used to read tricked me...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>伝説の弟様が残した唯一の宝物ですよ<fix123>さあ、目的地が見えて来ました<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's the one treasure left behind by the legendary brother.<fix123>Well, I can see our destination now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>魔界の赤黒い封印<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Red and Black Seal of Makai<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>魔界（法界上空）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Makai (above Hokkai)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 魔界地方都市エソテリア<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Rural Makai City Esoteria<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nazrin ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>おや？<fix123>君も魔界まで来たのかい？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmm?<fix123>So you came to Makai, too?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ！　ネズミ<fix123>まだ生きていたのね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah! The mouse!<fix123>I see you're still alive!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう簡単にやられはしないよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I can't be done in that easily.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今度こそ、二度と起き上がれなくしてやるわ！<fix123>貴方、弱かったし<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This time you won't be getting up again!<fix123>You're pretty weak, after all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おおっと、私にはまだやるべき事がある<fix123>この宝塔をお渡しするまで、君にやられる<fix123>訳にはいかないんだ<fix123>ちょっと、その力をお借りするとしよう<fix123>法の力で世界を照らすこの宝塔を！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, now, I've still got work to do.<fix123>I can't let you do me in<fix123>until I hand over this treasure pagoda.<fix123>Why don't you let me borrow a little of your power<fix123>for this treasure that will light the world with the power of dharma!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nazrin DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ここは一体……<fix123>禍々しいにも程があるわね<fix123>感じたことのない空気感<fix123>見た事もない結界<fix123>何で私はこんなとこに連れられたのかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Where on Earth am I...?<fix123>This is just too creepy...<fix123>I've never been in a place with this kind of atmosphere.<fix123>I've never seen boundaries like this.<fix123>Why did I let them bring me to a place like this?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Shou Toramaru ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>貴方を待っていたわ！<fix123>貴方の持っているその飛宝<fix123>それがあれば、ここの封印は解けます<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've been waiting for you!<fix123>With the flying treasure that you have,<fix123>we can break this seal.<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Huh? Who're you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>毘沙門天の弟子<fix123>寅丸 星<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Disciple of Bishamonten<fix123>Shou Toramaru<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は毘沙門天の代理<fix123>聖の信仰を一身に受けていた者です<fix123>ナズーリンが持ってきたこの宝塔と<fix123>貴方の持ってきた飛倉の破片が揃えば<fix123>ここの封印を解く事が出来ます<fix123>聖への恩を返す事が出来るのです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm the representative of Bishamonten,<fix123>a devotee of Hijiri's creed.<fix123>Now that we have the jeweled pagoda Nazrin brought,<fix123>as well as the fragments of the Flying Granary you possess,<fix123>We can break the seal here.<fix123>We can repay our debt of gratitude to Hijiri.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>倉……そう、ＵＦＯは倉だったのよね<fix123>この話を持ち帰れば盛り上がるわー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmm... that's right, the UFO was part of a granary.<fix123>People will be talking about this for a long time...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さあ、私と一緒に封印を解きましょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now, come, let us break the seal together.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さてと、封印も気になるけど……<fix123>まずは目の前の妖怪を退治しないとね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm, let's see, I'm worried about that seal, but......<fix123>First I have to vanquish the youkai in front of me, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>妖怪？<fix123>私の事ですか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Youkai?<fix123>Do you mean me?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>他に誰が居るのかしら<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Is there anyone else here?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方は妖怪を退治する事を正義とするのね<fix123>それもまた普遍的な考え方である<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You believe youkai hunting is justice, eh?<fix123>A lot of people seem to think that way.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>神に帰依しない者を矯める為に<fix123>私がここに居るのです！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've come here to straighten out<fix123>anyone without the proper reverence for God!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は妖怪ですが、毘沙門天に帰依しています<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's true that I'm a youkai, but I'm also a devotee of Bishamonten.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ、あれ？<fix123>でも、退治して見せますわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wh, what?<fix123>But, I'll try to defeat you anyway!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 虎柄の毘沙門天<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Tiger-Patterned Bishamonten<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうですか、それも良いでしょう<fix123>貴方には貴方の正義がある<fix123>ただ、もし貴方が道を誤っているのであれば<fix123>魔界に有りてなお輝き続けるこの法の光――<fix123>この毘沙門天の宝塔の前に<fix123>ひれ伏す事になるでしょう！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see, very well, then!<fix123>You have your own sense of justice.<fix123>However, if the path you've chosen isn't correct...<fix123>Then you'll have to bear witness to the light of dharma which is even brighter here in Makai—<fix123>And bow down<fix123>before this pagoda of Bishamonten!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Shou Toramaru DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>負けた……<fix123>貴方も間違ってはいないというのね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've lost...<fix123>I suppose that means what you're doing isn't wrong.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>参ったかー！<fix123>これが人間にして神である私<fix123>東風谷早苗の力よ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So you lost!<fix123>That's the power of the living god,<fix123>Sanae Kochiya!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それでは、貴方はこれからどうするのですか？<fix123>ここは魔界です<fix123>貴方を現世に戻す為の船も、今はエネルギー切れ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So, then, what will you do now?<fix123>This is Makai, after all,<fix123>and the ship that could take you back home is out of energy.<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Huh?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>聖の力なら貴方を元の世界に戻す事は<fix123>容易だと思いますが……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I think it would be easy for you to get home<fix123>with Hijiri's aid, but...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そ、そう。何者か判らないけど<fix123>その聖を復活させなきゃいけないのね<fix123>神奈子様……こういう時はどうすれば<fix123>……<fix123>……そう。その封印された奴を見て<fix123>危険なら退治すれば良いだけね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I, I see. I don't know who she is,<fix123>but I suppose I'll have to help you revive this Hijiri.<fix123>Oh, Lady Kanako... What should I do now?<fix123>......<fix123>...... yes. I'll go see this sealed person,<fix123>and if she's dangerous, I'll just beat her!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>協力してくれますね？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So, you'll help us?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええ！<fix123>やりましょう！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes!<fix123>Let's do it!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ちなみに、聖は元々人間だし<fix123>人間の味方ですけどね<fix123>それでも貴方は妖怪退治出来るのかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>By the way, Hijiri used to be human, too,<fix123>so she should be willing to help you...<fix123>Will you still be able to exterminate a "youkai" like that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>八苦を滅した尼公<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Nun Who Overcame the Eight Sufferings<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>法界<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hokkai<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 法界の火<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Fires of Hokkai<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>??? ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>??? LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ここは一体……<fix123>さっきまでの禍々しさが嘘の様だわ<fix123>一体、どんな人がここに封印されている<fix123>のかなぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Where am I......?<fix123>It's like that ill-omened place before never existed.<fix123>I wonder what kind of person<fix123>would get sealed away in a place like this...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Byakuren Hijiri ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ああ、法の世界に光が満ちる<fix123>貴方がこの世界を解放してくれたの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>O, the world of dharma is filled with light.<fix123>Are you the one who liberated this world?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ、居た<fix123>あのう<fix123>私を元の世界に帰して欲しいのです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, there you are.<fix123>Ummm,<fix123>I'd like you to take me back to my world.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はあ<fix123>そんなこと簡単そうですが……<fix123>ここの封印を解いてくれた人にしては<fix123>欲のない要望なのね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmmm?<fix123>That would probably be easy, but......<fix123>I'd have expected the breaker of the seal<fix123>to ask for something more.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええ、気が付いたらこんな処に居まして<fix123>ところで貴方は？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, well, before I knew it, here I was...<fix123>By the way, who are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>封印された大魔法使い<fix123>聖　白蓮<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Great Sealed Magician<fix123>Byakuren Hijiri<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私の名は白蓮<fix123>遠い昔の僧侶です<fix123>貴方は見たところ巫女の様ね？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My name is Byakuren.<fix123>I was a Buddhist monk a long, long time ago.<fix123>You seem to be a shrine maiden, am I right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええ、妖怪退治をする巫女です<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, I'm a shrine maiden that hunts youkai.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>妖怪退治……？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A youkai hunter...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええ、人間を苦しめる妖怪を<fix123>退治しているのです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, I hunt youkai who<fix123>do bad things to people.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……人間は変わっていない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...... I see humans haven't changed.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はい？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm sorry?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は、人間に虐げられていた妖怪を憂えて<fix123>いるのです<fix123>人間と妖怪が平等に暮らせる世界<fix123>それを目指し、尽力して来ました<fix123>しかし、それを拒んだ人間によって<fix123>封印されてしまったのです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I grieve for the youkai<fix123>that are oppresed by humans.<fix123>I did everything in my power to create a peaceful world<fix123>where humans and youkai could live as equals.<fix123>And yet, I was sealed away by humans<fix123>who didn't want that sort of world.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間と妖怪が平等に？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Humans and youkai, as equals?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええ、神も仏も、妖怪との違いはない<fix123>それなのに何故妖怪は退治され、神様は<fix123>信仰されるのか<fix123>それは、人間の都合でしかない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes. Gods and buddhas are no different from youkai.<fix123>Yet, why are youkai reviled and hunted,<fix123>while gods are worshipped?<fix123>It is only because humans want it to be so.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>神様と妖怪が同じですって？<fix123>そんな訳有るもんですか！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Did you say gods and youkai aren't any different?<fix123>That's not true at all!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方は妖怪退治を正義とするのですね？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Do you believe hunting youkai is just?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええそうよ<fix123>そうしないと平和は訪れないわ！<fix123>そう神奈子様も言ってたもん！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, of course!<fix123>We have to hunt youkai to keep the peace!<fix123>That's what Lady Kanako said, too!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 感情の摩天楼　～ Cosmic Mind<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Emotional Skyscraper ~ Cosmic Mind<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうですか、私は既に人間を辞めた者<fix123>貴方から見たら妖怪と言えるでしょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see; then, as someone who's given up on humans...<fix123>I suppose you would see me no different than a youkai.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>では退治させて頂きます！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Then, I guess it's time to beat you!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私が寺にいた頃と人間は変わっていないな<fix123>誠に浅く、付和雷同であるッ！<fix123>いざ、南無三――！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Humans haven't changed since my days in the temple.<fix123>You're only blindly following her, how superficial!<fix123>Now, namusan -- !<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Byakuren Hijiri DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>If player has continued<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Ending　No. 11<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>If player has not continued<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Ending　No. 05<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>春の湊に舟の影<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A Ship's Shadow at the Spring Harbor<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>残雪の道<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Road of Lingering Snow<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM:  春の湊に<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: At the Harbor of Spring<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nazrin ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Nazrin LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>おいおい、凄い事になっているぜ<fix123><fix123><fix123>あの船が、私を追いかけて<fix123>方向変換してきたぞ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, woah, this is turning out to be pretty amazing.<fix123><fix123><fix123>It looks like that ship has<fix123>come out to try to find me!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nazrin ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>違う違う<fix123>君を追いかけてなんていないよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, no.<fix123>It's not looking for you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ダウザーの小さな大将<fix123>ナズーリン<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Little Dowser General<fix123>Nazrin<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>アレは私をここに置いていってくれただけ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It just brought me here, is all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんだ？<fix123>ネズミだと？　さっきもいたが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What's this?<fix123>A mouse?  Hey, I just saw you, too.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ちょっと捜し物があるだけさ<fix123>宝の反応があったから降りてきたんだが<fix123><fix123><fix123>どうやら、君に反応しただけのようだ<fix123>がっかりだよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm just looking for a little something.<fix123>I came down because I picked up on a treasure response.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Anyway, it looks like it was just reacting to you.<fix123>What a letdown.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>船からネズミ……<fix123>もしかして、既に船倉を食い荒らしたとか！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A mouse from a ship ...<fix123>Don't tell me you've eaten through all the food supply already!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM:  小さな小さな賢い将<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: A Tiny, Tiny Clever Commander<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>アレは船なんかじゃない<fix123>まぁ、そう見えるかも知れんがね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's not really a ship.<fix123>Well, maybe it looks like one.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう見えるぜ<fix123>目が良いからな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It sure does.<fix123>I have good eyes, you know.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さてと、人間よ<fix123>私は仕事があるのでこの辺で<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Alright now, human.<fix123>I've got some work to do, so ...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>逃がすか！<fix123>何か逃がすと勿体ない気がするぜ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're not getting away!<fix123>If I let you get away, something bad will happen!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あんまり戦いたくないが……<fix123>しょうがないな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I don't really want to fight you, but ...<fix123>Oh, well.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nazrin DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>さあ！<fix123>お前が何者か、答えよ！<fix123><fix123><fix123>って、あれ？<fix123>もしかして逃げたか？<fix123><fix123><fix123>逃げ足の速いネズミだ<fix123>まあ、ネズミだからなぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now!<fix123>Tell me who you are!<fix123><fix123><fix123>..., wait, what?<fix123>Did she run away?<fix123><fix123><fix123>She's a pretty fast mouse.<fix123>Well, she's a mouse, after all.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>The One-eyed Monster Lurking in the Clouds<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>The Spring Clouds<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Sealed Cloud Route<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>Kogasa Tatara LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Kogasa Tatara ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ちょっと待ってよ〜<fix123><fix123><fix123>そんなに急いで何処に行こうって言うの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Please wait just a minute~<fix123><fix123><fix123>Where are you going in such a hurry?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前、前方から出てきたじゃないか<fix123><fix123><fix123>これじゃあ私がお前を追いかけている<fix123>ように見える<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, I just ran into you, didn't I?<fix123><fix123><fix123>It kinda makes it look like<fix123>I'm chasing you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>愉快な忘れ傘<fix123>多々良小傘<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Cheery Forgotten Umbrella<fix123>Kogasa Tatara<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 万年置き傘にご注意を<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Beware the Umbrella Left There Forever<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そこはそれ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'll leave that to you!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>で、なんだ？<fix123>忙しい私に何か用か？　仕事か？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, what is it?<fix123>What do you want with someone busy as me?  A job?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いやさぁ、最近暇でねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, uh, I've been really bored lately, and ...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほう、それは自慢かね<fix123>忙しい私に対して<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oho, are you bragging?<fix123>Since I'm really busy ...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間を脅かしても誰も驚いてくれないし<fix123>つまんないの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Even if I try to startle humans, no-one's ever surprised.<fix123>It's so boring.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>化け傘に驚くような人間はおらんよ<fix123><fix123><fix123>風で飛ばされているただの傘の方が怖い<fix123>ぶつかるかも知れんからな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Nobody would be surprised by a monster umbrella.<fix123><fix123><fix123>A normal umbrella blown around by the wind would be scarier.<fix123>It might run into you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なるほど！<fix123>ぶつかれば驚いてくれるのね？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see!<fix123>Bumping into people surprises them!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いやそういう意味で言った訳じゃ……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Er, no, that's not what I ...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>当って砕け、うらめしやー！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'll smash you up, boooo!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kogasa Tatara DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>当って砕けたー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You smashed me up ...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>普通の傘に比べて<fix123>唐傘お化けは柔らかいからな<fix123><fix123><fix123>あれ？<fix123>柔らかい方が砕け難いんだったっけ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Karakasa ghosts are really soft<fix123>compared to normal umbrellas.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Huh?<fix123>Shouldn't that make you harder to break, though?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>柔らかい……<fix123>そうか、こんにゃくね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Soft ...<fix123>Oh, like konjac jelly!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あん？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間を驚かすのならこんにゃくを<fix123>用意すれば、完璧！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I can use konjac jelly to surprise humans!<fix123>It's perfect!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……時代遅れな妖怪だな。お前<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>... this youkai's really behind the times.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>高速の廃墟と巨人<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The High-speed Ruins and the Giant<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>高速浮遊艇<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The High-speed Floating Ship<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: スカイルーイン<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Sky Ruin<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>妖精やら人間やら有象無象が<fix123>寄ってたかって……宝物庫狙いなの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Humans, fairies, and all, a real crowd is<fix123>dropping in ... are they after the treasury?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>宝物庫だと？<fix123>宝物庫が何故空を飛ぶ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A treasury?<fix123>Why's a treasury flying in the sky?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>問答無用！<fix123>賊の類に掛ける情けは無し<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, no point in arguing!<fix123>I'll show no mercy to any sort of scoundrel!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Ichirin Kumoi DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>いやはや、あの拳を見て逃げ出さない<fix123>人間がおったとは……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh!  To think that there are still humans that<fix123>wouldn't run away after seeing this fist ...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この船、入り口が一切見つからないんだが<fix123>連れて行ってくれないか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Look, I can't find an entrance to this ship anywhere ...<fix123>Would you take me to it?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Ichirin Kumoi LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>……逃げたな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>... ... She got away.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Ichirin Kumoi ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>何が目的なのかしら<fix123>宝物？　それとも姐さんの力が目的？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Just what are you after?<fix123>Treasure?  Or my sister's power?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>宝物なんて見あたらないじゃないか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I can't see any treasure here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう、見ての通り宝は全て失われてしまった<fix123><fix123><fix123>多くの宝は、欲深き賊に奪われ<fix123>姐さんを復活させる為の最後の飛宝も<fix123><fix123><fix123>妖精達に持ち去られてしまったよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, as you can see, it's all been lost.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Most of the treasure was stolen by greedy thieves,<fix123>even the flying treasures I need to revive my sister.<fix123><fix123><fix123>It was carried away by fairies.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それは残念だ<fix123>だが<fix123><fix123><fix123>宝物より面白そうなもんが眠ってそうだねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, that's too bad.<fix123>However.<fix123><fix123><fix123>It looks like something more interesting than treasure is sleeping here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>守り守られし大輪<fix123>雲居一輪＆雲山<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Big Wheel, Having Guarded and Been Guarded<fix123>Ichirin Kumoi & Unzan<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう眠っているわ<fix123>まだ<fix123><fix123><fix123>姐さんは飛宝が全て集まらないと<fix123>復活が出来ないの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, that's right.<fix123>She's still sleeping.<fix123><fix123><fix123>If I can't find all my sister's flying treasures,<fix123>I can't revive her.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふーん、手伝ってやろうか？<fix123>面白そうだし<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm, well, why don't I help you?<fix123>It sounds interesting.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……え？<fix123>何だって、この黒いのが……？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>... ... what's that?<fix123>You mean that girl in black has ... ?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何？　どうした？<fix123>突然独り言を始めて<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What's the matter?<fix123>Why did you start talking to yourself?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方が飛宝の破片を集めているって<fix123>雲山が言っているわ<fix123>ネズミに捜させても埒が空かなかったのに……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Unzan tells me<fix123><fix123>you've been gathering the fragments of the floating treasure.<fix123>I guess asking the mice to find it didn't work ...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんと、既に手伝っていたと言うのか？<fix123>何なんだ、秘宝って……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What, you mean I've already been helping?<fix123>What is this secret treasure, anyway ...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 時代親父とハイカラ少女<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Traditional Old Man and the Stylish Girl<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>集めてくれて有難う！<fix123>後は、それを渡してくれれば良いのよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Thank you for finding them!<fix123>Now, you just need to hand them over!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Ichirin Kumoi DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>素晴らしいわ<fix123>今の世にもこんな人間が居たなんて<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How splendid.<fix123>I can't believe there are humans like that in this world, too ...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それで秘宝って何なんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So what's this secret treasure?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>飛宝は、姐さんの力が一番籠もった宝なの<fix123>貴方も見てきたでしょう？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The flying treasure is my sister's most precious treasure.<fix123>You saw it too, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何か見たっけなぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I saw something ...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>妖精達がたまに持っていた飛行する破片を<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>They're flying objects the fairies carry around sometimes.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もしかして、円盤ＵＦＯの事かなぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Is she talking about those round UFOs ... ?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>聖輦と不吉な船長<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Unfortunate Captain of the Holy Palanquin<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>聖輦船内部<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Inside the Palanquin Ship<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 幽霊客船の時空を越えた旅<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Interdimensional Voyage of a Ghostly Passenger Ship<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>??? ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>??? LEAVES<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>ほう……<fix123>これはこれは<fix123><fix123><fix123>見事に何にも無い<fix123>見事に誰も居ないじゃないか<fix123><fix123><fix123>妖精の巣窟となった廃墟ってところか<fix123>こんなのが空に浮いているなんて<fix123><fix123><fix123>何かの事故かもしれんな<fix123>幽霊船って感じしかしないぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmmm ... <fix123>Well, now, this is ...<fix123><fix123><fix123>This place is totally empty.<fix123>And there's totally no-one here.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Just an abandoned place that's become a fairy hangout ...<fix123>How does this thing even stay in the air?<fix123><fix123><fix123>Maybe there was some kind of accident.<fix123>It feels like a ghost ship.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Minamitsu Murasa ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>BGM: キャプテン・ムラサ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Captain Murasa<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>誰か居るの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Is someone there?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お、見落としていたぜ<fix123>乗っている奴がいたか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, guess I missed you.<fix123>Someone's onboard after all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どちら様？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>And who are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>泣く子だけが黙る魔法使いだ<fix123>お前は？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A magician that makes just crying kids shut up.<fix123>How about you?[1]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>水難事故の念縛霊<fix123>村紗 水蜜<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Ghost Left from the Shipwreck<fix123>Minamitsu Murasa<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>申し遅れました<fix123>私は村紗、この聖輦船の船長です<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, where are my manners?<fix123>I'm Murasa, the captain of this holy palanquin.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>船長が来たか！　この船、ただ浮遊している<fix123>だけじゃないって事だな<fix123><fix123><fix123>で、この船は「せいれんせん」っていうのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So the captain's here!  Maybe that means this ship<fix123>isn't just floating around.<fix123><fix123><fix123>So, what'd you call this place, a holy ... ?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええ、そうです<fix123>聖をお乗せする為に作られた船だから聖輦船<fix123><fix123><fix123>尤も、今は私と貴方、それと一部の妖怪しか<fix123>乗っておりませんが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, it was built to carry Hijiri about,<fix123>so a holy palanquin.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Of course, its only passengers nowadays<fix123>are you, me, and a few youkai.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうか、確かにガランとしているな<fix123><fix123><fix123>で、この船は何処に向かっているんだ？<fix123>何の為に飛んでいるんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh, yeah, it's pretty empty.<fix123><fix123><fix123>So, where's this ship headed?<fix123>Why's it flying?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この船は法界に向かっています<fix123>聖を助けて、新たな世界を作る為にです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This ship is bound for Hokkai.<fix123>We'll save Hijiri and create a new world.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほう<fix123>全く判らん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh.<fix123>I don't get it at all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>実は貴方に黙っていた事があります<fix123><fix123><fix123>貴方が持ってきた宝さえあれば<fix123>この船は目的を達成できるのです<fix123><fix123><fix123>目的地まで移動する間<fix123>時間を稼がせて貰いました<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Actually, there's something I haven't told you.<fix123><fix123><fix123>We need the treasures you have<fix123>in order to reach our destination.<fix123><fix123><fix123>You've let us gain considerable time<fix123>on our journey there.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……なんだと？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>... ... what did you say?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さあ、もうすぐ目的地ですよ<fix123>逃がしません！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, we'll be arriving shortly.<fix123>I won't let you get away!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Minamitsu Murasa DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>強い……<fix123>ただ、時間は十分稼がせて貰いました<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're strong ... ...<fix123>But I think we've made up enough time.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>最初から逃げる気など無い<fix123><fix123><fix123>この船についてまだ判っている事が<fix123>殆どないからな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I didn't want to run away, you know.<fix123><fix123><fix123>There's still a lot I don't know about this ship.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうですか、では安心して運行を続けましょう<fix123>もうすぐ目的地です<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see, then I suppose it's okay for me to resume service.<fix123>We'll be arriving shortly.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何だろう、何か魔法が使いやすくなって<fix123>来たような<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh, it feels like it's easier<fix123>to use magic now for some reason.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もうすぐ魔界に突入しますからその影響でしょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's because we'll be entering Makai shortly.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ま、魔界だと？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>D-did you say Makai?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええ、法界は魔界の一角ですから<fix123>どうしても魔界に行く必要があるのです<fix123>肉体には厳しい瘴気が漂っていますが<fix123>その分魔法は強くなります<fix123>その為、聖の封印も強力なのですよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, Hokkai is a small part of Makai,<fix123>so we need to go to Makai.<fix123>There's a miasma that's bad for your body floating about,<fix123>but it makes magic stronger.<fix123>That's why Hijiri's seal is so strong, too.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほほう、そんな処に封印されたなんて<fix123>一体全体どんな奴なんだろうか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well now, I wonder who the heck<fix123>would be sealed away in a place like that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>魔界の赤黒い封印<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Red and Black Seal of the Underworld<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>魔界（法界上空）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Makai (above Hokkai)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 魔界地方都市エソテリア<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Provincial Makai City Esoteria<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nazrin ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>おや？<fix123>君も魔界まで来たのかい？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmm?<fix123>So you came to Makai, too?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ、あの時のネズミ！<fix123><fix123><fix123>ここに居るって事は、やっぱり<fix123>お前もあの船と関係有ったんだな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, it's that mouse from before!<fix123><fix123><fix123>If you're here, too,<fix123>you must have something to do with that ship.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どうやら探していた物の一つは<fix123>お前が集めていたと聞いたよ<fix123><fix123><fix123>私は船長達に内緒で、別の宝を探していたんだ<fix123><fix123><fix123>ご主人様もうっかり無くしてた、だなんて<fix123>恥ずかしくて私以外に言えなかったんだろうね<fix123><fix123><fix123>この毘沙門天の宝塔<fix123>ちょっとだけ使わせて貰おうかね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I heard that you had<fix123>one of the treasures I was looking for.<fix123><fix123><fix123>I've been looking for another treasure - it's a secret from the captain.<fix123><fix123><fix123>My master carelessly lost it, so she was<fix123>probably too embarrassed to tell anyone but me.<fix123><fix123><fix123>So, why don't I try<fix123>using this jeweled pagoda of Bishamonten?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nazrin DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ほうほう<fix123><fix123><fix123>見た事無い封印だな<fix123>これは一筋縄ではいかないだろう<fix123><fix123><fix123>この封印を解くには私の持っている宝？<fix123>が必要らしいんだが……<fix123><fix123><fix123>宝って、本当にこのＵＦＯの事なのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well now.<fix123><fix123><fix123>I've never seen a seal like this before.<fix123>Looks like this isn't the usual kind.<fix123><fix123><fix123>I guess you need this treasure(?) I found<fix123>to break the seal, but ...<fix123><fix123><fix123>Are these UFOs really treasure?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Shou Toramaru ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>そう、待っていたわ<fix123><fix123><fix123>貴方の持っているその飛宝<fix123>それがあれば、ここの封印は解けます<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, I've been waiting for you.<fix123><fix123><fix123>We can break the seal<fix123>with the flying treasure you've brought.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>誰だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who're you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>毘沙門天の弟子<fix123>寅丸 星<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Disciple of Bishamonten<fix123>Shou Toramaru<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は毘沙門天の代理<fix123>聖の信仰を一身に受けていた者です<fix123><fix123><fix123>ナズーリンが持ってきたこの宝塔と<fix123>貴方の持ってきた飛倉の破片が揃えば<fix123><fix123><fix123>ここの封印を解く事が出来ます<fix123>聖への恩を返す事が出来るのです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I am the representative of Bishamonten,<fix123>a devotee of Hijiri's creed.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Now that we have the jeweled pagoda Nazrin brought,<fix123> as well as the fragments of the Flying Storehouse you possess,<fix123><fix123><fix123>We can break the seal here.<fix123>We can repay our debt of gratitude to Hijiri.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>このＵＦＯが……飛倉の破片？<fix123>飛倉って何だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>These UFOs ... are part of the Flying Storehouse?<fix123>What's that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あれ？　知らないで集めていたんですか？<fix123>飛宝<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm?  You gathered all the treasure<fix123>without even knowing that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>気が付いたら集めていたな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yeah, by the time I realized what happened.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>飛倉とはその名の通り、空を飛ぶ穀倉です<fix123><fix123><fix123>弟様の霊妙な力が込められた倉でした<fix123><fix123><fix123>その霊力は、倉に触れるだけで空を飛んだり<fix123>身体能力をあげる程だったのです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>As its name suggests, it's a storehouse that flies through the sky.<fix123><fix123><fix123>It was filled with the lord brother's miraculous power.<fix123><fix123><fix123>That power was strong enough that with just a touch,<fix123>it raise one's physical ability and can cause them to fly through the sky.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほう？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>その倉は数百年もの間、我々と共に<fix123>地底世界に封じ込められていました<fix123><fix123><fix123>ですが、今冬、突然の間欠泉により<fix123>解放されたのです<fix123><fix123><fix123>そして飛倉の破片は間欠泉と共に<fix123>地上に散らばったのです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Storehouse had been sealed away deep underground with us<fix123>for several hundred years.<fix123><fix123><fix123>However, this winter, we were suddenly freed<fix123>by a geyser welling up.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Then, the fragments of the Flying storehouse were scattered<fix123>as the geyser spewed out.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>間欠泉か、そう言えば去年の冬から<fix123>頻繁に出るようになったな、何故か<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A geyser?  That's right, there's been frequent<fix123>geyser eruptions since last winter, I wonder why.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>我々も地底から目覚めた時には、既に破片は<fix123>妖精達によって散り散りとなっていました<fix123><fix123><fix123>聖の封印が解けるのは弟様の法力だけです<fix123><fix123><fix123>しかし、弟様の霊力が残っている物は<fix123>もうその飛倉の破片しか有りませんでした<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>When we were awakened from underground, the fragments<fix123>had already been scattered by fairies.<fix123><fix123><fix123>We need Myouren's magic in order to break Hijiri's seal.<fix123><fix123><fix123>However, the only thing with any of it left<fix123>are the fragments of the silo.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>よく判らんがこのＵＦＯ、大切な物なんだな？<fix123>貴重品なんだな？<fix123><fix123><fix123>妖精を狂わせていたのもこのＵＦＯだし<fix123>何か家に持ち帰って調べたいぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I don't really get it, but these UFOs are important, right?<fix123>They're valuable, right?<fix123><fix123><fix123>They were making those fairies go berserk, too.<fix123>I wanna take them home and study them.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 虎柄の毘沙門天<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Tiger-Patterned Bishamonten<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今、飛宝を持ち帰ってはいけません<fix123>ここで、封印を解く為に無くてはならないのです<fix123><fix123><fix123>ましてや、貴方がその飛宝の力を悪用する様な<fix123>事があっては、困ります<fix123><fix123><fix123>こうしたくなかったのですが、仕方有りません<fix123><fix123><fix123>毘沙門天の宝塔が照らす法の光が<fix123>貴方から邪心を奪うでしょう！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You can't take them now.<fix123>We need them in order to break the seal.<fix123><fix123><fix123>We can't let you take the treasure<fix123>and use them for some fiendish purpose.<fix123><fix123><fix123>I didn't want to do this, but I have no choice.<fix123><fix123><fix123>The light of this jeweled pagoda of Bishamonten<fix123>will cleanse the evil from your heart!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Shou Toramaru DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>流石、飛宝を集めていただけの事がありますね<fix123>かくなる上は……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I can see how you could have collected the treasure.<fix123>At this rate ... ...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まて、心配しなくても大丈夫だ<fix123>封印を解く事には協力するつもりだ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wait, no need for you to worry.<fix123>I want to help you break the seal.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうですか、では貴方も同胞ですね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see, then you are a comrade.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>その代わり、無事に封印を解いたら<fix123>この飛宝、ちょっと分けて貰うぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>In return, if everything works out,<fix123>could you share some of this treasure with me?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うむ……約束しましょう<fix123>ただし、一つだけですよ？<fix123><fix123><fix123>貴重品なので<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Um ... ... yes, I promise.<fix123>But only one, okay?<fix123><fix123><fix123>They're very valuable.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>やったぜ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>八苦を滅した尼公<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Nun Who Overcame the Eight Sufferings<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>法界<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hokkai<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 法界の火<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Fire of Hokkai<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>??? ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>??? LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>うわー<fix123><fix123><fix123>ビックリする程、何にもないぜー<fix123><fix123><fix123>さっさと帰って、この飛倉の破片とやらを<fix123>調べるとするかなー<fix123><fix123><fix123>何か出てくる前にトンズラするか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wow ...<fix123><fix123><fix123>There's so little here it's surprising.<fix123><fix123><fix123>I want to go home and go investigate<fix123>those Flying Storehouse pieces or whatever.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Maybe I'll sneak out before anything shows up.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Byakuren Hijiri ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ああ、法の世界に光が満ちる<fix123><fix123>貴方がこの世界を解放してくれたの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>O, the world of dharma is filled with light.<fix123><fix123>Are you the one who liberated this world?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>む、見つかっちまったぜ<fix123><fix123><fix123>こうなったら腹を括るか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Meh, she found me.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Better prepare myself for the worst.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>久しぶりに力が湧いてきたわ<fix123>有難うございます<fix123><fix123><fix123>是非、お礼をしたいと思うのですが……<fix123>生憎、法界には何も無くて<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I feel powerful again for the first time in a long time.<fix123>Thank you very much.<fix123><fix123><fix123>I'd like to reward you, of course ...<fix123>But alas, there's nothing here in Hokkai.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お礼だと？<fix123>ところで、お前は何者だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Did you say reward me?<fix123>By the way, who are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>封印された大魔法使い<fix123>聖　白蓮<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Great Sealed Magician<fix123>Byakuren Hijiri<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私の名は白蓮<fix123><fix123><fix123>遠い昔の僧侶です<fix123><fix123><fix123>いや、魔法使いと言った方が通りがいいかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My name is Byakuren.<fix123><fix123><fix123>I was a monk a long, long time ago.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Well, perhaps it would be more accurate to say I was a magician?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんと、同業者か……<fix123><fix123><fix123>そんな事よりお礼が欲しいぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm, so you're in the business too ...<fix123><fix123><fix123>I'd really like that reward now, though.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>同業者？<fix123>貴方も魔法を使うのね？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>In the business?<fix123>Can you also use magic?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、そうだぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yep, that's right.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>じゃあ、お礼はちょっと考えないとね<fix123>貴方にも出来る事じゃ仕方が無いし……<fix123><fix123><fix123>ちなみに、もう魔法は大っぴらに使える<fix123>時代になったのね？<fix123><fix123><fix123>私は人間であった頃に不思議な力を使った事で<fix123><fix123><fix123>人から忌み嫌われ、挙げ句の果てに<fix123>封印されてしまった<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Then I'll have to think on it;<fix123>it won't do if I give you something you could do yourself ...<fix123><fix123><fix123>Does this mean we've reached an age<fix123>where magic is widely used?<fix123><fix123><fix123>In my time as a human, because I could use strange powers ...<fix123><fix123><fix123>People hated me, and in the end<fix123>they sealed away me down here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何だと？<fix123>魔法を使ったが為に封印だと？<fix123><fix123><fix123>今の世界は……魔法を使っても<fix123>大丈夫だと思うが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What?<fix123>You were sealed away because you used magic?<fix123><fix123><fix123>In today's world ... ...<fix123>I think it's okay to use magic, but ...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>良かったわ<fix123>これで私も解放される<fix123><fix123><fix123>今から元の世界に戻って<fix123>色々頑張らないとね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, thank goodness.<fix123>Then I truly will be free.<fix123><fix123>I'll have to return to our world<fix123>and work hard.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ちょっと待て、お前は何をするつもりだ？<fix123>何が目的なんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hang on a sec, work hard at what?<fix123>What are you after?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は人間と妖怪の平等を訴え、世界に<fix123>平穏をもたらすのです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I want to appeal for human and youkai equality,<fix123>and bring peace to the world.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>平等……だと？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>... equality?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>虐げられた妖怪達を救うのです<fix123>それが魔法使いの私に与えられた使命<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'll save the oppressed youkai.<fix123>That is my chosen calling as a magician.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いや待て<fix123>そんな事はさせんぞ<fix123><fix123><fix123>今の世は、人間が虐げられているんだ<fix123>妖怪の方が大手を振って道を歩いている<fix123><fix123><fix123>お前みたいな妖怪がな<fix123>さっさと、私にお礼をくれて大人しくしていろ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now, wait.<fix123>I can't let you do that.<fix123><fix123><fix123>It's humans that are oppressed in today's world.<fix123>Youkai are running rampant.<fix123><fix123><fix123>A youkai like you<fix123>should just be quiet and give me my reward.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 感情の摩天楼　~ Cosmic Mind<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Emotional Skyscraper ~ Cosmic Mind<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうですか、私は既に人間を辞めた者<fix123><fix123><fix123>人間じゃない私が平等を訴えても無駄と言う事ね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see; I've already given up my humanity.<fix123><fix123><fix123>I suppose it's pointless for a non-human like me to appeal for equality.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そういう事だ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's right.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私が寺にいた頃と人間は変わっていないな<fix123><fix123><fix123>誠に狭く、田夫野人であるッ！<fix123>いざ、南無三――！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Humans haven't changed since my days in the temple.<fix123><fix123><fix123>What a narrow-minded boor you are!<fix123>Now, namusan ―― !<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Byakuren Hijiri DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
The Hakurei Shrine.<fix123>
It's a shrine on the eastern edge of Gensokyo.<fix123>
There was little snow left on the shrine grounds, casting shade by the trees.<fix123>
The cherry blossoms would probably be out soon.<fix123>
"Makai was just so creepy.<fix123>
That ship wasn't a treasure ship or anything, it was just<fix123>a youkai ship bound for Makai.<fix123>
So boring... and it was totally empty."<fix123>
"Was it? Wait, you went to Makai?"<fix123>
"Somewhere called Hokkai, out in the sticks of Makai."<fix123>
"Still, if that ship wasn't a treasure ship,<fix123>I'm not really that interested in it.<fix123>
Well, what happened to it, anyway?"<fix123>
"They say it's still floating around out there.<fix123>You haven't seen it?"<fix123>
"Oh, my spring hibernation's been terrible lately.<fix123>I haven't seen it at all."<fix123>
"The next time I see it, I'm going to board it again."<fix123>
The next day, Reimu found the ship flying through the sky and boarded it once more.<fix123>
"I finally found you. Why are you still flying around?"<fix123>
"It feels like I've been born again, being able to fly<fix123>around up here. It's so much nicer than Makai."<fix123>
"Yes, so that's why we're thinking about making this ship<fix123>into a Gensokyo sightseeing cruise ship."<fix123>
"Sightseeing... Where do you all live, anyway?"<fix123>
"The temple I lived in long ago is gone now.<fix123>
Well, anywhere would be a fine place to live, I think."<fix123>
"This sacred palanquin was sealed underground for many<fix123>years, along with my companions like Ichirin and Shou."<fix123>
"We were finally freed at the end of last year.<fix123>We're living on the ship until we decide where to stay."<fix123>
"Hm, I see.<fix123>
I don't think I'd mind wandering around forever, though.<fix123>
Just flying through the skies..."<fix123>
"Hey, now, you can't just fly around forever.<fix123>
This ship's gonna cast huge shadows everywhere."<fix123>
"That's true. I suppose we'll spend every third day<fix123>of sightseeing on the ground, then."<fix123>
"Roger that!"<fix123>
Reimu suggested they decorate their ship as a treasure ship<fix123>in order to attract customers.<fix123>
Byakuren agreed and accepted her idea surprisingly easily.<fix123>
And so, the rumors of the flying treasure ship that had been<fix123>circulating Gensokyo came true, at least for now.<fix123>
The treasure ship cruise was popular among humans and youkai.<fix123>
Sometimes humans and youkai would end up onboard at the same time,<fix123>but the youkai were never persecuted by humans;<fix123>
Byakuren was surprised at how much the world had changed;<fix123>youkai were no longer victims.<fix123>
Reimu didn't really understand what Byakuren was on guard about;<fix123>
but she had an idea why Byakuren had been sealed away.<fix123>
She was too powerful and willing to aid humans and youkai<fix123>without distinction, so the humans got scared and sealed her away.<fix123>
Nobody would fear powerful humans anymore, though.<fix123>
Byakuren and her youkai friends would never be sealed away again.<fix123>
<c$Ending No.01 — The Cruise Ship of Gensokyo's Spring.$><fix123>
<c$Congratulations, all clear! Just as I'd expected!$><fix123>
The Hakurei Shrine.<fix123>
It's a shrine on the eastern edge of Gensokyo.<fix123>
There was little snow left on the shrine grounds, casting shade by the trees.<fix123>
The cherry blossoms would probably be out soon.<fix123>
"Is this your shrine?"<fix123>
"Woah, don't scare me like that!<fix123>
What are you doing here, anyway?"<fix123>
"Gods and Buddhas must show each other respect, too."<fix123>
"Hmm. Of course."<fix123>
"Nobody... Really worships at this shrine, do they?"<fix123>
"Geh. W-what makes you say that?"<fix123>
"Well, the god here is so mad."<fix123>
"Maybe you should spend time getting more visitors<fix123>instead of just hunting youkai all the time."<fix123>
"A-anyway, don't you live in Makai?<fix123>Is it okay to just go back and forth like this?"<fix123>
"I used to be from here, too, like Murasa and the others.<fix123>
I've come to find a way to live here in peace."<fix123>
"In peace?"<fix123>
"Seeing your lonely, empty shrine has made up my mind.<fix123>
I believe I'll build a temple."<fix123>
"Youkai... Living peacefully in a temple?"<fix123>
"Yes, we'll reject violence in pursuit of enlightenment."<fix123>
"I'm confident in Buddhism, even after seeing this.<fix123>
We'll gain followers and slowly grow to be the greatest<fix123>Buddhist temple in the world.<fix123>
Yes... I'll name the temple after my younger brother...<fix123>
The Myouren Temple! That's perfect!"<fix123>
"Hey, are you making yourself out to be my rival?<fix123>
I'm not gonna go easy on you, okay?"<fix123>
"Your rival? I won't be doing any youkai hunting.<fix123>
I've always extended the hand of salvation to youkai.<fix123>
To those poor youkai oppressed by the shrine maiden..."<fix123>
The ship that flew through the sky landed close to the human<fix123>village, turning into nothing more than an old granary.<fix123>
That granary was remodeled into a modest temple.<fix123>
It was called the "Myouren Temple."<fix123>
The (so-called) treasure ship landing and turning into<fix123>a temple created an uproar in the village.<fix123>
Rumors flew around, like "These people are lucky" and "There's some<fix123>amazing boddhisatva there," making the temple popular with humans.<fix123>
It was originally built for youkai, but since Byakuren treated<fix123>humans and youkai the same, the temple accepted all comers.<fix123>
Except humans who were just looking for treasure from the treasure ship.<fix123>
Needless to say, Reimu was depressed by how easily Byakuren<fix123>picked up followers.<fix123>
<c$Ending No.02 — The Myouren Temple came down from the sky.$><fix123>
<c$Congratulations, all clear! Just as I'd expected!$><fix123>
Hokkai, a part of Makai.<fix123>
Reimu was caught by Byakuren, and was unable to return home.<fix123>
The only creatures around were youkai...<fix123>
"What on earth? These are no normal youkai.<fix123>I need to get home soon to start preparing again or I'll never be able to win."<fix123>
Reimu gave up on defeating the youkai around her and made<fix123>getting back to the shrine her top priority.<fix123>
<c$Ending No.07 — Collect lots of items before invading Makai.$><fix123>
<c$Go for a one-credit clear!$><fix123>
Hokkai, a part of Makai.<fix123>
Reimu was caught by Byakuren, and was unable to return home.<fix123>
She looked for the ship that brought her to Hokkai, but...<fix123>
"Why doesn't this run-down old ship have enough fuel to get home!?<fix123>
I can't just leave the shrine unattended for days."<fix123>
Reimu tried getting the ship working through trial and error,<fix123>
but she couldn't get it to fly again.<fix123>
<c$Ending No.08 — Was the trip out safe?$><fix123>
<c$Go for a one-credit clear!$><fix123>

<fix123>Nazrin LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>何という事だ<fix123><fix123><fix123>地上スレスレを飛んでいたら<fix123>空飛ぶ船に追いつけない事を知った<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What the hell?<fix123><fix123><fix123>Now I've learned the fact that I won't be able to catch<fix123>a ship flying in the sky by flying just above the ground.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nazrin ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>この辺に宝の反応が……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There was a treasure response from over here ... ...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ダウザーの小さな大将<fix123>ナズーリン<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Little Dowser General<fix123>Nazrin<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんだ、さっきの人間か<fix123>つまらん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What?  It's that human from before.<fix123>Boring ...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>宝の反応だと？<fix123>この辺に宝があるのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A treasure reaction?<fix123>Is there treasure around here?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ハズレさ、ハズレ<fix123>どうやら宝の反応は君だったみたいだ<fix123><fix123><fix123>人間はレア度０だから<fix123>わざわざ拾わないよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Nope, that's not it.<fix123>Looks like the response was coming from you.<fix123><fix123><fix123>But humans have a rarity factor of 0,<fix123>so I think I'll just ignore you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は比較的、ナマのつもりだったんだがな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I thought my body was relatively rare, though.[1]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さて、次の宝を探さないと<fix123>あのお方の小言を聞くはめになるな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I'd better go find the next treasure,<fix123>or I'll never hear the end of it from her.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>宝を集めているのか？<fix123>あの宝船と何か関係があるのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are you looking for treasure?<fix123>Does it have anything to do with that treasure ship?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM:  小さな小さな賢い将<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: A Tiny, Tiny Clever Commander<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>宝船？<fix123>空に浮かぶアレの事か？<fix123><fix123><fix123>見ようによっては宝船かも知れないが<fix123>今は違う<fix123><fix123><fix123>ま、人間には用はないが……<fix123><fix123><fix123>可哀想だが<fix123>私の小ネズミ達が食欲を抑えきれない様子だよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Treasure ship?<fix123>That thing floating up in the sky?<fix123><fix123><fix123>Maybe it looks like a treasure ship,<fix123>but it's not, now.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Well, I don't have any business with humans, but ...<fix123><fix123><fix123>Too bad for you,<fix123>but it looks like my little mice are really hungry.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nazrin DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>今のネズミは一体なんだったんだ？<fix123><fix123><fix123>まさか、宝船がネズミに荒らされたとか<fix123><fix123><fix123>何にしても自分で確かめるしかないか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Just what was that mouse, anyway?<fix123><fix123><fix123>Don't tell me the treasure ship got infested with mice?<fix123><fix123><fix123>Well, I guess I'll have to go find out for myself.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>雲に潜む一つ眼の化生<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The One-eyed Monster Lurking in the Clouds<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>The Spring Clouds<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Sealed Cloud Route<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>Kogasa Tatara LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Kogasa Tatara ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ちょっと待ってよ～<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Please wait just a minute~<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>待ってられん<fix123>船が私を呼んでいるんだ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I can't wait.<fix123>That ship is calling out to me.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, my, so you're just going to hurry right on?<fix123>Well, I guess I'll leave you now, then.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……待て<fix123><fix123><fix123>大人しく帰るたあ、怪しい奴だ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>... ... Wait.<fix123><fix123><fix123>You're just going to leave?  That's pretty suspicious.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>愉快な忘れ傘<fix123>多々良小傘<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Cheery Forgotten Umbrella<fix123>Kogasa Tatara<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 万年置き傘にご注意を<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Beware the Umbrella Left There Forever<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>じゃあ帰らない<fix123>暇だもん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I won't leave, then.<fix123>I've got lots of time.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんだお前？<fix123>あの船からの回し者か？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What's with you?<fix123>Are you a patrol from that ship?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>船？<fix123>関係無いよ<fix123><fix123><fix123>私は人間を驚かす事を生き甲斐とする愉快な妖怪<fix123><fix123><fix123>と言うわけで驚けー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ship?<fix123>That's got nothing to do with me.<fix123><fix123><fix123>I'm just a cheerful youkai who lives to surprise people.<fix123><fix123><fix123>So, be surprised--<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>知るか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yeah, right.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ぐすん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>*sob*<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>船と関係がないのなら邪魔をしないでくれ<fix123>私は忙しいんだ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If you're not related to that ship, please don't get in my way.<fix123>I'm really busy right now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>じゃあ、こうしたら驚いてくれるかな？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmm, will you be surprised if I do this?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kogasa Tatara DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>うらめしやー<fix123>驚いた？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Booooo!<fix123>Did that surprise you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>驚かないなぁ。街の妖怪、みんなお前みたいな<fix123>芸のない奴らばかりだ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Not at all.  All the other youkai in town are like you.<fix123>Not a single one is interesting at all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ぐすん<fix123>妖怪の存在意義って……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>*sniff*<fix123>My reason to live as a youkai ...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>雨を凌げるようになれば驚くかもしれんな<fix123>その手に持っている奴で<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I might be surprised if you could protect me from the rain<fix123>with that umbrella you've got there.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんと、原点回帰しろって事ね！<fix123>確かにいいかも……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, so you're saying to go back to square one!<fix123>Maybe that's not a bad idea ...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そんじゃ、目的の船に追いついたから<fix123>私はここで<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I caught up to the ship I was chasing,<fix123>so, see you.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>The High-speed Ruins and the Giant<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>The High-speed Floating Ship<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Sky Ruin<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>妖精やら人間やら有象無象が<fix123>寄ってたかって……宝物庫狙いなの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Humans, fairies, and all, a real crowd is<fix123>dropping in ... are they after the treasury?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>宝物庫だと？<fix123>なんという魅力的な響き<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A treasury?<fix123>I like the sound of that.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>問答無用！<fix123>賊の類に掛ける情けは無し<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, no point in arguing!<fix123>I'll show no mercy to any sort of scoundrel!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Ichirin Kumoi DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>いやはや、あの拳を見て逃げ出さない<fix123>人間がおったとは……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh!  To think that there are still humans that<fix123>wouldn't run away after seeing this fist ...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前を締め上げれば宝が手に入る<fix123>という物語だったのか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So I guess this is a story where I'll get the treasure<fix123>if I finish you off ...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Ichirin Kumoi LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>……逃げたな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>... ... She got away.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Ichirin Kumoi ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>何が目的なのかしら<fix123>宝物？　それとも姐さんの力が目的？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Just what are you after?<fix123>Treasure?  Or my sister's power?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>姐さん、だと？<fix123><fix123><fix123>……<fix123>それよりは宝だな。うん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Your sister, you say?<fix123><fix123><fix123>... ...<fix123>But more importantly, the treasure.  Yeah.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>やはりただの賊ね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I knew it, you're just a common thief!<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>The Big Wheel, Having Guarded and Been Guarded<fix123>Ichirin Kumoi & Unzan<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は姐さんの代わりに宝物の番をしている一輪<fix123><fix123><fix123>賊は生かしておけないよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm Ichirin, and I'm taking my sister's place guarding the treasure.<fix123><fix123><fix123>I won't let any thieves in alive!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あっはっは、賊だって？<fix123>私を誰だと思っている！<fix123>ただの賊じゃない<fix123>普通の魔法使いさまだ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah ha ha!  A thief?<fix123>Just who do you think I am!?<fix123>I'm no simple thief!<fix123>I'm a normal magician!<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>And?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まぁそのなんだ<fix123>そんな事だから気にしないでくれ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I, uh ...<fix123>So, please, don't worry about me, okay?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……え？<fix123>何だって、この黒いのが……？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>... ... What?<fix123>You mean, that girl in black has ... ?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何？　どうした？<fix123>突然独り言を始めて<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?  What's wrong?<fix123>Why are you talking to yourself?<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Unzan tells me<fix123>you're gathering the fragments of the floating treasure.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>秘宝の破片だと……？<fix123>妖精達を狂わせていた変な物体なら拾ったがな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Fragments of the secret treasure ... ?[2]<fix123>Well, I picked up some weird thing that was driving the fairies crazy ...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ネズミに捜させても埒が空かなかったのに……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see asking the mice to search wasn't any use ...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 時代親父とハイカラ少女<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Traditional Old Man and the Stylish Girl<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>集めてくれて有難う！<fix123>これでやっと姐さんが復活出来るわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Thank you for finding them!<fix123>Now I can finally revive my sister!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Ichirin Kumoi DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>素晴らしいわ<fix123>今の世にもこんな人間が居たなんて<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How splendid.<fix123>I can't believe there are humans like that in this world, too ...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>その辺の妖怪にゃ負けないよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I wouldn't lose to a youkai like you!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>飛宝を集めてるって事は、貴方も姐さんの<fix123>復活を望んでいるのでしょう？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If you're collecting the floating treasure, then<fix123>you're trying to revive my sister too, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんだ秘宝って<fix123>もしかして、妖精が落とす変な飛行物体か？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What's this secret treasure you're talking about?<fix123>You mean these flying things the fairies were dropping?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>良いんです良いんです<fix123>貴方も同胞の様ですから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Very well, very well.<fix123>You seem to be an ally, so ...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……なんだ？<fix123>この変な飛行物体。高価なのか……？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>... ... What?<fix123>Are these flying things actually worth something ... ?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>聖輦と不吉な船長<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Unfortunate Captain of the Holy Palanquin<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>??? LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>つかまされたぜ<fix123><fix123><fix123>何にも無いじゃないか、この船は<fix123><fix123><fix123>となると、この秘宝とかいう飛行物体でも<fix123>持ち帰って調べてみるか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I think I get it.<fix123><fix123><fix123>There's nothing on this ship.<fix123><fix123><fix123>So, I guess I'll just have to take this flying treasure<fix123>or whatever home and study it.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Minamitsu Murasa ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>BGM: キャプテン・ムラサ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Captain Murasa<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>誰か居るの？<fix123><fix123>人間……？<fix123>それとも貴方も人間を辞めた者？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Is someone there?<fix123><fix123>A human ... ... ?<fix123>Or have you also given up your humanity?<fix123><fix123>
