en_dialogue: <fix123>... ... A youkai?<fix123>What *is* this ship, anyway?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら貴方、良い物を持ってるわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, it looks like you've got something nice.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うん？<fix123>やっぱりこれが気になるのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm?<fix123>So, you're interested in this?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええ、それさえあればこの船は<fix123>目的地に向かう事が出来ます<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, as long as we have that,<fix123>we can turn this ship towards its destination.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>目的地だと？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Destination?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>水難事故の念縛霊<fix123>村紗 水蜜<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Ghost Left from the Shipwreck<fix123>Minamitsu Murasa<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>申し遅れました<fix123>私は村紗、この聖輦船の船長です<fix123><fix123><fix123>この船は、聖が封印された<fix123>法界に向かっています<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, where are my manners?<fix123>I'm Murasa, the captain of this holy palanquin.<fix123><fix123><fix123>This ship is bound for Hokkai,<fix123>the world where Hijiri is imprisoned.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>法界だと？<fix123>なんだそれは<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Did you say Hokkai?<fix123>The heck's that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>無限の広さを持つ魔界の、ほんの一角です<fix123>そこに聖が封印されているのです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A corner of the infinite area of Makai.<fix123>That's where Hijiri was sealed away.<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Makai ... ...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>恐れをなしましたか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are you afraid now?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いや、魔界には行きたかったんだ<fix123>魔法使いとして<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, I want to go to Makai.<fix123>As a magician.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>魔法使い？<fix123>もしかして人間じゃ無かったのかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Magician?<fix123>Hm, are you not human?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さあな<fix123>ま、連れて行って貰おうか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well ...<fix123>Well, anyway, mind taking me along?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふふ、残念ながら力無き者の乗船は<fix123>認めておりません<fix123><fix123><fix123>さ、その宝を置いて地上に戻りなさい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hehe, unfortunately we can't bring<fix123>powerless passengers with us.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Now, leave the treasure here and return back to earth!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Minamitsu Murasa DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>強いわ……<fix123>仕方が無い、乗船を認めるわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're strong ... ...<fix123>Oh well, I suppose we'll let you board.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もう乗船してたがな<fix123>それで魔界……法界に向かうって言ってたが<fix123>乗っていれば着くのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Uh, I'm already on board.<fix123>So, Makai ... ... You said we're going to Hokkai,<fix123>so if I ride along, I'll get there, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええ、貴方が宝を持ってきたので<fix123>もう向かっています<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, since you brought the treasure,<fix123>we've already under way.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いつもは瘴気が酷くて入れないが<fix123>魔界には色々面白い物が落ちているからな<fix123><fix123><fix123>この際だから瘴気は我慢して、珍しい物を<fix123>いっぱい拾ってコレクションしてやるぜ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The miasma usually makes it impossible to go there,<fix123>but lots of interesting things have fallen into Makai.<fix123><fix123><fix123>I guess this time I'll just bear it and<fix123>go collect lots of rare items!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ちなみに、この船は片道運行です<fix123><fix123><fix123>法界から戻ってくるつもりは無いですが……<fix123>よろしかったでしょうか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>By the way, this ship is a one-way liner.<fix123><fix123><fix123>We're not planning on leaving Makai ... ...<fix123>Is that okay?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いやちょっと待て<fix123>船を止めろ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wait, hang on!<fix123>Stop the boat!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>魔界の赤黒い封印<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Red and Black Seal of the Underworld<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>魔界（法界上空）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Makai (above Hokkai)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 魔界地方都市エソテリア<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Provincial Makai City Esoteria<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nazrin ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>おや？<fix123>君も魔界まで来たのかい？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmm?<fix123>So you came to Makai, too?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おや？　いつぞやのネズミじゃないか<fix123>やっぱり、魔界に宝の匂いでもするのか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmm?  It's that mouse from before.<fix123>I knew I could smell treasure in Makai.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>宝はもう見つけたよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've already found my treasure.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんだと？　狡いな、私は結界に拒まれて<fix123>魔界に降り立てないんだが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What?  No fair, the barrier was holding me back<fix123>so I couldn't get far into Makai.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いや、私の探していた宝は魔界の物ではない<fix123>法の光を放つこの宝塔さ<fix123><fix123><fix123>丁度良い<fix123>この宝、君に試してみよう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, I wasn't looking for something from Makai.<fix123>It's this jeweled pagoda, shining with the light of Buddha.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Perfect timing.<fix123>I'll test this treasure out on you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nazrin DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>うーん<fix123><fix123><fix123>おいおい。魔界に放り出されたのは良いとしても<fix123>地面に降り立てないじゃないか<fix123><fix123><fix123>何なんだ？<fix123>この不可解な封印は<fix123><fix123><fix123>これじゃあ、お宝も何も<fix123>拾えないぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmmm.<fix123>Hey, hey.  It's great that I've gotten through Makai,<fix123>but I can't get any farther down, can I?<fix123><fix123><fix123>What's that?<fix123>I don't understand this seal at all.<fix123><fix123><fix123>I'll never be able to get<fix123>any treasure or anything else at this rate.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Shou Toramaru ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>貴方が飛宝を集めてくれた人間ね<fix123><fix123><fix123>さあ、早速始めましょうか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're the human who gathered the flying treasure, yes?<fix123><fix123><fix123>Now, let us begin.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おお？　もしかして、ここの中に<fix123>入れる様になるのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmm?  Do you know<fix123>how I can get in here?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええ、そうです<fix123>その為に持ってきたのですよね？<fix123><fix123><fix123>その飛倉の破片<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, I do.<fix123>That's why you brought that, right?<fix123><fix123><fix123>Those fragments of the Flying Storehouse.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ん？<fix123>あ、ああ、まあな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Mm?<fix123>Oh, uh, yeah.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>毘沙門天の弟子<fix123>寅丸 星<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Disciple of Bishamonten<fix123>Shou Toramaru<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は毘沙門天の代理<fix123>聖の信仰を一身に受けていた者です<fix123><fix123><fix123>ナズーリンが持ってきたこの宝塔と<fix123>貴方の持ってきた飛倉の破片が揃えば<fix123><fix123><fix123>ここの封印を解く事が出来ます<fix123>聖への恩を返す事が出来るのです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I am the representative of Bishamonten,<fix123>a devotee of Hijiri's creed.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Now that we have the jeweled pagoda Nazrin brought,<fix123> as well as the fragments of the Flying Storehouse you possess,<fix123><fix123><fix123>We can break the seal here.<fix123>We can repay our debt of gratitude to Hijiri.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほうほう、で、この封印を解くと何が<fix123>出てくるんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oho, so, if you break this seal,<fix123>then something will come out, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あれ？　知らないで集めていたんですか？<fix123>飛宝<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm?  You gathered all the treasure<fix123>without even knowing that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ、いや、その<fix123>ちょっとど忘れしただけで<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, no, uh,<fix123>I guess I just kinda forgot.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふむ、その様子だと、最初から<fix123>知らなかったみたいですね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm, from the looks of it,<fix123>I'd say you never knew.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>てへ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Tee hee.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方がここに導かれてきたのも、聖が残した<fix123>飛宝の力かも知れない<fix123><fix123><fix123>しかし、聖の復活を拒む者かも知れないし<fix123>ただの賊かも知れぬ……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What led you here may be the power<fix123>of the treasure that Hijiri left.<fix123><fix123><fix123>However, you may be against her revival.<fix123>You may be just a thief ...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いやいや、私はただこの中に<fix123>入りたいだけで<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, no, I just<fix123>want to go down in there.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 虎柄の毘沙門天<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Tiger-Patterned Bishamonten<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ただの賊か……<fix123><fix123><fix123>ただ、賊であろうとも飛宝が<fix123>選んだ人間には間違い無い<fix123><fix123><fix123>もし貴方が道を誤っているのであれば――<fix123><fix123><fix123>この毘沙門天の宝塔の前に<fix123>ひれ伏す事になるでしょう！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Just a thief ... ...<fix123><fix123><fix123>Still, even if you are a thief,<fix123>there's no denying that you were chosen by the treasure.<fix123><fix123><fix123>However, if you've chosen to follow the wrong path ...<fix123><fix123><fix123>Then I'll have you bow down<fix123>before this pagoda of Bishamonten!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Shou Toramaru DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>貴方の道は間違ってはいなかった<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So your path is not a wrong one.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>負け惜しみか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're just sorry you lost.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さあ、封印を解く準備をしましょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now, let us prepare to lift the seal.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ、ああ<fix123>そうだな<fix123>その前に聞きたい事がある<fix123>ここの封印を解くとどうなるんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Y, yeah.<fix123>That's right.<fix123>But first, there's something I wanna ask you.<fix123>What happens when you lift this seal, anyway?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>その後は、聖の考える事です<fix123>私達の考えの及ぶ事ではありません<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's for Hijiri to worry about.<fix123>It's none of our concern.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何か、まずったかも知れないな<fix123>大事になったら私が事態を収拾させる<fix123>しかないか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm, maybe I messed something up here.<fix123>If things go south, I'll have no choice<fix123>but to take control of the situation.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>八苦を滅した尼公<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Nun Who Overcame the Eight Sufferings<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>法界<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hokkai<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 法界の火<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Fire of Hokkai<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>??? ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>??? LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>うえーい<fix123><fix123><fix123>何にもないぜー<fix123>この世界<fix123><fix123><fix123>ただ、流石魔界だな<fix123><fix123><fix123>ここに居るだけで魔法の力が湧いてくるというか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Bweeeeh.<fix123><fix123><fix123>There's nothing here<fix123>in this world.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Well, I guess it's Makai, that's for sure.<fix123><fix123><fix123>There's magic power pouring out of everywhere here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Byakuren Hijiri ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ああ、法の世界に光が満ちる<fix123><fix123>貴方がこの世界を解放してくれたの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>O, the world of dharma is filled with light.<fix123><fix123>Are you the one who liberated this world?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前か……<fix123>探したぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You ... ...<fix123>I've been looking for you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方は一体？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who on earth are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は魔法使いの魔理沙だ<fix123>ちょっと興味があってこんな処まで来ちゃったぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm Marisa the magician.<fix123>I was curious, so I came all the way down here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうですか、魔法使いですか……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see, you're a magician ...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前は何者だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>封印された大魔法使い<fix123>聖　白蓮<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Great Sealed Magician<fix123>Byakuren Hijiri<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私の名は白蓮<fix123><fix123><fix123>遠い昔の僧侶です<fix123><fix123><fix123>いや、魔法使いと言った方が通りがいいかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My name is Byakuren.<fix123><fix123><fix123>I was a monk a long, long time ago.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Well, perhaps it would be more accurate to say I was a magician?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何だと？　魔法使いだと？<fix123>お前も同業者なのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What?  You're a magician?<fix123>You're in the business?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええ、そういう事になるのかしらね<fix123><fix123><fix123>だから私を助けてくれたのね？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, I suppose you could say that.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Is that why you wanted to save me?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いや、そんなつもりじゃなかったんだがな……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, that wasn't what I had in mind, but ...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それにしても、もう魔法を使っても<fix123>大丈夫な世界になったのね？<fix123><fix123><fix123>私は人間であった頃に不思議な力を使った事で<fix123><fix123><fix123>人から忌み嫌われ、挙げ句の果てに<fix123>封印されてしまった<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But, that aside, has the world become a place<fix123>where it's okay to use magic?<fix123><fix123><fix123>In my time, because I could use strange powers ...<fix123><fix123><fix123>People hated me, and in the end<fix123>they sealed away me down here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何だと？<fix123>魔法を使ったが為に封印だと？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What?<fix123>You were sealed away because you used magic?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええ、それで私は妖怪の存在を認めて<fix123>平等を訴えたの<fix123><fix123><fix123>貴方は私の考えを支持してくれますか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, that's why I recognized youkai as equals<fix123>and called on others to do the same.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Will you support me in that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今の世界は……魔法を使っても<fix123>大丈夫だと思うが<fix123><fix123><fix123>妖怪と人間は平等ではない！<fix123><fix123><fix123>人間の方が弱いんだから<fix123>もっと優遇されるべきだ！<fix123><fix123><fix123>大体、妖怪が平等と言って平等であった<fix123>試しがないぜ<fix123><fix123><fix123>お前みたいな妖怪がな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>In today's world ... ...<fix123>I think it's okay to use magic.<fix123><fix123><fix123>But, youkai and humans are not equal!<fix123><fix123><fix123>Humans are weaker,<fix123>so they need more protection!<fix123><fix123><fix123>Saying youkai and humans are equal<fix123>doesn't make it true.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Especially coming from a youkai like you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 感情の摩天楼　~ Cosmic Mind<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Emotional Skyscraper ~ Cosmic Mind<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうですか、私は既に人間を辞めた者<fix123><fix123><fix123>人間じゃない私が平等を訴えても無駄と言う事ね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see; I've already given up my humanity.<fix123><fix123><fix123>I suppose it's pointless for a non-human like me to appeal for equality.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そういう事だ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's right.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私が寺にいた頃と人間は変わっていないな<fix123><fix123><fix123>誠に浅く、大欲非道であるッ！<fix123>いざ、南無三――！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Humans haven't changed since my days in the temple.<fix123><fix123><fix123>How superficial, greedy, and unjust you are!<fix123>Now, namusan ―― !<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Byakuren Hijiri DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
The geyser.<fix123>
The water around the geyser was too hot to bathe in.<fix123>
However, the souls that had appeared - no idea whether they were vengeful spirits<fix123>or phantoms due to their unclear forms - were starting to decrease in number.<fix123>
"Man, it's hot around here."<fix123>
"Well, it's being heated by that hell crow's power.<fix123>
Fusion energy, was it?<fix123>
It's got to be really hot."<fix123>
"What's nuclear fusion energy, anyway?"<fix123>
"I don't really know, but it's like the power of the Sun, right?"<fix123>
"I wonder if I could get her to turn the heat down.<fix123>
This is too dangerous to get near.<fix123>
Even for a youkai."<fix123>
"Why don't you go ask her?"<fix123>
"I wish it was like adjusting the knob on a water boiler...<fix123>
Oh, wait, I know!"<fix123>
"Well?<fix123>
All these phantoms..."<fix123>
"Remembering all those vengeful spirits<fix123>soaking in the geyser gave me an idea.<fix123>
If we stick some cold phantoms in it, won't it cool off?"<fix123>
"Even if it does...<fix123>Who'd want to get in a hot spring full of phantoms?<fix123>
Come to think of it, the vengeful spirits from before disappeared.<fix123>
My dolls aren't going out of control, either."<fix123>
"Hm. I guess it's over."<fix123>
"Aw, no way. The phantoms are getting away!"<fix123>
"Well, it's too hot, isn't it?<fix123>
Why don't we go get some eggs to slowly boil in the springs?"(This refers to onsen tamago, a low temperature boiled egg.)<fix123>
"Yeah! We can make money on hot springs eggs. Fusion energy's amazing."<fix123>
They understood the geyser was because of the hell crow's excess heat,<fix123>
but why did the spirits suddenly disappear?<fix123>
They didn't know why, but the hot spring stayed like Marisa wanted,<fix123>and Alice's dolls stopped going out of control, so they let it be.<fix123>
What's more, the underground youkai seemed content,<fix123>and didn't seem to be plotting anything.<fix123>
The geyser had probably caused the spirits to appear somehow,<fix123>Marisa and Alice concluded.<fix123>
But soon after, the hell crow said something unexpected.<fix123>
She had gotten her nuclear fusion power from a mountain god.<fix123>
Once they heard that, the two set out for the mountain shrine.<fix123>
They wanted to share some of that power, too.<fix123>
<c$Ending No.04 — Fusion eggs? They're still just boiled eggs.$><fix123>
<c$Congratulations, all clear! Just as I'd expected!$><fix123>
The magic library.<fix123>
A dark library in the basement of the Scarlet Devil Mansion.<fix123>
A great number of unique and unusual books were collected here.<fix123>
If you did serious research, you could obtain any knowledge, from<fix123>how to build a rocket to how to make a great meat and potato stew.(Refers to nikujaga.)<fix123>
"Evil spirits... Evil spirits... Evil spirits...<fix123>
In the end, they're phantoms who haven't crossed<fix123>the Sanzu River for some reason."<fix123>
"If a youkai takes away their body before the death gods<fix123>can ferry them, they become evil spirits.<fix123>
Hm, hm... eh?<fix123>
‘This most frequently happens when a youkai cat called a<fix123>kasha steals their body.’..."<fix123>
"...That cat..."<fix123>
"What about cats?"<fix123>
"I think that cat was the one who sent up those spirits...<fix123>What on earth is that?"<fix123>
"I caught it near the geyser.<fix123>
I can't tell whether it's an evil spirit or just a phantom though."<fix123>
"Stop bringing weird things into my library.<fix123>
It's easy to tell the two apart, anyhow."<fix123>
"Oh, really? Sorry, I guess I'm behind on my reading."<fix123>
"Phantoms are cold to the touch. Evil spirits are hot."<fix123>
"Let's see... Whoa, it's cold!<fix123>
Then, that means this is just a phantom."<fix123>
"Oh, don't leave it there!<fix123>Go take it back to where you found it.<fix123>
Don't you know abandoned pets are a problem nowadays?"<fix123>
"Yeah, that was a real problem underground."<fix123>
"The cats run wild controlling evil spirits,<fix123>and the crows use hellfire to go on a rampage...<fix123>
None of this would have happened if the Palace of the<fix123>Earth Spirits would take proper care of their pets."<fix123>
The geyser hadn't stopped, but the evil spirits had disappeared.<fix123>
They geyser had erupted to disperse excess heat from the Blazing Hell.<fix123>
Since the geyser itself wasn't a threat, Marisa and Patchouli<fix123>decided to leave it alone.<fix123>
Lately, it seems a lot of irresponsible pet owners were tiring of<fix123>the pets they'd adored so much, and let them go loose.<fix123>
Those pets could gain the power to lengthen their own lives and<fix123>eventually become youkai, and they might even turn against their<fix123><fix123>masters in the end.<fix123>
To all you pet owners, please remember this<fix123>whenever you see a youkai:<fix123>
That youkai might've been someone's pet, once upon a time.<fix123>
<c$Ending No.05 — The Palace's pets were probably youkai from the start.$><fix123>
<c$Congratulations, all clear! Just as I'd expected!$><fix123>
The geyser.<fix123>
Geysers form when water that's pooled underground is heated,<fix123>and the steam pressure forces it to burst out above ground.<fix123>
For the hot water to burst out at regular intervals, this<fix123>energy had to be truly something great.<fix123>
"What're you doing?"<fix123>
"The god of the mountain said that fusion energy will<fix123>change the kappa's future, but I don't really know<fix123><fix123>how we should use it."<fix123>
"But, I know this geyser was created<fix123>with fusion energy.<fix123>
So, I thought I'd try to draw energy<fix123>from the geyser."<fix123>
"Done!"<fix123>
"What's that?"<fix123>
"It's called a turbine. It's like a water wheel.<fix123>
If the energy of the geyser turns the turbine,<fix123>it'll make a lot of electricity for sure."<fix123>
"Isn't that kinda inefficient, though?<fix123>
Geysers spout out only so often...<fix123>
Why not just put a water wheel under the waterfall?"<fix123>
"Mm. The energy conversion rate does seem pretty low."<fix123>
"Aah, there's lots of things I'd try if I had<fix123>fusion energy..."<fix123>
"Well, why not just tame that crow, then?<fix123>Seems easy enough."<fix123>
"Oh? Will you do it for me, then?<fix123>I don't wanna go underground."<fix123>
"Oh well, I guess I'll go down one more time.<fix123>
But, if it goes well, you have to share<fix123>some of the energy with me."<fix123>
Marisa's second undercover underground excursion went off smoothly.<fix123>
What's more, the hell crow, Utsuho, listened to<fix123>what Marisa said patiently.<fix123>
To animals, weak people are just prey, but<fix123>they're submissive to stronger people.<fix123>
Utsuho said she could control nuclear fusion, but to use it in practical<fix123>applications she had to get certain atoms from the mountain god.<fix123>
In other words, she couldn't just keep making<fix123>reactions forever without the mountain god's permission.<fix123>
Marisa thought she had no choice but to visit<fix123>the mountain god and ask her for fusion energy.<fix123>
Still, the mountain god didn't have any reason to give it to her.<fix123>
<c$Ending No.06 — Fusion energy is the hope for the future.$><fix123>
<c$Congratulations, all clear! Just as I'd expected!$><fix123>
The geyser.<fix123>
If you looked close, you could see a swarm of phantom-like things.<fix123>
Were they vengeful spirits?<fix123>
"Hmm.<fix123>I don't really think those guys there are phantoms.<fix123>
Something's different, but I don't know what."<fix123>
In any case, she thought she'd try to learn the difference between<fix123>
vengeful ghosts and phantoms, but Alice made her put it off.<fix123>
First, she'd have to make them stop appearing.<fix123>
<c$Ending No.10 — Leave research for your free time.$><fix123>
<c$Try to clear without using continues!$><fix123>
The geyser.<fix123>
If you looked close, you could see a swarm of phantom-like things.<fix123>
Were they vengeful spirits?<fix123>
"These are vengeful spirits?<fix123>
They're just floating around in the hot spring...<fix123>
Doesn't look like they hold a grudge, or anything."<fix123>
According to Patchouli, if these spirits clung to something from<fix123>their life, they would come to bear a grudge against the world.<fix123>
Even if they looked like ordinary, carefree phantoms...<fix123>
<c$Ending No.11 — Maybe the phantoms will make the spring cold.$><fix123>

It takes energy to heat that much water.<fix123>
That must be the energy the kappa were talking about.<fix123>
"Hm, it sure is a lot of energy.<fix123>
Maybe enough to pile it as high as a mountain.<fix123>
I gotta get my hands on it...<fix123>
Will Nitori really share it with me, though?"<fix123>
Marisa had been forced to go underground by a youkai,<fix123>but next time she thought she'd sneak in of her own will.<fix123>
<c$Ending No.12 — The ultimate water heater.$><fix123>
<c$Try to clear without using continues!$><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>That ship ... ... flew away without a sound.<fix123>How suspicious.<fix123><fix123><fix123>And there were those fairies that were acting like they<fix123>were possessed by something ... that's bothering me.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, please don't take that the wrong way.<fix123>I was just looking for some treasure I detected around here.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: A Tiny, Tiny Clever Commander<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>宝船？<fix123>そんなもんは存在しないよ<fix123><fix123><fix123>そうじゃなくて、君に反応したんだ<fix123>私の小ネズミ達がね<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まあ、人類の宝だからね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I am a human treasure.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nazrin DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Humans aren't delicious enough<fix123>to be made fools of by mice.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Hm, but those mice were looking for treasure, too.<fix123><fix123><fix123>How suspicious ...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何か用？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Did you need something?<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Need?  Well, I don't know ...<fix123>It's just that humans flying through the sky are so unusual ...<fix123><fix123><fix123>Er, I don't mean that in a bad way.<fix123>I'm just kind of interested, that's all.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm?  It's just a normal umbrella monster.<fix123>What's the matter?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>愉快な忘れ傘<fix123>多々良小傘<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Cheery Forgotten Umbrella<fix123>Kogasa Tatara<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 万年置き傘にご注意を<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Beware the Umbrella Left There Forever<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>最近、暇なのよねぇ<fix123><fix123><fix123>傘が一人で動き始めても誰も驚かないし<fix123><fix123><fix123>まぁ貴方も驚いてくれてないみたいだけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I've been really bored lately ...<fix123><fix123><fix123>Nobody's ever surprised by an umbrella flying all by itself ...<fix123><fix123><fix123>Hm, it looks like you're not surprised, either.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんで化け傘相手に驚かなきゃいけないのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Why do I have to be surprised by something like that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ?あ、昔は良かったわねぇ<fix123>夜は私達、妖怪の天下だったのに<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, I remember the good old days.<fix123>We youkai used to be rulers of the night, but ...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今は昼……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's daytime right now ... ...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私がちょっと驚かしただけで<fix123>みんな腰を抜かしていたわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If anyone were even a little surprised by me,<fix123> they wouldn't be able to walk straight.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はいはい、懐古怪談話はいいから<fix123>ちょっとそこをどい……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, yes, that's enough of your old time stories.<fix123>Would you mind please mov-...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今は少し痛い目に遭わせないと<fix123>驚いてくれないのよねぇ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>These days you have to punish someone a little<fix123>to surprise them, don't you!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kogasa Tatara DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>うらめしや?<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Booo~?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はいはい、恨めしんでも結構よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, yes, that's enough bitterness from you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>しくしく<fix123>私達、妖怪って何なのかしら<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>sob sob*<fix123>Just what are we youkai, anyway?<fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Maybe you're luxury items?<fix123>Well, now the boat's right in front of me.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Treasury?<fix123>On this ship?<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, no point in arguing!<fix123>I'll show no mercy to any sort of scoundrel!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Ichirin Kumoi DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>いやはや、あの拳を見て逃げ出さない<fix123>人間がおったとは……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My word, to think that there were humans who won't<fix123>run away at the sight of this fist ... ...<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Is this really a treasure ship?<fix123>There's nothing here, but ...<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Just what are you after?<fix123>Treasure?  Or perhaps my sister's power?<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>What am I after?  I'm trying to figure out what this ship is after!<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm.<fix123>It's nothing to be worried about.<fix123><fix123><fix123>This looks like a ship to you, but it is a modernized, remodeled<fix123>version of a certain old, miraculous building.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>守り守られし大輪<fix123>雲居一輪＆雲山<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Big Wheel, Having Guarded and Been Guarded<fix123>Ichirin Kumoi & Unzan<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ここが宝物で満たされた時、姐さんが<fix123>悲願の大復活を遂げる事が出来るのです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Once this place is filled with treasure, I'll be able to<fix123>bring about the great revival of my sister as I've so dearly wished.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>大復活って<fix123>何か、残念な響きね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Great revival? [1]<fix123>I don't like the sound of that.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それまで、誰にも邪魔させない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I won't let anyone get in my way until that happens.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>This sister of yours ... ...<fix123>She's a youkai, right?<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>I wouldn't place her on the level of a youkai.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うーむ、復活前に倒した方が良さそうね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmm, maybe I'd better beat you before you can revive her.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……え？<fix123>何だって、この巫女が……？<fix123><fix123><fix123>雲山が、貴方が飛宝の破片を集めていると<fix123>言っているわ。本当？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>... what's that?<fix123>You mean, that shrine maiden has ... ?<fix123><fix123><fix123>Unzan tells me<fix123>you've been collecting the flying treasure.  Is this true?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何の話？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What are you talking about?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>雲山が嘘を吐く筈が無いわ<fix123>空を飛ぶ破片を集めているんでしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Unzan would have no reason to lie to me.<fix123>You've been collecting the fragments flying through the sky, haven't you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もしかして、邪魔になっているのなら<fix123>願ったり叶ったりで<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, if you're getting in my way,<fix123>maybe that wish will come true.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 時代親父とハイカラ少女<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Traditional Old Man and the Stylish Girl<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あはは、ネズミの代わりに集めて<fix123>貰って有難う！　全て頂くよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ahaha, well, thank you for finding them<fix123>for the mice!  I'll take them all!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Ichirin Kumoi DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>素晴らしいわ<fix123>今の世にもこんな人間が居たなんて<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How splendid.<fix123>I hadn't thought there were still humans like this in this world.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>妖怪に褒められても嬉しくとも<fix123>何ともないわよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There's nothing great about<fix123>being praised by a youkai.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まあ、姐さんの足下にも及ばないけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Still, you don't even compare to the soles of my sister's feet.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>その姐さんとやらを復活させるのは拙そうね<fix123><fix123><fix123>私の手に負えない奴だったら困る<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It doesn't sound like it would be a good idea to let you revive your sister.<fix123><fix123><fix123>I can't let youkai run around that I can't handle.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、中に入るって言うの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, are you saying you're going inside now?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>聖輦と不吉な船長<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Unfortunate Captain of the Holy Palanquin<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Inside the Palanquin Ship<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>But, there's nothing here ...<fix123>How does this ship stay in the sky?<fix123><fix123><fix123>Things I don't understand are generally no good.<fix123><fix123><fix123>This ship must be an ill omen, too!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Minamitsu Murasa ENTERS<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Captain Murasa<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>誰か居るの？<fix123><fix123>人間……？<fix123>それとも貴方も人間を辞めた者？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Is someone there?<fix123><fix123>A human ... ... ?<fix123>Or have you also given up your humanity?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>居たわ<fix123>不吉な妖怪が<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There you are.<fix123>A youkai of ill omen.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>I-ill omen?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この船の正体を教えなさい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Tell me what this ship really is!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あらあら声を荒げて……<fix123>乗船希望って事で良いのかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh my, not so loud ... ...<fix123>Are you sure you want to come onboard?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もう乗ってるけどね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm already onboard.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>The Ghost Left from the Shipwreck<fix123>Minamitsu Murasa<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は村紗、この聖輦船の船長です<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm Murasa, the captain of this holy palanquin.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Woah, the captain already?<fix123>How convenient!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この船では、この世界に未練がある方の乗船は<fix123>お断りさせて頂いていますが、貴方は？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We don't take any passengers who have any lingering<fix123>connection to this world; what about you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>へ？　あの世に行く船だっていうの？<fix123>そんな船、見飽きたわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?  You mean you're going to ... the world of the dead?<fix123>I'm sick of seeing ships like that.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あの世になんて行きませんよ<fix123><fix123><fix123>この船は聖が封印された世界<fix123>法界に向かいます<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, we're not going there.<fix123><fix123><fix123>This ship is bound for Hokkai,<fix123>the world where Hijiri is imprisoned.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほっかい？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hokkai?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>無限の広さを持つ魔界の、ほんの一角です<fix123>そこに聖が封印されているのです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A corner of the infinite area of Makai.<fix123>That's where Hijiri was sealed away.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>魔界なら知ってる<fix123>この船、そこに行くのね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, I know about Makai.<fix123>Is that where this ship is going?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>法界に入る為には聖が残した宝が<fix123>必要なのですが……<fix123><fix123><fix123>貴方はそれを持って現れた<fix123>さあ、ここでそれを渡して貰いますよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>In order to enter Hokkai,<fix123>we need the treasure Hijiri left behind ... ...<fix123><fix123><fix123>But, you happen to have appeared with it.<fix123>I'll have you hand it over now!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Minamitsu Murasa DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>何という強さ……<fix123>いつから人間はこんなに強くなったの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How strong ... ...<fix123>When did humans get this strong?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だから妖怪に褒められたって……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm, a compliment from a youkai ... ...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>聖も昔は人間だった事を思い出したわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It makes me remember how Hijiri was human once, long ago.<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Huh?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間は強くなるのね<fix123>今の地上は強い人間ばかりかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Humans get strong, don't they?<fix123>The earth must be full of strong humans now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うーん、どうかなぁ<fix123>って、船が止まらないんだけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I don't know ...<fix123>Wait, the ship isn't stopping.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>自動操縦ですから<fix123><fix123><fix123>貴方が宝を持って乗ってきたから<fix123>もう既に目的地へ向かっていますよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, it's in auto-mode.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Since you came onboard with the treasure,<fix123>we've been headed towards our final destination.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？<fix123>ちょっ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123> Just a-<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>魔界の赤黒い封印<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Red and Black Seal of the Underworld<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>魔界（法界上空）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Makai (above Hokkai)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 魔界地方都市エソテリア<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Provincial Makai City Esoteria<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nazrin ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>おや？<fix123>君も魔界まで来たのかい？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmm?<fix123>So you came to Makai, too?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あんたはさっき……<fix123>宝を探していたネズミね<fix123><fix123><fix123>何か、宝は私が持っているらしいよ？<fix123>それでこんな処まで連れてこられちゃった<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, aren't you that ...<fix123>That mouse that was looking for treasure?<fix123><fix123><fix123>I guess I've got some treasure.<fix123>That's why I got brought all the way here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どうやらそのようだね<fix123>だから、ダウジングが君に反応したんだ<fix123><fix123><fix123>でも、私が探していた宝はそれだけじゃ<fix123>無かったんだよ<fix123><fix123><fix123>この毘沙門天の宝塔の力<fix123>ご主人様にお渡しする前に君に試してみるか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Seems to be.<fix123>That's why my dowsing responded to you.<fix123><fix123><fix123>But, that's not the only treasure<fix123>I've been looking for.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Maybe I'll test the power of this Bishamonten pagoda on you<fix123>before I hand it over to my master.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nazrin DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>魔界に放り出されたのは良いけど<fix123>中に入れないじゃない<fix123><fix123><fix123>法界ってこの結界の下なんだろうけど……<fix123><fix123><fix123>見た事もない封印が施されているわ<fix123><fix123><fix123>一体、何が封印されているのかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm glad I got out of Makai,<fix123>but I can't go any farther.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Hokkai must be under this barrier, but ...<fix123><fix123><fix123>It's sealed with a seal I've never seen before.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Just what's sealed away in here, anyway?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Shou Toramaru ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>貴方が飛宝を集めてくれた人間ね<fix123><fix123><fix123>思ったより欲深そうな人間なのね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're the human who found the treasure, aren't you?<fix123><fix123><fix123>You look greedier than I'd imagined.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>失礼ね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How rude.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いや失礼した<fix123><fix123>ここに辿り着くなんて、もっと修行を<fix123>積んだ人間かと思ったので<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm sorry, you're quite right.<fix123><fix123><fix123>I simply thought that if you'd made it this far,<fix123>maybe you were some sort of ascetic scholar.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>積んでるつもりだけどね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I do mean to learn a lot while I'm here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>毘沙門天の弟子<fix123>寅丸 星<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Disciple of Bishamonten<fix123>Shou Toramaru<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は毘沙門天の代理<fix123>聖の信仰を一身に受けていた者です<fix123><fix123><fix123>ナズーリンが持ってきたこの宝塔と<fix123>貴方の持ってきた飛倉の破片が揃えば<fix123><fix123><fix123>ここの封印を解く事が出来ます<fix123>聖への恩を返す事が出来るのです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I am the representative of Bishamonten,<fix123>a devotee of Hijiri's creed.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Now that we have the jeweled pagoda Nazrin brought,<fix123> as well as the fragments of the Flying Storehouse you possess,<fix123><fix123><fix123>We can break the seal here.<fix123>We can repay our debt of gratitude to Hijiri.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この封印の下には何が眠っているの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What's sleeping beneath this seal?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あれ？　知らないで集めていたんですか？<fix123>飛宝<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm?  You gathered all the treasure<fix123>without even knowing that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もちろん知らない！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Of course I don't know!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間も私達妖怪も分け隔て無く力を<fix123>与えてくれた、人間の聖者です<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's a human saint who helped<fix123>both youkai and humans without distinction.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>聖者？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Saint?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうです。素晴らしい方だった<fix123>なのに、何故か人間に封印されてしまった<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes.  She was a wonderful person.<fix123>Yet, for some reason humans sealed her away.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>聖者とか何とかいって<fix123>やっぱり悪い奴だったんじゃないの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm, it's some kind of saint ... ?<fix123>It's not some bad guy?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間が愚かだったのです<fix123><fix123><fix123>愚かな人間は、自分の利益にならない者を<fix123>否定するものですから<fix123><fix123><fix123>魔界の力を使って妖怪を助けたからって<fix123><fix123><fix123>ただそれだけで封印されたのですよ<fix123>理不尽でしょう？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The humans were so foolish.<fix123>The foolish humans wanted to deny the existence<fix123>of anything that wouldn't benefit them, so ...<fix123><fix123><fix123>Since she wanted to use Makai's power to help youkai,<fix123><fix123><fix123>She was sealed away - for something as simple as that.<fix123>Isn't that unreasonable?<fix123><fix123><fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほら、悪いことしてるじゃん<fix123>妖怪の味方するなんて<fix123><fix123><fix123>私はあんたも退治するつもりよ？<fix123>妖怪だからね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Look, she was doing bad things, right?<fix123>If she's a friend of youkai ...<fix123><fix123><fix123>I'm going to have to beat you too, okay?<fix123>You're a youkai, after all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 虎柄の毘沙門天<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Tiger-Patterned Bishamonten<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それが貴方の正義なら、それも良いでしょう<fix123><fix123><fix123>ただ、もし貴方が道を誤っているのであれば<fix123><fix123>魔界に有りてなお輝き続けるこの法の光――<fix123><fix123><fix123>この毘沙門天の宝塔の前に<fix123>ひれ伏す事になるでしょう！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Very well, if that's your idea of justice.<fix123><fix123><fix123>However, if you've chosen to follow the wrong path ...<fix123><fix123>Then you'll have to bear witness to the light of dharma which is even brighter here in Makai --<fix123><fix123><fix123>And bow down<fix123>before this pagoda of Bishamonten!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Shou Toramaru DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>素晴らしい<fix123>その飛宝を集められるだけの事はあるわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How splendid.<fix123>I can see how you could have gathered the treasure.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今日は妖怪に褒められてばっかね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Youkai have been complimenting me all day.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方は飛倉の破片を集めて、聖を<fix123>復活させる手伝いをしているのですから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's because you've gathered the fragments of the Flying Storehouse<fix123>and helped us revive Hijiri.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>手伝いをしている気は無いんだけどね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Not that I had any intention of doing so.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さあ、封印を解く準備を始めましょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, let's begin the preparations to lift the seal.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>こ、ここまで来たらその聖者とやらも一度<fix123>見てみないと戻れないわね<fix123><fix123><fix123>気になって眠れなくなりそうだし<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I- I guess I can't go back after coming all this way<fix123>without seeing this Hijiri or whatever.<fix123><fix123><fix123>I wouldn't be able to sleep without knowing.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>素晴らしい<fix123>良い心がけです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Splendid!<fix123>You have a wonderful heart.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>八苦を滅した尼公<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Nun Who Overcame the Eight Sufferings<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>法界<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hokkai<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 法界の火<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Fire of Hokkai<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>??? ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>??? LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>全く人の気配がしないんですけどー<fix123><fix123><fix123>それにしても何なのかしら？<fix123>この世界は<fix123><fix123><fix123>さっきまでの魔界の禍々しさが殆ど<fix123>無くなって……<fix123><fix123><fix123>逆に気持ち悪いわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I can't sense anyone at all, but ...<fix123><fix123><fix123>Anyway,<fix123>what's *with* this world?<fix123><fix123><fix123>All that ominous atmosphere from before<fix123> is completely gone ... ...<fix123><fix123><fix123>It's just creepy in the opposite way.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Byakuren Hijiri ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ああ、法の世界に光が満ちる<fix123><fix123>貴方がこの世界を解放してくれたの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>O, the world of dharma is filled with light.<fix123><fix123>Are you the one who liberated this world?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>出てきたわ<fix123>あんたが妖怪達が復活させようとしていた……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There she is.<fix123>You're the person the youkai were trying to ... ...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら、貴方が封印を解いてくれたんじゃないの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, didn't you break the seal?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いやまぁ、結果的にそういう事に<fix123>なっちゃったけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, uh,<fix123>I guess that's the way it turned out, but ...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>有難うございます<fix123><fix123><fix123>また再び光を浴びる事が出来るなんて<fix123>夢にも思わなかったわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Thank you very much.<fix123><fix123><fix123>I never dreamed I'd be able<fix123>to bathe in the light again like this.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>で、あんたは何者なのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So, who are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>封印された大魔法使い<fix123>聖　白蓮<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Great Sealed Magician<fix123>Byakuren Hijiri<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私の名は白蓮<fix123><fix123><fix123>遠い昔の僧侶です<fix123><fix123><fix123>貴方は見たところ巫女の様ね？<fix123><fix123><fix123>私が間違っていなかったという事を<fix123>認めてくれたのかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My name is Byakuren.<fix123><fix123><fix123>I was a monk a long, long time ago.<fix123><fix123><fix123>You seem to be a shrine maiden, am I right?<fix123><fix123><fix123>Did you come down here<fix123>to admit that I wasn't wrong?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふん<fix123>私は妖怪に味方する者を退治してまわる巫女よ！<fix123><fix123><fix123>妖怪達が崇めていた貴方を危険な者と<fix123>判断したわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm.<fix123>I'm a shrine maiden who punishes those who aid youkai!<fix123><fix123><fix123>And I think you're a dangerous person<fix123>who all the youkai respect.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうですか、では私を再度封印すると？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see, then you'll seal me away again?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええ、その通りよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, exactly!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方は……本当は私と同じ考えを持っている<fix123>のでは無いですか？<fix123><fix123><fix123>妖怪も人間も同じ、法の下で全て<fix123>平等に生きるべきだと<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You ... really don't think the same way<fix123>that I do, do you?<fix123><fix123><fix123>That humans and youkai can live together as equals<fix123>in the light of the Buddha ...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そ、そんな訳ないわよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Th-there's no way!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>では何で封印を解いてくれたのでしょう？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Then why did you lift the seal?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それは……妖怪が封印を解く方が怖いからよ！<fix123>私が封印を解いた方がいくらかマシで……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well ... because it would've been scarier if the youkai did it!<fix123>It would be better for me to lift it myself ...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私はこれから、私を解放へ導いてくれた妖怪達の<fix123>恩に報いに行かなければなりません<fix123><fix123><fix123>貴方の妖怪を全て排除する考え<fix123>私にはそれを否定する事は出来ません<fix123><fix123><fix123>ですが、再び私を封印すると言うのなら――<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>From now on, I'll have to make sure I can<fix123>show my gratitude to those who freed me.<fix123><fix123><fix123>I can't change your desire<fix123>to eliminate all youkai.<fix123><fix123><fix123>However, if you're going to seal me away again ――<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 感情の摩天楼　~ Cosmic Mind<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Emotional Skyscraper ~ Cosmic Mind<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は精一杯抵抗します<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I will resist you with all my strength.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふん、最初からそう言っていればいいのよ<fix123><fix123><fix123>私は妖怪に味方する奴は全員倒すつもり<fix123>なんだから！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmph, you should have said that from the start.<fix123><fix123><fix123>After all,<fix123>I'll beat anyone who's a friend to youkai!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私が寺にいた頃と人間は変わっていないな<fix123><fix123><fix123>誠に薄く、軽挙妄動であるッ！<fix123>いざ、南無三――！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Humans haven't changed since my days in the temple.<fix123><fix123><fix123>How weak and rash you are!<fix123>Now, namusan ―― !<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Byakuren Hijiri DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
The Hakurei Shrine.<fix123>
A shrine at the eastern edge of Gensokyo.<fix123>
The shrine grounds were completely covered in snow.<fix123>
It had probably piled up while its maiden was underground.<fix123>
"Shoveling snow, shoveling more and more snow...<fix123>
I've to open up a walkway.<fix123>
The new year's soon, so we might even get some visitors."<fix123>
We should get some visitors for New Year's.<fix123>
Even with all this snow..."<fix123>
"Hmmm.<fix123>
That crow underground swallowed the powers of a yatagarasu.<fix123>
We could probably get lots of believers with that kind of power...<fix123>
And, I think the god here would like some sort<fix123>of easily understandable power."<fix123>
"Hello~"<fix123>
"What? You're creeping me out."<fix123>
"I caught a cat."<fix123>
"Meat-eating monsters don't taste good."<fix123>
"Oh, don't you remember this cat?"<fix123>
"Hm?<fix123>
Oh? Is that..."<fix123>
"Yes, it's the cat you fought in the Remains of Blazing Hell."<fix123>
"But why? Wait, Yukari, did you go underground?"<fix123>
"I found her around the geyser~.<fix123>Do you know what that means?"<fix123>
"No idea."<fix123>
"Oh, you're so dense.<fix123>The geyser erupted because that crow went mad.<fix123>
But, whose fault does that make the evil spirits?"<fix123>
"Was it that cat's?"<fix123>
"That's right. It's definitely the cat."<fix123>
"Huh. You're always saying things out of the blue.<fix123>
I don't really get it, but I just have to beat her, right?"<fix123>
"That's right.<fix123>
By the way, Reimu..."<fix123>
"How are you going to beat her?"<fix123>
"Hmm, she wouldn't be very tasty..."<fix123>
"See, that's why you don't get any visitors.<fix123>
Why not try keeping her around the shrine to draw in people?"<fix123>
"If people gather here together, does that count as worshipping a god?"<fix123>
The cat Yukari caught by the geyser — Orin — stayed at<fix123>the shrine, where Reimu could also keep an eye on her.<fix123>
Of course, she was still Satori's pet, so it really just<fix123>meant she got fed when she came to the shrine.<fix123>
Orin had sent the spirits up with the geyser as a warning to the<fix123>above ground youkai about her friend, the hell crow.<fix123>
Reimu and Yukari understood she meant no harm, so they didn't punish her.<fix123>

However, shortly after Orin started coming above ground, there were<fix123>several incidents where people's dead bodies disappeared, so needless to say<fix123><fix123>rumors spread in the village about the kasha near the shrine.<fix123>
<c$Ending No.01 — The Hell Cat.$><fix123>
<c$Congratulations, all clear! Just as I'd expected!$><fix123>
The Hakurei Shrine.<fix123>
A shrine on the eastern edge of Gensokyo.<fix123>
The shrine grounds were completely covered in snow.<fix123>
It had probably piled up while its maiden was underground.<fix123>
"No, some god from above ground came to visit me<fix123>before it all happened."<fix123>
"And that god gave you power?<fix123>
What kind of god would do that?"<fix123>
"I don't know what she was after, either.<fix123>
But, nuclear fusion has lots of legitimate uses."<fix123>
"Why don't you tell me more about this god?"<fix123>
"I think she said she came from a mountain up here...<fix123>
And maybe she was trying to expand mountain and get more followers there."<fix123>
"The god came down the mountain?<fix123>
Hm, that narrows it down to about two people..."<fix123>
"Hey, what do you think, Suika?"<fix123>
"Huh?"<fix123>
If you're that worried about it, go look around the mountain."<fix123>
"Hmph."<fix123>
"We figured out the geyser and the spirits, so that's enough for me."<fix123>
"Oh, that's right, what about the spirits?"<fix123>
"That's right, you said evil spirits were coming out of the geyser?<fix123>That's kind of hard to believe, though..."<fix123>
"Huh, you don't get it?<fix123>
The mastermind behind the spirits...<fix123>
It's gotta be that cat, right?"<fix123>
"Cat? You mean Orin?"<fix123>
"Oh yeah, that's her name, huh?"<fix123>
"Why would Orin..."<fix123>
"Well, she's a youkai, right?"<fix123>
"Orin isn't that kind of scheming, two-faced cat. She's cheerful."<fix123>
"Wellll... She wanted to tell us about something.<fix123>
Like, maybe, if her friend the hell crow was up to something.<fix123>
She couldn't know if someone underground was scheming something,<fix123>So why not go for help above ground?<fix123>
Geez, you're so pathetic. What an idiot."<fix123>
Since the geyser was due to Utsuho's excess power,<fix123>it didn't stop.<fix123>
However, the evil spirits had completely vanished<fix123>since Reimu had gone underground.<fix123>
She didn't know if Suika's theory was correct, but Reimu was just<fix123>satisfied the geyser hadn't stopped, so she didn't look into it too much.<fix123>
However, there was something she wasn't sure about.<fix123>
Who was the god that had given Utsuho fusion power?<fix123>
Why had they done it?<fix123>
Reimu decided to go visit the mountain once she'd rested up a little.<fix123>
<c$Ending No.02 — I want to get in the hot spring.$><fix123>
<c$Congratulations, all clear! Just as I'd expected!$><fix123>
The Hakurei Shrine.<fix123>
A shrine on the eastern edge of Gensokyo.<fix123>
The shrine grounds were completely covered in snow.<fix123>
It had probably piled up while its maiden was underground.<fix123>
"It's done!<fix123>I wrote an article about our adventures."<fix123>
"Don't wanna read it."<fix123>
"Here you go."<fix123>
"Hm, let's see...?<fix123>
Aah? ‘The Hakurei Shrine Maiden, Tired Out Playing With Youkai Cats?’<fix123>
‘A Mysterious Three-legged Crow Appears’...???<fix123>
This is terrible. This stupid third-rate youkai newspaper."<fix123>
"Well, even so."<fix123>
"Hey, anyways.<fix123>
You said you thought the gods of the mountain were up to something,<fix123>weren't you going to go undercover and report on that?<fix123>
What happened to that article?"<fix123>
"Ah, yes.<fix123>
I couldn't get much on it, so I had to cut it."<fix123>
"Huuh?"<fix123>
Then, what was the point of me going underground?"<fix123>
"Well?<fix123>
What was she like, the god that gave you fusion power?"<fix123>
"I don't really remember anymore..."<fix123>
"You stupid birdbrain. Did she say what she was after?<fix123>
Why do I always have to do this kind of thing?<fix123>Why am I the one that has to go underground?"<fix123>
"Come on, you have to investigate before writing an article."<fix123>
"What? I'm just stuck with doing it<fix123>because you won't."<fix123>
"Oh, I heard that they were after this power<fix123>for peaceful purposes."<fix123>
" ‘Peaceful purposes?’ "<fix123>
"Fusion power is convenient for boiling water,<fix123>and it doesn't create much waste, so it's clean energy."<fix123>
"Peaceful purposes... Oh, I know what this is about."<fix123>
"What's that?"<fix123>
"It's about hot springs. Hot springs!"<fix123>
"And adjusting the hot springs is simple.<fix123>
Well, if you're not careful, it'll all<fix123>turn into steam and cause an eruption."<fix123>
"If it gets to that point, then it's less a hot spring and more of a volcano."<fix123>
"Alright, that's it!<fix123>
The god of the mountain wanted a hot spring, so she gave you this power."<fix123>
"I see. Should I write an article about that?"<fix123>
"I wonder who'd read a newspaper<fix123>
if it only had that kind of story in it..."<fix123>
And so, the story ended up as an article titled,<fix123>"Exclusive! The geyser and the hot-spring-loving mountain god."<fix123>
There're really only two mountain gods around.<fix123>
The snake (Kanako Yasaka) and the frog (Suwako Moriya).<fix123>
What could these two gods be planning?<fix123>
Reimu thought she'd go up the mountain again once things cooled down a bit.<fix123>
<c$Ending No.03 — Nuclear hot spring.$><fix123>
<c$Congratulations, all clear! Just as I'd expected!$><fix123>
The snowy Hakurei Shrine.<fix123>
Reimu had to run back here from the heat of Hell.<fix123>
She couldn't stop the geyser, either.<fix123>
"Oh, man.<fix123>I can't believe Hell was really that hot.<fix123>
I'll have to be better prepared next time."<fix123>
Reimu froze her ying-yang orbs and purification rods to<fix123>counter the heat and set out again.<fix123>
<c$Ending No.07 — Better cool your head, first.$><fix123>
<c$Try to clear without using continues!$><fix123>
The snowy Hakurei Shrine.<fix123>
Reimu had to run back here from the heat of Hell.<fix123>
She couldn't stop the geyser, either.<fix123>
"Oh, man.<fix123>That high-temperature danmaku was too much!<fix123>
I'll have to sink her in the spring to beat her!"<fix123>
Reimu didn't want to go back underground,<fix123>
but needless to say, Suika wouldn't let her slack off.<fix123>
<c$Ending No.08 — Once again at it after sweating out in the hot springs...$><fix123>
<c$Try to clear without using continues!$><fix123>
The snowy Hakurei Shrine.<fix123>
Reimu had to run back here from the heat of Hell.<fix123>
She couldn't stop the geyser, either.<fix123>
"Oh, man.<fix123>Hell crows are still crows, right?<fix123>
Looks like crow tengu are their friends, too."<fix123>
Reimu threw a ying-yang orb at a crow.<fix123>
Of course, it was a poor substitute for beating the hell crow.<fix123>
<c$Ending No.09 — Can't run away from unpleasant things.$><fix123>
<c$Try to clear without using continues!$><fix123>

<fix123>Nazrin LEAVES<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>That flying thing is so fast!<fix123><fix123>I'm not going to catch up to it if I'm half-hearted about it!<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>狭い狭い幻想郷<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Gensokyo is so cramped and small.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>The Little Dowser General<fix123>Nazrin<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そんなに急いでどこに行く？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Where are you going in such a hurry? [1]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>邪魔よ！<fix123>さっきも居たわね、灰色の妖怪<fix123><fix123>あんたみたいなすぐ死ぬ小動物に構っている<fix123>時間なんてないわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Out of my way!<fix123>Hm, you were here before, too, little grey youkai.<fix123><fix123>I don't have the time to deal with small animals<fix123>that die easily like you!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM:  小さな小さな賢い将<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: A Tiny, Tiny Clever Commander<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう？　残念ね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Really?  Too bad.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>こうしている間にも宝船が<fix123>遠く離れて行ってしまう……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Even as we speak, that treasure ship<fix123>is getting away, far away...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>宝船？<fix123>空に浮かぶアレの事か？<fix123><fix123>ふふふ、ばっかみたいだね、君は<fix123>あれが宝船だと思っているのかい？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Treasure ship?<fix123>You mean that thing floating in the sky?<fix123><fix123>Ohoho, are you stupid?<fix123>Did you really think that's a treasure ship?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>馬鹿でもいいからそこをどいて！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Fine, whatever, I'm stupid, now get out of my way!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>宝を目指すのなら空を見ていてはいけない<fix123>宝は台所の隙間に詰まっているんだ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If you're looking for treasure, don't look in the sky.<fix123>There's lots packed away in kitchen nooks and crannies.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nazrin DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ああ、雲居に消えてしまったわ<fix123><fix123>雲を突き抜けるしかないのね<fix123><fix123>雲の中は妖怪だらけで気が進まないけど……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Aw, she disappeared into the clouds.<fix123><fix123>I guess I'll have to go further into the clouds.<fix123><fix123>But I bet there's tons of youkai up there, ugh ...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>雲に潜む一つ眼の化生<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The One-eyed Monster Lurking in the Clouds<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>The Spring Clouds<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Sealed Cloud Route<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kogasa Tatara ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Kogasa Tatara LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Kogasa Tatara ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ちょっと待ってよ〜<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hang on just a minute ...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何よ<fix123>ただの妖怪の癖に<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What?<fix123>You're just a plain old youkai.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そんなに邪険に扱わなくても良いじゃない<fix123>最近、暇なのよ〜<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You don't have to be so mean!<fix123>I've had lots of free time lately~<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は目の前の船を追っているの<fix123><fix123>あんたみたいな雑魚に構っている<fix123>時間なんてない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm chasing that ship right in front of us.<fix123><fix123>I don't have time to waste on small fry like you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>愉快な忘れ傘<fix123>多々良小傘<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Cheery Forgotten Umbrella<fix123>Kogasa Tatara<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 万年置き傘にご注意を<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Beware the Umbrella Left There Forever<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>船を追っているんなら<fix123>私と遊びながらでも追えるじゃない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, you can play with me<fix123>while you're chasing that ship, can't you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふん。妖怪が暇なのは良い事だわ<fix123>どうせ退治されるだけの存在なのに<fix123><fix123>でも、数が多すぎて全部退治できないから<fix123>あんたはまた今度ね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmph.  It must be nice to be a youkai with spare time.<fix123>Even if you only exist to be exterminated.<fix123><fix123>Still, there are too many to take care of them all,<fix123>so I'll leave you for next time.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>これだから人間は面白みが無いねぇ<fix123><fix123>何で無理にでも余裕を作らないのかしら？<fix123>余裕を持って行動できないのかしら？<fix123><fix123>宝船なんてまたいつか見つかるよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This is why humans aren't any fun.<fix123><fix123>Why can't you just make time for me?<fix123>Shouldn't you plan extra time into your schedule?<fix123><fix123>You can go find that treasure ship any time.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今の私にとって余裕なんて無駄よ<fix123>少しの時間も余らせたくないの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Extra time is pointless for me right now.<fix123>I don't want to waste a single second.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>無駄こそが美しさ<fix123>予定通りの人生は悪夢のような物よ<fix123><fix123>道具だって機能だけじゃ美しくないもの<fix123>無駄な部分こそが妖怪たる……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But the pointlessness is what's really beautiful.<fix123>It would be terrible if everything in life were all planned out.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Even tools aren't beautiful just because they're functional.<fix123>The useless parts are what make us youkai ...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>付喪神 (ばけどうぐ) に説教されたくないわよ！<fix123>あんたを倒しながら追えば良いんでしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Why am I getting lectured by a cursed umbrella!?<fix123>Fine, I'll beat you while I chase it, okay?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kogasa Tatara DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>傘妖怪なんてさっさと墜落すればいいのに<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Just fall out of the sky, you stupid umbrella youkai.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、人間はなんて無情なの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, humans are so cruel.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あんたが倒されたがってたんじゃないの<fix123>そういうのってなんて言ったっけ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, you looked like you wanted me to beat you.<fix123>Hmm, what do they call that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さあ、さでずむ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I dunno, sadism?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>反対な気がするけど何でもいいや<fix123>船が見えて来たから、案内ご苦労さん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I think that's opposite, but whatever.<fix123>I can see the ship now, so thanks for taking me to it.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>The High-speed Ruins and the Giant<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>The High-speed Floating Ship<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: スカイルーイン<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Sky Ruin<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>妖精やら人間やら有象無象が<fix123>寄ってたかって……宝物庫狙いなの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Humans, fairies, and all, everyone seems to be <fix123>after this ship ... are they after the treasure room?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>宝物庫？<fix123>って事はやっぱりこの船は……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Treasure room?<fix123> ... so, this ship really is a ...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>問答無用！<fix123>賊の類に掛ける情けは無し<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, no point in arguing!<fix123>I'll show no mercy to any enemy!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Ichirin Kumoi DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>いやはや、あの拳を見て逃げ出さない<fix123>人間がおったとは……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh!  To think that there are still humans that<fix123>wouldn't run away after seeing this fist ...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>やっぱりこの船、宝船？<fix123>見た感じ何にも積まれてないけど……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This ship really is a treasure ship, right?<fix123>It doesn't look like there's anything in it, but ...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Ichirin Kumoi LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あ、逃げた<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, she ran away.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Ichirin Kumoi ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>何が目的なのかしら<fix123>宝物？　それとも姐さんの力が目的？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Just what are you after?<fix123>Treasure?  Or perhaps my sister's power? [2]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>宝が目当てよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Treasure, of course!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふん<fix123>やはりただの賊ね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmmm.<fix123>So you're just a common ruffian.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>でも、この船は余りにも殺風景だわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This ship looks pretty bleak, though.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>守り守られし大輪<fix123>雲居一輪＆雲山<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Big Wheel, Having Guarded and Been Guarded<fix123>Ichirin Kumoi & Unzan<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>残念なお知らせだけど宝はもう無いの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I regret to have to tell you there's no treasure left.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんだって？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What was that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>空を飛ぶ力を持った宝物の数々<fix123>人間を改心させる宝物……<fix123><fix123>姐さんが眠っている間に殆ど失われて<fix123>世界に散り散りとなってしまった<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The treasure with the power to fly<fix123>also brings about change in humans ...<fix123><fix123>Most of it has been lost whilst my sister slept.<fix123>It's fallen down into the world.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>えー<fix123>金銀財宝は？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huuh?<fix123>But what about all the riches?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>金銀財宝？<fix123>そんな物が欲しいの？<fix123><fix123>最初から無いよ<fix123>お金に換えられる程度の価値の物なんて<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Riches?<fix123>Is that what you're after?<fix123><fix123>There never were any.<fix123>None with any real monetary worth, anyway.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>がっくし<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This really sucks.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……え？<fix123>何だって、この巫女が……？<fix123><fix123>雲山が、貴方が飛宝の破片を集めていると<fix123>言っているわ。本当？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>... hm?<fix123>You mean, this shrine maiden has ... ?<fix123><fix123>Unzan tells me you're after the fragments<fix123>of the flying treasure.  Is this true?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>集めてません<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, I'm not.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>雲山が嘘を吐く筈が無いわ<fix123>やったわね<fix123><fix123>良いのよ隠さなくても<fix123>空を飛ぶ破片を集めているそうじゃない<fix123><fix123>貴方も、姐さんの復活を望んでいるのね！<fix123>素晴らしいわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Unzan would have no reason to lie.<fix123>Excellent!<fix123><fix123>You don't have to hide it.<fix123>You're collecting those fragments flying through the sky, right?<fix123><fix123>You must be trying to revive my sister as well!<fix123>How splendid.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何の話か判らないわ！<fix123>私はただ、宝船に金銀財宝があると思って！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What the heck are you talking about?<fix123>I just thought there were riches on this treasure ship!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 時代親父とハイカラ少女<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Traditional Old Man and the Stylish Girl<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いいのいいの<fix123>さ、集めた宝を渡してね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's okay.<fix123>Now, hand over the treasure you've found!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Ichirin Kumoi DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>何というお強さ。さぞ名のある御方に違いない<fix123>と雲山が言っています<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're quite strong.  Unzan says you must be<fix123>a very famous person.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そ、そう？<fix123>まぁそれ程でも<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>R-really?<fix123>Well, that may be.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方が集めた浮遊の欠片は<fix123>姐さんが復活するのに必要な物<fix123><fix123>さあ、それを持って中へお進みください<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The floating fragments you've collected are necessary<fix123>for my sister's revival.<fix123><fix123>Now, please bring them inside.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>宝は無いんでしょ？<fix123>何かテンション下がったわ<fix123><fix123>まぁ、この船が何なのか確認ぐらいは<fix123>しないとね<fix123><fix123>報酬は無さそうだけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There's no treasure, right?<fix123>What a letdown.<fix123><fix123>Well, I guess I have to go see<fix123>what this ship really is.<fix123><fix123>It doesn't look like I'll get anything for it, though.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>聖輦と不吉な船長<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Unfortunate Captain of the Holy Palanquin<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Inside the Palanquin Ship<fix123><fix123>
