en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Interdimensional Voyage of a Ghostly Passenger Ship<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>??? ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>??? LEAVES<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>うん<fix123>よし、船の中は何もない<fix123><fix123><fix123>調査終了で良いわよね<fix123>つまらないし<fix123><fix123><fix123>大体、ただ船が飛んでいるだけでまだ何も<fix123>起きていないわけだし<fix123><fix123><fix123>宝船じゃなければ何の価値もないし<fix123>ただの箱だしー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yeah.<fix123>Okay, there's nothing inside the ship.<fix123><fix123><fix123>It'll be good to be done with this investigation.<fix123>It's so boring.<fix123><fix123><fix123>I mean, all that's happening is<fix123>the ship's just flying around.<fix123><fix123><fix123>If it's not a treasure ship, there's no point to it.<fix123>It's just a box.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Minamitsu Murasa ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>BGM: キャプテン・ムラサ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Captain Murasa<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>誰か居るの？<fix123><fix123>人間……？<fix123>それとも貴方も人間を辞めた者？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Is someone there?<fix123><fix123>A human ... ... ?<fix123>Or have you also given up your humanity?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>む、見逃しがあったみたいね<fix123>妖怪がいたなんて！　退治すべき！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmph, It looks like I missed something.<fix123>There's a youkai!  I'll have to beat you!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう、人間なのね？<fix123><fix123><fix123>だったら、貴方の持っている飛宝を置いて<fix123>今すぐ出て行った方がいいわ<fix123><fix123><fix123>この船はもうすぐ目的地に着く<fix123>そうしたら戻れなくなる<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see, you're human, right?<fix123><fix123><fix123>Then you'd better just put down those treasures<fix123>and leave this ship immediately.<fix123><fix123><fix123>We'll be reaching our destination soon.<fix123>There won't be any going back then.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>目的地？<fix123>あんたは一体……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Destination?<fix123>Who are you, anyway ... ?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>水難事故の念縛霊<fix123>村紗 水蜜<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Ghost Left from the Shipwreck<fix123>Minamitsu Murasa<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>申し遅れました<fix123>私は村紗、この聖輦船の船長です<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, where are my manners?<fix123>I'm Murasa, the captain of this holy palanquin.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>船長だって？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Captain?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この船はこの地を離れて聖が封印されている<fix123>別天地を目指します<fix123><fix123><fix123>そこで聖を復活させ、みんなで悩みを忘れて<fix123>生きるのです<fix123><fix123><fix123>排除される者が居ないこの世の楽園に……<fix123>妖力を自由に発揮できる解放的な未来に……<fix123><fix123><fix123>それが聖輦船の目的地<fix123>それが聖の考える理想なのです<fix123><fix123><fix123>ですから、この世界に未練がある方の乗船は<fix123>お断りさせて頂いていますが、貴方は？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This ship will be leaving this land<fix123>to go to another world, where Hijiri is sealed away.<fix123><fix123>There, we'll revive Hijiri,<fix123>and everyone will be able to forget their troubles.<fix123><fix123><fix123>We'll make a paradise where no-one can brush us aside ... <fix123>We'll make a liberating future where we can use our powers freely ...<fix123><fix123><fix123>That paradise is this ship's destination.<fix123>That's the ideal Hijiri has sought.<fix123><fix123><fix123>So, anyone with any lingering connection to this world<fix123>should disembark; what will you do?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何を言っているのか判らんけど<fix123><fix123><fix123>これが宝船じゃない事だけは判ったわ<fix123><fix123><fix123>妖怪が巣くう魔の船なのね<fix123>これは見逃せないわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I don't understand what you're saying, but ...<fix123><fix123><fix123>I understand this isn't a treasure ship now.<fix123><fix123><fix123>It's a devils' nest where youkai hide out, isn't it?<fix123>I can't overlook this.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>見逃せないとは？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If you can't overlook it ... ?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ここで船長を倒してこんな船<fix123>落としてやるわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Then I'll just have to beat the captain<fix123>and drop this ship out of the sky.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>言い忘れましたが、別天地に向かうに当って<fix123>どうしても必要な宝があるのです<fix123><fix123><fix123>貴方が持っている空を飛ぶ不思議物体<fix123>それが、その宝の破片です<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I forgot to mention this, but we absolutely need that treasure<fix123>in order to go to the other world.<fix123><fix123><fix123>The mysterious flying objects that you have<fix123>are fragments of that treasure.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そんなもの集めていたっけ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You mean you're trying to get all these?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ですから貴方は協力者かと思ったのですが<fix123>……残念ですね<fix123><fix123><fix123>貴方を乗せていては船は沈みかねない<fix123>呪われた水を浴びて船から落ちるが良いわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So, I was hoping you'd co-operate with us, but ...<fix123>Too bad.<fix123><fix123><fix123>It looks like letting you on puts us in danger of sinking.<fix123>Fall out of this ship and bathe in the cursed oceans!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Minamitsu Murasa DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>これが数多の妖怪を葬ってきた力なのか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This power's buried a lot of youkai, hasn't it?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうよ！<fix123>だから悪い事はやめるのね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's right!<fix123>So stop doing bad things!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何も悪い事していないんですけどね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But we're not doing anything bad.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まあ、妖怪っていうだけで悪いんじゃん？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Of course you are, you're a youkai, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>妖怪を辞めるのは無理ですわ〜<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I can't just stop being a youkai~<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>しかし、この船は止まらないわね<fix123>船長が何もしていないのに<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm, this ship really isn't stopping, is it?<fix123>Even though the captain isn't doing anything ...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>自動操縦ですから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's in auto-mode.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>宝船じゃないと判ってから興味を<fix123>失っていたけど<fix123><fix123><fix123>やっと、この船の正体が気になってきたわ<fix123><fix123><fix123>何処に向かっているのか確かめなきゃ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now that I know this isn't a treasure ship,<fix123>I'm not that interested.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Now I finally know what this ship really is.<fix123><fix123><fix123>But I still have to find out where it's going!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>魔界の赤黒い封印<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Red and Black Seal of the Underworld<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>魔界（法界上空）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Makai (above Hokkai)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 魔界地方都市エソテリア<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Provincial Makai City Esoteria<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nazrin ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>おや？<fix123>君も魔界まで来たのかい？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmm?<fix123>So you came to Makai, too?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あんた、どこかで会っていたっけ？<fix123>それに魔界だって？<fix123><fix123><fix123>あの馬鹿船長め、船の目的地は<fix123>魔界だったって言うの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmm, have we met somewhere before?<fix123>Wait, did you say Makai?<fix123><fix123><fix123>That stupid captain, does that mean<fix123>you were sailing to Makai?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>知らぬうちに宝物を見つけていた君を<fix123>魔界まで連れてきたんだね<fix123><fix123><fix123>ムラサ船長は良い仕事をした<fix123><fix123><fix123>その間に、私も頼まれてたもう一つの宝物を<fix123>見つけたよ<fix123><fix123><fix123>この毘沙門天の宝塔の力<fix123>ご主人様にお渡しする前に君に試してみるか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see they must have brought you here to Makai<fix123>with your treasure sometime.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Captain Murasa's done a good job.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Meanwhile, I've also found the other treasure<fix123>that I've been looking for.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Maybe I'll test the power of this Bishamonten pagoda on you<fix123>before I hand it over to my master.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nazrin DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ここは魔界かー<fix123><fix123><fix123>どうりで居心地悪いと思ったわ<fix123><fix123><fix123>あの船、こんな処まで連れてきて<fix123>封印を解くとか、何か不穏ね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So this is Makai?<fix123><fix123><fix123>That explains why I feel so horrible being here.<fix123><fix123><fix123>So they came all the way down here to break a seal or something?<fix123>That can't be good.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Shou Toramaru ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>待ってました！<fix123><fix123><fix123>貴方が飛宝を集めてくれた人間ね<fix123>思ったより貧相な顔つきなのね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've been waiting for you!<fix123><fix123><fix123>You're the human who gathered the flying treasure, yes?<fix123>You look a lot more scrawny than I imagined.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>失礼ね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How rude.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いや失礼した<fix123><fix123>ここに辿り着くなんて、もっと修行を<fix123>積んだ人間かと思ったので<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm sorry, you're quite right.<fix123><fix123><fix123>I simply thought that if you'd made it this far,<fix123>maybe you were some sort of ascetic scholar.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>積んでるつもりだけどね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I do mean to learn a lot while I'm here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>毘沙門天の弟子<fix123>寅丸 星<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Disciple of Bishamonten<fix123>Shou Toramaru<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は毘沙門天の代理<fix123>聖の信仰を一身に受けていた者です<fix123><fix123><fix123>ナズーリンが持ってきたこの宝塔と<fix123>貴方の持ってきた飛倉の破片が揃えば<fix123><fix123><fix123>ここの封印を解く事が出来ます<fix123>聖への恩を返す事が出来るのです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I am the representative of Bishamonten,<fix123>a devotee of Hijiri's creed.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Now that we have the jeweled pagoda Nazrin brought,<fix123> as well as the fragments of the Flying Storehouse you possess,<fix123><fix123><fix123>We can break the seal here.<fix123>We can repay our debt of gratitude to Hijiri.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私が持っている宝って、もしかして<fix123>このＵＦＯのおもちゃの事？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The treasure I brought?<fix123>Do you mean those UFO toys?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ＵＦＯ？<fix123>まあそう見えますかね<fix123><fix123><fix123>さあ、私と共にこの法界に光を――<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>UFO?<fix123>Ah, I suppose you might look at it that way.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Now, together, let us bring light into Hokkai and-<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>知らん！<fix123><fix123>私はただ宝船を追ってここまで来ただけだし<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who cares!<fix123><fix123>I only came this far chasing a treasure ship.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>宝船……ですか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A treasure ... ship?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>蓋を開けてみればただの空っぽの船だし<fix123><fix123><fix123>何か乗っているかと思いきや<fix123>いつの間にか魔界だし<fix123><fix123><fix123>もううんざりだわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>When I took a look inside, the ship was empty.<fix123><fix123><fix123>I thought there'd be something onboard,<fix123>and suddenly I was in Makai.<fix123><fix123><fix123>I'm sick of all this!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何もがっかりする事はありません<fix123><fix123><fix123>聖輦船は宝船とも言えなくもないですし<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There's nothing to be disappointed about.<fix123><fix123><fix123>You could call the holy palanquin a treasure ship.<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Huh?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だって、宝船には七福神が乗っているのですよ？<fix123><fix123><fix123>その中の一人、毘沙門天はここに居ます<fix123>縁起がいいですね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, the seven gods of luck ride a treasure ship, right?<fix123><fix123><fix123>And one of them, Bishamonten, is right here.<fix123>Isn't that fortunate?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どうでも良いよ<fix123><fix123><fix123>こうなったらあんたを倒して、封印された何かも<fix123>倒して家捜しするしかない！<fix123><fix123><fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Whatever.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Look, I'll just beat you and then beat that sealed whoever<fix123>and then go home!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 虎柄の毘沙門天<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Tiger-Patterned Bishamonten<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>良いでしょう<fix123>私と戦うと言うのなら、相手になります<fix123><fix123><fix123>ただ、もし貴方が道を誤っているのであれば<fix123><fix123><fix123>魔界に有りてなお輝き続けるこの法の光――<fix123><fix123><fix123>この毘沙門天の宝塔の前に<fix123>ひれ伏す事になるでしょう！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Very well.<fix123>If you want to fight me, I'll be your opponent.<fix123><fix123><fix123>However, if you've chosen to follow the wrong path ...<fix123><fix123><fix123>Then you'll have to bear witness to the light of dharma which is even brighter here in Makai --<fix123><fix123><fix123>And bow down<fix123>before this pagoda of Bishamonten!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Shou Toramaru DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>素晴らしい<fix123>その飛宝を集められるだけの事はあるわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How splendid.<fix123>I can see how you could have gathered the treasure.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この程度の妖怪退治は朝飯前よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I could beat someone like you before breakfast.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それで、私を倒したところで<fix123>どうしようというのです？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, now that you've beaten me,<fix123>what will you do next?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほら！　このＵＦＯのおもちゃが<fix123>必要なんでしょ？　封印を解くのに<fix123><fix123><fix123>何が封印されているのか確認してあげる<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Look!  You need this UFO toy, right?<fix123>To break the seal.<fix123><fix123><fix123>Let's go see just what's been sealed away.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええ、では少し寄り道をしましたが<fix123>早速封印解除の準備に入りましょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, you're new to the group,<fix123>but let's prepare to break the seal.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふん！　封印されていた奴ごと倒して<fix123>円満解決してやるから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmph!  I'll beat whoever's sealed away,<fix123>and then this'll all be taken care of.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>聖を虐めないでくださいね<fix123>封印明けですから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Please don't make fun of Hijiri,<fix123>the seal is open now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>八苦を滅した尼公<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Nun Who Overcame the Eight Sufferings<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>法界<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hokkai<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 法界の火<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Fire of Hokkai<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>??? ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>??? LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>さあ、出てきなさいよ！<fix123><fix123><fix123>ここに封印されていた事は<fix123>知っているんだからね？<fix123><fix123><fix123>声が響かない……<fix123><fix123><fix123>何か不思議な場所ね<fix123>人の気配が全くしないわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Okay, come on out!<fix123><fix123><fix123>I know you've been sealed in here<fix123>somewhere, okay?<fix123><fix123><fix123>I can't hear anyone ... ...<fix123><fix123><fix123>What a mysterious place.<fix123>I can't sense anyone at all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Byakuren Hijiri ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ああ、法の世界に光が満ちる<fix123><fix123>貴方がこの世界を解放してくれたの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>O, the world of dharma is filled with light.<fix123><fix123>Are you the one who liberated this world?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>やっと見つけたわ<fix123>あんたが妖怪の親玉ね？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I finally found you.<fix123>You're those youkai's boss, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>妖怪の？<fix123>親玉？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Youkai?<fix123>Boss?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう、妖怪達があんたを復活させようと<fix123>していたのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Right, those youkai<fix123>were trying to bring you back.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうだったの……<fix123><fix123><fix123>もう千年以上も何の力にもなれなかった<fix123>というのに……<fix123><fix123><fix123>まだ私を慕ってくれている妖怪もいたのですね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Really ...<fix123><fix123><fix123>Even though I haven't been able to do anything for them<fix123>for over a thousand years ...<fix123><fix123><fix123>So, there are still youkai who miss me ...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>で、あんたは何者なのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, who are you, anyway?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>封印された大魔法使い<fix123>聖　白蓮<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Great Sealed Magician<fix123>Byakuren Hijiri<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私の名は白蓮<fix123><fix123><fix123>遠い昔の僧侶です<fix123><fix123><fix123>貴方は見たところ巫女の様ね？<fix123><fix123><fix123>私を再び封印し直すとでも言うのかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My name is Byakuren.<fix123><fix123><fix123>I used to be a monk a long, long time ago.<fix123><fix123><fix123>You seem to be a shrine maiden, am I right?<fix123><fix123><fix123>Did you come down here to seal me away again?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ、ええ<fix123>そのつもりよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, yes,<fix123>that's exactly right!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方もまた、妖怪を虐げる者の一人なのね<fix123><fix123><fix123>私は気付いたのです<fix123>神も仏も妖怪に過ぎないと<fix123><fix123><fix123>妖怪として排除するか、神様として崇めるか<fix123>それは、人間が決める事なのです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're another oppressor of youkai, aren't you?<fix123><fix123><fix123>You know, I realized<fix123>that gods and buddhas are no more than youkai.<fix123><fix123><fix123>But youkai are hated, and gods are worshipped.<fix123>That's because humans decided it should be that way.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>へー<fix123>ま、私は神様だって退治するけどねー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123>Well, I've beaten gods, too ...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、私の巻物に法の光が満ちてくる<fix123><fix123><fix123>私はこれから、私を解放してくれた者へ<fix123>恩に報いに行かなければなりません<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, my scrolls are full of the light of Buddha.<fix123><fix123><fix123>From now on, I'll have to make sure<fix123>I show my gratitude to those who freed me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>むむ、放って置いて大丈夫なのかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmm, I wonder if it'd really be okay to leave you alone?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方の妖怪を全て排除する考え<fix123>私にはそれを否定する事は出来ません<fix123><fix123><fix123>ですが、再び私を封印すると言うのなら――<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I can't change your desire<fix123>to eliminate all youkai.<fix123><fix123><fix123>However, if you're going to seal me away again --<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 感情の摩天楼　~ Cosmic Mind<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Emotional Skyscraper ~ Cosmic Mind<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は精一杯抵抗します<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I will resist you with all my strength.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう来なくっちゃね！<fix123><fix123><fix123>私は妖怪に味方する奴は全員倒すつもりよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, there we go!<fix123><fix123><fix123>I'll beat anyone who's a friend to youkai!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私が寺にいた頃と人間は変わっていないな<fix123><fix123>誠に愚かで自分勝手であるッ！<fix123>いざ、南無三――！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Humans haven't changed since my days in the temple.<fix123><fix123>How foolish and self-centered you are!<fix123>Now, namusan ―― !<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Byakuren Hijiri DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>地獄のラブリービジター<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Lovely Visitor from Hell<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>守矢神社<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Moriya Shrine<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ラストリモート<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Last Remote<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Sanae Kochiya ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あら、この寒い中参拝に来たのですか？<fix123>うふふ私もここでの挨拶の仕方を学びました<fix123>この幻想郷では常識に囚われてはいけないのですね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, did you come to visit the shrine in this cold weather?<fix123>Hehe, I've learned how to do the greetings here.<fix123>You can't let yourself be held back by common sense in Gensokyo, right!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Sanae Kochiya DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>やっぱ冬山は寒いぜ<fix123>冬はこうでないとな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It sure is cold on the mountain.<fix123>I guess it's winter, after all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（あー暖かい家の中で<fix123>　暖かい紅茶を飲む午後は最高ね）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Ah, it's so wonderful to spend the afternoon<fix123><fix123>sipping warm tea in a warm house.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前、喧嘩売ってるな<fix123>大体、何で地上なのにお前と通信しないといけないんだよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, you looking for a fight?<fix123>Why do you have to do this while I'm above ground, anyway?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（冬山は素人には危険だから<fix123>　無闇に登らない方がいい）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Mountains in winter are dangerous for novices.<fix123>It's best not to recklessly decide to climb them.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はん灼熱地獄の方が遥かに危険だったぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Remains of Blazing Hell was way more dangerous than this.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（何にしても、あの地獄鴉の言う事が<fix123>　本当なら）<fix123>（核融合の力は山の神様に頂いたと<fix123>　いう事になる）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(In any case, if what that hell raven said<fix123>was true,)<fix123>(Then she got the power to control nuclear fusion<fix123>from the gods of this mountain.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Koishi Komeiji ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あのーちょっと良いですか？<fix123>この神社の人を誰か見ませんでしたか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Um, excuse me...?<fix123>Have you seen anyone from this shrine?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>見たっけ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, uh...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（さあね、私は本を読んでたわ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(I don't know, I was reading a book.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そっか、見てないな。悪いけど他当たりな私はこの神社は詳しくないんでね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh, I guess not, then. Sorry, but I don't know too much about this shrine.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そっか、それは失礼しました<fix123>もしかして留守なのかなぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, I see, sorry to have bothered you.<fix123>Maybe they're out now...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>本殿の方も見てきたのかい？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Did you try visiting the main building?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うん<fix123>もぬけの殻だったわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes.<fix123>It was just an empty shell.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だってさ、パチュリーどうする？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What do I do now, Patchouli?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（ふーん、居ないなら仕方が無いねぇ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Hmm, there's nothing you can do if they're not here.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方も山の神様に何か用事があって？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are you looking for the gods of the mountain, too?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、ちょっとな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yeah, kind of.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もしかして、貴方も力が欲しくてこの神社に来たの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Did you come to this shrine looking for power, too?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>力だと？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Power?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>山の神様に会えば、究極の力が手に入るって聞いたわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I heard you can get the ultimate power if you meet the gods of the mountain.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（およ？<fix123>　何でそんな話が広まってるの？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Really, now?<fix123>Who's been spreading that rumor?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>閉じた故意の瞳<fix123>古明地 こいし<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Closed Eyes of Love<fix123>Koishi Komeiji<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お姉ちゃんのペットに聞いたもの<fix123>おくうは、山の神に強くして貰ったって<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I heard it from one of my sister's pets.<fix123>The gods of the mountain made Okuu really strong.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おくう？　お姉ちゃん？何か嫌な予感がするぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Okuu? Sister? I've got a bad feeling about this.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（……嫌な予感<fix123>　魔理沙）<fix123>（私は少し午後の休憩を取るわ<fix123>　後は頑張って）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(... a bad feeling...<fix123>Marisa.)<fix123>(I'm going to take a bit of an afternoon nap.<fix123>Good luck!)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おいおい<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, hey!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方達も山の神様の力が欲しいの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Do you want the mountain gods' power, too?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、成り行きだがそういう事になった<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, that's not what I came for, but I wouldn't mind it.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ハルトマンの妖怪少女<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Hartmann's Youkai Girl<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だとしたらライバルね<fix123>ライバルは全て潰さないと自分の望みは叶えられないってお姉ちゃんが言ってた<fix123>貴方には恨みはないけど、ここで野垂れ死ぬ未来をあげるわ<fix123>大丈夫大丈夫、死体は猫に運ばせるから一生私の家で暮らせるよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Then that makes us rivals.<fix123>My sister is always saying that you can't make your dreams come true if you can't beat all your rivals.<fix123>I don't have anything against you, but I hope you're ready to die a dog's death.<fix123>Oh, don't worry, that cat will carry off your body, so you'll be able to live in our place!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Koishi Komeiji DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>うへぇ強いわーてっきり人間だと思ってたら違ったのね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wooow... you're really strongー I see I was wrong to think you're just some normal human.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間だぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But I am human.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うっそーんそんなに強くて人間だなんて……あっ<fix123>もしかして貴方最近、地霊殿に遊びに来なかった？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No way! I can't believe a human could be so strong... oh,<fix123>Are you the person that came to play in the Palace of the Earth Spirits?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地霊殿？ああ、そんなとこも行ったかもな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Palace of the Earth Spirits? Hm, I think I've been there before.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>やっぱり？　貴方みたいな強い人間が何人もいる訳ないものね<fix123>私は古明地こいし<fix123>その地霊殿に住んでいる者よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Really? There can't be that many people as strong as you.<fix123>I'm Koishi Komeiji.<fix123>I live in the Palace of the Earth Spirits.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（何だって？　……てっきりただの<fix123>　人間の参拝客だと思ってた）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(What did she say...? I thought she was<fix123>just a normal human shrine visitor at first.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前の勘も鈍いねぇ私には妖怪にしか見えないぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh, your intuition's not that great.<fix123>It's obvious she's a youkai to me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（……貴方から妖怪の気配が<fix123>　感じられない）<fix123>（それどころか……何の気配も<fix123>　感じられない）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(... you don't feel like a<fix123>youkai to me.)<fix123>(Actually... I can't sense anything<fix123>at all from you.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は無意識で動くもん<fix123>心を読む力を閉ざした事で、何も考えないで行動する力を得たわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's because I deal with the unconsciousness.<fix123>Since I closed off my ability to read minds, I gained the ability to move around free of thought.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（無の境地……<fix123>　坊さんが聞いたら泣いて喜びそうね）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(A state of mu...<fix123>If a Buddhist priest heard of her, he'd cry tears of joy.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>でも勝ってしまった訳だが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But, I won, anyhow.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方、本当に強いわね<fix123>どう？　家に遊びに来ない？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're really strong.<fix123>Do you want to come play at my house?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まあ行ってやらん事もない地底は遠いがな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I don't have anything better to do, but it's so far away.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（貴方、さとりの妹？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Are you Satori's younger sister?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（まさか妹がいるとは……<fix123>　聞いてなかったわ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Hmm, I hadn't heard that<fix123>she had a younger sister.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Sanae Kochiya ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あら、まだ帰ってなかったのですか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm, they're still not back?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おや、早苗じゃないか<fix123>何処で何をしてたんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, it's Sanae.<fix123>What were you off doing?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さっき会ったでしょう？<fix123>それで何の用件でしょう？今、神奈子様も諏訪子様も出かけてますが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We just saw each other a few minutes ago!<fix123>Anyway, what are you here for? Lady Kanako and Lady Suwako are both out.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>えーっと何だっけ<fix123>おいパチュリー神様に何か訊くことがあったんだろ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmmm, let's see...<fix123>Hey, Patchouli, we wanted to ask the gods something, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（さとりの妹……えーっと<fix123>　どっかに資料が無かったかな）<fix123>（え？　神様に訊くこと？<fix123>　うーん、核融合の話？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Satori's little sister... um, let's see,<fix123>don't I have any documents on her somewhere?)<fix123>(Huh? Something to ask the gods?<fix123>Yes, about nuclear fusion, remember?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>核融合……？ええ、計画は順調に進行していますよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Nuclear fusion...? Yes, our plan is going along quite nicely.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あん？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>聞いてませんか？　地底の灼熱地獄跡を利用して河童達に産業革命を起こさせるのです<fix123>成功すれば、今の何倍も生活水準が上がりますよ<fix123>核融合は、外の世界でも実用まで至っていないクリーンなエネルギー源です<fix123>私もこの目で地上の太陽の実現が見られると思うとワクワクしますよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, didn't you hear? We're going to create a kappa industrial revolution by using the old Remains of Blazing Hell.<fix123>If it works, our standard of living will be much better.<fix123>Nuclear fusion energy is a clean energy that even the outside world hasn't mastered yet.<fix123>It's exciting to think that I'll see the power of the sun harnessed here on the Earth.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>判らん何を言ってるのか全く<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I don't understand what you're saying at all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（核融合は河童達の産業革命の礎って<fix123>　ことかしら？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(So, nuclear fusion is the key to revolutionizing<fix123>the kappa's industry?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何にしても危険は無いんだな？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Anyway, it's not dangerous, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>勿論ですよ神奈子様はちゃんと説明してなかったのですね<fix123>ちょっと間欠泉が湧いたり、温泉が出やすくなるといった変化は出るかも知れませんが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Of course not. I guess Lady Kanako didn't explain this to you, did she?<fix123>It might cause geysers, which might make hot springs appear, though.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（結局今回の異変って、山の神様の<fix123>　説明不足に振り回されただけ？）<fix123>（私は疲れたわ……<fix123>　もう休む）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(So, in the end, this whole incident was just a misunderstanding<fix123>caused by the gods of the mountain not explaining things?)<fix123>(I'm tired...<fix123>I'm going to bed.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>じゃ、私は帰るけど遊びに来てねー約束だからねー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I'm going home, but come play with me some timeー You promisedー<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ま、良いじゃないかこれで自由に地底世界に行く口実が出来たんだ<fix123>それでよしとしてやろう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, this is nice. Now I have an excuse to go see the underground as much as I want.<fix123>Okay, let's do it!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: The Youkai Mountain.<fix123>
The strongest of the youkai, like kappa and tengu, live here.<fix123>
The youkai of the mountain don't attack humans,<fix123>
but they don't take kindly to any intruders, either.<fix123>
Yet, encouraged by her success, Marisa kept going back.<fix123>
"I told you, humans aren't allowed to go any further."<fix123>
"Oh, it's okay, isn't it?<fix123>
You let me go in that one time."<fix123>
"Let you?<fix123>
Don't you mean you forced your way in?"<fix123>
"You must've known I was trying to go against a god!"<fix123>
"You'd need a reason like that to get up the mountain.<fix123>
But you got that one from me for free last time."<fix123>
"Well, see? It's the same this time, so..."<fix123>
"But there's no reason to fight her now."<fix123>
"But I didn't totally beat her, you know?"<fix123>
"You don't need to fight Lady Yasaka anymore.<fix123>
She's reached an understanding with us."<fix123>
"Huh?"<fix123>
"Lady Yasaka didn't come here to hurt us. In fact,<fix123>we're a lot better off now that she's here."<fix123>
"What? Did she take over already?"<fix123>
"The mountain used to belong to a kishin.<fix123>
But they disappeared, and their faith went, too."<fix123>
"So, the world became a lot less interesting.<fix123>
That's why we've welcomed this new god.<fix123>
Isn't it fun to party with the gods every day?"<fix123>
"Parties... Is that what faith is all about?"<fix123>
"Faith is intimacy. There's another party today!"<fix123>
The mountain youkai get along well with their new god.<fix123>
Marisa felt out of the equation, which made her a bit lonely.<fix123>
However, beneath the mountain, the relationship between<fix123>humans and youkai was as surprisingly good as always.<fix123>
Perhaps this means the humans had some faith in the youkai?<fix123>
Marisa returned to the shrine, and the youkai partied.<fix123>
<c$Ending No.04 — The mountain youkai just do what they want.$><fix123>
<c$Congratulations, all clear! Just as I'd expected!$><fix123>
The Forest of Magic.<fix123>
A forest shrouded in fog that both humans and youkai avoid.<fix123>
This is where Marisa lived.<fix123>
What can she be gathering all of this lumber for...?<fix123>
"So the faithless can't understand faith, huh...<fix123>
Well then, let's try building up some faith.<fix123>
I think I'll try making my own little shrine..."<fix123>
"..Hm, but what will I put inside the shrine?<fix123>
I've never seen the insides of the Hakurei Shrine...<fix123>
Since it is the place where a god lives,<fix123>
Maybe I should put in a little cushion or something.<fix123>
I guess that god I just met could live in here."<fix123>
"Excuse me!?"<fix123>
"Woah!"<fix123>
"Don't use such a filthy cushion in there!"<fix123>
"Where'd you come from?"<fix123>
"If you bestow my name on a shrine, it'll become a<fix123>branch shrine I can visit whenever I wish.<fix123>
It seems you wanted to build a shrine for me, but I've<fix123>no interest in such a poorly-constructed shrine."<fix123>
"Hey, that's kinda rude."<fix123>
"In any case, why would a human such as you build a<fix123>shrine in a forest that receives no visitors?"<fix123>
"It's nice to try new things.<fix123>
Wouldn't it be bad if humans came here too often?"<fix123>
"In a sense. It would be hard on the visitors."<fix123>
"Well, you built a shrine on top of a mountain...<fix123>
What kind of person would go all the way up there?"<fix123>
"Why, there's no problem.<fix123>
My goal was to gather faith from the youkai.<fix123>
I meant to leave human faith to the Hakurei Shrine..."<fix123>
In the end, Marisa gave up her shrine building ambitions.<fix123>
She didn't really know how to make one, and she didn't want<fix123>to deal with gods coming out of it and nagging her.<fix123>
Marisa eventually asked Kanako to explain what faith is.<fix123>
—And this is what Kanako said:<fix123>
"It's exactly the same as how you feel toward magic."<fix123>
<c$Ending No.05 — Building shrines in gardens is a common practice.$><fix123>
<c$Congratulations, all clear! Just as I'd expected!$><fix123>
The Hakurei Shrine.<fix123>
A shrine that sits on the eastern border of Gensokyo.<fix123>
The shrine trees stained crimson later than the mountain's.<fix123>
Marisa visited the shrine, together with an odd pair.<fix123>
"—so, this person is a god, and<fix123>over there is a very maiden-like person."<fix123>
"Hello, I'm a god."<fix123>
"Ah, do you remember me? I'm the one that said maybe<fix123>you could change out your god..."<fix123>
"...So? What are you here for?"<fix123>
"We talked it over and came to an agreement.<fix123>
Well, don't misunderstand that...<fix123>
Anyway, why not hand over your shrine to this god?"<fix123>
"Why not give it a try?"<fix123>
"Why does even Marisa side with my enemies now?"<fix123>
"I'm not your enemy.<fix123>
I merely wish to help your shrine...<fix123>
We can both benefit; surely that's a good deal?"<fix123>
"Of course, we won't force you. The decision is yours."<fix123>
"It might be kind of interesting."<fix123>
"Of course it would be, with me around."<fix123>
"Shrines do normally change hands from time to time."<fix123>
"Am I the only one that doesn't like this?<fix123>
Why is even Marisa...?"<fix123>
"Well, come on, if this place becomes more like a<fix123>shrine, we could have festivals."<fix123>
"It's even okay if you only invite me to the feasts."<fix123>
"Well, then, maybe it's okay...<fix123>
I've learned how annoying one-sided religious solicitation is..."<fix123>
Kanako explained the relationship between gods and shrines.<fix123>
As a result, Marisa thought what she said was reasonable.<fix123>
A shrine is a god's home, and the shrine will become more<fix123>charming based on the god that inhabits it.<fix123>
So, she thought giving the shrine to Kanako was good. Because—<fix123>
Kanako's easy-going personality matched Marisa's very well.<fix123>
And she thought she'd get along well with the youkai there.<fix123>
<c$Ending No.06 — But please stop the overbearing solicitation.$><fix123>
<c$Congratulations, all clear! Just as I'd expected!$><fix123>
Hakurei Shrine, the next morning.<fix123>
After her hopeless fight against the god, Marisa snuck<fix123>
down the mountain so the tengu couldn't watch her leave.<fix123>
"You look tired. Did something happen yesterday?"<fix123>
"Oh, no.<fix123>
Just went to the mountain to find yummy cucumbers..."<fix123>
Marisa hid that she went to the mountain to fight the god.<fix123>
And because of that lie—<fix123>
She got in trouble for not sharing her yummy cucumbers.<fix123>
<c$Ending No.10 — It's not nice to lie.$><fix123>
<c$Aim for a 1cc on Normal or higher!$><fix123>
Hakurei Shrine, the next morning.<fix123>
After her hopeless fight against the god, Marisa snuck<fix123>
way down the mountain, pretending to be lost.<fix123>
"You look tired. Did something happen yesterday?"<fix123>
"Oh, no.<fix123>
I just went to tell the tengu about a neat rumor."<fix123>
Marisa hid that she went to the mountain to fight the god.<fix123>
So, it was a story in the next day's paper.<fix123>
—The fact that she talked back to a god, and lost.<fix123>
<c$Ending No.11 — The winners write the newspaper articles.$><fix123>
<c$Aim for a 1cc on Normal or higher!$><fix123>
Hakurei Shrine, the next morning.<fix123>
After her hopeless fight against the god, Marisa snuck<fix123>
the mountain, playing dead whenever the tengu came by.<fix123>
"You look tired. Did something happen yesterday?"<fix123>
"Oh, no.<fix123>
The leaves were so beautiful... I got caught up in some vigorous leaf-viewing."<fix123>
Marisa hid that she went to the mountain to fight the god.<fix123>
The mountain was stained in crimson.<fix123>
That day, danmaku danced together with the falling leaves.<fix123>
<c$Ending No.12 — Vigorous leaf-viewing?$><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Sanae Kochiya ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あら、この寒い中参拝に来たのですか？<fix123>うふふ私もここでの挨拶の仕方を学びました<fix123>この幻想郷では常識に囚われてはいけないのですね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, did you come to visit the shrine in this cold weather?<fix123>Hehe, I've learned how to do the greetings here.<fix123>You can't let yourself be held back by common sense in Gensokyo, right!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Sanae Kochiya DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>うおーい冬山は寒いぜー<fix123>温泉も湧いたし怨霊も湧かなくなったもうそれだけで十分だったかもな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Woah, it's cold up on the mountain.<fix123>The hot springs appeared and the spirits went away, isn't that enough work for now?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>(ほら、クリア後のおまけダンジョンよ<fix123>　頑張って！）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Look, it's the extra dungeon for after you beat the game.<fix123>Good luck!)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ったく、誰がそんなもん付け始めたんだ？<fix123>ゲームなんて一回クリアすればそれで十分じゃないか<fix123>おまけがあるのが当たり前だと、そのうちラスボスは中ボスに成り下がるぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Geez, who started that, anyway?<fix123>Isn't it enough to have cleared the game in the first place?<fix123>If there's always an extra dungeon, then the last boss just becomes a midboss!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>(身も蓋も無いこと言わないの<fix123>　ほら、あの地獄鴉の話だと）<fix123>(山の神様から核融合の力を<fix123>　授かったって言ってたでしょ？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Don't be so blunt.<fix123>Look, according to the hell raven,)<fix123>(She got the power of nuclear fusion<fix123>from the gods of the mountain, right?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうだったな私も御利益を受けようと来たんだった<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yeah, that's right. I came here to get some sort of divine blessing, too.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Koishi Komeiji ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あのーすみません<fix123>ここの神社の人は見ませんでしたか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Um, excuse me ...<fix123>Have you seen anyone from this shrine?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さっきあっちで倒したぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yeah, I just beat her over there.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>倒した、ですって？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You beat her?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あっちから襲いかかってきたんだ正当防衛だぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>She came at me from over there, so it was in self-defense.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あらら、どおりで誰も居ない訳ねぇ困ったわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh my, it looks like no-one's here. What a shame.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どうした？学業成就祈願か？<fix123>何なら、麓の神社紹介してやるよ<fix123>あそこならいつも暇してる巫女がいる<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What's wrong? Coming to pray for good grades?<fix123>I'll introduce you at the shrine below the mountain.<fix123>There's a shrine maiden there that never has anything to do.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>麓じゃなくて山の神社が良いの<fix123>この神社の御利益が欲しくて来たんだから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'd rather visit the shrine on the mountain.<fix123>I came here to get a divine blessing from the gods in this shrine.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>(守矢神社の御利益って何？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(What's the divine blessing of the Moriya Shrine, anyway?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さあな、鴉に核融合の力を授ける様な御利益だろ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I don't know, something good, like the nuclear fusion power she gave that crow, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>鴉に核融合？もしかして、おくうの事を言っているの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Nuclear fusion, crow? Are you talking about Okuu?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おくうって誰だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who's Okuu?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>(あの空っていう地獄鴉の事じゃない？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(She's talking about that hell raven, Utsuho.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、空だからおくうか<fix123>ラスボスから中ボスに成り下がる予定の奴だな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, it's 'cos her name is written with the kuu character for "empty".<fix123>That poor girl who got demoted to midboss.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方達、おくうの事を知っているって何者なの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You two know about Okuu? Who are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>大魔法使いの霧雨魔理沙だ覚えておくがいい<fix123>そういうお前は誰だ？こんな場所にある神社に参拝って怪しいぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm the great magician, Marisa Kirisame. Don't forget it.<fix123>Anyway, who are you? Any pilgrim to this shrine is pretty suspicious, if you ask me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>閉じた故意の瞳<fix123>古明地 こいし<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Closed Eyes of Love<fix123>Koishi Komeiji<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おくうはお姉ちゃんのペットだもの<fix123>私はおくうのパワーアップを見て羨ましかったわ<fix123>ここに来たら私のペットだってもっと強くなれるって思ってね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Okuu is one of my sister's pets.<fix123>I was so jealous of her power-up.<fix123>I thought if I came here, my pets could become more powerful, too.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>(もしかして、さとりさんの妹！？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Are you Miss Satori's younger sister!?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何だと？あのさとりにこんな妹が居たのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What's that? Did Satori have a little sister like her?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あれー？　おくうだけじゃなくてお姉ちゃんの事も知っているの？<fix123>貴方達もしかして……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh? You even know about my big sister?<fix123>Are you two ...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だから大賢者の魔理沙<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Like I said, I'm Marisa, the Great Sage.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この間家に来たっていう、人形を使うシーフ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are you the doll-using thief that they said visited our house?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なっ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wha-<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>(クスクス）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Tee hee.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は古明地こいし<fix123>山の神様は見つからなかったけど良い遊び相手が見つかったわ<fix123>泥棒はいけない事よ？地上の人間さん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm Koishi Komeiji.<fix123>I couldn't find the gods of the mountain, but it looks like I found a good playmate.<fix123>Stealing is bad, okay? Miss Above Ground Human.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>しょうがないな私も神奈子か諏訪子を捜してたんだが<fix123>居ないみたいだし遊んでやるか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, whatever. I did beat Kanako and Suwako, though.<fix123>It looks like they're not around, so I'll play with you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ハルトマンの妖怪少女<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Hartmann's Youkai Girl<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お姉ちゃんやおくうから話は聞いたわ<fix123>そのシーフはまるで宙を舞う紙くずのようにひらりひらりと弾幕をかわし<fix123>背中を這う蚤のように生理的に気持ち悪い動きをしたとね<fix123>貴方を倒して持ち帰れば、お姉ちゃん達との話の種になるに違いないわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I heard about you from my sister and Okuu.<fix123>That thief dodged danmaku just like bits of paper dancing in the air.<fix123>She said you were psychologically unsettling, like a flea crawling up your back.<fix123>If I beat you and take you back home, I'll definitely become the talk of the house!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Koishi Komeiji DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>強ーい！こりゃお姉ちゃんが負けるのも無理はないわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're stroooong! I can see how you beat my sister.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>余裕で撃破だぜ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yep, I crushed you easily!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>(本当に余裕だったのかなー？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Was it really that easy?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>付き合ってくれてありがとう！<fix123>生け捕りは出来なかったけど、話の種にはなりそうだわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Thanks for spending time with me!<fix123>I couldn't take you alive, but this will probably be worth some talk back home.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ、そうだお前、さとりの妹って事は……<fix123>そう、そのなんだお前もやっぱり心を読んだりするのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Uh, oh yeah, you're Satori's little sister ...<fix123>So, uh, can you read minds, too?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ううん、もう閉ざしちゃったわ私の第三の眼<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Nope, I closed my third eye.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>第三の眼？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Third eye?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人の心を見抜く第三の眼<fix123>あんなものがあるからお姉ちゃんは弱いのよ<fix123>私は、人の心を読めるから無意識に負けるって事に気付いたわ<fix123>だから、私は心を読まないの<fix123>ううん、読めなくなった、かな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The third eye, which can see through people's minds.<fix123>But that's what makes my sister weak.<fix123>I realized that mind reading made me lose to people's unconscious.<fix123>So I don't read people's minds anymore.<fix123>Uh, no, I guess I can't, really.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>よく判らんが安心したぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I don't get it, but thank goodness.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>(勿体ないわねぇ。そんな力があれば<fix123>　余裕で人間を支配できるのに）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(What a shame. You could control people<fix123>easily with that kind of power.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そんな甘くはないわ<fix123>有意は無意に敵わないの<fix123>生物は考えている事だけで行動してる訳じゃない<fix123>意識と無意識の両方で行動しているのよ<fix123>心が読めると無意識の行動が見えなくなるの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's not that great.<fix123>The conscious always loses to the unconscious.<fix123>People don't just act on what they consciously think.<fix123>They act on both the conscious and the unconscious.<fix123>If you read their mind, you can't tell what's going on in their unconscious mind.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふーんそうかい<fix123>ま、体も温まったし神奈子達も見つからんし<fix123>そろそろおいとまするか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmm, I see.<fix123>Well, I got all warmed up, but I couldn't find Kanako or anyone else.<fix123>Guess I'd better be heading home.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>(あらら？<fix123>　用事は良いの？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(What?<fix123>Don't tell me you're done here?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>山の神と地底の間で何があったのかそれを調べるのは霊夢がやってくれるさ<fix123>後で聞けばいいや<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, Reimu will take care of seeing if there's anything between the underground and the mountain gods.<fix123>I'll just ask her later.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>(なんて他力本願<fix123>　後で私が一人で調べようかしら？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(You're so easygoing.<fix123>Maybe I should look into it myself, later?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それよりも重大な事に気付いているか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Besides, I figured out something really important.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今、神社はもぬけの殻なんだ<fix123>あさるなら今だぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The shrine's totally empty now.<fix123>It's the perfect time to go fishing.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら泥棒はいけない事よ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh my, thieving is bad, you know?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>『この後、家捜しをした魔理沙は<fix123>　神奈子達に見つかって<fix123>こっぴどく絞られましたとさ<fix123>　めでたしめでたし』<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>"Later, Kanako caught Marisa<fix123>going through their house."<fix123>"She got put through the wringer.<fix123>The End."<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地獄のラブリービジター<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Lovely Visitor from Hell<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>守矢神社<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Moriya Shrine<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ラストリモート<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Last Remote<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Sanae Kochiya ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あら、この寒い中参拝に来たのですか？<fix123>うふふ私もここでの挨拶の仕方を学びました<fix123>この幻想郷では常識に囚われてはいけないのですね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, did you come to visit the shrine in this cold weather?<fix123>Hehe, I've learned how to do the greetings here.<fix123>You can't let yourself be held back by common sense in Gensokyo, right!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Sanae Kochiya DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>何処に居るのかしら、あの馬鹿<fix123>文の言う事が本当なら、今回の一連の騒動は神奈子の仕業に決まっているわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm, where did that idiot go?<fix123>If what Aya said is true, all this fighting I had to go through was Kanako's fault.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（くんくん）)<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(sniff sniff)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ記事にしたいなら別にしても良いけどー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Uh, if you want to write an article, go ahead and do it.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（しますします。記事の焦点は、<fix123>　何故山の神が地底に干渉したのか）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(I am! It's focused on why<fix123>the gods of the mountain interfered with the underground.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうそう、やれば出来るじゃないの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's right, good luck.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Koishi Komeiji ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あ、丁度良いところに巫女を見つけたわ<fix123>ここの神様が何処に行ったのか知らない？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, what a good time to find a shrine maiden.<fix123>Do you know where the god of this shrine went?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おん？私も捜していた所よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wah? I'm looking for her, too.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？　神社の巫女さんが神様を捜しているなんて滑稽だわ<fix123>本当は隠してるんでしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh? The shrine's maiden is looking for its god? That's funny.<fix123>She must be hiding, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（誰でしょう……天狗が山にこの様な妖怪の<fix123>　進入を許すとは思えないんですが）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Who is she? ... I can't imagine the tengu would<fix123>let a youkai like her onto the mountain.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あれー？神社まで誰にも会わなかったよ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmmm? Wasn't there anyone in the shrine?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（さっきも全く気配を感じなかったです<fix123>　貴方はいったい……）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(I can't feel a thing coming from her, either.<fix123>Who on earth...)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>閉じた恋の瞳<fix123>古明地 こいし<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Closed Eyes of Love<fix123>Koishi Komeiji<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は古明地こいし<fix123>遙々地底世界から山の上まで訪ねて来ちゃった<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm Koishi Komeiji.<fix123>I came all the way from the underground world to visit.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地底からだって？<fix123>地底と地上の行き来が簡単に成り過ぎてる気もするなー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The underground?<fix123>I think maybe it's too easy to go back and forth between the two now...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（何にしても、勝手に山に進入されては<fix123>　困ります）<fix123>（今ここで追い返しましょう）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(In any case, it's not good for people to be able<fix123>to just come onto the mountain anytime they please.)<fix123>(Let's chase her away.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>というか何で私を介してやってるのよ<fix123>ここは地上なんだからあんたが自分でやってよね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Why do I have to do it for you?<fix123>We're not underground anymore, so you can do it yourself.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（いやまぁ、遠隔操作もちょっと<fix123>　癖になってしまいまして）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Ah, well, it looks like I've gotten used to<fix123>this sort of remote operation...)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>で、神様は居るの？居ないの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, is the god here or not?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>知らん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I don't know.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あらー困ったわねぇ折角来たのに何の手土産も無しで帰れないわ<fix123>貴方、私と遊んで行かない？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, what a pain. I don't want to go home without a souvenir after coming all this way.<fix123>Will you play with me?<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Huh?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>少しは暇潰しにでもなるかなと思って言ってみたんだけど……駄目？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I thought it would be nice to kill some time... won't you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（望むところ！<fix123>　いざ尋常に勝負！）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Just what we wanted!<fix123>Now, let's fight her the usual way!)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ、良いね！威勢が良いのは良いことよ<fix123>地上にも強い奴居るみたいだし……この間、お姉ちゃんが言ってたよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, perfect! I like people with authority.<fix123>I guess there are strong people up here, too... My sister was talking about that recently.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お姉ちゃん？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Your sister?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>めでたい色した人間にやられたってね<fix123>でも、めでたい色って何色かしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>She said she was beaten by someone dressed in auspicious colors.<fix123>But, what kind of colors are those?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ま、自信ないけどめでたい色って赤とか白とかかなー多分<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmm, I'm not really sure, but maybe something like white and red... perhaps.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うふふじゃあ決まりね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ohoho, then that's perfect.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM:BGM: ハルトマンの妖怪少女<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Hartmann's Youkai Girl<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方、最近地底に降りてきた人間でしょ？<fix123>お姉ちゃんが言ってたよ『あの人間の力は活用できる』って<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're the human that came down to the underground, aren't you?<fix123>My sister was talking about you... she said your power would be pretty useful.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お姉ちゃんって誰よ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who's your sister?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>生け捕りすれば、余分な怨霊の掃除をやってくれるいいペットになる筈だってね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If I can take you alive, you'll be a great pet who can do the cleaning work of tons of spirits!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Koishi Komeiji DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>強ーい！生け捕りどころの騒ぎじゃないわ<fix123>貴方、本当に人間なの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wow, you're really strong! No way I can take you alive.<fix123>Are you really human?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>言うまでもなく人間<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Of course I'm human.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（ちょっとちょっとそこの貴方！）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Hey, just a minute, you!)<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Me?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（凄いじゃないですか<fix123>　凄い力の持ち主じゃないですか）<fix123>（是非、今度貴方の取材をお願いしたいと<fix123>　思います）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(That was amazing.<fix123>Your power is really amazing.)<fix123>(I think I'd like to interview you some time,<fix123>if I may.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私を取材？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Interview me?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（出来れば貴方の家までお伺いしたいのですが<fix123>　如何でしょう？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(I'd like to come visit you in your house.<fix123>Would you mind?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Suwako Moriya ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>およよ？私の居ない間に何があったのかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oho? What happened while I was out?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ、やっと見つけたわ<fix123>私はあんたを捜してたのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, I finally found you!<fix123>I've been looking for you, you know.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私に用事？珍しいわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You need something from me? Well, that's unusual.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私の家まで取材ですか、旧都にある地霊殿まで来て頂ければ取材しても良いですよ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Interview me at my house? If you can come all the way to the Palace of the Earth Spirits in the Former Capital, you're more than welcome too.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（旧都……うーん<fix123>　そこに私はちょっと行けないなー）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(The Former Capital... hmmm,<fix123>I don't know if I can go there...)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地霊殿？霊夢、誰なの？　この娘<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Palace of the Earth Spirits? Reimu, who is this girl?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>知らない何か地底の住人みたいよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I don't know. She's some person from the underground.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうそう地霊殿と言えば……この間お訪ねしたわ、神奈子と<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, that's right, we were visiting around the Palace of the Earth Spirits the other day, Kanako and I.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何だって？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You were?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>河童達にエネルギー革命を起こそうと丁度良い高温高圧な炉を捜してね<fix123>ほら、地底世界には不要になった灼熱地獄跡が眠っているって言うから探しに行ったの<fix123>そこで灼熱地獄跡は地霊殿というお屋敷の真下にあるって聞いたわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We were looking for a high temperature, high pressure furnace to revolutionize the kappa's energy production.<fix123>We heard that the Remains of Blazing Hell wasn't being used anymore, so we went to go look.<fix123>We heard it was right under a building called the Palace of the Earth Spirits.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？　もしかして私の家に来ておくうに力を与えた山の神様って、貴方？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm? Are you the mountain god that came to my house and gave Okuu that power?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>正確には神奈子だけどね<fix123>貴方は地霊殿の人なのね<fix123>この間は無断で灼熱の地獄鴉をお借りして申し訳ないわ<fix123>でもそのお陰で無事に核融合炉は動き始めそうよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, to be specific, it was Kanako.<fix123>Are you from the Palace of the Earth Spirits?<fix123>Sorry for borrowing that hell raven without your permission.<fix123>But, it looks like she's helped us create our Nuclear Furnace.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いやー、おくうは強くなりましたし良い事ですわどんどんとやってくださいまし<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, it's okay, it's great that Okuu got really strong. Please do it as much as you like.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何それ<fix123>何かよく判らないけど地下で何かの計画が動いていたって事？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What are you talking about?<fix123>I don't really understand what's going on, but are you planning something underground?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（そういえば、河童達が色めき立っていた<fix123>　けど……何か関係が）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Come to think of it, the kappa have been really excited<fix123>lately... maybe it's related.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>山の神様といい、めでたい人間といい<fix123>いやぁ、地上にも強い奴が一杯いるのね<fix123>貴方も地底の地霊殿にいつでもどうぞ<fix123>手厚くお持てなし致しますわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wow, mountain gods, auspicious humans,<fix123>the above ground world is just full of strong people.<fix123>You're welcome to come to the Palace of the Earth Spirits any time you want.<fix123>We'll welcome you whenever you come.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地霊殿だって？あそこはさとりが居るからやだ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Palace of the Earth Spirits? No thanks, that's where Satori lives.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら、お姉ちゃんが苦手なの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, you don't like my sister?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だって、あいつは心を読むんでしょ？ってお姉ちゃんだって！？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, she can read minds, you know? Wait, your sister!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: The Hakurei Shrine.<fix123>
The shrine that stood on the eastern border of Gensokyo.<fix123>
The shrine trees stained crimson later than the mountain's.<fix123>
Once the leaves turned, there was only one thing to do.<fix123>
"It's nice to watch the leaves down here sometimes."<fix123>
"Don't you come down here all the time?"<fix123>
"We finally got invited to a human's party!<fix123>
Better enjoy it, since it doesn't happen much."<fix123>
"Come to think of it, what's the party for?"<fix123>
"Because the leaves are so beautiful.<fix123>
And, I want you, the youkai of the mountain, to get along<fix123>
with the new god of the mountain."<fix123>
"These gods aren't bad gods.<fix123>
So, I just hope we can all avoid fighting."<fix123>
"I'm absolutely not a bad god."<fix123>
"Neither am I."<fix123>
"Well, that's not suspicious at all."<fix123>
"I'd like to help revive faith toward all things.<fix123>
Faith is a reverence toward existence,<fix123>
a fear of retribution for one's actions,<fix123>
and something that enriches one's life; both the mind and the body."<fix123>
"...But, it doesn't really have to be that formal."<fix123>
"There's no difference between faith and the ability<fix123>to share a nice drink together like this.<fix123>
Cause people sometimes use saké as shrine offerings."<fix123>
"Well, she's quite a frank god, isn't she?<fix123>Why not invite her over for drinks some time?"<fix123>
"...Ahaha, you're asking a tengu to invite her drinking?<fix123>
We would have anyway. We could even outdrink gods...<fix123>
Hm, maybe we should invite you over every day."<fix123>
"So strong; ah, but so am I, like a woman possessed."<fix123>
"I-If I have even a little..."<fix123>
"How much is little? 3 pints? Maybe 4 gallons?"(She uses the units 一升 (one shō) and 一斗 (one to), which roughly correspond to these amounts.)<fix123>
"I'd better go prepare a lot of cucumbers with miso paste.(Specifically, もろきゅう (morokyu).)<fix123>
I've also been making pickles lately, they're great with saké."<fix123>
Somehow, the mountain youkai had great alcohol tolerance.<fix123>
Perhaps the many strong personalities on the mountain drove<fix123>off the weaker youkai. Or perhaps—<fix123>
Alcohol was the lubricant that made the highly civilized<fix123>world of the the tengu and kappa livable.<fix123>
In any case, let us spare a thought for Sanae, the one<fix123>human in this big mix.<fix123>
<c$Ending No.01 — Faith is learning to be friendly with gods?$><fix123>
<c$Congratulations, all clear! Just as I'd expected!$><fix123>
The Hakurei Shrine.<fix123>
The shrine that stood on the eastern border of Gensokyo.<fix123>
The shrine trees stained crimson later than the mountain's.<fix123>
Despite its resplendent beauty, it had few human visitors.<fix123>
"—well, you can't help it being like this if you<fix123>won't take up Lady Yasaka on her offer."<fix123>
"Well, I want to see more visitors, but...<fix123>
There's so many youkai here, so what can you do?"<fix123>
"I think the beauty of this shrine is why there's so many.<fix123>
Of course, our shrine is beautiful, too..."<fix123>
"I don't want to change the shrine's gods, so..."<fix123>
"Hmm... That's it."<fix123>
"I think I might know a good way.<fix123>
Why not give up on getting more visitors and just<fix123>concentrate on collecting faith?"<fix123>
"What do you mean?"<fix123>
"You can get plenty from the youkai who come here."<fix123>
"...From the youkai?"<fix123>
"Gods don't mind too much who their believers are.<fix123>
Gods bestow their blessings on youkai and humans."<fix123>
"Hmmm... oh!"<fix123>
"Ahaha.<fix123>But it's so funny imagining youkai praying."<fix123>
"Actually, youkai have much deeper faith than humans.<fix123>
Youkai place more importance on what something<fix123>symbolizes than the thing itself, after all."<fix123>
"But, you know, it seems like it'd take a long time to<fix123>get faith from the youkai who've always come here."<fix123>
"I'll try to help. I'm something of a shrine maiden myself."<fix123>
"By the way, why did you move here to Gensokyo?"<fix123>
"Well, you see, that's—"<fix123>
In the outside world, people's faith in gods was weakened by<fix123>the appearance of bad cults and religions.<fix123>
However, all gods benefit from all faith in them.<fix123>
Even though faith and entreaty are different things,<fix123>
humans of outside, in their independence, lost the need for faith.<fix123>
Actually, that's not true.<fix123>
Even now, they have faith deep within their hearts.<fix123>
People believe in the news, brands, companies, and friends...<fix123>
The object of their faith has merely shifted closer.<fix123>
If you're a god who wishes to regain faith from humans,<fix123>
try setting your pride aside and being friendly with them.<fix123>
<c$Ending No.02 — Worship, from those youkai? No way.$><fix123>
<c$Congratulations, all clear! Just as I'd expected!$><fix123>
The Hakurei Shrine.<fix123>
The shrine that stood on the eastern border of Gensokyo.<fix123>
The shrine trees stained crimson later than the mountain's.<fix123>
An unusual structure appeared on the edge of the grounds.<fix123>
"What's with that huge bird's nest?"<fix123>
"It's not a bird's nest.<fix123>
This'll be our shrine's savior."<fix123>
"...Pretty boxy for a savior, don't you think?"<fix123>
"We've been losing devotees for a while now.<fix123>
That'll make even this shrine's influence get weaker."<fix123>
"So, what's this bird box savior supposed to mean?"<fix123>
"After spending so much time worrying over faith,<fix123>
I thought I'd try borrowing a new god's powers."<fix123>
"A... new god?"<fix123>
"See? It looks like a little shrine within a shrine."<fix123>
"Huh, can you really do that, just like that?"<fix123>
"I already did, see?"<fix123>
"Doesn't look done to me."<fix123>
"You see, shrines are pretty flexible.<fix123>
This god told me she could use any shrine, no matter how small it was,<fix123>
even if she didn't take over my shrine."<fix123>
"So you built a really tiny shrine.<fix123>
But how's that going to build up your faith?"<fix123>
"We'll see. Isn't it good to try new things?"<fix123>
"Such a tiny little shrine...<fix123>
I hope the god doesn't hate it...<fix123>
Did you make it that tiny on purpose?"<fix123>
"Just what are you saying?"<fix123>
Gods aren't affected much by their abode, but humans won't<fix123>believe much in them if their shrine is too run down.<fix123>
Reimu knew that, but she got carried away by the situation<fix123>
and ended up unconsciously taking it out on Kanako.<fix123>
However, this little shrine was more popular than expected,<fix123>and even got the occasional visitor from the village.<fix123>
This new god protected from wind and rain, yielded bountiful harvest and gave luck in (danmaku) battles.<fix123>
<c$Ending No.03 — Blessings are the bread and butter of gods.$><fix123>
<c$Congratulations, all clear! Just as I'd expected!$><fix123>
Morning at the Hakurei Shrine.<fix123>
After losing to the god, Reimu made her lonely way home as<fix123>
the tengu talked about her behind her back.<fix123>
"Oh, this really sucks.<fix123>She's really going to steal our shrine at this rate.<fix123>
If I don't go right back there now..."<fix123>
Reimu headed straight back without stopping to sleep.<fix123>
Even though that's the worst enemy of a danmaku battle...<fix123>
<c$Ending No.07 — Have you gotten enough sleep lately?$><fix123>
<c$Aim for a 1cc on Normal or higher!$><fix123>
Morning at the Hakurei Shrine.<fix123>
After losing to the god, Reimu made her lonely way home as<fix123>
the tengu sneered at her retreating figure.<fix123>
"Oh, this really sucks.<fix123>She's really going to take over the shrine!<fix123>
I can't let her do that!!"<fix123>
Reimu went back for a rematch out of anger, but...<fix123>
If you can't concentrate, you can't dodge bullets...<fix123>
<c$Ending No.08 — Have you been getting enough calcium?$>(This is a phrase often used in Japanese when somebody looks irritated; a similar joke was also used in Immaterial and Missing Power.)<fix123>
<c$Aim for a 1cc on Normal or higher!$><fix123>
Morning at the Hakurei Shrine.<fix123>
After losing to the god, Reimu made her lonely way home as<fix123>
the tengu jeered and threw rocks at her.<fix123>
"Oh, this really sucks.<fix123>Maybe it'd be better if she took over the shrine...?"<fix123>
Reimu pondered the shrine's fate and went back to fight.<fix123>
But you can't dodge bullets if you're burdened with worry.<fix123>
<c$Ending No.09 — Can you let go of your worries?$><fix123>
<c$Aim for a 1cc on Normal or higher!$><fix123>
<fix123>地獄のラブリービジター<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Moriya Shrine<fix123><fix123>
