jp_dialogue: <fix123>Sanae Kochiya ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あら、この寒い中参拝に来たのですか？<fix123>うふふ私もここでの挨拶の仕方を学びました<fix123>この幻想郷では常識に囚われてはいけないのですね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, did you come to visit the shrine in this cold weather?<fix123>Hehe, I've learned how to do the greetings here.<fix123>You can't let yourself be held back by common sense in Gensokyo, right!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Sanae Kochiya DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>何処に居るのかしら、あの馬鹿<fix123>あの地獄鴉の言う事が本当なら、今回の一連の騒動は神奈子の仕業に決まっているわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Where is that idiot, I wonder?<fix123>If what that hell raven said is true, all the fighting I've been through is Kanako's work.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（うぃーっす<fix123>　今日はどこで遊ぶのさ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Heeey!<fix123>Where are we off playing today?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ここは地上なのに何でこの珠で鬼と通信してるんだろ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Why is an oni talking to me through my orbs when I'm still above ground?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Koishi Komeiji ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あ、丁度良いところに巫女を見つけたわ<fix123>ここの神様が何処に行ったのか知らない？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, what a good time to find a shrine maiden.<fix123>Do you know where the god of this shrine went?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おん？私も捜していた所よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wah? I'm looking for her, too.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？　神社の巫女さんが神様を捜しているなんて滑稽だわ<fix123>本当は隠してるんでしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh? The shrine's maiden is looking for its god? That's funny.<fix123>She must be hiding, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（あれ？<fix123>　その声、その姿……）<fix123>（古明地んとこのこいしちゃんじゃ？<fix123>　なんでこんな山の上に？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Huh?<fix123>That voice, that person...)<fix123>(You're Koishi from the Komeiji place, right?<fix123>What're you doing on top of a mountain like this?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>閉じた故意の瞳<fix123>古明地こいし<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Closed Eyes of Love<fix123>Koishi Komeiji<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あれ？どっかで会った事あったっけ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmm? Have we met before?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あれ？会ったっけ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh? You know her?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（ほら、地霊殿に最悪の主がいたじゃん？<fix123>　その妹だよ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Hey, remember the scary lady in the Palace of the Earth Spirits?<fix123>This is her little sister.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？さとりの妹？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Eh? Satori's sister?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふーん、もしかして貴方！お姉ちゃんとおくうを倒したという人間？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmmm, are you the human who beat my sister and Okuu?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そんな事もあったねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Something like that, yes.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>山の神様には会えなかったけどこんな所でそんな人と会えるなんて<fix123>なんてついているのかしら！<fix123>もしかして、ここの神社の巫女さんなの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I wasn't able to find the god of the mountain, but I can't believe I met someone like you up here.<fix123>What a long trip it must have been!<fix123>Or maybe you're this shrine's shrine maiden?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>違う違うこんな辺鄙な所で寂れた神社がうちの訳が無い<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, no, there's no way I'd live in a place way out in the sticks like this.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうなのまあ何でも良いわ<fix123>お姉ちゃんを負かせた貴方の力私が確かめるわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Really? Well, it doesn't matter.<fix123>If you beat my sister, I'd better test your power for myself.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何処行っても似たような奴ばかり<fix123>何で戦う羽目になるのかなぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Man, everyone's the same wherever I go.<fix123>Why do I have to keep fighting these people?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（霊夢、こいしは姉の弱点を補った<fix123>　力を持ってるよ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Reimu, Koishi has a power that compensates for<fix123>her sister's weak point.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さとりの弱点？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Satori's weak point?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（さとりの弱点は心を読めてしまう事さ<fix123>　こいしは心の眼を自ら閉ざしたんだ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Satori's mind reading is her weak point.<fix123>Koishi decided to close her third eye by herself.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何を独り言してるの？<fix123>私は姉と違って心は読めないのよ<fix123>ちゃんと聞こえる言葉でお願い<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What are you talking to yourself about?<fix123>I can't read minds like my sister.<fix123>Please talk to me with words I can hear.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>心が読める事が弱点で、それを補う為に眼を閉じた？<fix123>それじゃあ、ただの妹妖怪じゃないの楽勝ね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Her mind reading was a weakness, so she closed her third eye?<fix123>Well, then, she's just a regular youkai! This'll be an easy win.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ハルトマンの妖怪少女<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Hartmann's Youkai Girl<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何だか判らないけど準備できた？<fix123>良いこと教えてあげる<fix123>お姉ちゃんは絶対に私には勝てないの<fix123>何故なら、私は「読む事の出来ない無意識」で行動できるから<fix123>無意識に潜む弾幕それはお姉ちゃんも見た事ない弾幕よ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I don't really understand, but are you ready?<fix123>Let me tell you something good.<fix123>My sister could never win against me.<fix123>Why? I can act against the unconscious that she can't read.<fix123>The danmaku that lurk in your unconscious are danmaku that my sister has never seen!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Koishi Komeiji DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>凄い凄い！貴方、ただもんじゃないわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, wow! You're not just any normal person, are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この程度、痛くはないけど痒いわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That didn't hurt, but it sure does itch!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>こりゃ、お姉ちゃんもおくうもお燐も敵わないわけだ<fix123>全く弾に当らないんですもの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I can see how my sister, Okuu, and Orin wouldn't stand a chance against you.<fix123>My bullets can never hit you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（ぐーぐー……はっ<fix123>　終わったねぇ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(zzzz... zzzz... oh,<fix123>hey, it's over?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>終わったわよあんたが酒呑んで寝ている間にね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yeah, it ended while you were passed out from drinking too much.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ところで貴方何の為にその強い力を持っているの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Anyway, why are you so strong?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そりゃあんたあんたみたいな迷惑な妖怪を退治する為よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, so I can take care of troublesome youkai like you, of course.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>勿体ないわー私ならもっと面白い事に使うのにー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's boring! I'd use it to do something a lot more fun.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まぁ確かに妖怪退治は面白くないけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, youkai extermination can be pretty boring.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私なら恋い焦がれるような殺戮とかー平和な人間から殺掠とかー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'd start a love-stricken massacre! Or maybe pillage from a bunch of peaceful humans.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（まぁ妖怪だしね<fix123>　今度一緒に地上でそれをやろうかい？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Well, she's a youkai, after all.<fix123>Why don't we play together next time you're above ground?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>わーい、貴方やさしいね<fix123>地上も楽しそうだわぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wow, you're really nice!<fix123>It sure is fun up here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>こらこら私の姿で変な約束しないの<fix123>そういう話は私のいない場所でしてよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, now! Don't make any weird promises for me!<fix123>And make sure I'm not around when you do that.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（ところで、霊夢？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(By the way, Reimu?)<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>What?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（何でこの神社まで来たの？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Why did you come all the way out to this shrine?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ、そうだ神奈子か諏訪子に聞きたい事があったんだ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, right. There's something I wanted to ask Kanako and Suwako.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>二人とも留守ですよ<fix123>それで私はお留守番です<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>They're both out right now.<fix123>I'm watching the shrine while they're gone.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ、そうやっぱり居なかったのね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Mm, so they're gone...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何の用件でしょう？伝えておきましょうか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What did you want to ask them? I can pass the message along.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地底の鴉の話なんだけど……って言っても判るのかな？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It was about the crow from underground... er, do you know what I'm talking about?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>判ります判ります地獄鴉の八咫烏の件ですね？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Of course I do. The hell crow with the yatagarasu, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？何で知ってるの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Eh? How do you know about that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それは山の産業に革命を起こさせる為の神奈子様の秘策だと聞いております<fix123>クリーンなエネルギーが得られて成功すれば神社の信仰も集まると<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Lady Kanako said it was her secret plan to revolutionize industry on the mountain.<fix123>She said if we could obtain clean energy, it would bring more believers to the shrine.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何それ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この間、地獄鴉の餌付けも成功してまず<fix123>第一段階成功と言ったところみたいですよ<fix123>地獄鴉が思ったより大人しくて、何故か良く言うこと聞いてくれるって<fix123>もっと地上で暴れると思っていたので、何だか拍子抜けみたいですよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The feeding of the crow was successful.<fix123>I guess you could say the first stage is complete.<fix123>She was a lot calmer than I imagined, and listened to what we had to say.<fix123>I thought she'd go wild above ground; this is kind of anticlimactic.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もしかして私が地底に潜らされてやったことって？<fix123>河童の産業革命の手助けになっただけ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You mean my whole ordeal underground...<fix123>Was just to help out with your kappa industrial revolution?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？　地底に行ったんですか？何の為に？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh? You went underground? Why?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もういいやめっぽう疲れたから温泉に入って寝る！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, whatever. I'm seriously tired, so I'm going back to have a bath and go to bed!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地獄のラブリービジター<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Lovely Visitor from Hell<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>守矢神社<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Moriya Shrine<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ラストリモート<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Last Remote<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Sanae Kochiya ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あら、この寒い中参拝に来たのですか？<fix123>うふふ私もここでの挨拶の仕方を学びました<fix123>この幻想郷では常識に囚われてはいけないのですね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, did you come to visit the shrine in this cold weather?<fix123>Hehe, I've learned how to do the greetings here.<fix123>You can't let yourself be held back by common sense in Gensokyo, right!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Sanae Kochiya DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>何処に居るのかしら、あの馬鹿<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm, where is that idiot, anyway?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（神様を馬鹿呼ばわりしていいの？<fix123><fix123>　いいわよね）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Is it okay to call gods idiots?<fix123><fix123>Well, I guess it is.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あの地獄鴉の言う事が本当なら、今回の一連の騒動は神奈子の仕業に決まっているわ<fix123>地底進出でも企んでいたのかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If what that hell raven said is true, all the fighting I've been through is Kanako's doing.<fix123>Is she trying to take over the underground, too?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Koishi Komeiji ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あ、丁度良いところに巫女を見つけたわ<fix123>ここの神様が何処に行ったのか知らない？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, what a perfect time to find a shrine maiden.<fix123>Do you know where the god of this shrine went?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おん？私も捜していた所よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh? I was just looking for them, too.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？　神社の巫女さんが神様を捜しているなんて滑稽だわ<fix123>本当は隠してるんでしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh? The shrine's maiden is looking for its god? That's funny.<fix123>You must be hiding them, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あんた、誰？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>閉じた恋の瞳<fix123>古明地 こいし<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Closed Eyes of Love<fix123>Koishi Komeiji<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は古明地こいし<fix123><fix123>しがない参拝客よ<fix123>わざわざ地底から出てきたってのに神様が見つからないなんて……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm Koishi Komeiji,<fix123><fix123>A humble shrine visitor.<fix123>I came all the way here from the underground, but I can't find this shrine's god...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>こめいじ……？どっかで聞いた事があるような<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Komeiji...? I think I've heard that name before.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（ほら、地霊殿で聞いたんじゃ無い？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(You heard it in the Palace of the Earth Spirits, remember?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方、地霊殿を知っているの！？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You know about the Palace!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>最近行ったわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I went there a little bit ago.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もしかして……貴方<fix123>お姉ちゃんが言ってた地上の人間？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, are you...<fix123>The human my big sister was talking about?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>嫌な予感がするよー！もりもりと<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've got a bad feeling about this! Seriously.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お姉ちゃんが中々腕が立つけど凶暴で頭の中が空っぽの巫女にやられたって<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My sister said she'd got beaten by a strong, vicious, and empty-headed shrine maiden.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さとりの妹さんねあんたももしや……考えてる事を……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, if you're Satori's sister, does that mean... you can...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>心の事？<fix123>私は閉ざしちゃったわ覚りの瞳<fix123>人の心なんて見ても落ち込むだけで良い事なんて何一つ無いもん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Read your mind?<fix123>I've already closed my satori eye.<fix123>Reading people's minds only makes you depressed and there's nothing good about it.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それは良かった<fix123>じゃ、神奈子も諏訪子も見つからないし私はここら辺で<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, thank goodness.<fix123>Well, I can't find Kanako or Suwako, so I think I'll be-<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ハルトマンの妖怪少女<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Hartmann's Youkai Girl<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ちょっと待ってよ！<fix123>山の神は見つからなかったけど、良い人間を見つけたわ<fix123>私はおくうに神の力を与えた強い者を捜していたの<fix123>でも、おくうを倒した貴方はもっと強い筈！<fix123>お姉ちゃんすら敵わなかった貴方の力是非見せて欲しいわー！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, just a minute!<fix123>I couldn't find the gods of the mountain, but I found a good human.<fix123>I was looking for the strong person who gave Okuu the power of the gods.<fix123>But, if you beat Okuu, that must mean you're even stronger!<fix123>I definitely want to see the power of the person even my sister couldn't fight!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Koishi Komeiji DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>さっすがぁ貴方、ただもんじゃないわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You sure aren't just any ordinary person.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（ほんと、ただもんじゃないわね）)<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(You really aren't, are you?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>普通の人間のつもりだって<fix123>ところで、何で神様を捜していたの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I told you, I'm just trying to be a normal human.<fix123>Anyway, why are you looking for the gods?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほら、お姉ちゃんのおくうは地獄鴉の癖にすんごく強くなったでしょ？<fix123>聞いたら、山の神に強くして貰ったってさ興味あるじゃない？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, they were able to make sis's Okuu really strong even though she's just a hell raven, right?<fix123>And when I asked her what happened, she said it was thanks to some mountain gods! It's really interesting, no?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おや、参拝客が二人も今日はごちそうね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, now, two visitors today? Excellent!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ、いた。山の神様その２<fix123>何処にいたのよ、捜してたのよ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There you are. Mountain god #2.<fix123>Where were you? I've been looking for you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ちょっと買い出しにね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I was just out on a shopping trip.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら、もしかして山の神様？ちょっとお願い良いかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, are you one of the gods of the mountain? Can I ask you something?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>霊夢、こいつ誰？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Reimu, who's this?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地獄のこいし<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>She's Koishi, from Hell.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>へー小石ねぇ……妖怪かと思ったわで、何かしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh. Koishi, a little rock? ... I thought she was a youkai. Well, what is it? [1]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うん。私のペットにも何か神様の一つでも与えて欲しいわぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Mm. I was hoping I could get maybe a god for one of my pets.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……どういう事？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...... what do you mean?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうそう思い出した<fix123><fix123>あんた、地底世界に何かした？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh yeah, now I remember.<fix123><fix123>Were you up to something in the underground world?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地底……？もしかして、山の産業革命計画の事かしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Underground...? Are you talking about our Mountain Industrial Revolution project?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>産業革命計画？？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Industrial revolution project??<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この間、河童の工場を見学してね<fix123><fix123>外の世界に比べて相当遅れてたからねぇ<fix123>神奈子が、新しいエネルギー資源があれば、革命が起こる筈だって<fix123>ほら、神奈子は技術革命が好きだから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We've been inspecting the kappa's industrial facilities.<fix123><fix123>They're pretty backwards compared to the outside world.<fix123>Kanako said that if they could find a new energy source, it would create a revolution.<fix123>You see, Kanako loves technological revolutions.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（それで、核のエネルギーを得ようと<fix123><fix123>　地底に八咫烏を？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(So, you sent the yatagarasu underground<fix123><fix123>in order to obtain atomic energy?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は河童に核は危ないんじゃないの？って言ったんだけどね<fix123>それで？上手くいったのかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I told her "wouldn't nuclear power be dangerous for the kappa?", but still....<fix123>So? How did it go?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あんたらねぇ<fix123>何かするつもりならみんなに言ってから行動してよね！<fix123>その所為で灼熱の地獄まで行かされたんだから！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, you guys...<fix123>Next time, tell everyone about it before you start!<fix123>I had to go all the way to the Hell of Blazing Fires because of you!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（ふー……霊夢、ご苦労さん<fix123><fix123>　よく頑張りました）<fix123>（今回の事件は全容が見えたから<fix123><fix123>　もう休んで良いわ、温泉でも何でも）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Hmm... good work, Reimu.<fix123><fix123>You really did well.)<fix123>(I see how all of this happened now.<fix123><fix123>You can go home and rest, in the hot springs or whatever.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>話まだー？<fix123>私のペットには恋い焦がれるような陰惨な力の神様が欲しいなー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are you done talking?<fix123>I want to find a god with the gloomy power of love for my pets...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あんたにそんな神様の力くれてやるもんですか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You think anyone would give you that kind of power?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: Hakugyokurou. The Netherworld.<fix123>
In the end, morning came with nothing settled.<fix123>　　Yuyuko had gone to sleep without saying anything,<fix123><fix123>　　and leaving Youmu puzzled.<fix123>
<l$Youmu:$12345678> "Since then, Lady Yuyuko hasn't been talking.<fix123><l$$12345678"> It seems she is not in a pleasant mood..."<fix123>
<l$Youmu:$12345678> "I see. If she went right back to bed,<fix123><l$$12345678"> she plans to get out again later."<fix123>
Youmu also went to sleep.<fix123>　　It might be a good idea to take a bit of a vacation.<fix123>
The night lasted for a long time, wearing everyone out.<fix123>　　That's why Yuyuko quickly fell asleep.<fix123>
Bad Ending No. 12<fix123>　　Keep clearing stages, as far as you can go!<fix123>
The Netherworld at Night.<fix123>
The long-awaited full moon cheerfully illuminated Gensokyo.<fix123>　　The Netherworld was even more serene.<fix123><fix123>　　It was as if the sound of the moonlight itself could be heard.<fix123>
But while the full moon had indeed returned...<fix123>　　The Princess of that moon's people had hidden herself somewhere again.<fix123>
<l$Yuyuko:$12345678> "Today~ will be such a fun Girls' Day~."(Hinamatsuri (雛祭り), also known as Doll's Day.)<fix123>
<l$Youmu:$12345678> "Please don't approach me while singing.<fix123><l$$12345678"> Besides, since when was today the Girls' Day?"<fix123>
<l$Yuyuko:$12345678> "Youmu, today are the pickled veggies!"(Specifically,tsukemono (漬物).)<fix123>
<l$Youmu:$12345678> "That's another sudden development..."<fix123>
<l$Yuyuko:$12345678> "But I'm already tired. You'll help me out won't you?"<fix123>
<l$Youmu:$12345678> "Let's get to it then."<fix123>
<l$Yuyuko:$12345678> "I only want to see if a soul can prepare pickled vegetables."<fix123>
<l$Youmu:$12345678> "Won't they prepare themselves if you leave them like that?<fix123>
<l$$12345678"> Or are you telling me that a soul has to prepare it..."<fix123>
<l$Yuyuko:$12345678> "It won't get done by itself.<fix123>
<l$$12345678"> With the pickled veggies, there's a person who knows how to do it."<fix123>
<l$Youmu:$12345678> "With the pickled veggies, you say..."<fix123>

<l$Yuyuko:$12345678> "Pickled vegetables are things of incense. In other words, they are the things of the divine.<fix123><l$$12345678"> It's a gift from the powers of the heavens!"(A pun; she mentions tsukemono again, and then says 香の物 which refers to pickled vegetables in general, but the literal reading of those kanji is "thing of incense" (and incenses can be used for religious purposes).)<fix123>
<l$Youmu:$12345678> "S-So that's why?<fix123>
<l$$12345678"> Then, what would be the best thing to do with it?"<fix123>

<l$Yuyuko:$12345678> "Ah, that's where you have to use your culinary powers.<fix123><l$$12345678"> It's up to you how to utilize your power and produce the best tasting<fix123><fix123><l$$12345678"> dish from it. Do your best."<fix123>
<l$Youmu:$12345678> "Start it by yourself and force it yourself. Is that all?"<fix123>
<l$Yuyuko:$12345678> "Complementing the pickled vegetables is (laugh) complementing the wife!<fix123><l$$12345678"> Do it till others are jealous of it! Do your best!"<fix123>
<l$Youmu:$12345678> "Yeah, I get it, I get it. I'll do it, geez."<fix123>

And so, while an ordinary day unrelated to the full moon passed,<fix123>　　Yuyuko was actually preparing herself for something else.<fix123><fix123>　　That is the preparations for another departure.<fix123>
Yuyuko had realized that the full moon that returned was actually<fix123>　　not the real moon.<fix123>
Normal Ending No. 8<fix123>　　Try playing again without using continues!<fix123>
The Netherworld at Night.<fix123>
The moon's power has reached even the Netherworld.<fix123>　　Even now, the overflowing jubilation in the Netherworld resembles<fix123><fix123>　　that of the living people.<fix123>
Indeed, the real moon has returned to Gensokyo.<fix123>　　Compared to the dead one, its power is wildly different.<fix123>
The moon until now, what even was it...?<fix123>
Its image in the night sky brought memories of the moon from long ago.<fix123>
Yuyuko found that moon nostalgic, even though<fix123>　　it had felt so shallow.<fix123>
A new power is pouring into tonight's moon from the heavens.<fix123>　　It's not very nostalgic, but then again, it's reassuring.<fix123>
The power of madness was overflowing.<fix123>　　Hence the "full" in full moon.<fix123>
On this night of the full moon, they tried not to<fix123>　　look directly at the moon.<fix123>
Youmu was warned about this.<fix123>
After all, the moon is always, to anyone...<fix123>
an enemy.<fix123>
<l$Eirin:$12345678> "So, what is it?<fix123><l$$12345678"> Why did you summon me all of a sudden?"<fix123>
<l$Yuyuko:$12345678> "Now now, there no need to be so tense.<fix123><l$$12345678"> First of all, have a sip of tea."<fix123>
<l$Eirin:$12345678> "Eh? Ah... Then I will have some."<fix123>
<l$Yuyuko:$12345678> "Gelsemium. The tea of elegance."<fix123>
<l$Eirin:$12345678> "Oeghhh! This is deadly poison!"<fix123>
<l$Yuyuko:$12345678> "Oh my, you really are quite knowledgeable."<fix123>

<l$Eirin:$12345678> "I know all there is to know about medicine.<fix123><l$$12345678"> For that reason, poisons and drugs won't work on me.<fix123><fix123><l$$12345678"> Trying to poison me is futile."<fix123>
<l$Yuyuko:$12345678> "Oh well, guess that's that.<fix123><l$$12345678"> I don't really feel like using my powers~<fix123>
<l$$12345678"> Maybe I should have Youmu kill you instead..."<fix123>
<l$Eirin:$12345678> "No, hold on. What are you trying to do by killing me?"<fix123>
<l$Yuyuko:$12345678> "You know Youmu, yes?<fix123><l$$12345678"> In our fight before she looked at the full moon too much,<fix123><fix123><l$$12345678"> and now her eyes hurt.<fix123>
<l$$12345678"> I couldn't think of anyone else but you who could cure it."<fix123>
<l$Eirin:$12345678> "Oh, my, that's bad indeed.<fix123><l$$12345678"> However, I can't do anything about the moon's power.<fix123>
<l$$12345678"> Ahem, anyways, I was going to say...<fix123><l$$12345678"> Why were you trying to kill me?"<fix123>
<l$Yuyuko:$12345678> "Because you're handy. I thought you might be useful at my home."<fix123>
<l$Yuyuko:$12345678> "Hey, where is this place?"<fix123>
<l$Eirin:$12345678> "The Netherworld."<fix123>
<l$Eirin:$12345678> "... No, no. You can't kill me for that.<fix123><l$$12345678"> Even I have people that I have to protect, for which I have to be alive.<fix123>

<l$$12345678"> If it's medical service you need, just tell me. You can<fix123><l$$12345678"> also just come over. I mean, you can come to the Netherworld<fix123><fix123><l$$12345678"> even if you're alive, right?"<fix123>
<l$Yuyuko:$12345678> "It's more fun being dead~.<fix123><l$$12345678"> Besides, once you die, you can't die again. Eternal youth, you know?"<fix123>
<l$Eirin:$12345678> "Say, what's the state of your servant's eyes?<fix123><l$$12345678"> I'll do it free of charge, so don't talk so much."<fix123>
<l$Youmu:$12345678> "Oh, what a place to see vengeful spirits!"<fix123>
<l$Eirin:$12345678> "Vengeful spirits?"<fix123>
<l$Yuyuko:$12345678> "Not just the dead - it seems she's seeing the souls<fix123><l$$12345678"> of living people."<fix123>
<l$Youmu:$12345678> "And to see them so long and red."<fix123>
<l$Eirin:$12345678> "Oh, she has terribly red eyes.<fix123>
<l$$12345678"> Just like the eyes of a rabbit. If someone very sensitive<fix123><l$$12345678"> looks directly at the moon, that's what happens."<fix123>
<l$Eirin:$12345678> "Scarlet eyes, eyes of madness. They won't recover by leaving them alone."<fix123>
<l$Yuyuko:$12345678> "Actually, it isn't much of a problem if she don't recover.<fix123><l$$12345678"> ...Wait, but who will clean the garden in place of mad Youmu?"<fix123>
<l$Youmu:$12345678> "When I close my eyes, I can still see the spirits~."<fix123>
<l$Eirin:$12345678> "Let's prepare medicine and try to fix this gradually.<fix123><l$$12345678"> In the meantime, do not look directly at the moon."<fix123>
<l$Yuyuko:$12345678> "Amazing! You're like a doctor in a little village.<fix123><l$$12345678"> Won't you work in my home after all?"<fix123>
<l$Eirin:$12345678> "Once again, I don't want to die.<fix123><l$$12345678"> Even then, I've already taken the medicine made with the Princess' power.<fix123>
<l$$12345678"> It's a shame, but I cannot take up your offer here in the Netherworld."<fix123>
<l$Yuyuko:$12345678> "Is the medicine, by any chance..."<fix123>
<l$Yuyuko:$12345678> "Aiiiee!!! My natural enemy~"<fix123>
<l$Youmu:$12345678> "Lady Yuyuko? What's the matter?<fix123><l$$12345678"> To think that something exists that even Lady Yuyuko cannot handle...<fix123>
<l$$12345678"> She's normally on top of things."<fix123>
<l$Eirin:$12345678> "Okay, let's fix those red eyes."<fix123>
<l$Yuyuko:$12345678> "Oh, Youmu, you can't drink any of that tea.<fix123><l$$12345678"> It's too high class for you."<fix123>
<l$Eirin:$12345678> "It seems she treats you very differently compared to me."<fix123>
Yuyuko can manipulate a person's death.<fix123>
And so those who die by Yuyuko's hand cannot achieve enlightenment,<fix123>　　and the Netherworld becomes lively.<fix123>
But no matter how you look at it, the seemingly-invincible Yuyuko<fix123>　　has one natural enemy.<fix123><fix123>　　Immortal humans, and the thing that grants it - the Hourai Elixir.<fix123>
The reason is that their existence is beyond Yuyuko's power.<fix123>
If every human abhorred death and sought the elixir of immortality,<fix123>　　then the concept of death would vanish from humanity.<fix123><fix123>　　And if no humans ever died...<fix123>
Then no new spirits would come to the Netherworld.<fix123>
Humans must die. Even if the great medicine,<fix123>　　the Hourai Elixir, will always exist...<fix123>
Good Ending No. 4<fix123>　　Thanks for playing! (The trial of guts lies ahead...)<fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>(Well, if we want to find the hot springs,<fix123>we've got to find whoever's making that geyser.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うん？<fix123>お前もやっぱり温泉が目当てなんだ<fix123>河童が温泉で酒呑んでるのは<fix123>絵になるからなぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123>So you're looking for the hot springs, too?<fix123>I guess I can see a kappa sitting in a hot springs<fix123>and drinking sake.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>その珠からの声……<fix123>河童の声なのか<fix123>おーい、聞こえるかい？<fix123>珠の河童よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So, the voice in those orbs...<fix123>Is a kappa's voice?<fix123>Heeey, can you hear me?<fix123>You kappa in there!<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>(Bwuh!?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>山では平和に楽しくやってるかね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I bet it's peaceful and fun up in the mountain, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>(へえへえ、全くお変わりなく）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Yes, yes, same as always.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>心配するな<fix123>別に山を取り返そうとか思ってないさ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Don't worry.<fix123>I'm not going to try to take over the mountain again or anything.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>(……たまにはお酒呑みにでも<fix123>　遊びに来てやってください<fix123>（みんな忙しくしてますがね）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(...... I hope you'll at least come<fix123>up and go drinking with us sometime.)<fix123>(Even though we're all pretty busy...)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>誰からも好まれない恐怖の目<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Those Terrifying Eyes Nobody Loves<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地霊殿<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Palace of the Earth Spirits<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ハーツフェルトファンシー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Heartfelt Fancy<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>間欠泉を出してる奴ねぇ。<fix123>この屋敷で合ってるのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm, that person who's making the geyser...<fix123>Will we meet them in this mansion?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>(地底はこの旧都で終わりではない筈）<fix123>（もっと地下深くに降りる手段が<fix123>　あるはずなんだ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(There should be more to the underground than just the Former Capital.)<fix123>(There has to be a way for us<fix123>to go even deeper.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>詳しいんだな。<fix123>何か私に隠してないか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You sure know a lot.<fix123>Are you hiding something from me?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>(どうもこの屋敷の下から熱風が<fix123>　吹いている）<fix123>（どこかに地下に降りる穴か何かが<fix123>　ありそうだ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(You can tell the heat is coming from<fix123>beneath this mansion.)<fix123>(It looks like there's a hole somewhere<fix123>where we can go down.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふむ、お前は何かしっているな？<fix123>ま、家捜しなら協力をしてやってもいいんだが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm, do you know something I don't? <fix123>Oh well, if you're house hunting I dont mind helping.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Satori Komeiji ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>……来客？<fix123>もしかして人間？　<fix123>まさかね、こんな所まで来られる筈がない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...... a visitor?<fix123>Are you a human?<fix123>No, you wouldn't have been able to make it this far.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おっと家人に見つかっちまった<fix123>こうなったら口封じをするしかないぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, we've been found by a member of the household.<fix123>Now I'm going to have to silence her!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>(頑張れ〜、何か強そうだけど）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Good luck~<fix123>She looks kind of strong, though.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地獄の底で眠る覚悟は出来たか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are you ready to sleep in the depths of hell?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……強盗ね<fix123>愚かな<fix123>……間欠泉？　地下へ潜る穴？<fix123>なんだ、そんな物を探しているの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...... you're quite belligerent.<fix123>How foolish.<fix123>...... a geyser? A hole that will lead you underground?<fix123>Why are you looking for something like that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あん？<fix123>私が何か言ったっけ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123>Did I say something?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>温泉が欲しいのね？<fix123>河童と協力する振りをして<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You want a hot spring, don't you?<fix123>So you're pretending to cooperate with the kappa.<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>(Hah?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……。<fix123>お前は何者だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>......<fix123>Who are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 少女さとり　～ 3rd eye<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Satori Maiden ~ 3rd eye<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>怨霊も恐れ怯む少女<fix123>古明地さとり<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Girl Even the Vengeful Spirits Fear<fix123>Satori Komeiji<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私はさとり、この地霊殿の主です。<fix123>貴方の考えている事は全て筒抜けなのですよ<fix123>私の第三の目で……魔理沙さん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm Satori, master of the Palace of the Earth Spirits.<fix123>I can tell everything you're thinking.<fix123>My third eye shows me... Miss Marisa.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんだって？<fix123>まだ何も言っていないのに<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What?<fix123>I still haven't said anything.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>(おい、さっさとやっちまいなよ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Hey, just beat her up already.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ、あー？　まあそうだな<fix123>倒してこの家を捜索するしかないな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh, huuh? Well, okay.<fix123>I guess I'll just have to beat her and search the house.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>「心が読めるだと？<fix123>　何かのインチキに違いない」<fix123>「本当だったら今から考える事も判る筈だ」<fix123>「かっぱっぱー、かっぱっぱー<fix123>　きゅうりのキュウちゃん丸かじりー」<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>"She can read my mind?<fix123>That has to be some kind of trick."<fix123>"If that's true, she can tell what I'm about to think."<fix123>"Kappappa-, kappappa-,<fix123>taking a big bite out of Kyuuchan cucumber-" [2][3]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お、本当なのかよ！　<fix123>心が読めるってのは<fix123>こんな奴に勝てるのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wow, it's true!<fix123>She can read my mind.<fix123>How can I beat someone like that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>(心を無にして戦えばいいんじゃん？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Just clear your mind and fight her.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そ、そうだな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I- I guess.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>心の中で「無心、無心」<fix123>って唱えてもねぇ<fix123>まあ、人間と会うのは本当に久しぶりだから<fix123>戦うのも悪くはないわね<fix123>貴方の心の中には美しい弾幕があるわね<fix123>貴方の心の中にある美しい弾幕で<fix123>生ぬるい地上へ逃げ帰れ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You know, even if you keep chanting<fix123>"clear your mind, clear your mind"...<fix123>Well, it's been so long since I've seen<fix123>a human, so we may as well fight a bit.<fix123>You have such beautiful danmaku in your heart.<fix123>With those beautiful danmaku, I'll chase you<fix123>back up to your lukewarm above ground world!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Satori Komeiji PAUSES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>さあ、これからが本番よ！<fix123>眠りを覚ます恐怖の記憶 (トラウマ) で眠るがいい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now, this is where it really begins!<fix123>Go and sleep with a trauma so frightful, it'll wake you up!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Satori Komeiji DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>なかなか強かったわ。<fix123>やっぱり人間を襲うのは良いわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're quite strong, aren't you?<fix123>It's nice to fight with humans.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>(……お、私の弾幕じゃないの。<fix123>　細部は違うけど）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(... oh, those were my danmaku.<fix123>They were ever so slightly different, though.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>たまたま頭の中に浮かんだ攻撃を<fix123>やられるとはな……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Pretty weird to fight the danmaku that<fix123>just happen to come to mind...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さあ、貴方の望みはなんでしたっけ？<fix123>……ああ、間欠泉の話ね<fix123>それでは中庭に案内しましょう<fix123>そこに地底最深部に通ずる穴があります<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now, what was it that you wanted?<fix123>...... oh, yes, the geyser.<fix123>I'll take you to the courtyard.<fix123>There's a hole there that will lead you to the deepest part of the underground.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あいよ<fix123>あ、そうだにとり、お前の企みが知りたいんだが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Okay.<fix123>Oh yeah, Nitori, I still wanna know what you're up to.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>(……そうねぇ。間欠泉の根元にいる<fix123>　妖怪に興味があってね）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(... oh, right. I'm interested in the youkai<fix123>at the base of the geyser.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>間欠泉の根元にいる妖怪？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The youkai at the base of the geyser?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>(ま、あんたには関係ない話さ。<fix123>　個人的な用事だよ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Well, it doesn't have anything to do with you.<fix123>It's personal business!)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>話の通じない奴だな。折角、二人で山分けで<fix123>手を打ってやるつもりなのに<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I just don't get what you're saying. I thought<fix123>we were going to make off with equal shares.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>「宝があったら独り占めしてやるがな」<fix123>ですって、気を付けて珠の向こうの河童さん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>"But any treasure I find is all mine."<fix123>I'd watch out, Miss Kappa inside the orbs.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うひょ<fix123>ここは早く立ち去ろうぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Uhyo!<fix123>Moving right along now...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>昔時の業火<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hellfires of Times Past<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>灼熱地獄跡<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Remains of Blazing Hell<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 廃獄ララバイ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Lullaby of Deserted Hell<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あー暑い暑い！<fix123>なんじゃここは<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Man, it's so hot!<fix123>What is this place?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>(ここは……？<fix123>　本物の地獄の様な場所だね）<fix123>（ふっふっふ<fix123>　見えて来たよ見えて来たよー）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(This place... ?<fix123>It looks like this is a real hell.)<fix123>(Ho ho ho,<fix123>I can see it, I can see itー)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いいなお前は<fix123>この暑さを体験しないで済むんだもんな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Must be nice not to have to<fix123>experience all this heat.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Cat ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>……またあの猫だ<fix123>お前の珠が魚臭いんじゃないのか？<fix123>その臭いにつられて猫がさー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...... it's that cat again.<fix123>Hey, Nitori, maybe your orbs smell like fish?<fix123>It's attracting this cat.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>(そうかな？<fix123>　くんくん）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Do they?<fix123>*sniff sniff*)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 死体旅行　～ Be of good cheer!<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Corpse Voyage ~ Be of good cheer!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Cat TRANSFORMS INTO Rin Kaenbyou<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>じゃじゃーん<fix123>別に魚の臭いがした訳じゃない。<fix123>人間の死体の臭いがしただけさ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Tada~<fix123>They don't really smell like fish to me.<fix123>All I can smell is human corpses!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おお？<fix123>猫が大きくなったぞ……って<fix123>死体の臭い、だと？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123>The cat got big... wait.<fix123>Did you say the smell of corpses?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>強い人間の死体の臭い。<fix123>運び甲斐がありそうな死体！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yep, the smell of strong human's corpses.<fix123>Corpses that'll be worth carrying off!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>(なんだこいつ<fix123>　不気味だね）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(What's with her?<fix123>She's kind of unsettling.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地獄の輪禍<fix123>お燐<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hell's Wheel Accident<fix123>Orin<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さっきのさとり様の所で聞いたよ<fix123>間欠泉の根元にいる妖怪を探しているんだって？<fix123>止めときな止めときな<fix123>その妖怪は最悪の鳥の事だ<fix123>お姉さん、相当腕が立つようだけど<fix123>危険極まりないよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I heard you at Miss Satori's place.<fix123>You're looking for the youkai at the base of the geyser, right?<fix123>But, ya can't stop her.<fix123>She's the worst bird there is.<fix123>You may be pretty strong,<fix123>but she's really dangerous!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>(最悪の鳥……？<fix123>　それだ！　それに会うんだ魔理沙）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(The worst bird... ?<fix123>That's it! We should go meet her, Marisa.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あん？<fix123>誰に命令してるんだ？<fix123>お前の目的がよく判らないが<fix123>何か宝の匂いがするぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123>Is someone telling you what to do?<fix123>I don't know what you're after,<fix123>but I can smell treasure in it.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>(判ったよ。無事に目的の物が<fix123>　手に入ったら少し分けてやるよ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Okay. If you can get your hands on my<fix123>target, I'll share some of it with you.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>話が早いねぇ　<fix123>じゃ決まりだ、行くぜ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, that was easy.<fix123>All right, it's settled, off we go!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あらららら、強い死体のお姉さん<fix123>行っちゃうのかい？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, hey, hey, Sister Strong Corpse.<fix123>Where ya goin'?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>猫とじゃれてる暇は無くなったぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sorry, I don't have to to play around with cats.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>嬉しいねぇ、<fix123>そんなに死に急ぐなんてね<fix123>お姉さんの強い死体、魂<fix123>さぞかし車が重くなるだろうねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, it's so wonderful<fix123>to see someone rushing to their death.<fix123>Your corpse and soul look pretty strong, Sis.<fix123>I bet they'll make my cart pretty heavy.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Rin Kaenbyou DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>素晴らしい！<fix123>強くて感動したよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's wonderful!<fix123>You're so strong I was moved.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>(さ、行こう行こう！<fix123>　お望みの力はもうすぐだ！）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Okay, let's go, let's go!<fix123>The power I want is almost at hand!)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お望みの力ってどんなのなんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What kind of power is that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>(噂によると、今のエレキテルの<fix123>　何倍ものエネルギーを持ち）<fix123>（全ての機械技術が<fix123>　革命的に進化するという）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(They say it's many times<fix123>more powerful than electricity.)<fix123>(It'll revolutionize all<fix123>our power production methods.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あいつの力の事ね？<fix123>お姉さん、それが目当てかい？<fix123>あはははは、楽しいねぇ<fix123>私が止める必要なんて無かったね<fix123>ここだけの話、あいつが持っている<fix123>強大な力ってのは、神様の力なんだって<fix123>うちら地底の動物は怨霊や魑魅魍魎を<fix123>喰らって強くなるんだけど<fix123>あいつは何故か神様を喰らったんだな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are you talking about her power?<fix123>Is that what you're after, Sis?<fix123>Hahahahaha, oh, this'll be fun.<fix123>I guess I didn't have to try to stop you.<fix123>Just between you and me,<fix123>her power is the power of the gods.<fix123>We animals of the deep get more powerful<fix123>by eating ghosts and spirits, but..<fix123>Somehow she was able to swallow up a god.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なるほどな<fix123>どういう力か判らんが<fix123>私の魔法の研究にも<fix123>少しは足しになるといいんだが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see.<fix123>I don't really get it, but...<fix123>Maybe she can help me with my<fix123>magical research, too.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>荒々しい二つ目の太陽<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Tempestuous Second Sun<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地底都市最深部<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Deepest Part of the Underground City<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 業火マントル<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Hellfire Mantle<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Rin Kaenbyou ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>そうそう、一つ忘れてたよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh right, I forgot to tell you one thing.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地獄の底 (ここら) で死ぬとみんな焼けて灰すら残らない<fix123>死体が欲しけりゃ<fix123>やっぱりあたいがお姉さんを仕留めないとね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If you die around here, you'll burn so hard there won't even be ashes left.<fix123>If I want your corpse,<fix123>I'd better take you down here!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Rin Kaenbyou DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>何だよ、進めば進むほどに暑いじゃないか！<fix123>お前の望みはこの灼熱の力なのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Man, the farther I go, the hotter it gets!<fix123>Is this heat power what you're after?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>(噂ではその力は相当高温高圧になると<fix123>　言われている）<fix123>（究極にして最後のエネルギーだと<fix123>　言われているのに）<fix123>（こんな地熱レベルである筈がない）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(They say that this power makes<fix123>it hotter and high pressure.)<fix123>(They say it's the ultimate,<fix123>final energy.)<fix123>(This heat is nowhere close.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>こんなって、わたしゃこんがり焼けそうだよ<fix123>ほんとに……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>At this rate, I'm really going to burn up...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Utsuho Reiuji ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>話はお燐から全て聞いたわ<fix123>私の力の素晴らしさを認めに<fix123>人間がやってきたって<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I heard about you from Orin.<fix123>She told me a human came to see<fix123>how magnificent my power was.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>(来たー<fix123>　こいつこいつ！）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(She's heeeeereー<fix123>It's her, it's her!)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前、楽しそうだな<fix123>お酒でも呑んでいるのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I'm glad you're having fun.<fix123>Are you drinking, or something?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>(だって一番乗りよ？　我々河童の仲間<fix123>　でこの力に嗅ぎつけたのは）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Well, I'm the first one to see<fix123>this power the kappa heard of.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふふふ、あら地上でも私の話題で<fix123>持ちきりだったのね？　嬉しいわ<fix123>でもどうやって私の事調べたの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ohoho, so they're even talking about<fix123>me up above ground? I'm so happy.<fix123>But, how did you find out about me?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>(山の神様に教えてもらったんだ<fix123>　河童の技術水準を上げられる、って）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(The god of the mountain told us about you,<fix123>and said it would advance our state of the art.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？　山の神が何で……？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What? Why did the god of the mountain... ?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おい、盛り上がってるところすまんが<fix123>その、お前の力って何なんだ？<fix123>何で河童の技術水準が上がるんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sorry to cut in just as it's getting good,<fix123>but just what is your power, anyway?<fix123>How will it make the kappa more advanced?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>熱かい悩む神の火<fix123>霊烏路空<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Scorching, Troublesome Divine Flame<fix123>Utsuho Reiuji<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は、ある神様の力を取り込んだわ<fix123>黒い太陽、八咫烏様<fix123>この力は太陽の力と同じ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've gained the power of a certain god.<fix123>The Black Sun, Lord Yatagarasu.<fix123>It's the same as the power of the sun.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>太陽の力ってなんだ？<fix123>光合成か？　日焼けか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What's the power of the sun?<fix123>Photosynthesis? Sunburn?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>(馬鹿だなぁ<fix123>　魔法使いなのに勉強不足だよ）<fix123>（太陽のエネルギー<fix123>　それは超高温、超高圧の世界）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(You're such an idiot.<fix123>How can a magician be so ignorant?)<fix123>(It's solar energy.<fix123>A super high temperature, high pressure world.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>核融合ですわ<fix123>核エネルギーは超高温を半恒久的に<fix123>生み出す究極の力、ヤタガラス様の神徳よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's fusion energy.<fix123>Nuclear energy creates an almost everlasting,<fix123>super high temperature power; this is Lord Yatagarasu's power.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>(核融合は超高温故に扱いが難しいと<fix123>　言われてるが……）<fix123>（ここに制御できる鴉が居ると）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Because nuclear fusion requires such high temperatures,<fix123>it's supposed to be hard to control, but...)<fix123>(This crow here can do it.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>凄いな<fix123>太陽と同じ力かー。私も欲しいぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's amazing.<fix123>The same power as the sun. I want it, too!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>(だろう？）<fix123>（だから魔理沙<fix123>　こいつを生け捕りにして！）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Don't you?)<fix123>(So, Marisa,<fix123>make sure you take her alive!)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うぉーいマジかよ！<fix123>究極の熱を操るんだろ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wait, are you serious!?<fix123>She controls ultimate heat, you know?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 霊知の太陽信仰　～ Nuclear Fusion<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Solar Sect of Mystic Wisdom ~ Nuclear Fusion<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>核融合の力をどう使うかは、その人次第。<fix123>貴方は持ち帰って何に使うのでしょう<fix123>究極の乗り物？　究極の武器？<fix123>それとも究極の魔法？<fix123>でも、私は再び灼熱地獄を生み出したいの<fix123>地上を溶かし尽くしてね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Each person who could would control fusion energy differently.<fix123>What would you do with it if you could steal it away?<fix123>The ultimate vehicle? The ultimate weapon?<fix123>Or, maybe, the ultimate magic?<fix123>Well, I want to revive the Blazing Hell.<fix123>I'll melt the Earth away!<fix123><fix123>

The Scarlet Devil Mansion.<fix123>
In the end, morning came with nothing settled yet.<fix123>　　Although Lady Remilia was slightly miffed,<fix123><fix123>　　thanks to Sakuya, she quietly went to sleep.<fix123>
<l$Sakuya:$12345678> "That was troublesome.<fix123><l$$12345678"> Looks like I'll have to go defeat tonight's outlaws again."<fix123>
<l$Sakuya:$12345678> "I could also use some rest."<fix123>
There is no rest for a maid.<fix123>　　They must always work dawn to dusk.<fix123>
However, no one knew this particular maid's way of resting...<fix123>
Bad Ending No. 11<fix123>　　Keep clearing stages, as far as you can go!<fix123>
Nighttime at the Scarlet Mansion.<fix123>

The long-awaited full moon was bewitchingly illuminating Gensokyo.<fix123>　　The scarlet building became even more red due to moonlight,<fix123><fix123>　　which contrasted the colors even better than the sunlight.<fix123>
It's true that the full moon returned, but still...<fix123>　　The princess of that moon had hidden herself somewhere again.<fix123>
<l$Sakuya:$12345678> "Mistress, let me pour you some fresh tea."<fix123>
<l$Remilia:$12345678> "If only the tea was as red as the moon,<fix123><l$$12345678"> it'd be so wonderful..."(Black tea is called "red tea" in Japanese (紅茶), as well as Chinese.)<fix123>
<l$Sakuya:$12345678> "It's still pleasant, even if it's not as red as the moon."<fix123>
<l$Sakuya:$12345678> "...Wait, the moon is red?"<fix123>
<l$Remilia:$12345678> "It's so wonderful, though. Why do you suppose it's so red?"<fix123>

<l$Sakuya:$12345678> "Well, the moon only reflects light shone on it.<fix123><l$$12345678"> What we see is only the light from our hearts,<fix123><fix123><l$$12345678"> but why would that be red?"<fix123>
<l$Remilia:$12345678> "Doesn't sound very scientific."<fix123>
<l$Sakuya:$12345678> "This is Gensokyo, unscientific is the way things are."<fix123>
<l$Remilia:$12345678> "Really? I'll tell you why the moon is red."<fix123>
<l$Remilia:$12345678> "The color of the moon is derived from that light<fix123><l$$12345678"> which isn't absorbed by it.<fix123>
<l$$12345678"> Scarlet light, being the only color left, reflects off the moon<fix123><l$$12345678"> and rains down upon Gensokyo.<fix123>
<l$$12345678"> Thus humans, living under this light, have this red shade of blood."<fix123>
<l$Sakuya:$12345678> "That's very scientific."<fix123>
<l$Remilia:$12345678> "So, why does the today's moon do this?<fix123><l$$12345678"> Sakuya, what do you think?"<fix123>
<l$Sakuya:$12345678> "Well,<fix123>
<l$$12345678"> I do know, but knowing it won't help us."<fix123>
<l$Remilia:$12345678> "Just tell me what's on your mind."<fix123>

<l$Sakuya:$12345678> "I think that tonight's moon is very red...<fix123><l$$12345678"> That this may be part of the Moon Rabbit's madness...<fix123><fix123><l$$12345678"> And that this time, the battlefield is on the moon."<fix123>
<l$Remilia:$12345678> "Typical Gensokyo.<fix123>
<l$$12345678"> That could indeed be the truth.<fix123><l$$12345678"> And where did that Moon Rabbit run off to, anyway?<fix123>
<l$$12345678"> We'll have to track it down to figure out what happened."<fix123>
Gensokyo's moon was so unnatural that it had turned red.<fix123>　　It was obviously fake.<fix123><fix123>　　Of course, both Sakuya and Remilia already knew that.<fix123>
And while they both knew it, they had never spoken of it before.<fix123>　　To find the truth, they would have to venture out again to investigate.<fix123>
Normal Ending No. 7<fix123>　　Try playing again without using a continue!<fix123>
Nighttime at the Scarlet Devil Mansion.<fix123>
The real moon had at last returned to Gensokyo.<fix123>
As it turned out, the fake moon had been nothing more than a paper toy,<fix123>
while the real one should reflect madness.<fix123>

Normally, humans can't see such madness. However, the light reflected<fix123>　　from the moon was made out of madness-inducing wavelengths, with minimal<fix123><fix123>　　interference wavelengths. Pure madness sometimes is seen even by humans.<fix123>
It is said that's why ghosts are seen only during night.<fix123>

Highly sensitive humans were affected worst of all, and went mad.<fix123>　　To get to the root of the madness, the person who controlled it<fix123><fix123>　　would have to be found, somewhere in Gensokyo...<fix123>

The tranquil light of the full moon shone down on Gensokyo.<fix123>　　The white of the lake was blacker than black, while the green of the forest<fix123><fix123>　　was darker than darkness. Only the mansion's red color became a more deeper shade.<fix123>
<l$Sakuya:$12345678> "Going to the moon...<fix123>
<l$$12345678"> Is this meeting even necessary?<fix123><l$$12345678"> As a matter of fact, weren't they exiled?"<fix123>
<l$Sakuya:$12345678> "Ah, but they were away for centuries. Is the Lunar<fix123><l$$12345678"> Capital really so bad?<fix123>
<l$$12345678"> Or maybe it's just that Gensokyo is so nice?"<fix123>
<l$Sakuya:$12345678> "Well, whatever the case, it's not because of us, Earthlings and youkai.<fix123>
<l$$12345678"> It's not like they can escape from here."<fix123>
<l$Remilia:$12345678> "So naive and sweet, like the wasanbon sugar."(Wasanbon (和三盆) is a type of Japanese sugarcane sugar.)<fix123>
<l$Sakuya:$12345678> "I am trying to control that."<fix123>
<l$Remilia:$12345678> "Truth is, humans have already been to the moon.<fix123><l$$12345678"> If we just laze around, they'll leave us behind in the dust."<fix123>
<l$Sakuya:$12345678> "But I'm not a devil, am I? Also, really?"<fix123>
<l$Remilia:$12345678> "Supposedly somebody from the outside world has already landed on the moon."<fix123>
<l$Sakuya:$12345678> "Who would talk about something so suspicious?<fix123>
<l$$12345678"> Wait, I can probably figure it out without you saying."<fix123>
<l$Remilia:$12345678> "Well then.<fix123>
<l$$12345678"> Let's leave for the moon now."<fix123>
<l$Sakuya:$12345678> "Eh? A trip to the moon? What for?"<fix123>
<l$Remilia:$12345678> "Rabbit hunting."<fix123>
<l$Sakuya:$12345678> "You said to not be behind the humans, but you<fix123><l$$12345678"> also want to do something old fashioned."<fix123>
<l$Remilia:$12345678> "Quickly, then, make the preparations.<fix123>
<l$$12345678"> Wait, how do we even get there? Patchy?"<fix123>
<l$Patchy:$12345678> "..... It's not that simple.<fix123>
<l$$12345678"> We'll need a lot of things for this type of magic."<fix123>
<l$Sakuya:$12345678> "Ah, you're serious about this."<fix123>
<l$Remilia:$12345678> "If we need materials, we should be able to do it quickly, no?<fix123>
<l$$12345678"> After all, we have somebody very talented."<fix123>
<l$Sakuya:$12345678> "Let's learn how to say 'maid' properly."<fix123>
<l$Remilia:$12345678> "Well, what do we need?"<fix123>
<l$Patchy:$12345678> "To start with......<fix123>
<l$$12345678"> we'd need a lightweight yet durable rocket engine."<fix123>
<l$Sakuya:$12345678> "Such a different world..."<fix123>
<l$Patchy:$12345678> "To put it simply, something that releases energy<fix123><l$$12345678"> in a straight line."<fix123>
<l$Remilia:$12345678> "That does ring a bell."<fix123>
<l$Sakuya:$12345678> "So it's that for real?"<fix123>
<l$Remilia:$12345678> "I've heard Marisa mention something like that before."<fix123>
<l$Patchy:$12345678> "Of course... we also need liquid fuel."<fix123>
<l$Remilia:$12345678> "Blood?"<fix123>
<l$Sakuya:$12345678> "Yes, blood."<fix123>
<l$Patchy:$12345678> "Blood."<fix123>
<l$Patchy:$12345678> "Using blood..."<fix123>
<l$Sakuya:$12345678> "Uh, how many things do you think would be necessary for this?"<fix123>
<l$Patchy:$12345678> "For this, given the book, something like a thousand."<fix123>
<l$Remilia:$12345678> "They sure have made a lot of progress with the magic in the outside world.<fix123><l$$12345678"> So, what do we need next?"<fix123>
<l$Patchy:$12345678> "Next, we need... Armstrong."<fix123>
<l$Remilia:$12345678> "Sakuya, can you take care of that one, please?"<fix123>
<l$Sakuya:$12345678> "How can I get something when I don't even know what it is?<fix123><l$$12345678"> A strong arm...?"<fix123>
<l$Remilia:$12345678> "Well, do you want to go to the moon tonight or not?"<fix123>
The moon had driven them mad.<fix123>
The devils did not seriously think that<fix123>　　the humans have genuinely landed on the moon.<fix123>

It was just not meant to be.<fix123>　　The madness brought forth from the capital of the moon...<fix123>　　The eyes of ordinary people could not see it.<fix123><fix123>　　For the real full moon was not visible to them.<fix123>
Sakuya thought she saw a rabbit with crimson eyes of madness in the moon.<fix123>　　Perhaps she just stared so much at it, that it hurt her eyes.<fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, looks like I beat her.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（……嫉妬に駆られたペルシャ人かな<fix123>　よく判らない）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(... a Persian person driven by jealousy?<fix123>I don't really understand.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何でペルシャ人が土の下にいるんだよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Why is a Persian underground?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（あくまでも推測よ推測<fix123>　メモメモ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Look, this is all conjecture.<fix123>*scribbles notes*)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふむ。何か地底の妖怪の調査に<fix123><fix123>利用されている気がしてきたぞ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm. Why do I feel like I'm down here<fix123><fix123>to conduct research on underground youkai?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>忘れられた雪の旧都<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Forgotten Snowy Former Capital<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>旧地獄街道<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Streets of a Former Hell<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 旧地獄街道を行く<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Walking the Streets of a Former Hell<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yuugi Hoshiguma ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あんた、なかなやるね<fix123>何者か知らんけど、<fix123>暴れる奴には暴れて迎えるのが礼儀ってね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, you're pretty good.<fix123>No idea who you are, but they say<fix123>a rowdy welcome is best for a rowdy guest!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yuugi Hoshiguma STOPS FIGHTING<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>気に入った！<fix123>もっと愉しませてあげるから<fix123>駄目になるまでついてきなよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I like you!<fix123>We'll have lots more fun, so<fix123>Keep following until you can't take anymore!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お？<fix123>付いていくのは気が進まんが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh?<fix123>I don't really want to follow you, but...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何なんだ？<fix123>こいつ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Man,<fix123>what's with her?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（さっきの妖怪の事を調べたわ）<fix123>（さっきのは橋姫<fix123>　橋を守っている嫉妬狂いの妖怪）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(I read up on that youkai we ran across before.)<fix123>(It was a bridge princess.<fix123>A youkai driven mad by jealousy, sworn to protect the bridge.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おい、さっきの妖怪より目の前の妖怪の事<fix123>調べてくれよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, why not worry about this youkai that's here now instead?<fix123>Read up on her, please!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どうした、息が上がっているよ？<fix123>もう降参かい？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What, are you out of breath?<fix123>Giving up already?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（……そんなにすぐには調べられない）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(...... I can't conduct research that quickly!)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>役に立たないな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're so useless.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どうした？<fix123>私が何者か調べたいのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What's wrong?<fix123>Are you trying to figure out who I am?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おう！　よく判ったな<fix123>その通りだ、ついでに弱点も教えてくれ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey! You got it, you're pretty good.<fix123>That's it, now just tell me your weak point, please.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>語られる怪力乱神<fix123>星熊 勇儀<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Spoken-of Anomalies, Strength, Disorder, and Spirits<fix123>Yuugi Hoshiguma<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は山の四天王の一人、力の勇儀<fix123>弱点は、煎った豆だね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm one of the Big Four of the Mountain, Yuugi the strong.<fix123>My weak point is fried beans, obviously.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふむ、最初からこうすれば良かったんだ<fix123>ま、煎った豆なんて持ってないがな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh, I wish they'd all been this cooperative.<fix123>Too bad I don't have any fried beans on me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（……<fix123>　煎った豆が弱点……？）<fix123>（煎った豆……<fix123>　うーん、まさかね）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(...<fix123>Her weak point is fried beans?)<fix123>(Fried beans...<fix123>No way.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前、何をしにこんな処まで来たんだい？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So, why did you come all the way down here?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それが困った事に私にもさっぱりだ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh, you know, I have no idea myself.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（目的地はここではない<fix123>　邪魔する者は蹴散らして進んで）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(This place isn't our destination.<fix123>Get rid of this pest so we can keep going.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>乱暴だな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're pretty violent.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>乱暴だね<fix123>乱暴な者は大好きだ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, indeed.<fix123>I love violent people.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 華のさかづき大江山<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: A Flower-Studded Sake Dish on Mt. Ooe<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>でも、口だけの奴はここで死ぬ！<fix123>しっかりと試させて貰うよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But, if you're all talk, then you'll die here!<fix123>I shall test your strength!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yuugi Hoshiguma DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>お見事！<fix123>その腕っ節、流石にここまで一人で<fix123>降りてくるだけあるね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well done!<fix123>I expected nothing less from someone who made it<fix123>all the way down here on their own.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（……さ、次に行くよ<fix123>　そいつは……放っておこう）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(...Well, let's move on.<fix123>Let's just... leave her alone.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>って、行き先判ってるのか？<fix123>私にはここがどこだかすら判らんのに<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>... You know where we're supposed to go?<fix123>I have no idea where we even are.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ここは旧地獄<fix123>地上の妖怪が干渉できない監獄さ<fix123>お前は私に勝った<fix123>お望みならば、何処にだって案内してやるよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This place is Former Hell,<fix123>a prison the youkai from above can't interfere with.<fix123>You beat me.<fix123>I'll lead you wherever you want, if you wish.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（……じゃあ、間欠泉を出している奴の<fix123>　居る処に案内して）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(... okay, then please take us to wherever the person<fix123>who's creating the geyser is.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>間欠泉か……<fix123>そうだね、この先の地霊殿に行ってみな？<fix123>人間にはちときついかも知れんが……<fix123>ま、十分腕は立つようだしね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A geyser...<fix123>Okay, why don't you try going to the Palace of the Earth Spirits up ahead?<fix123>It might be hard for a human...<fix123>Well, it looks like you'll be strong enough.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前に勝ったぐらいじゃ自慢にもならん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Just strong enough to beat you, that's nothing to write home about.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（良く見て、そいつは戦いの最中<fix123>　お酒を一滴も零さず飲み干した）<fix123>（それに煎った豆が苦手<fix123>　……貴方は腕を試されただけよ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Look at her, while she was fighting us and drinking,<fix123>she didn't spill a drop of her sake.)<fix123>(And she hates fried beans.<fix123>...... you were just testing us, weren't you?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>誰からも好まれない恐怖の目<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Those Terrifying Eyes Nobody Loves<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地霊殿<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Palace of the Earth Spirits<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ハーツフェルトファンシー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Heartfelt Fancy<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>変な屋敷だな<fix123>地面が眩しくて気持ち悪いぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What a weird mansion.<fix123>The ground is so shiny, it's weird.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（ここに……<fix123>　間欠泉に仕掛けをした奴がいるのかな）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(I wonder...<fix123>if the person that made the geyser is here.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうだ、間欠泉がどうかしたのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh yeah, what about the geyser?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（あれは止めなければならない）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(We have to stop it.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうなのか？<fix123>よく判らんが<fix123>それにしても、<fix123>この館には猫と妖精しかいないのかな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Really?<fix123>I don't really get it.<fix123>Besides,<fix123>There's only cats and fairies in this mansion.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Satori Komeiji ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>……来客？<fix123>もしかして人間？<fix123>まさかね、こんな所まで来られる筈がない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>... A visitor?<fix123>Are you human?<fix123>No, you wouldn't be able to get this far.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>む、いたぜ<fix123>家の人っぽい奴が<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm, there she is.<fix123>Looks like a member of the household.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（うむ、では早速間欠泉の事を）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Uh, hurry up and ask her about the geyser.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ちょっと良いかな<fix123>間欠泉の事を訊きたいんだ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Um, excuse me?<fix123>I want to ask you about the geyser...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……間欠泉？<fix123>……<fix123>……貴方は本心からそれを言っている？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>... geyser?<fix123>......<fix123>...... you really want to know about that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あん？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方の心の中には間欠泉に関する情報は<fix123>殆ど無い<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It seems there's almost no information in your heart<fix123>about the geyser.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何を言っている？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What are you saying?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（……）<fix123>（ちょっと待って<fix123>　嫌な予感がする）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(...)<fix123>(Wait a moment,<fix123>I've got a bad feeling about this.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……<fix123>お前は何者だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>......<fix123>Who are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 少女さとり　～ 3rd eye<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Satori Maiden ~ 3rd eye<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>怨霊も恐れ怯む少女<fix123>古明地さとり<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Girl Even the Vengeful Spirits Fear<fix123>Satori Komeiji<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私はさとり、この地霊殿の主です<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm Satori, the master of this household.<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>(What!?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方は人間のようだけど、<fix123>私に何か用ですか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You seem human,<fix123>what need do you have of me?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だから、間欠泉をだなぁ……<fix123>どうするんだっけ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, you know, the geyser...<fix123>What do I do now?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（……間欠泉を止める方法を訊くの）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(...... ask her how to stop the geyser.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>余り止めたくはないんだが……<fix123>まあ止める方法はないのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But I don't really want to stop it...<fix123>Well, is there any way I can?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>間欠泉を止める、ねぇ<fix123>確かに私のペットにそんな事出来るのも居るわ<fix123>「そいつに会って温泉をもっと出させてやる」<fix123>ですって？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How to stop the geyser, you say...<fix123>I'm sure one of my pets would be able to do that.<fix123>Hm,<fix123><fix123>"I want to meet her and have her make more hot springs"?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あん？<fix123>なんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Eh?<fix123>What?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>「何で考えている事がばれたんだ？」<fix123>ですか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>"How did she figure out what I was thinking",<fix123>you say...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（魔理沙、そいつはお前の手に余る相手<fix123>　さっさとペットの元へ行くよ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Marisa, she's more than you can handle.<fix123>Hurry up and go find her pet.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私が許可を出してないのに<fix123>どうやって行くつもりなのかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I didn't give you permission to do that.<fix123>Just how do you intend to go find her?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あん？<fix123>何とか探し出してやるぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123>I'll just find her, somehow.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>「最悪、気持ち悪いこいつを倒して<fix123>　聞けばいいか」<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>"This sucks, maybe I should have asked her how I can<fix123>beat this creep..."<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おい、何で私の考えてる事が判るんだよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, how can you tell what I'm thinking?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（さとり……聞いた事がある<fix123>　地底で最も嫌われている妖怪だと）<fix123>（心が読める妖怪。その能力により<fix123>　言葉を持たない怨霊を従え……）<fix123>（言葉を持たない動物にのみ好かれる<fix123>　動物は成長し強力な妖怪になると）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Satori... I've heard of those before.<fix123>They're said to be the most hated of the youkai underground.)<fix123>(A youkai that can read your heart. They can<fix123>use their power to control the wordless spirits...)<fix123>(And only wordless animals love them.<fix123>The animals grow up to become powerful youkai.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さあどうしたの？<fix123>間欠泉を止めに行かないの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, what's the matter?<fix123>Aren't you off to stop the geyser?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何か心を読まれるってのは居心地が悪いな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I don't feel comfortable with someone who can read my mind around.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私には見える<fix123>心を読む第三の目が貴方の心象を映し出す！<fix123>貴方の心の中にある美しい弾幕が<fix123>貴方を苦しめるでしょう！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I can see it...<fix123>My mind-reading third eye will show me your very heart!<fix123>The beautiful danmaku in your heart<fix123>will make you suffer!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Satori Komeiji PAUSES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>さあ、これからが本番よ！<fix123>眠りを覚ます恐怖の記憶 (トラウマ) で眠るがいい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Here's where it really begins!<fix123>Now, sleep with this trauma that will leave you sleepless!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Satori Komeiji DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>なかなか強かったわ<fix123>やっぱり人間を襲うのは良いわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm, you're quite strong.<fix123>It's good to attack humans.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（……ではさっき言っていた<fix123>　ペットの元へ案内して欲しいわ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(...... Now, I'd like you to<fix123>take us to that pet you mentioned before.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>良いでしょう<fix123>ただ……<fix123>私も長い間会っていないペットなんで<fix123>今頃どんな妖怪に成長しているのか判らないけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Very well.<fix123>However...<fix123>I haven't seen this particular pet in quite some time,<fix123>so I don't know what sort of youkai she's grown up to be.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>飼育放棄だな<fix123>無責任な飼い主が増えて腹が立つぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What kind of master are you?<fix123>It pisses me off how many irresponsible pet owners there are these days.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私のペットは色んな怨霊や妖怪を吸収して<fix123>育つから<fix123>放し飼いが一番ストレスが溜まらなくて良いのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My pets take care of themselves by absorbing<fix123>various spirits and youkai.<fix123>Letting them run free is the best way to keep my stress down.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（さっき途中で会った猫も放し飼い……<fix123>　うちの猫と同じね）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(That cat we met before was probably running free...<fix123>Just like our cat.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前、猫なんて飼っていたか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh, you have a cat?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（……飼っていたのは人間だったかも<fix123>　誤差の範囲）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(...... maybe that was a human we had.<fix123>It's within the margin of error.) [1]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それでは中庭に案内しましょう<fix123>そこに地底最深部に通ずる穴があります<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I'll take you to the courtyard.<fix123>There's a hole there that leads to the deepest parts of the underground.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まだ潜るのかよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heading down again?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>昔時の業火<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hellfires of Times Past<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>灼熱地獄跡<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Remains of Blazing Hell<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 廃獄ララバイ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Lullaby of Deserted Hell<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>中庭って暑いもんなんだなー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It sure is hot in this courtyard.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（中庭だから暑いって訳じゃない）<fix123>（貴方が厚着だから暑いのよ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(It's not supposed to be hot in the courtyard.)<fix123>(You're hot because you're wearing those heavy clothes.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>確かに厚着してるな<fix123>冬だからこのぐらいは当たり前なんだが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yeah, I sure am.<fix123>This is what I wear in winter, you know.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Cat ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>……猫だぜ<fix123>猫に好かれるようになったのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...... it's a cat.<fix123>I wonder if cats love me now?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうそうお姉さん、間欠泉を調べてるんだって？<fix123>さっき聞いていたよ！<fix123>止めときな止めときな<fix123>間欠泉は最悪の鳥に会わなきゃいけない<fix123>触れただけで溶解し<fix123>目を見たら狂う<fix123>そもそも眩しすぎて何にも見えないかな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh yeah, sis, you wanted to find out about that geyser, right?<fix123>I heard you talkin' about it before!<fix123>You'd better give up. You'd better give up.<fix123>Ya hafta meet the worst bird ever to stop the geyser.<fix123>If she touches you, you'll melt right away,<fix123>and looking in her eyes will drive you mad!<fix123>And now she's so dazzling you can't see a thing.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>You're going, right? You're going, right?<fix123>I won't stop ya.<fix123>Man, I'm so happy.<fix123>There's no way she could do in<fix123>a corpse as strong as you!<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>(...... that geyser is a path for vengeful spirits<fix123>to come above ground.)<fix123>(Vengeful spirits are gushing out of it even<fix123>as we speak.)<fix123>(The spirits will possess any living thing, no, even non-living<fix123>things and create ill will.)<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>No.<fix123>I don't know everything about what's going on, but...<fix123>I don't care about sending any spirits in.<fix123>I wanted to go see above ground for myself...<fix123><fix123>
