Marisa's House.<fix123>

In the end, morning came without anything being settled.<fix123>　　Alice seemed tired, and fell asleep at Marisa's house<fix123><fix123>　　instead of going back to her own home, which was unusual.<fix123>
<l$Marisa:$12345678> "The night's shorter than I thought."<fix123>
<l$Marisa:$12345678> "But I'll clobber the culprit for sure<fix123><l$$12345678"> the next time around."<fix123>
Marisa made a plan in order to defeat the people from the moon.<fix123>　　And Alice slept soundly beside her.<fix123>
She knew better than to stay up ruminating...<fix123>　　Things are more likely to turn out in your favor when you get enough rest.<fix123>
Bad Ending No. 10<fix123>　　Keep clearing stages, as far as you can go!<fix123>
Nighttime at the Hakurei Shrine.<fix123>

The true full moon hasn't been seen for a while.<fix123>　　Now that it was back, it cast a bewitching light on Gensokyo.<fix123>　　Two people in particular were entranced by it. They were slinking about the shrine.<fix123><fix123>　　No doubt, it was because of the moon.<fix123>
While the full moon had indeed returned...<fix123>　　However, the Princess of the moon and her people went into hiding, nobody knows where.<fix123>
<l$Marisa:$12345678> "All right.<fix123><l$$12345678"> Seems like we're here."<fix123>
<l$Alice:$12345678> "What is it? Did you find something interesting?"<fix123>

<l$Alice:$12345678> "Although, interesting in your case usually means<fix123><l$$12345678"> moon rabbit sunny-side-ups or Reimu's fried and skewered meat and vegetables."(Japanese dish called kushiage (串揚げ).)<fix123>
<l$Marisa:$12345678> "Well it won't be *that* interesting."<fix123>
<l$Marisa:$12345678> "I noticed this recently...<fix123><l$$12345678"> Don't you think that this full moon is strange?"<fix123>
<l$Alice:$12345678> "Full moon?<fix123><l$$12345678"> There isn't even a full moon."<fix123>
<l$Marisa:$12345678> "There isn't? Okay, we're at the shrine.<fix123><l$$12345678"> We're about to leave its grounds. Keep your eyes on the moon."<fix123>
<l$Alice:$12345678> "But you're not going to trip me, will you?"<fix123>
<l$Marisa:$12345678> "Yes I will."<fix123>
<l$Alice:$12345678> "Wait, why are you surprised?"<fix123>
<l$Marisa:$12345678> "No matter how many times I see it, it always surprises me.<fix123><l$$12345678"> You see that too, right?"<fix123>
<l$Alice:$12345678> "Its size seems to be different.<fix123><l$$12345678"> No, no. Its color changed?"<fix123>
<l$Marisa:$12345678> "Somehow it changed.<fix123><l$$12345678"> Before you ask, I dunno why."<fix123>
<l$Alice:$12345678> "Do you think the shrine's border distorts it<fix123><l$$12345678"> and it looks normal from the outside?"<fix123>
<l$Marisa:$12345678> "Again, I dunno."<fix123>
<l$Alice:$12345678> "Still, there needs to be an explanation."<fix123>
<l$Marisa:$12345678> "Crap! Reimu's home."<fix123>
<l$Marisa:$12345678> "We gotta scarper before she sees it too."<fix123>
<l$Alice:$12345678> "Yes, let's go."<fix123>
There were changes in the atmosphere.<fix123>　　That must have been what changed the moon's shape or color.<fix123>
The change was obviously not an everyday sight.<fix123>　　Something must have stayed hidden before the two magicians.<fix123><fix123>　　This is why soon they started investigating again.<fix123>
Normal Ending No. 6<fix123>　　Try finishing the game again without using a continue!<fix123>
The bamboo forest of Eientei.<fix123>

The bamboo in the forest grew quickly, causing it to constantly change.<fix123>　　Even one who knows it can get lost.<fix123>　　Past the bamboo maze, they stumbled upon a clearing,<fix123><fix123>　　wherein the moonlight shone down on a beautiful old estate.<fix123>
The mansion was huge and ancient,<fix123>　　pretty much no one in Gensokyo knew of its existence.<fix123>
Perhaps it was merely an illusionary deception?<fix123>
<l$Marisa:$12345678> "Finding this old place was pretty fun, don'tcha think?"<fix123>
<l$Alice:$12345678> "I swear, I never should have come with you."<fix123>
<l$Marisa:$12345678> "Well, have fun getting lost trying to find your way back!"<fix123>
<l$Alice:$12345678> "Alone, in *this* forest? You're not getting out."<fix123>
<l$Marisa:$12345678> "Wow, seeing these ancient ruins, I feel like<fix123><l$$12345678"> an archeologist at an excavation."<fix123>
<l$Alice:$12345678> "So now we're grave robbers? Let's go home."<fix123>

<l$Reisen:$12345678> "Whoa, hold it!"<fix123>
<l$Marisa:$12345678> "Someone came out."<fix123>
<l$Reisen:$12345678> "Of course I did, this is my home!<fix123>
<l$$12345678"> What are you up to, sneaking in here like that?"<fix123>
<l$Marisa:$12345678> "I just came to have a look. We're not going anywhere.<fix123>
<l$$12345678"> I'm a witch most of the time, except when I'm an archeologist.<fix123>
<l$$12345678"> I'm doing archeological work right now, so are<fix123><l$$12345678"> you going to let us in or not?"<fix123>
<l$Reisen:$12345678> "Hmph, even if you are an archeologist, I can't just let you in!<fix123>
<l$$12345678"> Wait, if you're a witch, I don't see how you can be<fix123><l$$12345678"> an archeologist too..."<fix123>
<l$Marisa:$12345678> "Archeologist, grave robber, same thing."<fix123>

<l$Reisen:$12345678> "Go away! This isn't a tomb, anyway..."<fix123>
<l$Marisa:$12345678> "Ah, correction, we're thieves."<fix123>
<l$Reisen:$12345678> "Shut up."<fix123>

<l$Marisa:$12345678> "It's fine, it's always like this."<fix123>
<l$Alice:$12345678> "...No matter where, treated like this."<fix123>
<l$Kaguya:$12345678> "Oh, we have guests?<fix123><l$$12345678"> It's been ever so long since we've had company."<fix123>
<l$Reisen:$12345678> "They're just thieves."<fix123>
<l$Kaguya:$12345678> "Even thieves are a rarity here.<fix123>
<l$$12345678"> Inaba, go fetch the four seasons tea and serve our guests."<fix123>

<l$Alice:$12345678> "This thief is so self-important."<fix123>
<l$Reisen:$12345678> "Are we really going to treat these people as if they're guests?"<fix123>
<l$Kaguya:$12345678> "I've been in hiding for ages.<fix123>
<l$$12345678"> But I never knew there were Earthlings<fix123><l$$12345678"> that were as powerful as those on the Moon,<fix123>
<l$$12345678"> So, I'd like to ask about Gensokyo."<fix123>
<l$Marisa:$12345678> "It's a real nice place."<fix123>
<l$Alice:$12345678> "Marisa, you just had to explain it briefly, hadn't you?"<fix123>
<l$Marisa:$12345678> "This here's the person who swapped our moon for that fake one."<fix123>
<l$Alice:$12345678> "Here youkai are rampant, in this carefree and pleasant place.<fix123><l$$12345678"> Say, do you think we could continue this after we finish our tea?"<fix123>
<l$Kaguya:$12345678> "Strange, isn't it?<fix123>
<l$$12345678"> I *do* remember the Earth being populated by numerous youkai.<fix123>
<l$$12345678"> I don't remember there being this many humans.<fix123><l$$12345678"> When did the youkai stop feasting upon them?"<fix123>
<l$Kaguya:$12345678> "It was such a constrained world..."<fix123>

<l$Kaguya:$12345678> "It's quite interesting how humans and youkai interact.<fix123>
<l$$12345678"> This little evening chat has been fascinating indeed."<fix123>

In fact, the waning moon wasn't the real one.<fix123>　　Now, the true full moon shines brightly upon Gensokyo,<fix123><fix123>　　bewitchingly restoring the land's power.<fix123>

Kaguya and her entourage decided to stay in Gensokyo.<fix123>　　Within its protective barrier,<fix123>　　they were safe from any Lunarians pursuing her.<fix123><fix123>　　And with no need for a fake moon, the true moon was returned.<fix123>

Those who came from the cosmos to Gensokyo were not outsiders.<fix123>　　instead, they were considered its inhabiants; Kaguya and the others<fix123><fix123>　　would quickly adapt to life in Gensokyo.<fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Are you going to the festival they're having down below?<fix123>You look like it.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（確かに）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Indeed.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>土の下なんて別に興味は無いぜ<fix123>折角地上に温泉が湧いたっていうのに<fix123>なんでこんなジメジメした陰湿な場所に<fix123>来なければ行けないんだよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm not really interested in the underground.<fix123>I mean, we'd finally gotten a hot spring up there.<fix123>Why do I have to come to such a wet and gloomy place<fix123>all of a sudden?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（貴方に行って貰わないと困るのよ）<fix123>（私達じゃ地底世界 (そっちのほう) には<fix123>　手が出せないから）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(We'd be in trouble if you hadn't come.)<fix123>(After all, we can't make a move<fix123>down there.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何をごちゃごちゃ言っている？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What are you mumbling about?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前を倒す独り言だ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Just talking to myself about how to beat you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どうやら友好的な来訪者ではなさそうね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It looks like you're not that friendly of a visitor.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 封じられた妖怪　～ Lost Place<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Sealed-Away Youkai ~ Lost Place<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yamame Kurodani DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ほら、関係ない奴を倒してしまったじゃないか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>See, all we've done is beat up someone completely unrelated.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（そんなのいつもの事でしょ？<fix123>　つべこべ言わずに地下に潜りなさい）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Isn't that what you always do?<fix123>Just stop complaining and hurry on further down.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まあいつもの事だけどな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I guess it is what I always do.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地上と過去を結ぶ深道<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Deep Road Connecting the Past and the Above Ground World<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地獄の深道<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Deep Road to Hell<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 渡る者の途絶えた橋<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Bridge People No Longer Cross<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いま、地下何階だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How many floors to go until we're underground?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（洞窟に階数は無いでしょ？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(There aren't any "floors" in a cave.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうか？　ダンジョンってもんは<fix123>階数があるもんだと思ってたぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Really? I thought places like dungeons<fix123>always had floors.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Parsee Mizuhashi ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>BGM: 緑眼のジェラシー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Green-eyed Jealousy<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>現在、地下６６６階<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're now on floor B666.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地殻の下の嫉妬心<fix123>水橋パルスィ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Jealousy Beneath the Earth's Crust<fix123>Parsee Mizuhashi<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>逆さ摩天楼の果てまでようこそ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Welcome to the end of the underground skyscraper.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほら、階数があるじゃないか<fix123>大体階数が無いと深さが分かり難いんだよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>See? I told you there were floors.<fix123>It'd be hard to tell how far you'd gone if there weren't.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（降りてきた時間で<fix123>　大体判るでしょうに）<fix123>（って、敵が来てるわよ？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(I'm sure you could tell based on<fix123>how much time you'd spent.)<fix123>(But, there's an enemy here, right?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はいはい、さっさと倒すぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yeah, yeah, I'll beat her up now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>旧都を目指す独り言の多い人間<fix123>気でも狂ったのか……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A human going to the Former Capital who talks to herself a lot...<fix123>Are you crazy?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そういえば、お前<fix123>さっき会った奴だな？<fix123>ということはこのダンジョンのボスだろ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, didn't we just<fix123>bump into you before?<fix123>That means you're the boss of the dungeon, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（ボスね）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Yes, she's the boss.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ゲーム気分で地下に潜るのはお勧めしない<fix123>経験値稼ぎのつもりが、<fix123>時間だけ潰れる事になるかもね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I wouldn't recommend that you treat going underground like a game.<fix123>You might be trying to get experience points,<fix123>but you'll just be wasting time in the end.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Parsee Mizuhashi DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>時間が潰れたな<fix123>得られた物は少なかった<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yeah, I guess I've been wasting time.<fix123>I didn't get much at all for that.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（さ、先を急ぐわよ<fix123>　もうすぐ目的地に着くから）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(H-, hurry up.<fix123>We're almost to our destination.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おお？　やっと目的地か……<fix123>って何処へ向っているのか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh? Finally...<fix123>Wait, where were we going?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（封じられた妖怪達の住む旧都に）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(The Former Capital where the sealed-away youkai live.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふむ<fix123>ダンジョンが短いのは良い事だ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm.<fix123>It's nice that the dungeon was so short.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>忘れられた雪の旧都<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Forgotten Snowy Former Capital<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>旧地獄街道<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Streets of a Former Hell<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 旧地獄街道を行く<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Walking the Streets of a Former Hell<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yuugi Hoshiguma ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あんた、なかなやるね<fix123>何者か知らんけど、<fix123>暴れる奴には暴れて迎えるのが礼儀ってね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, you're pretty good.<fix123>No idea who you are, but they say<fix123>a rowdy welcome is best for a rowdy guest!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yuugi Hoshiguma STOPS FIGHTING<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>気に入った！<fix123>もっと愉しませてあげるから<fix123>駄目になるまでついてきなよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I like you!<fix123>We'll have lots more fun, so<fix123>Keep following until you can't take anymore!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お？<fix123>付いていくのは気が進まんが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh?<fix123>I don't really want to follow you, but...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なぁさっきから訊きたかったんだが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, I've been meaning to ask you...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お？　なんだい？<fix123>もう降参かい？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm? What's that?<fix123>Give up already?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いや、ここって地下世界だろう？<fix123>なんで雪が降ってるのかと思って……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, uh, this is the underground world, right?<fix123>So, why is it snowing down here...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あん？<fix123>まあ冬だから雪が降るのは当然だね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123>Well, it's winter, of course it's snowing.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なるほど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, of course!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（魔理沙、街に着いたからここで<fix123>　ちょっと情報を仕入れるよ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Marisa, we've made it to the city,<fix123>so let's try to get some information.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うむ、じゃあ、早速会話だな<fix123>お前は誰だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm, okay, let's talk, then.<fix123>Who are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>語られる怪力乱神<fix123>星熊 勇儀<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Spoken-of Anomalies, Strength, Disorder, and Spirits<fix123>Yuugi Hoshiguma<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は山の四天王の一人、力の勇儀 (ゆうぎ) <fix123>もっとも、もう地底に降りちゃったから<fix123>山に入っちゃいないけどね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm one of the Big Four of the Mountain, Yuugi the strong.<fix123>Of course, I can't really go mountain climbing<fix123>since I came underground.<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>(Big Four...?<fix123>Of the Mountain...??)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うむ、質問タイム終わり<fix123>街の人との会話なんてそんなもんだ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Okay, question time is over.<fix123>That's how it is talking to people in town.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>淡泊ね<fix123>私の方から質問してもいい？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Pretty straightforward.<fix123>Mind if I ask something?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どうぞ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Go ahead.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間が地底に降りてきたのは実に久しぶり<fix123>何故なら、地底には恐ろしい妖怪達が棲ん<fix123>でいるからね。普通、人間は怖がる訳だ<fix123>問おう、お前は勇者なのか？<fix123>それとも愚か者なのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's really been a long time since humans came underground.<fix123>That's because there's a lot of really frightening youkai<fix123>here. Humans always seemed scared of them.<fix123>So, then, are you brave?<fix123>Or are you a fool?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>商人だ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm a merchant.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（盗賊 (シーフ) でしょ？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(You mean a thief, right?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふふん<fix123>愚か者に質問は時間の無駄だったねぇ<fix123>お前が強ければ私は何も言うまい<fix123>どのような理由でここまで来たのだとしても<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ho ho.<fix123>I guess it's a waste of time to ask a fool a question.<fix123>If you were strong, I probably wouldn't need to say anything,<fix123>No matter why you came down here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（魔理沙、気を付けて！<fix123>　調べたわ！　山の四天王って……）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Marisa, watch out!<fix123>I did some research, and the Big Four of the Mountain are...)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 華のさかづき大江山<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: A Flower-Studded Sake Dish on Mt. Ooe<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さあ、思いっきりかかってきな！<fix123>さもないと、べそかいても知らないよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Alright, come on and fight me seriously!<fix123>If you don't, you might end up in tears!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yuugi Hoshiguma DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>お見事！<fix123>その腕っ節、気に入ったよ！<fix123>今日からお前は朋友だ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well done!<fix123>I love how strong you are!<fix123>We're friends from now on.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（山の四天王って、妖怪の山の事だと<fix123>　したら、鬼の四天王の事よ）<fix123>（だとすれば、目の前の妖怪は鬼……）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(The Big Four of the Mountain are the four<fix123>big oni, if we're talking about the Youkai Mountain.)<fix123>(Which would mean you're looking at an oni...)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>鬼……？<fix123>萃香みたいなもんか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>An oni...?<fix123>You mean, like Suika?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ところで、お前の用はなんだい？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So, why did you come down here?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それが私にもさっぱりだ……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I have no idea, myself...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（そこの貴方にお願いです<fix123>　間欠泉を今すぐ止めて欲しいのです）<fix123>（あの間欠泉からは禍々しい物を<fix123>　感じます。何より……）<fix123>（間欠泉の近くでは人形が狂うのです<fix123>　まるで何かを怨むように……）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(I've got something to ask you.<fix123>I'd like you to stop the geyser that's erupting now.)<fix123>(I can feel something sinister behind<fix123>it all. Above all...)<fix123>(My dolls go out of control when they get near it.<fix123>It's as if they've got some sort of grudge...)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>間欠泉か……<fix123>何だろう、私にも判らないけど……<fix123>この先の地霊殿に向かうと良いね<fix123>そこの奴らなら何か判るかも知れない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A geyser, huh?<fix123>That's odd, I have no idea about that either...<fix123>You should probably go to the Palace of the Earth Spirits.<fix123>They might know something up there.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>やっと街の人らしくなってきたな<fix123>だが<fix123>何だよ、アリス (おまえ) 。地下に向かう理由は<fix123>間欠泉 (おんせん) を止める為だったのかよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, you're finally acting like a townsperson.<fix123>But...<fix123>What's with you, Alice? You sent me down here<fix123>to try to stop the hot springs?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（そうよ。あんたに言ったら<fix123>　反対しそうだから言わなかっただけ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(That's right.  I thought you'd object<fix123>if I mentioned it, so I didn't tell you.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふん、ここまで来たらその地霊殿とやらに<fix123>行って、温泉をボコボコ湧かせるまでだ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I guess if I've come this far, I'll go to that<fix123>Palace of the Earth Spirits or whatever and make those springs gush forth!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>誰からも好まれない恐怖の目<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Those Terrifying Eyes Nobody Loves<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地霊殿<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Palace of the Earth Spirits<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ハーツフェルトファンシー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Heartfelt Fancy<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さあラストダンジョンも大詰めだぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>And here the last dungeon comes to a finale.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（そうね、ちゃんと準備した？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(That's right, are you prepared for it?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ、さっきの街で買い物すれば良かったな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, I should have done some shopping in the town back there.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（でも、何か住人が見あたらないわ。<fix123>　……猫はいたけど）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(But, it doesn't look like there are any townsfolk here.<fix123>......There was a cat, though.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>大丈夫だ。誰もいない家の家捜しをするのは<fix123>基本中の基本だ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's all good. Searching a house with nobody in it is<fix123>the basic of basics.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Satori Komeiji ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>……誰かしら？<fix123>人間……？<fix123>まさかね、こんな所まで来られる筈がない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>......Who is it?<fix123>A human......?<fix123>I can't believe a human could make it all the way down here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>大丈夫だ。人がいる家の家捜しをするのも<fix123>基本中の基本<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's all good. Searching a house with somebody in it is also<fix123>the basic of basics.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（話を聞いた方が良くない？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Why don't you listen to what she has to say?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、もっと温泉が湧くようにして欲しいんだが<fix123>どうすればいいんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Aah, well, I want the hot spring to gush more.<fix123>What should I do?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……貴方は考えている事と正反対の事を<fix123>言っているのね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...What you are saying is the opposite of<fix123>what you are thinking.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あん？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方は今湧いている温泉に疑問を<fix123>持ち始めている<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now you're starting to have questions about the gushing hot spring.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どういう事だ……？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What do you mean...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 少女さとり　～ 3rd eye<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Satori Maiden ~ 3rd eye<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>怨霊も恐れ怯む少女<fix123>古明地さとり<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Girl Even the Vengeful Spirits Fear<fix123>Satori Komeiji<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私はさとり、この地霊殿の主です<fix123>私には一切隠し事は出来ません<fix123>私には貴方の心が丸見えなのです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm Satori, the master of the Palace of the Earth Spirits.<fix123>No one can hide anything from me.<fix123>Your heart is in plain sight to me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……え？<fix123>なんだって？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>......Huh?<fix123>What the heck?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（……さとり！<fix123>　地上から追放された妖怪よ）<fix123>（心が読める危険極まりない能力の<fix123>　持ち主。勝ち目はないわ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(......A satori!<fix123>She's a youkai exiled from the surface.)<fix123>(She has an extremely dangerous ability, mind reading.<fix123>There's no way you can win.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うへぇ、それは嫌だな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yuck, I don't like this.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（間欠泉の調査でこんな所に<fix123>　来させられるなんて）<fix123>（もしかして、さっきの鬼に<fix123>　騙されたのかなぁ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(I can't believe we were led here just by<fix123>investigating that geyser.)<fix123>(Perhaps the oni back there<fix123>tricked us?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>鬼は嘘吐かないと思ったが……<fix123>多分、こいつが何かを知っているんだろ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I didn't think oni were such liars, though...<fix123>Maybe she knows something?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……「心が読めるなんて嘘っぽいな」<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>..."Mind reading, that sounds like a lie."<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>およよ<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>……「どうせ倒せば解決するんだろ？」<fix123>ですか<fix123>……「面倒だ、戦っちゃおうぜ」<fix123>ですか、好戦的ね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>......"Anyway, everything'll be fine if I beat her, right?"<fix123>I see.<fix123>......"What a pain, let's just fight."<fix123>I see. How belligerent.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（魔理沙……あんたねぇ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Marisa... You....)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いいじゃねえか心が<fix123>読めるのは本当みたいだな<fix123>今はもう戦う事しか考えてないぜ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Don't worry. Seems like<fix123>she can really read minds, though.<fix123>Right now, I'm not thinking about anything else but fighting her!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふん、私には見える<fix123>心を読む第三の目が貴方の心象を映し出す！<fix123>戦いの心象<fix123>それに貴方は苦しめられるといいわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm, I can see it.<fix123>My mind-reading third eye will show me your very heart!<fix123>An image of battle...<fix123>I think I can use this to make you suffer.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Satori Komeiji PAUSES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>さあ、これからが本番よ！<fix123>眠りを覚ます恐怖の記憶 (トラウマ) で眠るがいい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Here I come. From now on it's the real thing!<fix123>Sleep with the trauma that always wakes you up!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Satori Komeiji DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>なかなか強かったわ<fix123>でも、貴方の目的は私を倒す事ではない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're pretty strong,<fix123>But you didn't come here to beat me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>心が読めるのなら嘘を吐く必要もあるまい<fix123>そうだ！　間欠泉の秘密を探りに来たんだ！<fix123>そうしたら鬼がこの屋敷に行けと……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If you can read minds, then there's no need to lie.<fix123>Oh, that's right! I came to discover the secrets of the geyser!<fix123>And then that oni told me to come to this mansion...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>初めからそういえば良かったのに<fix123>私は貴方と戦う必要なんて……<fix123>……間欠泉が問題なら確かに私の<fix123>ペットの仕業かも知れません<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You should have said that from the beginning.<fix123>I wouldn't have had to fight you...<fix123>... If a geyser is causing you trouble, then<fix123>it's probably my pet's doing.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（ペット？<fix123>　さっきの猫かしらね）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Your pet?<fix123>You mean the cat we saw before?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>調べたいのなら<fix123>中庭を開けてあげましょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If you want to find out more,<fix123>I'll open the courtyard for you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>中庭だと？<fix123>そこにペットがいるんだな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The courtyard?<fix123>Your pet is there, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いや、中庭からさらに地下深くへ潜れる<fix123>穴があります<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, the courtyard has a hole that leads down<fix123>to the depths of the underworld.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, so I guess this place isn't<fix123>the last dungeon?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（まだまだ、地下深くに潜るのね<fix123>　頑張って）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(We still have a long way to go. Let's go the depths of the underworld.<fix123>Hang in there.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>「その前に家捜しを……」ですって<fix123>それは許可しません<fix123>さっさと中庭へ向かってくださいね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>"Before that, let's search the house...." you think.<fix123>I won't allow that.<fix123>Please head to the courtyard immediately.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ちえっ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Damn.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Hellfires of Times Past<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Remains of Blazing Hell<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Whew...<fix123>This is so hot. So hot I could die! [1]<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>(Are the dolls okay?)<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>(I think the dolls themselves will be fine,<fix123>but it would be bad if the gunpowder inside caught fire.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何で火薬仕込んであるんだよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Why the hell did you stuff gunpowder in 'em?<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>……また猫だ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>......it's that cat again.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（魔理沙、何かエサとか撒いてない？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Marisa, are you throwing around some kind of cat food?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人形にじゃれているんじゃないか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Maybe it wants to play with these dolls?<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Corpse Voyage ~ Be of good cheer!<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>じゃじゃーん<fix123>お姉さん、強いねぇ<fix123>さとり様を倒しちゃうなんて<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Tada~<fix123>Sis, you're pretty strong.<fix123>You even beat Miss Satori.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おおっと、来た！<fix123>いきなりボスだぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ooh, here she comes!<fix123>A boss, out of the blue.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（あんまりいきなりでもないね……）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(It wasn't exactly out of the blue, actually......)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地獄の輪禍<fix123>お燐<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hell's Wheel Accident<fix123>Orin<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お姉さん、間欠泉を調べてるんだって？<fix123>さとり様とのやりとり見ていたよー！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So, sis, you're investigating the geyser, right?<fix123>I saw ya goin' back and forth with Miss Satori!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ラストダンジョンの中ボスお出ましって所かな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That must have been the last dungeon's mid-boss, I guess.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（いや、間欠泉ならペットだって<fix123>　さっき言ってたわ）<fix123>（こいつがラストじゃないかな？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(No, she said the geyser was her pet's doing.)<fix123>(Is this girl the last boss?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>残念！<fix123>間欠泉はあたいの管轄じゃないのさー<fix123>お姉さんが強かったから付いて来ただけね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Too bad!<fix123>The geyser's not my territory.<fix123>I just followed you because you're strong.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>間欠泉はこいつじゃないってさ<fix123>じゃあ次行こうぜ？　体力が勿体ない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>She said it's not her.<fix123>Why don't we go? I'm wasting my energy, here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（じゃあ、<fix123>　こいつは何の妖怪なのかしら……）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Well,<fix123>I wonder what kind of youkai she is...)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>死体と怨霊ならあたいにお任せ！<fix123>地獄の死体運搬はお燐の猫車運送でってね<fix123>お姉さんの強い死体、魂<fix123>この灼熱地獄で良い怨霊に育つはずさ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Leave your corpses and vengeful spirits to me!<fix123>Shipping dead bodies to hell, Orin's wheelbarrow transport at your service.<fix123>In this Blazing Hell, we'll grow your corpse and spirit<fix123>into a really great vengeful spirit!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Rin Kaenbyou DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>くー、お姉さんやるねぇ<fix123>あたい、いたく感動したよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Aww, you sure did it, sis.<fix123>I'm really moved!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（怨霊？<fix123>　怨霊って余り聞かないわね？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Vengeful spirits?<fix123>We don't hear about them often, do we?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>怨霊って地上には余りいないよな<fix123>幽霊と何が違うんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There aren't many vengeful spirits on the surface.<fix123>How are they different from phantoms?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>怨霊は恨みだけが一人歩きした幽霊さ<fix123>こいつが憑けば人間も妖怪もこの世を<fix123>怨むようになる<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A vengeful spirit is a ghost that came into being because of a grudge.<fix123>If one possesses a human or a youkai,<fix123>the possessed will come to hold a grudge against the world.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（怨むようになる？<fix123>　もしかして間欠泉の異常って……）<fix123>（間欠泉の近くで人形が狂う理由って<fix123>　……怨霊かしら？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Will come to hold a grudge against world?<fix123>Then, maybe the geyser incident...)<fix123>(And my dolls going crazy near the geyser is<fix123>... because of the vengeful spirits?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんだって？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（間欠泉と一緒に怨霊が湧いている？<fix123>　だとしたら納得できるわ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Vengeful spirits are coming from the geyser, right?<fix123>If that's the case, then I'm satisfied with this explanation.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そりゃ危ない<fix123>さあ、間欠泉を止める冒険に出ようか！<fix123>おおっと、もう終盤だった<fix123>このノリは間違っていたな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's dangerous.<fix123>So, let's depart on an adventure to stop the geyser!<fix123>Oops, it's already the last stage.<fix123>Never mind that excitement, then.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お姉さん、間欠泉を止めるんだね？<fix123>止めときな<fix123>間欠泉を管理しているあいつは危険さ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sis, you're going to stop the geyser, right?<fix123>You'd better give up.<fix123>The one that controls geysers is deadly.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（ふふふ、もう本当にラストみたいね<fix123>　街の人に止めろって言われるなんて）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Hahaha, then she must be the real last boss.<fix123>We were told not to do it by the townspeople, too.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そだな、じゃ、仕切り直して行くか！<fix123>最後の戦いはもう目の前だぜ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Right, well, let's go settle it then!<fix123>The last battle is right before our eyes!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうかい、どうしても行くって言うのかい<fix123>なら、骨は拾ってあげるから頑張ってね<fix123>強い死体のお姉さん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see, so you're gonna go on anyway.<fix123>Do your best, 'cause remember, I'll be there to pick up your bones,<fix123>Big Sis Strong Corpse.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>荒々しい二つ目の太陽<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Tempestuous Second Sun<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地底都市最深部<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Deepest Part of the Underground City<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 業火マントル<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Hellfire Mantle<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>そうそう、一つ忘れてたよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh right, I forgot to tell you one thing.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地獄の底 (ここら) で死ぬとみんな焼けて灰すら残らない<fix123>死体が欲しけりゃ<fix123>やっぱりあたいがお姉さんを仕留めないとね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If you die around here, you'll burn so hard there won't even be ashes left.<fix123>If I want your corpse,<fix123>I'd better take you down here!<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>何か汗が出すぎてげっそりしてきたぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I think I'm sweating so much I'm losing weight.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>(You have to take care of your own body.<fix123>It's a given for us magic users.)<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, since I'm a thief,<fix123>I can definitely say that<fix123>there's no treasure to be found around here.<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>何をお探しで……<fix123>久しぶりの人間さん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What are you trying to find......<fix123>Miss human, which I have not seen for a long time.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>来た！<fix123>今度こそ大ボスの予感<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Here she is!<fix123>I've got the feeling she's the big boss this time.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（あら、この鳥がもしかして<fix123>　さっきのさとりのペットかしら？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Oh, my, I wonder if this bird<fix123>is Satori's pet?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……さとり様に会って来たのね？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>......you met Miss Satori, didn't you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（ええ、間欠泉の事ならペットが<fix123>　握っていると）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Yes, she said her pet<fix123>was responsible for the geyser.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>熱かい悩む神の火<fix123>霊烏路空<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Scorching, Troublesome Divine Flame<fix123>Utsuho Reiuji<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いかにも、私が火焔地獄跡の火力を<fix123>調整している空（うつほ）です<fix123>間欠泉はその副産物に過ぎませんが……<fix123>それで間欠泉がどうしました？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Indeed, I'm Utsuho, the administrator of the Blazing Hell's heating power.<fix123>The geyser is merely its byproduct, but......<fix123>What's wrong with it?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あれを止めて欲しいんだとよ<fix123>危ないから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I want you to stop it<fix123>'cause it's dangerous.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……間欠泉はそんなに危険ではない筈<fix123>せいぜい火傷する程度かしら<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>......The geyser shouldn't be that dangerous.<fix123>At most, you can only get burnt by it.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（お湯と一緒に何かが湧いてきてるの！<fix123>　怨霊か何かが）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Well, something is gushing out with hot water!<fix123>Vengeful spirits or something else.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>怨霊……？　不思議な話ねぇ<fix123>怨霊ならお燐が管理している筈……<fix123>怨霊の件は私じゃないわ<fix123>それに、もう間欠泉は止められないのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Vengeful spirits......? That's weird.<fix123>Vengeful spirits should be under Orin's control.<fix123>I'm not responsible for the vengeful spirit matter.<fix123>Plus, the geyser cannot be stopped now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何だと？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私が余りに強い力を手にしてしまったから<fix123>火焔地獄の炎は強くなる一方<fix123>それに伴い間欠泉も強くなるわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I have just obtained an exceedingly strong power,<fix123>and the flame of the Blazing Hell became stronger as a result.<fix123>So geysers became stronger as well.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>強い力だと？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Strong power?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええ、究極の力<fix123>地上を全て溶かし尽くす最後のエネルギー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes. The ultimate power<fix123>The energy to melt up every corner of the surface.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（何を言ってるのよ<fix123>　そんな力ある訳が無いよ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(What are you talking about?<fix123>There's no such power.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふん、そうだな<fix123>それに間欠泉は止められるじゃないか<fix123>お前の強い力をお前ごと葬り去れば<fix123>間欠泉は止まる<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm, that's right.<fix123>And the geyser can definitely be stopped.<fix123>If I send both you and your power to oblivion,<fix123>the geyser will stop.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 霊知の太陽信仰　～ Nuclear Fusion<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Solar Sect of Mystic Wisdom ~ Nuclear Fusion<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら、盲点でした確かに<fix123>私が居なければ火焔地獄は元通りになる<fix123>でもね、もう一つ盲点があるわ<fix123>私の究極の核エネルギーは全てを溶かし尽くす！<fix123>どうやって私を倒すつもりかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, that was certainly a point I overlooked.<fix123>If I'm no longer of this world, then the Blazing Hell will return to the way it was.<fix123>But, there's also another point you are overlooking.<fix123>My ultimate nuclear energy melts up everything completely!<fix123>How would you go about taking me down then?<fix123><fix123>

<l$Alice:$12345678> "The forest is shining in the moonlight, too.<fix123><l$$12345678"> We have to enjoy this long-awaited full moon together."<fix123>
<l$Reimu:$12345678> "It's all good.<fix123><l$$12345678"> Who's going to clean all this up?"<fix123>
<l$Yukari:$12345678> "Come on, Ran.<fix123><l$$12345678"> Don't leave anything lying around."<fix123>
<l$Ran:$12345678> "Understood~.<fix123><l$$12345678"> I'm watching the moon and drinking sake at the moment."<fix123>
<l$Yukari:$12345678> "Watching the moon and drinking sake, huh?<fix123><l$$12345678"> You have to let the moon reflect on your sake and drink it afterwards."<fix123>
<l$Reimu:$12345678> "You have to drink the moon, too."<fix123>
<l$Yukari:$12345678> "Yeah, the moon.<fix123><l$$12345678"> The truth is, it contains an enormous power.<fix123><fix123><l$$12345678"> Ran, you should also taste this power a little."<fix123>
<l$Ran:$12345678> "Is it okay to drink?"<fix123>
<l$Reimu:$12345678> "It's not only that moon..."<fix123>
<l$Yukari:$12345678> "You're right. We have to do something about that."<fix123>
The moon was charmingly glittering.<fix123>　　However, that light was shedding sorrow somewhere.<fix123>
Yes, this recent moon looked flimsy.<fix123>　　Reimu thought that something was still being hidden...<fix123>
Normal Ending No. 5<fix123>　　Try playing again without using a continue!<fix123>
The Hakurei Shrine at night.<fix123>
The true full moon had returned to Gensokyo.<fix123>　　The previous moon was just a papier-mache toy.<fix123><fix123>　　But in contrast, tonight's moon was brightly shining.<fix123>
The moon's true power is that it boosts the purification rate of<fix123>　　the sunlight... to dispel the illusions of Gensokyo.<fix123>
It's so like Gensokyo for this to happen on the night of a full moon...<fix123>
<l$Reimu:$12345678> "Today the moon is also clearly visible~.<fix123><l$$12345678"> Hey, I say that and suddenly a lot of people gather again."<fix123>
<l$Marisa:$12345678> "Ah, it's just the usual.<fix123><l$$12345678"> Come on, things like this are necessary once in a while."<fix123>
<l$Reimu:$12345678> "You keep saying 'it's the usual thing,' 'once in a while'...<fix123><l$$12345678"> ...you could get a different excuse, you know."<fix123>
<l$Marisa:$12345678> "Oh well, it's okay. Is there something else?<fix123><l$$12345678"> Are you saying that Reimu's sake isn't good enough to drink?"<fix123>
<l$Reimu:$12345678> "Geez! It's the shrine's sake, just drink it!"<fix123>
<l$Alice:$12345678> "Shut up!<fix123><l$$12345678"> Won't you calm down a little and have some more sake?"<fix123>
<l$Marisa:$12345678> "I'm awake all this time now.<fix123><l$$12345678"> The noisy time as well as the unnoisy time became noisy."<fix123>
<l$Yukari:$12345678> "It's been a while since the last full moon.<fix123><l$$12345678"> I'll impartially support this degree of fun."<fix123>
<l$Ran:$12345678> "That aside, it makes you feel better."<fix123>
<l$Yukari:$12345678> "It's very rare for youkai like Ran to act like humans.<fix123><l$$12345678"> Must be because of the influence of the moon.<fix123>
<l$$12345678"> It would be great if there were some good regulations<fix123><l$$12345678"> for the drunkards."<fix123>
<l$Ran:$12345678> "Yukari-sama looks completely fine. As expected!"<fix123>
<l$Reimu:$12345678> "I don't know if being full of human traits is good or bad..."<fix123>
<l$Yukari:$12345678> "Oh my, the ghost burning with humanity is calling."<fix123>
<l$Reimu:$12345678> "No, not really. There's no human warmth in me."<fix123>
<l$Ran:$12345678> "I should make sure Chen doesn't get affected by the moon's miasma."<fix123>
<l$Chen:$12345678> "I'm carried away by the sake,<fix123><l$$12345678"> looking at the round moon makes my eyes spin~."<fix123>
<l$Yukari:$12345678> "Well, if your eyes are also spinning, I guess the moon suits you."<fix123>
<l$Reisen:$12345678> "The miasma of the moon? You make it sound like the moon is poisonous."<fix123>
<l$Kaguya:$12345678> "Oh, my. Did I say that to the humans?"<fix123>
<l$$12345678"> Er, that was rude of me."<fix123>
<l$Eirin:$12345678> "With this, the princess is finally playing outside again.<fix123>
<l$$12345678> You might say this has become something good."<fix123>
<l$Kaguya:$12345678> "You say this, but Eirin, weren't you the one who imprisoned her? Geez."<fix123>
<l$Eirin:$12345678> "She was imprisoned from the beginning, anyway."<fix123>
<l$Reimu:$12345678> "Please calm down.<fix123>
<l$$12345678"> For example, even if a messenger from the moon came,<fix123><l$$12345678"> she wouldn't know about Gensokyo."<fix123>
<l$Yukari:$12345678> "Yes, there's a big barrier, so there's no way she could enter."<fix123>
<l$Reimu:$12345678> "I'm glad that I'm in Gensokyo. It's really peaceful."<fix123>
<l$Eirin:$12345678> "I'm grateful as well.<fix123>
<l$$12345678"> This time, I tried putting a hideout above ground, but...<fix123>
<l$$12345678"> This entire planet was originally used as a hideout. Or a prison."<fix123>
<l$Reisen:$12345678> "That's somehow stupid.<fix123>
<l$$12345678"> Without this, we could play a little more. Hey, I wonder...<fix123>
<l$$12345678"> What about the circumstances that made you hide until now?"<fix123>
<l$Eirin:$12345678> "Oh, they're still valid.<fix123>
<l$$12345678"> The princess has been hiding for about a thousand years."<fix123>
<l$Kaguya:$12345678> "What are you trying to say?<fix123>
<l$$12345678"> I'm an eternal being. The past days are infinite.<fix123>
<l$$12345678"> That's why it won't have a meaning if we don't have fun now.<fix123>
<l$$12345678"> A thousand years or ten thousand years,<fix123><l$$12345678"> there's nothing in them matching this moment."<fix123>
<l$Kaguya:$12345678> "Even if it's one second ago, the past doesn't matter."<fix123>
<l$Reisen:$12345678> "Hey, that's my meatball~!"<fix123>
<l$Kaguya:$12345678> "I'm an eternal being."<fix123>
<l$Eirin:$12345678> "If the princess would consider such an act, I will do it as well."<fix123>
<l$Reimu:$12345678> "Hey! That was mine!"<fix123>
<l$Marisa:$12345678> "Surely these people can't be from the moon."<fix123>
It's a night where the moon's power gets stronger.<fix123>　　As soon as the youkai's true power returned, Gensokyo's<fix123><fix123>　　strength came back.<fix123>
This is the equilibrium of Gensokyo's power.<fix123>
Humans are always food for youkai.<fix123>　　And humans exterminate youkai so they won't be eaten.<fix123>
If the moon's power is ever in disorder, this balance will shatter.<fix123>
Reimu felt that this incident was a threat in that way.<fix123>
The heavens began to regain their balance by designating the people<fix123>　　who came from the outside to Earth as half-humans.<fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>(So excited!)<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>If we were, there's no reason we'd come so deep into<fix123>a hole like this!<fix123>Besides, we can always go see<fix123>something interesting.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>So, you can always go see something interesting?<fix123>I'm so jealous.<fix123>If that's the case, then you need to show me something interesting<fix123>to relieve my boredom!<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>(Well, this is a good opportunity for that,<fix123>but my purpose is to have you strike down a great evil.)<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, you're pretty good.<fix123>Dunno who you are, but they say<fix123>a rowdy welcome is best for a rowdy guest!<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>I like you!<fix123>We'll have lots more fun, so<fix123>Keep following until you can't take anymore!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（や、これは不味い事になりましたね）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Well, this has gotten a bit out of hand.)<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Geez!<fix123>Quit wandering around in front of me, you're in the way!<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, you're so cold.<fix123>And people from above almost never come down here.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>(Ah, hello, hello.<fix123>Nice to meet you, I'm Shameimaru the Tengu.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あん？<fix123>……天狗だってー？<fix123>ふーん、見た感じ天狗だとは思えんが…<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123>A tengu?<fix123>I wouldn't have guessed it by looking at you...<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>No, I'm not a tengu,<fix123>I'm a human.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あーん？<fix123>さっきから何言ってるのさ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123>Well, what were you saying before, then?<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>(No, no, I'm a tengu pretending to be a human.<fix123>There's something I needed to look into...)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ちょっ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Just a-<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（天狗のままでは不味いと思いまして<fix123>　こうやって潜入させて頂きました）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(I didn't think it would be a good idea for a tengu to be down here,<fix123>but I was able to sneak in like this.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほう、天狗がここに降りてくるなんて…<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm, strange to think a tengu would come down here...<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>The Spoken-of Anomalies, Strength, Disorder, and Spirits<fix123>Yuugi Hoshiguma<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>I thought you didn't want to meet us, so you were<fix123><fix123>avoiding us.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（いえいえそんな<fix123>　いつか挨拶に伺いたいと）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(No, no, I thought I'd<fix123>come introduce myself later.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>へぇ、それで人間の振りして？<fix123>私はそういう天狗の調子の良い嘘が<fix123>大嫌いなんだよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmm, and you're pretending to be a human?<fix123>You know, I really hate good tengu lies<fix123>like that.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（滅相もない<fix123>　嘘を吐いているつもりは無いんですが）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(I'm so very sorry.<fix123>I didn't mean to come down here to spout lies to you.)<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm, so did you send me down here because you couldn't<fix123>move on your own, because there's someone you didn't want to bump into?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふふん。　ま、天狗（めいゆう）の事だし許してやっても<fix123>いいんだけど……条件がある<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hoho. Well, since we're such good friends with tengu, I'll<fix123>look over it this time... but on one condition.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>I only forgive the strong and the brave!<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>お見事！<fix123>その腕に免じて用件を聞いてやろう！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well done!<fix123>Now, let's see what I'm forgiving such a strong person for!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（へへぇ。有難うございます<fix123>　端的に用件を言いますが……）<fix123>（地上に怨霊が出ようとしています<fix123>　勿論、鬼の貴方の仕業とは思いませんが）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Heheh. Thank you very much.<fix123>Well, then, I suppose I'll get straight to the point.)<fix123>(Vengeful spirits have begun to appear above ground.<fix123>Of course, I'm not saying that this is the oni's doing.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？　怨霊だって？<fix123>初耳よ、初耳！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What? Vengeful spirits?<fix123>That's the first I've heard of this!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？　何だって？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh? What's that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（放っておけば貴方達にとっても不都合<fix123>　でしょう？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(It would be a problem for you, as well, if they were to<fix123>get out, right?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふーむ<fix123>そうか、それは嘘じゃないんだね？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmmmm.<fix123>Well, you're not lying, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（どうして私が嘘をつきましょう<fix123>　とにかく、その怨霊の調査をしたくて)<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Why would I be lying?<fix123>In any case, we wanted to investigate these spirits...)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうか、ま、今回はその強さと酒に免じて<fix123>信用してやるよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see, well, I'll trust you this time, based on what<fix123>your strength and this sake tell me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（へへへ、有難きお言葉で）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Hehehe, you're far too kind.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あんたら、徹底的に私を無視して進行する<fix123>つもりなのね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You two are going to go right along and keep<fix123>ignoring me, aren't you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>誰からも好まれない恐怖の目<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Those Terrifying Eyes Nobody Loves<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地霊殿<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Palace of the Earth Spirits<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ハートフェルトファンシー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Heartfelt Fancy<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この家が怪しいって言うの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Isn't this place suspicious?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（はい、ネタの臭いがプンプンします）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Yes, I can quite clearly smell a dope.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地上まで臭いが伝わるのかしらね<fix123>ところでさっきの話なんだけど<fix123>怨霊がどうとかって<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm, the smell reaches all the way up there?<fix123>By the way, what were you saying earlier<fix123>about vengeful spirits?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（ああ、怨霊ですか……間欠泉から怨霊が<fix123>　湧いて出てきてるのは確かですが）<fix123>（地底で貴方が自由に動けるように<fix123>　利用したに過ぎません）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Ah yes, the spirits... it's quite certain that<fix123>vengeful spirits were emanating from the geyser...)<fix123>(I just used them so that you'll be<fix123>free to move about the underground.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はい？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（ま、気にせず……<fix123>　この不思議な館を隈無く調査しましょう）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Well, never you mind...<fix123>Let's make sure we search every nook and cranny of this mysterious mansion.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Satori Komeiji ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>……珍しく騒がしいわ<fix123>この地霊殿に訪客なんていつ以来かしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...It's unusually busy here.<fix123>How long has it been since we've had visitors in the Palace?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おっと、何かいたわよ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, somebody's there?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そりゃいますよ<fix123>私の家だもの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I should say I am.<fix123>It's my house, after all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（一応挨拶した方が良くありませんか？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Perhaps we should introduce ourselves?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>およよ、地上からきました巫女の霊夢です<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, hey there, I'm Reimu, the shrine maiden from above ground.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>怨霊も恐れ怯む少女<fix123>古明地さとり<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Girl Even the Vengeful Spirits Fear<fix123>Satori Komeiji<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私はさとり、この地霊殿の主です<fix123>……ふーん<fix123>……随分と私を警戒してるわね<fix123>押しかけてきたのは貴方の方なのに<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm Satori, the master of the Palace of the Earth Spirits.<fix123>...... hmmm.<fix123>You're being awfully cautious of me<fix123>considering you're the visitor here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いや別に警戒なんてしてないけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, I'm not, really.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（貴方の屋敷が見事でしたので<fix123>　ちょっと取材させて頂きたく）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Your mansion looked so splendid<fix123>I just wanted to get some information on it...)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……ん？<fix123>心にも思ってない事を喋るのね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...... hmm?<fix123>You're speaking of things that you didn't think of.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 少女さとり　～ 3rd eye<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Satori Maiden ~ 3rd eye<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私に一切隠し事は出来ません<fix123>貴方の考えている事は口から出る言葉より<fix123>物を伝えます<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Nothing can be hidden from me.<fix123>What you're thinking speaks volumes beyond anything<fix123>you could say with your mouth.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どゆこと？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What do you mean?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……「面倒だから温泉を諦めようかなぁ」<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>... "This is such a pain, maybe I should give up the hot springs."<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ギク<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>eek<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……「何で考えている事が判るのかしら？」<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>... "How does she know what I'm thinking?"<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ひえー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yeeek!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……「気持ち悪いから口を封じよう」<fix123>ですって？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>... "She's creepy, I'd better shut her up",<fix123>you say?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>心が読めるって言うのね？<fix123>喋る手間が省けて楽だわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You mean you can read my mind?<fix123>I guess I don't have to bother saying anything.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（何と言うことでしょう<fix123>　心を読む妖怪がいたなんて）<fix123>（……ふむふむ<fix123>　面白い記事が書けそうです）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(What's this?<fix123>I can't believe there's a mind-reading youkai...)<fix123>(... hm, hm,<fix123>This should make an interesting article.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……ニヤニヤ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...... griiin.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……「さーてどうやって退治しようかな」<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>... "Now, how am I going to beat her?"<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もっと心を読んで<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Go on, read more.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……「こんな弾幕が良いのかなー」<fix123>……「それともあんな弾幕が」<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>... "Hm, how about this danmaku?"<fix123>... "Or maybe this one..."<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（一体何を想像しているのでしょうか？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(What on earth are you imagining?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>愚かな人間ね<fix123>無駄な考えが自らの心象に苦しめられる<fix123>事になると言うのに<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Such a foolish human.<fix123>You're only spelling out<fix123>your own defeat, you know.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Satori Komeiji PAUSES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>さあ、本番はこれからよ<fix123>眠りを覚ます恐怖の記憶 (トラウマ) で眠るがいい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Here's where it really begins.<fix123>Now, sleep with this trauma that will leave you sleepless!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Satori Komeiji DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>出来るわね<fix123>地上の人間だと思って舐めてたわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, not bad.<fix123>I took you too lightly since you're a human from above.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>こんな大きな館に住んでるからどんな奴と<fix123>思いきや、大した事なかったわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I was wondering who lived in such a big house,<fix123>but you weren't such a big deal, after all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（今の技は……）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Those techniques were...)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方は何故こんな地底深くまで降りてきた<fix123>のでしょう？<fix123>心の中にはまだ迷いが多すぎて目的がよく<fix123>見えないのです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Why ever did you come so far underground?<fix123>There are too many questions in your mind, I can't<fix123>see what you're after clearly.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（あ、んーそうですね。地上で間欠泉と共に<fix123>　怨霊が出てきているのです）<fix123>（いくつか訊ねてみましたが、今のところ<fix123>　それに関わる者は見つかりませんでした）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Ah, well, that's right. A geyser has appeared above<fix123>ground, and with it some vengeful spirits.)<fix123>(We've asked a few people about it, but so far<fix123>nobody seems to have been involved.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>間欠泉？　怨霊？<fix123>うーむ……もしかしたら心当たりがあるかも<fix123>知れない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A geyser? Vengeful spirits?<fix123>Hmmm... maybe you've come to the right place<fix123>after all.<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Eh?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そんな事が出来るのは私のペットぐらい<fix123>ですから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I think one of my pets could have done something<fix123>like that.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（ペット……<fix123>　さっきの猫ですかね）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Pets...<fix123>you mean like that cat?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>調べたいのなら<fix123>中庭を開けてあげましょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If you want to look into it,<fix123>I'll take you to the courtyard.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>中庭？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Courtyard?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>中庭から、さらに地下深くへ潜れます<fix123>そこに私のペットがいます<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You can get farther underground from there.<fix123>That's where my pet will be.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>乗りかかった船ね<fix123>仕様が無いわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I've gone too far to turn back.<fix123>I guess I have no choice.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>「面倒な事言わなくても良いのに」<fix123>ですか……<fix123>済みませんね<fix123>心が読めて<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>"You didn't have to go say something like that",<fix123>was it?<fix123>Well, I'm sorry<fix123>for reading your mind.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>昔時の業火<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hellfires of Times Past<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>灼熱地獄跡<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Remains of the Blazing Hell<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 廃獄ララバイ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Lullaby of Deserted Hell<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さっきから猫がちょろちょろ出てくるけど<fix123>なかなか仕留められないわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That cat keeps creeping up on us,<fix123>but I just can't quite take it down.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（ふむ。もしかしたらあの猫、<fix123>　普通の猫じゃ無いのかも知れませんね）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Hmm. Perhaps that cat<fix123>isn't a normal cat?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ま、最低でも普通の猫じゃ無いと思うけどね<fix123>弾幕を張るなんて<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I don't think there's any way it could be<fix123>if it can shoot danmaku.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（さっきのさとりさんの話だと<fix123>　その猫が何か鍵を握っていると）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(According to what Miss Satori said,<fix123>that cat may be holding the key to something.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>次に現れたら確実に仕留めるわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Next time it comes I'll get it for sure.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Cat ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>でた！<fix123>今度こそ逃がさないわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There it is!<fix123>This time I won't let you get away!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 死体旅行　～ Be of good cheer!<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Corpse Voyage ~ Be of good cheer!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Cat TRANSFORMS INTO Rin Kaenbyou<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>願ったり叶ったりよ！<fix123>お姉さん、強いねぇ<fix123>さとり様を倒しちゃうなんて<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Speak of the devil and she will appear!<fix123>You're pretty strong, Sis.<fix123>You'd have to be, to beat Miss Satori.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>！？<fix123>妖怪変化ね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>!?<fix123>It turned into a youkai!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（妖怪です！　退治しましょう！<fix123>　であえ、であえ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(It's a youkai! Let's defeat it!<fix123>Alright, come out and fight~)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>文 (あんた) が言うとどうも調子が狂うわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I think things'll get out of hand if you keep telling me that.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地獄の輪禍<fix123>お燐<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hell's Wheel Accident<fix123>Orin<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あはは、妖怪変化って<fix123>ここじゃあ人間の方がずっと珍しいよ<fix123>それで何かい？<fix123>間欠泉の事を調べてるんだって？<fix123>さっき聞いてたよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hahaha, I turned into a youkai?<fix123>Humans are a lot rarer down here, ya know.<fix123>Well, how 'bout it?<fix123>Ya said ya wanted to find about the geyser, right?<fix123>I heard it before!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>話が早いわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, straight to the point.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（……ふむ<fix123>　貴方……ではないのですね）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(...... hmm.<fix123>It's... not you, is it?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>間欠泉だとしたらもっと地下深くだね<fix123>そこに最悪の鳥がいるさ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If you're lookin' for the geyser's source, ya gotta go deeper.<fix123>The meanest bird ever is down there, though.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>鳥？<fix123>あんたは関係無いのね？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Bird?<fix123>So you don't have anything to do with it?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>でも、行かせはしない<fix123>お姉さんはここで怨霊になるのさ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But, I can't let ya get down there.<fix123>Here's where you turn into a wandering spirit.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Rin Kaenbyou DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>くー、お姉さんやるねぇ<fix123>地上にはこんな強い人間がいるのかぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Phew, you're pretty good, Sis!<fix123>I can't believe there are humans that strong above ground.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地底に人間がいるのかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are there even any humans underground?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さて、その強さならもしかしてあいつに少しでも<fix123>ダメージ与えられるかもね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Okay, if you're that strong, ya might even be<fix123>able to damage her a little.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そんなに強いの？<fix123>その鳥<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Is that bird<fix123>really that strong?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うちら動物は長く生きながらえたり、怨霊や<fix123>魑魅魍魎を飲み込んだりする事で力を得るの<fix123>でもあいつは何処で見つけたのかしらねぇ<fix123>神様の力なんて飲み込んで<fix123>とんでもない力を手に入れたのさ<fix123>お姉さんも気を付けな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We animals get powerful by living really old, or<fix123>swallowing ghosts and spirits.<fix123>I wonder where she found it, though?<fix123>She was able to swallow the power of a god.<fix123>She got really powerful, ya know.<fix123>Ya better be careful, Sis.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふーん<fix123>ま、もう何が来たって驚かないよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmmm.<fix123>Well, I guess nothing surprises me that much anymore.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（神様の力……？<fix123>　　やっぱりね、おかしいと思った）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(The power of a god...?<fix123>I thought this seemed rather strange.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それにしても暑いわー<fix123>文 (あんた) の団扇借りて来れば良かったわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's so hot down here, though.<fix123>I wish you'd come down here and let me borrow your fan.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>荒々しい二つ目の太陽<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Tempestuous Second Sun<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地底都市最深部<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Deepest Part of the Underground City<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 業火マントル<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Hellfire Mantle<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Rin Kaenbyou ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>そうそう、一つ忘れてたよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh yeah, I forgot something.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地獄の底 (ここら) で死ぬとみんな焼けて灰すら残らない<fix123>死体が欲しけりゃ<fix123>やっぱりあたいがお姉さんを仕留めないとね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If you die around here, you'll burn so hard there won't even be ashes left.<fix123>If I want your corpse,<fix123>I'd better take ya down here!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Rin Kaenbyou DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>だー、もう駄目！<fix123>よく考えたらどんな奴かも聞いてないのに<fix123>探せるわけがないじゃん。暑いし<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, I can't take it anymore!<fix123>If you think about it, there's no way we'd be<fix123>able to find anyone here. It's so hot.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（さっきの猫が言ってましたよ<fix123>　神の力を飲み込んだって）<fix123>（そんな雰囲気のある方向を目指せば<fix123>　いいんじゃないですか？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(The cat before said it, right?<fix123>She swallowed up a god's power.)<fix123>(Shouldn't we be looking for a place<fix123>with an atmosphere that fits that?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そんな雰囲気ってねぇ<fix123>神を飲み込んだって言われても<fix123>何の神かも判らないし<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm, that kind of atmosphere...<fix123>But we don't even know what kind of god<fix123>she's supposed to have eaten.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（実は私、その神様に思い当たる節がある<fix123>　のです）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Actually, I happen to remember a god<fix123>like that.)<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>What?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Utsuho Reiuji ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>今は誰も訪ねて来ない地獄の底の底に<fix123>ようこそ<fix123>お燐から話は聞いたわ。間欠泉を止めたい<fix123>って言う人間と妖怪の二人組が……<fix123>って人間一人しかいない<fix123>姿の見えない妖怪かな？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Welcome to the depths of the depths of hell<fix123>that none should visit.<fix123>I heard about you from Orin. She said a human and a youkai<fix123>that wanted to stop the geyser were coming...<fix123>But all I see is a human.<fix123>Is the youkai invisible?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おっと、また妖怪変化よ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, someone else turned into a youkai!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（であえであえ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Come out and fight!)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>であえ、って貴方一人じゃないの<fix123>いや、二人なのかなぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Come out and... You're not alone, are you?<fix123>Maybe there really are two of you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>一人でも二人でも百人力よ<fix123>そんでもって、さっき間欠泉って言ってたけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>One person or two, I've got the power of a hundred!<fix123>Anyway, you said something about the geyser?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>熱かい悩む神の火<fix123>霊烏路 空<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Scorching, Troublesome Divine Flame<fix123>Utsuho Reiuji<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私がこの灼熱地獄跡を守っている空（うつほ）<fix123>みんな「おくう」って呼ぶわ<fix123>間欠泉の事だけどねー<fix123>昔ならまだしも、今はもう止められないわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm Utsuho, and I'm in charge of guarding the Remains of Blazing Hell.<fix123>Everyone calls me "Okuu".<fix123>Well, about the geyser...<fix123>Maybe you could have before, but it's too late to stop it now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（これは……<fix123>　体から漏れる力が見えるわ）<fix123>（貴方が唆されて神を飲み込んだ者ですね？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(This is...<fix123>I can see power radiating from her body.)<fix123>(Are you the one who was tempted into eating that god?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ん？<fix123>何を言ってるの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm?<fix123>What are you talking about?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（貴方は地上進出を企んでるのですか？<fix123>　山の神の口車に乗って）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(You're planning on taking over the above ground world, aren't you?<fix123>And the mountain god talked you into it.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？　何を言ってるの？<fix123>山の神の口車？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm? What are you talking about?<fix123>The mountain god talked me into it?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（そうです。山の神様が不穏な行動を<fix123>　取っていたので潜入捜査をしてました）<fix123>（どうやら強大な力を地底世界に送り込んで<fix123>　いて、その後間欠泉が湧いてきて）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(That's right. She was up to no good,<fix123>so I took the liberty of looking into it myself.)<fix123>(Somehow she brought an incredible power down here,<fix123>and not long after, the geyser appeared.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何を言ってるのか<fix123>全く話が見えてこないんですけどー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What are you talking about?<fix123>I don't get it at all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふふーん<fix123>いかにも、神の力を飲み込んだのは私<fix123>この神の力を持って地上に侵略しようと<fix123>企んでいるのも私<fix123>それで何？<fix123>私を始末したいって言うの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmhmmm.<fix123>What of it? I am indeed the one with the power of a god.<fix123>I'm also the one who's plotting to invade the above ground<fix123>using this power.<fix123>And, so what?<fix123>Are you saying you'll try to stop me?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（いえいえ、面白そうなので独占密着取材<fix123>　させて頂きたいと交渉に伺った次第で）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(No, no, I guess that depends on whether or not<fix123>you'll give me exclusive coverage of the invasion.)<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Wha-!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（『密着！　地獄の鴉の七日間地上侵略戦争』<fix123>　久しぶりに大スクープの予感です）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>("Full coverage! The Hell Crow's Seven Days War"<fix123>I think I'm on the trail of a huge scoop...)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ちょっと待ってよ！<fix123>私は許可しないわよ？　そんなの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now, just a minute!<fix123>I won't allow that.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>良いですわ。思う存分私を取材して<fix123>記事にして私の恐ろしさを世に広めてくださる？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Very well. Will you interview me as much as you like<fix123>and spread fear of me far and wide?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>良いんですか<fix123>なら、邪魔するのは野暮ってものね<fix123>……って言うとでも思ったの？<fix123>地上侵略なんて駄目よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, is that okay?<fix123>I guess it would be uncouth of me to try to stop you.<fix123>... did you really think I'd say that?<fix123>You can't just invade the above ground.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 霊知の太陽信仰　～ Nuclear Fusion<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Solar Sect of Mystic Wisdom ~ Nuclear Fusion<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら、空気の読めない人間ねぇ<fix123>地上侵略の手始めに貴方を倒そうかしら<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, you have no sense of atmosphere, do you?<fix123>Beating you will be the first step in my invasion, then.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（む、巫女vs地獄鴉、新しいスクープの予感<fix123>　であえー、であえー）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Hm, Shrine maiden VS Hell crow, here comes another scoop!<fix123>Come out and fight, all you scoundrels!)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私が飲み込んだ神の炎！<fix123>核エネルギーで跡形もなく溶けきるがいいわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The divine flames that I've absorbed...<fix123>will burn you to a crisp with nuclear energy and leave nothing behind!<fix123><fix123>

This, the Scarlet Devil Mansion, sits silently in Gensokyo.<fix123>　　Nature has a tendency to be noisy when spring arrives.<fix123><fix123>　　Of course, this place is no exception...<fix123>
<c$Sakuya:$12345678> "Mistress.<fix123><c$$12345678"> On a sunny day like this, let's quietly stay at home."<fix123>
<c$Remilia:$12345678> "Eh, but the cherry blossoms are trying so hard to open."<fix123>
<c$Sakuya:$12345678> "I've prepared something unusual for you today<fix123>
<c$$12345678"> so that you won't be bored."<fix123>
<c$Remilia:$12345678> "What's that?"<fix123>
<c$Sakuya:$12345678> "The Miniature Netherworld!"<fix123>
<c$Remilia:$12345678> "Wow, amazing!"<fix123>
<c$Sakuya:$12345678> "Know what else? These ghosts are real,<fix123><c$$12345678"> taken from that place."<fix123>
<c$Remilia:$12345678> "And these cherry blossoms?"<fix123>
<c$Sakuya:$12345678> "The cherries are clay models<fix123><c$$12345678"> made from the Netherworld's soil."<fix123>
<c$Remilia:$12345678> "You're so skillful, Sakuya."<fix123>
<c$Sakuya:$12345678> "I only gathered the ingredients.<fix123>
<c$$12345678"> It's Ms. Patchouli who put it together.<fix123>
<c$$12345678"> I was planning to use them for my cooking."<fix123>
<c$Remilia:$12345678> "Hmm, you're skillful, Patchy."<fix123>
<c$Patchouli:$12345678> "See Remmy,<fix123><c$$12345678"> underneath these cherry trees, there are..."<fix123>
<c$Remilia:$12345678> "Whoa, that's surprising."<fix123>
<c$Patchouli:$12345678> "In addition to that, these ghosts are actually bound to their location.<fix123><c$$12345678"> and the vengeful spirits are in 1:10 scale."<fix123>
<c$Remilia:$12345678> "This is Patchy's work alright, it's so detailed."<fix123>
<c$Remilia:$12345678> "But why did you pair cherry blossoms with the Netherworld?"<fix123>
<c$Sakuya:$12345678> "This kind of thing happens to be in style among the dead."<fix123>
<c$Remilia:$12345678> "Well, this small flower viewing does have its charm.<fix123>
<c$$12345678"> Now, if only it had a ghost's lifeblood in it as well,<fix123><c$$12345678"> I could ask for nothing more."<fix123>
<c$Sakuya:$12345678> "Ghost's lifeblood...<fix123>
<c$$12345678"> I'll go find some."<fix123>
In the end, the Saigyou Ayakashi blossomed, but not fully.<fix123>　　The seal on it didn't break, so as always, everyone was<fix123><fix123>　　greeted by the arrival of spring.<fix123>
As the Netherworld's barrier weakens, the border of<fix123>　　life and death becomes vague. Perhaps it's only<fix123><fix123>　　hastening the cycle of entropy.<fix123>
Ending No. 8<fix123>

This is the Hakurei Shrine, located at the edge of Gensokyo.<fix123>　　In the end, the Saigyou Ayakashi blossomed, but not fully.<fix123>　　The seal on it didn't break, so as always, everyone was<fix123><fix123>　　greeted by the arrival of spring.<fix123>

At her mistress' insistence, Sakuya decided to take her out<fix123>　　for a flower viewing. In all of Gensokyo, no place is better<fix123><fix123>　　than this shrine for a soothing view of cherry blossoms.<fix123>
<c$Sakuya:$12345678> "Mistress, we're almost there."<fix123>
<c$Remilia:$12345678> "Perhaps it's because they were delayed,<fix123><c$$12345678"> but this year's cherries are brilliant."<fix123>
<c$Sakuya:$12345678> "I got to appreciate these cherries a little before you."<fix123>
<c$Remilia:$12345678> "You have good eyes, Sakuya."<fix123>
<c$Sakuya:$12345678> "That's not quite what I meant..."<fix123>
<c$Yuyuko:$12345678> "Oh, are you also here to admire the cherry blossoms?"<fix123>
<c$Sakuya:$12345678> "Er, why are you here?"<fix123>
<c$Remilia:$12345678> "Who's that?"<fix123>
<c$Sakuya:$12345678> "A corpse and a half-corpse."<fix123>
<c$Youmu:$12345678> "'Ghosts', we are called."<fix123>
<c$Yuyuko:$12345678> "The cherries here are most splendid<fix123><c$$12345678"> at this time of the year,<fix123>
<c$$12345678"> It'd be foolish not to come for a flower viewing."<fix123>
<c$Sakuya:$12345678> "Well yes. We're here for flower viewing as well."<fix123>
<c$Sakuya:$12345678> "So, whatever happened to the cherries in your garden?"<fix123>
<c$Yuyuko:$12345678> "The Saigyou Ayakashi didn't fully blossom after all,<fix123>
<c$$12345678"> but that doesn't matter to me anymore."<fix123>
<c$Yuyuko:$12345678> "I'm more interested in bothering Youmu now."<fix123>
<c$Remilia:$12345678> "Oh, that sounds fun."<fix123>
<c$Reimu:$12345678> "Geez, don't just invite yourselves into my garden<fix123><c$$12345678"> and then make noise!"<fix123>
<c$Sakuya:$12345678> "That sounds mean."<fix123>
<c$Youmu:$12345678> "You're so mean."<fix123>
<c$Reimu:$12345678> "... Ignoring me is meaner."<fix123>
<c$Yuyuko:$12345678> "By the way, I wouldn't recommend standing under that tree."<fix123>
<c$Yuyuko:$12345678> "Whoever's buried there has been<fix123><c$$12345678"> decaying for the past 50 years."<fix123>
<c$Youmu:$12345678> "Still ripening."<fix123>
<c$Sakuya:$12345678> "Never mind that, I brought sweets and drinks with me."<fix123>
<c$Reimu:$12345678> "Well fine then.<fix123><c$$12345678"> As long as Sakuya does the cleaning."<fix123>
<c$Sakuya:$12345678> "I agreed to no such thing.<fix123>
<c$$12345678"> Fortunately, we have someone here more suited to that job."<fix123>
<c$Yuyuko:$12345678> "Yeah, we do."<fix123>
At that moment, the cherry blossoms surrounding Reimu<fix123>　　seemed to redden. Perhaps it was because the sun was<fix123><fix123>　　approaching the horizon...<fix123>
Ending No. 9<fix123>
The Scarlet Devil Mansion.<fix123>
In the end, the Saigyou Ayakashi didn't fully blossom.<fix123>　　　　Sakuya returned to the mansion just once<fix123><fix123>　　　　to grab a fresh change of clothes.<fix123>
<c$Sakuya:$12345678> "Has nothing changed, mistress?"<fix123>
<c$Remilia:$12345678> "Sooooo,<fix123>　　<c$$12345678"> since there's no change, was your trip for nothing?"<fix123>
<c$Sakuya:$12345678> "I only came back for a change of clothes."<fix123>
After changing out of her snow-drenched and ghastly clothes,<fix123>　　　　Sakuya readied herself for another journey.<fix123>
