en_dialogue: <fix123>Look, I don't know anything about you, okay?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>封じた筈の恐怖の妖怪<fix123>今一度味わうと良い<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Then experience the power of a youkai of fear<fix123>that should have been sealed away.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Parsee Mizuhashi DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>勝手に話を進めないでよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Stop holding your own conversations!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（そろそろ着くよ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(We're almost there.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>へ？<fix123>何処へ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123>We're almost where?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（我々が住む世界へ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(The world where we live.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああん？<fix123>一体何処に向かっているのよ…<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Whaa?<fix123>Where the heck are we going?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>忘れられた雪の旧都<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Forgotten Snowy Former Capital<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>旧地獄街道<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Streets of a Former Hell<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 旧地獄街道を行く<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Walking the Streets of a Former Hell<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yuugi Hoshiguma ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あんた、なかなやるね<fix123>何者か知らんけど、<fix123>暴れる奴には暴れて迎えるのが礼儀ってね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, you're pretty good.<fix123>Dunno who you are, but they say<fix123>a rowdy welcome is best for a rowdy guest!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yuugi Hoshiguma STOPS FIGHTING<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>気に入った！<fix123>もっと愉しませてあげるから<fix123>駄目になるまでついてきなよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I like you!<fix123>We'll have lots more fun, so<fix123>keep following until you can't take anymore!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あんたと酒呑んでく気は無いんだけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But I don't want to go drinking with you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うぎぎ<fix123>目の前をうろちょろと邪魔よ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Geez!<fix123>Quit wandering around in front of me, you're in the way!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あらあら、つれないねぇ<fix123>地上の奴らが降りてくる事なんて殆ど無いのに<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, you're so cold.<fix123>And people from above almost never come down here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（おう！　誰かと思ったら勇儀じゃないか　<fix123>　久しぶり）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Oh, I was wondering who that was! Yuugi,<fix123>long time no see.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あん？<fix123>私を知ってるって、貴方……何者？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123>You know who I am? ...... Who are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（私だよ私。　暫く地上に遊び行ってた<fix123>　からって忘れて貰っちゃ困るねぇ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Me, it's me! Don't tell me you forgot me just<fix123>'cos I went to play above ground for a little while.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>その酔った声……<fix123>もしかして萃香！？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That drunken voice ...<fix123>Is that Suika!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（また、あんたらと四人で山登りたいねぇ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(I wanna go mountain climbing again, the four of us.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あれまぁ、　随分と様変わりしちゃって……<fix123>まるで人間の巫女の様よ？<fix123>いつからそんな趣味になっちゃったのさ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wow, you sure have changed a lot...<fix123>You look just like a human shrine maiden.<fix123>When did you pick up those tastes, anyway?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>知るか<fix123>あんたが話している相手は私じゃないわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How should I know?<fix123>You're not talking to me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うん？<fix123>萃香は何処に行った？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123>Where'd Suika go?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あいつは地上にいるよ<fix123>何？　あいつと知り合いなの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>She's above ground.<fix123>Wait, do you know her?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地上？<fix123>ああ、その珠から聞こえてきているのか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Above ground?<fix123>Oh, her voice is coming from that jewel.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>知り合いって事は、あんたも鬼なのね？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If you're friends, you're an oni too, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>語られる怪力乱神<fix123>星熊 勇儀<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Spoken-of Anomalies, Strength, Disorder, and Spirits<fix123>Yuugi Hoshiguma<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もちろん<fix123>私と萃香と同じ山の四天王の一人、力の勇儀<fix123>ま、山っていっても今は山に居ないけどね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Of course.<fix123>I was one of the Big Four of the Mountain with Suika, Yuugi the Strong!<fix123>Of course, I can't climb many mountains down here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふーん<fix123>で、あんたらが地上を攻めようっていうの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmm.<fix123>So, you're not trying to attack the overworld, are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あはははは！<fix123>何で今更地上を攻める必要があるのよ<fix123>地獄だったここも今や我々の楽園<fix123>地上の賢者達にも感謝しているよ<fix123>邪魔も入らないしね<fix123>それより、あんた！<fix123>人間の癖に強いし<fix123>萃香とも知り合いみたいだし<fix123>久しぶりにわくわくしてきたよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ahahahaha!<fix123>Why would we want to do that now?<fix123>This place may have been Hell once, but now it's our paradise.<fix123>We're even thankful for the sages above ground.<fix123>They won't let anyone come bother us here.<fix123>But more importantly, you!<fix123>You're strong for a human,<fix123>And it looks like you know Suika, too.<fix123>I haven't been this excited in a long time!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 華のさかづき大江山<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: A Flower-Studded Sake Dish on Mt. Ooe<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……どうして私の周りはこんな奴ばかり<fix123>集まってくるのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>... why am I always surrounded by<fix123>people like this?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yuugi Hoshiguma DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>お見事！<fix123>流石、萃香の知り合いだけあるね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well done!<fix123>Only a friend of Suika could be this strong!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>で、本当に地上を攻める気はないの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So, you really don't want to attack the overworld?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ないない<fix123>鬼の約束よ<fix123>地下に落とされた怨霊達を鎮める代わりに<fix123>地底世界は私達の物になったんだ<fix123>地底世界は私達の楽園<fix123>今更地上に興味は無いよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No way.<fix123>That's an oni's promise.<fix123>The underworld was given to us<fix123>in return for sealing away the vengeful spirits.<fix123>The underworld is our paradise.<fix123>We don't care about the overworld anymore.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（それがさぁ、何か最近おかしいんだよ<fix123>　温泉と一緒に怨霊も出てきちゃってさ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(It's been weird lately, though.<fix123>The vengeful spirits showed up together with these springs.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お、萃香<fix123>って怨霊だって？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, Suika.<fix123>So, the vengeful spirits, you say?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（そう、地霊達と混じって怨霊がね<fix123>　このまま放って置くと不味い事になるよ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Yep, together with a bunch of earth spirits.<fix123>Something bad's gonna happen if this keeps up.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……うーむ？<fix123>おかしいなぁ、ちゃんと見張ってる奴がいる筈<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>... really?<fix123>That's weird, someone should be watching over them.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何の話？<fix123>怨霊だなんて私は説明受けてないわよ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What are you talking about?<fix123>I haven't gotten the explanation about these vengeful spirits.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（説明してないもん）<fix123>（ま、そんな訳でこの人間に調査を<fix123>　お願いしたわけさ）<fix123>（我々じゃ、内密に動けないし）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(That's 'cos nobody's given one.)<fix123>(Anyway, I asked this human to look into<fix123>it for me.)<fix123>(Since we can't act in secret.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、そうかい！<fix123>じゃよろしく頼むよ！　そこの人間<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, I see!<fix123>Well, then, I'll leave it to you, human!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何処に行って何を調査すりゃ良いのか<fix123>全く判らんっちゅーに<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But I have no idea where to go or<fix123>what to investigateー<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>誰からも好まれない恐怖の目<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Those Terrifying Eyes Nobody Loves<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地霊殿<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Palace of the Earth Spirits<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ハーツフェルトファンシー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Heartfelt Fancy<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>このお屋敷に怨霊を操っている<fix123>敵がいるって言うの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So, does that mean there are enemies in this mansion<fix123>that can control the vengeful spirits?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（うん、恐らくね）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Yeah, probably.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>勝手に忍び込んじゃったけど……<fix123>まぁどうせ妖怪の住処だしどうでも良いか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, we just snuck in...<fix123>Oh well, it looks like a youkai den, so it's probably okay.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（ここは地底一の嫌われ者の館なんだ<fix123>　ここの主は数多くの怨霊を従えている）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(This is the mansion of the most hated person in the underground.<fix123>The master of the mansion controls lots of vengeful spirits.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地底一の嫌われ者ねぇ<fix123>よっぽど性格が悪いのかな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The most hated person in the underground...<fix123>They must have a pretty bad personality.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（うんにゃ。性格は大人しいし<fix123>　物腰は柔らかくて良い奴なんだけど……）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Naw, she acts really grown-up<fix123>and she's very mild-mannered, but...)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Satori Komeiji ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>……来客なんて珍しい<fix123>……なるほど、私の猫(ペット)が迷惑を<fix123>掛けてしまったようね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>... A visitor? Most unusual.<fix123>...... I see, it seems my pet has<fix123>caused you some trouble.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お、嫌われ者かしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, are you that hated person?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>酷い言われようね<fix123>……ふーん<fix123>……私と戦う気があるようね<fix123>しかし大した理由も持っていない、と<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's not a very nice way of putting it.<fix123>...... hmmm.<fix123>...... It seems you're looking for a fight.<fix123>But it doesn't look like you have a good reason for it.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>よく判ったわね<fix123>確かに大した理由も持っていないわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, you catch on pretty quickly.<fix123>I definitely don't have a good reason.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……今、慌てて理由を考えているね<fix123>……怨霊、鬼？　温泉？　強盗！？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...... now you're trying to think of one.<fix123>......vengeful spirits, oni? Hot springs? Burglary!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>な！<fix123>何故考えている事を<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey!<fix123>How do you know what I'm...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 少女さとり　～ 3rd eye<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Satori Maiden ~ 3rd eye<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>怨霊も恐れ怯む少女<fix123>古明地さとり<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Girl Even the Vengeful Spirits Fear<fix123>Satori Komeiji<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私には隠し事は一切出来ませんよ<fix123>申し遅れましたが<fix123>私はさとり、この地霊殿の主です<fix123>私の三つ目の目は、貴方の考えている事を<fix123>嫌でも教えてくれるのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There's nothing you can hide from me.<fix123>Perhaps I should have introduced myself sooner.<fix123>I'm Satori, the master of the Palace of the Earth Spirits.<fix123>My third eye will tell me whatever you're thinking,<fix123>no matter how badly you wish it otherwise.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>考えている事が判るって？<fix123>げげげ、そりゃ嫌われるわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You can tell what I'm thinking?<fix123>Gah, people must hate that.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（だろ？　一緒にいたくはないわな<fix123>　さ、頑張れ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(See? Nobody wants to be with her.<fix123>Welp, good luck.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>萃香(あんた)がここに連れてきたんでしょ？<fix123>何とかしなさいよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, you're the one that came along, aren't you!?<fix123>Do something about her!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>一体、誰と話しているの……？<fix123>……そう、地上に鬼がいるのね<fix123>知らなかったわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who on earth are you talking to...?<fix123>Oh, I see, there's an oni above ground.<fix123>I didn't know that.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（流石に私の考えている事までは判るまい<fix123>　遠いもんね。安全地帯だ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(I knew it, she can't tell what I'm thinking up here.<fix123>It's so far away, I'm in a safety zone.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ずるいわねぇ、仕様が無い<fix123>心を読まれる前に倒すしかないのかな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's not fair. Oh well,<fix123>I guess I'll just have to beat her before she reads my mind.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>「怨霊を操っている私を倒せば鬼も満足するわ」<fix123>ふーん<fix123>残念ながら、私を倒したところで何も<fix123>変わらないと思うけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>"The oni will be satisfied if I can beat the master of the Palace."<fix123>Hmm.<fix123>Unfortunately, I don't think anything will change<fix123>even if you do manage to beat me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（こいつ相手に長期戦はやばいね<fix123>　心を丸裸にされる前にやっちゃいなよ！）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Fighting her for too long is dangerous.<fix123>Hurry up before she lays your heart bare!)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>「うーん、本当にこいつが黒幕かしら？」<fix123>と考えているのね<fix123>え？「どっちでもいいや、倒しちゃえ」<fix123>ですって？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, you're thinking,<fix123>"Hmm, I wonder if she's really the mastermind?"<fix123>What?<fix123>"Who cares, let's get her anyway!"<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ついでに早く地上に帰って温泉に入ろうと<fix123>考えてるわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I just want to finish up my business here and<fix123>go back up to the hot spring!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方には平和的に解決するという<fix123>心は持っていないようね<fix123>私には見えるわ<fix123>貴方の心の中に思い描いている弾幕が！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It seems you're of no mind<fix123>to settle this peacefully.<fix123>I can see it.<fix123>The danmaku drawn into your memory!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Satori Komeiji PAUSES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>さあ、これからが本番よ！<fix123>眠りを覚ます恐怖の記憶(トラウマ)で眠るがいい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Here's where it really begins!<fix123>Now, sleep with this trauma that will leave you sleepless!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Satori Komeiji DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>出来るわね<fix123>地上の人間だと思って舐めてたわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Not bad at all.<fix123>I didn't think a human from above would be so strong.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うーん<fix123>どっかで見た事のある弾幕だったけど……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmmmm.<fix123>I think I've seen these danmaku before somewhere...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（おいおい、さっきのは私の技だよ<fix123>　　　覚えておいて欲しいねぇ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Hey, hey, those were my moves before!<fix123>It'd be nice if you'd remember them.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方の心の奥底にあった技から強そうなのを<fix123>選んだの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I picked the danmaku that looked the strongest<fix123>from the depths of your heart.<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Eh?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ、今もっと強い技を思い出したわね？<fix123>ふむふむ、参考にしておくわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, you're remembering even stronger ones now?<fix123>Hm, I'll have to have another look.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（そうだ、かくかくしかじか<fix123>　って伝えてよ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Yeah, just tell her whatever,<fix123>blah blah blah.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>かくかくしかじか<fix123>で、良いの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Blah blah blah blah blah.<fix123>Like that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>言葉は不要ですわ<fix123>そう、怨霊の湧く間欠泉ですか……<fix123>それなら私のペットの管轄ね<fix123>中庭を開けてあげるわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There's no need to use words.<fix123>Ah yes, a geyser that's spewing out vengeful spirits...<fix123>One of my pets is in charge of that.<fix123>I'll take you to the courtyard.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>中庭？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Courtyard?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>中庭から、さらに地下深くへ潜れます<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You can go even farther down from there.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うへぇ<fix123>もうこれ以上地下に潜るのは嫌ねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Bwuh?<fix123>I don't want to go any deeper.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>「温泉に入るのがさらに遠くなる」<fix123>ですか……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>"It'll take me even farther from the hot springs",<fix123>you say...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>昔時の業火<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hellfires of Times Past<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>灼熱地獄跡<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Remains of Blazing Hell<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 廃獄ララバイ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Lullaby of Deserted Hell<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何よここ<fix123>暑いなんてもんじゃないわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What's with this place?<fix123>It's way too hot!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（あの地霊殿はね）<fix123>（旧都が地獄でなくなった時に灼熱地獄が<fix123>　あった場所に建てられたんだ）<fix123>（灼熱地獄は怨霊と間欠泉の両方を扱える<fix123>　場所だからここに来たんだよ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Well, the Palace of the Earth Spirits... )<fix123>(... was built above the Hell of Blazing Fires<fix123>when the Former Capital stopped being part of Hell.)<fix123>(We came here because we can take care of both the geyser<fix123>and the vengeful spirits in the Hell of Blazing Fires.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんだって灼熱地獄だって？<fix123>このまま深く降りていって大丈夫なのかな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What, the Hell of Blazing Fires?<fix123>Is it okay to go any farther down here?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Cat ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>……また猫だ<fix123>あの猫、地霊殿からずっと付いてくるんだけど<fix123>何か嫌ねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...... it's another cat.<fix123>I think that cat's been following us since the Palace of the Earth Spirits.<fix123>It's kind of creepy.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（怪しいねぇ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(It's suspicious.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 死体旅行　～ Be of good cheer!<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Corpse Voyage ~ Be of good cheer!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Cat TRANSFORMS INTO Rin Kaenbyou<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>じゃじゃーん<fix123>お姉さん、灼熱地獄を楽しんでるかい？<fix123>躰も魂も焦がれる業火<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Tada~<fix123>Hey, sis, havin' fun in the Hell of Blazing Fires?<fix123>The hellfires'll take your body and your soul.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ありゃ<fix123>猫じゃなかったのか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Woah,<fix123>It wasn't a cat?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（いや、十分猫のままだと思うよ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(No, I think it's cat enough.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地獄の輪禍<fix123>お燐<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hell's Wheel Accident<fix123>Orin<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>猫は猫でも、そんじょそこらの猫と一緒にして<fix123>もらっちゃぁ困る<fix123>ここが本当の地獄であった時代から<fix123>細々と生きながらえてようやく<fix123>死体や怨霊を捕まえて操れるようになったのさ<fix123>くー、涙ぐましい努力の甲斐があった<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A cat's a cat, but don't make the mistake of thinking I'm<fix123>just your ordinary cat.<fix123>I've been living here<fix123>ever since this place was really Hell.<fix123>And now I can catch corpses and spirits and control them.<fix123>All my hard work has really paid off.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何だって？<fix123>怨霊？<fix123>つまりこいつはここで仕留めておいた方が<fix123>いいって事ね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What?<fix123>Spirits?<fix123>That means we'd better<fix123>take her down, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（ほう、あんたは火の車って訳ね<fix123>　　　ほうほう）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Hey, you're one of those fire chariots, right?<fix123>Hey, hey!)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？<fix123>まぁ確かにうちの神社は火の車だけど何で今？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123>Well, we've got a cart for fires at the shrine, but ..<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お姉さん<fix123>火の車はあたいだよ<fix123>死体を見つけちゃこの猫車で運ぶんだ<fix123>地獄までね！<fix123>お姉さんの死体も運んであげるよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, sis,<fix123>I'm your fiery cart, right here.<fix123>If I find a corpse, I'll wheel it in this cart<fix123>all the way to Hell!<fix123>I'll take your corpse, too!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Rin Kaenbyou DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>くー、お姉さんしびれるねぇ<fix123>その強さ、堪らないわぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Man, sis, you really did a number on me.<fix123>Your strength is unbelievable.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何よこいつ<fix123>変な猫ね<fix123>でも、こいつを倒したから<fix123>間欠泉は元に戻るのかな？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What's with her?<fix123>What a weird cat.<fix123>But, anyway, we beat her,<fix123>so does that mean the geyser will go back to normal?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いやいや、間欠泉はあたいの管轄ではないね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Nope, I'm not in charge of the geyser.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>じゃ、案内して<fix123>その管轄の奴がいるところまで<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, then,<fix123>take us to whoever is.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あいつの所ねぇ<fix123>地底の核にいると思うけど……<fix123>うーん……お勧めしないけど<fix123>まぁ、お姉さんの強さならあるいは！<fix123>じゃんじゃん当って砕けて♪<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmm, her place is...<fix123>I think it's at the core of the underground...<fix123>Yeah... I can't recommend it for ya.<fix123>But, maybe someone as strong as you...<fix123>Can break her right down♪<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何か自信が付くような不安になるような<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Somehow you seem to make me confident and make me uneasy.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（大丈夫だよ<fix123>　負けやしないって）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(It's okay.<fix123>You can't lose.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そりゃあんた。あんたは地底をよく知ってる<fix123>かも知れないけどさぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, you. You know lots about the underground,<fix123>don't you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ささ、心配要らないわ<fix123>お姉さんの骨と魂は拾ってあげるから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, no need to worry.<fix123>I'll take care of your bones and your soul.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（こいつに死体拾われたら、もうあの世<fix123>　にも行けないよ）<fix123>（怨霊として地底を彷徨い続ける事に<fix123>　なる。こりゃぁ負けられないねぇ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(If she picks up your corpse, there's no way<fix123>you'll make it to heaven.)<fix123>(You'll wander the underground as a vengeful spirit<fix123>forever. You can't lose now.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いいよもう<fix123>何が来ても負ける筈がないわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, whatever.<fix123>I won't lose whatever happens.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>荒々しい二つ目の太陽<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Tempestuous Second Sun<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地底都市最深部<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Deepest Part of the Underground City<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 業火マントル<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Hellfire Mantle<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Rin Kaenbyou ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>そうそう、一つ忘れてたよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh yeah, I forgot something.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地獄の底 (ここら) で死ぬとみんな焼けて灰すら残らない<fix123>死体が欲しけりゃ<fix123>やっぱりあたいがお姉さんを仕留めないとね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If you die around here, you'll burn so hard there won't even be ashes left.<fix123>If I want your corpse,<fix123>I'd better take ya down here!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Rin Kaenbyou DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>だー、もう駄目！<fix123>こんな場所、数分と居られないわよ<fix123>肺が焼けるわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, I can't take it anymore!<fix123>I can't stay in a place like this.<fix123>My lungs are going to burn up.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（そりゃ、灼熱地獄だった場所の<fix123>　底の底だからねぇ）<fix123>（多くの罪人が二度と行きたくない地獄に<fix123>　この地獄を選んだ位さ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Well, it is the deepest part of<fix123>the Hell of Blazing Fires.)<fix123>(Most sinners chose this place as the hell they'd<fix123>want to go back to the least.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>昔の人は大変だったのね<fix123>死んだ後もこんな場所へ行かされるなんて<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It must have been terrible long ago.<fix123>I can't believe anyone would get sent to a place like this after they died now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Utsuho Reiuji ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>久しぶりの罪人ね<fix123>忘れられた灼熱地獄へ落とされるなんて<fix123>相当なうっかりさん？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I haven't seen a new sinner in a long time.<fix123>You must have been pretty thoughtless to be sent<fix123>to the Hell of Blazing Fires.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>落とされた訳じゃない<fix123>小旅行みたいなもんよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's not like I got sent here.<fix123>I'm just on a little trip.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（こいつは地獄鴉<fix123>　灼熱地獄で死者の肉を啄む下賤な鳥さ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(This is a hell raven.<fix123>She's a humble bird that eats the corpses of the dead in the Hell of Blazing Fires.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>焼き肉が主食なのね<fix123>いつか成人病になるよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>She must eat mostly fried meat, then.<fix123>That'll be bad for her when she's older.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（間欠泉が湧くのも怨霊が湧くのも<fix123>　全てはここ灼熱地獄跡に原因がある）<fix123>（だから来てみたんだけど……）<fix123>（でも、どうやらこいつ<fix123>　厄介なもん飲み込んだみたいだねぇ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(The Remains of Blazing Hell is the source of<fix123>the geyser and the vengeful spirits.)<fix123>(So, I thought we'd come to see what was going on...)<fix123>(But, it looks like she's<fix123>eaten something pretty bad.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あん？<fix123>厄介なもん？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123>Something bad?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何をごちゃごちゃ言ってるの？<fix123>貴方は食べられる為に小旅行に来たんでしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What are you mumbling on about?<fix123>Did you come on a trip here to get eaten?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（何か、地獄には不釣り合いな力を感じるよ<fix123>　こいつ……）<fix123>（神を飲み込んだね）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(I can feel something that doesn't belong in hell.<fix123>She's...)<fix123>(Probably eaten a god.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>こうしている間にも、貴方の躰はじっくり<fix123>焼けていく<fix123>今すぐ食べたいけど焦りは禁物<fix123>美味しく頂く為には時間をかけて焼かないと<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>See, your body's getting burned up<fix123>pretty nicely now.<fix123>I want to eat you up right now, but it's not good to rush.<fix123>You have to let it fry just the right amount for it to taste the best.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふん、その前にあんたが飛べなくなるよ<fix123>今の人間は灼熱地獄なんか怖がらない<fix123>ましてやそこに住む鴉なんて<fix123>地上で生ゴミを漁る鴉の方が怖いわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm, I'll clip your wings before that.<fix123>Humans these days aren't scared of any Hell of Blazing Fires,<fix123>much less the birds that live there.<fix123>The birds that eat raw garbage up above are scarier.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>熱かい悩む神の火<fix123>霊烏路空<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Scorching, Troublesome Divine Flame<fix123>Utsuho Reiuji<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふふふ<fix123>そう、灼熱地獄は怖くないの<fix123>じゃあ、もっと恐ろしい高温高圧の世界なら<fix123>どうかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hohoho.<fix123>So, you're not afraid of the Hell of Blazing Fires?<fix123>Well, then, what about a much more terrifying<fix123>high temperature, high pressure world?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（あちゃー<fix123>　こいつは拙い）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Aw, man,<fix123>what an idiot.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ん？<fix123>どうしたの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm?<fix123>What's wrong?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（こいつの体の中から感じる力<fix123>　これは八咫烏の力だよ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(The power I can feel inside of her<fix123>is a Yatagarasu.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>八咫烏？　カラスの中にヤタガラス？<fix123>ロシアの人形みたいね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yatagarasu? A sun crow inside a crow?<fix123>She's like one of those Russian dolls!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（八咫烏は究極のエネルギーを操る神様だ<fix123>　霊夢も逃げた方がいいよ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(A Yatagarasu is a god that controls the ultimate energy.<fix123>Reimu, maybe you'd better run.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 霊知の太陽信仰　～ Nuclear Fusion<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Solar Sect of Mystic Wisdom ~ Nuclear Fusion<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>残念でした<fix123>もう地獄の釜から逃げ出せない<fix123>時間すら歪む超高温、超高圧の世界は<fix123>地上の姿を大きく変貌させるでしょう<fix123>その究極のエネルギーこそ核融合！<fix123>貴方も私とフュージョンしましょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Too bad,<fix123>but you can't escape from the flaming kettle of hell.<fix123>This high temperature, high pressure world that distorts even time<fix123>will transform the above ground world in a big way.<fix123>The ultimate energy is nuclear fusion power!<fix123>Won't you fuse with me?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Utsuho Reiuji DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>If player has continued<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Ending　No. 8<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>If player has not continued<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Ending　No. 2<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>忘恩の地から吹く風<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Wind Blowing From the Thankless Land<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>幻想風穴<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Fantastic Blowhole<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 暗闇の風穴<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Dark Blowhole<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kisume ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Kisume DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>何でこんなじめじめした所に来なきゃ<fix123>いけないの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Why did I have to come down to such a<fix123>soaking wet place?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>(……霊夢。聞こえるかしら？……）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(... Reimu. Can you hear me?... )<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うぇ？<fix123>ついに幻聴が<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123>And now I'm hearing things.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（……陰陽玉を通じて会話が<fix123>　出来るようにしておいたわ）<fix123>（貴方がサボらない様に）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(... I made it so we can talk<fix123>through your yin-yang orbs.)<fix123>(So I can make sure you don't slack off.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>知るかい<fix123>大体、こんな暗くてサボりようのない<fix123>洞窟に送り込んでおいて<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>As if!<fix123>First of all, you sent me into this cave,<fix123>which is no place to loaf around.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yamame Kurodani ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>おお？<fix123>人間とは珍しいねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh?<fix123>A human? How unusual.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>暗い洞窟の明るい網<fix123>黒谷ヤマメ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Bright Net in the Dark Cave<fix123>Yamame Kurodani<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地底に遊びに来たのかい？<fix123>あそこは今お祭り騒ぎよ<fix123>誰も拒みゃしないから楽しんでおいき<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Did you come to play underground?<fix123>They're having a big feast down there now.<fix123>They won't turn away anyone, so go have fun.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（……霊夢）<fix123>（敵よ、霊夢。　倒しなさい）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(..... Reimu.)<fix123>(That's an enemy, Reimu. Defeat her.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>敵かなぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Is it really?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あらあら大歓迎よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, what a warm welcome.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>敵かどうかというとそんなでも<fix123>ない気がするけど……<fix123>倒す事には変わりはない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I don't really know if she's an enemy<fix123>or not...<fix123>But I guess the usual thing would be to beat her.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お、独り言の多い人間め<fix123>地下に落とされた妖怪達の力を見たいのね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, you self-talking human. You're looking for the<fix123>power of the youkai who got banished down here, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 封じられた妖怪　～ Lost Place<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Sealed-Away Youkai ~ Lost Place<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yamame Kurodani DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>独り言が多いってさ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Do I talk to myself that much?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（疲れているんじゃない？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Are you getting tired?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はあ、疲れるに決まってるじゃない<fix123>余り乗り気じゃないし<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Of course I'm getting tired.<fix123>It's not like I want to be down here, anyway.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地上と過去を結ぶ深道<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Deep Road Connecting the Past and the Above Ground World<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地獄の深道<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Deep Road to Hell<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 渡る者の途絶えた橋<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Bridge People No Longer Cross<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この穴、何処まで続いているのよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Just how far does this hole go!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（……もうすぐよ）<fix123>（もうすぐ、旧都に辿り着く筈）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(... you're almost there.)<fix123>(You should reach the Former Capital soon.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Parsee Mizuhashi ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>BGM: 緑眼のジェラシー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Green-eyed Jealousy<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もしかして人間？<fix123>人間が旧都に何の用？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, are you a human?<fix123>What does a human want in the Former Capital?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>旧都？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Former Capital?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地殻の下の嫉妬心<fix123>水橋パルスィ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Jealousy Beneath the Earth's Crust<fix123>Parsee Mizuhashi<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まさか私達の呪われた力を目当てに？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are you coming to look for our cursed power?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（……霊夢）<fix123>（地底の妖怪達は、忌み嫌われた能力を<fix123>　持つ者ばかり…）<fix123>（出会い頭に倒しなさい）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(...... Reimu.)<fix123>(All the youkai underground have fearsome,<fix123>detestable powers... )<fix123>(Just beat her while you're passing by her.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>むむむ、話が読めないわ<fix123>私はただ、温泉が楽しめれば良いのに<fix123>何か紫に騙された気がする<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I can never tell what you're going to say next!<fix123>I just wanted to relax in some hot springs.<fix123>I think you tricked me, Yukari.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（ふふふ、騙してなどいないわ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Hmhmhm, I'm not tricking anyone.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地上の光が妬ましい<fix123>巡る風が妬ましい<fix123>貴方には恨みはないけど<fix123>私が貴方を討つ理由など幾らでも作れるわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm jealous of the light above ground.<fix123>I'm jealous of the gentle breezes.<fix123>I don't have anything against you, but<fix123>I can make up lots of reasons to attack you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Parsee Mizuhashi DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>何よ今の奴<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What was her problem?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（彼女はこの世とあの世を<fix123>　未練で繋ぐ嫉妬の妖怪）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(She is a youkai of jealousy binding<fix123>this world to the next through her regrets.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この世とあの世？<fix123>なんかあの世にいける奴が多すぎない？<fix123>死神とか亡霊とか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This world and the next?<fix123>Aren't there too many people who can go back and forth between<fix123>the two? Reapers, ghosts, and...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（それだけ、人間の死は妖怪にとって<fix123>　魅力的、って事ですわ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(That's just because human death has a bewitching<fix123>effect on youkai.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>忘れられた雪の旧都<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Snowy Forgotten Former Capital<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>旧地獄街道<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Streets of a Former Hell<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 旧地獄街道を行く<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Walking the Streets of a Former Hell<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yuugi Hoshiguma ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あんた、なかなやるね<fix123>何者か知らんけど、<fix123>暴れる奴には暴れて迎えるのが礼儀ってね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, you're pretty good.<fix123>Dunno who you are, but they say<fix123>a rowdy welcome is best for a rowdy guest!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yuugi Hoshiguma STOPS FIGHTING<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>気に入った！<fix123>もっと愉しませてあげるから<fix123>駄目になるまでついてきなよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I like you!<fix123>We'll have lots more fun, so<fix123>keep following until you can't take anymore!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あんたと酒呑んでく気は無いんだけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But I don't want to go drinking with you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うぎぎ<fix123>目の前をうろちょろと邪魔よ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Geez!<fix123>Quit wandering around in front of me, you're in the way!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あらあら、つれないねぇ<fix123>地上の奴らが降りてくる事なんて殆ど無いのに<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, you're so cold.<fix123>And people from above almost never come down here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（……霊夢、話を聞いてあげたら？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(... Reimu, why don't we listen to what she has to say?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そもそも、目的もよく判らないし<fix123>紫（あんた）は何か当てがあるんでしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I don't even know what we're down here for.<fix123>You're after something, right, Yukari?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>語られる怪力乱神<fix123>星熊 勇儀<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Spoken-of Anomalies, Strength, Disorder, and Spirits<fix123>Yuugi Hoshiguma<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>一体、誰の下に向かってるんだい？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Just whose tail are you after, anyway?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>知らない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I don't know.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おや、迷子かい？<fix123>迷って地下に潜っちゃうなんて<fix123>穴があったから入っちゃったのかな？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, are you lost?<fix123>How did you wander all the way down here?<fix123>Did you wander into some hole that opened up?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>知らないわよ！<fix123>私は無理矢理地下に行かされたの！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Whatever!<fix123>I was forced to come down here!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あん？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（私は地上の妖怪を進入させない約束をした）<fix123>（そして貴方達は地底に大都市を築いた）<fix123>（ただ、その代わりに地中に眠る怨霊達を<fix123>　出てこないように鎮める約束だった筈）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(I promised not to let any youkai from above down here.)<fix123>(And then you all built a great city underground.)<fix123>(But, in return I believe you promised to make sure the<fix123>vengeful spirits underground would remain pacified.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まあな、そういう約束だねって<fix123>そんな事を知っているなんて、貴方は誰？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yeah, we have a deal like that, but who are<fix123>you if you know about that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（なのに、間欠泉と一緒に怨霊が沸いてくる<fix123>　なんて、約束が違うんじゃないの？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(And yet, the vengeful spirits started pouring out when that<fix123>geyser erupted. That's not what you promised, is it?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？　地下から沸いてきた？<fix123>怨霊？<fix123>うーん<fix123>私は旧都から地上に行ってる奴なんて……<fix123>一人しか知らんな<fix123>だけどそいつは……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh? They're pouring out?<fix123>The vengeful spirits?<fix123>Well, I can't think of<fix123>Many people who've left the Former Capital to go above ground...<fix123>I only know of one,<fix123>But she's...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（そいつは関係無いわ、きっと<fix123>　何か他に思い当たる節はある？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(She's got nothing to do with this, I'm sure.<fix123>Can you remember any other times?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうだなぁ……<fix123>間欠泉なら地霊殿の奴らの仕業じゃないかな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm, let's see...<fix123>A geyser probably means it's the Palace of the Earth Spirits.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>勝手に話を進めないでよ<fix123>地霊殿って何？　そこに行けばいいの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Stop leading the conversation by yourself.<fix123>What's the Palace of the Earth Spirits? Can we go there?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前はその珠の向こうにいる妖怪に言われて<fix123>やってきたんだな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You came here because the youkai in that jewel<fix123>told you to, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうよ、よく判ったわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yep, you got it right on.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地霊殿ってのは、旧地獄の中心に建っている<fix123>お屋敷だよ<fix123>そこには偉そうにしている奴らがいるんだよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Palace of the Earth Spirits is a building right in<fix123>the middle of what used to be Hell here.<fix123>A bunch of stuck-up folks live there.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふーん<fix123>取り敢えずそこに向かってみようかな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmm.<fix123>I guess we should go there, then.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（ふふふ、多分すぐにはいけないわよ？<fix123>　目の前にこいつがいる限り）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Hohoho, I think it'll be a while before we can set out,<fix123>as long as she's there, anyway.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うん？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そこの珠の向こうの妖怪は<fix123>良く判っているね！<fix123>我々、鬼の性格が！<fix123>強い者を見ると力比べしたくなる性格が！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That youkai in the jewel knows<fix123>what's going on!<fix123>Because, we oni<fix123>always want to compare our strength to strong people we meet!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 華のさかづき大江山<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: A Flower-Studded Sake Dish on Mt. Ooe<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yuugi Hoshiguma DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>お見事！<fix123>そこまで力があるのなら地霊殿に行っても<fix123>大丈夫だわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well done!<fix123>If you're that powerful, you'll have no problems at the<fix123>Palace of the Earth Spirits!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何だって？<fix123>あんた、鬼だって？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What?<fix123>You're an oni?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうよ？<fix123>鬼は地上を捨てて、ここに移る住んだの<fix123>ここは昔、地獄の繁華街だったんだけど、<fix123>今や地獄は閻魔様に持って行かれて……<fix123>今や地底はただの忘れられた怨霊達の牢獄<fix123>ま、人間はその事を忘れて久しいのかも<fix123>知れないけどね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Uh, yeah?<fix123>We cast aside the above ground world and moved here.<fix123>Long ago, this was Hell's shopping district,<fix123>but now the Yamas have made off with Hell, so...<fix123>Now it's just a forgotten prison for vengeful spirits.<fix123>Well, that's an old story, I'm sure humans don't<fix123>remember anymore.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（貴方達（おにたち）が約束を破るとは思っていない<fix123>　さ、そいつを地霊殿まで案内してあげて<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(I wouldn't have thought you oni would break your promise.<fix123>Now, take her to the Palace of the Earth Spirits.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>紫、あんた何か隠してない？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yukari, you're not hiding something, are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（ああ、神社にあったお茶はいまいち<fix123>　美味しくなかったわ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Oh, the tea at the shrine wasn't<fix123>very good.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>留守中に勝手に飲むな！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Don't drink it all while I'm gone!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>誰からも好かれない恐怖の目<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Those Terrifying Eyes Nobody Loves<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地霊殿<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Palace of the Earth Spirits<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ハートフェルトファンシー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Heartfelt Fancy<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Cat ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Cat DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>鬼の言う事を真に受けて<fix123>こんな大きな屋敷に来ちゃったけど<fix123>肝心なこの館の住人っぽい人が全く見えない<fix123>……猫はいたけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I know we took that oni at her word and<fix123>came to this huge mansion, but<fix123>I don't see anyone who looks like they'd be in charge.<fix123>... there was that cat, though.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（ふむ）<fix123>（さっきの猫に主人を連れてきて貰えば<fix123>　良かったわね）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Hmm.)<fix123>(We should have had that cat take us<fix123>to its master.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>猫に止めを刺せば良かったなぁ<fix123>死体の臭いにつられて出てきたかも知れない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I wish we could have finished off that cat.<fix123>It might have been attracted by the smell of dead bodies.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Satori Komeiji ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>……来客なんて珍しい<fix123>……なるほど、私の猫が迷惑を<fix123>掛けてしまったようね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>... visitors? How unusual.<fix123>... I see, my cat must have<fix123>caused you some trouble.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>やっと妖怪らしい妖怪に出会えたわ<fix123>さあ、色々訊きたい事があるの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Finally, someone that looks like a youkai.<fix123>There's a lot I want to ask you...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>言わなくても判るわ<fix123>……神社の近くに不思議な間欠泉？<fix123>……あら、そのままでも良いと思ってるの<fix123>……え？　喉が渇いたって？<fix123>そう、お茶の用意でもしましょうか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You don't have to tell me that.<fix123>...... a strange geyser near a shrine?<fix123>...... oh, I think that would be fine, too.<fix123>...... Hmm? You're thirsty?<fix123>Why don't I put on some tea?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あー？<fix123>何を独り言してるのよ<fix123>さっきから何故か暑くて<fix123>……喉が渇いてるのは確かだけど<fix123>お茶でも出してくれるって<fix123>あんた使用人か何か？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123>What are you talking to yourself about?<fix123>I've been hot for some reason for a while<fix123>... so yes, I'm thirsty<fix123>but if you're talking about making tea<fix123>are you a servant, or what?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 少女さとり　～ 3rd eye<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Satori Maiden ~ 3rd eye<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>怨霊も恐れ怯む少女<fix123>古明地さとり<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Girl Even the Vengeful Spirits Fear<fix123>Satori Komeiji<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>申し遅れました<fix123>私はさとり、この地霊殿の主です<fix123>私には隠し事は一切出来ませんよ<fix123>何故なら、貴方の考えている事が<fix123>全て聞こえてきてしまうのですから……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, excuse me. I'm Satori<fix123>the master of the Palace of the Earth Spirits.<fix123>There's nothing that's hidden from me.<fix123><fix123>That's because I can hear<fix123>everything you're thinking...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんと！　会話いらずね<fix123>じゃあ早速お茶でも<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What!? I guess we don't need to talk then.<fix123>Some tea would be nice, right away, please!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（……霊夢、最初に言った事を忘れたの？）<fix123>（地底に棲む妖怪は<fix123>　出会い頭に倒しなさい、と）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(...... Reimu, I told you before, didn't I?)<fix123>(You should beat any youkai<fix123>you encounter underground right away.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>しょうがないじゃない<fix123>私はまだ怨霊とかよく判らないし<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh well. I still don't know<fix123>anything about the vengeful spirits.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>一体、誰と話しているの……？<fix123>……そう、地上に居る妖怪と話しているのね<fix123>……<fix123>……<fix123>……流石に地上は遠すぎてその妖怪の心は<fix123>読めないわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who are you talking to?<fix123>... I see, a youkai that's above ground.<fix123>...<fix123>...<fix123>... I knew it, above ground is too far away,<fix123>so I can't read her heart.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（貴方かしら？<fix123>　忌まわしき間欠泉を止める事が出来るのは）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(I wonder if you're the one who could<fix123>stop that dreadful geyser?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>間欠泉？　間欠泉ねぇ……<fix123>また私のペットが何かやらかしたのかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A geyser? Hm, a geyser...<fix123>I wonder if one of my pets did something they shouldn't have again?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（ペット？<fix123>　さっきの猫の事かしら）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Pet?<fix123>Oh, like that cat?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>でもそこの人間は「間欠泉は残しても良い」と<fix123>考えているようだけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But, it seems that human doesn't mind<fix123>if the geyser stays.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（霊夢……<fix123>　そろそろ妖怪退治の本分を思い出しなさい）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Reimu...<fix123>you should really get around to taking care of her.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>んー<fix123>そうねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Mmm.<fix123>I guess.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう「面倒だからみんな倒して地上に帰ろう」<fix123>と考えているのね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, she's thinking,<fix123>"Being down here is a pain, so I'll just beat everyone and go home."<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>その通りよ<fix123>流石会話いらずね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Exactly.<fix123>We really don't need to talk, do we!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地上の間欠泉は恐らく私のペットか<fix123>うちの怨霊の手によるものでしょう<fix123>私が調べても良いのですが……<fix123>貴方には平和的に解決するという<fix123>心は持っていないようね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The geyser was probably caused by one of my pets<fix123>or one of the spirits in this mansion.<fix123>I don't mind looking into it, but...<fix123>You don't seem to be of a mind<fix123>to settle this peacefully.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>当たり前じゃない<fix123>誰が妖怪の言う事なんて真に受けるのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Of course not.<fix123>Who would take a youkai at their word?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>しかし、鬼の言う事は真に受けた<fix123>そして地上の妖怪の事を信用している<fix123>貴方がその妖怪の事を思い出している事が<fix123>私にも判るよ<fix123>さあ、心に武器を持って！<fix123>自分の心象と戦うが良いわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But, you trusted that oni...<fix123>And you're relying on that youkai from above.<fix123>I know everything you remember<fix123>about that youkai, too.<fix123>Now, arm your heart, and do battle<fix123>against your own feelings!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Satori Komeiji PAUSES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>さあ、これからが本番よ！<fix123>眠りを覚ます恐怖の記憶 (トラウマ) で眠るがいい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now, this is where it really begins!<fix123>Go and sleep with a trauma so frightful it will wake you up!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Satori Komeiji DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あらら<fix123>こんな地底深くまで降りてくるだけあるわ〜<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh my.<fix123>Well, you did manage to come this deep underground~<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どっかで見た事のある弾幕だったわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm, those danmaku look awfully familiar.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そりゃそうよ、貴方の心の中にあった弾幕だもの。<fix123>私はそれを真似ただけ……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Of course, they're danmaku that stood out in your heart.<fix123>I just imitated them...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（それはともかく、今度は貴方の心当たり<fix123>　を霊夢に教えてやってくださる？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(In any case, why don't you tell Reimu<fix123>about what's in your heart now?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>えーっと、間欠泉を止める方法でしたっけ？<fix123>それなら私のペットに会うと良いわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmm, how to stop the geyser, was it?<fix123>You should talk to my pet, then.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ペットって猫の事？<fix123>それならさっき会ったけど……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You mean that cat?<fix123>I think we met before...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>猫にはそんな能力はありません<fix123>私は数多くのペットを飼っていますから<fix123>この屋敷の中庭に、さらに地下深く<fix123>最深部に通じる穴があります。<fix123>その先に居るはずですわ<fix123>……え？<fix123>「ペットなら呼べばいいのに」ですか？<fix123>どうも、私はペットに避けられるのですよ<fix123>この力の所為かしらね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The cat isn't that powerful.<fix123>I have lots of pets here.<fix123>In the courtyard of this mansion, there's a hole<fix123>that leads to the deepest part of the underground.<fix123>She should be there.<fix123>... Hm?<fix123>"If she's your pet, why not just call her?"<fix123>My pet has been avoiding me lately.<fix123>I wonder if it's because of my power?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ペットだけじゃなくて誰からも<fix123>好かれなさそうね。会話が成立しなくて<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I don't think anyone likes her, not just her pets.<fix123>Nobody would get to finish their sentences.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>昔時の業火<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hellfires of Times Past<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>灼熱地獄跡<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Remains of the Blazing Hell<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 廃獄ララバイ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Lullaby of Deserted Hell<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あー暑いわねー<fix123>冬服着てきて損したわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, it's so hot.<fix123>I wish I hadn't worn winter clothes.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（それ、冬服だったの？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Those are winter clothes?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>中庭ってこんな地獄のようなところとは<fix123>思わなかったわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I wouldn't have imagined such a hellish place<fix123>would be under their courtyard.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Cat ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>……猫？<fix123>あの猫、地霊殿からずっと付いてくるんだけど<fix123>何か嫌ねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>... a cat?<fix123>I think that cat's been following me from the Palace,<fix123>how creepy.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（マタタビ持ってる？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Do you have any catnip?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 死体旅行　～ Be of good cheer!<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Corpse Voyage ~ Be of good cheer!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Cat TRANSFORMS into Rin Kaenbyou<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>じゃじゃーん<fix123>お姉さん、楽しい事してるね！<fix123>あたいも混ぜてくれるかい？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Tada~<fix123>Looks like you're havin' fun, sis!<fix123>Mind if I join ya?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>わ！<fix123>猫が猫になった！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Aah!<fix123>The cat turned into a cat!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（それを言うなら猫が猫車になった、かな？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(You mean, the cat turned into a cat-wheelbarrow?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地獄の輪禍<fix123>お燐<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hell's Wheel Accident<fix123>Orin<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>猫の姿のままの方が楽なんだけど<fix123>会話がまともに出来ないし<fix123>それに、あのままじゃお姉さんに負けそう<fix123>だったから元の姿に戻しちゃった<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's more fun being a cat,<fix123>but I can't really talk like that.<fix123>Besides, it looked like I was gonna lose to ya,<fix123>so I had to change back.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さっきのさとりが言ってたペットって<fix123>やっぱりあんたかな？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are you the pet Satori<fix123>was talking about?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（猫は違うって言ってたような）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(I think she said it wasn't the cat.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>見てた見てた聞いてたよ<fix123>ご主人様の勇姿、お姉さんの野望！<fix123>間欠泉を止めるんだって？<fix123>止めときな止めときな<fix123>あいつは危ない奴さ！<fix123>ここらで一番危険な地底の鳥だ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I was watching, and listening.<fix123>To my master's gallantry, and your plot!<fix123>You wanna stop the geyser?<fix123>Ya better not!<fix123>She's really dangerous, ya know?<fix123>She's the most dangerous bird underground.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ここまできて引き下がる訳にいかないでしょ？<fix123>自分だって危ない猫の癖に<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There's no way we can turn back now!<fix123>Even if you're a dangerous cat.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（そうそう、うちの猫は何処に行ったっけ？<fix123>　すぐ居なくなって困るのよねぇ）<fix123>（自分の式神なら自分でちゃんとプログラム<fix123>　して欲しいわね。バグの無いように）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Hm, I wonder where our cat went off to?<fix123>It's such a pain when she just suddenly disappears like that.)<fix123>(I wish you'd take care to program your own familiar<fix123>properly. Without any bugs.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ま、そんな危険な鳥を相手にする位なら<fix123>私とやるよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, if you're gonna go up against that dangerous bird,<fix123>you gotta fight me first!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>望むところ！<fix123>もう散々猫の貴方と戦った気もするけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Perfect!<fix123>I think we already fought you a few times as a cat, though...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間の貴方を殺して、業火の車は重くなる〜♪<fix123>あー死体運びは楽しいなぁ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If I kill you, human, my hellfire cart will get heavy~♪<fix123>Man, carrying off corpses is fun!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Rin Kaenbyou DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>お見事！<fix123>あたいが人間に負けるとは思わなかったわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Good job!<fix123>Wouldn't've thought I'd lose to a human.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あー、暑くてやってらんないわ<fix123>さっさと終わらせよう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, it's so hot I can't stand it<fix123>I just wanted to be done with it.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お姉さんならきっとあいつもやってくれるわね！<fix123>期待して待ってるわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, sis, I bet you can beat her for me!<fix123>I'll be waiting for you!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>変な感じねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What a weird feeling.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（ここまで来たら後は一本道<fix123>もう行くしかないわ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(It looks like there's only one road up ahead.<fix123>All we can do is go forward.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>その、この先に居るペットってどんな奴なの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I wonder what the pet down that road will be like?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うちらと同じでさとり様のペットなんだけどね<fix123>最近、果てしなく強大な力を手に入れたのよ<fix123>それで誰の手にも負えなくなって……<fix123>うちら動物は長く生きながらえたり、怨霊や<fix123>魑魅魍魎を飲み込んだりする事で力を得るの<fix123>でもあいつは……何処で見つけたのかしらねぇ<fix123>神様の力なんて飲み込んで<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>She's one of Miss Satori's pets, just like me, but...<fix123>She got really powerful lately, it's like she can do anything.<fix123>So, nobody can really take care of her...<fix123>We animals get really powerful when we live long, and we<fix123>can get powerful by swallowing up vengeful spirits and the like[1]<fix123>But, she's... I wonder where she found it?<fix123>Hard to believe she swallowed up the power of the gods.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（今の聞いた？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Did you hear that?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うん<fix123>神様って消化に良いのかなぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes.<fix123>I wonder if gods are easy to digest...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>荒々しい二つ目の太陽<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Tempestuous Second Sun<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地底都市最深部<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Deepest Part of the Underground City<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 業火マントル<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Hellfire Mantle<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Rin Kaenbyou ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>そうそう、一つ忘れてたよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh yeah, I forgot something.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地獄の底 (ここら) で死ぬとみんな焼けて灰すら残らない<fix123>死体が欲しけりゃ<fix123>やっぱりあたいがお姉さんを仕留めないとね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If you die around here, you'll burn so hard there won't even be ashes left.<fix123>If I want your corpse,<fix123>I'd better take ya down here!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Rin Kaenbyou DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>だー、もう駄目！<fix123>こんな所にいたら目的の鳥を見つける前に<fix123>焼け死んじゃうわよ。焼け巫女よ焼け巫女<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I can't take it anymore!<fix123>I'm going to be burned to death before we ever find that bird.<fix123>I'm turning into a fried shrine maiden here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（大丈夫、もう見つかる寸前よ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Don't worry, I'm sure we're about to find her.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何の根拠があって言ってるのか判らないけれど<fix123>私もそう思う。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I have no idea what makes you say that<fix123>but I think you're right.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Utsuho Reiuji ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>やっと見つけたわ！<fix123>貴方が噂の地上から来た変わり者ね？<fix123>私に会いに来るって噂を聞いて<fix123>いてもたってもいられなかったわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I finally found you!<fix123>You're the weird person from above everyone's been talking about, right?<fix123>I heard you were coming to find me<fix123>but I couldn't find you anywhere.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほらね。<fix123>そろそろ見つかると思った<fix123>私の勘に間違いは無いんだから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm, speak of the devil, eh?<fix123>I guess my intuition is as good as ever.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方の目的は間欠泉を止める事ですって？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're trying to stop the geyser, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まぁ……そうね<fix123>止めるのは一緒に出てくる怨霊だけで<fix123>温泉は残してくれても良いんだけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Uh... right.<fix123>Though, I wouldn't mind it if the geyser stayed<fix123>and only those spirits went away...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はるか遠くの地上からわざわざ来てくれたのに<fix123>こんな事言うのも心苦しいんだけど……<fix123>間欠泉は止まらないわよ<fix123>もう遅い、遅すぎたわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You came all the way down here from above ground,<fix123>so I hate to tell you this, but...<fix123>The geyser won't stop.<fix123>It's too late for that.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（何ですって？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(What did you say?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>間欠泉は私が手に入れた究極の力の余剰分を<fix123>地上に逃すためだけの穴<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The geyser is just a hole to let the excess<fix123>part of my ultimate power escape.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>熱かい悩む神の火<fix123>霊烏路 空<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Scorching, Troublesome Divine Flame<fix123>Utsuho Reiuji<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私はもう究極の力を手にしてしまった<fix123>その力を使う度に間欠泉が湧くの<fix123>だから止める事が出来ない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've already obtained the ultimate power.<fix123>Every time I use it, the geyser gushes forth.<fix123>So, I can't stop it.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>究極の力だって？<fix123>使う度に間欠泉が湧くって、湯沸しの力かしら<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The ultimate power?<fix123>If a geyser happens every time, does that mean it's the power of a teakettle?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（霊夢、貴方なら見える筈<fix123>　目の前の鳥は、何の神を喰らったと思う？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Reimu, you should be able to see it.<fix123>Which god did that bird eat up?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うーん……お湯を沸かす神様？<fix123>謎ね<fix123>何にしてもここまで来たらこいつを倒せば<fix123>間欠泉が止まる筈<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmmmm... the kind that can draw a hot bath?<fix123>Who knows?<fix123>Anyway, we came all this way, so if we<fix123>just beat her the geyser should stop.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふふふ、そうこなくちゃね！<fix123>貴方を倒した後は地上にこの力を試しに行く<fix123>つもりよ<fix123>うふふ、哀れ地上は新しい灼熱地獄に<fix123>生まれ変わる<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hahaha, I guess it comes to that, after all!<fix123>Once I beat you, I'm going to go above<fix123>ground to test out this power of mine.<fix123>Hohoho, that pathetic place will be<fix123>reborn as a new Blazing Hell.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほんと、良かったわね<fix123>地上に行く前に私に会えて<fix123>地上に住む究極の巫女の力で倒されて<fix123>貴方は地上侵略を諦める事が出来るんだもん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm, it's a good thing you ran into<fix123>me before you went up there.<fix123>You'll be beaten by the power of the ultimate shrine maiden,<fix123>which will stop your invasion plans.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 霊知の太陽信仰　～ Nuclear Fusion<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Solar Sect of Mystic Wisdom ~ Nuclear Fusion<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>黒い太陽、ヤタガラス様<fix123>我に力を与えてくださった事に感謝します<fix123>地上に降り注ぐ太陽の光<fix123>それは新しい原子を創る核融合の熱<fix123>究極の核融合で身も心も幽霊も妖精も<fix123>フュージョンし尽くすがいい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Lord Yatagarasu, the Black Sun.<fix123>Thank you for giving me your power.<fix123>The sunlight that rains down on the Earth<fix123>is a nuclear furnace that will create new atoms.<fix123>My ultimate nuclear fusion will burn up<fix123>every body, heart, phantom, and fairy!<fix123><fix123>

<c$Yuyuko:$12345678> "Ah, you're still here.<fix123><c$$12345678"> Spring has arrived in your world as well,<fix123><fix123><c$$12345678"> why don't you go back?"<fix123>

<c$Youmu:$12345678> "She says that your presence is causing<fix123><c$$12345678"> our cherry petals to be blown away."<fix123>

A cherry petal is like a human life. Wind makes little<fix123>　　difference when the time comes for it to fall. Marisa believes<fix123><fix123>　　that petals fall when flowers strive too hard to open.<fix123>
