<c$Yuyuko:$12345678> "Anyway, Youmu, we're hosting a flower viewing feast today.<fix123>
<c$$12345678"> Finish cleaning up already.<fix123>
<c$$12345678"> Oh yes, I've invited the Prismriver sisters as well."<fix123>
<c$Marisa:$12345678> "I've brought some Tuchigumo Sake.<fix123><c$$12345678"> C'mon, we'll be celebrating all night long."<fix123>
<c$Yuyuko:$12345678> "Wow, excellent.<fix123><c$$12345678"> That's as good as being revived!"<fix123>
<c$Youmu:$12345678> "... You don't say."<fix123>

No duty is emptier than cleaning up after a feast.<fix123>　　That, however, is merely a sign that the feast<fix123>　　was very enjoyable. This is why, although cleanup duty<fix123><fix123>　　feels futile to Youmu, she finds it reassuring.<fix123>
Ending No. 7<fix123>
The Kirisame residence.<fix123>
In the end, the Saigyou Ayakashi didn't fully blossom.<fix123>　　　　Marisa returned to the cold of Gensokyo,<fix123><fix123>　　　　and decided to warm herself at home.<fix123>
<c$Marisa:$12345678> "So what was the point of it all?<fix123>　　<c$$12345678"> Did I learn that my own home is best?"<fix123>
<c$Marisa:$12345678> "Well, fine.<fix123>　　<c$$12345678"> Clinging to cherry blossoms even after one's death...<fix123><fix123>　　<c$$12345678"> That's really pathetic, isn't it."<fix123>
Although it was only for a short while,<fix123>　　　　Marisa enjoyed basking in the bounty of spring.<fix123><fix123>　　　　She will surely set out to enjoy it again.<fix123>
Bad Ending No. 2<fix123>　　　　Try clearing the game without continues next time!<fix123>
<fix123>愉快な日本の神様<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A Merry Japanese God<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>守矢の神社（本殿）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Moriya Shrine (Inner Sanctum)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 明日ハレの日、ケの昨日<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Tomorrow Will Be Special, Yesterday Was Not<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kanako Yasaka ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あら、もしかしてこの先に進むつもり？<fix123>駄目よ永遠に眠り続ける私の友人が居るんだから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, do you mean to go further ahead?<fix123>You may not — there rests my ever-sleeping friend.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kanako Yasaka DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>神奈子が言ってた友達って……<fix123>やっぱり神様なんだろうなぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If she's Kanako's friend...<fix123>That must mean she's another god.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Suwako Moriya ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>誰が友達ですって？<fix123>私の神社を勝手に幻想郷に送り込んでおいて<fix123>よくもまぁ、いけしゃあしゃあとそんな事言えたもんだ<fix123>あんな女、敵よ敵<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who said we're friends?<fix123>She selfishly sent my shrine into Gensokyo...<fix123>Then she shamelessly said, "Oh! Don't worry, it'll be okay".<fix123>That kind of woman is an enemy. An enemy!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この神社は神奈子の神社じゃないの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Isn't this shrine Kanako's?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>土着神の頂点<fix123>洩矢　諏訪子<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Highest of Native Gods<fix123>Suwako Moriya<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あーうーまあ、私の神社だったんだけどねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Auuuuu... Well, it used to be my shrine, you know?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だった？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Used to?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>昔、神奈子に敗れてからはあいつの神社ね仕方がない<fix123>でもまあ、神社は自由にさせてくれるし私への信仰も増えたし<fix123>まあ、感謝はして無くもないけど<fix123>それより何よ貴方は麓の巫女でしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A long time ago, I got beaten by Kanako, so now it's her shrine. Can't help that.<fix123>But you know what, I'm free to stay around the shrine, and people's faith in me has risen.<fix123>It's not like I'm not grateful, I guess...<fix123>Anyway, what is it? You're the shrine maiden from down below the mountain, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いやまあ、この神社の秘密を探りに来ただけなんだけどね<fix123>何だかんだ言って二人とも仲良さそうだしま、帰ろうかな？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, ah, I came to find out the secrets of this shrine.<fix123>It looks like you're on pretty good terms with those two, so I think I'll be going back now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何言ってるのよ早苗とも神奈子とも遊んだんでしょ？<fix123>私だけ無視して巫女が務まるとでも思ってるの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What are you saying?  You got to play with Sanae and Kanako, right?<fix123>Do you think you'd be fit to be a shrine maiden if you ignored only me?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>思ってますが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, yes.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ネイティブフェイス<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Native Faith<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もー！　巫女なら知っておきなさい！<fix123>「お祭り」は別名「神遊び」と言って神様が人間と遊ぶ事なの！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Geez!  You're a shrine maiden, so you should know this!<fix123>"Omatsuri" are another way of saying "kami asobi", which means it's a time when gods play with humans!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もしかして、前に早苗や神奈子と戦ったりしたのって……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Don't tell me, those battles with Sanae and Kanako were...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう、ただの神遊び、つまりお祭り<fix123>今日は私の弾幕お祭りの番よ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yep, just a little god play, or festivals.<fix123>Today it's my turn to have a danmaku festival!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Suwako Moriya DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あはははは。天晴れだわ一王国を築いたこの私が、人間に負けるとは<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ahahahaha. Simply admirable for a human to defeat a god who's built up a country by herself.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何がお祭りなのかしらただの弾幕じゃないの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What was all that about a festival? Isn't this just normal danmaku play?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だから、お祭りとは神様が遊ぶ事<fix123>日常感覚を離れた晴れの日の事よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Like I said, festivals are a time for gods to play.<fix123>They're special days where you leave all your everyday cares behind!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふーん割と弾幕は日常感覚だけどね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmmm, but danmaku is an everyday thing...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>これだけ強い人間が居るのなら幻想郷に住むのも悪くはないわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If the humans that live here are this strong, maybe it's not so bad to live in Gensokyo.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら私、余計な事したかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh my, I wonder if I overdid it?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もう住み込む事に決めたから<fix123>そうだ、貴方の神社でもお祭りを始めればいいんじゃないの？<fix123>そうすればきっと人間も集まるよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've already decided to stay here.<fix123>Oh yes, wouldn't it be great if we start having festivals at your shrine?<fix123>If we did that, I bet a lot of people would come.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>弾幕祭り？集まるかなぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A danmaku festival? I wonder if anyone would really come.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>集まるってば日にち決めて例大祭とかやれば良いのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If they would, Sunday would be nice to have an annual grand festival.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まあ良いけどね<fix123>この神社の秘密が少し判ったから今日はもう帰るわよ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I suppose...<fix123>I know a little more about the secrets of this shrine now, so I'm going home for today, okay?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方の神社の参拝客が増えなかったり神奈子が変な事をしていたら<fix123>私に相談してね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If you don't get more visitors, or if Kanako does anything strange...<fix123>Come see me about it, okay?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はいはい<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Okay, okay.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>神奈子が持っている神徳も信仰心も殆どが、私の力なんだから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>After all, Kanako's faith and divine virtues are mostly thanks to me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今なんと？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What did you just...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は実務。神奈子は営業ま、そんな所かしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I provide the divine services. I guess you could say that Kanako does the sales.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>神様の世界も世知辛いのねぇ……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The world of the gods is a tough place, isn't it...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>八百万の秋の神<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Myriads of Autumn Gods<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>妖怪の山の麓<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>At the Foot of Youkai Mountain<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 人恋し神様　～ Romantic Fall<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: A God That Misses People ~ Romantic Fall<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Shizuha Aki ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Shizuha Aki DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>何だろう<fix123>久しぶりなんで調子がそこそこだぜ<fix123>いきなり強い奴とか出てきてくれないかねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Aw, man...<fix123>It's been a while, so I'm out of shape. I could use some practice.<fix123>Sure would be nice if someone strong would show up...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>随分と余裕だ事<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You say that as if it were nothing at all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Minoriko Aki ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>妖怪に怯えながら行動する人間の癖に<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But you're a human, and humans are supposed to be afraid of youkai!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>豊かさと稔りの象徴<fix123>秋　穣子<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Symbol of Abundance and Harvest<fix123>Minoriko Aki<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>妖怪以外にも怯えるぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm afraid of other things, too.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あんたが向かおうとしている場所にいる<fix123>妖怪は、今までの妖怪とは訳が違うわよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Where you're trying to go, the youkai are<fix123>very different from those you've seen before.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それは楽しみだな<fix123>お前も妖怪より強いんだろう？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That sounds like fun.<fix123>So, you're stronger than a youkai, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私はただの八百万分の一の神<fix123>この先は、神様がごろごろしているんだから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm just one amongst the multitudes of gods.<fix123>There are many more here just like me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 稲田姫様に叱られるから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Because Princess Inada is Scolding Me<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Minoriko Aki DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>こいつみたいな奴がごろごろしているのか<fix123>余り期待できないな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Just more of the same after all, huh?<fix123>Guess I can't expect much.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>神々の疵痕<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Scars of the Gods<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>妖怪の樹海<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Great Youkai Forest<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 厄神様の通り道　～ Dark Road<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Road of the Misfortune God ~ Dark Road<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Hina Kagiyama ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Hina Kagiyama LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>こうやって闘いながら進むと<fix123>山は遠いんだな<fix123>山に辿り着く前に円周率を暗唱出来そうだ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If I have to keep fighting like this,<fix123>I'll never make it to the mountain.<fix123>I could recite all the digits of pi before I got there.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あらあらまだ居たの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, are you still here?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Hina Kagiyama ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>産医師異国に向こう......<fix123>......御社に蟲さんざん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>"How I like a drink, alcoholic of course,<fix123>after the light skirmish involving danmaku exchanges." [1]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何の呪文よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Is that some sort of spell?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>誰だ？<fix123>見ない顔だな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, a new face.<fix123>Who're you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さっきも会ったけど<fix123>私はここで厄を集めているの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm sure we've met before, but I'm<fix123>just here to gather misfortune, now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>秘神流し雛<fix123>鍵山　雛<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Hidden God Nagashi-bina[2]<fix123>Hina Kagiyama<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それはえんがちょだな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm, better keep my fingers crossed then.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>えんがちょの向こう側に私が居るから<fix123>人間は平和に暮らせるのよ<fix123>山は人間の立ち入る所じゃない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's because I cross my fingers for you<fix123>that humans can live in peace.<fix123>The mountain is no place for mortals.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>これから盛大に盛り上がってくる所だぜ<fix123>邪魔するな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, but it's just starting to get good.<fix123>Stay out of my way.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あらゆる災厄が降りかかるわよ<fix123>人間を守る為にも行かせるものか！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Every disaster will befall you.<fix123>I can't let you pass, even to protect humans!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 運命のダークサイド<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Dark Side of Fate<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Hina Kagiyama DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>うーん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oof...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>......御社に蟲さんざん......<fix123>この続き、何だっけ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>"...after the light skirmish involving danmaku exchanges..."<fix123>What comes after this, again?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何言ってるのか判らないわよ<fix123>山に行きたいってあんた本当に人間なの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I don't understand what you're saying.<fix123>Wanting to go to the mountain... are you really human?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>神社が蟲だらけになって......<fix123>ま、そうやって円周率を憶えるのが人間だ<fix123>故に人間だぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How I'd like a drink...<fix123>Well, anyway, only humans would memorise pi.<fix123>Therefore, I'm human.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>瑕疵無き要塞<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Flawless Fortress<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>未踏の渓谷<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Untrodden Valley<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 神々が恋した幻想郷<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Gensokyo the Gods Loved<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nitori Kawashiro ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>げげ、人間！？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ack, a human!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nitori Kawashiro LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>おお？<fix123>逃げられた<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123>She ran away.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nitori Kawashiro ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あーあ、私の光学迷彩スーツが壊れちゃった<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Awww, my optical camouflage suit broke!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>壊したんだよ<fix123>何もんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You mean, I broke it.<fix123>Who are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間の癖に私の姿がよく見えたわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're a human, but you picked me out pretty well from the camo.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>全然隠れてなかったぜ<fix123>むしろ目立ってた<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You weren't hidden at all.<fix123>You really stood out.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>じゃあねー人間<fix123>ちなみにこれ以上来ると危険だよー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>See you, human!<fix123>By the way, it's dangerous if you go any furtherー<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nitori Kawashiro LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>人の話を聞けよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Listen when people talk to you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nitori Kawashiro ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>お、さっきの人間<fix123>奥には進むなって言ったでしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, it's that human from before.<fix123>Didn't I tell you not to go any deeper?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何なんだ？<fix123>山の妖怪はお前みたいな奴ばかりなのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Aw geez.<fix123>Are all the youkai in the mountain like you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ごめんごめん<fix123>人間を実際に見たのは久しぶりだから<fix123>新作の光学迷彩スーツの実験を<fix123>してみたかっただけよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sorry about that, it's just been<fix123>so long since I've actually seen a human.<fix123>I just wanted to give my new<fix123>optical camouflage suit a test run.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>実験台にしようったあ、光栄だ<fix123>どんどん実験台にしてくれ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You want to make me a test subject? What an honour.<fix123>Please, perform your experiments on me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それと、これ以上山には入るのは<fix123>危険だから追い返そうと思ってね<fix123>悪いこたぁ言わない<fix123>引き返せ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, anyway, the mountain gets dangerous from<fix123>here in, so I thought I'd chase you away.<fix123>Let me tell you straight up...<fix123>Turn back now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>超妖怪弾頭<fix123>河城　にとり<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Super Youkai Warhead<fix123>Nitori Kawashiro<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>引き返せって言われたら進みたくなるな<fix123>お前だって、立ち入り禁止の立て札を<fix123>見たら入りたくなるだろう？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Saying that just makes me want to go on all the more.<fix123>Doesn't a big "KEEP OUT" sign just<fix123>make you want to see what's behind it?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 芥川龍之介の河童　～ Candid Friend<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Akutagawa Ryuunosuke's "Kappa" ~ Candid Friend [3]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ならないよ<fix123>ならないからさっさと帰れ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, it doesn't.<fix123>It doesn't, so just go home.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>みんなで追い返そうとするんだもんな<fix123>こうなったら行ける所まで行くぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Seems like everyone's just trying to chase me away.<fix123>If that's how it is, I'll keep on going as far as I can.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nitori Kawashiro DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>つ、強い……<fix123>こんな奴に負けるなんて……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>S-strong... <fix123>To think I'd lose to someone like you...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さあ行くぜ<fix123>山の上まで<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now, <fix123>up the mountain I go.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>元気な人間よ。河童と人間は古来からの<fix123>盟友だから教えてやる<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're an energetic human. Kappa and humans have been sworn friends <fix123>since ancient times, so let me tell you something.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>負けた奴が盟友とか言うのはちゃんちゃら<fix123>おかしいぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>For the loser to claim to be a sworn friend <fix123>is a little strange.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>最近、山の上に不穏な神が居着いている<fix123>そのお陰で、我々河童も天狗様も<fix123>何か腹の収まりが悪いんだ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Recently, a threatening god has taken up residence at the top of the mountain.<fix123>Thanks to that, us kappa and tengu <fix123>have been bothered.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それは何か？<fix123>調べて解決して欲しいって言うフリか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What are you saying? <fix123>You want me to go solve it?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おっと、話しすぎたね<fix123>後はお好きにしてねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, I've said too much, <fix123>don't worry about it.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふん。滝が見えてきたな<fix123>これからが本番だぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmm. From this waterfall <fix123>the game is on!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>要塞の山[4]<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Mountain Fortress<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>九天の滝<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Waterfall of Nine Heavens<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: フォールオブフォール　～ 秋めく滝<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Fall of Fall ~ Autumnal Waterfall<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Momiji Inubashiri ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Momiji Inubashiri DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Aya Shameimaru ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あやややや<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ayayayaya...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>里に最も近い天狗<fix123>射命丸　文<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Tengu Closest to the Village<fix123>Aya Shameimaru<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>侵入者の報告で来てみれば<fix123>まさか貴方とは……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I came to check on that intruder report,<fix123>but I never thought it'd be you...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お、いつぞやの天狗<fix123>丁度いいぜ、この先を案内してくれ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, hey, it's the tengu from back then.<fix123>Perfect timing.  Won't you show me the way in?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>残念、私は侵入者を追い返しに来たのよ<fix123>そもそも、何処に案内すれば良いのやら<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Too bad for you, I came to chase the intruder away.<fix123>I wonder where you wanted me to take you anyway.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>聞いたぜ、山の上に変な神様が住み始めたん<fix123>だって？<fix123>私はそいつを倒しに来た勇者だ<fix123>ガンガン行く勇者だぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've heard a rumor. A strange god came to live on<fix123>top of the mountain, right?<fix123>I'm the hero that's come to beat her.<fix123>I'm the hero, going forth with a bang.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほう、そんな話、誰から聞いたのかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ho, I wonder who you heard that from?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>誰からだったかな、もう忘れたが......<fix123>そんなでその神様の所まで行きたいんだ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm, I wonder, I already forgot who it was...<fix123>Anyway, I want to go see that god.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うふふ<fix123>私は貴女の自由にさせてあげたいわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heheh,<fix123>I'd love to let you have your way...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 妖怪の山　～ Mysterious Mountain<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Youkai Mountain ~ Mysterious Mountain<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>でも、私は貴女を通す訳に行かないの<fix123>私があっさり通しちゃったら<fix123>見回り天狗達も納得がいかないからね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But there's no way I can let you through.<fix123>The tengu patrollers won't stand for it<fix123>if I let you through that easily.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何でだよ<fix123>良いじゃないから、天狗には迷惑かけないぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Why not?<fix123>It'll be fine, I won't bother those tengu.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は上司の命令でここを通すなと<fix123>言われてるの<fix123>組織に属するってのは<fix123>自分の意味だけでは動けなくなるって事よ<fix123>さあ、手加減してあげるから、<fix123>本気で掛かってきなさい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I have orders from the boss<fix123>not to let you pass.<fix123>Belonging to a group means that sometimes,<fix123>you don't get to have your way.<fix123>Now, I'll go easy on you,<fix123>so come at me with all your might!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>手加減なんてしけた事言わなくても良いぜ<fix123>どうせなら不戦敗で良いじゃん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, no need to talk about going easy on me.<fix123>Can't you just lose the game by default?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Aya Shameimaru DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>まじめに戦った事って殆ど無かったけど<fix123>予想以上の強さだったわ<fix123>これなら、あの厄介な神様も倒せるかもね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hardly ever have I had a serious match,<fix123>and you were stronger than I expected.<fix123>With that power, maybe you could even beat that pain of a god.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、お前らの代わりに倒してきてやるよ<fix123>でも、その神様は何をして<fix123>天狗や河童に嫌がられてるんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Don't worry, I'll take care of her for you.<fix123>But what is that god doing that's gotten all<fix123>you tengu and kappa to hate her so much?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>......河童？<fix123>もしかしてその話、河童に聞いたのね？<fix123>簡単に言うと、山を自分の物にしようと<fix123>しているから、古参の私達にはうざいだけ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...Kappa?<fix123>You heard it from a kappa, didn't you?<fix123>To put it simply, she acts like the mountain is hers, which<fix123>is a pain to those of us who've been here all this while.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何だよ、お前ら天狗だって勝手に山を<fix123><fix123>自分のものにしてるじゃん<fix123>そのお陰で人間が近づけないしさ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What are you talking about? Aren't you tengu the ones<fix123>who just decided the mountain theirs?<fix123>Humans don't go near the mountain thanks to you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それでも、新しく入ってきても天狗に敬意も<fix123>払わないのよ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Even so, can't the newcomer<fix123>at least show us some respect?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんだかなぁ。ま、良いぜ、とりあえず<fix123>その神様の所まで案内しな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yeah, maybe. Well, whatever. Now,<fix123>time to take me to where she is.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>霊山に風が吹く<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A Wind Blows on the Sacred Mountain<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>守矢の神社<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Moriya Shrine<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 少女が見た日本の原風景<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Primal Scene of Japan the Girl Saw<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Sanae Kochiya ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Sanae Kochiya LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Sanae Kochiya ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>神社に来て暴れるとは何事なの！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What's the meaning of you storming into my shrine like this!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>神社だって！？　こんな山の上に？<fix123>そう言えば、そんな雰囲気だけど......<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A shrine!?  On top of the mountain?<fix123>Well, I guess it's got that atmosphere...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ここは守矢の神社<fix123>忘れ去られた過去の神社<fix123>外の世界から神社と湖ごと幻想郷に<fix123>移動してきたのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This is the Moriya Shrine,<fix123>a long-forgotten shrine of the past.<fix123>It was moved into Gensokyo from the outside world<fix123>together with the lake.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あんた、誰？<fix123>まさか巫女？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who are you?<fix123>Wait... are you a shrine maiden?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>祀られる風の人間<fix123>東風谷　早苗<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Deified Human of the Wind<fix123>Sanae Kochiya<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は風祝　（かぜはふり）　の早苗<fix123>外の世界では絶え果てた現人神の末裔 <fix123>まぁ巫女といえば巫女みたいなもんね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm Sanae, a wind priestess, descendent of a<fix123>long-forgotten line of gods incarnate in the outside world. <fix123>Well, I guess you could call me something like a shrine maiden.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうか、巫女って職業みたいなもんだったな<fix123>霊夢の事かと勘違いする所だったぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, so "shrine maiden" is actually the name of a job...<fix123>I almost thought it meant "Reimu".<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それで、貴方は何者ですか？<fix123>参拝客には見えないのですが......<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So then, who are you?<fix123>You don't look like a pilgrim to the shrine...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は魔法使いの魔理沙<fix123>悪の神様を懲らしめる麓のヒーロー<fix123>河童や天狗達も纏めて懲らしめる<fix123>何でも屋さ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm the magician, Marisa.<fix123>I'm the hero at the foot of the mountain, come to beat up the evil god.<fix123>We also take care of kappa and tengu.<fix123>We're an anything-goes kind of shop.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>麓には変は人間がいた物ね<fix123>それで、私も懲らしめるって言うの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There sure are strange people at the foot of the mountain.<fix123>So, are you going to punish me, as well?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 信仰は儚き人間の為に<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Faith is for the Transient People<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>懲らしめるぜ<fix123>悪い神様みたいだからな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I sure am.<fix123>You look like an evil god to me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いいわ<fix123>貴方に代わって私が懲らしめましょう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, that's okay.<fix123>Why don't I do the punishing, instead?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私はあんたを懲らしめるんだぜ？<fix123>誰を懲らしめるんだよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What are you talking about? I'm punishing you.<fix123>Who are you going to punish?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方に決まってるじゃない<fix123>現人神の力で懲らしめてあげましょう<fix123>奇跡を起こす神の力で！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Why, you, of course.<fix123>I'll punish you with the power of a living god...<fix123>With the divine power to cause miracles!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Sanae Kochiya DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>強い......<fix123>何でも屋なんて油断させておいて<fix123>実は本物のヒーローか何か？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're strong...<fix123>Your "anything goes shop" act really threw me.<fix123>Are you really some sort of hero?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だから、何でも屋だぜ<fix123>天狗や河童達もあんたらを嫌っていたぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I told you, we're an anything-goes shop.<fix123>The tengu and the kappa were getting sick of you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私はただ、山の神様である八坂様に<fix123>この山を御神体にして頂きたかっただけ<fix123>それが、この地に棲む妖怪や人間にとって<fix123>幸せな事になると......<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>All I wanted was for people to revere this mountain<fix123>in the name of Lady Yasaka, the goddess of mountains.<fix123>I thought that the humans and youkai that lived here<fix123>would like that...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そんなことぁ無いから、さ、最後の親玉に<fix123>会わせるんだな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>They don't, so go on,<fix123>take me to the last boss.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え！？<fix123>もしかして八坂様にも会われるつもりなの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What!?<fix123>Do you mean to meet with Lady Yasaka?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>悪い事する神様を懲らしめないとな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You've got to scold a god when they act up.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あゝ風の神よ神湖の地に<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, the God of Wind on the Grounds of the Divine Lake<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>風神の湖<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Wind God's Lake<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 御柱の墓場　～ Grave of Being<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Cemetery of Onbashira ~ Grave of Being<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>山の上にこんな大きな湖とはな......<fix123>出てきな<fix123>空気の読めない神様よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who'd have thought there'd be such a huge lake on top of the mountain?<fix123>Come on out,<fix123>You oblivious god!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kanako Yasaka ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>我を呼ぶのは何処の人ぞ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who doth call for mine presence?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前か？　山を我が物にしようとしたり<fix123>麓の神社を乗っ取ろうとしている神様は<fix123>懲らしめに来たぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Is it you? That god who acts like the mountain's hers,<fix123>and that's trying to take over the shrine at the foot of the mountain?<fix123>I came to punish you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>......<fix123>へぇ、面白いわね<fix123>幻想郷には変わった人間も居るのね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>......<fix123>Heh, how interesting.<fix123>Gensokyo's humans sure are peculiar.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そんな訳で、山に居座るには天狗や河童達<fix123>とも仲良くしてやってくれないと－－<fix123>誰かが困るんだ！<fix123>きっと<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So, you see, if you don't try hard to get along with<fix123>the tengu and kappa that live in the mountain—<fix123>Somebody'll get in trouble!<fix123>For sure.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>山は私自身であり<fix123>山は私への信仰の対象です<fix123>幻想郷にはめぼしい山がここしか無かった<fix123>のですから<fix123>この山に住んでいる者が私を信仰しないの<fix123>なら仕方がありません<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The mountain itself is me.<fix123>The mountain is the object of worship of me.<fix123>After all, this is the only such magnificent<fix123>mountain in all of Gensokyo...<fix123>I can't help it if those who live here<fix123>don't have faith in me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お、幻想郷から立ち退く気か？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, thinking about leaving Gensokyo?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>山坂と湖の権化<fix123>八坂　神奈子<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Avatar of Mountains and Lakes<fix123>Kanako Yasaka<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 神さびた古戦場　～ Suwa Foughten Field<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Venerable Ancient Battlefield ~ Suwa Foughten Field<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>神の信仰に邪魔する者は<fix123>一つ一つ排除しなければいけません<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A god must eliminate all who oppose<fix123>their struggle for faith, one by one.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そこまでして信仰に拘るのは<fix123>何故なんだ？<fix123>今の幻想郷に神様なんて必要ないぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Why are you so worried about<fix123>faith all the time?<fix123>Gensokyo doesn't need any gods these days.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>信仰が失われると、幻想郷は混沌と<fix123>し始めるでしょう<fix123>信仰の意味は、信仰していない人には<fix123>判らない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Were Gensokyo to completely lose its faith, surely<fix123>it would be thrown into chaos.<fix123>The faithless can never<fix123>understand the meaning of faith.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>神社なら毎日の様に行ってるがな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I go to a shrine every day, you know.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>信仰が失われた神社はただの小屋<fix123>貴方は毎日の様に小屋に通っているだけ<fix123>貴方は一度－－<fix123>神の荒ぶる御魂を味わうと良い！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A shrine that loses its faith is nothing but a simple shack.<fix123>Now, you, who goes to<fix123>such a shack every day—<fix123>Experience this once the raging soul of a god!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kanako Yasaka DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>

<c$Reimu:$12345678> "And what do you mean by cat's forehead?"<fix123>
<c$Remilia:$12345678> "Ratsbane, eh."<fix123>
<c$Marisa:$12345678> "... Is it safe to eat this cake?"<fix123>
In the end, the Saigyou Ayakashi blossomed, but not fully.<fix123>　　The seal on it didn't break, so as always, everyone was<fix123><fix123>　　greeted by the arrival of spring.<fix123>
Gensokyo had already forgotten about the events of winter.<fix123>　　Such is the power of cherry blossoms.<fix123>
Ending No. 4<fix123>

This is the Hakurei Shrine, located at the edge of Gensokyo.<fix123>　　In the end, the Saigyou Ayakashi blossomed, but not fully.<fix123>　　The seal on it didn't break, so as always, everyone was<fix123><fix123>　　greeted by the arrival of spring.<fix123>
Upon her return, the shrine's maiden went<fix123>　　to check on the backyard.<fix123>
No sign of the long winter was to be found.<fix123>
<c$Reimu:$12345678> "Wow, the snow sure melted quickly."<fix123>
<c$Reimu:$12345678> "Maybe I should tidy up the garden a little."<fix123>
<c$Reimu:$12345678> "... hmm, isn't this a little too warm for spring?"<fix123>
<c$????:$12345678> "That's because an entire winter's worth of spring<fix123><c$$12345678"> was released all at once."<fix123>
<c$Reimu:$12345678> "Was that supposed to make sense?"<fix123>
<c$Yuyuko:$12345678> "By the way, this garden is pathetic."<fix123>
<c$Reimu:$12345678> "Shut up, this is what a shrine should be like."<fix123>
<c$Youmu:$12345678> "If the Saigyouji garden was this tiny, I'd have it easy..."<fix123>
<c$Yuyuko:$12345678> "I'd go mad if I had to live in such a lowly place."<fix123>
<c$Reimu:$12345678> "Why did you come here, anyway?"<fix123>
<c$Yuyuko:$12345678> "Until the barrier between this world and the Netherworld<fix123><c$$12345678"> is repaired, there's a fine line between here and there."<fix123>
<c$Youmu:$12345678> "So we came to enjoy ourselves for a bit."<fix123>
<c$Reimu:$12345678> "Please fix the border as soon as possible,<fix123><c$$12345678"> it's dangerous."<fix123>
<c$Youmu:$12345678> "You're the one who tore it open."<fix123>
<c$Youmu:$12345678> "Speaking of barriers, the one here is incredibly strong..."<fix123>
<c$Reimu:$12345678> "That's what prevents people from coming and going as<fix123><c$$12345678"> they please. Don't get too close, it's dangerous for you."<fix123>
<c$Reimu:$12345678> "Or rather, I should say that the Netherworld's barrier<fix123><c$$12345678"> ought to be this strong."<fix123>
<c$Yuyuko:$12345678> "I don't think even SHE can form such a strong barrier."<fix123>
<c$Reimu:$12345678> "She? Who is 'she'?"<fix123>
<c$Yuyuko:$12345678> "The one I asked to affect repairs<fix123><c$$12345678"> to the Netherworld's barrier."<fix123>
<c$Reimu:$12345678> "Hey, if it's fixed while you're here,<fix123><c$$12345678"> would you be able to return home?"<fix123>
<c$Youmu:$12345678> "That won't be a problem, we can fly over it."<fix123>
<c$Reimu:$12345678> "... What a worthless barrier."<fix123>
There are many borders in Gensokyo. Most of them, however,<fix123>　　are too vague to work properly. Perhaps the only one<fix123><fix123>　　that actually works is the one at the Hakurei Shrine.<fix123>
Ending No. 5<fix123>
The Hakurei Shrine, covered in the white of snow.<fix123>
Fleeing from the Netherworld, Reimu barely escaped<fix123>　　　　with her life. All traces of the spring she had managed<fix123><fix123>　　　　to gather were lost in the process.<fix123>
Even so, the Saigyou Ayakashi didn't blossom,<fix123>　　　　and nothing remarkable happened.<fix123>
<c$Reimu:$12345678> "Grr...<fix123>　　<c$$12345678"> Ghosts are living in the warmth of our spring, and<fix123><fix123>　　<c$$12345678"> we're still stuck in this cold."<fix123>
<c$Reimu:$12345678> "It's kinda irritating.<fix123>　　<c$$12345678"> No, it's REALLY irritating."<fix123>
The cherry trees in the shrine's backyard found it<fix123>　　　　impossible to blossom buried under all the snow.<fix123><fix123>　　　　The dismal sight upset Reimu more than ever.<fix123>

<fix123>Shizuha Aki DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>落ち葉で視界が良くないわね<fix123>こんな調子で山に立ち入って大丈夫かしら？<fix123>あれ？<fix123>何だか美味しそうな匂いが......<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I can't really see through all the falling leaves...<fix123>Can I really make it all the way to the mountain like this?<fix123>Huh?<fix123>I smell something tasty...<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>巫女の癖に神を食べようだなんて<fix123>笑止千万、不届き千万！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Even though you're a shrine maiden, you want to eat a god?<fix123>How ridiculous! What insolence!<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Who said I was going to eat you?<fix123>But is that delicious smell coming from you?<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Symbol of Abundance and Harvest<fix123>Minoriko Aki<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>神様たる物、身に纏う香りも気を付けないと<fix123>あ、ちなみに私は豊穣の神ね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Gods always put a great deal of care into their odor.<fix123>Oh, by the way, I'm the harvest god.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うーん、生焼き芋の香り<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Mmmm, so that's why you smell like half-baked sweet potatoes.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>収穫したてのお芋は私の香水<fix123>巫女に食べられてたまるもんですか！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Freshly-harvested sweet potatoes make up my perfume.<fix123>Do you think I'm going to let a shrine maiden eat me!?<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Because Princess Inada is Scolding Me<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Minoriko Aki DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>いやいや、神様はピンキリねぇ。うちの神は<fix123>こんなのよりも力がないのかしら？<fix123>おっと、こんな所で芋焼いている<fix123>場合じゃないわ<fix123>先を急ごうっと<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That was pretty weak, for a god. I wonder<fix123>if my shrine's god is any stronger?<fix123>Well, this is no time for baking sweet potatoes.<fix123>Better hurry on ahead.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いつ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>When?<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>But I'm not lost.<fix123>I just want to go to the mountain.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>What are you going to do there?<fix123>Don't you know it's dangerous?<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>If you get in my way, I'll treat you like an enemy.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は人間の味方<fix123>人間の厄を受けて、神々に渡しているの<fix123>なんなら、<fix123>貴方の災厄も全て引き受けましょうか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm a friend of humans.<fix123>I take their misfortune and pass them on to the gods.<fix123>If you like,<fix123>I can take on all of your tragedies.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>妖怪は私の敵<fix123>あんたは妖怪<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あっ、そう！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, really!<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>That's because my eyes are really good.<fix123>Or, maybe you weren't really hiding.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nitori Kawashiro LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>これ以上行くけどね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'll still be going, anyway.<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>お、さっきの人間<fix123>奥に進むなって言ったでしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, it's that human from before.<fix123>Didn't I tell you not to go any deeper?<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>You really got in my way back there.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Did I?<fix123>I don't even know what you're doing.<fix123>How can I get in your way?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は山の上に住む神様に緊急の用事があるの<fix123>通してくれる？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I have urgent business with the god that lives on top of the mountain.<fix123>Will you let me through?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>山の上の神様だって？<fix123>そんなもん何人もいるけど......<fix123>悪いこたぁ言わない<fix123>引き返した方が良い<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The god on top of the mountain?<fix123>But many gods live up there ...<fix123>Let me tell you straight up ...<fix123>You'd better leave.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>超妖怪弾頭<fix123>河城　にとり<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Super Youkai Warhead<fix123>Nitori Kawashiro<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は河城にとり<fix123>通称、谷カッパのにとり<fix123>さあさあ、里へ帰った帰った<fix123>この先、人間に対して排他的な奴も多いよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm Nitori Kawashiro.<fix123>They call me Nitori the Valley Kappa.<fix123>Go on now, better get back to the village.<fix123>There's lots of folks who don't like humans up ahead.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そんなの判ってるわ<fix123>それでも行かなきゃ行けない時もあるの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, I know that.<fix123>But sometimes there are things you just have to do.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あらあら、久しぶりに盟友である<fix123>人間に出会ったと言うのに残念ね......<fix123>仕方がない、これ以上山に入るというなら<fix123>その本気、確かめさせて貰うよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh my, it's been so long since I met a human,<fix123>my sworn friends. Why did it have to turn out this way...<fix123>Oh well, if you really want to get into the mountain,<fix123>you'll have to show me how serious you are!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 芥川龍之介の河童　～ Candid Friend<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Akutagawa Ryuunosuke's "Kappa" ~ Candid Friend[2]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Nitori Kawashiro DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>つ、強い、私の兵器で倒せないなんて......<fix123>人間とは思えない強さだわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're, you're strong, I can't believe my weapons couldn't beat you ...<fix123>I didn't think humans were that strong.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さあ、先に進むわよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, time to move on.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間よ。河童と人間は古来からの盟友だから<fix123>教えてやるよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey human. Kappa and humans have been sworn friends<fix123>since ancient times, so let me tell you something.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>盟友?<fix123>古来からの宿敵の間違いじゃない？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sworn friends?<fix123>Are you sure you haven't mistaken an old enemy for a friend?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>最近、山の上に不穏な神が居着いたのは事実<fix123>貴方はそれを倒しに行くんだろ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's true that there's been a restless god on top of the mountain lately.<fix123>Are you going to go beat her?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おっと、思わぬ所で情報得たわ<fix123>何が目的で山に入っているのか忘れかけてたしね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, what an unexpected place to get such great information.<fix123>I'd forgotten why I'd come all the way up here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、頼りない。人間は頼りない<fix123>やっぱり天狗様に相談した方がよかったかな<fix123>まぁ、この辺の河童には伝えておくから<fix123>この先に行きなさいな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I can't believe it. Humans are so flaky.<fix123>I knew I should have asked the tengu about this instead.<fix123>Well, I'll tell the kappa around here about you,<fix123>So just go on ahead.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>滝が見えてきた......<fix123>これからが本番ね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I can see a waterfall up ahead ...<fix123>And now for the main event!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>侵入者の報告で来てみれば<fix123>まさか貴方とは……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I came to check on that intruder report,<fix123>but I never thought it'd be you...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>別にあんたら天狗に用事がある訳じゃないわ<fix123>どいてよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I don't have any business with any of you tengu.<fix123>Get out of the way.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>侵入者の報告を受けて<fix123>何故か私が呼び出されたのよ<fix123>私はただの新聞記者なのにねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We received an intruder alert,<fix123>and for some reason they called me onto the job.<fix123>I'm just a simple newspaper reporter...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何が言いたいの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What are you trying to say?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方の事を一番良く知っているのが<fix123>私だから<fix123>貴方の相談事にも乗れるかもしれないって<fix123>上司の粋な計らいね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's because I'm the one that knows the<fix123>most about you.<fix123>Maybe it would be best if I could talk you out of it.<fix123>That was the boss' plan.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さっきも言ったけど天狗には用事はないわ<fix123>山に居る神様に会いたいの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I told you before, I don't have any business with the tengu.<fix123>I just want to see the god that lives on the mountain.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>山の神様？<fix123>はは～んさてはあの神様の事かな？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The god of the mountain?<fix123>Aha~ So, you mean that god?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何か知ってるの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Do you know something about her?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>最近、天狗も手を焼く神様が住み着いたのよ<fix123>どんどんと山を自分の物にしようとするし……<fix123>最近は麓にまで降りて信仰を集めようと<fix123>している、って言う話だし……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Lately, there's a god that's been giving even us some trouble.<fix123>She keeps acting like this mountain is hers...<fix123>And she's even come down to the foot of the mountain lately<fix123>to try and gather faith...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……信仰を集めている<fix123>きっと、そいつだわ<fix123>そいつに会いたいの。何処にいる？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...So she's gathering faith.<fix123>That's got to be her.<fix123>I want to meet with her. Where is she?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>調子に乗るようだったら、天狗達が倒すつもり<fix123>だったので、貴方が行く必要はないわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If she really got out of hand, we tengu were going to go<fix123>beat her, so you don't need to do anything.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>折角ここまで来たんだから、良いじゃないの<fix123>その神様の居る所まで連れて行ってよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, come on, I've come all this way.<fix123>Take me to wherever this god is!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>でも、私は貴方を通す訳に行かないの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But there's no way I can let you through.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 妖怪の山　～ Mysterious Mountain<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Youkai Mountain ~ Mysterious Mountain<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私があっさり通しちゃったら<fix123>見回り天狗達も納得がいかないからね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The tengu patrollers won't stand for it<fix123>if I let you through that easily.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>面倒な種族ね<fix123>天狗って<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Geez.<fix123>You tengu are such a pain.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>組織に属するってのは<fix123>自分の意思だけでは動けなくなるって事よ<fix123>さあ、手加減してあげるから<fix123>本気で掛かってきなさい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Belonging to a group means that sometimes,<fix123>you don't get to have your way.<fix123>Now, I'll go easy on you,<fix123>So come at me with all your might!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>手加減はありがたいけど……<fix123>だったら通してくれれば良いのに<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Thanks for going easy on me, but...<fix123>You could just let me through, you know.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Aya Shameimaru DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>まじめに戦った事って殆ど無かったけど<fix123>予想以上の強さだったわ<fix123>これなら、あの厄介な神様も倒せるかもね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hardly ever have I had a serious match,<fix123>and you were stronger than I expected.<fix123>With that power, maybe you could even beat that pain of a god.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さあ、その神様の所まで案内して！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now, take me to where she is already!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>その神様は、少し前に神社と湖ごと<fix123>引越してきたの<fix123>この先に新しい神社が出来ているのよ<fix123>そこに居るはずだわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That god showed up here not too long ago with<fix123>a shrine and a lake.<fix123>There's a new shrine up the way a bit.<fix123>She should be there.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>山の上に神社？<fix123><fix123>神社はうちだけじゃ無かったのかなぁ……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A shrine on top of the mountain?<fix123><fix123>I thought mine was the only one...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>霊山に風が吹く<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A Wind Blows on the Sacred Mountain<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>守矢の神社<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Moriya Shrine<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 少女が見た日本の原風景<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Primal Scene of Japan the Girl Saw<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Sanae Kochiya ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Sanae Kochiya LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Sanae Kochiya ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>巫女の貴方の方から山に入るとは……<fix123>今すぐうちの神様を勧請したいのかしら<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If a shrine maiden like you is coming up the mountain...<fix123>Maybe you want to join up with us right away?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ここは神社みたいだけど……<fix123>うち以外にも神社はあったのね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, this sure looks like a shrine...<fix123>I guess there was another shrine besides mine.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ここは守矢の神社<fix123>忘れ去られた過去の神社<fix123>外の世界から神社と湖ごと幻想郷に<fix123>移動してきたのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This is the Moriya Shrine,<fix123>a long-forgotten shrine of the past.<fix123>It was moved into Gensokyo from the outside world<fix123>together with the lake.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>神社と湖ごと移動って<fix123>派手な事したわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You moved a shrine and a lake?<fix123>That's pretty flashy.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ここの山は私と私の神様が頂くわ<fix123>そして、貴方の神社を頂けば――<fix123>幻想郷の信仰心は、全て私達の物……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My god and I will be taking over this mountain now.<fix123>Then, if we can take over your shrine—<fix123>All of Gensokyo's faith will be ours...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そんな事したら、幻想郷におわす八百万の神が<fix123>黙ってはいないわよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If you do that, Gensokyo's eight million gods<fix123>won't be so quiet for sure.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>これは幻想郷の為でもあるのですよ<fix123>今の信仰心が失われた状態が続けば、<fix123>幻想郷は力を失います<fix123>奇跡を起こす力を失うのです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This is also for Gensokyo's good.<fix123>Gensokyo will become weak if it continues in its<fix123>current state of lessened piety.<fix123>We'll lose the power to cause miracles.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>冗談じゃない<fix123>信仰心くらい、私の力で何とか戻すわよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You've gotta be kidding.<fix123>I'll be able to restore Gensokyo's piety somehow with my powers!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>祀られる風の人間<fix123>東風谷　早苗<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Deified Human of the Wind<fix123>Sanae Kochiya<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 信仰は儚き人間の為に<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Faith is for the Transient People<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は風祝（かぜはふり）の早苗<fix123>外の世界では絶え果てた現人神の末裔<fix123>神を祀る人間が祀られる事もある<fix123>巫女が神になる事もある<fix123>貴方にはそのぐらいの覚悟が出来て<fix123>巫女をしているの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm Sanae, a wind priestess, descendent of a<fix123>long-forgotten line of gods incarnate in the outside world.<fix123>Sometimes, humans that revere a god are themselves revered.<fix123>Sometimes, shrine maidens can become gods.<fix123>Since you're a shrine maiden, are you prepared for<fix123>such things to happen?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>別に神になってもならなくても関係ないわ<fix123>やるって言ったら、やる時もまぁまぁあるの！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I don't care if I become a god or not.<fix123>But if you say you want a fight, you'd better be ready for one!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう<fix123>では現人神の力を見て考えなさい<fix123>奇跡を起こす神の力を！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see.<fix123>Then, maybe you should watch and consider the power of a living god...<fix123>The divine power to cause miracles!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Sanae Kochiya DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>強い……<fix123>こんなに力があるのに<fix123>何で貴方の神社に信仰心が集まらないの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're strong...<fix123>If you're this powerful,<fix123>why doesn't your shrine have more followers?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それは私が知りたい<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'd like to know that myself.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私の神様の分社を置いておくだけでも<fix123>信仰心は大分回復すると思うんだけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I think you'd probably get a great deal of faith<fix123>If we even just made you a branch shrine for my god...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うーん、それは考えておくけど<fix123>まずは、その神様に会わないと……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmmm, I'll think it over,<fix123>but first I'd have to meet that god.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え！？<fix123>貴方の目的って、もしかして……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What!?<fix123>You mean, your goal is...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>悪い事する神様を懲らしめるのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>To go punish a god that's doing bad things.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あゝ風の神よ神湖の地に<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, the God of Wind on the Grounds of the Divine Lake<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>風神の湖<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Wind God's Lake<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 御柱の墓場　～ Grave of Being<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Cemetery of Onbashira ~ Grave of Being<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>湖に着いたわ<fix123>ここに居るはずね<fix123>何だろう、この気持ち悪い柱の山は……<fix123>ま、とにかく出てきなさい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've made it to the lake.<fix123>She should be somewhere around here.<fix123>What is it with all these ominous pillars on this mountain?<fix123>Well, come on out!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kanako Yasaka ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>我を呼ぶのは何処の人ぞ<fix123>おや？<fix123>なーんだ、麓の巫女じゃないの<fix123>私に何か用？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who calls for My presence?<fix123>Oh?<fix123>Why, it must be the shrine maiden from down the mountain.<fix123>What is your business here?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>随分とフランクな神様ね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Quite a frank god, aren't you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>最近は、厳かな雰囲気を見せるよりも<fix123>友達感覚の方が信仰が集まりやすいのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>These days it's easier to win faith with<fix123>a friendly attitude than with a solemn air and august presence.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まあいいや、うちの神社を乗っ取ろうと<fix123>するの、あれ困るからやめてくれない？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Whatever, it'd be a problem you tried to<fix123>take over my shrine. Please don't do that, ok?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>乗っ取ろうとなんてしていないわよ<fix123>私は貴方の神社を助けたいだけ<fix123>貴方の神社に人が集まるようにしたいだけ<fix123>妖怪の魔の手から救いたいだけ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I don't wish to take over your shrine!<fix123>I wish to save it.<fix123>I wish to bring more people to it.<fix123>I wish to deliver it from the wicked clutches of youkai.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>余計なお世話よ<fix123>大体ねぇ、例えあんたを祀っても信仰が<fix123>増えるかどうか判らないじゃん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's really none of your business.<fix123>Besides, even if we did set you up in my shrine,<fix123>I'm not sure that would net any faith.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>山坂と湖の権化<fix123>八坂　神奈子<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Avatar of Mountains and Lakes<fix123>Kanako Yasaka<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 神さびた古戦場　～ Suwa Foughten Field<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Venerable Ancient Battlefield ~ Suwa Foughten Field<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>信仰は０よりも減ることは有り得ない<fix123>幻想郷に足りない物は<fix123>神様を信じる心<fix123>巫女の貴方なら判るでしょう？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's not as if your faith can go below zero.<fix123>What Gensokyo lacks...<fix123>is hearts that believe in gods.<fix123>A shrine maiden like you should understand that, yes?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私だって、神社に参拝客が来たらいいなあと<fix123>思ってるわよ<fix123>でも、それは私の力で何とかするから……<fix123>貴方の力なんか借りないから……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I think it would be nice if more<fix123>people would come to visit the shrine too.<fix123>But I can do something about it on my own...<fix123>I don't need to borrow your powers...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>神社は巫女の為にあるのではない<fix123>神社は神の宿る場所<fix123>そろそろ――<fix123>神社の意味を真剣に考え直す時期よ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A shrine does not exist for its maiden.<fix123>A shrine is a home for a god.<fix123>Now, I think...<fix123>It is time for you to seriously rethink the purpose of a shrine!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kanako Yasaka DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>If player is playing on Easy or has continued<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Ending No. 7, 8 or 9 (depending on the shottype choosen: A, B, C)<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>If player has not continued and is playing on Normal or higher<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Ending No. 1, 2 or 3 (depending on the shottype choosen: A, B, C)<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>蓬莱人形<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Doll of Hourai<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>満月の下の、草木も眠る丑三つ時。<fix123><fix123>人間と妖怪の肝試しは、いったい何を恐れる？<fix123><fix123>最大の大罪の犠牲者は、いったいどこに居る？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Under the full moon, even the plants are asleep in the dead of the night.<fix123>Just what is there to be afraid of in this human and youkai's trial of guts? [1]<fix123>Just where is the victim of the greatest sin?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: エクステンドアッシュ　～ 蓬莱人<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Extend Ash ~ Person of Hourai<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Keine Kamishirasawa ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>待っていたぞ。<fix123>満月の夜にやってくるとはいい度胸だ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've been waiting.<fix123>You've got some guts, challenging me on the night of the full moon.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら、すっかりお変わりになって<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My, you've certainly changed.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あの人間には指一本触れさせない！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I won't let you lay one finger on that human!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Keine Kamishirasawa DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>尋常じゃない攻撃だったけど、この程度じゃ<fix123><fix123>肝試しにもならないわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I suppose these attacks are above average,<fix123><fix123>but it's not much of a trial of guts.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間以外の者同士で討ちあう丑三つ時。<fix123>人間も妖怪も無い殺伐とした夜。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's the dead of night, and non-humans are fighting each other.<fix123>A brutal night, with neither humans or youkai around.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Fujiwara no Mokou ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>こんな満月の夜だからかな？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Maybe that's because it's a full moon tonight?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あいにく、私は人間よ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sorry, but I'm human.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>蓬莱の人の形<fix123>藤原 妹紅<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Figure of the Person of Hourai<fix123>Fujiwara no Mokou<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう？<fix123><fix123>でもね。あいにく私も人間なの。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Really?<fix123><fix123>Sorry to say, though, but I'm human too.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>咲夜、丁度いいわ。<fix123><fix123>こんな処で人間よ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sakuya, we came at just the right time.<fix123><fix123>There's a human, in a place like this.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>丁度いいんですか？<fix123><fix123>まだ、食事の時間には早いでしょう？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Just the right time?<fix123><fix123>It's still a bit early for a meal, isn't it?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そちらのお嬢さんは妖怪ね。<fix123><fix123>そりゃその大きな羽を見れば判るけど。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So, the young lady there is a youkai?<fix123><fix123>Although I guess that was obvious from the wings and all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>妖怪なんかと一緒にするな。<fix123><fix123>私は誇り高き……。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Don't lump me in with mere youkai.<fix123><fix123>I'm proud and noble...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ここではそんなに誇り高く無い方が<fix123><fix123>いいですよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There's no need to be proud and noble<fix123><fix123>at a time like this.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>で、妖怪と人間の二人で何をしようと<fix123><fix123>していたのかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So, what would a human and a youkai<fix123><fix123>be doing together here?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いやまぁ、肝試しを……。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Er, well, we're having a trial of guts...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>肝試しぃ？<fix123>人間と妖怪の二人で？<fix123>こんな真実の満月の下、<fix123><fix123>さらに草木だけが眠る丑三つ時に？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A trial of guts?<fix123>For a human and youkai?<fix123>And under the true full moon to boot, in the dead<fix123><fix123>of night when only the plants are asleep?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>悪い？　私達はちょっと季節はずれの<fix123><fix123>納涼を楽しんでいただけよ。<fix123>人間だったら大人しくお化けにでも<fix123><fix123>なって私達を喜ばせればいいのよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What's wrong with that? We're just enjoying this<fix123><fix123>nice, cool breeze a bit out-of-season.<fix123>You're a human, so just quiet down and entertain us<fix123><fix123>by becoming a monster for our trial.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お嬢様。お化けになるんじゃなくて、<fix123><fix123>お化けを演じるんですよ。人間は。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Milady. Humans don't become monsters,<fix123><fix123>they just act like them.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>魑魅魍魎の類なんて、沢山居るじゃない。<fix123>何の為にわざわざ人間が演じる必要が<fix123><fix123>あるのよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Aren't there plenty of sinister spirits already?<fix123>Why would you need a human to go<fix123><fix123>to the trouble of acting like them?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前、人間って言ったよね。<fix123>では、何故妖怪を恐れない。<fix123>何故私を畏れない。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You said you're a human.<fix123>Why aren't you afraid of youkai, then?<fix123>Why aren't you quaking in fear of me?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>肝試しに来てるんだか、<fix123><fix123>肝試させに来てるんだか……。<fix123>でも、もう私に恐れる物は何一つない。<fix123>いくら、目にも止まらぬ矢で<fix123><fix123>打ち抜かれようと、<fix123>いくら、里を一瞬で消す神の火で<fix123><fix123>焼かれたとしても、<fix123>私は死ぬ事は無い。<fix123>もう肝試しも出来ないのよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Have you come for a "trial of guts",<fix123><fix123>or to give someone's guts a try...?<fix123>But, I have nothing to be afraid of any more.<fix123>No matter how many times I'm pierced<fix123><fix123>by arrows too fast to see,<fix123>No matter how many times I'm burnt<fix123><fix123>by divine fire that can consume a village in a moment,<fix123>I cannot die.<fix123>I can't test my guts anymore, either.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>良かったですね、お嬢様。<fix123>血吸い放題ですよ。<fix123><fix123>吸っても死なないんでしょう？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This is wonderful, Milady.<fix123>You can drink her blood as much as you want. <fix123><fix123>No matter how much you drink, she won't die.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>駄目だわ、咲夜。<fix123>こいつはもう人間じゃないよ。<fix123><fix123>私は私を恐れる人間の血しか飲まない。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's no good, Sakuya.<fix123>She's not human any more.<fix123><fix123>I only drink the blood of humans who fear me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら残念。無限にお酒の湧く瓢箪みたいかな、<fix123><fix123>と思ったのですが。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My, that's too bad. I thought she might be like<fix123><fix123>that gourd that produces infinite liquor. [2]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方、本当に人間？<fix123>そんな訳で、肝試しだったらもう帰りなさい。<fix123><fix123>ここは貴方達が来るような処じゃないわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are you really human?<fix123>If you are, forget about your trial and go home already.<fix123><fix123>This place isn't somewhere where you should be.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>でもあいつは、何かあるような口ぶり<fix123><fix123>だったわよね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>She was speaking to us like there<fix123><fix123>was something here, though.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら、私には何かあるように見えるわよ。<fix123><fix123>今と、ほんの少し先の未来に。<fix123>咲夜は、ナイフは鋭く切れる割には鈍いのよ。<fix123>輝夜はこいつを見つけさせる為に、肝試し<fix123><fix123>を仕込んだに決まってるじゃない。絶対に。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, it looks to me like there is something here.<fix123><fix123>Right now, and slightly in the future.<fix123>Your knives are sharp, Sakuya, but your mind's a tad dull.<fix123>Kaguya wanted to lead us to this person, so she obviously<fix123><fix123>set us up on a trial of guts for that purpose. That has to be it.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>んー。<fix123><fix123>かぐやだって？<fix123>やっぱりそうか。人間と妖怪が肝試しだ<fix123><fix123>なんておかしいと思ったよ。<fix123>いつも私を始末しようとする。<fix123><fix123>いつも刺客を遣わす。<fix123>あいつは私が死なない事を知っているのに！<fix123>蓬莱の薬を作ったのは輝夜でしょう？<fix123><fix123>ふざけるのもいい加減にして欲しいわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hrm.<fix123><fix123>Kaguya, you say?<fix123>So that's it. I did think it was strange that a<fix123><fix123>human and youkai were having a trial of guts here.<fix123>She's always trying to eliminate me.<fix123><fix123>She's always sending assassins.<fix123>And even though she knows I'll never die!<fix123>Kaguya's the one who made the Hourai Elixir, right?<fix123>I wish she'd just give this a rest already.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほら、咲夜。<fix123><fix123>私の行った通り、輝夜は私達を使ったのよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>See, Sakuya?<fix123><fix123>Kaguya was using us, just like I said.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええ。つまり、お嬢様は面白そうだから<fix123><fix123>話に乗ったと言う事ですね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Indeed. So you're saying you went along with it<fix123><fix123>because it seemed interesting, Milady?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ううん、暇だったからよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, no, to kill time.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>肝試しの肝は富士の煙。<fix123><fix123>月まで届く永遠の火山灰。<fix123>不尽の火から生まれるは、<fix123><fix123>何度でも甦る不死の鳥。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The guts of this trial are the smoke of Mount Fuji.<fix123><fix123>The eternal volcanic ash, reaching to the moon.<fix123>An ever-resurrecting immortal bird,<fix123><fix123>born from unextinguishable flames.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 月まで届け、不死の煙<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Reach for the Moon, Immortal Smoke<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>甦るたびに強くなる伝説の火の鳥。<fix123><fix123>今宵の弾は、お嬢ちゃんのトラウマになるよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A legendary phoenix, growing in strength with each rebirth.<fix123><fix123>The bullets of this evening will be the young lady's eternal trauma.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Fujiwara no Mokou DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あーれー。<fix123><fix123>もーだめだぁ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Aw, maaan.<fix123><fix123>I can't take any mooore.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あれ？<fix123><fix123>もう降参？　口ほどにもないなぁ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123><fix123>Surrendering already? You're all bark and no bite.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私はもう十分ですよ～。<fix123><fix123>死なない人間を挑発しないで下さい。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've had enough already~.<fix123><fix123>Please don't taunt a human who can't die.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そっか、咲夜は死ぬ人間だもんね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, yeah. You're a human who can die, Sakuya.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>不吉な言い方ですわね。<fix123><fix123>お嬢様が言うと冗談に聴こえませんわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What an ominous comment.<fix123><fix123>Hearing it from Milady, it doesn't sound like a joke.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>死なないって言っても、闘い続けるのは<fix123><fix123>無理だ～。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I may not be dying any time soon,<fix123><fix123>but I really can't keep fighting~.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう、咲夜も不老不死になってみない？<fix123>そうすればずっと一緒に居られるよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So, how about you become immortal too, Sakuya?<fix123>Then we can be together forever.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は一生死ぬ人間ですよ。<fix123>大丈夫、生きている間は一緒に居ますから。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'll be a mortal human as long as I live, thank you.<fix123>Don't worry, though. We'll be together as long as I'm alive.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>不老不死は止めた方がいいわよ。<fix123>こう見えても、貴方に撃たれた体が物凄く<fix123><fix123>痛いんだから。<fix123>痛くても死ねないし。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I don't recommend becoming immortal.<fix123>They might not look it, but these bruises<fix123><fix123>you gave me are really painful.<fix123>Although I won't die even if it hurts.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>咲夜がそういうなら仕方が無い、残念ね。<fix123><fix123>不老不死の……、蓬莱の薬はね、<fix123>不老不死の人間の生き肝に溜まるのよ。<fix123>目の前に不老不死になる薬が、疲れて<fix123><fix123>痛がっているというのに。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If you say so, Sakuya, there's not much I can do. Shame, though.<fix123><fix123>Speaking of that immortal medicine... the Hourai Elixir...<fix123>It builds up in an immortal human's guts.<fix123>The elixir of immortality stands before us, although<fix123><fix123>she's rather beaten and tired right now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>誰が人間の肝を食べるのですか。<fix123>それに、誰からそんな事聞いたの？<fix123>って聞かなくても判りそうなもんですが。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who would eat a human's guts?<fix123>And who told you that, anyway?<fix123>Wait, no, I probably know who it was already.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人の肝がどうとか、なにやら物騒な会話を<fix123><fix123>しているわね。<fix123>これじゃぁ、私の肝試しじゃない。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Talking about eating a person's guts? This is a<fix123><fix123>pretty scary conversation you're having.<fix123>This isn't my trial of guts, is it?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>肝試しってそういう意味よね？<fix123><fix123>ね、死ぬ咲夜。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's what "a trial of guts" means, right?<fix123><fix123>Right, mortal Sakuya?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>パチュリー様と一緒にいたら、変な覚え方<fix123><fix123>ばっかして困りますわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You learn such bizarre things when you spend time<fix123><fix123>with Lady Patchouli. It's a bit troubling.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>蓬莱人形<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Doll of Hourai<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>満月の下の、草木も眠る丑三つ時。<fix123><fix123>人間と妖怪の肝試しは、いったい何を恐れる？<fix123><fix123>最大の大罪の犠牲者は、いったいどこに居る？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Under the full moon, even the plants are asleep in the dead of the night.<fix123>Just what is there to be afraid of in this human and youkai's trial of guts? [1]<fix123>Just where is the victim of the greatest sin?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: エクステンドアッシュ　～ 蓬莱人<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Extend Ash ~ Person of Hourai<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Keine Kamishirasawa ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>待っていたぞ。<fix123>満月の夜にやってくるとはいい度胸だ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've been waiting.<fix123>You've got some guts, challenging me on the night of the full moon.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>肝試しだからな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, this is a trial of guts.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あの人間には指一本触れさせない！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I won't let you lay one finger on that human!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Keine Kamishirasawa DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>むしろ何も起きない事が不気味だ。<fix123><fix123>不条理だな。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It sure is creepy when nothing's happening.<fix123><fix123>Absurd, too.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>本当の恐怖は、約束された恐怖の<fix123><fix123>向こうにある。<fix123>居るはずのお化け役が消えたお化け屋敷程、<fix123><fix123>怖い物は無いのよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>True terror lies beyond the<fix123><fix123>fear that you expect.<fix123>There's nothing more terrifying than a haunted house<fix123><fix123>devoid of people acting as ghosts.[2]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Fujiwara no Mokou ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>鳴く夜雀も黙る丑三つ時の竹林。<fix123><fix123>こんな時間にほっつき歩く人間が居るなんて。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Even night sparrows are silent in the bamboo forest in the dead of night.<fix123><fix123>To think that there'd be humans wandering around in here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何者だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who're you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>魔理沙、こいつは……。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Marisa, this girl...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>蓬莱の人の形<fix123>藤原 妹紅<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Figure of the Person of Hourai<fix123>Fujiwara no Mokou<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は昔からここに住む人間。<fix123><fix123>別に取って喰ったりしないよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm a human who's lived here for a long time.<fix123><fix123>Don't worry. I won't kidnap you or eat you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間だと？<fix123><fix123>そうは見えないがな。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Human?<fix123><fix123>Doesn't look like one.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>魔理沙、この人は確かに人間みたいだけど。<fix123><fix123>気をつけて。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Marisa, she definitely looks human...<fix123><fix123>but, be careful.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>で、こんな時間にここに来た目的は何？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So, what are you doing out this late?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>筍狩り。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Harvesting bamboo shoots.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>肝試し。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A trial of guts.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どっち？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Which of those?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>判れよ……。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oughta be obvious...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>満月の下、人間と妖怪の二人で肝試し。<fix123>人間は勇気があるというか、馬鹿というか。<fix123>そこな人間の肝は、さぞ硬くて歯ごたえが<fix123><fix123>あるんでしょうね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Beneath the full moon, a human and youkai are on a trial of guts.<fix123>Does the human have guts, or is she a fool?<fix123>That human over there ought to have guts that are<fix123><fix123>pretty stiff and tough to chew.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あんた本当に人間か？<fix123>これほど肝好きの人間見たこと無いぜ。<fix123><fix123>しかも生きているし。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are you really human?<fix123>Can't say I've seen any humans who're this fond of guts.<fix123><fix123>At least, none who're still alive.[3]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>魔理沙には生きている様に見える？<fix123>私には死んでいる様に見える。<fix123><fix123>いや、生きていない様に見える、かな？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Does she look alive to you, Marisa?<fix123>She looks dead to me.<fix123><fix123>Well, maybe she just looks like she's not alive?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もう、人を幽霊みたいに扱ってぇ。<fix123>でも、殆ど正解だわ。<fix123><fix123>なかなかの幻視力ね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, don't treat people like phantoms.<fix123>That's almost correct, though.<fix123><fix123>You can see through illusions pretty well.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>肝好きってところか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So I guess yer a gut-eater, then?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>実はね。<fix123>私には死が無いの。<fix123>死なないって事は、生きてもいない。<fix123>死と生という余計な状態が無くなり、<fix123><fix123>純粋な人間に近い人間。<fix123>ある意味幽霊みたいなものかもね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Actually...<fix123>I can't die.<fix123>To be devoid of death is to be devoid of life.<fix123>Without the unnecessary states of life and death,<fix123><fix123>I'm about as close as you can get to a pure human.<fix123>So I may be like a phantom, in a certain sense.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>死なないですって！<fix123><fix123>煮ても焼いても。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So she won't die!<fix123><fix123>Even if we roast or bake her, too.[4]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>蒸しても揚げてもなんて言ったか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How about if we boil or fry her?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間が不老不死になったって事は……。<fix123>例の伝説の薬が存在するって事よ。<fix123><fix123>やっぱり嘘じゃなかったんだ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If a human could reach a state of immortality...<fix123>That legendary medicine must really exist.<fix123><fix123>It wasn't a lie, after all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何の話か判らんな。<fix123>一体、誰に嘘の様な本当の話を<fix123><fix123>吹き込まれたと言うんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I dunno what you're talking about.<fix123>Who the heck would tell you a true story<fix123><fix123>and make it sound like a lie?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>例の薬？<fix123><fix123>蓬莱の事？<fix123>そんなもの、とうの昔に全て使って<fix123><fix123>しまったよ。<fix123>確かに私はその薬を奪って、不老不死となり<fix123><fix123>今に至る。<fix123>輝夜はいまだ私を亡き者にしようとするが、<fix123><fix123>それも無理な話ね。<fix123>もう千年以上も続く馬鹿な争いよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That medicine?<fix123><fix123>You mean the Hourai Elixir?<fix123>That old thing. I used it all up<fix123><fix123>a long, long time ago.<fix123>Certainly, I stole that medicine,<fix123><fix123>and am immortal even now.<fix123>Kaguya still tries to kill me,<fix123><fix123>but it's impossible to do that.<fix123>This stupid fight of ours has dragged on for over a thousand years now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>判ったぜ。<fix123><fix123>全て判った。<fix123>やっぱり、今回の肝試しのお化け役はお前だ。<fix123>輝夜に肝試しの話を持ちかけられた時から<fix123><fix123>おかしいと思ったんだ。<fix123>輝夜を倒した私なら、お前を始末できると<fix123><fix123>踏んだんだろうな。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I get it now.<fix123><fix123>All of it.<fix123>So, you're playing the role of the ghost in this haunted house.<fix123>I did think that this whole "trial of guts" thing<fix123><fix123>sounded weird when Kaguya brought it up.<fix123>I defeated Kaguya, so it follows that I<fix123><fix123>could put an end to you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ちょっと！　輝夜を倒したのは魔理沙一人の<fix123><fix123>力じゃないでしょ？<fix123>それに、人間を倒すのは妖怪の仕事。<fix123><fix123>目の前の貴方は、私に倒されるべきなの。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey! You're not trying to steal all<fix123><fix123>the credit for yourself, are you?<fix123>Besides, defeating a human is a job for a youkai.<fix123><fix123>The person before us is obviously mine to defeat.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんと、輝夜を倒した？<fix123><fix123>目の前のこんな二人が？<fix123>なんと言うことかしら。あのにっくき月人が<fix123><fix123>こんな人妖にやられるなんて。<fix123>これは久しぶりに歯応えのある刺客に<fix123><fix123>なりそうね。<fix123>いや、歯応えがあるのは肝かしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What, Kaguya was defeated?<fix123><fix123>By these two in front of me?<fix123>How do I say this? To think that such a troublesome<fix123><fix123>Lunarian would be done in by a team like this.<fix123>It's been a long time since I've had to<fix123><fix123>confront such tough assassins.<fix123>Or maybe it's just your guts that are tough?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>残念だわ、蓬莱の薬。<fix123><fix123>是非とも手に入れてみたかったわね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's too bad about that Hourai Elixir.<fix123><fix123>I wanted to get my hands on it no matter what.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私の肝は健康だ。硬くは無い。<fix123><fix123>したがって私には薬は不要だよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My guts are totally healthy. Not stiff at all.<fix123><fix123>Thus, I don't need any medicine.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>蓬莱の薬、人間は決して口にしては<fix123><fix123>ならぬ禁忌の薬。<fix123>一度手をだしゃ、大人になれぬ。<fix123><fix123>二度手をだしゃ、病苦も忘れる。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Hourai Elixir is a forbidden medicine<fix123><fix123>that should never be consumed by humans.<fix123>With a single touch, you will never become an adult.<fix123><fix123>With a second touch, you will forget all disease and illness.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 月まで届け、不死の煙<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Reach for the Moon, Immortal Smoke<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>三度手をだしゃ……、<fix123><fix123>お前達も永遠の苦輪に悩むがいい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>With a third touch...<fix123><fix123>Your souls will forever churn in torment!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Fujiwara no Mokou DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あーれー。<fix123><fix123>歯応え在りすぎるぅ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Aw, maaan.<fix123><fix123>That was way too tough for me...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まだやるか？<fix123><fix123>死なない、ってのは本当の様だな。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wanna go again?<fix123><fix123>Looks like you really can't die.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>死ななくても、そろそろ動ける限界が来てる<fix123><fix123>んじゃないかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>She can't die, sure, but doesn't it look like<fix123><fix123>she's running out of stamina?<fix123><fix123>
