jp_dialogue: <fix123>もうとっくに限界よ。いい加減にしないと、<fix123><fix123>明日筋肉痛で動けなくなっちゃうわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I already have. I'd better give it a rest<fix123><fix123>before my muscle pain tomorrow keeps me from moving.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>筋肉痛で済むの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Muscle pain? That's all?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いつも思うんだが、不老不死の体を丁度<fix123><fix123>半分に割ると、どっちが本体になるんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Y'know, I've always wondered. If you divide an immortal<fix123><fix123>right down the middle, which half still counts as their body?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いつも思わないでよそんなこと。<fix123>不老不死は、肉体を捨てる事。<fix123>魂のみが本体となり、新しい肉体を生める<fix123><fix123>ようになる事よ。<fix123>魂は大きさを持たないから、好きな所に<fix123><fix123>新しい肉体を造る。<fix123>逆に魂を失った肉体はすぐに滅ぶでしょう？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Why would you always wonder something like that?<fix123>Immortality is like casting away the physical body.<fix123>Your soul alone is what you actually are,<fix123><fix123>and it's able to produce a new body.<fix123>Souls don't have a particular size, so they can<fix123><fix123>create a new body wherever they like.<fix123>Conversely, a body without a soul would perish rather quickly, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>やけに詳しいわね。<fix123>蓬莱の薬を欲しがっていたみたいだし、<fix123><fix123>不老不死にでもなろうとでも思ったの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You sure know an awful lot.<fix123>It looked like you really wanted the Hourai Elixir.<fix123><fix123>Did you want to become immortal too, or something?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>別に。魂に興味があっただけよ。<fix123><fix123>人形を自立させられないかと思ってね。<fix123>それに妖怪には効かないんでしょう？<fix123><fix123>その薬。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Not really. I'm just interested in souls.<fix123><fix123>I thought I could use them to make independent dolls.<fix123>Besides, that elixir wouldn't even work<fix123><fix123>on youkai, would it?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なぁ、気になるんだが。<fix123>魂が大きさを持たないなら、妖夢にくっつい<fix123><fix123>ているアレはなんなんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, I got another question.<fix123>If souls don't have a particular size, then what's that thing<fix123><fix123>that's always stickin' around Youmu?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>アレは幽霊でしょ？　別物よ。<fix123><fix123>そんなところを気にしないの。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's a phantom, isn't it? Totally different thing.<fix123><fix123>Never mind that, anyway.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私が不死なら幽霊は不生。<fix123>肝と形が異なるだけで、似たようなものかもね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>As I am undying, phantoms are unliving.<fix123>Maybe all that's different is our form. Or guts.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうだった。<fix123><fix123>どうだ？　私の肝試しは。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh, I see.<fix123><fix123>So, how did my trial of guts go?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうねぇ。硬くて黒くて……。<fix123><fix123>肝硬変？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, well. They're hard and blackish...<fix123><fix123>Perhaps it's liver cirrhosis?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>げげ、そんなにお酒飲んでたっけ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Aw, no, have I been drinking that much?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>魔理沙、肝臓が悪い時は肝臓を食べるのよ。<fix123><fix123>それに不老不死の肝はね……。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Marisa, to cure your guts, you should eat someone else's.<fix123><fix123>Plus, an immortal's guts are...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>不老不死とはいえ、人間の肝はちょっと。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A human's guts would be a bit much, immortality aside.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>不老不死の体は、病には冒されないから、<fix123><fix123>中まで奇麗よ。<fix123>食べさせないけど。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>An immortal's body is immune to all disease,<fix123><fix123>so my innards are totally clean.<fix123>But don't go eating them.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>食べないよぅ……。<fix123><fix123>不老不死は魅力だがな。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm not gonna...<fix123><fix123>Although the whole immortality thing is pretty appealing.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>蓬莱人形<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Doll of Hourai<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>満月の下の、草木も眠る丑三つ時。<fix123><fix123>人間と妖怪の肝試しは、いったい何を恐れる？<fix123><fix123>最大の大罪の犠牲者は、いったいどこに居る？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Under the full moon, even the plants are asleep in the dead of the night.<fix123>Just what is there to be afraid of in this human and youkai's trial of guts? [1]<fix123>Just where is the victim of the greatest sin?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: エクステンドアッシュ　～ 蓬莱人<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Extend Ash ~ Person of Hourai<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Keine Kamishirasawa ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>待っていたぞ。<fix123>満月の夜にやってくるとはいい度胸だ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've been waiting.<fix123>You've got some guts, challenging me on the night of the full moon.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>これが肝試しの肝？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are you the "guts" in this trial of guts?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あの人間には指一本触れさせない！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I won't let you lay one finger on that human!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Keine Kamishirasawa DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>なんだったのかしら。<fix123><fix123>確かに妖精たちが騒いでいる様だけど……。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I wonder what that was about.<fix123><fix123>It does feel like the fairies are pretty rowdy tonight...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今夜の月は、また一段と強い。<fix123>妖の者が騒ぐのも無理が無いわね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The moon tonight is especially strong.<fix123>It's no wonder that all the creatures are rowdy, really.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Fujiwara no Mokou ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>こんな夜に出かける馬鹿者も居るんだねぇ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So there are even fools who'd go out on a night like this, huh?<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Who's that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前だよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You, obviously?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いや馬鹿者の事じゃなくて。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, I'm not asking who's a fool.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>馬鹿者ってところは認めるのね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So you're admitting to being a fool too, then.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>蓬莱の人の形<fix123>藤原 妹紅<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Figure of the Person of Hourai<fix123>Fujiwara no Mokou<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私はずっとここに住んでいる人間。<fix123><fix123>今ここに居るのは馬鹿だからじゃないよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm a human who's lived here for a long time.<fix123><fix123>I'm not here because I'm a fool.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間？<fix123><fix123>人間ねぇ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A human?<fix123><fix123>A human, huh.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この竹林の持ち主か何かかしら。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Maybe she owns the forest or something.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>で、目的は何？　お馬鹿さん。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So, what are you doing here, fools?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>肝試し。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A trial of guts.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>肝とか色々試し。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>And of various other things.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんと肝試し！<fix123>ああ、何時から人間はこんなに馬鹿に<fix123><fix123>なったのかしら？<fix123>こんなに狂おしい満月の丑三つ時に、<fix123>こんなに妖怪が沢山出る処まで来て、<fix123>事もあろうか肝試し！<fix123>妖怪に殺されなかったのが不思議ね。<fix123>それに死んだら、妖怪達に生き肝を<fix123><fix123>喰われる肝試しなんて――<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What! A trial of guts!?<fix123>Oh, since when have humans<fix123><fix123>been this foolish?<fix123>You come all the way out here in the dead of night,<fix123>with this lunatic full moon, and tons of youkai out,<fix123>for a trial of guts, of all things!?<fix123>It's a miracle that you weren't killed by youkai yet.<fix123>A trial of guts, seriously! If you die,<fix123><fix123>it'll be your guts the youkai will feast on---<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>言われ放題よ。<fix123><fix123>霊夢、何か反撃しないの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>She's just babbling.<fix123><fix123>Reimu, any counterattacks?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いやまぁねぇ。肝試しったって、<fix123><fix123>輝夜がほれいけ、やれいけって言うからさぁ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ehh, well. We're just having this trial of guts<fix123><fix123>because Kaguya was saying 'hey, go on out there,' so...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今なんて？<fix123><fix123>輝夜って言った？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What was that?<fix123><fix123>Did you say "Kaguya"?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>言ったっけ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Um, did I?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>か・ぐ・や、言ったわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You certainly uttered "ka―gu―ya".<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>むきー！<fix123><fix123>肝試しなんておかしいと思ったら、<fix123>やっぱりあいつの仕業なのね。<fix123>そうか、今度はこいつ等をけしかけて<fix123><fix123>私を始末しようとしているな？<fix123>あいつったら、いっつもいっつも私を<fix123><fix123>始末しようとして！<fix123>全く、こんな不便な体にしたのは<fix123><fix123>あいつじゃないの！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Rrrgh!<fix123><fix123>I figured your trial of guts was suspicious.<fix123>Of course she'd be behind this.<fix123>Yeah, she goaded the two of you into<fix123><fix123>getting rid of me this time, didn't she?<fix123>She always, ALWAYS tries to<fix123><fix123>do away with me!<fix123>Argh, and wasn't she the one who gave me<fix123><fix123>this inconvenient body in the first place!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんか、一人で盛り上がってるわね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh, she's getting all worked up on her own.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほら貴方も便乗しないと損よ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>See? If you don't take advantage of this, you'll lose.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふん、輝夜の使いがどれほどのもん<fix123><fix123>なのか見せて貰おうか。<fix123>あいつが遣したって事は、あいつよりは<fix123><fix123>強いんでしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmph. So, how about I see for myself<fix123><fix123>just how strong you messengers of Kaguya's are?<fix123>If she sent you, you must be<fix123><fix123>more powerful than her, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>強気な人間ね。私みたいな妖怪相手に<fix123><fix123>そこまで強気な人間なんて、<fix123>３人位しか知らないわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How brave. To think that there'd be a human<fix123><fix123>brave enough to confront a youkai like me.<fix123>I only knew three others like that. [2]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>でも、人間相手に戦うのはちょっと<fix123><fix123>気乗りしないわね……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'd kind of rather not fight<fix123><fix123>another human, though...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何言ってるの。<fix123><fix123>魔理沙は余裕でのして来たじゃないの。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What are you saying?<fix123><fix123>You were fine fighting Marisa, weren't you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私を普通の人間だと思うな。<fix123>私は死なない。絶対に死ぬ事が無い。<fix123><fix123>あのにっくき輝夜の所為で。<fix123>そうよ、いくらあいつが私を始末しようと<fix123><fix123>しても、どだい無理な事。<fix123>あいつはそれが判ってて使いを遣して来る。<fix123><fix123>腹立たしいにも程があるわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Don't go thinking I'm some ordinary human.<fix123>I won't die. I'm completely unable to die.<fix123><fix123>Thanks to that lousy Kaguya.<fix123>Yes, no matter how hard she tries to eliminate me,<fix123><fix123>it won't do her any good at all.<fix123>She knows that, and she still sends you messengers.<fix123><fix123>This cannot get any more annoying.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほら、霊夢。<fix123><fix123>また乗り遅れてるわよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Look, Reimu.<fix123><fix123>You missed another opportunity.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>よく分からないけど。<fix123>死なないって事は、<fix123><fix123>思いっきりやってもいいって事？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I still don't quite get it.<fix123>But if she won't die, that means<fix123><fix123>I can go all-out on her, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>中正解ね。<fix123><fix123>絶対に死なないのが自慢みたいだし。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>More or less. Although it looks like the "completely<fix123><fix123>unable to die" part is just her being full of herself.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>思いっきりやらなきゃ、<fix123><fix123>貴方の人生ゲームオーバー。<fix123>もう戻り橋にも戻れない、<fix123><fix123>一方通行の丑三つ時。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If you don't go all out,<fix123><fix123>it's game over for your life.<fix123>There's no turning back now.<fix123><fix123>It's a one-way street in the dead of night.[3]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 月まで届け、不死の煙<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Reach for the Moon, Immortal Smoke<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お望みどおり。<fix123><fix123>貴方達の肝、試させて貰うわよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Just what you wanted.<fix123><fix123>Allow me to test your guts.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Fujiwara no Mokou DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あーれー。<fix123><fix123>強すぎるぅぅ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ohhh man.<fix123><fix123>You're too strong...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あらほんと、まだ生きているわ。<fix123><fix123>ほんとに死なないのね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wow, look, she's still alive.<fix123><fix123>She really can't die, huh?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>最初は何度も死にかけて頼りないから<fix123><fix123>びっくりしたわよ。ほんと。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm seriously surprised. It looked like<fix123><fix123>she was about to die a bunch of times.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>痛い痛い、死なないけど痛い～。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ow, ow! I won't die, but it still hurts~.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>霊夢、この娘面白いわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Reimu, this girl is quite interesting.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いや、痛がってるのを見て面白い言うのは<fix123><fix123>ちょっと。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Er, looking at her in pain and saying "that's interesting"<fix123>is a bit, uh...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>こんなに強いんじゃ、肝試しもへったくれも<fix123><fix123>無いじゃない。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If you're this strong, there's no point<fix123><fix123>to a trial of guts, is there?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう？<fix123><fix123>私だって怖い物も色々あるわよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Really?<fix123><fix123>There's still various things that I'm scared of.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まんじゅうとかでしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Like manju?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう、あの丸いフォルムが大きな蟲の卵を<fix123><fix123>彷彿させて、そして中のあんが……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yeah, they're shaped like giant insect eggs.<fix123><fix123>And then that jelly inside is like...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いやぁぁ。まんじゅう怖い。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh noooo. Manju are so scary. [4]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それはともかく、肝試しはこれで終了かしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, anyway, is our trial of guts finished?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あれ？<fix123><fix123>そう言えばまだ肝を試していないわね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh?<fix123><fix123>Now that you mention it, we haven't tried any guts yet.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほら、目の前の人間の生き肝。<fix123><fix123>霊夢、貴方が掻っ捌いて確認しなさい。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>See? The human in front of us is full of guts.<fix123><fix123>Reimu, you cut out her guts and give them a try.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ひぇぇ。<fix123><fix123>死なないけど怖い。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Eeeek.<fix123><fix123>I won't die, but that's scary.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんで私がそんな妖怪じみたことしなきゃ<fix123><fix123>いけないのかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Why on earth should I have to<fix123><fix123>do something so youkai-like?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら、不老不死の人間の生き肝を食せば、<fix123><fix123>貴方も不老不死になれるわよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, if you eat an immortal person's guts,<fix123><fix123>you'll become immortal too.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>というか、人間やめるのは<fix123><fix123>ちょっとねぇ……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That said, I'd rather not<fix123><fix123>stop being human, y'know...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら酷い。私は人間じゃないって言うの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, that's mean. Are you saying I'm not human?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間……、なのかな？<fix123><fix123>よく分からないわね。<fix123>まぁどうせ、今の幻想郷は人間なのか<fix123><fix123>違うのか判らないような連中ばかりよ。<fix123>いまさら、魂を入れる器の違いなんて<fix123><fix123>大したもんじゃないのかな？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are you human...?<fix123><fix123>I don't really know.<fix123>Well, in any case, Gensokyo is full of things<fix123><fix123>that you can't tell are human or not anyway.<fix123>I guess it wouldn't matter much these days<fix123><fix123>if the container for your soul is different.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>でも博麗の仕事は妖怪退治。<fix123><fix123>それは妖怪差別かしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Youkai extermination is the duty of the Hakurei, though.<fix123><fix123>Would that be youkai discrimination?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>前言撤回。妖怪は退治されるもの。<fix123><fix123>人間は退治するもの。<fix123>これは動かせない約束事ね。<fix123><fix123>これからも私は、妖怪を退治するわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Okay, I take that back. Youkai should be exterminated.<fix123><fix123>Humans should do the exterminating.<fix123>It's an unshakable contract we have.<fix123><fix123>I'll keep exterminating youkai from now on.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>大・正・解。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Right you are.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>蛍火の行方<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Where the Fireflies Fly<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>蛍の灯りはいつもより激しく見えたのは気の所為か。<fix123>今宵は永い夜になるだろう。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are the fireflies brighter than usual, or is it just your imagination?<fix123>Tonight will be a long night.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 幻視の夜　～ Ghostly Eyes<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Illusionary Night ~ Ghostly Eyes<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さあ、出て来い！<fix123>そこに隠れる闇に蠢くものよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You, show yourself!<fix123>The wriggling one, hiding in the darkness there.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>妖夢、おいてかないでよー…<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Youmu, don't leave me behind here...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何言ってるんですか、夜は短いのですよ！<fix123>早く敵を見つけて斬り潰すのです。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What are you saying? The night is very short!<fix123>We have to find the villains quickly, and cut them into mash.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いや、そうじゃなくて……。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, I didn't mean...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>斬り潰すって……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>"Cut them into mash"...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Wriggle Nightbug ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>闇に蠢く光の蟲<fix123>リグル・ナイトバグ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A Bug of Light Wriggling in the Dark<fix123>Wriggle Nightbug<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>斬るか潰すかどっちかにしてよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are you cutting them or mashing them? Make up your mind!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さぁ、斬られる前か潰される前に、<fix123>どこに行けば良いのか言いなさい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now, before you get cut or mashed,<fix123>tell us which direction we ought to be going!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>妖夢のそれは、夜明けのテンションよ。<fix123>おいてかないで、って言ったじゃない。<fix123><fix123>まだ夜は始まったばっかよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Youmu, save the excitement for when dawn is nearing!<fix123>I told you not to leave me behind, didn't I?<fix123><fix123>The night's only just started.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんなのよ、こいつら。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What is with these two?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あれ？<fix123>目の前に大きな蛍が居るわよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh?<fix123>There's a big firefly in front of us.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>気付いて無かったのですか……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Did you not notice her yet...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>蛍見も良いわね。<fix123>妖夢、寄り道していかない？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Firefly watching is quite nice, too.<fix123>Youmu, would you like to take a side trip?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今のどこにそんな時間があるのです！<fix123>虫なんてこの楼観剣で……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Do we really have time for that now!?<fix123>I'll slice this bug to ribbons with my Roukanken...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうやって話している時間が一番長い！<fix123>蛍様が出て喜ばない奴なんて、<fix123>久しぶりに見たよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're spending the most time just talking like this!<fix123>It's been such a long time since I've seen anyone<fix123>who wouldn't be pleased to see fireflies!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 蠢々秋月　～ Mooned Insect<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Wriggling Autumn Moon ~ Mooned Insect<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Wriggle Nightbug DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>幽々子さまは、狙いを定めないから<fix123>敵を討つのに時間がかかるのです。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Lady Yuyuko, it takes a while for you to defeat<fix123>enemies because you don't focus your aim enough.[1]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら、急がば回れ、って言葉知ってる？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My, haven't you ever heard the saying, "haste makes waste"?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あぁ、急いでるんでしたね。<fix123>結局、次はどこに行けば良いのでしょうか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, yes, we are in a hurry.<fix123>So, where should we go next?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どう？<fix123>この枝が倒れた方に進んでみない？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well?<fix123>How about we see which way this branch falls?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そんなんでいいんですか……。<fix123>って、そんなに傾けてたら、手を放す前に<fix123>倒れる向きが決まっていますよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Is that really okay...?<fix123>Wait, with the way you're holding that,<fix123>there's really only one direction it'll fall.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>くるくるくる～、っと。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Round and round and round it goes~<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間の消える道<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Path that Humans Vanish From<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間の通り道も、真夜中に出歩くものは獣か妖怪位。<fix123>少なくとも人の姿が見える筈も無い。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Beasts and youkai are what stroll at midnight, even on the humans' roads.<fix123>There shouldn't be a human form in sight, at the least.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 夜雀の歌声　～ Night Bird<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Song of the Night Sparrow ~ Night Bird<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mystia Lorelei ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Mystia Lorelei PAUSES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ちょ、ちょっと待って～！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wait, waaaait!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あんた邪魔だって。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're in the way.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あなた達には私の歌声が届かないのかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The two of you aren't hearing my song, are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>夜雀の怪<fix123>ミスティア・ローレライ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Night Sparrow Apparition<fix123>Mystia Lorelei<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もしかして人間じゃ無いの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Perhaps you're not human?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>夜だというのに、雀の鳴き声がするわ。妖夢。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's nighttime, but I hear a sparrow calling. Youmu?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>幽々子さま。<fix123>この鳴き声に惑わされないで下さい。<fix123>これは夜雀の鳴き声。<fix123>最も不吉な音です。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Lady Yuyuko,<fix123>please don't get distracted by this song.<fix123>That's the cry of a night sparrow.<fix123>It's one of the most accursed sounds in the world.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>不吉なんて失礼ね。<fix123>それに、幽霊が出る音よりはなんぼか<fix123>マシでしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Accursed? How rude of you.<fix123>At the very least, my singing is better than the sound of<fix123>approaching phantoms, isn't it?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええそうねぇ、比べ物になりませんわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, indeed. It's no contest at all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>否定して下さいよ～。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Please don't agree with her...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>妖夢ほら、鳴き声がまた強くなってきたわ。<fix123>何処から聞こえてるのかしら。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Youmu, listen! The cries got louder again.<fix123>I wonder where they're coming from.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああもう、人間でも人間だった奴でもいいや。<fix123>これから、楽しい妖怪祭りが始まるよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Geeze. Whether you are human or you were human, it doesn't matter to me.<fix123>Now, the fun youkai festival begins.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さぁ妖夢、先を急ぎましょうか。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Okay, Youmu. Shall we hurry along?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？えぇ、そうですね。そうですけど。<fix123>それにはまず、目の前の鳥を落とさないと。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh? Er, yes. I suppose we should, yes.<fix123>But we've got to shoot down this bird in front of us, first off.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>雀は小骨が多くて嫌いなの。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I don't like sparrows. They're too bony.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>通すもんか！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You shall not pass!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: もう歌しか聞こえない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Deaf to All but the Song<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mystia Lorelei DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>夜雀が出たって事は、じきに妖怪か何か<fix123>が集まってきます。<fix123>その前にここを去りましょう。<fix123>先を急ぎますよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That night sparrow's appearance is going to attract<fix123>lots of youkai and other things, before long.<fix123>Let's move on before that happens.<fix123>We have to hurry.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ちょっと待って。小骨が……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hang on. Got a bone in my throat...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さっき、嫌いって言ってたじゃないですか。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Didn't you just say you didn't like sparrows?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>妖夢、好き嫌いは良くないわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's not good to be a picky eater, Youmu.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>歴史喰いの懐郷<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Memories of the History-Eater's Home<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>一本道の先には人間達が住む小さな里がある。<fix123>だが里があるはずの場所には、何も、無かった。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>At the end of a straight road, there was a small village where humans lived.<fix123>However, in the place where the village should have been, there was nothing at all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 懐かしき東方の血　～ Old World<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Nostalgic Blood of the East ~ Old World<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Keine Kamishirasawa ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>お前達か。<fix123>こんな真夜中に里を襲おうとする奴は。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Is it you?<fix123>Are you the ones trying to attack the village in the middle of this night?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あれ？<fix123>変な所に迷い込んでしまったわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh?<fix123>It seems we've gotten lost in some strange place.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ここは何処でしょう……？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yeah, where are we...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>迷子の振りしても無駄だ。<fix123>不吉な亡霊達よ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There's no point in plating innocent.<fix123>I can tell you're ominous ghosts.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Keine Kamishirasawa PAUSES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>くそ！<fix123>亡霊がなんで。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Crap!<fix123>These ghosts are really something.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>酷いわね。<fix123>亡霊を人外扱いして。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, how cruel.<fix123>Treating ghosts like outcasts, really.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Keine Kamishirasawa EXITS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Keine Kamishirasawa ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>こんな所まで何の用だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What business do you have in some place like this?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さっき、攻撃してきたでしょ？<fix123>そのお返し、よ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You attacked us before, right?<fix123>We're just going to respond to that.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>知識と歴史の半獣<fix123>上白沢 慧音<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Half Beast of Knowledge and History<fix123>Keine Kamishirasawa<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ここには何も無い。<fix123>さっさと通り過ぎるが良い。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There is nothing here.<fix123>Just move along already.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>といっても、実は目的地が分かって<fix123>いないので……。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's easy to say that, but we really<fix123>don't know where we're moving to...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>当ても無くふらふらしているのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are you just wandering around with no goal?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いやいや、妖夢。<fix123>ちゃんと目的地に向っているわ。<fix123>あなたは私の言う通りにすればいいのよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, no, Youmu.<fix123>We're certainly heading in the right direction.<fix123>All you need to do is go where I tell you to.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前達の目的とは何だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What is your purpose?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この異常な月を元に戻す事。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>To restore this abnormal moon to normal.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いやいや、妖夢。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, no, Youmu.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>素敵でお腹いっぱいな夜の観光旅行。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We're having our fill of a wonderful nighttime sightseeing tour.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんだか物凄く怪しい奴等だな。<fix123>ただでさえ幽霊は怪しいのに。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You two are really way too suspicious.<fix123>Although phantoms are suspicious at the best of times.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まて、それは聞き捨てならないな。<fix123>幽霊は怪しくない。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wait, I can't just let you say that.<fix123>Phantoms aren't suspicious.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いやいや。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, no—<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うるさい。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Shut up.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……やはり、お前達は危険そうだな。<fix123>ここから追い出すしか無さそうだ。<fix123>よく分からん奴らだが。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...you two really do seem dangerous.<fix123>Looks like I'll have to drive you away from here.<fix123>Although I don't quite get what you're doing.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ねぇねぇ妖夢。<fix123>今日は、虫、鳥、と来て次は獣よ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, hey, Youmu.<fix123>So far, we've had a bug, a bird, and now a beast.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何が言いたいのですか。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What are you trying to say?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふん、お前達の歴史は全て頂く！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmph. I'll help myself to all of your history!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: プレインエイジア<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Plain Asia<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前達が幽霊になる前も、全てだ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Every last bit. Even from before you became phantoms.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>次は龍かしらね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I wonder if a dragon's up next.[2]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>幽々子さま。次の事考える前に<fix123><fix123>目の前の事を考えてください。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Lady Yuyuko. Please concentrate on what's happening now,<fix123>and not what's going to happen next.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Keine Kamishirasawa DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>獣、って人間を獣扱いしないで下さいよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>"Beast"? Please, milady, you shouldn't treat humans like beasts.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いやいや、妖夢。<fix123>この娘は今は人間の姿をしているけど、<fix123>半分獣よ。あなたみたいね。<fix123>もっとも、人間も獣だと思うので足して<fix123>２半獣かな？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, no, Youmu.<fix123>This girl appears human right now,<fix123>but she's a half-beast. Kind of like you.<fix123>Although, I think humans are beasts too,<fix123>so I guess she's a full beast?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>くそ、月が不完全じゃなければ<fix123>こんな幽霊なんかに……。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Damnit. If the moon hadn't been incomplete,<fix123>I'd never have lost to such phantoms...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうそうそう。<fix123>満月を取り戻さないといけないんでした。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, yes, yes.<fix123>We've got to take back the full moon.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さぁ、次は龍料理ね。<fix123>楽しみだわ。妖夢。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now, next up is a dragon dish.<fix123>I can't wait, Youmu.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>幽々子さま、目的地は分かっているって<fix123><fix123>言ってましたよね？<fix123>なんか不安になってきましたよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Lady Yuyuko, you said you knew where our<fix123>destination was, right?<fix123>Somehow, I feel kind of concerned.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>でも、龍は鱗が多そうね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A dragon would have lots of scales, though.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>魔力を含む土の下<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Beneath the Soil that Holds Magic Power<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>力強い竹の下には、さらに力強い根が張り巡らされて<fix123><fix123>いる。表面しか見れないのは愚かな人間と妖怪だけだ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Beneath the sturdy bamboo, even sturdier roots spread out.<fix123>Only foolish humans and youkai can see nothing but the surface.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 永夜の報い　～ Imperishable Night<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Retribution for the Eternal Night ~ Imperishable Night<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>動くと撃つ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Move and I'll shoot!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Marisa Kirisame ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>間違えた。<fix123>撃つと動くだ。今すぐ動く。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I messed up.<fix123>I mean, shoot and I'll move..[3] Right away.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何？<fix123>こんなところで遭うなんて珍しい。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What?<fix123>That's strange, running into you in a place like this.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>普通の黒魔法少女<fix123>霧雨 魔理沙<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ordinary Black-Magic Girl<fix123>Marisa Kirisame<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さぁな。私はいつも通り、迷惑な妖怪を退治<fix123>しているだけだぜ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, eh, I'm just hunting some troublesome youkai,<fix123>like usual.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>迷惑って、誰がこんなことしたか知ってるの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Disturbing? Do you know who's doing all this, then?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だからー、普通は判るわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm telling you, even ordinary people could understand that.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そりゃ判るぜ。<fix123>こんな所に妖気集めた奴が飛んでいればな。<fix123>明日は待ちにまったお月見の日だ。<fix123>今日の月なんてもう見飽きたぜ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, then, I understand.<fix123>How could I not, when the ones gathering up this strange air are flying right at me?<fix123>Tomorrow's the harvest moon-viewing that we've been waiting for.<fix123>I already got bored of staring at tonight's moon.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら、判って無さそうね。<fix123>夜を止めているのは私達。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, you don't seem to understand.<fix123>We're the ones who are stopping the night.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前達だろ？<fix123>だからやっつけに来たんじゃないか。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yeah, and?<fix123>That's why I came here to kick your butts, ain't it?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そこの黒いの。<fix123>後ろの歪な月を見て何も感じないのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, you. The black-clothed one.<fix123>Don't you feel anything when you look at that warped moon behind you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もう見飽きたって言っただろ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Didn't I just say I got bored of lookin' at it?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 恋色マスタースパーク<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Love-Colored Master Spark<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>現実に目を背けるな。<fix123>こうしている間にもあの歪な月は沈む。<fix123>放っておけば大変な事になるのが<fix123>判らんのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You can't look away from reality.<fix123>While we're arguing like this, that moon is sinking lower.<fix123>Don't you understand that things will get really bad<fix123>if we just leave it be?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ー？夜が終らない方が大変だぜ。 <fix123>竹だって、一日が終らなければ永遠に成長<fix123>するかも知れない。 <fix123>それこそ月まで、でもな。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ehh? An endless night will cause far more trouble for sure. <fix123>For instance, the bamboo here will grow eternally if the night lasts too long. <fix123>Might even reach the moon, perhaps.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>出る杭は打たれるの。<fix123>あれ？打つと動くんだったっけ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The nail that sticks out gets struck down.<fix123>Oh? How would you move if you get struck down?[4]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、動くぜ。<fix123>夜が明けるまで動いてやるぜ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yeah, I'll move, all right.<fix123>I'll keep on moving until dawn breaks.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Marisa Kirisame EXITS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>幽々子さま、逃げましたよ。<fix123>追いますか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Lady Yuyuko, she's fled.<fix123>Shall we pursue?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>困ったわね。<fix123>私達もあっちに向ってるんだけど……。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What a bother.<fix123>I mean, we're headed that way too, but...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Marisa Kirisame ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Marisa Kirisame PAUSES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>撃ったから動いた。<fix123>さぁ、これからが本番だぜ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Okay. You shot, I moved.<fix123>Now, the real battle starts here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まだやるのか？<fix123>もう勝負あっただろう？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're still up for this?<fix123>The game's already decided, isn't it?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふん。<fix123>そっちが二人なら、こっちは二回だ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmph.<fix123>There's two of you, so I get two tries!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Marisa Kirisame DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>とんだ無駄な時間を過ごしてしまった。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That was such an awful waste of time.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>幽霊に無駄な時間なんて無いの。<fix123>全ては筋書き通り。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>For phantoms, there's no such thing as wasted time.<fix123>Everything is going as planned.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>くそ。<fix123>一体、何だと言うんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Damnit.<fix123>What the heck are you two saying?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>一瞬も全て。全ても一瞬。<fix123>あなたと遊んでいる時間も必然よ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>An instant is everything. Everything is but an instant.<fix123>The time we spent playing with you was inevitable, too.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あれ？<fix123>竹林の奥に大きな屋敷が見えます。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123>I see a huge mansion in the middle of the bamboo forest.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>妖夢。<fix123>判らない方がおかしいって言ってたでしょ？<fix123>そこに居るわよ。<fix123>探していた龍料理が。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Youmu.<fix123>Didn't I say it'd be strange to not understand what's happening?<fix123>Inside there...<fix123>is the dragon dish I've been searching for.[5]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>穢き世の美しき檻<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A Pure Cage in the Filthy World<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>「穢き所に、いかでか久しくおはせん。」<fix123>そういうと閉ざされた扉は一枚残らず開き――<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>"Why have you lingered so long in such a filthy place?"<fix123>Then, all the locked doors opened, untouched——[6]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: シンデレラケージ　～ Kagome-Kagome<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Cinderella Cage ~ Kagome-Kagome<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Tewi Inaba ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Tewi Inaba DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>遅かったわね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're too late.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Reisen Udongein Inaba ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>全ての扉は封印したわ。<fix123>もう、姫は連れ出せないでしょう？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've sealed all the doors.<fix123>You can't take the princess away now, can you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>漸く見つかりましたね。犯人が。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Looks like we've finally found the culprit.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>これは宇宙鳥。<fix123>まだまだ、焦っちゃ駄目よ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This is just a space bird.[7]<fix123>We're far from done, so don't get worked up.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>狂気の月の兎<fix123>鈴仙・Ｕ・イナバ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Lunatic Moon Rabbit<fix123>Reisen Udongein Inaba<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんだ、幽霊か。<fix123>焦らせないでよ、もう。<fix123>用が無いなら帰ってよ。<fix123>今取り込み中なの。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh, some phantoms?<fix123>Don't get me all worked up, geeze.<fix123>If you've got no business here, leave.<fix123>We're in the middle of something right now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうはいかない。<fix123>この月の異変は、お前がやったのだろう？<fix123>そうなら斬る。<fix123>違うのなら斬って先に進む。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No way.<fix123>This moon incident was caused by you, wasn't it?<fix123>If so, I'll slash you.<fix123>If not, I'll slash you and move on.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>月の異変？<fix123>ああ、地上の密室の術の事？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Moon incident?<fix123>Ah, you mean the earth-sealing spell?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうよ。<fix123>これは物凄く迷惑な術だわ。<fix123>即刻やめてもらいます。<fix123>妖夢、さぁ斬っておしまい。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Right.<fix123>This spell of yours is incredibly troublesome.<fix123>We'll have you put a stop to it this instant.<fix123>Now, Youmu, go slash her.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え、えぇ、行きますよ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Um, er, here I go?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>荒っぽい幽霊ね。<fix123>少しは話を聞いてからでも良いじゃない。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What rowdy phantoms.<fix123>Aren't you going to listen to us for even a little bit?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eirin Yagokoro ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あら、お迎えかと思ったら、幽霊？<fix123>まぁ、お迎えが来れる筈が無いけど。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My, I thought we had guests, but it's just some phantoms?<fix123>Well, there shouldn't be any guests arriving anyway.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>妖夢、二人目よ。<fix123>これも斬るのよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Youmu, there's another one.<fix123>Slash her too.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え、えぇ？行きます、の？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>H-huh? Should I go?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほら、そんなに苛めちゃ可哀相じゃない。<fix123>月の件は、私の術よ。<fix123>ただ、これも姫とこの娘の為。<fix123>幽霊とはいえ、この位の優しさが無いと<fix123>いけないわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, look, you shouldn't tease the poor girl like that.<fix123>The business with the moon is due to my spell.<fix123>But, it was for the sake of the princess and this girl.<fix123>Even phantoms ought to have at least<fix123>this much kindness in them.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前が犯人か。<fix123>それは斬る相手が一人減った。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So you're the culprit?<fix123>I've got one less person to slash, then.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うーん、でも焦っちゃ駄目。<fix123>ウドンゲ、ここはお前に任せたわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Mmm, but don't get all worked up yet.<fix123>Udonge, I'll leave this to you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eirin Yagokoro EXITS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>お任せください。斬られはしないけど、<fix123>扉は一つも空かせません。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Leave it to me. There's no slashing going on,<fix123>but I won't let a single one of those doors be opened.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（なんだ、幽々子さまと大差ないじゃ<fix123>ないか。）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(Huh, there isn't there much difference<fix123>between that lady and Lady Yuyuko.)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>脳が逃げて、鳥が残る。<fix123>妖夢、斬る相手が一人減ったわね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The brain has left, and the bird remains.<fix123>Youmu, you've got one less person to slash.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？　えぇ、斬りますってば。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh? Er, slashing. Will do.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 狂気の瞳　～ Invisible Full Moon<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Lunatic Eyes ~ Invisible Full Moon<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふふふ。<fix123>月の事ばっかに気を取られて……。<fix123>既に私の罠に嵌っている事に気が付いて<fix123>いないのかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh heh heh.<fix123>You've only been thinking of the moon...<fix123>Don't you see that you've already<fix123>fallen into my trap?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方の方向は狂い始めている。<fix123>もう真っ直ぐ飛んでいられない！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Your sense of direction is starting to go insane.<fix123>You're already unable to fly straight!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そういえば、幽々子さま、なんで<fix123>あいつが鳥なんですか？兎じゃぁ…<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Speaking of which, Lady Yuyuko,<fix123>why'd you call her a bird? She looks like a rabbit...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>兎は、皮をはいで食べると、<fix123>鳥になるの。覚えておきなさい。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>When skinned and eaten, they're the same thing.[8]<fix123>Remember that.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>嘘を教えるな。<fix123>っつか、無視するな！<fix123>私の目を見ても、まだ正気で居られると<fix123>思うなよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, don't tell lies.<fix123>...and don't ignore me!<fix123>I doubt you'll be able to remain sane<fix123>after gazing into my eyes!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Reisen Udongein Inaba DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>幽々子さまの言う通りに進む（FinalA）<fix123><fix123>幽々子さまの言う通りに進む（FinalB）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Go where Lady Yuyuko says (Final A)<fix123><fix123>Go where Lady Yuyuko says (Final B)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>If it is player's first time defeating Reisen, player has used a continue, or player chooses Final A<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>うう。目が廻る。<fix123>なんだか気分が悪くなってきた……。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ohh, my head is spinning.<fix123>I'm starting to feel sort of gross...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あらあら、これだけ揺られたから、<fix123>人間側が酔ったのね。<fix123>まぁ、安心しなさい。<fix123>次は体に良い物が食べられるわよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My, my, your human half got sick<fix123>just from being shaken around that much.<fix123>Well, don't fret.<fix123>Next, we'll eat something that's good for your health.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんていうこと。<fix123>思っていたよりずっと強い……。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I can't believe this.<fix123>You're far stronger than I thought...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>次は薬膳よ。しかも最後なの。<fix123>龍じゃないのが残念だけど。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Next up, herbal dishes. And that's the end of it, too.<fix123>Unfortunately, it's not a dragon after all, though.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>幽々子さま。<fix123>なんか知っているんですか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Lady Yuyuko.<fix123>Do you know something I don't?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>全然。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Not at all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>NEXT STAGE: Final A<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>If player chooses Final B<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>うう。目が廻る。<fix123>なんだか気分が悪くなってきた……。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ohh, my head is spinning.<fix123>I'm starting to feel sort of gross...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あらあら、これだけ揺られたから、<fix123>人間側が酔ったのね。<fix123>あそこに見える扉の奥で<fix123>ちょっと休みましょうか。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My, my, your human half got sick<fix123>just from being shaken around that much.<fix123>How about we go through that door over there<fix123>and rest for a little a bit?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、しまった。<fix123>まだ封印が間に合ってない扉があったのか。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ahh, crap.<fix123>There was a door that I didn't have time to seal yet?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>大丈夫、ですよ。<fix123>先を急ぎましょう。さっきのを追いますよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, I'm okay.<fix123>Let's hurry ahead and chase that one from before.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いいの。<fix123>空いている扉は入れる扉。<fix123>きっとそこには最後の料理が待っているわ。<fix123>まぁ、休憩にはならないかもしれない<fix123>けどね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You sure?<fix123>The door that's open is the door to enter.<fix123>Our final course is surely waiting for us in there.<fix123>Well, it might not be much of a respite,<fix123>though.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>NEXT STAGE: Final B<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>姫を隠す夜空の珠<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Orb in the Night Sky, Hiding the Princess<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>永い永い廊下。この廊下は何者かが見せる狂像か。<fix123><fix123>近すぎる月の記憶は、妖怪には懐かしく、薄い物だった。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A long, long corridor. Is it a lunatic illusion being shown by someone?<fix123>To the youkai, this closer moon brought faint, nostalgic memories.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ヴォヤージュ １９６９<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Voyage 1969<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eirin Yagokoro ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ふふふ。<fix123>無事ついて来てるようね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hahaha.<fix123>Good, so you're following me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>追いついた。<fix123>もう逃さないわよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We've caught up with you.<fix123>You won't be escaping now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええ、逃しませんとも。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, you won't be escaping.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eirin Yagokoro EXITS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>えぇーと。<fix123>何処にいった？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ummm.<fix123>Where'd she go?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eirin Yagokoro ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ここ、ここ。<fix123>さすが半人前ね。<fix123>こんな短時間で見失うなんて。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Here, here.<fix123>You really are half-baked.<fix123>You lost sight of me in such a short time.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何やってるのよ。<fix123>その大きな半幽霊は何の為についているの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What are you doing?<fix123>What's that big phantom half of yours there for?<fix123><fix123><fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>尾行の為じゃ無いですよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Not for chasing people, surely.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>月の頭脳<fix123>八意 永琳<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Brain of the Moon<fix123>Eirin Yagokoro<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まぁ、ここは私が作った偽の通路。<fix123>貴方達が見失うのも無理は無いわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, this is a false pathway I created.<fix123>So it's no wonder that you lost track of me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>偽の通路？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>False pathway?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>偽の月に偽の星空。<fix123>ほんと、手の込んだ事をしたものね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A false moon in a false sky.<fix123>You're really overdoing it with this.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら、よく分かったわね。<fix123>あの月が幻影だって。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, impressive.<fix123>You see that this moon is an illusion.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>大昔の月よ、あれは。<fix123>月がまだ天上にあった頃の月。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's a very old moon.<fix123>One from when the moon was still there in the heavens.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>昔ですか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Old?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>古臭い、黴の生えた月。<fix123>今の月には兎はいないものねぇ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A terribly old-fashioned moon, with mold growing on it.<fix123>The moon these days has no rabbits on its surface.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あいにく、今でも兎はいるわ。<fix123>月の民も兎も、月の裏でひっそりと<fix123>暮らしているよ。<fix123>結界を張ってひっそりと……。<fix123>そう、幻想郷の様にね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, no, there are rabbits there even now.<fix123>The people and rabbits of the moon have been<fix123>living quietly on the far side.<fix123>Unseen, protected by a barrier...<fix123>Yes, it's much like your Gensokyo.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>月の幻想郷？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A Gensokyo on the moon?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そしてこの幻影の月は、月の記憶。<fix123>古臭く見えるのはその為よ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>And so, this illusory moon is a memory of the past moon.<fix123>That's why it looks so old-fashioned.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>で、そんな黴臭い月を持ち出して<fix123>何をしようとしてたの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So, what are you trying to do<fix123>by dragging this musty old moon out?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>用事ならもう済んでいるわ。<fix123>満月は月と地上を結ぶ唯一の鍵。<fix123>これさえ無くせば、追手も月から<fix123>地上にやって来れない。<fix123>今頃、偽の地上に辿りついている<fix123>でしょう。そう、黴臭い地上に。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My task is already coming to an end.<fix123>The full moon is the one key that links the moon to the earth.<fix123>Just by removing that, no pursuers can reach<fix123>the Earth's surface from the moon.<fix123>Even now, they're pursuing us to a fake Earth.<fix123>To an old, musty Earth, yes.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あなたは、犯罪者なのね。<fix123>何かから逃げる者は罪を犯した者。<fix123>身を隠そうとする者は罪を認めた者。<fix123>そして、罪を認めた犯罪者は<fix123>言い訳を始めるわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>In short, you are a criminal.<fix123>Those who try to escape from something are those who've committed a crime.<fix123>Those who try to hide themselves are those who've admitted their crime.<fix123>And criminals who've admitted to a crime<fix123>always start making excuses.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いや別に。<fix123>あんまりにもここが居心地が良かったから、<fix123>月に帰りたくなかっただけよ。<fix123>安心していいわ。<fix123>朝になれば満月は元に戻してあげるから。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, it's not like that.<fix123>This may be a bit unreasonable, but I simply didn't want<fix123>to go back to the moon because it was comfortable here.<fix123>There's no need to worry.<fix123>Once it's morning, I'll return your full moon, you see.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>幽々子さま、私に何かご指示を。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Lady Yuyuko, give me some instructions.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら、今頃になって私の言ってたことが<fix123>判ってきたのかしら。<fix123>じゃあ、まずは私の盾になりなさい。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, have you understood what I was saying<fix123>by now?<fix123>Well then, first, please become my shield.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お任せください。<fix123>冥界一硬い盾、ごらんに入れましょう。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Leave it to me.<fix123>I will be the hardest shield in all the Netherworld.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>気が向いたら援護してあげるから。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Seeing as I'll back you up if I feel like it.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あはははは。<fix123>盾は外からの力を防ぐ力しか持たない。<fix123>我ら月の民は内なる力に作用させる<fix123>能力を持つの。<fix123>あなたが硬い盾になっている内に、中の<fix123>やわらかい部分から腐っていく……。<fix123>そう、そっちの能天気なお嬢さんからね。<fix123>硬い盾なんて無意味だわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ahahaha.<fix123>A shield can only stop something from the outside.<fix123>We of the moon have the ability to use<fix123>more internal forces.<fix123>While you're becoming a hard shield,<fix123>the soft parts inside you are slowly rotting...<fix123>Yes, you carefree girl over there.<fix123>A "hard shield" is meaningless.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>妖夢、安心して。<fix123>ナマ物じゃないから腐らないわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Don't worry, Youmu.<fix123>I'm not alive, so I can't rot.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>判ってますよ。<fix123>最初から腐っていることぐらい。<fix123>でも、腐っていてもお守りするのが<fix123><fix123>魂魄家の役割なんですよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I understand.<fix123>You're rotting to begin with, right?<fix123>But rotten or not, it's the Konpaku<fix123>family's duty to protect you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>腐らないってば。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I said I can't rot.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いつまでその余裕が持つかしらね。<fix123>留処なく溢れる月の記憶。<fix123>これを浴びた地上人で狂わなかった<fix123>人は居ない。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I wonder how long that attitude of yours will last.<fix123>This ceaselessly overflowing memory of the moon...<fix123>Amongst the Earthlings bathed in it, there are none<fix123>who didn't go insane.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>仕様が無いわね。妖夢、狂わないように<fix123>これだけは覚えておくのよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Looks like there's no helping it.<fix123>Youmu, keep this one thing in mind so you don't go insane.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、人じゃなくて幽霊ね。<fix123>それじゃ腐らないか。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, you're a phantom and not a human.<fix123>I guess you won't rot, then?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>腐りかけが一番美味しいの。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Things are most delicious when they're about to rot.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今それを教えられても……。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Why are you telling me that now...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>言うわね。<fix123>でも、発酵の能力は神の力。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well said.<fix123>However, fermentation is a power granted by the gods.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 千年幻想郷　～ History of the Moon<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Gensokyo Millennium ~ History of the Moon<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方達亡霊は神も見捨てたって事よ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You ghosts, unable to rot, have been forsaken even by the gods!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eirin Yagokoro DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>何遊んでるのよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What are you playing at!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kaguya Houraisan ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>永琳、私の力でもう一度だけチャンスをあげる。<fix123>これで負けたらその時は……。<fix123>そこの亡霊！<fix123>私の力で作られた薬と永琳の本当の力、<fix123><fix123>一生忘れないものになるよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Eirin, I grant you one more chance with my power.<fix123>If you lose this time...<fix123>You ghosts there!<fix123>With the medicine made by my power, and Eirin's true strength,<fix123><fix123>you'll never forget this as long as you live!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ヴォヤージュ １９７０<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Voyage 1970<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eirin Yagokoro REVIVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Eirin Yagokoro DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>If the imperishable night ever reaches 5:00 am<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>BAD ENDING No. 12<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>If the imperishable night ends before 5:00 am<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>NORMAL ENDING No. 8<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>五つの難題<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Five Impossible Requests<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>解決不能な五つの難題。<fix123>しかし、長い年月と幻想の力は、それらの問題を<fix123>解くのに十分だった。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There were five impossible requests that nobody could solve.<fix123>However, the long passing of years and the power of phantasm<fix123>were enough for these requests to be fulfilled.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ヴォヤージュ １９６９<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Voyage 1969<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eirin Yagokoro ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ああもう。<fix123>こっちに来させちゃ駄目だって言ってるのに。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Geez.<fix123>I told her not to let them come this way.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>妖夢。<fix123>行くわよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Youmu.<fix123>Press on.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええ、行きますとも。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes. Pressing on now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eirin Yagokoro DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>幽々子さま。<fix123>見てください、凄い満月ですよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Lady Yuyuko, look.<fix123>What an amazing full moon.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kaguya Houraisan ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>これが本当の満月。<fix123>貴方達は人間でも妖怪でもないみたいね。<fix123>何でこんな所に迷い込んできたのかしら。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This is the true full moon.<fix123>It seems that you two are neither human nor youkai.<fix123>I wonder why you've wandered into such a place as this?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>妖夢。<fix123>あの月の顔を見るのは忌まわしい事よ。<fix123>今すぐに見るのをやめなさい。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Youmu.<fix123>Looking at that moon is a fearful thing.<fix123>Stop looking at it, right away.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え、えぇ、そうなのですか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Er, wha, is it really?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>永遠と須臾の罪人<fix123>蓬莱山 輝夜<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sinner of Eternity and the Instantaneous<fix123>Kaguya Houraisan<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>本当の月は忌まわしいもの。<fix123>地上人はその事を忘れて久しい。<fix123>貴方は懐かしい人ね。<fix123>いや、人だった者かな？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The true moon is fearful, indeed.<fix123>That's something that the Earthlings have long since forgotten.<fix123>You must be quite the nostalgic human.<fix123>Or rather, ex-human?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まだまだ人のつもりだけど。<fix123>でもね、この娘はまだ半分人なの。<fix123>半分だけでもおかしくなったら困るわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Every now and then I still think of myself that way.<fix123>This girl is still half-human, though.<fix123>It'd be quite bad if half of her went insane.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>幽々子さま。<fix123>月を見ないであいつを見るのは無理です！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Lady Yuyuko.<fix123>If I look away from the moon, I can't see her either!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>心の目で見るのよ。<fix123>その大きな半幽霊は何の為に付いているの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Look at her with your mind's eye.<fix123>What's that big phantom half of yours there for?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>心眼の為ではないですよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Not for using any inner eyes, surely.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>楽しいわね。<fix123>穢い人間でも妖怪でもない者か。<fix123>見ていて気持ちのいい位、何にもないのね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What fun.<fix123>You're neither impure humans, nor youkai.<fix123>You truly have nothing, it's quite enjoyable to look at.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>幽々子さま、大変です。<fix123>目を瞑ったら真っ暗です！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh no, Lady Yuyuko!<fix123>It's completely dark when I close my eyes!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>少しくらいこの満月みて狂った方が<fix123>いいんじゃない？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wouldn't it be okay to look at this full moon<fix123>and go insane, just a little bit?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>見えなくても刀は物を斬れるでしょう？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You can still slash things without looking at them, can't you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>で、今日はどうしたの？<fix123>幽霊が何の用なの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So, what are you doing here tonight?<fix123>What business do you phantoms have?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>珠はね、少しでも欠けると価値は無くなるの。<fix123>それは、永遠に丸のままではいられないからよ。<fix123>でもね、その傷が付いた珠も、転がしている<fix123>うちにまた珠に戻る。<fix123>そういうことでしょう？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If even a little bit of a sphere is missing, it loses its value.<fix123>That's because it can't stay round forever.<fix123>But, as that flawed sphere is rolled around a bit,<fix123>it becomes a full sphere once again.<fix123>That's what this is about, isn't it?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あー、急に目を開けると眩しさに目が眩む。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ahh, when I open my eyes all of a sudden, the light is blinding me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう、永遠とはそういうこと。<fix123>ワビの世界よ。<fix123>実は私、永遠を操る事が出来るの。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, that is indeed what eternity is about.<fix123>The peaceful world.<fix123>Actually, I'm able to manipulate eternity.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ってことは、今夜を止めていたのも<fix123>貴方かしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>—so, does that mean you're the one<fix123>who's stopping the night?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>え？<fix123>幽々子さま、それはその……。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123>Lady Yuyuko, isn't that...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そんな酷い事をするのは私じゃないわ。<fix123>これは信じていいわよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I could never do something so cruel.<fix123>Trust me on that one.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まぁ、どうでもいいわそんなこと。<fix123>私は、幻想郷に満月が戻ればそれでいいの。<fix123>朝にはそのうちなるでしょうし。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, that doesn't matter to me anyway.<fix123>I'll be satisfied if we can return the full moon to Gensokyo.<fix123>Morning will still come in the meantime.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>良く言いますね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well said.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>妖夢、これは最後の命令よ。<fix123>目の前の永遠を斬りなさい。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Youmu, this is your final order.<fix123>Slash the eternity before your eyes.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら、永遠は傷が付いても永遠よ。<fix123>さっきそう言っていたでしょう？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, eternity is still eternity, even with pieces missing.<fix123>You were saying that just a minute ago, weren't you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だから斬るんですよね！<fix123>この白楼剣で！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Okay, so I'll slash her<fix123>with my Hakurouken here!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さっきはああ言ってたけど、夜を止め<fix123>ていたのはこいつの仕業よ、きっと。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I said this just a minute ago, but she has to<fix123>be the one who's stopping the night. Surely.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いや、それは違うと……。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, um, I think that's...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>違うって言ってるでしょ？<fix123>まぁいいわ。<fix123>そんなに私と戦いたいのならやりましょう？<fix123>今まで、何人もの人間が敗れ去って<fix123>いった五つの問題。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wrong. I said that, didn't I?<fix123>Well, whatever.<fix123>You're so eager to fight with me, so shall we begin?<fix123>My five requests that so many humans<fix123>in the past have failed to complete...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 竹取飛翔　～ Lunatic Princess<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Flight of the Bamboo Cutter ~ Lunatic Princess<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方達に幾つ解けるかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How many of them can you fulfill?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kaguya Houraisan DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>なんて事！<fix123>そう、夜を止めていたのは……、<fix123>貴方達だったのね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What the!?<fix123>I see. The ones who are stopping the night...<fix123>It's you two, isn't it.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ヴォヤージュ1970<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Voyage 1970<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kaguya Houraisan REVIVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>貴方達が作った半端な永遠の夜なんて……<fix123>私の永遠を操る術で全て破って見せる。<fix123>夜明けはすぐそこにあるはずよ。<fix123>どう？<fix123>これで永夜の術は破れて、夜は明ける！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This half-finished eternal night that you have made...<fix123>With my spell to manipulate eternity, I'll tear it all away.<fix123>The dawn shall be upon us soon.<fix123>How's that?<fix123>With this, your spell of eternal night shall be broken, and the dawn shall come!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kaguya Houraisan DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>If player runs out of lives during this stage<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>BAD ENDING No. 12<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Otherwise<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>GOOD ENDING No. 4<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>蛍火の行方<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Where the Fireflies Fly<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>蛍の灯りはいつもより激しく見えたのは気の所為か。<fix123>今宵は永い夜になるだろう。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are the fireflies brighter than usual, or is it just your imagination?<fix123>Tonight will be a long night.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 幻視の夜　～ Ghostly Eyes<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Illusionary Night ~ Ghostly Eyes<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>咲夜、別に付いて来いとは言ってないわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sakuya, I didn't really ask you to tag along.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何言ってるのですか、私は心配してるのですよ。<fix123>また、さっきみたいな虫が現れたら……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What are you saying? I'm simply worried.<fix123>If that bug we saw before shows up again...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>現れたら、って時は現れるのよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Say "if she shows up," and I'll show up right away!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Wriggle Nightbug ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>闇に蠢く光の蟲<fix123>リグル・ナイトバグ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A Bug of Light Wriggling in the Dark<fix123>Wriggle Nightbug<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さぁ、現れたわ。<fix123>そのお嬢様を渡して貰おうかしら！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>And now, I've showed up.<fix123>How about you hand that young lady over!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>現れたら……、虫が可哀相でしょ？<fix123>五分の虫にも一分の魂でしたっけ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If she shows up, she's fated to come to a bad end, isn't she?<fix123>They say a half-inch bug has only one-tenth an inch of soul. [1]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>八割減ね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's 80% smaller.[2]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もしかして、物騒な話？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wait, are you up to something evil?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いえ、殺生な話。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>More like something lethal.[3]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>良いのよ、私は人間以外には興味が無いから。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, never mind. I have no interest in non-humans, you see.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>興味が無いから心配なのですよ。<fix123>人間なら食料で済むかも知れないけど、<fix123>それ以下だと……。<fix123>はぁ、無慈悲にも程があります。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The fact that you're not interested is what's worrying me.<fix123>Humans might get away with simply being food,<fix123>but things lower than them...<fix123>*sigh*. What heartless cruelty.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ひぇぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Eeeek!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 蠢々秋月　～ Mooned Insect<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Wriggling Autumn Moon ~ Mooned Insect<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Wriggle Nightbug DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あーあ。<fix123>最近、蛍も増えてきて綺麗ですね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Uh-oh.<fix123>We see more and more fireflies, and they're so beautiful.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>咲夜、その感嘆符と内容が合っていないわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sakuya, that interjection doesn't match what you're saying.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>途中で話題を変えたのですよ。お嬢様。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I changed the subject partway through, Milady.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>後半しか伝わらなかったわ。<fix123>何が言いたかったのかしらね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I only understand the second half.<fix123>What were you trying to say?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間の消える道<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Path that Humans Vanish From<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間の通り道も、真夜中に出歩くものは獣か妖怪位。<fix123>少なくとも人の姿が見える筈も無い。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Beasts and youkai are what stroll at midnight, even on the humans' roads.<fix123>There shouldn't be a human form in sight, at the least.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 夜雀の歌声　～ Night Bird<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Song of the Night Sparrow ~ Night Bird<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mystia Lorelei ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Mystia Lorelei PAUSES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ちょ、ちょっと待って～！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wait, waaaait!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>急いでるのよ。<fix123>動きながらなら聞いてあげるわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We're in a hurry.<fix123>If you can keep up with us, we'll listen.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>言っても止まらないくせに。<fix123>でも、人間と蝙蝠。不思議な組み合わせね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So you won't stop even if I ask.<fix123>A human and a bat, though? That's an unusual pair.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>夜雀の怪<fix123>ミスティア・ローレライ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Night Sparrow Apparition<fix123>Mystia Lorelei<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間は欲しいけど、そいつはいらない。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'd like to have that human. But not that bat.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふん。餓鬼が夜遊びか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmph. Is it the brats' night out?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>勿論、夜遊びよ。<fix123>良い子の昼間はおねむの時間。<fix123>夜は人狩りサービスタイムよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Naturally! <fix123>Good kids' daytime is when I go beddy-bye.<fix123>At night, it's happy hour for man-hunting!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>悪いけど急いでるんだ。<fix123>さっさとやられてくれないか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Too bad. We're in a hurry.<fix123>So, mind getting shot down right now?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ちょっと待って、って言ってるでしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>W-wait! I said "wait" already, didn't I?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お嬢様。<fix123>この程度の奴相手にしていると、きりが<fix123>無いですわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Milady.<fix123>If you start fights even with enemies of this level,<fix123>there'll be no end to them.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>True.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まったく、ふざけてるわね！<fix123>夜に飛ぶ鳥を恐れた事は無いのかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, quit joking around!<fix123>Aren't you scared by birds flying in the night?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>フライドチキン、でしょ？<fix123>私は人間がいいわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Birds frying in the night? [4]<fix123>Humans are better, really.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（何が良いのかしら？）<fix123>お嬢様、flyはフライドに変形しません。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(How better?)<fix123>Milady, you can't turn "fly" into "fry".[5]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんでもいいわ。<fix123>私が本当の闇夜の恐怖を教えてあげる！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Whatever.<fix123>I'll show you the true terror of darkness!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>闇夜の恐怖、ねぇ……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>"Terror of darkness", huh...?[6]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: もう歌しか聞こえない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Deaf to All but the Song<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mystia Lorelei DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>さぁ、咲夜。そいつをフライにするか、<fix123>それとも先に進むか、どっちが良い？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now, Sakuya. Which shall we do:<fix123>to fry that bird, or to continue on ahead?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>フライは後にして、先に進みましょう。<fix123>夜は短いのですよ。<fix123>そういえば、なんでこっちに向ってる<fix123>んでしょうか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Let's leave the frying for later and proceed onwards.<fix123>The night is short.<fix123>Speaking of which, why are we headed<fix123>in this direction?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ん？、燃料補給。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hm? Refueling.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>歴史喰いの懐郷<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Memories of the History-Eater's Home<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>一本道の先には人間達が住む小さな里がある。<fix123>だが里があるはずの場所には、何も、無かった。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>At the end of a straight road, there was a small village where humans lived.<fix123>However, in the place where the village should have been, there was nothing at all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 懐かしき東方の血　～ Old World<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Nostalgic Blood of the East ~ Old World<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Keine Kamishirasawa ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>お前達か。<fix123>こんな真夜中に里を襲おうとする奴は。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Is it you?<fix123>Are you the ones trying to attack the village in the middle of this night?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お嬢様。<fix123>こんなところ、さっさと通り抜けましょう。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Milady.<fix123>Let's pass by this place, and quickly.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まぁ、別に餓えてはいないけど……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I guess I'm not that hungry right now...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まったく、ここの人間が居なくなったら<fix123>残るは妖怪と変な人間だけになるじゃないか！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Good grief. Without the humans from the village,<fix123>the only ones left here are youkai and the weird humans!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Keine Kamishirasawa PAUSES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>むむ、お前達何もんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Mmph. What the heck are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふん。もう後が無いんじゃないかい？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Bah. There's no end to this now, is there?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お嬢様！<fix123>少々お戯れが過ぎますよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Milady!<fix123>You're toying with her a little too much.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Keine Kamishirasawa EXITS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Keine Kamishirasawa ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>よく見てみな。悪魔達よ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Look around, you devils.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>達って、ねぇ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Devils plural, huh?[7]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>知識と歴史の半獣<fix123>上白沢 慧音<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Half Beast of Knowledge and History<fix123>Keine Kamishirasawa<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ここには何も無かった。<fix123>そう見えるだろう？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There's nothing here.<fix123>You can see that, can't you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>って、ここは人間の里でしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, shouldn't the Human Village be here?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、私はあんまり来る事は無いけど、<fix123>咲夜はよく来ているのかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah. I rarely visit the place myself,<fix123>but do you come here often, Sakuya?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええ、うちのお屋敷の道具は人間製のもの<fix123>も結構有りますわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes. Many of the tools we use at our mansion<fix123>were made by the humans here, too.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>よく見て……。<fix123>見ての通り、ここには何も無かったんだよ。<fix123>いいから、さっさと通り過ぎな。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Look closely...<fix123>As you can see, there was never anything here.<fix123>Okay? Move along, now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんか嫌な態度ね。<fix123>里と人間をどこやったのかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What a bad attitude you have.<fix123>What did you do with the village and its humans?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>判らんのか？<fix123>そもそも、人間は居なかった事にした。<fix123>今、ここの里の歴史は全て私が<fix123>保護している。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Don't you get it?<fix123>I made it so there were no humans to begin with.<fix123>Right now, all of this village's history<fix123>is under my protection.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>咲夜。<fix123>妹の家庭教師に良いんじゃない？<fix123>郷土歴史学の先生って感じで。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sakuya.<fix123>Wouldn't she be a good tutor for my little sister?<fix123>Teaching her about the local history, or some such.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うちにはもう知識人は要りませんわ……。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We don't need any more intellectuals at the mansion...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いいか、もう一度言う。<fix123>ここには元々何も無かった。<fix123>人間も人間の里もだ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Listen. I'll say it one more time.<fix123>There never was anything here from the start.<fix123>No humans, nor their village.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どうも、その言い方がひっかかるのよね。<fix123>お嬢様。<fix123>少々時間を頂けますか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Something about what you're saying sticks out to me.<fix123>Milady.<fix123>May I have a bit of time?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>急いでるんだけどね。物凄く。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We're in a hurry. An incredible hurry.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: プレインエイジア<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Plain Asia<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そこの悪魔の歴史も私が頂こうか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>May I have a bit of that devil's history, myself?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふん、偉そうね。<fix123>ワーハクタクの癖に。<fix123>歴史ばっかり見ているお前には、<fix123>運命は変えられないよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmph, you're rather full of yourself.<fix123>Even though you're a were-hakutaku.<fix123>All you do is look back at history.<fix123>If you're like that, you can't change your fate.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お嬢様。<fix123>時間を頂いてもいいのですね？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Milady.<fix123>May I please have a bit of time?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>しょうがないわねぇ。<fix123>ちょっとなら、私の時間も使っても良いわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, it can't be helped.<fix123>You may use a bit of my time. Just a moment's worth.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Keine Kamishirasawa DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>さぁ、すっきりしたところで先を<fix123>急ぎましょう。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, that was refreshing.<fix123>Now, let's move on.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まだ、里は元に戻ってないけど<fix123>もうすっきりしたの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're feeling refreshed, even though<fix123>the village hasn't been put back yet?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もうすっきりしたわ。きれいさっぱり。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, quite so. I feel not one whit of fatigue.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まぁいいけど、こいつのお陰ですっかり妖気の<fix123>上流の方向を見失ったわ。<fix123>咲夜は、行き先が分かってるのかしら。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, okay. Thanks to her, though, I've completely lost the direction<fix123>that the strange air was coming from.<fix123>Do you know where to go, Sakuya?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>きれいさっぱりですわ。<fix123>でもほら、こんなときに便利な奴がいます。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Not one whit.<fix123>But, look! We have someone who'd be very useful at a time like this.<fix123><fix123>
