jp_dialogue: <fix123>あー？満月の異変の原因？<fix123>それは、あいつの仕業だろう。<fix123>こんな事出来る奴なんてそうそう居ないしな。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wha? You mean the cause of this full-moon incident?<fix123>It could only be their doing.<fix123>There are few people capable of such a thing.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>知識人は役に立つわね。<fix123>家にはもう要らないけど。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My, intellectuals can be useful.<fix123>Although we certainly don't need any more.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>家の知識人は本ばっかり読んでて、<fix123>あんまり役に立っていない気が……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Our mansion's intellectual is such a bookworm,<fix123>she's hardly any use at all...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ムダ知識が豊富なのですよ。<fix123>もう要らないけど。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We have quite enough useless knowledge already.<fix123>We don't need any more.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>伝説の夢の国<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Legendary Dreamland<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>月明かりの竹の国は、夢の様に不気味に見えた。<fix123>今にも竹が、妖しく輝きだしそうである。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The land of bamboo under the moonlight looked as eerie as a dream.<fix123>The bamboo looked as if it would start glowing strangely at any moment.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 永夜の報い　～ Imperishable Night<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Retribution for the Eternal Night ~ Imperishable Night<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そこまでよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Stop right there!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Reimu Hakurei ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>やっぱりあんたね。<fix123>どうりで、時間の流れがおかしいと思ったよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So it was you, after all.<fix123>No wonder I thought the flow of time was weird.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何の事かしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What are you talking about?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほら、普段からおかしな事してるんでしょ？<fix123>咲夜って、そうだもんねぇ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Look, you're always doing something weird, right?<fix123>That's Sakuya for you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まぁ、酷いですわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, how cruel of you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まぁ、いつもおかしな事はしてるけど。<fix123>今日は一段と大きな事をしてるわね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, you're pretty much always doing something weird,<fix123>but today you've gone much too far.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>楽園の素敵な巫女<fix123>博麗 霊夢<fix123><fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wonderful Shrine Maiden of Paradise<fix123>Reimu Hakurei<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まるで、紅い霧のあの時みたいだわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This is just like when you made that scarlet mist.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おかしな事をしているのは咲夜だけど、<fix123>大きな事をしているのは私達じゃないわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sakuya is doing something weird,<fix123>but we're not the ones who're doing the biggest thing right now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今は、その犯人を懲らしめに動いているの<fix123>ですわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We're on our way to teach that culprit a lesson<fix123>right now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>鳥の目はごませても。<fix123>私の目はごまかせないわ。<fix123>あんたらが動くたびに、時刻が止まる。<fix123>夜が延びる。<fix123>夜を止めている犯人は、あんたらだ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Maybe you could fool a bird with that excuse,<fix123>but you can't trick me.<fix123>Whenever you two move, time stops,<fix123>and the night gets longer. <fix123>You two are the culprits who are stopping the night!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そりゃ、そうよ。悪いかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, yeah. Anything wrong with that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お嬢様。<fix123>今は、夜を止める事が目的ではありません。<fix123>霊夢の後ろの月を見て下さい。<fix123>ほらもうこんなに……。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Milady.<fix123>Stopping the night is not our goal right now.<fix123>Look at the moon behind Reimu, please.<fix123>See, it's already so...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あの月と、終らない夜は関係無いでしょ？<fix123>夜を止めて、そんでもって吸血鬼が跋扈して、<fix123>これほど危険な夜もないわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That moon's got nothing to do with this unending night, doesn't it?<fix123>The night's stopped, and a vampire is running rampant because of it.<fix123>What could be more dangerous than that!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もう、私は夜の王なんだからその位<fix123>許してよぉ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Please, I'm queen of the night,<fix123>so at least forgive that.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おっしゃってる意味があまり……。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I don't think you're helping...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 少女綺想曲　～ Dream Battle<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Maiden's Capriccio ~ Dream Battle<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>とにかく、この場で時刻の進みを<fix123>正常に戻させる。<fix123>妖怪を退治するのが私の仕事よ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Anyway, I'm going to have you return the passage of time<fix123>to normal right here.<fix123>Exterminating youkai like you is my job!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あなたにはまだ判っていないようね。<fix123>私たちが夜を止めている理由が。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You still don't understand why<fix123>we're stopping the night yet, it seems.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>咲夜、ここは急がなくてもいいわ。<fix123>あなたが時刻を調整してくれるのなら。<fix123>私は誤解のままでもかまわない。<fix123>何時ぞやの借りを返すチャンスなの。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sakuya, there's no need to hurry here.<fix123>As long as you're adjusting the time, at least.<fix123>I don't mind her misunderstanding, either.<fix123>This is my chance to pay her back for that day.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お嬢様がそうおっしゃるのなら……。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, if you say so, Milady...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さぁ、棺桶に戻る覚悟はいい？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So, are you ready to go back to your coffin?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>棺桶は死人の入るものだって、<fix123>前に言ったじゃない。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I told you before that coffins<fix123>are for the dead, didn't I?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>紅くて冥くて窓の少ない棺桶よ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That scarlet, dark and windowless coffin!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Reimu Hakurei EXITS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>逃げたわ！そっち。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>She's fleeing! This way.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私のナイフから逃げれると思って？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Do you think you can escape from my knives?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Reimu Hakurei ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Reimu Hakurei PAUSES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>この竹林で迷わないなんて……。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How are you not getting lost in this bamboo forest...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あなたの後を追ってきたの。<fix123>逃さないわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We're just following you.<fix123>You can't escape.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さっきは、いきなり二人で驚いただけ。<fix123>もう準備は出来たわ。<fix123>あんたらを、結界のすきまに落とし込む！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I was just surprised before, since you both attacked at once.<fix123>Now, I'm ready.<fix123>Fall into the gap of my boundary!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Reimu Hakurei DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>借りは返したわ。<fix123>血は飲まないでおいてあげるから、<fix123>さっさとお帰り。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've paid you back.<fix123>I'll do you a favor and won't drink your blood,<fix123>so go on home.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うーん。<fix123>夜を止めたりして、一体何が目的なのよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Mmm.<fix123>What on earth was your goal in stopping the night?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そういう質問は、闘う前にするものよ。<fix123>今は、私たちの勝った後なので、答える必要は<fix123>無いわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You should have asked that before we fought.<fix123>We've won now, so there's no need for us<fix123>to give an answer.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>永遠の満月の復元（ボソ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...restoring the eternal full moon... (mumbling)[8]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>永遠は付かせません！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We're not restoring it for eternity!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>明日になっても夜のままだったら嫌だなぁ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm not gonna like it if it's still night tomorrow.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>咲夜、あれ。<fix123>あの屋敷……。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sakuya, look.<fix123>That mansion...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>穢き世の美しき檻<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A Pure Cage in the Filthy World<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>「穢き所に、いかでか久しくおはせん。」<fix123>そういうと閉ざされた扉は一枚残らず開き――<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>"Why have you lingered so long in such a filthy place?"<fix123>Then, all the locked doors opened, untouched——[9]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: シンデレラケージ　～ Kagome-Kagome<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Cinderella Cage ~ Kagome-Kagome<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Tewi Inaba ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Tewi Inaba DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>遅かったわね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're too late.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Reisen Udongein Inaba ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>全ての扉は封印したわ。<fix123>もう、姫は連れ出せないでしょう？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've sealed all the doors.<fix123>You can't take the princess away now, can you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方の仕業かしら？<fix123>この月の異変は。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Is this moon incident<fix123>your doing, perhaps?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>怪しい感じね。<fix123>特にその挑戦的な見た目とか。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>She looks shifty.<fix123>Especially with that defiant appearance.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>狂気の月の兎<fix123>鈴仙・Ｕ・イナバ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Lunatic Moon Rabbit<fix123>Reisen Udongein Inaba<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら、羽付きのあなた程ではないわ。<fix123>ところで、こんな夜中に何の用？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, less so than you, winged one.<fix123>At any rate, what business do you have here in the middle of this night?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それはもう凄い用よ。<fix123>この月の異変は、貴方近辺の仕業でしょう？<fix123>嫌な臭いは元から断て、ってね。<fix123>私は掃除が得意なのよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Important business.<fix123>This moon incident is because of you folks, isn't it?<fix123>They say that if there's a bad smell, clean up its source.<fix123>I'm good at cleaning.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>月の異変？<fix123>うーん、この術によく気が付いたわね。<fix123>地上に這いつくばって生きるだけの、<fix123>穢き民のくせにね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Moon incident?<fix123>Mmm, it looks like you've noticed our spell.<fix123>Even though you're just impure people<fix123>who only crawl around on the Earth.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あいにく、空に月と星しか見たことが無い<fix123>汚れた生き物なんでねぇ。<fix123>月に変化があれば嫌でもわかる。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Unfortunately for you, I'm a filthy creature<fix123>who only watches the moon and stars in the sky.<fix123>I know when the moon changes, for good or for bad.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お嬢様は夜型、ですものねぇ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're quite the night person, Milady.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さっさと地上に満月を戻すのよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Restore the full moon to Earth, right now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まだ、術を解くわけに行かないの。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There's no way we can undo this spell yet.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eirin Yagokoro ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あら、お迎えかと思ったら、<fix123>ただの迷い妖怪？<fix123>まぁ、お迎えが来れる筈が無いけど。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My, I thought they just came to pick her up,<fix123>but it's just some lost youkai?<fix123>Well, there shouldn't be anyone picking her up anyway.<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Who're you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>咲夜、悪いのはこいつよ。<fix123>一発で判ったわ、この悪党面で。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sakuya, she's the villain.<fix123>You can tell with one glance at that villainous face.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>酷い言われ様だわ。<fix123>確かに、この地上の密室は私が作ったわ。<fix123>でも、これも姫とこの娘の為。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What a cruel thing to say.<fix123>I certainly did create this sealed chamber around the Earth.<fix123>But, it was for the sake of the princess and this girl.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうと決まれば、倒さないわけには<fix123>行かないですわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If that's the case, we will have to<fix123>beat you at all costs.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うーん、でもまだ駄目。<fix123>ウドンゲ、ここはお前に任せたわ。<fix123>間違っても姫を連れ出されないようにね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Mmm, but no, not yet.<fix123>Udonge, I'll leave this to you.<fix123>Whatever you do, do not let them take our princess.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eirin Yagokoro LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>お任せください。<fix123>閉ざされた扉は一つも空かせません。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Leave it to me.<fix123>I won't let a single one of those closed doors be opened.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何事にも順路という物があるって訳ね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've found that no matter what happens, there's always a path to follow.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>面倒ね。いつもの咲夜みたいに、<fix123>道を外れて見ない？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What a pain. As usual, you're not going off<fix123>the beaten path, Sakuya?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>順路通りに進んで、尚且つ力で圧倒する。<fix123>これが文句を言わせないコツですわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Just stick to the regular path, and overwhelm the enemy.<fix123>That's the trick to avoiding complaints.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 狂気の瞳　～ Invisible Full Moon<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Lunatic Eyes ~ Invisible Full Moon<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふふふ。<fix123>順路は貴方の後ろ方向。<fix123>でも、引き返すのも出来ない。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hahaha.<fix123>The path to follow is the one behind you.<fix123>But, there's no turning back now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>引き返さないわよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We won't be turning back.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>月の兎の罠に嵌っているのに気が<fix123>付いていないのかしら？<fix123>そう、右も左も、上も下も……。<fix123>貴方はもう方向が狂って見えている。<fix123>貴方は、真っ直ぐに飛んでいるつもりでも、<fix123>フラフラに飛んでいる。<fix123>私の目を見て、もっと狂うが良いわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Don't you see that you've already fallen into<fix123>this moon rabbit's trap?<fix123>Left, right, up and down...<fix123>Your sense of direction has already gone insane.<fix123>Though you think you're flying straight ahead,<fix123>you're actually floating around aimlessly.<fix123>Now, gaze into my eyes, and become more insane still!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Reisen Udongein Inaba DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>まっすぐ進む（FinalA）<fix123><fix123>まっすぐ進まない（FinalB）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Go straight onward (Final A)<fix123><fix123>Don't go straight onward (Final B)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>If it is player's first time defeating Reisen, player has used a continue, or player chooses Final A<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>お嬢様、順路通り進みましょう。<fix123>出口はもうすぐですよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Milady, let's proceed along the regular path.<fix123>We'll be at the exit soon.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>咲夜、さっきの奴はこの先に居る。<fix123>でも、ちょっと……。<fix123>気をつけた方が良いわね。<fix123>咲夜とだから大丈夫だと思うけど。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sakuya, the one we saw before is down this way.<fix123>But, um...<fix123>We ought to be careful.<fix123>I think we'll be fine, though, since I'm with you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>師匠は私なんか比べ物にならない程強いのよ。<fix123>私に勝ったからって、師匠に敵うと<fix123>思ってるの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My master's power is beyond comparison to mine.<fix123>You may have beaten me, but do you think<fix123>you're a match for my master?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>圧倒的に。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Overwhelmingly.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さぁ、夜が明ける前には決着を<fix123>付けましょう。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now, let's finish this<fix123>before dawn comes.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうか、夜を延ばしていたのはあなた達<fix123>だったのね。<fix123>私はてっきり……。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see. So it was you two who were<fix123>lengthing the night.<fix123>I would've thought that she......<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>NEXT STAGE: Final A<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>If player chooses Final B<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>お嬢様、順路通り進みましょう。<fix123>出口はもうすぐですよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Milady, let's proceed along the regular path.<fix123>We'll be at the exit soon.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>咲夜、さっきの奴はこの先に居る。<fix123>でも、その前に。<fix123>あそこに見える扉に入るのよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sakuya, the one we saw before is down this way.<fix123>But, before that...<fix123>Let's go through that door over there.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何かあるんですか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What's over there?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、しまった。<fix123>まだ封印が間に合ってない扉があったのか。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ahh, crap.<fix123>There was a door that I didn't have time to seal yet?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あそこの先に本命が居るわ。<fix123>私の目はごまかせないわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The one we seek is down that way.<fix123>My eyes can't be deceived.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、師匠に怒られるぅ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ohh, my master will be mad at me...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>NEXT STAGE: Final B<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>姫を隠す夜空の珠<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Orb in the Night Sky, Hiding the Princess<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>永い永い廊下。この廊下は何者かが見せる狂像か。<fix123><fix123>近すぎる月の記憶は、妖怪には懐かしく、薄い物だった。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A long, long corridor. Is it a lunatic illusion being shown by someone?<fix123>To the youkai, this closer moon brought faint, nostalgic memories.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ヴォヤージュ １９６９<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Voyage 1969<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eirin Yagokoro ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ふふふ。<fix123>無事ついて来てるようね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hahaha.<fix123>Good, so you're following me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほらほら。<fix123>もう後が無いんじゃないのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, hey.<fix123>Is there no end to this?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>でも、さっきから大分進んでいるけど……。<fix123>この廊下、終わりが見えません！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We've gone so far by now, but...<fix123>I can't see an end to this corridor!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eirin Yagokoro EXITS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>廊下は終ったみたいだけど、<fix123>ここは一体……。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It looks like the corridor has ended,<fix123>but where on earth is this...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eirin Yagokoro ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>この位でいいわね。<fix123>ここまで来ても気が付かないのかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's enough.<fix123>Haven't you realized yet, after coming so far?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>しまった！<fix123>嵌められたわ、咲夜。<fix123>アレは月じゃない！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Damnit!<fix123>We fell for it, Sakuya.<fix123>That's not the moon!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>確かに、ちょっと大き過ぎますわねぇ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Certainly, it is a little on the large side.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いや、大きいのは近い所為だと思うけど。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, that's because we're closer to it, I guess.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>月の頭脳<fix123>八意 永琳<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Brain of the Moon<fix123>Eirin Yagokoro<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう、貴方達は偽物の月と永い廊下に<fix123>導かれてここまで来た。<fix123>満月は、月と地上を結ぶ唯一の鍵なの。<fix123>その鍵を壊せば、月と地上は行き来<fix123>出来なくなる。<fix123>ほら、こんな風に偽の幻影に惑わされてね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, you were led through that eternal corridor,<fix123>and came to this false moon here.<fix123>The full moon is the one key that links the moon to the earth.<fix123>If one were to break that key, travel between the moon and earth<fix123>would be impossible.<fix123>See? You've been deceived by this fake illusion, just like that.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら、幻影ですって。<fix123>さっきの無茶苦茶長い廊下も幻影かしら。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, it's an illusion.<fix123>Was that absurdly long corridor just now an illusion too?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>幻影かもね。<fix123>あんなに長いんじゃ、掃除用のモップが<fix123>持たなさそうだし。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It might've been.<fix123>No cleaning mop would stand a chance<fix123>against a corridor that long.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら、恐らくモップじゃなくて雑巾掛け<fix123>じゃないかしら。腰痛めそうね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, wouldn't you need a wet rag and not a mop?<fix123>That'd hurt your back.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そんなとこ、気にしなくてもいいじゃない。<fix123>幻影よ幻影。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's a very pointless thing to worry about, isn't it?<fix123>It's an illusion. An illusion.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それにしても、こんな大掛かりな事をして<fix123>どうしようっての？<fix123>誰も月に行こうとなんてしてないよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That aside, what's the purpose of these<fix123>convoluted things you're doing?<fix123>Nobody's trying to go to the moon.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>幻想郷の外には地上から月に向う愚か者も<fix123>居るけど……。<fix123>それより今は、月からの追手から姫を守る<fix123>事だけを考えている。<fix123>今夜はこのまま朝を迎えれば、もう<fix123>月から使者がやってこないでしょう。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There are many fools outside of Gensokyo who are heading<fix123>to the moon, though...<fix123>More importantly, my only intention right now<fix123>is to protect the princess from the moon's pursuers.<fix123>If dawn arrives, with things as they are,<fix123>no more messengers should arrive from the moon.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、さっきから兎ばっかり出てきたのは<fix123>月の兎だったのね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, so the reason there were so many rabbits back there<fix123>is because they were moon rabbits.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いや、殆どは地上で捕まえた兎。<fix123>生粋の月の兎はさっきの鈴仙だけよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, most of those were caught on Earth.<fix123>Only Reisen, who you saw just now, is a genuine moon rabbit.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どうでもいいよ。<fix123>満月を奪った奴がわかっただけで良いの。<fix123>理由なんてどうでもいい。<fix123>ここに来るまで、犯人を見つけたらどう痛み<fix123>つけてやろうか、だけを考えてきたわ。<fix123>咲夜、ここは手加減無しよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who cares?<fix123>It's fine if we just know who stole the full moon.<fix123>Their reason doesn't matter.<fix123>All we've been thinking about until now is how badly<fix123>we're gonna beat the culprit when we find them.<fix123>Sakuya, don't go easy on her.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今まで出会ってきた敵も手加減してない<fix123>ですよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I haven't gone easy on any enemies<fix123>up until now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……じゃあ、死ぬ気で。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...so, let's fight to the death.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>死にませんよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I won't die.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>随分と余裕ねぇ。<fix123>ここまで誘い出したのも、思う存分遊ぶ為。<fix123>安心していいわ。<fix123>朝になれば満月は元に戻してあげるから。<fix123>後は、朝まで遊ぶだけでいいのよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're quite composed.<fix123>I lured you out here so I could play to my heart's content.<fix123>There's no need to worry.<fix123>Once it's morning, I'll return your full moon, you see.<fix123>All that's left is to play until then.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お嬢様、良かったですわね。<fix123>勝っても負けても満月は元に戻るようで。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What a relief, Milady.<fix123>Whether we win or lose, the full moon will be restored.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何を甘い事言ってるの？<fix123>なめられたお返しをしないと、<fix123>幻想郷での威厳が保てないじゃないの。<fix123>もはや満月なんてどうでも良いの。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are you going soft?<fix123>We have to get her back for disrespecting me,<fix123>or I won't be able to keep my dignity in Gensokyo.<fix123>The full moon doesn't matter by now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふん、ガキの癖に。<fix123>貴方みたいな幼い子供が永遠の民である<fix123>私に敵うはずが無いじゃない。<fix123>貴方の積み重ねてきた紅い歴史。<fix123>私の歴史で割れば、ゼロよ。<fix123>永久からみれば貴方は須臾。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmph, what a brat.<fix123>Young children like yourself can't stand a chance<fix123>against me, an eternal being.<fix123>All the scarlet history that you've built up---<fix123>Divided by my history, the result is zero.<fix123>From eternity's point of view, you are but a mere instant.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほら、お嬢様。<fix123>年長者は敬わないといけませんよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Look, Milady.<fix123>You should respect the elderly.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あんたは一番若い。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're the youngest one here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あと、夜を止めていたのは貴方達でしょう？<fix123>そんなことして、姫の逆鱗に触れて<fix123>なければいいけど……。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Also, it was you who was stopping the night, yes?<fix123>You may very well incur the princess's<fix123>wrath for doing that...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほれ私を敬いなさい、咲夜。存分に。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So, you ought to respect me, Sakuya. As much as you like.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>話を聞いていない。<fix123>最近の若い者はこれだから困るよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>And they aren't listening.<fix123>This is why youngsters nowadays are such a bother.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 千年幻想郷　～ History of the Moon<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Gensokyo Millennium ~ History of the Moon<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方達には、話よりこの弾幕の薬の方が<fix123>必要みたいね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I think you'll find this medicinal barrage<fix123>more important than your chatter!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eirin Yagokoro DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>何遊んでるのよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What are you playing at!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kaguya Houraisan ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>永琳、私の力でもう一度だけチャンスをあげる。<fix123>これで負けたらその時は……。<fix123>そこの悪魔！<fix123>私の力で作られた薬と永琳の本当の力、<fix123><fix123>一生忘れないものになるよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Eirin, I grant you one more chance with my power.<fix123>If you lose this time...<fix123>You devils there!<fix123>With the medicine made by my power, and Eirin's true strength,<fix123><fix123>you'll never forget this as long as you live!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ヴォヤージュ １９７０<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Voyage 1970<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eirin Yagokoro REVIVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Eirin Yagokoro DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>If the imperishable night ever reaches 5:00 am<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>BAD ENDING No. 11<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>If the imperishable night ends before 5:00 am<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>NORMAL ENDING No. 7<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>五つの難題<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Five Impossible Requests<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>解決不能な五つの難題。<fix123>しかし、長い年月と幻想の力は、それらの問題を<fix123>解くのに十分だった。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There were five impossible requests that nobody could solve.<fix123>However, the long passing of years and the power of phantasm<fix123>were enough for these requests to be fulfilled.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ヴォヤージュ １９６９<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Voyage 1969<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eirin Yagokoro ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ああもう。<fix123>こっちに来させちゃ駄目だって言ってるのに。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Geez.<fix123>I told her not to let them come this way.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>咲夜。<fix123>こいつはフェイクよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sakuya.<fix123>This one's a decoy.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>では、速攻で倒させて頂きますわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well then, let's shoot her down at once.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eirin Yagokoro DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>お嬢様。<fix123>お怪我はないですか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Milady.<fix123>Are there any injuries on you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kaguya Houraisan ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>有るわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, there are.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>無いよ。<fix123>って、あんた誰？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>None at all.<fix123>---hey, who're you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>永遠と須臾の罪人<fix123>蓬莱山 輝夜<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sinner of Eternity and the Instantaneous<fix123>Kaguya Houraisan<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>鈴仙と永琳を倒してここまで来るなんて……。<fix123>怪我の一つでも負って貰わないと、割に<fix123>合わないわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Defeating Reisen and Eirin, and coming so far...<fix123>It wouldn't be fair if you didn't have at least<fix123>one injury.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あいにく、満月の夜は無敵なんでねぇ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Too bad. I'm invincible on the night of the full moon.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>初めて聞きましたわ。そんな事。<fix123>……っていつの間にか満月ですわ。<fix123>お嬢様。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>First I've heard of that.<fix123>---hey, the full moon appeared at some point,<fix123>Milady.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>判ってるから言ったんだけどね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I knew that. That's why I said it.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>これが真実の満月よ。<fix123>いつ頃だったかしら、この満月が地上から<fix123>消えたのは。<fix123>満月から人を狂わす力が失われたのは。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This is the true full moon.<fix123>I wonder when it was that this full moon<fix123>vanished from the earth,<fix123>along with its power to drive people insane.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この満月は……。<fix123>咲夜が危ない！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This full moon is...<fix123>Sakuya! Watch out!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう、直に見た人間を狂わす真実の満月。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, this true full moon will drive mad any human who looks directly at it.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いや別に何にも有りませんが？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I feel fine, though?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……咲夜は危なくなかったわね。<fix123>鍛えてあるし。<fix123>まぁ、咲夜がいなくてもこの満月下なら<fix123>無敵だけど。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...I guess you'd be okay, Sakuya.<fix123>You're very well-disciplined.<fix123>Well, even without Sakuya, I'm still<fix123>invincible under this full moon.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら、それは酷いじゃないですか。<fix123>どんな場面でも、私は力になりますよ。<fix123>頼りにしてください。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, isn't that a bit cruel?<fix123>I will help you no matter what the situation.<fix123>Please rely on me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら、咲夜、ちょっと狂い始めてない？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh my, Sakuya, are you starting to go a little insane?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>月は地上に様々な力を与えた。<fix123>魔法の様な力の殆どが、元々は月の力。<fix123>貴方のお仲間にも満月頼りの物も居るん<fix123><fix123>じゃない？そこな吸血鬼さん。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The moon granted many powers to the Earth.<fix123>Most powers such as magic were originally those of the moon.<fix123>Your companions include people who depend on the moon<fix123>as well, don't they, miss vampire?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だから何よ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So what?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>満月となった今。<fix123>無敵ってことですよ。素敵。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's a full moon right now.<fix123>That means we're invincible. Wonderful.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふふ。<fix123>我々月の民は、地上人を魔物に変えて、<fix123>地上人の穢れを調節してきた。<fix123>でも、もうそれもお終い。<fix123>地上人は自ら魔物を封印してしまった。<fix123>今の魔物は、ただのお約束として人を襲うだけ<fix123>の良く判らない生き物になってしまったわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Heh heh.<fix123>We of the moon turned some on the Earth into monsters,<fix123>to regulate the Earthlings' impurity.<fix123>But, that's all over now.<fix123>The Earthlings have sealed the monsters by themselves.<fix123>As a result, monsters these days are just nonsensical creatures who attack humans as part of some weird contract.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今の紅茶を飲む毎日の方が楽しいんだよ。<fix123>それが何が悪い。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Our current daily life of drinking tea is much more enjoyable.<fix123>I don't see what's wrong with that.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地上人は次第に月を、夜を恐れなくなった。<fix123>地上人は益々増長したわ。<fix123>月の光が必要で無くなった夜。<fix123>潮の満ち干が無関係な海岸。<fix123>終いには月にまで攻め込んだって言う<fix123>じゃない。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Gradually, the Earthlings lost their fear of the moon and its night.<fix123>They became more and more arrogant.<fix123>The night no longer requires the light of the moon.<fix123>The shorelines have no relation to the tides' ebb and flow.<fix123>And they even say they'll invade the moon itself<fix123>in the end, don't they?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふん、そんな下賎な人間の事なんて<fix123>知らんな。<fix123>大体、あんた、月の民なんだろう？<fix123>月に帰って地上人と戦えばいいじゃないか。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmph. I've got no idea what those worthless<fix123>humans are doing.<fix123>But you're from the moon, right?<fix123>Why don't you go back to the moon and fight the Earthlings there?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は……。<fix123>月には帰れない理由があるの。<fix123>それに、月の民の味方でもないわ。<fix123>地上でもおおっぴらには動けないけど。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I...<fix123>have a reason that I can't go back to the moon.<fix123>I am not an ally of the moon's people.<fix123>Nor can I move openly on the Earth.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>月には帰れない、地上でも居場所がない。<fix123>よっぽど悪い事したんでしょうね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You can't go back to the moon, and you have no place on Earth.<fix123>You must've done something quite terrible.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>地上人には迷惑をかけない様に、力のない者<fix123>には会わない様にしていたのよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've been trying to avoid bothering the Earthlings,<fix123>and avoid meeting with powerless people.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>無敵のお嬢様と無敵の人間。<fix123>私たちに力がないのか試す？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>An invincible lady and an invincible human.<fix123>Would you like to test that claim that we're powerless?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今まで、何人もの人間が敗れ去って<fix123>いった五つの問題。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My five requests that so many humans<fix123>in the past have failed to complete...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 竹取飛翔　～ Lunatic Princess<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Flight of the Bamboo Cutter ~ Lunatic Princess<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この難題をクリア出来るのかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I wonder if you can clear them?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kaguya Houraisan DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>なんて事！<fix123>そう、夜を止めていたのは……、<fix123>貴方達だったのね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What the!?<fix123>I see. The ones who are stopping the night...<fix123>It's you two, isn't it.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ヴォヤージュ1970<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Voyage 1970<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kaguya Houraisan REVIVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>貴方達が作った半端な永遠の夜なんて……<fix123>私の永遠を操る術で全て破って見せる。<fix123>夜明けはすぐそこにあるはずよ。<fix123>どう？<fix123>これで永夜の術は破れて、夜は明ける！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This half-finished eternal night that you have made...<fix123>With my spell to manipulate eternity, I'll tear it all away.<fix123>The dawn shall be upon us soon.<fix123>How's that?<fix123>With this, your spell of eternal night shall be broken, and the dawn shall come!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kaguya Houraisan DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>If player runs out of lives during this stage<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>BAD ENDING No. 11<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Otherwise<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>GOOD ENDING No. 3<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>蛍火の行方<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Where the Fireflies Fly<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>蛍の灯りはいつもより激しく見えたのは気の所為か。<fix123>今宵は永い夜になるだろう。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are the fireflies brighter than usual, or is it just your imagination?<fix123>Tonight will be a long night.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 幻視の夜　～ Ghostly Eyes<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Illusionary Night ~ Ghostly Eyes<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、月が綺麗だな。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, the moon sure is beautiful tonight.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>えっ、あんたにはそう見えるの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What? Does it seriously look like that to you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふん、綺麗じゃないか。<fix123>こういう月ってなんていったっけ？待宵？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmph. It's beautiful, isn't it?<fix123>What do ya call a moon like this? The matsuyoi? [1]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>呑気で良いわね。<fix123><fix123>月見が楽しめて、人手が足りてたら……<fix123>あんたなんか絶対に連れ出さないわよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I envy your carefree manner. <fix123><fix123>If I could have enjoyed moon watching, and hadn't been short of hands...<fix123>I'd never have taken you with me tonight.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>月の見える夜は楽しまないと駄目じゃない。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's a waste not to enjoy a moonlit night, isn't it?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Wriggle Nightbug ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>闇に蠢く光の蟲<fix123>リグル・ナイトバグ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A Bug of Light Wriggling in the Dark<fix123>Wriggle Nightbug<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ねぇ。お二方。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Right? You two?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>楽しんでるぜ。私はな。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Totally enjoying it. 'Least, I am.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら、私も楽しんでるわよ。<fix123><fix123>魔理沙、あなた以上はね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I'm enjoying myself, too!<fix123><fix123>At least more than you, Marisa.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さっきといってる事が違うじゃん。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Didn't you just say something completely different?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>違うの。<fix123>私が楽しんでるのは月見じゃなくて、<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Of course not.<fix123>I'm not enjoying the moon-watching, but the--<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>蛍見、だろう？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Firefly-watching, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>惜しいわね。あなたにしては。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Almost, but not quite. Very perceptive of you, though.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……来ないのなら私から行くよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...If you don't come, I will!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>蛍狩よ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's more like firefly-HUNTING.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 蠢々秋月　～ Mooned Insect<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Wriggling Autumn Moon ~ Mooned Insect<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Wriggle Nightbug DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>蛍狩って蛍を捕まえる事であって、<fix123>やっつける事じゃないぜ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You realize firefly-hunting is about <fix123>catching them, not beating them up, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は捕まえる気だったのに、あんたが<fix123>潰したんでしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I wanted to catch it, but you went and<fix123>squished it!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ったく、やれやれだぜ……<fix123>私は蛍を避けただけだ。勘違いするな。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Geez, what a pain...[2]<fix123>Don't get me wrong—— all I did was dodge it.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間の消える道<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Path Where Humans Vanish<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間の通り道も、真夜中に出歩くものは獣か妖怪位。<fix123>少なくとも人の姿が見える筈も無い。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Beasts and youkai are what stroll at midnight, even on the humans' roads.<fix123>There shouldn't be a human form in sight, at the least.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 夜雀の歌声　～ Night Bird<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Song of the Night Sparrow ~ Night Bird<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mystia Lorelei ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Mystia Lorelei PAUSES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ちょ、ちょっと待って～！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wait, waaaait!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あー？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>夜雀の怪<fix123>ミスティア・ローレライ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Night Sparrow Apparition<fix123>Mystia Lorelei<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>こんな夜中に何処に行こうっての？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Where are you going this late at night?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>毎年恒例の妖怪退治強化月間だ。<fix123><fix123>妖怪の居る所なら何処にでも出かけるぜ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's my annual Youkai Extermination Month.[3]<fix123>I'll go wherever youkai live.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それは何？<fix123>私に喧嘩を売ってるの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wait, what?<fix123>Are you picking a fight with me?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>魔理沙が妖怪退治なんて滑稽だわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Marisa is just a type of person who exterminates youkai repeatedly.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おお？<fix123>私の妖怪退治の腕を知らないのか？<fix123>私が魔砲を放った後には、妖怪どころか<fix123>人間も残らない。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh?<fix123>Don't you know how awesome I am at that?<fix123>After I've fired my magicannon, there are no humans left,<fix123>let alone youkai.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そこの人間。<fix123>私の事、知らないのかしら。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You, human...<fix123>Don't you have any idea who I am?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あー？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Huh?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>夜の道で私を恐れない人間はいないわ。<fix123>その気になれば、人間なんか全滅する<fix123>位の多くの妖怪も呼べるわよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There's no human that doesn't fear me on night roads.<fix123>If I wanted, I could call enough youkai here to eradicate<fix123>every human in this land.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……ふん、この夜雀風情が何を言うの。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...hmph. What does this night sparrow think she's saying?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はっはっは～<fix123>この私が誰だか知らないと見える。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hahaha~<fix123>Looks like you still don't get who I am.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間でしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Human?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Human.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間三昧。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Human all the way.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いやまぁ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Er, well.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いい？<fix123>お前達は今夜から……<fix123>夜は目が見えなくなるよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>All right?<fix123>Starting tonight, you two...<fix123>Will never again see in the dark.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: もう歌しか聞こえない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Deaf to All but the Song<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mystia Lorelei DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あー良く見える。<fix123>どんな暗闇もばっちりだぜ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, I can see clearly.<fix123>I can do just fine in any darkness.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああもう！<fix123>こんな雑魚にかまってないで先急ぐわよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>For goodness' sake!<fix123>We've got no time to waste on such small fry!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それはそうと何処向ってるんだよ。<fix123>そっちに敵が居るわけ無いだろ……<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But where are we heading, anyway?<fix123>There's no way there are any enemies in that direction.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>でも、あっちの方から妖気を感じるのよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I feel a strange air from over this way, though.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そっちは人間しかいないぜ。<fix123>私の様に善良な。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There's only humans over that way.<fix123>All innocent, much like m'self.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>歴史喰いの懐郷<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Memories of the History-Eater's Home<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>一本道の先には人間達が住む小さな里がある。<fix123>だが里があるはずの場所には、何も、無かった。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>At the end of a straight road, there was a small village where humans lived.<fix123>However, in the place where the village should have been, there was nothing at all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 懐かしき東方の血　～ Old World<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Nostalgic Blood of the East ~ Old World<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Keine Kamishirasawa ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>お前達か。<fix123>こんな真夜中に里を襲おうとする奴は。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Is it you?<fix123>Are you the ones trying to attack the village in the middle of this night?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うにゃ。<fix123>通りがかっただけだ。気にするな。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Nahhh.<fix123>We're just passing by. Don't mind us.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふん、妖怪の言う事なんか信用できないな。<fix123>今夜を無かった事にしてやる！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmph, I won't trust the words of a youkai.<fix123>I'll make this night never have happened!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Keine Kamishirasawa PAUSES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>お前達何もんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What the heck are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おっとそこは、<fix123>やんごとなき事情を思い出した、だろ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>By that you mean,<fix123>"Whoops, I gotta be somewhere else," right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Keine Kamishirasawa LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Keine Kamishirasawa ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>流石にこれ以上は下がれないな。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Naturally, I can't retreat any further.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さぁ、人間を明け渡して貰おうか。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now, are you gonna surrender the humans to us?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ちょっとちょっと魔理沙！<fix123>誰が、人間をとって喰おうって言ったのよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wait, wait, Marisa!<fix123>Who said we were gonna eat the humans?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>知識と歴史の半獣<fix123>上白沢 慧音<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Half Beast of Knowledge and History<fix123>Keine Kamishirasawa<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふん。<fix123>こんな里まで妖怪が来るようになるなんて。<fix123>やはり異常な月の所為か。<fix123>今まで、滅多に来る事は無かったんだがな。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmph.<fix123>To think that youkai would come as far as this village.<fix123>Is it because of that abnormal moon, after all?<fix123>They've only come here rarely before.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>誰も人間をとって喰うなんて言ってないぜ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Nobody's saying we're gonna eat them.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>とにかく。<fix123>私は急いでるの！<fix123>あんたが誰だか知らないけど、人間なんか<fix123>にかまっている暇は無いのよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Anyway.<fix123>I'm in a real hurry!<fix123>I don't know who you are, but we don't<fix123>have time to waste for any humans.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>酷いぜ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're mean.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>大人しく通り過ぎてくれるなら、<fix123>私も何もしまい。<fix123>だが、お前達は少々騒々し過ぎる。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If you were just quietly passing by,<fix123>I wouldn't try to stop you.<fix123>But you two are being just a little too noisy.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほら騒々しいって、魔理沙。<fix123>真夜中だというのに、<fix123>あんたが思いっきり魔法を使うからよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>See, she called you noisy, Marisa.<fix123>That's because you're going all-out with your magic<fix123>even though it's the dead of night.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何言ってるんだ？<fix123>魔法は真夜中に思いっきり使うもんだぜ？<fix123>太陽の下で人知れずこっそりと使うのは、<fix123><fix123>日光写真ぐらいなもんだ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What are you sayin'?<fix123>Magic's something you've gotta cut loose with at night, y'know?<fix123>The only things worth using secretly in the day<fix123>are cyanotypes and stuff like that.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なにやら不穏な空気が漂っていたので<fix123>里を遮断したが……<fix123>どうやら正解のようだな。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I felt an unpleasant feeling approaching,<fix123>so I sealed the village...<fix123>Seems I was right to do that.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だからー。<fix123>誰も人間を襲うなんていってない。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I TOLD you.<fix123>Nobody's saying we're gonna attack the humans.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（……明け渡せとか言ってなかったっけ？）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(...Didn't you just say "surrender the humans to us"?)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>むしろ目の前の人間に用事があるのだ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Really, the only human I'm concerned with is you!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何でもいいよ、この与太郎が。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Whatever you say, you dirty liar.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: プレインエイジア<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Plain Asia<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>里の人間にも里の歴史にも弾幕一本<fix123>触れさせる物か！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I won't let a single one of your danmaku<fix123>touch the humans or history of this village!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>魔理沙！<fix123>分かっていないと思うけど、<fix123>こいつは人間じゃないわ。<fix123>半獣よ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Marisa!<fix123>I'm quite sure you haven't noticed yet,<fix123>but she isn't human.<fix123>She's a half-beast.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Keine Kamishirasawa DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>満月が無くて変身出来ない半獣なんて、<fix123><fix123>ただの人間だな。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A half-beast that can't transform without the full moon<fix123>is just some human, really.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あんたもただの人間でしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You know you're a human too, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>満月さえあればこんな奴には……。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If only it'd been a full moon tonight, I could've...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうそう。<fix123>私たちは満月を取り戻そうとしているのよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, yeah.<fix123>We're trying to restore that full moon.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうだ。<fix123>最初から言ってただろ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yeah.<fix123>We said that to begin with, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あー？<fix123>何だよそれ。聞いてない。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ahh?<fix123>What the? I never heard that.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あんたなら誰の仕業か知っていそうね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It seems to me like you know who's responsible for this.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さぁ、私が勝ったんだから、約束通り<fix123>教えて貰おうか。<fix123>約束は今作ったが。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now, since I've won, you'll keep your promise<fix123>and tell us who it is.<fix123>The promise being one we made just now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>伝説の夢の国<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Legendary Dreamland<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>月明かりの竹の国は、夢の様に不気味に見えた。<fix123>今にも竹が、妖しく輝きだしそうである。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The land of bamboo under the moonlight looked as eerie as a dream.<fix123>The bamboo looked as if it would start glowing strangely at any moment.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 永夜の報い　～ Imperishable Night<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Retribution for the Eternal Night ~ Imperishable Night<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ちょっと待て！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Freeze!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Reimu Hakurei ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>何だ、何時までも夜が明けないから<fix123>おかしいと思ったら、<fix123>魔理沙の仕業ね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Just as I thought that it was strange<fix123>that the night still hadn't ended...<fix123>So it was you, Marisa.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おい、誤解だ。<fix123>悪いのはこいつ一人だぜ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oi, you've got it wrong.<fix123>The only bad one is this person here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何よ。<fix123>あんたも同罪でしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What!?<fix123>You're guilty of the same thing, aren't you, Marisa?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>楽園の素敵な巫女<fix123>博麗 霊夢<fix123><fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wonderful Shrine Maiden of Paradise<fix123>Reimu Hakurei<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>こんな事して……、<fix123>一体何を企んでるのよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Doing something like this...<fix123>What on earth are you two plotting?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あれだな、ほら。<fix123>霊夢、なんと言うか……。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's, um, y'see.<fix123>Reimu, how do I put this...?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>歯切れが悪いわね。<fix123>いつもみたいに言えばいいじゃない。<fix123>邪魔だ、そこをどけ！<fix123>ってね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Why the stuttering?<fix123>Just yell at her like you always do.<fix123>"You! Get outta my way!"<fix123>Like that.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>馬鹿！<fix123>こいつを怒らせると不味いぜ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Moron!<fix123>It'll get ugly if she gets mad.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私を怒らせる事自体が不味い事でしょ？<fix123>今日はちょっと懲らしめてやらないと<fix123>いけないわね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Making me mad to begin with is what's ugly, right?<fix123>I'll definitely have to teach you<fix123>a bit of a lesson tonight.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふん。<fix123>あんた、後ろ見てもなんとも思わないの？<fix123>もう、歪な月もこんなに判り易く<fix123>なってるじゃない！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmph.<fix123>Will you still think nothing's wrong when you look behind you?[4]<fix123>The distorted moon is already that obvious,<fix123>isn't it!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ！<fix123>この月も、あんたらの仕業ね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ahh!<fix123>This moon is your doing too, huh?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 少女綺想曲　～ Dream Battle<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Maiden's Capriccio ~ Dream Battle<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、もういいぜ。諦めたよ。<fix123>そうだ。<fix123>この終らない夜も、欠けて歪な月も、<fix123>消えた人間の里も、<fix123>お地蔵さんに傘かぶせて廻ったのも、<fix123>全てはアリスがやった。<fix123>さぁ、そこをどきな！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Okay, fine. I give up.<fix123>You're right.<fix123>The endless night, that broken, warped moon,<fix123>hiding the human village,<fix123>and putting hats on the stone statues; [5]<fix123>all of it was Alice's fault.<fix123>Now, get outta my way!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まぁいいけどね。<fix123>月の光を蓄えたこの竹林で、<fix123>あんたらは、光る竹の一つになる。<fix123><fix123>美しいわね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, all right.<fix123>In this bamboo forest bathed in moonlight,<fix123>you two will become one of the shining bamboo trees.<fix123>How beautiful.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>その言葉、ちょっと屈折させて<fix123>お返ししますわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Allow me to return those words,<fix123>albeit a bit differently.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さぁ！<fix123>終らない夜は、ここでお終いよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>C'mon!<fix123>This endless night will end right here!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Reimu Hakurei EXITS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あれ？<fix123>逃げるなんてあいつらしくないな。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh?<fix123>It's not like her to retreat.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>追うわよ。魔理沙。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Chase her down, Marisa.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Reimu Hakurei ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Reimu Hakurei PAUSES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>さぁ、あんたらに、本当の結界を<fix123><fix123>見せてあげるわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now, I'll show you two<fix123>my true boundary.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何で仕切りなおす必要があったんだよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What's the point of squaring off with us again?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そっちが二人だから二回！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There's two of you, so I get two tries!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Reimu Hakurei DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>さぁ急ぐぜ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A'ight, let's get moving.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>目的地が見えてきたわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Our destination is now in sight.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>仕様が無いわね。<fix123>悪巧みも程ほどにするのよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, there's not much I can do.<fix123>Don't take your evil plotting too far.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんか言った？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Did you say something?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>へぇ。竹林の中にこんな大きな屋敷がある<fix123>なんて、初めて知ったぜ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Man. I never knew there was such a big mansion<fix123>in the bamboo forest.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あー？<fix123>私も初めて見たわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Eh?<fix123>Oh, me neither.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>じゃぁね。<fix123>良い子と負け犬はここでお帰りね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Bye bye, now.<fix123>It's time for the good girl and loser to go home.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>霊夢、永遠の一回休みだ。<fix123>じゃぁな。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Reimu, it's an eternal 'skip one turn' for you.<fix123>See ya later.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>穢き世の美しき檻<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A Pure Cage in the Filthy World<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>「穢き所に、いかでか久しくおはせん。」<fix123>そういうと閉ざされた扉は一枚残らず開き――<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>"Why have you lingered so long in such a filthy place?"<fix123>Then, all the locked doors opened, untouched——[6]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: シンデレラケージ　～ Kagome-Kagome<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Cinderella Cage ~ Kagome-Kagome<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Tewi Inaba ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Tewi Inaba DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>遅かったわね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're too late.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Reisen Udongein Inaba ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>全ての扉は封印したわ。<fix123>もう、姫は連れ出せないでしょう？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've sealed all the doors.<fix123>You can't take the princess away now, can you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おう。<fix123>長くて暗い廊下だったな、アリスよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Whoa.<fix123>That corridor was so long and dark, Alice.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>取り敢えず、相手にしてやったら？<fix123>目の前の奴。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How about we deal with her, to begin with?<fix123>That one in front of us.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>狂気の月の兎<fix123>鈴仙・Ｕ・イナバ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Lunatic Moon Rabbit<fix123>Reisen Udongein Inaba<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>って、何？<fix123>あんた達……、地上の人じゃないの。<fix123>こんな夜中に何の用？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, what?<fix123>You two are... people of the earth, aren't you?<fix123>What are you up to at this time of night?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>こんだけ長ければ、いくら掃除の達人でも<fix123>一日が雑巾掛けだけで終るな。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It'd take an entire day of wiping to clean a hall that long,<fix123>no matter how good a janitor you were.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>魔理沙の家の掃除よりは、時間も手間も<fix123>少なくて済むと思うけど。<fix123>って、いい加減相手にしてやったら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I think it'd still be much faster and easier<fix123>than cleaning your house, Marisa.<fix123>--okay, now, come on. Let's deal with her, hm?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もう、変なのが紛れ込んできたわね。<fix123>うちは今忙しいの。<fix123>こそ泥以外の用が無いならさっさと帰る。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Looks like some weirdos have already snuck in.<fix123>We're busy right now.<fix123>If you have no business other than burglary, leave now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>真夜中に忙しい奴なんてのは、まっとうな<fix123>生き方してない奴だけだ。<fix123>なぁ同業者よ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The only ones who'd be busy at this time of night<fix123>are the ones who aren't living honestly.<fix123>Right, you colleagues?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>魔理沙が本題を言わないなら、私が言うわ。<fix123>歪な月の異変は、あなたかその仲間の<fix123>仕業でしょう？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Since Marisa will never get to the point, I will.<fix123>You or your cohorts are responsible<fix123>for this warped-moon incident, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Indeed.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さぁ、大人しく元に戻すか、<fix123>一悶着あった後に元に戻すか、<fix123>どっちかを選びな！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So, will you return the moon quietly now,<fix123>or return it after we give you some trouble?<fix123>Take your pick!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>美味しい所だけ持っていかないの。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, don't just take all my cool lines.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eirin Yagokoro ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あの月は、まだ戻す訳にはいかないわ。<fix123>こうしている間にも、月の民との関係は<fix123>悪くなりつつあるの。<fix123>もうこのまま、地上を大きな密室にする<fix123>しか姫を逃す道は無い。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There's no way we can return that moon yet.<fix123>Even as we speak, our relations with the Moon's people<fix123>are worsening still.<fix123>At this rate, there is no way for our princess to escape<fix123>other than by making the Earth into a huge sealed chamber.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ？何もんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What? Who're you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>魔理沙、危ないわ。<fix123>こいつの力は今まで感じた事が無い……。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Marisa, watch out.<fix123>That person's power isn't like anything I've felt before...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あなた達は古代の力のコピーを使用して<fix123>いるみたいね。<fix123>まだ人間が居なかった時代の無秩序な力。<fix123>あの頃が懐かしいわ。<fix123>能力にも特許を認めるべきかしら。<fix123>まぁ取り敢えず、<fix123>ウドンゲ、ここはお前に任せたわ。<fix123>間違っても姫を連れ出されないようにね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It looks like the two of you are using a copy<fix123>of an ancient power.<fix123>A chaotic power, from the time before humans were around.<fix123>Those were the days.<fix123>I wonder if special powers should be patentable.<fix123>Well, before anything else--<fix123>Udonge, I'll leave this to you.<fix123>Whatever you do, do not let them take our princess.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eirin Yagokoro LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>お任せください。<fix123>閉ざされた扉は一つも空かせません。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Leave it to me.<fix123>I won't let a single one of those closed doors be opened.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんだぁ？　ベラベラ喋るだけ喋って<fix123>逃げるなんてなぁ、<fix123>後で倒しに来てくれ、<fix123>って言ってる様なもんだぜ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Whaaat? Chattering away like that,<fix123>and then just running away...<fix123>It's like she's saying,<fix123>"hey, come beat me up later".<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう言ってたのよ。<fix123>でも、後で倒しに行くかどうかは、<fix123>異変の犯人かどうかで決まるの。<fix123>それを忘れちゃ朝になってしまうわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>She certainly is.<fix123>But whether or not we do that depends on...<fix123>...whether she's the culprit behind this incident or not.<fix123>If we forget about that, it'll be morning.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あんたら、私を無視しすぎ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You two are ignoring me too much.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 狂気の瞳　～ Invisible Full Moon<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Lunatic Eyes ~ Invisible Full Moon<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いい？<fix123>この廊下、催眠廊下は私の罠の一つ。<fix123>真っ直ぐに飛べないお前達は、<fix123>私の力で跡形も無く消え去るのよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You see?<fix123>This hypnotic corridor is one of my traps.<fix123>Since you two can't fly straight,<fix123>you'll be completely wiped away by my power!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それは魔理沙の台詞。<fix123>光の魔砲で跡形も無く消え去るがいいわ、<fix123>このぺんぺん草。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That should be Marisa's line.<fix123>You'll be completely wiped away by her magicannon,<fix123>you hogweed.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>美味しい所持っていくなよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, don't take my cool lines.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>その台詞、月の兎である私の目を見ても、<fix123>まだ吐けるのかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I wonder if you'll still be able to say that<fix123>after gazing into the eyes of this lunar rabbit?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Reisen Udongein Inaba DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>さっきのを撃ちに行く（FinalA）<fix123><fix123>あたりかまわず撃ちに行く（FinalB）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Go blow up that one from before (Final A)<fix123><fix123>Go blow up everything in sight (Final B)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>If it is player's first time defeating Reisen, player has used a continue, or player chooses Final A<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>月は元に戻ったのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Did the moon return to normal?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いや、こいつじゃないわね。<fix123>やっぱりさっきの……。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, she wasn't the one.<fix123>It must've been that other one...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私に勝ったからって、師匠に敵うと<fix123>思ってるの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I may have lost, but do you really think<fix123>you can oppose my master?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>負けるはずが無いわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There's no way we'll lose.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんだか、貧弱そうだったしな。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>She looked pretty dinky to me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今回は、力では私の負けを認めるけど……。<fix123>師匠は、月面一の頭脳の持ち主。<fix123>あんたらみたいな馬鹿共なんか勝負に<fix123>なるはずがないわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'll admit I wasn't strong enough this time...<fix123>But my master has the greatest brain of anyone on the entire moon.<fix123>There's no way she'd ever lose<fix123>to fools like the two of you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あー？弾幕に頭脳？<fix123>馬鹿じゃないのか？弾幕はパワーだよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wha? Using your brain for danmaku?<fix123>Are you dumb or something? Danmaku's all about power.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そういうこと言うから馬鹿扱いされるのよ。<fix123>弾幕はブレイン。常識よ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Comments like that are why people think you're dumb.<fix123>Danmaku is all about brains. It's just common sense.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>NEXT STAGE: Final A<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>If player chooses Final B<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>月は元に戻ったのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Did the moon return to normal?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いや、こいつじゃないわね。<fix123>ほら、あそこ……。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, she wasn't the one.<fix123>Hey, check that out...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>判ってるぜ。あの扉だけ少し開いている。<fix123>あんなに強い妖気は初めてだ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I get you. That door's open a little bit.<fix123>The strange air in there is the strongest I've ever felt.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、そこは。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ahh, that's--<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>火薬庫かしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Where they keep the gunpowder?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>火薬庫だな。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Where they keep the gunpowder.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それは行くしかないわね。<fix123>異変の元凶の火薬庫なら。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Nowhere else for us to go, then.<fix123>Since it's the gunpowder of the one who caused this incident.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうだな。<fix123>そこに行けば全てが解決する火薬庫だし。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Right you are.<fix123>Once we head over there, that gunpowder will solve everything.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、師匠に怒られるぅ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Aww, my master's going to get mad at me...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>NEXT STAGE: Final B<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>姫を隠す夜空の珠<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Orb in the Night Sky, Hiding the Princess<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>永い永い廊下。この廊下は何者かが見せる狂像か。<fix123><fix123>近すぎる月の記憶は、妖怪には懐かしく、薄い物だった。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A long, long corridor. Is it a lunatic illusion being shown by someone?<fix123>To the youkai, this closer moon brought faint, nostalgic memories.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ヴォヤージュ１９６９<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Voyage 1969<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eirin Yagokoro ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ふふふ。<fix123>無事ついて来てるようね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hahaha.<fix123>Good, so you're following me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>魔理沙！<fix123>こいつを撃つのよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Marisa!<fix123>Shoot her!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>んなもん、言われなくても判ってるぜ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yeesh, you don't hafta tell me twice.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eirin Yagokoro LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>何度も出てきたり逃げたりしていたようだが、<fix123>それは焦りか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You just keep poppin' out and runnin' off again.<fix123>Impatient, aren't you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eirin Yagokoro ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>焦り？<fix123>貴方達は愚かねぇ。<fix123>ここまで誘導されてきた事にも<fix123>気が付かないのかしら。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Impatient?<fix123>My, aren't you two stupid.<fix123>Have you still not realized<fix123>how far I've led you astray?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>魔理沙、周りを見て！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Marisa, look around!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>見てるって。<fix123>何時の間にか外だな。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm lookin'.<fix123>We wound up outside at some point.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>月の頭脳<fix123>八意 永琳<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Brain of the Moon<fix123>Eirin Yagokoro<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう、外よ。<fix123>貴方達は永い廊下に導かれてここまで来た。<fix123>どう？<fix123>外の空気は。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, the outside.<fix123>You were led through that eternal corridor, and came here.<fix123>So,<fix123>how's the air outside?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>というか、空気はあるんだな。<fix123>地上の外も。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Which is to say, there IS air outside.<fix123>Outside the Earth.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>魔理沙！おかしいわよ。<fix123>この月も星も……。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Marisa! This is strange.<fix123>That moon, and those stars...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さっきから、魔理沙魔理沙うるさいなぁ。<fix123>結局人が居なきゃ何も出来ないのかよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You've just been saying "Marisa! Marisa!" for a while now.<fix123>Can't you do anything by yourself?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふふふ。<fix123>こうやって、月に向う人間を偽の月に繋ぐ。<fix123>月と地上を結ぶ道は、私の手によって<fix123>切られたわ。<fix123>これで、地上人は月に辿り着けない。<fix123>そして月の民は、姫を探し出せない。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hahaha.<fix123>And thus, the humans who depart for the moon are led to this false moon.<fix123>The passage between the Earth and the moon<fix123>has been severed, by my hand.<fix123>With this, you Earthlings will never reach the moon.<fix123>And the people of the moon will never find the princess.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>姫？<fix123>そうか、お前達は月の民か。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Princess?<fix123>Oh, so you're moon people?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんでそう思うの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What makes you think that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>狂ってる奴は大抵、月が原因だ。<fix123>深い意味は無いぜ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>When people go crazy, it's usually because of the moon.<fix123>That's all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう、姫も私も鈴仙も月の生まれよ。<fix123>でも、もう帰らない事にしたわ。<fix123>ずっと昔にね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The princess, myself and Reisen certainly came from the moon.<fix123>But, we can't go back there now.<fix123>Not since a long time ago.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>別にあんたらが帰ろうがどうだろうが<fix123>関係無いがな。<fix123>月の民は、月を見て楽しむ民の事を<fix123>考えているのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It doesn't really matter to us<fix123>whether you go back or not.<fix123>Haven't you moon people considered those<fix123>who like looking at the moon?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そんなもの……。<fix123>地上人も見てるだけなら問題<fix123>なかったのに……。<fix123>わざわざ月にまで来ようとしたり、<fix123>挙句の果てに、<fix123>旗を立てて、自分の物だ、みたいに<fix123>いう愚かな地上人が出てくる。<fix123>そんなだから何時まで経っても、<fix123>地上人は下賎なのよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, about that...<fix123>If the Earth's people only looked at it,<fix123>there would be no problem, but...<fix123>There were also foolish Earthlings who deliberately came<fix123>all the way to the moon,<fix123>and in the end, stuck a flag on it<fix123>as if it were their own.[7]<fix123>That's why Earthlings have always been, are now,<fix123>and will forever be inferior.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふん。<fix123>私達はそんな真似はしてないわ。<fix123>地上に満月が無いと困る民も居る。<fix123>そんな地上であなたが満月を隠せば、<fix123>それなりの報復を受ける事も考えているの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmph.<fix123>We never did such a thing.<fix123>There are people on Earth who'll suffer without the full moon's presence, too.<fix123>Didn't you think they'd retaliate<fix123>if you stole the full moon from that Earth?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、いいのよ。<fix123>術はもう済んだから。<fix123>朝になれば満月は返してあげる。<fix123>といっても、元々私達のものだけどね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, that's fine.<fix123>My spell is already complete, you see.<fix123>Once morning comes, we'll give you back your full moon.<fix123>Of course, it's always really been ours, anyway.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうかい。<fix123>じゃぁ、残りは今まで隠していた分の<fix123>報復だけ、という事だな。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, a'ight.<fix123>So, that means all that's left is the retaliation you get<fix123>for having hidden it up until now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうね。<fix123>どの位痛みつければ良いのかしらね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yeah.<fix123>Now, how badly should we beat her up?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あらあら、痛いのは嫌だわ。<fix123>あいにく、私は薬学の心得があるから、<fix123><fix123>多少の怪我なら大丈夫だけど。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My, my, I don't want to be hurt.<fix123>Unfortunately for you, though I happen to know a bit<fix123>about medicine, so some minor injuries won't be a problem.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それは有難い事で。<fix123>私達の滋養回復でもお願いするか。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's pretty convenient.<fix123>Can we ask you to fix up our nutrition as well?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 千年幻想郷　～ History of the Moon<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Gensokyo Millennium ~ History of the Moon<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それにね、薬は攻撃にも使えるのよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>And, by the way, medicine can be used to attack, too!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eirin Yagokoro DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>何遊んでるのよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What are you doing!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kaguya Houraisan ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>永琳、私の力でもう一度だけチャンスをあげる。<fix123>これで負けたらその時は……。<fix123>そこの野良猫！<fix123>私の力で作られた薬と永琳の本当の力、<fix123><fix123>一生忘れないものになるよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Eirin, I grant you one more chance with my power.<fix123>If you lose this time...<fix123>You there, you stray cats!<fix123>With the medicine made by my power, and Eirin's true strength,<fix123><fix123>you'll never forget this as long as you live!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ヴォヤージュ1970<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Voyage 1970<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eirin Yagokoro REVIVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Eirin Yagokoro DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>If the imperishable night ever reaches 5:00 am<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>BAD ENDING No. 10<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>If the imperishable night ends before 5:00 am<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>NORMAL ENDING No. 6<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>五つの難題<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Five Impossible Requests<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>解決不能な五つの難題。<fix123><fix123>しかし、長い年月と幻想の力は、それらの問題を<fix123><fix123>解くのに十分だった。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There were five impossible requests that nobody could solve.<fix123>However, the long passing of years and the power of phantasm<fix123>were enough for these requests to be fulfilled.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ヴォヤージュ1969<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Voyage 1969<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eirin Yagokoro ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ああもう。<fix123>こっちに来させちゃ駄目だって言ってるのに。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Geez.<fix123>I told her not to let them come this way.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんだか知らんが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wha? I didn't know that.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>良い方に向かっている感じね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Feels like we're headed in the right direction.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eirin Yagokoro DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>満月だな。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, it's the full moon.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kaguya Houraisan ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>そう、ただの満月よ。<fix123>貴方達が何百年も何千年も見てきた<fix123>本物の魔力。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, it's quite simply the full moon.<fix123>A true magic power that you've all gazed at<fix123>for hundreds, no, thousands of years.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>魔理沙、あの満月は危ないわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Marisa, that full moon is dangerous.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>満月が危ない？<fix123>なに寝ぼけた事言ってるんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The moon's dangerous?<fix123>Are ya half-asleep, sayin' that?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あなたには見えないかも知れないけど……<fix123>いま、大量に満月光線が降り注いでいるわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Perhaps you can't see them yourself, but...<fix123>There are a ridiculous number of full-moon-beams falling on us now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>変な名前をつけないの！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Don't call it weird names!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>永遠と須臾の罪人<fix123>蓬莱山 輝夜<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sinner of Eternity and the Instantaneous<fix123>Kaguya Houraisan<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今は、月本来の力が甦っているの。<fix123>穢れのない月は、穢れのない地上を妖しく<fix123>照らす。<fix123>この光は貴き月の民ですら忘れた<fix123>太古の記憶なのよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now, the original power of the moon has been revived.<fix123>This moon with no impurity throws its pale light<fix123>upon an Earth with no impurity...<fix123>This light is an ancient memory, forgotten even<fix123>by the superior people of the moon.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>つまり満月光線だな。<fix123>見えないがびしびしと感じるぜ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>In short, they're full-moon-beams.<fix123>I can't see them, but I can feel them slappin' down on me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>これじゃぁ、普通の人間は５分と持たず<fix123>発狂するわ。<fix123>魔理沙は大丈夫かしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>At this rate, ordinary humans would go insane<fix123>in less than 5 minutes.<fix123>Are you okay, Marisa?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、狂うのには慣れているぜ。<fix123>でも、これはどういうことなんだ？<fix123>なんで今、満月なんだ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, I'm used to being insane.<fix123>But what's up with all this, anyhow?<fix123>Why's there a full moon now?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>永琳の術で穢れのない月と穢れのない地上は<fix123>隔離された。<fix123>私はここにいる事で、地上からも月からも<fix123>身を隠す事が出来る様になったわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Thanks to Eirin's spell, the pure moon and the pure Earth<fix123>have been isolated.<fix123>By staying here, it seems I can hide myself<fix123>from both the Earth and the moon.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>大げさなかくれんぼだな。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's some pretty huge hide-and-seek.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>でもね。<fix123>永琳のこの術は完全だけど、あまり<fix123>好きじゃないわ。<fix123>ここには誰も居ない。<fix123>誰も訪れない。<fix123>退屈過ぎて死にそうだわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But...<fix123>While this spell of Eirin's is perfect,<fix123>I don't really like it.<fix123>There's nobody else here.<fix123>Nobody visits, either.<fix123>I'm bored to death.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>穢れのない地上には誰もいない。<fix123>月人らしいものの見方ね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>An Earth with no impurity has nobody on it.<fix123>That's a very Lunarian-esque mentality.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>丁度良いじゃないか。<fix123>穢い私達がたっぷり遊んで、それから<fix123><fix123>連れ出してやるよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Isn't this good timing?<fix123>You can play with this impure pair here as much as<fix123>ya want, and then we'll take you away.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まぁ、私はここの生まれじゃないから、<fix123>私を連れ出すのは本当に大変な事よ。<fix123>……大昔にも同じ様なやり取りをした<fix123><fix123>事があるわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, since I wasn't born here,<fix123>it'll be quite the challenge for you to get me out.<fix123>...I remember having another exchange like this,<fix123>long, long ago.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まぁ、私は満月なんてどうでもいいんだがな。<fix123>こいつが満月が無いと困るって駄々を<fix123><fix123>こねるんでねぇ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Eh, I don't really care about the full moon,<fix123>but this girl here won't stop throwin' a fit<fix123>over it being gone.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>駄々をこねるどころじゃないわ。<fix123>余りふざけたまねをしてると、天罰が<fix123>下るわよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm not just throwing some fit.<fix123>If you keep messing around too much, divine punishment<fix123>will fall upon you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>天罰は怖いわね。<fix123>でも、私が地上にいるのも天罰なの。<fix123>そうだ、こんな私を連れ出そうとする<fix123>人にはいつも難題を与えてきたわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Divine punishment? That doesn't sound good.<fix123>My stay on Earth is already a divine punishment as well, though.<fix123>I know. Whenever someone came to take me away,<fix123>I gave them an impossible request.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>難題？<fix123>それを解けばお前を連れ出せると<fix123>いうのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>An impossible request?<fix123>You mean if we fulfill it, we can take you<fix123>out of here?<fix123><fix123>
