jp_dialogue: <fix123>今まで、何人もの人間が敗れ去って<fix123>いった五つの問題。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My five requests that so many humans<fix123>in the past have failed to complete...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 竹取飛翔　～ Lunatic Princess<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Flight of the Bamboo Cutter ~ Lunatic Princess<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方達に幾つ解けるかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How many of them can you fulfill?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kaguya Houraisan DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>なんて事！<fix123>そう、夜を止めていたのは……、<fix123>貴方達だったのね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What the!?<fix123>I see. The ones who are stopping the night...<fix123>It's you two, isn't it.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ヴォヤージュ1970<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Voyage 1970<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kaguya Houraisan REVIVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>貴方達が作った半端な永遠の夜なんて……<fix123>私の永遠を操る術で全て破って見せる。<fix123>夜明けはすぐそこにあるはずよ。<fix123>どう？<fix123>これで永夜の術は破れて、夜は明ける！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This half-finished eternal night that you have made...<fix123>With my spell to manipulate eternity, I'll tear it all away.<fix123>The dawn shall be upon us soon.<fix123>How's that?<fix123>With this, your spell of eternal night shall be broken, and the dawn shall come!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kaguya Houraisan DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>If player runs out of lives during this stage<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>BAD ENDING No. 10<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Otherwise<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>GOOD ENDING No. 2<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>蛍火の行方<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Where the Fireflies Fly<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>蛍の灯りはいつもより激しく見えたのは気の所為か。<fix123>今宵は永い夜になるだろう。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are the fireflies brighter than usual, or is it just your imagination?<fix123>Tonight will be a long night.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 幻視の夜　～ Ghostly Eyes<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Illusionary Night ~ Ghostly Eyes<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほら何も無いじゃないの！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Look, there's nothing out here!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まだ、夜は始まったばっかよ。<fix123>焦らないの。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The night's still only just begun.<fix123>No need to hurry.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>焦って私を連れ出しておいて<fix123>焦らないも何も無いでしょ？<fix123>報酬は高く付くから覚えときなさい。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You've got no room to say "no need to hurry"<fix123>when you're the one who dragged me out here in a hurry.<fix123>You owe me big for this, so don't you forget it.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>って、さっきから何も無いって……<fix123>私が居たでしょ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You've been saying "nothing here" for a while now...<fix123>I'm here, aren't I!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Wriggle Nightbug ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>心配しなくても……<fix123>報酬は払うわよ。<fix123>あなたじゃあるまいし。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Don't worry about it...<fix123>I'll pay you back.<fix123>It's not like I'm you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>闇に蠢く光の蟲<fix123>リグル・ナイトバグ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A Bug of Light Wriggling in the Dark<fix123>Wriggle Nightbug<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ちょっとちょっとちょっと。<fix123>私を無視するとはいい度胸だわ。<fix123>それなりの覚悟が出来てるんでしょうね！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, hey, hey.<fix123>You've got some real nerve, brushing me off like this.<fix123>I hope you’re prepared to face the consequences!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>洒落かしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Was that a pun?[1]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>洒落なの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Was it?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう言えば、夜に出歩くのに<fix123>大事な物置いて来ちゃった。神社に。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That reminds me, I forgot something important<fix123>for an evening stroll. Back at the shrine.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あなたの言いたい事は判ったわ。<fix123>蚊取り線香でしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I know what you're trying to say.<fix123>A mosquito coil, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>蛍だってば！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm a firefly!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 蠢々秋月　～ Mooned Insect<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Wriggling Autumn Moon ~ Mooned Insect<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Wriggle Nightbug DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ほんと、夜は虫が多くて嫌よねぇ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Really, it's awful at night with all these bugs around.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>夜しか起きていない奴が何を言うのよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Says the one who's only awake at night.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええ、夜の方が自然が豊かってことよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, because nature thrives during the night.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>最近、蛍も増えたわね……<fix123>何だか外の世界がちょっと心配だわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There've been lots of fireflies, lately...<fix123>Kinda makes me worry a little about the outside world.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>判ってるじゃないの。<fix123>でも、心配するなんてあなたらしくないわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You understand, don't you?<fix123>It's not like you to worry, though.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間の消える道<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Path Where Humans Vanish<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間の通り道も、真夜中に出歩くものは獣か妖怪位。<fix123>少なくとも人の姿が見える筈も無い。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Beasts and youkai are what stroll at midnight, even on the humans' roads.<fix123>There shouldn't be a human form in sight, at the least.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 夜雀の歌声　～ Night Bird<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Song of the Night Sparrow ~ Night Bird<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mystia Lorelei ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Mystia Lorelei PAUSES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ちょ、ちょっと待って～！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>W-waaaait~!<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>What?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>久しぶりのヒトネギだと思ったのに。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I thought you were some foolishly-tasty humans[2], at long last.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>夜雀の怪<fix123>ミスティア・ローレライ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Night Sparrow Apparition<fix123>Mystia Lorelei<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あんた達、一体何者なのよ～？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who exactly would you two be~?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ん、人間以外。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Um, non-humans.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間以外？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Non-humans?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まぁ、人間以外でもなんでもいいけど。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, human or not, I'm fine either way.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>珍しいわね。この道に以外が通るなんて。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My, that's rare. Seeing non-humans go along this road.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふーん。あなたは夜雀のようね。<fix123>あんまり人間ばっか襲ってると～。<fix123>この辺から人間が居なくなるわよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmm. You seem to be a night sparrow.<fix123>You shouldn't attack just humans so often~.<fix123>There won't be any more left around here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だからといって、人間の代わりに妖怪を<fix123>襲ったりはしないんじゃん？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That might be so, how about attacking youkai instead of humans?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほっといてよ。大体、とっくに夜の道から<fix123><fix123>人間の姿は消えているし。<fix123>居たとしても、よっぽど急ぎか、訳ありか<fix123><fix123>人間以外だけだわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, never mind. Besides, human forms haven't been seen<fix123>on night roads for a long time.<fix123>If there's anyone here at all, it'd be non-humans who were<fix123>in a big hurry, or had some important reason to be here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いい？もう一度言うわ。<fix123>私達は、急ぎで訳ありで人間以外なの。<fix123>こんな所で時間を潰している暇は無いわ。<fix123>ここを通してくれる？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Listen. I'll say this once more.<fix123>We are non-humans, in a hurry, with an important reason.<fix123>We don't have time to waste here.<fix123>Will you let us pass?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この道の先って、あんまり紫の様な妖怪が<fix123>行く場所じゃないんだけど……。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The end of this road isn't a place where<fix123>youkai like Yukari often visit, though...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>久しぶりの遊び相手なのに……。<fix123>そうだ、里に行って一緒に人間を<fix123>からかわない？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Aw, even though you're playmates after so long...<fix123>I know. How about we go to the village<fix123>and mess with the humans together?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああもう、私は前から言ってるでしょ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ahh, geeze, I've said this before, haven't I!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は鳥目じゃ無いって。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I can see in the dark.[3]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ、人間発見。<fix123>私が鳥目にしてあげる！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, human sighted.<fix123>I'll make you night-blind!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: もう歌しか聞こえない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Deaf to All but the Song<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Mystia Lorelei DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>全く、夜雀風情が。<fix123>羽蟲の王気取りは、絶望的に早いわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Goodness, it was only a night sparrow.<fix123>It's hopelessly too early for her to be acting like a king of bird lice.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……今の奴、本当に雀だったの？<fix123>暗くてよく見えなかったけど。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...was that really a sparrow just now?<fix123>It was dark, and I couldn't see well.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>夜の小鳥は大体夜雀よ。<fix123>取り扱いに気を付けないと、暗い所では<fix123>目が見えなくなってしまうわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If you see a small bird at night, it's usually a night sparrow.<fix123>If you don't treat them with caution, you'll become<fix123>unable to see in dark places.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（……雀ってあんなだったかなぁ。<fix123>良く見えなかったけど）<fix123>ああ、人間の里が見えてきたわ。あんたと<fix123>一緒に来たくなかったんだけどなぁ……。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(...is that really what sparrows are like?<fix123>Although I couldn't see it well.)<fix123>Ah, I can see the Human Village. I didn't<fix123>really want to come here with you, though...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>歴史喰いの懐郷<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Memories of the History-Eater's Home<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>一本道の先には人間達が住む小さな里がある。<fix123>だが里があるはずの場所には、何も、無かった。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>At the end of a straight road, there was a small village where humans lived.<fix123>However, in the place where the village should have been, there was nothing at all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 懐かしき東方の血　～ Old World<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Nostalgic Blood of the East ~ Old World<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Keine Kamishirasawa ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>お前達か。<fix123>こんな真夜中に里を襲おうとする奴は。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Is it you?<fix123>Are you the ones trying to attack the village in the middle of this night?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この惨状はあんたの仕業ね？<fix123>人間と人間の里を何処にやったの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This horrible scene is your doing, isn't it?<fix123>Where did you send the humans and their village?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前達妖怪には、人間を渡しはしない。<fix123>今夜を無かった事にしてやる！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I won't hand the humans over to you youkai.<fix123>I'll make this night never have happened!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Keine Kamishirasawa PAUSES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あー、お前達何もんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Aah, what the heck are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ちょっと、里を元に戻しなさい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, put the village back!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Keine Kamishirasawa EXITS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Keine Kamishirasawa ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>しつこいな。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So persistent.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あんたなんかどうでもいいのよ。<fix123>ここは人間の里だった筈でしょ？<fix123>なのに、何も無いじゃない。<fix123><fix123>人間達や家とかどうしたのよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You don't matter right now.<fix123>The Human Village was supposed to be here, right?<fix123>But there's nothing here now.<fix123>What happened to the humans and their houses and everything!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どうもしてない。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Nothing.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>知識と歴史の半獣<fix123>上白沢 慧音<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Half-Beast of Knowledge and History<fix123>Keine Kamishirasawa<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前達には見えないようにしてやっただけだ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I just made it so that the village was invisible to your kind.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>霊夢、こんな所でしっぽりしている暇は無いわ。<fix123>こうしている間にも月はどんどん沈んでいるの。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Reimu, we don't have time to stick around here.<fix123>The moon is gradually sinking lower as we speak.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>しっぽりはしてないけど、ちょっと待って。<fix123>人間を里ごと消している妖怪を見逃す訳には<fix123>いかない。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We're not exactly sticking, but hold on.<fix123>It's not like I can just ignore a youkai that erased a whole village of humans.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ここには、元々人間は住んでいなかった。<fix123>と言う風に見える様にしただけだ。<fix123>私が、この不吉な夜から人間を守る。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>"Humans never settled here in the first place."<fix123>All I did was make it look that way.<fix123>I'll protect the humans from this ill-omened night.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ねぇねぇ。<fix123>私には普通に人間の姿が見えるんだけどさぁ。<fix123>この程度のまやかしなんて、全然役に立たない<fix123><fix123>じゃない？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, hey.<fix123>I can see the humans just like usual, though.<fix123>Trickery of this level isn't useful at all,<fix123><fix123>is it?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>！<fix123>お前達、本当に何もんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>!<fix123>Really, what ARE you two?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>大丈夫。私には里は見えないわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Don't worry. They're invisible enough to me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うう。そんな情けかけられても。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Uu. Your pity isn't helping.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それにあんた。<fix123>半獣なんでしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>And you.<fix123>You're a half-beast, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>満月じゃなければ人間だ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm human when the moon isn't full.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人面犬とか人面岩とかと大差ないわね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Not much different from a human-faced dog or human-faced rock, then.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何で顔だけ残して変身する必要があるんだよ。<fix123>変身は全身だ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Why are you assuming everything but my face changes?!<fix123>I'll have you know the transformation is full-body!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>牛頭馬頭とか、頭だけ獣に変身。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Or it's like Gozu and Mezu, where only the head turns into a beast's.[4]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……まぁいい。<fix123>そこまで言うなら、もう後には引かせない。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...oh well.<fix123>If you're going to say that, I won't let you take it back.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: プレインエイジア<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Plain Asia<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今夜は、お前達の歴史で満漢全席だ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Tonight, I'll make an imperial feast out of your history![5]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私はともかく、こいつの歴史は点心位に<fix123><fix123>しかならないわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Myself aside, this one's history would amount<fix123><fix123>to some light snacks at best.[6]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うるさいなぁ。<fix123>それだけ毎日が飲茶なのよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Shut up.<fix123>Even then, that means every day is tea and snacks for me.[7]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Keine Kamishirasawa DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>さぁ、人間の里を元に戻しなさい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now, restore the Human Village!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>戻しても大丈夫よ。<fix123>元々ここの人間とあんたなんか眼中に無いわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It'll be okay to put it back.<fix123>We weren't thinking anything of you and the humans here to begin with.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>じゃぁ、何処に行こうとしてるんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Then, where are you trying to go?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あっち。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That way.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>こっち。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This way.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……。<fix123>昨今の異常な月の原因を作った奴なら、<fix123>そっち。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>......<fix123>If you're after the ones behind the recent unusual moon,<fix123>they're that way.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほら言ったとおりじゃない。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>See, I was right, wasn't I!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>霊夢の指先と70度は違う向きね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Reimu, your finger is off from hers by 70 degrees.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あんたは110度違う。<fix123>ってあんた、良く私達の目的が判ったわね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're off by 110—<fix123>wait, she figured out what we're trying to do?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>判らない方がおかしいのよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It'd be more strange if she hadn't figured it out.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>魔力を含む土の下<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Beneath the Soil that Holds Magic Power<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>力強い竹の下には、さらに力強い根が張り巡らされて<fix123><fix123>いる。表面しか見れないのは愚かな人間と妖怪だけだ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Beneath the sturdy bamboo, even sturdier roots spread out.<fix123>Only foolish humans and youkai can see nothing but the surface.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 永夜の報い　～ Imperishable Night<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Retribution for the Eternal Night ~ Imperishable Night<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>動くと撃つ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Move and I'll shoot!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Marisa Kirisame ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>間違えた。<fix123>撃つと動くだ。今すぐ動く。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I messed up.<fix123>I mean, shoot and I'll move.[8] Right away.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何？<fix123>何でこんな所に魔理沙がいるの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What?<fix123>Why are you in a place like this, Marisa?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>普通の黒魔法少女<fix123>霧雨 魔理沙<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ordinary Black-Magic Girl<fix123>Marisa Kirisame<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さぁな、私はいつも通り、迷惑な妖怪を退治<fix123>しているだけだぜ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, eh, I'm just hunting some troublesome youkai,<fix123><fix123>like usual.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>へぇ、奇遇ね。<fix123>私も迷惑な妖怪退治をしているの。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, what a coincidence.<fix123>I'm doing some troublesome youkai hunting too.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私が言ってるのは「迷惑な妖怪」を退治だ。<fix123>お前の場合は、迷惑な「妖怪退治」だろ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What I'm saying is "hunting troublesome youkai".<fix123>In your case, it's troublesome "youkai hunting," isn't it?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうでもないわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Not really.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>へぇ、こんな夜に、あなた一人で何が出来る<fix123>かしら。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My, I wonder what you can do all by yourself<fix123>on a night like this.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>迷惑な妖怪退治だ。<fix123>今日の月なんてもう見飽きた。<fix123>そろそろ、明日にしてもらうぜ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hunt troublesome youkai.<fix123>I'm already tired of staring at today's moon.<fix123>It's about time to make it be tomorrow.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>で、迷惑な妖怪って？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So, who's the troublesome youkai?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前の事だよ。<fix123>また、夜と昼の境界をいじっただろ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You.<fix123>You messed with the boundary of night and day again, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>夜を止めているのは私達。<fix123>でも今はそれどころじゃないのよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We're the ones who're stopping the night.<fix123>But now isn't the time for that!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう。<fix123>あなたは、後ろに目が無いのかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Indeed.<fix123>Don't you have eyes on the back of your head?[9]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あー？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ahh?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まぁ、多分無いけど。<fix123>そういうことよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, she probably doesn't.<fix123>That's how it is.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>日本語を話せ。<fix123>ここは幻想郷だ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Speak Japanese.<fix123>This is Gensokyo.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 恋色マスタースパーク<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Love-Colored Master Spark<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>魔理沙に何言っても無駄ね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Looks like nothing we say will get through to her.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あの歪な月は危険なのに……。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But that distorted moon is so dangerous...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間には大して害は無いの。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's not really harmful to humans.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あー？何だか知らないけど。<fix123>夜が終らない方が害だらけだぜ。<fix123>妖怪は夜に人を喰う。<fix123>夜が続けば、喰い過ぎで妖怪は自滅する。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ahh? I don't know what's happening, but<fix123>a never-ending night has harmful written all over it.<fix123>Youkai eat humans during the night.<fix123>If the night keeps going, the youkai will stuff themselves until they drop dead.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>する訳無いじゃない。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There's no way we'd do that.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>自滅する前に退治してやらないとな。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Gotta exterminate them before they drop dead.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Marisa Kirisame EXITS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あ、逃げた？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, running away?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さぁ、地の果てまで追うのよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now, let's chase her to the ends of the earth.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Marisa Kirisame ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Marisa Kirisame PAUSES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あれ、霊夢じゃないか？<fix123>どうしたんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, if it isn't Reimu!<fix123>What's up?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>白々しいにも程があるわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There's such a thing as too barefaced of a lie.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さっきのは紫分。<fix123>今度はお前分だ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That last one was for Yukari.<fix123>This one's for you!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Marisa Kirisame DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>魔理沙を追っているうちに、目的地に着いた<fix123>みたいね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Looks like we arrived at our destination while we were<fix123>chasing Marisa.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほんと、あなたって幸運ねぇ。<fix123>うちの藍にも分けてあげたいくらいだわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You really are lucky.<fix123>I wish you could share that luck with my Ran, too.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>くそ。<fix123>一体、何だと言うんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Damnit.<fix123>What on earth are you two on about?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お陰で犯人がわかったのよ。<fix123>あなたは無駄じゃなかったの。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Thanks to you, we know who the culprit is.<fix123>You weren't useless.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いや、犯人は判らないけど。<fix123>取り合えず、あの屋敷の中にいる。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, we haven't figured out the culprit.<fix123>But at any rate, they're in that mansion.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まぁ負けたんだから仕様が無い。<fix123>帰って寝る。<fix123>起きたら朝になっている事を祈るぜ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I lost, so there ain't much I can do.<fix123>Time to head home an' sleep.<fix123>I hope it'll be morning when I wake up.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>永遠にお休みなさい。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sleep for all eternity.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まぁ、風邪ひかないようにね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, try not to catch a cold.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>穢き世の美しき檻<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A Pure Cage in the Filthy World<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>「穢き所に、いかでか久しくおはせん。」<fix123>そういうと閉ざされた扉は一枚残らず開き――<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>"Why have you lingered so long in such a filthy place?"<fix123>Then, all the locked doors opened, untouched——[10]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: シンデレラケージ　～ Kagome-Kagome<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Cinderella Cage ~ Kagome-Kagome<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Tewi Inaba ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Tewi Inaba DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>遅かったわね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're too late.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Reisen Udongein Inaba ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>全ての扉は封印したわ。<fix123>もう、姫は連れ出せないでしょう？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I've sealed all the doors.<fix123>You can't take the princess away now, can you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>犯人はこいつかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Is she the culprit?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さぁねぇ。取り敢えず倒してみたら？<fix123>ここに居るはずだし。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who knows. Shall we take her down, first of all?<fix123>The culprit should be here somewhere.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>狂気の月の兎<fix123>鈴仙・Ｕ・イナバ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Lunatic Moon Rabbit<fix123>Reisen Udongein Inaba<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何だ、妖怪か。<fix123>そうよね、ここまで来れるはずが無いし。<fix123>心配して損したわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What, are you youkai?<fix123>You shouldn't have been able to find your way here, though.<fix123>Nothing to worry about.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私はまだ人間よ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, I'm still human.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間ならなおさらだわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Humans are even less worrisome.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>一体、何を心配していたのかしら？<fix123>こんな悪さしておいて。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Why would you be worried, I wonder?<fix123>All this is your mischief.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>悪さ？<fix123>んー、地上の密室のこと？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Mischief?<fix123>Nnn, you mean sealing up the earth?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なの？<fix123>よく分からないけど。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Maybe?<fix123>I don't quite get it, though.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>満月の事よ。<fix123>よく分からないけど。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We mean the full moon.<fix123>I don't quite get it either, though.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ月の事？　それはね、私の師匠、<fix123>永琳の取っておきの秘術。<fix123>この地上を密室化する秘術なの。<fix123>判るかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, you're talking about the moon?<fix123>That's my master Eirin's most powerful spell.<fix123>It makes this Earth into a giant, sealed chamber.<fix123>Do you get it now?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>判る訳が無いわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There's no way we get it.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eirin Yagokoro ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ううん。<fix123>そんなんじゃ人間には判らないわ。<fix123>それに、満月を無くす程度の術。<fix123>取っておきでも何でもない。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Mm-mm.<fix123>Humans can't understand with an explanation like that.<fix123>Also, about that full moon-erasing spell.<fix123>It's hardly my most powerful one.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>霊夢。<fix123>こいつが犯人よ。匂いがする。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Reimu.<fix123>She's the culprit. I can smell it.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そう？<fix123>私の勘はなんだか……。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Is she?<fix123>My intuition is, sort of...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さぁ、この歪な月を元に戻して<fix123>もらいましょうか！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now, return this distorted moon<fix123>to normal!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>……それは、まだ早いわ。<fix123>今、この術を解く訳にはいかないの。<fix123>ウドンゲ。<fix123>荒事と狂気は全てお前の仕事でしょ？<fix123>ここは任せたわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...It's still too early for that.<fix123>There's no way I can undo this spell yet.<fix123>Udonge.<fix123>Conflict and insanity are all your job, correct?<fix123>I'll leave this to you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eirin Yagokoro EXITS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>お任せください。<fix123>閉ざされた扉は一つも空かせません。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Leave it to me.<fix123>I won't let a single one of those closed doors be opened.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>逃げたって一緒よ。どうせ、こいつを<fix123>倒して追う事になるんだから。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Running won't stop us. We'll get her anyway<fix123>after taking you down.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうねぇ。それにこいつ倒しても<fix123>満月は戻らなさそうねぇ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Looks like it. It also looks like taking you down<fix123>won't bring back the full moon, either.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ふん。最近、戦える相手が<fix123>居なかったから丁度いいわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hmph. I haven't had anyone to fight with lately,<fix123>so this is just about perfect.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 狂気の瞳　～ Invisible Full Moon<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Lunatic Eyes ~ Invisible Full Moon<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あなた達に全て見せてあげるわ。<fix123>月の狂気を！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'll show you two everything<fix123>of the moon's insanity!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>月の狂気？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The moon's insanity?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>月に来た人間を狂わせた催眠術。<fix123>あの人間は弱かったわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's my hypnosis, that drove the humans who came to the moon insane.<fix123>Those humans were weak.[11]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>こいつ。危なそうね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This person. She seems dangerous.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>月は人を狂わすの。<fix123>そう、月の兎である私の目を見て<fix123>狂わずに居られるかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The moon drives people mad.<fix123>So, I wonder if you can remain in your right mind<fix123>while gazing into the eyes of this lunar rabbit?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Reisen Udongein Inaba DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>目に見えるものを追う（FinalA）<fix123><fix123>勘を信じる（FinalB）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Follow your eyes (Final A)<fix123><fix123>Trust your intuition (Final B)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>If it is player's first time defeating Reisen, player has used a continue, or player chooses Final A<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>さぁ、さっきのを追うわよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Okay, now let's go chase that other one down.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さっきのは何処に入っていったのかしら？<fix123>扉が多すぎて判らないわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But which door did they enter?<fix123>There are so many, I can't tell.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さっきの、……って、師匠をさっきの<fix123>呼ばわりしないで。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>"That other one"... hey, don't just call my<fix123>master something like that.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>犯人はこの奥に居るわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The culprit is down this way.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>犯人が自殺する前に捕まえるのよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We've got to capture her before she commits suicide.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>自殺しないし、犯人って……。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>She wouldn't commit suicide, and don't call her a...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うるさい白兎。<fix123>その辺で皮引ん剥くわよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Shush, you rabbit.<fix123>Keep it up and we'll tear off your skin.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>NEXT STAGE: Final A<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>If player chooses Final B<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>さぁ、さっきのを追うわよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Okay, now let's go chase that other one down.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さっきのは何処に入っていったのかしら？<fix123>扉が多すぎて判らないわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But which door did they enter?<fix123>There are so many, I can't tell.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>紫。<fix123>ほら、あそこの扉……。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yukari.<fix123>Look, that door over there...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああまずい！<fix123>封印が間に合わなかったわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh no!<fix123>I didn't finish sealing them in time.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>犯人はそこかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Is the culprit in there?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私の勘がそこだって言ってるわ。<fix123>いくわよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My intuition says so.<fix123>Let's go.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、師匠にしかられるぅ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ohh, my master will be mad at me...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>NEXT STAGE: Final B<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>姫を隠す夜空の珠<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Orb in the Night Sky, Hiding the Princess<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>永い永い廊下。この廊下は何者かが見せる狂像か。<fix123><fix123>近すぎる月の記憶は、妖怪には懐かしく、薄い物だった。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A long, long corridor. Is it a lunatic illusion being shown by someone?<fix123>To the youkai, this closer moon brought faint, nostalgic memories.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ヴォヤージュ １９６９<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Voyage 1969<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eirin Yagokoro ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ふふふ。<fix123>無事ついて来てるようね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hahaha.<fix123>Good, so you're following me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この廊下はおかしいわ。<fix123>いくらなんでもこんなに長い筈がない。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This corridor is strange.<fix123>It can't possibly be this long.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>外が見たことが無い世界になってる！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The outside's turned into some world I've never seen!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eirin Yagokoro EXITS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>長い廊下ももう終った見たいね<fix123>そろそろ観念したらどう？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It looks like that long corridor has ended now.<fix123>How about giving up soon?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eirin Yagokoro ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あはははは。<fix123>貴方達は愚かねぇ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ahahaha.<fix123>My, aren't you two stupid.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほら、馬鹿だって。<fix123>神社で巫女なんかやってるから。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, she just said we were stupid.<fix123>It's because I let a shrine maiden do her things.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>月の頭脳<fix123>八意 永琳<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Brain of the Moon<fix123>Eirin Yagokoro<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もうすぐ朝になる。<fix123>そうなれば、もう満月は返すわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The morning will come soon.<fix123>After that, I'll return the full moon to you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら、聞き分けいいじゃない。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My, aren't you a good listener?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もう術は完成しているの。<fix123>何人たりとも姫を連れ出す事は出来ない。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My spell is already complete.<fix123>It's impossible for anyone to take the princess from here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>姫？<fix123><fix123>姫なんて最初から興味は無いわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A princess?<fix123>We had no interest in a princess to begin with.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私達は満月さえ戻ればそれでいいの。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We only want you to return the full moon.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>心配しなくても、朝が来れば<fix123><fix123>元に戻すわよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Don't worry. When morning comes,<fix123><fix123>I'll give it right back.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうはいかない。<fix123>私達は、朝が来る前に満月を<fix123><fix123>取り戻しに来たんだから。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's not good enough.<fix123>We came here to get the moon back<fix123><fix123>before the morning.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>せっかちねぇ。<fix123>でも、私達が今居る場所。<fix123><fix123>何処だか判るかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're so impatient.<fix123>But, look at the place we're in right now.<fix123><fix123>Do you know where this is?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ここは偽の月と地上の間。<fix123>さっきの永い廊下は、偽の月と地上を<fix123><fix123>結ぶ偽物の通路。<fix123>貴方達は偽満月が生み出した幻像に<fix123><fix123>騙されてここまで来たのよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This place is between the false moon and the Earth.<fix123>That endless corridor just now<fix123>was a false passage that connects the two.<fix123>You two were fooled by an illusion that the false full moon<fix123>produced, and came here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>で？<fix123>だから何よ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>And?<fix123>So what about it?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方達には戻る術があるのかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Do you have any method of returning home?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうねぇ。<fix123>それは貴方を倒してから考える事。<fix123>焦る事はないわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I see.<fix123>Let's take care of that after beating you.<fix123>We're in no hurry.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まんまと私の術に嵌る奴が、どうして<fix123><fix123>私に敵うと思うのか不思議だわ。<fix123>まぁ、私も鬼じゃないし。<fix123>まぁ、朝までなら遊んであげるわよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How can someone who was so perfectly deceived by my spell<fix123>think they can still oppose me? It's quite strange.<fix123>Well, I'm no demon myself.<fix123>Until morning, I'll play with you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>よく分からないけど。<fix123>こいつを倒せば万事解決？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I don't quite get it, but...<fix123>If we defeat her, it'll solve everything?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そんなだから馬鹿って言われるのよ。<fix123>でも大正解。<fix123>博麗霊夢の言う事は全て正解よ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>See, that's why she called you stupid.<fix123>But you're exactly right.<fix123>Everything Reimu Hakurei says is entirely correct.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今頃、地上人も月に辿りつけないで<fix123><fix123>永遠に彷徨っていることでしょう。<fix123>月の民も同じ。<fix123>これで月の民も地上に来れないはず。<fix123>これが私の最大の秘術の一つ。<fix123><fix123>地上は大きな密室と化したのよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Right now, all Earthlings will wander forever,<fix123>without ever reaching the moon.<fix123>And the people of the moon are just the same.<fix123>With this, none of the moon's people should be able to reach the Earth.<fix123>This is one of my greatest secret spells.<fix123>The Earth has become a gigantic sealed chamber.[12]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さっきの兎といい。<fix123>狂ってる奴が多すぎね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>She's just like that rabbit from before.<fix123>There's so many lunatics in here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さぁ、紫。<fix123>こんな奴さっさと倒して、地上に帰るわよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So, Yukari.<fix123>Let's beat her up quick, and head back to the Earth.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら、遊んでいく気になったみたいね。<fix123>あいにく私は、永遠に遊ぶ力は持って<fix123><fix123>いないけど……。<fix123>それでも、朝まで遊ぶこと位は出来るわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, it looks like you want to play with me now.<fix123>I'm afraid I lack the power to play<fix123>forever, but...<fix123>Even so, I can play until morning.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>永遠に遊んでみたい物ね。<fix123>でも、それはまたの機会にでも……。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I wouldn't mind playing forever.<fix123>But, some other time...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 千年幻想郷　～ History of the Moon<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Gensokyo Millennium ~ History of the Moon<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さぁ、幻想郷の世明けはもう目の前にある！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now, the dawn of Gensokyo is at hand!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eirin Yagokoro DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>何遊んでるのよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What are you playing at!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kaguya Houraisan ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>永琳、私の力でもう一度だけチャンスをあげる。<fix123>これで負けたらその時は……。<fix123>そこの人妖！<fix123>私の力で作られた薬と永琳の本当の力、<fix123><fix123>一生忘れないものになるよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Eirin, I grant you one more chance with my power.<fix123>If you lose this time...<fix123>You there, human and youkai!<fix123>With the medicine made by my power, and Eirin's true strength,<fix123><fix123>you'll never forget this as long as you live!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ヴォヤージュ １９７０<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Voyage 1970<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eirin Yagokoro REVIVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Eirin Yagokoro DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>If the imperishable night ever reaches 5:00 am<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>BAD ENDING No. 9<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>If the imperishable night ends before 5:00 am<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Normal Ending #5<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>五つの難題<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Five Impossible Requests<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>解決不能な五つの難題。<fix123>しかし、長い年月と幻想の力は、それらの問題を<fix123>解くのに十分だった。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>There were five impossible requests that nobody could solve.<fix123>However, the long passing of years and the power of phantasm<fix123>were enough for these requests to be fulfilled.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ヴォヤージュ １９６９<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Voyage 1969<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eirin Yagokoro ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ああもう。<fix123>こっちに来させちゃ駄目だって言ってるのに。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Geez.<fix123>I told her not to let them come this way.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>霊夢。<fix123>こいつの言っている意味、わかる？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Reimu.<fix123>Do you understand what she just said?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ええ、こっちが正解って事でしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yeah. We're heading the right way, aren't we?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Eirin Yagokoro DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>久々の満月が……。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The full moon, after so long...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kaguya Houraisan ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>そう、地上から見た本物の満月よ。<fix123>それにしても人間と妖怪……。<fix123>今日は珍しい客が来ているわね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, this is the true full moon, as seen from the Earth.<fix123>More importantly, a human and a youkai...<fix123>Some very strange guests have come today.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あんたは……。<fix123>一体何者よ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You...<fix123>What exactly are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>永遠と須臾の罪人<fix123>蓬莱山 輝夜<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sinner of Eternity and the Instantaneous<fix123>Kaguya Houraisan<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は輝夜。<fix123>でも、あなたが先に名乗ってないのに。<fix123>質問してきた事には怒らない。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I am Kaguya.<fix123>You should have offered your names first, though,<fix123>but I'll let it pass.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>その程度で恩を着せようなんてのは甘いわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's childish to pass off something like that as an act of kindness.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>誰もそんな事言っていない。<fix123>最近、永琳が屋敷の外に出させて<fix123>くれないのよ。<fix123>だから、たまのお客様は大切に扱うわ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who said I was doing that?<fix123>Recently, Eirin hasn't let me out of<fix123>the mansion at all.<fix123>So, these odd guests are most welcomed.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>弾のお客様？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The shot guests?[13]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>弾幕馬鹿みたいな言い方しないの。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Don't talk like you're obsessed with danmaku.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間に宿るは儚い霊（たま）。<fix123>その人間が住むのは大きな球。<fix123>そして、貴き民が住むのは……、<fix123>後ろに見える狂おしい珠。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The human body houses a fragile, round soul.<fix123>What those humans live on is a huge, round orb below.<fix123>And, what the superior people live on...<fix123>Is that lunatic orb behind me.[14]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>で、私達が避けるのは、<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, it looks like what we'll be dodging<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>美しき弾、っと。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>are some beautiful round bullets, as well.[15]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人の台詞を取らないの。<fix123>こっちの方は怒るわよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Don't steal people's lines.<fix123>My kindness has limits.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほら、先が読める台詞は、言わなく<fix123>ても伝わるからいいの。<fix123>何せ、私達は弾のお客様だもんねぇ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Look, we get where this speech is going without<fix123>you saying it, so it's fine.<fix123>We're shot guests, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>全くもう、せっかちねぇ。<fix123>焦らなくても見せてあげるわよ。<fix123>本当の月が持つ毒気を！<fix123>それと、私からの美しき難題を！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You two are just so impatient.<fix123>Even without hurrying, I'll show you...<fix123>The miasma of the true moon!<fix123>And, my beautiful impossible requests, as well!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>本当に暇そうね……。<fix123>待ち構えて遊び相手を探していたの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You've really got too much free time...<fix123>Were you just waiting for someone to play with?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>って、折角決まった所で水をさす～。<fix123>今まで身を隠していたから余り外に<fix123>出れなかっただけよ。<fix123>でも、今日はその分遊ばさせてもらう。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey, don't be such a wet blanket~.<fix123>I've been hiding here up until now, so I didn't have<fix123>much chance to go out and play.<fix123>But, I'll make up for that today.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まぁいいけどね。<fix123>もう満月は元に戻った見たいだし。<fix123>後はけじめとして、犯人を懲らしめれば<fix123>いいだけよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, it's fine, I guess.<fix123>It looks like the full moon's already restored and all.<fix123>All we have to do now is punish the culprit<fix123>and set things right for good.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あいにく、本物の満月はここでしか<fix123>見えないよ。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm afraid you can't see the true full moon<fix123>from anywhere but here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんだってー！<fix123>って言うほどでもないけど。<fix123>どうせ懲らしめるし。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Whaaaat!?<fix123>...is not something that that warrants saying.<fix123>We'll punish you anyway.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さぁそろそろ、心の準備は出来たかしら。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well then, are you ready?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>出来てない。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Not at all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>出来てない。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Not at all.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今まで、何人もの人間が敗れ去って<fix123>いった五つの問題。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My five requests that so many humans<fix123>in the past have failed to complete...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 竹取飛翔　～ Lunatic Princess<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Flight of The Bamboo Cutter ~ Lunatic Princess<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>貴方達に幾つ解けるかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How many of them can you fulfill?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kaguya Houraisan DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>なんて事！<fix123>そう、夜を止めていたのは……、<fix123>貴方達だったのね。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What the!?<fix123>I see. The ones who are stopping the night...<fix123>It's you two, isn't it.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ヴォヤージュ １９７０<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Voyage 1970<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kaguya Houraisan REVIVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>貴方達が作った半端な永遠の夜なんて……<fix123>私の永遠を操る術で全て破って見せる。<fix123>夜明けはすぐそこにあるはずよ。<fix123>どう？<fix123>これで永夜の術は破れて、夜は明ける！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This half-finished eternal night that you have made...<fix123>With my spell to manipulate eternity, I'll tear it all away.<fix123>The dawn shall be upon us soon.<fix123>How's that?<fix123>With this, your spell of eternal night shall be broken, and the dawn shall come!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Kaguya Houraisan DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>If player runs out of lives during this stage<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>BAD ENDING No. 9<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Otherwise<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>GOOD ENDING No. 1<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>妖怪の式の式<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Shikigami of the Shikigami of the Youkai<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Cherry tree was already in bloom fully.<fix123>However, Japanese heart is not satisfied yet.<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The cherry trees were already in full bloom.<fix123>Yet the Japanese hearts were not yet satisfied.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>三國に渡り妖異をなすが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A mysterious occurrence on the crossing to three countries[1]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 妖々跋扈<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Spiritual Domination<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Chen ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ここで遭ったが百年目<fix123>今日は憑きたての<fix123>ほやほやだよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Finally, we meet again.<fix123>Today, I have now become...<fix123>freshly and newly possessed!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どの辺がほやほや？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Which part of you is new, then?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Chen DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あの世くんだりまでやってきて<fix123>目標が居なかったら退屈だわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If I'd traveled all the way to the land of the dead<fix123>only to find what I was looking for wasn't there...<fix123>That would totally suck.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>おお？これは珍しい<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh?  This is rare.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Ran Yakumo ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>すきま妖怪の式<fix123>八雲　藍（やくも　らん）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Shikigami of the Sukima Youkai <fix123>Ran Yakumo<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>こういう人間もこんな所にいるんだ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>They have people like this here too.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>こういうって何よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What do you mean "like this"?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>見てのとおり<fix123>赤かったり白かったりで目出度い人間<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Like you. <fix123>Happy sorts clothed in red and white.[2]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>猫の次は狐・・・<fix123>何時からここは畜生界になったんでしょ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>First a cat, and now a fox... <fix123>When did this place become the Animal Realm?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ、お前が橙に酷い目に遭わせた<fix123>人間だな？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah, so you're the human who gave Chen a hard time?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうだっけ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What if I am?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>橙は私の式神<fix123>今は回復して、もっと強くなっているわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Chen is my shikigami.<fix123>She has recovered, and grown stronger than before.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>・・・強かったっけ？<fix123>って、あんたの式神？<fix123>あんたが式神じゃないの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>... She was supposed to be strong?<fix123>Wait, she's your shikigami? <fix123>Aren't you a shikigami yourself?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私も式神<fix123>ご主人様はまだお休みですわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Indeed I am.<fix123>My master is still asleep right now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>やっぱり、あんたが目標ね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah.  So you're the one I'm looking for, then.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何か用？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>For what?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>冥界と顕界の境を修復・・・<fix123>って<fix123>よく考えたら<fix123>直接用があるのは、あんたの使い手<fix123>のような気もしてきた<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Repairing the border between the Netherworld and our world...<fix123>And...<fix123>Come to think of it<fix123>For that to happen... <fix123>I've got to talk to your master.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ご主人様は冬眠中ですが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My master is hibernating.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>起こして<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wake her up.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は護衛でもあるわ<fix123>私の式神に酷い目を負わすような人を<fix123>ご主人様に会わせる訳が無い<fix123>ここは、今度は強くなった橙に<fix123>やられるがいいわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I am also her guardian.<fix123>I have no intention of allowing <fix123>troublemakers to meet with my master.<fix123>Now, you will meet your end at <fix123>the hands of a strengthened Chen...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>猫なら、さっき遭ったけど・・・<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If you mean that cat, I met her just now...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんだって？<fix123>それでどうなったのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You did?<fix123>How did that go?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>特に何も無かったかの様だったわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It was nothing special.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まぁ、橙は病み上がりだから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well... but she was still recovering...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さっきは、回復したっていってた癖に<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Didn't you just say that she'd already recovered?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ここは、私が橙の仇を取らなきゃいけない<fix123>みたいね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...Looks like I have to take revenge for her now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さすがに、式神を倒せば<fix123>使い手も冬眠から目覚めるかしら<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Just as I expected.<fix123>Defeat a shikigami, and maybe its master will wake up...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ご主人様は、春眠も暁を覚えずよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>In spring, my master sleeps a sleep that knows no dawn.[3]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まあ、取りあえずは<fix123>目の前の障害から<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, in the meantime, there's a more immediate obstacle around.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 少女幻葬　～ Necro-Fantasy<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: A Maiden's Illusionary Funeral ~ Necro-Fantasy<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は橙とは桁が違くてよ<fix123>色々と<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I am many orders of magnitude different from Chen.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Ran Yakumo DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>式神風情が巫女に敵うと思って<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Did you think that a shikigami could stand up to a shrine maiden?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私の式が通用しないなんて<fix123>騙したわね～<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How could my formulas have failed?[4]<fix123>You cheated, didn't you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なにを？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>てっきり人間だと思っていたのに<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I thought for sure that you were only human.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人間だってば<fix123>ともかく、折角だから<fix123>あなたの主に会わせて貰おうかしら<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I am human.<fix123>Anyway, for all my trouble, <fix123>you will introduce me to your master.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>紫（ゆかり）様は、まだおやすみ中だわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My master, Yukari, is still sleeping...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まだ、って何時になったら<fix123>目が覚めるのよ<fix123>もう、十分に春じゃない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>"Still", you say. When will she awaken?<fix123>Spring has already arrived in full.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>紫様は冬も昼間も寝ているの<fix123>こんな時間はまだ起きていない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>She sleeps through winter and all day.<fix123>It's still too early for her to wake up.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もう夜の帳も落ちる頃の様な気がして<fix123>ならないけど・・・<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I think it's already pretty close to dusk...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私達にとって、本当の宵闇はこんなもん<fix123>じゃないの<fix123>人間が寝る時間が、本当の夜なのさ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>For us it isn't.<fix123>When humans go to sleep, that's what we consider the true night.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いいから、起こしてよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Whatever, wake her up now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>といっても、紫様はここにはいないし～<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But she isn't here~<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>こいつはただの倒し損？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So, I shot you down for nothing?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ただのやられ損？<fix123>って、あなたの目的は何？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>And I was shot down for nothing?<fix123>So what are you here for anyway?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>えーと、冥界に迷惑な奴がいて、<fix123>そいつが誰かの使い魔だから・・・<fix123>あ、目的はあんたを倒す事ね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, let's see.<fix123>Disturbance in the Netherworld, someone's errant shikigami...<fix123>Oh yeah, I'm here to punish you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>しゅ～ん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Awww...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人妖の境界<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Border Between Youkai and Humans<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Phantasmagoria.<fix123>She was also living on the border of Gensokyo.<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>三國に渡り妖異をなすが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A mysterious occurrence on the crossing to three countries[1]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 妖々跋扈　～ Who done it!<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Spiritual Domination ~ Who done it!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Ran Yakumo ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>また来たの？<fix123>今日はもう疲れたし<fix123>そろそろ寝ようと思っていたのに<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You again?<fix123>I'm tired today.<fix123>I was just about to go to sleep...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>約束通り、夜に来たわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>As promised, I have come at night.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Ran Yakumo DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>そろそろ、本命が出てきてもいい頃だわ<fix123>こんなにも闇が深いし<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's high time for the truth to emerge.<fix123>The night only gets so dark.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>出てきましょうか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Shall I emerge, then?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yukari Yakumo ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>ほら、出てきました<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Look, I'm here now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あ、丁度いいところに出てきた<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, perfect timing.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>神隠しの主犯<fix123>八雲　紫（やくも　ゆかり）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Mastermind Behind the Spiriting Away[5] <fix123>Yukari Yakumo<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あなたが、私の藍を倒した人間ね<fix123>あなたみたいな物騒な人間が居たら<fix123>おちおち寝ても居られないの<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You are the human who defeated my Ran?<fix123>Knowing that dangerous humans like you exist keeps me from sleeping soundly.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>全然、起きてこなかったじゃない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Even so, you sure took your time getting up.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今は起きているの<fix123>そんなことより、あなた・・・<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well... I'm awake now.<fix123>And you...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>はい？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yeah?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>博麗神社のおめでたい人じゃないかしら<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You are the happy person from Hakurei Shrine, are you not?[2]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>前半はそうで、後半はそうじゃない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Basically yes, while I'm not quite sure what you mean by "happy."<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>博麗の結界は、北東側が薄くなっているわ<fix123>あのままだと、破れてしまうかも知れない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Hakurei Barrier is weakening along the north-east.<fix123>If left alone, it might wear out completely.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あらそう、それは危険だわ<fix123>わざわざ有難うございます<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, that's dangerous. <fix123>Thanks for letting me know.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いえいえ、私が穴を空けてみただけです<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, no, you see, I'm the one trying to tear a hole in it.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>って、引き直しておきなさい！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well then, go fix it!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ネクロファンタジア<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Necrofantasia<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>所詮、妖怪は妖怪<fix123>妖怪の始末も後始末も、人間がやる<fix123>ことになるのね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>After all, youkai are youkai...<fix123>Beating them down and cleaning up afterwards <fix123>has to be done by a human.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら、あなたは気がついていない？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, haven't you noticed?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今、ここ白玉楼の私の周りは<fix123>妖怪と人間の境界が薄くなって<fix123>いることに<fix123>ここまで来た時点で、人間の境界を<fix123>越していることに<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Here, in Hakugyokurou where we stand,<fix123>the border between youkai and humans wears thin.<fix123>You came this far, and were able to cross over from the human side.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いいから、その境界も引き直して<fix123>もらうわ<fix123>元々、目的はあんたに冥界の境界を<fix123>引きなおさせること<fix123>そこに来て、一つや二つ結界が<fix123>増えても変らないでしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well then, go fix it now.<fix123>It was my intention to make you fix it from the start. <fix123>And since you'll be doing that anyway...<fix123>Having to fix an extra barrier or two <fix123>won't make much of a difference, right?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>一つや二つ・・・<fix123>結界は、そんなに少ないと思って？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>An extra barrier or two...<fix123>Do you think that there are that few?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yukari Yakumo DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>さーて、約束通り仕事して<fix123>貰おうかしら<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Now then, as you promised, get to work.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>言われなくてもするつもりだったのに<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I was going to do so even without your demands...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>嘘ばっかり<fix123>何時まで経っても、起きてこなかった<fix123>じゃない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Liar.<fix123>How much time went to waste while you were lazing off?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それは、寝ていたからだわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's because I was asleep.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それは当たり前<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Obviously.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>とにもかくにも、私がここにいる時点で<fix123>ちゃんと仕事しようとしている<fix123>証拠じゃない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Either way, I'm here now and I'm awake.<fix123>That is proof enough that I have the will to work.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>仕事をしようとしている、と<fix123>仕事をしているは違う！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>"Willing to work" and "getting work done" are entirely different!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>神社にまるで居ないあなたより<fix123>よっぽど仕事していると思うけど<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Compared to a shrine maiden who's rarely in her shrine, I think I'm getting plenty of work done.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私の仕事は妖魔調伏<fix123>残虐行為手当が欲しいくらいだわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Exorcism is my job.<fix123>I should receive hazard pay for my work.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら、もうそろそろ夜が明けるわ<fix123>帰って寝ないと・・・<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, it's almost dawn.<fix123>I have to return home and sleep...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>全然、仕事してないし<fix123>あんた、一体何処に住んでるのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So all in all, you did exactly nothing.<fix123>Where on Earth do you live?<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>The same place as you.<fix123>At the edge of Gensokyo.<fix123>Along the north-eastern edge.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>That's a very ominous direction.<fix123>Don't you dare tear a hole in the barrier.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら、闘う前に私が空けた、って<fix123>いいませんでしたか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, didn't I say that I already had, before we fought?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>帰って寝てろ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Go home and sleep!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>白銀の春<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Spring of Silvery Snow<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Cherry petals must have fallen like snowflakes...<fix123>However, it was still silvery snow.<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Cherry petals should have fallen like snowflakes...<fix123>Yet it was still silver with snow.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Paradise ~ Deep Mountain[1]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああもう、こんな雑魚倒しても何にも<fix123><fix123>なりゃしない！<fix123>さっさと黒幕の登場願いたいものだわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ahhhhh, killing the small fry is so pointless!<fix123>I wish the one pulling the strings would show up already.<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>冬の忘れ物<fix123>レティ・ホワイトロック<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What Winter Left Behind <fix123>Letty Whiterock<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>くろまく～<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Pulling strings, what fun~<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Ahh, so you're the one?<fix123><fix123>Well then, without delay.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ちょい、待って！<fix123><fix123>私は黒幕だけど、普通よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, wait!<fix123><fix123>I'm the mastermind, but I'm normal.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Mastermind or normal doesn't matter in such a place.<fix123>Don't you think this situation isn't normal to begin with?<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>The snow crystals are larger than in past years.<fix123><fix123>Three times larger.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああそうね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, that's true.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: クリスタライズシルバー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Crystallized Silver<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あとは、頭のおかしなメイドが<fix123><fix123>空を飛んでることくらいかな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>On top of that, there's a freaky flying maid coming towards me.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうね。<fix123><fix123>やっぱり、あんたが黒幕ね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yeah, that too.<fix123><fix123>After all, you're the mastermind.<fix123><fix123>

<fix123>黒幕、弱いなぁ<fix123>次の黒幕でも探さないとね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That was pitiful.<fix123>I'm gonna find the next mastermind, then.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Black Cat of Mayohiga<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>In days like this,<fix123>Cats are supposed to docilely curl up beneath a kotatsu.[2]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>（迷信だったのか…）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>(I didn't know it was just a superstition...)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>大体、野猫はどうすればいいのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If that were true, then what should stray cats do?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>大人しく保健所に駆逐されてみては<fix123><fix123>どうかしら？<fix123>浄土の世界は暖かそうだし<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Why not get put to sleep at an animal shelter?<fix123>The Buddhist Paradise is warm, they say.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Diao Ye Zong (withered leaf)<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Humans? Posing a threat to us?<fix123>Impossible, impossible, absolutely impossible!<fix123><fix123>To think that they would oppose us...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>試してみたいのね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So you want to see if we could?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Chen DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>南無～<fix123>きっと極楽浄土は、暖かくて幸せに<fix123><fix123>違いないでしょう<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>I feel like I'm just wasting my time here...<fix123>I wonder how the mistress is doing?<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>So, for what reason do you worry? About yourself.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>服の替えを３着しか持ってこなかったの。<fix123><fix123>自分<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Because I'm carrying only three changes of clothes.<fix123> <fix123>For myself.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Didn't know you were carrying a few.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>You seem to have few worries. Isn't that nice.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, you really declare it.<fix123>So, you, who has no worries.<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes?<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Alright, spill it. Who's behind this whole affair?<fix123><fix123>

en_dialogue: <fix123>Downwind, there's a decadent Shinto shrine.<fix123>There's a shrine maiden there who dreams of spring...<fix123><fix123>I bet she's behind all this.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>多分、それは違うと思います<fix123><fix123>
