en_dialogue: <fix123>Finally, I've reached the source.<fix123>It took me a whole day to get here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>こんなところまで来て、余裕あるわね<fix123>ここは、白玉楼<fix123>死者たちの住まう処よ<fix123>生きた人間の常識で物を考えると<fix123><fix123>痛い目にあうわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>In coming here, you have exercised great composure.<fix123>This is Hakugyokurou.<fix123>The deceased live on in this place.<fix123>Acting on the common sense of the living will land you in a mess.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>死人に口無し<fix123>大人しく春を返してもらおうかしら<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The dead tells no tales.<fix123>Now, return the spring you stole.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あと少しなのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hold on a bit.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>少しでもダメ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's a little bit too long.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あと少しで西行妖（さいぎょうあやかし）<fix123><fix123>が満開になる<fix123>普通の春じゃ絶対に満開にはならないのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Soon, the Saigyou Ayakashi will reach full bloom.<fix123>That could never happen with a normal spring.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ダメだってば<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I said I don't care.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あなたの持っているなけなしの春で<fix123><fix123>西行妖もきっと満開になる<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The trace of spring you brought here could bring the Saigyou Ayakashi to full bloom.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>話聞いてる？<fix123>そんなもんの為に、私は寒い思いを<fix123><fix123>してきたのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are you even listening to me?<fix123>I've traveled through that cold only to find such a selfish idea.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ここは暖かいでしょ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>But it's warm here, isn't it?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まぁいいわ<fix123>死人に口無しよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's enough already.<fix123>Dead people have no mouths.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>死人に口無しだわ<fix123>その春を全て戴くまでよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Indeed, dead people have no mouths.<fix123>I will consume the warmth of your spring.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この私のナイフは、幽霊も斬れるのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I wonder, can my knives even cut phantoms?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 広有射怪鳥事　～ Till when?<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Hiroari Shoots a Strange Bird ~ Till When?[4]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>妖怪が鍛えたこの楼観剣に<fix123>斬れぬものなど、少ししか無い！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The things that cannot be cut by my Roukanken, forged by youkai...<fix123>are next to none!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Youmu Konpaku DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>良かった幽霊も斬れるみたいね<fix123>銀だから？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Cool. Looks like these knives actually work.<fix123>Maybe because they're silver?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は半分は幽霊ではないわ<fix123>でも、西行寺お嬢様は完全な霊体<fix123>そんな陳腐な武器で勝負に<fix123><fix123>なるのかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm half non-phantom, you know.<fix123>But the mistress of this shrine is a fully spirit-bodied.<fix123>Do you expect to be a challenge using those obsolete weapons?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>って、なんでそのお嬢様と闘う事で<fix123><fix123>話が進んでるのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wait, why are we already talking about that battle?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>厭離穢士<fix123>欣求浄土<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Loathing this unclean world<fix123>Seeking rebirth in the Pure Land<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>彼の世に嬢の亡骸<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A Maiden's Remains in the Other World<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほとけには桜の花をたてまつれ<fix123>我が後の世を人とぶらはば<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Please offer cherry blossoms to the Buddha<fix123>Should you wish to mourn for me in the other world[5]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: アルティメットトゥルース<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Ultimate Truth<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Youmu Konpaku ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>これ以上踏み込んで<fix123>お嬢様に殺されても知らないわよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Don't step any further!<fix123>Believe me, the young mistress will not hesitate to kill!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>死人のくせに五月蝿いな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You sure make a lot of noise for someone who's dead.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Youmu Konpaku DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あの世には<fix123>死人に口無し、という言葉は無いのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You know...<fix123>Doesn't this world have a saying that "the dead have no mouths"?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら<fix123>もちろん、そんな言葉は無くてよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh?<fix123>Of course we don't have any such saying.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yuyuko Saigyouji ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>幽冥楼閣の亡霊少女<fix123>西行寺 幽々子（さいぎょうじゆゆこ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ghost Girl in the Netherworld Tower<fix123>Yuyuko Saigyouji<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あの世はいつも<fix123>賑やかで華やかな処だわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Netherworld is always lively and gorgeous.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>華やかなのは、幻想郷の春を奪った<fix123><fix123>からじゃなくて？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Isn't it gorgeous because you snatched spring away from Gensokyo?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら、春は嫌い？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh my. You dislike spring?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>好きだから怒ってる<fix123>何故、幻想郷の春度を奪った？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, I'm mad because I LIKE it.<fix123>So why did you steal it?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>春なら何でも良かったんだけど<fix123>まだ、もう少し足りないのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I took any spring that was spring.<fix123>Still, what we have is not enough.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>・・・さっきの死人はあんたと私を<fix123><fix123>闘わせたがってた様よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...So, that dead girl back there wants me to fight you.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もう少しで、最後の桜、西行妖<fix123><fix123>（さいぎょうあやかし）が咲くの<fix123>それさえ咲けば、全ての疑問は解けるわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Soon, the last cherry blossom, the Saigyou Ayakashi, will bloom.<fix123>Then all will be answered...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>その桜、枯れてるんじゃないの？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That cherry tree... isn't it withering?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もう少しで咲きそうなの<fix123>きっと、妖夢はあなたの持つなけなしの春<fix123><fix123>で、開花すると思ったのね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's on the verge of blooming.<fix123>Youmu must have thought that the small trace of spring you carry would be enough.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>興味は無い<fix123>それより、ここに来るのに丸一日以上<fix123><fix123>かかってしまったのが気になる<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I don't care.<fix123>I am worried that it took me over a day to get here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら、すぐに帰してあげるわよ<fix123>あなたはまだお呼びではないし<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I'll let you return to your home right away.<fix123>You're not to come here yet, anyway.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さっきの訂正、ここに来るのじゃなくて<fix123>幻想郷を春にするの、だわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Let me correct what I said. Not "to get here,"<fix123>but "to return Gensokyo's spring."<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら、地上はまだ桜が咲かないのかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Oh, could it be that the cherry blossoms in your world have yet to bloom?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>桜どころか、福寿草も咲かないわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No cherry blossoms; not even the pheasant's eyes bloom.[6]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それじゃぁ、心臓病の時困るわね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>In that case, it'd be troublesome if you developed a heart disease.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>困らない<fix123>そもそも、家のお嬢様が心臓弱い<fix123><fix123>訳ないし<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's not.<fix123>First of all, my mistress does not have a weak heart.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それは残念ね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's too bad...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>残念？<fix123><fix123>まぁ、草の話はいいのよ<fix123>そろそろ暖気が欲しいのよ<fix123>返して貰おうかしら、暖気を<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You expected it?<fix123><fix123>Well, alright. Enough talk of herbs.<fix123>I'm eager to have some warmth.<fix123>Return that warmth to us, now.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 幽雅に咲かせ、墨染の桜　～ Border of Life<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Bloom Nobly, Ink-black Cherry Blossom ~ Border of Life[7]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>亡骸は一箇所に集めるから<fix123>美しいのよ<fix123>春も桜も同じ・・・<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Corpses are beautiful<fix123>when they're gathered together in one place.<fix123>Same goes for the cherry blossoms and spring...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そもそも亡骸は美しくないし<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>First of all, corpses aren't beautiful.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だからね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I mean...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>必ず地上で花見を行うわ、姫の亡骸！<fix123>必ず封印を解いてみせる、悪魔の犬！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I will see flowers, rotting princess!<fix123><fix123>I will unseal the tree, dog of the devil!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yuyuko Saigyouji DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>身のうさを思ひしらでややみなまし<fix123>そむくならひのなき世なりせば<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My life might have ended knowing nothing of my misery<fix123>were this a world without the custom of priestly retreat [8]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yuyuko Saigyouji REVIVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>BGM: ボーダーオブライフ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Border of Life<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yuyuko Saigyouji DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>If player has continued<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Bad Ending　No. 03<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>If player has not continued and is using Sakuya-A<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Ending　No. 08<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>If player has not continued and is using Sakuya-B<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Ending　No. 09<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>白銀の春<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Spring of Silvery Snow<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Cherry petals must have fallen like snowflakes...<fix123>However, it was still silvery snow.<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Cherry petals should have fallen like snowflakes...<fix123>Yet it was still silver with snow.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 無何有の郷　～ Deep Mountain<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Paradise ~ Deep Mountain[1]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんで、私がこんなとこにいるんだ？<fix123>冬の雪山は遭難しやすいんだぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What the hell am I doing here?<fix123>It's easy to become lost in the winter mountains of snow.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Letty Whiterock ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>なんで遭難しやすいか、知ってる？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>And do you know why it is so easy to lose your way?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>冬の忘れ物<fix123>レティ・ホワイトロック<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What Winter Left Behind <fix123>Letty Whiterock<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>冬の雪無し山が無いからだな。<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Because in winter, there aren't any mountains without snow.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>やっぱり、あなたも遭難者？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's right.  Are you also a lost soul?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私は普通だぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Nah, I'm ordinary.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>かわいそうに、寒さにやられたのね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Poor thing, done in by the cold.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうだな。本来なら今ごろは、人間達が<fix123>桜の木の下で眠る季節だしな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So it seems. This should be a season when humans<fix123>nap beneath cherry trees.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>今年は冬が長いわねぇ。<fix123>私もいい加減、春眠したくなってきたわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The winter is indeed long this year.<fix123>I also want a long, deep, carefree sleep.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: クリスタライズシルバー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Crystallized Silver<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>しっかりしろ、この寒さで寝たら殺すぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hold on, if you sleep in this cold you will be killed.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Letty Whiterock DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>こんな奴でも<fix123>倒せば、少しは春度が増えたかな？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If I can defeat even this kind of opponent,<fix123>maybe spring will return a little bit at a time?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>マヨヒガの黒猫<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Black Cat of Mayohiga<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>It wavered in the village in which people are not.<fix123>"MAYOIGA"(apparitional village) refused human always.<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It wavered in the village in which people are not.<fix123>"Mayohiga", village of apparitions, has always refused humans.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 遠野幻想物語<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Fantastic Tales from Tono<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああもう。<fix123>ここは人間の様な何かが棲みそうな所だな<fix123>猫とか、犬とか、狐とか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ahhh...<fix123>Something human-like seems to live here.<fix123>A cat? A dog? A fox?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Chen ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>呼ばれて飛び出て．．．<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I hear the voices calling~...[2]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>凶兆の黒猫<fix123>橙（チェン）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Black Cat of Bad Omens<fix123>Chen<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>．．． 出る杭は打たれる、か？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>"Go farther and fare worse," eh?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>で、何の用？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So, what is your purpose here?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>四本足の生き物に用などないぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Nothing to do with four-legged creatures.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>迷い家にやってきたって事は、<fix123>道に迷ったんでしょ～？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You have reached the Village of the Lost.<fix123>Have you lost your way?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>道なんて無かったけどな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I never had any way to lose.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さっきから吹雪で視界悪いし、<fix123>風向きもころころ変ってるから<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Visibility was was horrible in that snowstorm,<fix123>and the winds were changing by the moment.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうか、風向きが変っていたのか<fix123>どうりで<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The winds were changing? I see.<fix123>No wonder...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ティアオイエツォン(withered leaf)<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Diao Ye Zong (withered leaf)<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>もう帰り道も判らないでしょ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>And now you don't know the way back.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どうりで<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No wonder.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Chen DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>どうりで<fix123>どうでもいい奴に遭うわけだぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No wonder.<fix123>I keep running into all these randos.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>人形租界の夜<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>One Night in the Settlement of the Dolls<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Is that it is snowing only this paradise?<fix123>The paradise was already Alice's playground.<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Is it snowing even in this paradise?<fix123>The paradise that is already Alice's playground.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: ブクレシュティの人形師<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Doll Maker of București<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Alice Margatroid ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Alice Margatroid LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>何だか<fix123>居心地がいいぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It seems...<fix123>...comfortable here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Alice Margatroid ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>こんな殺伐とした夜がいいのかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Do you find this brutal evening likable?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>七色の人形使い<fix123>アリス・マーガトロイド<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Seven-Colored Puppeteer <fix123>Alice Margatroid<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いいんだよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It isn't bad.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>所詮、あなたは野魔法使いね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Then surely you are a magician of the untamed fields.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>温室魔法使いよりはよくないか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>As opposed to a magician from a greenhouse?[3]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>都会派魔法使いよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>As opposed to a magician from a city sect.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あー？、辺境にようこそだな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ohー?  I get it—this is a welcome to the wilderness.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>田舎の春は寒くて嫌ねぇ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Springtime in this rural place is cold and disagreeable.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>誰の所為で春なのにこんな吹雪に<fix123>あってるんだよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I think not; some power is at work to cause such snowstorms in spring.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 人形裁判　～ 人の形弄びし少女<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Doll Judgement ~ The Girl who Played with People's Shapes<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ちなみに、私の所為ではないわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It is not my doing, you know.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そうかい<fix123>でも、なけなしの春くらいは<fix123>持ってそうだな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Is that so?<fix123>Even so, it seems that you hold some tiny spring of your own.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私も、あんたのなけなしの春くらいを<fix123>頂こうかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, perhaps I shall partake of your small spring as well?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Alice Margatroid DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>いつも冬ってこんなに<fix123>騒がしかったのか？<fix123>大体、普通の人間は表に出ないからなぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Have winters always been this busy?<fix123>Normal humans usually stay indoors.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私を普通の人間と一緒にしないでよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You mustn't consider me a normal human.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>異常な人間か？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are you a weird human, then?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>普通の人間以外！！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'm normal, just not human!!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>雲の上の桜花結界<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The Cherry Blossom Barrier from Above the Clouds<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Cherry petal has been coming down from over the cloud.<fix123>Does "Reisyouden"(Legendary place) exist really?<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Cherry petals have been falling from above the clouds.<fix123>Does "Reishouden", the legendary place, really exist?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 天空の花の都<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: The Capital City of Flowers in the Sky<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この結界は凄いな<fix123>素人にはさっぱり解き方が分らないぜ<fix123>何を隠してあるんだか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This barrier is amazing.<fix123>There's no way a novice like me can solve its mystery.<fix123>Is there something I'm missing?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Lyrica Prismriver ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>えへへ～<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Eh, heh, heh～.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>騒霊キーボーディスト<fix123>リリカ・プリズムリバー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Poltergeist Keyboardist<fix123>Lyrica Prismriver<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>企業秘密<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's a trade secret.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>オンパッキャラマド・・・<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Au pas, camarade[4]...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そんなんじゃ、この結界は開かないって<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That isn't going to work, kid.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どうでもいいけど、お前は誰だ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Fine, then.  So who are you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どうでもいいじゃん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It doesn't matter, does it?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、どうでもいいぜ<fix123>どうせ、倒せば扉が開くんだろ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yeah, I guess it doesn't.<fix123>So, if I defeat you, you'll open the gate?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Lunasa Prismriver ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>Merlin Prismriver ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>騒霊ヴァイオリスト<fix123>ルナサ・プリズムリバー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Poltergeist Violinist<fix123>Lunasa Prismriver<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>リリカのお友達？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Lyrica, is this a friend of yours?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お友達だぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yeah, a good friend.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お友達よ～<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>My friend, yes~<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>騒霊トランペッター<fix123>メルラン・プリズムリバー<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Poltergeist Trumpeter<fix123>Merlin Prismriver<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それは良かったわ<fix123>ようやくリリカにもお友達が出来て<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Wonderful.<fix123>At last, Lyrica has made a friend.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>で、早速だが<fix123>友達のよしみで、この結界を解いて<fix123>欲しい<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Alright, then.<fix123>My good friend, would you kindly open this door?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 幽霊楽団　～ Phantom Ensemble<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Phantom Band ~ Phantom Ensemble<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>その前に一曲聴いてからにしない？<fix123>友達のよしみで<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Won't you listen to just one song first, my good friend?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お代は見てのお帰りよ<fix123>友達のよしみの所為で<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It's a song of welcome.<fix123>To a dear new friend.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>よしみ～<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Friend~<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どうにも、あんたらじゃこの結界を<fix123>解けそうに無いぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If I didn't know any better,<fix123>I'd say you don't plan on opening this barrier.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さぁ演奏開始よ～<fix123>姉さん、やっちゃいな！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well then, let's start the performance～<fix123>Sisters, get ready!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お友達なんだから、たまにはソロで<fix123>やりなさいよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>She's your friend.<fix123>Play solo for a bit.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うぇ～<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Hey~<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>わかったよ、いつでも手助けする<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Alright, alright. I'll help you whenever you need.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>手助けは、無用だぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You don't need more help my friend, do you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Prismriver Sisters DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>さて、扉は開くのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, will you open the door?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>この扉は開かないわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>This door does not open.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>お前達は、この中に入るんじゃ<fix123>ないのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Don't you go through it now and then?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私達は上を飛び越えて入るのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We just fly over it.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>白玉楼階段の幻闘<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Spirit Battle on the Staircase of Hakugyokurou<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>The girl lived in the world after death.<fix123>They were a half of a phantom and human...<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The girl lived in the world after death.<fix123>She was half-phantom and half-human...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>願わくは<fix123><fix123>花の下にて<fix123><fix123>春死なむ<fix123><fix123><fix123>その如月の望月のころ<fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Let me die in spring <fix123><fix123>beneath the blossoms <fix123><fix123><fix123>at Kisaragi's full moon[5]<fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 東方妖々夢　～ Ancient Temple<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Eastern Ghostly Dream ~ Ancient Temple<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Youmu Konpaku ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>あなた、人間ね<fix123>ちょうどいい<fix123>あなたの持ってるなけなしの春を<fix123>すべて頂くわ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're a human, I see.<fix123>Just what I needed.<fix123>I shall drain every drop<fix123>of the spring from you!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Youmu Konpaku LEAVES<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>大分暖かくなってきたな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ahh, it's getting a lot warmer.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Youmu Konpaku ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>みんなが騒がしいと思ったら<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So this is why all the ghosts here were noisy...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>半分幻の庭師<fix123>魂魄　妖夢（こんぱくようむ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Half-fantasy Gardener<fix123>Youmu Konpaku<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>生きた人間だったのね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>...maybe because a living human has come here.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私が死体なら騒がないのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>If I'm a dead human, won't they make noise?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>騒がない<fix123>人間がここ白玉楼に来ることは<fix123>それ自体が死のはずなのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>No, not at all.<fix123>For a human to have come all the way to Hakugyokurou,<fix123>death is the only possible explanation.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私はきっと生きてるぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, I'm alive.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あなたは、その結界を自分で越えてきた<fix123>その愚かさに霊が騒がしくもなろう<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yet you passed through that barrier with your own will.<fix123>It's no wonder the spirits here are making a great clamor at your foolishness.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>で、ここは暖かくていいぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, it's warm here, anyway.  Nice and warm.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それはもう、幻想郷中の春が集まった<fix123>からね<fix123>普通の桜は満開以上に満開だわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That is because we have gathered all the spring essence in Gensokyo.<fix123>The ordinary cherry blossoms are beyond even the most idealized full bloom.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>死体が優雅にお花見とは洒落てるな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Dead bodies having a nice flower-viewing. How elegant.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それでも西行妖（さいぎょうあやかし）<fix123>は満開には足りない・・・<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yet even this immaculate bloom is insufficient for the Saigyou Ayakashi...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さいぎょうあやかし？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Saigyou Ayakashi?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>うちの自慢の妖怪桜よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Our pride and joy, our youkai cherry blossom.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それは見てみたい気もするぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'd like to have a look at that, myself.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ともかく、あとほんの僅かの春が集まれば<fix123>この西行妖も満開になる<fix123>あなたが持ってきたなけなしの春が<fix123>満開まであと一押しするってものよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>In any case, with just a little more spring,<fix123>our Saigyou Ayakashi will reach full bloom.<fix123>The tiny trace of spring that you brought here<fix123>will bring us yet another step closer to full bloom.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>しかし、折角集めた春を渡すつもりなど<fix123>あるわけも無いぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>After all that trouble collecting my spring.<fix123>I won't hand it to you so easily.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>満開まであと一押し！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>We are one step short of full bloom!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>いっそのこと、私がお前の集めた春を<fix123>全て奪って<fix123>その妖怪桜を咲かせてやるぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Or better yet, what would you say if I were to snatch away all of your spring<fix123>to make those cherry blossoms bloom for myself?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私の集めた春は渡しやしない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I will not hand over my spring.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>私もな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Me neither.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 広有射怪鳥事　～ Till when?<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Hiroari Shoots a Strange Bird ~ Till When?[6]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>・・・妖怪が鍛えたこの楼観剣に<fix123>斬れぬものなど、殆ど無い！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>The things that cannot be cut by my Roukanken, forged by youkai...<fix123>are as good as none!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Youmu Konpaku DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>さぁ、その妖怪桜まで案内してもらおうか<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>So, show me the way to the Saigyou Ayakashi, will you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>どの道、西行妖が満開になるんだったら<fix123>それでもいいんだけど<fix123>なんか納得いかない<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Anyway, the Saigyou Ayakashi will bloom.<fix123>So my job is fulfilled.<fix123>But I have a bad feeling about this...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>誰が、満開にするなんていったんだ？<fix123>私は花見がしたいだけだぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who said I was going to bloom the Saigyou Ayakashi?<fix123>I just want to have a flower-viewing.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>厭離穢士<fix123>欣求浄土<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Loathing this unclean world<fix123>Seeking rebirth in the Pure Land<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>彼の世に嬢の亡骸<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>A Maiden's Remains in the Other World<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ほとけには桜の花をたてまつれ<fix123>我が後の世を人とぶらはば<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Please offer cherry blossoms to the Buddha<fix123>Should you wish to mourn for me in the other world[7]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: アルティメットトゥルース<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Ultimate Truth<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Youmu Konpaku ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>これ以上踏み込んで<fix123>お嬢様に殺されても知らないわよ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Don't step any further!<fix123>Believe me, the young mistress will not hesitate to kill!<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>そもそも、この先に行かないと<fix123>この春は渡せないんだが<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, if I don't go any further,<fix123>I can't exactly hand over my spring to you guys.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Youmu Konpaku DEFEATED<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>どこに行っても<fix123>満開だな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Everywhere I go,<fix123>everything is in full bloom.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まだまだ<fix123>あと少しなのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Not yet.<fix123>It shall happen soon.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>Yuyuko Saigyouji ENTERS<fix123><fix123>
<fix123>もう少し春があれば<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>With just a little more spring...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>幽冥楼閣の亡霊少女<fix123>西行寺 幽々子（さいぎょうじゆゆこ）<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ghost Girl in the Netherworld Tower<fix123>Yuyuko Saigyouji<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>西行妖（さいぎょうあやかし）も<fix123>完全に咲くわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Even the Saigyou Ayakashi will be in perfect bloom.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>持ってきたぜ<fix123>その、なけなしの春を<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I got it right here.<fix123>That last drop of spring.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら、あなたが妖夢の後継ぎかしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Ah. Would you like to take Youmu's place, then?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>まさか、私はこんな辺鄙な処で<fix123>一生を終えたくないぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Nah, I wouldn't want to live out the rest of my life in a place like this.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>じゃ、代用品？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>How about just a subsitute?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>話を聞いてるのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are you listening to me?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>聞いてるわよ<fix123>死ぬ時は桜の木の下で死にたい<fix123>ってことでしょ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I am.<fix123>You're saying that when you die, you want to die beneath a cherry tree?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>何を訳分らんことを言っているんだ？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You don't understand what I am saying, do you?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>とにかく、どうしても西行妖の封印を<fix123>解きたいのよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Anyway, all I want is to loosen the seal on the Saigyou Ayakashi.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>だから、させてやるぜ<fix123>何か良い事あるのか？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well, do it, then.<fix123>Is something good going to happen?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>さぁ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Who knows?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ただじゃ、渡せん<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Well then, I ain't giving it up for free.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>花見なんてどうかしら<fix123>うちの花見は賑やかで楽しいわよ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What about our flower viewing?<fix123>It shall be lively and exciting.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ちょっと前に、賑やかそうな奴らを<fix123>倒して来たような・・・<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Just a little while, I killed some lively and exciting guys on my way up here...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>なんにしても、冥界の桜は<fix123>人間には目の毒かしら？<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are the cherry blossoms of the Netherworld not tempting enough for human eyes?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、この辺は死臭でいっぱいだな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Maybe if this place didn't reek of death.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あら、あなたは目で臭いを嗅ぐのね<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Are you smelling with your eyes?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ああ、匂うな<fix123>こんな辛気臭い春も初めてだぜ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Yes, exactly.<fix123>Damn, this is the first time I see such an irritating spring.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>失礼ね<fix123>そんなここの春は、あなた達の住む<fix123>幻想郷の春よ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You are rude.<fix123>The spring that you feel here is none other than the spring of your Gensokyo.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>失礼な<fix123>誰が、目で匂いを嗅ぐ！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>That's rude.<fix123>What kind of person can smell with their eyes!?<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>会話がずれてるずれてる<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You're lagging behind in the conversation.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>あの世は音速が遅い<fix123>そんな音速の遅い処には<fix123>この春はやれねぇな<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>Sound travels slowly in the Netherworld.<fix123>A place with such a slow speed of sound does not deserve a pleasant spring.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: 幽雅に咲かせ、墨染の桜　～ Border of Life<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>BGM: Bloom Nobly, Ink-black Cherry Blossom ~ Border of Life[8]<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>それは残念<fix123>今度から、空気の温度を上げて<fix123>話ますわ<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>What a pity.<fix123>I'll turn up the heat and we can continue our chat.<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>ついでで良いが・・・<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>You can do that later...<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>でも、折角だし<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>It'll take just a moment—<fix123><fix123>

jp_dialogue: <fix123>辛気臭い春を返して貰うぜ、死人嬢！<fix123>なけなしの春をいただくわ、黒い魔！<fix123><fix123>
en_dialogue: <fix123>I'll take my boring spring, corpse-girl!<fix123>I'll take your pitiful spring, black witch!<fix123><fix123>
